commentary: kumar to mccullum, 1 wide, thats wide, as praveen bowls one down the legs
kumar to mccullum, no run, too straight, mccullum drives hard to midwicket, who is sharp
khan to mccullum, four runs, bang, thats four! mccullum gets it in his area and though it comes in he gives it a nice thump over midwicket for the first boundary in ipl

khan to mccullum, six runs, the first six! zaheer has mccullum in a tangle as he looks to go one way but ends up hitting it another, he walks down and tries to work it to leg but ends up with a thick outside-edge that flies over and over third man! wow!
noffke to mccullum, 5 wides, terrible start, miles down leg stump and the wicketkeeper cant stop it
noffke to mccullum, 1 leg bye, a close shout, as mccullum tries to flick but misses, looks like it was marginally outside the line
noffke to ganguly, no run, swing and a miss! comes dancing down but doesn't connect at all
kumar to mccullum, 1 run, slower ball, very well bowled, mccullum flashes hard and get a thick edge past the vacant slip region, third man does the fielding
kallis to mccullum, no run, walks outside his crease, misses the ball and gets struck outside the line of impact, kallis half-appeals but the umpire is not interested
kallis to mccullum, no run, thats wider, mccullum flashes, and connects with hot air
kallis to mccullum, 1 run, slower ball comes into him and he adjusts, pushing to midwicket
joshi to ponting, 1 run, some good turn, spins away and draws a leading-edge to cover
joshi to mccullum, 1 run, too straight and flat and he turns it past square leg
joshi to ponting, 1 run, fired on leg again and thats more runs past square leg
joshi to mccullum, 1 run, goes for an encore but finds the fielder in the deep, on the bounce
kallis to ponting, four runs, unlucky for kallis! ponting eyes bangalore's mg road and heaves across the line, the thick edge flies down to third man
kallis to ponting, 4 byes, thats byes, as ponting walks down, misses, and boucher fails to stop
joshi to ponting, no run, uses his feet, joshi beats him in the air and collects the ball
kallis to ponting, out, gone! ponting tries to go downtown, but instead mistimes it up into the starry night and praveen sits under it at mid-off to send him on his way
kallis to mccullum, four runs, slower delivery down leg, mccullum shuffles and turns it superbly down to fine leg, past the fielder, for four more
kallis to mccullum, 2 runs, flashed, and well fielded! mccullum gives kallis the kitchen sink but kohli dives excellently to his right at point to take pace off the ball and keep him to two
joshi to hussey, 1 run, and he's off the mark with a drive down to long-off, using his feet

joshi to mccullum, 2 runs, gets down and heaves past square leg again, timing it terribly, but the fast outfield speeds it out to the deep and a superb dive from praveen on the ropes saves two ... its referred for a while and the verdict is that its safe
white to hussey, four runs, thats a seam-up delivery down leg and his victorian team-mate helps it along its way down to fine leg, poor start
white to hussey, 1 run, better delivery, hussey punches to mid-on for a single
white to mccullum, six runs, thats outta here! mccullum skips down, giving himself room, and slams him over deep midwicket for another dinger
white to mccullum, four runs, and again, skips down and hammers this down to long-off
white to mccullum, 2 wides, this one slants well down leg stump and boucher fumbles
white to hussey, 1 run, tighter delivery, hussey farms the strike over with a push to midwicket
noffke to hussey, no run, slower ball goes past his outside-edge as he skips down and misses
khan to hussey, 1 run, exposes the stumps and again and just gets bat on it, driving to cover
noffke to hussey, out, and he strikes! hussey goes for a big hit, slashing the ball up in the air and the spiraling top-edge is well held by white, running backward from point
noffke to mohammad hafeez, 1 run, biffed down over mccullum's head, not timed but its a run
kallis to mccullum, no run, misses out on this one, swinging wildly
kallis to mccullum, four runs, flashes at this, losing a hand off the bat, but noffke misfields on the rope
kallis to mohammad hafeez, four runs, now hafeez gets going, paddling the last ball into the gap
kumar to mccullum, no run, slower ball just outside off, he misses and its a dot ball
dinda to dravid, 1 run, off the mark immediately, reaching out and slapping the ball to deep point
dinda to jaffer, 1 wide, and thats very wide outside off stump, jaffer cant reach out
dinda to dravid, 1 run, hint of swing but thats sweetly driven to mccullum at mid-off ... so he's not keeping wickets but is on the field ... and thats a great diving effort
dinda to kallis, 1 run, some width on offer and he steers it away from his body past gully
dinda to jaffer, 1 wide, backs away, dinda bowls it too wide, some movement but wrong line
dinda to jaffer, no run, walks down, dinda shapes the ball away and jaffer hangs the bat out
dinda to jaffer, 1 run, a better shot this time, more orthodox, driven towards mid-off
sharma to kallis, 1 leg bye, walks a long way outside off and misses the shot, cant give those out
sharma to jaffer, no run, another atrocious shot from jaffer, standing and chasing it with no footwork, the ball seams away and just beats the bat
sharma to jaffer, no run, another dot ball as he fails to make contact ... kolkata keep it tight
agarkar to kallis, no run, thats wide outside off, swinging away, batsman slashes but misses
agarkar to white, no run,
dinda to jaffer, no run, thats a wide well outside off stump, a needless run
dinda to jaffer, out, edged and taken! dinda strikes again, getting jaffer chasing another wide one only to hand first slip a neat catch
dinda to boucher, no run, nips in off the seam, boucher tries to swat across the line and the ball narrowly skims over the bails
dinda to boucher, 1 run, drives from his crease and gets an inside-edge to midwicket, then scampers
dinda to boucher, no run, another top delivery, seaming in and rising to have him in a mess
agarkar to white, no run, good movement again as agarkar hits the upright seam, white is foxed
agarkar to boucher, 1 wide, thats called wide as he just loses concentration - maybe he saw them too!
agarkar to boucher, 1 wide, another wide as he pitches well outside the stumps, then shakes his head
agarkar to boucher, four runs, good improve from boucher, shuffling and flicking out to deep square leg
ganguly to white, 1 run, wrong line and the ball is tucked down to deep square leg
ganguly to boucher, 1 leg bye, slips in from middle and leg, raps him on the leg, ganguly asks the question but replays show it was missing leg
agarkar to akhil, no run, moves away past the outside-edge as he flirts from the crease
agarkar to noffke, no run, slides down leg stump, he misses out on the flick, agarkar fields
agarkar to noffke, 1 wide, too wide outside off, exaggerated movement, asad rauf spreads his wings
agarkar to noffke, 1 wide, another wide as agarkar sprays it around, rauf is not impressed
ganguly to kumar, no run, swings from his crease and the ball raps him, but koertzen reckons it was missing leg stump, very close shout
ganguly to kumar, 1 wide, slants down leg stump and saha takes it excellently, top footwork too
ganguly to noffke, four runs, thats four, too straight and turned down to fine leg, ganguly is furious
ganguly to noffke, 1 run, straight again and he turns it to kartik at midwicket this time
agarkar to noffke, no run, hits the deck and he gets back to play it away, another dot ball
agarkar to noffke, no run, stands his ground and chases it, but cannot get bat onto it
agarkar to noffke, no run, again noffke chases one wide of off stump and fails to connect
agarkar to kumar, four runs, thick outside-edge gets praveen a boundary, as he slashes from his crease and the ball flies well wide of the lone slip to third man
ganguly to khan, no run, sharp movement, jags in and catches him in a mess, ganguly asks the question but he says sorry boss, not that one ... but lovely seam position from gangs
ganguly to khan, 1 run, this one is pushed to mid-on and zaheer hurriedly calls praveen across
ganguly to kumar, no run, tidy stuff again, keeping it stump-to-stump, praveen plods it back
ganguly to kumar, 1 run, shuffles across and tucks this one past the man at midwicket
shukla to khan, 1 run, better stuff, straight on the stumps, pushed to mid-on this time
shukla to khan, no run, makes room and the ball follows him, nipping away past the bat
shukla to khan, 1 run, gets back and pushes this one into the covers for a single

ganguly to khan, out, cleaned up, zaheer missing the line completely for off stump to be pegged back and ganguly runs off in celebration and ponting runs towards him and the two embrace ... now thats a sight, eh?
ganguly to kumar, no run, dropped! by ponting! praveen gets a leading edge that spirals up in the air and ponting, always struggling as he runs behind, fails to hold on
ganguly to kumar, no run, slips down and catches him outside the line of leg stump
sharma to joshi, 1 wide, very wide outside off, carries on past the bat and wide is duly called
sharma to kumar, 1 leg bye, slides well down leg stump, praveen calls for the leg-bye and gets it
shukla to joshi, 1 wide, poor ball, very wide outside off stump and another freebie to the total

lee to hayden, four runs, now that's hayden for you, walking down the track and swatting lee to midwicket for four, speedy outfield and that races away, this is the aussie rivalry we've been waiting for
sreesanth to patel, four runs, edged and through where second slip would have been, might not have carried but that is four more, parthiv is going after sreesanth in style
sreesanth to patel, 2 runs, that was nearly one more, neatly clattered past point but the point fielder (hopes) got his hands to it, so that's only two, this is sloppy stuff from sreesanth.
sreesanth to patel, 1 wide, round the wicket this time, wide of the stumps, too wide in fact, parthiv lets it go and that's called wide

lee to hayden, no run, hayden makes room and tries to smash that towards delhi, inside edge rattles the stumps but it doesn't matter, rarely has such a rattling of timber prompted such muted reactions
lee to hussey, 1 run, straight and on the body, defended cautiously. this is pura cup action in mohali. nsw v queensland and wa
lee to hussey, no run, tapped to the off side but goel is there, diving and stopping the single, he's already making an impression. good comeback from lee after a minor hammering.

hopes to hayden, four runs, dropped, hayden walking down the track and tries to smash him over mid-on straight away, but that's not that well timed, it ballons up towards wilkin mota at mid-on but he mis-times his jump and fluffs the chance, that runs away, it could be a costly miss

hopes to hayden, six runs, and he makes 'em pay, down the track and smoked away way, way over long-off for six, that's a biggie, teeing off with remarkable ease. what was that about rubbing salt into wounds?
hopes to hayden, no run, gives himself room and tries to smash it over midwicket but that was a slower ball and he couldn't make contact, wild hoick that

hopes to hayden, 1 run, another swish, this is like a windmill now, leading edge sails high and between the mid-off and cover fielders. just realised hopes is queensland too. this is an inter-state rivalry now.
hopes to hussey, 1 run, down the track and tries to swat it over mid-on, can't get the timing right, straight to the fielder
pathan to hussey, 1 run, slower one this time, straight too, hussey just turns it away towards midwicket, easy single
pathan to raina, four runs, down the leg side and that's bread and butter for raina, tucked away neatly down to fine leg for four, pathan lets out some venom
pathan to raina, 1 run, slight change of pace again, raina pushes in the air but he was a bit too early on that, falls in the gap and they pick up a single
goel to hussey, 1 run, similar ball, hussey tries to turn it and get two more, but they decide against it
goel to hussey, no run, turned away towards the leg side but they can't get a single
chawla to raina, no run, better ball that, straight and on middle, tucked away to the leg side
mota to hussey, 1 run, good ball that time, change of pace and slightly wide of off, tapped to cover for a single
hopes to hussey, 1 leg bye, tries to turn it to the leg side, leading edge pops towards point
pathan to badrinath, 1 run, forced through the covers for a quick single, yuvraj dives but they manage the run
lee to badrinath, 1 run, tapped to the off side, slower one there

lee to hussey, 1 run, and that's the hundred, the second in as many games, a hundred off 50 balls, mccullum's 100 was off 53 balls, this is quicker, he brings it up by tapping one to the off side, a big smile across his face and he can't hold his joy
lee to hussey, six runs, that's blitzed over square leg for a magnificent six, scooped way over square leg for another six, this is turning into a carnage now, hussey turning it on
hopes to badrinath, six runs, slower one, but badri detects that early, stands back, moves across and belts it way over square leg for a big six, he's showing his worth here
oram to goel, four runs, start as you go, smashed through the leg side for a boundary
oram to goel, no run, left alone outside off
oram to goel, no run, drives but can't make contact
oram to hopes, four runs, width offered and hopes clatters it through point for a four, that was crisply struck and races away
oram to goel, 1 run, straight one this time, no room to free his arms, tip and run towards cover, 11 off the over, they needed 12 at the start of the innings.
gony to goel, no run, tapped to point and think of a single but 'no' is the loud call
gony to goel, 1 run, sliced away to third man, well fielded there and keeps them to a single
gony to goel, 2 runs, on middle and leg, turned away towards square for a couple
oram to hopes, no run, tries to power it past oram but well fielded by the big man, every dot ball is priceless here
oram to goel, 1 run, slower one this time, 118kph, pushed to the off side for a single
oram to hopes, four runs, smoked over mid-off for a one-bounce four, that was outide off and he used the horizontal bat to great effect
gony to goel, 1 run, glided away to third man for a single, goel giving the strike to his international partner
gony to goel, 1 wide, too wide that one, goel flays but he gets an extra ball after missing it
muralitharan to sangakkara, 1 run, down the track and crisply driven to long-off for a single, sangakkara must be feeling a bit odd facing murali instead of keeping to him
muralitharan to sangakkara, 1 leg bye, down the leg side, swept but the ball catches the pad and goes towards the slips, a mis-field allows for a single
muralitharan to hopes, 1 run, fine over that, driven to long-off for a single, just six off murali's first over
amarnath to sangakkara, 1 run, too wide from amarnath, slapped through point for a single, that could have been a wide if he had let it go
amarnath to hopes, four runs, that's his fifty and he brings it up in style, cracked through midwicket for a blistering four, 24-ball half-century from hopes, what a cracker
amarnath to hopes, 1 run, dropped, that was crunched straight back at the bowler, he stretched his right hand out but saw the ball popping out, tough chance but one nevertheless
joginder sharma to hopes, four runs, that's clobbered over midwicket for another four, hopes on fire here, unstoppable now, joginder doesn't know where to look
joginder sharma to sangakkara, 1 wide, down the leg side, sangakkara can't get his bat onto that one, wide called
joginder sharma to sangakkara, 1 run, slower one that stops on the batsman, sangakkara chips it square for a single
muralitharan to sangakkara, 1 run, down the track and carved through the in-field for a single
amarnath to sangakkara, 1 run, driven through covers and hayden does well to keep them down to a single

amarnath to hopes, out, holes out this time, slower one and hopes can't get the timing and lofts it straight to joginder at long-off, too easy for him and amarnath is overjoyed, chennai break through, brett lee sighs in the dug-out
amarnath to sangakkara, 1 run, glided through third man for a single. the crowds going hoarse here
amarnath to yuvraj singh, 1 run, 129.5kph, outside off, steered to third man for a single, yuvraj is away
joginder sharma to yuvraj singh, 1 run, pushed towards mid-off for a quick single, a game of cat-and-mouse here, someone needs to go for broke ... and now
amarnath to sangakkara, 1 leg bye, tries to shuffle across and heave it over the leg side but can't make contact, has to be happy with a single

amarnath to yuvraj singh, six runs, there is goes, yuvraj tees off as only he can, smooth swing of the bat and rips that way over long-off for a six, 91 metres that one, what a monster. the king is here, long live the king
amarnath to yuvraj singh, 1 run, sliced towards cover, can't get the timing there but they poach a single

amarnath to yuvraj singh, four runs, gives himself room, the bowler follows him but that's swatted through midwicket for a four, fine placement despite the bowler following him, yuvraj motoring along here
muralitharan to yuvraj singh, 1 run, down the track and pushed to the cover region for a single
muralitharan to yuvraj singh, 1 run, thinks of dancing down the track but stops in the last moment, flicked away to fine leg
muralitharan to sangakkara, 2 wides, too far down the leg side, surely a wide and a bye too
muralitharan to yuvraj singh, no run, good finish, two dots in a row, quicker one that is pushed back to the bowler

joginder sharma to sangakkara, 1 run, that is close! batsman makes room and gets one to midwicket, they think of a single but sangakkara needs to go back, he slips but makes a valiant attempt, no direct hit but dhoni grabs the ball and dislodges the bails, the third umpire is called up and this is really close. waiting, waiting .... and he's safe. it was a line call but the benefit had to go to the batsman.

joginder sharma to yuvraj singh, out, huge wicket that silences the crowd! joginder takes off the pace and deceives yuvraj, big hit goes wrong, not much timing and amarnath comes around towards deep extra cover to take a sharp catch under pressure. yuvraj needs to go and punjab's hopes are slowly going up in smoke.
amarnath to katich, 1 bye, slower one this time, tries to swat it through the on side but that beats the bat

amarnath to sangakkara, 2 runs, another crazy-looking shot from sangakkara, he's targetting the area behind fine leg but hasn't managed to get even one there, flays wildly and gets it in the air towards square
gony to sangakkara, four runs, finall sangakkara gets the shot he's been looking for, walks across the stumps and shovels it over fine leg for a four, he's been looking for that shot for a while now.
muralitharan to pathan, no run, pushed back to the bowler, fine over at this point, murali is quite a champion
oram to katich, 1 run, pushed to mid-on for a single, that's a good way to go about it
joginder sharma to pathan, no run, slower one to finish, irfan can't make contact and it dribbles through to the keeper
mcgrath to kohli, no run, thats an expected channel from a man who retired after the world cup, on the dime outside off stump with a hint of movement and kohli leaves it be
mcgrath to kohli, no run, similar line as the ball wobbles off the seam and beats kohli's slash
mcgrath to kohli, no run, oh ho, that very nearly knocked back the base of off stump as kohli inside-edges a drive but looks back as the ball misses its mark, theres some movement out there
mcgrath to kohli, 1 wide, first runs come courtesy a wide outside off, kohli charges down but misses
geeves to kohli, no run, there's some bounce, the ball beating pathan's limp bat outside off stump
geeves to kohli, no run, drives from the crease and the away swing beats the bat again
mcgrath to kohli, no run, this one's closer to the stumps and kohli tries to nibble it fine but misses
mcgrath to kohli, out, gone! kohli decides to take on mcgrath by skipping down but only succeeds in swiping the ball to manhas at midwicket, who takes a simple catch
mcgrath to watson, no run, straighter one and watson turns it towards square leg
mcgrath to watson, no run, leaves this one outside off and thats the first maiden in the ipl
geeves to pathan, 1 run, quick outside off, tapped towards cover for a single
mcgrath to kaif, no run, another inside-edge as kaif just tries to drive from the crease, with zero footwork, and survives as the ball takes bat then back leg
mcgrath to kaif, 1 run, thats too straight, and kaif gets off the mark with an uppish shot in the air past a diving midwicket
maharoof to watson, no run, he drives from the crease and drags it towards midwicket, hit too hard
maharoof to watson, 1 run, change of pace squares him up and he ends up edging towards gully
bhatia to kaif, 2 runs, stands and punches this one past point and lehmann has some running to do
bhatia to kaif, no run, plays and misses from his crease, good seam positioning
bhatia to kaif, no run, an action replay of sorts, except this ball sits up, and well taken too
maharoof to lehmann, 1 run, flowing square-drive from lehmann, creamed past point for one

maharoof to lehmann, out, and the big man goes! lehmann shuffles across and tries to turn a straight one past square leg but misses, and even before maharoof can complete his appeal umpire pratapkumar shoots up the finger, it pitched on leg stump and looked out, though lehmann didn't think so
bhatia to jadeja, no run, flicks a straighter one uppishly to the fielder at midwicket, didn't carry
bhatia to kaif, no run, slower delivery, kaif shuffles but cannot work the ball past midwicket
vettori to jadeja, 1 run, looped up on off stump and he pushes into the covers for a single
vettori to jadeja, no run, thinks about stepping out but vettori fires it in and he defends to cover
bhatia to salunkhe, four runs, thats an intellectual edge, salunkhe opening the face and sneaking it past karthik's gloves down to the third man fence
bhatia to jadeja, 2 wides, pitches well wide of the stumps, karthik fumbles so thats a couple
bhatia to salunkhe, no run, good stuff, no room to work with and the ball is just turned to midwicket
bhatia to jadeja, 1 run, gives himself room and drills this one down to the man at long-off
geeves to jadeja, four runs, now there's a shot and a half! jadeja creates room and goes over point
geeves to jadeja, no run, tries to get cheeky, exposing the stumps, but cannot make contact
vettori to jadeja, six runs, great shot, man! jadeja dances down and heaves this one over mid-on

vettori to jadeja, out, but this is vettori, and he's been around for a while now! the wily veteran fires it in fast and flat and jadeja, exposing the stumps in an attempt to steer it away, fails to get bat on it much to vettori's pleasure ...smart bowling after being carted for six
vettori to warne, no run, slides down leg stump, warne misses out on the flick to midwicket
vettori to warne, 1 run, single to end the over, warne also turning one past midwicket
vettori to salunkhe, 1 run, cheeky shot, opening the face and dabbing to a fumbling gully fielder
vettori to warne, no run, oh ho ho ho, warne also tries the cheeky shot as he shows all his three stumps and very narrowly gets bat on the arm ball, chopping to point
vettori to warne, 1 run, uses his feet and goes aerial, good shot but just the single
vettori to salunkhe, no run, another arm ball, which is played to backward point rather well
maharoof to warne, out, goes for a booming drive over extra-cover, gets a thick inside-edge onto the back leg and it proceeds to roll onto the base of his stumps, dislodging the bails
maharoof to trivedi, no run, slower ball on off stump, trivedi backs away and chops to cover
maharoof to trivedi, 1 run, slower delivery again, trivedi picks it and chops it into the covers for one
vettori to trivedi, no run, tosses it up on middle and leg, trivedi plays it towards mid-on
vettori to salunkhe, four runs, good use of the feet, and a clean smash over long-off, makes for a top shot
mcgrath to salunkhe, four runs, nicely done! salunkhe just walks across the stumps and scoops it over karthik
mcgrath to salunkhe, no run, walks way outside off and attempts it again, but cannot connect
mcgrath to salunkhe, 1 run, well bowled, right up there in the zone, and salunkhe drives to midwicket
mcgrath to trivedi, 1 run, makes room and drives hard to extra-cover for a single
mcgrath to salunkhe, 2 runs, strides down and heaves, getting an inside-edge down to deep square leg
patel to gambhir, no run, tidy delivery on off stump, he stands his ground and pushes to point
patel to gambhir, no run, dances down and drives hard but misses completely on the booming shot
watson to sehwag, four runs, and he just hammers this one straight over watson's head, wasn't a bad ball but it was in sehwag's zone and he launches it for four
watson to sehwag, four runs, make that three in row! sehwag opens the face of the bat and places that superbly between the wide first slip and the 'keeper and the kotla goes ballistic
watson to dhawan, 1 wide, bad ball, sliding down leg for a wide as it beats the bat
patel to gambhir, four runs, smoked! gambhir makes room and slashes over deep point for four
patel to dhawan, 1 run, very wide and dhawan reaches out, slapping it into the covers, he loses his bat but runs down and just makes his ground, leaping out of the ball's way
patel to gambhir, six runs, now there's a shot! gambhir sashays down and lofts it over extra-cover for six
patel to gambhir, four runs, very well played, as gambhir kneels down and gently glides the ball between the yawning gap from the wicketkeeper and slip, the crowd goes berzerk
trivedi to gambhir, 1 run, looks to make room but the change of pace draws an inside-edge past leg stump
watson to dhawan, 1 run, decent delivery on off stump but dhawan pushes into the covers
watson to dhawan, no run, this one's wide outside off, dhawan slashes and misses and then looks up to umpire aleem dar, who remains unmoved ... a marginal call
trivedi to dhawan, 1 wide, slower ball slips out and ends up very wide outside off stump

trivedi to dhawan, 2 runs, shuffles across and turns the ball from off stump through midwicket, sprinting hard and diving to make his ground as a high throw comes back in, and thats the 50-run partnership
trivedi to dhawan, no run, this one lifts sharply and he tries a cheeky glide over the 'keepers head, but misses
warne to gambhir, no run, legbreak on the stumps, gambhir tucks it straight to midwicket
warne to dhawan, 1 run, this time he connects but under-edges the topspinner wide of leg stump
pathan to gambhir, 1 wide, spins sharply down the stumps and a wide is called, 'keeper fumbles

pathan to gambhir, 1 run, dropped! gambhir plays another booming drive in the air, very hard and warne sticks out his left hand but cannot clutch on to it at cover ... he had very little time to react and did well to take some pace off the bat
pathan to dhawan, 1 run, quicker one foxes dhawan, who edges wide of the 'keeper and leg stump
warne to gambhir, 1 run, dances down and drills this one to mid-off, very firmly struck
warne to gambhir, 1 run, flat on off stump, he makes room and steers this one past point
warne to gambhir, 1 run, uses his feet and drives the flatter one down to munat at long-off
pathan to gambhir, 1 run, flat on middle and leg, gambhir shuffles and pushes to midwicket
salunkhe to gambhir, 1 run, outside off and gambhir gets onto the toes to punch into the covers
salunkhe to dhawan, 5 wides, rubbish delivery, slides way down leg stump and the 'keeper can't get there
watson to dhawan, 1 run, too much width and dhawan slaps it out to the deep cover fielder
watson to gambhir, 1 run, goes for a square-drive, chopping into the ground at point and running hard
watson to gambhir, 1 run, more room and gambhir drives it out to pathan at deep cover
trivedi to gambhir, 1 run, again he errs in line and gambhir turns him off the hips to fine leg
trivedi to dhawan, 2 runs, heaves this one and though its mistimed he gets a couple past mid-on
trivedi to dhawan, four runs, dances down and swings this one over trivedi's head for four, firm shot
kumar to ronchi, no run, thats a ripper, hitting the upright seam and sits up, kissing the flap of his pad, praveen appeals but the umpire is unmoved
kumar to ronchi, four runs, gets some width and creams that over backward point, one bounce and four, which gets the crowd into a tizzy
khan to ronchi, no run, straighter one and ronchi taps that away to the fielder
khan to ronchi, no run, pitches outside leg stump and catches him on the roll, zaheer and the slips ask the question but umpire harper shakes his head, was struck outside marginally

khan to ronchi, out, oh well held, kohli! ronchi drives into the air towards cover-point and kohli plucks a superb catch diving away to his left and low to the ground, that was firmly struck but he did excellenty

kumar to jayasuriya, four runs, well if youre gonna flash, flash hard! jayasuriya goes for a slash outside off stump and edges very hard over the gap between slips and gully, the ball bounces and goes over the hoarding and hits a little girl in the crowd ... hope shes okay
kumar to thornely, no run, invites the drive and thornely obliges with no footwork, missing completely
kallis to jayasuriya, 1 wide, poor start, pitching outside leg and its just skims down for a wide
kallis to jayasuriya, four runs, good clean hit from jayasuriya, seeing the ball in his arc and teeing off downtown for a bottom-handed smash, crowd loves it
kallis to jayasuriya, four runs, same result! this one's hit straighter and with firm control
kallis to jayasuriya, no run, this one goes across him and he dabs it away to backward point
vinay kumar to uthappa, 1 run, starts off too straight and uthappa tucks it down to fine leg, where zaheer runs around and does well on the ropes
akhil to uthappa, 1 run, a touch too straight and some deft work with the wrists allows uthappa one past square leg and midwicket, well complimented by shah's running
akhil to shah, 1 run, again he's too straight and so shah flicks in the air to square leg
akhil to shah, 1 run, plays from the crease, and away from his body, edging wide of boucher and down the man doing duty at third man
kallis to shah, 1 leg bye, comes down to try and flick it away but gets an inside-edge to cover
kallis to shah, four runs, again shah gets some width and opens the face, beating the gap at gully
vinay kumar to uthappa, 1 run, similarly tight delivery but this time uthappa rides it and drops it near point
vinay kumar to shah, 1 leg bye, slips in and catches him on the thigh as he tries to nudge it away, struck outside the line and the height was also a factor, shah does well to scamper a leg-bye
vinay kumar to uthappa, no run, comes down and heaves at it but misses as the ball lifts on him
joshi to shah, 1 run, flat arm ball on the stumps, shah waits for turn and plays to point
joshi to shah, no run, spins flat outside off stump, shah reaches out but cant get there
joshi to uthappa, no run, well bowled, the arm ball spitting up and just beating the face of the bat as uthappa tries to cheeky dab, too close for comfort
joshi to uthappa, 1 run, again he exposes the stumps and steers this one to backward point
akhil to nayar, 1 bye, sees the width and slaps it but gets an under-edge wide of boucher

kumar to uthappa, 2 runs, this time he makes contact, scooping it over boucher to fine leg, where the fielder collects and fires in a throw to boucher, who whips off the bails but uthappa dives to make it back in time
kallis to uthappa, 1 run, walks down and drills him down to mid-off, where chanderpaul dives

kallis to uthappa, 1 run, madness, uthappa walking well across his stumps before the ball is bowled, trying to scoop it away to leg but instead getting a leading-edge to kohli at point, then the throw misses else he was a goner
kallis to uthappa, four runs, good shot, just scooping from middle and off to fine leg .. that makes it 43 from three overs from kallis
akhil to nayar, 1 run, steps outside leg, akhil follows him and nayar drives to mid-on
akhil to pollock, four runs, lucky start for polly, driving and inside-edging down to fine leg
vinay kumar to nayar, six runs, clean biff, just using his feet and going dead straight for six over the sightscreen! not a bad ball at all, just some good old fashioned hitting
vinay kumar to pollock, six runs, oh thats bigger and better! polly! he's enjoying his post-retirement cricket, just creating room and repeating the shot but this time for half a dozen
vinay kumar to pollock, 1 run, shuffles down and across, whipping across the line to keep strike
nehra to chanderpaul, 1 run, tight line, but chanderpaul picks it and steers past backward point
nehra to chanderpaul, four runs, on middle and leg and he picks it up over midwicket for a flat four
pollock to dravid, no run, gets up his toes and crunches it to backward point, who fields well

nehra to dravid, no run, good shout, but the fact that the ball pitches just around leg stump and was carrying high before dravid misses out on the flick after shuffling across does it for umpire harper
nehra to chanderpaul, 1 run, makes room but inside-edges the booming drive to square leg, chanderpaul tried to throw the bat at it and slam it over the covers
nehra to dravid, 1 run, keeps strike with a single, nudged while on the hop into the gap at gully
pollock to chanderpaul, 1 run, slower one on middle and leg, chanderpaul drives to mid-off for one
pollock to dravid, 1 run, tidy stuff again, dravid plays it late and tips the ball to point for one more
kulkarni to chanderpaul, 1 wide, very wide, kulkarni spraying it a mile outside off stump
kulkarni to chanderpaul, no run, stands and drills this one to the man at mid-off, who stops the rocket
pollock to taylor, 1 run, drives to extra cover, though he wanted to go straighter with that shot
pollock to dravid, no run, immaculate line and all dravid can do is defend it back to pollock
kulkarni to dravid, no run, good line, not allowing dravid any room and he tucks it to midwicket
jayasuriya to dravid, 2 runs, flat on off stump, dravid uses his feet and drives to extra cover
jayasuriya to taylor, 1 run, flat and wide, spins away invitingly, taylor slashes and gets a thick outside-edge to where slip could have been
jayasuriya to dravid, 1 run, flat on off stump, dravid uses his feet and drives to midwicket
jayasuriya to taylor, 1 run, flat on middle and off, taylor flicks nicely to midwicket for one
jayasuriya to dravid, 2 runs, some width now, dravid backs away and toe-ends it out to deep cover
harbhajan singh to taylor, 1 wide, much quicker but down leg and thats a wide
jayasuriya to kallis, 1 run, slow, flat and wide, and kallis reaches out to slap past point
jayasuriya to kallis, no run, sharp turn there, slower through the air, beats kallis' drive
jayasuriya to taylor, out, gone! taylor, after a good little camoe, throws it away with a shimmy down the track but mistimes the lofted drive down nayar's throat at long-off
harbhajan singh to kallis, no run, well bowled, tight on off stump and he can only turn it to midwicket
nayar to kohli, no run, decent start, swinging it in from outside off stump, kohli defends with a long stride in and so the umpire cannot uphold nayar and ronchi's appeal for the shout
nayar to kohli, four runs, thats smashed, square-driven over backward point very, very hard
nehra to kohli, 1 wide, terrible stuff, well down leg stump so another run to the scoreboard
nehra to kohli, no run, makes room and slams that one, rather ungainly, to the point fielder
nehra to boucher, 1 wide, another rubbish ball, the attempted split-fingered slower delivery slanting well down leg stump, mumbai don't need this
harbhajan singh to kallis, 1 run, flat on middle and leg, nicely swept out to deep backward square leg
harbhajan singh to kallis, 1 run, flat again, kallis uses his feet and jams it to pollock at extra cover, who misses the nonstriker's stumps and allows an overthrow
pollock to boucher, four runs, steps away to leg, then comes back, and slams the ball over point
jayasuriya to boucher, six runs, massive! boucher sashays down and clubs this dead straight, wow!
jayasuriya to kallis, 1 run, steps down and drives down to uthappa again
nehra to kallis, 1 run, makes room and drills this along the ground to long-off
harbhajan singh to boucher, four runs, flat and wide, boucher makes room and slashes past backward point
harbhajan singh to boucher, 1 run, flat again and this time he drives the other side of point ... five to win ...
harbhajan singh to akhil, no run, flat on middle and off, driven with good use of the feet to cover
kulkarni to akhil, no run, gets some room but chops the ball to the fielder, scores are level
kulkarni to akhil, 1 run, and there it is, as akhil drives to mid-on, who parries the ball towards mid-off and boucher crosses for the winning run

dinda to venugopal rao, 1 no ball, curving delivery outside off stump, venu thinks about offering a shot before withdrawing his bat. and folks, the next one is going to be a free hit. gilly charges across to have a word with venu
dinda to venugopal rao, no run,
dinda to venugopal rao, no run, probing delivery outside off and venu shoulders arms.

dinda to venugopal rao, 5 runs, overthrows! it was patted to right of point and what should have been just a single has turned into five runs. wild throw at the non-striker's ends with no one backing up.

sharma to venugopal rao, 1 run, ooh another lifter! the pitch is certainly doing things. it kicked up alarmingly, venu took out the bottom-hand and stabbed at it, the ball flew off the glove and went to the off side
sharma to gilchrist, 1 wide, and this one keeps low. hmm... not a ideal track, this. this one was down the leg side and gilly survives. had it been straight, he could have been in trouble
sharma to gilchrist, 1 wide, again down the leg side, gilly has a swing and a miss.
dinda to venugopal rao, 1 run, on the leg and middle, tucked behind square leg for a single
dinda to gilchrist, no run, keeps low and goes under the bat, outside off
dinda to venugopal rao, 1 run, comes in from the off stump line, venu pats it gently to the off side and off they rush across for a quick single
sharma to laxman, no run, this one keeps low. vvs lets the delivery go past him outside off stump
sharma to laxman, no run, in the zone outside off stump, left alone
dinda to laxman, no run, stops on vvs and he wrists it down to midwicket. vvs walks down to have a very close look at the spot. big puff of dust flew up that time.
agarkar to gilchrist, six runs, it takes special talent on this pitch to go for two sixes in one over. agarkar does it. it was again outside leg stump and gilly again flicks it over long leg
kartik to symonds, 1 run, on the middle and leg, turning in, placed towards midwicket for a single

kartik to symonds, no run, now then, that's a ripper. it spun sharply from the middle stump, jumped up and left a bemused symonds. ponting rushes across from first slip  to have a chat with murali kartik
mohammad hafeez to gilchrist, no run, from round the stumps, on the middle line, pushed back to the bowler
mohammad hafeez to gilchrist, 1 no ball, around off stump, pushed to point.
mohammad hafeez to gilchrist, no run, jumps out to have a big swing but ends up yorking himself. he charged out too far
mohammad hafeez to gilchrist, 1 run, gets a inside-edge as the ball kicks up but will pick a single as the ball rolled towards square leg
mohammad hafeez to symonds, no run, big turn. is it hafeez or muralitharan?! it landed way outside off and spun past symonds and down the leg side
mohammad hafeez to symonds, no run, stretches across to dab a turning delivery to covers
kartik to sharma, no run,
kartik to styris, 1 run, pushed to extra cover for a single
mohammad hafeez to styris, 1 run,
mohammad hafeez to symonds, 1 leg bye, spins towards the pad, tucked behind square. he has to start from well outside off to be effective
mohammad hafeez to styris, no run, again on the middle and leg line, turned to midwicket.
kartik to symonds, no run, omg! what a ripper. unplayable. it drifted in, landed on middle and leg, gripped, turned, bounced and spun past the off stump,  past the poke.
kartik to symonds, no run,
kartik to styris, four runs, turning outside off stump, squeezed off the outside edge, down to third man boundary
mohammad hafeez to symonds, no run, turns in from outside off and symonds stabs it to the off side
mohammad hafeez to symonds, 1 run, on the middle and leg, tucked behind square leg
mohammad hafeez to symonds, no run, straighter one, on the off stump, symonds defends to the leg side
hussey to symonds, no run, turns in, beats the hurried jab and strikes the pad. going down leg, though
mohammad hafeez to yadav, no run,
mohammad hafeez to symonds, no run, this one spins and again, the same response from symonds
hussey to bangar, 1 run, stretches across and whips effectively with the turn to deep midwicket
hussey to symonds, 1 wide, spins too much and goes down leg side
hussey to symonds, 1 run,
agarkar to bangar, 1 run, gets the single this time with a nudge through backward point

kartik to singh, out, deccan charges have been shot out for 110. it was tapped to right of point and the throw, from hafeez, was slightly wide but saha, the 'keeper, lunged to his right, collected the ball, turned quickly to whip off the bails. very smart work from him and knight riders need 111 to win.
vaas to saha, 1 run,
vaas to saha, no run, stretches across to steer a delivery angled across him to point
vaas to ganguly, no run, around the off stump, steered to backward point. ganguly played a fab knock on a similar track in kanpur. can he do it here again for the knight riders?
vaas to saha, no run,
vaas to saha, 1 run, this one jumps even as it comes in and saha takes out the bottom-hand off the handle in a hurry and jabs it behind square

singh to ganguly, 1 run, outside off stump, keeps a touch low, ganguly has  a waft, gets a thick outside edge and it rolls along the ground to left of the lone slip fielder in laxman who lunges to make a half-stop
vaas to ganguly, 1 run, another one that jumped up, this one goes off the left glove as he tries to fend it away
bangar to ganguly, no run, on the stumps, turned to the point region
styris to ganguly, no run, stops a touch but ganguly adjusts to push it to point
bangar to hussey, no run, again that shuffle, this ball straightens and is defended to the off side
bangar to hussey, 1 wide, wide down the leg side and gilchrist, standing up to the stumps, manages to make a half-stop
styris to ganguly, 2 runs, stops on ganguly who adjusts to swat it away through wide midwicket.
bangar to hussey, no run, on the stumps. pushed down the track
symonds to hussey, 1 run, turned to left of midwicket
ojha to ganguly, 1 wide, starts off with a wide down the leg side.
ojha to hussey, 1 wide, lands outside leg, turns but not enough.
ojha to hussey, 1 run,
ojha to hussey, 1 run, goes right back to guide to backward point
ojha to mohammad hafeez, no run, drifts in, lands on middle and spins sharply past the outside edge. hafeez was trying to tap it past the slip fielder
ojha to hussey, no run, on the middle and leg, nudged to the on side
singh to mohammad hafeez, no run, rushes through the channel outside off, hafeez tries to run it down to third man but misses
singh to hussey, 1 run, angles in towards middle, hussey stays beside the line, opens the bat-face and guides to cover point for a quick single.
ojha to hussey, no run, goes back to push a delivery on the middle to cover point
ojha to hussey, 1 run, turns away from hussey who steers to cover point for a quick single this time. rohit rushed in but they got across in time
ojha to shukla, 1 run, turned to backward point
styris to hussey, 1 run, slower one, just outside off and he missed an intended whip and again they rush across for a quick run.
styris to hussey, no run, almost bowled by the slower one! hussey charged out and had a mighty heave, missed and it just went over the bails

styris to hussey, four runs, and a glance to fine leg now. surely, now, the knight riders can't lose this. it was on the middle and leg, hussey shuffled across and glided it fine. very fine. the crowd are up on their feet and the decibels level is crazy
patel to goel, no run, start.
patel to goel, no run, on the middle stump line, turned to midwicket,  hopes wanted a single but yusuf pathan fired in a throw and hopes dived back into the crease
patel to goel, 1 run, and again yusuf pathan is in the picture. another dive and a throw but he misses the stumps and the batsman scampers home in time.
patel to hopes, no run, tight over comes to an end. it was on the off stump line and hopes defended it to the off side
patel to goel, four runs, jumps out and lofts the delivery over mid-off, just one bounce over the ropes. goel is up and running.
patel to goel, no run,
patel to goel, no run,
trivedi to hopes, 1 run, on the middle and leg, turned behind square for a single.
trivedi to sangakkara, four runs, a slower one but an unfazed sanga picked it up early and sent it over mid-on.
warne to hopes, 1 run, lands it on the leg and middle, slight turn and its squeezed behind squareleg
warne to jayawardene, no run, on the off and middle line, slight turn and guided to point
warne to hopes, 2 runs, swept past square leg

salunkhe to yuvraj singh, 1 wide, drama! the bowler and the 'keeper celebrate, thinking they got a catch down the leg side but aleem dar calmly signalled it a wide. it spun down the leg side, yuvraj tried to glance it and it appeared as if he missed it. the replays, pretty bad angle, doesn't say much.
watson to yuvraj singh, four runs, down the leg side now and yuvraj helps it around the corner, to the fine-leg boundary
warne to yuvraj singh, no run,
warne to yuvraj singh, 1 run, the slider outside off and yuvraj drove to long-off
pankaj singh to pathan, 1 run, driven to extra cover for a single
trivedi to yuvraj singh, 1 run,
pathan to yuvraj singh, no run,
pathan to pathan, no run, fires a quicker one, again irfan can't put it away for a run.
warne to yuvraj singh, no run, on the middle, turns in , flatter trajectory, turned to square leg
watson to chawla, no run,

sreesanth to kaif, out, sreesanth strikes first ball. kaifu is gone. perfect seaming delivery, outside off stump and kaif went for another on-the-up drive but edged it behind. kaif has failed again. sreesanth lets out a roar as kaif walks past him.
sreesanth to pathan, 1 wide, slips this one down the leg side

sreesanth to kamran akmal, no run, more drama as a ferocious appeal for a caught-behind dismissal is turned out. sreesanth is really upset and fuming. it was a seaming delivery outside off, akmal went for a drive and there was a noise there but no deviation. the snickometer doesn't show any deviation either.
sreesanth to kamran akmal, no run, on the stumps, defended. sreesanth has a word or two with akmal who doesn't like it and says something back. yuvraj gets in to handle the hot sreesanth
sreesanth to watson, 1 wide, down the leg side and the crowd roar their joy. they are heckling their indian player!
sreesanth to watson, no run, in the zone, lovely probing delivery outside off and watson lets it go past him
sreesanth to watson, 2 runs, turned past square leg
hopes to watson, 1 run, on the middle, drifting towards middle and leg, turned past square leg
lee to watson, no run, lovely slower one and watson is completely deceived. he just pushed at it and it went past the outside edge
pathan to watson, no run, swings in towards the middle and watson just about manages to jab it away.
pathan to lehmann, 1 wide, well outside off, lehmann lets it go and has a look at the umpire who extends his arms.
hopes to watson, 1 run, run down to third man.
pathan to watson, 1 run, goes round the stumps, just outside off, angling in, tapped to backward point
chawla to lehmann, 1 run, turns in this time and driven to long-off
chawla to watson, no run, on the middle, rushes on straight, watson didn't pick it but played it off the pitch to midwicket
pathan to jadeja, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
pathan to jadeja, no run, leans across to push it the off side
chawla to jadeja, no run,
chawla to jadeja, no run, sanga misses a stumping chance. jadeja had charged down the track, missed a lofted shot but so did sangakkara
lee to jadeja, no run, moves down leg again, lee bowls a slower one outside off and jadeja fails to connect

lee to jadeja, no run, deja-vu. jadeja moved down leg again, lee sends across a slower one and it beats the waft and goes over the stumps. lee has a few words with jadeja and watson comes down to have a chat with jadeja.
pathan to jadeja, no run, jadeja tries the same thing with irfan who like lee, bowls a slower one and jadeja watches it sail past the off stump
pathan to jadeja, no run, yet another slower one, jadeja is too early into his waft and sanga gathers
pathan to jadeja, no run, quicker and closer to the off stump, jadeja has another swing and a miss. watson again comes down for a chat

pathan to jadeja, 1 run, stays where he is and guides a slower one to backward point where goel dives to field. the batsmen hesitate about the single, goel fires but misse. had he hit, watson would have been stranded. he had given up
hopes to jadeja, 1 wide, down the leg side,. yet another wide.
mcgrath to gilchrist, no run, good start from pigeon, bowling from around  the stumps with two slips, as he lands in on the dime and swings it in, for gilchrist to leave it be
mcgrath to gilchrist, no run, again he hits that spot outside off and gilchrist leaves it alone
mcgrath to venugopal rao, no run, closer to the stumps and he drives well to maharoof at extra cover

mcgrath to venugopal rao, no run, straighter one, tucked to midwicket and sets off, laxman is rooted to his crease and waves him back and venu has to hurry and get back and survives as dhawan  is late to release the ball
mohammad asif to laxman, no run, tidy, tidy, tidy .. laxman can only defend to point again, riveting stuff
mohammad asif to laxman, 1 run, gets some width and steers it to backward point, where manoj tiwary absolutely makes a mess of it, eyes off the ball and allowing laxman to get off the mark
mohammad asif to venugopal rao, no run, whoah there, cowboy, where are you going? asif invites the drive and venu chases it with zero footwork, missing by a country mile
mcgrath to laxman, 1 run, a bit outside off stump and laxman square-drives well, but this time tiwary gets his hands on it and saves runs
mcgrath to venugopal rao, no run, and he's turned right around, closing his eyes and eyeing banjara hills, swiping very ungainly and missing the ball by yards
mohammad asif to symonds, no run, hits that spot again and symonds shoulders arms this time
mcgrath to symonds, four runs, bang, thats four more! symonds skips down, creating the room, and slams his former australian team-mate over the covers for a one-bounce four
maharoof to venugopal rao, 1 run, slow and wide, 98ks,venu waits and guides it to backward point
maharoof to venugopal rao, no run, now he connects, drilling it down the track and maharoof does well to get a finger on that brute of a shot
mahesh to sharma, no run, wide again but sharma misses as he tries to dab it late and fine, undone by the bit of bounce and no footwork
mahesh to sharma, no run, tries to dab it fine but mistimes the shot and karthik dives well to stop
mahesh to sharma, 1 run, waits and this time connects with his steer down to third man
mahesh to sharma, four runs, edged and it just evades a leaping karthik, flinging himself to his right after sharma flashes ever so hard at the away-swinger
maharoof to sharma, no run, this one kicks off, swings, and beats sharma as he chases it

bhatia to shahid afridi, out, and he strikes first ball, would you believe? bhatia pitches on about middle and leg, afridi gets across to try and scoop it away to fine leg, misses, and umpire saheba lifts up the finger as it looks like it would have taken out leg stump .. a good call, as i've just seen replays.
bhatia to bangar, no run, pushes at one moving late, misses, and karthik collects smoothly
bhatia to bangar, 1 run, on off stump, pushed at and he does well to keep it down to third man
bhatia to bangar, no run, slower one outside off, he mistimes the shot and karthik fields
mahesh to bangar, 1 run, this one stops on him but he tips it to point for a smart single
mohammad asif to bangar, no run, bang on the money, middle and off, he looks to nudge it away but ends up playing it back to asif
bhatia to sharma, six runs, just over the ropes! sharma makes room and drills this one dead straight and the ball just cross the ropes
maharoof to sharma, four runs, and again, sharma makes room and creams this flat over the covers, another stunning shot and that gets the crowd into a tizzy
maharoof to sharma, 2 runs, drilled again, maharoof gets a hand on it to take some pace but parries the ball down to long-off and thats a 26-run over .. woof!
bhatia to yadav, four runs, another slow delivery, but yadav leans back and hammers it over the bowler's head ... they are piling on the runs now!
bhatia to yadav, four runs, oh thats poor stuff from delhi, as yadav drives the ball hard down to long-off, where gambhir misfields and allows the ball to run away off his palms
mahesh to vaas, 1 run, slower ball outside off, a mistimed chop to point for a quick single
vaas to gambhir, 1 run, comes out and drives the ball past backward point again, he's in a hurry
vaas to gambhir, no run, third time in a row he skips down and tries to go over, but the slower ball beats him and gilchrist collects on the awkward bounce
vaas to gambhir, four runs, slashed hard, reaching out to the wide one, and the thick outside-edge flies wide of the slips to third man as delhi continue to flay runs
singh to sehwag, no run, pitches outside leg stump, sehwag stays back and tries to nudge but misses, rp starts to appeal but realises the ball was outside the line of impact
singh to dhawan, 1 run, nips it back from off stump, pinning dhawan to his crease, the bat comes down in the nick of time and sehwag is quick to call for the run past leg stump
singh to sehwag, no run, gets across off stump and pushes the ball to point, who's very sharp
singh to dhawan, 1 run, nips into dhawan, who tucks it off the hips to vaas at fine leg, who fields and returns a very tidy throw to gilchrist
singh to dhawan, no run, pitches down leg, dhawan looks to flick but gets squared up, the ball rolls past off stump and rp swoops in to dismiss any thoughts of the single
shahid afridi to sehwag, 1 run, flat on off stump and dug out to the man at backward point
bangar to dhawan, 1 run, smartly done, using his feet and pushing the ball gently into the covers
shahid afridi to dhawan, no run, better stuff, on the stumps and squaring him up, defended uneasily
ojha to dhawan, 2 wides, bad ball, slipping down leg stump, gilchrist cant get there
ojha to sehwag, 2 wides, rubbish bowling, two feet outside leg stump, arm ball gone wrong
ojha to dhawan, 1 run, spins away but he gets over it and dabs it to point for one
ojha to sehwag, 1 run, skips down and connects this time, driving to mid-on for one
vaas to dhawan, 1 wide, and a wide seals the win, sliding down leg stump and that a nine-wicket thumping for the delhi daredevils, their second in a row
pollock to patel, 1 wide, not such a good start, that pitches outside off and seams away sharply, good bounce too
pollock to patel, no run, turns his wrists this time and flicks it from outside off towards mid-on
pollock to patel, no run, first false stroke, he sees the width marginally outside off and slashes and misses

nehra to hayden, 1 run, almost a run-out! nehra bowls this one quicker, hayden gets a thin edge onto his boot and sets off as the ball rolls towards cover, patel sets off, hayden is slow off the blocks and the throw was just wide of the stumps at the non-striker's end
nehra to patel, no run, slices him in half this time as patel tries to whip it across the line
nehra to patel, four runs, slashed! patel gets a lot of width outside off and reaches out, the ball gets the thick edge and just beats slip who leaps up to try and get that
nehra to patel, no run, pushed to mid-on, a misfield by yeligati doesn't cost a run
pollock to hayden, no run, wide outside off, hayden makes room but decides not to chase that
nehra to patel, out, edged! nehra gives him width outside off, patel goes for the ezpansive drive and gets a very thin edge through to ronchi
nehra to hussey, no run, good stuff by nehra, gets it to nip back in and keeps hussey quiet as he taps it back to the bowler
nehra to hussey, 1 run, hussey gets a bit of width and taps it towards cover and calls quickly for the run, there's a slight fumble in the field, good over by nehra
kulkarni to hussey, no run, bowls over the wicket, lands it on off and middle and hussey pushes that towards cover
nehra to raina, 1 run, lands just outside off and comes back in, he pushes it through the line towards midwicket
nehra to hayden, 1 wide, nehra sees hayden giving the charge and bowls a slower ball but he strays down the legside
nehra to hayden, four runs, the slower ball again, nearly deceives hayden who makes a bit of room and mis-hits that over backward point
nehra to raina, 1 wide, poor delivery by nehra who slides that really wide down leg, that was out of the hitting zone too
nehra to hayden, no run, the slower ball again, he shapes to slash it through the offside and misses
kulkarni to raina, 1 run, drives straight  down to fielder at long-off
harbhajan singh to raina, no run, pitches outside leg stump, raina turns it behind square
harbhajan singh to hayden, 1 run, raina slashes to backward point
harbhajan singh to raina, 1 run, raina uses his feet and flicks to leg side
harbhajan singh to hayden, 1 run, pitched on middle and driven to mid-on
bravo to raina, no run, over the wicket and pitched outside off stump, raina slashes at it but misses
bravo to raina, 2 runs, tries to loft it over long-off but mistimes and is fielded by yeligati extra cover
harbhajan singh to hayden, no run, pitched on off and turned away, hayden backed away but didn't play a shot
harbhajan singh to raina, 1 run, drags it from outside off but gets an under-edge to midwicket
bravo to raina, 1 run, pushed to long-off
bravo to raina, 1 run, slower ball, pushed to cover
yeligati to hayden, no run, pitched on off stump, hayden gets it to balloon right next to him but the keeper can't get to it
yeligati to hayden, 1 run,
yeligati to raina, four runs, flicked to deep midwicket, where robin uthappa makes a valiant effort to get the ball away from the boundary rope by nayar, when collecting it, pushes it over
yeligati to raina, 5 wides, bizzarre delivery, way outside the leg stump, raina wants to have a go but seems to miss the ball after it pitches and it slips past his bat for four
yeligati to raina, 1 run, flicked to deep midwicket
pollock to raina, no run, pitched outside leg stump, played and missed
pollock to raina, 1 run, driven to long-off
pollock to hayden, 1 run, driven to mid-on
bravo to dhoni, 1 wide, bravo slides down the legside and dhoni shapes to flick it fine, he misses
kulkarni to dhoni, 1 run, he tries to scoop this over the bowler's head but mistimes it to long-off
kulkarni to hayden, four runs, hayden walks down a few paces down the track before he delivers and nonchalantly scoops this through the line to the long-off fence, one bounce and four
kulkarni to dhoni, no run, well bowled, dhoni steps down and decides against the stroke as he sees the ball pitching outside off, he glances at the umpire thinking it would be called a wide
nehra to hayden, (no ball) four runs, over the waist, hayden tries to slide that over point but gets an edge which flies past the keeper and slip

nehra to dhoni, out, swipes that across the line to harbhajan at midwicket and takes off, hayden is a little slow off the blocks and is miles out of his crease as harbhajan gets it spot on with the direct hit. ironically, hayden is dismissed by his nemesis!

khote to dhoni, out, excellent catch! the slower ball and dhoni goes the loft over midwicket, he gets a top edge and that was in the air for ever, bravo runs across towards mid-on and falls over backwards as he takes the catch
oram to ronchi, no run, oram pitches this on off and gets it to kick on ronchi, he taps it to the offside
oram to ronchi, 1 wide, slides wide down the legside, oram loses his line
oram to jayasuriya, 1 wide, oram loses his line again and slides that wide down the legside
gony to uthappa, no run, that's a maiden, impressive by gony as he hits the deck hard and gets the ball to kick on uthappa, he hops and fends it to the on side
oram to jayasuriya, 1 run, pitches outside off, he pushes it towards cover and sets off quickly
oram to uthappa, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and plays a controlled glide down to third man
gony to uthappa, 1 run, uthappa gets across, turns the face of the bat and places it wide of square leg
gony to jayasuriya, four runs, pitches on off and middle and jayasuriya improvises well by flicking that across the line and chipping it over square leg
gony to jayasuriya, out, jayasuriya tries to go downtown but fails to get on top of the bounce, he only manages a top edge and joginder takes the skier easily at mid-on
gony to uthappa, 1 leg bye, slides down the legside and he flicks it off his gloves down to fine leg
oram to uthappa, four runs, well played, uthappa sees the width outside off and deliberately steers it between slip and the keeper with very soft hands, first slip is really wide
oram to uthappa, four runs, very delicate, oram gives him width and uthappa opens the face of the bat and deftly glides it past hussey at wide first slip
gony to uthappa, no run, uthappa goes for a wild swing across the line and meets thin air, gony beats him for pace
gony to uthappa, no run, gony wins another battle as uthappa attempts another cheeky glide, the extra bounce squares him up and beats him
gony to uthappa, no run, pitches on middle and leg, he tucks it to the on side
gony to uthappa, 1 run, uthappa drags that from outside off and tries to club that through the on side but mistimes it wide of mid-on
joginder sharma to pollock, 1 run, slightly wide outside off, he opens the blade and glides it down to third man
joginder sharma to uthappa, no run, pitches on middle and leg, he closes the face and tucks it to midwicket
gony to uthappa, (no ball) 1 run, that one slips out and lobs over pollock's waist, he scoops that over midwicket
amarnath to uthappa, 1 run, pitches outside off and comes back in, he opens the blade and dabs it down to third man
amarnath to pollock, 1 run, good ball, comes back in and pollock steers it to the offside
amarnath to uthappa, no run, goes for another wild swing and he misses
joginder sharma to uthappa, 1 run,
joginder sharma to pollock, 1 run,
joginder sharma to pollock, 1 run, the slower ball, he waits for it and taps it softly towards cover and sets off
muralitharan to pollock, 1 wide, starts off rather inauspiciously by sliding wide down leg
muralitharan to pollock, 1 wide, action replay, he slides that wide down leg again
muralitharan to pollock, 1 wide, that's a hat-trick! murali struggles to grip the ball again and slides wide down leg
muralitharan to pollock, 1 run, finally, he manages to land it within the stumps this time and pollock defends
amarnath to bravo, no run, good ball, pitches outside off and comes back in, he gets back and defends
amarnath to bravo, 1 run, walks across his stumps and flicks it wide of square leg
muralitharan to bravo, 1 wide, slides wide down the leg side
muralitharan to nayar, 1 run, he gets on his knee and bravely drags that from outside off and places it to deep square leg
amarnath to nayar, no run, amarnath tempts him with width outside off and nayar completely misses it as he tries to swing across the line

amarnath to nayar, 5 runs, comes round the wicket this time, he places it to backward point and badrinath has a shy at the stumps, the ball hits the sweet spot of bravo's bat and races away to third man for four over throws
oram to harbhajan singh, no run, the slower ball, harbhajan swings too early and misses
joginder sharma to nayar, (no ball) 1 run, he oversteps! nayar makes room and square drives this to badrinath at backward point
joginder sharma to nayar, 1 run, joginder doesn't overstep, nayar scoops this down to long-off
patel to gilchrist, no run, starts off with one that pitches outside off and seams away, no wide called
watson to laxman, 1 run, the famous wrist comes into play early as he drags this from outside off and places it to fine leg
watson to laxman, no run, defends it back to the bowler but exposes his stumps a little, dangerous
patel to symonds, no run, wide outside off, symonds slashes it towards point, big misunderstanding between the batsmen, both stuck mid-pitch but kaif throws misses the stumps
patel to symonds, no run, a rarity in twenty20, symonds shoulders arms to one just outside off
patel to symonds, 3 runs, a bit of width, symonds slashes it, kaif tries to stop it at point, watson gives chase and a superb dive keeps the batsmen to three
watson to symonds, four runs, symonds makes room for himself and bludgeons it past a diving mid-off and the fifty comes up
watson to symonds, 1 wide, that wasn't that good, bangs it in but is ill-directed and results in a wide down leg
watson to symonds, 1 run, pushes it to mid-on and a quick single is taken
pankaj singh to symonds, 1 run, a bit of width and symonds runs it down to third man for a single
pankaj singh to laxman, 1 run, slower ball, slanting to leg, laxman guides it to fine leg for a single
trivedi to symonds, 1 run, drive on the off, another single
warne to symonds, 1 run, single to pankaj singh at deep extra cover
warne to laxman, out, and shane warne has done it.. no foot work from laxman, stays at the crease and drives away from his body and he gives the simplest of return catches
warne to symonds, 1 run, comes on a little quicker, symonds whips it to mid-on for a single
trivedi to sharma, 1 run, outside off, and sent down to third man for a single
warne to symonds, 1 wide, loses his line and slides way down leg
warne to symonds, four runs, lofts this with brute force just past warne's reach and places it to the long-off boundary, that's his fifty
salunkhe to symonds, 1 run, stays back at the crease and tucks this to midwicket for a quick single
salunkhe to symonds, six runs, salunkhe commits a crime by dishing out a half tracker outside off and symonds obliges by staying back and clubbing this over cow corner
trivedi to symonds, 1 no ball, the keeper is upto the stumps, he oversteps and symonds places it to midwicket
trivedi to sharma, 1 run, rohit gets the width outside off and drags this to salunkhe at midwicket
patel to sharma, no run, bowls a slower one wide outside off, he shapes to glide that to third man but misses
warne to symonds, six runs, he stays back at the crease waits for the turn and clubs that over deep midwicket
warne to sharma, out, rohit shapes to cart this over the on side but is foxed by the late turn, he gets a thick leading edge to salunkhe at extra cover
patel to yadav, four runs, gives him width outside off and yadav plays a deliberate glide wide of the keeper
patel to symonds, four runs, all timing, symonds makes room and places it towards pathan at point who flings himself to his right and fumbles, the ball scorches away to the boundary
patel to symonds, 1 wide, bowls that far too wide outside the offstump, symonds isn't interested
patel to symonds, 1 wide, munaf loses his line again and dishes out another wide outside off, symonds lets this one go too
watson to yadav, out, yadav sees the extra bounce and width and tries to slash over the keeper, akmal leaps up and hangs onto it

vaas to kamran akmal, no run, a dramatic start, kamran akmal punches the first ball down the wicket, and it hits the stumps at the other end, with graeme smith out of the crease, hyderabad are appealing, but there's some doubt about whether vaas got a boot on it, third umpire rules it not out
vaas to kamran akmal, no run, steers it to rohit sharma at point, no run

vaas to kamran akmal, 1 run, akmal throws his bat at that, takes a thick outside edge and flies down to third man, rp singh makes a brilliant effort but fails to complete the catch.. what a start to this innings!
vaas to smith, no run, smith pushes his first ball to mid-on
vaas to smith, no run, defended towards cover
singh to kamran akmal, no run, good comeback, played to point, no run
singh to kamran akmal, 1 run, outside off this time and akmal pushes it to square for a single
singh to smith, no run, smith defends it to off, he's yet to get off the mark
singh to smith, no run, and again, rp came back well in that over after being hit for six off the first
vaas to kamran akmal, out, got him, akmal's powerful slice finds sanjay bangar at backward point, who takes a good catch
vaas to pathan, no run, inside-edge on to the pad, pops up and nearly a return ctach
vaas to pathan, no run, wafts at one outside off, no contact
vaas to pathan, 1 run, budges it to cover and steals a quick single
vaas to smith, no run, just one run in this over so far, vaas is doing a tremendous job here
singh to pathan, six runs, width outside off, and yusuf lofts it through the line and carves it over long-off
singh to pathan, 1 wide, and that was a poor delivery, very,very wide outside off
singh to pathan, no run, yusuf throws his bat at it, no contact
singh to smith, four runs, charges down the track, follows the line of the ball and pushes it wide of mid-on
vaas to pathan, six runs, slower ball, yusuf picks it and smashes another six
vaas to pathan, four runs, four this time, creamed past mid-off
vaas to smith, four runs, graeme smith gets into the act, rajasthan aren't going down without a fight, makes room and blasts it through the covers
ojha to smith, four runs, another four, comes down the track and chipped over mid-on this time
ojha to pathan, six runs, huge hit, yusuf launches that into the stands
ojha to pathan, no run, another swipe from the batsman, that kept a touch low and the batsman misses it completely
kalyankrishna to smith, no run, good slower ball, smith checks his stroke and pushes it back to the bowler
singh to pathan, four runs, everything's going pathan's way as he mis-hits one high over backward  point, it appeared as if someone would catch it but pathan just got lucky there
shahid afridi to pathan, 1 run, stays back and flat-bats that one over the bowler's head
shahid afridi to smith, no run, pushes this towards cover, pathan sets off but smith sends him back, pathan intercepts the throw
ojha to watson, 1 run, pitches on middle and leg and turns a little, he steps down and flicks it to square leg
ojha to smith, no run, pitches this outside off and gets away with a wide as smith reaches out to chase it
symonds to kaif, four runs, he errs by bowling a quicker one wide outside off, he makes room and slices it past backward point
symonds to kaif, no run, pushed to the off side
symonds to kaif, six runs, bang! kaif steps down and lofts that high over the bowler's head, symonds is getting creamed here
shahid afridi to smith, 1 wide, slides the quicker one wide down the leg side
shahid afridi to warne, no run, fires that on middle and leg, he fails to put that away

singh to warne, out, warne moves across his stumps to distract rp, he fires that down leg and warne drives straight to laxman at cover, salunkhe sets off for a suicidal run but warne sends him back, it's too late as rp whips off the bails
symonds to warne, six runs, goodness! warne steps down and clubs that high into the second tier over deep midwicket, how that changes things!
pollock to goel, 1 run, pollock persists with his tight off stump line, goel opens the face and runs the ball down to third man
nehra to goel, 1 run, this time he pushes hard at it and gets an outside edge that flies just wide of uthappa's left at first slip towards third man
pollock to sangakkara, 1 wide, pollock strays down leg side with the slower ball, sangakkara tries to work it behind square but misses

pollock to sangakkara, four runs, pollock once again tries the slower ball and once again he strays down leg side, fine leg is in the circle and sangakkara flicks the ball off his hips past him for yet another boundary
pollock to sangakkara, 2 runs, sangakkara goes ariborne, he slices the ball over the off side but it falls safe towards deep point, three fielders converge on the ball
kulkarni to sangakkara, no run, smashed hard and straight but he's hit it right to the fielder at mid-on
kulkarni to sangakkara, 1 wide, sangakkara backs away towards leg side, kulkarni tries to counter by bowling wide outside off stump, that's a little too wide says the umpire
harbhajan singh to sangakkara, 1 run, tight line on off stump from round the wicket, sangakkara pushes the ball towards the off side and calls goel through for one
harbhajan singh to goel, 2 runs,
harbhajan singh to yuvraj singh, 1 run, reverse swept for a single
khote to sarwan, 1 run, sarwan comes down the track and tries to hit through the off side, he gets an inside edge on the on side instead
nehra to sarwan, 2 runs, sarwan moves towards the leg side and drives towards long-off, uthappa mis-fields and sangakkara sprints back for the second
nehra to jayawardene, 1 run, jayawardene opens the face and runs the ball towards third man to get off the mark
khote to sangakkara, 1 run, sangakkara moves towards leg and drives the ball towards long off, he didn't time that all that well
harbhajan singh to sangakkara, 1 run, driven towards deep cover, just the single this time
harbhajan singh to sohal, no run, defended towards backward point
harbhajan singh to lee, 2 wides, bowled fast down leg side, ronchi does well to get a glove to it
lee to ronchi, no run, 152.4 kmh, tremendous pace from lee outside the off stump, ronchi has a waft at it but misses
lee to jayasuriya, no run, slower ball on middle stump, jayasuriya gets behind the line of the ball and blocks
lee to bravo, no run, the slower ball at 116 kmh, bravo gets behind the line and defends
pathan to bravo, 1 wide, terribly wide outside off stump, he'll have to bowl that one again

pathan to bravo, 1 run, dropped by sarwan! pathan beat bravo with a slower ball, he chipped it in the air straight to cover where sarwan dropped a sitter, bravo's been let off by his west indian team-mate!
pathan to uthappa, no run, another slower ball at 116 kmh outside off stump, uthappa tries to run it down to third man but misses
singh to bravo, no run, bravo tries to run the ball towards third man but plays it towards first slip on the bounce
singh to bravo, 1 run, pushed towards the off side for a quick single, both bravo and uthappa are very swift between the wickets
chawla to pollock, 1 run, pushed with soft hands towards the leg side for one more
lee to pollock, no run, the slower ball at 126 kmh outside off stump, left alone by pollock
pathan to nehra, no run, that's it, punjab have won their first match of the tournament, nehra digs the last ball towards point to end the game
sohail tanvir to taylor, 1 wide, that's wide, it pitched outside leg and carried on past the leg stump, taylor did try to play the leg glance but he couldn't  connect
trivedi to taylor, 1 run, slower ball at 105 kmh on middle stump, taylor flicks it through midwicket for just the single
trivedi to kohli, 2 runs, he gets off the mark by pushing the ball towards point, there's an overthrow at the bowler's end and he gets a second
trivedi to kohli, 1 wide, trivedi tries the slower ball but strays down leg side, benson signals another wide
trivedi to kohli, 1 run, played towards point for a quick single to end the over

trivedi to kohli, six runs, what a stunning catch! but has he hit the rope? virat got under the ball and smashed it high in the air towards deep midwicket, jadeja got under it and jumped up in the air towards his left and caught the ball as it was going over the boundary, he managed to dive back inside the boundary but as he hit the ground his hand hit the rope, terrific terrific effort but it's six
warne to joshi, no run, bowled flat through the air on off stump, joshi defends back towards the bowler
pathan to joshi, 1 run, bowled slowly through the air on off stump, flicked in the air towards midwicket for one
warne to joshi, no run, defended once again to the fielder at square leg
warne to kumar, no run, bowled fast and wide outside off, left alone by praveen
warne to khan, 1 run, thrown up again, down the track and under-edged to midwicket for a single
trivedi to kumar, no run, praveen backs away and tries to hit the ball on the leg side, trivedi follows him and beats him with the slower ball
khan to pathan, no run, yusuf tried to smash it again but mis-hit it towards the bowler

kumar to pathan, 1 run, the slower ball outside off stump, pathan pushes the ball towards point with soft hands and calls for the single, had the throw hit the stumps at the batsman's end smith would have been out
vinay kumar to watson, 1 run, watson tries to work the ball on the leg side by closing the face but gets a leading edge towards the off side
kumble to watson, 1 wide, fired down leg side, that's a wide from kumble, boucher did well to move quickly to his left and collect
kumble to watson, no run, bowled flat through the air on off stump, watson stays in his crease and plays the ball behind square on the off side
kumble to watson, no run, bowled flat and straight on middle stump, watson gets behind the line and defends with a straight bat
oram to ganguly, no run, on and outside off, crisply struck by ganguly but badrinath is prowling there, fine stop that stops the run, that was well timed
oram to ganguly, four runs, too much width, uses the room and spanks it past point for the first four of the game
gony to mccullum, no run, pace and bounce, 130kph, starts outside off and seams away, mccullum swings hard, really hard, but can't make contact
gony to mccullum, 1 no ball, good ball but he's overstepped, 131kph this time and doesn't give him room outside off but mccullum gets a free hit
oram to saha, no run, inside edge that's stabbed towards mid-on
gony to saha, no run, angling into the batsman this time, tries to flick it across the line but plays it back to the bowler, good bowling from gony here, after a demolition in the previous over
amarnath to saha, no run, pushed to cover, they think of a quick single but the chennai cover cordon is alert as ever

amarnath to saha, four runs, moves across and shovels this one over midwicket, another four, this is a fine way to ease the pressure, saha showing his worth. we've seen how well he can keep. now he's showing how good a batsman he is
muralitharan to ganguly, no run, quicker one, outside off and spinning away, tries to jab at it but can't make contact
muralitharan to ganguly, no run, pushed back to the bowler, he's fired that in
