muralitharan to ganguly, no run, turned away to the leg side, another dot ball, this must be frustrating for the kolkata side
muralitharan to ganguly, 1 wide, too far down the leg side, that was left alone for a wide
muralitharan to ganguly, 1 run, tapped square for a single, retains the strike
muralitharan to mohammad hafeez, 1 run, another offbreak, turned away in the gap square off the wicket
muralitharan to ganguly, 1 wide, too far down the leg side, he's trying to start from wide and get it away

joginder sharma to ganguly, out, ganguly falls! a slower one this time, outside off again, ganguly tries to loft it over the infield but a leading edge balloons up straight to badrinath at cover, he keeps his eye on the ball and doesn't make any mistake, this is big trouble now. chennai well and truly on top.
joginder sharma to mohammad hafeez, 1 run, tucked away to the leg side
muralitharan to mohammad hafeez, 1 run, doosra this time, starts from off and turns away, hafeez tries to work it to mid-on but can only get a thick edge towards point
muralitharan to mohammad hafeez, 1 run, quicker outside off, glided to third man
muralitharan to shukla, no run, 80.4kph, starts from leg and spins away, another doosra, he's mixing them well, pushed to the on-side

amarnath to shukla, 1 run, another one with good bounce, just 123kph but this pitch is offering good bounce, disconcerting lift close to his rib-cage, taps it hesitantly to the third man region, he could have been hit by that

oram to mohammad hafeez, no run, 111.4kph, outside off and giving the batsman no room to play with, hafeez tries  to glide it to third man but only manages an inside edge down to the ground, trickles back to the keeper
joginder sharma to mohammad hafeez, 1 run, slower one outside off, tapped away towards third man
muralitharan to shukla, no run, offbreak that turns sharp, pushed to cover
muralitharan to shukla, 1 leg bye, swept away but no timing again, has to settle for the single after the ball bobs off bat, pad, glove and many other implements
joginder sharma to shukla, 1 run, pushed to the on side for a quick single

joginder sharma to agarkar, 1 no ball, oversteps this time, slower one that's pushed back to the bowler, but agarkar gets a chance to swing his arms. replays show that it's a close call. the umpire might have been a bit harsh there.
oram to kartik, out, slower one again, kartik is too early on the shot, checks his shot and offers a simple skier to the bowler, simple caught and bowled, kolkata slide deeper
oram to sharma, 1 run, crisp drive first up, outside off and he gives lokhi the strike
joginder sharma to sharma, 2 runs, driven to extra cover
dinda to patel, no run, left alone outside off, a bit of shape for dinda away from the left-hander
dinda to patel, no run, 137.7kph, left alone outside off then, no hurry for the batsmen, this asking-rate is well within reach
dinda to hayden, four runs, another slash and this time it's the bottom edge that squirts past the second slip for four, no chance for ponting there, hayden is looking to go for it
dinda to patel, no run, square driven but straight to the fielder, good pace from dinda but he's conceding too many runs for kolkata's liking.
sharma to hayden, (no ball) 1 run, over-steps this time, glided away to third man for a single but ishant has given a free hit now.
dinda to patel, 1 run, angles his bat to get a sensible single to third man
agarkar to hayden, no run, tries to tip and run a quick single but parthiv sends him back, the point fielder is quick
hussey to patel, no run, dropped, really tough caught-and-bowled chance but hussey can't hold on, smacked back hard and hussey doesn't have time to react

hussey to hayden, six runs, what a monster! walks down the track and pummels it way, way over midwicket for a biggie, ponting just had a word with hussey before that ball but it obviously doesn't work.
hussey to patel, no run, tapped back to the bowler, they think of a single but decide against it
mohammad hafeez to hayden, 1 run, starts from round the wicket too, quicker one but he angles the bat towards third man and takes off, good run

mohammad hafeez to hayden, six runs, he's eaten that up like he would a giant hamburger, stands tall, backs away, swings clean and sees the ball soar over the ropes, what a strike, he's such a brutal hitter
mohammad hafeez to hayden, no run, defended to the off side
mohammad hafeez to patel, 1 wide, down the leg side again and he lets it go, called a wide and rightly so
agarkar to hayden, 1 run, slower one, tapped sensibly to the off side and they take a quick one
mohammad hafeez to dhoni, 1 run, traipses down the track and taps in the gap for another single
agarkar to dhoni, no run, tapped away towards cover, good line from agarkar
kartik to hayden, 1 run, backs away and taps it towards cover for a single
kartik to hayden, 1 run, pushed away to midwicket for a single
sharma to hayden, 2 runs, backs away, gives room, sliced away over extra-cover for a couple, hayden in a hurry to finish this off, it seems

sharma to hayden, six runs, smack, hard and straight, standing tall and blitzing that way over the bowler for a big one, this is all ending too fast, chennai going bananas. time for a bath at the marina.
kartik to hayden, four runs, down the leg side and easily done, helped along to fine leg for a four, only five needed now
kartik to hayden, no run,
kartik to hayden, 1 run, pushed through to middle and leg, turned away to leg side
zoysa to ronchi, four runs, there's no fine leg and that line on leg stump is asking for punishment, ronchi moves across his stumps and plays the leg glance to the fine leg boundary
zoysa to jayasuriya, 1 wide, way down leg side, easy decision for the umpire to make
ojha to pollock, 1 run, the line is on leg stump, pollock moves across and flicks behind square for a single
ojha to pollock, no run, pollock tries to step out of his crease but ojha follows him, he ends of defending towards the bowler
kalyankrishna to pollock, 1 run, wide outside off stump, pollock moves a little towards leg and throws his bat at it, driving the ball through cover for a single

kalyankrishna to bravo, 1 run, slower ball on off and middle stump, bravo pushes the ball towards the leg side, bravo sets off for the single but nayar is late to respond, the bowler fails to collect to there's an easy single
shahid afridi to bravo, 2 runs, bowled flat through the air on off stump, driven uppishly through cover for a single
shahid afridi to bravo, 1 leg bye, bravo drops the ball on the leg side for a quick run
shahid afridi to khote, 1 run,
shahid afridi to bravo, 1 run, bravo tries to blast the ball through the off side but mis-hits it towards the leg side, that was a slower ball
bangar to bravo, four runs, bravo makes room by moving towards the leg side and throws his bat hard at the ball, third man is in the circle and bravo slices the ball over backward point for four
bangar to bravo, 1 run, dropped, bravo made room to slice the ball over point again, he hits it straight to rp who drops an absolute sitter, terrible lapse
jayasuriya to laxman, 1 run, laxman waits in his crease and drives towards long off for  a single
jayasuriya to gilchrist, no run, bowled flat through the air on off stump, gilchrist defends back towards the bowler
jayasuriya to gilchrist, 2 runs, gilchrist lofts a flat delivery from outside off stump over mid-on, the ball falls safely in the deep, he didn't time that well

jayasuriya to gilchrist, six runs, this time he has timed it immaculately! gilchrist gets under the ball and lofts the ball high and far over deep midwicket, that ball nearly hit the electronic screen
chitnis to gilchrist, no run, bowled flat and straight, gilchrist gets behind the line and defends towards the bowler

chitnis to gilchrist, six runs, bowled flat outside off stump, gilchrist waits for it, gets down on one knee and lofts the ball over deep midwicket, that has gone a long long way over the boundary, the game is quickly ending as a contest
chitnis to gilchrist, 1 wide, bowled quickly down leg side, wide called
jayasuriya to laxman, 1 run, laxman waits in his crease and drives a flat ball from outside off towards long- off, back to gilchirst now
jayasuriya to laxman, 1 run, laxman moves back and drives towards long off to bring up the 100 partnership, this is the highest opening stand in the ipl, laxman's made 20
jayasuriya to gilchrist, four runs, gilchrist stands rooted in his crease and smashes the ball straight past jayasuriya, he hit that so hard that it could have broken fingers
jayasuriya to gilchrist, 4 byes, gilchrist throws his bat at a wide ball and gets a faint outside edge past the wicketkeeper, the umpire initially signals byes but motions that he was unsighted

nayar to gilchrist, 1 run, now gilchirst hits the ball straight past the bowler and kulkarni runs to his left and makes a fantastic save on the boundary with one hand, he keeps his balance to stay inside the rope
bravo to laxman, 1 run, slower ball outside off stump, laxman guides the ball towards third man for  a single
bravo to gilchrist, 1 wide, bowled wide down leg side, gilchirst tries to deposit that over long leg as well but it is too far away from him
bravo to laxman, no run,
lee to gambhir, no run, good carry to start off with, pitches on the channel outside off and seams back in slightly before reaching the keeper

pathan to sehwag, 1 leg bye, appeal for a leg before! pitches in line of offstump and comes back in and appears to hit the stumps as sehwag misses a heave to the on side, replays showed that it would have hit, umpire shivaram wasn't convinced
pathan to gambhir, 1 run, pitches outside off, he taps that wide of cover
pathan to dhawan, no run, pitches outside off, he slashes it on the first bounce to slip
lee to shoaib malik, four runs, classic shot to get off the mark, it was fractionally wide outside off and moving away, he times it crisply past backward point

pathan to shoaib malik, 1 run, taps it softly towards katich at cover, he has a shy at the non-striker's end and hits the stumps, they steal an overthrow with nobody to back the deflection off the stumps
pathan to gambhir, no run, steps down the track and checks his stroke as he taps it back to the bowler
pathan to shoaib malik, 1 run, slower ball, he opens the face of the bat and dabs it to third man
sreesanth to shoaib malik, four runs, malik welcomes sreesanth with a smashing offdrive past mid-off, that was a little too wide outside off
sreesanth to shoaib malik, 1 run, goes for the drive through the on side a little too early and ends up getting a thick edge onto his boot, the ball rolls to the offside
chawla to tiwary, no run, pitches it on middle, no turn, he defends
chawla to shoaib malik, 2 wides, slides down the leg side, he loses his direction there
singh to karthik, no run, tempts him with width outside off and he nearly feathers it through to the keeper as he attempts to dab it down to third man
chawla to tiwary, 1 run, gives him more width outside off, he reaches out and drives it wide of point
chawla to karthik, 1 run, pitches outside off, he drives to cover
singh to karthik, 2 runs, pitches on middle and leg, he shuffles and tucks it down to the on side
singh to karthik, four runs, that was a real brute of a delivery, really stifled karthik as he hopped to fend it off, the ball lobbed off his glove and just beat the keeper
singh to tiwary, no run, gets back at the crease and taps it to the off side
singh to tiwary, no run, false shot by tiwary as he gets width outside off and slashes hard and misses
chawla to karthik, 1 run,
chawla to tiwary, no run,
yuvraj singh to tiwary, 1 run, driven through the line to deep cover
chawla to tiwary, four runs, good shot, gets on his knee early and drags that from outside off and places it wide of deep square leg, there's a despairing dive
chawla to bhatia, no run, gets this one to straighten and tucks up bhatia, he manages to defend
yuvraj singh to tiwary, 1 wide, slides wide down the leg side
yuvraj singh to tiwary, no run, pitches on middle and straightens, he can't whip it through the on side
yuvraj singh to bhatia, no run, pushed back straight, yuvraj dives and stops that
yuvraj singh to bhatia, 1 run, gets back and punches through the line to long-off
pathan to tiwary, 1 wide, tempts him to go for the wild drive through the covers but the ball it too wide to make contact
pathan to tiwary, 1 run, similar delivery, this time he drives to deep point
pathan to mahesh, 1 run, the slower ball, yomahesh intelligently taps it wide of the bowler and gets off strike
pathan to mahesh, 1 run, another slower ball, he exposes his stumps and punches it down to deep cover
mcgrath to goel, 1 run, pitches on middle and leg, he tucks it to fine leg
mcgrath to katich, no run, gets a long way across his stumps and defends back to mcgrath
mcgrath to goel, no run, gets across and defends it to mid-off
mohammad asif to katich, no run, beats him straight up with an away swinger
mohammad asif to katich, no run,
mohammad asif to katich, 2 runs, pushes it towards mid-on and sets off fast, maharoof hits the stumps at katich's end but he just makes it to his crease
mcgrath to katich, no run, rocks across and punches it hard down to backward point
mcgrath to katich, 1 run, shuffles across, turns the face of the bat and tucks it just wide of midwicket, jayawardene is a little slow off the blocks
mohammad asif to jayawardene, no run, pitches just outside off, he gets across, covers the line and defends
mohammad asif to jayawardene, no run, good ball, pitches outside off and swinging away, jayawardene has a poke at it
mcgrath to jayawardene, 1 run, pitches it wide outside off, he opens the face of the bat and dabs it down to third man
mcgrath to katich, no run, defended to the on side
maharoof to jayawardene, 1 run, pitches outside off and comes back in, he tucks it to the on side
maharoof to katich, 1 run,

maharoof to jayawardene, no run, nearly a return catch! jayawardene shapes to push this through the on side and checks his stroke, the ball lobs off the meat of the bat and maharoof stretches out to catch that
mahesh to katich, no run, pitches outside off, he gets across and taps it to the offside
mahesh to katich, 1 run, katich shuffles across his stumps again and glances it down to bhatia at fine leg
mahesh to jayawardene, 1 run, he taps it down to the offside with soft hands, yomahesh attempts an under arm flick but the throw was well over the stumps
mahesh to jayawardene, no run, false stroke by mahela as he flashes at one wide outside off and misses
shoaib malik to katich, 1 wide, strays wide down the leg side, fired in fast
shoaib malik to jayawardene, 1 wide, turns wide down leg, karthik whips off the bails
mohammad asif to yuvraj singh, no run, pitches outside off, the ball holds its line before reaching the keeper
mohammad asif to yuvraj singh, no run, gets across his stumps and defends back to the bowler
mohammad asif to yuvraj singh, 1 run, pitches wide outside off, he opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man
mohammad asif to katich, four runs, frustration for asif as katich makes use of the width outside off and gets a thick outside edge wide of the slips
shoaib malik to yuvraj singh, no run, steps down and drives hard but he can't beat cover
maharoof to katich, no run, gets across his stumps and defends back to the bowler
maharoof to katich, 1 wide, the slower ball, misdirects it wide down the leg side
maharoof to katich, 1 run, pitches outside off, he drives to long-off
shoaib malik to katich, six runs, charges down the track and creams it over the straight boundary, a spectator holds the catch at the second tier
shoaib malik to katich, 2 runs, rocks back and punches it down to long-off
shoaib malik to katich, no run,
maharoof to katich, no run, flat bats it across the line and maharoof tries to intercept it with his boot, maharoof claims he didn't see it
bhatia to katich, 1 wide, slides wide down the legside, bonus run there
mahesh to srivastava, no run, srivastava turns it to the offside
mahesh to yuvraj singh, 1 run, shuffles at the crease and whips it to the on side
mcgrath to yuvraj singh, 1 run, comes round the wicket, yuvraj taps it to backward point, an overthrow results in a single, yuvraj isn;t happy with his partner's running
mcgrath to srivastava, no run, defended to the offside
mcgrath to srivastava, 1 run,
mahesh to yuvraj singh, four runs, gives him width outside off and yuvraj makes room and crashes that past extra cover off the backfoot
mahesh to yuvraj singh, 1 run, pushes this in the arc between mid-on and midwicket
mahesh to pathan, 1 run, slices it down to backward point and retains the strike
mohammad asif to yuvraj singh, 1 run, closes the face of the bat and flicks this towards midwicket

mohammad asif to pathan, (no ball) 1 run, exposes his stumps and clubs it to long-off, pathan makes a gesture to the umpires that there were only 3 fielders in the circle and umpire sivaram duly signals that a no  ball

mohammad asif to pathan, out, charges down the track and tries to finish it off in style but gets a thick edge as he tries to club it past the bowler, karthik leaps up and gathers it, umpire sivaram raises the finger after a while and asif gives pathan a bit of a send-off
shoaib malik to yuvraj singh, no run, gets down and plays a neat defensive push to the covers
shoaib malik to yuvraj singh, no run, tries to tuck it wide of midwicket but pushes it back to malik
steyn to hayden, no run, fires that at 142 kph, pitches outside off, seams back in and beats hayden, the crowd gets animated
steyn to hayden, no run, lands on middle and comes back in, he taps it to mid-off
steyn to hayden, no run, fires that at 141 kph, lands a little wide outside off and carries through to boucher near his face
steyn to hayden, no run, even quicker, 144 kph, this one lands on the corridor outside off and kicks up on hayden  who wisely shoulders arms
khan to patel, no run, what bounce! zaheer lands it outside off, kicks up on patel and slices him in half, how did that not take the edge?
khan to hayden, 1 run, walks a few paces down and shapes to club it past the bowler but he mistimes it to mid-on, takes a quick single
steyn to hayden, no run, raw pace, 144 kph, lands it a little wide outside off and gets appreciable bounce as boucher takes it high
steyn to hayden, 1 wide, the slower ball, however he misdirects it slightly wide outside the offstump, harsh call
steyn to hayden, no run, fires that at 143 kph, he really pounds it on the pitch and forces hayden to weave away to take evasive action
khan to hayden, no run, false shot, he sees the width outside off and has a wild swish at it
khan to hayden, four runs, zaheer goes round the wicket, hayden makes room and gets a thin inside edge which just misses the stumps, very streaky, hayden's now the leading run scorer  of the ipl
kumar to patel, no run, pitches on off and middle, he pushes it towards midwicket
kumar to patel, 1 run, grants him width outside off, he uppishly scoops it past the vacant gully region and down to third man
kumar to hussey, 1 run, pitches fractionally wide outside off and he steers it down to third man
khan to patel, four runs, slides on middle and leg and patel whips it away very firmly past square leg, the ball rocketed off the bat
khan to patel, no run, false shot from patel as he mistimes a scoop and nearly gives mid-on a catch
kumar to patel, out, praveen gives him a bit of width outside off, patel attempts a cheeky glide down to third man but ends up edging to kallis at first slip who slides to his left and catches it
kumar to raina, 1 run, pitches outside off, he punches that to the offside
kumar to hussey, no run, pitches outside off and comes on straight, he punches that off the meat of the bat to cover
kallis to raina, 2 runs, this one kicks up on suresh raina, he tries to carve that over the covers but he checks his stroke and keeps it along the ground and beats cover
kallis to raina, 1 run, scooped past cover, there's protection in the deep
kallis to hussey, no run, gets a thick inside edge and that nearly rolls onto the stumps
akhil to raina, 1 run, gets on the backfoot and punches that to the offside
akhil to hussey, 1 run, the slower ball, he waits on it and glides it down to third man
kallis to hussey, 1 run, the slower ball, he opens the face and steers it to third man
kallis to raina, 1 run, shuffles at the crease and whips this down to midwicket
kallis to hussey, 1 run, taps it very softly and the ball nearly rolls onto the stumps, raina's very quick off the blocks and they take a quick single
kallis to raina, no run, bangs that on middle and gets plenty of away movement, close to being called a wide
akhil to hussey, no run, tries to steer that down to third man, the extra bounce takes him by surprise
akhil to raina, 1 run, gets back and pushes this to the on side
akhil to hussey, 1 run, stays back at the crease and chops it down towards cover
kumar to hussey, 1 run, gives him the charge but he gets an under edge to the on side, we've seen quite a few mis-hits today
akhil to hussey, no run,
akhil to hussey, 1 run, gets back and chops it down to the offside
akhil to dhoni, no run,
akhil to dhoni, no run, stays back at the crease and whips it behind square on the on side
kallis to dhoni, 3 runs, grants him width outside off, he gets a thick outside edge down to third man, steyn fumbles and they steal an extra run
steyn to dhoni, no run, faster now, 145 kph, dhoni throws the kitchen sink at it outside off but meets thin air
steyn to dhoni, no run, has a wild swing outside off and he misses
akhil to hussey, no run, the slower ball, well disguised as hussey swings and misses
akhil to hussey, no run, clubs it hard down the pitch and akhil does brilliantly to intercept that as he falls over
kallis to hussey, four runs, hussey makes room and gets a thin under edge which trickles past the stumps and beats the keeper

kallis to hussey, 1 run, ouch! hussey clubs it hard and straight and the ball strikes umpire doctrove hard on the shoulder as he takes evasive action, the umpire saves a boundary and hussey sees the funny side to it and they share a light moment and embrace, one for the album there
kumar to dhoni, 1 run, pitches outside off and he swings across the line and places it to deep midwicket
steyn to dhoni, 1 wide, now this is certainly a wide, he slides down lwg
steyn to dhoni, four runs, and now we have a misfield! dhoni drives that firmly down to chipli at long-off but he mistimes his dive and the ball slips past him
khan to dhoni, out, the slower ball, he makes room  but fails to get the timing right as he scoops it to chipli at deep extra cover
gony to chipli, no run, hits the deck hard outside off and the ball rears on the batsman and beats him
gony to chipli, four runs, brilliantly played, it lands just fractionally wide outside off and chipli stays back and punches that off the meat of the bat and beats cover
gony to chipli, no run, pitches on middle and leg, he softly pushes it to mid-on
gony to chipli, 1 run, hits the deck hard outside off, he adjusts himself on the backfoot and punches this wide of point
oram to chipli, no run, tests him out with a lifter outside off and the extra bounce beats the drive, good delivery
oram to chipli, 1 run, we've seen about a 100 inside edges already today and here's one more, this one trickles to fine leg
oram to jaffer, no run, squares jaffer up with a jaffa! very appropriate, he pokes his bat out and nearly gets an edge
oram to jaffer, no run, defended solidly back to the bowler, such shots won't take them home
oram to jaffer, no run, tries to dispatch this one by making room but it fails to come off as he only manages an inside edge to midwicket
gony to taylor, 1 run, stays back and punches it hard down the pitch and just beats the bowler
gony to jaffer, no run, this time he makes room to scoop this over mid-off but he misses
gony to jaffer, no run, dropped: gony gets a sitter of a return catch but he fails to hang onto it, jaffer in fact checked his stroke
oram to taylor, no run, taylor shapes to drive straight but closes the face of the bat and mistimes it back to the bowler
oram to jaffer, 1 run, dropped: taylor gets a thick edge off the toe of his bat and dhoni and patel at slip have a go at it, the ball lobs off dhoni's glove, they share a laugh after that drop
gony to jaffer, no run, makes room but the extra pace forces him to adjust his stroke, he ends up chopping the ball down
morkel to taylor, 1 run, gets across his stumps and pushes this one wide of mid-on
morkel to taylor, 1 wide, slides wide down the leg side, morkel loses his line

amarnath to jaffer, four runs, dropped: that's two for the night for gony! taylor scoops it over mid-on, gony over runs the ball and completely misjudges it, the ball lobs off him and rolls to the boundary
amarnath to jaffer, 1 run, moves across his stumps early and glances that one down to fine leg
morkel to jaffer, 1 wide, slides wide down the leg side
morkel to jaffer, 1 run, makes room to crash it through the off side but he mistimes it to mid-off
morkel to taylor, 1 run, backs away a little and chops it down wide of point
joginder sharma to jaffer, 1 run, slides on middle and leg, he tucks it with the line wide of midwicket
joginder sharma to jaffer, 1 run, turns the face of the bat and glances it wide of square leg
amarnath to taylor, 1 run, the slower ball, lands outside off, he steers it wide of point

amarnath to jaffer, 3 runs, brilliant fielding! jaffer steers it down towards third man and times that sweetly, hussey runs across, pushes it away and the ball nearly rolls towards the ropes again on the deflection, gony eventually picks it up
joginder sharma to kallis, 1 run, shuffles across his stumps and tucks it wide of square leg
joginder sharma to kallis, 1 run, shuffles across and angles it wide of point to give taylor the strike
joginder sharma to kallis, 1 run, shuffles across his stumps and easily glances this one down to fine leg
morkel to taylor, no run, taylor tries to heave that over the on side but the slower ball deceives him
morkel to taylor, no run, that ball shoots through really low and beats him, we've never seen that before today

joginder sharma to kallis, out, he shuffles across his stumps and joginder follows him by bowling it wide outside off, kallis gets a thin edge to dhoni and joginder knows he's got him, he doesn't turn back for the confirmation
joginder sharma to taylor, 1 wide, that was harsh, taylor shuffles across and misses a wide delivery, tiffen signals a wide
gony to boucher, 2 runs, dropped: boucher gets a thick leading edge as he tries to work that to the on side, raina runs backwards from cover but spills the skier in the region of mid-off

gony to dravid, out, gony gets one to angle inwards from off stump, dravid shapes to flick but the ball strikes him in line of middle and leg, tiffen thinks about it for ages before raising the finger
gony to kumar, 1 run, punches this one hard down to deep extra cover
morkel to kumar, 1 run, makes room but mistimes it to the offside, praveen is frustrated with that shot
morkel to khan, 1 run, pitches on middle and leg, he tucks it to the on side
morkel to kumar, 1 run, praveen stays back and punches it hard to long-off
oram to khan, 1 run, out, makes room and pushes that wide of mid-off, raina gathers the ball and throws it flat and hard to dhoni, zaheer is struggling to make his ground
pollock to mccullum, 1 run, easy runs, as pollock goes astray and mccullum, shuffling, tucks the ball down to fine leg for a single, looks to be a nice carry on the ball

pollock to ganguly, out, edged and a smashing catch by jayasuriya at wide slip! pollock strikes with his third ball, forcing ganguly to reach out and chase the ball and its weld held at slip, diving to his left and taking it above his head, captain takes out captain!
pollock to ponting, 1 run, slower ball on the stumps, tucked to midwicket to open his account
nehra to das, four runs, top shot, just making room and crunching that past cover and point
nehra to das, four runs, two in two, as das latches onto the width and slashes upwards past gully and the outfield is so fast that third man cannot get to it in time
nehra to das, no run, width again but das chops it into the ground, point fields, so a freebie missed
pollock to das, six runs, shot, son! flicked off the stumps with utter disdain, that flies over deep midwicket to get the fans chering
fernando to ponting, no run, good ball first up, on off stump and patiently patted down the track
kulkarni to das, no run, on the stumps, no room, and das drops his head to defend it back
kulkarni to das, no run, swings into off stump and das punches sweetly to midwicket
kulkarni to das, 1 run, gets a bit of width, but its the slower ball and he chops it to point
kulkarni to hussey, 1 run, gets some room but is early into the shot, chopping past gully for one
bravo to ponting, no run, change of pace, comes in and he plays the ball to cover, who's sharp
fernando to hussey, 1 run, on the stumps, shaping away, he gets outside half of the bat to point
jayasuriya to hussey, no run, looks to open face but plays straight to extra cover
pollock to ponting, 1 run, on the stumps, ponting turns it towards mid-wicket
pollock to hussey, 1 run, slower ball, hussey sees it and checks his shot, plays it down to mid-on
pollock to ponting, 1 run, outside edge, as it just shaped away a bit. single to thirdman
pollock to hussey, no run, right on the stumps, no room for hussey, a valuable dot ball
jayasuriya to ponting, no run, sees him charging down and fires it in quicker on the leg stump
pollock to mohammad hafeez, 1 run, risky single to point, after the ball nips in and hafeez plays it away, and ponting wanted the run immediately

pollock to ponting, 1 run, falls over again as he looks to flick past midwicket, but gets squared up and edges to nehra at third man, who returns a wide throw ... someone shouts at him and he shouts back ... its all happening

jayasuriya to mohammad hafeez, out, madness, i say! hafeez stands and pushes to the off side, starts to run down but then sells ponting down the river as rahane swoops in collects, and returns the ball to jayasuriya, who does the rest .. ponting harried off down the track and had no chance of getting back ... so his poor ipl run ends with a poor call from hafeez ... does it remind you of lara in his odi career?
jayasuriya to agarkar, no run, flat on middle and leg and its driven to the man at midwicket
jayasuriya to agarkar, no run, thats a maiden-wicket over, as agarkar taps the ball back to the bowler
jayasuriya to shukla, 1 run, comes out, jayasuriya follows him and he uneasily pokes the ball to gully
jayasuriya to agarkar, 1 wide, there's a wide as jayasuriya pitches flay down leg stump
jayasuriya to agarkar, out, another one bites the dust! agarkar just hits this one down nehra's throat at deep mid-on and kolkata are really making a mess of this
jayasuriya to shukla, 1 run, further confusion, as shukla pushes to point, hesitates, and gets kartik confused at the other end, luckily for kolkata the throw was off the mark
bravo to shukla, 1 wide, attempted slower delivery loops up and slips down leg stump for a wide
bravo to kartik, 1 run, stands his ground steers this one wide of gully down to third man
fernando to shukla, 1 run, slower ball, hit with too much bottom-hand to long-off, but he gets strike
kulkarni to kartik, 3 wides, and he tries to play it there, walking across the stumps, but the ball is well down leg stump and shah fumbles, allowing the extra courtesy the overthrow
kulkarni to kartik, no run,
fernando to kartik, out, skips down, fernando follows him and kartik just chips it in the air to midwicket, where jayasuriya runs after it and plucks the catch very well
agarkar to rahane, 1 wide, poor stuff, well down leg stump, batsman cant get there so its wide
agarkar to rahane, 1 wide, another wide, this time miles outside off stump, rahane needed a ten foot pole to reach that one ... agarkar spraying it around so far
agarkar to rahane, no run, plays from his crease, feeling for it, and chops just outside off stump
sharma to jayasuriya, six runs, this time he chases it and connects superbly, flashing a flat six over gully, all bottom hand on that shot, a very wide ball from ishant
sharma to jayasuriya, no run, goes thrashing again but misses the ball completely, mccullum collects and the slips are being kept interested
agarkar to rahane, no run, there to be driven, and he does so well, but cant beat backward point
agarkar to rahane, out, and he strikes! thats a nothing shot, just a chip into midwicket's hands, as rahane looked to go over the top but went tamely with his flick
agarkar to pandey, no run, on the stumps and pandey just pushes it back to agarkar
sharma to jayasuriya, four runs, pacy, sharp delivery gets jayasuriya ducking but he leaves his bat hanging out and the ball kisses the outer edge and flies over mccullum's head
dinda to bravo, no run, slower ball, too wide of the stumps and bravo leaves it alone
dinda to bravo, no run, gets him shuffling across, then the ball stops on bravo, who does well to play it wide of dinda towards midwicket
sharma to uthappa, 1 run, some room on offer and he opens the face to run it down to third man
kartik to bravo, no run, tosses it up, gets some drift, he waits and steers it to backward point
kartik to bravo, no run, there's the arm ball, sliding down leg to get bravo in a total mess as he steps back
mohammad hafeez to bravo, 1 run, repeats the shot but its flatter and he cant beat the man this time
mohammad hafeez to uthappa, 1 run, flat on middle and leg, uthappa uses his feet and drives to midwicket
mohammad hafeez to uthappa, 5 wides, steps right across, exposing middle and leg, but the ball is fired down very wide and beats mccullum as well ... kolkata dont need that at all
mohammad hafeez to uthappa, no run, fired in flat on middle and off, uthappa plays a walking drive to extra cover but bravo sends him back as the fielder moves in quickly
kartik to uthappa, no run, another one slides down leg stump, raps the bad, but is turned down
ganguly to bravo, 1 run, driven uppishly from the crease but its into the gap at cover safely
kartik to bravo, no run, again some good drift and loop, and its played back to kartik
kartik to bravo, six runs, hello, dolly! bravo uses his feet and plays a terrific caribbean loft, all timing and elegance, over long-off for half a dozen, beautiful to watch
kartik to bravo, no run, arm ball this time, well spotted and he plays it to midwicket
ganguly to bravo, four runs, and again, bravo gets the back leg up and just drives dead straight past the bowler and mid-off for another flowing shot, not afraid to go over the top at all
ganguly to uthappa, no run, tidy stuff, after uthappa punches back but dada sticks out a hand to save
ganguly to bravo, 1 run, flicked from off stump, in the air, out to deep midwicket for a single
dinda to bravo, 1 run, this time he reads it well and opens the face to run it down to third man
dinda to bravo, no run, change of pace, he gets across and pushes it from middle and off to midwicket a bit uppishly but the fielder is deep so all is well for bravo and mumbai
agarkar to uthappa, four runs, shot, man! uthappa makes room and drives hard in the air through cover
shukla to bravo, no run, slips well down leg stump, bravo goes for a big flick and misses
shukla to uthappa, 1 run, too straight and this time he coolly flicks out to deep midwicket
shukla to bravo, 1 run, dropped but thats a tough call! he tries to steer it away again, gets a thin under-edge but mccullum misses it and that single raises bravo's fifty
agarkar to bravo, 1 no ball, oversteps, driven straight to cover, so we have a free hit
agarkar to bravo, 1 run, makes room and slashes down to deep third man, who takes the catch, so bravo cannot be out caught, and its a run to the scoreboard, and the 100th run of the partnership
agarkar to uthappa, 1 run,
dinda to bravo, 1 run, tries to whip it away from off stump but survives with an inside-edge, they then proceed to scamper a single to midwicket
khan to gambhir, 1 run, gambhir takes a step down the pitch in anticipation, but decides to angle the bat and play the ball to third man instead.
khan to gambhir, no run, squirted out to backward point, gambhir thinks of a single, but virat kohli, the local boy, is on to the ball quickly
khan to gambhir, four runs, eased through midwicket, lovely shot. too straight from zaheer and gambhir cashes in.
steyn to sehwag, 1 wide, wide down the leg side. steyn hasn't switched the radar on yet.
steyn to gambhir, no run, gambhir taps it down on to the off side, but again kohli is in quickly from point.
steyn to gambhir, four runs, bit of width and with the ball just sitting up, gambhir crashes it through point for four. super shot that. gauti is on a roll here.
steyn to gambhir, no run, slants one across the left-hander. gambhir thinks of going for it, but withdraws at the last moment. end of the over
khan to sehwag, 2 runs, sehwag makes room for another mighty flail but misses that one. fortunately for him, it misses the stumps as well. no run. end of the over
steyn to gambhir, 2 runs, gambhir angles the bat and plays it behind point. steyn continuing here.
steyn to gambhir, 1 run, this one is also played to backward point for a single

steyn to gambhir, out, gambhir plays it down to point and sets off. sehwag responds, but the pick-up and throw from ross taylor is brilliant. the umpire gives him out without even consulting the third umpire. shikhar dhawan is the new man in
kumar to dhawan, no run, played back down the pitch to the bowler, who collects on his follow-through
vinay kumar to gambhir, 1 run, waits for the ball to come on to him and then deflects it fine to third man for a single.
vinay kumar to gambhir, four runs, the punishment continues. poor bowling continues. this one is on the leg side and gambhir flays it to deep square leg boundary
kallis to dhawan, 2 runs, again on the leg side, swung to deep square leg region where steyn kicks it away and zak gets in with the throw
kallis to gambhir, no run, another slower ball, outside the off stump, left alone
kohli to gambhir, 1 run, almost chris harris' action, on the leg and middle, flicked away for a single
kohli to dhawan, four runs, again on that leg stump line - boy you can't bowl there - swung away to deep backward square leg region.
joshi to dhawan, 1 run, comes down the track and flat-bats to long-off
joshi to gambhir, four runs, another charge down the track and he flays along the ground to the cover boundary. delhi are galloping away here.
joshi to gambhir, 1 run,
kallis to dhawan, 1 run, gets his fifty this time, with a dab to the on side
kallis to gambhir, four runs, the runs refuse to dry up. gambhir crouched and opened the bat-face deliberately to square drive to backward point boundary
steyn to karthik, 1 run, on the hips, tucked to long leg for a single
steyn to gambhir, (no ball) 2 runs, slower one , flicked to deep square leg region. no ball and that means a free hit is coming up
kallis to gambhir, four runs, tries a slower one but gambhir picks it up early and drills it over kallis' head.
kallis to tiwary, 1 run,
khan to tiwary, 1 run, from round the stumps, on the middle, turned to midwicket
khan to tiwary, 1 run, slows up the pace, hit to deep midwicket for a single
khan to bhatia, no run, down the leg side, tries to help it along but it runs off the edge, along the ground, to boucher
kumar to tiwary, 1 run, slower one this time and its hit to midwicket
mcgrath to kumar, no run, bit wide outside the off stump, no shot offered
mohammad asif to taylor, no run, taylor swing across the line and the ball zips past the outside edge - he has scored lots of runs playing that shot in this tournament
mcgrath to taylor, 1 run, forced away to covers - bit of hesitation going for the single but in the end jaffer made it across comfortably
mcgrath to jaffer, no run, driven towards cover
mohammad asif to jaffer, no run,
mahesh to kallis, no run, walks to the off stump, mahesh keeps it on the outside-off line and kallis gets a inside edge on to the pad
mahesh to kallis, no run,
mahesh to dravid, 1 run, on the middle and leg, dravid let the ball come to him before wristing it to fine leg
vettori to kallis, 1 run,
vettori to dravid, no run, just outside off and nudged to point
mahesh to kallis, 1 leg bye, picks up a leg bye now. again that walk outside off and he misses to connect with an intended glance
bhatia to kallis, 1 run, slower one, outside off, pushed to extra cover
shoaib malik to dravid, 1 run, spins in towards the hip, dravid goes back to play it with the turn to backward square leg
shoaib malik to kallis, 1 run, shuffles outside off and wrists it past square leg, they think about two but decide against it
sehwag to dravid, 1 run, pings the long off now
vettori to dravid, 1 run,
vettori to kallis, 1 run, turns it to midwicket region
vettori to kallis, 1 run, quicker one and kallis gets it to mid-off region for a single
mcgrath to kallis, no run, slower one, kallis misses a offdrive and karthik, standing up to the stumps, gathers
mahesh to boucher, no run, in the zone outside off, boucher tries to dab it through point, gets an inside edge that takes the ball behind the stumps.
mahesh to boucher, 1 run, just a single to long-off.
vettori to boucher, 1 run, comes down the track, vettori takes the pace of the ball and boucher flat bats a drive back to vettori who makes a half stop
vettori to kallis, 1 run, takes the pace off the delivery and kallis can only loft it one bounce to long off
vettori to boucher, 1 run, a quicker one now - vettori is mixing up things rather nicely-  boucher, down the track, gets a inside edge to fine leg
vettori to kallis, out, the armer takes out kallis. he ran down the track, had a heave but missed. he was through the shot early.
sehwag to kohli, 1 run, swings it hard but straight to deep midwicket.
sehwag to boucher, four runs, came down again, sehwag pushed it well outside off, boucher reaches out to find the straight boundary
sehwag to boucher, 1 run, down the track and he mistimes a swing past midwicket. the daredevils have won and the challengers sink again.

sreesanth to laxman, 1 run, edged and dropped! sreesanth invites another booming drive outside the off and laxman obliges, with absolutely no footwork, and as the ball deviates he edges but sangakkara, flinging himself to his right, cannot hold on as the ball travels away from him, thats a life for laxman
sreesanth to gilchrist, 3 runs, drives hard from his crease, eying extra-cover, but gets too much bottom hand and ends up dragging it past midwicket, but  he gets a triple for his efforts
sreesanth to laxman, 1 run, another slower ball outside off, pushed to point and gibbs harries down
singh to gibbs, 3 runs, good shot from gibbs, pushing uppishly past extra cover and it takes some good chasing down from yuvraj to haul it in near the ropes
singh to laxman, 1 run, not a shot he'd be proud of but its runs, laxman reaching out and working it ungainly past mid-on down to goel again
chawla to sharma, 1 run, quicker one spins into him and he gets bat down to nudge to midwicket
singh to shahid afridi, 1 run, he likes the width and hammers it along the turf to pathan at deep cover
singh to sharma, 1 run, change of pace but he checks the shot past the bowler to long-off
gagandeep singh to sharma, no run, bowled wider outside off stump and he drives from the crease, missing, and thats well kept by sangakkara, standing up to the stumps
gagandeep singh to sharma, 1 run, a touch too straight and he shuffles, on-driving for a single
gagandeep singh to shahid afridi, six runs, there he goes, clubbing it across from just outside off stump for a big six over deep midwicket, one leg up as is his wont

gagandeep singh to shahid afridi, out, rush of blood sends him back inside, but thats a good catch from yuvraj! afridi loses his marbles, heaving at one and getting a top-edge up into the starry night, yuvraj keeps his eyes trained on the ball in the covers and takes it, falling down onto his back, then juggling and holding onto it on the third attempt
gagandeep singh to sharma, no run, drives from his crease and misses, another good take from sangakkara
chawla to bangar, no run, flatter one outside the line, he drives and misses as chawla appeals
singh to kalyankrishna, 1 run, skips down, slashes upwards of gully down to third man, on the bounce
singh to kalyankrishna, 1 bye, repeat of that shot, except this time sharma calls his partner down and survives as sangakkara misses with the under-arm flick to the stumps
singh to sharma, four runs, he gets four, moving to fifty from just 34 balls! he gets back and heaves the ball just over midwicket, picking his spot excellently, to get the fans on their feet
gagandeep singh to sharma, 2 runs, makes room and goes over extra-cover but its not timed well, landing safely between three fielders converging on the boundary
gagandeep singh to sharma, four runs, uff! sharma! he just skips down and drills this dead straight over the umpire, it missed taking off his head by inches

pathan to kalyankrishna, out, oh well held, marsh! brilliant effort at backward point, diving horizontally to his right to cup a firm slash from kalyankrishna, dancing down the track, perfectly balanced in the air ... one for the album, i'd say
pathan to singh, 1 run, makes room and drives just over a leaping cover fielder's fingertips, sharma wanted to come back for two but rp sent him back, wisely
zoysa to marsh, 1 run, gets some room, checks the shot, running wide of backward point
singh to sarwan, 1 run, more width and sarwan reaches out, slashing on the bounce to third man
bangar to marsh, 1 run, drags it from outside off stump and gets a single to midwicket, where sharma dives but cant stop it, so mid-on fires in a throw which is well backed up
bangar to sarwan, 1 run, straight on middle and off and its pushed to midwicket, as he shuffles
kalyankrishna to sangakkara, out, got em! sangakkara falls going for an expansive drive off one knee, just failing to keep the ball down and sharma takes an easy catch at cover
kalyankrishna to yuvraj singh, 1 wide, a very wide delivery outside off, yuvraj chases but cant get there
venugopal rao to marsh, 1 run, flat outside leg again and this time he flicks to midwicket
venugopal rao to marsh, 1 run, gets some width and inside-edges from outside off down past leg
bangar to marsh, four runs, this is poor stuff, bowling it well outside leg stump and marsh escorts the ball down to fine leg for another well-timed boundary
shahid afridi to marsh, four runs, a rank half-tracker and marsh deals with it, spanking past cover for four
shahid afridi to marsh, 1 run, gives it some air and now marsh coolly tucks it to midwicket
shahid afridi to marsh, 1 run, a tad too straight and it allows marsh to wrist it away to midwicket
kalyankrishna to jayawardene, 1 run, nips into him and he rolls the wrists, playing it to midwicket
kalyankrishna to marsh, 1 run, well played, running it off the open face to backward point, who tumbles around and does well to save runs
shahid afridi to marsh, 1 run, fizzed up on middle and off, he gets back and plays it to midwicket
shahid afridi to jayawardene, 1 run, looped up on middle and leg and its easily nudged to the on-side
shahid afridi to marsh, no run, comes down, afridi fires it in and marsh digs it back to him
bangar to marsh, no run, and that beats him, nipping in with extra height, a top over comes to an end
bangar to marsh, four runs, another streaky shot, marsh swiping across the line and inside-edging past leg stump for the ball to dribble down to the fine-leg boundary
bangar to jayawardene, 1 run, well bowled, tight on the stumps but jayawardene just pushes it to deep mid-on for an easy single as runs keep ticking over
bangar to marsh, 1 run, steps out to leg and tucks the last ball to midwicket to keep strike
zoysa to marsh, 2 runs, now its a pick-up shot over mid-on's head, dropping in no-man's-land
singh to jayawardene, 1 wide, that one swings well wide of the stumps to lower the equation
dinda to smith, no run, hits the deck early on and gets smith on the backfoot straight away as he defends back to the bowler
dinda to smith, 1 run, waits on it and plays the ball really late, he opens the face of the bat and dabs it to third man
dinda to asnodkar, no run, false shot, there was width and he flayed at it outside the offstump
dinda to asnodkar, no run, gets across and defends it very softly back to the bowler, the ball rolls to the bowler
sharma to smith, no run, smith stays back at the crease and plays it rather late, he taps it towards cover and looks for a single, sends asnodkar back
dinda to asnodkar, 1 run, slides on middle and leg, he gets across and tucks it behind square on the on side
dinda to kaif, four runs, grants him width outside off, dinda strives for that extra yard of pace but sprays it offline and kaif scoops it over backward point
dinda to kaif, 1 wide, loses his direction and slides wide down the leg side, he misses the glance
dinda to kaif, no run, this one skids through at stump height and kaif angles it down towards cover
sharma to asnodkar, 1 run, gets it to skid through at middle stump height, he steers it down to point and a misfield allows a single
agarkar to asnodkar, no run, good comeback, he looks to glide that down to third man but the ball comes back in and beats him completely
agarkar to asnodkar, 2 runs, he goes for the cross batted swipe but luckily the top edge lands well clear of midwicket
agarkar to asnodkar, no run, drags the line outside the offstump, the ball seams away and he slashes and misses
agarkar to asnodkar, no run, beats him, there was width outside off but asnodkar failed to make contact, driving away from the body

agarkar to kaif, out, agarkar shoots back after conceding a six, he changes the pace of the ball, kaif fails to read it early and tamely chips it back to agarkar, he closes the face of the bat at the time of contact and hence mistimes it
agarkar to asnodkar, 1 run, drags the line closer to the offstump but this time he takes a single down to third man
agarkar to pathan, 1 run, drives outside the offstump and places it wide of extra cover
hussey to pathan, four runs, pitches on middle and leg and pathan heaves it across the line over midwicket
hussey to pathan, 1 run, pushed to the on side for a single
ganguly to pathan, 1 run, pitches on middle and leg, he gets across and tucks it down to midwicket

umar gul to asnodkar, out, loss of concentration from asnodkar as he shapes to club that over the on side, the ball comes on a lot quicker and hence he gets a thick top edge which spoons to hussey at wide mid-off, that was a tame end to a good innings but he's done his job
umar gul to pathan, 1 run, pitches outside off, he punches this to the offside
dinda to jadeja, 1 wide, strays wide down the legside, he attempts a glance but misses
umar gul to pathan, (no ball) 1 run, oversteps, he whips it to fine leg
sharma to jadeja, no run, pitches outside off and seams across slightly, he tries a cheeky glide but misses
sharma to jadeja, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man
sharma to pathan, no run, tempts him to go for the heave over midwicket but pathan misses it completely, feet were rooted to the crease
sharma to warne, no run, slower ball, very well bowled as it deceives him, he makes room and decides to leave it but the ball wasn't wide enough to be called
sharma to warne, 1 run, the quicker one, he makes room slice it past the infield but mistimes it towards mid-off
sharma to warne, 1 bye, makes room but misses the ball, pathan sets off quickly, dives at the crease and makes his ground before the under arm flick breaks the stumps, they steal a bye
watson to salman butt, no run, gets across and defends to the offside
watson to salman butt, 1 run, stays on the backfoot and punches this firmly towards mid-on, dive restricts this to a single
watson to salman butt, four runs, slides down the leg side, butt gets a big shuffle across and turns it wide of square leg, that flew off the face of the bat
sohail tanvir to ganguly, 1 run, this was a little wide outside off and ganguly angles it wide of the slips and watson slides well at third man and saves a boundary
sohail tanvir to salman butt, 1 wide, loses his line there as he slides down the leg side, he misses the glance
sohail tanvir to salman butt, no run, pitches outside off and dips back in, he shoulders arms

sohail tanvir to salman butt, out, the offstump tumbles... tanvir pitches it outside off and gets it to nip back in a little, butt drives away from his body, fails to cover the line and gets a thick inside edge which cannons onto his offstump, as usual tanvir shows no emotion
sohail tanvir to agarkar, 1 wide, slides wide down the legside and agarkar almost rehearses the uppish flick as the ball beats him
watson to agarkar, no run, hops back and steers one towards point and sets off, he decides against the single and scampers back
sohail tanvir to agarkar, 1 run, slams that hard past the bowler but the stumps get in the way, they manage a single off the deflection
trivedi to ganguly, 1 wide, wide, slower ball from trivedi, ganguly attempts to dab it away, no contact
trivedi to ganguly, 1 run, another slower ball, on leg this time, ganguly pushes it square on the on side, kolkata 50 comes up
patel to ganguly, 2 runs, pushed behind square on the on side to deep square leg
patel to ganguly, no run, ganguly defends to the off, another dot ball, that was an excellent over from munaf
trivedi to hussey, 1 run, trivedi is sending down a lot of slower balls here, hussey uses his wrists to send it to midwicket for a single, he wanted two but ganguly wasn't interested
trivedi to ganguly, no run, the slower ball this time and ganguly only manages to chop it down towards point, he's trying to force the pace
warne to hussey, 2 runs, lands on middle and leg, he closes the face of the bat and whips it behind square on the on side
warne to ganguly, no run, pushes this one flatter, ganguly softly tucks this to midwicket
warne to hussey, 1 wide, terrible delivery as he directs this so wide down leg that rawat barely manages to get a glove to it
warne to hussey, 1 run, slides on middle and leg, that's an easy single to deep midwicket
warne to hussey, six runs, gives it a bit of air outside off and hussey dances down the track and lofts it over long-off, he made plenty of room for that
sohail tanvir to hussey, 2 runs, tanvir comes round the wicket, he makes room and lofts over the bowler's head
sohail tanvir to das, 1 run, stretches his bat out and plays it one handed down to mid-on, the ball lobs off the top of the bat and falls safe
mcgrath to fleming, no run, and he leaves it go as mcgrath hits his straps outside off stump and gets the ball to shape away, he has had a great ipl so far
mcgrath to fleming, no run, same channel just outside off, shaping away, and flemo leaves it be
mcgrath to patel, no run, tight stuff on off stump and parthiv defends it to cover
mohammad asif to fleming, 1 wide, thats a wide outside off stump, very wide
mohammad asif to fleming, no run, hint of movement squares him up and he gets a leading-edge to gully
mohammad asif to patel, four runs, outside leg stump and thats a top flick past square leg, where mcgrath jogs towards the ball but puts in no effort to stop the ball, looks rather odd
mcgrath to fleming, 1 run, makes some room and plays with the movement, jamming the angled bat down in time and running the ball past gully and down to third man

mcgrath to patel, no run, where's he going? parthiv dances down, shuts his eyes, and tries to hit this one out of the park but doesn't connect at all and the keeper collects ... mcgrath gives him a look as if to say hello, kidhar?

mahesh to fleming, 1 no ball, and he strikes first ball, but its a no ball! good grief, fleming doesn't move his feet and drags the ball back onto his stumps but yo mahesh has overstepped so we have a free hit ... flemo was walking off but gets called back
mahesh to patel, no run, oh ho ho, thats pretty wide outside off stump but bowden lets him go
sangwan to vidyut, 1 run, again some room and parthiv opens the face, really reaching out, and steers it down to the fielder at third man for a single
sangwan to vidyut, four runs, slashes a wide one over a leaping slip and third man cant get there in time
mahesh to patel, four runs, more room outside off stump and parthiv flashes hard, with a thick outside-edge miles over slip for a one-bounce four that third man cannot get to
shoaib malik to vidyut, four runs, another wide one down leg stump beats bat and wicketkeeper
shoaib malik to vidyut, 2 runs, gets some width and drives into the gap between cover and point
sehwag to dhoni, no run, comes out first ball, sehwag sees him and fires it in, and the chennai captain turns the ball straight to midwicket
sehwag to dhoni, no run,
sehwag to dhoni, 1 run, thats poked into the gap at cover and point and dhoni gets off the mark
mohammad asif to vidyut, 1 run, exposes the stumps and drives well to cover, where a dives saves runs
sehwag to vidyut, six runs, top shot, making room and driving very straight over the bowler, good stuff
sehwag to vidyut, 2 runs, makes room and drives into the covers this time, good running
sehwag to dhoni, six runs, massive! dhoni skips down and heaves with the spin, connecting extremely well for a dinger over deep midwicket, a spanking shot for six
mohammad asif to dhoni, 1 run, comes out, drives the ball to cover, who dives to his right and saves runs

mcgrath to vidyut, 1 run, slower ball on the stumps, he waits for it and then opens the face to nudge it to backward point, looks at dhoni who calls for the quick single and thats his fifty in his first match, well played, vidyut
mahesh to dhoni, no run, step down again but cannot drive this one away and yo mahesh fields
mahesh to dhoni, no run, well bowled, offering no room and dhoni can just push that to point
sangwan to dhoni, 1 wide, too, too wide outside off stump as sangwan loses grip on the ball
ntini to sehwag, six runs, at that pace thats flying away over third man for a flat six, as sehwag smashes the wide one very hard, the tall man gony down on the ropes looks on as it sails over
ntini to gambhir, 1 run, gambhir tucks it away for a single to midwicket
ntini to sehwag, four runs, good line from ntini, half opened the face, races away through vacant second slip for a four
gony to sehwag, four runs, sehwag is a man in a hurry, picks that from outside off and deposits it at the midwicket boundary
gony to gambhir, 1 run, gives himself room and slashes it to third man
ntini to gambhir, 1 run, dabbed to mid-off and a quick single results
ntini to gambhir, four runs, backs away and slaps it square for another boundary, gambhir is getting into the act as well
morkel to gambhir, four runs, gambhir is extremely strong square on the off, some width provided and he dismisses it for four
morkel to gambhir, no run, tries to repeat the stroke, but can't pierce the field this time
morkel to gambhir, no run, came down the track, but misses it
morkel to gambhir, four runs, streaky shot that, gets the edge and it flies for a boundary through the vacant slip region
muralitharan to sehwag, no run, doosra lands outside off stump and spins away past the bat
muralitharan to gambhir, 2 runs, skips down and heaves it along the ground to ntini at deep midwicket
muralitharan to gambhir, 1 run, steps out to leg stump and drives inside-out to extra cover
morkel to gambhir, four runs, couple steps down and he clubs that, golf-like, straight for four, class
morkel to sehwag, no run, well bowled, slipping down into him as he makes room, then sneaks between pad and bat to beat him, dhoni collects, maybe a thin inside-edge
muralitharan to sehwag, 1 run, spins into him, he gets back and steers to point and sets off, a good flat throw comes in from badri but thats some excellent running from gambhir
muralitharan to sehwag, 1 run, quicker one squares him up but he ends up running it to point for one
morkel to sehwag, 1 bye, shuffles around, ball slips past leg stump, dhoni collects and sees gambhir outside his crease and throws the ball down but misses, and they steal a run
morkel to sehwag, 1 run, swings at one down leg and gets an inside-edge onto the thigh
joginder sharma to de villiers, 1 run, another pleasing shot, this time straighter, gets him off the mark
joginder sharma to gambhir, 1 run, change of pace but he gets across to nudge it to midwicket for one
muralitharan to de villiers, 1 run, quicker one outside off, he gets across and defends it to point
muralitharan to gambhir, 1 run, skips down, murali keeps it flat but gauti flicks it out to the deep
joginder sharma to de villiers, 1 run, shuffles across to get sharma dropping wide, then he neatly opens the face and runs the ball down to third man for an easy single
joginder sharma to gambhir, 1 run, well bowled, rolling the fingers across, but its easily tapped to point

joginder sharma to gambhir, 2 runs, sees some width and steers it down to third man, where a fumble from morkel allows a second and that gambhir's second fifty on the trot, from 35 deliveries, and the ipl's leading run-scorer raises his bat to an appreciative crowd, well played, gauti
gony to gambhir, out, bowled em! gambhir inside-edges trying a cheeky dab to third man, just succeeding in dragging the ball back onto the stumps, and a good innings is over
ntini to de villiers, 2 runs, too straight and de villiers twirls the ball down to morkel at deep backward square leg, calling for two immediately and he sprints the first one superbly
muralitharan to dhawan, no run, flatter one outside leg stump, he steps back and misses out on the shot
morkel to de villiers, 1 wide, but thats sloppy, very sloppy, morkel slipping a wide well down leg stump
kumble to gilchrist, no run, outside the off stump, gilchrist pushes it back to the bowler
kumble to gilchrist, 1 run, outside the off stump, pushes it to point for a single
kumble to gibbs, no run, outside the off stump, gibbs reaches for it and defends
kumble to gilchrist, no run, outside the off stump, gilchrist pushes it to point
kumble to gilchrist, 1 run, on the leg stump, gilchrist forces it away to square leg for a single
steyn to gilchrist, 1 run, on the leg stump, gilchrist turns it to square leg for a single to retain the strike
kallis to gilchrist, no run, on the off stump and upto the batsman as gilchrist defends it back to the bowler
kallis to gilchrist, four runs, gilchrist is warming up now as he picks the slower delivery outside the off stump and dispatches it over midwicket for a boundary. is gilchrist getting the step on now
kallis to gilchrist, 1 wide, the aggressive intent from gilchrist shakes kallis a touch as he sends a wide down the leg side
kohli to gilchrist, no run, outside the off stump, gilchrist forces it to point off the backfoot
akhil to gibbs, four runs, easy pickings for gibbs as he picks the line early on the leg stump and glances it away for a boundary
akhil to gibbs, four runs, on the leg stump again as gibbs goes more squarer with his glance as he beats the square leg fielder and gets himself a boundary
akhil to gibbs, no run, bounce outside the off  stump deceives gibbs
kohli to gilchrist, no run,
akhil to gilchrist, six runs, this time an even better shot as gilchrist slaps it away over square leg for another six and he is looking dangerous now
akhil to gilchrist, no run, on the off stump, gilchrist drives it to cover
kumble to sharma, 1 run, on the middle stump, rohit drives it to mid on for a single

vinay kumar to sharma, no run, outside the off stump and swinging in sharply and also has nippy bounce. the bounce takes rohit by surprise as he takes the bottom hand away from the handle and is struck on the fingers
kohli to silva, no run, on the middle stump, silva turns it to square leg
kohli to sharma, 2 runs, outside the off stump, rohit sharma looks to open the face and run it away to third man but gets an inside edge to fine leg for a couple
kohli to sharma, (no ball) 1 run, kohli oversteps as rohit guides it to square leg for a single
kohli to sharma, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
vinay kumar to sharma, no run, on the middle stump and a little slower in pace as rohit pushes it to midwicket
vinay kumar to sharma, no run, on the off stump, rohit pushes it back to the bowler
akhil to venugopal rao, 1 run, outside the off stump, venu pushes it to covers for a single
akhil to ravi teja, 1 run, outside the off stump, teja steers it to third man for a single
akhil to ravi teja, no run, on the off stump and coming in, teja looks to play it away on the leg side but gets a leading edge back to the bowler
kumble to venugopal rao, no run, outside the off stump, venu pushes it to point
kumble to venugopal rao, 1 run, on the off stump, venu comes down the track and looks to loft it away but gets an inside edge to fine leg for a single
kumble to venugopal rao, four runs, on the leg stump, venu comes charging down the track as he pushes it in the gap between deep square leg deep midwicket for a boundary
vinay kumar to yadav, 1 run, on the off stump, arjun pushes it to cover for a single
vinay kumar to vaas, no run, vaas has a wild swing and misses
vinay kumar to vaas, no run, swinging away from off stump as vaas has a wild swing and misses it. three times in a row has that happened now
steyn to singh, no run, rp is deceived by the slower delivery
vaas to kallis, no run, on the leg stump, kallis pushes it to mid on as there is some confusion as jaffer does not know to whose call he has to respond and a direct throw would have been disaster
vaas to kallis, four runs, on the off stump, kallis creams it through covers for a boundary
vaas to kallis, four runs, kallis walks down the track and drives it to long off for a boundary
vaas to kallis, 2 runs, outside the off stump, kallis rocka back and drives it past covers for a couple
singh to kallis, 1 run, outside the off stump, kallis steers it to third man for a single
vaas to kallis, four runs, outside the off stump, kallis reaches for the delivery and threads it past covers for a boundary
vaas to kallis, out, on the off stump, kallis drives to mid on and jaffer is not quick enough to beat the throw from arjun yadav at the bowlers end
vaas to kallis, four runs, on the off stump, kallis drives and gets an inside edge to fine leg for a boundary
vaas to kallis, no run, outside the off stump and moving away, kallis goes for the drive and misses
singh to misbah-ul-haq, 1 run, on the leg stump, misbah turns it to fine leg for a single
singh to kallis, no run, outside the off stump and swinging away, kallis lets it go to the keeper
singh to kallis, 1 run, on the leg stump, kallis drives it to mid on where a good effort from vijayakumar saves a boundary
vijaykumar to kallis, no run, on the leg stump, kallis pushes it to midwicket and does not want a run
bangar to misbah-ul-haq, no run, outside the off stump, misbah pushes it to cover
bangar to kallis, 1 run, outside the off stump, kallis steers it to third man for a single
bangar to misbah-ul-haq, 1 run, on the leg stump, misbah pushes it to square leg for a single

bangar to kallis, out, outside the off stump, kallis drives it to  mid off and chamara silva comes running in and swoops down on the ball and lets go of the ball in one go as it breaks down the stumps. jaffer fails to beat the throw for the second time in succession as he has been running for kallis this time round
vijaykumar to dravid, 1 run, on the leg stump, dravid turns it to square leg for a single
vijaykumar to misbah-ul-haq, 1 run, outside the off stump, misbah steers it to third man for a single
vijaykumar to misbah-ul-haq, no run, on the middle stump, misbah pushes it to midwicket
bangar to dravid, 1 run, on the leg stump, dravid pushes it to midwicket. misfield by afridi allows them a single
vijaykumar to misbah-ul-haq, no run, misbah moves back a touch and vijayakumar follows him as misbah drives it to mid off
venugopal rao to misbah-ul-haq, four runs, a half tracker this time as misbah once again heaves it along the ground for a boundary
venugopal rao to misbah-ul-haq, 2 runs, on the leg stump, misbah turns it away to fine leg for a couple
ravi teja to dravid, 1 run, on the leg stump, dravid pushes it to midwicket for a single
ravi teja to white, 1 run, on the leg stump, white forces it to midwicket for a single
vaas to white, 1 run, outside the off stump, white steers it to third man for a single
ravi teja to dravid, 1 run, on the leg stump, dravid pushes to midwicket for a single
ravi teja to white, six runs, on the leg stump, white lofts it over midwicket for a six
ravi teja to white, 1 run, on the leg stump, white pushes it to midwicket for a single
singh to dravid, no run,
bangar to dravid, out, outside the off stump and moving away a touch as dravid pokes at it and gets a thin edge back to the keeper and koertzen is pretty slow in raising the dreaded finger
vijaykumar to white, 1 run, on the leg stump, white looks to drive it and gets an inside edge to fine leg for a single
vijaykumar to kohli, 1 run, on the leg stump, kohli flicks it to deep midwicket for a single
silva to white, 1 run, on the middle stump, white swings and gets an inside edge to square leg for a single
silva to akhil, 1 run, on the leg stump, akhil flicks it to square leg for a single
silva to white, 1 run, on the leg stump, white turns it to square leg for a single
silva to akhil, six runs, that finishes it off as akhil lofts a long hop on the leg stump over square leg for a huge six
sharma to marsh, no run, good ball again, pitching on leg stump and going away from marsh, who is nearly squared up but gets bat down on time, pushing it to point
sharma to marsh, four runs, thats runs, as ishant pitches outside leg stump and allows marsh to use the pace and help the ball along its way down to fine leg for four
sharma to marsh, no run, that is a ripper! ishant hits that sweet spot on off stump and gets the ball to seam and lift excellently to catch marsh in all sorts of trouble, feeling and missing
sharma to marsh, no run, tight delivery on the stumps draws a hurried defensive from marsh
agarkar to marsh, 1 run, and he begins with one on middle and off, drawing a hard drive which takes the inside-edge and flies towards midwicket, who dives and saves runs
agarkar to hopes, four runs, and he's off the mark with a firm yet streaky carve backward of point, hopes not trying to keep the ball along the ground, and it evades a leaping brad hodge
sharma to hopes, no run, makes room and tries to drive hard through the covers but uses too much bottom hand and ends up chopping to point
dinda to hopes, four runs, crunching shot as dinda gives hopes room to free those solid forearms and he doesn't disappoint, slapping the ball through the covers
agarkar to sangakkara, four runs, comes down and chips over mid-off, not timed very well but he's got enough bat on it to beat the man and the ball dribbles away for four
agarkar to sangakkara, 1 run, thats a streaky shot, as he flashes outside off stump and gets a thick edge over gully and down to third man, dropping before him
dinda to sangakkara, four runs, stands his ground and opens the face, running it down past backward point, very late, and its placed excellently into the gap and beats a diving third man
mohammad hafeez to marsh, four runs, skips down and connects well, straight driving and gul is sloppy down on the boundary, mistiming his dive
mohammad hafeez to yuvraj singh, 1 run, flat on middle and leg and yuvraj flicks it away past square leg
dinda to marsh, four runs, top shot, just driving square of the wicket with a flourish and picking the gap at square leg, ball races across the turf and meets the ropes
mohammad hafeez to marsh, no run, suggests that he's about to dance down, then hafeez bowls it wide outside off stump, saha collects and whips off the bails but marsh is back inside
hussey to jayawardene, six runs, and he's welcomed with a six over cow corner, as jayawardene kneels down and launches hussey into the night, the ball goes up and over the ropes
hussey to goel, no run, a touch flatter, outside off, he shapes to flick but cannot connect
umar gul to pathan, no run, tight again, this one on the stumps and its driven to point
umar gul to sangakkara, 1 run, well stopped, as sangakkara drives to point, who dives and saves runs, then fumbles as he gets up, batsmen decide to take one and just make it
hussey to pathan, 1 run, flat ball on the stumps, he skips down and drives to midwicket
hussey to pathan, 2 runs, dances down and drives aerial to wide midwicket, running hard
umar gul to pathan, 1 wide, wide, sliding down leg stump and past the attempted flick
sharma to sangakkara, 1 run, gets his back leg across and square-drives this one down to third man
umar gul to sangakkara, four runs, and that's four, as he again makes room and flashes the bat at it, slicing over backward point to beat the fielder running around in the deep

sharma to chawla, six runs, make that 21 from the over! chawla, not for the first time, backs away to leg and swings hard, connecting well and slashing the ball over backward point and it keeps on going
sreesanth to ganguly, four runs, too wide and ganguly squeezes it over a leaping backward point, this outfield is lighting fast and so third man cannot get across to stop the ball
pathan to mohammad hafeez, no run, pitches on leg stump, hafeez mistimes his attempted nudge, pathan appeals but the umpire is unmoved, may have been missing due to the bounce
sreesanth to mohammad hafeez, 1 run, tries another drive but inside-edges to leg due to the change of pace
sreesanth to das, no run, another hard-handed drive, but past hussey and down to mid-on

pathan to shukla, no run, another close call! pitches on leg and swings down to rap a clueless shukla, rooted to his crease, but this time the umpire shakes his head after a thought, and its really swinging around out there
pathan to hussey, no run, more movement, again pitching on leg and swinging in, hussey is late on the stroke but survives with an inside-edge, pathan is on fire tonight
pathan to hussey, no run, change of pace, pushing it away from hussey, who shoulders arms
sreesanth to shukla, 1 run, thats a nothing drive from the crease, away from the body, and the ball slices through the gap at gully and rolls down to the fielder at third man
singh to hussey, no run, well stopped there! vrv offers width and hussey carves it late to backward point, where marsh dives to his left and saves what seemed a certain four
gagandeep singh to hussey, no run, nearly squares him up but he plays it gently to marsh at point
singh to shukla, out, middle stump is pegged back as shukla makes room and fails to connect
gagandeep singh to saha, no run, accurate bowling, on off stump and saha can only defend
gagandeep singh to saha, 1 run, again there's no room and saha just tucks it to midwicket
gagandeep singh to hussey, 1 run, pitches on leg, he shapes to flick and gets a thin inside-edge onto the pad, saha calls for the single and they scamper across as square leg fields
singh to saha, no run, there it is again, and saha pushes to a diving cover fielder
hopes to saha, 1 run, slower ball, pushed uppishly to yuvraj at cover, who collects and shies at the stumps but misses so saha gets across safely
hopes to saha, 1 run, gets tall and punches this one along the ground to backward point
hopes to hussey, no run, slower ball, hussey waits and opens the face to play it backward point
chawla to saha, six runs, more runs, as he sizes up chawla and swings him flat over midwicket, another good shot and saha is now looking to get on with matters against chawla
hopes to hussey, six runs, another big shot, as he uses his feet and swings it over mid-on, pathan leaps back with one hand but the ball goes over his head, another clinical shot
pathan to saha, four runs, swung away over square leg but that doesn't matter, as punjab have clinched this match by nine runs to make it four in a row

mohammad asif to jayasuriya, four runs, a bit too straight from asif, on leg and middle stump, jayasuriya walks across his stumps and plays the leg glance, there's no fine leg so jayasuriya collects his second boundary
mahesh to jayasuriya, 1 run, jayasuriya moves across once again and lofts yomahesh over square leg, there's a fielder in the deep now
sangwan to uthappa, 1 run, uthappa pushes the ball towards cover for another single
mahesh to thornely, 1 run, played towards sangwan at third man for a single, bit of a boundary drought at the moment
sehwag to nayar, 1 run, pushed through midwicket for  a quick single
shoaib malik to tiwary, 1 run, tiwary moves across his stumps and chips the ball towards fine leg, just the single and he will retain strike
mohammad asif to pollock, no run, pollock makes room again but asif seams the ball away from the right-hander and beats the bat
mahesh to raje, no run, raje lines yo mahesh up and tries to launch him over deep midwicket, yo mahesh sticks to an excellent line just outside off and beats the bat
pollock to gambhir, no run, gambhir stays in his crease and tries to run the ball towards third man, he plays it to a widish slip
nehra to gambhir, no run, too straight this time on middle and leg stump, gambhir should have put it away but flicks the ball to bravo at square leg
bravo to de villiers, no run, played off the backfoot behind  point

bravo to sehwag, four runs, that's a slower one but sehwag's spotted it, he backed away towards the leg side to make room and lofted the ball cleanly right over the bowlers head for four, it bounced once before going over the boundary

kulkarni to shoaib malik, no run, sehwag's been let off! malik defended the ball towards point and sehwag sprinted for the single from the non-striker's end, malik sent him back, sehwag was miles out of his crease but the bowler couldn't get back in time and the throw missed the stumps

jayasuriya to sehwag, six runs, what a welcome he gets! sehwag steps out of his crease, gets under the ball and lofts jayasuriya high and extremely far over deep midwicket, he's the tournament's leading scorer now and wins the orange cap from rohit sharma
nehra to karthik, 1 run, guided towards third man for  a single

pollock to shoaib malik, out, caught! pollock strikes first up! malik tries to smash him over the long off boundary, it was the slower ball and malik gets under it and hits it high in the air, nayar is at long off and he takes a well-judged catch, mumbai have broken a dangerous partnership
pollock to karthik, 1 run, played with an open face towards third man for  a single

bravo to sangwan, 1 leg bye, the slower ball angles into the right-hander, sangwan tried to defend and was hit on the back pad, bravo appeals confidently but koertzen says not out this time, they run a leg bye

nehra to sangwan, out, caught! sangwan tries to clear the long off boundary but doesn't time it well, he hits it in the air towards tiwary who runs in from the boundary and holds on to the catch, that was dipping on tiwary and he timed his run and slide extremely well
