kulkarni to mcgrath, out, and he lasts just two balls! mcgrath tries to loft the ball over the infield on the off side, he slices the ball high in the air, thornely runs backwards from cover and takes the catch, the dy patil stadium erupts and the players are thrilled, what a match they have had toppling the table-leaders delhi
sohail tanvir to raina, no run, this one leaves the batsman, who shoulders arms
sohail tanvir to raina, no run, movement again, swinging away from outside off as raina leaves
sohail tanvir to vidyut, out, edged and taken! third wicket for tanvir, pitching outside the off stump for vidyut to go flashing, and the thick outside edge is snapped up by warne at second slip
sohail tanvir to badrinath, 1 leg bye, lands outside leg stump, raps the pad, and they steal a quick leg-bye
patel to badrinath, no run, slides down leg stump, raps the pad, munaf appeals but that was slipping down the line, raina wants one but badri waves him back, more pressure on chennai
patel to badrinath, no run, top stuff, right up there on off stump and he defends tightly
watson to badrinath, four runs, good shot, just leaning into the wide one and square-driving it away
watson to badrinath, four runs, slower ball on the stumps, well picked and flicked past midwicket
warne to dhoni, no run, well bowled, champ! the warne special, pitching outside leg stump and ripping across dhoni, who pushes and misses due to the massive spin, wow
patel to raina, 1 run, again on the stumps and raina rolls the wrists nicely, into the gap
patel to morkel, 1 run, gets back on the toes and pushes the ball into the gap at cover
warne to raina, no run, flat outside off, he gets back and flat-bats it back to warne, who fields
warne to raina, 1 run, looped up, raina dances down and flicks that past mid-on nicely
pathan to raina, 1 run, some turn now, he gets back and punches the ball towards mid-on
pathan to morkel, no run, quicker one, pinning morkel back in his crease, defended back again
pathan to morkel, no run, flatter one, no spin at all, morkel gets back and can only drive it back
pathan to morkel, no run, slides into morkel, who turns it away straight to midwicket
warne to morkel, no run, quicker one, he gets across but cannot beat backward point
warne to morkel, six runs, good blow, morkel skipping down and clubbing it very, very straight for six
warne to morkel, 2 runs, quicker and flatter, he shuffles and muscles it past midwicket
pathan to morkel, 1 run, flatter on middle and leg, he gets back and drives past midwicket
pathan to raina, 1 run, again its flat on the stumps and he tucks it to midwicket
pathan to morkel, 1 run, flat on middle and leg, another shuffle and drive wide of midwicket
trivedi to morkel, no run, tidy start, on the stumps and he just plays it back to trivedi
trivedi to morkel, 1 run, gets some width and chops it wide of kaif at backward point
watson to morkel, 2 runs, sees the width and slashes upwards of point, it drops safely in the deep
watson to morkel, no run, slower ball beats him as he heaves across the line and misses
watson to morkel, no run, bounces him over the stumps and morkel ducks under it
watson to gony, no run, goes carving outside off stump and nearly drags onto this stumps
sohail tanvir to muralitharan, out, and there are the best figures of the ipl! tanvir gets a five-wicket haul, keeping it straight to go past murali's swipe and rattling the stumps
sohail tanvir to ntini, four runs, slower one, looped up wide, ntini slashes and just gets the toe end of the bat on it and it flies down to trivedi at third man, who dives but cant stop it
sohail tanvir to ntini, four runs, shot! ntini uses his feet and drives that very hard past the gap at cover
sohail tanvir to ntini, 2 runs, comes down again and connects well, slashing past backward point
sohail tanvir to ntini, out, and he gets six! ntini is bowled making room and tanvir finishes with the best figures in any format of twenty20 cricket, would you believe? he gets 6 for 14!
ntini to smith, no run, pitches outside leg, swings in, and catches him on the hop
ntini to smith, no run, extra carry now, as this one slants across from smith, shouldering arms
ntini to smith, 1 run, good movement, pushed across smith, who manages to dab past gully
gony to asnodkar, four runs, thats a firm shot, asnodkar dragging from outside off stump down into the gap at midwicket, the fast outfield escorts the ball away for four
ntini to smith, four runs, makes room, skips aside, and slaps that firmly past cover and point
gony to smith, no run, slower ball on middle and leg, he shuffles and turns it to square leg
morkel to asnodkar, 1 run, change of pace, slants into him, he plays it late down to gully
morkel to smith, 5 wides, wide, down leg stump, evades bat and keeper and runs to fine leg
muralitharan to smith, no run, looped up outside leg stump, he's late on the attempted flick
muralitharan to smith, 1 run, flat on off stump, he dabs it to cover and asnodkar calls him over

muralitharan to asnodkar, no run, pushed through asnodkar, almost falling over as he misses the drive, dhoni collects and breaks the stumps with the batsman's back leg just back on the ground, that was touch and go but replays were correct
vidyut to pathan, six runs, thats massive! pathan doesn't waste time, stepping out and hammering that with the spin for a big brute of a hit over deep midwicket
vidyut to pathan, 1 wide, arm ball goes all wrong, sliding well down leg stump for wide

vidyut to pathan, 2 runs, well caught ... or not! pathan gets down and swings this one into the air to ntini, getting across from deep midwicket and holding it on the ropes, but then losing his balance and as he falls over he has to throw the ball back in, so a good effort but no catch
muralitharan to smith, 1 wide, wrong line, spinning down leg stump for dhoni to collect
raina to smith, 2 runs, thats that, smith freeing the arms and chipping over mid-off for two

sreesanth to jaffer, no run, excellent ball, the first two balls went away from jaffer, this one pitched outside off stump and came back into the right-hander, jaffer drove away from his body and the ball went through the gap between bat and pad
pathan to kohli, 1 wide, pathan pitches outside off and slants it away from the right-hander, kohli lets it go and umpire doctrove calls it wide, that is pretty harsh

sreesanth to dravid, no run, sreesanth pitches outside off stump and seams the ball away from dravid who once again lets the ball go, sreesanth is bowling a testing line here and is getting the ball to move both ways
gagandeep singh to kohli, 1 run, played down towards third man for one, another poor throw from vrv in the deep

gagandeep singh to kohli, four runs, kohli sees a little bit of width outside off and slashes hard, the ball is only a little bit to vrv's right at third man but kohli's hit it so hard that vrv can't reach it, a quicker fielder might have
chawla to kohli, 1 run, bowled flat through the air on leg stump from round the wicket, kohli goes back and defends back past the bowler

sreesanth to kohli, 1 run, dropped! kohli charges sreesanth once again and swings wildly, this time he connects and gets a top edge that flies miles in the air, it's a swirling catch somewhere in the region behind midwicket, hopes runs back and tries to settle under it, he catches it initially but as he falls towards the ground the ball slips out of his hand
chawla to dravid, no run, bowled wide outside off, dravid misses the ball
chawla to dravid, 2 runs, dravid moves back and pushes the ball into the huge gap at midwicket for two
chawla to dravid, no run, bowled flat through the air on off stump, dravid moves back in his crease and drives to cover
chawla to kumar, no run, big turn! chawla loops the ball into the right-hander, pitches outside off and then spins it sharply away from praveen who lets it go
singh to kumble, 1 run, kumble pushes the ball towards mid-on, kumble sets off for the single and would have been out once again had the fielder hit the stumps at the bowler's end
steyn to hopes, no run, beware! steyn pitches that on the corridor outside off and squares up hopes with the late seam movement as he shuffles about at the crease
khan to sarwan, 1 wide, bizarre, that is so wide outside off stump that patil had to dive across first slip to collect, another wide
khan to marsh, 1 leg bye, too straight this time, slanting down leg side, marsh tries to run it towards fine leg but gets hit on the thigh for leg byes
khan to sarwan, no run, a bit too straight this time on middle and leg, sarwan flicks and times it well but can't beat the fielder at square leg
kumble to sarwan, 1 run, sarwan moves back and pushes towards mid-on for a single, steyn is rather deep
kallis to marsh, 4 leg byes, poor line from kallis, down leg side, marsh tries to play the leg glance but gets hit on the thigh, the ball beats the keeper and goes for four leg byes, erratic line
kumar to jayawardene, no run, this time praveen nips the ball back into the right-hander, jayawardene gets behind the line and defends on the leg side

kumble to marsh, four runs, dropped, marsh came down the track and drove the ball in the air back at kumble, kumble moved to his right but couldn't hold on to the low catch, the ball runs to the straight boundary as well
kumble to marsh, 1 wide, strays down leg side, wide called
kumble to marsh, 1 run, marsh plays the ball towards point for  a quick single
steyn to jayawardene, 1 wide, bowled fast at 140 kmh but the line is down leg side, the umpire calls it wide, punjab bring up their 100, just 27 needed now
steyn to jayawardene, 1 run, jayawardene pushes the ball with soft hands towards mid-on and calls for another quick single
steyn to jayawardene, no run, width offered outside off stump, jayawardene moves back and punches the ball towards point
steyn to jayawardene, no run, quicker delivery angling into off stump, jayawardene covers the line and defends towards point
khan to pathan, 1 run, pathan goes for another big drive and gets an inside edge towards the keeper who does well to dive to his right and get a hand on it
khan to jayawardene, 1 run, jayawardene pushes the ball gently past the bowler and calls pathan through for the run
kumble to pathan, 1 wide, the winning run sums up bangalore's match, kumble bowls the ball way down leg side and concedes a wide, punjab win by six wickets

vijaykumar to patel, no run, dropped! parthiv gives vijay kumar the charge and tries to smash the ball straight, he mis-hit it and connected with the top half of the bat and played the ball straight to the bowler who couldn't hold on during his follow through
singh to anirudha, no run,
vijaykumar to raina, 1 run, straighter line on middle and off stump, rania pushes the ball towards mid-off and sets off for the quick single
shahid afridi to dhoni, no run, bowled flat and fast on off stump, dhoni defends back to the bowler
bangar to raina, no run, defended on the leg side
ojha to dhoni, no run, dhoni moves back to a flat and straight delivery and pushes it towards cover
ojha to dhoni, 1 run, driven to long off for a single
shahid afridi to joginder sharma, 1 run, played to deep midwicket for  a single
ojha to morkel, 1 run, morkel backs away to make room and swats the ball flat towards long off, the ball reaches the fielder on the bounce
joginder sharma to gilchrist, (no ball) 1 run, gilchrist swings the free hit over midwicket and gets just the single
muralitharan to styris, no run, styris tries to drive on the off side but murali beats the bat with the straighter one
muralitharan to sharma, 1 run, pushed towards midwicket for a single
muralitharan to styris, 1 run, played behind point with an open face for a single
joginder sharma to sharma, no run, defended on the leg side
morkel to styris, 1 run, styris makes room by moving towards the leg side and drives towards long off
muralitharan to styris, 1 wide, murali fires the ball down leg side, styris misses the flick, that is a wide
nehra to asnodkar, no run, swing and a miss. he attempts a big swipe across the line, misses the ball completely but has a nice smile.
pollock to asnodkar, four runs, polly tries a slower one but swapnil picks it up, waits before thumping it over point. the little man is rocking
nehra to watson, no run,
nehra to watson, no run, slightly slower in pace, again angled across watson who has a lame poke and a miss
pollock to watson, 1 run, slower one, just outside off but watson waits on the ball before tapping it to third man for a single
pollock to asnodkar, 1 run, another slower one but this one bounces a bit and swapnil swats it past square leg
kulkarni to watson, 1 run, bowls this one outside off and watson again tries to loft but gets a outside edge, one bounce to third man
bravo to watson, 1 wide, a wide down the leg side
bravo to watson, 1 run, gets it right this time - on and around that off stump, watson opens the bat-face and guides it to third man
bravo to asnodkar, 1 run, on the leg stump line, tucked behind square leg
jayasuriya to watson, 1 run, again he takes out the pace by holding the ball deep inside his palm and watson punches it to extra cover
bravo to asnodkar, 2 runs, change of pace but swapnil waits before playing the lofted shot to deep extra cover region
bravo to watson, 1 wide,
bravo to kaif, no run, in the zone outside off stump and kaif lets it go through to the 'keeper
jayasuriya to asnodkar, no run, floated on the middle and off stump, pushed to the off side
jayasuriya to kaif, 1 run, slows up the pace, on the middle and off, kaif steers it to cover point region for a single

raje to asnodkar, 1 run, dropped by jayasuriya at backward point. it was a slower one and swapnil asnodkar was completely fooled. he checked his drive and it went off the outside edge to left of jayasuriya who got under it but spilled a dolly
raje to asnodkar, 1 run,
raje to warne, 1 wide, slower one but slips down leg side
raje to warne, 1 run, change of pace, outside leg, tapped behind square
kulkarni to asnodkar, no run, tries the slower one but it was well outside off stump
kulkarni to asnodkar, 1 run, leans across, opens the bat-face and steers to third man
raje to asnodkar, out, done in by the slower one. lovely one from the back of the hand and swapnil holes out to long-off. tendulkar is beaming.
raje to sohail tanvir, 1 run, on the middle and leg, tucked to square leg
raje to rawat, 1 run, another slower one, pushed to extra cover for a single
raje to sohail tanvir, 1 run, on the middle and leg, turned to fine leg
nehra to rawat, no run,
bravo to trivedi, no run, run out missed. jayasuriya picked up the steer at backward point and fired in a throw at the striker's end but missed. trivedi  had run with the stroke but was sent back

bravo to trivedi, out, cleaned up by a lovely slower one. trivedi had backed away and was baffled by the slower one. he had a waft but no where in line. this is the lowest total by a team batting first.
sohail tanvir to takawale, no run, from over the wickets, on and around the off stump, defended to covers
sohail tanvir to takawale, no run, angles away across the batsman who shoulders arms
sohail tanvir to takawale, 1 wide, swings down the leg side. big wide. tanvir, not trivedi - we are changing it - tried to bring this one in but the release went awry
sohail tanvir to takawale, no run, around that off stump, moving away, defended to the off side
sohail tanvir to takawale, no run, swing and a miss. in the zone outside off stump and he wanted to loft it over mid-on
sohail tanvir to takawale, 1 run, just outside off, dabbed to third man for a single
sohail tanvir to jayasuriya, no run, well outside the off stump, he has a jab, the bat hits the ground and the ball flies through to the 'keeper
patel to takawale, no run,
sohail tanvir to takawale, 1 run, dabbed to third man
trivedi to takawale, 1 run, slower one - it bounces a bit - tapped close on the off side, robin calls takewale for a quick single
watson to nayar, 1 run, on the middle and leg, turned wide of mid-on for a single
warne to nayar, 1 run, charges down and lofts to long -on
warne to nayar, 3 wides, wide wide one outside the off stump. he was looking for the slider across the left-hand batsman but the release went completely wrong
sohail tanvir to uthappa, no run, slips down leg side. another wide.
sohail tanvir to uthappa, 1 wide, slower one but again drifts down leg side. uthappa just watched it go past him. the scores are level
gony to gambhir, 1 run,
morkel to sehwag, four runs, marginally drifts towards middle and leg, enough for sehwag to whip it through midwicket.
morkel to sehwag, no run,
morkel to sehwag, 1 run,
morkel to gambhir, 1 run, tapped to wide third man for a single
gony to gambhir, no run,
gony to gambhir, 1 run,
muralitharan to gambhir, 1 run,
muralitharan to dhawan, 1 wide, down the leg side, misses the flick
muralitharan to gambhir, no run,
amarnath to dhawan, no run,
amarnath to gambhir, 1 run, hurls it outside off, steered to third man
muralitharan to dhawan, no run,
muralitharan to dhawan, no run, doosra on the middle stump line, goes back, picks it off the turf and defends
balaji to dhawan, 1 run, outside off again, driven through covers
amarnath to dhawan, 1 run, on the middle and leg, swung past square leg
balaji to dhawan, 1 run,
balaji to gambhir, 1 run, slower one on the stumps, defended
balaji to dhawan, 1 run, pushed to the off side. 100 up
muralitharan to gambhir, 1 wide, outside leg, that's a wide by any standards, gambhir can't make contact there
muralitharan to gambhir, 1 wide, another one way down leg, dhoni is furious there, collects the ball and throws it back under-arm with a tinge of anger
gony to gambhir, 1 run, tapped to the off side, they take a quick one there

gony to dhawan, 1 wide, moves across and tries to swing towards backward square, misses that and it's called a wide down the leg side, that's a touch harsh on the bowler but anything down leg is a wide in this format
gony to gambhir, 1 run, slower one on middle and leg, gambhir looks for the big one on the on side but decides to angle the bat to third man instead, another run

amarnath to gambhir, four runs, slow ball goes completely awry, gauti waits for it eagerly and hammers it over his head for four, that was nearly six but just pitched inside the ropes there, gambhir is going bananas here, metal on the pedal
amarnath to gambhir, 1 run, retains strike with a glide to third man
muralitharan to gambhir, 1 run, another one down the track, can't get the elevation and drives towards midwicket
kapugedera to gambhir, 1 run, inside edge that trickles behind the keeper
kapugedera to dhawan, 1 run,
balaji to dhawan, 1 run,
morkel to dhawan, 1 run,
morkel to shoaib malik, 1 run,
morkel to dhawan, four runs, lashed away through the covers for four, scorching shot that
morkel to dhawan, 2 runs, tries to go aerial again but the ball just falls wide of the third man, scamper a two here
balaji to tiwary, 1 run, slower one now, waits before punching it to extra cover
mohammad asif to vidyut, no run, similar delivery and he mistimes a drive to the off side and asif rushes to his right to make the stop
mahesh to vidyut, no run, on the legs, misses the flick shot and the ball strikes the pad
mahesh to vidyut, 1 run, charges down, making room to the leg side in the process, the bowler follows him and he adjusts to push it past the bowler
sangwan to vidyut, 1 wide, down the leg side and the 'keeper, standing up to the stumps, gets his body behind it to make a half-stop
mahesh to vidyut, 2 wides, slower one but it was down the leg side. the 'keeper couldn't gather it cleanly either.
sangwan to fleming, 1 run, brings dhoni on strike with a dab to third man
shoaib malik to fleming, 1 wide, slower but again down the leg side
shoaib malik to fleming, 1 run, finally, shifts his line to the middle and fleming squeezes it off the inner edge to square leg
shoaib malik to dhoni, no run, turns in to dhoni who punches it to midwicket
sangwan to fleming, 1 run, outside off, flashed off the outer edge to third man
mohammad asif to fleming, no run, on the off stump, steered to backward point
sehwag to dhoni, no run, comes out, almost yorks himself and digs it back to sehwag
sehwag to morkel, six runs, there he goes. floated on the leg and middle and albie goes down on his knees to swing it high into the stands at deep midwicket. he is known for his big  hitting
mohammad asif to kapugedera, 1 leg bye, appeal for lbw and tiffin calmly signals a leg bye. kapugedera had walked across, got outside off stump and was struck outside off
shoaib malik to gony, six runs, go go go gonyyyyy...... malik slowed up the pace as he saw goni come out but he adjusted, waited before heaving it over deep midwicket. tension is killing here
shoaib malik to gony, 1 wide, pressure makes malik bowl a wide one outside off stump
shoaib malik to badrinath, no run, turns in from outside off, badri wanted to ping cover point but gets a inside edge down the track. 1 from 1. what a finish we have here. will we have a bowlout?!
steyn to chopra, no run, glided to point, 'no' is the call, two runs off the first over, what a fine start, aakash and brad. keep going this way and you'll get 32 by the end of the innings.
khan to hodge, no run, driven to cover, four in the ring there, zaheer doing it well here
khan to hodge, 1 wide, over the wicket and it's too wide, down the leg side

steyn to chopra, out, gone, that's a familiar chopra dismissal, he moves across the stumps and tries to flick it towards the leg side, steyn keeps it straight and that would have rattled middle and leg, chopra has been out in that fashion earlier. and he has to go now too.
steyn to ganguly, no run, keeps a bit low, outside off but doesn't rise as much as he expected, goes past the inside edge, boucher collects it near his ankles
steyn to ganguly, 1 run, slower one, turned away to fine leg for a single
khan to hussey, no run, 136kph, straight again, hussey pushes tamely to the off side
kumar to ganguly, 1 run, slower one this time, tucked away to the leg side for a single
kumar to hussey, six runs, slower ball, faster hit, waited for it and boshed that way over the bowlers head for a biggie, he knew that was coming
vinay kumar to ganguly, 2 runs, tapped to cover, and the call is for two straight away, zaheer comes around but he needs to watch out for a bit of wetness on he outfield
kumble to ganguly, no run, pushed to the off side
kumble to ganguly, no run, jabbed to the point region but straight to the fielder
kumble to ganguly, no run, turned to the leg side, another dot, this four followed by dots seems fashionable these days
vinay kumar to hussey, 1 run, straight again, what people call 'wicket-to-wicket', defended to the off side but they manage a quick one. i prefer 'wicked-to-wicked'

vinay kumar to ganguly, out, this is what was not needed at this point, ganguly takes off for a risky single and the fielder at mid-on lets in an accurate under-arm throw, cameron white is alert there and he's gone for all money. the third umpire takes a long time but this is kolkata and he better. out it is.
vinay kumar to hussey, 1 run, glided to third man and they manage a quick one
kumble to hussey, six runs, swoosh, down the track and bang, that's the way to go, he tells tatenda, as the ball soars into the stands at long-off

kumble to hussey, 1 leg bye, out, another! run-out again, turned towards fine leg and they think of two but steyn lets go a sensational throw, straight over the bails and hussey has no chance in getting back, boucher does the rest and the umpire doesn't even refer the decision (which was pretty close). what a throw that was. steyn is all geed up here, for sure.
kumar to shukla, 1 run, flicked away from the middle stump to the leg side, settle for one
kumble to shukla, 1 run, quicker one, the classic kumble flipper that beats the bat, inside edge trickles to the leg side, fine over from ak
steyn to kartik, 1 run, tapped away towards cover for a quick single
vinay kumar to kartik, no run, beats the outside edge straight away, bowlers continue to get swing here
vinay kumar to saha, no run, tapped to cover, another dot
steyn to kartik, no run, backs away but the ball is thrown wide of off, he can't reach it, that's not a wide for sure though kartik thinks that's as wide as the grand canyon
steyn to kartik, 2 runs, slower one, deceives him but he chips it in the gap, they think of two but decide against it
steyn to kartik, 1 run, feeble tap to cover and they take off
khan to kartik, 2 runs, forceful push wide of long-off and they take off for two, a bit of a misfield and they cash in

kumar to kartik, out, driven back to the bowler, he takes it neat and claims the catch, then he realises they are going for a run and takes the bails off, either way it's out. replays suggesting that it's probably caught and bowled. saha doesn't get the strike now
dinda to arunkumar, no run, outswing to start with, beats the flashing blade, jak looks to get a move on
dinda to arunkumar, no run, slightly wide this time, jak flashes hard but shukla makes a super stop at cover, that's got them cheering
dinda to arunkumar, no run, wide of off this time, jak tries to back away and flash but that's too far to reach, he looks for a wide signal but can't get it, five dots
sharma to chanderpaul, no run, another dot, pushed to the off side, shiv middling them all
sharma to chanderpaul, 1 run, pushed straight for a single, taibu scurries across to stop that
dinda to chanderpaul, 1 wide, down the leg side, wide called and rightly so
dinda to chanderpaul, no run, walks down the track and taps it to the off side, no run again
dinda to chanderpaul, 1 run, no room to play around with, jags it to the leg side and complete another single
dinda to arunkumar, four runs, that's a cracker, violent swing across the line and he finds the gap through midwicket, jak gets going now, he loves to attempt the audacious
sharma to arunkumar, no run, square driven to the off side, can't beat the field
ganguly to boucher, no run, outside off, tapped to mid-on, they decide against the single
ganguly to boucher, 1 run, turned from outside off to fine leg, only a single, fine over
umar gul to dravid, no run, pushed back to the bowler
umar gul to dravid, no run, tapped towards mid-on and another dot. the pressure is piling on as shoaib takes centrestage
umar gul to dravid, no run, tries to turn and take off for a quick single but the bowler is there to stop that
ganguly to boucher, no run, driven back to the bowler, good stop and an attempt to get a run-out
ganguly to white, no run, defended the first one
ganguly to white, no run, tapped to the off side, they decide against the single

shukla to white, six runs, that's huge, white tees off, backing away, watching the ball till the end and swatting one way over square leg for six, he has the best t20 record going around and he's out to show us why, eden watches in silence
dinda to boucher, four runs, smashed it to pulp this time, backs away and hammers it to midwicket for a four, screams in between the fielders
dinda to boucher, no run, backs away again but can't get it past ganguly at midwicket
dinda to boucher, 1 run, picked up from outside off towards square leg but fine fielding from shukla there, it's been a high standard in the field from kolkata
umar gul to white, 2 runs, tries to loft it over long-off but can't get the timing right, thick edge falls just past mid-on and they scamper a couple
umar gul to boucher, 1 run, typical boucher back-away and try to swat over midwicket attempt, straight to mid-on for a quick single

sharma to boucher, 1 run, cracked hard towards cover, sliced it without timing, hussey is there but he slips and can't get the catch, stops it anyway, well done after losing his balance, this is slipping away from bangalore now

kartik to boucher, out, gone! run-out at the non-striker's end, boucher cracks it back to the bowler and kartik fields it superbly, white is backing up too far and can't get back to the crease, kartik takes the bails off and eden goes ballistic, they know the importance of that wicket, bangalore have lost their way here
kartik to boucher, four runs, down the track, nice little shimmy, over midwicket for four, that's a fine shot after the run-out, they need many more of those
kartik to boucher, six runs, huge! what a response from boucher, down the track and slapping that way over square leg for six, there was a fielder there and he's cleared it. he's blasting them now
kartik to boucher, four runs, down the track again, it's outside off and he's pasted that past the bowler for four, screams past him and there's no fielder stopping that

sharma to boucher, 2 runs, whacked to long-off but taibu mis-fields there, they want the second and the fluff allows them, praveen is coming back anyway, boucher gets the strike but the match is running away
warne to gilchrist, 1 run, bowled flat through the air on off stump, gilchrist moves back and drives towards long off
warne to styris, no run, defended back towards the bowler
trivedi to gilchrist, 1 run, he starts off with a slower one on middle stump, gilchrist tries to hit it into the stands at midwicket but mis-times it behind square

pathan to styris, out, caught! warne holds on to a skier! styris tried to loft yusuf over midwicket once again, his time he tried to drag it from outside off and got a top edge, the ball went extremely high in the air but got no further than warne at midwicket, well-judged catch
pathan to sharma, 1 run, rohit gets behind the line and closes the face of the bat to play the ball through square leg
trivedi to sharma, 1 leg bye, trivedi strays on to middle and leg, sharma misses the leg glance but gets hit on the thigh for  a leg bye to fine leg
trivedi to ravi teja, no run, teja moves back and across and defends towards the off side
watson to bangar, no run, watson slips one down leg side, bangar misses the leg glance and the ball brushes the pad on its way through to rawat
warne to singh, 1 run, pushed towards the leg side for one
sohail tanvir to singh, 1 wide, tanvir sprays the first ball of the last over down leg side, wide called

vijaykumar to smith, four runs, poor line first line, on leg stump, smith moves across his stumps and plays the leg glance to the fine-leg boundary, smith begins the innings with a four, just like gilchrist did
vijaykumar to smith, four runs, he does it again, vijaykumar pitches on leg stump and allows smith to shuffle towards the off side and nudge the ball off his hips past gilchrist for four more
styris to smith, 2 runs, smith backs away towards the leg side to make room even before styris releases the ball, he reaches out for the ball and drives through extra cover
ojha to pathan, 1 run, yusuf tries to loft over the straight boundary but doesn't time it well, he's placed it very straight though so the ball falls safely
ojha to pathan, four runs, now he steps out of his crease and drives the ball hard and past the fielder at mid-on, four this time
shahid afridi to smith, 1 bye, smith tries to defend the ball towards the off side, that kept low, yusuf calls him through for one
shahid afridi to smith, no run, defended back to the bowler
venugopal rao to pathan, 2 wides, he bowls it wide down leg side, gilchrist can't collect cleanly and they run a single

venugopal rao to smith, 2 runs, smith moves back and drives the ball through midwicket, he runs the first one quickly and then comes back for the second, the throw comes back at the bowler's end and venugopal breaks the stumps, yusuf was just home, he grounded his bat expertly and used his long reach to good effect
venugopal rao to pathan, four runs, yusuf backs away to make room and powers the drive through extra cover, he's split the gap and will get four more
ojha to smith, 1 run, smith backs away towards leg and drives the ball towards cover
ojha to pathan, 1 wide, bowled flat and fast down leg side, another wide
ojha to kaif, 1 run, kaif gets off the mark by moving back in his crease and flicking the ball towards square leg
ojha to kaif, four runs, and once again he follows up by stepping out of the crease and lofting the ball cleanly over mid-on for four more

singh to smith, out, smith's holes out! he backs away towards the leg side and tries to go over mid-on, he doesn't get the elevation and hits it straight to ojha who takes an easy catch, too little too late for deccan
pollock to goswami, 1 run, goswami gets squared up by one that pitches around off stump and seams across the left-hander, goswami gets an outside edge to third man
pollock to goswami, 1 run, this time he opens the face and steers the ball towards third man

nehra to goswami, 2 runs, goswami leans into the line of the ball and opens the face to punch the ball through cover point, he's timed it will but the outfield is so slow that it allows smith to slide and save the boundary
pollock to goswami, 1 run, goswami jumps back and pushes a ball off his hips towards square leg
nehra to goswami, 1 run, goswami moves deep in his crease and opens the face once again for a single to backward point

nehra to boucher, four runs, fantastic shot! boucher stands in his crease, waits for the ball to angle across him and punches into the gap between midwicket and mid-on, superb use of the bottom hand and it was struck with enough power to beat the outfield
fernando to goswami, 1 run, played down to third man for a single
fernando to white, no run, white tries to drive on the off side but mis-times it to mid-on, spectacular over from fernando, he has figures of 3 for 3 off two overs
kulkarni to white, 1 wide, white backs away towards leg and kulkarni sprays it wide outside off, that's a wide
smith to white, 2 runs, played behind square on the off side, a direct hit from pandey ricochets off the stumps and the batsmen run an overthrow
kulkarni to white, no run, played towards backward point for one more
smith to dravid, 1 run, dravid opens the face and runs the ball towards third man for one, only one rune off the over and a wicket as well, smith's done splendidly
nehra to dravid, 1 run, dravid pushes the ball towards cover for a single
fernando to vinay kumar, 1 wide, bowled wide down leg side, billy bowden signals wide in his unique exaggerated way
smith to vinay kumar, 5 wides, he's spoilt his figures a little bit by firing a wide down leg side, the keeper has no chance and the ball runs to the boudnary for five wides
smith to vinay kumar, no run, pushed towards jayasuriya at cover
kulkarni to kumar, 1 run, a slower ball wide outside off stump, praveen reaches out for it and mis-times the shot to cover
kulkarni to vinay kumar, 1 wide, that's another wide ball outside off stump, bowden shows off his wares for the second time in a row
kulkarni to vinay kumar, 1 wide, and bowden is at it again! kulkarni sprays another one wide outside off
kumble to tendulkar, no run, tendulkar makes room by moving towards leg and pushes the ball back to kumble
steyn to tendulkar, 1 run, a bit too straight to the right-hander, tendulkar jumps across his crease and flicks towards deep backward square leg
steyn to jayasuriya, 1 run, steyn pitches around leg stump and jayasuriya moves across to nudge the ball behind square, once again he gets hurried by steyn's pace
kumar to tendulkar, 1 wide, praveen slants the ball wide across the right-hander from roudn the wicket, bowden calls it wide
vinay kumar to jayasuriya, no run, vinay kumar gets the ball to bounce on jayasuria who gets surprised and defends awkwardly on the off side
akhil to jayasuriya, no run, jayasuriya defends back to the bowler
vinay kumar to jayasuriya, no run, he creates room again and tries to hit the ball over the off side, vinay kumar angles the ball into the left-hander and beats the bat
kumble to tendulkar, 1 run, kumble bowls a quicker ball on middle and leg, tendulkar moves across and flicks towards square leg
kumble to jayasuriya, four runs, this time he gets inside the line and plays the ball firmly down to fine leg for four, eleven runs off the over
kumble to jayasuriya, 1 run, jayasuriya drives a flatter ball  to long off for a single
steyn to tendulkar, no run, defended back to the bowler
steyn to tendulkar, 1 run,
steyn to uthappa, no run,

steyn to uthappa, no run, another screamer. uthappa hops but manages to sway away in time. dropped his wrists as well to get the bat out of the way. well adjusted in the end but you have to say steyn is smelling blood here
vinay kumar to uthappa, no run,
steyn to tendulkar, no run, lifting delivery outside off, srt goes back and across, watches it jump up and lets it fly past him
steyn to tendulkar, no run, outside off stump line and tendulkar lets it go through to the 'keeper
steyn to tendulkar, no run, just outside off and forced to right of point where white makes a neat diving stop
akhil to tendulkar, 1 run, similar line and this time tendulkar twists his body and wrists it to fine leg
kumble to tendulkar, no run,
sreesanth to vidyut, 1 wide, vidyut has another dash at a wide ball that slants across him, this time umpire jayaprakash calls it wide
pathan to fleming, 1 run, this time the line is a bit too straight which allows fleming to work the ball off his thigh behind square, he's off the mark
sreesanth to badrinath, 1 run, driven back past the bowler for  a single to end the over
pathan to badrinath, 1 wide, that is too wide outside off stump, punjab have been generous with the wides today
singh to raina, (no ball) 1 run, vrv's over-stepped to there's a free hit coming up, raina plays the ball behind square for one run
singh to badrinath, 1 wide, vrv strays down leg side and that is another wide, raina wants a bye as well but scampers back to his crease
chawla to raina, 1 wide, bowled flat through the air down leg side, raina lets it go and that is another wide
chawla to raina, four runs, raina comes down the track and swings hard to send the ball over midwicket, he hit that flat and has placed it in the gap
chawla to raina, four runs, raina pushes hard at the ball and the outside edge runs towards third man for four more
chawla to badrinath, 1 run, badrinath drives the ball towards long off for one more, chennai are speeding along at nearly ten an over
chawla to dhoni, six runs, and again! dhoni gets down the pitch and lofts the ball back over chawla's head for another six! he hit that flat but it went rather far
hopes to badrinath, no run, the slower ball wide outside off stump, badrinath moves towards leg as well, he reaches out for it and hits it to point
pathan to badrinath, 1 wide, the slower ball sprayed wide outside off stump from over the wicket, that's another wide
morkel to hopes, 1 run, hopes backs away to make room and guides the ball towards third man for one
gony to marsh, 1 run, marsh drops the ball with soft hands on the off side for the quick single
morkel to marsh, no run, once again he tries to drive through the off but mis-times the ball towards mid-on
amarnath to sarwan, 2 runs, amarnath strays on to middle and leg, allowing sarwan to flick into the gap at midwicket, the batsmen come back for two
muralitharan to sarwan, no run, sarwan moves back and across and plays a flat ball from off towards midwicket
muralitharan to marsh, 1 run, marsh moves back in his crease and punches the ball through midwicket for the single, eight of murali's first over
muralitharan to sarwan, no run, sarwan jumps out of his crease and murali and drives hard and straight, murali dives to his left and fields superbly
muralitharan to sarwan, no run, defended on the off side
muralitharan to jayawardene, six runs, jayawardene's hit him for six! he moves across his stumps, gets into position and lofts the ball with the spin over deep midwicket, elegant shot
balaji to chawla, 2 runs, chawla mis-cues the ball high in the air but it falls safe past the cover region
muralitharan to chawla, 2 runs, this time he does make contact and his attempted hit over midwicket ends up as a leading edge that falls safely between mid-on and mid-off
gony to pathan, six runs, pathan lofts gony straight back over his head, he's hit it cleanly and the ball clears the boundary with ease
vaas to ganguly, 2 runs, pitches outside off and seams away, ganguly follows the line and pushes it wide of cover to get off the mark
vaas to ganguly, no run, just opens the face of the bat and tries to glide it past point, gibbs slides and intercepts it
vijaykumar to chopra, no run, very uncertain leave by chopra, he shoulders arms to one that comes back in but the ball just catches the bottom half of the bat and rolls to slip
vijaykumar to chopra, 1 run, lands it on middle and leg, he gets across his stumps early and tucks it down to fine leg
vijaykumar to ganguly, 1 run, grants him a lot of width outside off but ganguly doesn't quite capitalise on it much as he slices it down to third man
vaas to ganguly, 1 run, better delivery, pitches on middle, he gets across his stumps and tucks it down to square leg
vijaykumar to ganguly, 1 run, steps down the track to repeat the stroke but he mistimes it completely though, the inside edge rolls to the offside and they pick up only a single
styris to ganguly, no run, poor start to the over for kolkata, ganguly pushes it softly towards point, chopra sets off but is sent back, fortunately for him the throw from gibbs was wide
singh to ganguly, 1 run, plays it late, opens the face of the bat and dabs it down to third man
singh to chopra, 1 run, gives him plenty of width outside the offstump and chopra only manages to chop it down towards backward point
styris to ganguly, no run, better delivery, pitches around the offstump this time and it's a dot ball own to mid-off
styris to ganguly, no run, opens the face of the bat pretty late and dabs it straight to point
singh to ganguly, no run, defended on the backfoot to the on side
singh to chopra, 1 wide, puts it a little more effort with the pace but strays it wide outside the offstump
singh to chopra, 1 run, he stays right back at the crease and punches it wide of the covers
venugopal rao to ganguly, 1 run, makes room and dabs it down towards point, ojha misfields this time and they take another run off the misfield
venugopal rao to chopra, no run,
bangar to chopra, four runs, bangar errs yet again by straying down the legside and chopra helps himself to a gentle flick to fetch another boundary down to fine leg
bangar to chopra, no run, makes a bit of room to cream that past the covers but he ends up mistiming it and fetches no runs
ojha to hussey, 1 run, ojha gets a bit of turn, hussey waits for it, gets on the backfoot and punches it wide of point
ojha to ganguly, no run, lands just outside off and ganguly gets on the backfoot and defends to the on side
ojha to ganguly, 1 leg bye, shuffles across his stumps a little and tucks it wide of midwicket
venugopal rao to ganguly, 1 run, steps down the track to repeat the stroke but one again he mistimes it, this time to the on side
ojha to ganguly, 1 wide, pitches that realy wide outside off and loses his line
ojha to hussey, 1 run, pushes this with the spin towards cover and sets off for a quick run
venugopal rao to hussey, 1 run, pitches on middle and leg, he whips it wide of midwicket
venugopal rao to ganguly, 1 run, takes a few paces down the track and lofts over square leg this time
styris to ganguly, no run, makes room to chase a wide delivery and misses, gilly believes he got a faint touch and appeals, umpire ian howell immediately shakes his head
singh to hussey, 2 runs, he clubs this one down to deep square leg, bangar nearly over runs the ball but manages to intercept it with one hand
singh to hussey, 2 runs, makes room and mows this one across the line down to deep midwicket

vijaykumar to hussey, (no ball) 1 run, he oversteps and it's a catch as well! hussey gets on his knee and clubs it down to deep midwicket who takes the catch, replays showed that the no-ball call was a bit too harsh
vijaykumar to taibu, 1 run, he fails to put away the free hit, makes room to flat-bat it past the bowler but the ball catches the toe edge of the bat and rolls to the offside
vijaykumar to taibu, 2 runs, dropped: the sloppiness continues as vaas spills a sitter at midwicket, taibu tries to clear the infield but gets a top edge
singh to shukla, four runs, makes room this time and a leading edge clears backward point, runs are coming everywhere

singh to shukla, 6 runs, and this didn't clear the rope at all! shukla pushed it to long-off, the fielder hurls it back to rp, they set of for a second run and rp flings it back to gilly who was nowhere in the picture, there was nobody backing up and that was a bonus four
dinda to gilchrist, 1 run, slightly wide outside off and gilchrist gets his bat down quickly and carves it down to ishant at third man
dinda to gibbs, no run, pitches on off and driven to cover
sharma to gilchrist, 1 leg bye,
dinda to gilchrist, four runs, plays across the line and mis-times, lifting the ball from outside off to mid-on boundary
dinda to gilchrist, four runs, slower ball, driven over long-off for a one-bounce four
dinda to gilchrist, four runs, over-pitched, stays on the crease and just strokes it through extra-cover for four

umar gul to ravi teja, out, first-ball wicket! gul pitches it outside off and the ball pitches on the seam and deviates away from the right-hander who has a go at it anyway and the edge carries to the keeper
umar gul to sharma, four runs, outside off, rohit lifts it over the mid-off fielder for four
ganguly to styris, no run, outside off, styris drives to point
ganguly to styris, no run, pitched on off, styris drives it down the pitch and ganguly gets a hand at it and blocks the run
ganguly to styris, 1 run, flicked to leg side
ganguly to sharma, 1 run, pushed to backward point and rohit gets back to the crease to see a shy at the stumps whiz by him
ganguly to styris, 1 run, flicked behind square leg
umar gul to sharma, no run, defended to off side
ganguly to sharma, no run, defended back to the bowler
ganguly to sharma, six runs, rohit dances out of the crease and lifts the ball from outside off to a huge six over midwicket
kartik to sharma, no run, round the wicket, rohit steps away from the stumps before it pitched and drove it down the pitch
kartik to sharma, 1 leg bye, steps away once again, edges a drive and ball goes to off side
kartik to venugopal rao, no run, pitched on middle, venudrives to cover
kartik to venugopal rao, 1 run, flicked to square leg
ganguly to venugopal rao, 1 run, pitched on off, driven to mid-off
kartik to sharma, 1 run, pitched on middle, rohit is already out of the crease and plays it to the leg side
kartik to venugopal rao, 1 run, venu steps out of the crease looking for the big one but gets an inside edge and the ball rolls away to square-leg
kartik to sharma, 1 run, driven to cover
dinda to venugopal rao, 1 run, swings across the line again and he fails to connect properly, only managing an inside edge which rolls to the offside
kartik to venugopal rao, six runs, rao's looking dangerous! kartik bowls this a little flatter but it matters little to rao as he charges down the track and tonks a flat six over deep extra cover
kartik to venugopal rao, four runs, he fires this one down the leg side and rao gives the charge and lofts over midwicket, one bounce and four
ganguly to bangar, 1 run, ganguly comes back into the attack, he makes room and places it wide of point
ganguly to venugopal rao, 1 run, mistimes it to hussey at extra cover and takes a risk with the run, hussey's throw is wide
sharma to venugopal rao, no run, ishant fires that on the blovkhole, he makes room  to squeeze it out but misses
sharma to venugopal rao, no run, he foxes him with the slower delivery and rao's wild swing only meets thin air
sharma to venugopal rao, six runs, one-handed! ishant gives him width outside off and rao stretches out and slices it over third man, that traveled off the meat of the bat
umar gul to singh, 1 run, rp makes room and biff it across the line but ends up mistiming it down to the on side
umar gul to venugopal rao, 1 wide, gul fails to control the inswing and directs it wide down the leg side, there was a boundary opportunity for rao there
mascarenhas to sehwag, no run, the slower ball this time, sehwag slices it off the toe of the bat towards mid-off, he needs a replacement bat
watson to gambhir, no run, the first false shot from gambhir as he chases a wide delivery and nearly gets a en edge to the keeper, watson is amused by that
watson to gambhir, no run, he flirts outside off again and nearly gets a feather edge as he opens the face and tries to slice it down to third man
watson to gambhir, no run, nearly an edge? or was it? gambhir fishes outside off and there appeared to be a sound as it beat the bat, curiously both rawat and watson didn't appeal
mascarenhas to sehwag, 1 run, he stays at the crease and chips it over square leg, deep square leg picks it up
mascarenhas to sehwag, four runs, this time sehwag connects and it travels, he sees the width outside off and drags it wide of trivedi at mid-on
mascarenhas to sehwag, 1 run, slides way down the leg side and sehwag can't resist chasing that, the ball appears to strike the back of the bat before rolling to square leg
watson to sehwag, no run, watson tempts him with width outside off and sehwag has a whiff at it, he stays rooted to the crease and misses
watson to sehwag, no run, watson keeps it nice and tight by getting the ball to jag back in, the least sehwag could do was to tap it to mid-on
mm patel to sehwag, 1 run, pitches on middle and leg and holds its line, he gets across and whips it behind square on the on side
mm patel to gambhir, 1 run, stands a little wide of legstump at time of delivery to give himself room, he opens the face of the bat and dabs it to third man
mm patel to sehwag, 1 run, places it down to kaif at point and sets off, they decide against the run initially but go ahead with it as kaif has a shy at the stumps and misses

watson to sehwag, out, watson pitches it outside off and the ball holds its line, sehwag tries to punch it wide of the infield on the offside but ends up placing it straight to kaif at backward point who hangs on to the sitter
mm patel to gambhir, 1 run, walks a couple of paces down the track and angles it wide of slip and takes off, dhawan makes his ground before the direct hit
mm patel to dhawan, 2 runs, grants him width outside off and he caresses it wide of backward point, watson does well to run across from fine leg to intercept it

mm patel to dhawan, out, dhawan taps it a little wide of munaf with soft hands and for some reason they set off for a single which was never there in the first place, gambhir looks back but dhawan decides to sacrifice his wicket and goes ahead with the run as munaf gathers the ball and takes out the middle stump
trivedi to gambhir, 1 run, the slower ball this time, he opens the face of the bat and dabs it to third man
trivedi to de villiers, 2 runs, this one nips back in off the seam, he shuffles across and tucks it behind square on the on side

trivedi to de villiers, 2 runs, he times it well and sends the ball racing along the turf but a brilliant sliding save by watson to his right at mid-off saves a certain boundary, gambhir was ball watching but luckily the throw at his end was just wide
warne to de villiers, no run, rocks back and punches with the turn to extra cover
warne to de villiers, 2 runs, steps down and heaves it across the line to the on side
warne to de villiers, 1 run, tapped to the on side for a single
trivedi to de villiers, 1 run, gets across and tucks this one wide of midwicket
trivedi to karthik, no run, bowls a much quicker one, it sits up for karthik as he defends to the offside
warne to de villiers, 2 runs, pushes it wide of point, they scamper back for the second run
warne to de villiers, 2 runs, tucks this one across the line to square leg
mascarenhas to karthik, 2 runs, curves in from outside the offstump, he opens the face of the bat and dabs it to third man
warne to karthik, 2 runs, gets across and whips it to deep midwicket
warne to karthik, 2 runs, pushes this one to deep midwicket
warne to karthik, no run, bowls the flipper this time and the ball nearly goes through his legs as he makes room
mascarenhas to karthik, 2 wides, slides really wide down the leg side and they pick up an extra single off a deflection from rawat
mascarenhas to karthik, no run, tries a cheeky steer down to third man but misses
mascarenhas to karthik, 1 run, gives him width again outside the offstump, he opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man
mascarenhas to dilshan, 1 run, opens the face of the bat again and steers it behind square on the offside

mascarenhas to karthik, out, mascaranhas signs off his bowling in the ipl in style! pitches on the corridor outside off and straightens, karthik pokes at it and gets a thin edge through to rawat, dimitri knows it and so does the umpire
mm patel to dilshan, no run, chops it down towards point and contemplates a single, sends him back
trivedi to mishra, no run, opens the face of the bat and taps it towards point, the batsmen hesitate and dilshan is sent back, the throw was too high for munaf to gather
trivedi to dilshan, 1 run, pitches on middle and leg, he shuffles and tucks it behind square on the on side
trivedi to maharoof, no run, deceives him with the slower ball, he swings and misses
trivedi to maharoof, no run, another slower one and another heave meets thin air
warne to maharoof, 2 runs, makes room and scoops this one over backward point
watson to mahesh, 1 bye, swings and misses, they steal a bye
watson to dilshan, no run, goes for a mighty heave but fails to make contact with the bat as the ball hits him flush on the body
mcgrath to pathan, no run, this one keeps just a little low, it was more of a warm-up delivery, pathan flashes and the ball creeps under the bat
mcgrath to pathan, 1 run, gives him the charge early and heaves it across the line towards midwicket, the ball comes off the edge and the timing was missing
mcgrath to smith, no run, lovely bowling, pitches on off and keeps it straight, smith has no room to work with and ends up defending back to the bowler
maharoof to pathan, no run, bowls the slower one and pathan's mighty heave meets thin air
mcgrath to smith, 1 run, waits at the crease and gently dabs a delivery pitching outside off down to third man
mcgrath to pathan, 1 run, makes room and fails to control a loft over the infield on the offside but instead gets a thick leading edge which falls on the first bounce to sangwan at third man
mcgrath to smith, 1 wide, loses his line and slides down the leg side, smith misses out to fetch a boundary
maharoof to smith, 1 run,
maharoof to kaif, 1 leg bye, pitched on leg and flicked to leg side
maharoof to smith, 1 wide, goes down leg side, ball stays low this time
mcgrath to kaif, no run, pitches on off and swings away
mcgrath to kaif, no run, pitched on off and comes in a touch, kaif defends
mcgrath to kaif, 1 run, pitched to middle and off, flicked to square leg
sangwan to smith, 1 run, pitched on off and driven to mid-off
sangwan to watson, no run, pitched on off and moving away, watson shoulders arms
sangwan to watson, 1 run, pitched on middle and flicked to fine leg
mahesh to smith, 1 leg bye, rocks back and shapes to defend but gets an inside edge

sangwan to watson, 1 run, attempts to slap this one away to the on side and gets a thin edge onto his pad, the ball trickles close to the stumps but smith was off the blocks quickly, he makes it before sangwan can gather the ball
sangwan to watson, 2 runs, gives him a bit of width and it seams away, he follows the movement and steers it down to third man
sangwan to watson, 1 run, gets across his stumps and taps it softly towards cover and sets off
sangwan to smith, 1 run, smith isn't afraid to make room again as he pushes this through the line to long-off
mishra to jadeja, 2 runs, jadeja swings across the line and gets a streaky under edge which just rolls pas the stumps and trickles to fine leg
maharoof to jadeja, 1 wide, slides really wide down the leg side, maharoof struggling a little here
maharoof to watson, 2 runs, pushed it to the on side, they take an extra run off the overthrow
mishra to watson, 1 run, a misfield by sehwag helps watson bring up his fifty, his third of the tournament
mishra to watson, 1 wide, loses his direction and sprays it wide down the legside
mcgrath to watson, four runs, mcgrath errs by giving him too much width, he takes advantage of the fact that there's no slip and the outside edge sails past the keeper and down to third man
sangwan to warne, no run, foxes him with the slower ball and this one just sails over the middle stump, sangwan thought he had him
sangwan to warne, no run, another slower one and warne misses as he tries to mow it across the line, in fact he gets an edge onto his body
maharoof to rawat, no run, tries to punch it through the offside and he misses
sreesanth to kohli, no run, he flays at a wide offering outside off and the ball seams away after pitching
sreesanth to kohli, 2 runs, pitches this one on middle and leg and kohli shuffles across and tucks it wide of fine leg for a couple
sreesanth to kohli, no run, false shot by kohli as he stretches out to slash at one outside off, sreesanth gets quite a bit of away movement
sreesanth to kohli, no run, pitches it in line of offstump and the ball holds its line, he gets behind it and angles it down towards point
pathan to kohli, no run, walks across his stumps early to cover the inward movement and he tucks it down to square leg
pathan to kohli, no run, takes a couple of paces down the track and checks his stroke at the last minute, the ball goes on the first bounce to slip
pathan to kohli, no run, shuffles across to push that through the gap on the on side but midwicket intercepts it, the on side is quite packed for him

pathan to kohli, no run, this time pathan bowls the one that goes away from the right hander and nearly gets his man as he fishes outside the offstump, no runs off the bat in the over, good one by pathan
sreesanth to kohli, no run, sreesanth beats him with a jaffa, that moves away rather late and just beats the outside edge, the ball dips low before reaching kaul
pathan to kohli, no run, the slower one from pathan and this induces an edge but it fails to carry through to the keeper
pathan to kohli, 1 run, takes a few paces down the track for a wild swish over the on side but he gets a thick outside edge which travels to chawla at third man
pathan to misbah-ul-haq, 1 run, pitches outside the offstump, he opens the face of the bat and chops it down hard to third man

sreesanth to misbah-ul-haq, out, misbah why do these things always happen to you?? sreesanth gets this one to nip back in sharply, misbah goes back and across a little too far and trods onto his stumps before pushing it to the offside, how unlucky, initially nobody noticed what had happened and then....
chawla to kohli, 5 wides, bowls from round the wicket, he strays way too far outside leg and the ball beats kaul and just about everyone

chawla to kohli, out, chawla strikes back! the ball dips in on off and middle and shoots through a little low, kohli goes back to the wrong delivery and the ball skids through and hits the offstump, chawla gets on his knee and punches the air
singh to dravid, no run, that was a neat drive but straight to extra cover
chawla to dravid, 1 run, gets quickly down on his knee and pierces the gap behind square on the offside
singh to dravid, 1 run, steers it down to third man and takes the first run quickly, dravis sets off for the second run but white wisely sends him back
singh to white, no run, times it a little too well towards mid-off and dravid wisely turns down the single
singh to white, 1 run, walks across his stumps and pushes it firmly down to luke pomersbach at long-off
yuvraj singh to boucher, 1 run, stays back and punches this one to long-off
chawla to boucher, four runs, drags that from outside the offstump and mows it away wide of midwicket
chawla to dravid, 2 runs, stays back at the crease, waits for the turn and slams it past extra cover
chawla to boucher, 1 run, steps down the track and whips it from outside off and places it to square leg and sets off
hopes to dravid, 1 run, plenty of confusion with the running, he tucks it to the offside and sends him back, the throw is wide and they nearly take the overthrow
hopes to boucher, no run, gives him a bit of width outside off and he slams it hard straight to point
pathan to boucher, 1 run, steps down the track and checks his stroke, he slams it down to extra cover
pathan to dravid, 1 run, opens the face of the bat late and steers it towards point, marsh's throw at the striker's end is wide
hopes to kumar, 1 run, tucks him up with the lifter, he gets on his knee and fends it off to the on side
sreesanth to vinay kumar, 1 wide, loses his line and misdirects it down the legside, he fails to make contact on the nudge
singh to khan, 1 bye, makes room and swings and misses, kaul has a shy at the stumps but they pick up a single after the ball deflects off the stump
singh to khan, no run, swing and a miss, zaheer makes room but fails to make contact, that ends a great spell by vrv
pathan to boucher, 1 wide, he sees him make room but sprays it spectacularly wide outside the offstump
steyn to marsh, 2 wides, poor delivery to start off, he slides wide down the legside and boucher fumbles as well
steyn to hopes, 1 run, edged! steyn pitches it outside off and gets it to move away, the outside edge just beats slip on the bounce and zaheer slides really well at third man to save three runs
khan to marsh, no run, pitches outside off and holds its line, marsh chooses to let it go, we don't see that very often in twenty20
khan to marsh, no run, lovely delivery! he fires that at good pace and gets it to dart back in sharply, marsh does well to let that go
khan to marsh, no run, this is restrictive stuff from zaheer as he gets one to nip back in and tuck him up, he chops it down to point
khan to marsh, 1 run, marsh spoils a potential maiden as he opens the face of the bat and deftly angles it wide of point
kumar to marsh, no run, praveen slides that wide outside off and gets away with it as marsh chops it down to extra cover
khan to hopes, no run, another super delivery, bangs it on middle and holds its line, hopes really has no room to work with and ends up pushing it to mid-off
khan to marsh, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and angles it down to third man
kumar to hopes, 1 run, flicked to leg side
khan to hopes, no run, dropped this time its hopes, pitched on off and the batsman drives it back to bowler but zaheer can't hold on to it as he dives in his follow-through
khan to hopes, 1 run, defended back to the bowler
vinay kumar to hopes, no run, pitched on off, driven to cover

vinay kumar to hopes, out, vinaykumar gets them the crucial wicket, pitched on off and hopes tries to replicate his earlier six to long-off, but it doesn't have the legs and dale steyn runs in from deep extra cover to take a diving catch
vinay kumar to pomersbach, no run, defended to cover
vinay kumar to pomersbach, 1 run, driven to cover
kumble to marsh, 1 run, pitched on leg, flicked to midwicket
kumble to pomersbach, 1 run, swept to fine leg
kumble to marsh, six runs, nice one. marsh steps out of the crease and picks up the ball from off stump to a six over long-off
kumble to marsh, 1 run,
kumble to pomersbach, no run, defended to point
kumble to pomersbach, 4 leg byes, pitched just outside leg and brushes the pad before slipping between bat and pad and through the keepers legs for four byes
vinay kumar to marsh, 2 runs, glided to third man and they ran hard for those runs
vinay kumar to marsh, no run, driven to cover
vinay kumar to marsh, no run, pitched on leg and marsh tried to flick it but edges the ball and it falls by the pitch. he thinks of taking a single but changes his mind as vinay runs towards him
vinay kumar to marsh, 2 runs, driven to mid-on
kumble to pomersbach, four runs, pitched on leg and an outside edge from the bat takes it to third-man boundary
kumble to pomersbach, no run,
kumble to pomersbach, no run, pitched on leg, marsh steps out and away and plays to off side
kumble to pomersbach, no run, pushed to leg side
kumble to pomersbach, no run, pitched on off, stays straight and low to beat the batsman
kumble to pomersbach, no run, driven back to the bowler

steyn to marsh, four runs, steyn returns for a second spell, he pitches it a little too wide, he slashes past cover and misbah nearly intercepts it, unfortunately the ball deflects off his hand and trickles to the rope
steyn to marsh, 1 wide, he bowls the slower ball but slides down the legside
kumble to pomersbach, 1 run, makes a bit of room and slices it wide of point to bring up the 100
kumble to marsh, no run, makes room again, sees the ball pitching outside off and he slices it down to third man
kohli to pomersbach, 1 run, makes room, steps down and bangs this down to long-off
kohli to pomersbach, 1 run, goes for an across the line swipe but he mistimes it to square leg
kumble to marsh, 1 wide, sprays that a little too wide outside off, he decides not to chase it
kumble to pomersbach, no run, makes room and slashes it wide of point
kumble to pomersbach, 1 run, tries to glance it late but he ends up chopping it down to the offside
mcgrath to salman butt, no run, ambles in and bowls that fairly slowly, butt is circumspect and chooses to let it go
sangwan to salman butt, no run, pitches on offstump and holds its line. he covers the line well and defends back to him
sangwan to chopra, 1 wide, loses his line and sprays it wide outside the legstump

mcgrath to salman butt, four runs, superb placement! mcgrath pitches it fractionally wide outside the offstump, butt gets back and across and slices perfectly in the arc between cover and backward point
mcgrath to chopra, 1 run, dropped: chopra fishes outside the offstump and the edge carries wide of the keeper, gambhir is too wide at first slip and fumbles despite getting both hands behind the ball
sangwan to chopra, no run, angles in from around the offstump, he gets across and taps it to the onside
sangwan to chopra, no run, keeps him quiet again as he tucks it to the on side and finds the square leg fielder
sangwan to chopra, 1 run, the quicker one this time, he shuffles and tucks it across the line towards mid-on
mahesh to chopra, no run, tucks it away and times it very crisply but again he fails to get the placement right and places it straight to square leg
sangwan to salman butt, 1 wide, slides wide outside off, too wide for him to chase that
sangwan to salman butt, no run, brings the line closer to the offstump, he gets across and flicks it to mid-on
sangwan to salman butt, 1 wide, strives for that extra yard of pace and sprays it too wide outside off
sangwan to salman butt, 1 run, gets across his stumps and turns it to the region of mid-on, they take a quick single and butt makes his ground before the throw at his end takes out the offstump
sangwan to chopra, no run, walks down the track early to unsettle the bowler but he ends up placing it straight to mid-on
mahesh to ganguly, 1 no ball, oversteps, pitches on middle and holds its line, he covers the line and defends
mahesh to ganguly, 1 run, pitches it outside the offstump and he angles it down to third man
mahesh to salman butt, 1 run, pitches around the offstump, he angles it behind point
mahesh to ganguly, 1 wide, strays a little too wide outside the offstump, ganguly just lets it go
mahesh to ganguly, 1 wide, loses his line again and he strays wide down the legside, he's struggling
mahesh to hussey, 1 run, pitches outside the offstump, he opens the face of the bat and dabs it down to third man
maharoof to salman butt, 1 run, turns his bat just before the point of contact and tucks it wide of mid-on, butt's not slamming them around here
maharoof to hussey, no run, nips back in from offstump, he tucks it off his hips and declines the single
mahesh to salman butt, no run, puts it more effort and thuds it on the pitch, butt hops and defends it back to the bowler

mahesh to salman butt, four runs, that should make butt feel a lot better, yomahesh bowls it quick and once again strays too wide outside off, he plays it harder and sends it scorching past cover this time
maharoof to salman butt, 1 run, gets across and taps it down to backward point
maharoof to hussey, 1 wide, slides down the leg side, he tries to glance but misses
mishra to salman butt, no run, lands on offstump line and comes on straight, he taps it back to the bowler
mishra to salman butt, 1 run, shuffles at the crease and whips it to midwicket
mishra to hussey, no run, chance there! almost... he bowls the flipper this time and it appeared like it took the thin edge, de villiers juggles the ball and fumbles
sehwag to salman butt, no run,
sehwag to salman butt, four runs, slides down the legside, he gets on his knee early and slams it wide of deep square leg
mishra to salman butt, 1 run, stays back at the crease and glides it down to third man, the ball skids through a little low but he adjusts well
mishra to hussey, no run, steps down the track but checks his stroke, he settles for a single to long-off
mahesh to salman butt, 1 wide, starts off his new spell with a wide outside off
mahesh to taibu, 1 run, taibu shuffles across and tucks it wide of square leg
mahesh to taibu, 1 run, gets across and whips it behind square on the on side
mahesh to hussey, no run, makes room and attempts a wild slash past backward point but misses it completely, he shows his frustrations
mishra to taibu, 1 run, slides on middle and leg, he tucks it to the on side
mishra to hussey, 1 run, steps down the track to crash that past the infield but places it straight to sehwag at extra cover
sangwan to hussey, 1 run, backs away from the stumps and crashes that towards the covers, he can't find the gap

sangwan to taibu, 1 run, out, he angles it down to dilshan at third man again, taibu takes the risk with the second run and makes a dive for the crease fairly early, the throw lands just above the stumps and de villiers whips off the bails, the third umpire jayaprakash has a look and gives it out
sangwan to shukla, 1 run, comes round the wicket and bowls the slower ball, he stretches out and gets an outside edge down towards third man
mcgrath to shukla, 1 run, pitches outside off and gets it to nip back in, he shuffles and tucks it to square leg

mcgrath to hussey, no run, interesting! mcgrath fields off his own bowling and sees shukla scamper back to his crease, he decides not to run him out and then sees hussey out of his crease as well, he decides against running him out as well and they share a laugh after that
maharoof to hussey, 1 run, waits for it at the crease and lofts it over mid-on, can't find the boundary
maharoof to shukla, 1 run, gets across and whips it to deep midwicket
mcgrath to saha, 1 run, that's a mishit over mid-off and saha gets away with it, he doesn't time it well at all
maharoof to iqbal abdulla, 1 run, bowls the quicker one and gets it to kick up on him, abdullah glides it down to third man and settles for a single only
shoaib akhtar to gambhir, 1 run, huge roar as shoaib runs in hard, he lands it just outside the line of offstump at a good pace, gambhir chops it down towards point
shoaib akhtar to sehwag, 1 wide, gets aggressive and fires that in wide down leg, sehwag misses the glance, shoaib gave it everything
shoaib akhtar to de villiers, no run, slides down the legside and de villiers gets a faint nick off his gloves

shoaib akhtar to de villiers, 1 run, continues bowling wide of the crease and pitches that on middle, not as pacy as some of his earlier deliveries, de villiers taps it with soft hands towards cover and sets off
shoaib akhtar to tiwary, 1 run, the speed gun said he crossed 150, he waits on it at the crease and angles it down to third man
shoaib akhtar to de villiers, no run, angles this one into the right hander from wide of the crease, he covers the line well and pushes it firmly towards mid-off

shoaib akhtar to tiwary, out, he's on a hat-trick! delivers from wide of the crease, he gives it everything and gets it to angle in sharply into the right hander, it hits tiwary in line of offstump and asad rauf raises the finger
shoaib akhtar to dilshan, no run, gets it to angle into the right hander, he wisely lets it go
dinda to dhawan, four runs, superb timing! dinda gives him just a little bit of width, he moves across just a touch and bangs it along the turf, the ball shoots up and beats cover
sharma to dilshan, 1 run, outside the off stump as dilshan steers it away to third man for a single off the last ball
dinda to dhawan, 1 wide, dinda bowls it on the leg side which makes howell stretch his hands to signify a wide
ganguly to mishra, 1 run, on the leg stump pushed to mid on for a single
ganguly to dilshan, 1 run, on the off stump, steered to third man to change ends
ganguly to dilshan, no run, on the off stump as dilshan pushes it to square leg. straining his wrists there
iqbal abdulla to mishra, no run, outside off, tries to steer it and misses
iqbal abdulla to mishra, 1 run, on the off stump as he pushes it to point for a single
iqbal abdulla to dilshan, no run, pushes to covers
iqbal abdulla to dilshan, no run, left alone outside the off stump
ganguly to mishra, 1 run, outside off, pushes it firmly to covers for a single
ganguly to mishra, 1 run, outside the off stump as mishra steers but a poor fielding effort by hussey allows them a single
ganguly to dilshan, no run, on the middle stump as dilshan reaches for it but cant get the timing right as he fails to retain the strike
iqbal abdulla to maharoof, 1 run, takes a few paces down the track and chips it uppishly past the bowler and down to long-off
iqbal abdulla to maharoof, 2 runs, stays at the crease and tucks it away past midwicket
ganguly to maharoof, 1 run, complete confusion in the running, he tucks it to the on side and maharoof is sent back as they attempt a risky second run

ganguly to maharoof, no run, : will kolkata regret that? maharoof punches it back hard but just checks his stroke at the last moment, ganguly turns in his follow through, gets his hands underneath it but ends up grabbing it, he's flat on the turf frustrated with himself
iqbal abdulla to mishra, four runs, that should ease the pressure a bit, he slides down the legside and he gets a thin edge on the glance and glides it past the keeper and down to fine leg
dinda to maharoof, 1 run, dinda makes him think as he gets one to nip back in and skid through, he gets a thick outside edge to third man
dinda to mishra, 1 run, angles in towards the legstump and he glides it down to fine leg
dinda to maharoof, 1 run, backs away a little from the stumps and square drives it towards third man
dinda to mishra, 1 run, he angles it off the meat of the bat behind backward point and they take it too easy on the first run, there should have been two there
sharma to mishra, no run, another direct hit! he pushes it to the covers and sets off for a riskly run, there's a direct hit at the non-striker's end but he was safe
shukla to mahesh, 5 wides, whoopsy! in the excitement he loses control of the swing and sprays it wide down leg, it's too quick for saha to intercept it
pollock to fleming, no run, superb first over, fleming tries to drive the last ball through the off side but gets an inside edge towards the leg side, pollock does the fielding
pollock to vidyut, 1 run, pushed off the hips towards square leg for a single
pollock to vidyut, 2 runs, driven elegantly through covers for two, nice timing

pollock to vidyut, out, caught! vidyut tries to hammer pollock over the straight boundary but mis-hits the ball high in the air towards mid-off, rohan raje positions himself under the catch and takes it comfortably with his palms facing upwards, aussie style
nehra to raina, no run, excellent comeback from nehra, only two off this over, raina moves back once again and pushes the ball towards point, nehra didn't give the batsman any room to work with

kulkarni to kapugedera, no run, kapugedera could have easily been run out! he pushes the ball towards the off side and wants the single, bandrinath sends him back after he comes a long way down, the throw comes in towards the wicketkeeper's end but the ball hits kapugedera's bat as he was trying to make his ground
raje to badrinath, 1 run, badrinath drops the ball with soft hands towards point and calls for the single
thornely to dhoni, 1 wide, he starts off with a very wide ball outside off stump, the ball swung away from the right-hander
thornely to dhoni, four runs, once again the ball swings quite a bit away from dhoni who tries to drive but gets a thick edge to the third-man boundary
kulkarni to badrinath, 1 wide, that's a bit too wide outside off stump, badrinath lets it go and kulkarni will have to re-bowl that one
kulkarni to badrinath, four runs, that's very wide outside off stump, it would have certainly been called but badrinath reached out for it and edged the ball past the keeper to the third man boundary
kulkarni to morkel, 1 wide, starts off with a wide ball outside off stump, six more to go
kulkarni to morkel, 1 wide, another wide ball outside off, the pressure is telling on kulkarni

gony to jayasuriya, 3 runs, chipped over the on side but fantastic fielding from murali, some great footwork and keeps them down to three, that wasn't too well timed but was running away over the fast outfield
gony to tendulkar, no run, 132.8kph, bounce outside off and carry too, nice bit of shape but tendulkar didn't have to play at it, drops his hands and lets go

gony to tendulkar, no run, swinging again, but that's too far outside off, pitching well outside and moving away, tendulkar slashes but can't reach the ball, looks at the umpire for a wide but can't get the sign
gony to tendulkar, four runs, thick edge there but that's soaring through to third man for a four, that was quick and outside off, moving away too, tendulkar pushes hard and a thick edge flies away
morkel to jayasuriya, 1 wide, too wide outside off, jayasuriya can't get the slash, wide called by billy doctrove, now that's strange, not given for gony in the last over but given here
morkel to jayasuriya, no run, defended to point
gony to jayasuriya, 1 wide, gony strays down leg side, jayasuriya tries to play the leg glance but misses
gony to jayasuriya, 1 wide, jayasuriya moves across his stumps to flick but gony strays down leg side once again, he's having trouble finishing what is an excellent over

morkel to tendulkar, six runs, superb effort from the ball boy outside the third man boundary but he drops it! tendulkar reaches out for a wide ball outside off stump, it would have been called wide, he slashes and the ball soars towards third man, the ball boy dives towards his right but can't hold on
morkel to jayasuriya, 1 leg bye, jayasuriya tries to work the ball through the leg side but gets hit on the thigh for  a leg bye
morkel to jayasuriya, no run, jayasuriya tries to blast the ball through the off side but mis-times the drive to mid-off
balaji to tendulkar, 1 wide, that is too wide outside off stump, the ball seams further away from the right-hander
