joginder sharma to tendulkar, 1 wide, joginder pitches wide outside off stump and seams it further away, tendulkar tries to reach for it but can't
joginder sharma to uthappa, no run, pitches outside off stump and seams a long way away from uthappa who lets it go
balaji to uthappa, 1 wide, that's very wide outside off stump, uthappa moves across and reaches out for it but still can't make contact
muralitharan to uthappa, 1 wide, slips down leg side first up, that turned too and the umpire calls it wide
joginder sharma to uthappa, 1 run, uthappa takes a step across his stumps and flicks the ball off his hips towards murali at long leg

kapugedera to jayasuriya, four runs, dropped! jayasuriya tries to clear the leg-side boundary but gets a top edge that flies high in the air towards long off, vidyut tries to get under it but can't get into a good position, he gets a hand on it but the ball rolls over the boundary
mm patel to marsh, no run, one slip in place, angling away from the left-hander, some bounce early on, lets it go
mm patel to hopes, no run, and this keeps a bit low, waits for it and pats it back towards mid-on
mm patel to hopes, no run, that's left him a shade, pushing tentatively, beats the outside edge
watson to marsh, no run, slightly wide of off, some swing again but not as much, pushed to mid-off
watson to marsh, no run, some good inswing again, shapes into the batsman, he can't get the timing right, appeal for lbw but that pitched outside leg
watson to marsh, four runs, too wide and he's latched on, spanked through point for another four, that's a screamer too, this is marsh-land
mm patel to marsh, 1 wide, down the leg side, no need to touch that one
mm patel to marsh, no run, pushed confidently back to the bowler, good stop from munaf
mm patel to marsh, no run, gives himself a bit of room, tapes towards gully
watson to hopes, 1 run, pushed to cover and they take off, think of two but decide against it
watson to hopes, no run, drives hard but good diving stop by the cover fielder
pankaj singh to hopes, four runs, one-handed flay there, backs away and crashes that over point for four, the top-hand came off but that was racing away
pankaj singh to hopes, no run, pushed to mid-on, they think of a run but that would have been too reckless
pankaj singh to hopes, 1 run, slow one again, pushed to midwicket for a quick one
watson to marsh, no run, straight this time, pushed to point, not much room to play with there
watson to hopes, no run, tapped towards cover
pankaj singh to marsh, 1 run, slightly slower, bit wide and he's caressed that past point
pankaj singh to hopes, 1 run, 128.9kph, pushed to cover, waits on that one
salunkhe to marsh, 1 run, quicker one, angling in, tapped to mid-on
trivedi to hopes, 1 run, slower one, outside off, pushed confidently to mid-on, waits for that
trivedi to marsh, no run, slower delivery on the middle stump and shaping away, marsh looks to run  it down to third man but fails to get any willow on it
trivedi to marsh, no run, slower again, slashed away but it's too close to the point fielder to take a single
salunkhe to marsh, no run, glided away towards third man
pathan to hopes, no run, bit of extra bounce for yusuf, hopes tries to move back and turn it but padded away close to the off side
pathan to marsh, 1 run, pushed to midwicket
pathan to marsh, 1 run, steps back and pushes confidently through midwicket, more good timing but only one here
trivedi to marsh, 1 run, too wide but another slower one, slashed but straight to deep backward point
trivedi to marsh, no run, pushed to mid-on, slightly slower ball this time
trivedi to marsh, 1 run, angled his bat to get a single to third man, he's retained the strike
pankaj singh to marsh, 1 wide, wide this time, marsh has messed with everyone's plans here, pankaj tries another slower one but it's too far outside off
trivedi to yuvraj singh, six runs, and another, this is almost as big as the first one, he's striking sixes as if popping peanuts, stand and blast, all the way over midwicket, big, bigger, biggest
watson to marsh, 1 wide, he backs away but that's too far outside off, wide called and rightly so
pathan to kaif, no run, kaif gets an inside edge on to the pad to a ball that swings into him
sreesanth to younis khan, 1 run, shuffling across and pushing to long-off for a single, he has a big smile on his face after getting off the mark. it's his first game, mind you.
pathan to younis khan, no run, tries to pick it up from outside off towards midwicket but that kept a bit low and he can't gauge the bounce, he's walking towards the ball here
pathan to nk patel, no run, swinging away from the left-hander, square-drives but that beats the outside edge
sreesanth to nk patel, 1 wide, too wide outside off, he doesn't need to worry about that
sreesanth to nk patel, four runs, glorious, there's some width there and he's lacing these effortlessly, stands straight and caresses it past point for another four, stringing them together now
pathan to nk patel, no run, patted back to the bowler
hopes to nk patel, four runs, that's hammered through covers, he's backed away and cracked that hard through extra cover, finds the gap again, four more
hopes to nk patel, 1 run, slashes hard at a slower one, point is deep so keeps them down to a single, he's hitting them confidently, though
powar to watson, 1 leg bye, charges down, done in by the spin, padded away towards the leg side for a quick one
chawla to watson, 1 run, all ready to go after that but can only work it away behind square leg for a single. someone has to go now. niraj maybe better off against the legbreak bowler
yuvraj singh to pathan, six runs, now then, this is the power of brother yo, not that well timed but that's soared over long-off for another six, easily done, two in two
chawla to pathan, 1 run, holds that back, 77kph, swept away to square leg
chawla to pathan, 2 runs, another clean swing but this time they need to settle for a couple, driven crunchily to midwicket but hopes mops up

chawla to kamran akmal, out, got 'em! akmal has holed out, down the track and he couldn't get the timing, lofted towards extra cover and mota is waiting there, straight into his palms and one rapid innings ends
chawla to rawat, 1 run, pushed to the on side for a quick one
chawla to rawat, no run, he thinks of coming down the track, thick inside edge deflects to the on side

hopes to pathan, four runs, too wide and it's cracked hard, he's smoked that, the fielder comes across but his feet are on the rope when he gets the ball, fine stop first up but he messed up then, good effort but that's four

hopes to pathan, four runs, peanuts, says yusuf, he's whistled that through covers for four more, stands back and thumps that with immense power, burns the carpet, hopes has begun to talk to himself. yusuf has strange effects on people
singh to rawat, 2 runs, lofted over midwicket but can't get the timing right, they get a couple and you can either see it as a good result or a bad one
hopes to salunkhe, 2 runs, slower one this time, pummeled towards square leg, marsh dives and keeps them to two
pathan to rawat, 1 run, slower one this time, tries to blast it over midwicket but the leading edge pops towards mid-on, they scamper through
pathan to pankaj singh, no run, keeps low this time, just misses the off stump and pankaj's wild swing meets air
pathan to pankaj singh, no run, slower one this time, 111.9kph, another swing and another miss, it misses off stump too
vijaykumar to gambhir, 1 run, too straight once again on middle and leg, gambhir moves back and flicks the ball towards long leg for a single
vijaykumar to gambhir, 1 run, gambhir comes down the track and hits the ball towards deep backward square leg, that was more of an inside edge
sarvesh kumar to gambhir, 1 wide, this time sarvesh strays down leg side and he'll have to re-bowl that one
venugopal rao to dhawan, 1 wide, venugopal fires the ball down leg side from round the wicket, wide called
venugopal rao to dhawan, no run,
shahid afridi to gambhir, 2 runs, gambhir moves back to a quicker ball and chips it past the bowler, they run one and then dhawan sprints back to the danger end for the second
shahid afridi to gambhir, six runs, gambhir charges afridi and hoists him high and far with the turn over deep midwicket, stunning hit
shahid afridi to dhawan, four runs, what power! dhawan gives afridi a taste of his own but clobbering the ball with a flat bat over afridi's head, that shot to the boudnary

shahid afridi to dhawan, four runs, dhawan also reaches his fifty, he makes room and drives the ball hard and into the gap at extra cover, four more and deccan are losing it here, just like they did against kolkata during the final overs
ojha to maharoof, no run, once again he is squared up by a flat ball that turns a bit away from the right-hander, he gets another outside edge towards backward point
singh to maharoof, 2 runs, sliced towards deep point where gibbs runs to his left and slides to save the boundary
singh to maharoof, 1 run, this time he mis-times it past the bowler for a single to retain strike
ojha to dhawan, 1 leg bye, dhawan fails to make proper contact as he tries to nudge the ball on the leg side and runs a leg bye

ojha to maharoof, out, caught! sharma takes it this time, maharoof tries to clear the straight boundary once again, this time the ball was too far away from him and he slices it high in the air and sharma takes a simple catch at point, sharma's earlier drop has cost deccan 18 runs
mcgrath to shahid afridi, 1 leg bye, the slower ball and afridi tries to nudge the ball off his hips, he misses and gets hit on the thigh for a leg bye
mohammad asif to gilchrist, 1 wide, wide outside off stump this time, gilchrist lets it go, first extra of the innings
mohammad asif to gibbs, 1 wide, asif strays down leg side this time, gibbs moves across his stumps and lets it go, that's a wide

mcgrath to shahid afridi, four runs, simply amazing! afridi moves very early towards the leg side to make room, mcgrath sees him going and bowls the slower ball on the stumps, afridi waits for it, reaches out, and slashes, the ball hits the outside edge and flies over point, it's not timed well but the ball still rolls to the boundary
mishra to gibbs, 1 run,
mishra to gibbs, no run,
mishra to gibbs, no run, gibbs smashes a long hop hard at cover where de villiers makes an excellent stop
mishra to gibbs, no run, he gets a leading edge on the off side as he tries to close the face and play it on the leg side
bhatia to styris, 1 run, another slower ball outside off, styris pushes on the off side and takes a single towards cover point
mohammad asif to styris, 1 run, driven towards long off this time for a single

maharoof to venugopal rao, six runs, rao's hammered it on to the second tier! he backed away to a slower ball, swung his bat hard and hit the ball straight over the bowler's head for a massive six, deccan need a few more like that
mcgrath to ravi teja, 1 run, teja moves back and guides the ball towards third man to give rao the strike, sensible batting

mishra to ravi teja, out, he's cleared the boundary! no he hasn't, malik's taken the catch at long off! mishra bowled the flatter and faster ball outside off stump, teja made room and hit it with a flat bat towards long off where malik moved to his left and held on to a hard catch
mishra to sarvesh kumar, no run, he could have had four in four! sarvesh charges and misses but karthik fails to collect the ball, imagine that he could have had four wickets in a row
pollock to salman butt, 1 run, dropped with soft hands towards the off side for a quick single
nehra to salman butt, no run, nehra angles the ball into the left-hander from over the wicket, pitches just outside off stump and then shapes the ball away from butt who lets it go again
nehra to salman butt, 1 wide, butt slashes hard at it but the ball is extremely wide outside off stump, he misses and umpire doctrove calls it wide
pollock to chopra, 1 run, butt opens the face of his bat and steers the ball towards third man
pollock to salman butt, 1 wide, that's a shocking wide from pollock! way down leg side, butt tries to play the leg glance but he was far away from the ball
nehra to hussey, 1 wide, wide outside off stump this time, hussey lets it go and the umpire signals wide
nehra to hussey, no run, hussey once again doesn't have any room to work with because of nehra's movement back into the right-hander, he defends back to the bowler
nehra to hussey, 1 wide, nehra pitches too straight this time and strays down leg side, that's another wide
bravo to mohammad hafeez, 1 wide, hafeez lets yet another one go outside off, this time it is too wide and bravo will have to re-bowl that
bravo to mohammad hafeez, no run, in the channel outside off stump, hafeez lifts his bat out of the way once again, mumbai have conceded only 27 off the powerplay overs, magnificent effort
pollock to ganguly, 1 run, this time ganguly pushes towards uthappa at cover point and scurries through for the single
pollock to saha, 1 run, played down to third man for a single

bravo to saha, out, caught again! saha flashes hard at one outside off stump, he gets undone by the bounce and seam movement away from him and nicks it straight to tendulkar who takes a regulation catch at first slip, there's good carry on this surface and tendulkar is standing rather deep

raje to agarkar, four runs, and again! this time agarkar jumps back and flicks a ball from middle and leg through midwicket, the timing is excellent and the ball beats the fielder giving chase comfortably
raje to agarkar, 1 run, what happened there? agarkar tries to whip the ball off his hips but gets a leading edge because of the high bounce, the ball ends up at third man
thornely to shoaib akhtar, 1 wide, that's very wide outside off stump, shoaib slashes hard at it but misses, umpire harper calls it wide
thornely to shoaib akhtar, no run, wider outside the off stump this time, shoaib judiciously lets it go
thornely to dinda, 1 run, he gets an outside edge and collects a single towards third man
thornely to shoaib akhtar, no run, the slower ball on off stump, shoaib mis-times the drive back to the bowler
raje to shoaib akhtar, no run, the slower ball on middle and leg, shoaib moves back and tries to defend, he manages, awkwardly

raje to shoaib akhtar, out, that's it! all over, tendulkar's taken his fourth catch! raje bowls the slower ball on middle stump, shoaib mis-hits it straight to tendulkar at midwicket, isn't he thrilled!
shoaib akhtar to jayasuriya, 1 wide, shoaib strays down leg side this time and the umpire signals wide

shoaib akhtar to uthappa, 1 run, shoaib fires the ball in from wide of the crease, uthappa jumps back and across and fends the ball towards the leg side, he calls jayasuriya through for the quick single
agarkar to jayasuriya, 1 wide, agarkar sprays the ball down leg side, that's the second wide of the over
sreesanth to gambhir, 1 wide, he strays a little too wide outside the off stump and gambhir can't resist chasing that
sreesanth to gambhir, 2 wides, terrible delivery wide down the legside and sreesanth will really have to thank kaul for flinging himself to his right and saving two wides
sreesanth to sehwag, no run, ends the over with a beautiful delivery pitched on the corridor outside off, it squares up sehwag and he nearly gets an edge
pathan to gambhir, no run, he gives him the charge this time but he fails to place it wide of mid-off who's stationed more towards cover
pathan to gambhir, four runs, pitches just marginally wide outside off, he opens the face of the bat and times it superbly in the arc between backward point and cover
pathan to gambhir, no run, gets this one to bend back in sharply and nearly takes the edge

pathan to gambhir, no run, he slashes hard square of the wicket and hopes does well to slide and save a couple of runs, marsh throws it to the keeper and there's confusion in the running, gambhir makes it back just in time
sreesanth to sehwag, 2 runs, : sehwag goes for the loft and completely mistimes it as the top edge goes towards mid-off, yuvraj who has the safest pair of hands spills the sitter
sreesanth to sehwag, 1 run, takes a very quick single to point and gambhir scampers home
sreesanth to sehwag, 2 runs, the misfielding disease spreads like a virus here, sehwag pushes wide of mid-on and sets off, powar makes a mess of it and they take an extra run
pathan to gambhir, no run, slices this one firmly towards point and hopes intercepts it
pathan to gambhir, no run, gets the width outside off but he mistimes the drive to hopes at backward point
pathan to gambhir, 1 run, plays it late, opens the face of the bat and glides it gently down to third man to retain the strike
sreesanth to gambhir, 2 runs, steps down the track again and tries to launch him downtown, he mistimes the stroke and the ball just clears the fielder in the region of long-off
sreesanth to gambhir, 1 wide, bowls the slower ball but misdirects the legbreak down the legside, he tries to nudge it down but misses
sreesanth to gambhir, 2 runs, gambhir's charmed life continues as he gets a thick outside edge and ball lands wide of vrv in the region of third man
singh to gambhir, 1 run, takes a couple of paces down and softly tucks it towards midwicket to take a single
powar to gambhir, 1 wide, wide from round the stumps, it turns away, and is called a wide
powar to sehwag, no run, sehwag goes for an almighty heave, it's slower and misses
powar to gambhir, no run, flatter on leg stump, and just brushes the pad
powar to gambhir, out, powar strikes! gambhir plays for the break, but this one goes straight and cleans gambhir up. clever bowling from powar.
chawla to dhawan, 1 run, flat on l;eg stump, dhawan turns this around the corner for one
chawla to sehwag, 1 run, angled across the rigjt hander, sehwag punches it off the backfoot to long-off
chawla to dhawan, no run,
powar to sehwag, 1 wide, powar slips this one wide down leg on seeing sehwag give him the charge
powar to sehwag, 1 leg bye, goes for a mighty hoick a little too early and he misses, the ball trickles past the keeper
powar to sehwag, 1 run, pushes it flat on middle and leg, he makes room and heaves it to deep midwicket
singh to sehwag, no run, clever stuff from vrv as he slips it wide outside off stump on seeing sehwag make room, it was too far for him to stretch out and play a stroke

hopes to maharoof, out, this is turning out to be an excellent over so far! he bowls the slower ball, maharoof makes room but he mistimes the loft and powar runs backwards and takes an excellent catch at midwicket
mcgrath to marsh, 1 run, comes around the wicket and gets it to bend back in sharply to the left hander, he taps it to the offside to get off the mark
mcgrath to marsh, no run, beats him this time, this is lovely delivery as it swings in and beats marsh as he goes for the offdrive
mcgrath to marsh, no run, mcgrath gets better and better as he bends it in again and nearly shaves the offstump as marsh swings and misses
mcgrath to marsh, 1 run, limits him to just a single this time, he opens the face of the bat and taps it to the offside
sangwan to hopes, 1 wide, loses his line and sprays it wide outside the offstump, punjab could do with more of that
mishra to jayawardene, 1 run, good over by mishra as he tucks it to the on side for a single
sehwag to jayawardene, 1 wide, slides wide down the legside
mishra to jayawardene, six runs, bowls the long hop, he decides to stay on the backfoot and clubs it over deep midwicket
mishra to pomersbach, 1 run, gets across his stumps and tucks it away to the on side
maharoof to jayawardene, 1 run, makes room and deftly dabs this one to third man
bhatia to jayawardene, six runs, jayawardene wrecks a good over by swiveling across his stumps and putting away a long hop high over deep midwicket
kumar to smith, 4 wides, that's wide down leg side, patil dives to his right but can't collect, the ball runs towards fine leg where kumble dives and saves the boundary

kallis to asnodkar, four runs, unbelievable, asnodkar should buy a lottery ticket, he slashes outside off stump once again and gets a thick outside edge that flies high but between first slip and the wicketkeeper for four

abdur razzak to smith, six runs, welcome to the ipl razzak! smith moves towards the leg side to make room and swings his bat hard to loft the ball on to the roof of the stands at deep midwicket, massive hit, razzak's conceded 11 runs off one ball!
abdur razzak to smith, no run, bowled flat and fast on off and middle, smith defends to the bowler
kumble to asnodkar, 1 run, pushed towards the off side for a single
kohli to smith, 2 wides, that's wide down leg side, the keeper fails to collect but it will be just the single
kohli to asnodkar, 1 leg bye, asnodkar tries to work the ball from leg stump behidn square but mis-hits it towards midwicket
abdur razzak to watson, no run, watson moves back to another quick delivery on middle and defends on the off side
abdur razzak to smith, 5 wides, that's a shocking wide outside off stump, patil moves towards the ball and he should have stopped it but the ball goes under him and runs to the boudnary
kallis to watson, 1 run, watson swings across the line and collects a single to deep midwicket
khan to smith, 1 run, smith backs away towards leg and zaheer follows him, smith gets an edge on leg side
patel to kohli, 1 run, kohli moves across his stumps and drops the ball with soft hands on the pitch, kallis calls him through for the single
sohail tanvir to white, 1 wide, this time tanvir bowls the ball to far outside off from over the wicket, bowden signals wide in his own curious way
watson to kallis, 1 run, kallis drives the ball elegantly through the covers but will get only a single

watson to kallis, no run, was that an edge? rawat thought so, kallis slashes at a wide ball outside off and there is a sound as the ball passed the bat, rawat appeals immediately but watson's shout is late, the umpire says not out
trivedi to kallis, 2 runs, starts off with a slower ball, kallis makes room and drives through cover for a single
warne to patil, no run, patil backs away towards leg and mis-times the drive towards cover
trivedi to dravid, four runs, trivedi strays down leg side and dravid helps the slower ball towards fine leg for four more with a deft leg glance
trivedi to patil, 1 run, patil moves across his stumps and pushes a slower ball towards square leg
warne to dravid, 1 run, dravid moves deep in his crease and drives the ball through cover

warne to kumar, out, and he goes first ball! he steps out of his crease and tries to clear long-off, he's hit it pretty well but not well enough, the ball goes high in the air and kaif takes a well-judged catch a few feet inside the long-off boundary, dravid watches helplessly from the other end
pathan to dravid, six runs, that's a massive six! dravid gets under a flat and fast delivery and lofts the ball sweetly over deep midwicket, that has gone several rows back
warne to kumble, 1 run, driven through covers for one
pathan to dravid, no run, dravid moves back and defends a quicker ball towards the leg side

pathan to dravid, six runs, that's the third one on the roof! dravid charges yusuf and lofts him cleanly through the line over deep midwicket, he brings up his 50 with that shot, 53 off 25 balls, dravid is showing up his team-mates here, he could have done with a lot more support
sohail tanvir to dravid, 1 run, dravid drives the ball through covers for  a single
jadeja to dravid, no run, driven towards cover and again he doesn't take the single
vijaykumar to jayasuriya, 1 wide, vijaykumar strays down leg side again, jayasuriya shuffles across to play the leg glance but misses, wide called
singh to thornely, no run, rp appeals for leg before but the ball pitched outside leg, thornely had moved across his stumps to work the ball behind square but missed
ojha to tendulkar, no run, tendulkar moves around his crease as the bowler runs up, ojha bowls flat and straight and tendulkar defends on the off side
ojha to tendulkar, four runs, this time he backs away to make room and smashes the ball past the bowler with a flat bat, the ball races to the long off boundary
shahid afridi to thornely, 1 run, bowled flat and straight on middle stump, thornely moves back and defends to the bowler
shahid afridi to uthappa, no run, defended towards the off side
shahid afridi to uthappa, 2 leg byes, uthappa moves across his stumps and flicks the ball behind square, that went off his pad
ojha to uthappa, no run, uthappa moves back and across and defends a flat and fast ball back to the bowler
ojha to uthappa, no run, uthappa tries to open the face and run the ball towards third man but misses
shahid afridi to uthappa, 1 wide, that's too wide outside off stump and umpire harper agrees
ojha to nayar, 1 leg bye, nayar tries to hit through leg but gets a leading edge towards point
ojha to nayar, no run, nayar tries to drive but gets an inside edge on to his pad

ojha to nayar, four runs, nicely struck! nayar takes a step down and lofts the ball straight over the bowler with a lovely free swing of the bat, that was like a golf swing, the ball bounces once before going over the boundary

venugopal rao to nayar, 1 run, uthappa's safe! nayar pushes the ball to cover and calls for the quick single, ojha fields and fires the throw back at gilchrist who breaks the stumps, uthappa is just safe, direct hit and he would have been out
venugopal rao to nayar, 1 run, nayar steps out and swings the ball through square leg for one
venugopal rao to nayar, 1 run, nayar makes room and hits towards long-off for a single
venugopal rao to bravo, no run, bravo moves back in his crease and plays the ball to midwicket, nayar wants the single but bravo sends him back
venugopal rao to bravo, 1 run, bravo steps out of his crease and drives towards long-off for a single

zoysa to nayar, 1 run, once again nayar moves across his stumps and uses the angle into him from over the wicket to guide the ball towards fine leg, gilchirst has pushed the man back to the boundary now
vijaykumar to shah, 1 wide, vijaykumar starts his new spell with a wide down leg side
vijaykumar to shah, 1 wide, vijaykumar strays down leg side again, that's another wide, six runs off one ball so far
vijaykumar to shah, 1 wide, another wide down leg side, just the two legal balls so far

nehra to gilchrist, 1 run, dropped, gilchrist tries to loft over the leg side and ends up chipping the ball high in the air, he stopped his shot and didn't go through with it, raje pedals backwards from mid-on and fails to hold on to the catch even though he got into position and got both hands to it
fernando to venugopal rao, 1 wide, pitches outside off stump and seams away from the right-hander, that's a bit too wide
raje to silva, no run, silva pushes the ball towards point and sets off for the run, rao sends him back, uthappa hits the stumps direct but silva is back
raje to silva, 1 wide, extremely wide outside off stump, silva lets it go, this is silva's first game of the ipl
fernando to silva, four runs, silva steps across his stumps and flicks a ball from leg stump towards the fine leg boundary, well struck

thornely to silva, 1 run, silva drops the ball with soft hands close on the off side and calls rao through for the single, thornely runs quickly to the ball and hits the stumps at the batsman's end with an under throw, rao is safe
nayar to ravi teja, no run, tight wicket to wicket line from nayar, teja defends from his crease to the leg side
nayar to ravi teja, no run, super ball, nayar bowls a quicker ball that pitches on middle and straightens off the pitch and beats the outside edge
jayasuriya to venugopal rao, four runs, rao makes room by moving towards leg and drives a quicker ball through cover point for four more
raje to ravi teja, 1 run, teja moves back and across and pushes the ball behind point for one more, they need more than that
bravo to ravi teja, 1 run, the slower ball, teja drops it on the leg side with soft hands and sprints the single, bravo tries to kick the ball on to the stumps but misses
fernando to venugopal rao, no run, the slower ball outside off stump, rao has a wild swing but misses

bravo to venugopal rao, out, rao's gone and with it so have decccan's slim hopes! rao slashes at a ball that's a bit too far away from him, he slices the ball in the air over point, shah pedals backwards and manages to hold on to the catch although he didn't get into a very good position

fernando to zoysa, 2 runs, zoysa hits the ball in the air towards wide third man where shah runs across the boudnary and catches the ball just before he goes outside the boundary, he throws the ball back in time
fernando to zoysa, four runs, zoysa chips the ball in the gap over the fielder at midwicket for a four
nehra to singh, 1 run, driven hard and straight past the bowler for a single
ntini to salman butt, 1 run, delivers from slightly wide of the crease, butt gets on the backfoot and punches it back past the bowler and towards mid-off again
gony to mohammad hafeez, 1 run, another mis-hit, this time by hafeez, the ball kicks up on him and he closes the face of the bat and gets a thick leading edge down to third man

ntini to mohammad hafeez, out, nitini slides down the legside, he shuffles across and flicks it uppishly down to fine leg, he times it a little too well and places it straight to gony who takes it comfortably
ntini to ganguly, no run, lovely ball, it angles into ganguly and suddenly shapes away after pitching, it squares ganguly up on the drive and nearly gets an outside edge to patel
gony to ganguly, no run, makes a bit of room to pierce the offside field, he mistimes it cover and that's another dot ball
gony to ganguly, no run, hits the deck hard again and gets the ball to kick up, he opens the face of the bat and steers it to cover point, this is good stuff by gony
ntini to salman butt, four runs, he slides it across the left hander again and butt makes room for himself, he plays this a lot squarer and slashes it with control over backward point
ntini to salman butt, no run, good tactic by ntini as he pitches it on the corridor outside off and beats the batsman, the ball straightens after pitching
gony to das, 1 run, gives him a bit of width outside off, he opens the face of the bat and pushes it wide of cover
muralitharan to salman butt, no run, this one's flatter in trajectory, not much turn as he taps it to mid-off
morkel to das, no run, makes a bit of room to tuck it away to the on side but the ball skids through a lot quicker and he manages to place it back to the bowler
morkel to das, no run, makes room again to pierce the offside field but he mistimes it to mid-off
gony to salman butt, no run, false stroke from butt as he attempts a cheeky glide to third man and misses it completely
gony to das, no run, exposes all his stumps and goes for a mighty heave and misses
gony to das, no run, attempts the stroke again and the same result, gony gives him a glare, scary, brrrrr!!
muralitharan to das, 1 run, takes a few paces down and heaves it to deep midwicket
muralitharan to salman butt, no run, makes room to slice it wide of the infield on the offside but the big turn beats him

ntini to hussey, out, timber and that;s two in two! ntini gets it to angle in to the right hander, that's his stock delivery, hussey is a little lazy to move across and cover the line and the ball skids through and hits the top of offstump, the stump goes for a tumble
ntini to shukla, no run, ends a superb over with a dot ball, shukla taps it towards mid-off
balaji to saha, 1 run, pushed to the offside for a single
balaji to shukla, 1 wide, slips that wide outside off, loses his line here
balaji to shukla, 1 run, the slower ball, he makes room and pushes it to long-off
morkel to saha, 1 run,
morkel to shukla, 1 bye, attempts to heave it through the on side, he misses and gets a bye as patel fumbles
balaji to shukla, 1 leg bye, foxes him with the slower ball as he goes for the heave, the ball hits him just outside the line of the stumps but balaji appeals anyway
shoaib akhtar to patel, 1 wide, bad start for shoaib as he slides this one down the legside, wide called
shoaib akhtar to patel, 1 wide, this time he sprays it well wide of the offstump, that ankle must be disturbing his rhythm
sharma to patel, no run, pitches on middle and comes on straight, he angles it down towards backward point, this is a good line by ishant

sharma to patel, four runs, superb timing! ishant gives him just a bit of width outside off, he opens the face of the bat and meets the ball on an angle, he strikes it off the meat of the bat and the ball just beats the diving cover fielder
sharma to patel, 1 run, strays on the body this time and he shuffles and tucks it away down to fine leg
shoaib akhtar to fleming, no run, gets a thick inside edge as he plays away from his body and the ball nearly trickles onto his stumps
shoaib akhtar to fleming, no run, the crowd roar as he runs in, he fires it on off and middle and flemo just gets his bat down on time and tucks it down to square leg
sharma to fleming, no run, gets across his stumps just a touch and tucks it towards midwicket
sharma to fleming, 1 run, taps it down on the pitch with soft hands and patel calls for the run quickly

sharma to patel, 1 run, shuffles across a little, turns the face of the bat and turns it towards mid-on and sets off for a quick single, he dives at the non-striker's end and the under-arm flick sails over the stumps
dinda to patel, no run, this one keeps a little low, he just manages to cover the line and tap it firmly back to the bowler
dinda to patel, 1 run, slashes it hard along the ground and taibu effects a brilliant athletic save to his right and saves a certain boundary
dinda to patel, no run, takes this from outside the offstump and whips across the line to midwicket with a good use of the wrists
agarkar to patel, 1 run, swings in to the left hander and he tucks it to the on side after exposing his stumps
dinda to fleming, 1 run, he taps it with soft hands towards mid-off and sets off quickly for a single, he takes advantage of the fact that the fielder is on the edge of the circle

dinda to patel, 1 run, taps it just wide of shukla at mid-off and sets off, shukla for some reason hesitates before throwing and eventually knocks the stumps down after patel makes his ground, why did we wait? otherwise patel would have gone, surely!
agarkar to fleming, 1 wide, slides wide down the legside, he attempts to nudge it down fine but misses
agarkar to patel, no run, bowls the slower one this time and beats him outside the offstump
agarkar to fleming, no run, pitches outside off, he shapes to drive but misses
mcgrath to kallis, no run, starts with one slightly wide, kallis is the latest in the line of openers for banglalore. they seem to have changed their combination every game.
mcgrath to kallis, no run, outside off again, left alone, bharat chipli is kallis' opening partner
mcgrath to kallis, no run, he reaches out for this one, plays and misses, moves away from the bat in the last moment, bit of seam movement here
mcgrath to kallis, 1 run, walks down the track and pushes back to the bolwer, mcgrath lets out a reverse flick that hits the stumps and deflects for an overthrow, they get a run.
sangwan to kallis, 1 wide, too wide outside off, starting wide and moving away, kallis throws his bat but can't reach it, wide called and rightly so
sangwan to kallis, 5 wides, too wide again, he's sprayed that, too far for the wicketkeeper as well, all the way for four, this is erratic from sangwan
sangwan to chipli, 1 wide, he's lost his bearings here, too wide again, the line is all wrong
mcgrath to chipli, 1 run, down the leg side and angled towards fine leg
mcgrath to kallis, 1 run, flicked away to the on side, line slightly wrong that time

mcgrath to kallis, 1 wide, that's harsh from the umpire, it was not too wide outside off but it's called a wide, kallis let it go and mcgrath can't believe it, he wasn't given a caught-behind in the last ball of the previous over and now this. surely no love lost between the aussies.

mcgrath to chipli, no run, that's spanked hard to point and some sensational fielding by dilshan, diving stop after throwing himself to the right, mcgrath gives the batsman more lip, he is furious now
mcgrath to kallis, four runs, on middle and kallis moves across to turn it away crisply off his hips, all the way behind square for four, mcgrath is furious - this time with himself
mahesh to goswami, no run, outside off this time and lets it go, two good dot balls from yomahesh
mahesh to goswami, four runs, now that's a sweet shot, laced through the covers for a fine four, everything right about it, balance, timing and head position
maharoof to goswami, 1 run, down the track and spanked away over infield for a single, maharoof rounds off a fine over
maharoof to dravid, 1 run, pushed to mid-on and takes off, sensible decision to give goswami the strike, he's the man in form
maharoof to dravid, 1 run, tip and run again, jabbed to the covers and takes off
dilshan to dravid, 1 run, down the track and turned away past midwicket for a single, a typical dravid shot
dilshan to goswami, no run, tries to punch to mid-on but can't get the timing right
dilshan to goswami, 1 run, quicker one, he makes room and cracks it hard past extra cover, there's a fielder back there, though
bhatia to goswami, 1 run, pitched on middle and leg, flicked to square leg
bhatia to misbah-ul-haq, 1 run, patted to cover for a quick single
bhatia to goswami, 1 run, tucked away towards square leg, they think of a couple but that's good fielding
bhatia to misbah-ul-haq, 1 run, outside off and not much movement, steered to third man for a single, misbah getting into his groove there
mahesh to goswami, 1 wide, gives himself a lot of room and that's called a wide, harsh one that, it wouldn't have been a wide if he was standing in his normal position
mahesh to goswami, no run, backs off again and tries to judder it past cover but misses again, this is getting frustrating for goswami
mahesh to misbah-ul-haq, 1 run, another tip and run to the off side, misbah's plan seems clear, get into the groove and smash later
mahesh to goswami, no run, driven hard to point, dilshan isn't letting anything go by, two vital dots for yomahesh

mahesh to goswami, four runs, top edge flies away past karthik, he's tried to lash it past cover but can only get an edge, that would have been a sensational catch but it races past karthik for four, goswami brings up a fifty in his ipl debut, take a bow little man, they'll be cheering in lilua (his hometown in bengal) for sure

maharoof to goswami, out, down the track and tries to clear the midwicket region, bit of extra bounce for maharoof and the leading edge pops high in the air for dilshan, at point, to take a comfortable catch. end of a fine innings
sangwan to misbah-ul-haq, no run, slower one to start with, misbah too early on it
sangwan to misbah-ul-haq, 2 runs, backs away and lashes it to extra cover for a couple
maharoof to akhil, 1 run, makes room and hammers down to long-off
maharoof to misbah-ul-haq, 1 run, spanked to deep point and they pick up a single, on his knees that time, misbah
bhatia to misbah-ul-haq, no run, that's gold-dust at this point, a dot ball, misbah lets it go thinking it's a wide but not called, zaheer khan is halfway down the crease and needs to hurry back
bhatia to misbah-ul-haq, six runs, slower but but misbah knows that, stand and deliver that, waits for it and swings it hard over midwicket for a six, he knew exactly what was coming
steyn to gambhir, four runs, down the leg side and what a start from gambhir, flicked with sweet timing to the square leg fence for four, too easy for the man with the orange cap
steyn to gambhir, 1 run, tucked to square leg for a single, the line is a bit awry here
steyn to sehwag, 1 run, on middle and leg this time, turned away crisply behind square for a single
steyn to gambhir, 4 leg byes, too far down leg side, that's too easy for gambhir, helped it down the leg side, four legbyes and steyn hasn't got his line right
khan to gambhir, four runs, too far down leg, that's an awful line from zaheer, beats the batsman, beats the keeper, he can only get a glove to it but it's four
khan to gambhir, 5 wides, another one that's way too wide down leg, no chance for goswami there, another four, more wides, this may be costly

steyn to gambhir, four runs, bit of width and he's flayed that through the covers for another four, he's in such roaring form that a few good balls can only stiffen him up, what a zinger that was, four dots and two fours, gauti makes up for lost time
khan to sehwag, 1 run, sensible from the captain, steering to third man and giving the strike to the man in form
khan to gambhir, 1 run, on middle and off, keeps him quiet now, pushed to the off side for a quick single, better line from zaheer here
kumar to gambhir, 1 run, sensible this time, taps with soft hands and takes off for a single to cover

kumar to sehwag, four runs, he's motoring along too, on middle and leg and sehwag punishes that behind square, these two batsmen have murdered attacks all through this tournament and this doesn't look any different
kallis to sehwag, 1 run, steered to third man, there's a misfield there but they settle for one
kumar to gambhir, 1 run, down the track and driven to cover, good diving stop keeps them down to a single, that was travelling too
kallis to de villiers, 2 runs, straight one again, tucked to fine leg and he hurries back for two, that was a bit sloppy from the fielder
akhil to gambhir, 1 run, on middle and leg, turned away to square leg for a single, sensible from gauti, he knows the run-rate is well within control
kumble to de villiers, 1 run, driven to mid-on for an easy single
akhil to de villiers, 2 runs, uppish this time, outside off but point can't get to it despite a diving attempt, they complete two more, these delhi batsmen are so quick between the wickets
kumble to de villiers, 1 run, driven meatily through the covers for a single
akhil to de villiers, 1 run,
akhil to de villiers, 1 run, flicked to square leg for a single
kumble to de villiers, 1 run, quicker one down the leg side, ab was giving him the charge but he made the late change kumble, ab needs to make the change to push to the on side
kumble to dilshan, 1 run, dilshan makes room and drives through the covers
kumble to maharoof, 1 run, quicker one on middle, turned away to the leg side for a quick single, good fielding at square leg but they're home

kumble to dhawan, no run, more drama! dhawan pushes back to the bowler, it appeared like a bump ball but kumble completed a low catch and claims it, the fielders look pretty confident but the umpire is not sure, the third umpire is called upon but the evidence is not conclusive. 'not out' says the third umpire
steyn to dhawan, 1 run, slower one from steyn, dhawan is foxed by it and the tentative chip falls in the gap in the covers, that could have easily been caught
steyn to maharoof, 1 leg bye, backs away again but steyn follows him, struck on the body but they manage a leg bye, end of a ferocious spell but delhi could just get past the tape here
khan to maharoof, four runs, what a statement! maharoof dances down the track and rips a powerful drive through the covers, that's pinged the boundary hoardings hard and they're almost there now

khan to dhawan, four runs, straight and coming into the left-hander, he tries to loft it over mid-on but a thick inside edge has sneaked the gap between mid-on and midwicket, all the way for four, all over bar the shouting now
sohail tanvir to salman butt, 2 wides, down the leg side, starts with a wide, it's pakistan v pakistan first up, two slips in place and there seems to be a bit of swing around
sohail tanvir to salman butt, no run, on middle and leg again, he hasn't got the line going here, turned away but they decide against the single
patel to ganguly, no run, fine over this, wicket maiden that, tapped to the off side, super stuff from munaf
watson to salman butt, 1 wide, drifting down the leg side now, that's wide in this format, butt tries to flick but can't make contact
watson to salman butt, no run, tapped to cover
watson to salman butt, no run, similar ball again, driven straight to mid-off again, tight over this, just five off it
sohail tanvir to ganguly, no run, good line this, doesn't allow him a chance to free his arms, tapped to cover
sohail tanvir to ganguly, no run, jags back into the left hander, surprises him and he has no stroke for that, they think of a quick run but decide against it
sohail tanvir to ganguly, no run, superb slower ball here, surprises ganguly and he can only push it tentatively to cover, the crowd are getting into this now, boos go around
patel to ganguly, no run, signs of frustration here, ganguly backs off and tries to whack that over mid-on but can't get the timing right, dribbled to mid-on
patel to ganguly, 1 run, walks down the track again, ganguly doesn't have much of a clue but is trying to clear the field, thick inside edge goes to square leg, even dada is smiling by the end of it
watson to salman butt, 1 run, backs away, tries to lash it through the off side but can't beat the fielder, they hurry a single, this is tight bowling here
watson to salman butt, 1 run, 135.1, fine change of pace, pushed to the on side, only one again

patel to salman butt, four runs, that's the shot of the evening, gives himself room, sees the ball thrown up little wide but he's flayed that through the covers on one knee, classical mixes with improvisation there, eden is alive and well
patel to hussey, no run, left alone outside off, moving a shade away, successful over again
trivedi to ganguly, no run, another slower one, not coming onto the bat, ganguly needs to wait an age for it and can't work it away, dribbles to slip
trivedi to hussey, four runs, down the leg side this time, trivedi is having a poor over here, helped along past the keeper for four, two rank balls here
warne to ganguly, 2 runs, legbreak that's on off, turns into the left-hander, ganguly backs away and flays it hard towards extra cover, they pick up a couple
warne to ganguly, 1 run, turned to the on side, that was a legbreak which turned a bit more
pathan to ganguly, 1 run, tapped to the off side, quick run too, quickish from yusuf
pathan to das, 1 run, 97.2kph, fired in on middle and leg, turned away for a single

warne to das, six runs, ladies and gentlemen, introducing debabrata, down the track and swings clean, what a shot, whistles towards the sight-screen for a biggie, shane is a bit stunned, eden is abuzz, that's as smooth a straight hit as you will see tonight.
pathan to ganguly, 1 run, quicker one outside off, tries to angle past third man but it's a fine bit of fielding by munaf, keeps them to a single
pathan to das, 1 run, crisply smashed to midwicket but only a single, he's hitting them clean here
trivedi to ganguly, 1 run, slower one again, trivedi is a slower bowler, guys, let's face it, glided away to third man
sohail tanvir to shukla, 1 run, played towards point once again
sohail tanvir to umar gul, no run, round the wicket and the most tantalising slower ball of the night, 99kph and gul has no clue of when that's going to reach him, loops to the keeper

sharma to asnodkar, four runs, that's romesh kaluwitharana at his best, swapnil waits there and lashes that hard thorough the covers, not a man move, eden stunned, what a creamer that was, the goa canon is on his way

sharma to asnodkar, out, that's the breakthrough, swinging away from asnodkar and he's thrown his bat at it wildly, tries to smash it through the covers but only manages an outside edge to the keeper, important wicket for ishant, asnodkar can be dangerous
dinda to smith, no run, left alone outside off
dinda to smith, 1 run, glided away to third man for a single
sharma to smith, four runs, that's a fine shot, slightly outside off and smith uses the pace of the ball to glide it expertly behind point for four, that's class
sharma to smith, 1 run, another risky run and hafeez misses a direct hit, turned to square leg and they take off but that was too reckless, a direct hit there and smith was gone
sharma to smith, no run, tries to glide one past point again but can't beat the field
sharma to smith, 1 run, tip and run there, these two batsmen seem to have a good understanding
agarkar to smith, four runs, spanked that one, moved away outside off and ripped that through point for four, raced away, that's beefy
agarkar to smith, 1 run, sensible stuff here, a tap and a run that follows a four, experience coming into play here
agarkar to sohail tanvir, four runs, that's languid, stands and smashes one matter-of-factly through mid-on for four, that's as calm as it gets, what a shot
umar gul to smith, no run, cracked to point but that's well fielded by hussey
agarkar to kaif, 1 run, pushed through cover, finds the gap and takes a single
agarkar to watson, 1 run, runs another one down to third man, easily done, he's getting into his groove here
agarkar to kaif, no run, tapped to point, some tight bowling here but kolkata need wickets, if these two batsmen get set, expect the runs to flow, and there's yusuf and jadeja to come later
agarkar to watson, no run, punches to cover, not taking any risk here, but watson can suddenly explode and nobody will know what's hit them, he's been the player of the tournament so far
agarkar to watson, four runs, smashed away through midwicket, not neatly timed but that's racing away to the fence for four, what a shot
ganguly to kaif, 1 run, kaif stays in his crease and drives the ball behind point to third man
ganguly to watson, four runs, deft touch, watson stays in his crease, waits for the ball to angle into him and opens the face at the very last moment to play the ball fine towards third man
umar gul to pathan, four runs, fortune favours yusuf, he tries to loft it over midwicket but an inside edge runs away past the keeper for four, streaky but that will work
ganguly to kaif, no run, 112kph, in the corridor outside off, driven to cover, can't find the gap
ganguly to kaif, 1 run, turned away from outside off to midwicket, they think of two but 'no' is the loud call, yusuf is a hare between the stumps too

dinda to kaif, 1 run, what a chance! driven to cover and yusuf has backed up too far, he is mid-way down the pitch and kaif needs to go for it, the fielder at cover misses the direct hit, he could have lobbed it back to the bowler and yusuf might have still been out, things not going kolkata's way at the moment
dinda to kaif, 1 run, 130kph, driven to cover, diving stop that keeps them down
shukla to pathan, 2 runs, turned behind square and they rush back for a couple, that was a dangerous second but the throw is awry and yusuf gets there without much of a problem
shukla to pathan, 1 run, he's tired after all those twos, drives half-heartedly to midwicket for a single

shukla to kaif, 1 leg bye, another missed chance, kolkata aren't fielding anywhere near their best here, tapped to point and butt misses another direct hit, kaif would have been out of the crease again, these two batsmen are being reckless with their running and kolkata are not capitalising
sharma to kaif, no run, tapped to point

sharma to kaif, 2 runs, rocks back and pushes through covers, and they've scampered two again, how can kolkata allow that, the fielder is slow and the throw isn't too straight, kaif is speeding as if it's his last game, rajasthan are taking the mickey out of kolkata here, eden has been silenced

umar gul to pathan, six runs, what a way to finish! yusuf has done it in style, chips it way over square leg for a big six, he's turned this match around in a trice and stands at the non-striker's end and flexes his muscles at his team-mates. they've plucked the chestnuts out of the fire here. in the semi-finals for sure now, rajasthan. and they truly deserve to be the first team to do so.
pollock to marsh, no run, shaun v shaun.... pollock has his say early on as he slants it across the left hander and marsh lets it go
pollock to marsh, 1 run, gives him the same amount of width and he angles it just wide of point to get the innings off the mark
pollock to pomersbach, no run, slants it across the left hander this time and pomersbach wisely chooses to let it go

pollock to pomersbach, 2 runs, tries to break the shackles by dancing down the track but he mistimes the loft, the ball swirls in the air for a long time and fernando isn't quick enough to run back from mid-off and take it
nehra to pomersbach, no run, gets this one to nip back in only slightly, he gets behind the line and defends
nehra to pomersbach, no run, can't beat mid-off again i'm afraid, this time he takes a couple of paces down the track and slams it straight to the fielder who's a bit deep
pollock to marsh, no run, false stroke, he sees the ball angling across him and has a waft at it without moving his feet
pollock to marsh, no run, adjusts the line and brings it closer to the left hander this time, he defends and angles it square of the wicket
pollock to pomersbach, no run, lovely delivery, the slower one, he taps it back to the bowler
nehra to marsh, 1 run, gives him a bit of width outside off and he deftly angles it down to third man
nehra to pomersbach, no run, swing and a miss, the ball stops a bit after pitching and his swing across the line meets thin air, that wasn't too far from the stumps either
pollock to marsh, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and angles it wide of point

pollock to marsh, 2 runs, excellent running! he tucks it softly towards midwicket and sets off quickly, two fielders converge but they're a bit lazy in getting to it and the batsmen seize the chance to take another run
yeligati to marsh, no run, gives it plenty of air outside leg and marsh this time fails to whip it away wide of midwicket
chitnis to marsh, 2 runs, steps down and whips it wide of square leg, nayar loses his shoe as he bends to pick it up
chitnis to marsh, 2 runs, steps down and tucks it wide of midwicket
chitnis to marsh, no run, pitches on middle and off, he chooses to defend this time, that's rare
smith to marsh, no run, gives him just a bit of width and he shifts to the backfoot and angles it towards point
smith to pomersbach, 1 run, mows this one across the line and places it just wide of mid-on
fernando to pomersbach, 1 run, slower ball, he places it towards mid-on
fernando to marsh, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and angles it down to third man
fernando to marsh, no run,
smith to marsh, no run, bowls round the wicket, he makes a bit of room and chops it towards point
smith to marsh, 1 run, gets a bit of width this time and he opens the faced of the bat and angles it down to third man
smith to marsh, 1 wide, loses his direction and sprays it wide outside off, he decides against chasing it
smith to marsh, no run, slightly wide outside off this time and he shoulders arms
yeligati to marsh, no run, lands the ball on off and middle this time, he chops it to the infield on the offside
yeligati to pomersbach, 1 leg bye,
yeligati to marsh, 1 run, fires that flat outside the legstump and for the umpteenth time today it's pushed to the deep on the on side
yeligati to pomersbach, 1 run,
chitnis to marsh, 1 run, tossed on offstump, pushed wide of point
chitnis to pomersbach, 1 run, tossed on the legs, he whips it wide of midwicket
fernando to yuvraj singh, no run, good comeback by fernando as he fires in a slower ball outside the offstump, yuvraj leans onto the stroke too early and he misses
fernando to pomersbach, no run, good stuff by fernando as he bowls another slower one on seeing him advance down the track, he swings and misses
fernando to pomersbach, no run, ditto! fernando foxes him with another slower one, he tries to hoick him across the line but misses again, that's a super over
chitnis to pomersbach, 5 wides, slides it really wide down the legside, it was so wide that pomersbach couldn't get bat on it, it beats the keeper as well
fernando to pomersbach, 1 run, he finally manages to get some wood on it this time but it's a leading edge which falls safe from long-off

fernando to jayawardene, out, jayawardene gets foxed by the slower delivery as he tries to loft him downtown, he releases the handle as he makes contact with the ball and fernando himself takes the skier
fernando to pomersbach, four runs, cheeky! fernando fires this one outside the offstump, he makes room and deftly glides it wide the keeper who dives in vain to his left
yeligati to pathan, 1 run, almost a run-out! he taps it towards chitnis at cover and sets off, yeligati whips off the bails but pommy's back home
yeligati to pathan, no run, well bowled, he walks across his stumps and nearly falls over after shuffling a bit too much
yeligati to pathan, 1 run, fires this one wide outside off, he reaches out and taps it towards mid-off
yeligati to pomersbach, four runs, good finish to the over for punjab, he steps down the track and punishes a flat delivery past the bowler and long-off
nehra to pathan, 2 wides, bad start, he fails to control the movement and slides this one wide down the legside
sreesanth to jayasuriya, 1 wide, very inauspicious start for sreesanth as he sprays wide down the legside, kaul does well to stop it
sreesanth to jayasuriya, 5 wides, it gets worse! sreesanth struggles to control the movement and sprays it so wide down the legside that kaul has no chance of stopping it
sreesanth to jayasuriya, no run, beats him, this time he bowls it slightly wide outside off and jayasuriya flashes at it without moving his feet, that's the first legitimate ball of the innings
sreesanth to jayasuriya, no run, gets just a bit of late inward movement, he tries to whip it away wide of mid-on but mistimes it
pathan to tendulkar, 2 wides, now pathan struggles with extras as he slides this wide down the legside, kaul fails to gather it properly and the ball lobs off his glove and rolls away
sreesanth to smith, no run, good finish to the over, smith gets across and defends it solidly back to the bowler
singh to tendulkar, no run, tries to steer this one past the packed offside field but marsh's sliding save at point limits it to a dot ball
singh to tendulkar, four runs, he errs by drifting towards the body, tendulkar waits for it and glances it late well past the keeper and fine leg
singh to tendulkar, no run, knocks the stumps down on the delivery stride, he tucks it to the on side
chawla to smith, no run, leans onto the drive a little early and he only pushes it back to the bowler
hopes to smith, no run, beats him this time, hopes gets the ball to nip back in just a little and that squares up smith who attempts a glide to third man i guess
chawla to tendulkar, no run, drives away from his body and the bottom edge nearly trickles onto the stumps
hopes to tendulkar, 1 run, grants him a bit of width outside the offstump, he reaches out and dabs it down to third man
pathan to tendulkar, no run, takes a couple of paces down the track and softly places it towards cover
chawla to tendulkar, no run, shoulders arms to one that straightens after pitching
yuvraj singh to uthappa, 1 run, he charges down the track and just checks his stroke, the ball lobs to the vacant areas near square leg
yuvraj singh to tendulkar, 1 leg bye, waits for it at the crease and taps it towards point
pathan to tendulkar, 1 run, steps down the track to disturb the bowler's rhythm, he punches it to mid-off
yuvraj singh to uthappa, 1 leg bye, glided to fine leg
sreesanth to shah, 2 runs, steps down the track and plays a chipped shot just wide of jayawardene at midwicket
singh to nehra, 1 bye, makes room and misses, they steal a bye

singh to yeligati, 2 runs, makes room and chops it down towards the bowler, they go for the run and vrv makes an unnecessary attempt at the non strikers end, the throw is backed up at mid-on and they take a second run
gony to kohli, 1 run, nudged towards the leg side for a single towards square leg
gony to goswami, 1 run, goswami drops the ball with soft hands towards cover and calls his under-19 captain through for  a single

ntini to kohli, four runs, ntini angles the ball sharply into off stump from wide of the crease, kohli waits for the ball and opens the face late to guide the ball towards third man, gony dives on the boundary but he can't stop it
ntini to goswami, 1 run, goswami backs away towards leg and mis-hits the attempted loft towards wide mid-on
gony to kohli, 1 run, kohli tries to loft over midwicket but mis-times the ball towards square leg
muralitharan to dravid, 1 run, pushed towards the leg side for a single
muralitharan to misbah-ul-haq, 2 runs, played towards deep midwicket for two more to end the over
muralitharan to boucher, no run,
morkel to boucher, four runs, shot! boucher leans across and flicks an over-pitched delivery between mid-on and midwicket for four
balaji to dravid, 1 run, chipped in the air towards long-off for a single
balaji to kumar, four runs, another slower ball but this time praveen spots it early, he waits for the ball and lofts it straight back over the bowler's head for four
balaji to kumar, six runs, that's the first six! praveen backs away to create room to free his arms and swings his bat hard to smash the ball flat over the extra cover boundary
morkel to kumar, no run, praven plays the ball towards midwicket and doesn't take the single
steyn to patel, four runs, super shot! steyn bowls the slower ball on leg and middle, parthiv makes room by moving towards leg and drives the ball firmly past mid-off for four more
vinay kumar to fleming, no run, defended back to the bowler

kumble to patel, out, caught! with a lot of luck! i've never seen one like this before! parthiv stepped out of his crease and drove the ball hard straight back at kumble who failed to hold on at the first attempt, the ball bounced out of his hands and hit the non-striker fleming on the shoulder and popped up for kumble to take the catch off the rebound, it might have hit fleming's shoulder and his hand actually
kumble to dhoni, no run, dhoni takes a few steps out of his crease and blocks
akhil to raina, no run, raina stays in his crease and pushes the ball through midwicket
kallis to raina, 1 run, driven uppishly towards the off side for a single
steyn to balaji, 1 wide, that is extremely wide outside off stump, balaji was moving outside off to hit the ball through leg but steyn sprayed it even wider
sreesanth to gilchrist, four runs, sree goes wide outside the off stump as gilchrist has a wide slash at it and gets off the mark with an outside edge to third man for a boundary
sreesanth to gilchrist, 1 run, this time around he gets it back closer to the body as gilchrist taps it to cover and sets off for a single
singh to gibbs, 1 run, wide outside the off stump, gibbs goes for the drive but manages a bottom edge onto it as it dies down on the way to keeper
singh to gilchrist, no run, outside the off stump, gilchrist looks to steer it away but gets a bottom edge to point. gilchrist isn't timing them well today
sreesanth to gibbs, 1 run, on the leg stump, gibbs pushes it to midwicket for a single
sreesanth to gilchrist, no run, goes wide outside the off stump as gilchrist reaches for it and barely manages to push it to point`
sreesanth to gilchrist, 1 run, on the leg stump, gilchrist flicks it to midwicket for a single
powar to gilchrist, 1 run, outside the off stump, gilchrist plays with soft hands to extra cover for a single
powar to gibbs, 1 wide, wide down the leg side as gibbs looks to glance it and misses the line

powar to gibbs, six runs, on the off stump as gibbs watches it out of the hand and comes down the track and lofts it over deep midwicket for the first six of the innings. a citi moment of success as the commentators on the tv would say
powar to gibbs, 1 run, on the middle stump, gibbs pushes it on the off side for a single
powar to gilchrist, 1 run, outside the off stump as gilchrist pushes it to cover for a single
chawla to gibbs, no run,
gagandeep singh to sharma, no run, on the middle stump. rohit pushes it to mid on
powar to sharma, no run, on the leg stump, rohit pushes it to midwicket
powar to sharma, 1 run, on the middle stump as rohit turns it to square leg for a single
powar to sharma, no run, on the middle stump as rohit pushes it back to the bowler
yuvraj singh to sharma, 2 runs, on the leg stump, rohit turns it away to fine leg for a couple

yuvraj singh to sharma, six runs, dropped! outside the off stump. rohit comes down the track and lofts it to long offf where vrv fails to pick the catch and allows the ball to cross the ropes. now how costly will this lapse prove
powar to gilchrist, 1 run, on the leg stump as gilchrist turns it away to midwicket to bring up his half-century. responsible batting this by gilchrist
powar to sharma, no run, on the middle stump as rohit pushes it back to the bowler
powar to venugopal rao, no run, on the off stump, venu pushes it back to the bowler and it caps a good day at bowling for powar
chawla to sharma, 1 run, on the leg stump, rohit turns it away to midwicket for a single
gagandeep singh to sharma, six runs, on the off stump, rohit gets behind the line and under the delivery as he lofts it to deep midwicket for another six
singh to silva, four runs, on the leg stump first up as silva lofts it over midwicket for a boundary
singh to silva, 2 runs, on the leg stump again as silva turns it to deep square leg for a couple
sreesanth to silva, four runs, slower delivery on the off stump as silva picks it and swings it between long leg  and deep midwicket for a boundary
sreesanth to silva, 2 runs, on the leg stump and slower in pace again as silva turns it on the leg side for a couple
singh to marsh, 1 run, jabbed to the off side and they're off, scamper through for a single
venugopal rao to sangakkara, no run, on the leg stump as sangakkara turns it away to midwicket
vijaykumar to sangakkara, no run, on the middle stump, sangakkara pushes it to midwicket
vijaykumar to sangakkara, four runs, on the off stump and sangakkara notices the lack of pace on it as he lofts it over long off for a boundary
vijaykumar to sangakkara, no run, on the off stump, sangakkara pushes the ball back to the bowler, who threatens to throw the stumps down. frustration is vented there by the bowler
styris to sangakkara, 1 run, on the leg stump, pushes it to midwicket for a six
styris to marsh, 1 run,
singh to marsh, 1 run, on the leg stump, marsh turns it away to long leg for a single
styris to sangakkara, 1 run, on the leg stump, sangakkara turns it to deep midwicket for a single
sharma to marsh, 1 run, pitches on the leg stump, duly swept by marsh to deep backward square leg for a single
venugopal rao to yuvraj singh, 1 run, on the leg stump, yuvraj slaps it to deep square leg for a single
sharma to marsh, no run, on the off stump, marsh drives it back to the bowler
sharma to yuvraj singh, 1 run,
sharma to marsh, 1 run, on the off stump, marsh drives it to deep extra cover to bring up the hundred on the board
ojha to yuvraj singh, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
ojha to yuvraj singh, 1 wide, wide down the leg side again
ojha to yuvraj singh, no run, on the leg stump, yuvraj flicks it to midwicket and does not take a run
sharma to yuvraj singh, 1 run, on the off stump, yuvraj pushes it to long off for a single
sharma to yuvraj singh, 1 run, on the off stump, yuvraj drives it to long off for a single
ojha to marsh, 1 run, on the leg stump, turns it away to fine leg for a single
ojha to pomersbach, 1 run, on the leg stump, guides it to fine leg for a single
sharma to pomersbach, 1 run, outside the off stump, pomerrsbach drives it to long off for a single
sharma to marsh, 1 run, outside the off stump, marsh lofts it to long off to pick up a single
ojha to pomersbach, 1 run,
ojha to marsh, six runs, cheer girls are at work as marsh gets under the delivery and lofts it over cow corner for a huge six
ojha to pomersbach, 1 run, on the leg stump and pomersbach turns it to midwicket for a single
ojha to jayawardene, 1 wide, wide down the leg side this time around
singh to chawla, 1 wide, starts off with a wide down the leg side in this fresh spell
singh to jayawardene, 1 run, on the leg stump, jayawardene pushes it to deep midwicket for a single

styris to chawla, no run, outside the off stump, chawla has a swing and misses, gilchrist whips the bails off in a flash as it is reffered and green light is flashed and rightly so as chawla had his feet back in
styris to jayawardene, 1 run, on the leg stump, jayawardene pushes it to midwicket for a single
mcgrath to tendulkar, four runs, gets plenty of away swing this time, he reaches out and carves it well wide of first slip and the ball races away quickly to third man, the fielder dives in vain
geeves to jayasuriya, 1 run, gets it to angle across the left hander, he angles it down to third man to take a single
geeves to tendulkar, 1 run, gets it to move away from the right hander this time, he drives well away from his body and angles it to third man
geeves to jayasuriya, no run,
mcgrath to tendulkar, no run, gets the line closer to the right hander, he pushes it back to the bowler
geeves to tendulkar, 1 run, pitches outside off this time and he dabs it wide of backward point
maharoof to tendulkar, no run, he opens the face of the bat slightly and shapes it to punch it through the offside, cover picks it up
mahesh to jayasuriya, no run, he shuffles his backfoot before the delivery to disturb the bowler's rhythm, well yomahes keeps him quiet as jayasuriya places it to point
maharoof to tendulkar, 2 wides, stumping chance! he slides wide down the legstump and tendulkar trods out of his crease as he tries to flick it, karthik fumbles and lets it slip through
maharoof to jayasuriya, 1 wide, fails to control the movement and slides it wide down the legside

mahesh to tendulkar, out, timber! yomahesh pitches it on middle and gets it to nip back in, tendulkar tries to flick it to the on side but the ball skids through a lot quicker than expected and pushes his legstump back
mahesh to jayasuriya, 1 run, gets it to slant across the left hander and still manages to tuck him for room , he drives wide of mid-off for a single
maharoof to smith, no run, moves across just a touch and turns it to midwicket, he thinks of a run but jayasuriya sends him back
maharoof to smith, no run,
maharoof to smith, 1 run, picks the slower ball and pushes it down towards mid-off
maharoof to jayasuriya, 1 wide,
maharoof to jayasuriya, 1 wide, slides down the legside and karthik who's upto the stumps picks it up
maharoof to jayasuriya, 1 run, slides down the legside again and karthik picks it up and whips off the bails
maharoof to smith, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and deliberately glides it wide of the keeper, smith wants the second run but jayasuriya sends him back
mishra to jayasuriya, no run, just opens the face of the bat and steers it to point
mishra to smith, no run, pushed to the covers

mahesh to uthappa, no run, he teases him with another slower one which beats him outside the offstump, uthappa hasn't been in the best of form of late and he's been very tentative off the three balls he's faced today
mishra to uthappa, 1 run, dangerous ploy by uthappa as he stays back to a flipper, yet he manages to punch it past the bowler, had he missed that would have crashed onto the stumps
mishra to nayar, no run, pushed back to the bowler
geeves to pollock, no run, angles it down to backward point
geeves to pollock, no run, driven to mid-off
geeves to pollock, 1 run,

geeves to uthappa, four runs, good stuff from uthappa! geeves slants it away from the right hander and he opens the face of the bat, picks his spot and deliberately glides it wide of third man, no slip in place as well
mishra to uthappa, 1 run, charges down the track and lofts it with intent doen to long-off, the fielder takes it just before the rope
mishra to pollock, no run,
mishra to pollock, 1 run,
mcgrath to pollock, no run, makes room to slice it wide of gully but he misses
mcgrath to pollock, 1 leg bye, angles it towards his body this time and he tucks it behind square on the on side
maharoof to pollock, 1 run, stays back at the crease but he gets a slower delivery and he pushes that wide of point

mahesh to uthappa, 1 run, out, dropped: he makes room and tries to club this one over midwicket, sehwag drops a sitter at midwicket and that allows a single, nel dashes out for a second run but uthappa isn't interested

pollock to gambhir, 1 run, circumspect start already for delhi, gambhir pushes it towards cover and sets off, sehwag sends him back and uthappa's throw just misses the stumps, had he hit gambhir would have gone, thay take a run of the overthrow
pollock to sehwag, no run, pitches on middle and comes on straight, he taps it back to the bowler
nehra to dhawan, four runs, grants him a bit of width outside off, he makes use of the pace and movement of the ball to dab it with control wide of slip and down to third man
nehra to dhawan, 1 run, pitches around the offstump, he plays with an angled bat and steers it doen to third man
pollock to dhawan, no run, bowls the slower ball, he pushes it back to the bowler
pollock to dhawan, no run, he shapes to cream this through the onside but doesn't quite pick the slower ball as he mistimes the drive to mid-on
pollock to dhawan, no run, and another dot, dhawan tries to pierce the offside field this time but he pushes it to mid-off
pollock to dhawan, no run, takes a couple of paces down the track but can't beat  pollock
pollock to dhawan, six runs, he wrecks a potential maiden over by shuffling across his stumps and whipping it high over deep fine leg, that landed a few rows back
nehra to gambhir, 1 run, on the middle stump, gambhir pushes it to mid on with soft hands for a single
nel to gambhir, six runs, gambhir goes one better this time as he lofts it away to third man boundary for a six as nel isn't amused
nel to gambhir, 1 run, on the leg stump, gambhir pushes it to square leg for a single
kulkarni to dhawan, no run, on the middle stump, dhawan drives it back to the bowler
nel to tiwary, 1 run, drifts towards his body and he tucks it behind square on the on side
kulkarni to tiwary, 1 run, grants him a bit of width outside off and he punches it uppishly past backward point and doen to third man
kulkarni to dhawan, no run, makes room and mistimes a punch down to cover
kulkarni to dhawan, 1 run, gets a leading edge to the offside and a fumble allows a single
smith to dhawan, 1 wide, sprays it really wide outside the offstump
smith to dhawan, 1 run, stays back at the crease and punches it with an open face down to third man
smith to tiwary, no run, shuffles across his stumps but fails to adjust to the ball which kicks up and beats the outside edge
jayasuriya to tiwary, four runs, bowls that too wide outside off, he makes room and then reaches out and glides it with control down to squarish third man
jayasuriya to tiwary, 1 run, stays back at the crease and he punches a ball that keeps a little low, uthappa could have taken the catch if he was more alert
jayasuriya to dhawan, 1 run,
smith to tiwary, no run, slides down the legside, he misses the glance
smith to dhawan, no run, pushed back to the bowler

smith to dilshan, out, that's two in two! pitches on offstump and holds its line, dilshan tries to force it wide of cover but plays outside the line of the ball, the ball skids through and the offstump is flattened
jayasuriya to karthik, 2 runs, steps down and mows it past midwicket, a  misfield by pollock allows an extra run, mumbai are a bit sloppy here
smith to karthik, 1 run, takes a few paces down and tucks it to square leg
smith to karthik, 2 runs, moves across his stumps and picks iy across the line and beats square leg
jayasuriya to tiwary, no run, chopped to point
pollock to tiwary, 1 run, varies his pace by bowling a slower ball, he tucks it across the line wide of midwicket
pollock to karthik, 2 leg byes, pollock too feels the pressure as he slides it wide down the legside and beats the keeper
nehra to maharoof, no run, maharoof makes room and takes a few paces down the track but the slower delivery beats him
nehra to maharoof, no run, backs away to mow it across the line, he misses
kulkarni to maharoof, no run, adjusts the line closer to the batsman, he makes room and mistimes it back to the bowler
kulkarni to maharoof, no run, makes room to biff it past the bowler but he misses it this time
jayasuriya to maharoof, 1 run,
jayasuriya to karthik, 1 run, pushed wide of point
nel to karthik, no run, beats him this time, there was width outside off but he missed the glance completely
nel to karthik, no run, makes room to slice through the offside, he misses
nehra to maharoof, 1 run, takes a couple of paces down the track and lofts it towards long-off
nehra to maharoof, no run, this is getting more tense here! he makes room to slice through the offside but he misses, good bowling by nehra

nehra to maharoof, four runs, everyone in the dugout rush onto the field! nehra keeps it on the stumps and maharoof takes the risk of backing away and slicing it hard square of the wicket on the offside, there was enough power on that to beat the fielder who tried to boot it away, had he intercepted it the batsmen would have taken two comfortably
ntini to asnodkar, 1 no ball, oversteps and delivers a wide down the leg side and we will have a free hit
ntini to asnodkar, no run, outside the off stump, asnodkar moves onto the backfoot and punches it to backward point
ntini to asnodkar, 1 run, outside the  off stump, asnodkar steers it to third man for a single
gony to asnodkar, 1 run, outside the off stump, pushes to midwicket for a single
gony to smith, 2 runs, on the legs, smith guides it to fine leg for a couple
gony to smith, 1 run, outside the off stump, smith plays the steer to third man at the last moment to retain the strike
morkel to smith, no run, outside the off stump, smith punches it to mid off but does not quite time it
morkel to asnodkar, four runs, on the leg stump, asnodkar flicks it away to fine leg for a boundary where balaji's diving effort is in vain
morkel to asnodkar, no run,
gony to smith, 2 runs, gony drifts onto the leg stump as smith turns it away to deep square leg for a couple
muralitharan to smith, 1 wide, starts off with a wide down the leg side
muralitharan to smith, four runs, on thye leg stump, smith comes down the track and lofts it to deep midwicket for a boundary. clean hitting by smith
muralitharan to smith, 1 run, on the leg stump, pushes it to midwicket for a single
muralitharan to asnodkar, 1 run, picks the doosra and pushes it to cover for a single
morkel to asnodkar, no run, outside the off stump, asnodkar lets it go to the keeper
raina to kamran akmal, 1 run, on the off stump, akmal pushes it to mid on for a single
raina to smith, 1 run, on the leg stump, smith turns it to fine leg for a single
raina to smith, 1 run, on the off stump, smith steers it to point for a single
raina to kamran akmal, six runs, good shot that as kamran lofts it away to long off for a six
muralitharan to smith, no run,
muralitharan to kamran akmal, no run,
muralitharan to kamran akmal, 1 run, ouitside the off stump, akmal steers it away to backward point for a single but smith is struggling to reach the delivery
