raina to smith, 1 run, outside the off stump as smith comes down the track and has an ugly swipe to deep midwicket for a single
raina to kamran akmal, 1 run,
ntini to pathan, no run, on the off stump, yusuf  pushes it back to the bowler
ntini to pathan, 1 run,
ntini to kamran akmal, six runs, now thats a cross court shot straight from tennis as akmal comes down the track and lofts it clean over long off for another six. he is looking good here now
muralitharan to pathan, 1 run, on the off stump, yusuf plays with soft hands to cover for a single
muralitharan to kamran akmal, no run, on the off stump, akmal drives it back to the bowler
muralitharan to kamran akmal, no run, on the leg stump, akmal guides it to square leg and sends back yusuf, who wants a single
muralitharan to kamran akmal, no run, on the leg stump, akmal pushes it to midwicket
morkel to kamran akmal, 1 run, pushes to long off for a single
morkel to kaif, 1 run, outside the off stump, kaif pushes it to point for a single
morkel to kohli, 1 run, on the off stump, pushes it to point for a single to bring up two hundred for the team
sohail tanvir to patel, no run, outside the off stump and swinging away. parthiv has a long look at it and lets it go the keeper
sohail tanvir to patel, four runs, drifts onto the leg stump this time as parthiv turns his wrists and fetches himself a boundary
sohail tanvir to patel, 1 wide, wide down the leg stump this time
sohail tanvir to patel, 1 run, outside the off stump, parthiv opens the face at the last moment to fetch himself a single
pathan to patel, 1 leg bye, on the leg stump, swept to fine leg for a single
pathan to fleming, no run, left alone outside the off stump
pathan to raina, 1 run, outside the off stump, raina pushes it to cover for a single
patel to raina, no run, on the off stump, raina defends it on the backfoot
patel to raina, 1 run, on the leg stump, raina pushes it to midwicket for a single
pathan to raina, four runs, on the off stump, raina comes down the track and lofts it away to midwicket for a boundary
pathan to patel, 1 run,
pathan to raina, no run, outside the off stump, defended on the backfoot by raina
pathan to raina, no run, outside the off stump, raina moves back a touch and drives it to mid off for a single
sohail tanvir to raina, four runs, outside the off stump and raina drives through the off side once again for a boundary. thats quite a shot by raina, who is looking dangerous
sohail tanvir to raina, no run, bounces him this time around as he is struck on the helmet and is alert enough to guard his wickets
pankaj singh to patel, four runs, not three times in a row parthiv seems to be saying as he drives it through covers for a boundary
warne to raina, 1 run, outside the off stump, raina pushes it to midwicket off the backfoot for a single
warne to patel, 1 run, quicker one outside the off stump as parthiv looks to pulkl but does not time it and they get a single
pankaj singh to patel, 1 run, outside the off stump, parthiv steers it to third man for a single
pankaj singh to raina, 1 wide, wide outside the off stump
warne to patel, 1 run, on the leg stump[, parthiv drives it to long off for a single
warne to raina, out, king warne does it again as induces raina to play a false stroke and the ball lobs up to deep midwicket, where kaif running in takes the catch
salunkhe to patel, (no ball) 1 run, oversteps and pitches it outside off, parthiv drives it to long off for a single
salunkhe to patel, 2 runs, on the leg stump, lofts it to deep midwicket for a couple
salunkhe to patel, four runs, on the off stump, parthiv finally hits it to the area where he was aiming for and gets a boundary for himself
salunkhe to patel, 1 bye, outside the off stump, patel swings and misses and gets a bye
warne to patel, 1 run, on the leg stump, patel turns it to midwicket for a single
warne to morkel, 1 wide, wide outside the off stump
pathan to morkel, 1 run, outside the off stump, albie drives it to long off for a single
warne to patel, 1 run, outside the off stump, parthiv chips it on the off side just eluding mid off
warne to morkel, 1 run, on the leg stump, morkel pushes it to midwicket for a single
warne to patel, out, warne does it again as he slips in a faster delivery. parthiv who is down the track is foxed and akmal does the rest
sohail tanvir to morkel, no run, outside the off stump and slower in pace as albie is foxed
sohail tanvir to gony, no run, swings it in from outside off as gony swings and misses
vijaykumar to jaffer, no run, just a little wide outside off and it holds its line before reaching gilchrist, not much bounce so far
vijaykumar to chipli, no run, this one kicks up a little on him, he shapes to defend but gets an inside edge
singh to chipli, 1 run, this one too shoots up fairly quickly and squares him up with the indipper, he adjusts by opening the face of the bat and dabbing it to third man
vijaykumar to jaffer, four runs, takes a couple of paces down the track and lofts this elegantly through the line over the bowler, superb timing there
singh to jaffer, no run, pitches outside off and straightens, he pushes it softly to the offside
singh to kohli, 1 wide, strays a little too wide outside off and the away movement doesn't help rp's cause
styris to kohli, 1 wide, slides wide down leg and gilchrist collects it qiuckly and whips off the bails, he's upto the stumps
styris to kohli, 1 run, tries to work it through the on side but just checks his stroke as he chips it uppishly past midwicket
styris to jaffer, no run, pitches on off and straightens, he defends back to the bowler
styris to jaffer, 1 run, pitches on off and middle, he tucks it wide of square leg
styris to kohli, 1 run, pitches outside off, he pushes it to the offside
styris to jaffer, no run, gets across and tucks this one to midwicket, quiet over so far
ojha to kohli, 1 run, pitches outside off, not much turn, he punches it to cover
ojha to jaffer, 1 run, rocks back at the crease and tucks this one firmly down to affridi at deep midwicket
ojha to kohli, no run, gets back and pushes this one to the offside
ojha to kohli, 2 runs, pushes it down to the vacant midwicket region, ojha runs across, slides and intercepts it but just fumbles and that allows a second run
bangar to jaffer, 1 run, pitches on off and middle and straightens, he punches it wide of point
bangar to kohli, 1 run, pitches just a touch wide outside off and he places it down to third man
shahid afridi to kohli, 1 run, gets back at the crease and takes a quick single down to backward point
ojha to jaffer, 1 run,
singh to misbah-ul-haq, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and gently bads it down to third man
singh to dravid, 1 run, he opens the facer of the bat and steers it along the turf this time and places it to third man
singh to misbah-ul-haq, no run, gives him a bit of width outside off, he punches it to point
ojha to boucher, 1 run, stays back and punches to the on side
ojha to dravid, 1 leg bye,
ojha to boucher, 1 run,
styris to dravid, 1 run, comes on straight, dravid tries to whip it across the line but gets a thin inside edge and the ball rolls to the offside
styris to boucher, 1 run, pitches outside off and he steers it down to third man
shahid afridi to dravid, no run, fires in another quicker one outside off, he misses and gilchrist whips off the bails

shahid afridi to dravid, no run, this was a medium pacer almost, beats dravid as he tries to club this over midwicket and gilchrist whips off the bails again, the third umpire has a look and confirms that dravid's backfoot was back at the crease
shahid afridi to dravid, 1 run, stays back and clubs it down to deep square leg
steyn to gilchrist, 1 wide, fires that wide outside off, 142 kph, this guy's fun to watch
steyn to laxman, no run, even faster, 146 kph, pitches outside off and seams away, laxman plays a nothing shot really
khan to laxman, 1 run, slides just a little wide outside off, he opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man
steyn to gilchrist, no run, first false shot by gilchrist as he checks the drive and taps it uppishly to mid-off, that was in the air for a while
steyn to gibbs, no run, deceives him with a slower ball, gibbs shoulders arms
steyn to gibbs, no run, pitches outside off and seams away, he shoulders arms again
steyn to gibbs, 1 run, pushed firmly through the line but some good commitment by kumble at mid-off limits that to a dot ball
kumar to sharma, no run, pitches outside off and seams away, rohit chases it and punches it off the meat of the bat to point
kumar to sharma, no run, drags the line closer to the offstump, he stays back, covers the line and defends
kumar to sharma, 1 run, shapes away after pitching and rohit helps himself to a single down to third man
kumar to laxman, 1 run, gets a bit of width outside off, he opens the face of the bat and dabs it to third man
kallis to sharma, no run, starts off with a slower one, he decides to stay back and tap it back to the bowler
kallis to sharma, 1 bye, this one shoots through low and squares up rohit and boucher who fumbles and they steal a bye
kumble to sharma, 1 run, lands on middle and leg, he stays back waits for the turn before clipping it behind square on the on side

kumar to sharma, no run, almost a run-out! rohit pushes it to steyn at mid-off and laxman is already off the blocks, he slips and struggles to make his ground but luckily for him a fumble by steyn allows his time to get back
kallis to laxman, 1 run, pitches outside off, he opens the face of the bat and angles it down to third man
kallis to sharma, 1 run, another easy single as he has all the time in the world to angle it down to third man
khan to laxman, no run, pitches outside off, he places it towards backward point
khan to laxman, no run, laxman searches for the single to bring up his fifty but he's squared up by the extra bounce, he wafts at it outside the offstump
steyn to sharma, no run, makes room to carve that over the on side but the pace beats him, the bounce too is too much for rohit's comfort
steyn to laxman, no run, steyn ends an excellent over by beating him outside off, he shapes to glide that down to third man but the pace beats him to it
kumar to styris, 1 run, keeps him quiet as laxman pushes a single down to long-off
khan to bangar, 1 run, bangar gets a snorter first up and he's in a tangle, he somehow gets a thick outside edge and the ball goes on the first bounce to third man
umar gul to marsh, no run, good comeback by gul as he just slants it across the left hander and beats him, marsh fishes outside the offstump
sharma to hopes, 5 wides, i spoke too soon! ishant loses his line and slides it so wide down the legside that even two wicketkeepers couldn't have stopped it
mendis to marsh, no run, this one comes in, marsh decides to defend it away
mendis to marsh, no run, the straighter one this time, marsh defends again
umar gul to sangakkara, no run, slants it across the left hander, he shoulders arms
umar gul to sangakkara, no run, taps it to mid-off
umar gul to sangakkara, 1 run, follows the movement outside the offstump and he carves it over point and down to third man, mendis mops it up
umar gul to marsh, no run, follows it up with the slower ball, marsh just opens the face of the bat and angles it down to cover

umar gul to marsh, 1 run, slices it hard towards backward point and hussey makes an athletic save, the batsmen scamper through for the run and chopra's throw nearly hits the stumps at the batsman's end
mendis to marsh, 1 run, no turn, he punches it wide of cover
mendis to sangakkara, no run, comes on straight, he punches it to mid-off
mendis to sangakkara, 1 run, pushes it to mid-on on the walk and sets off for a quick run
sharma to sangakkara, no run, charges down the track to launch it over the on side but he swings and misses, that wasnt far from the legstump
sharma to sangakkara, 1 wide,
sharma to sangakkara, 1 run, shuffles across his stumps and whips it towards midwicket
dinda to marsh, no run, tries to punch it wide of the covers but he ends up mistiming it to extra cover
dinda to marsh, no run, the slower ball, he checks his stroke and angles it gently towards point
hussey to sangakkara, 1 run, gives it plenty of air outside off, sangakkara fails to time his loft well but he just manages to clear mid-off, ganguly runs backwards but he can't get to it
hussey to marsh, no run, mows across the line early and mistimes it to the on side
hussey to sangakkara, 1 run,
shukla to marsh, 1 run, drives hard back to the bowler and he deflects it off his boot, the ball hits the non striker
shukla to sangakkara, 1 wide, just slides down the legside, he tries to glance but misses
hussey to marsh, 1 run, tucked away towards square leg
hussey to sangakkara, 1 run, gives the charge and pushes it down to the deep on the on side
hussey to marsh, 1 run,
hussey to sangakkara, 1 run, pushed to deep extra cover
hussey to marsh, no run, driven hard  back to the bowler
mendis to marsh, 1 run, steps down the track to smother the spin, he punches it to long-off
hussey to yuvraj singh, no run, plays a checked drive towards cover
mendis to yuvraj singh, four runs, makes room and carves it wide of third man
mendis to yuvraj singh, no run,
mendis to yuvraj singh, 1 run, gets a leading edge to cover
mendis to jayawardene, 1 run, turned to midwicket
mendis to yuvraj singh, no run, he shapes to punch but checks his stroke and the ball lobs towards cover
mendis to yuvraj singh, 1 run,
sharma to yuvraj singh, 1 run, makes room for himself and sort of mistimes the drive to long-off
umar gul to chawla, out, gul's hit the furniture again! chawla makes room to steer it wide of the keeper and down to third man, the ball removes the offstump and pegs the middle stump back
pathan to salman butt, 1 wide, opening ball blues there for pathan there as he fires one down the leg side and it is a wide
pathan to ganguly, no run, outside the off stump, ganguly moves across a touch and defends it on the backfoot. eventful over
sreesanth to salman butt, four runs, frustration there for sreesanth as everything goes according to the plan but for the thin edge that just eludes the diving keeper
sreesanth to salman butt, no run, sreesanth also troubling batsmen with swing as he squares up butt with an away moving delivery and induces the outside edge which does not carry to the slips
sreesanth to salman butt, 1 run, there we have a butt special as he allows the ball come onto the face and then angles it to third man for a single. a little more timing would have helped
pathan to salman butt, no run, taps it away towards point
pathan to salman butt, no run, makes room and advances down the track to club it past the bowler but he swings and misses
pathan to salman butt, 1 run, pitches outside off, he opens the face of the bat and angles it down to third man
powar to ganguly, no run, makes room to slice it through off, the ball straightens, he punches it to cover
powar to ganguly, no run,
powar to ganguly, no run, makes room and places it to cover
powar to ganguly, 1 wide, down the legside
sreesanth to salman butt, no run, the slower ball, he has a wild swing and misses it completely, the ball dips before reaching sanga
powar to ganguly, 1 run, pitches outside off, he punches with the turn to cover
powar to hussey, no run, steps down the track, checks his stroke and pushes it back to the bowler

singh to ganguly, no run, shuffles across his stumps and slices it hard along the turf, marsh makes an athletic save diving to his right and jayawardene is there to back him up, such professionalism in the fielding, awesome
singh to hussey, no run, gets the ball to angle into the right hander, hussey settles for a punch straight to point
singh to ganguly, 1 run, gets back at the crease and punches to the offside for a single
singh to shukla, 1 run, opens the face of the bat late and glides it down to third man
singh to ganguly, no run, tucks him up for room outside off, he rocks back at the crease and steers it to cover
singh to ganguly, 1 wide, he bowls the slower ball and slides just wide down the legside, vrv reckoned the ball brushed ganguly before reaching the keeper
chawla to ganguly, no run, beats him on the offdrive
singh to ganguly, 1 wide, the slower ball slides really wide down the legside
singh to ganguly, four runs, classic! vrv gives him just a bit of width outside off, he rocks back and caresses it wide of backward point, that's vintage ganguly
singh to saha, no run, lovely ball from vrv as he gets it to nip back sharply and slice him in half, the ball went past the daylight between bat and pad
singh to saha, no run, lands it outside off, he opens the face of the bat and steers it to marsh at point
hopes to ganguly, 1 run, pitched outside off, he steers it to point
chawla to saha, four runs, takes the attack to chawla by stepping down the track and whipping it against the turn over midwicket
chawla to ganguly, 1 run, this one comes on straight, he tucks it to the on side
chawla to ganguly, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and steers it to third man

hopes to umar gul, no run, stays back and punches it past the bowler, ganguly sets off, turns back, jayawardene's under arm flick just misses the stumps and a direct hit would have been curtains for ganguly
chawla to umar gul, no run, this one skids on him quick, he just manages to cover the line and fend it off, the ball nearly trickled on the stumps
sohail tanvir to jayasuriya, 1 wide, tanvir's given away a run by spraying it wide outside off stump, jayasuriya slashes but misses
watson to tendulkar, no run, that's a slower ball which keeps a little low outside off stump, tendulkar stays in his crease and defends, the ball hits the toe end of the bat
pankaj singh to tendulkar, no run, tendulkar sets off for the single after pushing the ball to mid-on but then decides against it, he called early enough and jayasuriya gets back well in time
trivedi to jayasuriya, no run, the ball keeps very low outside off and has no pace on it, jayasuriya swings too early and misses
warne to tendulkar, 1 run, bowled flatter through the air, tendulkar pushes the ball towards square leg
trivedi to tendulkar, 1 run, the slower ball at 105 kmh on off and middle stump, tendulkar waits for it and pushes towards midwicket
warne to nayar, 1 run, nayar tries to hit through the off side again but doesn't find the gap this time

warne to uthappa, out, uthappa's gone! he charges down the track far too early, warne sees him coming and rips the leg break wide outside off stump, uthappa swings wildly and helplessly but misses as the ball spins away from him, akmal collects the ball wide outside off and does well to break the stumps before uthappa regains his ground

sohail tanvir to smith, out, caught! tanvir picks up number four with a slower ball outside off stump, smith backs away to make room and lofts the ball straight to niraj patel on the long-off boundary, that's tanvir's 21st wicket in the tournament, he's three clear of sreesanth in second place

watson to takawale, six runs, takawale's hit the first six of the innings! takawale backs away to make room, waits for the slower ball and hits it with power over the long-off boundary, mid-off was in the circle
pollock to kamran akmal, 1 run, akmal ruins the prospect of  a maiden by inside-edging the ball towards fine leg
nehra to kamran akmal, no run, nehra gets the ball to swing into the right-hander's off stump, akmal drives hard and hits the ball towards cover point
pollock to kamran akmal, 1 run, akmal punches the ball towards jayasuriya at mid-off and sprints the single, a direct hit at the bowler's end and he would have been out
pollock to asnodkar, 1 run, asnodkar taps the ball towards midwicket and runs a very risky single, the fielder under-arms the throw at the bowler's end and had he hit it would have been close as well
nehra to asnodkar, 1 wide, nehra strays far down leg side this time, that's a wide
nehra to asnodkar, 1 run, asnodkar guides the ball down to third man to end the over
pollock to asnodkar, 1 wide, pollock strays down leg side this time and bowden signals wide after asnodkar misses the leg glance
fernando to asnodkar, 1 run, asnodkar gets an inside edge that rolls behind square for a single
fernando to kaif, 1 wide, bowled fast down leg side, that's another wide, mumbai have bowled a few of them today
raje to kaif, 1 run, played towards third man for a single
jayasuriya to kaif, no run, slower ball, kaif comes out of his crease and gets an inside edge on to the pad
jayasuriya to patel, 1 run, driven through cover for a single
smith to patel, 1 run, steered with an open face towards third man for a single
pollock to jadeja, 1 run, the slower ball at 111 kmh on middle and off, jadeja pushes the ball towards point and immediately calls for the single
fernando to patel, 1 wide, fernando's fired a wide down leg side, can you believe it, it's very far down leg side, unbelievable scenes
muralitharan to venugopal rao, 1 wide, he starts off with a wide down leg side
muralitharan to venugopal rao, 2 runs, rao opens the face to run the doosra towards third man for two runs
muralitharan to venugopal rao, 1 wide, murali fires another flat ball down leg side, that's the second wide, it's murali's 19th and he's tied with sreesanth for the most wides in the competition
muralitharan to styris, out, bowled him! styris takes a step down the track and tries to loft murali with the turn over the leg side, he misses and murali hits middle stump
muralitharan to venugopal rao, 1 run, swept down to long leg for a single to end the over

morkel to venugopal rao, 1 run, rao drops the ball with soft hands towards point, he sets off for the run but raina gets to the ball quickly, teja sends rao back and he has to hurry to beat raina's underarm throw, raina misses and concedes an over throw
morkel to ravi teja, 1 run, driven towards mid-off for a single
morkel to ravi teja, 1 wide, teja walks across his stumps and tries to play the leg glance but morkel strays down leg side, another wide

ntini to ravi teja, 2 wides, teja backs away towards leg and ntini follows him, he slips down leg side and patel dives to his left and makes a fine save, rao steals the bye and patel misses the run-out at the batsman's end
balaji to singh, 1 bye, rp charges and swings again, he misses this time and afridi runs the bye to parthiv

balaji to singh, out, morkel's taken a catch that scraped the sky before coming down, rp backed away to the leg side, balaji bowled a slower ball which followed him, rp swung hard and lofted the ball miles in the air, morkel ran in from the boundary towards midwicket, settled under the steepler and fell to his left as he completed the catch
singh to patel, no run, he tries to hit on the leg and gets an edge towards the off
vijaykumar to raina, 1 wide, that's a bit too wide outside off  from vijaykumar and he concedes an extra
singh to patel, 1 wide, rp strays down leg side once again, another wide
shahid afridi to patel, 1 run, swept down to long leg for one
shahid afridi to raina, 1 run, raina pushes the ball on the leg side and calls for the quick single

sarvesh kumar to raina, four runs, well he's hit this with tremendous power! raina backs away towards leg, makes room and smashes the ball with a flat ball over the bowler's head, it bounces once before racing over the boundary
shahid afridi to patel, 1 run, driven in the air but over afridi's head for a single
shahid afridi to raina, 1 wide, that's rather wide down leg side
shahid afridi to raina, 1 wide, another one down leg side, another wide
sarvesh kumar to patel, no run, parthiv charges down the track and swings wildly at the ball, he doesn't make contact
ojha to dhoni, 1 run, driven towards long-off this time for a single
ojha to dhoni, 1 wide, fired flat down leg side, wide called
ojha to dhoni, 1 wide, ojha bowls down leg side once again, two wides in a row now
ojha to dhoni, no run, dhoni steps down the track once again and flat-bats the ball towards the bowler, ojha bowled that flat and straight
shahid afridi to raina, no run, afridi appeals for lbw after raina misses the flick but it pitched outside leg
ojha to raina, 1 run, raina moves back, waits for ojha to angle the ball into him, and punches towards point for a single

ojha to raina, 2 runs, raina tries to hit through the leg side and mis-hits it to square leg, afridi runs in from the deep and his throw is poor, it's high over the stumps which allows raina to come back safely for the second

singh to morkel, 3 runs, morkel drives the ball square through point and he's placed it well, the fielder saves the boundary but the batsmen run three because the fielder has pushed the ball some distance away from him
mcgrath to smith, 1 wide, and this one is wide, mcgrath gets a bit too straight and the ball slants down leg side

mohammad asif to smith, 1 run, what a close call! smith pushes the ball towards cover and sets off for the quick single, as he's running his hamstring begins to give him trouble and he begins to hobble, he's struggling to make his ground as the direct hit comes in from cover at the bowler's end, smith barely grounds his bat as the ball hits the stumps, that was very very close, smith's safe but his hamstring is giving him trouble
mcgrath to asnodkar, 1 run, asnodkar pushes the ball towards the leg side and sprints the single
mcgrath to smith, no run, mcgrath finishes the over with a slower ball which beats smith who tries to run it towards third man
mahesh to asnodkar, no run, asnodkar moves back and defends back to the bowler
maharoof to watson, four runs, the slower ball outside off stump, watson picks it up early and uses his muscle to loft the ball back over the bowler's head for four
mishra to watson, 1 run, sehwag fires the throw into the keepers end after watson collects a single behidn square on the leg side
mishra to kaif, 1 wide, slides down leg side this time, it's bowden's cue to entertain the crowd
mahesh to watson, 1 wide, he overcompensates by bowling too wide outside off stump, watson slashes hard but misses
mishra to watson, no run, bowled flatter and quicker outside off stump, watson moves back and tries to run the ball to third man but misses
mishra to kaif, 1 run, kaif pushes the ball towards deep cover for a single
mishra to pathan, no run, defended on the off side, yusuf came down the track and played it to point

mishra to pathan, six runs, this time it's massive! yusuf gets down on one knee and carts mishra over the deep midwicket boundary, the only people close to catching that were the fans at deep midwicket
mcgrath to pathan, four runs, mcgrath bowls a slower ball on off stump, yusuf swings hard across the line and gets a top edge down to the third man boundary
sohail tanvir to gambhir, 2 wides, tanvir strays far down leg side and sends bowden into his energetic routine to signal a wide
sohail tanvir to gambhir, 1 run, played behind point for another single

sohail tanvir to gambhir, 1 leg bye, tanvir skids the ball back into gambhir from outside off stump, he gets hit on the top of the pad and the ball goes towards slips where a fumble allows the leg bye, maybe there was an inside edge
watson to gambhir, 1 wide, too far outside off, gambhir slashes but he was never going to get to that
sohail tanvir to gambhir, four runs, bit of width there, crashed through point for four, sweet timing on that occasion, rare bit of width from the man with the purple cap
watson to gambhir, no run, tries to walk down the track and swing to the leg side, another miss, he's going nowhere with these initial movements
patel to dhawan, no run, moving away again, thickish edge towards mid-off
patel to karthik, 1 run, karthik takes a step down the track and pushes the ball on the leg side
patel to dilshan, no run, now he slashes at a wide delivery outside off and misses
trivedi to karthik, 1 run, this time karthik moves into the line of the ball outside off and opens the face to play the ball to third man
warne to dilshan, four runs, quicker and flatter ball this time outside off stump, dilshan waits for it and slices the ball past backward point for four
warne to dilshan, no run, the big ripping legbreak which pitches around middle and spins a long way across dilshan who moves back and lets it go
trivedi to maharoof, 1 run, the slower ball from trivedi, maharoof pushes towards point for one
patel to mohammad asif, 1 run, played towards point once again, for a single this time
patel to mahesh, no run, defended once again back to the bowler
patel to mohammad asif, 1 run, asif gets an inside edge past the stumps for  single
muralitharan to hopes, no run, pushes him back and forces a watchful push to the on side, raina puts in a good save
muralitharan to hopes, 2 runs, swept away and another super effort, this time from albie morkel at fine leg, that was running away to the fence but he kept them down to a couple
muralitharan to hopes, no run, 88.3kph, turns from middle to leg, that's big spin already, drifts down leg but no wide called
ntini to marsh, 1 run, bit of movement, seaming away from leg to middle, marsh fends at it and a thickish edge runs away to third man, he ensured he took his bottom hand off in the last moment

ntini to hopes, out, that's gone, ntini strikes with a wide one, hopes slashes hard at a wide one but that's moving away from the right-hander, thick top-edge goes at an easy height to parthiv, they're cock-a-hoop, ntini would admit that was a poor ball but it's produced a wicket. chennai won't complain.

ntini to sangakkara, 3 runs, pushed to cover and they scamper through, murali lets rip a direct hit from wide of mid-off but it deflects away for a couple of over-throws, sangakkara was safely in when the throw came in

gony to sangakkara, out, that's another big one! sangakkara has walked there. angling away from the left-hander and only a half-hearted appeal from gony, nothing from parthiv behind the stumps but the batsman walks. is this his gilchrist moment? semi-final of a big tournament, he's edged to the keeper and walked. what a start for the super kings.
gony to yuvraj singh, 1 wide, down the leg side, he tries to turn that away but it's wide
gony to yuvraj singh, 2 runs, driven to mid-off and balaji mis-fields, allowing them a second run
ntini to marsh, 1 run, that might have been close, pushed to mid-off and they take murali on again, could have been close but marsh looked in control, murali misses anyway
gony to pathan, no run, 131kph, lets it go outside off, moving away from the left-hander but a bit too wide outside off
ntini to jayawardene, no run, delivering from wide of the crease, no angle into the batsman, too wide outside off, no wide given strangely
ntini to jayawardene, 1 run, wide of the stumps again, mahela drives away from the body and steers it to third man, that was an edgy shot
ntini to pathan, no run, firm drive but straight to the fielder again, four fielders very close in at point and cover, hardly a gap to find there
ntini to pathan, 1 run, pushed to mid-on, just 2 runs in the last 11 balls, pressure, pressure
gony to jayawardene, no run, pushed to cover, can't find the gap

morkel to mota, no run, another close one, almost one more run-out, pushed back to the bowler and mota thinks of a single (absolutely no chance for a run there), morkel throws it back but it misses the stumps, would have been gone if that had hit
morkel to mota, 1 run, bit of width, steered towards third man
muralitharan to mota, no run, doosra this time, mota is a handy domestic batsman in the lower order but wouldn't have faced anything so good, can't read that one
muralitharan to mota, 1 run, swept away to fine leg, man in place for the top edge
muralitharan to chawla, no run, sharp offbreak, pitched on middle and turns away, shoulders arms
muralitharan to chawla, no run, patted to gully but no run too, chennai giving nothing away
muralitharan to chawla, 2 runs, turned away towards square for a couple, lots of nervous energy around there
morkel to mota, 1 run, good bounce again, bending his back and hitting the deck, bit of width and it's steered to third man
balaji to mota, no run, on his toes and dropping the ball down towards the covers
muralitharan to chawla, no run, defended to the off side
muralitharan to powar, no run, turned away from outside off to the leg side, straight to the fielder
muralitharan to powar, no run, tapped to the off side
balaji to mota, no run, width on offer, he tries to flay that but misses, too far away from the body
balaji to mota, 1 run, tapped to deep point, confidently done, surprisingly they don't think of a taking a second, saying yes and no, before just scraping home, too easy a run this
balaji to powar, no run, too wide, powar tries to slash but can't get to it, that was there to be struck for four, the grimace suggests as much
muralitharan to powar, no run, he thinks of jumping down the track but that was flatter, checks his shot and plays it back
muralitharan to powar, 1 run, waits on that one, glided towards third man but can't beat the fielder in the infield
muralitharan to mota, no run, 85.3kph, straight too, defended back to the bowler, fine end to his spell here
morkel to mota, 1 run, angled into the batsman, pushed to the on side for a quick one
balaji to powar, no run, more bounce, he tries to carve that over the slips but can't make contact

balaji to sreesanth, no run, jumps down the track and misses, thinks of running a bye, parthiv rolls the ball to the stumps and that's really close, goes to the third umpire but he's just in, an inch in, what a reckless run he tried there. they have totally panicked today.
balaji to sreesanth, 1 bye, and another jump down the track, he misses the swat again, goes through to the keeper and they get a bye, parthiv misses the stumps this time
pathan to vidyut, four runs, cracked away meatily, takes a stride and carves that past backward point for four, well in control of that
sreesanth to vidyut, 1 run, 136.7kph, too straight and tucked behind square for a single, loud 'no' from parthiv as they consider a second
pathan to patel, 1 wide, too wide, more swing too, that was way too outside off, strangely sangakkara is clapping for that
pathan to raina, no run, more swing, prodigious this time, starts from off and moves alarmingly away, raina lets it go but pathan knows that it would have put some doubts into the batsman
powar to patel, 1 run, charges down the track and tries to belt that over midwicket, thick under-edge that dribbles to midwicket, fielder there mops up
powar to raina, no run, another slow one, outside leg, swept away but not much timing
pathan to patel, 1 run, 130.4kph, edgy drive that, tries to punch through the covers but a thick edge flies towards third man

singh to raina, no run, tucked away to square leg, they think of a single, mota gets the direct hit but parthiv is well back, no need to refer that to the third umpire (though he did), that's pretty shoddy umpiring, no way was that going to be out
singh to raina, no run, rocking back, tapped to cover, confidently done
singh to raina, 1 run, turned away to square leg, waited on that one and jumped to flick it away

singh to patel, no run, tapped to the off side and parthiv wants the single, raina says no but that was an easy run, parthiv even stands mid pitch and shouts at raina for declining that before getting back comfortably
singh to raina, 1 run, glided to third man for a single
hopes to patel, four runs, gets the extra width this time, slashes hard and that's carved towards backward point for four, powar can't get there from third man
hopes to patel, 1 run, driven to deep cover, easy single there
hopes to raina, 1 run, bit of bounce and jumps to steer it to third man, glum faces all around the fielding unit, what a stage to freeze
chawla to raina, 1 run, glided to third man, fine stop from marsh and keeps them down to one
chawla to patel, no run, pushed back hard to the bowler, was made to hurry on that
chawla to patel, 1 run, flicked to backward square leg
hopes to patel, no run, slashes outside off but done in by the extra bounce, through to the keeper
chawla to raina, no run, driven to extra cover, good stop from yuvraj, tries to get the direct hit in but that gets only the non-striker's bat
powar to patel, 1 run, swept away for a quick one
pathan to raina, 1 run, driven neatly through the covers
chawla to raina, 1 run, turned away to square leg for a single, they're closing in now

chawla to raina, four runs, superbly chipped past mid-off for a four and it's all over, chennai's players are all in the middle congratulating raina and parthiv, it's been a fantastic day for them and they've routed punjab, who came into this game as favourites. yuvraj is dejected but he will know that they brought it upon themselves.
sohail tanvir to patel, 1 wide, tanvir swings the ball down leg side this time, chennai are away with a wide
trivedi to patel, no run, patel charges down the track and smashes the ball to yusuf at mid-off who fields superbly and throws so quickly at the keepers end that parthiv hurries back into his crease
pathan to patel, 1 run, this time parthiv makes a bit off room and lofts the ball over the off side

pathan to patel, out, akmal's missed a stumping! but no he's caught it! parthiv charges down the pitch and yusuf fires in a flat and fast ball, parthiv decides to run the ball towards third man but gets an edge to akmal who fumbles the catch initially but then dives to his right to take the rebound, sharp effort, and i thought he had missed a stumping initially!
warne to raina, 2 runs, raina waits in his crease and guides the ball towards third man by opening the face, he's batting so fluently
warne to raina, no run, bowled flatter and straighter, that's the one that skids on to the batsman, raina defends back to the bowler
pathan to morkel, no run, morkel moves back and defends towards the bowler
warne to morkel, no run, warne bowls a flatter ball way down leg side, koertzen lets it go, very strange that
pathan to raina, 1 run, raina moves back and punches the flat ball towards wide mid-off for one, what a spell yusuf has bowled, 3 for 22 off four overs, he's kept rajasthan in this game
trivedi to dhoni, 1 run, dhoni pushes the ball towards cover for another single
watson to dhoni, 1 run, dhoni hits the slower ball back at the bowler, he hits the ball hard into the ground and watson leaps up to try and catch it, he gets his hand to it but can't save the single

ntini to asnodkar, 1 run, ntini angles the ball sharply into the right-hander from wide of the crease from over the wicket, asnodkar uses the angle into him to lean across and nudge the ball to square leg
gony to asnodkar, 1 run, asnodkar moves back and opens the face to play the ball late towards raina at backward point
ntini to nk patel, no run, patel backs away and slashes at a wide ball outside off, ntini is lucky to get away there for it was quite wide
gony to asnodkar, 1 run, glided away to third man, sensibly done
ntini to asnodkar, no run, 143.9kph, patted to the off side, they think of a quick one but decide against it
ntini to asnodkar, four runs, he's a pocket-dynamo asnodkar, backs off a bit, sees the width and lashed that over the cover field, that's classic kalu, audacious but effective, one-bounce four that
gony to asnodkar, 2 runs, steered his bat to third man, vidyut lets out a dive but they're back for two, dhoni isn't happy with that fielding effort, he didn't want more than a single there
gony to asnodkar, 1 run, steered to third man, sensibly done and retains strike

morkel to pathan, 1 run, 137.1kph, tapped to point and they think of one, direct hit misses but he might have been in, they think of running on the overthrow but another direct hit is missed, the ball is flying all over now
morkel to watson, 1 wide, fired down leg side this time, bowden signals wide

muralitharan to pathan, 2 runs, raina's dropped it! yusuf went after murali and tried to loft him over deep midwicket, he hit it extremely high between midwicket and mid-on, raina ran to his left from midwicket to try and get under the steepler, he fumbles the first attempt, barely manages to hold on on the second but as his hands hit the ground the ball falls out
muralitharan to pathan, 1 run, yusuf yorks himself as he charges murali and gets an inside edge on to the pad, they run a single to the off side
gony to pathan, no run, the slower ball this time, yusuf pushes the ball towards midwicket

muralitharan to watson, out, bowled him! watson comes down the track to murali but yorks himself by getting too close to the ball, the ball squeezes under the bat and hits leg stump, this is a huge wicket and murali's broken through the pair of rajasthan's most dangerous batsmen

muralitharan to kaif, out, caught! another twist! kaif steps out of his crease, murali bowls the flat doosra and kaif prods tamely at the ball, it hits the splice of the bat and goes straight to dhoni at cover, simple catch
morkel to sohail tanvir, 1 wide, morkel strays down leg side and that is a wide

balaji to sohail tanvir, 2 wides, what has he done! balaji has bowled a wide outside off stump, tanvir lets it go and parthiv fails to collect cleanly and the batsmen run, that's two runs without a legal delivery being bowled
vaas to ganguly, no run, and nearly edges it, he reaches out to a delivery outside off, the late movement saves him
vaas to ganguly, no run, nice movement off the seam again, this time he's surer of his off stump and shoulders arms
vaas to hodge, no run, comes back off the seam, close call as he just gets his bat behind the line
singh to pujara, no run, lands it outside off and the right-hander lets it go and gauges the away movement
singh to pujara, no run, lands it outside off and he gets behind the line and pats it away
singh to pujara, no run, steers it to the off side and tells his partner to wait
vaas to pujara, 4 leg byes, he's punished for bowling the wrong line, down the leg side and he easily glances it to the fine leg boundary
vaas to pujara, no run, tucks it to midwicket and tells his partner to wait
vaas to pujara, no run, close call! defends with soft hands and the ball spins backwards close to his stumps
vaas to pujara, no run, defends softly again and the ball rolls to mid-off
jaskaran singh to hodge, 1 wide, poor start for jaskaran, too wide outside off, more of a loosener
jaskaran singh to hodge, four runs, closer to the stumps but still too wide, gets beside the line and slashes it hard and along the turf past backward point
jaskaran singh to hodge, 1 run, much better, hodge knocks it down to midwicket for a single
singh to hodge, 1 wide, rp switches ends but sprays it very wide of the off stump,the batsman thinks of playing at it but misses
singh to hodge, 1 wide, too wide outside off again, he's not able to control the movement
singh to hodge, 1 run, drops it down to backward point and risks the single
singh to pujara, no run, angles it across the right-hander, safely left alone
singh to shah, no run, stays behind the line and defends to the off side
singh to shah, no run, nice angle across the right-hander and well left by shah
jaskaran singh to mathews, no run, bowls a jaffa outside the off stump, squares up a tentative mathews
jaskaran singh to mathews, 1 run, close call for mathews! he comes down the track and forces it to mid-on and risks suman's arm, the throw was just wide
singh to mathews, no run, chops it down to the off side
singh to mathews, no run, stays behind the line and defends with soft hands
ojha to shah, no run, stays back and defends with soft hands
ojha to shah, no run, comes down the track very early but checks his shot, defends
ojha to shah, no run, defends with soft hands
ojha to shah, no run, pushes it through quicker and he defends
symonds to shah, no run, on target and shah defends back to the bowler
symonds to mathews, 2 runs, tucks it to the deep on the on side and they push hard for the second run
symonds to mathews, no run, symonds flings himself to his right and intercepts a drive
symonds to mathews, 1 run, places it down to third man for a single
symonds to shah, 2 runs, tucks it to the deep and jaskaran has a bit of work to do, they complete the second run
ojha to mathews, no run, well bowled, stump to stump and mathews defends with a dead bat
ojha to mathews, no run, steers it to the off side, thinks of a single but then heads back
ojha to mathews, 1 run, pinches a single to the on side and rushes through
ojha to shah, 1 run, pushed square on the off side and the fielder does his best to dive
ojha to mathews, no run, tries to force it through but can't beat the bowler
symonds to shah, no run, chops it hard to the off side but he can't beat backward point
symonds to shah, no run, punches it straight to cover
symonds to mathews, 1 wide, drifts down the leg side and he half attempts to play it away
symonds to mathews, no run, pushes it back to the bowler, deccan still have them on a leash here
symonds to mathews, 1 wide, oops, loses his direction and slips it down the leg side
symonds to mathews, 2 runs, tucked behind square on the on side and a fumble allows a single
ojha to mathews, 1 run, turned to the on side
ojha to shah, no run, tries to pierce the gap at cover
ojha to shah, no run, takes a couple of paces down and checks his shot and punches it down to mid-off
symonds to mathews, 1 leg bye,
ojha to shah, 1 run, pushed to the off side and they think of a second run but change their minds
ojha to mathews, no run, chopped towards covers
ojha to mathews, four runs, poor delivery, there's no midwicket and there's a big gap in the deep, mathews goes back and slaps it
ojha to mathews, 1 run, gets beside the line and chops it towards cover
ojha to shah, 1 run,
vaas to shah, no run, shah moves a long way wide of the leg stump but can only drive straight to cover
vaas to shah, six runs, seemed like a top edge but that travelled, shah gets on his knee and carts that high over fine leg, he plays that shot well
vaas to shah, 1 run,
vaas to mathews, 1 run,
singh to mathews, 1 run, forced to the on side for a single

langeveldt to laxman, 1 run, laxman closes the face to play towards leg and gets a leading edge towards mid off. and look at ganguly! he covers good ground to his left, picks up and throws at the bowler's end, putting pressure on laxman
sharma to gilchrist, four runs, edged and four! gilchrist moves across and pokes at a delivery angling across him, this time the edge flies wide of the slips and runs to the third man boundary
sharma to laxman, 1 run, the slower ball this time and laxman tries to loft over midwicket, he mis-times it in the air but the ball lands safely, ishant has no luck today
sharma to gilchrist, 1 run, gilchrist tries to hit over square leg again but gets an inside edge behind square
sharma to gilchrist, no run, the slower ball at 119 kmh, gilchrist waits for it, waits for it, and dabs towards mid-off
kartik to gilchrist, no run, quicker ball and straight, gilchrist defends towards kartik
kartik to gilchrist, 1 run, jumps out of his crease and plays towards midwicket for a single
kartik to gilchrist, 1 run, pushed towards mid-off for a quick single
mathews to gilchrist, 1 run, steered towards third man for a single
mathews to gibbs, 1 no ball, he's over-stepped, gibbs defends on the off side, he won't be defending the free hit coming up
kartik to gibbs, no run, bowled quick and straight, gibbs defends towards the bowler
mathews to gilchrist, 1 wide, that's wide outside off stump, gilchrist can't reach it
mathews to gilchrist, 1 run, wide outside off stump, gilchrist reaches out but mis-times it to cover, hodge fumbles
mathews to gilchrist, 1 run, slower ball outside off, gilchrist waits and dabs towards third man
hodge to gilchrist, 1 run, driven towards long off for a single
hodge to gilchrist, 2 runs, played through square leg for two more

mathews to gilchrist, 1 run, slower ball and gilchrist tries to play his pick up shot over square leg, he ends up lofting it towards fine leg and the ball falls safely as three fielders converge on it

hodge to gilchrist, out, caught! gilchrist moves back and tries to clear the square leg boundary, he doesn't hit it cleanly and tiwary runs to his left and takes a smart catch on the move, is it too late for kolkata though?
hodge to symonds, no run, symonds advances and gets yorked
hodge to gibbs, no run, played to midwicket, symonds wanted one but gibbs didn't, the fielder picked up and threw the ball straight into the umpire!
langeveldt to symonds, 1 run, driven through point for a single
sharma to anirudh singh, 1 run, he's away by steering the ball towards third man for a single
shukla to anirudh singh, 1 run, hit to mid-on for a quick single
shukla to sharma, 1 run, played off the hips through square leg for one
mathews to anirudh singh, 1 run, hit in the air towards long off, bounces once before reaching the fielder
shukla to anirudh singh, no run, played back to the bowler and shukla fields well, that shy at the stumps at the striker's end was unnecessary though, kolkata don't want to risk overthrows
langeveldt to suman, no run, suman lets langeveldt know what he's up to by backing away too early, langeveldt delivers wide outside off, suman lets it go and looks expectantly at the umpire
langeveldt to suman, 1 run, he's driven it into the stumps at the bowler's end, else he would have got two for that shot
mascarenhas to jayasuriya, no run, straighter ling this time, jayasuriya gets an inside edge on the leg side
mascarenhas to jayasuriya, no run, very wide again and jayasuriya goes after it, this time he mis-times the shot to cover
mascarenhas to jayasuriya, 1 run, jayasuriya keeps the strike by pushing the ball to mid on and calling sachin for the single
tait to jayasuriya, 1 wide, 147 kmh but the ball is down leg side, jayasuriya lets it go
tait to tendulkar, four runs, and again, identical stroke, merely using tait's pace to send the ball steadily towards the square leg boundary
tait to tendulkar, 1 wide, tait overcompensates for his straight lines by bowling wide outside off
uniyal to tendulkar, 1 wide, starts off with a slower one but slips it wide down the leg side
uniyal to tendulkar, no run, yet another slower one, on the middle and leg line, turned to square-leg
tait to tare, no run, in the zone outside off stump, tries to run it down to third man but doesn't connect
tait to tare, 1 wide, pushes this one down the leg side. wide.
tait to tare, 1 wide, and sprays this wide outside off stump. that's the danger with tait.
uniyal to tendulkar, 1 run, as expected he bowls a slower one, tendulkar turns it past square-leg
uniyal to tare, 2 runs, from round the stumps, yet another slower one, on the middle and leg, turned down to fine-leg region
warne to rayudu, 1 leg bye, tries to flick it away but will collect a leg bye
warne to tiwary, 1 wide, pushes this one wide outside off stump
warne to tiwary, four runs, charges down the track to play a powerful drive past warney
mascarenhas to rayudu, 1 run, moves down the track and plays a nice lofted shot to left of long-off
mascarenhas to tiwary, 1 run, on the leg stump line, turned behind square-leg

mascarenhas to rayudu, four runs, what a shot rayudu garu! he fetches it from the off and middle and plays a imperious-looking swing across the line to square-leg boundary.. he just swatted it away in style
warne to tiwary, 1 run, stays back to force it to long-off
jhunjhunwala to rayudu, no run, skips down the track and dabs it to midwicket
jhunjhunwala to rayudu, 1 run, stays back, creates room to lift it over left of long-off .. nicely played
jhunjhunwala to tiwary, no run, quicker, straighter, driven down the track
pathan to rayudu, 1 run, moves down the track and taps it to right of midwicket
pathan to rayudu, six runs, thunderous wallop! rayudu, who used to play in icl, is shining brightly here. he thrashes this one over midwicket. good clean swing of the bat.
pathan to rayudu, 1 run, hits this down to long-off
pathan to tiwary, 2 runs, backs away to hit this one to left of long-off
uniyal to rayudu, 1 wide, from round the wicket, another slower one but wide outside off stump
uniyal to rayudu, out, tries to hit the slower one over midwicket boundary but finds the man at the deep ... fine entertaining knock from rayudu ends

tait to tiwary, out, naman ojha flies to his left to take a super catch. tiwary's fine innings ends. he backed away to try swing this delivery to the on side but edged it behind, ojha took off to pluck a smart one-handed catch

uniyal to harbhajan singh, out, slower one outside off, harbhajan can't connect but sathish calls him over for a single ... ojha underarms a direct hit and sathish dives to get back inside the crease. but hold on .....he grounds the bat  inside the crease but  then it lifts in the air when the ball hits the stumps. third umpire rules it out.
khan to ojha, no run, a lifting delivery, pacy and well-directed, ojha hops to tuck it to the on side
mclaren to smith, four runs, moves down the track for the lofted hit but gets a good thick inside edge to fine-leg boundary
malinga to smith, 1 run, starts off with a slower one, mistimes the drive to right of mid-on where shikhar stops and fires the throw at the non-striker's end
malinga to ojha, 1 run, the fifth slower one of the over - run down to third man for a single
murtaza to jhunjhunwala, no run, outside off stump, squeezed to backward point
murtaza to jhunjhunwala, no run, on the off stump line, pushed out to mid-off
murtaza to jhunjhunwala, 1 run, quicker one on the middle, tapped to the on side
murtaza to jhunjhunwala, six runs, top shot. thrilling. he sashayed down the track, stayed outside the line of the delivery and lifted it over wide long-off
murtaza to pathan, 2 runs,
murtaza to dogra, 1 run, stays back to punch it to left of murtaza who takes some pace off the ball with a half-stop

sathish to pathan, six runs, 50 up from 21 balls! he swings this to high towards long-off .. mclaren jumps to catch the ball, lands with his feet just inside the line but then steps on the boundary .. he signals to the umpire that its a six
sathish to pathan, 1 wide, pressure. wide down the leg side.

sathish to pathan, four runs, what loverly fun. brother yo is turning on the heat here. and in some style. a seemingly dead match is alive and kicking. this one has been swung away to deep backward square-leg boundary.
mclaren to pathan, 1 wide, more pressure. wide down the leg side. what an innings this is turning out  to be.
jayasuriya to dogra, 1 run, drives to long-off

sathish to dogra, out, yusuf is run out! what a huge wicket! what a fine work from sathish, the wonderful fielder! it was smashed back down the track, sathish lunges to his right to stop it and has the presence of the mind to calmly flick a direct hit at the non-striker's end. yusuf had backed up too far and couldn't come back in time. it has taken some fine fielding to terminate one of the most delightful t20 knocks.
sathish to dogra, four runs, poor stuff  from sathish.. under pressure, he has caved in as a bowler .. he slips this down the leg sdie and dogra helps it along to the fine-leg boundary
sathish to dogra, 1 run, retains the strike with a drive to deep midwicket
khan to dogra, 1 wide, aaha! more drama as zaheer sprays this one wide outsdie off. 18 from 12. who will cave in under pressure?
malinga to mascarenhas, 1 wide, aaha! just as i was singing his praise .. more fun .. he sprays it wide down the leg side .. 8 from 2 balls! warne gets across for a chat.
nannes to bopara, 1 wide, some swing but it moves down the leg side ...
nannes to bisla, no run, on the middle stump line, slanting away, dabbed to backward point
maharoof to bopara, 1 wide, slips this one down the leg side ..
maharoof to sangakkara, 1 run, run down to third man for a single
nannes to bopara, 1 run, moves outside leg stump, nannes follows him, jabbed off the inner edge to on side
maharoof to sangakkara, no run, around the off stump line, pushed out to point
sangwan to bopara, no run, around the off stump line, driven to cover
maharoof to yuvraj singh, 1 wide, lands outside off and moves away even further ... wide
maharoof to yuvraj singh, no run, in the zone outside off, slanting away, left alone
mahesh to bopara, 1 wide, and this one tails down the leg side

mahesh to bopara, 2 runs, driven to the off side.. yo mahesh makes a diving stop .. bopara was down the track, looking for a single, and mahesh's throw misses the stumps at the striker's end with bopara rushing back. had it hit, bopara would have been a goner. over throws results as the ball goes past the keeper
mishra to pathan, 1 run, on the leg and middle, swept away for a single
mishra to bopara, four runs, stays back to tap it straight to backward point where nannes makes a right royal mess of a simple stop.... there shouldn't have been any run ..
mishra to bopara, no run, leans across to defend to the off side
mishra to bopara, 1 run, goes back to punch it past point
mishra to pathan, four runs, moves down the track, fetches the ball from around off stump and drags it to wide midwicket boundary
mahesh to pathan, 2 runs, backs away and lifts it over mid-off .. gambhir rushes back and makes a desperate attempt but the ball falls just ahead of his reach
mahesh to pathan, 1 run, bouncing delivery outside off, edged to third man
dilshan to kaif, no run, on the middle stump line, kaif dabs it to midwicket
mishra to kaif, 1 run, on the off stump line, pushed to right of cover where ab makes a fine diving stop and quickly releases a throw at the non-striker's end
mahesh to powar, no run, around the off stump line, squeezed out to backward point
nannes to powar, out, the leg stump flies out ... powar tried to charge at nannes but the ball was too quick for him .. the leg stump flew out of its peg
maharoof to sreesanth, no run, walks down the track, maharoof slips in a slower one and sreesanth doesn't pick it all and the ball loops past the bat
nannes to chawla, 1 run, on the middle, piyush backs away to guide it to third man
nannes to sreesanth, no run, has a big swing and a miss at this one
nannes to sreesanth, 1 run, rushes down the track and drives to mid-off fora  single
sangwan to sreesanth, 2 runs, mvoes down the track and drives it hard to left of long-off where mithun manhas makes a fine sliding stop
pathan to gambhir, 1 run, around the off stump line, run down to third man for a single
pathan to sehwag, no run,
pathan to sehwag, four runs, on the middle stump line, curves in, sehwag, who has opened -up his stance slightly for irfan's inswing i guess, whips it through midwicket
pathan to sehwag, no run, around the off stump, driven to cover
sreesanth to dilshan, no run, on the middle stump line, pushed back to the bowler
sreesanth to de villiers, no run, yet another curvy outswinger around off stump line, squeezed out to point

pathan to gambhir, 2 runs, almost a run out  around the middle and off line .. pushed to backward point .. confusion between the two .. kaif throws it towards the non-striker's end .. pathan rushes back, lunges to grab the throw and then flicks at the stumps but misses .. and ab dives to get back in the crease .. no on to back up
pathan to gambhir, no run,
pathan to de villiers, 1 wide, sprays it wide outside off stump
pathan to de villiers, no run, outside off stump, sweetly driven but can't beat mid-off
pathan to de villiers, 1 wide, pushes it wide outside off stump
pathan to de villiers, no run, goes down on a bent knee to square drive it to cover point
pathan to de villiers, 1 run, on the middle stump line, nudged behind square-leg
sreesanth to gambhir, 1 run, on the middle and off line, run down to third man .
sreesanth to de villiers, 1 run, on the off stump line, skids on, tapped to the on side for a single
abdulla to gambhir, 1 run, charges down the track and squeezes it past square-leg
chawla to gambhir, 2 runs, moves down the track to flick it past square-leg for couple of runs
chawla to karthik, no run, loud shout for lbw ... slider on the middle and leg ...goes past the defensive prod and strikes the pad on the leg stump line.. would have probably gone down leg
chawla to karthik, 1 run, pushes this one through point
abdulla to karthik, no run, well outside off stump, dabbed towards point
abdulla to karthik, 1 run, pushes this one towards mid-on for a single
chawla to karthik, 1 run, around off and middle, squeezed of the outer edge through point
chawla to gambhir, no run, gets down the track and almost yorks himself .. dug out to the bowler

chawla to gambhir, no run, almost run out he charged down the track and drove it to right of cover where bopara makes a fine diving stop and throws it to the keeper who breaks the stumps. had it been a direct hit, gambhir would have been out
abdulla to gambhir, 1 run, slower one on the off stump line, run down to third man
abdulla to gambhir, four runs, drifts ever so gently down the leg side and gambhir glances it away to the boundary
powar to manhas, 1 run, goes back to work it past square-leg
chawla to manhas, 2 runs, pushed towards midwicket ... no one there and by the time bowler ran across, they get back for the second
chawla to gambhir, 1 run, turns to the leg stump line, dabbed past square-leg
yuvraj singh to gambhir, no run, around off stump, pushed out to cover .. gambhir is not happy with himself
yuvraj singh to gambhir, 1 run, flicks this straight to midwicket and gets across for the quick single
sreesanth to manhas, 1 run, run out chance missed manhas dabbed to point and got across for a single.. had kaif hit the stumps at the non-striker's end , manhas would have been out
abdulla to manhas, 2 runs, dropped by irfan at long-off. what a clanger! it was the slower one and manhas ended up scooping it high towards long-off where irfan makes a right royal mess of it
abdulla to gambhir, six runs, what a stunning hit. the delhi camp erupts in joy. gambhir backs away to lift it superbly over long-off and boy is he pumped or what .. he lets out a scream
pathan to manhas, 1 run, around the off stump line, pushed to point for a quick single.. it needed a direct hit but bopara misses the stumps
langeveldt to goswami, no run, straightens on the middle stump line and sreevats jabs it out at the last minute
langeveldt to goswami, no run, lifting delivery in the channel outside off stump, left alone
sharma to kallis, no run, in the zone outside off stump, holds its line, left alone
sharma to kallis, 2 runs, homing in on the off stump, kallis stays adjacent to the line and opens the bat-face to punch it neatly through point
sharma to kallis, no run, around the off stump line, tapped to the off side
sharma to kallis, no run, stays back to punch it to cover. another dot ball.
langeveldt to goswami, no run, lifter on the middle stump line, sreevats defends it back down the track
sharma to pandey, no run, again manish moves away at the last minute .. he almost waits for the ball to land before he backs away outside leg and again mistimes the punchy shot .. this time to mid-on
sharma to pandey, no run, closer to the off stump, steered to point. just a wide from that over from ishant. pretty cool stuff.
mathews to kallis, 1 run, slower one on the middle stump line, turned behind square-leg
kartik to kallis, 1 run, quicker, on the middle stump line, dabbed to the on side for a single
kartik to kohli, no run, on the middle and leg, skids on with the arm, edged to square-leg

kartik to kohli, out, murali kartik, who  bowled superbly in the previous editions of ipl, takes out kohli. he got it to dip rapidly on kohli, who had charged down the track, and the attempted lofted hit went towards deep midwicket. lovely bit of bowling from kartik.
kartik to kallis, no run, on the leg and middle line,d rifting away, turned to the on side
kartik to kallis, four runs, slips this too much down the leg side and kallis swings it to square-leg boundary
hodge to morgan, six runs, morgan sashays down the track and just nonchalantly lifts it over long-off. lovely piece of timing there
hodge to kallis, 1 run, on the middle stump line, whipped to deep midwicket
ganguly to kallis, 1 run, tapped behind the wicket on the off side for a single
kartik to kallis, no run, on the off stump line, pushed out to cover
kartik to kallis, no run, around off stump line, turns away, steered to point
kartik to dravid, 1 run, around the middle and leg, drifting in, tapped to midwicket
ganguly to dravid, 1 run, slower one, chipped over the on-side 30-yard circle
ganguly to kallis, 1 run, plays it down to deep midwicket for a single
mathews to uthappa, 1 run, on the middle stump line, turned to right of midwicket for a single
mathews to uthappa, 1 run, shuffle across to run this one down to third man
sharma to uthappa, 1 run, on the middle and leg stump line, turned to fine-leg region
kartik to uthappa, 1 run, on the middle and leg, pushed out to the on side for a single
kartik to kallis, no run, just outside off stump, kallis tries to square drive and misses it
gavaskar to kallis, no run, on the middle stump line, skids on to the middle, pushed out to point ..
gavaskar to kallis, four runs, moves outside leg stump and lifts inside-out to extra-cover boundary
gavaskar to kallis, 1 run, square drives this one to point region

langeveldt to kallis, four runs, slips to the legs and kallis whips it to the deep midwicket boundary. he stayed outside leg, adjacent to the line and played the wristy shot wide of deep midwicket fielder
mathews to uthappa, out, walks down the track and goes for the lofted big hit but ends up nicking it behind the wicket. angelooooo had pushed it wider to induce that edge

mathews to van der merwe, out, angelo is da maan for kkr so far in this competition. he slips in a slower one around off stump and van der merwe slices the intended big hit to backward point where hodge takes a good low tumbling catch
kumar to hodge, no run, just outside off stump, steered to backward point. hodge signals to the people to settle down behind the sightscreen
kumar to tiwary, no run, walks down the track, pk gets to curve it away superbly past the outside edge ...
kallis to hodge, no run, in the zone outside off stump, left alone
kallis to hodge, 1 run, on the middle stump line, turned past square-leg
kumar to hodge, 1 run, on the middle stump line, turned to midwicket for a single
kumar to tiwary, 1 run, around off stump line, tapped to midwicket for a single
kumar to hodge, no run, on the stumps, defended to the on side
kumar to hodge, 1 run, in the channel outside off, run down to third man
kallis to tiwary, four runs, thrash! tiwary backs away to play a fabulous square drive. crack of doom. tiwary has exploded after the ankle injury
steyn to tiwary, no run, mistimes this one back to steyn
kumble to hodge, no run, slider on the middle stump line, edged to the on side
kumble to hodge, no run, slows up the pace, driven to cover
van der merwe to tiwary, 1 run, on the leg stump line, dabbed to square-leg
van der merwe to hodge, 1 wide, quickish, slides down leg side .. wide
van der merwe to tiwary, 1 wide, another one that slides down the leg side ..
van der merwe to tiwary, 1 run, on the middle and leg, wristed to midwicket
van der merwe to hodge, no run, on the off stump line, pushed to cover
van der merwe to hodge, 1 run, on the middle stump line, swatted through to deep midwicket
kumble to hodge, 1 run, flicked away for a single
kumble to hodge, no run, and again. good probing bowling and hodge knows he can afford to play out these deliveries ,, doesn't have to take risks
kumble to hodge, no run, slider ,moves past the defensive prod and hits the pad .. going down leg ..
van der merwe to tiwary, 1 run, moves outside leg stump and punches it to deep cover
van der merwe to hodge, four runs, rushes down the track and lifts it over the bowler and to the straight boundary
van der merwe to hodge, 1 wide, slips it down the leg side ..
van der merwe to hodge, no run, on the off stump line, pushed out to kumble at extra cover
steyn to tiwary, no run, slightly slower one, well outside off stump, steered to kohli at backward point
van der merwe to tiwary, 2 runs, moves outside leg , reaches out to a delivery outside off and carves it to deep point. 50 up for tiwary

van der merwe to tiwary, out, good catch by van der merwe. tiwary had really struck it very hard back down the pitch .. van der merwe manages to hold on it .. it hit him on the wrist i think and rolled up and he clung on to it. looks like he is in some pain now.. entertaining breezy fifty from tiwary.

van der merwe to ganguly, 1 run, dropped by sreevats it turned in from outside off, ganguly tried to run it through vacant slip region and edged it behind but sreevats couldn't hold on to a tough chance
steyn to ganguly, 1 run, around the off stump line, tapped to cover for a single
steyn to hodge, 1 run, on the off stump line, pushed through point
steyn to ganguly, no run, around the off stump line, squeezed out to point
kumble to ganguly, no run, on the off stump line, dabbed to the on side
kumble to pujara, no run, turns from the off stump, pushed out to cover
kumble to pujara, no run, around the off stump line, stabbed to the on side
kumble to pujara, no run, from a slightly round-armsih action . around off stump , pujara rushed down the track to punch it to cover ..
steyn to pujara, no run, on the off stump line, defended to cover
kumar to pujara, 1 run, charges down the track and edges the intended big hit to the on side
kumar to shah, 1 run, slower one, outside off, run down to third man
morkel to gilchrist, 1 wide, sliding down the leg side, gilchrist tries to flick that fine but is unable to connect, a wide nevertheless

morkel to gilchrist, 1 leg bye, angling in from round the wicket and gilchrist attempts a similar shot, gets across a hint and tries to clip it fine, is struck high on the thighs and earns a single behind square

morkel to gilchrist, four runs, wham, morkel's been struck, pitched it up on the off and gilchrist blazed it back past the bowler, ferocious power and morkel, who stuck his hand out, has been dealt a painful blow as it grazed his finger, nothing serious i hope though he is getting some treatment from the physio

muralitharan to laxman, no run, the doosra, laxman made room, it zipped away after pitching, tried to open the face did laxman, got a thick edge which dhoni put down, sharp chance, two missed today off lax
ashwin to laxman, 1 run, kept it flat and got it to turn in, laxman had shaped up for a drive through the off but turned the face at the right time to nudge it into the leg side for a single
ashwin to gilchrist, 1 wide, fires it down the leg side, much quicker but the direction wrong, the 50's up
ashwin to gilchrist, 1 wide, not the best start here, down the leg side again, another wide
muralitharan to symonds, no run, drops it into the leg side behind the keeper, calls for a single but it's not there
muralitharan to symonds, no run,
kemp to symonds, 1 wide, kemp fires his first ball in ipl down the leg side
kemp to symonds, no run, similar delivery, closer to offstump, no room to free the arms, symonds can only squeeze it towards gully
kemp to gibbs, 1 run, again angling into leg, gibbs tucks the ball towards square leg
ashwin to gibbs, no run, the doosra this time, again gibbs doesn't make contact
ashwin to gibbs, no run, another dot ball, regulation offspinner, gibbs turns it towards square leg
ashwin to gibbs, 2 runs, this time gibbs gets a couple by placing the ball wide of murali
ashwin to gibbs, 1 run, gibbs goes for a heave across the line, gets a single to midwicket
kemp to gibbs, no run, moves away and plays that straight to extra cover, trying to improvise here is gibbs
kemp to gibbs, no run, slower one bowled outside off, drags it straight to midwicket
kemp to gibbs, 1 run, slower one this time, on middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on
muralitharan to gibbs, no run,
ashwin to gibbs, 1 run, gibbs drags that towards deep square leg for a single
ashwin to symonds, 1 run, keeping it flat, on middle and leg, flicked away behind square for a single
muralitharan to gibbs, 1 wide, fires it down the leg side, gibbs lets it go, earns an extra ball
muralitharan to gibbs, 1 wide, murali falters again, another wide down the leg side
balaji to symonds, 1 wide, straying down the leg side this time, tries to work it fine, concedes another run does balaji
morkel to symonds, 2 runs, stretches and cracks it wide of deep cover for a couple of runs
morkel to symonds, 1 run, reaches his half-century, which began on an uncertain note but then shaped up nicely, with a swat to long-off for a single
morkel to sharma, 1 run, rohit eases that into the deep on the off side for a single
tyagi to suman, four runs, there's no respite for the poor bowler as suman creams him past a diving extra cover to the ropes, blazing drive
tyagi to suman, 1 no ball, tyagi, having a horrible day, follows that up with a wide down the leg side, it's actually given a no-ball for height, slipped out
vaas to vijay, 1 run, bowled at 114.5 kmph on middle, defended into the leg side towards rohit who flicks a needless throw to concede an extra run
vaas to vijay, 2 runs, a touch too straight, flicked away from the crease through square leg for a couple of runs
sharma to hayden, no run, driven hard but straight to mid-off

vaas to vijay, out, bowled'im! some movement inward but that was always heading just one way, m vijay gave him the charge and tried to smash him over midwicket, swung hard, got an inside edge and the leg stump was knocked off
vaas to raina, six runs, takes no time in setting himself up, not a bad ball at all but he had made his mind up, swinging it hard over midwicket and into the stands
singh to badrinath, 1 run, opens the face and guides it down to third man for a single

singh to hayden, six runs, a flat six, bowls it just outside off and he strikes it firmly through the line, didn't think it would go all the way but there was plenty of power involved, clears long-off comfortably
singh to badrinath, no run, he'd rather be bowling to him, plays it straight back to the bowler
ojha to kemp, no run, targeting middle and leg, gets across and turns it towards midwicket
jaskaran singh to kemp, no run, starts well, a tight line just outside off, defended solidly into the off side
ojha to kemp, 1 run, opts to play it from the crease this time, taps it past point for a single
suman to dhoni, 1 run, swats it hard towards long-off for a single
sharma to morkel, 1 run, turns in sharply from outside leg stump, tries to work it around, gets a leading edge wide of extra cover, they sneak a single
ojha to dhoni, no run, turning in from outside leg stump, tries to work it square, it drops dead into the leg side, time for the second time-out and a much-needed break for my fingers
symonds to morkel, 1 run, dragged it towards deep square leg for a single
singh to balaji, 1 run, struck hard towards long-off for a single, the end is near, or 16 balls away, or three wickets, this game is a done thing
singh to muralitharan, 1 run, eased towards extra cover for a single
singh to tyagi, 1 run, pushed towards long-off for a single, wants the second but morkel sends him back
singh to morkel, 1 wide, slower one outside off, reaches for it, misses, given a wide
maharoof to asnodkar, four runs, four first ball. over pitched outside off stump and swapnil leans across to square drive to the point boundary
maharoof to smith, 1 wide, pushes it across.. too far across outside off
nannes to asnodkar, no run, slants it across swapnil who chases it but doesn't connect
nannes to ojha, no run, around the off stump line, tapped to the off side
nannes to ojha, no run, a nasty lifter , just above chest-high and ojha tries to play it down initially before he tries to get his bat out of the way and the ball crashes into the right shoulder
maharoof to ojha, 1 run, straightens outside off stump, run down to nannes at third man

maharoof to pathan, out, done in by the slower one. it was almost predictable that yusuf, who was dead-batting so far, would go after this ball. he picked the wrong ball, though. he didn't pick the slower one all that well and ended up dragging it straight up and ab moved to his right at mid-on to collect it.
sangwan to jhunjhunwala, 1 run, bounces across jhunjhunwala who dabs it to third man
ladda to jhunjhunwala, no run, quick slider around off, tapped to backward point
ladda to jhunjhunwala, 1 wide, pushes this one down the leg side. ladda jumps before he gets into the final stride pre release
ladda to jhunjhunwala, no run, slower, around off stump line, pushed out to cover
sangwan to jhunjhunwala, 1 run, turns this to wide of midwicket for a single
ladda to dogra, no run, around the off stump, again skids in - that has been mostly what ladda has been doing so far - pushed out to cover
ladda to dogra, no run, flatter, quicker, slider on the middle stump line, just pushed away .. another tight over from ladda
sangwan to jhunjhunwala, 1 run, pushes this across jhbujhunwala who square drives it very neatly , good timing and all that, but hits it straight to sehwag at deep point region
sangwan to dogra, no run,
mishra to dogra, no run, slider around off stump, tapped to backward point
maharoof to jhunjhunwala, 2 runs, slower one on the middle stump line, wristed just past square-leg and they run hard to come back for the second run
maharoof to jhunjhunwala, 1 run,
maharoof to dogra, no run, just outside off stump, slower one, pushed out to point
mishra to dogra, no run,
mishra to dogra, no run, from wide of the crease, slider on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
mishra to jhunjhunwala, 1 run, the quick slider on the middle stump line, stays outside the line, picks it off the pitch to jab it to cover
sangwan to dogra, 1 run, slower one on the stumps, swatted to midwicket for a quick single
mishra to jhunjhunwala, 1 run, around off stump line, carved to right of backward point for a quick single
mishra to mascarenhas, 1 run, around off stump, pushed to cover point
nannes to mascarenhas, 1 run, out, mascarenhas is run out. it was pushed to third man and he came back for the second run but he is not even in the frame when dk breaks the stumps.
nannes to uniyal, 1 run,
nannes to jhunjhunwala, 1 run, forces this one to deep point for a single
ladda to jhunjhunwala, 1 run, swats this one away for a single
ladda to uniyal, no run,
ladda to jhunjhunwala, four runs, moves down the track to play a lovely inside-out lofted hit to extra-cover boundary
nannes to uniyal, 1 run, moves outside leg and flat-bats it between cover and mid-off
mascarenhas to sehwag, no run, the keeper is standing up to the stumps now. this one has been turned to backward square-leg
tait to sehwag, 2 wides, pacy delivery, almost 150 kmph, down the leg side .. bye .. the keeper had collected it cleanly but he was so far back that gambhir rushes across for the run!
tait to gambhir, no run, driven down the track and the bowler lunges to stop it
patel to sehwag, 1 run, slower one, straightening on the off stump line, sehwag checks his drive and squeezes it to point
patel to gambhir, 1 run, around the off stump, run down to third man
mascarenhas to gambhir, no run,
tait to de villiers, 1 wide, another tait wide. no one would be surprised. tait smiles as he passes the umpire.
tait to de villiers, 1 wide, yet another wide. tait screams out a four-letter word and then smiles as he walks back. love is a four letter word too ..
