tait to sehwag, 1 run, stays back, stays beside the line of the slightly slower delivery and chops it to third man

mascarenhas to sehwag, 1 run, almost run out. it was driven down the track and ab had backed up too far .. mascarenhas tries to field and almost deflects it, unintentionally, on to the stumps at the non-striker's end
mascarenhas to sehwag, no run, big swing and a miss. the keeper takes out the bails. sehwag was in,
mascarenhas to sehwag, 1 run, goes for the big hit to the on side but ends up dragging it off the inner half of the bat to deep midwicket
patel to de villiers, no run, in the zone outside off stump and the keeper collects
warne to karthik, 1 run, turns from outside leg, turned past square-leg
patel to karthik, four runs, skips down the track and plays a neat whippy on-the-up drive through midwicket.
patel to karthik, 1 run,
warne to karthik, 1 run, on the middle and off line, slip in place, tapped towards point for a single
tait to karthik, 1 wide, another tait wide. warne, keeper and the bowler appeal .. old trick. doesn't work.
tait to karthik, 1 run, outside off stump, run down to third man
warne to manhas, 1 run, quicker slider outside off, chopped down to backward point where munna bhai , munaf patel ie, makes a complete mess of a regulation stop. warne looks pissed.
uniyal to karthik, four runs, slower one outside off, dk waits and waits before slapping it to left of backward point
uniyal to manhas, 1 run, third slower one in a row .. run down to third man
kumar to bisla, no run, around the off stump line, pushed out to point region
kumar to bisla, no run, around the off stump line, tilts in this time - he has been taking away mostly so far - pushed back down the pitch
kumar to bisla, no run, loverly outswinger! it moved away sharply and ravi bopara was almost fatally attracted to it .. the ball just about missed taking the outside edge
steyn to bopara, 3 runs, hint of away swing but poor fielding from steyn. it was driven just to the left of him and he allowed it to burst through his fingers ...
steyn to bisla, no run, the crowd are screaming rcb as steyn rushes in to bowl. lovely delivery, shaping away late, and moves past the defensive prod .. and the keeper collects
steyn to bisla, no run, another one going away from the off stump and bisla is all at sea. they have a nice word in hindi for this - aukat!
steyn to bisla, 1 wide, pushes this down the leg side ... boucher dives to gather it

steyn to bisla, four runs, fast pacy lifting deliver into the ribcage .. bisla is in a awkward position, takes the bottom hand of the handle and fends it off in an ungainly fashion .. the ball is i n the air and just wide of the diving boucher down on the leg side
kumar to bisla, 1 wide, wide down the leg side ... boucher makes yet another diving stop
kumar to bopara, 1 run, around the off stump line, shaping away, pushed out to extra cover
kallis to bisla, no run, in the zone outside off stump and the keeper gathers

steyn to bisla, 1 leg bye, almost run out jabbed out to the off side ... and steyn rushes across, picks the ball and flicks the throw but misses the stumps ... had he hit the stumps,  bisla, who was diving to get inside the crease, would have been a goner
kallis to bisla, no run, tapped to the on side
kumble to bisla, no run, around the off stump, skids on, pushes it to the cover
kumble to bopara, 1 run, leg break turning away from the off stump, forced away to deep cover
vinay kumar to bopara, 1 run,
vinay kumar to bisla, 1 run, around the off stump line, guided to backward point
kumble to bisla, six runs, thrash! bisla you beauty! he rushed down the track and lifted the ball over long-off!
kumble to bopara, no run, stays back to tap this to the on side
kumble to bopara, no run, and again! it was drilled down the track and kumble bravely puts his right hand out to stop it ...!
vinay kumar to bisla, 1 run, around off stump, pushed through point
vinay kumar to bopara, 1 run, around the off stump line, tapped wide of backward point
kohli to bisla, 1 run, turns it past square-leg
kohli to bopara, 2 runs,
kohli to bisla, four runs, walks right across to outside off stump and virat follows him but bisla manages to scoop it over boucher!
kumble to bisla, 1 run, moves down the track and drags it to deep midwicket
kumble to bopara, 1 run, released like a seamer .. outside off stump, mistimes it to cover
kohli to bisla, (no ball) four runs, goes for the big swing and gets an inside edge to fine-leg region
kohli to bopara, 1 run, on the middle and off line, tapped past square-leg
steyn to bopara, no run, in the channel outside off, bopara goes for the big square drive but doesn't connect

kallis to bisla, out, it was the slower one and bisla swings it straight to deep midwicket. he has done his job though. he was in all sorts of trouble against the pace and bounce of steyn but made merry against the others. entertaining knock.
kallis to bopara, 1 run, run down to third man for a single
kallis to yuvraj singh, 1 run, lifting delivery on the middle and leg line, yuvraj hops to tap it to the on side
kallis to yuvraj singh, 1 run, on the off stump line, pushed out to cover
kumble to jayawardene, six runs, slows up this one as well, tosses it across... mahela was down the track, waited that fraction to adjust to the lack of pace and lofted it over long-off
kumar to jayawardene, 1 wide, oopsy! a wide off the fifth ball .. punjab on 199
pathan to kallis, no run, curves towards off and middle line, pushed out to the off side
sreesanth to kallis, 1 run, kallis pushes towards mid-off and rushes for a quick single but yuvraj fails to hit the stumps . had he hit, kallis would have been out
pathan to kallis, 1 run, pushes this to the off side
pathan to pandey, no run, slower on the off stump line, mistimes to the off side
sreesanth to kallis, no run, lovely delivery , late movement on the off and middle line, squeezed out off the outer edge to cover
sreesanth to kallis, 1 wide, lands outside off stump, moves away even further .. wide
abdulla to pandey, 1 run, slower one around off stump, pushed to right of mid-off
pathan to pandey, four runs, edged r to third man boundary. it was a slower one outside off, manish wanted to heave it over mid-on and got a fat edge
pathan to kallis, 1 run, angles it across kallis who runs it down to third man

pathan to pandey, six runs, bosh! he picked the slower one early, went down on his knee and thrashed it high over long-off boundary. crowd roar and roar. deepika padukone, wearing the rcb jersey, can't stop smiling
chawla to pandey, 2 runs, quick slider on the middle stump line, eased past square-leg
yuvraj singh to pandey, no run, around the off stump, forced to left of cover where bopara makes a fine diving stop
yuvraj singh to kallis, no run, around the off stump line, driven to cover

yuvraj singh to kallis, no run, on the off stump line, pushed out to the off side. the camera pans to vijay mallya, owner of rcb, who gives a thumbs up sign. but thumbs up is owned by coke no? ok sorry for that pj..
yuvraj singh to uthappa, 1 run, taps it to midwicket for a single
abdulla to uthappa, four runs, walks to the off stump line and drills yet another slower one to the straight boundary. fab hit.
bipul sharma to kallis, 1 run, taps it to point for a single.
bopara to kallis, no run, outside off stump, tapped to point .. this time kohli wants a single but gets back in a hurry
bipul sharma to kallis, 1 run, on the middle and leg, tapped to midwicket
bipul sharma to kohli, 1 run, gets down the track and drives towards extra cover for a single
bopara to kohli, no run, moves outside leg stump, bopara slips in a slower one outside off and kohli is fooled
bopara to kallis, 1 run, taps it to the off side for a s ngle
bopara to kallis, 2 runs, fine stop from kaif this time. it was drilled hard to left of him at long-off and he makes a fine diving stop
bipul sharma to kallis, six runs, jacques kallis is showing who is da boss. again, he sashayed down the track and played a powerful whippy flick over wide midwicket
abdulla to kohli, 1 wide, this time, it veers further away from loc .. wide
bond to vijay, 1 run, gets an inside edge on this one, gets off the mark with the single to fine leg
bond to hayden, no run, 144.2ks, around off, moving away, hayden shoulders arms
bond to hayden, no run, nips in again, which means away from the left-hand batsman, and hayden lets it go
bond to hayden, no run, walks down the track, gets a bottom edge that falls safe
bond to vijay, 1 run, tucks him up, bit he pushes it to cover-point and comes through for one
bond to hayden, no run, superb bowling, 147ks, pitches middle and leg and moves away and beats another swing from the hayden bat
bond to hayden, no run, more circumspect this time, shoulders arms to one outside off
sharma to raina, 1 run, steered away square of backward point for a single
sharma to vijay, 1 run, thick edge outside off, and he gets a single to third man
mathews to raina, 1 run, tip-and-run again, towards cover, and makes it easily
mathews to vijay, no run, on target, around off, straightening just a touch, vijay defends it back
shukla to vijay, four runs, swiped across the line, between mid-on and midwicket, not the prettiest of strokes, but gets his four
mathews to raina, 1 run, tip-and-run, to cover, he is in despite hodge's direct-hit
mathews to raina, 1 run, shapes up for the hit over midwicket, sees a slower ball and opens the face for a single to third man
kartik to vijay, no run, arm ball, looks to run it down to third man, gets an inside edge
kartik to vijay, 1 wide, wide down the leg side, saha removes the bails but vijay is safe, he overbalanced and fell over after the bails were removed
kartik to vijay, no run, stops on him as he looks to drive, defends back to karthik in the end
kartik to vijay, 1 run, pushed through the covers for a single
shukla to raina, no run, goes for the extra-cover hit, gets the inside half of the bat, back to the bowler
shukla to raina, 1 run, hit past shukla, in the air but he can't get his hand to it, will get just a single
hodge to dhoni, no run, was there some drift? goes for the big drive through the off side but the ball is wide of his reach
hodge to dhoni, no run, fired down the leg side, not called a wide, could have brushed his pad
shukla to badrinath, no run, shukla on target, flicked straight to midwicket
shukla to badrinath, no run, looks to run it down to third man, there is extra bounce that beats him, and saha takes this one well
shukla to badrinath, 1 run, steers this one to third man for a single
shukla to badrinath, 2 runs, slower ball, gets a thick outside edge
kartik to dhoni, 1 run, shimmies down the pitch, flicks it with soft hands, but doesn't have the time to come back for two
kartik to badrinath, 2 runs, tip-and-run this time, karthik in the hurry fumbles, and gives away two
kartik to badrinath, no run, jumps out of the crease, karthik bowls flat, and he plays it straight to cover-point
bond to dhoni, 1 run, looks to turn this to leg, bond gets him in the forearm with the extra bounce, gets a single to third man
bond to badrinath, no run, 149ks, too quick for badri, hurries him up and tucks him up, badri almost treads onto his stumps
bond to badrinath, 1 run, runs this down to third man for a single
kartik to dhoni, no run, flat delivery, can't get it past extra cover
kartik to dhoni, no run, another dot, can't punch it past point
kartik to badrinath, no run, flat delivery, doesn't give him any room, hit back to the bowler
kartik to badrinath, 1 run, jumps out of the track again, gets too close to the ball, and can't get the elevation
sharma to badrinath, four runs, badri makes room, ishant follows him, and badri nicely glances it fine, and the fine leg is too square
sharma to badrinath, no run, makes room again, this time ishant goes outside off, and creates enough distance, and badri misses
shukla to dhoni, no run, beats him with a slower ball outside off, saha does to collect it behind the swirling dhoni bat
morkel to hodge, no run, seems slightly surprised by the bounce, , defended back to the bowler
morkel to ganguly, no run, on target again, tucking him up, played back to the bowler
morkel to ganguly, no run, and he tucks him up again, into the ribs, defended again
gony to tiwary, four runs, regulation edge outside off, but there is just one slip in place and it beats him

gony to tiwary, out, bowled him! gony has come right back, with an in-coming delivery. tiwary hits through its line, but the ball moves in and takes the inside edge onto the middle stump. chennai right on top
gony to saha, no run, hayden drops a high catch at first slip! he used to take 95 out of 100 such, edged hard over first slip, jumps high, gets his hands to it but can't collect it
morkel to saha, 1 leg bye, walks across for the big on-side shot, misses it, and morkel shouts for lbw but it is not even close
gony to saha, no run, slower ball, hit straight to mid-on
gony to saha, four runs, gony has been very unlucky this over, again troubles him with the inward movement, but the inside edge flies past the keeper
balaji to ganguly, no run, makes room to negate that rib attack, but can't pierce the off-side ring
balaji to ganguly, no run, and again, makes much better contact this time, but still straight to the fielder
balaji to saha, out, bye bye middle stump! balaji finishes off what gony started! heaves at one again, and plays around a straight delivery
gony to shah, no run, nice crunchy punch shot outside off, one bounce to cover
gony to shah, 1 run, mis-hit outside off, but they manage a single
balaji to mathews, no run, pushed to pint where badri makes a diving save
balaji to mathews, 1 run, comes down the track, clears the infield, only just, ganguly turns down the second
balaji to ganguly, 1 run, runs this one down to third man for one
muralitharan to mathews, no run,
muralitharan to mathews, 1 wide, pitches leg and turns down the leg side
muralitharan to ganguly, 1 run, ganguly jumps out of the crease, murali bowls it flat, ganguly checks his shot, gets a single. lovely cat-and-mouse
kemp to ganguly, 1 wide, still going for ganguly's hips-ribs, misdirected and gives away a wide
kemp to mathews, 1 run, thick outside edge, balaji makes a superb diving save at third man, and dhoni makes a one-handed collection. remember he was hit by bond in the forearm
kemp to shukla, four runs, and dhoni has dropped it, regulation edge, wide of dhoni and he dives and can't make, possible the injured arm coming into play
kemp to mathews, no run, mathews goes for the scoop over the keeper, misses, but is hit outside the line of off
ashwin to shukla, 1 run, runs this one down to third man, and dhoni makes a left-handed collection again

ashwin to mathews, 1 run, bunted to single at midwicket, dhoni to raina: 'c'mon raina, aage rehne hota hai to peeche bhag jata hai; peeche rehna hota hai to aage aa jata hai.' [c'mon raina, when you need to come up to save a single, you sit back. when you need to be at the edge of the circle, you start running in.'
ashwin to shukla, no run,
ashwin to shukla, four runs, flat delivery and nicely he uses it pace, past backward point, gets four
kemp to mathews, 2 leg byes, looks to work it on to leg, is struck in the thigh, gets two leg-byes
kemp to mathews, out, it's all over for kolkata - barring a miracle. mathews looks for the scoop, misses, and is this time hit inside the line. dead duck if ever there was one
kemp to gavaskar, no run, play and miss right away, sunny wouldn't have liked it
ashwin to shukla, 1 run, tip-and-run, takes a single to cover
ashwin to gavaskar, no run, opens the face, but hits straight to point
kemp to shukla, 1 leg bye, moving in to shukla, gets a leg-bye
kemp to bond, 1 run, played with an open face, gets a single past cover
kemp to shukla, 1 run, swiped across the lien, towards cow corner, but hayden runs from midwicket and makes a fine save
muralitharan to kartik, no run, spins across him, defended
ashwin to sharma, no run, the straighter one, ishant defends it back
muralitharan to kartik, no run, beats him outside off with a sharp offbreak
muralitharan to kartik, 1 run, single to fine leg
ashwin to sharma, no run, flat delivery, pushed back to the bowler
ashwin to sharma, no run, plays another delivery back to ashwin
muralitharan to kartik, no run, defended back to the bowler
muralitharan to kartik, 1 run, driven with an open face, gets a single
muralitharan to sharma, 1 run, comes down the track, gets a single to long-off
muralitharan to sharma, no run, dropped, hit right back at murali, gets to him too soon
muralitharan to sharma, no run, doosra, pitches outside leg and turns away like a legbreak, ishant is hit in the pad
raina to kartik, 3 runs, big big shout for lbw, given runs, raina thinks pad first, saheba thinks bat first, it was headed for the stumps. replay says pad first
raina to sharma, no run, and again, straight to raina who fields well
raina to sharma, 1 run, delays the delivery release, flicked away for one
raina to sharma, 1 run, ishant comes down, gets a single to long-off
balaji to sharma, no run, sharma swings and misses outside off
balaji to sharma, out, and how it finishes! karthik is strolling through for a single to point, and badri hits the only visible stump direct. karthik knew he wouldn't have made it
nannes to tendulkar, 3 runs, and he turns his wrists on it, to beat the off-side field, and drags it from outside off to wide of midwicket, gets three for it
maharoof to jayasuriya, no run, slower ball, 116ks, checks his shot and defends
maharoof to jayasuriya, 1 run, tip-and-run to mid-off, and it is perhaps hit too fast and nagar misses the stumps - jaya was a goner had he hit

maharoof to tendulkar, 1 run, another run-out missed, tendulkar walks across the stumps again, misses and wants a quick run, but jayasuriya hasn't taken a start. ab de villiers runs in from cover, chooses to go for jaya's end as opposed to sachin (he could have got both), and the throw misses by inches. karthik running in collects it, but is over-balanced and misses the stumps
nannes to tendulkar, four runs, steered away for four! waits an extra half-second, opens the face late, beats point, and also manages to hit it square of third man
nannes to tendulkar, 1 run, walks across the stumps and flicks him to fine leg for one
nannes to tendulkar, 1 run, pushed to mid-off for a single
maharoof to tendulkar, four runs, slower ball, driven with an open face, uppishly but wide enough of backward point, four more
maharoof to tendulkar, four runs, quicker ball, gets an edge this time, regulation edge as he looks to drive, but there is no slip

maharoof to jayasuriya, out, nagarrrrrr! oh what a catch, will be one of the catches of the tournament by the time we are done with it. jayasuriya mis-hits a loft over mid-off, the ball seems like it will clear nagar, who takes a few steps back, leaps at the right time, sticks his right hand behind him and holds on to it

maharoof to tendulkar, four runs, and what a shot, dances down the track, and just meets this slower ball. no violence, just gets inside the line, and guides it wide of mid-on, almost as if playing a spinner
ladda to tendulkar, 1 run, flat delivery, no turn, gets a leg-bye as he looks to flick it
ladda to tare, no run, looks to drive it through covers, finds the fielder, not much turn so far
ladda to tare, 1 run, jumps out of the crease, and hits it to deep midwicket
ladda to tendulkar, four runs, no edges this time, he steps out, and lofts it straight and high, clean clean hit, salt meets wound for ladda
ladda to tendulkar, 1 leg bye, lbw shout as he fails to connect but it is headed down the leg side

sangwan to tare, out, bowled him! sangwan comes back! tries the same shot, but this ball is closer to him and he has to make room, and completely plays down the wrong line. tare misses, sangwan hits the off stump
sangwan to tiwary, 1 run, looks to drive through covers, gets thick edge towards third man
ladda to tendulkar, 1 run, steps down the track and flicks a flat delivery into the leg side for a single
ladda to tiwary, 1 run, guides this past backward point for a single
maharoof to tiwary, 1 run, comes down the track, nearly yorks himself, gets a single nevertheless
maharoof to tendulkar, 1 leg bye, slower ball, and tendulkar mis-hits, gets a single to fine leg off the underside edge
mishra to tendulkar, four runs, how about some good old violence now? dances down and smashes him just to his left, mishra knows better than to stick his hand out
mishra to tendulkar, 1 run, comes down the track again, gets too close to it, and flicks it away for a single
mishra to tendulkar, out, he is gone! again gets too close to it as he steps out, and doesn't get enough power into it and holes out to long-off. nagar again takes a neat low catch
mishra to tiwary, no run, quicker flatter delivery, hit back one bounce to mishra
sangwan to rayudu, 1 wide, slower ball, and it's called wide as rayudu misses a flash at it outside off
mishra to tiwary, 1 run, flat, quick, hit down to long-off
sangwan to tiwary, 1 wide, slower ball but too wide of off
sangwan to rayudu, 2 runs, gets a thick edge and will come back for a second, wide of third man
nannes to rayudu, 1 run, steps out, mis-hits, gets a single to long-off
nannes to rayudu, six runs, mid-on is up in the circle, and he goes deep into the crease, and swats it over him, premeditated but effective
mishra to tiwary, six runs, lovely straight hit, dances down the track and just lofts him, just the extension of arms
mishra to rayudu, 1 run, misses out, long hop, and he fails to get under it, gets just a single
mishra to tiwary, no run, another long hop goes unpunished, stays low, and tiwary misses, mishra lucky in this over so far
maharoof to rayudu, 1 run, comes down the track, it's a slower ball and hence he ends up dragging it to midwicket
nannes to pollard, 1 run, hits this one down to long-off, gets a single
ladda to bravo, 2 runs, driven inside-out past cover, comes back for two
ladda to pollard, out, gone! jumps out of the crease, planning to hit it to noida, but doesn't make any contact as the ball breaks away
khan to sehwag, 2 runs, slightly slower delivery, he opens the face as late as possible, gets it wide of keeper but fine of third man, gets a couple
malinga to dilshan, four runs, slower ball, there is no country for bowlers! he has done him in, got an early shot out of him, got an inside edge, and that goes to the fine-leg boundary
malinga to dilshan, 1 run, back to yorking him, dilshan digs it out and he pinches a single to point
malinga to sehwag, 1 run, slower ball, adjusts his shot, still ends up dragging it to leg side, gets a single
khan to dilshan, 1 leg bye, misses on the pick-up shot over leg, gets a leg-bye
bravo to de villiers, 1 run, hits straight to extra cover this time
bravo to sehwag, 1 run, and he drills one straight to mid-off, gets a single off the fumble from zaheer
bravo to maharoof, no run, slower ball, and maharoof has to check his shot, ends up playing it back to bravo
pollard to maharoof, 1 run, slower ball, maharoof pushes it down to long-off for one
pollard to maharoof, 1 bye, slower ball again, maharoof ends up playing inside the line, gets a bye off the fumble from tare
jayasuriya to maharoof, no run, another quick delivery, turns away and beats him outside off
harbhajan singh to mishra, 1 run, mishra steps down and blocks it to point for one
harbhajan singh to maharoof, no run, yorks him, no room either

jayasuriya to maharoof, out, and jaya gets him! this time he goes for the straight boundary, and jaya bowls flat and across him, maharoof swings inside the line, tare stumps him even though it stays low
jayasuriya to sangwan, no run, stays low again, pitched outside leg
pollard to sangwan, no run, looks for a sharp single to point, but sathish is very quick
pollard to sangwan, 1 run, flicked away from off stump line, gets a single
pollard to mishra, no run, slower ball, ends up playing inside the line as he looks to run it down

pollard to mishra, out, timber! bowled from wide the crease, rolling the fingers on it, mishra plays the angle, the ball doesn't quite go in with it, and he ends up playing inside the line. off stump no more
jayasuriya to sangwan, no run, drives straight to extra cover, sent back and the high throw saves sangwan

jayasuriya to ladda, out, poor running and this one is ending fast! drops it just off the wicket and calls sangwan through, bravo at point is super fast, swoops on it, and underarm-flicks it to hit the only visible stump direct
jayasuriya to nannes, no run, plays inside the line of a ball turning away
jayasuriya to ladda, no run, blocks it to cover
pollard to nannes, 1 run, helped away for a single to deep point
pollard to ladda, no run, played with an open face to backward point
pollard to ladda, no run, bowled from behind the stumps, slower ball too, beats him
pollard to ladda, 1 wide, called a wide a she misses while trying to run this down to third man
pollard to ladda, no run, opens the face, finds point
jayasuriya to nannes, no run, hit back to cover
jayasuriya to nannes, no run, played to extra cover
jayasuriya to nannes, no run, goes deep into the crease to defend
jayasuriya to ladda, no run, turn and bounce from outside leg, beats him
harbhajan singh to nannes, no run, helps this away, with the turn
harbhajan singh to nannes, out, it's all over! gets an inside edge as he looks to force it through covers, gets a big inside edge onto the stumps
kumar to lumb, no run, swings with the angle, away from the left-handed lumb who shoulders arms
steyn to ojha, 3 runs, flicked and mis-fielded by manish pandey at square leg and the batsmen run through for three. steyn topped 143 kph there.
steyn to lumb, no run, swing and a miss outside off
steyn to lumb, no run, he's through him! pacy delivery and lumb ic caught deep in the crease and plays all over it.
kumar to ojha, 1 wide, commentator's curse! praveen drifts well down legside this time.
kumar to lumb, 1 run, slower ball and lumb goes through with the shot over midwicket after coming down the track. it falls safe between two fielders
steyn to ojha, no run, pacy again - 148 kph, and ojha gets behind it nicely and defends
steyn to ojha, no run, similar ball, gets bat on it this time, but straight to square leg
steyn to ojha, 1 wide, this time he slips down the leg side for a wide. 149 kph. steyn needs to tweak the radar a bit, now that he's hit top gear.
kallis to lumb, 1 no ball, free hit coming up. kallis oversteps and lumb will look to break free
kumble to lumb, no run, quick and angled across, pushed to mid off
kallis to jhunjhunwala, no run, jhunjhunwala escapes! definite edge on that one, the fielding team was sure they had him but umpire hariharan is unmoved.
kallis to jhunjhunwala, four runs, he makes room and carves it over point this time. rubbing salt into kallis' wounds with a four!
kumble to martyn, 1 run, and again, similar ball but played away for a single off the backfoot
steyn to martyn, 1 run, makes room (or was he running away from the pace?), but steyn follows him towards legstump. played away towards deep point for a run.
kallis to martyn, 1 run, slower ball, and again the batsman somehow survives! mis-hits towards mid-on, and runs a single.
kallis to pathan, 1 run, safely tucked away towards square leg for a single.
kallis to pathan, 1 run, around the stumps again to yusuf, and he drives off the backfoot towards long off for one
kallis to martyn, 1 wide, loses the line on this occasion, the attempted slower ball slips well down the legside for a wide.
kallis to martyn, 1 run, martyn just can't break free. again tries to make room, but kallis keeps it tight and he can only work it away feebly for a quick single towards midwicket
kallis to pathan, no run, and he bounces him yet again. this was really dug in, and was on the verge of being called a wide.
kumble to martyn, 1 run, down the track and looks to drive, but can't get any kind of timing going. martyn's having a nightmare so far.
vinay kumar to dogra, no run, and again! hits him on the helmet this time. rajasthan need to find a way to counter this - the other teams will be watching keenly.
vinay kumar to dogra, 1 run, gets it away this time towards third man for a run.
kumar to martyn, 1 wide, starts off with a wayward ball, outside off. swings away for good measure, easy call of wide

kumar to dogra, out, three in three for praveen!!! first hat-trick of ipl 2010! straight and as fast as praveen can be, and it is good enough for dogra. middle stump is out of the ground and praveen roars! rajasthan going down in a hurry here.
kumar to morkel, no run, play and a miss outside off by morne morkel
vinay kumar to warne, 1 run, even slower - 97 kph. warne waits and waits and inside edges it onto his boot for a single to cover.
vinay kumar to morkel, no run, slow again, outside the left-hander's offstump. play and miss.
kumar to morkel, no run, thin air yet again for morne. nice changes in pace from praveen.
kumar to morkel, 2 runs, guided away towards cover for a couple. for a man who aims to emulate mathew hayden's batting, morne is struggling a bit for timing.
kumar to morkel, no run, and again, swing and a miss. great spell from praveen. he's gone for a few in the past, but kept it really tight today. and the hat-trick does his cause no harm.
kumble to patel, no run, outside off and turn away from the right hander. he can't connect.
kumble to patel, 1 leg bye, hoick and a miss, the ball thuds into the batsman's thigh and runs away for a leg-bye

kumble to morkel, out, gotcha! kumble deceives morne all ends up, the spin eludes the outside edge and morne's backfoot goes very slightly outside his crease. boucher is waiting behind and whips off the bails.
morkel to kallis, 1 wide, the horror, the horror! drifts way down the leg for a wide.
morkel to kallis, 1 wide, and again! this could end in double quick time unless rajasthan recalibrates its radar.
morkel to kallis, no run, finally gets it outside off, defended off the backfoot towards point.
morkel to kallis, 1 wide, back to the old line, well down the leg for a wide.
patel to kallis, 1 run, its on legstump again, kallis turns it away easily behind square for another single.
patel to kallis, no run, good line, just outside off and pushing kallis onto the backfoot. he taps it away towards the offside.
patel to kallis, no run, similar ball, looks to work it towards the leg side, but can't get it away.
morkel to kallis, four runs, well, he's really struggling with his line here, another shocker down the legside, meat and drink for the in-form kallis who sends it off to fine leg for four.
morkel to kallis, no run, moves outside off this time, finally. kallis hops back and defends it towards cover.
morkel to kallis, 1 wide, tight call from umpire hariharan. slightly wider than the previous ball, but it was still a smidgeon inside the tramlines.
morkel to kallis, no run, offstump line, and kallis stays on the backfoot. defends it to the leg side. bangalore don't need to rush here, and kallis certainly isn't.
morkel to kallis, four runs, whaddashot! that could have easily been kallis batting in a test match. high elbow, beautiful timing, all along the ground, through long off for four.
patel to pandey, no run,
patel to pandey, no run, opens the face of the bat and forces off the backfoot
patel to pandey, no run, similar ball, similar shot, though he opened the face slightly lesser this time according to venkat raghav, our numerically oriented scorer.
patel to pandey, no run, and again, can't get it through square.
warne to pandey, 1 run, bowling! the classical legspinner, from outside leg, turning and taking the right-hander's outside edge
narwal to pandey, no run,
warne to pandey, no run, hits him flush on the toe, but outside leg. warne lets out a big appeal nevertheless.
warne to pandey, no run,
warne to pandey, no run, and a super ball to finish off. sharp spin, beats pandey's outside edge by inches. warney's got the leggie going well, but no variations in spin.
narwal to kallis, 1 wide, wide down the legside. fifth wide of the innings.
morkel to pandey, 1 run, looks to deposit it over deep midwicket, and just about gets it to mid on for a run. four to win.
morkel to kallis, 1 run, kallis is in no hurry, plays it away quietly towards square for another run.
narwal to kallis, no run, moves towards the offside and looks to whip it towards midwicket but can't make connection.
narwal to kallis, no run, on offstump this time and kallis looks to work it away to the legside, but does not succeed.
narwal to kallis, 1 wide, pandey will be going mad at the non-striker's end, as narwal seems intent on denying him a chance to finish it off with a boundary. another wide down leg.
ashwin to warner, four runs, this time warner finds the gap, backing away to make space to free his arms and drills it past extra cover
ashwin to warner, 1 run, pushed towards mid-off for a single
joginder sharma to sehwag, no run, poor shot, swings at thin air and nearly loses his off stump, slower ball i think
joginder sharma to sehwag, no run, he gives it another bang but hits it straight to the bowler
joginder sharma to sehwag, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and angles it to third man, quick single taken
balaji to dilshan, no run,
balaji to dilshan, 1 run, gives him width and he slashes it hard along the ground down to square third man

joginder sharma to dilshan, 1 run, direct hit but he's safe, pushes it to mid-on and they scramble the single,murali hits at the bowler's end but dilshan makes his ground, the third umpire takes a look
balaji to sehwag, no run, wild swing but the makes contact of the toe of the bat, the ball rolls to the on side
balaji to sehwag, no run, swishes too early and he swishes at thin air again,in fact this was quite close to taking the edge
balaji to sehwag, 1 run, good running, tapped with soft hands down to cover and sets off quickly
balaji to dilshan, no run,
kemp to sehwag, four runs, good placement there! not a bad delivery, sehwag gets nicely beside the line and angles it just wide of backward point, great timing
kemp to sehwag, 2 runs, punches it wide of long-off and that;s his fifty! off 22 balls
muralitharan to sehwag, no run, comes round the wicket, tucks him up for room and he defends
muralitharan to sehwag, four runs, he gives him width this time, opens the face of the bat and glides it elegantly wide of backward point
muralitharan to sehwag, 2 wides, too wide down the leg side, doesn't offer a shot and the ball deflects off the keeper
muralitharan to dilshan, 1 run,
muralitharan to sehwag, 1 run, rocks back and tucks it to the on side
morkel to dilshan, no run, when the scoop doesn't come off it's not the prettiest sight is it? hew tries to pick that from the off stump, the ball hits his arm
morkel to dilshan, 1 wide, slower ball but too wide outside off
morkel to dilshan, no run, tries to force it through the off side but misses
morkel to sehwag, no run, makes room and jams it out to point
muralitharan to dilshan, no run, keeps a bit low and he just manages to keep it out
muralitharan to dilshan, no run, the doosra beats his off stump! that's how u can keep him quiet
muralitharan to dilshan, 1 run, tucks it towards midwicket
muralitharan to sehwag, 1 run, rocks back and slaps it just wide of the non-striker,  down to long-off
muralitharan to sehwag, 1 wide, just wide down the leg side
ashwin to dilshan, 1 run, closes the face of the bat and he pushes it back to the bowler
ashwin to sehwag, 1 wide, down the leg side
ashwin to sehwag, 1 run, tucks him down to midwicket for a single
muralitharan to sehwag, 1 run, goes back and tucks it with the turn to midwicket
muralitharan to dilshan, out, chips down the track and he tries to clear midwicket but he fails to keep it down, raina's alert and he takes it easily
muralitharan to karthik, 1 leg bye, tucked to the on side with soft hands and he takes a single

muralitharan to sehwag, out, kemp take a bow! sehwag waltzes down the track and tries to clear long-off but makes contact off the splice of the bat, the ball swirls in the air and kemp takes it one handed and falls backward just inches from the rope
ashwin to de villiers, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and dabs it wide of point
ashwin to manhas, four runs, width offered and he makes room and angles it down to third man, beats the fielder in the circle
raina to karthik, 1 run, tucks it down to square leg
morkel to karthik, 1 run, opens the face and taps it down to the off side
morkel to manhas, four runs, gives him width outside off, manhas gets beside the line, rolls his wrists and cracks it wide of backward point, third man can't get to it
morkel to manhas, 1 run,
muralitharan to karthik, 1 run, continues round the wicket, he chips it in the air to the wide open spaces at midwicket
joginder sharma to bhatia, 1 run, pushes it down to point
joginder sharma to bhatia, 1 run, punches it down to mid-on for a single
joginder sharma to manhas, 1 run, punches it square of the wicket on the off side
ashwin to manhas, 1 run,
joginder sharma to manhas, no run, slower ball, he chips down the track and swings hard and misses, good change of pace
joginder sharma to bhatia, 1 run,
balaji to manhas, 1 run,
nannes to patel, no run, nips back in and slices him in half! superb delivery and well kept
nannes to patel, 1 wide, a touch wide outside the off stump, he shoulders arms
nannes to patel, 1 run, taps it with soft hands to the off side and sets off

yadav to hayden, four runs, dropped and a misfield!  hayden biffs it hard at the bowler who gets his right hand to it and deflects it to mid-off, sloppy effort by the fielder as the ball goes right between his legs
yadav to hayden, no run, chops it back to the bowler
nannes to hayden, 1 run, tucks it towards midwicket
nannes to badrinath, no run, the slower ball beats him outside the off stump, well bowled
sangwan to hayden, 1 run, so much for the first sighting, he mistimes it to the on side, tries to whack it across the line
sangwan to badrinath, no run, opens the face and angles it to the off side
bhatia to hayden, four runs, down the leg side and he gets a faint trickle down to fine leg, wide of the fielder in the circle
bhatia to hayden, no run,

sangwan to hayden, 1 run, run-out appeal! hayden pushes the ball to mid-off and challenges mishra by going for the single, the fielder picks up and fires a direct hit at the bowler's end and hayden is just in with the dive, third umpire takes a look
sangwan to badrinath, no run, tries to crack it past midwicket but mistimes it to mid-on
yadav to badrinath, 1 leg bye, doesn't bounce much and the ball hits him close to the abdomen and rolls to the on side
yadav to hayden, no run,
dilshan to hayden, 1 run,
yadav to raina, 1 run, steers it with soft hands towards dilshan at point and takes a sharp single
bhatia to raina, 1 run,
bhatia to hayden, six runs, take cover! hayden bashes one over deep midwicket again, the ball sits up nicely for him to club it away
sangwan to raina, no run,
mishra to hayden, 1 wide, too wide outside off, even two mongoose bats won't be enough to chase that
nannes to hayden, 1 wide, nannes drifts too wide down the leg side, hayden tries to clip it away
nannes to raina, 1 wide, nannes struggles with his direction again, just a trifle wide down the leg side
mishra to raina, 1 run,
mishra to morkel, no run,
yadav to raina, four runs, drifts down the leg side, fine leg is up and he gently tucks it around the corner, it was that easy
yadav to raina, 1 wide, drags it wide outside off, he fails to make contact
yadav to raina, 1 run, punches it just past the bowler for a single
dilshan to raina, 1 run, stays back and punches it past cover, sehwag gets across and misfields
dilshan to kemp, 1 run, squirts it to midwicket
mishra to kemp, 1 wide, another wide down the leg side, delhi have bowled too many of those!
mishra to raina, 1 run, drives him long-off
nannes to kemp, no run,
nannes to kemp, no run, beats him again just outside the off stump, nice angle away frpm the right hander
nannes to kemp, 1 run, squirted out just wide of mid-off and he takes a chance with the single, he dives and the throw is just wide
nannes to vijay, 1 run, tucked to deep midwicket, chance for a second run but they don't risk it
sangwan to vijay, four runs, good shot by vijay! he knew mid-on was up and he backed himself  to loft a slower ball comfortably over the fielder
sangwan to vijay, 1 run, makes room and steers him wide of point
sreesanth to gilchrist, 1 wide, pressure's on sreesanth and it shows. attempted slower ball goes awry, down the leg side
srivastava to laxman, 2 runs, and this time, he laxmans it to midwicket, wrists all over that, a hint of inswing, but he picked it and tucked it away.
srivastava to gibbs, no run, nice swing, beats the attempted hoick and just misses the stumps.
srivastava to gibbs, 1 run, almost has gibbs caught and bowled. it pops up off his bat towards the bowler, and just eludes the outstretched hands
srivastava to symonds, four runs, ah, another inside edge, this time from symonds, misses the stumps and flies to fine leg for four
chawla to symonds, no run,
chawla to symonds, 1 run, safely tapped away for a single through midwicket
chawla to gibbs, 1 run, gets it away through mid on for another single
bipul sharma to gibbs, 1 run,
bipul sharma to symonds, 1 run, tapped away by symonds behind square for a single
bipul sharma to symonds, 1 run, driven nicely down to mid off for another single
chawla to symonds, 1 run, finishes off with a single towards mid wicket
pathan to symonds, 1 run, slower ball from irfan. played away to midwicket
pathan to gibbs, 1 run, drives it down to mid off. irfan's not swinging it anymore.
sreesanth to symonds, 1 run, slightly wider of offstump this time and he gets it down to third man off the backfoot
sreesanth to symonds, four runs, tries another slower ball, and it slips down the legside, symonds gets something on it and sends it on its way to fine leg. gift
yuvraj singh to gibbs, no run,
yuvraj singh to symonds, 1 run, similar ball, symonds taps it down to mid off to rotate the strike

yuvraj singh to sharma, out, superb piece of fielding by mahela jayawardene from point! rohit steers it down to point and takes off for a tight single. the throw was fired in to the non-striker's end and rohit had to put in the dive, but it was all over. third umpire completes the formalities and deccan have lost two here.
yuvraj singh to symonds, 1 run,
bipul sharma to symonds, six runs, symonds does it again! this is golf at its very best. bangs the ball on offstump easily, very very high and it clears long off easily.
bipul sharma to symonds, 2 runs,
yuvraj singh to symonds, 1 run, eased down to long off for a single. symmo is crucial
yuvraj singh to suman, no run, down the track, misses and sanga misses the stumping. first blemish in the fielding.
yuvraj singh to suman, no run,
yuvraj singh to suman, no run, very tight lines for yuvraj. pushes him back and he can't get it past the bowler.
yuvraj singh to symonds, no run, symmo jumps out, but can't reach the pitch and quietly taps it away.
chawla to suman, 1 run,
pathan to vaas, 1 run, very wide of vaas, and he stretches big time to get bat on it, runs away to cover for a single
pathan to vaas, 2 runs, just eludes bopara's fingers at midwicket. goes down as a drop.
pathan to vaas, no run,
pathan to suman, 1 run, wide outside off, tapped away to point. good over from irfan.

sreesanth to jaskaran singh, out, great work from sanga! the attempted guide to third man goes to his right. sanga gathers, does not bother with trifles like removing the gloves and calmly under-arms a throw to hit down the stumps at the striker's end.

sreesanth to jaskaran singh, 2 runs, its all happening! goes for an almighty hoick, mis-hits it and it goes really high, probably out of srivastava's sight before coming back down, and he fails to gather the catch at midwicket. but he fires in a good throw to hit the stumps down at the striker's end. the batsman's just made his ground though. sreesanth is quite disappointed with the drop.
vaas to bisla, no run,

singh to bopara, 1 run, miss by gibbs gives away an overthrow. good ball from rp, hint of swing back in to bopara, who plays it to gibbs and takes a few paces. the under-armed throw misses and they run one
vaas to bopara, 1 run,
singh to bopara, no run, good lines, bopara is trying to break free, but can't connect off the backfoot
singh to bopara, 1 wide, and he loses the radar this time. strays down the leg for a wide.
singh to bopara, no run,
vaas to yuvraj singh, no run, nice and tight line again, on yuvraj's off stump, he defends it down to mid on
symonds to bopara, no run, tidies up nicely off his own bowling, running to the leg side to deny a single
ojha to jayawardene, 1 run, straighter this time and turned away to square leg
symonds to bopara, 1 run, a touch of inswing there, bopara gets a thick inside edge towards midwicket
ojha to bopara, 1 run,
ojha to barath, no run, stays back and pats it towards point, can't get it past
sharma to bopara, no run, hit towards the offisde, nicely saved by the bowler diving to his left
sharma to barath, no run,
ojha to bopara, 1 run, swept away from the leg stump line towards square leg
sharma to pathan, no run, pitches outside leg and turns towards pathan's leg stump
sharma to bopara, 1 run, picked away nicely from middle and leg towards midwicket
sharma to pathan, 1 run, outside leg and turning in again, turned away off the backfoot towards midwicket
symonds to pathan, 1 run,
symonds to chawla, no run, guides it from close to the stumps towards point region off the backfoot
sharma to pathan, 1 run,
sharma to pathan, 1 run, nearly does him this time. inside edged past the stumps
vaas to pathan, 1 wide, vaas back in, and slides one down the leg. neat take from gilly, standing up to the stumps.
symonds to chawla, no run, straight on middle stump and he can't work it away through the legside.
symonds to chawla, 1 run, outside off this time, driven down for one.
singh to pathan, four runs, swatted away from off stump towards square leg by irfan. four runs.
singh to pathan, six runs, again! irfan's batted superbly today, and there's no let up, he's sent it in the same direction, flatter and over the ropes
ojha to bipul sharma, four runs, well hit and very badly fielded at deep midwicket. down on one knee and hit hard, and it went through the fielder's legs.
ojha to bipul sharma, 1 run,
ojha to pathan, 4 leg byes, wide down the leg and it's taken some pad and run away to the boundary. hiccups in the deccan camp!
ojha to pathan, 2 runs, symmo shows how it is done! well swept again by irfan to square leg and symmo puts in a big dive, running in from midwicket, to stop it from going for four.
ojha to pathan, 1 run, gets it away square to the leg side for one.
singh to bipul sharma, 1 run, drilled down to long off, only for a single. pressure's on irfan.
dinda to fazal, no run, another big lbw appeal, this time though it started straight and would perhaps have misses the leg stump. hawk-eye says kissing leg stump, koertzen goes with his instinct
dinda to fazal, four runs, walks down the track and swipes across it as if in an atm, gets four past mid-on
sharma to ojha, 1 wide, starts off with a wide outside off stump
sharma to fazal, 1 wide, too far down the leg side, fazal tries for a shot over the infield but fails to connect
dinda to fazal, no run, walks down the track, dinda angles it across him, he defends it to cover, and has hit too strongly to come for a quick single
dinda to fazal, four runs, incredible shot, capitalising on the strong off-side field, takes this from well outside off and dragged it to the square-leg boundary
sharma to fazal, no run, straight delivery, played with an open face, can't get it past point
sharma to fazal, 2 runs, steps down the track and hits him across the line into the leg side
sharma to ojha, 1 run, steered away from outside off, gets a single
bond to fazal, 1 run, tip-and-run, to mid-off
bond to fazal, no run, hits across the line again, doesn't get it past mid-on
bond to fazal, out, well maybe it's not exactly faiz's day all the way, telegrams bond before coming down the wicket and he bounces him, the mis-hit lobs straight to mid-off
mathews to ojha, no run, looks to steer the first ball, can;t beat point
kartik to jhunjhunwala, 1 wide, fired down the leg side
kartik to jhunjhunwala, no run, good finish to the over for karthik, bowls straight and fields the defensive hit back
mathews to jhunjhunwala, 1 run, slower ball again, gets a single to wide of point
kartik to jhunjhunwala, no run, flat delivery again, hit straight to cover
bond to jhunjhunwala, 1 run, steered away to third man, yusuf back on strike
bond to pathan, four runs, delicate! dug into the body, moves out of the line, and then gets under it and guides it past the keeper, not much pace in the wicket here
bond to jhunjhunwala, 1 run, and again, jhunjhunwala runs it down to third man, pathan back on strike
kartik to jhunjhunwala, no run, karthik on target, around off stump, defended back to the bowler
kartik to jhunjhunwala, 1 run, too straight this time, and is flicked away for one
kartik to pathan, no run, leading edge as he looks to bunt it to leg for one, is safe
bond to jhunjhunwala, no run, slower ball, checks his shot, gets it straight to midwicket
dinda to pathan, no run, starts with a slower ball, 106ks, pathan pats it back to him
hodge to jhunjhunwala, four runs, tries another square drive, gets a thick edge and even better result, in the air but past backward point
hodge to voges, four runs, driven against the turn, first shot in the ipl and it's a cracker, past extra cover
mathews to jhunjhunwala, four runs, starts off with a predictable slower ball and jhunjhunwala is waiting and has crashed it square for four
mathews to jhunjhunwala, 1 run, another slower ball and he runs it down to third man for a single
mathews to voges, 1 run, slower ball again, and he runs it down to third man again
mathews to jhunjhunwala, 1 run, he is bowling only slower ones, i'll let you know when he bowls the change-up quick delivery, dragged from outside off and gets a single to square leg
sharma to jhunjhunwala, out, and jhunjhunwala misses the fifty! makes room to club it into the leg side, the ball follows him and gets him high on the bat, and it's an easy catch at midwicket
sharma to dogra, out, edged and gone! poor shot really. wide delivery outside off and he goes after it and has to really reach out to be able to edge it. would have been wide had he let it be
sharma to voges, no run, misses out on the square drive, good over so far
bond to voges, 1 run, gets a bottom edge for a single to point
bond to warne, out, shane gets shane! looks to chip it over extra-cover but gets it way too straight, hitting it down long-off's throat
pathan to tiwary, 1 run, this time the offbreak follows him again but he manages it wide enough of cover for one
tait to tiwary, 1 run, tip-and-run, around off, and they make it despite a direct-hit from yusuf pathan
pathan to tiwary, 1 run, pushes an offbreak to midwicket for a single
pathan to tiwary, four runs, nice shot, set himself up by making room and then chipping over the cover ring - there is no deep fielder on the off side

tait to hodge, 1 run, jhunjhunwala has demolished the stumps! dropped at his feet and pujara calls him through for one, jhunjhunwala charges in from cover, dives for the ball, deflects it onto the stumps and goes shoulder first into the wood work. pujara's dive sees him in
patel to pujara, 1 run, slower ball, guided wide of backward point for his first single out his score of 17
trivedi to pujara, 1 run, slower ball outside off, steered away for a single
trivedi to hodge, no run, hodge shows signs of frustration, jumps out of the crease and swings and misses
warne to pujara, 1 run, pujara jumps out of the crease, the ball dips on him, he manages to get a single into the on side
trivedi to hodge, 1 run, pushed to cover for one
warne to hodge, 1 run, pushed down to long-off, stayed in crease this time
warne to hodge, 1 run, sharp turn from outside leg, helped away around the corner
pathan to ganguly, 2 runs, no one saving one on the leg side and ganguly bunts it into the space and hares back for two
pathan to ganguly, 1 run, swept away in the air, one bounce to long leg
pathan to shah, no run, quick sharp offbreak, no room, defended
tait to ganguly, 2 runs, steered to third man, trivedi runs to the other side, then recovers, enough time for ganguly to come back
patel to shah, 1 run, slower ball, picked to square leg for one
patel to ganguly, 1 run, 113 kph, drags the slower ball with no timing to deep midwicket
patel to shah, 1 run, take a single to third man
patel to saha, no run, dot ball, and rajasthan are officially on the board
kumar to jayasuriya, 1 run, nice swing from leg to off, and sanath thick-edges to third man. praveen's been swinging it consistently so far.
kumar to tendulkar, no run, big swing away from sachin and really late too. misses the outside edge and boucher has to dive to collect it.
steyn to jayasuriya, 1 wide, working up some pace, up from 133 to 140 ks, but this one slides down the leg side
steyn to tare, no run, fast and furious outside off, he lets it go.
steyn to tare, no run, play and a miss! really quick for tare this.
steyn to tare, four runs, squeezes it through the slips. late on the shot and hence got a thick outside edge, it did not carry to kallis and ran away
kumar to tendulkar, 1 wide, starts wide and then swings away a mile. sachin's standing well out to counter the swing, and lunges but still can't reach it.
kumar to tendulkar, 4 leg byes, sliding down the leg and swinging down, all the way for four. wrongly called leg byes and sachin's not pleased
steyn to tare, no run, similar ball, nice shot with straight bat and high elbow, but not straight enough to elude mid on
steyn to tare, 1 wide, slips down the leg again. easy take for boucher, but steyn has to rebowl that one.
steyn to tare, 1 run, similar ball, similar shot, but this time they set off quickly for a single.

steyn to tendulkar, four runs, and again! at 127 kph, sachin will send these to the boundary all day. it's even further outside leg this time and the master has no problems. three fours to square leg, and steyn is having nighmares of gwalior!
vinay kumar to tiwary, no run, looks to force the ball through the off side this time, but can't find the gap
kallis to tendulkar, 1 run, marginally straighter this time, and sachin picks him off middle and sends it to square leg.
kumble to tendulkar, 1 run, very straight, on middle, sachin makes room and looks to whack it through the covers
vinay kumar to tendulkar, no run, slow ball, back of the hand, sachin tries to guide it past point, but can't beat kohli. tiwary is backing up a long way, but gets back.
vinay kumar to tendulkar, no run, very good slower ball outside off and beats sachin all ends up. hits the outside edge as he swings hard, and dribbles through to boucher.

vinay kumar to tendulkar, out, the big big fish is gone! straight ball, angling from middle to leg, and sachin tries to get inside the line and work it down. he exposes leg stump, the ball finds a way past and disturbs the woodwork. mumbai indians are in big trouble now.
vinay kumar to sathish, 1 leg bye, sliding down leg again, gets it down to boucher for a quick single
kumble to pollard, no run, flippa! on offstump, pollard stays back and keeps it out.
vinay kumar to pollard, 1 run, stays back and guides this one down, behind point
vinay kumar to pollard, 1 run, back of the hand slower ball this time, at 98.9 kph. on leg and middle, pollard waits and plays it to midwicket
vinay kumar to sathish, four runs, nice shot! satish frees his arms and makes use of the few inches of room he had outside off, and sends it through to the point boundary
vinay kumar to sathish, 2 runs, misfield, first in the game, from anil kumble at square leg, lets them run through for two
steyn to sathish, no run, sensational fielding by manish pandey at point! it was timed quite well, but he dived to his right and nearly created a run out opportunity
kallis to sathish, 1 run, slower ball, 112.6 kph, outside off. satish opens the face and runs it down well to third man. not enough pace on that ball to go to the boundary.
kumble to sathish, four runs, squeezes it down nicely through the really small gap at point. poor fielding from steyn inside the circle and it runs away.
kumble to sathish, 1 leg bye, sliding down this time, picks a leg bye to square leg
kumar to sathish, 1 run, slower ball, back of the hand, and satish plays it with the turn, so to speak, towards kohli at point. good hand from satish here.
steyn to sathish, 1 run, similar ball, smilar shot from satish, but it goes finer, on the bounce to third man
kallis to khan, no run, slower ball outside off, zaheer stays back and guides it to point.
kumar to khan, no run,
khan to kallis, 1 run, on leg stump this time, turned away fown to deep square leg for one

malinga to kallis, 1 run, dropped by rayudu who has hurt himself in the process. it was the slower one on the middle and leg,  kallis decides rather late to play the uppish flick and rayudu lunged out to his left to try take the over-head catch but couldn't hold on. worse ...he landed on his elbow. ouch.
malinga to kallis, no run, stays back to defend to the off side
bravo to kallis, no run, around off stump, keeper is standing up, steered to backward point ... the fielder fires in a direct hit but kallis is home
bravo to pandey, 2 runs, whips this one to deep square-leg where tiwary makes a diving stop
harbhajan singh to kallis, no run, stays back to tap the off break to the on side
jayasuriya to pandey, 1 run, around off stump, manish stays back to play the flat-batted thump to long-off.
jayasuriya to kallis, 1 run, on the middle and leg line, kallis stays adjacent to the line, opens his bat-face and steers the ball to point
jayasuriya to pandey, 1 run, backs away to drive to long-off
jayasuriya to kallis, 1 run, around off stump line, steered to point region
harbhajan singh to kallis, 1 run, stays back to work the ball from off stump to backward square-leg
harbhajan singh to pandey, out, and now harbhajan screams after taking out pandey. pandey swiped that straight to pollard at midwicket.
harbhajan singh to uthappa, no run, from round the stumps, a lovely topspinner that goes past the outside edge. lots of over spin on that and it bounces just past the defensive prod
jayasuriya to kallis, 1 run, stays back to punch it to long-off
jayasuriya to uthappa, 1 run, backs away to force it to the off side
harbhajan singh to kallis, no run, shuffles to the off stump line and stabs a topspinner to the off side
harbhajan singh to kallis, 1 run, stays back to clip the off break on middle and leg past square-leg . one slip in place
bravo to kallis, 1 run, walks towards off and runs this down to third man
bravo to kallis, 1 run, around the off stump line, pushed out to point region
malinga to kallis, no run, slower one around the off stump line, turned to midwicket
malinga to uthappa, 1 run, outside off stump, dabbed past backward point
harbhajan singh to kohli, no run, around the off stump line, tapped to the on side
mishra to gibbs, 1 run, moves down the track and drags it through mid-on
nagar to gilchrist, no run, on the off stump line, tapped to the on side
ladda to gilchrist, no run, the leggie skids the ball in towards the off stump, pushed out back down the track
ladda to symonds, no run, slides in from outside off, jabbed to point
mishra to gibbs, 1 run, the quickish slider on middle and leg, turned to the on side
mishra to symonds, 1 run, skids in towards middle and leg, dabbed to midwicket
mishra to gibbs, 1 run, around the off stump line, turned to vacant midwicket region
mishra to symonds, no run, on the middle stump line, stabbed to the on side
mishra to symonds, no run, quickish delivery, straightening on the middle stump line, poked away to the on side
ladda to symonds, no run, around the off stump line, eased to the off side
ladda to symonds, 1 run, skids low .. symonds crouches to keep it out
yadav to symonds, 1 run, moves in towards off and middle, defended to the off side
yadav to gibbs, 1 run, squeezes this to the off side
yadav to symonds, 1 run, backs away to drill to deep cover
yadav to gibbs, no run,
yadav to gibbs, 1 run,

nannes to gibbs, 1 run, run out chance missed pushed towards extra cover and gets across for a quick single. ab swoops in and flicks a throw at non-striker's end but misses. gibbs would have been run out ,.. he was not even in the frame
nannes to gibbs, 1 run, outside off stump, run down to third man
nagar to symonds, 1 run, stays back to tap the off break to square-leg
nagar to rg sharma, no run, slow off break outside off, defended to the on side
nagar to rg sharma, no run,
nagar to symonds, no run, skips down the track and jabs it to the off side
nagar to symonds, four runs, stays back, creates room and thrashes it .. a fore-hand fierce flat-batted thrash past the non-striker!
nagar to rg sharma, no run,
nagar to rg sharma, 1 run, turns in to the middle, eased to square-leg
yadav to symonds, 1 run,
yadav to symonds, no run, walks down the track and jabs it away in the end
henriques to rg sharma, 1 run, slower one outside off stump, rohit waits for the ball to arrive before opening the bat-face to run it to third man
henriques to suman, no run, pushes this to the midwicket
henriques to suman, 1 run, slower one, tapped to the on side
nannes to suman, no run, slower one, outside off, guided to backward point
nannes to suman, 1 run, from outside off stump, run down to third man
yadav to rg sharma, no run, driven straight to cover
yadav to rg sharma, 1 run, moves outside leg and runs it to third man
henriques to suman, 1 run, another slower one, pushed to long-off
nannes to rg sharma, 2 runs, swings to the deep midwicket for couple of runs
nannes to rg sharma, out, holes out this time to mid-off .. rohit moves outside leg stump and goes for the lofted hit and skies it up straight towards mid-off
yadav to vaas, 2 runs, swings it to wide midwicket region for couple of runs
vaas to warner, no run, around the off stump line, pushes it out cautiously to the off side
singh to warner, no run, a dot ball. stop the press. warner drives to cover
ojha to warner, no run, steps out , almost yorks himself, just about manages to dig it out
ojha to de villiers, 1 run, outside off stump, square driven to point region
vaas to de villiers, no run,
rg sharma to de villiers, 2 runs, skips down the track and whips to venugopal rao at deep midwicket
rg sharma to de villiers, no run, pushes this one back to rohit
r sharma to warner, 1 run, pushed out to cover for a single
r sharma to warner, 1 run, on the middle stump line, dabbed past midwicket
r sharma to de villiers, 1 run, slider outside off, dragged down to longon
symonds to de villiers, 2 runs, turned wide of midwicket for two runs.. very close second run .. he just about drags the bat back inside the crease
symonds to warner, 1 run,
symonds to warner, 1 run, on the middle and leg, dabbed to midwicket
ojha to warner, six runs,
symonds to warner, 1 run,
symonds to de villiers, 1 run,
symonds to warner, no run,
symonds to warner, no run,
symonds to warner, 2 runs,
symonds to warner, no run,
ojha to de villiers, 1 run, delivery on the middle and leg, flicked through midwicket
singh to karthik, 1 run, moves towards the off stump to slice it to deep cover
singh to de villiers, no run,
r sharma to karthik, 1 run,
r sharma to manhas, no run,
r sharma to manhas, 1 run, pushed to coverse
r sharma to karthik, no run, goes back to push it back to the bowler
r sharma to karthik, 1 run, picks a single with a push to mid-=on
singh to karthik, 1 run, the intended whip to the on side to third man
singh to manhas, no run,

r sharma to karthik, 1 run, almost a run out. dk squeezes it to the off side and rushes across. gilly flicks the gloves off and fires a throw at the non-striker's end . dk dives to get back in the crease
r sharma to manhas, four runs, finally, a boundary for delhi. he charged out and plays a neat sliced square drive over point
ojha to henriques, 1 run, on the off stump line, pushed through covers
ojha to karthik, 1 run, it was pushed towards midwicket  and they get across for a quick single .. it was refered upstairs but moises was in
ojha to henriques, 2 runs, stays back to work it to long-leg.
symonds to nagar, no run, outside off stump, stabbed to backward point ..
r sharma to karthik, 1 run, stays back to work it to midwicket for a single ..
r sharma to karthik, 1 run, stays back to push this to cover point
symonds to yadav, 1 run, drives this one to long-off
gony to pathan, four runs, similar line outside off, irfan lets it go for a change.
gony to pathan, no run, similar ball, and he lets it go for a change
gony to pathan, 1 run, thickish outside edge this time, and it runs down to third man
ashwin to sangakkara, no run, tight line, on leg and turning in, sanga looks to nudge and run to the leg side, but cannot get it far enough
balaji to sangakkara, four runs, super shot from sanga! waltzs down the track, takes the ball on the bounce and shovels it over the covers.
balaji to sangakkara, 1 run,
muralitharan to pathan, 1 run, stays back and flicks it from outside leg, behind square

ashwin to pathan, six runs, regal hit! irfan's struck a purple patch, he shimmies down the track, its in his slot and he plays a wonderful loft-drive over midwicket. ganguly would have been proud of that shot
balaji to yuvraj singh, 1 run, and it shows. nicely concealed slower ball and yuvi was so early in the shot, he was playing it in the last ipl. pops up, but lands safely towards mid off for one
muralitharan to yuvraj singh, no run,
muralitharan to yuvraj singh, 1 run, similar shot, can't time it this time.
ashwin to kaif, no run,
kemp to kaif, 1 wide, slower ball, sliding down the leg and it's a wide.
raina to yuvraj singh, no run, quick outside off, and beats yuvraj. a bit of cat and mouse there.
raina to yuvraj singh, 1 run, tucked away towards midwicket. yuvi will retain strike with that single
balaji to yuvraj singh, 1 run, slower ball, 115.9 kph and yuvraj is caught by surprise, early into the flick, which ultimately turns into a fend down to fine leg.
raina to kaif, 1 run, again, hit hard by kaif to long off and vijay intercepts it
muralitharan to bisla, no run, doosra on middle and turning marginally towards off, gets the leading edge
muralitharan to bisla, no run,
morkel to bisla, no run, super fielding by morkel off his own bowling, bisla can't get it past morkel. yuvi is anxious for strike
morkel to bisla, 1 run, gets it away finally, down to fine leg.
balaji to theron, 1 wide, bala lets this one slip down the leg for a wide
balaji to chawla, four runs, lashes out this time, similar line from balaji, but chawla makes good contact and gets it down behind the point boundary. nice shot.
pathan to patel, 1 wide, slips down the leg first ball, that's a wide
pathan to hayden, no run, swing and a miss! hayden steps out a bit and gives it a big swing straight, but it eludes his outside edge
pathan to hayden, no run, and again! hint of away swing from irfan and it's enough to beat hayden's big swing, through to sanga
pathan to hayden, four runs, not this time though! hayden sizes this up, swings again over mid on and the timing is awesome. one bounce for four
powar to patel, no run,
powar to hayden, no run, but he can't make use of it, tries to swing him away to the leg side and does not connect
powar to hayden, no run,
powar to hayden, four runs, hit hard off the backfoot, that really stopped on him and slowed, and yuvraj at mid off did not see it early enough, it ran away for four.
powar to hayden, 1 leg bye,
powar to patel, no run,
theron to patel, 1 wide, cliche chance, am not gonna let it go. rusty is rusty, and slips it well down the off side. wide
theron to patel, 2 leg byes, gets it on the money this time, and it's slightly fast on leg stump. hurries on to patel who gets some pad on it.
theron to patel, no run, better line, outside off, patel can't free his arms. check-drives to point
chawla to patel, 1 run, on leg stump, swept down to fine leg
chawla to hayden, 1 run, nudged away from outside off, towards point for a brisk single. good stop too from theron
chawla to raina, 1 run, played away off the backfoot down to mid on

srivastava to raina, 1 wide, sloppy bowling, it's one thing to bowl a slow loosener in this format, but even worse to slip it so wide down the leg side. scratch that. on second thought, that can't go for four.
yuvraj singh to raina, no run,
yuvraj singh to raina, 1 run, runs it off the face towards point, nicely done again
theron to vijay, 1 wide, slips down the legside this time and harper extends his arms to signal wide
yuvraj singh to patel, no run,
chawla to morkel, no run, beautiful piece of bowling. straight one that beat him all ends up, missed the outside edge and the off stump by a whisker
powar to patel, no run, and again. powar is bowling slowly, on a tight leash and turning it into patel from outside leg.
powar to patel, 1 run, fantastic stuff from powar and patel can't get it away. runs down to third man
theron to morkel, 1 run, slower ball, going from leg to off, quietly played away to cover
theron to gony, 1 wide, oh, that's crucial! slips one well down the leg, and sanga does well to keep the damages down.
theron to gony, no run, almighty swipe from gony and he misses!
theron to ashwin, no run, great bowling, fast on middle and leg, giving ashwin no chance of scoring

pathan to morkel, 2 byes, oh irfan, what have you done! it was in morkel's slot, he missed the swing, it went to sanga, ashwin was off to steal a bye, sanga took a shy at the striker's end and missed. irfan gathered and took a shy at the non-striker's and missed as well! and they ran back for two!
malinga to gayle, no run, another slower ball, this time gayle is with it, and shoulders arms
khan to ganguly, 1 run, and nearly again! inside edge, almost through that gap, shaping in towards the off stick late, and somehow dada gets an inside edge
mclaren to ganguly, no run, plays with an open face, towards point, where sathish and pollard are almost an electric fence
khan to ganguly, no run, angling into him, looks to help it down to fine leg, misses it, but it is headed down the leg side
khan to ganguly, no run, walks down the wicket and across the stumps, and misses the pick-up shot
malinga to gayle, no run, slower ball again, defended to cover
harbhajan singh to ganguly, 1 run, comes down the track again, gets too close to its pitch, gets a single to long-off
mclaren to ganguly, 2 runs, over-pitched delivery, driven wide of long-off, comes back for two
harbhajan singh to shah, 1 run, nice offbreak, no room, bunts it into covers for a single
malinga to gayle, 1 run, slower ball again, guides it to slightly wide of pollard, who doesn't field it cleanly, and they get through for one
bravo to shah, 1 run, looks to hit across the line, slices it down to long-off
malinga to gayle, 1 run, slower ball, gayle aborts the big shot, gets a single to point
malinga to gayle, 1 run, again a slower ball, and gain gayle gets just a single off it - to cover-point
khan to shah, out, this time he makes room and gets outside the line, zak bowls the same delivery and he misses it, and is bowled
bond to dhawan, four runs, too quick down the leg side, dhawan gets a tickle fine
bond to dhawan, no run, better line, around off, hit one bounce to cover
sharma to tendulkar, no run, wide outside off, tendulkar shoulders arms
sharma to tendulkar, four runs, what an outfield this is, he mis-hits a drive outside off, but it goes fast across the turf, beats mid-off and goes for four

sharma to tendulkar, four runs, lovely shot again, this time he hits the drive well, opening the face on it, and placing it between mid-off and extra cover - all runs so far have cone in six boundaries
gayle to tendulkar, 1 wide, fired even further down the leg side
sharma to dhawan, 1 run, driven straight to harpreet at cover and comes through for one
sharma to tendulkar, 1 wide, slower ball, wide down the leg side
sharma to tendulkar, no run, hit to point, and tendulkar decides against the single, both originally and also off the overthrow
gayle to dhawan, 1 run, swept from way outside off, gets a single to deep midwicket
gayle to tendulkar, four runs, whipped away from the middle stump, all along the ground, and between midwicket and square leg - and it's a small gap, picked to perfection - fifty up in 4.2
gayle to tendulkar, no run, and again, this time he finds midwicket, though
bond to tendulkar, 1 run, starts off with a slower ball, around off, takes a single to cover
kartik to tiwary, no run, beats him with the turn first up, belts out an appeal, the ball is clearly turning too far down
mathews to tendulkar, 1 wide, and he follows it with a quicker delivery angling down the leg side
kartik to tendulkar, no run, slows this down, bowls way outside off so sachin can flick him to leg, gets a defensive shot out of him
kartik to tendulkar, no run, and smartly bowled again, flatter outside off, and gets a leading-edge from him, but doesn't pick the ball at all, and doesn't accept the return catch
mathews to tiwary, no run, slower ball, around leg, and breaking away, hit back to the bowler
gayle to tiwary, 1 run, flat delivery, hit down to long-off for a single
gayle to tiwary, no run, makes room, gayle follows him, can't get the drive past extra cover
gayle to tiwary, no run, steps down, yorks himself, another tight over for kkr
mathews to tendulkar, 1 run, slower ball again, and dragged from off towards deep midwicket for a single
kartik to tendulkar, 1 run, and he gets another leading edge out of tendulkar who is bent at playing him to on, but again the edge is safe and he gets a single to point
kartik to sathish, 1 run,
kartik to sathish, 1 run, opens the face again, and gets just a single this time, but quick running from srt
bond to sathish, four runs, and sathish gets another boundary, not where he intended this one, though. looks to whip it over leg, gets a leading edge over point and into the gap
bond to tendulkar, 2 runs, slower ball, and steered to wide of third man for two
bond to tendulkar, 1 run, dabbed to third man for one
bond to sathish, 1 run, slapped to mid-on, comes though for one and makes it despite a direct-hit from karthik
morkel to kallis, 1 run, shuffles across to push to mid-on for a single
tyagi to kallis, no run, straightens around the middle stump line, kallis was on the shuffle, adjusts his wrists to adjust to the straightening and pushes the ball to the on side of the pitch
morkel to kallis, no run, in the  zone outside off stump, left alone
balaji to dravid, 1 wide, bala slips in a wide down the leg side
tyagi to pandey, 1 run, on the middle stump line, pushed to mid-on for a single
balaji to dravid, 1 run, this time he leans across, gets close to the line of the ball outside off and opens the bat-face to guide it past hayden
muralitharan to dravid, 1 leg bye, murali starts from round the stumps. off break on the middle and leg line, tries to flick it and the ball rolls towards midwicket
muralitharan to pandey, 1 wide, spins down the leg side, past the attempted glance .. wide
muralitharan to pandey, 1 run, on the off stump line, tapped to right of raina and calls dravid for a quick single

tyagi to pandey, no run, run out missed it was pushed to midwicket and robin had backed up too far. hayden picked up the ball and fired the throw at the non-striker's end. robin tried to dive back in .. had it hit the stumps, he would have been out
muralitharan to pandey, no run, turns in to the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
morkel to kohli, 2 runs, turns this towards mid-on .. and they rush back fo the second rub .. before the man rushes in from the deep. superbly run by both
morkel to uthappa, 1 run, leans across and tries to work it to the on side and gets a leading edge to third man
muralitharan to uthappa, no run,
muralitharan to uthappa, 3 leg byes, the ball turns into the leg and middle line and rolls away to fine-leg region
muralitharan to kohli, four runs, another off break on the middle and leg line and kohli plays a delightful glance shot .. working his wrists over time and the ball races away to fine-leg boundary
muralitharan to morgan, no run, another dot ball. morgan tries to work it to the on side but edges it.
ashwin to uthappa, 1 run, walks down the track and whips it to deep midwicket.
ashwin to uthappa, 1 run, walks down the track, ashwin pushes it further outside off and robin swipes it across the line but doesn't connect properly.. just a single, wide of midwicket
ashwin to uthappa, 2 runs, walks down the track and drags it from outside off to deep midwicket. he rushes back for the second and dives to get back inside the crease.
kumar to patel, no run, some swing there. away from the left-handed parthiv. it started from middle and leg and moved towards off and middle, defended to the off side
kumar to hayden, no run, in the channel outside off stump, hayden allows it to pass through to boucher

kumar to patel, out, pk takes out parthiv. he switched to round the stumps for this delivery and got the ball to curve away from parthiv from that angle. fine delivery. parthiv had a lame poke at it. fatal.
steyn to hayden, no run, in the zone outside off, much closer this time and curving back .. left alone
steyn to hayden, 2 runs, walks down the track and pushes it out to right of mid-off
steyn to hayden, no run, in the channel outside off stump, angling away from hayden who lets it go through to boucher
kumar to bailey, 1 run, stays back to clip it behind square-leg for a single
steyn to hayden, 1 wide, pushes this wide outside off stump,
kumble to bailey, no run, bailey can't get kumble away. another slider on the middle stump line, pushed out to the on side
kallis to bailey, 1 run, outside off stump, run down to third man.
kumble to bailey, 1 run, pushes this one through the off side for a single. what a fine start from kumble.
kallis to bailey, 1 run, pushed away for a single
kallis to hayden, four runs, sprays it just outside leg stump, perhaps he thought hayden would move down the leg side but hayden stays where he was and plays the leg glance
kumble to bailey, no run, this one has been pushed back to the bowler
kumble to bailey, 1 run, this one is a leg break, turns away from bailey who stabs it to backward point

vinay kumar to bailey, out, hayden is run out. direct hit from rahul dravid it was pushed  to cover, hayden backed up too far, dravid swooped in for the kill and under-armed a direct hit at the non-striker's end . huge moment this! dravid has struck a big blow!
vinay kumar to vijay, 1 run, pushed to point for a single
kallis to raina, 1 run, stays back to clip it past square-leg
vinay kumar to raina, 1 wide, tries to slip in the slower one but slips it wide outside off stump
vinay kumar to vijay, 1 run, stays behind the line to clip it past square-leg
steyn to morkel, 1 run, 147.4 kmph delivery on the middle stump line, edged behind square-leg.
