vinay kumar to badrinath, no run, moves outside leg and goes for the big shot through the off side but the ball rushes past him and to the keeper
kumar to morkel, 1 run,
kumar to morkel, no run, swing and a miss. done in by the slower one.
kumar to morkel, no run, again can't connect well with his swing to the on side.
steyn to ashwin, 1 run, around the off stump line, pushed to cover point for a single
kumar to morkel, four runs, gets into position and drives through cover .. will collect a boundary. too little and too late
vinay kumar to ashwin, 1 run, moves outside leg and carves a slower one to deep point region
vinay kumar to balaji, no run, in the zone outside off stump, big swing and a miss
vinay kumar to balaji, no run, and again. bangalore prevail yet again.
pathan to lumb, no run, fumble by yuvraj at mid-off, doesn't cost them a run, first time bat met ball tonight
pathan to lumb, four runs, walks across the stumps, goes against the swing, and manages to clear mid-on
pathan to lumb, no run, square-drive, more like throwing his arms at a wide delivery, finds cover-point
pathan to lumb, four runs, slower ball, checks his drive, it gets a thick edge, and sails past first slip, and fine of a square third man
sreesanth to ojha, 1 no ball, good start - spoke too soon. he is actually too good with the ball straightening outside off and beating ojha, but he has also over-stepped. why am i not surprised?

srivastava to lumb, 1 run, overthrow, sloppy work by theron at mid-on, looks to drop to cover and run, is sent back, but bopara goes for a throw, and theron at mid-on doesn't bend quick enough to get his body behind it
srivastava to ojha, four runs, nice pick-up shot, leg-stump line, and he just flicks it over midwicket, all power comes in that last instance, through the wrists
srivastava to ojha, 1 run, angling across him, and steered away to third man
sreesanth to lumb, no run, wafts outside off, and he plays way outside the line of the delivery
srivastava to lumb, no run, steps down the track, and wafts and misses
srivastava to lumb, four runs, pick-up shot, nicely done, takes it from off, makes sweet connection, and there is no intention of keeping it down
srivastava to lumb, 1 run, slower ball, 92ks, delays his shot, plays with soft hands, gets a single to third man
sreesanth to fazal, 1 run, nicely chopped away to third man
sreesanth to fazal, 1 wide, big wide down the leg side
sreesanth to fazal, no run, looks to run this down to third man, but it's not wide enough, gets an inside edge onto the pad, another amusing appeal from punjab
theron to lumb, four runs, too much width too often, and this time he crashes it past point, and fine of third man, top shot
chawla to pathan, no run, flat outside off, played to point, no turn
srivastava to fazal, four runs, very nice shot, exploits the square third man, opens the face very late and gets four
srivastava to fazal, 1 run, walks across the stumps, exposing all three sticks, slower ball comes out, drops into the leg side and runs, yusuf wants two but is rightly sent back
srivastava to pathan, 1 wide, huge huge shout for a catch down the leg side, and the umpire calls it a wide because there is light between glove and ball

srivastava to pathan, 2 runs, irfan has dropped brother yusuf! slower ball, yusuf throws everything at it, ends up skying it, irfan runs to his right from long-off, gets under it, but the hands don't come together in time
chawla to fazal, 1 run, bunted wide of point for a single
chawla to fazal, 1 run, comes down the track and hits him to wide of long-off, where kaif keeps them down to one
chawla to pathan, 1 run, pushed down to long-off for a single
chawla to fazal, six runs, nice shot, clean clean swing, comes down the track again, gets to its pitch, and lofts him over midwicket
theron to pathan, 1 wide, big wide down the leg side
theron to fazal, 1 run, runs this one down to third man for a single
chawla to pathan, 1 run, quick delivery again, and he is contend with a single to cover
srivastava to fazal, 1 wide, way wide outside off, surprisingly no appeal from sanga this time
srivastava to fazal, 1 leg bye, oh sorry, spoke too soon, shalabh belts out a huge shout from the deepest part of his gut, as he has missed a scoop shot way way outside off
yuvraj singh to voges, four runs, another nice shot from voges, not frills, no big back lift, just a drive wide enough of long-off
chawla to voges, no run, comes down the track, hits straight to extra cover
pathan to voges, no run, starts off with a slower one, hit straight to point
pathan to fazal, 1 run, swiped across the line, gets a single to deep square leg
pathan to voges, 1 run, slower ball, dabbed to third man for one
theron to fazal, no run, sees him back away, angles it across him, and it's far enough of the batsman, but not far enough to be called wide
pathan to fazal, 1 run, makes room, irfan puts in the slower delivery, gets a bottom edge for one
pathan to fazal, four runs, slower ball, and thwacked back past the bowler, the mid-off is up, and there is no stopping this

pathan to fazal, 1 run, out, goes for a non-existent double after hitting it straight to long-off, piyush goes for the right end, the striker's, and also hits the stumps direct. would have been run out even if this was not a direct-hit
pathan to dogra, 1 run, slower ball, opens the face, and gets voges on strike
patel to sangakkara, 1 run, shimmies down the track, drops it into the covers and takes a single
tait to sangakkara, no run, wafts and misses outside off
tait to bopara, no run, swing again, and beats him outside off
patel to bopara, no run, looks for a black-and-run but he has hit it too strongly to midwicket
patel to sangakkara, four runs, slapped away in the air towards mid-off who thinks he is in the game, but it goes wide of the fielder, and travels fast
patel to sangakkara, four runs, bottom edge for four, swipes across the line, and the edge travels fast and also misses the stumps
patel to bopara, 3 runs, nicely driven, slower ball and squeezes it through covers, lumb puts in a spirited chase and makes a diving save
tait to sangakkara, four runs, that's the sanga we know, super- square-drive, the ball went away through covers as fast as it came on, superbly timed, and high elbow was the bonus
patel to bisla, six runs, makes room and is early into a slower ball, but he has gone for the straight shot and even though it is skied it has enough muscle behind it to go for a six

patel to bisla, four runs, steps out and lofts him over wide mid-on, good clear-minded batting, he knows there are vast open spaces out there and doesn't mind a mis-hit as long as he is hitting into those vacant spaces
warne to bisla, 1 wide, nearly bowled him around his legs, and called wide
trivedi to bisla, 1 leg bye, dropped on the pitch and comes through for one, trivedi does well and is swift and would have got him had he hit the non-striker's stumps direct
trivedi to bopara, 1 run, slower ball, and again tip-and-run
trivedi to bopara, no run, slower ball, around off, looks to turn his wrist on it, ends up hitting it back to the bowler
warne to bopara, 1 run, swept away from leg stump to deep square leg
warne to bisla, no run,
warne to yuvraj singh, 2 runs, crunchy inside-out drive first ball, past extra cover
trivedi to bopara, 1 run, slower ball, hit straight to cover-point, dot
trivedi to yuvraj singh, 1 wide, way wide outside off
warne to yuvraj singh, 1 run, winding up to hit this one too, but it dips on him, and turns into him, and he changes the shot well to take a single to midwicket
warne to bopara, 1 run, pushed down to long-off for one
warne to yuvraj singh, 1 run,
voges to jayawardene, 1 run, read 11.2 for this ball's description

patel to bopara, out, munna strikes! another slower ball gets them a wicket! two settled batsmen play loose shots. walks down the wicket, munaf bowls a slower one that grips at him, and despite a checked shot it flies to the right of mid-on where sid t takes a nice catch. bopara is livid. and for a change, no send-off from a bowler, despite their earlier spat in the initial overs
patel to jayawardene, 1 run, drives away from the body, gets a thick edge for one
warne to chawla, no run, tarapore has let another batsman off, pitched slightly outside off, turning in, and chawla has missed it, and it has hit him in line of off
warne to chawla, 1 run,
pathan to jayawardene, 1 run, swept away in the air, one bounce to fine leg
pathan to theron, no run, quick quick delivery, 97ks, hits him outside off, hence not given lbw
trivedi to jayawardene, (no ball) 2 runs, dropped off a no-ball at deep midwicket! dogra had three or four gos at it, but doesn't really matter
trivedi to sreesanth, no run, sreesanth is done with the shot by the time the slower ball arrives
mclaren to hayden, 1 wide, it's a lefty on strike and mclaren slips it down the leg side
mclaren to patel, 2 runs, on the middle and leg line, patel presses back to clip it towards deep midwicket
khan to hayden, 1 wide, swing and a miss.. it was well outside the off stump and hayden couldn't reach it
mclaren to patel, four runs, nicely flicked away or as they say, pick-up shot. it was again on the legs and patel wrists it up and over square-leg
harbhajan singh to hayden, 1 wide, spins down the leg side and tare does well to gather it
harbhajan singh to hayden, no run, outside off stump, hayden fails to connect with his shot and tare collects
harbhajan singh to raina, no run,
harbhajan singh to raina, 2 runs, moves outside leg and drives hard to covers where tiwary makes a diving half-stop
mclaren to raina, no run,
mclaren to raina, 1 run, moves outsidee leg stumpp, mclaren slips in a slower one, pushed out to left of mid-off
harbhajan singh to badrinath, 1 run, leans across to push the off break to point for a single
harbhajan singh to raina, no run, another dot ball and it's yet another fine tight over from bhajji.. he has been bowling really well this ipl.

bravo to raina, 1 run, tip and run .. pushed to the off side and off they go. pollard has a shy at the non-striker's end, raina dives back to the crease. had the throw found its mark, it could have got interesting
harbhajan singh to badrinath, 1 run, goes well back to turn it behind square-leg
harbhajan singh to badrinath, 1 run, stays back to clip it away to the on side
malinga to raina, 2 runs, malinga starts off with slower one, on the middle and leg, turned to fine-leg region.
malinga to raina, 1 run, second slower one, this time outside off, run down to third man
malinga to badrinath, 1 run, slower one outside off stump, run down to third man
mclaren to badrinath, 1 wide, tries the slower one but loses direction
bravo to badrinath, 1 run, driven hard through to deep cover for a single
morkel to tendulkar, 1 leg bye, walks across, tries to flick but misses and the ball rolls of the pad .. shout for lbw, was it missing leg?
balaji to dhawan, 5 wides, walks down the track and bala sprays it really wide outside off ... poor over so far from balaji
morkel to dhawan, 1 wide, just down the leg side and bowden extends his arms
morkel to dhawan, no run, around the off stump line, pushed out to point
morkel to tendulkar, no run, backs away a touch and tries to force it away but doesn't connect. dhoni collects
balaji to dhawan, no run, slower one outside off stump, dhawan goes for the big drive and misses it
balaji to dhawan, 1 run, turned to square-leg for a single
balaji to dhawan, no run,
jakati to dhawan, 1 run, pushes it to cover point for a single
jakati to tendulkar, no run, on the middle stump line, dabs it back down the pitch
jakati to tendulkar, four runs, tendulkar moves down the track and ends up slicing it towards deep cover. bailey rushes in but it lands on practice pitches and bounces right over a stunned bailey!
muralitharan to dhawan, no run, slip in place and there is a loud shout for lbw .. the ball lands oaround leg stump, turns in to hit the back pad ..
muralitharan to tendulkar, 1 wide, spins down the leg side
jakati to dhawan, out, dhawan falls after a flamboyant fifty. he moved down the track, looking for the lofted hit, but miscued it towards midwicket where raina holds on
jakati to tendulkar, 2 runs, pushes this through point and will come back for two runs
muralitharan to tiwary, no run, lands outside leg, spins in to clip the pad and go through to dhoni
muralitharan to sathish, 1 run, goes back to turn the off break to backward square-leg
jakati to tendulkar, 1 leg bye, on the leg stump line, nurdled to fine-leg
morkel to sathish, 2 runs, charges down the track and drives hard to left of long-off
muralitharan to tendulkar, 1 run, taps it towards deep square-leg for a single
joginder sharma to tendulkar, 1 run, slower one outside off, run down to third man
jakati to tendulkar, no run, turns from middle, tries to dab it to the on side and gets a leading edge back down the pitch
muralitharan to tendulkar, 1 run, moves down the track to drive to right of long-off
muralitharan to bravo, no run, on the middle and leg, tapped to backward square-leg
morkel to tendulkar, no run, slower one well outside off, rolls under the bat and dhoni collects
narwal to gilchrist, no run, stands just outside the crease and goes for the big hit over mid-on but mistimes it along the ground to mid-on
narwal to gilchrist, out, narwal is absolutely delighted. he is hopping around in joy! gilchrist went for the big hit over mid-on but miscued it to cover! huge wicket
narwal to laxman, no run, outside the off stump, jabbed away
narwal to laxman, no run, shout for lbw as laxman misses a flick shot. it would have missed leg stump, though.
jhunjhunwala to gibbs, 1 wide, starts with a wide down the leg side. warne is making his moves here. first narhwal and now abhishek
jhunjhunwala to gibbs, six runs, gibbs moves down the track and plays a nice lofted hit over long-off.
jhunjhunwala to gibbs, 1 wide, another wide down the leg side
jhunjhunwala to gibbs, no run, on the middle stump line, turned to midwicket
jhunjhunwala to gibbs, six runs, rushes down the track and plays another gorgeous lofted hit. this time to the straight boundary. he makes it look really easy.
narwal to gibbs, 1 run, gets this down to deep backward square-leg region
narwal to gibbs, no run, slower one around off and middle stump line, defended to the on side
trivedi to gibbs, 1 run, another mistimed hit gibbs moves down the track, sidharth slips in a slower one and gibbs rolls his wrist and manages to get it just wide of mid-on
tait to laxman, 1 run, stays back to work this to mid-on for a single
narwal to symonds, 1 run, turns to mid-on for a single
warne to symonds, no run, slow in the air, turns from outside leg to hit the pad
warne to symonds, 1 run, on the middle and leg line, quicker and flatter, tapped to square-leg
warne to suman, no run, lovely ripping leg break. it turned in from middle stump and spun right past the defensive poke..
pathan to rg sharma, 1 run, quick and flat, pushed through the on side
pathan to rg sharma, 1 run, quick and flat now, on the leg and middle, tapped past square-leg
trivedi to suman, 1 run, taps the slower one to extra cover for a single
trivedi to rg sharma, 1 run, on the middle stump line, turned to long-leg
trivedi to suman, 1 run, another slower one, around 105 kmph!, that;s really slow, pushed uppishly past the lunging bowler
trivedi to rg sharma, six runs, rohit, though, picks the slower one very early this time, waits before swinging it over midwicket boundary
voges to vaas, no run, turns in from outside off, pushed back to the bowler
warne to rg sharma, 1 run, slower, turns towards off and mdidle, rohit eases it, with the turn, to point
warne to vaas, 1 run, goes back and across to guide the leg break to backward point
pathan to rg sharma, 1 wide, spins down the leg side
voges to rg sharma, no run, well outside off, swatted away to cover
voges to vaas, 1 run, drags it down to deep midwicket for a single
tait to rg sharma, 1 wide, tait tries a slower one but sprays it wide outside off
tait to vaas, out, vaas is run out now, though. it was pushed towards cover and vaas goes for the single but dogra fires a direct hit at the non-striker's end. gone!
tait to singh, 1 bye, moves outside leg, tait pushes it further outside off, around 147 kmph, the batsman let it go to the keeper but rohit calls over for a single
tait to singh, 1 bye, really fast .. rp swings and misses and the ball goes past the leg stump and the keeper lunges to his left to stop it .. they rush across for teh run.
vaas to lumb, four runs, shuffles right across and whips the incoming delivery through midwicket
singh to ojha, no run,
rg sharma to lumb, 2 runs, stays back to clip the off break past square-leg
singh to lumb, four runs, whack! this is getting all too easy. imperious lumb. he takes a couple of steps down the track and thrashes gentle seam-up delivery to the wide midwicket boundary
rg sharma to ojha, no run, from round the stumps, on middle and leg, pushed back to the bowler
rg sharma to ojha, no run, turns from middle and leg, jabbed away
rg sharma to ojha, six runs, that has been flayed! rohit tosses it up and ojha hammers it to the straight boundary.
rg sharma to ojha, 1 run, on the leg stump line, turned past square-leg
rg sharma to lumb, 1 run, pushed out to midwicket and they scramble across for a quick single .. ojha does really well to rush across and dive to get back inside the crease
r sharma to ojha, no run, on the middle stump line, swept to square-leg
r sharma to ojha, no run, down the leg side, and it catches a bit of the pad
ojha to ojha, out, stumped! ojha, who has been really good in the ipl games, tosses it up and gets it to dip and spins it  away past the attempted lofted hit ..
ojha to pathan, 1 wide, pushes it wide outside off, yusuf almost charged at it but decided to let it go to gilly.
ojha to pathan, six runs, wallop! slip and silly-point watch the white ball soar into the orbit over long-off.
ojha to lumb, 1 wide, rips it quick but slips it down the leg side
r sharma to lumb, 1 run, turns in from outside off, pushed towards long-off
r sharma to pathan, 1 run, slip and silly-point in. yusuf stays back to punch it with the turn to deep cover
r sharma to lumb, 1 run, around the off stump line, it breaks the other way, away from the lefty lumb who pings deep point
r sharma to lumb, no run, around the off stump line, again spinning away, a tentative lumb pokes it to cover ..
r sharma to lumb, no run, quicker,a leg break this time, lumb defends towards cover
ojha to pathan, no run, around the off stump line, yusuf pushes this one back to ojha
ojha to pathan, no run, big swing and a miss. it spun away from outside off, yusuf tried to crash it over long-off but makes no contact
r sharma to pathan, 1 run, moves back to work the ball to midwicket and the bowler rushes off to pick the ball . vacant spaces in the on-side ring
r sharma to lumb, no run, quicker, turning into middle stump, guided to backward point
vaas to pathan, 1 run, pushed to cover.. overthrows as the throw misses the stumps at the non-striker;s end
symonds to pathan, no run, around the off stump line, pushed to extra cover
symonds to fazal, no run, around the off stump line , steered to backward point
symonds to fazal, no run, lands outside leg , moves in to hit the pad
ojha to fazal, 5 wides, sprays it wide down the leg side
ojha to pathan, no run, goes for another big hit over the on side but doesn't connect this time
ojha to pathan, no run, around off stump, steered to backward point
ojha to pathan, 2 runs, swats it away to deep backward square-leg region
symonds to fazal, no run, pushes this towards cover
symonds to pathan, 2 runs, goes for the big hit but miscues it and it lands safely in the unmanned mid-on region

srivastava to gayle, no run, that's more like it. similar ball, gayle decides to make up for his circumspection off the previous ball and looks to knock the stuffing out of this one. good for the ball, he did not connect.
lee to ganguly, 1 run, over-pitched on middle and leg, ganguly punches down the track nicely, yuvraj gets across from mid off and stops it.

srivastava to ganguly, 2 runs, in the offside, there is god and then there is ganguly, but at deep point, there is irfan pathan. he puts in a good tive to stop a sweetly timed backfoot square drive from fetching four.
srivastava to ganguly, four runs, slow slower ball, at 96.9 kph, ganguly picked it, waited on his back-lift and timed it nicely through the covers off the backfoot.
malik to tiwary, no run, again outside off, can't get it away.
malik to ganguly, no run, ganguly tries to play mcdilscoop, but it does not come out right.
bopara to ganguly, 1 run, looks to break free but no timing in the loft over mid on
malik to tiwary, 1 run, legspinning slower ball, tiwary picked it and tried to hoick it over square leg, but could not find the gap
malik to ganguly, 1 run, down the track and looks to deposit that over the midwicket boundary, but cannot get under it. drags it down along the carpet to deep midwicket
malik to tiwary, 1 run, straighter this time, drilled down to long off.. slight fumble from chawla.
malik to ganguly, no run, swing and a miss, goes between ganguly, who has moved well outside leg and the leg stump, through to sanga.
lee to tiwary, 1 run, slower ball, 105.6 kph outside off, tiwary stays back and guides it to third man
bopara to ganguly, no run, driven straight to lee at cover, tiwary was well down, but lee missed the direct hit.
pathan to ganguly, no run, nice ball, follows ganguly as he moves away outside leg stump and gives him no room.
pathan to mathews, 1 wide, slips down the leg for a wide.
pathan to mathews, 1 wide, and again. irfan has lost the plot at the end of the over and sanga will be quite angry. the over-rate is going nowhere.
pathan to mathews, no run, itched up and driven straight back, irfan could not get a finger on it, else it would have been curtains for the non-striker, as it hit the stumps.
chawla to mathews, 2 runs, again, leggie on leg stump, at 88 kph, dabbed away off the backfoot to midwicket
chawla to mathews, four runs, finally times one. mathews is down the track and tees off towards long off, where bopara makes a mess of it. through for four.
bond to yuvraj singh, no run, fast and furious outside off! yuvi is late on the attempt to guide it through the offside
dinda to bisla, 1 wide, loses the radar somewhat, sprays it outside off for a wide
dinda to bisla, 1 wide, another wide, starts outside off and finishes where the keeper would have been if they were playing on the adjacent pitch. almost.
dinda to bisla, no run, tests the umpire with a similar ball, he lets him go this time
bond to yuvraj singh, no run, on yuvi's off stump, he guides it to point
bond to yuvraj singh, 1 run, whoa, some more dangerous running, yuvi tips straight to mid off and takes off, the under arm throw misses and he's in.
dinda to yuvraj singh, no run, fractionally straighter, yuvi stays back and check-drives straight to point
gayle to bisla, 1 wide, very wide down the lg, looks to play a super-cheeky lap and still can't reach it

agarkar to yuvraj singh, out, great catch!!! yuvi looks to go downtown again, skies the loft over midwicket and it goes real high, the floodlights are really low here, there is a chance the ball went temporarily out of sight, but when it came back down, manoj tiwary had run from square leg to midwicket, dived to his right and plucked the swirler!
agarkar to bisla, 1 run,
gayle to bisla, no run,

agarkar to bisla, out, and he goes this time! agarkar has picked his second wicket, by following bisla and keeping it on middle and leg. bisla was down the track and looked to go straight, but did not get it straight enough. hussey from mid off ran to his right and took a good low tumbling catch
agarkar to sangakkara, 2 runs, outside off this time, sanga drives straight to dinda at mid off, and he again fumbles to concede two.
agarkar to sangakkara, 1 run, same ball, same shot, better fielding. dinda misses the direct hit, though sanga would have probably been in.
iqbal abdulla to sangakkara, 1 run, down the track, and flicked away to deep midwicket this time
iqbal abdulla to sangakkara, 1 run, and again, sanga's picking the singles well to midwicket. punjab need more.
mathews to sangakkara, 1 run, slower ball, sanga waits and drives it straight to long off
mathews to sangakkara, 1 run, a complete and utter lack of timing for sanga, who looks to loft the slower ball over long off, and can only get it over mid off
hussey to sangakkara, 1 run, fired in, sliding down the leg and sanga can't capitalise. gets it down behind square leg where the fielder tidies up well
hussey to sangakkara, 2 runs, comes out and drives it down to long off this time
hussey to jayawardene, no run, fired in at 111.7 kph, mahela can't get it past hussey. this chase is going nowhere.
mathews to jayawardene, 1 run, lofted well, but can't elude long off.

mathews to jayawardene, out, mathews has yorked mahela! the batsman was looking to get some momentum going, by walking over to the offside, mathews got a good sight of leg stump, aimed and hit it. poor innings from mahela today, got no timing
mathews to pathan, six runs, majestic from irfan! over-pitched by mathews on off stump, pathan saw it got  under it and deposited over the straight boundary
mathews to goel, 1 run, slightly wider this time, goel stays back and opens the face to run it down to third man. kkr are keeping it tight.
mathews to goel, 1 run, slower ball, angling across and guided away towards third man
bond to lee, 1 wide, bond lets out a roar as he puts a lot of effort into his last ball, to fellow tear-away lee, but gets carried away a bit and it is a wide for height
agarkar to goel, no run, and it ends in fitting fashion. another play and a miss outside off, kkr have prevailed easily, by 39 runs.

kumar to warner, 2 runs, slower ball, this time dropped by uthappa! decieves warner, who is early into the shot and scoops it high over mid off. uthappa runs back several yards and gets there, but puts it down as it comes over his shoulder. harsh call, but that is a drop.
steyn to warner, 1 wide, steyn's radar lost signal momentarily, that flew out of his hand, very wide outside off
kallis to sehwag, 1 run, slower ball again, sehwag picks it this time, waits on it and runs it delicately down to third man to take a single and retain strike
vinay kumar to de villiers, 1 run, back of the hand slower delivery, at 104.8 kph. ab stays back and taps it down to the leg side to rotate strike.
vinay kumar to karthik, 1 run, oooh, he's yet to get used to this pitch for sure. very early into that flick, it takes the leading edge and somehow eludes all the offside fielders
kallis to de villiers, no run, wider outside off, and this time ab can't get it away past point. rare dot ball
steyn to karthik, no run, lovely slower delivery, runs his fingers over that one and beats karthik's outside edge as he walks down the track
steyn to de villiers, 1 run, played away to cover to turn the strike over
kallis to jadhav, 1 run, straighter this time, allows jadhav to work it away to square leg.
kumble to jadhav, no run,
kallis to jadhav, no run, swing and a miss outside off this time
kumble to de villiers, 1 run, gets it away this time, down to midwicket
kumar to mcdonald, 1 wide, slips down the legside for a wide
kumar to jadhav, 1 wide, starts from outside off and swings away for an easy call of wide
steyn to mcdonald, four runs, educated edge from mcdonald to get off the mark. it was fast outside off, he made room and got a thick outside edge, wide of boucher
steyn to mcdonald, 3 runs, nice bit of fielding by pandey at the deep cover boundary. mcdonald got it away over the infield, off the backfoot and pandey put in a dive to save a run
steyn to jadhav, no run, flicked away well, but straight to midwicket
steyn to jadhav, 1 wide, steyn-gun goes wide again, well outside off
vinay kumar to jadhav, no run, tight call, really slow ball 85.6 kph, that's slower than kumble! it slipped marginally down the leg and umpire jerling did not call it wide
vinay kumar to jadhav, 1 run, fifty for jadhav on ipl debut! what an innings, stayed back and guided the slower ball to the left of point
nannes to pandey, no run, 140 kph, on a similar line. pandey stays back and quietly plays it down to square leg
sangwan to kallis, 1 wide, slips it well down the offside, wide
sangwan to kallis, no run, this time, even better sense prevails, the drive goes straight to warner and they decide not to run
yadav to pandey, 1 run, slips down the leg this time, and pandey easily glances it down to fine leg

yadav to pandey, 1 run, stumps are out of the ground, but at the non-striker's end! pandey has absolutely smashed that down, and off stump is out of the ground. that deserved more that one, was hit real hard.
sangwan to kallis, no run,
sangwan to kallis, 1 wide, and he sprays it wide again, well outside off. has to rebowl that and he'll kick himself if that goes for four.
mishra to kallis, 1 run, played down to midwicket for one
mcdonald to kallis, 1 run, straighter this time, played away from the off stump line towards point
mishra to uthappa, 1 run, opens up the offside and goes over mid off this time
sangwan to morgan, 1 wide,
sangwan to kohli, 1 run, tapped down to point and through for another risky single to get off the mark

mishra to kohli, 4 leg byes, ball of the day, but it goes away to the boundary for leg-byes. beats kohli all ends up with a leg spinner into the rough, and it was miles away from kohli's legs, and beat dk who missed the stumping. could have been out, should have been byes, should not have been leg byes.
mishra to kohli, 1 run, gets it away this time for one
mishra to morgan, 1 run,
mcdonald to kohli, 1 run, lands it this time, kohli stays back and runs it off the face to turn the strike over
mcdonald to morgan, 1 run, run-out chance, but the throw misses. morgan tips it down to point and runs across, the throw misses and he was running a tad casually. would have been out
mcdonald to kohli, 1 run, gets it down to midwicket for one
sangwan to boucher, 1 run,
sangwan to vinay kumar, 1 wide, slips down the leg for a wide.
nannes to vinay kumar, 1 run, stays back and makes room to get the ball from leg stump, down to third man

nannes to kohli, 1 run, out, it's that kind of day for bangalore here! kohli hit that one straight to midwicket, where mishra mis-fielded. bangalore decided to run the second one, mishra recouped and threw straight to nannes who removed the bails. out by miles
yadav to steyn, 4 leg byes, slips down the leg and steyn gets something on it down to fine leg
yadav to steyn, no run, on leg stump this time, and kallis can't get it away
nannes to kohli, 1 run, makes room by moving to the leg side and drills it straight to long off
morkel to lumb, no run, goes back and across to punch it to cover
morkel to lumb, 1 run, shuffles across to flick to deep backward square-leg
muralitharan to lumb, 1 run, turns in from outside leg, lumb stays back to work it towards deep midwicket
muralitharan to ojha, 1 wide, lands around leg and turns down for a wide
muralitharan to ojha, 1 run, on the middle stump line, turning in, looking for the lbw, jabbed behind square-leg
muralitharan to lumb, four runs, from over the wicket, murali lands it outside leg and lumb goes down on his knee to swing it to backward square-leg boundary. too much width on that one.
morkel to lumb, 2 runs, moves down the track, it's a slower ball, and he drags it towards deep midwicket region
thushara to ojha, no run, on the middle stump line, pushed out to the off side
thushara to fazal, no run, around the off stump line, pushed out to backward point
muralitharan to fazal, 1 run, from over the wicket, turns in from outside leg, dabbed wide of midwicket
muralitharan to ojha, 1 run, goes back to push the flattish off break on off and middle to point
muralitharan to fazal, no run, spins in from outside leg, moves past the poke to strike the pad
raina to fazal, 1 run, from round the stumps to the lefty, on the leg stump line, fazal chops it towards backward point
raina to fazal, 1 run, skips down the track and drives to long-off
joginder sharma to ojha, 2 runs, and almost again. this time to the right of third man where albie makes a fine diving stop
joginder sharma to ojha, 1 run, slower one, outside off, run down to third man
raina to fazal, 1 run, skips down the track and lifts it towards long-off.. one bounce to the fielder
jakati to fazal, 1 run, backs away to slap it to long-off
jakati to fazal, 1 run, turns in to middle and off, tapped to backward point
muralitharan to ojha, 1 run, outside off stump line , pushed away to backward point
jakati to pathan, no run,
jakati to pathan, four runs, width outside off and yusuf crashes it to the point boundary
jakati to ojha, no run, lovely delivery, again turns away from the middle stump and goes past the outside edge
muralitharan to voges, 2 runs, wrists this off break through midwicket
jakati to ojha, 1 run, on the leg and middle line, swept away for a single
morkel to ojha, no run, slower one outside off, ojha can't connect with the square drive
morkel to dogra, 1 run, slower one outside off, driven to deep cover

thushara to narwal, 1 run, out, warne is run out it was slashed to deep point region .. warne turns for the second but his partner is not interested. warne is unable to beat the throw from jakati. three in three for chennai!
thushara to narwal, 1 run, goes for the big drive but can't beat the cover fielder.
pathan to vijay, 1 run, on the off stump line, turns in slightly, pushed towards mid-on for a quick single
pathan to hayden, 1 run, moves outside leg and mistimes the forcing shot to left of mid-on
narwal to hayden, 2 runs, stays to thrash this to right of cover where there is a diving half-stop made .. overthrows though and hayden gets back
narwal to hayden, 1 run, mistimes another intended big hit towards mid-on
tait to vijay, 2 runs, slips to the middle and leg line and vijay is good there, plays an elegant flick past square-leg
pathan to raina, no run, slip in place ... the ball comes in with the angle, from round the stumps to strike the pad
narwal to vijay, six runs, vijay picks the slower one very early, shuffles into position, waits before whip lashing it from outside off over deep midwicket. fabulicious.
tait to raina, 1 run,
tait to vijay, no run, in the channel outside off stump, vijay allows it to pass him
pathan to raina, 1 wide, pushes it down the leg side
warne to vijay, 1 run, on the leg and middle line, nudged past square-leg

warne to raina, no run, dropped by ojha. it landed well outside off and sort of straightened. raina tries to steer it through vacant slip region and it ran off the face of the bat and ojha can't hold on
trivedi to vijay, no run, slower one outside off, dabbed to backward point

trivedi to vijay, out, vijay is run out it was flicked to left of square-leg ... and he sets off for a non-existent single as yusuf is stationed there! yusuf took couple of steps to his left, picked the ball and its around this time, vijay started to turn back. too late. direct hit. gone!
warne to dhoni, 1 run, turns from the off stump, slower through the air, forced to long-off
warne to badrinath, no run, big ripper this time! it spun past the lunging badri
trivedi to badrinath, no run, slower one around off stump line, tapped to point ..
warne to badrinath, no run, slip in place and badri taps the leg break to backward point
voges to dhoni, 1 run, backs away to fist it to long-off.
voges to badrinath, 1 run, moves down the track to drive to long-off
narwal to dhoni, 1 wide, slower one but wide outside off, dhoni lets it go
pathan to dhoni, 1 wide, fires it down the leg side .. wide
pathan to dhoni, 1 leg bye, goes for the big swing to the on side , rolls away to the off, he sets off for a single before turning back .. ojha flicks the throw wide of the stumps
pathan to badrinath, 1 run, moves outside leg stump, yusuf follows him, chopped to backward point

pathan to dhoni, 1 run, out, dhoni is run out and he is furious with badri .. he had forced it to left of deep midwicket where voges stops. dhoni turned back for the second run, both batsmen collide mid-pitch and dhoni loses his bat .. he runs on but obviously can't reach anywhere close. it would have been tight even if he had the bat in his hand. no chance without it. dhoni is handed the bat by warne and he storms off in anger
pathan to badrinath, 1 leg bye, skips down the track, tries to whip it to the onside, misses but collects a leg bye
tait to arun karthik, 1 run, fast and straight, 151.8 kmph outside off, stabbed away for a single
roach to dhawan, 1 wide, he bowls it wide outside off and dhawan lashes at it, wide called
jaskaran singh to tendulkar, 1 run, opens the face and dabs it to third man
roach to dhawan, no run, 145 kph, steep delivery that fizzes past dhawan's body, great bounce and carry
jaskaran singh to tendulkar, four runs, he pitched it up on off and middle and tendulkar gets under the bounce and plays slightly across the line, places it in the big gap at midwicket
jaskaran singh to bravo, 1 run, angles it across the right hander and he opens the face and places it down to third man
jaskaran singh to tendulkar, 1 no ball, free hit: jaskaran loses complete control of it and sprays it really wide outside off, the ball nearly goes towards slip and it's another no ball
jaskaran singh to tendulkar, no run, walks down the pitch and squirts it out straight to venugopal rao at midwicket
ojha to bravo, no run, pushed back to the bowler
ojha to bravo, no run, beats him with a ripper that turns and bounces, continues from over the wicket
singh to bravo, no run, tucks him up for room and bravo defends with soft hands and tells his partner to wait
singh to bravo, no run, punches it back to the bowler, rp turns back and sees tendulkar out of his creasem tries to palm the ball towards the stumps but the batsman's home
singh to tendulkar, four runs, classic sachin! he moves across his stumps and nonchalantly flicks it across  the line and picks the big gap at midwicket, this man's in imperious touch
symonds to bravo, 1 run, pushes it towards mid-on for a single
symonds to tendulkar, 1 wide, slower ball but too wide outside off, doesn't offer a shot
symonds to bravo, no run, hit hard but straight to square leg
singh to bravo, no run, well bowled, on the stumps and bravo punches it back to the bowler
singh to tiwary, four runs, poor delivery and put away, bounce and width outside off to free his arms, reaches out and slashes it over backward point
singh to tiwary, out, poor shot after that boundary! rp swings it away from the left-hander and tiwary drives away from the  body and gilchrist takes the edge, double strike there for rp
ojha to tendulkar, no run, tucked to the on side
ojha to tendulkar, 1 run, tucks it to the on side for a single
singh to tendulkar, 1 run, gently eased away towards midwicket and ojha has a shy at the bowler's end but sachin's too quick for him
singh to tendulkar, no run, good ball, tucks him up for room and he softly pushes it down the pitch
singh to tendulkar, 1 run, angles it across the right-hander and he opens the face and dabs it down to third man who's square
singh to rayudu, 1 run, mistimes the drive to the on side but beats the bowler
ojha to rayudu, 1 run, drops it wide of the silly point region and sets off, tendulkar was off the blocks very quickly
ojha to tendulkar, no run, squeezes it out to cover
symonds to tendulkar, no run, drops it down the pitch with soft hands
symonds to tendulkar, four runs, symonds gives him width, tendulkar gets beside the line and scoops it in the air wide of the backward point region
symonds to tendulkar, 1 bye, tries to run it down to third man, he actually hits it off the face of the bat and gilchrist fails to catch it, the umpires signals byes though
symonds to sathish, no run,
ojha to pollard, no run, quicker through the air and defended to the off side
ojha to pollard, no run, keeps it straight and on the stumps, pollard defends again, ojha's tying them down
roach to mclaren, no run, thuds it on the pitch and the ball fizzes past him
roach to mclaren, no run, bangs it on the pitch again and he doesn't offer a shot
roach to mclaren, 1 wide, he's going to make a few dents on the pitch, another steep delivery and mclaren can only watch that sail to the keeper
roach to tendulkar, no run, tucks him up for room and sachin pushes it  back to the bowler
symonds to tendulkar, no run, tucked to the on side and he refuses the single
singh to mclaren, four runs, poor effort from jaskaran, mclaren tucks it to long leg and jaskaran appears to have it covered but tries to stop it one handed, beats him
singh to harbhajan singh, 1 run, chipped in the air but the ball drops in the vacant midwicket region
symonds to mclaren, 1 run, slower ball again and tucked to deep midwicket, sharp fielding limits that to a single
roach to harbhajan singh, no run, fires it outside off and he fails to dig it out
roach to harbhajan singh, 1 run,
sharma to harbhajan singh, four runs, bang! he stays back and slaps it wide of mid-off and the ball races to the wide long-off boundary
harbhajan singh to gilchrist, no run, harbhajan opens the bowling, pushes it to the on side
harbhajan singh to gibbs, no run, turn this time, hits the bat and pad
harbhajan singh to gibbs, 2 byes, add some bounce to that turn! he shoulders arms and the ball beats rayudu's gloves and rolls sway
mclaren to mishra, no run, fends it to the off side
mclaren to mishra, 1 run, turns the face of the bat and tucks it down to fine leg
mclaren to gibbs, no run, tucks it straight to harbhajan at midwicket and tells his partner to wait
khan to gibbs, 1 run, shuffles and tucks it across the line to fine leg
khan to mishra, 1 run, pushed to the on side for a single
khan to gibbs, no run, tucks it to square leg, he can't pinch a single there
khan to gibbs, no run,
mclaren to mishra, no run, defends with soft hands down the pitch
mclaren to mishra, 1 run, bashes it past the bowler but malinga gets a hand to it at mid-off
mclaren to gibbs, 1 run, pushes it to the off side for a single
mclaren to mishra, no run, makes room to squirt it out but he misses
khan to gibbs, no run,
khan to symonds, 1 run, gets off the mark with a glide past the diving backward point fielder
malinga to mishra, out, the loft doesn't come off well, malinga bowls the slower ball, mishra stays at the crease and tries to loft over long-off but he ends up splicing it to mclaren at mid-off
malinga to symonds, no run, tucks him up for room, he pushes it down the pitch
malinga to symonds, no run, steers it towards cover point and tells his partner to wait
malinga to symonds, no run, doesn't give him width again, has to settle for a steer to backward point

bravo to sharma, no run, pushed just wide of cover and tiwary fires it to the keeper, rohit is sent back, dives in desperation and rayudu's flick misses the stumps, a direct hit would have sent him back
bravo to sharma, 1 run, opens the face and dabs it down to third man
bravo to suman, no run,
malinga to sharma, 1 run,
malinga to suman, 2 runs, tucks it to deep square leg
malinga to suman, no run,
malinga to suman, no run, slower ball, pushes it back to the bowler
harbhajan singh to sharma, 1 wide, down the leg side, doesn't offer a shot
harbhajan singh to suman, 1 run,
harbhajan singh to sharma, 1 wide, loses control and fires it wide really down the leg side
harbhajan singh to sharma, 1 run, drives wide of long-off and shouts 'two' immediately, sathish mops up but limits it to the single, harbhajan is peeved that the throw wasn't to his own end
bravo to suman, no run, stays back and punches it straight to mid-on
bravo to suman, no run, flat bats it straight to binny at mid-off, suman's eyeing a big hit somewhere
bravo to suman, 2 runs, tucks it in the air down to long leg for a couple
harbhajan singh to sharma, 1 run,
harbhajan singh to venugopal rao, four runs, well done, gets off the mark with a gentle dab down to third man, opens the face and beats the fielder within the circle
pollard to sharma, no run,
pollard to sharma, 2 runs, turns it to deep midwicket for a couple
pollard to sharma, 1 run, makes a lot of room but ends up steering it down to point
pollard to venugopal rao, 1 run, squirts it to the off side for a single
mclaren to venugopal rao, 1 run, stays back and tucks it to the on side for a single
pollard to sharma, 2 runs,
pollard to sharma, 2 runs, tucks i to deep midwicket and calls for two straightaway, his partner cooperates
pollard to sharma, six runs, just over the rope! rohit stays at the crease and nonchalantly lofts him high over the off side, the fielder at deep cover dives near the rope but the ball just beats him
harbhajan singh to jaskaran singh, 1 run, turns it down to square leg
harbhajan singh to jaskaran singh, out, harbhajan's having a dream night! jaskaran sashays down the track hoping to deposit it over deep midwicket but finds substitute duminy
malinga to roach, 2 runs, well played a well fielded, just opens the face to run it wide of the keeper, mclaren dives at third man to save 2 runs
khan to roach, no run, roach looks clueless, all he can do is push it back to the bowler again

khan to roach, out, the middle stump is flattened! roach exposes all three stumps and tries to launch that anywhere, swing and a miss and the middle stump lands a couple of yards back and takes the stump mic wire with it
malinga to singh, no run, makes room and tries to swing, he misses the ball completely
malinga to singh, no run,
gayle to warner, no run, tossed it up on middle, played it with a straight bat back to the bowler
langeveldt to warner, 1 wide, langeveldt runs in and delivers a wide ball outside off stump

langeveldt to gambhir, out, lbw! gambhir closed the face of the bat and missed an incoming delivery from langeveldt, the ball hit him on the knee roll and that looked out, the umpire takes a while but eventually raises the finger
sharma to warner, 1 wide, this is a terrible over, ishant sprays it wide again outside off stump

sharma to karthik, out, bowled him! karthik stays bent over his bat in dismay after poking tentatively at one outside off stump and inside-edging on to his stumps, that's the third time a wicket has fallen off the last ball of the over today
langeveldt to warner, no run, slower ball on off stump, warner mis-times the smash to cover
hussey to warner, four runs, warner's gone after him and cleared mid-on with a flat hit
mathews to collingwood, no run, the slower one outside off stump, driven to cover
mathews to collingwood, 1 run, nudged to midwicket for a rather risky single, a direct hit at the bowler's would have been close
kartik to collingwood, 1 run, collingood takes a small step to the off and drives to long-off, single taken
mathews to collingwood, four runs, collingwood skips down the track, and uses a small back lift to chip the ball through midwicket for four
mathews to collingwood, 1 run, slower ball again and collingwood checks his shot to play it straight past the bowler
kartik to warner, no run, defended back towards the bowler
kartik to collingwood, 1 run, it spins again and hits the outside edge and goes towards backward point
agarkar to collingwood, no run, zippy ball outside off stump, collingwood swishes, collingwood misses
agarkar to collingwood, no run, collingwood mis-times the drive to cover, he had width to hit that
hussey to warner, 1 run, hussey delivers with a side arm action, like a spinning malinga, warner hits through cover
hussey to collingwood, no run, played back to the bowler, hussey dives to his left and fields
hussey to warner, 1 run, warner drives again, this time through point for one
agarkar to warner, 1 run, driven to long off for a single
hussey to collingwood, 1 run, collingwood steps out to hussey and hits him over midwicket
hussey to warner, no run, driven firmly towards point where mandeep fields and fires the throw back in
hussey to warner, 1 run, played to mandeep again and again he fires in a good throw, collingwood is too quick though
kartik to warner, 1 run, warner goes back in his crease and hits the ball to long off with a flat bat
gayle to collingwood, 1 run, gayle returns and collingwood plays through midwicket for one
gayle to warner, 1 run, driven to wide mid on for one
kartik to warner, 1 run, played to mid off for a single
kartik to warner, 1 run, played to long off once again for one
kartik to collingwood, 1 run, collingwood moves back and hits the ball to deep cover for one
langeveldt to warner, 1 run, warner gets to 100 and delhi gives him a massive ovation, he reaches the landmark by driving to long off, second centurion of the tournament after yusuf pathan
nannes to gayle, no run, that looked slower but the speed gun said it was 137 kmh, gayle once again let it go outside off stump
nannes to ganguly, no run, ganguly gets caught on the crease by nannes' angle into the left-hander, he defends awkwardly
nannes to ganguly, 1 wide, ganguly jumps inside the line of a delivery on his hips and it gets called wide down leg side
mcdonald to gayle, six runs, he hit this with the middle, heaving it over the deep square leg boundary, first six of the innings
mishra to mandeep singh, out, mandeep charges and swings, the ball dips and spins, it's the legbreak and it leaves mandeep stranded, karthik collects and flattens two stumps

mishra to gayle, 1 run, dropped! sehwag drops a steepler! gayle swung hard at the ball and top-edged it high to square leg, sehwag tried catching with the fingers pointing up and the ball burst through his fingers
mishra to hussey, 1 run, played to point for a single
mishra to gayle, 1 run, gayle defends to the off side and then runs a quick single
bhatia to gayle, 1 run, played to square leg for a single
yadav to hussey, 1 wide, he strays down leg side this time, hussey tries to leg glance but fails
yadav to hussey, no run, a slower ball this time and hussey defends back to the bowler
yadav to hussey, 1 run, played through point for just a single, kkr need much much more now
yadav to mathews, 1 run, mathews backs away to make room and plays the ball to mid-off for a single
bhatia to mathews, 1 wide, too far down leg side this time, will have to rebowl that
bhatia to mathews, 2 runs, smashed back at the bowler, the ball crashes into the boot and deflects towards mid-off
yadav to hussey, no run, hussey backs away and swings hard but only gets a bottom edge past his stumps
yadav to mathews, 1 run, driven hard to mid off for a quick single
mishra to hussey, 1 run, played towards midwicket for one
mishra to mathews, no run, mathews backs away towards leg and plays the ball to cover
mishra to mathews, 1 run, played to cover again, another dot ball
mishra to hussey, 1 run, pushed towards mid off for a quick single
yadav to mathews, 1 wide, the slower ball but it's wide outside off
yadav to saha, 1 run, driven through point for a single
nannes to mathews, 1 run, mathews swings again and this time he mis-hits it over the head of gambhir at mid-off
bhatia to agarkar, four runs, bhatia bowls a low ball outside off, agarkar swings and gets a bottom edge through karthik's legs for four
bhatia to agarkar, no run, agarkar swings again and this time he doesn't place it between karthik's legs, he misses it completely
bhatia to agarkar, 1 run, he stays in his crease and chips the ball towards long off
bhatia to saha, 1 run, saha swings across the line and mis-times to midwicket
bhatia to saha, 1 bye, saha heaves mightily across the line but is no where close to making contact, this contest is fizzing out swiftly

nannes to saha, 2 runs, that's hit nannes on his follow through, saha smashed the ball back at the bowler and it struck the fingers on his left hand, nannes screamed in pain and he is bleeding, a lot. he's gone off the field right away
collingwood to agarkar, 2 runs, hit to deep midwicket for more insignificant runs
collingwood to agarkar, 2 runs, played to deep midwicket once again
mcdonald to saha, no run, played on the leg side, five balls left in this mismatch
mcdonald to saha, 1 run, he backs away and drives to the fielder at cover
mcdonald to kartik, 1 run, another single, to deep point
mclaren to bopara, no run, hint of swing there, bopara lets it go untouched wide outside off
mclaren to bopara, 1 run, tip-and-run to cover, soft hands, quick call, hard running
mclaren to marsh, no run, opens the face on this one, but there isn't much room here to work with
khan to bisla, 1 run, gets a thick outside edge first up, which files past slip, but third man is fine
mclaren to bisla, 2 runs, whipped away off the stumps, past square leg
mclaren to marsh, no run, makes a one-handed save in his follow through, it's hit back well and mclaren has to quickly go down to his left
mclaren to marsh, four runs, long-hop, doesn't get too high, and marsh rocks back and deposits it into the square-leg boundary
mclaren to marsh, no run, over-pitched, but marsh finds extra cover on this drive
malinga to bisla, 4 byes, after tare, rayudu struggles with the gloves, the slower ball beats bisla, but rayudu doesn't get his body behind it and lets through four byes
malinga to bisla, out, that's the highest i have seen a checked shot go! this slower ball spits at him, and he has to check the drive, and the skier settles in zaheer khan's hands at mid-off
harbhajan singh to marsh, 5 wides, poor keeping again, not to be too harsh on rayudu because he is not a genuine keeper, pitched outside leg, straightened, and went between rayudu and marsh
harbhajan singh to marsh, 1 run, bunted to midwicket for a single
harbhajan singh to jayawardene, no run, yorked, quick ball too, bhajji misses a trick by not appealing - it hit pad first
harbhajan singh to jayawardene, 1 run, defended with an open face, wide of cover, comes for a single
pollard to marsh, 2 runs, second fumble for harbhajan, this time at deep square leg, and this time it costs them the second - srt is not happy
bravo to jayawardene, no run, bhajji fields cleanly this time at extra cover and goes for the throw as marsh is sent back. there is a bad bounce, but tendulkar does well backing up
bravo to jayawardene, 1 run, pushed to mid-on, and comes through for a risky single, sathish's throw misses
pollard to marsh, 1 run, slower ball, he is early into it and hits it in the air, but wide enough of pollard
pollard to jayawardene, 1 wide, quicker delivery this time, but angled way down the leg side
malinga to marsh, 2 runs, slower ball, and he mis-hits past midwicket, and another poor throw from tiwary - half way down the pitch - lets them come back for two

harbhajan singh to jayawardene, 1 run, out, both of them have been run out! poor running again! mahela makes room and hits it square, malinga fumbles, mahela comes back for two. by the half way mark, marsh knows it's a bad call, and stops there and watches mahela get run out. just to make sure they get a wicket from this delivery, they run down the stumps at non-striker's end too
bravo to pathan, 1 run, an even slower delivery, irfan bunts it into the covers for one
harbhajan singh to pathan, 1 run, pushed down to long-off for a single
bravo to marsh, four runs, loose bowling , down the leg side, and marsh will keep punishing those, nicely glanced away fine of a square fine leg
bravo to marsh, 1 run, pushed down to long-off for one

malinga to pathan, out, amazing catch by bhajji! undoes all his earlier fumbles! irfan gets too much underneath this one, and bhajji has to run backwards from midwicket to get under it, and even though he hasn't got himself into great position he holds onto it and tumbles over. gets up and points to jonty rhodes
khan to lee, 1 run, tucks him up with one aimed for the ribs, gets a bottom edge for one
khan to lee, 2 runs, limply hit to mid-on, sathish hits direct but lee is in, and they get an overthrow too
malinga to chawla, 1 run, another slower ball down the leg side, this time chawla gets bat on it, gets a single to fine leg
mclaren to srivastava, 1 run, and he nicely steers it down to third man to hand over the strike to his up team-mate
mclaren to chawla, 2 runs, and shalabh does well again, backing up too far and turns this single to long-off into two
lee to dhawan, 1 run, slower ball, he stands as is and steers it to third man
lee to tendulkar, 1 run, quick delivery, tailing in, tendulkar flicks it with soft hands, gets a single just wide of square leg
srivastava to tendulkar, no run, swing first ball, big inswing, big shout too, but umpire tarapore says going down, and it is going down
srivastava to tendulkar, no run, swing again, beats him again, shalabh used to be a good inswing bowler for up before injuries halted his career he lost his swing too
pathan to dhawan, four runs, lovely square-drive, there are five fielders on the cover ring, and he gets it between cover and extra cover. power? check. placement? check
pathan to dhawan, no run, another slower ball, played straight to point this time, babu wants one but srt sends him back
srivastava to dhawan, no run, swing again, starts outside off, and babu lets it go
malik to dhawan, 1 run, and he bunts and runs, making it easily because they are all so deep
malik to tendulkar, 1 run, comes down the track, gets the inside half of the bat on this, and takes a single to mid-on
malik to dhawan, four runs, he has literally swept him away, not sure what it says about the pace of the bowler, but he has also managed to keep it down, and has got four runs for it
chawla to tendulkar, 5 wides, smears this one down the leg side, 89ks, too much to do for bisla, another makeshift keeper
chawla to dhawan, no run, turn there for pc, dhawan looks to work it fine, finds square leg

chawla to dhawan, 1 run, talk about fairplay! dhawan tips and runs, and chawla and pollard collide and pollard is tripped over, bisla goes for the run-out but misses. in between the serious stuff, sunny g has me chuckling. he says, 'now who is the big guy here? who should fall? there is no way pollard should be on the ground.'
pathan to pollard, no run, slower ball, pollard hits it on the bounce to cover
chawla to pollard, four runs, no slip there and it goes for four there, pollard throws all his might at this, gets a regulation edge past the keeper
chawla to pollard, six runs, what a beautiful shot, no power here, just a mere flick, with the turn, and over long-off easily
chawla to dhawan, no run, big legbreak again, and a big shout for lbw, but doctrove rightly reckons it's turning down the leg side
pathan to dhawan, 1 run, another slower ball, guided to deep point for one
goel to dhawan, 2 runs, swept away square, and a fumble from malik at deep square lets them come back for two
goel to tiwary, no run, tiwary sends dhawan back as he has hit a little too strongly to point
bopara to dhawan, 2 runs, and he has swept away a right-arm medium bowler, in the gap square on the on side, comes back for two to bring up his fifty!

bopara to dhawan, no run, bisla has got good training from sanga it seems, as he refuses to stop appealing for lbw on a ball that is clearly angling across the off stump. fun comes when his bowler is not interested at all
bopara to dhawan, no run,
bopara to rayudu, no run, nice diving save to his right by mahela at extra cover as rayudu drives this slower one from bopara
lee to tiwary, 1 run, slower one outside off, bunted square for a single
lee to rayudu, no run, slower ball again, and mahela makes another diving save at extra cover, he wants this one bad
lee to rayudu, 5 wides, nobody can not call this wides! it's just way too wide down the leg side and bisla has no chance here
bopara to rayudu, 1 run, steps down the track, gets a bottom edge on it but will take a single
bopara to tiwary, no run, slower ball, no room, defended back to him
chawla to tiwary, no run, slider, tiwary stays back and pushes, but can't beat mid-off
srivastava to rayudu, 1 run, comes down the track to sower delivery and gets a single to long-off
srivastava to rayudu, 1 wide, tries the same delivery but this is pushed too far across
bopara to bravo, 1 run, another slower ball that grips, back-of-the-hand stuff, bravo is way early into it, the bottom hand comes off, and he gets a single off the mis-hit
srivastava to sathish, no run, angled across him, and sathish is jumping down the track first ball and misses
srivastava to sathish, 3 runs, throws everything behind this, gets it over point, comes back for two, and bisla misses a regulation throw to give away an overthrow
bopara to sathish, four runs, what a shot, inside-out over extra, clean strike, and it's malik who is diving again in vain
lee to harbhajan singh, 1 run, he has got under it and smashed it to deep square leg for one
gony to kallis, 1 run, walks down the track and eases it to left of mid-off for a single
thushara to kallis, 1 run, pushes to left of albie at mid-off for  a quick single
morkel to kallis, 1 run, runs this down to third man
thushara to kallis, 1 run, around the off stump line, dabbed to third man
thushara to uthappa, no run, turns this one to the on side
gony to uthappa, no run, slightly slower, square driven to point
gony to kallis, 1 wide, and this time wide outside off
jakati to kallis, 1 run, on the leg stump line, turned past square-leg
muralitharan to kallis, 1 run, on the middle and leg, from round the stumps, pushed wide of midwicket
muralitharan to kohli, no run, goes back to clip the delivery from outside off to raina at midwicket
muralitharan to kohli, 1 run, on the middle and off, turned past square-leg
muralitharan to kallis, 1 run, around off stump line, steered to point
jakati to kohli, 1 run, on the leg stump line, whipped to deep midwicket
jakati to kallis, no run, on the middle stump line, eased back to the bowler
jakati to kallis, no run, from wide of the crease, pushed to right of the non striker and jakati makes a fine tumbling save
jakati to kohli, 1 run, moves down the track and turns it towards deep midwicket
muralitharan to kohli, 1 run, quicker, around off and middle, pushed out to the off side
muralitharan to kallis, 1 run, around off stump line, eased towards backward point
morkel to kallis, 1 run, slower one outside off, eased wide of backward point
gony to kallis, 1 wide, wide outside of off stump.
muralitharan to kallis, no run, lands outside off, kallis thinks it will spin in but it slides past the outside edge
muralitharan to kallis, no run, another skidder outside off, kallis tries to ping third man but can't connect
muralitharan to kallis, 1 run, stretches across to push wide of cover
jakati to pietersen, no run, quicker around off, square driven to backward point
jakati to pietersen, no run, maiden over from jakati! it turned from middle and off, pushed back to the bowler. just two runs from the last two overs. chennai are applying the squeeze.
muralitharan to white, no run, outside off stump, white pushes at it rather tentatively and edges it to the on side
muralitharan to white, no run, top spinner on the off and middle line, pushed to the off side .. no chance for a single as dhoni rushes after it
morkel to white, no run,
thushara to white, 1 run, from round the stumps, outside off, hits it down to long-off
kumar to vijay, no run, just outside off stump, vijay eases it to cover
kumar to vijay, no run, around the off and middle line, squeezed out to point
kumar to vijay, 2 runs, this one curves in to the middle stump line, wrists it through midwicket and kp sets off in pursuit
kumar to vijay, 1 run, another lifting delivery, vijay stays back to tap it down to the off side for a quick single
kumar to vijay, no run, around the off stump line, pushed out to cover
kumble to hayden, 1 run, another slider around off and middle, hayden gets a leading edge to cover
kumble to hayden, no run, on the off and middle, pushed back to anil
steyn to vijay, 1 run, slower one outside off stump, pushed to point for a quick run
kallis to vijay, 1 run, stays in line to push it to the on side for a single
kumble to vijay, 2 runs, on the middle stump line, flicked past square-leg
kumble to vijay, 1 run, on the middle and leg, squeezed to square-leg
kumble to raina, 1 run, stays back to inside edge the slider from outside off to the on side
kallis to raina, 1 run, taps it to right of square-leg and vinay moves to his right to stop
pietersen to raina, 1 run, leans across to push the off break through cover point
pietersen to vijay, 1 run, from round the stumps, vijay is again down the track and drags the intended big hit to deep midwicket
pietersen to raina, 1 run, from round the stumps, on the middle and off, pushed towards long-off
pietersen to raina, 1 run, on the off and middle, tapped to cover point
kumble to dhoni, no run, on the off and middle line, pushed to point
kumble to dhoni, 1 run, presses back to work it past square-leg for a single
vinay kumar to raina, no run, slower one around off stump line, squeezed off the outer edge to pk at backward point
vinay kumar to raina, 1 run, another slower one, pushed to long-off
kumble to raina, 1 run, moves down the track and drives to kp at long-off
kumar to dhoni, 1 wide, pushes this one down the leg side ..
kallis to morkel, 1 leg bye, slower one on the leg, albie tries to flick, the ball rolls to the off, kohli rushes in from point and raina dives to get back inside the crease
pathan to sehwag, no run, sehwag makes room and taps it towards extra cover, can't clear the field there
pathan to sehwag, four runs, four more, yusuf kept it flat this time and fired it on leg stump, sehwag bent low and swept it really fine to find the ropes
narwal to gambhir, no run, tapped away into the off side towards point
narwal to collingwood, no run, pushed into the off side towards cover
warne to gambhir, no run, skidded onto him there, kept it flat, gambhir closes the face a touch too early on that and gets a leading edge towards point
warne to gambhir, 2 runs, whipped from the crease towards square leg where faiz fazal misfields, allowing them to come back for the second
warne to gambhir, 1 run, tucked into the leg side for a single
pathan to gambhir, no run,
pathan to gambhir, 1 run, tickled away towards fine leg for a single
warne to gambhir, four runs, stepping out of his crease to that tossed-up ball, hitting it with the turn is gambhir as he swings that over midwicket for a boundary
warne to gambhir, 1 run, whipped away towards deep midwicket for a single to bring up the team's century
tait to gambhir, 2 wides, too wide, and it;s given by the umpire, and they also steal a run
trivedi to gambhir, 1 run, slower one again, waits for it to come on and dabs it behind point for a single
tait to karthik, 1 run, karthik gets to a half-century, an enterprising innings, typical of him, guides that down to third man
tait to mcdonald, 1 run,
maharoof to ojha, 1 run, guided down to third man for a single
mcdonald to ojha, 1 run, nice stump to stump line, he pushes it back to the bowler
mcdonald to jhunjhunwala, no run,
mishra to voges, 1 run, pushed it wide of mid-on for a single
mishra to jhunjhunwala, 1 wide, quicker through the air but misdirected, down the leg side, given a wide
maharoof to pathan, 1 run,
maharoof to voges, no run, chops it down towards point, calls for a single but yusuf isn't interested
ladda to voges, 1 run,

ladda to pathan, 2 runs, dropped, difficult to call it that but collingwood did get his hands to it, a lethargic chip by yusuf who gets no timing on it, running in from long-off, collingwood covers good distance but fails to hold on while diving to his left
ladda to pathan, no run, pushed back to the bowler
ladda to pathan, no run,
mishra to dogra, no run, bowling it from wide of the crease, gets outside the line and defends
mishra to dogra, 1 run, driven through extra cover into the deep for a single
ladda to dogra, no run, spins away and guides it towards point
ladda to dogra, 1 run, tucks it down behind square for a single
ladda to dogra, no run, keeps it flat and targets middle, not much turn for him as much as mishra, defended back down the pitch
collingwood to dogra, 2 runs, swung away over midwicket into the deep for a couple of runs
mishra to dogra, 1 run, turned away, eased towards deep cover for a single
mishra to tait, 1 run, slapped down to long-off for a single
yadav to tait, 1 run, smartly guided down to third man for a single
yadav to dogra, 1 run, rammed back past the bowler to mid-off for a single
ladda to dogra, 2 runs, comes down the track to smack him over long-off, ends up slicing it over point for a couple as the fielder in the deep fumbles
jaskaran singh to pujara, 1 run, guided down to third man for a single
harmeet singh to pujara, 5 wides, too wide down the leg side, even a dive from gilchrist can't save it, five runs just gifted away
symonds to pujara, 1 run, in the channel outside off, eased towards deep cover for a single
roach to ganguly, no run, banged it hard on the pitch on middle, got back, nicely behind it, and defended it to cover
sharma to tiwary, 1 run, closes the face on that one and tickles it wide of square leg for a single
ojha to tiwary, no run, gets a stride out and defends it to extra cover
ojha to ganguly, 1 run, gets across and taps it behind square for a single, excellent start by ojha
ojha to hussey, 1 run, pushed through the line to long-off for one more, another tidy over from ojha
ojha to hussey, 1 run, flicked away towards fine leg for a single
sharma to ganguly, 1 run, driven hard past the bowler for a single to long-off
venugopal rao to ganguly, 2 runs, nicely placed, drove it gently into that big gap between long-off and deep cover for a couple of ruins
venugopal rao to ganguly, 2 runs, similar delivery but ganguly gets to it this time, steering it through point for a couple
symonds to hussey, 1 run, turned away through midwicket for a single
symonds to ganguly, 1 run, comes down the track and slaps it towards deep square leg for one more
ojha to ganguly, 1 wide, ojha is struggling, tried to get him stumped again off a wide ball  but ganguly's not falling for it, it's called by the umpire
roach to mathews, 2 runs, makes room and swats that past extra cover into the deep for a couple of runs
roach to agarkar, 1 run, moves away and drives it wide of extra cover for a single
parmar to gibbs, 1 run, on middle and leg, turned behind square for a single to keep the strike, deccan have begun well

bond to gibbs, 1 run, missed run-out, gilchrist is lucky, played to midwicket and rush for a single, gayle fielded and tool aim at the striker's end but didn't strike, gilchrist was a gonner had that hit
bond to gibbs, 1 wide, slides it down the leg side, a slower ball gone wrong, a wide

agarkar to gilchrist, out, a massive wicket for kolkata, gilchrist looks to mow the ball over midwicket, gets the ball high on the bat, the ball swirls towards deep midwicket, pujara runs in from the rope to safely take the catch, it looked like there would be a collision with gayle who was running from inside the circle, but there was no problems in the end, eden goes crazy
agarkar to gibbs, 1 run, pushed towards cover for a sharp single
bond to gibbs, 1 run, pushed towards mid-on for a single this time
agarkar to gibbs, no run, a touch slower from agarkar, 123 kmh, gibbs was expecting the ball to rise more than it did, gibbs' mow meets only air and the ball sails over middle stump
agarkar to gibbs, 1 run, swung away towards deep square leg for a single
kartik to gibbs, no run, defended towards cover, gibbs wants a run but is rightly sent back
kartik to mishra, no run, driven firmly down to mid-on
kartik to mishra, four runs, down the track this time and lofts the ball over mid-on for a one-bounce four
kartik to mishra, four runs, and once more, almost the same shot from mishra, comes down the pitch and lofts over mid-on for four more
kartik to gibbs, no run, pushed into the leg side towards kartik
kartik to gibbs, 1 run, angling in towards middle, eases it towards deep cover for a single
mathews to symonds, 2 runs, slower one, slaps it past extra cover who misfields, two more
parmar to gibbs, 1 run, turned behind square for a single
parmar to symonds, 1 run, dabbed into the off side wide of cover for a single
parmar to gibbs, 1 run, gibbs gets to his half-century with a gentle nudge behind square, one of his more restrained twenty20 fifties but he's dropped anchor and they have plenty of wickets in hand
bond to symonds, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
kartik to suman, 1 run, pushed away wide of midwicket for a single
agarkar to symonds, 1 wide, wide, well outside off, symonds had shaped up for a big one there and wisely left it alone
bond to symonds, 2 runs, another superb over, finishes off with just a couple, driven wide of long-off
gayle to suman, 1 run, just a single and the crowd knows this game is virtually over, driven to deep midwicket
gayle to symonds, 1 run, comes down the track and rams it down to long-off on the bounce for just a single
kumar to marsh, no run, swing away from marsh, who lets it go through to uthappa. pk not happy with the bounce it almost bounces twice before reaching the keeper
kumar to marsh, no run, massive swing there, pitches leg - maybe even outside - and beats a defensive shot outside off
kumar to marsh, no run, gets in line this time and defended solidly towards point
kumar to marsh, 1 run, tips and runs to cover, and makes sure this is not a maiden
vinay kumar to marsh, no run, another bottom edge on a marsh attempt to run it down for a single

vinay kumar to marsh, out, and vk strikes early, what a bowling combination change! the effort ball, quicker than his three previous deliveries, pitches middle and off and makes him play and leaves him enough to take the edge, and dravid at wide slip is placed perfectly for it
vinay kumar to sangakkara, four runs, and he gets the sparse crowd involved with a trademark languid square-drive, vk gave him the width and he sends it crashing between point and cover
vinay kumar to sangakkara, 1 run, and follows it up with a bunted single to square leg
kumar to sangakkara, no run, looks to open the face on on but it's too close to him
kumar to sangakkara, no run, makes room, pk follows him, no room there, and he hits it straight to mid-on
kumar to sangakkara, 1 run, slower ball, and he drops it to cover and pinches a single
vinay kumar to sangakkara, 1 run, gets an inside edge onto the pad as he looks to play it to third man, but steals a single, good calling from bisla
vinay kumar to bisla, no run, plays across the line of a straight delivery and misses
kallis to sangakkara, no run, straight delivery this time, no room, sanga hits it to cover

kallis to sangakkara, four runs, not the best of his shots, clears his body out of the line, kallis slips in a slower ball, and sanga gets the inside half of the bat, but also gets enough power to beat mid-on and go for four
kallis to bisla, four runs, misfielded by steen by deep square leg, it was hit nicely with the angle, and steyn makes good ground to his right but the slight wobble beats his slide
kallis to bisla, 1 run, dabbed away to third man for one
kumble to sangakkara, no run, sanga gives him the charge, and has to defend a flat delivery, close to 100ks
kumble to bisla, no run, bisla makes room and has to contend with a fiery delivery that keeps following him
pietersen to sangakkara, 1 run, hit softly into the leg side where nobody is in the circle, but kp does the chasing and keeps them down to one
steyn to bopara, no run, again he is quick, and there isn't much room, bopara hits it to cover
steyn to bopara, 1 run, drops to cover and runs, and kp gets a bad bounce else this would have been interesting
kumble to bopara, no run, straight and fast, 99ks, no room either, defended
steyn to bopara, 2 runs, slower ball, and again uses whatever pace there is on it, to run it fine of third man
kallis to bopara, 1 run, steered to third man to bring yuvi back on strike
kumble to yuvraj singh, (no ball) 1 run, gives him the charge again, looks to go inside-out but gets too close to it and hits it to long-off for one. and it's a massive no-ball by the way
steyn to yuvraj singh, 1 run, yuvraj backs away and steyn follows him with a slower delivery, gets a single to extra cover
vinay kumar to bopara, 1 run, moves across the stumps and mows this one to deep midwicket
kumar to bopara, 1 leg bye, slower ball, and it beats bopara who is moving across al the time, will get a leg-bye
lee to pandey, no run, starts with the sort delivery, tucking him up, 139ks, patted to leg side
lee to pandey, 1 run, slower ball, bunted to point for a single
sreesanth to kallis, no run, makes room for the square drive, doesn't connect well, finds cover
sreesanth to pandey, four runs, slower ball, picks it up early, and lofts it cleanly over mid-off
srivastava to kallis, out, out first ball, kallis looks for the big booming drive through the off side, ends up going too hard and edges a straight angling delivery
srivastava to pietersen, four runs, superb shot first ball! moves across and uses his wrists to drive it straight of mid-off, from wide of off
srivastava to pietersen, 1 run, looks to whip this off the stumps, gets an inside edge onto the pad
srivastava to pandey, 2 runs, nicely guided to square of third man to come back for two
bipul sharma to pandey, no run, flat outside off, hit to point
bipul sharma to pandey, no run, again flat, his height creating an awkward sort of angle, beats pandey, the lbw shout is turned down as this might be headed down leg
chawla to pietersen, no run, looks for the big hit into the on side but ends up yorking himself up
bipul sharma to pietersen, no run, looks to work it to leg and gets a leading edge, one bounce to cover
bipul sharma to pietersen, 1 run, gives him the charge and flicks this from outside off to the on side for one
yuvraj singh to kohli, 1 run, driven down to long-off, takes a single
bipul sharma to pietersen, 3 runs, bunted away into the leg side and they push for a second. two fielders are rushing towards it, and neither gets down, letting them steal the third too
yuvraj singh to pietersen, 2 runs, smashed straight down again, gets yuvi in the foot, and deflects to the other side of long-off for another couple
pathan to kohli, 1 run, makes room to find irfan has followed him, and he flicks it to fine leg for one
pathan to pietersen, no run, steps down and yorks himself up
srivastava to kohli, 1 run,
pathan to pietersen, no run, oh wild shot from kp, dances down the track and swings and misses
pathan to pietersen, 1 wide, kp jumps across the crease, ikp wants to create some distance, and bowls it way wide outside off
pathan to pietersen, four runs, finishes this error-filled match with a sweet boundary through extra cover. bangalore back to what they have become used to - winning
narwal to hayden, 1 run, hayden walks down the track right away, gets an inside edge onto the pad, vijay calls him through for a single
pathan to hayden, no run, flat delivery, pushed back to the bowler
wagh to hayden, four runs, and this has been clubbed! walks down the pitch again, and flat-bats it over midwicket
tait to vijay, 1 run, tip and run here
tait to raina, 2 runs, steered away to third man, and a needless direct hit from the deep lets them come through for the overthrow
warne to vijay, no run, nice dip there, vijay defends the legbreak
