pathan to morkel, 1 run, bunted past point for a single
jhunjhunwala to vijay, 5 runs, watson's first boundary in the ipl! through a wild wild throw from midwicket that beats everybody on its way to extra cover for four extra runs
jhunjhunwala to morkel, 2 runs, guided past backward point and comes back for two
jhunjhunwala to morkel, 1 run, makes room, dabs it to backward point for one
jhunjhunwala to vijay, 1 run, bunted into the covers for one
warne to morkel, 1 run, slid across him, and he takes a single to third man
warne to morkel, 2 runs, swiped away past midwicket for two
pathan to vijay, six runs, crash! dances down the track and sends him sailing into the crowd behind deep midwicket. h.u.g.e
pathan to vijay, 1 run, makes room, is too far from it to get power, but gets a single
tait to morkel, 1 run, can't beat extra cover this time, but takes a single nonetheless
narwal to vijay, six runs, bye bye ball! slower ball, but vijay waits and waits for it and sends it over cow corner. crazy hitting going on
warne to morkel, no run, vijay almost runs himself out! off morkel's pad, but it hasn't gone too far away from ojha, and morkel sends vijay back. a wide throw saves vijay here

watson to morkel, 1 run, umm, i am not going to repeat what gauti said! it's a top-edged skier that hasn't gone far off the pitch. three fielders get under it, ojha calls for it, and lets it slip right through
tait to vijay, no run, tait flirting with the wide line, and and has managed to stay inside it, and still wide enough of vijay. well bowled
watson to vijay, out, end of a superb innings from vijay! finally he mis-hits one and holes out to deep midwicket! he walks out to a unanimous standing ovation. take a bow
morkel to lumb, 2 runs, doug b announces himself with a tumbling save at deep square leg, lovely stop to prevent this punch off the hips from going for four
morkel to lumb, no run, steps down the wicket, gets the bottom part of the bat
tyagi to ojha, 1 wide, starts with a wide down the leg side
tyagi to ojha, 1 leg bye, hurries him up in this flick down the leg side, gets a leg-bye
tyagi to lumb, no run, lumb looking desperate, steps down, makes room, swings and misses
tyagi to lumb, 2 runs, steps down the track, and clears cover ring with a mis-hit
bollinger to ojha, 1 run, tucks him up, this time he drops it fine of square leg and gets a single
tyagi to lumb, 1 run, dropped at cover-point by raina, would have been a superb catch had he held onto it with that dive to his left
morkel to lumb, 1 run, slower ball, sets himself up for the big hit, waits, and hits it two bounces to deep midwicket
muralitharan to ojha, 1 wide, starts round the wicket, pitches leg and it turns down the leg side
muralitharan to ojha, no run, doosra, spinning away from the same spot, gets a thick edge, along the ground
muralitharan to ojha, 1 run, flatter delivery, stays back, and places it in covers for one
jakati to ojha, no run,
jakati to ojha, six runs, ojha is not going down without swinging, charges down the track and lofts him straight into the sight screen
jakati to ojha, 1 run, dropped by badri at deep midwicket, running in and misjudging a low catch
morkel to watson, four runs, oof what power! both morkel and rudi do well to get out of the way of this straight hit
jakati to ojha, 1 run, comes down the track and bunts this one into the leg side to bring up his fifty
muralitharan to ojha, 1 run, starts off with a toppie, ojha bunts it to cover for one
jakati to ojha, six runs, superb shot, are we on to something? comes down the track and makes room at the same time, and lofts him over the sight screen
jakati to watson, 1 leg bye, turning towards him from outside leg, beats him, but watto gets a leg-bye
jakati to ojha, four runs, gives him the charge and throws his bat at it again, and the outside edge beats third man - big over for rajasthan
tyagi to watson, 1 wide, beats him with one that nips away, and quite harshly it's called a wide
muralitharan to ojha, 1 run, topspinner, and the attempted straight loft gets a thick edge that just about clears extra cover
muralitharan to watson, six runs, watooooooo whadaplayaaaaa! swept away over deep square leg, 15 rows back, lovely clean striking - and against murali, no less
bollinger to fazal, 1 run, steered to third man for a single
raina to fazal, 1 run, driven inside-out, ojha on strike now
raina to fazal, 1 run, follows fazal who is backing away, and concedes just a single
raina to ojha, 1 leg bye, looks for the big shot over the leg side, swings too early, gets a leg-bye
muralitharan to jhunjhunwala, six runs, no respect for the highest wicket-taker in tests! dances down first ball and hits him back over his head, six more
tyagi to ojha, four runs, swings, gets a thick edge over the keeper
tyagi to ojha, 1 run, skies this one, just wide of the bowler, hayden is under it, and he drops it, but the single takes ojha away from strike
tyagi to raut, no run, and ojha can't get a century either, raut swings and misses
rg sharma to dhawan, 1 wide, coming round the wicket, slides it well down the leg side, given a wide
symonds to tendulkar, 1 run, angling in towards off, turns the face and tap it wide of square leg for a single

harris to tendulkar, four runs, moral victory for the bowler, found some late movement this time which produced a leading edge as tendulkar tried to turn the face, there's no slip in place and it races to the third-man boundary
symonds to tendulkar, 2 runs, raises the 50-stand with a drive through midwicket, a couple more in the deep

ojha to dhawan, out, stumped, gets a wicket first ball, tosses it up outside off, dhawan comes down the track, turns in but dhawan was expecting more, defended inside the line, missed and gilly made no mistake this time, one down
ojha to tiwary, no run, lovely bowling, induced him to come out of the crease and got it to turn a bit extra, defended back to the bowler
ojha to bravo, no run, ooh, turns away as he closes the face and it strikes the outside half of the bat, bravo is not looking too convincing here
rg sharma to rayudu, 1 run, comes down the track, digs it out through midwicket into the deep for a single
rg sharma to tiwary, 1 run, slips that in quicker, turned away wide of square leg for one more
r sharma to tiwary, 2 runs, crashed through the off side  but there's cover in the deep, long-off runs across and restricts them to a couple
ojha to tiwary, 1 run, pushes it wide of midwicket from the crease for a single
ojha to rayudu, 1 run, pushes it back to ojha who fumbles moving to his right and concedes a single
jaskaran singh to rayudu, 1 wide, jaskaran feeling the nerves, slower one but too wide, given by the umpire
jaskaran singh to rayudu, 2 runs, poor stuff from jaskaran, driven to deep cover and jaskaran fails to collect the throw, fumbles and allows them two more
harbhajan singh to gilchrist, no run, whipped away to square leg, no single on offer there
khan to laxman, no run, guided towards backward point this time, bit of confusion on whether to go for the run, decide against it finally
bravo to laxman, no run, pitched it up on the off, cracked it back to the bowler

bravo to gilchrist, 1 run, out, run-out, pushed away towards square leg, they scampered for a single but there was plenty of hesitation as they tried to decide on the second, laxman took off, harris sent him back, an accurate throw to the keeper as gilchrist makes way, rayudu takes off the bails and laxman is a long way out
khan to rg sharma, 1 run, uses his wrists to turn that through square leg for a single
pollard to rg sharma, 1 wide, slips it down the leg side, rohit tries to help that down, misses, given a wide
pollard to symonds, 2 runs, comes from wide of the crease, slaps it towards deep midwicket for a couple of runs, steadily progressing are these two
mclaren to rg sharma, 1 run, runs it down towards third man for a single
pollard to mishra, no run, slower one bowled on the off, defended towards midwicket
pollard to symonds, 1 run, bowls it from wide of the crease, slashed away to deep point for a single
pollard to mishra, no run, slower one, t suman wants to send it into the stands, doesn't pick the slower one, has a big heave, misses
pollard to suman, 1 run, change of pace again, heaves it in the direction of square leg, gets to him on the bounce
mclaren to r sharma, no run, makes room and the bowler chases him, defended back to the mclaren
malinga to r sharma, no run, misses again, quick this time, makes room to swing that over the on-side, gets to rayudu on the bounce and he does well to get his body behind it
malinga to suman, 1 run, slower one this time, flicked through square leg for a single
harbhajan singh to suman, 1 leg bye,
harbhajan singh to r sharma, out, rahul's gone, lands on middle, heaves it straight to bravo at deep backward square leg, a hopeless situation for deccan now
harbhajan singh to suman, out, tries an identical shot but the doosra does him in, it turns away, he gets the leading edge and rayudu, running to his right, snaps a well-judged catch

pathan to ganguly, no run, swing, lovely swing, starts leg and ends up middle, but how long can he keep getting it? that ikp's swing ends in one or two overs is one of indian cricket's bigger tragedies of the last decade
pathan to ganguly, 1 wide, looks for more swing and this goes on with the angle, way down the leg side
pathan to ganguly, no run, goes for the square-drive this time, can't beat point
powar to ganguly, 1 run, tosses it up even more, ganguly charges down, ends up yorking himself
powar to ganguly, no run, closer to the leg stump, flatter too, ganguly defends
srivastava to gayle, no run, slower ball, 117ks, gayle defends
srivastava to gayle, four runs, swing there, and gayle gets the outside half of the bat on the drive, the ball goes uppishly past extra cover, wide enough of a diving piyush chawla
theron to ganguly, no run, starts off with a slower one, outside off, sliced to point
theron to ganguly, 1 no ball, keeps him quiet with a straight delivery with no room, but over-steps
srivastava to ganguly, 2 runs, steals a single to midwicket, and theron's direct-hit costs punjab an overthrow
theron to gayle, 1 run, driven wide of mid-off for a single
theron to ganguly, no run, slower ball, driven to extra cover
powar to gayle, no run, gives him the charge, ends up yorking himself, and hits it back to the bowler
bopara to ganguly, out, and bopara gets a typical harris dismissal here, 115ks, stopping at ganguly, and a fine low return catch off this sort of leading edge by bopara. eat your heart out, harry
bopara to tiwary, 1 run, steered to third man to get off the mark
bopara to gayle, 1 run, driven through the covers, will get a single
powar to tiwary, 1 run, tiwary gives him the charge again, gets too close to it, and doesn't get the elevation on this shot, and gets just a single

chawla to tiwary, no run, tiwary is getting desperate here, charging out too early, and ends up yorking himself. 'superb bowling pushy,' says bisla. pushy is the nickname chawla gets from sussex where he replaced mushtaq 'mushy' ahmed
chawla to tiwary, 1 run, flicked away from outside off, into the leg side for one
bopara to gayle, 2 wides, slower ball, wide outside leg, and this is now the most expensive over in all ipl matches
pathan to tiwary, four runs, it indeed is pouring, this time tiwary edges a slower delivery, wide of keeper, fine of third man
pathan to tiwary, 1 run, pushed to long-off for a single

chawla to gayle, 1 run, another catch dropped, ganguly can't help his laughter in the dugout! this is a top-edged skier, chawla calls for it, chawla gets under it, chawla waits for ages for it to come down, chawla lets it slip out. dada is cracking up, amul butter wants its logo on those punjab fingers
pathan to mathews, 1 run, slower ball, driven down to long-off for a single
pathan to mathews, 1 run, mis-hits an attempted straight hit, bopara makes a good diving save at extra cover
srivastava to mathews, 1 wide, same delivery, slightly wider, and this time rightly penalised
srivastava to mathews, four runs, 200 up, comes up with an edge past the makeshift wicketkeeepr, bisla - a regulation golveman would have taken that
bond to bisla, no run, another slower ball, around off stump, pushed back to the bowler
bond to jayawardene, 1 run, slower ball, pushed down to mid-on, and he wants a single and he takes a single
bond to bisla, four runs, slower ball, what slower ball? bisla makes room, but adjusts well to the change of pace, and goes over mid-off
unadkat to jayawardene, 1 run, runs this down to third man for a single
unadkat to bisla, 1 run, dabs this one down to third man for a single - unadkat is warned for running on the pitch
unadkat to jayawardene, 1 run, slower ball, 11ks, takes the edge, and it dies on saha, and what's more they take a single
unadkat to bisla, no run, slower ball again, this time he beats bisla outside off
kartik to bisla, four runs, superb hit, comes down the track and absolutely murders this only yards wide of long-off, but so quick it is the fieldsman can't get around
kartik to bisla, out, another arm ball, and through bisla before his bat comes down. leg stump gone! mocking clap from kartik, along with a few words for a send-off
gayle to sangakkara, 1 run, forced away from middle and leg to wide of point for a single
kartik to jayawardene, 1 run, tip-and-run to cover
kartik to jayawardene, 1 wide, fired down the leg side
mathews to jayawardene, no run, change of pace - he actually bowled a quick delivery! and bets him outside off
mathews to sangakkara, four runs, some luck going punjab's way in this innings, sanga goes for the big square drive, gets a thick edge past saha and fine of third man

mathews to sangakkara, six runs, what a shot! 100 up, and also 50 for the partnership! sanga gives him the charge, mathews bowls the slower one, and it is merely a checked shot, lofted straight over mathews's head, all the way for six. what clean connection
hussey to sangakkara, 1 run, flat delivery, driven towards extra cover, and tiwary makes a diving save
hussey to jayawardene, six runs, oof beautiful! lovely clean straight strike, and he hardly seemed to have hit it, over long-off, only about five rows back, but that's enough
kartik to jayawardene, 1 run, and as expected mahela makes room and chips this past extra cover for one
kartik to sangakkara, 1 run, flat-batted one bounce to long-off for a single
bond to jayawardene, 1 run, steered away to third man for a single
bond to jayawardene, no run, another dot ball, pushed straight to straightish extra cover, and eden gardens is raising some hell - for dot balls
mathews to yuvraj singh, no run, another slower ball, hit back to the right of mathews who fields well in his follow through, gets an applause from the crowd
bond to yuvraj singh, 1 run, plays with an open face, steals a single to point, mandeep could have got him, but misses with the direct hit
kumble to sehwag, no run, just outside off, sehwag looks to crack it through covers but misses, uthappa can't collect cleanly
vinay kumar to sehwag, no run, third dot ball in a row, this time sehwag defends towards mid-on
vinay kumar to sehwag, four runs, no one keeps sehwag quiet for long, not that wide from vinay but sehwag makes room and carves it behind backward point for four, it's a fast outfield at the kotla
vinay kumar to sehwag, 1 run, steered towards backward point for a single this time to keep the strike
kumble to sehwag, no run, third dot ball in a row, sehwag can't get it past kumble again
kumble to sehwag, four runs, gets the boundary this time, moves towards leg a touch and caresses the ball through extra cover
vinay kumar to warner, 1 run, warner blasts it along the ground to long-off, vinay has a fielder in the deep there
vinay kumar to sehwag, 1 run, a back of the hand slower ball this time, 101 kmh, sehwag punches it to mid-off
kallis to collingwood, no run,
kallis to collingwood, 2 runs, collingwood shuffles across the stumps and glances the ball fine, appanna dives at the fine-leg boundary to stop that one
pietersen to warner, 1 run, gets a single to cover this time, played with soft hands
appanna to collingwood, 1 run, width again, just wide of cover point to allow time for the single
appanna to warner, 1 run, single to midwicket this time
appanna to collingwood, no run, pushed towards extra cover by collingwood this time, and that's the time-out
appanna to collingwood, 1 run, nudged towards backward point this time, a sharp single is taken
white to collingwood, 2 runs, swung away towards midwicket when appanna misfields
white to collingwood, 1 wide, whoah, that was the widest ball of the tournament, slipped out of white's hand and barely lands on the pitch, way outside off
white to collingwood, no run, blocked towards the off side
white to collingwood, six runs, terrible delivery from white, half-tracker, sits up for collingwood, who clobbers it over midwicket
appanna to jadhav, 1 run, pushed towards long-off for a single
appanna to collingwood, no run, chops it towards backward point
appanna to collingwood, 1 run,
mithun to collingwood, 1 run, slashed towards deep point by collingwood
mithun to jadhav, 1 wide, slanting down the leg side, mithun will have to re-bowl that one
mithun to jadhav, 1 run, another single to third man, bangalore won't mind that
mithun to collingwood, 1 run, another single, leading edge towards mid-off this time

appanna to jadhav, out, is that a stumping? jadhav look to glance the ball down towards fine leg, it rolls off his pad and then the gloves towards the keeper, uthappa collects and whips off the bails with jadhav out of his ground
appanna to collingwood, no run, driven towards mid-off by collingwood
kallis to collingwood, 1 run, pushed towards cover for a single
kallis to vettori, 2 runs, vettori completely foxed by that slower ball, miscues the ball towards mid-off, ball is in the air for a long time but the fielder is at long-off, so vettori is safe
kumble to collingwood, no run, collingwood comes down the pitch and pushes the ball towards mid-off
kumble to collingwood, no run, back to dot balls, collingwood can only push the final delivery of the over back to kumble
vinay kumar to collingwood, six runs, collingwood dispenses with fancy stuff and goes back to the basics, down the track and mowed over midwicket for six more

mithun to collingwood, four runs, mishit from collingwood, looks to swing it over the legside, gets a thick outside edge towards third man, the ball spins sharply after bouncing to wrongfoot the fielder there, appanna it was
maharoof to kallis, four runs, and again! this time it's a touch slower and kallis waits a moment before driving wide of the fielder at mid-off
mishra to white, no run, driven firmly back towards the bowler
mishra to kallis, no run, bowled him, but off the free-hit
mishra to kallis, no run, outside off, kallis looks to steer it towards backward point but misses the ball
maharoof to kallis, 1 run, tapped towards cover this time, gets a quick single

mishra to white, out, warner keeps getting these catches, white's the man to go, batsman looks to go straight but gets it on the outside half of the bat, the ball swirls towards long-off, warner does the rest, that's mishra's 12th wicket
mishra to kallis, 1 run, crisply driven towards long-off for a single
vettori to kallis, no run, way outside off, kallis looks to swipe over midwicket but misses
vettori to kallis, no run, driven towards extra cover, another dot ball
vettori to kallis, 1 run, arm ball, kallis makes room and steers towards backward point
maharoof to pietersen, no run, just outside off, batsman looks to hoick that to midwicket, no contact
maharoof to pietersen, 1 leg bye, maharoof appeals for lbw, not sure why, pietersen is struck on the foot at least two feet outside off, ball runs away towards backward point
maharoof to pietersen, no run, delhi bowlers doing a superb job here, another dot ball as pietersen can only punch it back to maharoof
bhatia to pietersen, no run, defended back towards the bowler this time
bhatia to pietersen, no run, third slower ball in a row from bhatia, pietersen can only get it as far as extra cover
sangwan to kallis, 1 run, they just can't break free here these two batsman, slashed towards deep point this time
sangwan to kallis, no run, crunched towards point, straight towards the fielder so there wasn't even a single off that slower ball
sangwan to kallis, no run, super over from sangwan, the final ball is pushed back to the bowler
bhatia to pietersen, 1 run, on legstump, glanced down to fine leg
bhatia to kallis, 1 run, gambhir throws himself to the left at extra cover to stop the ball
sangwan to uthappa, no run, slaps the ball towards point
sangwan to kallis, 1 run, punches the ball towards long-off for a single
vettori to uthappa, no run,
vettori to uthappa, 2 runs, slapped in the gap between deep point and deep cover
sangwan to kallis, 1 run, turned to midwicket for a single
sangwan to uthappa, 1 run, single to long-off this time
sangwan to kallis, 1 run, thick outside edge flies towards third man for a single
bhatia to taylor, no run, chopped towards point, straight towards the fielder
bhatia to taylor, no run, way outside off, taylor targets midwicket with a big swing, misses, appeal for a stumping, but he's in
mishra to taylor, six runs, welcome to the ipl taylor, that is another massive hit, this ball was closer to the stumps, taylor batters that one over square leg
mishra to kallis, 1 run, swung towards deep square leg by kallis
bhatia to kallis, 1 run, kallis keeps adding to his collection of half-centuries, gets a single down to long-off
bhatia to kallis, 1 run, pushed towards extra cover again, much less power in this stroke
bhatia to kohli, 1 run, a wild heave from kohli, gets the top-edge which swirls towards third man but lands safely
sangwan to kohli, 1 run, down to fine leg for a single this time
sangwan to kallis, 1 run, kallis stays back and crunches it to long-off for a single
vettori to dravid, four runs, typical dravid shot, makes room and carves it past a diving extra cover
vettori to dravid, 1 run, well outside off, dravid chops it towards backward point, sehwag dives to his right to stop that one
vettori to kohli, 1 run, drilled to long-off for a single
maharoof to kohli, out, kohli's stay is over, looks to swing the ball over midwicket, he misses and the ball spears into middle and leg stumps

vettori to vinay kumar, out, vettori strikes, can't blame vinay for swinging at everything, he comes down the track and looks to heave to midwicket, the ball slips under his bat and crashes into middle and off stumps
vettori to mithun, four runs, makes room and smashes it through extra cover for four
vettori to mithun, 1 run, flat-batted down to long-off for a single
vettori to dravid, no run, moves outside leg and drills the ball to extra cover
vettori to dravid, 1 run, again gambhir at extra cover does the fielding after draivd makes room and pushes the ball towards him
mishra to appanna, 1 run, the hat-trick is saved, swung towards square leg

mishra to appanna, no run, delhi complete a convincing victory, wide outside off, batsman looks to swing it to midwicket again, misses, keeper collects, and delhi move to 12 points and take sole possession of second spot in the table
harris to lumb, no run, again driven out to cover. shane warne chose to bat
harris to lumb, no run, around the off stump, pushed away to the off side
smith to ojha, no run, swing and a miss outside off stump, gilchrist collects.
singh to ojha, 1 wide, rp serves this wide outside off stump.

singh to ojha, out, rp and harris combo at it again. it was pushed well outside off stump, ojha plays a weak slash. and the ball gently lobs to cover where harris - oh he is everywhere isn't he - takes it
singh to watson, 1 run, chopped to thirdman for a single
harmeet singh to fazal, four runs, another slower one but shot and wide, bit of rubbish really, and fazal crashes it to the point boundary
harmeet singh to fazal, 1 run, tries to shuffle across and work it to the on side and the ball rolls of the pad to the off side
singh to fazal, 2 runs, outside off stump, dabbed to third man
singh to watson, no run, again he tries to chop to third man, again no room, he gets it to wide slip/gully
symonds to fazal, 2 runs, on the off stump line, tilting away, run down wide of third man for couple of runs
symonds to watson, no run, slower one, just outside off stump, watson chops it again straight to that wide slip/gully fielder. hmmm
symonds to watson, no run, leans across to drive to cover
smith to fazal, 1 run, leans across to drive to cover point
ojha to fazal, 1 run, driven through the on side
symonds to fazal, 2 runs, around off stump line, driven wide of long-off
symonds to fazal, no run, on the leg stump line, slower one, pushed towards mid-off

symonds to fazal, 2 runs, run out chance missed. it was pushed towards backward point .. azhar bilakhia hurls the throw to symonds .. awkward bounce and he doesn't collect it cleanly and breaks the stumps with his hands. look pa no ball!
symonds to fazal, 1 run, pushed through the on side for a single
ojha to fazal, 1 run, goes down the track and drags it to deep midwicket
ojha to fazal, four runs, skips down the track, ojha had slowed up the pace and floated it outside off, fazal adjusts and plays a neat square drive to point boundary
ojha to fazal, out, holes out to deep midwicket. fazal was looking for some quick runs here;' he again moved down the track but ended up dragging the ball straight to deep midwicket
harmeet singh to watson, 1 run, slower one, mistimes the heave to mid-on
harris to watson, 1 run, on the middle stump line, pushed to the on side
harris to pathan, no run, lifting delivery on the middle stump, yusuf stabs it to the on side .. bit unconvincingly
harris to jhunjhunwala, four runs, edged but just wide of the diving gilly. it was a sharp lifting delivery around off, stabbed to right of gilchrist who dives but cant' reach it
harris to jhunjhunwala, no run, jabbed away to the off side
ojha to watson, 1 wide, starts the over with a wide

ojha to watson, six runs, almost caught at long-off. it was lifted towards the boundary where symonds leaps but ends up palming it over. fab effort from symonds who tried his best but couldn't hold on ..
harmeet singh to warne, no run, another slower one, jabbed out to the on side
singh to watson, 1 run, outside off stump, chopped away
harmeet singh to morkel, four runs, outside off stump, chopped away to backward point boundary.
harmeet singh to morkel, no run, pushes this one to covers
harmeet singh to morkel, no run, slower one from round the stumps, morne has a big swing but misses. . the ball tails past the leg stump
harmeet singh to morkel, out, warne is run out. it was pushed towards backward point where rp fires in a direct hit at the striker's end
harris to trivedi, 3 wides, pushes it down the leg side. gilly is slightly slow in getting across and doesn't collect cleanly
harris to trivedi, no run, moves outside leg and drives straight to ojha at mid-off
pathan to laxman, no run, on the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
pathan to laxman, no run, tries to turn it the on side but doesn't make contact
pathan to laxman, no run, turns in to the middle stump line, stabbed to the on side
watson to gilchrist, 1 wide, hint of swing but pushes it down the leg side
watson to gilchrist, 1 wide, and again. wide down the leg side
watson to gilchrist, 1 run, around off stump line this time, run down to third man
watson to laxman, 1 wide, yet  another wide .. this time down the leg side.. oh well..
watson to laxman, 1 run, on the off stump line, pushed towards mid-on for a single
pathan to gilchrist, no run, on the middle and off line, jabbed out to the bowler
pathan to gilchrist, no run, turned out to midwicket
pathan to gilchrist, no run, on the off-stump line, defended to the off side
pathan to gilchrist, no run, around the off stump line, chopped away
pathan to gilchrist, 1 run, stays back to tuck it past square-leg
pathan to sharma, no run, turns from outside, pushed towards cover
dole to gilchrist, six runs, over the sightscreen! magnificent shot. he just knifed through the line.
dole to gilchrist, 1 wide, slower one but slips it down the leg side
morkel to symonds, no run, moves outside leg, morne follows him and the ball goes between symonds and leg stump
morkel to symonds, no run, outside off stump line, left alone ..
dole to symonds, 1 run, just outside off stump, tapping to third man
dole to symonds, 1 no ball, lifting delivery outside off stump, symonds allows it to pass over him
morkel to sharma, 1 run, just outside off stump, run down to third man
morkel to sharma, 1 run, slower one outside off stump, run down to third man
trivedi to sharma, no run, lifting delivery around off, pushed down to the off side
warne to anirudh singh, 1 run,
warne to anirudh singh, 1 run, turns in slowly to the middle stump line, tucked behind square leg
warne to sharma, no run, backs away slightly to punch to cover
warne to sharma, no run, quicker one, skids on, pushed back to warne
trivedi to anirudh singh, no run,
trivedi to anirudh singh, no run, slower one outside off, tapped to point
trivedi to sharma, four runs, goes for yet another slower one, rohit is ready, picks it up early and lofts it over mid-off
warne to anirudh singh, no run, turns in to hit the pad, going down the leg side

warne to anirudh singh, out, done in by the slider. it slid away outside off stump, aniruddh tried to punch it to the off side and edges it  .. good catch by naman ojha ... it was thick edge but he covered it well. warne has struck. enter dwayne smith

warne to smith, 1 bye, slip in place. .. lovely leg break from middle and leg, smith pushes at it, clueless, and the ball spins past the outside edge. warne holds his head! .. naman ojha doesn't collect it cleanly
watson to smith, 1 run, driven to left of mid-off for a single
watson to sharma, no run, slower one outside off stump, guided to backward point
warne to smith, no run, turns from middle stump iine, pushed back to the bowler
warne to bilakhia, no run, turns from the middle and leg line, towards off, azhar is almost squared-up, jabbed to the off side
watson to sharma, no run, slower one, rohit was shuffling across, stops his movement and defends to the off side
watson to sharma, four runs, he picks the slower one and plays a neat pick-up shot over wide midwicket. ala carl hooper.
warne to sharma, 1 run, on the middle stump , slightly quicker, skidding on, pushed out to long-off
warne to singh, no run, just a slip in. rp tries to jump down the track (why?!) and manages to get some bat on it .. the ball rolls to cover
morkel to sharma, 1 run, picks a single with a dab to third man. morne now gets to bowl at rp

trivedi to singh, out, what a catch by morne! rp went for the big hit again and mistimed the slower one over mid-on. morne rushed back and took a very good catch . the ball came from behind him, he stretched out his hands to hold on .. rohit on strike now.
mclaren to vijay, 2 runs, outside off stump, slashed away to third man .. nachim with the wild throw .. harbhajan fails to back-up cleanly
harbhajan singh to hayden, 1 run, on the off and middle, hayden pushes it to mid-off for a single
harbhajan singh to vijay, no run, turns in from outside off and bounces as well .. vijay is troubled, stabs out at it and the ball hits the back of the arm and goes past the stumps
malinga to vijay, no run, yet another slower one, outside off, tapped to backward point
malinga to vijay, 1 run, outside off stump, run down to third man
harbhajan singh to vijay, 1 wide, pushes it down the leg side and rayudu does well to get his body around in time and stops it
malinga to raina, no run, and another slow one from malinga, raina defends it back down the pitch
malinga to raina, 1 run, around 120 kmph again, pushed wide of cover for a single
malinga to hayden, no run, leans across to defend
harbhajan singh to raina, 2 runs, comes down the track and ends up dragging the attempted lofted hit past square-leg.. harbhajan has been bowling superbly
harbhajan singh to raina, no run, dips outside off, pushed back to the bowler
harbhajan singh to raina, 1 run, moves down the track and lifts it one bounce to long-off
harbhajan singh to hayden, no run, good ball, turns from the middle towards middle and off, hayden is late in reacting and just about edges it to point. he sets for a single but is sent back
ahmed to raina, 5 wides, around 138 knmph delivery well outside off stump,,, it bounces before rayudu .. who fails to stop it .. not easy even for regular keepers ..
ahmed to raina, 1 run, pushed through square of the wicket for a single
ahmed to hayden, no run, in the channel outside off, hayden doesn't connect with his drive
ahmed to hayden, 1 run, driven down to tiwary at long-off
ahmed to raina, no run, swing and a miss. in the zone outside off, raina can't get bat to ball
mclaren to raina, 1 run, on the middle and leg line, swung away to tiwary at deep square-leg
bravo to raina, 1 wide, well outside off stump, harper extends his arms
bravo to hayden, 1 run, pushed out to the on side for a single
ahmed to hayden, 1 wide, pushes it well outside off stump. wide
ahmed to dhoni, four runs, again on the legs, dhoni glances it to the fine-leg boundary
bravo to hayden, 2 runs, flicks this one past square-leg for couple of runs
pollard to dhoni, 1 run, slower one outside off, jabbed out to cover
pollard to dhoni, four runs, edged to right rayudu. it was the lifting delivery outside off, dhoni was surprised by the bounce and stabs it clear of the leaping rayudu
malinga to hayden, 1 wide, slips a wide outside off stump .. around 145 kmph
pollard to dhoni, four runs, slower one outside off stump, dhoni goes for the big swing to the cowcorner and ends up dragging it to right of deep midwicket fielder
pollard to dhoni, 1 run, another slower one, well outside off stump, dips .. dragged to the on side ..towardsmid-on ..dhponi wants a second run but hayden sends him back
pollard to hayden, 1 run, mistimes another attempted hit .. just a single to deep midwicket region
sathish to badrinath, 2 runs, on the off and middle, eased behind square-leg ..
sathish to hussey, 1 run, slower one, eased to long-off
sathish to badrinath, 1 run, on the middle and leg, turned to long leg
pollard to badrinath, no run, slower one outside off, tries to run it to third man, edges it and the ball rolls to rayudu
harbhajan singh to badrinath, 2 runs, backs away slightly to drive to left of long-off ..and they rush back to beat the throw from bravo
harbhajan singh to badrinath, 1 run, pushed out to midwicket for a quick signle .. had it been a direct hit from pollard, badri would have been run out
pollard to hussey, 1 run, yet another slower one, pushed out past point
malinga to badrinath, no run, hit back down the track and it crashes against the stump at the non-striker's end .. malinga rushes back, and uproots one stump but by then hussey was back
mclaren to hussey, 2 runs, dropped by tiwary at deep midwicket. it was swung straight to him and he makes a right royal mess of it.
mclaren to hussey, 2 runs, slower one, dragged to deep square-leg
mclaren to hussey, 1 leg bye, hussey's struggles continue. swing and miss. the ball rolls of the pad
tyagi to tendulkar, no run, good delivery curving away from the off stump, left alone
tyagi to tendulkar, 1 run, on the middle stump line, turned to square-leg
tyagi to tendulkar, no run, charges down the track but mistimes the attempted forcing hit .. the ball rolls to mid-off
ashwin to dhawan, 1 wide, pushes it well down the leg side
ashwin to dhawan, 1 wide, again slips it down the leg side
ashwin to dhawan, no run, turns away from the off stump, pushed to point
ashwin to dhawan, 1 run, stays back to punch to extra cover
ashwin to dhawan, 1 run, couple of steps down the track and drives to mid-off
ashwin to tendulkar, 2 runs, on the off and middle, tendulkar backs away at the last minute to punch it through cover point
thushara to tiwary, no run, lifting delivery on the off stump line, jabbed out to point
jakati to tendulkar, four runs, rushes down the track, jakati pushes it wider outside off stump, tendulkar lunges across to slice it of the outer edge just over backward point. almost mark waughed.
jakati to tendulkar, no run, drives straight to cover
jakati to tendulkar, 1 run, quickish arm-ball. skids on really quickly, jabbed out to the off side
jakati to tiwary, no run, just outside off stump, pushed out to the on side
thushara to tendulkar, 1 run, forced away through the on side for a single
thushara to tiwary, no run, backs to the leg side, thushara fires it outside off, left alone
raina to tiwary, 1 run, on the leg stump line, tapped to midwicket for a single
tyagi to bravo, 1 run, stays back to punch it through the off side

tyagi to bravo, out, thushara takes a real skier! bravo went for the lofted hit over long-off .. thushara came in from the deep and then had to back pedal and he fell on his back as he held on to the catch. his team-mates mob him
tyagi to tiwary, 1 wide, wide outside off stump
jakati to tiwary, 1 wide, down the leg side, dhoni gathers
jakati to pollard, 1 run, quickish arm-ball, tapped to the on side
ashwin to pollard, 1 run, around the off stump, tapped close on the off side for a quick single
jakati to mclaren, 1 run, turned tos quare-leg for a single

jakati to sathish, 2 runs, pushed towards deep midwicket and they turned for second run. the fielder rushes in from the deep and fired a throw to the bowler who breaks the stumps. appeal for run out. third umpire finds that the batsman is home
ashwin to tendulkar, 1 run, turned to square-leg
ashwin to harbhajan singh, no run, shuffles to the off side and smashes it really hard back at ashwin who stretches his right hand out and is hit on his wrist. ouch!
ashwin to tendulkar, 1 run, on the middle and leg, turned behind square-leg
jakati to harbhajan singh, four runs, rushes down the track and hammers it to the straight boundary

jakati to tendulkar, 1 run, dropped by the bowler. tendulkar came down the track and mishit it completely .. jakati thinks it's flying over him and raises his hands up .. he just didn't see it .. and shuts his eyes ...it was a mishit and the ball actually lobbed gently to hit jakati on his chest!
thushara to tendulkar, 1 run, shuffles across to dab it to the on side for a single
raina to harbhajan singh, 1 run, goes for the swing but doesn't connect properly
raina to ahmed, 1 wide, down the leg side  .. wide
raina to ahmed, 1 leg bye, jabbed out to square-leg for a single
raina to harbhajan singh, 1 run, stays back to force it away to long-off
raina to ahmed, 2 runs, moves down the track and slices it to deep point region
raina to ahmed, no run, stays back to mishit to the on side ...
raina to ahmed, 1 run, moves down the track and edges it to fine-leg region
dole to bisla, four runs, quicker, sharper, higher, 135ks, and bisla gets a perfect top edge over the keeper's head
dole to bisla, 1 run, looks for the hit over midwicket, but the mis-hit bisects mid-off and mid-on
dole to jayawardene, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
dole to bisla, 1 wide, ojha shouts for a catch down the leg side, umpire tarapore says wide - replays inconclusive - perilously close to the glove
dole to bisla, four runs, a gift down the leg side, and he glances it without any fuss for four
watson to bisla, 2 runs, misfielded by raut at midwicket, just let it through, didn't get down in time, and lets through two runs
pathan to bisla, no run, fast, 102ks, but it also stops at him a touch, and bisla can't play a forceful shot to it
watson to jayawardene, no run, slower ball this time, and mahela gets an inside edge that is safe - much better over from watto
watson to jayawardene, 1 run, runs this down to third man for one
pathan to sangakkara, 1 run, tip and run, to midwicket

trivedi to sangakkara, out, and sanga perishes trying to hit the first ball from a new bowler for four. he does that often in twenty20, and tried it here again, jumped out of the crease, looked to go over midwicket, but didn't get enough height in it, and pathan timed his jump to perfection to hold onto this overhead catch
trivedi to yuvraj singh, 1 run, pushed down to mid-on to get off the mark
trivedi to jayawardene, no run, looks to run this down to third man, but doesn't get the placement right
trivedi to jayawardene, 1 run, slower ball, steered away, down to third man for one
warne to jayawardene, 2 wides, too far down the leg side, ojha gets hand on ti, else it would have been five wides
warne to jayawardene, 1 run, bunted into the leg side for one
pathan to jayawardene, 1 run, dropped by dole at square leg, and it's an absolute sitter, hit down his lap, and it goes in and comes out

warne to yuvraj singh, six runs, and one more, yuvi on fire here, jumps out of the track, warne throws it wide and that gives him enough room to swing his arms and he goes perfectly straight, into the sight screen
warne to yuvraj singh, no run, looks to run this to third man, but hits straight to point

dole to jayawardene, out, what an over, what a guy warne is! opposition going at 10 an over and he has a slip, a wide one, in the 12th over! mahela looks to work it from outside off into the leg side, gets a leading edge and warne swallows it at the wide slip
trivedi to pathan, 1 run, this time he flicks it away for a single to fine leg
warne to bopara, 1 run, swept away from the leg-stump line for one
fazal to chawla, 1 run, pushed down to long-off for one
watson to chawla, no run, thrown up wide, chawla looks for the expansive drive and connects nothing
watson to chawla, no run, slower ball, and chawla still can't get it away, hits it straight to point
watson to chawla, 1 run, another slower delivery, pushed down to long-off, chawla retains strike - good over, just two off
trivedi to chawla, 1 run, continues with the slower ones, driven down to long-off for one
sreesanth to lumb, no run, hint of swing, 135ks, beats him outside off, lumb plays at it outside the line
sreesanth to lumb, 1 wide, no swing this time, and it keeps going with the angle, and is a wide
sreesanth to lumb, no run, swing again, shaping in towards off, defended back to him

powar to lumb, four runs, that's lucky, shapes to charge at him, ends up staying back, and leading-edges an attempted flick, over mid-off. irfan has completely misjudged it mid-off, he comes charging in, and is lobbed. would have been a chance had he stayed his ground or gone back a bit
sreesanth to lumb, 1 wide, slashes outside off but it is too wide
theron to ojha, 1 run, tips and run to the leg side for a single
theron to lumb, four runs, poor thinking/bowling - no one behind square on the leg side and he bowls leg-stump again, and lumb cashes in again
powar to ojha, four runs, clean loft, over mid-off, waited for the ball to arrive, it landed close enough to him to play the big straight shot

powar to lumb, 1 leg bye, punjab is back to being a comedy of errors! for a change rajasthan make a mistake, lumb ignores ojha's calls of no and keeps coming down for a single. bisla, who fields the ball not far from the striker's end, is not aware to the situation and throws to the non-striker's end. and it would still have been close had the throw been not wide! and mahela, who has run in from slip to striker's end, keeps waiting for the throw in vain
chawla to lumb, no run,
chawla to ojha, no run, beats him with a non-spinning delivery, bisla shouts unnecessarily for lbw, chawla is not even interested, he knows it is sliding down
chawla to lumb, 1 run, swept away for one to deep square
pathan to lumb, no run, slower ball, beats him outside off

pathan to lumb, four runs, no respect for irfan here, walks down the pitch again, and flicks him over midwicket, just a chip shot! he does not feel there is any risk involved in walking down to him, and strange to see the keeper has not come up
pathan to lumb, four runs, up comes the keeper, and through goes a bottom edge between his legs! guess when it's not your day, it's not your evening either

bopara to lumb, out, and the dbbly-dobblies strike, too late perhaps! slower ball, lumb looks for his flick shot over midwicket, but because the ball is slower he ends up dragging it squarer and to a waiting chawla. misses out on a century
chawla to ojha, 2 runs, finally some good fielding by punab! ojha comes down the wicket and drives wide of long-off, where mahela puts in the dive and saves two runs
theron to ojha, no run, diving save from sreesanth at midwicket, saves at least one run
sreesanth to pathan, 1 run, tucks him up with one angling into the ribs
sreesanth to pathan, (no ball) 1 run, and oversteps and scores are level
maharoof to ganguly, no run, opens the bat-face to steer the slower one to point
maharoof to ganguly, four runs, he backed away even as he stepped out of his crease, maharoof tried to follow him but ganguly still manages to slice it up and over point.
maharoof to ganguly, no run, slower one ..ganguly is flummoxed, he was again coming down the track, the ball goes past the waft and over the off stump
maharoof to ganguly, 1 run, yet another slower one, tapped close on the off side and they get across for the single
vettori to ganguly, 1 run, on the middle and leg line, eased to deep midwicket
vettori to gayle, 1 run, on the off stump line, pushed out to cover point
vettori to ganguly, four runs, skips down the track and drives through covers. he timed his  jump down the track to perfection
vettori to ganguly, 1 wide, slows up the pace, loops it across but pushes it down the leg side
maharoof to ganguly, 1 run, steered to backward point, one look at gayle who responds quickly. ganguly reaches the other end and applauds gayle for responding favorably to his call
sangwan to ganguly, 1 wide, wide outside off stump and this time ganguly lets it go.
sangwan to ganguly, no run, outside off stump, pushed out to point region .
mishra to ganguly, 1 wide, pushes another wide down the leg side
sangwan to ganguly, no run, shuffles across and mistimes the drive to mid-off
sangwan to gayle, no run, slower one outside off stump, pushed out to the off side
collingwood to ganguly, 1 run, starts off with a slower one, eased through covers
collingwood to gayle, 1 run, moves down the track and flicks it to deep backward square-leg
collingwood to gayle, 1 run, slower one again, turns in from outside leg, tapped to square-leg
bhatia to ganguly, 1 run, slower one around off stump, guided to point region for a single
bhatia to gayle, 1 run, moves down the track for the lofted hit but goes through early with the shot and edges it to backward square-leg
bhatia to ganguly, no run, slower one, on the middle and off line, ganguly moves outside leg and mistimes the shot back to the bowler
collingwood to ganguly, six runs, flamboyant!  ganguly rushes down the track and lifts it to the straight boundary.
collingwood to ganguly, 1 run, moves outside leg stump and punches it to long-off
collingwood to ganguly, no run, moves outside leg, colly follows him with a slower one, pushed out to extra cover
collingwood to ganguly, 1 run, yet another slower one, ganguly was down the track, had to wait and pushes it out to long-off
collingwood to gayle, 1 wide, down the leg side and dk collects
collingwood to gayle, 1 run, turns in from outside leg .. colly has been essentially an off-break bowler this game, tapped out to deep midwicket
bhatia to mccullum, 1 run, the slower ones keep coming .. pushed through cover point
bhatia to ganguly, 1 run, another slower one, ganguly takes the bottom-hand off the handle to push it out to cover
vettori to ganguly, 1 run, stays back to punch it to long-off
bhatia to mccullum, 2 runs, slower one, on the middle stump line, tapped past square-leg and by the time the man comes in from the deep, the batsmen complete two runs
bhatia to tiwary, 1 run, on the leg stump line, turned behind square-leg
bhatia to tiwary, 1 run, swatted past square-leg

vettori to tiwary, 1 run, out, mccullum is run out a big wicket. it was pushed towards deep square-leg .. rajat bhatia rushes in and fires in the throw to dan, who very calmly breaks the stumps. they managed to steal two runs in the last over when mccullum tapped past square-leg but that was hit far more gently than this one.
vettori to mathews, 1 run, on the off and middle line, eased towards midwicket and the bowler himself sets off in pursuit
vettori to tiwary, 1 run, moves down the track, tapes the ball past square-leg and this time they don't attempt the second run. rajat bhatia rushes in from the deep and flicks the ball to the keeper
bhatia to tiwary, 1 wide, wide outside leg stump
vettori to tiwary, 1 run,
vettori to mathews, no run, the arm-ball on the off stump line, eased back to dan
vettori to mathews, no run, quick one, moving in with the arm again, pushed out to the off side.
vettori to mathews, 1 run, quickish, just outside off stump, jabbed out to cover
mishra to mathews, 2 runs, moves down the track and ends up slicing it over point
mishra to mathews, 1 run, threatens to go down the track, mishra pushes it well outside off to stump him,. the batsman reaches out to jab it to cover
sangwan to mathews, 2 runs, reaches out to drive to right of long-off
sangwan to mathews, 1 run, slower one outside off stump, angelo goes for the big lofted shot but ends up dragging it to midwicket region
maharoof to mathews, 2 runs, shovelled through midwicket for couple of runs
maharoof to tiwary, 2 runs, fetches the slower one from outside off and swings it to left of deep midwicket
mishra to mathews, 1 run, moves down the track and whips it to deep midwicket
dinda to warner, no run, on the middle and leg, skiddy, pushed out to point
agarkar to sehwag, 1 run, stays back to punch it to right of mid-off
dinda to sehwag, 1 run, pushed out to the on side for a single
dinda to gambhir, 1 leg bye, dabbed to square-leg for a run
dinda to sehwag, no run, pushes this one out to the off side
agarkar to gambhir, 1 run, slower one, on the leg stump line, turned past square-leg
mendis to sehwag, 1 run, moves outside leg stump and square drives and tiwary makes yet another fine diving half-stop moving to his right at backward point
mendis to gambhir, 1 run, on the leg stump line, dabbed past square-leg
mendis to sehwag, no run, moves down the track and drives the carrom ball to mid-off
mathews to sehwag, four runs, slower one outside off stump line, sehwag unfurls the square drive and plays it to perfection
mathews to gambhir, 1 run, slower one outside off stump, run down to third man
mendis to gambhir, 1 run, moves down the track and turns it through midwicket
mendis to sehwag, 1 wide, pushes this one down the leg side
mendis to sehwag, 1 run, goes down the track and punches it through midwicket
mendis to gambhir, 2 runs, skips down the track and drives through covers
mendis to gambhir, 1 run, quickish, skids on towards middle and leg, tapped to midwicket
ganguly to sehwag, 1 wide, pushes it down the leg side ..
ganguly to gambhir, 1 run, slower one, pushed out to right of the fielder at covers
iqbal abdulla to gambhir, 1 run, on the leg stump line, eased to deep square-leg
iqbal abdulla to gambhir, four runs, skilful! rushes down the track and swings it to wide midwicket boundary.
iqbal abdulla to gambhir, 1 run, on the leg stump line, dabbed to square-leg
dinda to sehwag, 1 run, another lifting delivery, sehwag swats it past square-leg
mathews to sehwag, six runs, thrash! sehwag picks the slower one early and swings it high over the cowcorner. immense!
iqbal abdulla to karthik, 1 leg bye, spins away from the middle and off line, gets past the poke and rolls away to the off side
iqbal abdulla to karthik, no run,
agarkar to sehwag, four runs, reaches across to outside off and carves to point boundary
mendis to jadhav, no run, moves down the track and stabs the carrom ball back to the bowler

dinda to karthik, out, surely, game over now?! dk went for the swing across the line but dragged it straight to midwicket. dinda, who started the damage by taking out the off stump of david warner, has returned to take out dk
dinda to mishra, 1 run, the slower one outside off, mishra edges the intended big hit to the off side
dinda to vettori, 1 wide, moves outside leg, dinda pushes it wide outside off stump .. he tried a slower one but ended up pushing it too far across
harris to pandey, no run, seam movement from harris away from the right-hander, beats pandey's prod
harris to pandey, 1 wide, too wide outside off and pandey has a slash at it
harris to pandey, 1 run, gets a thick outside edge, more like a leading edge, great delivery shaping away from the right hander, flies past second slip
harris to kallis, 1 wide, too wide down the leg side, good take by gilly
harris to kallis, no run, gets behind the line and defends to the off side
harris to kallis, no run, great stop by suman at backward point, slides to his right and saves it one-handed, saves a four there
harris to kallis, 1 run, angles it just wide of gully who was earlier at second slip, third man comes across and stops it
harris to pandey, no run, good bounce and carry, squared up pandey outside off
harmeet singh to kallis, 1 wide, slides down the leg side, fails to control the seam
harmeet singh to kallis, no run, comes down the pitch to bash that but makes contact off the bottom edge
harmeet singh to kallis, four runs, good shot, got a little high on him but he adjusted well, bends his back backwards and punches wide of backward point and cover
harmeet singh to kallis, no run, stays behind the line and pushes it to mid-on
harmeet singh to kallis, 1 run,
harmeet singh to pandey, no run, good delivery, lands just a shade outside off and the away movement just beats the bat

harris to pandey, out, middle stump is down! the ball just nips back in off the seam, pandey is too slow in getting behind the line but the ball skids through and hits the top of middle stump, may have been an inside edge
harris to dravid, no run, gets across and defends it with soft hands
harris to dravid, no run, dravid is completely squared up for bounce and movement outside off, wafts at it, harris is getting it to move both ways
singh to dravid, no run, this one nips back in and hits him on the thigh, dravid stares at the pitch
singh to dravid, 1 wide, rp mistook first slip for the batsman, that's how wide that was
singh to dravid, 1 run, gets beside the line and chops it to point
marsh to kallis, no run,
ojha to kallis, 1 run, tucks it down to midwicket
symonds to kallis, 1 run, slower ball, he opens the face and angles it down to gully
symonds to kallis, 1 run, walks down the pitch but the ball gets high on him so he can only fend it to the on side
symonds to dravid, no run, loss in concentration there, dravid tries to mow it somewhere over the on side but swings too early, the ball beats him outside off
symonds to dravid, 1 run, steers it to the off side for a single, good over so far
ojha to dravid, 1 run, pushes it hard down to midwicket
ojha to kallis, 1 run, slow through the air, he stays back and pushes it to mid-on
symonds to uthappa, 1 run, keeps it nice and tight on the off stump and he tucks it across the line to deep square leg
symonds to uthappa, out, another poor shot, uthappa goes for a wild slash to a wide delivery outside off, targets the on side, plays too early and gets an edge to gilchrist who's up to the stumps
symonds to taylor, 1 run, squirted just wide of suman at backward point
ojha to kohli, no run, opens the face and steers it to the off side
ojha to kohli, no run, stays back and tucks it to the on side
marsh to kohli, no run, keeps it nice and straight, kohli can only push it back to the bowler

ojha to kallis, 5 runs, deccan caught napping, kallis pushes it towards rohit at point and takes off for a quick single, rohit has a shy at the bowler's end but ojha's not behind the throw, nobody backing up
ojha to kallis, 1 run, tucks it wide of midwicket
marsh to kallis, 1 wide, fails to control the swing and he slides it down the leg side
marsh to kallis, no run, nips it back in and kallis can only defend it back to the bowler
marsh to kallis, 1 wide, loses his line and sprays it down the leg side
marsh to kallis, no run,
marsh to kohli, 1 run, taps it to the of side and sets off quickly, kohli reaches just before the direct hit at the bowler's end
harris to kallis, 2 runs, chops it to the off side and they set off quickly, kohli makes it before the direct hit again but the ball ricochets to the on side and they take another run
harris to kallis, 1 run,
harris to kallis, 1 run, punches it down to cover point
singh to kohli, no run, swings hard but only swishes at thin air, kohli plays that too early
singh to kohli, 1 run, angles it on middle and leg and tucked to the on side
singh to kallis, four runs, cheeky but great shot, kallis knows there's no slip so he opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man, doesn't try to play it too hard
singh to kallis, 1 run, opens the face and this time  he angles it straight to the third man fielder
symonds to kohli, six runs, hits the roof! stays at the crease, makes room and cracks it over the bowler's head, the ball hits the roof and lands back on the turf, great shot
symonds to kohli, 1 wide,
symonds to kohli, no run,
singh to kohli, no run, rp comes round the wicket and kohli makes room to swing that over the on side but he swishes at thin air
marsh to kohli, no run, a dot ball, an anomaly! lands just outside off and beats him for pace and bounce
marsh to kohli, 1 run, knocks it down to deep square leg
marsh to kohli, four runs, slashed and a thick edge flies past the keeper, marsh apologies to gilly
harris to kohli, no run,
harris to white, six runs, power! white stays at the crease and butchers it over wide long-off, seemed like a mishit but the ball landed over the second tier
harris to white, six runs, he was aiming for the blimp! stays at the crease and gets all his power behind it and the distance as well, goes to the sightscreen
kumar to gilchrist, 1 run, lands it on middle and off and tucked softly to the on side
kumar to mishra, no run, bowls it dead straight, stays behind the line and pushes it to the on side
kumar to mishra, no run, steers it to kohli at backward point and gilchrist tells his partner to wait
kumble to mishra, no run, the ball skids through and tucks him up, he chops it down the pitch
kumble to mishra, four runs, steps down the track and this time he gets the elevation over mid-off, nice shot
kumble to mishra, 1 run, dropped tough one, tries to scoop it over kumble but the bowler leaps up and deflects it towards white at mid-off
kumar to suman, no run, leaves him outside off
kumar to suman, no run, beats him outside off again, good away movement
kumar to suman, no run, suman shoulders arms this time
steyn to gilchrist, no run, gilchrist tries to chase that one but it was too wide outside off
steyn to gilchrist, four runs, that scorched to the boundary in a couple of seconds, gets a fraction of width and bangs it along the turf past backward point, third man had no time to react
steyn to suman, 1 run, 154 kph and on the stumps, sumna just manages to get behind the line and tap it down to mid-off for a quick single
steyn to gilchrist, 1 wide, sloppy from steyn, he directs it so wide outside off that no batsman could have chased it
steyn to gilchrist, no run, big appeal for a caught behind! did that clip something? rip snorter of a delivery on the body and there was a sound, harper wasn't sure, may have been a great decision
kumar to gilchrist, 1 run,
kallis to gilchrist, 1 run, tucks him up for room and he chops it down just wide of second slip
kallis to suman, no run,
kallis to suman, no run, stays back and tucks it back to the bowler
vinay kumar to suman, 2 runs, he slices it just wide of kohli at backward point, would have been a great diving catch
vinay kumar to suman, 1 run, backs away and slaps it over the on side
vinay kumar to suman, 1 run, tries to go over the top and ends up chipping it down to third man, praveen watches the spin at the right time and stops it first bounce
kallis to suman, no run, lands outside off and he shoulders arms
kallis to suman, 1 run, the ball climbs on him and he gets his bat high and fends it off
kumble to suman, four runs, streaky! he comes down the pitch and tries to mow it over the on side, gets an inside edge past the stumps and down to fine leg
kumble to suman, 1 wide, down the leg side
kumble to suman, 2 runs, mistimes it to deep square leg
kumble to suman, no run, another inside edge onto the body
steyn to gilchrist, 1 run, fiery delivery on the middle stump and gilchrist makes a hint of room and chops it down to backward point
steyn to suman, 1 wide, lands it wide outside off and suman can't chase that
steyn to suman, 1 run, fires it on the stumps and he just manages to clip it to the on side
steyn to suman, no run,
kumble to suman, 1 run,
kumble to sharma, 1 run, tucks it to the on side and they scrape through, uthappa has a shy at the batsman's end
vinay kumar to sharma, 1 run, pushes it to the off side for a single
vinay kumar to suman, 1 run, pinches a single to midwicket
vinay kumar to sharma, out, rohit's frustrated with himself! he ends up chipping it straight to steyn at mid-off who barely moved, soft dismissal
vinay kumar to suman, 1 leg bye,
kallis to suman, no run, suman tries to hoick him away without moving his feet, chops it onto his body
steyn to symonds, four runs, he gives him some width this time and he slashes hard, the outside edge flies to third man
steyn to symonds, 1 run, moves right across his stumps and tucks it to the on side
kumble to suman, 1 run, swings it down to deep midwicket
kumble to symonds, 1 run, driven to deep extra cover
vinay kumar to symonds, no run,
vinay kumar to symonds, 1 run, slower  ball and he smacks it to deep cover and white fumbles
vinay kumar to suman, 2 runs, stays at the crease and chips it in the air down to deep midwicket
vinay kumar to symonds, 1 run, mistimes it to midwicket
kumar to symonds, 1 wide, slower ball but too wide outside off, he's not chasing that
kumar to symonds, 1 run,
kallis to suman, 1 run, flayed to long-off and symonds wanted the second but suman was happy with the single
kallis to symonds, six runs, will this be the most important hit for deccan? kallis errs by pitching it up and symonds gets under the bounce and scoops it over long-off, clean hit!
kallis to symonds, 1 run, comes round the wicket and symonds tucks it to midwicket
lee to dhawan, 1 run, slight shape in towards dhawan, 142kph, the batsman gets a single off the inside edge onto the pad
lee to tendulkar, 1 run, looks to leave one alone outside off, but ends up playing at it and dabbing to third man
lee to dhawan, 1 run, not the most convincing of shots, but manages to clear backward point with this mis-timed slash outside off
lee to tendulkar, 2 runs, 142.5kph, into the body, srt gets an inside edge onto the pad and then towards fine leg
lee to tendulkar, 2 runs, lovely straight on-the-up punch and despite lee's getting a hand to it, it has enough in it to get them two
pathan to tendulkar, no run, slight swing again, pushed to mid-off, and he has hit it too hard to come for a single
pathan to tendulkar, no run, more powerful drive, and straight towards goel this time
lee to rayudu, no run, moves across the stumps, but lee is fast and just outside off, and there is no big shot forthcoming
lee to rayudu, no run, moves across the stumps and turns this one to on, but finds square leg
pathan to rayudu, four runs, lovely shot, dances down the track as if to a spinner, and lofts him over mid-off
pathan to rayudu, four runs, that's a bravo flick - well almost. takes a big step down and extravagantly flicks it from outside off to over midwicket. the back leg slightly in the air
pathan to rayudu, 1 run, pushed away wide of mid-on this time, for a single
pathan to tendulkar, 1 run, flicked from outside off to wide of mid-on for a single
chawla to tendulkar, 1 run, flicked away from leg-stump line to deep midwicket
chawla to tendulkar, 1 run, looks to work this to on again, but gets a leading edge, a safe, soft one

chawla to rayudu, out, quicker one, and he has really fired this toppie in, 96.4kph, and speeding up all the time, and an unsuspecting rayudu has been done in and bowled through the gate as he looks to flick it to on
yuvraj singh to tendulkar, 1 run, bunted into the leg side for a single
powar to duminy, 1 run, pushes a regulation offbreak down to long-off
chawla to tendulkar, no run,
chawla to sathish, 2 runs, runs a quicker ball past the slip and charges back for the second
powar to sathish, 1 run, pushed to wide of mid-on for the sixth single from the over
chawla to duminy, 1 run, doesn't pick the straighter one, turns his wrists too early but because he has played with soft hands the leading edge goes along the ground
chawla to sathish, no run, flat delivery, hit straight to mid-off
powar to pollard, no run, flat and straight, kp stays back and defends
yuvraj singh to pollard, no run, beats him with the arm ball, appeals for lbw, but it going down the leg side
lee to pollard, 1 leg bye, slower ball, 114ks, pollard is early into it, gets a leg-bye, though
pathan to duminy, 1 run, slower ball, dragged across to midwicket for a single
ablish to harbhajan singh, out, oh he is doing well here! another slower ball, and harbhajan is early into the shot on the leg side, it comes almost of the back of the bat, and lobs to sanga
ablish to mclaren, out, and he keeps getting slower and slower, 94.7kph, and mclaren steos out and wafts and is through with the shot when the ball arrives and hits the stumps
ablish to khan, out, another slower ball, and it beats zaheer's swipe and sanga hits direct to deny them the leg-bye
mclaren to barath, no run, and gone first ball? extra bounce, and i heard something as it passed the bat, but no appeal from mumbai, just a polite enquiry and a no
mclaren to barath, 1 run, steered down to third man for one
khan to barath, no run, looks for the big hoick outside off but plays inside the line
khan to barath, 1 leg bye, swing into the batsman, barath looks to steal a leg-bye and gets in the way of dhawan and the throw
malinga to jayawardene, four runs, starts off with a fast ball outside off, and mahela throws everything at it, and the thick edge flies to third man for four
malinga to jayawardene, no run, slower ball outside off, and he lets it go through to rayudu
harbhajan singh to barath, no run, barath gives him charge first up, mis-hits it one bounce to mid-on
malinga to jayawardene, no run, slower ball again, this time he has to check his shot, back to the bowler

malinga to jayawardene, out, drama! slower ball again, mahela hits straight to tiwary at mid-on, who hold onto the catch safely, tumbles over, and when he is about to throw the ball up, it slips out of his hand. mahela is walking, but barath asks him to hold on. the umpires reckon he had it in control for enough time for it to classify as a catch. got to agree perhaps, wasn't like the famous gibbs non-catch, he held it for longer before he let it slip
malinga to sangakkara, 1 run, slower ball outside off, gets a thick edge for a single to third man
harbhajan singh to barath, no run, slower again, and this time he plays it straight to midwicket
harbhajan singh to barath, 1 run, shimmies down the track and bunts this one into the on side for one
mclaren to barath, 1 run, chops this to backward point, where pollard's fumble lets them come through for one
sathish to sangakkara, no run, starts with a slower ball, driven straight to extra cover
sathish to barath, 1 wide, big wide down the leg side
sathish to barath, 1 run, drops and runs this time, just to the right of sathish but the calling is early and running quick
khan to sangakkara, four runs, and flicked away off the stumps, flat and fast, and bhajji misfields at fine leg to give away two extra runs
khan to sangakkara, four runs, good shot, gooooood shot, shimmies down the pitch, plays an on-the-up check-punch, and it goes very straight and fast for four
khan to sangakkara, no run, another high-elbow shot, but straight back to zak
sathish to barath, 2 runs, slower ball, bunted into the vacant on side with soft hands, and comes back for two
harbhajan singh to sangakkara, no run, flat around off, hit to extra cover
harbhajan singh to yuvraj singh, no run, flatter delivery, defended back to the bowler
harbhajan singh to yuvraj singh, 1 wide, fired down the leg side, wide
duminy to sangakkara, six runs, shot! this should ease the pressure a touch, dances down the track and lofts him over his head, and it lands on the rope
duminy to sangakkara, 1 run, pushed down to long-off for a single
duminy to yuvraj singh, no run, defends a flattish offbreak
duminy to yuvraj singh, 1 run, swept away to long leg
harbhajan singh to yuvraj singh, 1 run, pushed down to long-off for a single
duminy to sangakkara, no run, half shout for lbw but it is clearly pitched outside leg
duminy to sangakkara, 1 run, steps out and chips this square on the on side
malinga to sangakkara, no run, slower ball, sanga checks his shot, hits to midwicket
malinga to sangakkara, 1 run, slower ball, the check shot gets him a single to wide of extra cover
malinga to yuvraj singh, no run, slower ball again, the edge goes one bounce to rayudu who does well to get his body behind this one
malinga to yuvraj singh, no run, another slower ball, hit to point straight
khan to sangakkara, no run, that's four runs gone! absolutely smashed into the stumps at the non-striker's end, and it comes back to zaheer as opposed to deflecting anywhere else

malinga to sangakkara, out, there is another twist coming! sanga is gone! quicker delivery, 143kph, and sanga holes out to long-off. your turn to bat, mr sodhi. 'finish it off,' sanga tells pathan as he walks off
khan to pathan, four runs, and pathan finishes it with a bullet over mid-on, and finally punjab win in mohali
harris to hayden, no run, back of a lneght, sligh shape, a slight appeal for lbw but it is slipping down
harris to hayden, no run, left alone outside off
singh to hayden, 1 wide, walks down the track but this is too wide outside off
singh to hayden, 1 run, slower ball, hayden is early into the attempted big hit, gets only a single to mid-on
singh to hayden, no run, goes for another flat-bat, but can't get it past midwicket
singh to hayden, 2 runs, goes for another big one outside off, gets the outside half of the bat and it just manages to clear point
harris to vijay, 1 run, bunted towards mid-on and he is called through for a quick single
harris to hayden, 1 run, walks down the track again, almost yorks himself, gets just a single to mid-off
harris to hayden, 1 run, tips and runs to point
sharma to vijay, 1 wide, slower but still down the leg side, and vijay has no problems accepting the favour
sharma to hayden, four runs, almost yorks himself as he charges down the pitch but gets enough power in it to beat mid-on and got for four
harmeet singh to vijay, no run, makes room to hit inside-out, but finds extra cover
harmeet singh to vijay, 1 run, makes room again, but gets an inside edge onto the pad for a single

harmeet singh to hayden, out, and it's the mongoose who wilts in the heat and not harmeet! hayden looks to run this down to third man, but incredibly harmeet finds the edge on mongoose [i was told it didn't have anything but the sweet part], and gilly holds onto a smart catch
smith to raina, four runs, rubs salt into wounds here, lofting him over mid-on
harmeet singh to vijay, 1 run, slower ball, pushed to wide of extra cover for one

harmeet singh to raina, 1 run, out, oh what a call from vijay! he has run himself out, raina hit it to just to the left of deep midwicket, vijay called for the second and had barely crossed the halfway mark when the throw came and the bails were removed
symonds to raina, 1 run, pushed down to long-off for one
ojha to dhoni, no run, comes down the track, and defends it back to the bowler
ojha to dhoni, 1 run, gives him the charge and bunts this wide of the bowler for one
symonds to raina, 1 run, hits a lovely inside-out shot, but the long-off is wide and keeps them to one
symonds to dhoni, 1 run, slower ball, turned to square leg for one
ojha to raina, 2 runs, raina charges down and lofts him between deep square leg and deep midwicket
ojha to raina, 1 run, gives him the charge again, ojha bowls flat, and he pushes it down to long-off

ojha to dhoni, out, lovely delivery, fast offbreak, 88.5ks, angling in, making him play, pitching middle and off and then beating him with the break and takes the off stump. ojha is ecstatic, and he hurts himself during a high-five with gilly
sharma to raina, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
sharma to raina, 1 run, comes down the track and drives down to long-off for one
sharma to raina, 1 run, pushed past cover-point for another single
ojha to raina, six runs, raina goes big, raina goes clean, raina goes straight, lovely six
symonds to raina, 1 run, makes room, symonds follows him, he turns it around the corner for one
symonds to hussey, 1 run, through raina's legs, firmly hit back and raina makes way for it through to long-off
harmeet singh to badrinath, 1 leg bye, slower ball again, badri misses again, gets just a leg-bye
harmeet singh to raina, no run, delivered with the legbrak, but it slides with the angle and beats raina's attempt to steer it to third man
harmeet singh to badrinath, 1 run, another legbreak, this time he pushes it down to long-off
harris to ashwin, 1 run, turned away to fine leg for one
harris to thushara, out, looks for the big heave over mid-on in circle, but times it only so well to carry to that very fielder, symonds
harris to bollinger, 2 byes, makes room, misses a straight delivery, and gilchrist lets through two leg-byes
ashwin to mishra, no run, starts with his carrom ball, the straighter ball that takes the leading edge
ashwin to mishra, 2 runs, comes down the track, plays inside-out, and places it past mid-off
ashwin to mishra, 1 run, comes down the track, gets the outside half of the bat for a single to extra cover
bollinger to mishra, 2 runs, gets a thick outside edge on this attempted big shot, and it is worth two runs to fine of third man
bollinger to mishra, 1 run, his response is to give the bowler the charge, gets a single off the bottom edge
ashwin to gilchrist, no run, big appeal for lbw, they reckon it is pad first, but it is clearly bat as gilchrist defends this one
ashwin to gilchrist, four runs, dropped by hayden at slip, this was the quicker delivery, and the edge flew past keeper, and hayden couldn't his right hand around in time
ashwin to mishra, 1 wide, fired too far down the leg side
ashwin to mishra, no run, tunred away to fine leg, sent back by gilly, and he just about beats the under-arm flick by half a frame
bollinger to gilchrist, 1 run, slower ball, hit down to mid-on for one
bollinger to mishra, four runs, comes down the track and flashes at it, but the edge flies between keeper and wide slip
bollinger to mishra, six runs, mishra is running away, picks the slower ball early and lofts it over midwicket for six
ashwin to gilchrist, out, what a beauty from ashwin, angling in, pitching middle and off, gilchrist looks to run it down but it breaks away and takes a faint tickle through
ashwin to sharma, no run, big lbw shout first ball, the offbreak beats him as his bat is hidden behind the pad, but taufel reckons it might just me turning too far down the leg side
jakati to suman, 1 run, flat delivery, pushed down to lone-off for one
ashwin to suman, no run, carrom ball, suman has no clue about this one as it leaves him
thushara to suman, four runs, another edge gets them four, slightly awkward flash at it outside off, and it flies over slip
raina to sharma, no run, straighter one, rohit stays back and defends
thushara to suman, no run, looks to run this down to third man and ends up playing inside the line
thushara to suman, no run, pushed to cover, another dot ball
raina to sharma, 1 run, driven past cover for one
raina to suman, 1 run, charges down the track, mis-hits to deep square leg for one
jakati to suman, no run, big shout for lbw, but sliding down the leg side as he ends up playing on the off side of the delivery - not straightening enough
jakati to suman, 1 run, pushed wide of extra cover for one
jakati to symonds, no run, arm ball, gets symonds's inside edge onto the pad
jakati to symonds, no run, regulation offbreak this time, symonds stays back and blocks it
raina to suman, 1 run, stays back and turns this to fine leg for one
raina to symonds, 1 leg bye, chips down the pitch and kicks it out, and claims a leg-bye and is granted! i am not sure he attempted a shot here
raina to suman, 2 runs, nicely placed between fine leg and deep square leg, and comes back for two
jakati to symonds, six runs, lovely shot! strong arms and wrists! hardly a back lift or a follow through here, just merely flicked straight back over his head
tyagi to suman, no run, starts with a slower one, beats suman outside off
tyagi to suman, 2 runs, soft hands as he places this into the leg side and comes back for a couple
thushara to symonds, 1 run, slower ball, and he runs it down to third man for one
thushara to suman, 1 run, guided to backward point for one, and symonds is quick enough to beat the direct hit

jakati to suman, out, had he had precision equipments he couldn't have found raina at long-off better! this inside-out shot has got him many runs tonight, but this one he ends up hitting far straighter than he wants, and raina is a touch wide too. all that means the game is not over yet
jakati to symonds, 1 run, symonds pushes it to the right of the bowler, jakati is hampered by the batsman getting back into the none-striker's crease, and a single ensues
jakati to symonds, six runs, another lovely hit from symonds, no back lift or follow through, dances down the track and hits it flat and straight, lovely six
jakati to symonds, 2 runs, and now the nurdle into the leg side, and he has places it well to come back for two
jakati to symonds, no run, flatter delivery, hit to straightish extra cover
thushara to smith, 1 run, follows the big hit with a bunted single
thushara to symonds, 1 run, dabbed away to third man for a single
kumar to ganguly, no run, swing first away, inswing, pitching leg and moving towards off, blocked by ganguly
kumar to ganguly, 1 run, and straightaway ends up angling one down the leg side, and it straightens only a touch, ganguly takes a single to mid-on
kumar to gayle, 1 wide, outswinger this time, moves in too much down the leg side
kumar to gayle, 1 run, back to bowling inswing, but too straight, gayle gets a single to square leg
steyn to gayle, no run, 144.5kph, looked like it would swing in towards gayle, who plays for that movement, but it moves away upon pitching, and beats him
kumar to gayle, no run, big outswinger, beats gayle, missing leg
kumar to gayle, 1 run, beauty, follows the outswinger with a big inswinger, and it takes the outside edge that flies wide of slip for a single
kumar to gayle, 1 run, gayle charges down the track and smashes it back at him, pk gets a hand on it, saving three runs
kumar to gayle, 1 wide, this time gayle stays back, pk slips it down the leg side, and gets uthappa on the wrist
