kallis to ganguly, 1 run, gets a thick outside edge for a single as he backs away again
kallis to mccullum, 1 run, gives him the charge, kallis tucks him up, baz runs it down to third man for a single
kallis to ganguly, 1 run, no room this time, but ganguly drops and runs to cover
kumble to ganguly, no run, nicely bowled, straighter one, ganguly pokes inside the line
kumble to ganguly, no run, beats him again with the straighter delivery
kallis to ganguly, 1 run, makes room and steers this one down to third man
kallis to mccullum, 1 run, another dab to third man for a single
kallis to ganguly, 1 run, and another steer for a single
sriram to mccullum, 1 run, flat delivery outside off, pushed to cover
kumble to mccullum, 1 run, another charge at him, he manages to get this to backward point for a single
sriram to mccullum, four runs, chinaman this time, and he has swept this fine, lovely shot, with the spin, and he has swept kkr back into the lead
sriram to mccullum, no run, flat, fast offbreak, defends - big over, for 18
vinay kumar to ganguly, 1 run, angled across, helped away to third man for one
vinay kumar to mccullum, no run, slight straightening of the line upon pitching just outside off, defended back to him
vinay kumar to mccullum, 1 run, and baz tries his scoop again, and has nearly scooped it from outside off onto the stumps as he is tumbling over. what a guy. gets a single to fine leg
kallis to mccullum, 1 run, steered down to third man for one
kallis to mccullum, no run, slower ball outside off, helped away to backward point
kallis to mccullum, no run, 136kph only, but it nips in and hurries mccullum into a defensive shot

vinay kumar to mccullum, six runs, what bat speed, he just swings across the line, is hit on the back of the bat, and it flies over third man for six. remember the first match of the first ipl, anybody? edges flying for sixes

vinay kumar to mccullum, four runs, 'i'd be spitting blood if i were the bowler,' says robin jackman! edged? guided? the bat face opens and also it takes the edge, and it's gone for four past the keeper

vinay kumar to mccullum, 2 runs, what a dive to get in! hit just to the right of third man, comes back for two, which is clearly not on, and then almost flies through the last four yards or so. there is more drama! while his bat lands in before the stumps are disturbed, it goes aerial as the bails come off. benefit of the doubt lets mccullum stay in.
kumble to saha, no run, big lbw shout, quicker, straighter ball, through him, but sliding down
kumble to mccullum, no run, flat, quick, no room, defended towards midwicket
steyn to saha, no run, too quick, 149.2kph, climbing into the ribs, no choice but to offer a defensive shot
steyn to saha, 1 run, 154kph, steyn is fired up, saha manages to play it to mid-off for one
steyn to pujara, no run, 149.5kph, past pujara before the bat comes down
steyn to pujara, 1 wide, 155.1kph, misses his line down the leg side, good save by uthappa
kallis to agarkar, 1 run, backs away and drives through the covers, wants two but is rightly sent back by pujara
vinay kumar to sharma, out, this one nips back in, gets the inside edge, and uthappa holds onto a low catch to his left
vinay kumar to agarkar, 2 runs, kumble misfields at extra cover, allows two when it should have been one
vinay kumar to agarkar, 1 run, hit to extra cover again, and this time is just a single
dinda to kallis, 2 runs, dropped by ganguly at mid-off, strong inside-out strike from kallis and the overhead catch goes through ganguly's fingers
sharma to sriram, 1 run, whips this away off the hips for a single to square leg
sharma to kallis, 1 run, misfield by ishant in his follow through, kallis gets the single to keep the strike
dinda to kallis, 1 run, driven with an open face, gets a single to third man
dinda to sriram, no run, sriram backs away, slashes and misses

dinda to kallis, out, they have got him! the big wicket! almost dropped! kallis goes for the big square drive, gets a thick edge, which almost pops out of gayle's hands at slip, but he recovers and holds onto the rebound
sharma to sriram, no run, swings and misses outside off
agarkar to dravid, 1 run, whipped away to deep square leg for a single
agarkar to dravid, 1 leg bye, nips back in, gets an inside edge onto the pad, concedes a single
sharma to dravid, 2 runs, whipped away from outside off, hit wide of deep square and comes back for two
sharma to dravid, 1 run, that one spits at him, and played like dravid does in the tests, leaning away, getting the bottom hand of the handle, and running it down to third man for one
agarkar to dravid, 1 run, slower ball, whipped away to deep square leg for a single
mathews to sriram, 1 run, slower ball, bunted for one towards point, dravid makes it despite tiwary's jonty-like work to hit the stumps direct
mathews to dravid, 1 run, square-drive, lovely shot, but now they have deep point in place
mendis to sriram, 5 wides, corrom ball, sriram looks to scoop it, blind-sighting saha, and what should have been one wide becomes five
mendis to dravid, no run, quick carrom ball, hit back to the bowler
dinda to sriram, out, gone! timber! sriram, striking at less than 100 per 100 balls, had to either hit out or get out! he gets out, looking for the big shot over mid-off, and playing on
dinda to uthappa, 2 runs, lovely timing, lovely stop at deep midwicket, just met it with an angled bat, and tiwary had to take four quick steps and a tumble to save this from going to the boundary
agarkar to uthappa, 1 run, gets inside the line, and flicks it to fine leg for one
agarkar to dravid, 1 run, doesn't get enough on this drive, only a single to extra cover
agarkar to uthappa, 1 run, across the line, but robin usually connects those, this is mis-hit, one bounce to midwicket for one
mathews to taylor, 1 run, tucks him up with one aimed for the ribs, taylor drops and runs
mendis to taylor, 1 run, carrom ball, outside off, taylor bunts it for one
sharma to uthappa, 2 runs, slower ball, robin mis-hits, but the top edge falls safe at deep square leg
sharma to uthappa, no run, slower ball, uthappa wants to send it to cubbon park but is through with the shot early
mendis to taylor, 1 run, swept along the ground this time, there is yes and no about the second, but a misfield in the deep has them safe

mendis to uthappa, four runs, reverse-swept for six or is it? lovely timing to get it to deep point, but it's actually a drop! ishant ran in too far and then sees it lob him, and then kicks an ipl board in disgust. there will be hell to pay for that, buddy! get ready for fines
powar to warner, no run, big turn, massive, powar pitches the ball on leg or just outside and rips the offbreak past warner's defense, sanga appeals but bowden is having none of it
pathan to gambhir, 1 wide, pathan bowls this wider outside off stump, the ball swings too. that's been called wide
pathan to gambhir, 1 wide, too wide outside off again, he'll have to bowl one more
powar to gambhir, 5 wides, oh he's tossed this one extremely wide outside leg stump, sangakkara has no chance, gift-wrapped runs for delhi
powar to gambhir, no run, defended on the leg side
powar to warner, 2 runs, warner moves back and hits the ball hard towards cover where a fumble allows delhi runs they shouldn't have got
powar to warner, no run, warner defends, but not very well
ablish to gambhir, four runs, oh that's so wide and gambhir reaches out for it and dabs the ball through the gap at backward point, way too much width offered

ablish to gambhir, no run, this one is straighter and gambhir is in a spot of trouble, he defends but the ball hits the bat and goes dangerously close to the stumps, gambhir is out of his crease as well and has to scamper back
ablish to collingwood, 2 runs, played to backward point, yuvi throws needlessly at the bowler's end and concedes overthrows
powar to karthik, no run, defended back to the bowler
powar to karthik, 2 runs, has he reverse swept it with the back of his bat? i think he has, and controlled it rather well to third man
powar to karthik, 1 run, played on the leg side
chawla to collingwood, no run, bowled straighter on middle and off, collingwood goes back and plays the ball to midwicket
chawla to collingwood, no run, collingwood pokes nervously outside off stump and gets an inside edge that goes past sangakkara
powar to karthik, 1 wide, powar rips the ball but it turns outside leg and that's a wide
powar to karthik, no run, defended back to the bowler
powar to collingwood, no run, defended on the leg side

chawla to collingwood, out, that is plumb, stone dead! collingwood went back into his crease to read the ball off the pitch, it was the topspinner and not a legbreak, the ball skidded through and hit the back pad before collingwood could bring his bat down, the impact was low, don't get easier lbws than that
chawla to vettori, 1 run, swept behind square for a single
yuvraj singh to karthik, no run, driven firmly but straight to cover
yuvraj singh to karthik, 1 run, driven again but this time in the gap between cover and point
chawla to karthik, 1 run, driven towards long-off for a single
pathan to karthik, no run, he starts with a wide delivery outside off, karthik reaches for it but misses
pathan to karthik, no run, another dot ball, karthik is taking his time, but he's got plenty
yuvraj singh to manhas, 1 run, dabbed on the leg side for one'
pathan to bhatia, no run, bhatia drives again and pathan bends low in his follow through to stop it
yuvraj singh to manhas, no run, the batsman steps out of his crease and then defends
yuvraj singh to manhas, 1 run, played through cover for a single
ablish to maharoof, 1 wide, wide down the leg side, sangakkara makes a sharp save and runs to his bowler for a word
ablish to mishra, 1 run, flicked towards deep midwicket
ablish to manhas, 1 run, wide ball, manhas reaches for it and hits towards point for a single
ablish to mishra, 1 run, dabbed on the off side for a single
theron to mishra, 1 run, mishra gets an inside edge towards long leg
theron to manhas, 2 runs, manhas flicks firmly and thinks he has a boundary until karan goel sprints to his left and dives to save the four
theron to manhas, 2 runs, manhas flicks again and the kotla crowd cheer as the ball runs to the boundary, but karan goel speeds to his right this time and dives to save four
theron to manhas, 1 run, manhas hits across the line and gives karan goel an easier piece of fielding this time
chawla to manhas, 1 run, played towards point for  a single
theron to mishra, 1 run, mishra clears his leg and heaves across the line, he gets an inside edge towards fine leg
pathan to mishra, 1 wide, that's too wide outside off, sanga isn't happy
pathan to nehra, no run, played back to the bowler
nehra to jayawardene, 1 run, well it looked like he hit that well but the ball didn't even clear the infield behind the bowler's head, jayawardene looks at the bottom of his bat
maharoof to jayawardene, no run, jayawardene made room but the slower ball took an age to reach him, he defended it in the end
maharoof to jayawardene, 1 run, slower one, 133 kmh, jayawardene flicks behind square for one more
nehra to jayawardene, 1 run, driven to mid-on for a quick single, warner's the fielder
maharoof to jayawardene, 1 run, deftly dabbed to third man for a single
mishra to jayawardene, no run, defended back to the bowler, that was 89 kmh and straight, jayawardene was looking to make room
mishra to jayawardene, 1 run, flicked through midwicket for one
bhatia to jayawardene, no run, the slower one and jayawardene misses the swat through midwicket, that was 98 kmh and just outside off, else bhatia would have bowled him
mishra to pathan, 1 run, played through square leg for a single
mishra to jayawardene, 1 run, played through midwicket for a single
mishra to pathan, out, caught in the deep! ifran comes down the track and swings his bat hard, hitting the ball in the air and straight to bhatia on the deep midwicket boundary
mishra to sangakkara, 1 run, sangakkara goes back and pushes a flat ball, which keeps low, to cover for one
vettori to sangakkara, no run, sangakkara advances and plays the ball back to vettori
vettori to sangakkara, no run, sangakkara moves back and across and plays the ball to midwicket
mishra to sangakkara, no run, defended back to the bowler
vettori to sangakkara, 1 wide, vettori drifts down leg side, bowden calls it wide
vettori to sangakkara, 1 run, arm ball and the batsmen run a single to deep point
collingwood to sangakkara, 1 run, sanga goes back and plays the ball through midwicket
sehwag to yuvraj singh, 1 run, flicked through square leg for a single
collingwood to yuvraj singh, 1 run, 95 kmh this time on off stump, nudged on the off side for a single
bhatia to yuvraj singh, four runs, poor ball, on leg stump, and yuvraj swats it down to the fine leg boundary
bhatia to yuvraj singh, 1 run, played towards point for one
mishra to sangakkara, 1 run, driven once again to long off for a single
mishra to yuvraj singh, no run, what's he trying? yuvraj attempts a reverse-swat and gets into an awful tangle
mishra to yuvraj singh, no run, played back to the bowler
mishra to sangakkara, 1 run, played behind square on the leg side for one
collingwood to sangakkara, no run, collingwood beats sanga's drive with an offbreak, a spinner's offbreak
vettori to sangakkara, no run, played to midwicket, sanga wants one but can't find it
vettori to sangakkara, 1 run, played through midwicket for a single
vettori to yuvraj singh, no run, yuvraj tries to close the face but gets a leading edge to vettori
collingwood to yuvraj singh, 1 run, yuvraj muscles the ball to deep midwicket where manhas prevents the four with a diving effort
collingwood to sangakkara, out, bowled him! sangakkara plays down the wrong line and collingwood hits middle stump
collingwood to barath, 1 run, he's away with a single through point

vettori to barath, 1 run, that's it! punjab have won. barath goes down the track and hits to mid-on, he runs the single and has to sprint, sehwag throws the ball to vettori who doesn't collect cleanly, he would have been in anyway, it needed a direct hit
pathan to jayasuriya, 1 wide, starts off with a wide down the leg side, jayasuriya gets his backfoot back before the keeper whips off the bails

watson to rayudu, no run, stays behind the line and defends

dole to tiwary, 1 run, taps it to the off side for a quick single
watson to tiwary, no run, stays beside the line and taps it to point
watson to duminy, four runs, streaky start! he's squared up outside the off stump and gets a thick outside edge which beats slip and runs to third man
pathan to tendulkar, 1 run,

jhunjhunwala to duminy, no run, flicked to square leg

warne to duminy, no run, no turn, tapped to the off side

trivedi to pollard, 1 run, close call! there was an appeal was a leg before but there was an inside edge, the ball rolls to the off side and pollard ambles out of his crease before being sent back, voges dives and has a shy at the stumps but misses with pollard miles out of his crease, voges could have done a jonty and run the stumps down
trivedi to tendulkar, 1 wide, slower ball but too wide down the leg side
trivedi to tendulkar, 1 run, tucks it down to the on side to retain the strike
warne to tendulkar, 2 runs, squeezes it down to deep midwicket and sachin puts pressure on lumb and pushes for the second run
warne to tendulkar, no run,
warne to tendulkar, no run,
trivedi to tendulkar, 1 run, gently tucked away towards square leg for a single
dole to tendulkar, no run, comes round the wicket and he knocks it back to the bowler

trivedi to tendulkar, no run, well well he turns down the single! he makes room and scoops it towards yusuf at deep cover, sathish is sent back

khan to ojha, no run,
kulkarni to lumb, no run, gets beside the line and taps it to the off side
kulkarni to fazal, no run,
kulkarni to fazal, no run, stabbed towards point and he doesn't take the run

khan to ojha, out, the man with the orange cap takes it! zaheer troubled ojha last over with his away movement and this time he finally induced the thick outside edge, tendulkar judges it well at first slip, falls to his left and cups it
kulkarni to fazal, four runs, streaky! drives away from the body on one leg and gets an inside edge past the stumps and the keeper
kulkarni to fazal, 1 run, flicked wide of mid-on
malinga to fazal, no run, steered straight to pollard at extra cover, packed off side field

kulkarni to fazal, no run, backs away and tries to carve it over the infield on the off side but misses
kulkarni to fazal, 1 run, punches it straight to pollard at backward point, he fumbles and that allows a single
kulkarni to jhunjhunwala, no run,

harbhajan singh to voges, 1 run,

harbhajan singh to jhunjhunwala, 1 run, tucks it towards square leg for a single

harbhajan singh to voges, 1 run,

pollard to voges, 3 runs, sliced behind point and tiwary does really well to sprint and save a boundary
pollard to voges, no run, gets beside the line and chops it to the off side
malinga to voges, 1 run, gets bedside the line and steers him just wide of cover point
pollard to voges, 1 run, placed to the deep on the off side

khan to dole, 1 run, stays back and knocks it towards mid-on
khan to raut, no run,
khan to raut, 1 run, comes round the wicket, gets beside the line and taps it to cover

malinga to dole, 1 run, nudged down to fine leg for a single
malinga to raut, no run,
malinga to raut, no run, the perfume ball! it whistles past the helmet as he sways out of the way
khan to raut, no run,
khan to raut, 1 run, punches it down to backward point
khan to dole, 1 run,
malinga to dole, no run, backs away this time and swishes at thin air
kulkarni to raut, no run,

kulkarni to dole, 2 runs,
harbhajan singh to dole, 1 wide,
steyn to gibbs, 1 run, gets beside the line and punches it to the off side
steyn to gilchrist, out, gilly has walked! steyn angles it across the left-hander, very minimal fott movement, gets a thin edge to the keeper, uthappa knows it immediately
vinay kumar to gibbs, no run, stays beside the line and taps it to the off side
vinay kumar to gibbs, 1 run, stays back and taps it down the pitch

steyn to gibbs, four runs, living a charmed life here, he drives away from his body and gets a thick inside edge which nearly shaves the stumps and runs to fine leg
steyn to gibbs, no run, slower ball, he tucks it down to midwicket

steyn to mishra, no run, skids through and he tucks it to the off side
steyn to mishra, no run,

appanna to sharma, 1 run, out, no communication at all! apanna bowls over the wicket, rohit drives down to deep cover and settles for a single, mishra charges out for the second but fails to glance at rohit who signalled him to stay put at the other end, steyn's throw was accurate to the keeper and mishra was stuck at rohit's end, mishra wasnt paying attention at all to his partner
appanna to symonds, 1 run, pushes it to extra cover

steyn to sharma, 1 run, reaches out and spoons it towards third man

harris to dravid, no run, stays back and drops it back to the bowler

harmeet singh to kallis, 1 wide, he slips it wide down the leg side

symonds to kallis, 1 run, pushes it down to cover

harris to appanna, 1 run, out, run-out! appanna makes room and scoops it down to deep point, risky second run but the throw from rohit is accurate to gilchrist and he whips off the bails, tiffenn doesn't call for the third umpire

nehra to madan, no run, swing in to him again, this time he is behind the line of it and defends
sangwan to madan, 1 run, slower ball, runs it down to third man for a single
sangwan to tendulkar, 2 runs, 'walking flick', says sunny g on air, and it is one, as he walks down the wicket and flicks it from outside off, against the angle, and wide of deep square
sangwan to tendulkar, 1 run, another flick shot, but this time closer to deep square leg

mishra to tendulkar, four runs, beautiful shot, comes down the track, gets too close to it, but still gets power into that shot, all timing actually, and hits it all along the ground and wide of mid-on for four
mishra to tendulkar, no run, stays back this time to turn it to leg, but hits it straight to square leg
mishra to tendulkar, 1 run, another shot wide of mid-on, not much power in it, and with single srt overtakes kallis as the leading scorer in this ipl
mcdonald to tendulkar, 1 run, viru is livid as he misfields this one at straight midwicket and lets through a single
mishra to tendulkar, 1 run, swept away fine for a single
mishra to tiwary, 1 run, quicker one pushed down to long-off for one
mcdonald to tiwary, 1 run, one hand comes off the bat as he squeezes this past cover for one
collingwood to tiwary, 2 runs, played with the angle, soft hands ensure a couple
collingwood to tiwary, 2 runs, and again, he places it between deep square and deep midwicket to come back for an easy two
collingwood to tiwary, 1 run, slower offbreak, bunted into the on side, where no man is in the circle, and takes an easy single

sangwan to tiwary, 1 run, they'll do anything for srt wicket! sangwan appeals for a run-out as a straight hit from tiwary hits the non-striker's stumps. but it is inches away from sangwan's hand, the umpire knows it, and sangwan smiles sheepishly. naughty
collingwood to tiwary, 1 run, drops and runs, not too far from karthik, just makes it in time
collingwood to tiwary, no run, slower ball, around leg stump, hit back to the bowler
sangwan to tiwary, out, slower ball, perfect line, pitching just outside off and breaking away to hit the stumps. tiwary aborts the big shot, looks to open the face but misses
collingwood to rayudu, 1 run, dropped by karthik, rayudu looks to drive an offbreak, gets a thick edge that hits karthik on the thumb and pops out
collingwood to rayudu, no run, gives him the charge, gets too close to it, and hits it straight to extra cover
mishra to rayudu, 1 leg bye, goes for the stumping down the leg side again, and rayudu manages to get an inside edge onto the pad
ladda to pollard, 2 runs, and he gets a leading edge first ball, pollard looks to turn it to leg, and ends up hitting into the off side, along the ground, for two
ladda to pollard, six runs, it's a mis-hit for a six! what power, what a small ground! toe-ends it over long-off
ladda to pollard, no run, quicker ball, pollard stays in the crease and can't get it off the square
khan to warner, 1 leg bye, similar delivery, looks to clip it, gets a leg-bye for one
khan to sehwag, 1 run, pollard misfields on the practice wicket around the cover-point area, sehwag gets a single
khan to sehwag, 1 leg bye, and sehwag misses another leg-side offering, gets inside the line but this one doesn't get up as much as he expects, but will steal a leg-bye

fernando to sehwag, 1 run, that split-fingered slower one nearly consumed two of the most dangerous batsmen in the world in three deliveries! this time sehwag ends up skying it, and murtaza from mid-on gets under a much simpler catch than the previous one, but the ball slips through the reverse-cup
harbhajan singh to sehwag, 1 run, hit on the bounce to deep midwicket for one
harbhajan singh to gambhir, no run, takes half a step down and defends

harbhajan singh to sehwag, 1 leg bye, lovely play, sees sehwag charge down, fires it down the leg side looking for a stumping, but sehwag shuffles to kick it away, and he takes a leg-bye, and the umpires allow the leg-bye. he wasn't attempting a shot surely
bravo to sehwag, 1 run, slower ball, sehwag stays back to turn it to deep midwicket for one
harbhajan singh to sehwag, 1 run, turning in, bunted away for one
murtaza to de villiers, 1 run, bunted towards midwicket for a single
pollard to de villiers, 1 run, starts with a slow ball, dropped to on side for a single
pollard to de villiers, no run, walks out, moves across, hits a slower ball back to pollard
pollard to de villiers, 1 run, another slower ball, gets an inside edge into the leg side
murtaza to karthik, 1 run, bunted into the leg side for one
murtaza to collingwood, 1 run, steps out first ball, gets a soft leading edge for a single
murtaza to collingwood, no run, some turn, it stops at him too, checks his shot towards extra cover
pollard to karthik, 1 run, charges at him and turns him to deep midwicket for one
murtaza to mcdonald, 1 run, pushed to cover for one
murtaza to mcdonald, no run, looks to play inside-out, there is no spin on this one, and he ends up hitting it back to the bowler
murtaza to mcdonald, 1 run, gets this one past a diving extra cover for a single
pollard to mcdonald, no run, more confusion with the running, hit straight to point, and mcdonald has to send back mishra
pollard to mishra, no run, opens the face to point
pollard to mishra, no run, slower ball, hit back to the bowler
murtaza to mishra, 1 run, comes down the track to hit this one to long-off
murtaza to mcdonald, 1 run, arm ball, plays this one well, but only for a single to long-off
murtaza to mishra, 1 run, played to extra cover for a single
murtaza to mcdonald, 1 run, another single to extra cover
murtaza to mishra, 1 run, end of a superb spell, with a single to long-off
pollard to mishra, no run, beats him with a slower one as he is early into the charge and wings
pollard to mcdonald, 2 runs, played with an open face to deep point for one
harbhajan singh to mishra, 1 run, turned around the corner for one
harbhajan singh to mishra, 1 run, played from outside off, for one to square leg
harbhajan singh to mishra, 1 run, comes down the track and hits it to long-off
harbhajan singh to mcdonald, no run, topspinner, stays back and defends
fernando to mishra, 1 run, helped away to fine leg for one
fernando to mcdonald, 1 run, runs this down to third man
harbhajan singh to sangwan, 1 run, flicked off the leg stump for a single
fernando to sangwan, 1 run, goes for the big heave, gets a single off the back of the bat
bravo to mcdonald, six runs, finally a boundary! timed well and straight over the bowler's head
bravo to mcdonald, 1 run, hit along the ground to long-off this time
bravo to sangwan, 1 run, slower ball, gets a single off the inside edge
bravo to mcdonald, no run, swipes across the line and misses
bollinger to ganguly, four runs, improvisation! looks to tuck dada up for room, he backs away outside leg and creates enough room to force it behind point for four
ashwin to mccullum, no run, outside off, looked to work it away to the off side
ashwin to mccullum, no run,
bollinger to hussey, 1 leg bye, slower ball at 114 kph, slips down the leg tucked away for a leg bye

ashwin to hussey, 1 wide, out, ashwin's got another one, what a spell this is! looped on leg stump, turning down the leg, and hussey was drawn out, could not make contact and over-balanced. dhoni took the bails off before one could have said 'wide'!
ashwin to mathews, no run, turn! turns in sharply from off stump
ashwin to mathews, no run,
ashwin to mathews, no run, and again, mathews tries to come down but can't combat the spin
ashwin to mathews, no run, great lines, keeps it outside off and turns it in without much fuss.
bollinger to tiwary, no run, again, he lets it go outside off. slips in place, arms being shouldered. no it is not a test match.
bollinger to tiwary, no run, nicely bowled! brings it back in this time and eludes the inside edge by a whisker. might have been a slight deflection, tough to call.
ashwin to tiwary, 1 run, on off stump, turning in, tucked away to leg
ashwin to mathews, 4 leg byes, tuns down the leg this time, and it runs away to the boundary. angelo is thrilled - runs have been hard to come by
ashwin to tiwary, 2 runs, that unusual doosra this time, the batsman manages to pick it and play away towards square on the off for a couple
ashwin to tiwary, no run, big spin, takes something en route to leg slip
ashwin to tiwary, no run, end of an awesome spell! ashwin finishes it off with another variation, it looked like a genuine leg spinner this time. no bat, through to dhoni.
morkel to tiwary, 1 run, tip and run, played off the face straight to point and they are through.
morkel to tiwary, 1 run, stays back, and dabs it behind point for a single
muralitharan to mathews, four runs, nice shot! 83.3 kph is fast enough outside off, for mathews to open the face and run it down to the third man fence
muralitharan to mathews, six runs, take that my fellow sri lankan! mathews goes down on a knee and shovels it from outside off beyond the midwicket boundary. good shot!
jakati to mathews, 1 wide, drifts down leg and concedes a wide
muralitharan to tiwary, 1 run, and he plays down to the off side to rotate the strike
muralitharan to mathews, no run, more turn, pops up off something on the leg side, dhoni tidies up
jakati to mathews, 1 run, on leg stump again, tapped away near the wicket for a quick single
jakati to mathews, no run, can't get it away, straight back to the bowler

jakati to saha, out, gone! saha played it off the face off the bat, he wanted to go very fine and it went too fine for his liking, into dhoni's right leg. he regained quickly and broke the stumps with saha desperately trying to get back in.
jakati to shukla, 2 runs, expertly played, opens the face to run it down from a fraction outside off stump, towards third man
raina to mathews, no run, great fielding at midwicket from badri to deny the single
raina to mathews, 1 run, swept hard from outside off towards deep square leg
raina to shukla, no run,
raina to shukla, six runs, this time over the off side! generates tremendous bat-speed and sends it flying over wide long off, even better shot this one!
muralitharan to shukla, 5 wides, murali is having a really poor day, big spin from middle and leg, well down the leg and dhoni can't save five wides
muralitharan to shukla, 1 run, better ball, outside off, he gets down the track and plays it to the leg side
muralitharan to mathews, 1 wide, and again, he's trying hard to deny room and concedes another wide down the leg
muralitharan to shukla, no run, and again, replay of the previous ball. good finish to an awry over from murali
bollinger to agarkar, four runs, agarkar gets a thick outside edge that goes as fine as thick outside edges can go, without landing in the keeper's gloves. crucial boundary

bollinger to agarkar, no run, missed run-out chance by badri at point. agarkar hit it straight to him and ran, and badri took time to aim and throw down the stumps. would have been an easy call if he'd hit.
muralitharan to mathews, 1 wide, someone's stolen the wizard's magic wand today. wide down the leg
muralitharan to mathews, no run, can't get this one away, straight back down the track for no run
gayle to vijay, 5 wides, spin! slides down the leg side unfortunately for kkr and runs away for five wides. it was a legside stumping chance as well, albeit a tough one.
gayle to hayden, no run, outside hayden's off stump, he lets it go
gayle to raina, no run, good lines! outside raina's off stump, he goes for an expansive drive and misses
gayle to vijay, 1 run, down the track and dabbed away past the bowler for a single
gayle to raina, no run, on middle and leg, gives himself room but can't score through the off side
gayle to raina, 5 wides, ah, you can have as many slips as you want, but if you bowl it down the leg side it will not help mr. gayle. that was wrongly called wide too, it hit raina
gayle to raina, four runs, no such problems over the leg side, mid on is in and raina clears him easily. four more
dinda to raina, four runs, kolkata have not had much luck in this innings, raina gets a thick edge that runs very fine for four through third man
gayle to vijay, 1 run, hit hard down to square leg, but he has cover there
agarkar to raina, no run, angles across from middle to off, raina stays back and opens the face, and sends an eager vijay back to his crease
agarkar to vijay, 1 run, vijay does the needful, opens the face and taps it for a single to give red-hot raina the strike
agarkar to raina, no run, slower ball, 116.3 kph and raina can't get bat on it as he opens the face, second bounce before it reaches saha
iqbal abdulla to raina, no run, tight line, middle and leg and raina can't work it away to the leg side
agarkar to vijay, four runs, grace from vijay! agarkar marginally outside off, vijay stays back and opens the face to run it deftly down to third man. that flew in the air, but very safe
agarkar to vijay, no run, tries to work this away to the leg side, but can't get past midwicket
hussey to raina, no run,
mathews to vijay, 1 wide, slides down the leg this time to gift a run and a ball.
mathews to vijay, 2 runs, slower ball, vijay picks it early and glances it very fine to pick a couple. dinda puts in the sliding save on the boundary
mathews to raina, no run, lucky to escape with that one, it was well wide of off stump, but the umpire let it go
hussey to vijay, 1 run,
hussey to vijay, four runs, beautiful shot! vijay sashays down and drives elegantly through the off side. this game is ending really fast
hussey to vijay, 2 runs, plays it away for a couple more. vijay has quietly crept up to 38, and is looking ominous now
iqbal abdulla to vijay, no run,

iqbal abdulla to raina, six runs, raina finishes it off in typical fashion, and the authority of that shot underlines chennai's dominance tonight. swung away on one foot over midwicket. see you later kolkata!
kumble to lumb, 1 run, steered towards backward point, steyn dives too early, but recovers, getting back up on one hand and then keeps them down to one
steyn to ojha, 1 run, 149kph, straight, ojha is caught on the crease, but the bat comes down just in time
steyn to lumb, 1 run, makes room, steyn follows him, manges to get wide of mid-off for one
steyn to ojha, four runs, no bounce in the pitch, looks for the hip-rib area, this one goes thigh-high, and the line is too leg-sidish. ojha guides it past the keeper for four
steyn to ojha, 1 wide, digs it halfway mark, gets it only rib high, and down the leg side - no bounce in the pitch
steyn to ojha, no run, slower ball, 119.6kph, defended towards midwicket
vinay kumar to ojha, 1 run, steered away past point for one
pankaj singh to watson, no run, nice punch, but can't pierce the cover ring
vinay kumar to jhunjhunwala, 1 run, room given this time, steered to third man for the first run in 11 balls
vinay kumar to watson, 2 runs, goes wide of the crease, gets this to nip back in to watson, who gets a couple off the inside half of the bat
pankaj singh to watson, 1 run, and the water filter lets one through! this one is hit to the right of kallis at backward point, and he is late on the dive, but manages to get a hand on it
steyn to watson, 1 run, steered to third man for one
steyn to jhunjhunwala, no run, looks to steer this to third man, gets bottom edge towards keeper
kallis to jhunjhunwala, no run, sees him back away too soon, and pushes through a slower ball wide of off

pankaj singh to jhunjhunwala, out, slower ball, and jhunjhunwala has been put out of his misery! makes room early and doesn't get any bat behind this hit, and kumble's long arms of the law make it easy at mid-off
kallis to voges, no run, more on the off stump this time, pushed back to the bowler
steyn to raut, 1 run, slower one, runs this down to third man
steyn to voges, no run, tries the shot again, but this is faster and beats him for pace
pankaj singh to voges, 1 run, better bowling, around off, no room, pushed to long-off for one
pankaj singh to raut, 1 run, slower ball, steered to third man for one
pankaj singh to raut, 1 run, slower ball, opens the face on it for a single
steyn to raut, no run, beats him for the pace again, the slowness this time, through the big heave before it arrives
steyn to raut, 1 run, backs away, steyn follows him, yorks him, only a single
kallis to voges, 1 run, drilled back at him, on the bump, kallis can't get his hands down in time
vinay kumar to raut, 2 runs, goes for the big heave, slices it wide of mid-off and takes two
vinay kumar to raut, no run, looks to play the scoop shot, done in by the slower ball, vk rushes up to the striker's end to prevent a bye
vinay kumar to raut, six runs, picks the slower ball early, makes room, and lofts him over long-off, good timing, first six of the innings
kamran khan to kallis, no run, gets swing first up, but swinging too far down the leg side
kamran khan to pietersen, 1 run, driven wide of mid-off for an easy single
watson to pietersen, no run, slower ball, checks the shot and defends it back
kamran khan to pietersen, no run, is handcuffed as he looks to drive, no room, but he is safe

trivedi to pandey, out, slower ball, looks to tap it into the on side, and he gets a leading edge towards extra cover, and yusuf holds onto it, but his facial reaction conveys visibility problem. eyes contracting as if in smoke
voges to pietersen, 1 run, makes room, looks to go over mid-on, but there is no spin on it, and gets an inside edge for one
trivedi to pietersen, 1 run, slower ball, tickled away for one to on
trivedi to uthappa, four runs, playing at will here, walks across and drags this from outside off, and flicks it over midwicket
watson to uthappa, no run, appeal for lbw, hit outside the line, and uthappa also shows his bat. stays low too
watson to pietersen, 2 runs, lovely shot, walks across the stumps, and flicks it from outside off, past midwicket, lovely balance when he plays that imbalanced shot
watson to pietersen, 1 run, 50 off 24 for kp, pushed down to long-off. he might just be the no. 3 bangalore are looking for

warne to pietersen, six runs, another lovely shot, down the pitch, close to the ball, and goes straight into the sight screen. got to admire ojha's optimism here. 'come on warney, just one wicket here,' he says
warne to pietersen, 1 run, pushed down to long-off for one

warne to uthappa, out, appeal for stumping as he misses out on that switch hit. replays shot that while he was stuck on the line for a second, a minute part of his foot slid back over it by the time bails came off. and he has given him out! third ump! 'you make up your own minds at home. you saw it,' says jeremy coney on air

kamran khan to kohli, out, pushed to cover-point, kp wants one, kohli says no, kp keeps running, kohli stands his ground. kp is run out, but he gives kohli a nasty glare, and then stands in the middle, perhaps suggesting he reached the striker's end first. kp has to go, say the replays. unnecessary blip on bangalore's night at the very end, slightly unsavoury too
kamran khan to kohli, 1 run, wide outside off, driven through the covers
trivedi to taylor, 1 run, gets an inside edge as he looks to play it to cover
trivedi to kohli, no run, slower ball, hit to mid-on
nannes to vijay, 2 wides, ah, radar is not yet turned on, nannes slips down the leg, karthik makes a diving half-stop to restrict it to two wides
nehra to hayden, no run, nice away movement from haydos, he shoulders arms
nehra to vijay, no run, another good ball, angling across vijay who has nothing to do with it. gets back and shoulders arms
nehra to vijay, no run, finishes off with another dot - good over from nehra. outside vijay's off stump, he stays back and blocks down the track
nannes to vijay, 3 runs, the line is marginally off target this time, and it is enough for vijay to time it away off the hips to midwicket. good running gets three easily
nehra to vijay, four runs, intentional! despite the presence of a slip, vijay was looking to open the face of the bat outside off, the ball flew away off the meat, very fine to the third man fence
nehra to hussey, no run, on mr. cricket's off stump, he stays back and defends to point. chennai need this man today, desperately, to come to the party
yadav to raina, no run, straighter from umesh, angling in from leg to middle, raina gets into it and defends to the leg side
nehra to raina, no run, raina backs away towards the leg side to create room through the off but cannot connect. unnecessary ugly shot
dilshan to raina, 1 run, skips out and drives from leg to long off
sehwag to hussey, four runs, slow looper outside off, hussey drives through square, and mishra makes a mess of an easy pick up and throw, to concede four
dilshan to hussey, 1 run, finally gets it away to deep cover for a single
sehwag to morkel, no run, turn for sehwag, sqaures him up as it spins from leg to off, gets an outside edge to the off side

sehwag to morkel, out, is that sehwag or muralitharan?! big spin again, from leg towards off, morkel is befuddled completely as it takes outside edge and carries to collingwood at slip who takes it cleanly. chennai are shell-shocked, both the team and the city!
mishra to badrinath, 1 run, spin for mishra as well, as expected, turns away from badri who gets back and drives to cover
sehwag to ashwin, no run, again down the track but the intent is just for one and he cant even get that
sehwag to ashwin, 1 run, gets well inside the line to work it from off and middle, very fine towards fine leg. sehwag's bowling a great spell
mishra to ashwin, no run,
sehwag to badrinath, 1 run, huge turn, badri was looking to run it down to third man and had no room to do so.
mishra to badrinath, 1 run,
mishra to balaji, 1 run, finally gets a run, to retain strike
dilshan to badrinath, no run,
dilshan to balaji, no run,
mishra to bollinger, 1 no ball, no ball, chennai will take that. what can bolly do with the free hit coming up
mishra to bollinger, no run, another one, bolly's not picking them at all.
mishra to bollinger, 1 run, bolly backs away to the leg side to create room, it is the leggie this time, driven to long off
dilshan to bollinger, no run, offie this time, and bolly is as befuddled as he was by the googlies, misses the swipe to leg again
dilshan to badrinath, 1 run, badri tries to get one, drives in the air to deep midwicket on the bounce

nannes to bollinger, 1 run, direct hit would have had bollinger's number. straight and fast, he gets bat on it to the off side and goes for a nothing run, nannes runs to the off side, picks up and throws... and misses
nannes to badrinath, 1 run, another run-out chance gone abegging. badri hit straight to mid on and ran for the strike. the fielder misses, badri survives and csk have three figures
nannes to bollinger, no run,
nehra to bollinger, 1 run, good yorked on leg, bolly can't do much except squeeze it down to mid on
nehra to badrinath, 2 runs, nicely hit by badri, staying back, lofting over mid on, but can't beat warner who is prowling in the deep

nehra to badrinath, four runs, mishra has made another blunder in the outfield and incredibly, again he's conceded four! badri got it high into the midwicket area where mishra was running across from square leg. he got under it and put it down inexplicably, and it found a way past the rope.
bollinger to gambhir, 1 run, ooh, gambhir nearly runs himself out once again. tip and run straight to mid on, where ashwin is slow to react and his throw is average too.
ashwin to gambhir, no run, and again, morkel dives at point to stop the run
bollinger to karthik, 1 run, gets down the track and tucks it down to midwicket
ashwin to gambhir, 1 run, beautiful arm-ball, gambhir, one of the best players of spin in the world, had no clue about it. inside edged to the leg side
ashwin to karthik, 4 byes, whoa! big spin, beating two batsmen-wicketkeepers all ends up, and somehow misses the stumps. four byes
ashwin to karthik, no run,
jakati to karthik, no run, nice arm ball, but dk picks it and opens the face, but can't elude point
morkel to gambhir, no run, ooh, this time he misses but only just and it goes into dhoni's gloves. good take
jakati to gambhir, 3 runs, cheeky! plays that very late off the stumps very fine to third man and gets three for it
jakati to manhas, no run, armer, hurrying onto manhas who does well to keep it out
jakati to gambhir, no run, on middle and leg, gambhir uses the wrists to glance to square leg but no runs
jakati to gambhir, no run, turn and bounce, sliding down leg. ridiculous appeal for lbw to herald the time-out.
raina to manhas, no run, tight line outside off, not much turn played to point
raina to manhas, no run, and four now! good bowling, keeps it tight
balaji to gambhir, no run, hurries him this time with some extra pace, gambhir misses
balaji to gambhir, no run, square driven straight to point. poor over from bala, it has released the pressure. csk need to strike. gauti has done well, manhas is giving him good company
jakati to manhas, 1 run, finds the gap this time, between cover and mid off
jakati to manhas, no run, good ball, on middle and leg straightening away from the batsman. defended
jakati to manhas, no run, he comes down this time to smother the turn and plays to mid on, for no run
jakati to manhas, 1 run, whipped from middle and off to midwicket for another single
raina to gambhir, no run, and again. no karbonn kamaal, but that was a carbon copy of the previous ball
ashwin to gambhir, no run,
raina to gambhir, no run,
morkel to gambhir, no run, driven straight to haydos at cover, who fumbles and recovers. dot.
morkel to gambhir, 2 runs, and gauti finishes it off the way he set it up.chips it over midwicket and runs through for two, with beads of sweat dripping all over the pitch from his forehead.
singh to sangakkara, no run, nice start for rp, good tight line, sangakkara pushes it towards cover
singh to sangakkara, four runs, lovely square drive for four from sangakkara, first boundary of the day
singh to sangakkara, no run, nice shape outside off, some swing for rp, pitches too far outside off to trouble the batsman though
harris to jayawardene, 1 wide, down the leg side, he'll have to re-bowl that one
harris to jayawardene, 1 wide, harris struggling to control his line on this pitch which is offering him plenty of help, this one is down leg
harris to jayawardene, no run, jayawardene backs away and looks to dab it behind square on the off side, he misses and the keeper collects
marsh to sangakkara, no run, similar delivery, sangakkara looks to drive, gets it off the toe end of the bat towards slip
marsh to sangakkara, no run, well outside off, left alone by sangakkara
marsh to jayawardene, four runs, angling into legstump again, jayawardene comes down the track and flicks it towards deep square leg, bounces just wide of the man running across from long leg
symonds to sangakkara, four runs, symonds starts with a gift on legstump, easily turned away for four towards backward square leg
symonds to jayawardene, 2 runs, a bit of width, this time jayawardene gets it away towards deep extra cover
rg sharma to sangakkara, 1 run,
ojha to jayawardene, no run, on middle, defended with soft hands
ojha to jayawardene, four runs, down the leg side, jayawardene moves across and hoicks it towards fine leg for a one-bounce four
ojha to jayawardene, no run, outside off, jayawardene carves it towards backward point
ojha to sangakkara, no run, good over from ojha, sangakkara looks to crash an outside off ball through point but misses
symonds to sangakkara, six runs, on the legstump, sangakkara gets the first six of the innings by swiping that over deep backward square leg, just clears the fielder
ojha to jayawardene, 2 runs, on legstump, jayawardene again makes room, plays an inside-out lofted drive to deep extra cover
r sharma to yuvraj singh, no run, yuvraj looks to defend his first ball but the extra bounce troubles him, can't get bat on it, there's a big lbw appeal but that was too high
r sharma to yuvraj singh, no run, yuvraj looks to swing that to midwicket, but that was a quicker one without much room for the batsman, 102kmh
harris to jayawardene, 1 run, makes some room and carves that ball towards deep backward square leg for a single
marsh to jayawardene, 1 run, again jayawardene walks way across the offstump, marsh keeps the ball well outside off, batsman get it away to square leg
r sharma to jayawardene, 1 run, chance there, blasted back towards the bowler, who had to jump to take a return catch, gets a hand on it but can't hang on, the ball is deflected towards mid-on
singh to jayawardene, 1 wide, rp starts out with a delivery way outside off stump
harris to jayawardene, four runs, harris is appealing for lbw, jayawardene moves to the off side, and delicately glides the ball for four to fine leg
harris to jayawardene, four runs, gets on one knee and opens the face to guide the ball to the third man boundary this time
harris to jayawardene, 1 run, tapped to extra cover for a single
singh to jayawardene, four runs, a thick outside edge races away to the third man boundary
singh to jayawardene, 2 runs, gets that away towards backward point for two more
singh to jayawardene, 1 run, jayawrdene's chance of making a century are nearly over, he guides this one towards midwicket for a single
malik to mishra, no run, lovely outswinger, beats him outside off, misses the edge not by much
pathan to gilchrist, no run, shape away from gilchrist, starting middle and off and looking away, gilchrist defends
pathan to gilchrist, four runs, top shot, gilchrist will love the pace of this pitch, there is swing in this ball too, but he punches it square, and it flies across the outfield

pathan to gilchrist, out, just when i was saying he will like the pace, he is done in by one that pitches in the green area and holds up a bit. gilchrist goes for the big shot over the keepers, and is early into the shot, and ends up skying it to extra cover
theron to suman, no run, shifts his line to outside off, suman moves away from leg, mistimes it back to the bowler
srivastava to mishra, 1 run, a mishit from mishra, reaches the man at deep midwicket on the bounce
srivastava to mishra, 1 run, chopped towards backward point off the backfoot
theron to mishra, 1 run, clubbed towards the bowler by mishra, theron manages to get a foot on that, deflected towards mid-on
theron to mishra, 1 wide, down the leg side, and that's a free run for deccan
malik to mishra, 1 wide, another leg-side wide from punjab
malik to rg sharma, no run, looks to turn this one towards square leg but can't time it
chawla to suman, 1 run, a sensible drive to cover for another single
chawla to rg sharma, 1 run, single to long-off this time, rohit drives it along the ground
pathan to rg sharma, 1 run, slower ball, 106kmh, well outside off, dabbed to third man for a single
yuvraj singh to suman, six runs, yuvraj's first ball is clobbered over midwicket, suman gets on his knee and sends that one sailing over the rope to bring up the 100
yuvraj singh to rg sharma, four runs, terrible delivery from yuvraj, way down the leg side, easily dismissed to the fine leg boundary
yuvraj singh to rg sharma, 1 run, eased towards long-off for a single
chawla to symonds, no run, goes on straight after pitching way outside off, left alone by symonds
theron to marsh, 1 wide, another one slips down the leg side
chawla to rg sharma, no run, left alone by rohit, pitching just outside off and turning away sharply
chawla to marsh, 2 leg byes, big appeal for lbw, but marsh was hit outside the line by that straighter one
theron to marsh, 1 run, another offbreak from theron, marsh looks for the big swing, can only get it to fine leg for a single, tight over from theron
yuvraj singh to marsh, 1 run, sensibly driven towards cover for a single
yuvraj singh to sumanth, 1 run, sumnath gets off the mark by getting a single to square leg, keeper runs across to field
malik to sumanth, four runs, deccan win their fourth in a row, sumanth slaps that one through the crowded in-fielded past cover
steyn to tendulkar, no run, in the zone outside off stump, manish tries to carve it away to point but cant connect
steyn to tendulkar, 1 run, around 142 kmph outswinger, tendulkar pushes it to right of mid-off where kumble makes a tumbling stop
vinay kumar to mclaren, no run, around the middle and off line, squeezed out to backward point
steyn to tendulkar, no run, charges down the track and attempts to heave to the on side .. it was a slower one and he couldn't' adjust in time.. the ball rolls off his pad
vinay kumar to tendulkar, no run, around the off stump line, tendulkar goes back and across to defend to the off side
pankaj singh to mclaren, no run, kp! what a stop. the crowd roar. it was driven to his right at covers and he rushed to his right and dived to intercept the ball
pankaj singh to mclaren, 1 wide, slips this one down the leg side, he was trying the slower one around 111 kmph, wide
kallis to mclaren, no run, on the middle and leg, tapped behind square-leg
kallis to rayudu, 1 run, walks right across to the off - following the tendulkar plan against kallis - and glances it behind square-leg
kallis to mclaren, no run, moves down the track for the big lofted hit but makes no contact. robin collects
pankaj singh to rayudu, no run, crash! moves down the pitch and drives hard but the ball crashes into the stumps at the other end
pankaj singh to rayudu, 1 run, drives this one to left of mid-off where kumble makes a tumbling diving stop. acton-packed over comes to an end
kumble to rayudu, 1 run, on the middle stump line, slides in, flicked away behind square-leg
kumble to mclaren, 1 run, goes well back to punch it towards deep midwicket for a single
kumble to rayudu, 1 run, quicker, just outside off, tapped to point region
kumble to mclaren, 1 run, hits this one down to long-off
kumble to pollard, 2 wides, quickish slider but goes down the leg side and robin makes a half-stop
kumble to mclaren, four runs, slips this one down the leg side and mclaren glances it to the fine-leg boundary
pankaj singh to pollard, 1 run, the slower one around the off stump line, tapped behind point for a single
pankaj singh to mclaren, 1 run, turned past square-leg for a single
pietersen to nayar, 1 run, taps this one past square-leg
pietersen to duminy, six runs, thwack! duminy moves down the track and lifts it over long-off
pietersen to duminy, 1 run, eases this one through midwicket
steyn to nayar, 1 run, slower one around the off stump line, dabbed to third man
steyn to duminy, no run, slower one, duminy is forced to wait, he tries to force it to the on side, misses and the ball tails past the leg stump
vinay kumar to nayar, no run, slower one outside off stump, nayar tries to carve it over the off-side field but makes no contact.
khan to pandey, no run, in the zone outside off, manish tries to carve it to point but can't connect
khan to pandey, 2 runs, around the off stump, edged to behind square-leg for two runs
fernando to kallis, 1 run, on the off-stump line, kallis plays it late to third man
fernando to pandey, no run, in the zone outside off, manish pushes at it with an angled bat and the ball rushes past the edge . two very quiet overs for bangalore.
khan to kallis, 1 run, opens the bat-face to guide this to left of backward point for a single
mclaren to kallis, no run, moves outside leg, mclaren follows him and kallis pushes it back down the pitch
mclaren to kallis, no run, moves outside leg again, mclaren follows him with a slower one this time, kallis makes no contact and the ball goes past the leg stump
mclaren to dravid, 1 run, around off stump line, steered to third man
harbhajan singh to pietersen, no run, still from round the stumps, on the leg stump line, nudged to midwicket
harbhajan singh to pietersen, 1 bye, outside off, pushed away to the off side
pollard to pietersen, 1 run, another slower one, on the middle stump line, flicked to deep midwicket
pollard to dravid, 2 runs, slower one outside off stump, dravid lunges out and ends up chipping it over the bowler
pollard to uthappa, 1 run, stays back to tap it to point region for a quick single
pollard to pietersen, 1 run, flicked away for a single
pollard to uthappa, 1 run, tapped to backward point to sachin and again they rush for the quick single.. sachin fires the throw but misses
harbhajan singh to pietersen, six runs, kp steps out of his crease and smashes the slow delivery over midwicket boundary. crushed!
harbhajan singh to uthappa, 1 run, on the leg stump line, nudged behind square-leg

harbhajan singh to pietersen, out, the straighter one, the ball held between the thumb and the forefinger, gets kp who moved down the track for the lofted drive but ended up slicing it towards long-off where tiwary took a low catch.
harbhajan singh to uthappa, 1 run, quicker one, from round the stumps, skids on, pushed out to midwicket
harbhajan singh to kohli, 1 run, on the leg stump line, turned behind square-leg
fernando to kohli, 1 run, slower one outside off, jabbed to third man
fernando to kohli, 1 run, another one bouncing into the body and again virat is in trouble, stabs it out to the on side
mclaren to kohli, 1 run, slower one on the middle, swung away to deep midwicket
mclaren to vinay kumar, 1 run, slower one, on the middle, tapped to the on side
pollard to vinay kumar, 1 wide, yet another slower one, goes through to the keeper
mclaren to kumble, 1 leg bye, moves outside leg, mclaren follows him , jabbed to the off side
mclaren to vinay kumar, four runs, moves outside the leg stump and thrashes it to the cover boundary
bond to watson, four runs,
bond to watson, no run,
bond to watson, 1 run,
bond to ojha, no run,
bond to ojha, 1 run,
bond to watson, no run,
dinda to ojha, no run,
dinda to ojha, 1 run,
dinda to watson, 1 run,
dinda to ojha, no run,
dinda to ojha, no run,
dinda to ojha, no run,
bond to watson, four runs,
bond to watson, 1 run,
bond to ojha, no run,
bond to ojha, no run,
bond to ojha, 1 run,
bond to watson, no run,
dinda to ojha, four runs,
dinda to ojha, no run,
dinda to ojha, four runs,
dinda to ojha, no run,
dinda to ojha, 1 run,
dinda to watson, 1 run,
kartik to watson, no run, pushed back to the bowler
unadkat to watson, 1 run, ganguly makes a diving one-handed save at mid-on, it was a slower ball that watson had managed to hit wide of mid-on, but ganguly was up to the task
shukla to ojha, 1 bye, shuffles too far across, shukla misses the leg stump by inches, and in a positive bit of umpiring, it is not called no-ball
shukla to pathan, no run, defends the first ball he faces, to cover

unadkat to pathan, out, as good as a catch as ganguly has ever taken! and it is some take! yusuf gets too much under this attempted six off a slower ball, and skies it towards deep midwicket, and ganguly runs back from midwicket, keeps his eye on it, and then in the final instance sees it is falling away, and then dives to complete the stunner
unadkat to voges, 1 run, opens the face to get off the mark
kartik to finch, no run, tosses this one nicely, ends up yorking him
kartik to voges, 1 run, driven wide of long-off for one

kartik to voges, four runs, dinda misfields at long-off. the story of the tournament really, brilliant work followed by ordinary stuff. voges dances down the track and hits this towards long-off, dinda lets it go through on the second bounce
shukla to voges, 1 run, turned to midwicket for one
dinda to raut, 1 run, gets an inside edge on a slower delivery, and takes a single
unadkat to raut, no run, slower ball, looks to run it past the keeper, but there isn't much pace on it and hence it can't get wide of mccullum
unadkat to raut, 1 run, stays a touch low, he recovers well to work it to midwicket

unadkat to raut, out, another superb catch. by gayle this time. raut is frustrated and he jumps out of the track, and is done in by yet another slower delivery. gayle runs backwards from mid-off and takes a nice head-high catch
unadkat to dogra, 1 run, runs it down to third man for one
shukla to fazal, 1 run, angled across him, he opens the face to gets a single to third man
shukla to fazal, 1 run, driven with an open face, gets a single to deep point
kartik to dogra, out, rajasthan are falling apart here. tries to reverse-hit, the ball pitches in the rough outside what would be the leg stump, turns away, beats him, and takes out the middle stump
kartik to fazal, 1 run, opens the face to get one, good finish by kartik after being given a bit of stick by watson early on
bond to warne, 2 wides, good save by mccullum, it is a big wide down the leg side, mccullum dives and saves three. first wide of the innings!
dinda to fazal, no run, slower ball, passes under the bat of fazal who is backing away
dinda to trivedi, four runs, inside edge for four, makes room early, dinda goes for the stumps, and the inside edge beats both the stumps and the keeper
dinda to trivedi, out, mother of all ironies. sid trivedi getting out to a slower one. ends up skying it towards midwicket and unadkat gets under it and completes the catch even as he takes a tumble
pathan to ganguly, no run, flat around middle, gets an inside edge, which is safe
pathan to mccullum, 1 run, pushed with soft hands to mid-off, and rushes through for one
kamran khan to mccullum, no run, angled across the stumps, pushed to point
kamran khan to gayle, 1 wide, slight swing away from gayle, left alone

kamran khan to gayle, out, timber! kamran has turned this game around. for the moment at least. gayle looks to defend, playing for the swing, and this one goes in with the angle, and squeezes through the bat-pad gap
kamran khan to pujara, no run, slower ball, pushed to point, ganguly sends pujara back, then thinks of a single off misfield but decides against it
trivedi to pujara, no run, slower ball, hit back at him, trivedi gets a left hand on it
warne to ganguly, no run, that's wide down the leg side not called, ojha's unbelievably long appeal has something to do with it?
warne to ganguly, 1 run, pushed to cover for a single
pathan to ganguly, no run, sharp turn, angled in from round the stumps, pitches off and middle and beats a defensive poke
pathan to ganguly, four runs, nicely played, using yusuf's pace, and the sharp turn, and guiding this late past watson at slip
warne to ganguly, 1 run, swept away from leg-stump line for a single
pathan to ganguly, 1 run, makes room, drives inside-out, gets a single to deep point
voges to ganguly, 1 run, gives him the charge, voges looks for the leg-side stumping, but he gets bat on it
warne to pujara, 1 run, comes down the track, and bunts this into the on side for one
warne to ganguly, no run, punches it against the turn, finds straightish extra cover
trivedi to pujara, no run, slower ball, beats him as he looks to give trivedi the charge
tyagi to jayawardene, 1 wide, seams in after pitching middle and leg, big wide
tyagi to marsh, no run, better line for the left-hander, pitching off and moving away, left alone
bollinger to marsh, 1 wide, bollinger gives the reluctant umpire an exercise of arms. this one is even further down the leg side
bollinger to marsh, 1 run, steers this wide one down to third man for one
bollinger to jayawardene, no run, angled across him, left alone
morkel to marsh, 1 leg bye, similar delivery, this time he fails to make contact but takes a leg-bye
ashwin to marsh, no run, angled in, defended to on
bollinger to marsh, 2 runs, hit to mid-on, tyagi misfields, letting through couple of runs
ashwin to sangakkara, 1 run, shimmies down the track to push this to long-off for one
ashwin to marsh, 1 run, pushed to long-off for one
raina to sangakkara, 1 run, comes down the track to flick this one into the on side
raina to marsh, no run, looks to run this one down too, but hits it too hard to point
kemp to marsh, four runs, even more powerful, another gentle delivery, and marsh again stands and waits and flat-bats straight back
kemp to marsh, 1 run, slower ball, guided to third man for one
kemp to marsh, 1 run, steers this one from outside off for one
raina to marsh, no run, looks to play with an open face but there is not enough room to work with
raina to sangakkara, 2 runs, bunted into the leg side, and runs hard to come back back for two before deep midwicket can get into the act
ashwin to sangakkara, 1 run, comes down the track, the ball stops at him, but he manages to push it to long-off for one
ashwin to sangakkara, 2 runs, good fielding by bollinger at long-off, sanga comes down the track and hits it straight and fast, but bollinger dives to his left to save two runs
morkel to marsh, 1 run, runs this one from middle and leg to past point for a single
ashwin to pathan, four runs, irfan is in now. dances down the track, drags it across from off and manages to hit it wide of deep midwicket
ashwin to pathan, no run, driven, but straight to extra cover in the circle
bollinger to pathan, 2 runs, goes for the big shot, gets the toe end, third man is square, and they come back for two
bollinger to pathan, 2 runs, another big shot goes wrong, but again it is placed well, wide enough of long-off, and they come back for two. 50 off 36 for this partnership
bollinger to pathan, no run, slower ball, 117ks irfan misses out on a swipe across the line
bollinger to pathan, 1 run, top edge on an attempted big shot, tyagi runs in from third man and drops it
bollinger to pathan, four runs, another mis-hit from irfan, but this top edge goes straight over the keeper's head, and irfan is smiling as he sees it go for four in the v behind the wicket
bollinger to pathan, 1 run, mis-hit, inside edge towards square leg for one
powar to vijay, 1 run, stays in the crease and turns this to midwicket for one
powar to hayden, no run, pitched leg, turning away, pushed to mid-off
powar to hayden, no run, flatter delivery, beats him, the lbw shout is stifled because it is pitched outside leg
pathan to hayden, no run, swing there, starts outside off and moves away, hayden shoulders arms
powar to vijay, no run, powar slows it down even further, and vijay stays in the crease to defend this one
powar to vijay, no run, flatter, vijay comes down the track and hits it back to the bowler
powar to raina, no run, and more beautiful spin bowling, flatter delivery, 87ks, but just as much rip on it, pitches middle and off and beats him outside off
powar to badrinath, 1 run, pushed to mid-on for a sharp single
powar to raina, 1 run, guides this one to backward point for one
singh to raina, no run, tucks him up, played to point
chawla to badrinath, 1 run, another half-tracker, and he has deep midwicket in place this time
theron to dhoni, 1 run, steers to third man for a single
chawla to badrinath, no run, straighter topspinner, badri is hit in the pad, outside the line of off
theron to badrinath, no run, backs away, theron follows him, hit straight to extra cover. six dots in a row for badri
theron to badrinath, 1 wide, beats his scoop, too far down the leg side, bowden calmly waits for a fake appeal to prevent wide to end, and then stretches his arms. that's how you do it
theron to dhoni, 1 run, walks down the wicket, and turns this slower ball to square leg for one
pathan to dhoni, no run, more swing, beats dhoni as he walks down the pitch
pathan to dhoni, 1 run, walks down the pitch again, goes for the big shot over midwicket, gets an inside edge onto the pad
yuvraj singh to dhoni, 1 run, hits this to deep midwicket for one
yuvraj singh to badrinath, no run, looks to charge at him, yuvi stays flat and straight, hit back to the bowler
yuvraj singh to dhoni, 1 run, angled in, turned to midwicket for one
chawla to badrinath, 2 runs, charges at him, hits straight enough of long-off to come back for two
theron to dhoni, 2 runs, dropped or saved two, take your call. dhoni throws everything at this, gets a healthy high edge, sanga goes high, gets gloves to it, the ball bursts through, they get two
nannes to gilchrist, no run, angling in towards middle and off, holds its line, gets back and defends it to point
nehra to gilchrist, no run,

nehra to mishra, 1 run, comes down the track and pushes it towards mid-off for a single, warner fields well and dives while flicking it to the non-striker's end but misses the stumps, he would have been in anyway
nehra to mishra, four runs, had made up his mind there, nehra fires it on middle and off, mishra makes room and slices it over point for another boundary
yadav to rg sharma, no run, tries to work it through the leg side, came onto him a little quickly, was struck on the thighs, that was 145 kmph
yadav to mishra, no run, he's bowling quick here, 145.3 kmph, nips back in sharply to take mishra on the thighs
mishra to rg sharma, 1 run, well fielded, that was bowled quick and flat outside off, rohit made a bit of room and forced it towards cover where a diving save kept them to just a single
yadav to rg sharma, four runs, lovely drive, pitched it up on the off stump, rohit made a bit of room and crunched it all along the ground wide of mid-off for a boundary
yadav to rg sharma, 1 wide, yadav slips that one down the leg side to concede another run and an extra ball
mishra to symonds, no run,
yadav to symonds, no run, keeps low and symonds does well to negotiate it, leapt up and brought his bat down in time to tap it to point
yadav to symonds, no run, another one that keeps low and zips under him, bowled quick and had raced through his bat to the keeper

mishra to symonds, four runs, ohh, that was close, turned away to flummox symonds there, he was surprised by the extent of turn there, got a thick edge and it landed just wide of slip, beat the fielder, and rolled down the third-man boundary
mishra to marsh, 1 run, gets his left foot out of the way and pushes it past the bowler for a single

mishra to symonds, out, gone, round the wicket again, pitches it outside leg stump, symonds comes down the track, waits for it to turn in and chips it well but straight into the palms of a perfectly positioned mithun manhas at long-off
mishra to marsh, 1 run, swept down towards long leg for a single

nehra to marsh, out, the slower one does the trick, bowled at 114.8 kmph, tries to flick it over the leg-side field, doesn't pick the change in pace and ends up getting a leading edge to manhas at square leg
collingwood to vaas, 1 run, angles it towards middle, chips it wide of midwicket for a single
collingwood to vaas, out, another one goes, deccan are sliding at the death, tries to swing it over square leg, doesn't connect well and holes out to nehra who runs in from fine leg
harmeet singh to dilshan, no run, angles it towards middle, makes room and punches it to cover
harmeet singh to manhas, four runs, lovely timing, nipped back in and he just pushed through the line to beat the bowler and the diving mid-on
symonds to gambhir, no run,

ojha to gambhir, out, the ball's chasing rohit and he's snapping them up, it's bowled flat outside off and gambhir comes down the track and swings it to the left of rohit who stretches, tumbles and holds on to a sharp chance
ojha to collingwood, 1 run,
ojha to collingwood, 1 run, gave it some air, came down the track and drove it towards long-off for a single
r sharma to collingwood, 1 run, gets outside the line and taps it into that vacant area around midwicket for a single
r sharma to collingwood, 1 run,
r sharma to mishra, 1 run, pushed into the leg side wide of the bowler for a single
ojha to mishra, no run, turned away sharply to surprise the batsman, closed the face on it a little too early, missed
harmeet singh to nehra, 1 run, knocked it through midwicket into the deep for a single

r sharma to collingwood, 2 runs, is there a twist in the tale? rohit dropped it, collingwood was looking to clear long-off but mistimed it, it was miles in the air and rohit was in a position to clasp it but couldn't hold on
r sharma to collingwood, no run, played it back to the bowler
r sharma to collingwood, 1 run, bowled flat outside off, slapped it towards long-off for a single
marsh to nehra, no run, goes for a big heave there, misses and it rolls down to the keeper
bond to tiwary, 1 run, bowls it at 141.7 kmph, on leg stump, pushed away just wide of mid-on for a single
bond to dhawan, 1 run, angling it away from the left hander, slower one, dhawan gets across and guides it down to third man
dinda to tiwary, 1 wide, slides it down the leg side, tries to clip it fine, misses, called a wide
dinda to tiwary, 1 run, pushed it on the leg side, whipped through towards deep midwicket for a single
unadkat to tiwary, no run, gets back again and taps it towards cover
unadkat to tiwary, 1 run, well run, drops it down in the off side and sets off for a quick single
unadkat to duminy, 2 runs, slower one this time but doesn't get his direction right, tucked away behind square again, they get a couple this time
ganguly to duminy, 1 run, pushed through to mid-off and he calls for a single and makes it in time, would have been interesting had there been a direct hit but replays show he was safe
kartik to duminy, no run, looks to chop it towards point, gets an inside edge on the bounce to the keeper
kartik to duminy, 1 run, comes down the track and turns it wide of midwicket for a single, a tidy over
hussey to duminy, 1 run, driven in the direction of long-off for a single
dinda to tiwary, 1 run, fires it on middle, pushed away between point and cover for a single

unadkat to duminy, out, timber! he's been bowling slower deliveries and that one was quicker, at 132 kmph, duminy had been kept quiet and tried to dispatch that one over midwicket, missed and the stumps were splayed
kartik to sathish, 1 run, plays it in the direction of point for a quick single

kartik to bravo, 1 leg bye, came down the track and offered his pad, hid his bat behind it, they sneak a leg bye but shouldn't have been signalled one, there was no effort to play the shot, he just kicked it away
bond to bravo, 2 runs, pushed away through midwicket for a single
kartik to sathish, 1 run, waited for it to turn away, guided it just behind point for a quick single
tiwary to rayudu, no run, turning away, tries to play him past point, misses, the keeper goes up but the umpire turns him down, replays show there was an edge
tiwary to rayudu, 1 wide, turns away again but a touch too wide this time, called
tiwary to rayudu, 2 runs, slaps it in ugly fashion over the bowler for a single
tiwary to rayudu, 1 run,
bond to binny, 2 runs, angling it on middle, gets across and drives it him through midwicket for a couple, it went past ganguly who, while diving, hurt himself a little but all is well now
mclaren to mccullum, no run, angles it in towards middle, mccullum comes down the track and pushes him to cover
binny to mccullum, 1 run, slower one outside off, slaps it towards deep extra cover for a single
duminy to ganguly, 1 run, appeal for run-out, pushed into the off side towards extra cover, a direct hit onto the non-striker's end, ganguly has just made it in
duminy to mccullum, four runs, fires it hard down the leg side, mccullum helps it on its way to the fine-leg boundary
duminy to ganguly, no run, lands outside leg and turns towards middle, drops it in the off side
bravo to ganguly, 1 run,
sathish to mccullum, 1 run, pushed towards mid-off for a single
sathish to ganguly, no run, driven into the off side
sathish to mccullum, 1 run, and again, gets it behind the keeper and ganguly calls for the single

sathish to ganguly, out, bravo and mclaren almost got into a collision there, i don't think anyone called, the slower one there and ganguly tried to smash that over midwicket, was early into the shot and got the leading edge towards extra cover, both fielders went for it, bravo got to it first, the ball popped out and he he held on to the second attempt
sathish to mccullum, 1 wide, wide down the leg side, slower one again
sathish to mccullum, 2 runs, flicked behind square leg for a couple of runs
murtaza to hussey, 1 run, eased wide of point for a single
murtaza to mccullum, 5 wides, fires it hard down the leg side, the keeper fails to hold on and the result is five wides, kolkata are inching closer
murtaza to hussey, 2 runs, flicked away towards deep midwicket, they have enough time to head back for the second
kumar to dhawan, 1 run, and he gets the edge, and it goes wide of third slip! pitches middle and off, and swings away, and the genuine edge goes safe
kumar to tendulkar, no run, beats srt on the flick, appeals for lbw, but the angle is taking it down the leg side
kumar to tendulkar, no run, inswing now, good stuff, swinging towards the off stump from wide outside off, srt is watchful in pushing it to mid-on
kumar to tendulkar, 1 run, finishes a good over with the outswinger, no big swing, but straightens enough to make srt play a watchful push wide of mid-off
steyn to tendulkar, no run, outswing, 140ks, tendulkar shoulders arms

kumar to dhawan, four runs, overthrows! looks to drop and run, but hasn't hit far enough of pk, and sends nayar back. pk can run nayar out, but misses with a wide throw, and kp from mid-on is there to collect the throw and there is nobody to back up
kumar to nayar, 2 runs, flicked off the hips, gets a couple to square of deep fine leg
kumar to nayar, no run, accurate inswinger, pushed to midwicket

steyn to dhawan, out, slower ball, 118ks, and the kp-kohli combine have got a run-out here! dhawan drops to cover, wants a single, is sent back as pietersen is swooping on it fast. kp tries the direct-hit, hits the stumps, and they want to take a single off the ricochet. it hasn't gone too far, and kohli runs dhawan out by yards. nayar's call, and dhawan pays the price for responding to the call. kohli is pumped: this needed a direct hit because steyn wasn't there to collect the throw
steyn to rayudu, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
vinay kumar to rayudu, no run, another mix-up, looks to drop and run to square leg, but is sent back

vinay kumar to rayudu, 1 wide, comes down the track, vinay bounces him, is wided! how did the umpire judge the height of the ball vis-a-vis the batsman when it passed the stumps while the batsman was halfway down the pitch?
kallis to nayar, four runs, nayar moves across, gets inside the line of a leg-side delivery, and glances it fine. not a great delivery, but nayar is creating his leg-stump line here by moving across
kallis to nayar, 1 run, he does that again, but flicks this one squarer and gets only one
kallis to rayudu, 1 run, dabbed to point for a single
kumble to rayudu, 1 run, slightly outside off, hit to long-off for one

kumble to nayar, 2 runs, nayar is playing a little cameo that will annoy the bowling side. moves across the stumps, brings the lbw shout in, and then dabs it with soft hands into the leg side and runs hard for two

pietersen to nayar, 2 runs, and boy does this turn? angling in, pitching middle and off, and turning away big time, and uthappa is not sharp enough for it. but dravid is, chases hard, and makes a sliding save at the edge of the boundary
kumble to rayudu, 1 run, pushed to long-off for one

kumble to rayudu, 2 runs, over-eager bangalore here. hit between the bowler and straightish extra cover. kumble and pietersen both go for it, nearly colide, and neither man collects it cleanly. pietersen shies at the stumps after having collected it, and ends up conceding an unnecessary overthrow. the positive for bangalore is, the two men didn't collide
kumble to rayudu, 1 run, drops and runs to cover, and makes it comfortably
pietersen to tiwary, no run, turns across him, big turn, beats him, pitches middle and turns big time
pietersen to tiwary, 1 run, tiwary makes room, the ball pitches outside leg, turns away towards middle, he gets enough bat on it to get a single
pietersen to tiwary, 1 run, flatter, pushed to midwicket for one
kohli to tiwary, no run, driven into the ground and then to kumble at extra cover, is sent back by rayudu
pietersen to rayudu, 1 run, comes down the track and hits one-bounce to long-off
pietersen to tiwary, 1 run, goes for the big heave-ho, gets the inside edge towards deep midwicket for one
