kumble to rayudu, (no ball) 1 run, thrown it up in the air, top edge, caught, but doctrove has his left hand in the air. kumble has overstepped!
steyn to tiwary, 1 run, slower ball, checks the shot, nicely guides it for one to point
steyn to pollard, 1 run, lovely slower ball, comes through only after he has completed the shot, gets the single
khan to dravid, four runs, edged, he just threw everything at it, and there was no way this edge was going to hand, flies long way over slip
khan to dravid, no run, closer to the stumps, no room to swing the arms, and hit back to the bowler
malinga to dravid, four runs, another outside edge for four, stretches to play at this one, and the outside edge goes along the ground and wide of slip
khan to pietersen, four runs, shuffles across, gets inside the line, converts a middle-and-leg delivery into a wide one down the leg side, and glances it fine for four
khan to pietersen, 2 runs, looks to drive, gets the inside half of the bat, comes back for two before fine leg can come around
khan to pietersen, no run, gets the outside half of the bat as he drives, one bounce to point
malinga to pietersen, 2 runs, slower ball, 122ks gets the mis-hit, but he got enough on it to clear mid-off. only just

harbhajan singh to pietersen, 1 wide, out, and he has him stumped! sees his coming down, bowls it down the leg side, it turns across him, and even though rayudu doesn't make a clean collection, kp is too far down the pitch to make it back in time. he dives back, but in vain. mumbai crowd goes wild. it's actually good work from rayudu who is so far down the leg side he has to dive to flick the bails off
harbhajan singh to dravid, 1 wide, wide down the leg side, sharp turn. uthappa wants a bye but is sent back
pollard to uthappa, no run, slower ball, and pollard dives across the pitch, saves one, gets the crowd involved

pollard to uthappa, out, slower ball, huge wicket! pollard can do no wrong tonight! it's the slower ball, and he ends up dragging it much squarer than he would have wanted to hit, and dhawan completes the pressure catch at deep square leg
pollard to taylor, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
pollard to taylor, 1 run, bunted to point for one, nayar puts in the one-handed pick-up-and-throw but misses the stumps
fernando to kohli, no run, looks to runs this down to third man for one, finds point
fernando to kohli, four runs, inside edged, four, not fair for the bowler. looks to whip it from outside off, and ends up placing it perfectly
fernando to kohli, 2 runs, played with soft hands towards deep midwicket, and they come back for two
pollard to kohli, no run, slower ball, has to check the big shot, can't get the bunt past pollard

pollard to kohli, out, edged and taken! pollard is all over bangalore! and kohli is not walking. umpires consult with the third umpire, and the replays show it was caught about a foot off the ground. it was a slower ball that he looked to run to third man, but the pace variation did him in
pollard to pandey, 1 run, flicked away to deep midwicket for one
harbhajan singh to pandey, 1 wide, fired down the leg side, wide
pollard to taylor, 1 run, slower ball, placed into the leg side for one
malinga to taylor, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
khan to vinay kumar, 1 run, leading edge for one to point
malinga to taylor, 1 run, makes room to hit, but he doesn't get all of it, only a single
fernando to steyn, no run, slower ball, heaves and misses
fernando to steyn, no run, split-finger slower ball, too good for steyn, misses
symonds to vijay, 1 wide, symonds bowling seam-up, starts with a delivery down the leg-side
symonds to vijay, 1 run, first runs of the game come when vijay flicks the ball down to fine leg
symonds to hayden, no run, dropped, rp grasses a sitter, hayden smashes it straight to extra cover, reaches  rp at throat height, doesn't have to move at all, in and out, hayden survives
symonds to hayden, no run, blocked back towards the bowler

harris to hayden, no run, dropped again, this time it is sumanth, hayden closes the face too soon, gets an outside edge towards gully, straight at  the fielder who again makes a hash of things by trying to take a shoulder high catch with his fingers pointing up
harris to hayden, 1 wide, way outside the off stump, harris will have to re-bowl that one
singh to vijay, no run, angling across the batsman, well outside off, vijay swipes at that one but misses
harris to raina, 1 run, yet another drop, suman drops an overhead catch at gully, another sitter, raina gets the leading edge as he looks to flick the  ball, goes through his fingers
harris to badrinath, no run, defended towards midwicket, can't beat the fielder
symonds to badrinath, 1 leg bye, and again badtrinath can't get bat on ball, loud appeal but again the ball would have gone over
symonds to dhoni, 2 byes, what an over this is from symonds, this time dhoni gets a streaky inside-edge as the ball jags in a touch from outside off, beats the keeper
singh to dhoni, 1 run, moves nimbly across the stumps and work the legstump delivery down to fine leg for a single
ojha to dhoni, 2 runs, sliding onto legstump, whipped off the backfoot towards fine leg
harmeet singh to badrinath, no run, well outside off, badrinath looks to crash that through covers, no contact
harmeet singh to badrinath, 1 run, badri is in far more control this time, glides it down to third man for a single

ojha to dhoni, no run, total confusion between the batsmen after dhoni jabs the ball towards symonds at cover, badrinath had to scramble back and put the dive in to beat the direct hit from symonds, dhoni tooks a couple of paces before yelling 'nooo'
ojha to dhoni, 1 run, played with soft hands towards square leg
singh to dhoni, 1 run, a bit of width, dhoni slaps it towards deep point for a single
symonds to badrinath, 1 run, played uppishly towards midwicket, wide of the fielder there
ojha to morkel, 1 run, speared in by ojha, morkel dabs it towards backward point, misfield gifts him a single
ojha to morkel, 2 runs, morkel shows he's not all about muscling the ball, dinks it past the keeper for a couple down to third man
symonds to anirudha, 1 run,
symonds to badrinath, no run, mistimes the ball back towards the bowler
harris to anirudha, 1 run, just another single, chennai need more than that, driven along the ground towards mid-on for one more
harmeet singh to anirudha, no run, defended back towards the bowler
singh to ashwin, 1 run, driven down to long-off for a single
ashwin to gilchrist, no run, fired in by ashwin from round the stumps, awkwardly blocked by gilchrist
ashwin to gilchrist, no run, defended towards midwicket
ashwin to gilchrist, no run, 'wait' is the call after he tucks it towards midwicket
ashwin to gilchrist, no run, goes for the big swing, gets a faint inside-edge onto his body, muted appeal for lbw
ashwin to gilchrist, 1 run, gets off the mark by pushing the ball towards point, good start for chennai this
bollinger to gilchrist, no run, defended off the backfoot towards mid-on
bollinger to gilchrist, no run, gilchrist looks to swing to midwicket again, but misses and is struck on his body
bollinger to gibbs, no run, pushed towards mid-on this time, no run
ashwin to gilchrist, no run, speared into legstump, gilchrist digs it out back towards the bowler
ashwin to gilchrist, six runs, deccan breathe easy, gilchrist steps out and hits it over the bowler for six, nice timing on that, not much power behind the shot
ashwin to gilchrist, no run, defended back towards the bowler off the backfoot
ashwin to gibbs, no run, gibbs misses that by a long way, ashwin fires it into the legstump, gibbs down the track trying to loft but is hit on the body
ashwin to gibbs, no run, defended back towards the bowler
ashwin to gibbs, no run, gibbs' struggle continues, he gets a thick outside edge towards point
bollinger to suman, out, and another wicket gone, chennai are delighted, suman makes room and looks to crunch the ball past cover but raina takes a smart catch to reduce deccan to 23 for 2
muralitharan to sharma, 1 run, defended towards midwicket by rohit
morkel to symonds, 1 run, on middle stump, deftly tucked towards midwicket by symonds
muralitharan to gibbs, 2 runs, guided past hayden at gully, get back for the second
muralitharan to gibbs, no run, on middle and leg, absolutely no room on offer from murali, defended to the off side
muralitharan to gibbs, no run, swept to leg slip, on the bounce, badrinath fields
morkel to mishra, no run, defended back towards the bowler, dot-ball count increases
jakati to sumanth, 1 wide, down the leg side, dhoni whips off the bails, umpire says not out
jakati to symonds, no run,
muralitharan to symonds, no run, blocked back towards the bowler
muralitharan to symonds, 1 run, turned towards midwicket for a single
jakati to symonds, four runs, symonds knows there's a need to get a move on, he charges out of the track and hammers the ball straight down the track
jakati to symonds, 5 wides, again down the leg side, beats the batsman and keeper this time, he's been bowling over the stumps
jakati to symonds, 2 runs, symonds gets the ball towards backward point this time
jakati to symonds, 1 run, all along the ground to mid-on for a single
ashwin to symonds, out, that's probably the end of the road for deccan, fired in by ashwin, symonds looks to clear midwicket but can only find vijay there
ashwin to harris, no run, defended back to the bowler
ashwin to harris, 1 run, swung to backward square leg by harris
ashwin to sumanth, no run, big appeal for lbw but that was sliding down leg, ashwin completes a superb spell, 4-0-14-1
jakati to harris, 2 runs, harris backs away and slaps that one towards cover
jakati to harris, four runs, and another swipe to midwicket for four, muscular hit that one, vijay dives near the rope in vain
jakati to harris, 1 run, slashed away to backward point, only a single this time
jakati to sumanth, no run, charges down the track and can only block it towards the bowler
bollinger to harris, out, chennai move closer to victory, harris charges down the track and looks to blast the ball over long-off, can't clear vijay there, who takes a nonchalant catch in the deep
muralitharan to harmeet singh, out, deccan collapsing here, chennai set to make their second final, the quick delivery that turns in just a touch, pitching on off, hitting on middle, bye bye harmeet
muralitharan to ojha, no run, defended towards the off side, murali rushes across to field
muralitharan to ojha, 1 run, tips the ball just over the head of the bowler, ojha gets a single
muralitharan to singh, no run, straighter one from murali, defended back to the bowler
muralitharan to singh, no run, the doosra, rp can only hit it back to the bowler
kumar to anirudh singh, no run,

kumar to smith, no run, appeal for obstructing the field: slower one again, pushes it back to the bowler and rushes for a single, the non-striker sends him back in time, praveen tries to collect and throw it back onto the stumps at smith's end but collides with smith who turns to make it back to the crease, praveen appears to have hurt his waist, uthappa appealed but there was no response from the umpire, difficult to determine whether the collision was intentional

kumble to smith, out, bowled'im! bowled from slightly wide of the crease, that was the slider, smith played outside the line to that one, it slid in to beat him through the gate and crash into the stumps
doshi to venugopal rao, no run, lovely delivery, beats him again, much flatter and got it to spit away to just escape the outside edge, nice stuff from the son of dilip
kumble to venugopal rao, 1 run,
doshi to venugopal rao, 1 run, flatter, spinning away, eased it towards cover for a single
doshi to anirudh singh, 1 wide, down the leg side for the left-hander and spins away further, given a wide
doshi to anirudh singh, 1 run, bowled flat, swept towards deep square leg for a single
doshi to harris, 1 run, pushed in the direction of cover for a single
harris to kallis, no run, trying to get him to drive at that one but he doesn't, moves away after pitching and he shoulders arms
ojha to dravid, 1 run, pushed through with a bit of a reach towards long-off for a single
harris to kallis, no run, targeting middle and leg, that was bowled at 137.1 kmph, defended back towards the bowler
ojha to kallis, no run,
ojha to kallis, no run, defended in the direction of silly point
ojha to dravid, 1 run, swept towards deep square leg for a single
symonds to dravid, no run,
symonds to dravid, no run, appeared to stop on him a little there, checked his shot and played it back on the pitch
symonds to dravid, 1 run, guides it down towards third man for a single
symonds to pietersen, 2 runs, pushed through midwicket for a couple of runs
ojha to pietersen, no run, drifting in on middle, pushed towards square leg
ojha to dravid, 1 run, comes down the track and chips it towards long-off for a single
harbhajan singh to hayden, no run, guarded hayden there, waits for it to angle in and then turn away, shoulders arms
malinga to hayden, 1 run, pushed gently towards mid-off for a single
malinga to hayden, no run, appeared to nip in just a hint, gets a fraction outside off and punches it towards extra cover, there wasn't a run there and he was sent back wisely

harbhajan singh to hayden, no run, appeal for lbw, went on straight, was quicker through the air, hayden played for the turn, missed and was struck in line, that was out as the replays indicated, koertzen thought that was missing leg, hayden's lucky

harbhajan singh to hayden, no run, another appeal for lbw, hayden's playing for the spin and consistently missing the straighter ones, he as struck in line again but this one was going over the stumps, what a contest
harbhajan singh to hayden, no run, fired it hard just outside leg stump, hayden, looking to leave it, was struck on the leg, an excellent over from harbhajan
malinga to hayden, four runs, that's four, perfects the shot on the second attempt, almost identical delivery and he cracks it fiercely through cover and point to the boundary
fernando to hayden, no run, another slower one, bowled at 123.2 kmph, holds its line this time and hayden shoulders arms
pollard to raina, 1 run, bowls it at his ribs, turned into the leg side towards midwicket for a single
pollard to hayden, 1 run,
pollard to badrinath, 1 run, chases him as he makes room this time, flicks it away towards fine leg for a single
pollard to dhoni, six runs, an audacious shot! slower ball, he picked it, came down the track and shovels it with one hand over deep midwicket, came off the meat and landed into the stands
malinga to raina, 3 runs, slower one on middle and leg, tries to clear midwicket, doesn't quite get hold of it but manages to steal three runs
khan to raina, 1 wide, down the leg side, tries to glance it fine, can't connect but it's a wide
pollard to raina, six runs, that should hurt, really hurt, raina is latching on to these chances, makes room and smacks him clean over deep extra cover for another six
fernando to raina, 1 wide, slower one bowled down the leg side, given a wide
harbhajan singh to raina, no run, fires it wide outside off, raina had made room and left it alone expecting a wide but that wasn't given

malinga to anirudha, 5 wides, and that spoils it, anirudha moved well across and malinga bowled it wider, the batsman didn't get a touch and rayudu had moved well towards the leg side, couldn't collect it, and went to the boundary, five wides that
ashwin to dhawan, no run, are we going to start with a maiden? pushed back to the bowler again
ashwin to dhawan, no run, that's a maiden, on middle and leg, dhawan flicks it to midwicket
bollinger to nayar, 1 run, nayar gets an inside edge towards midwicket, tendulkar would have been a goner if anirudha had hit directly, he misses though
ashwin to tendulkar, 1 wide, anticipating that tendulkar will move to the leg side, fires it down leg
ashwin to tendulkar, no run, blocked towards square leg
bollinger to tendulkar, no run, defended by tendulkar towards point, superb start from chennai here
ashwin to nayar, no run, on middle and leg, defended to the left of the bowler
morkel to tendulkar, 1 wide, starts with one down the leg side
morkel to tendulkar, four runs, another beauty from tendulkar, takes a couple of paces down the track, opens the face as he drives past extra cover for four more
muralitharan to tendulkar, no run,
muralitharan to tendulkar, no run, defended back a touch uppishly towards the bowler

muralitharan to nayar, no run, hayden's horror match continues, he drops a catch at slip, gets a leading edge from nayar as the batsman looks to turn to leg, flies low to hayden who grabs at it but the ball hits him on the wrist
morkel to tendulkar, no run,
morkel to tendulkar, 1 run, makes room and dabs the ball toward third man for a single
muralitharan to nayar, 1 run, swept away to midwicket for a single
muralitharan to nayar, no run, turns in after pitching outside leg, nayar defends it towards the bowler
jakati to nayar, six runs, and another one, not as clean a hit as the previous one, much straighter this time, just a couple of yards beyond the rope
muralitharan to tendulkar, 1 bye, tendulkar bends and tries to push the ball from the stumps towards third man, he misses as does dhoni
muralitharan to nayar, 1 run,
muralitharan to tendulkar, four runs, tendulkar powers that from outside off to midwicket, bollinger races across to his right but can't stop that one at the boundary
raina to nayar, no run, a quicker one from raina, comes into nayar, who can only swish it towards point

raina to nayar, out, after missing many run-out chances, chennai get one, nayar plays towards square leg and sets off, sent back by tendulkar, dhoni has plenty of time to take aim to throw down the stumps, tendulkar hits the ground with his bat in disguts
jakati to tendulkar, 1 run, makes room and plays it to long-off with a flat bat, in the air for a while but reaches the fielder on the bounce
jakati to rayudu, 1 run, swept to deep backward square leg for a single
raina to tendulkar, 1 wide, wide down the leg side

raina to tendulkar, 1 wide, again down the leg side, was that out? dhoni appeals confidently after collecting the ball, big noise as the ball passed bat, chennai are obviously unhappy, great take from dhoni
raina to tendulkar, no run,
raina to rayudu, four runs, inside-out drive past long-off for four this time
jakati to tendulkar, out, tendulkar's gone, he's caught at long-off, he just chipped the ball, hardly any power behind the shot, carries to vijay who is just inside the rope, chennai rejoice
jakati to tiwary, no run, defended back to the bowler
jakati to rayudu, 1 run, swiped towards midwicket, two bounces to the fielder
ashwin to rayudu, 1 wide, down the leg side, a free run for mumbai
ashwin to duminy, no run, defended back towards the bowler
ashwin to duminy, 1 run, outside edge towards cover
ashwin to duminy, 2 runs, inside-edged towards backward square leg by duminy
ashwin to duminy, 2 runs, swung away towards deep midwicket, raina comes across to field
muralitharan to rayudu, 2 runs, just outside off, flicked towards square leg, tight single taken
muralitharan to rayudu, 1 run,
muralitharan to duminy, no run,
muralitharan to duminy, 1 run, pushed through towards long--off for a single
bollinger to khan, no run, angling across the batsman, looks to swing it to midwicket, misses
bollinger to khan, no run, another delivery across the batsman, bottom-edged,reaches the keeper on the bounce
iqbal abdulla to anirudha, 1 run, speared in on the toes, anirudha digs it out to mid on for a tight single
pathan to anirudha, no run, flat delivery on middle, anirudha punches back to the bowler.
pathan to anirudha, 2 wides, pathan slides this well down the leg side, and they get an extra run.
balaji to raina, no run, angles across from over the wicket, raina stays in the crease and steers into the off side
balaji to raina, no run, aha, raina backed away too far as he jumped out and balaji smartly kept it well outside off. no wide, though raina could not reach it.
balaji to raina, no run, this was closer to being a wide, raina stayed on leg stump and leant out. but he let it go as it was well outside off.
kallis to raina, no run, raina looks to get inside the line and flick, but misses. it goes over leg stump.
ladda to raina, no run, faster on middle and off, played with a straight ball to the leg side.
ladda to raina, 1 run, over-pitched on leg stump, raina drives fluidly past mid on for a single
bhatia to anirudha, 1 run, over-pitched and angling in, anirudha whips it off the toes for a single
bhatia to anirudha, 1 run, another slower ball, ends a good over from bhatia. anirudha was days early into the shot as he chipped it uppishly over mid on for a single
bhatia to raina, 1 run, over-pitched on midwicket, raina whips viciously through midwicket for one more

pathan to anirudha, 1 run, morgan's dropped one now. kolkata can't catch a cold at the moment, says robin jackman. anirudha jumps out and looks to loft over midwicket, and gets it out straight to morgan who shells it.

bhatia to anirudha, no run, bhatia has anirudha completely handcuffed with his slower balls. another one with no pace at all, on middle and anirudha looks to muscle it to the leg side but can't time it at all.
bhatia to anirudha, four runs, finally bhatia loses his line and pushes one down the leg side, anirudha is relieved as he helps it along to fine leg
bhatia to dhoni, 1 run, another slow delivery on middle and leg, dhoni pushes wide of midwicket for a single.
ladda to dhoni, 1 run, dhoni keeps strike with another single, square driving with the spin
ladda to dhoni, no run, flatter and wisely so, dhoni can't get it away.

balaji to morkel, 1 run, angled across, morkel looks to carve but gets an under edge to bisla on the bounce, diving away to his left. they run a mad single and bisla misses the under-arm flick. would have been out by half a pitch

morkel to kallis, four runs, poor ball, morkel angles too far down the leg side and kallis' natural shuffle across gets him well inside the line. he easily glances it down to fine leg for a four. these two south africans have produced 14 runs off the last 3 head-to-head balls.
southee to kallis, 1 run, gets inside the line and looks to whip, and this time he gets a single.
southee to bisla, no run, moves the ball to a line outside off and gets it to nudge in off the seam, bisla covers the line and defends to the off side
ashwin to kallis, 5 wides, big turn. too much for his own good. landed outside off, spun a mile and dhoni could not get his hands to it. five wides down the leg side
ashwin to bisla, no run, here comes the carom ball, lands on middle and nips away from bisla who can't get it away
ashwin to bisla, no run, another carom ball, too straight this time and bisla can't get the nudge away

southee to kallis, four runs, the format might change, but kallis' methods won't. lovely shot, threading the gap between point and cover with precision. southee gives him a sliver of width outside off and kallis square drives with authority .
southee to bisla, 1 run, the field is back on the off side, and there's another easy single to be had. bisla steers through point for a single.
ashwin to kallis, no run, carom ball, breaks away from outside off, kallis watches closely and defends
ashwin to kallis, no run, over-pitched on middle and leg, kallis plays it back down the track
ashwin to bisla, 1 run, bisla skips out again, ashwin follows him on leg stump and gets chipped airily through the leg side for one more

randiv to bisla, no run, missed stumping, what happened there? was that an arm ball? bisla did not pick it, charging out and past it. dhoni did not pouch it cleanly, seemed to bounce more than he expected.
randiv to kallis, 1 wide, randiv sends this turning well down the leg side and this time dhoni does well to collect.
jakati to bisla, no run, grip and turn from outside off, bisla jumps out and then adjusts for the spin and defends
jakati to kallis, 1 run, sharp spin again from wide of off stump, kallis drives with the spin through cover point for a single.
jakati to kallis, no run, sharp away spin, kallis leans out and defends with the spin
randiv to kallis, no run, arm ball, lands outside off and straightens past kallis who did not pick it as he pushed inside the line.
jakati to bisla, 2 runs, superb fielding from badri at long off. bisla runs out and looks to tee off straight and makes good contact, badri runs to his right, slides and saves a couple.
morkel to pathan, 1 run, another single, yusuf's not played a big shot yet.

morkel to kallis, four runs, top shot from kallis, he's manufactured a boundary with smart footwork. he jumps out and to the leg side, morkel keeps it straight but there is enough room for him to carve over the covers.

jakati to pathan, six runs, bosh, that's trademark yusuf. over-pitching ain't a good idea. jakati lands this in yusuf's half, and yusuf sends it to the other half of india. reaches out, gets under it and monsters it straight.
jakati to pathan, 1 run, this time he gets the single, steering past point for one
ashwin to pathan, 1 run, finally gets the single, working calmly with the spin to the leg side.
ashwin to kallis, no run, kallis looks to drive past cover, but can't get the gap this time.
randiv to kallis, 1 run, another arm ball, kallis again plays inside the line but gets an outside sdge away to the off side.
randiv to tiwary, 2 runs, lovely bowling, randiv bowls another drifter outside off, manoj stays back and steers towards point for a single.
jakati to kallis, 1 run, kallis forces one past the diving jakati and they get a single to mid on
jakati to tiwary, 1 run, tiwary scoots down the track yet again, but jakati gets extra grip and turn, forcing him to feel for it outside off. played away backward of point.
morkel to tiwary, 1 run, follows that up with a single, kkr are doing this easy for the moment.
morkel to tiwary, 1 wide, morkel's not turned up today with the ball. he lands this a mile outside off and it called a wide.
ashwin to tiwary, 1 run, offie on middle from ashwin, and turning in, easily tucked through square leg for a single.
ashwin to morgan, no run, huge turn from ashwin, angles in from wide of the crease round the wicket and it then zoots away past a confused morgan.
ashwin to morgan, no run, the carom ball this time, morgan did not pick this one either, but defended from the crease.

southee to shukla, four runs, they needed a boundary, and they've got one in fortuitous circumstances. tight delivery, following the batsman as he backs away and landing on leg stump, shukla has a swipe at it and gets an inside edge past fine leg,.

randiv to tiwary, out, ah well, this game is not done turning. dhoni gets another stumping. randiv holds his nerve for the last couple of balls and gets tiwary with an armer that broke past the outside edge after enticing him out of the crease. tiwary looked to close the face as he drove, it bounced extra but dhoni ad no problems collecting and breaking the stumps.

oram to dhawan, 5 runs, almost a run out first ball and instead we get overthrows! oh well. it was pushed to cover point, the batsman wanted it, the non-striker didn't and eventually he gets across. the throw from menaria is wide and it races away to the boundary
oram to jaggi, no run, high back lift but he is slightly late on the punchy shot and the ball rolls away to cover
oram to dhawan, no run, shikhar is more compact, gets behind the line of this to deflect to square-leg fielder
oram to jaggi, no run, pushes this to mid-on for a single
oram to jaggi, 1 run, he backs away and oram slips in a slower one. jaggi drags it to deep midwicket region
singh to jaggi, no run, gets back to punch this delivery to point
trivedi to chipli, four runs, chipli starts off with a lovely square drive through cover point.
trivedi to chipli, no run, in the channel outside off, chipli tries to heave it through the on side and misses
warne to chipli, 1 run, on the middle stump line, turned to midwicket

trivedi to chipli, 1 run, yet another slower one and almost a catch at mid-off. jaggi checked his shot- difficult from that high back lift of his- and he almost scooped it to mid-off. overthrows allow them to get a run
trivedi to jaggi, 1 run, moves outside leg and just goes for a whack. menaria intercepts at backward point
trivedi to duminy, 1 run, just outside off, steered to left of backward point
warne to duminy, 1 run, runs down the track and eases it to long-off
warne to jaggi, 1 run, gets back to tuck it around the corner, behind square-leg, for a single
botha to duminy, 1 run, on the middle and off line, turned to point
botha to jaggi, 1 run, goes down the track to hit to left of the bowler
botha to duminy, 1 run, topspinner on the middle and off, driven out to long-off
warne to duminy, no run, goes down the track to push it to cover
warne to duminy, no run, gets well back to nudge this one straightening on the off stump line to the leg side

warne to duminy, out, duminy has been having some trouble picking warne and he is gone now. he went down the track looking for the leg break. it didn't turn in much. and he ended up slicing it to the off side and long-off ran in to pouch that
trivedi to ravi teja, 1 run, gets back to punch it to the off side and they get across after some hesitation.
trivedi to ravi teja, 2 runs, fetches this from outside off and drags it to cow corner for couple of runs
menaria to ravi teja, no run, stays back to work it to warne at midwicket
botha to ravi teja, 1 run, slow off break on the off stump line, dabbed to the off for a single
singh to ravi teja, 1 run, slower one again, dragged across to deep midwicket
trivedi to steyn, no run, slower one outside off, stabbed to the off side of the pitch
trivedi to steyn, 1 run, runs this down to third man for a single
singh to mishra, 1 run, goes for the big lofted hit over the off side but is fooled by the slower one and edges to the leg side
singh to mishra, 1 run, mishits this slower one to extra cover for a single
steyn to paunikar, four runs, fab shot. it was a delivery curving away from him and amit went back to caress it superbly through covers. no violence. pure timing.
sharma to paunikar, 1 run, square driven to point where chipli fumbles
ojha to dravid, 1 run, gets back and outside leg and whips this arm-ball to deep midwicket
ojha to botha, 1 run, quicker one, on the middle and leg again,. pushed through wide midwicket for a run.
christian to botha, four runs, blasted! it was a slower one and botha picked it up this time and crashed it through extra cover
mishra to botha, no run, quickish leg break, botha hurries back to defend
ojha to botha, 1 run, slower, on the middle,. botha goes for a big lofted hit but that slower pace meant he ended up dragging it through midwicket
ojha to botha, 2 runs, goes down the track for a lofted hit over long-off and ends up slicing it to wide long-off region, clear of the fielder rushing in
ojha to botha, 1 run, moves down the track and hits this to long-off
mishra to dravid, 1 run, gets back to punch it to long-off for a single
christian to botha, 1 run, steers this to  point where duminy makes a diving stop
mishra to taylor, 1 run, goes for a similar shot but this was slower and outside off and he ends up dragging it past square-leg
mishra to botha, 1 run, gets back to work it though midwicket
steyn to botha, no run, around the off stump line, steered to duminy at backward point
steyn to botha, no run, the slower one, on the middle and off line, jabbed out to the off
steyn to botha, no run, stays back to push another slower one to backward point. what a fine over this was
ojha to botha, six runs, warnie stands up and applauds. botha rushed down the track and smashed this over the straight boundary. boom. bang.
harbhajan singh to warner, 1 run, driven towards mid-off for a single

harbhajan singh to sehwag, 2 runs, sehwag nearly continues his tradition of starting with boundaries, this seemed like a massive hit, except it went miles in the air after he came down the track and lofted it towards long-off, didn't have the distance and it lands a few yards within the rope
harbhajan singh to sehwag, six runs, sehwag! gets the distance this time, gives himself a bit of room and lofts the ball inside-out over long-off and it clears the ropes
malinga to finch, 1 wide, flings this one down the leg side
malinga to finch, 1 run, arrowing into finch's toes, batsman whips it towards deep backward square leg
malinga to sehwag, four runs, sehwag isn't all about brutal hitting, he shows his softer side as malinga sends down a slower ball, dabbed past a diving slip for four
murtaza to finch, no run, defended towards midwicket
murtaza to sehwag, no run, mistimes the ball towards mid-on
murtaza to sehwag, no run, a quicker ball, sehwag skips down the track and pushes the ball back to the bowler
murtaza to sehwag, 1 run, carved towards backward point where pollard is lurking
murtaza to finch, four runs, finch finds the boundary this time, gets a long stride in, makes a bit of room and crashes that one in the small gap at point
murtaza to ojha, no run,
patel to finch, 1 run, finch gives no respect to the world cup winner, looks to smash the first ball over the sightscreen, totally mistimed and it falls near mid-off
patel to ojha, no run, guides this one towards pollard at backward point
patel to ojha, no run, just outside off, poked towards point for a single that helps ojha keep the strike
harbhajan singh to ojha, no run, skates down the track and eases the ball towards cover
harbhajan singh to finch, no run, hit firmly back to the bowler
patel to venugopal rao, no run, on offstump this time, defended back to the bowler

pollard to venugopal rao, 1 run, oof, that was nearly out, the batsman was into his stroke early, it nearly lobs to mid-off, then there's plenty of confused running, and a direct hit would have resulted in another wicket
pollard to ojha, no run,
pollard to ojha, 1 run, stabs this one towards backward point, there's a direct hit as the batsman look to pinch a quick single, they make their ground though
patel to venugopal rao, 1 run, munaf responds with a slower ball, 118kmh, eases it to mid-on
pollard to venugopal rao, 1 run, pollard jags that one in, turns that one towards square leg
pollard to ojha, 1 run, a slower ball bowled from wide of the crease, jabbed towards the off side for a single
pollard to venugopal rao, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
pollard to venugopal rao, 1 run, on middle and leg, tucked towards square leg for a single
pollard to ojha, no run, outside off, drops the ball towards point with soft hands, no time for a single
franklin to ojha, 1 run, dabbed towards point for a single
murtaza to ojha, no run, another dot ball as ojha carves the ball straight to cover
murtaza to ojha, 1 run, dropped, ojha skips down the track and away from the stumps, and muscles the  ball to the left of the bowler, who tries to latch on to an overhead catch, but can't hang on
murtaza to ojha, 1 wide, missed stumping, fired way down the leg side, jacobs does well to collect, but can't balance himself and then take off the bails, ojha was a long way down the track
murtaza to ojha, 1 run, whipped towards midwicket, batsmen think of a second but after a lot of screaming decide to settle for a single
murtaza to ojha, out, that's the end of the partnership, murtaza breaks through, ojha skips beyond leg and launches the ball towards long-off where malinga accepts the catch
murtaza to venugopal rao, four runs, a boundary for rao, swept hard and in the air, it flies behind square leg for four, delhe need more of those to make a match of it
harbhajan singh to yadav, no run,
harbhajan singh to dinda, no run, gets a big stride in and blocks to the off side
dinda to jacobs, 1 run, mumbai and jacobs get off the mark as jacobs pushes the ball towards cover and sneaks a single, huge cheer from the crowd, not for jacobs' first run i can reliably inform you
morkel to rayudu, 1 wide, way down the leg side
morkel to tendulkar, 1 run, tendulkar hasn't looked at ease today, this ball surprises him with the bounce, more than he expects and the bottom had comes off as he defends outside off
dinda to tendulkar, 1 leg bye, a muted appeal for lbw, but that was going down leg and perhaps height was a concern as well, off tendulkar's pad towards square leg
morkel to rayudu, 1 run, a bit of width on offer, rayudu guides the ball to third man sensibly
morkel to tendulkar, 1 wide, speared down the leg side, not too far outside the legstump, but it's still a wide, tendulkar was moving across the stumps and looking to whip it away, no bat on it

morkel to tendulkar, 1 run, dropped, a very tough chance for sehwag, he leapt to his right earlier in the over, this time he has to fly to his left after tendulkar is squared up, sehwag gets a hand on it but can't hold on
pathan to tendulkar, 1 wide, not a great start, wide down the leg side
pathan to tendulkar, no run, that one keeps really low, the famous tendulkar crouch on display as he keeps that one out

pathan to rayudu, no run, hello! that straightened off the pitch and opened up rayudu, keeper is absolutely convinced there was an edge, irfan doesn't bother to appeal, except after he sees ojha pleading with umpire
pathan to rayudu, no run,
pathan to rayudu, 1 run, guides the ball to backward point for a single to end the over
yadav to rayudu, 1 run, on off stump, and once more the batsman shuffles across and tucks the ball to square leg
pathan to tendulkar, 1 run, on the middle stump, tucked towards midwicket

pathan to sharma, 1 leg bye, massive appeal for lbw, irfan is convinced, hawk-eye says that pitched on legstump and was going on to hit legstump, irfan is can't believe that was turned down, rohit survives
pathan to tendulkar, 1 run, tendulkar eases the ball towards cover to pick up an easy single
yadav to tendulkar, four runs, tendulkar continues to move across the stump for nearly every ball, this was slanting into him, tendulkar glances that fine for four, crafty shot that
yadav to tendulkar, no run, sachin wants the single after shuffling across and tapping the ball to cover, rohit was going nowhere, so tendulkar  turns back
yadav to sharma, 1 run, runs it down to third man for a single
van der merwe to sharma, no run, jabbed back to the bowler
van der merwe to sharma, no run, hit hard back to the bowler
morkel to tendulkar, no run, well outside off, tendulkar glides that one towards backward point, can't beat the fielder
morkel to sharma, 1 run, a lovely flick towards square leg from rohit sharma
morkel to tendulkar, no run, wide outside off, chopped to point by tendulkar
morkel to sharma, 1 run, rohit sharma stands tall and steer the ball towards third man after seeing the width provided
van der merwe to sharma, no run, rohit attempts a big hit towards the off side, mistimed towards the on side
morkel to sharma, four runs, rohit decides to change gears, he hammers morkel's first ball to deep midwicket for four, some sign on aggression from mumbai batting
morkel to sharma, four runs, and another boundary for rohit, a better shot this, no power just timing as he guides a slightly wide ball past point for four
morkel to sharma, 1 run, stands tall and guides the ball towards third man for a single
morkel to tendulkar, 1 wide, sprays it down the leg side
morkel to sharma, four runs, lovely shot to end the over, rohit sharma gets a big stride in and drives that along the ground past cover for four more, 15 off the over
van der merwe to sharma, 1 run, rohit stays back and pushes the ball towards cover
van der merwe to sharma, no run, three dot balls to end the over, defended towards cover by rohit
finch to sharma, no run, that was nearly bowled, rohit wanted to send that into the stands, but missed the flat and fast ball, which also missed the stumps
van der merwe to tendulkar, no run, tapped to the right of the bowler
van der merwe to tendulkar, no run, turned to midwicket, tendulkar stops after taking a couple of paces, rohit has to scramble back
van der merwe to tendulkar, 2 runs, places this wide of the midwicket to pick up a couple
van der merwe to tendulkar, no run, watchful defence to end van der merwe's spell
finch to tendulkar, no run, defended towards the off side by tendulkar
finch to tendulkar, no run, defended by tendulkar towards the bowler
pathan to tendulkar, no run,
steyn to kallis, no run, this one did not get up much, steyn stares at the pitch, it moved away outside off and was left alone
steyn to kallis, no run, steyn gets some lift this time, put in a lot of effort on this one, and got it to get big on kallis who hopped on his toes, and brought it down
sharma to bisla, four runs, gets this one to straighten and bounce outside off, bisla pushes with an angled bat, and the thick edge beats the slip cordon and runs in to the third man boundary
sharma to kallis, no run, it is the second over, and the ball is already not rising more than a foot, fortunately for kallis it was also a foot outside off, else he was in trouble

sharma to kallis, four runs, another one keeps a bit low outside off, this time kallis adjusts brilliantly, letting ti come on, standing in the crease and pushing it in to the gap at covers at the last instant
steyn to kallis, 1 run, kallis gets off strike with a quick single to point
steyn to bisla, no run, again bisla backs away, and throws his bat at one that steyn bowls outside off, misses by a mile
sharma to kallis, no run, shuffles outside off stump, and looks to turn this one through midwicket, but only gets it as far as mid on
sharma to kallis, four runs, this time he gets it past mid on, moves around in the crease and whips it away, mid on runs to his right and puts in the dive, but the ball beats him
sharma to kallis, 1 run, kallis rocks back in the crease, this one is not far from off stump, but he slashes it with lovely timing, and it flies to third man
christian to bisla, 1 run, backs away and looks to carve this one through covers, gets too far from the ball and gets it off the bottom edge in to the off side
christian to bisla, 1 bye, good slower one, follows the batsman as he comes down the track, he misses, the keeper fails to collect on the bounce as well
ojha to kallis, no run, this one goes straight on, the inside edge on to pad saves him as he stabs at it
ojha to kallis, 2 runs, this is a better approach, goes outside leg and slams it with the turn wide of long off
duminy to gambhir, 1 run, not much turn, but right on the stumps and whipped away to deep midwicket
duminy to tiwary, no run, comes down the track and duminy fires it wide of off stump, he pushes it away on the leg side

duminy to tiwary, no run, eep, manoj gets himself in to a big tangle, it was darted in around off, he went back to dab it fine, but got it off the inner half near the stumps, and then overbalanced and went down on the ground
christian to tiwary, no run, another slower one, he backs away yet again, but cannot connect this time
christian to tiwary, 1 run, driven back to the bowler, who cannot field cleanly and concedes the run
christian to gambhir, four runs, poor delivery and gautam capitalises, shuffles across and turns it wide of the man on the fine leg boundary
duminy to tiwary, no run, this one is angled straight across the batsman who misses as he pushes at it
ojha to gambhir, four runs, neat work from gautam, this one bounced extra and went straight on with the arm, but gautam waited beside the line and dabbed it very fine on the off side
ojha to gambhir, 1 wide, turns down the leg side and that is a wide
ojha to tiwary, no run, manoj makes room outside leg and looks to run this one fine on the off side but misses as it bounces extra
mishra to gambhir, no run, another one keeps low, turns in and he hits it away towards extra cover

mishra to gambhir, out, gautam goes this time, backs away and comes down the track for that lofted shot over the off side infield, but misses and the ball hits the middle stump, looked to be the one that slides straight on
mishra to pathan, no run, and looks to bash his first ball out of sight, has a big swing from the crease, but it turns away and he misses
steyn to tiwary, 1 run, makes room and looks to loft this one over mid off, goes to that man on the bounce
steyn to pathan, no run, stands in the crease and drives from the crease, on the bounce to extra cover
iqbal abdulla to jaggi, no run, turning away, he goes back and plays it away to extra cover

iqbal abdulla to jaggi, no run, uh oh, jaggi wants the run, dhawan doesn't, it was pushed in the air towards mid on, abdulla went charging after it and fired in the throw to the keeper, jaggi rushed back from halfway down the pitch, and the desperate dive seems to have saves him in the end, just saved him, as replays show
balaji to dhawan, no run, looks to smash this one over midwicket, swivels and has a swing, but does not connect
balaji to dhawan, 1 run, has a huge heave at this one but gets an inside edge towards square leg, they take on abdulla again with the run, he misses the throw at the striker;s end
pathan to chipli, no run, tight stuff from yk, turned away to midwicket
unadkat to chipli, 1 run, dropped slanted across the right-hander who slaps it in the air to the left of extra cover, who dives but fails to hold on, it is gautam
unadkat to chipli, 1 run, hit away wide of extra cover, and this time the single is taken
pathan to sangakkara, no run, angled in around off and straightening, played back to the bowler
bhatia to sangakkara, no run, driven back to bhatia who shows off his football skills, stops the ball with his boot, it loops up and settles in his hands
pathan to duminy, 1 run, shuffles and whips this one to midwicket to get off the mark
ten doeschate to chipli, 1 wide, angled wide down the leg side from over the stumps
ten doeschate to duminy, 1 run, widish outside off stump, driven to long off
bhatia to chipli, four runs, poor delivery, angled down the leg side, chipli stays in the crease and shovels it fine for a boundary
bhatia to chipli, 1 leg bye, desperate appeal for lbw, but that struck him outside the line of off
iqbal abdulla to duminy, out, duminy charges down the track and swings a flatter one straight to jacques kallis at deep midwicket to sink deccan further in to trouble
bhatia to christian, 1 run, straightens and keep very low on middle, he adjusts well to turn it away through square leg
balaji to christian, six runs, swung away for six over deep midwicket, just stood still and smashed it over the boundary

unadkat to ravi teja, out, would you believe it, it is jacques kallis, there is no getting away for him, teja went down on a knee for the big heave-ho over midwicket, got it off the high part of the blade, the ball hung in the sky for ages before coming down in to the safe hands of kallis at deep midwicket, fourth catch for him today
unadkat to steyn, no run, 117 kph delivery slanted across the batsman who looks to swing it away again but misses it completely
unadkat to mishra, 1 wide, one more slower one outside off stump, but it is called a wide this time
tait to warner, 1 run, pacy one, at the rib cage, warner hops, takes the bottom-hand off the handle and jabs it to backward square-leg

tait to finch, no run, spicy hot! in the zone outside off, holding its line, and the batsman hops into trouble. it was quite pacy and he ended up stabbing late. the ball went through the bat and pad gap and flew over the off stump. the speed gun says 157.3 kmph. be afraid. very afraid!
singh to warner, no run, stays back to push it to point fielder
singh to finch, 1 wide, walks down the t rack and across the stumps. the bowler pushes it down the leg side
singh to finch, no run, gets across to defend this to the off side

botha to warner, 3 runs, gets back to punch this one and it looked like just a tame single but it was timed so well that mid-on fielder couldn't reach it despite a dive and deep midwicket charged across to make a diving save
botha to finch, no run, around the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
botha to finch, no run, goes down the track and jabbed it back to the bowler
trivedi to finch, 1 wide, goes for the slower one but slips it down the leg side
trivedi to warner, no run, the slower ones keep coming; warner punches this to cover
singh to chand, no run, gets back and across but mistimes the punchy shot to point
trivedi to chand, 1 run, that slower one again, on the middle, turned past square-leg

warne to venugopal rao, no run, another one? big appeal for catch by the keeper. it was a lovely leg break. stunning delivery. it drifted in towards the leg stump, gripped, and spun sharply past the defensive poke. no edge.
warne to venugopal rao, no run, slower, on the off stump line, defended to the off
botha to warner, no run, just outside off stump, pushed out to cover
botha to warner, 1 run, quicker one, on the off, chopped to backward point
botha to venugopal rao, no run, turns in from outside off, pushed back to the bowler
botha to warner, 1 run, gets back to clip this from the middle stump line through midwicket
warne to warner, no run, sharp lovely leg break from outside off. warner reacts as it its a time bomb and prods so nervously at it. inside edge on to his body
botha to venugopal rao, no run, turns in from outside off, pushed to straightish midwicket
botha to venugopal rao, 1 run, around the off stump line, eased through the on side for a single
warne to venugopal rao, no run, the skidder on the off stump line, jabbed away to the off
warne to venugopal rao, no run, slower, leg break on the off stump line, defended to the off
trivedi to warner, no run, a flat-batted whack but straight to mid-off
trivedi to warner, 1 run, moves away to the leg and pushes it to left of mid-off for a single
botha to warner, 1 run, pushes this away for a single
botha to warner, no run, quicker, just outside leg, warner stabs at it and it runs off the edge to the off
botha to venugopal rao, six runs, venu sashays down the track and swings this from around off to the midwicket boundary. up up and over.
warne to warner, no run, pushes this one well outside off and warner lunges out for the drive but plays so away from the body that he edges it to his body
singh to venugopal rao, no run, more slower ones. more mishits. venu inside edges this along the ground to the keeper
trivedi to pathan, no run, rajasthan have tait. then they have a slew of slower-ball specialists. this one too is a slower one and goes past the attempted heave
trivedi to venugopal rao, six runs, 50 for venu supah knock this. and super shot this. he read the slower one and swung it over long-off
trivedi to venugopal rao, 1 wide, this slower one slips down the leg side for a wide

trivedi to venugopal rao, 2 runs, super blow and neat stop from taylor. it was swung away in style to left of deep midwicket where taylor charged across, lunged out and put his left hand out to push the ball back into field of play
tait to pathan, four runs, swing and an edge. the ball flies through vacant slips and runs down to third man boundary
dinda to paunikar, (no ball) 1 run, swinging away from the off stump line, edged through to thirdman. huge no ball, though. free hit coming up for rahul, who takes his guard
dinda to dravid, 1 no ball, wayward delivery well outside off. very wide but its a no ball first.
morkel to dravid, 4 leg byes, drifts to the pad and rahul tries the leg glance, misses, but will collect 4 leg byes
morkel to dravid, no run, well outside off stump and rahul shoulders arms
pathan to dravid, 1 wide, wide outside off stump, the ump extends his arms
pathan to dravid, no run, stays back to punch this to mid-off
pathan to dravid, four runs, and the late steer to third man now. he jumped back to ride the bounce, opened the bat face and steered it deliberately
pathan to dravid, no run, gets behind the line to nudge this to the on side
morkel to botha, no run, in the channel outside off stump, botha shoulders arms
morkel to botha, no run, stays back to dab this to point, looks for a single but retreats
van der merwe to dravid, 1 run, gets back again and punches this wide of mid-off for a single
nadeem to dravid, no run, turn there! and it surprises rahul who just about withdraws his bat away from the line. nothing alarming turn, mind you
nadeem to dravid, no run, presses back to punch it but mistimes it to extra cover

van der merwe to dravid, 2 runs, dropped by chand at extra cover. rahul got a leading edge on that, trying to work it to the on side and it lobbed over chand who ran back and dived but couldn't hold on
van der merwe to dravid, out, it drifted in towards middle stump, rahul backed away outside leg but it turned and that got rahul thinking, doubting and he perished, trying to stab it. edge and gone.
van der merwe to menaria, 1 run, dabs this to square-leg and after some hesitation he gets across just in time
nadeem to menaria, 1 run, on the off stump line, steered to backward point
nadeem to menaria, no run, gets back to push this to cover
nadeem to menaria, no run, quicker, pushed to midwicket
van der merwe to menaria, six runs, murderous hit! he went down on his knee and has absolutely tonked this over midwicket boundary.
van der merwe to botha, 2 runs, slower, on the middle, turned through backward square-leg for two runs

pathan to menaria, six runs, bye bye! six more! irfan tries a slower one but ashok has not only picked it but has played a fierce pick-up shot, a thumping flick, and it just about gets over the jumping fielder at deep square-leg
pathan to menaria, no run, backs away outside leg, irfan pushes it outside off and he ends up mistiming it back to the bowler.
dinda to rahane, 1 run, slower one well outside off, chopped out to point
pathan to rahane, 1 run, the slower ones keep coming thick and fast, this one has been edged towards first slip, the keeper gets across to stop it
van der merwe to rahane, 1 run, gets back to nurdle this behind square-leg
van der merwe to botha, 1 run, gets back to steer this to deep point
van der merwe to rahane, four runs, good delivery, bit of air, bit of spin and it gets a hesitant prod from the batsman. and also the edge but no slip and it runs away
van der merwe to botha, 1 run, around the off stump line, pushed out to cover point
nadeem to rahane, no run, slower, outside off, pushed out awkwardly to extra cover
nadeem to rahane, 1 run, taps this to left of that fielder in extra cover for a single
nadeem to rahane, 1 run, quicker, pushed through to deep cover
nadeem to taylor, 1 run, on the middle, pushed through mid-on
morkel to botha, 1 run, pushes this to left of van der merwe at cover for a single
malinga to kohli, 1 run, no maiden for malinga, kolhi eases the ball towards mid-on and sprints through for a single
patel to kohli, no run, just a bit of width, kohli opens the face and steers the ball towards backward point
malinga to kohli, no run, pushed towards mid-on by kohli
patel to dilshan, 1 run, angled in from munaf, tucked towards midwicket by dilshan
patel to kohli, no run, kohli looks to whip that towards square leg but doesn't get bat on it
patel to dilshan, no run, munaf remains accurate, defended by dilshan, another dot ball by munaf
pollard to dilshan, 1 run, on middle and leg, pushed towards midwicket for a single
murtaza to dilshan, 1 run, ali murtaza's first ball is first, dilshan looks to muscle it through covers, the timing is terrible
murtaza to dilshan, 1 run, driven along the ground towards long-off for a single
murtaza to de villiers, no run, this one comes in to the batsman, de villiers defends after getting well back in the crease
murtaza to de villiers, 1 run, pushed towards extra cover, and a single is pinched
pollard to dilshan, no run, dilshan looks for his favourite shot, the carve through cover, but can't beat the fielder
pollard to dilshan, 1 run, tucks this towards the midwicket for a single
harbhajan singh to dilshan, no run, angling into middle stump, defended towards midwicket

franklin to dilshan, 1 run, ooh, bangalore survive a couple of close calls, first dilshan looks to drive through the off, he gets an inside edge that bounces to midwicket, where tendulkar fires the ball to the keeper, de villiers had to dive to make his ground, a direct hit would have made it interesting, it was still interesting as de villiers' bat was in the air after he dived, his gloves just about pass the crease before the bails are removed
franklin to de villiers, four runs, rubbish ball down the leg side,thanks says de villiers as he helps it down to fine leg for four
murtaza to dilshan, 1 run, bit of width again, slapped square for a single
murtaza to dilshan, 1 run, dilshan stays beside the line and looks to thwack it past cover, again can't get it past the fielder
patel to dilshan, 1 run, munaf returns, dilshan looks to slash the first ball through cover, edged down to third man
patel to dilshan, 1 run, stabbed towards backward point for a single, and munaf completes another tidy over
harbhajan singh to dilshan, 1 wide, harbhajan speared it down way down the leg side

murtaza to de villiers, 4 byes, the arm-ball from murtaza, de villiers doesn't read it, he was looking to smash it over midwicket, he misses, the ball misses the legstump, and the keeper also misses it, four byes
pollard to dilshan, no run, dilshan makes some room and looks to work it through the off side, he can't connect

pollard to de villiers, out, pollard has struck, de villiers attempts to smash the ball towards midwicket, like kohli he too gets an edge, the ball loops towards the bowler, who takes an overhead catch
harbhajan singh to tiwary, four runs, tiwary mows that one over midwicket, harbhajan from round the wicket, aesthetics isn't something tiwary cares about, ugly but effective batting
malinga to tiwary, 1 wide, this time tiwary stands his ground, malinga perhaps expects him to back away and bowls a wide down leg
malinga to dilshan, 1 run, dilshan gets this one away to third man for another single
khan to jacobs, no run, jacobs is down the track first ball, takes a couple of paces to push the ball towards mid-off
khan to jacobs, 1 wide, big wide that, pitches outside leg and moves further away, de villiers flies across to stop that
khan to jacobs, no run,
khan to jacobs, no run, tucked him up from round the wicket, looked to work it to the leg side but can't get it away, zaheer gives jacobs a stare
vettori to tendulkar, 1 run, pushed towards mid-off for a single
vettori to jacobs, 1 run, on legstump, whipped towards deep midwicket for a single
khan to tendulkar, no run, angling across the batsman, tendulkar was looking to leave that and the ball hits the top of the handle, and drops at his feet
vettori to jacobs, 1 run, a wristy flick towards deep midwicket
vettori to tendulkar, no run, jabbed towards point by tendulkar
vettori to tendulkar, no run, tendulkar makes room but mistimes his drive towards cover
mithun to tendulkar, no run, angled into the batsman, defended back down the track
mithun to tendulkar, 1 run, shuffles across the stumps and whips the ball towards deep midwicket for a single
mithun to rayudu, 1 run, opens the face to steer the ball towards third man and get off the mark
mithun to tendulkar, no run, tendulkar plays it with soft hands towards backward point, he sets off for a single but then decides against it
mithun to tendulkar, 1 run, great stop from mayank agarwal at deep backward square leg, superb shot from tendulkar before that, jumps across the stumps and whips the ball from outside off
kohli to tendulkar, 1 run, kohli's first ball is driven back towards the bowler
kohli to rayudu, no run, outside off, and batsman can't connect, good start from kohli
mithun to rayudu, four runs, rayudu is attacking mithun here, he comes down the track and crashes it past extra cover for four
mithun to tendulkar, 1 run, a deft push towards deep point for a single to tendulkar
vettori to rayudu, no run, defends the first ball back towards the bowler
vettori to rayudu, 1 run, tucks this one towards midwicket for a single
vettori to tendulkar, 1 run, on middle and off, tucked behind square for another single
vettori to tendulkar, 1 run, good over from vettori, a bit of width on the final ball, tendulkar rocks back and slaps it towards deep point for a single, just four off the over
dilshan to tendulkar, no run, ooh, this time tendulkar attempts a deft leg glide past the keeper,can't connect with that outside off ball
vettori to rayudu, 1 run, tapped towards cover point for a single
vettori to tendulkar, 1 run, nurdles it behind square leg for a single
pathan to tendulkar, 1 run, turns away after pitching on middle, tucked towards midwicket off the backfoot
kohli to tendulkar, four runs, once again tendulkar shows t20 isn't all about power, he just lofts this over the bowler's head with little effort, great timing from tendulkar
khan to rayudu, no run, rayudu opens the face to drop the ball from middle stump towards point, decides against the single
khan to tendulkar, no run, jags away after pitching just outside off, left alone by tendulkar
pathan to tendulkar, 1 run, tendulkar pushes it towards the off side for a single

khan to tendulkar, no run, nearly a run-out, tendulkar drops the ball to the leg side and sets off for a single, then he stops, rayudu was already charging down and was nearly three-quarters the way down, zaheer sprints to get to the ball and throws the ball at the non-striker's end but misses, and rayudu survives
khan to tendulkar, 1 run, looking to play the ball to the leg side, edge past the keeper's right for a single
khan to rayudu, no run, looks to guide this one off the backfoot towards third man, can't connect
khan to rayudu, 1 run, slaps this in the air towards deep backward square leg for a single
pathan to rayudu, 2 runs, slapped towards point for a couple
pathan to rayudu, 1 run, muscled towards long-off, a very straight hit but there isn't enough power to beat the fielder, just a single
mithun to rayudu, four runs, rayudu has been in brilliant form today, he comes down the track and scythes this one through covers for a boundary, even vettori applauds
kumar to badrinath, no run, better from badri, lets an away swinger go away to the keeper
kumar to badrinath, no run, he's through him with an inducker. praveen's darting the ball this way and that, csk are struggling against the wobbling seam.
kumar to badrinath, no run, he finishes with one that nips away, badri lets it go. stupendous over from praveen. spread the news, this might get some crowd into mohali.
kumar to badrinath, 1 run, badri leans out with more conviction into a square drive, and gets it away backward of point for a single.
kumar to vijay, 1 run, vijay leans across outside off and opens the face to guide a single backward of point. not so much devilish movement for praveen now.

kumar to badrinath, 2 leg byes, that's a very strange shot. badri gets well across and looks to lap praveen from wide outside off, but doesn't get bat on it. it runs away towards midwicket and they get a couple
kumar to badrinath, no run, there ain't no runs to be had. badri looks to check drive through the off side, but marsh dives away and intercepts.
harris to badrinath, no run, the heavy ball, badri jumps and ducks and looks to work it to the leg side. just manages to keep it away from the ribs.
harris to badrinath, no run, ends the over with an emphatic bumper, had badri jumping, swaying back and moving the head out of the way as it zoomed past him. gilchrist collects it high and applauds.
kumar to badrinath, 1 leg bye, angled in, badri looks to flick and can't get bat on it. leg bye stolen to square leg.
mclaren to badrinath, no run, skims the first ball off the surface and gets it to nip away from a nervy badri poke outside off.
mclaren to badrinath, 1 run, aha, vijay closes the bat early as he looks to flick and gets a leading edge down to third man
nayar to badrinath, 1 run, shuffles inside the line and glances backward of square for a single this time.
chawla to vijay, 1 run, flatter, steered to a diving cover-point fielder and they get single.
chawla to badrinath, no run, flatter and quicker, badri stays on the crease and defends.
chawla to badrinath, 2 runs, the slider from chawla, always round the corner, badri squirts it off the inside edge to midwicket and they run like men possessed for a couple.
bhatt to badrinath, 1 wide, slides this one too far down the leg side. called a wide.
nayar to badrinath, 2 runs, width outside off this time, badri goes through the covers and it takes a really good save to keep him down to a couple.
bhatt to vijay, no run, fired in on middle and leg, vijay can't get it away as he looks to muscle another one away., the helmet is off for vijay. symbolically, the gloves are off.
bhatt to badrinath, 1 run, badri chips out again, bhatt follows him and badri twinkles the flick to square leg for one more.
harris to badrinath, 1 run, this time he gets it away, heaving without much timing for a single.
bhatt to badrinath, 2 runs, fired in faster, badri heaves without timing to midwicket for two more.
mclaren to badrinath, 1 run, legspinning slower ball at 114 kph well outside off, badri drives into the covers for a single
ashwin to valthaty, no run, carom ball to start off, paul gets half across and defends to the off side
southee to valthaty, four runs, good shot from valthaty. southee goes too ambitiously in search of the outswinger, valthaty gets inside the line and whips past mid on. lovely timing.
ashwin to gilchrist, no run, fired in from round the crease, gilchrist defends from the crease

ashwin to gilchrist, 1 run, action everywhere, gilchrist hangs back and steers to jakati at backward point. poor throw, and valthaty makes it by the time dhoni collects and breaks the stumps. despite running into styris on the way.
ashwin to valthaty, 1 wide, ashwin slips one down the leg side, and it is a wide.
ashwin to valthaty, no run, tight line, offie comes in from middle stump line and valthaty forces it to mid off
randiv to marsh, 1 run, offie lands on middle and straightens, defended to the off side
randiv to valthaty, 1 run, valthaty has made fifty in no time, nudging a big spinner with the turn to square leg
randiv to valthaty, 1 run, over-pitched on middle, valthaty drives against the spin into the covers for one.
randiv to marsh, 2 runs, good running, randiv fires it in and marsh gets an inside edge to midwicket. randiv has to field it himself, and they have enough time to get back.
styris to valthaty, four runs, valthaty rolls along. appalling delivery from styris, slants one a mile down the leg side and valthaty laps it along to fine leg. he's hit better balls for fours today.

randiv to valthaty, four runs, oho, nice little doosra, beats the batsman, gets the leading edge and runs away to third man for four. tough luck. valthaty was squared up on the flick and will be happy with the outcome.
randiv to sunny singh, 1 run, sunny is away, getting a single backward of square
randiv to valthaty, no run, doosra on middle, calmly defended back down the track. just in case you thought valthaty is all attack!
jakati to sunny singh, 1 run, flatter on middle and off, forced into the covers for a hustled single.
raina to valthaty, no run, flat and straight, on off stump and valthaty plays it back to the bowler
raina to sunny singh, no run, flatter on middle this time, sunny pushes into the covers and they decide against the single wisely.

randiv to sunny singh, out, huge wicket for chennai. sunny is gone, and they will hope to stop the torrent now. sunny again bounds out of the crease, but randiv sees him and lands the floater outside off and gets it to go on. sunny heaves and gets a big leading edge that is caught at backward point.
southee to karthik, no run, karthik looks to tap into the off side and get a single. raina charges in from point, karthik gets back into the crease and they go down in a heap!
jakati to valthaty, 1 run, single to end the over. doubt if jakati will get another over.

morkel to valthaty, four runs, morkel has disintegrated today. he has fine leg fine and no cover at deep backward point. and produces an over-pitched ball outside off. valthaty responds by going down on a knee and steer-driving it through backward point. how cool was that shot!
khan to dhawan, 1 run, whipped through mid-wicket, excellent fielding keeps it down to one but could easily have been more
khan to sohal, no run, hits the back pad and cleaned up by the keeper
van der wath to dhawan, 1 wide, van der wath starts with a wide, far outside off
van der wath to dhawan, 1 no ball, and now it's a no-ball, this is a disappointing start for van der wath
van der wath to dhawan, four runs, van der wath tries to bowl the yorket but it's pushed into the gap and gets to the boundary
van der wath to dhawan, no run, driven well to the extra cover fielder
van der wath to dhawan, 1 run, another confident drive, this time into the covers and some good fielding saves that going all the way
van der wath to sohal, no run, better from van der wath, squares sohal up, tighter ball to end an over that went for 11
khan to dhawan, no run, turned around to mid-wicket, not enough on it to get past the fielder
khan to dhawan, 1 run, played to mid-on, quick single taken
khan to sohal, 1 run, sohal is tucked up, gets it away on the on side and runs a quick first one, thinks of a second, decides not to
khan to sohal, no run, another good ball, sohal has no room to do much other than defend. successful over for zak
van der wath to sangakkara, no run, sangakkara's first ball, defended back to the bowler
van der wath to sohal, 1 no ball, another no-ball from van der wath, really struggling with his rythym. he was just on the line there, line belongs to the umpire
van der wath to sohal, no run, doesn't cost much, sohal misses it completely.
aravind to sangakkara, 1 run, nicely struck to vettori at mid-on who fumbles
aravind to sohal, 2 runs, turned to the on-side. zak labours to the ball and let's them run two
aravind to sohal, four runs, goes the aerial route, over mid-wicket. sohal's wristwork is quite effective, turns that well
aravind to sohal, no run, tries to whip it to fine leg, ab does well to gather that
aravind to sohal, no run, defended back to the bowler
vettori to sohal, no run, sohal still trying to make room, defends back to dan
vettori to sohal, 1 run, nicely placed to mid-wicket
aravind to sohal, no run, pushed into the covers
aravind to sohal, 1 run, turned around for an easy one
aravind to sohal, four runs, goes for the hoick on the on-side, steyn says he is like a right-handed sanath jayasuriya as he plays that
vettori to sangakkara, 1 run, delicately turned on the leg side
vettori to sohal, no run, steered to third man, sanga charges down but is sent back by sohal
vettori to sohal, 1 run, pushed to the mid-wicket area
vettori to sangakkara, four runs, finds the gap, snaga opens the face and guides it to third man, pretty shot
vettori to sohal, 1 run, good strike rotation, played to mid-wicket
ninan to sohal, 1 run, offspinner, driven to long-off, thoughts of a second, turned down
ninan to sangakkara, 1 run, looks to whip away on the on-side, doesn't get enough on it, rolls away
ninan to sohal, 2 runs, turned to fine leg
ninan to sohal, no run, sohal wanting a big shot again, on one knee tries to give it the heave-ho, but gets it as far as the inner ring
vettori to sangakkara, 1 run, driven down to mid-off
vettori to sangakkara, no run, vettori building pressure here driven straight to extra cover
ninan to sangakkara, 1 run, played straight back to the bowler, he lets it trickle away, but the batsmen won't risk a second
ninan to chipli, 1 run, pushed to long-off
ninan to sangakkara, 1 run, played to mid-off
ninan to chipli, no run, big stride in and defends into the covers
dilshan to sangakkara, no run, sanga makes some room but can't get away
dilshan to sangakkara, 1 run, flicks it to mid-wicket
dilshan to chipli, no run, tapped into the off side
dilshan to chipli, 1 run, pushed past dilshan to mid on, ambled single
aravind to chipli, 1 run, smacked into the on-side, enough time for one
aravind to chipli, 1 run, turned to mid-wicket
aravind to chipli, 1 run, sensibly turned to mid-wicket, excellent strike rotation in that over
dilshan to chipli, 1 run, nudged to mid off, brings up the 100
dilshan to sangakkara, six runs, dead straight again. sanga is getting his maximums in the classiest fashion. over dilshan's head and that's high and into the stands
dilshan to sangakkara, 2 runs, goes straight again, but just not enough to reach the rope
van der wath to duminy, no run, duminy faces his first ball on his birthday, steers it to point, yells 'wait' loudly
van der wath to duminy, 1 run, turned onto the leg-side, duminy off the mark and keeps strike
ninan to duminy, 1 run, nicely timed, square of th wicket for one
ninan to chipli, six runs, and again. down on the knee quicker, teasing the fielder again, but this time it's flatter and it's the same result
ninan to chipli, 1 run, dilshan comes round the wicket and chipli plays to mid wicket for one
ninan to duminy, 1 run, down to long off, duminy happy to give chipli the strike
ninan to chipli, 1 run, run fine to backward square leg, great over for the chargers, seems its acceleration time
khan to chipli, four runs, zak's back and he's gone too wide with that slower one. chipli knocks it back over his head, couple of bouces and four.
khan to chipli, four runs, beautiful ball, on the toes and chipli has luck going his way. inside edge down to fine leg
khan to chipli, 1 run, steered to point and things calm down a little
vettori to chipli, 2 runs, chipli only had to wait one more ball for it, driven to long off and there's his 50
vettori to chipli, 1 run, wristily played into the on-side chipli oozing confidence here
vettori to duminy, no run, on legstump and duminy tries to flick it away but misses

vettori to duminy, four runs, over long off, poses some problems for the fielder there, who is just about to snatch it out of the air, but finds himself on the rope and umpire koertzen calls it six immediately
vettori to duminy, 2 runs, played to deep mid-wicket
vettori to duminy, 2 runs, and again, duminy hitting it well, without any real force or anger, good timing and the overthrow allows them the second
van der wath to duminy, no run, duminy swinging again but that's a slower ball and he's misread it.

khan to duminy, out, great catch virat kohli. duminy gives that an almighty thwack over mid-wicket and it looks likes it destined to go all the way. kohli is on the fence and leaps up to grab that. birthday boy gone for 22.
khan to chipli, four runs, gets under that and slices over point, chipli not stopping here
khan to chipli, 2 runs, driven down to long off
steyn to agarwal, no run, wide outside off and agarwal has a big swing, misses
steyn to agarwal, no run, swings away, steyn getting good movement and agarwal is lost. no clue how to play that
steyn to agarwal, 1 run, gets bat to ball, steers it loosely to third man, bangalore's chase has begun
steyn to dilshan, no run, dilshan has a heave-ho. mistimes it to mid-on, looking to go aerial but can't get enough on it
steyn to dilshan, 1 run, swings in this time, whipped away behind square on the leg side, good start from steyn
sharma to dilshan, no run, sharma shares the opening bowling duties. bounce on offer for him there, dishan reaches it for it and sanga collects behind
sharma to dilshan, no run, more bounce, dilshan can't do anything with that and sanga collects high again
sharma to dilshan, no run, can't get it away cleanly, bounces off the ground on the off side
sharma to dilshan, 2 runs, chops it down to third man, good, hard running gets them two
sharma to dilshan, four runs, thick edge off the toe of the bat, past the man at gully
steyn to agarwal, four runs, goes aerial over the covers, finally connects with one from steyn and connects well
steyn to agarwal, no run, no footwork again, tries to smash it somewhere but the ball is moving too much for agarwal
steyn to agarwal, (no ball) 2 runs, steyn oversteps and it's driven through the covers for a couple
steyn to agarwal, 1 run, comes off the bottom of the bat and it's just cost one
steyn to khan, no run, well, well, we have zak here in a pinchitting role. he is looking to smash, but misses the first one.
sharma to agarwal, four runs, agarwal throws his bat at it, gets it over third man and i have never heard a commentator so surprised to see a four, which he thinks is a six at first
sharma to agarwal, 1 run, leading edge to extra cover and it's just one
sharma to kohli, no run, defended to the covers
gony to agarwal, 1 run, extra bounce, agarwal gives himself some space, hits the ball over the point area, good control
gony to kohli, 1 run, not as much bounce this time, steered down to third man
sharma to kohli, 1 run, steered to third man, past the widish second slip, who gets down but can't stop one
sharma to de villiers, no run, ab de villiers faces his first ball, plays a confident drive to point, jp duminy pounces on it
sharma to de villiers, no run, pushed away to the covers, can't pierce the ring, sharma bowling well
gony to kohli, no run, stikes kohli on the back pad and there's a big appeal from gony but it looks too high and replays show that it is
gony to kohli, 1 run, played down to third-man

gony to de villiers, out, goner! gony has been bowling a superb line so far and this time he is rewarded. de villiers gets a thick outside edge and sanga does the rest. big, big wicket for deccan, de villiers goes without scoring and the hyderabad curse is slowly being broken
gony to tiwary, 1 run, saurabh tiwary and his flowing locks face their first ball. pushed into the gap on the off side and he sets off for the run immediately
gony to kohli, 1 run, another good ball, gets it away for one. deccan on top, all the bowlers have performed well so far
sharma to kohli, 2 runs, straighter ball, flicked through mid-wicket, lots of space down there to run a few
sharma to kohli, no run, great delivery, holds it line and beats the bat. the required run rate steadily climbing and i am hearing songs from dabanng being played at the ground
christian to tiwary, 1 run, driven out into the covers, a little looser from christian, allows tiwary some room
christian to kohli, 1 run, dabbed down to mid-off
christian to tiwary, 1 run, tapped down just on the on side, they scramble through, good intent to get that single
christian to kohli, 2 runs, pushed into the covers, it's got some timing on it, beats the inner ring and there's two on offer
christian to kohli, 1 leg bye, played off the legs, quick and easy run. time-out time. phew!
mishra to kohli, no run, mishra on, slapped to extra cover, duminy fields that well
mishra to kohli, 2 runs, legbreak, driven to cover boundary, fumbled and there's two there
mishra to kohli, no run, straight delivery, pushed to mid off
christian to tiwary, 2 runs, sliced drive past point, in the air for a while, sharms does some great work on the boundary and saves two
christian to kohli, no run, good line, pushed on the on side
christian to kohli, no run, flicked to mid-wicket, picks out the fielder and can't get a run. pressure squarely on rcb now
