mishra to tiwary, out, too much pressure and tiwary had to go for a big one. tries to hit that with the turn and gets a top edge that goes straight up. sanga gets below it takes safely. bangalore folding.
mishra to pujara, 1 run, what a rude welcome for pujara that previous ball, turns this one away and gets off strike
mishra to kohli, no run, defended back to mishra
mishra to kohli, 1 no ball, mishra overstepps this time, that's slapped away into the covers
mishra to kohli, 1 run, on leg stump, dug out to long off
christian to pujara, 1 run, driven to mid off, gony fields well has a shy at the stumps but pujara would have been home
mishra to pujara, 1 run, chipped to mid-wicket
mishra to kohli, 1 run, legbreak, scooped out to the covers, christian collects on the bounce
mishra to kohli, 1 run, into the covers
gony to kohli, no run, wide outside off, kohli has a swipe and misses
gony to kohli, 1 run, slower ball and played away to mid-on
gony to kohli, 1 run, into the covers for one
mishra to kohli, no run, played into the covers
mishra to kohli, six runs, big heave-ho from kohli over mid-wicket, the fielder almost dives into the advertising boards but it doesn't matter, six it is
steyn to pujara, no run, swings away, pujara swings and misses
steyn to pujara, four runs, wide ball, this time pujara takes advantage, sends it through the covers
steyn to pujara, 2 runs, steyn hurls down another wide one, that's hit square of the wicket and well get down to two by dhawan
gony to kohli, four runs, kohli makes big room for himself, drive in the air to long off. ankit was there and has been marshalling his boundary well all night but can't get to that.

gony to kohli, out, it's over. gony ges for a big hit over mid-wicket but misreads the delivery. it's a slower ball and it goes on to hit off stump. th big man is gone, he kicks the ground in frustration as he leaves. this is a big ask for bangalore now.
gony to ninan, 1 run, dab into the covers, ninan off the mark
gony to vettori, 1 run, off the hips, vettori steps outside the off stump and send that to fine leg
steyn to ninan, 1 run, edged down to third man.
steyn to vettori, 1 run, slower ball, flicked down to deep square leg
steyn to ninan, no run, swings and misses
steyn to ninan, 1 run, pushed into the covers

steyn to vettori, no run, vettori backs away far, steyn sends it wide of offstump and there's no run. they're going to need more than a herschelle gibbs six sixes here. the last over could well be a formality
christian to aravind, 1 wide, wide outside off, called that way
christian to aravind, 1 wide, and again, wide down the leg side this time

christian to aravind, 1 run, played into the covers and that's a 33-run win for the chargers. the hyderabad jinx has been broken - the chargers win their first match at home. bangalore lose their second in succession.
lee to paunikar, 1 wide, very wide outside off and it swings away further, bisla has to leap to his right to collect it
balaji to paunikar, 1 wide, that's too wide outside off, another extra to keep rajasthan ticking
kallis to dravid, 1 wide, what's with all the wides today, another one far outside off stump. kallis the villain this time
kallis to dravid, four runs, wide again outside off, but close enough for dravid to reach it and drive through cover for four
balaji to paunikar, no run, balaji angles the ball into the right-hander, paunikar makes a bit of room and pushes towards point
shakib al hasan to menaria, 1 run, played towards point and menaria is off the mark
shakib al hasan to dravid, 1 wide, that's too far down leg side
kallis to menaria, 1 run, steered towards third man and paunikar will keep strike.
shakib al hasan to menaria, 1 run, played towards deep square leg for a single
bhatia to menaria, 1 run, slow and straight, defended on the off side from the crease
bhatia to dravid, 1 run, dravid reaches out to heave the ball on the leg side but mis-times it
kallis to menaria, 2 runs, dabbed towards point for a quick single, there's an overthrow at the non-striker's end
kallis to menaria, 1 run, played towards point with a quick single, direct hit at the bowler's end would have run him out
kallis to dravid, no run, dravid makes room and tries to flay the ball through the off, he doesn't make contact
pathan to menaria, 1 run, menaria moves back and forces the ball through wide mid-on
pathan to dravid, out, bowled! dravid moves back and aims for the heave through the leg side, the ball was slow again and dravid missed it by miles
pathan to watson, 1 run, clumsy and shoddy cricket, watson plays the ball back to yusuf who throws the ball back at the keeper. it's a poor throw and there's a fumble, which allows overthrows

pathan to menaria, out, caught and bowled! menaria backs away towards leg to smash the ball through the off, he ends up hitting it with the bottom of the bat and the ball flies right back at yusuf, who takes the catch at head height
shakib al hasan to taylor, 1 leg bye, taylor plays the last ball on the leg side, doesn't make proper contact with the swat
kallis to taylor, 1 run, a bit of width outside off, taylor guides it towards third man
balaji to botha, 2 leg byes, botha misses the glance off the hips and the ball hits his thigh and goes behind square, the keeper has to chase so they can run two
menaria to kallis, 1 run, pushed from the crease towards point
menaria to bisla, no run, bisla charges and tries to hit through the off but the ball hits the inside edge and goes on the leg side
menaria to bisla, no run, played back to the bowler

menaria to kallis, six runs, and again, kallis strides out, gets under the ball and lofts it cleanly over long-off. menaria v kallis, what a mismatch this is. menaria's a part time left-arm spinner at best.
menaria to kallis, no run, played towards mid-on
menaria to kallis, 1 run, pushed towards cover for a single, it's a risky one but kallis gets between the throw and the stumps and blocks it. intentionally but unintentionally at the same time.

doshi to kallis, four runs, kallis makes a touch of room and aims for the booming drive through cover, the ball flies off the outside edge and just falls wide of the fielder at backward point, who dived to his right
botha to kallis, 1 run, played behind point with an open face
botha to kallis, 1 run, kallis stays in his crease and flicks the ball behind square
warne to kallis, 2 runs, kallis welcomes warne with a powerful drive through extra cover, warne got that to turn
warne to kallis, 1 run, kallis chips the drive intentionally in the air towards long-off, hitting it with the turn
trivedi to kallis, 1 run, kallis plays the ball towards third man, that kept a touch low and kallis had to work a bit harder
warne to kallis, no run, kallis makes room and tries to hit the ball a little too hard through cover, he mis-times it and hits it into the ground
trivedi to kallis, no run, kallis backs away towards leg to make the space to punch towards point
watson to kallis, 1 run, kallis waits in his crease and dabs the ball from outside off towards third man
trivedi to kallis, 1 run, the run machine reaches his third fifty of the tournament by driving to long-off, and this is his third innings
doshi to gambhir, 1 run, gambhir inside the hit across the line past his stumps
doshi to kallis, no run, makes room and drives towards cover
trivedi to gambhir, 1 run, gambhir charges again but this time he chips it over the in-field at cover
warne to kallis, no run, and kallis drives the ball back to warne
warne to kallis, no run, kallis tries to slug the ball over the leg side but mis-times it to midwicket
warne to kallis, four runs, he's timed it well this time, kallis lofts a quicker ball over the fielder at mid-on
warne to kallis, 1 run, pushed off the from foot towards point
khan to hussey, 1 run, hussey starts off well, opening the face on a widish delivery, getting a single to third man
vettori to vijay, no run, slightly slower, pushed cautiously to mid-on
vettori to vijay, 2 runs, too straight this time, vijay turns his wrists late and gets himself a couple, wide of deep midwicket
vettori to hussey, no run, comes down the track, and pushes this to midwicket
khan to hussey, four runs, smashed it, absolutely smashed it, dancing down the track and lofting him over mid-on, as if zaheer was a spinner
khan to hussey, 1 run, hit to mid-on who is deep and thus allows them a single
khan to vijay, no run, looks to drive, can't beat cover
khan to vijay, 1 run, placed wide of mid-on for a single, cautious start from vijay

khan to hussey, 1 run, pujara conceded an overthrow in the last over. now he has flown across at extra cover and saved three runs. this one was walloped by hussey, to the left of extra cover, but pujara was too alert and agile for it
vettori to hussey, 1 run, slows this one down a bit, and hussey taps it for one into the leg side
vettori to vijay, no run, yorks him as vijay looks to make room
vettori to vijay, no run, more cat and mouse. vijay stands way outside leg stump for this, vettori follows him, and yorks him again

van der wath to hussey, 1 run, bangalore are fielding poorly here! kaif this time. one of the better fielders in domestic cricket. hussey looks to loft over mid-off, mishits, kaif runs back, gets under it, still running back, and lets it through his hands
van der wath to raina, 1 run, slower ball, dropped towards cover, and they steal a single
van der wath to hussey, 1 run, shimmies down the track, sees the slower ball, and pushes it wide of cover for one
van der wath to raina, four runs, nice shot, making room, backing away, and opening the face on a chest-high delivery, getting it fine of third man. not much wrong with this delivery
ninan to hussey, 1 run, sees him coming at hime, and pushes this wide of off, hussey manages to get bat to it and chips it wide of long-off for one
ninan to hussey, 1 run, driven to long-off for another single
dilshan to raina, 1 run, keeps this one slow in the air even though the batsmen is charging at him, gets an inside edge, but it still accounts for a single
dilshan to hussey, 1 run, this would have been a wide had he not played at it. as it turns out, he gets a bottom edge for one
dilshan to raina, 1 run, comes down the track to push it to long-off for another single
ninan to raina, 2 runs, poor fielding at extra cover, this was hit straight at him, and through him
ninan to hussey, 1 run, hussey pushes this down to long-off for one
kohli to dhoni, 2 runs, nicely done, placed with soft hands into the on side, and sprints back for two
vettori to dhoni, no run, charges at him, and ends up yorking himself
vettori to dhoni, 1 run, pushed wide of vettori, who would have saved it had hussey not been in his way. however, the non-striker was not out of line in being where he was
kohli to dhoni, 1 run, played down to long-off for one
kohli to hussey, no run, athletic off his own bowling, dives to his lift on the practice pitch and saves a single
vettori to hussey, 1 bye, ab has missed a stumping here? hussey makes room and comes down, vettori fires it in. ab is possibly blind-sighted as he can't even collect the ball. concedes a bye too
kohli to dhoni, 1 run, forces this into the covers for one
kohli to hussey, no run, no room here and hussey defends it back to kohli

khan to dhoni, out, zak gets his own back. goes round the wicket, angles it in, gets it to hold its line the slightest bit, thus getting the slight outside edge from dhoni, who walks. rarely does zaheer not have the final word
khan to morkel, 1 run, stays back, pushes it to cover, hands the strike over
khan to morkel, four runs, angling too straight, morkel gets a deflection wide of keeper and fine of the very square fine leg
van der wath to morkel, 1 run,
khan to morkel, 2 runs, bunted into the on side where all the fielders are back on the boundary, and they run back hard for a couple
van der wath to hussey, 1 run, sees him charge at him, pushes this wide of off, hussey connects with the open face but can't beat point
southee to agarwal, 1 run, and agarwal hands it over to pathan by dropping it to cover for one
southee to agarwal, no run, played with an open face, can't beat point
southee to agarwal, no run, on target, no room, played to point
morkel to agarwal, 1 run, misfield at point, they steal a single
morkel to kohli, 1 run, another misfield, raina this time, at point. another single stolen. this one didn't bounce as high as raina expected it to
morkel to agarwal, no run, slower ball again, pushed to cover, no run

southee to kohli, four runs, smart shot or outside edge? mix of both. kohli looks to drive, realises he is not close to it, and opens his face a bit, and the thick edge flies wide of dhoni. no slip there
southee to kohli, no run, slightly slower, hit straight to mid-off, along the ground
southee to agarwal, no run, slight shape in, towards top of off, pushed back to the bowler. good over again
ashwin to agarwal, no run, flatter, middle and leg, played back to the bowler
morkel to de villiers, no run, de villiers charges at morkel, who bowls it wide of off, and the batsman pushes it to point
morkel to kohli, 1 run, runs a widish delivery down to third man
morkel to de villiers, no run, looks to open face on this one, but makes no contact
morkel to de villiers, no run, lovely shot, but even better fielding. square-drive from ab, but a diving save at point saves four runs. badrinath is the man
randiv to de villiers, 2 runs, nice chip shot towards cow corner, comes back for two
jakati to kohli, 1 run, another misfield, at extra cover, concedes a single
jakati to de villiers, 1 run, chips down the track, gets a single to deep midwicket. along the ground
ashwin to de villiers, no run, carrom ball, gets a leading edge, back to the bowler
ashwin to de villiers, no run, another carrom ball, and an lbw appeal as de villers is foxed. dharmasena reckons it is pitched outside leg. dhoni disagrees. he makes the drs review signal
ashwin to de villiers, no run, hit straight to mid-on, another dot
ashwin to de villiers, 1 run, places it wide of extra for one
ashwin to kohli, no run, flat, quick, played back to the bowler
ashwin to kohli, four runs, lovely shot, making room, opening the face, all along the ground, straight of extra cover, wide of long-off. four of the best runs you get to see
jakati to kohli, no run, kohli looks to go inside-out, finds extra cover
jakati to kohli, 1 run, comes down the track, plays it to long-off for one
jakati to de villiers, 1 wide, darted down the leg side, and rightly called wide despite dhoni's big appeal
jakati to de villiers, 3 runs, throws his hands at a wide delivery, ends up slicing it over point, gets three
raina to tiwary, 1 run, drops and runs, gets a single to point
raina to tiwary, 2 runs, placed fine of a very square fine leg, and comes back for an easy second
raina to tiwary, 1 wide, darted well down the leg side, well done by dhoni
jakati to de villiers, 1 leg bye, too much indecision, it seemed. made room, looked like shaping to go inside-out, changed his mind at the last moment and swept, and gets just a leg-bye
jakati to tiwary, 1 run, another single to midwicket, and again tiwary plonks his bat in. no direct-hit this time
jakati to de villiers, six runs, no one can stick a boot out to this one. ab charges down again, and this time lofts him well over, and i mean well over, midwicket
randiv to de villiers, 1 run, yorks him, concedes just a single
randiv to de villiers, 1 run, pushed wide of off, a diving hussey at extra cover keeps them down to one
ashwin to pujara, 2 wides, wide down the leg side, and they squeeze in a bye too
ashwin to de villiers, 2 runs, looks to go inside-out, gets the inside half of the bat towards square leg, fits in a couple
ashwin to pujara, 1 run, places this wide of point to get off the mark
randiv to de villiers, 1 run, swept away, will get just a single to deep square
randiv to de villiers, 1 run, slower through the air, pushed square for one
kumar to dhawan, 1 run, lovely delivery, angled in from round the stumps, pitches off and zips away, hangs back, covers for the movement, and guides it to third man
kumar to sangakkara, no run, closer to off, pushed away to extra cover
harris to dhawan, no run, stays in the crease and eases one that is angled across to cover
harris to dhawan, 1 run, gets nicely behind this one and pushes it away towards covers
harris to dhawan, no run, played back to the bowler
kumar to sangakkara, 1 run, pushed again with soft hands to mid off and sanga charges across for the run, well done
mclaren to dhawan, 1 run, swings hard at one that is wide outside off, gets it off the inner half wide of mid on, and has to dive in as the throw comes in
mclaren to sangakkara, 2 runs, sanga bends the knee and comfortably beats extra cover with the drive, mid off chases it down
nayar to sangakkara, 1 run, makes room and chips in the air to long off
valthaty to dhawan, no run, played away close to the wicket
kumar to duminy, 1 run, good delivery skidding on middle stump, he goes deep in the crease to work it through midwicket
chawla to duminy, 1 run, skids on across the left-hander, pushed away wide of extra cover
valthaty to duminy, 1 run, eased down to long off
harris to duminy, 1 run, nicely done, stays back and makes room to guide one from middle stump to third man
harris to duminy, four runs, that deft guide off the stumps from jp, malik overruns the ball at third man, then puts out the left hand to stop the ball, but it beats him in to the boundary
harris to duminy, 1 run, opens the face and runs down another one to third man
steyn to gilchrist, 1 run, this one does not come back in, angles across outside off stump, he stays in the crease and steers it to third man
sharma to gilchrist, no run, pushed back to the bowler from the crease
steyn to valthaty, 1 run, angled in on leg stump, paul backs away and drives wide of extra cover, mid off dives across to save the boundary
gony to valthaty, four runs, slower one from the back of the hand, but he gets this one away as well, slams it wide of the man at long off who dives to his left but cannot stop it
sharma to valthaty, 1 leg bye, sees him backing away a long way outside leg and fires it in to him, he tries to swing it away but cannot connect
mishra to valthaty, no run, cannot work this one on leg stump away
christian to valthaty, 1 run, meets the ball with a straight bat but cannot beat a diving extra cover
mishra to gilchrist, no run, turns in to adam who cannot work it away
mishra to gilchrist, no run, pushed back to the bowler
mishra to gilchrist, no run, played away towards covers
duminy to gilchrist, 1 wide, looks to work this one fine on the leg side, but does not connect cleanly
duminy to gilchrist, 1 wide, fired wide down the leg side from round the stumps
duminy to gilchrist, no run, pushed back to the bowler
duminy to gilchrist, no run, fired in around leg stump, gilly gets in to a tangle and cannot work it away
steyn to gilchrist, 1 run, slower one this time around off stump, gilly stays in the crease and steers it to third man
steyn to valthaty, 1 run, now the slower one, lovely stuff from steyn, he was early in to the drive, but long off is right on the boundary, and extra cover cannot get to it
duminy to gilchrist, 1 run, slapped away wide of point who does well to dive and stop the ball, it was chipli
christian to valthaty, 1 run, slapped away over the bowler to long off
mishra to valthaty, four runs, connects alright this time, down the track, and slams this flat delivery wide of long off for another boundary
lee to watson, 1 run, drops this one close to the wickets and paunikar calls him for the single, watson hesitated, but went for it in the end
lee to paunikar, 1 run, good work at backward point, it was lovely slower one from lee, he waited on it and guided it to the left of the man there, who pounced on it and made watson hurry
balaji to watson, no run, slower one way outside off, watson goes down on the knee for the big drive, but misses
iqbal abdulla to paunikar, 2 runs, good diving effort on the wide long off boundary, it is bhatia, saves the boundary after paunikar drove a flat one outside off hard
balaji to fazal, 1 run, shuffles across, and overbalances but manages to flick it away to fine leg
balaji to raut, no run, another beauty from balaji, gets it to pitch around off and move away, he feels for it and misses
balaji to raut, 1 run, has another huge swipe as he rushes outside his crease, but gets only a single to mid on
iqbal abdulla to raut, 1 run, sharp turn from middle stump, he closes the face early and gets a leading edge towards point

iqbal abdulla to raut, out, super stuff from iqbal, brilliant presence of mind, it was pushed in the air way to his right, he charged after the ball to stop the single, picked it up with a dive, and then looked to throw it to the keeper, but stopped for an instant, saw the non-striker had backed up too far, and hit his stumps with a direct throw
bhatia to raut, no run, moves away from wide outside off, he cannot get it away, steering it to backward point

bhatia to raut, out, yet another run-out, flicked away to midwicket, striker takes off, menaria is unmoved, raut is almost mid-pitch before he turns back, throw comes in right on top of the stumps, and he had no chance of making it back
iqbal abdulla to menaria, 1 wide, keeps low again, and turns down the leg side
shakib al hasan to taylor, no run, sharp turn for shakib  now, goes across the batsman from middle, he almost pushes it straight to the bowler, shakib with a neat stop to his left
shakib al hasan to taylor, no run, looks to work this one on leg stump away but cannot time it
pathan to taylor, 1 wide, turns slowly down the leg side from middle stump
pathan to menaria, 1 run, comes slowly off the pitch outside off and he hits it past the bowler to long off
shakib al hasan to warne, no run, turns away from middle stump, calmly defended down the track
shakib al hasan to singh, no run, pushed away from the crease towards covers
tait to gambhir, 2 wides, paunikar does well to save four byes, tait slung this one a foot down the leg side and paunikar went flying to his right
tait to bisla, no run, shuffles and plays this one out on the leg side
tait to bisla, no run, beats him with another good one, this time closer to off and slower too, straightens and goes on the bounce to the keeper
watson to gambhir, 2 runs, swings in a long way around middle stump, gambhir gets an inside edge as he goes for it, gets it backward of square leg
watson to gambhir, no run, angled across the left-hander who lets it go
tait to gambhir, 1 leg bye, paunikar with another flying take down the leg side, gautam got some pad on it, keeper thought there was some bat
warne to bisla, no run, gambhir charges for the single, it was pushed away to warne's right but he got there quickly and gautam rushed back, what;s with him these days?
watson to bisla, 1 run, stands tall and punches past extra cover for a single

tait to gambhir, 1 wide, gautam walks across outside the stumps, looking to go over fine leg, tait fires it in but the ball somehow misses leg stump, it is called a wide, whose world is it? not the bowler's
warne to tiwary, no run, turns from outside leg stump to outside off stump, leaving a confused batsman stabbing it back to the bowler
trivedi to gambhir, 1 run, drops this one close to the stumps on the off side and tiwary rushes for the single
dinda to sohal, no run, defended on the leg side
pathan to sohal, 1 run, tapped onto the leg side, quick running again, just a hint of movement in for pathan
pathan to dhawan, out, oh my word! chopped on! dhawan slashes at the ball that swings away from the left-hander and inside edges it onto middle stump. good move to open with pathan
pathan to sangakkara, no run, defended back to the bowler
pathan to sangakkara, no run, defened to point, superb over first up from irfan
morkel to sohal, no run, sohal wafts at it outside off, nothing shot really and is lucky not to get an edge
morkel to sohal, 1 run, drifting into sohal, who plays to mid-on
morkel to sangakkara, no run, chopped down to mid on, sanga gets it on the inside half of the bat
morkel to sangakkara, no run, driven into the covers again, nothing close to the type of shot played off the last ball
pathan to sangakkara, 1 wide, trying too hard is irfan, down the leg side, wide called
pathan to sangakkara, no run, driven to the covers, straight to the fielder
pathan to sangakkara, 1 run, driven on the on side now, beats the fielder and is picked up on the edge of the ring
pathan to sohal, four runs, clever. sohal plays a nifty little shot, angling the face of hsi bat to the leg side and chipping it down to fine leg
morkel to sangakkara, no run, driven to finch at extra cover, who pounces and hurls in the throw at the keepers end, direct hit would have been gone
morkel to sangakkara, 1 wide, quite a distance outside off, called wide
morkel to sangakkara, 1 leg bye, appeal for lbw, pitched outside leg it seems, morne morkel is apparently not feeling well
morkel to sohal, 1 run, tapped to point
morkel to sangakkara, 1 run, leading edge to point, not played too well but he gets one
morkel to sohal, 2 runs, steered down to third man, angles the bat well and pathan fields well on the boundary
morkel to sohal, no run, morkel finsihes well, beats the bat with the last ball of the over
dinda to sangakkara, 1 run, sanga dances out to him and flicks away to deep square leg, doesn't get as much bat on that as he would have liked
dinda to sohal, no run, moves away and keeps low, sohal can't reach it
dinda to sohal, no run, straighter ball, tucks sohal up who defends on the leg side
dinda to sohal, four runs, beats third man, played very fine, anlged bat, guided it past point and it's through
dinda to sohal, 1 run, middle and off stump line, rolls around the ground past square leg
hopes to sangakkara, no run, defended to mid-on
hopes to sangakkara, no run, change of pace, sanga looks to drive on the off side but can't make contact
hopes to sangakkara, 1 run, tapped into the covers, scrambled singles
hopes to sohal, 1 run, picked up nicely and chipped over mid-on, thoughts of a second there, not taken
nadeem to sangakkara, 1 run, on legstump line, pushed to mid-wicket
nadeem to sohal, 1 run, pushed through the covers
nadeem to sangakkara, no run, defended to mid-on
nadeem to sangakkara, four runs, beautiful shot, played late, placed in a good spot, in the gap at deep mid-wicket, sanga was well down the pitch for that
nadeem to sangakkara, four runs, another four, turned to backward square leg, sanga cashing in and it's time out time
hopes to sohal, four runs, lucky, lucky, good ball, outside edge, runs away to third man
hopes to sohal, 1 run, turned to deep backward square
hopes to sohal, 1 run, turned again to backward square leg
hopes to sangakkara, no run, pushed into the covers
nagar to sohal, 2 runs, run down to deep backward point
nagar to sohal, 1 run, dabbed to cover, sneaky single taken

nagar to sangakkara, four runs, dancing queen, sohal comes down the wicket and gets it in the air to deep extra cover. morne morkel makes a hash of it, totally inelegant, gets to it with one hand and then lets it roll away for four
nagar to sangakkara, four runs, morne morkel, the ball is following you. he is flat on his face this time and lets another one through
pathan to sohal, four runs, well timed, beats the man at the mid-wicket and the one on the rope
pathan to sohal, no run, pushed to point, better fielding and all thoughts of a run are quickly quelled
dinda to sohal, no run, goes right through sohal, nips away a touch and there's nothing he can do with that
dinda to sangakkara, no run, sanga slaps at that one, only as far as mid-wicket
dinda to sangakkara, 1 run, sanga makes some room and drives to long off but that's not very well timed

dinda to sangakkara, out, superb catch by finch, backpedalling from inside the circle. sanga hasn't been timing well this over and goes aerial with that one on the on side but finch has it covered. sanga falls for 49, seems we've jinxed them
nadeem to white, 1 run, delicate tap into the off side, takes off straight away for the run and gets it even though the fielding was sharp
nadeem to white, no run, defended into the covers
nadeem to white, 1 run, white wants to go big, but reaches long off and ambles through
morkel to sohal, six runs, down town! morkel's day gets worse, apparently he has not eaten in a few days and now he gets smacked over hsi head for six.
morkel to sohal, four runs, and worse, over the covers, four. morkel not bowling too badly, but sohal is hitting it well
morkel to sohal, 1 run, turned to fine leg
morkel to sohal, 1 run, run down to third man, lots of space there to take the single

nadeem to sohal, out, another good catch by finch, moving backwards again, not as tough as the last one. sohal wanted to go big over the mid-off area but doesn't get enough on it and finch pouches a second
nadeem to white, no run, and again, no more runs from this over
pathan to christian, 1 run, flicked to backward square leg, small fumble from the fielder, doesn't matter
hopes to white, 2 runs, white leans back on that and it goes up in the air, lands safely wide of long off. he is desperate to hit the ball far and hard
hopes to christian, 2 runs, turned to deep mid-wicket
hopes to white, six runs, now he gets hold of it. hit straight and through the line, slower ball from hopes and white gets it high and over
hopes to white, 1 run, driven to long off
morkel to christian, no run, big swipe, misses and goes over the top of leg
morkel to white, four runs, this time some improvisation knows. white takes it from outside off and flicks down to fine leg, walks across his stumps to hit it
hopes to white, 1 run, smack, back past hopes to long off, it only got one but was hit with some power
hopes to christian, 2 runs, stroked to deep square leg
hopes to christian, out, this time christian doesn't miss, trying to go aerial on the leg-side, but it's a slower ball, he plays too early and the bottom edge lands on the stumps
dinda to white, no run, white wants to hit it hard, looking to smoke it through the off side but can't get it away
dinda to white, 1 run, tries on the on side this time, just gets one
dinda to chipli, 3 runs, creamed through the covers, good work in the deep from nagar, who saved a boundary and manages to get the ball in before it bobbles over
steyn to warner, no run, some away movement, keeping low and left alone by warner who collects at knee height
steyn to warner, no run, slower ball, defended into the covers
steyn to warner, no run, nice, meaty drive to point, stands tall for that shot, but it can't get through
steyn to warner, no run, tucked away, tries to squeeze it on the on side, thinks of a run but decides not to
steyn to warner, 1 run, tuckey away with a little more finesse, if warner can be accused of having any, and a single is on the cards
christian to sehwag, no run, driven into the covers, duminy on the mic says they need wickets in the first six overs
christian to sehwag, four runs, creamed through the covers, christian has had a nightmare start
steyn to warner, no run, slower ball, warner wants to give it the treatment again, gets a bottom edge that rolls into the covers
harmeet singh to sehwag, no run, width offered but viru hits it to point
harmeet singh to ojha, no run, nudged into the off side, ojha wants the run but they decide against it the fielder hits the stumps but the ojha safe
christian to warner, 1 run, played to deep mid-wicket
harmeet singh to warner, no run, driven to mid-off, warner not looking to bludgeon this one
harmeet singh to warner, 1 run, much slower from haremeet, turned to mid-wicket
harmeet singh to finch, out, he's got a second. delivery outside off and finch looks to run it to third man. sanga is standing up and collected well. deep trouble for delhi now
ojha to venugopal rao, no run, slip in place for rao, pitches outside leg, half an appeal from ojha
ojha to venugopal rao, no run, gives it a bit of air, defended sedately
ojha to venugopal rao, 1 run, played with slightly less force and gets it past ojha to mid-off
ojha to warner, no run, just on leg stump line, warner wants to flick away, doesn't happen

harmeet singh to venugopal rao, 5 wides, oh gosh! splayed that everywhere. well, not everywhere, down leg. looks like it slipped out while he was rolling his fingers over the ball and that's far down leg. five wides
harmeet singh to venugopal rao, no run, tries to steer it past third man, misses and sanga has the bails off in a flash, he wants to look at whether he got the stumping, doesn't seem like it
harmeet singh to venugopal rao, four runs, bit of width, but nothing severe and rao has just found the gap behind point, good timing
harmeet singh to venugopal rao, no run, bowls him the same ball, this time roa drives and gets as far as extra cover
ojha to warner, six runs, just a little too much on leg and warner gets to it immediately. comes down the track and lifts it over mid-wicket, gets a lot of meat on it
ojha to warner, 1 run, nudged into the covers
ojha to venugopal rao, 1 run, swept to backwarsd square leg
ojha to warner, 4 byes, strays down leg, warner misses, sanga misses and it's gone fine and that's byes
christian to venugopal rao, 1 run, whipped away to deep square leg
christian to venugopal rao, 1 run, little bit of width and chopped down to third man
mishra to venugopal rao, 1 run, swept to deep mid-wicket, mishra into the attack, ex delhi man
mishra to venugopal rao, 1 run, swept to deep mid-wicket, roa likes that shot and that area

mishra to venugopal rao, out, rao wants to go over the rope this time, he's come down the wicket and strikes it hard to christian at long off, who does well to take the catch without stepping on the boundary
mishra to warner, 2 byes, misses everything, sanga can't collect but may have had a stumping opportunity if he had, byes
harmeet singh to pathan, no run, driven to point, no room for a run there

harmeet singh to warner, 2 runs,  dropped  warner gets under it but can't the right amount of meat oh the shot. it's the air and not going the distance. chipli was running in too fast from long off, gets to it, gets fingers to it and can't hold on. warner gets 50 in the process
harmeet singh to warner, no run, defended back to singh, warner wants a run but he knows he can't have one
dhawan to warner, no run, dhawan is on and his first ball s defended
dhawan to hopes, 1 run, turning away and hopes pushes it behind sqaure on the off side
dhawan to pathan, no run, pathan tries to flick away with the turn but doesn't get hold of it
dhawan to pathan, 1 leg bye, half an appeal for the lbw, leg byes given
mishra to pathan, 1 run, pathan shimmies down and smacks to long off, just a single
mishra to hopes, 1 run, width outside off, pushed to deep cover
mishra to pathan, 1 run, pathan comes down again and flicks to mid-on
mishra to pathan, 1 run, too far outside off, hold its line and is nudged away to point, superb over from mishra
ojha to nagar, 1 run, makes some room for himself and chops it into the covers
ojha to nagar, 1 run, turns into nagar, who moves away and gets it out to the covers
mishra to hopes, 1 run, same ball, similar result, also goes down to long off
mishra to nagar, 2 runs, quicker one, nagar hits the turf as he tries to get to the ball and it runs down to fine leg for one
steyn to nagar, 1 wide, outside leg, nagar was looking to run it fine, called wide
steyn to nagar, 1 run, can't get too much on that, small tap down to the keeper and quick run taken
steyn to hopes, 1 run, driven to long off and delhi have a steep mountain to climb in their last over, 26 runs needed
christian to nagar, out, nagar looking for the big one over mid-wicket, straight ball, slower ball again, you miss, i hit stuff. middle stump is hit and the end is near for delhi
christian to morkel, 2 runs, drives through extra cover and picks up two

trivedi to gilchrist, 1 no ball, it's all happening! bowled off a no-ball! and gilchrist doesn't know of the no-ball, and is walking back when one rr fielder disturbs the bails and appeals for a run-out. good try. good knowledge of cricket rules. well done dinesh yagnik
trivedi to gilchrist, 2 runs, gets the inside half of the bat on a drive, and gets two runs wide of square leg
trivedi to gilchrist, 1 wide, wide outside off, angling away, second extra of the over
trivedi to gilchrist, 1 run, pushed wide of mid-off to retain the strike
tait to valthaty, no run, slower ball outside off, left alone
tait to valthaty, 2 wides, wide down the leg side, and yagnik is ordinary with the keeping gloves, and tait speaks a famous four-letter word out loud
trivedi to valthaty, four runs, no more peace... slower ball, picks it up early, makes room, and sends it crashing over point
warne to gilchrist, 1 run, mis-fielded this time! gently tapped back to warne's left, he doesn't collect cleanly, and they steal the single
watson to gilchrist, out, finally something goes rajasthan's way! gilchrist goes for another powerful hit, doesn't get the elevation and tait takes the easy catch at mid-on. what relief for rajasthan
watson to marsh, no run, angled across marsh, nearly gets the edge as marsh drives away from the body
watson to marsh, 2 runs, drives away from the body again, gets a thick edge square of third man to take a couple
tait to valthaty, 4 leg byes, an indication of tait's pace is that this one hits valthaty in the hip area, and flies across the outfield for four leg byes
watson to marsh, 1 run, runs this off the face of the bat to third man
warne to valthaty, no run, sharp legbreak, played towards point
warne to marsh, four runs, lovely batting, for all the hitting here, marsh has played three beautiful shots quietly. this time he comes down the track and chips warne over midwicket. no violence
warne to marsh, no run, defends this one back to the bowler
warne to marsh, 1 run, opens the face on this, uses soft hands, and they take a single
binny to valthaty, 1 run, slower ball, the inside edge gets him a single towards square leg
binny to marsh, 1 run, pushed to long-off for one
binny to valthaty, 2 runs, as soon as the match finishes, valthaty must go to a casino! slower ball, he skies it and it falls between mid-off and long-off. two fielders go after you, after you

binny to valthaty, 1 run, the casino is waiting paul! another mis-hit towards long-off, and asnodkar comes charging in, puts the dive in, but it bursts through his hands. and he hurts himself too as he takes the fall
warne to marsh, 1 run, chipped towards deep midwicket again, gets a single
warne to valthaty, no run, respects the respectable legbreak, defending it to cover
binny to karthik, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
binny to marsh, 1 run, driven wide of cover for a single this time
binny to marsh, 1 run, placed wide of cover this time
menaria to marsh, 1 run, starts off with a long hop, but marsh doesn't get all of it, and gets just a single to deep midwicket
raut to karthik, no run, extra bounce, and it goes straight on, hitting him in the pad
raut to marsh, 2 runs, flicked away off the stumps for one
trivedi to karthik, 1 run, steered to third man for a single
trivedi to marsh, 1 run, and he almost took karthik out here. hit straight back to karthik's gut, who does well to get out of the way. and is thus still standing on his own two feet
tait to marsh, 1 run, opens the face, gets a single to point
tait to marsh, 1 bye, slower ball, another fumble from yagnik, and the bye doesn't amuse tait
watson to nayar, no run, pushed to point, they keep him on strike

watson to nayar, out, nayar is gone. he looked to drop and run, and then stopped. then he saw marsh charging at him and realised it would be criminal to turn his back at marsh, and went for the single anyway. that stutter, though, cost him his wicket
watson to marsh, no run, just holds its line outside off, and marsh ends up pushing inside its line
trivedi to mclaren, 2 wides, and nightmare it is, as he bowls a big wide down the leg side, too wide for yagnik to collect it cleanly
trivedi to marsh, 1 run, slower ball, driven down to long-off for one

trivedi to mclaren, no run, angled across, and that beats the attempted scoop. superb comeback from trivedi, which means he is only tied with rp singh for the worst figures in all ipls, and doesn't exclusively own the dubious distinction
kumar to asnodkar, no run, sharp inswinger to start off with, almost an lbw but it is headed down the leg side
kumar to dravid, no run, defended to point
harris to dravid, no run, opens the face this time, but finds cover. three good shots, three straight to fielders
kumar to watson, no run, outswinger, starts middle, heads towards off, defended. testing waters a bit
kumar to watson, 1 run, inswinger this time, watson steers this for one
kumar to asnodkar, four runs, makes room, pk follows him, and he goes leg side, getting four wide of midwicket
harris to watson, no run, better line, around off, defended towards cover
harris to watson, no run, hit straight back towards the stumps this time, harris fields in the follow through
harris to watson, 1 run, steers this to third man for a single
kumar to binny, no run, flicked away to square leg, no run
kumar to binny, 1 run, slower ball, opens the face to bring watson back on strike
bhatt to binny, no run, looks to make room and go over extra, the thick outside edge goes towards point
bhatt to binny, 2 runs, comes down the track to chip this over mid-on for two
bhatt to binny, 1 run, dropped! was blind-sighted to be fair perhaps. makes room to hit, gets a fine fine edge, and it hits gilly's pad
chawla to binny, no run, skiddish legbreak, hurries him up, defended
chawla to binny, 1 run, backs away to go over extra, but it skids on again, hurrying him up. gets  a single to cover
chawla to taylor, no run, legbreak this time, slower through the air, pitches middle and off, breaks away, beating the prod by taylor
valthaty to menaria, no run, stump to stump, pushed back to the bowler
valthaty to menaria, 1 run, pushed wide of long-off, comes through for one
chawla to menaria, no run, another shot straight to fielder, extra cover this time
chawla to menaria, 1 run, wrong'un, gets a thick outside edge for a single
chawla to menaria, 2 runs, sliced away past point
valthaty to binny, 1 run, heaves away at this slower one, gets a single to midwicket
valthaty to binny, 1 run, slower ball, stays low, gets the toe end on it, gets a single to deep midwicket
valthaty to menaria, no run, another slower ball, menaria ends up hitting it back to the bowler
chawla to binny, four runs, superb shot, comes down the track again, and muscles this over chawla's head
chawla to binny, 1 run, swept away upon making room, gets a single to deep square
chawla to menaria, 1 run, legbreak around off, opens the face and takes a single
nayar to menaria, no run, slower ball, flicked away to square leg where sunny singh dives and saves the run
nayar to raut, 1 run, slower delivery again, played towards point for one
mclaren to raut, four runs, slashed away fine of a very square third man for four
mclaren to raut, four runs, poor delivery down the leg side, and he guides it fine of fine leg
mclaren to raut, no run, backs away again, and this time mclaren bowls outside off, beating raut again

mclaren to raut, 3 runs, what a drop! raut charges at mclaren, and sends the slower ball to the moon and back, but chawla never ever looks like he has got under it, and it bursts through his hands and hits him in the chest
chawla to raut, no run, legbreak to begin with, defended to point
chawla to raut, 1 run, ridiculous umpiring, allows a leg-bye there as raut jumps out of the crease and thrusts his pad at this, the bat hidden well behind the pad
chawla to raut, 1 run, runs this down to point and speeds across for a single
harris to raut, 1 run, backs away, bowlers follows him, concedes just the single to midwicket
bhatt to yagnik, no run, wristily played, but straight to midwicket
harris to yagnik, 1 wide, slower one, wide down the leg side
bhatt to warne, four runs, lovely shot warner! comes down the track and lofts his straight over his head
bhatt to warne, 1 run, square-drive this time, just the single
morkel to sathish, no run, seam movement straight away, but no carry. very wide outside off, sathish pokes and misses as it moves away.
morkel to sathish, no run, very similar to the first ball, again the ball dies after passing sathish's flat-footed swish.

morkel to sathish, no run, morkel starts with a maiden, and he's got all but one ball in that over to move away devilishly. sathish again swings wildly in hope but the ball just keeps going away and he misses the line by a lot in the end.
morkel to rayudu, no run, morkel again gets one to go away, but starts it from well outside off. rayudu pokes without moving his feet.
morkel to rayudu, no run, another away seamer, rayudu gets closer to the line and guides to point
morkel to rayudu, 1 run, breaking news: morkel has conceded a run. rayudu gets bat on ball. gets across to off stump and angles another away seamer to third man.

bollinger to sharma, four runs, the previous shot was textbook, this one was imperious. bollinger did not over-pitch this one, though it was still there for the drive. it was a gamble, since slip was waiting. rohit got across and scythed the drive backward of point. the wrists came into play and it was just too elegant to watch.
joginder sharma to rayudu, no run, good delivery, nips away a touch from outside off and rayudu feels for it from the crease
joginder sharma to rayudu, 1 run, this time he steers a single from off stump line, through third man for a single

joginder sharma to rayudu, no run, rayudu is going for a walk around his crease every ball. this time he is a foot outside the crease, with the feet planted on middle and off as jogi bends one in a touch.
ashwin to rayudu, no run,
ashwin to rayudu, 1 run, big turn from outside off, but it is slow and rayudu guides to third man for a single
ashwin to sharma, no run, floater on off stump, rohit reaches across and defends
randiv to sharma, 1 wide, too much turn, drifts down and is called wide.
randiv to sharma, no run, more air, rohit leans out to work it to mid-on
randiv to sharma, 1 wide, randiv's lines aren't too good, another one slides down the leg side
randiv to rayudu, 1 run, too straight again to end the over, swept without much control backward of square for a single
ashwin to rayudu, 1 run, carom ball on off stump, rayudu sees it and swipes it across to midwicket
ashwin to rayudu, no run, rayudu again tries to work the carom ball from the crease to the leg side, but finds midwicket this time
ashwin to rayudu, 1 run, tough of width outside off, rayudu steers through cover point for a single
randiv to symonds, 1 wide, another wide from randiv, he slips it down the leg side
randiv to symonds, 2 runs, another straighter one, squares of a nervy symonds who pushes from the crease after getting across. outside edged towards third man for two
randiv to symonds, 1 run, straightens from middle, symonds slaps with the turn to square leg
ashwin to symonds, no run, turn from outside off, symmo is playing the spin from the pitch, he isn't picking it. played with bat and pad close to each other back down the track
ashwin to symonds, 1 run, symonds is not picking him at all, the floater that holds its line, is outside edged to point.
ashwin to sharma, 1 run, carom ball outside off, rohit pushes into the off side for a single
ashwin to symonds, 1 wide, slides a wide down the leg side

raina to symonds, no run, how did that miss the stumps? raina gets this ti skid on from middle and symmo plays all over it as he looks to heave. he might have got an inside egde, and that was really close to the leg stump.
raina to sharma, 1 run, rohit times the extra cover push really well and badri does well to keep it down to a single

randiv to sharma, six runs, rohit has hit that almost out of the wankhede. typical shot to being up a 50, it lands in the third tier over long off. randiv tosses it up from round the stumps, rohit charges out and launches him clean and high.
randiv to sharma, 1 run, wisely fires this in flat, and rohit guides backward of point for one
randiv to symonds, no run, skidder on off, played into the off side without fuss
randiv to symonds, no run, beats him outside off with a quick floater, symonds looks to guide through point but misses
joginder sharma to symonds, 1 run, this time he lands it well outside off in the mid-120s. symonds has a huge swipe at it and gets it down to third man
raina to symonds, 1 run, symonds pushes  a single to end the over. poor one from raina.
patel to hussey, 1 wide, called wide, and that's a very poor call. surely wasn't wide enough outside off
patel to hussey, no run, on the toes this time, and hussey charms the flick away. franklin at midwicket dives in the way.
malinga to vijay, 1 wide, well, they are being a little too strict with these wides. another one outside off.
ahmed to vijay, 1 wide, slides this one well down the leg side. another wide.
ahmed to vijay, no run, keeps it around off stump this time and vijay steers from the crease to point, who dives and saves
ahmed to vijay, no run, aha, that stopped on vijay. 139 kph but it seemed to bounce extra as vijay was early on the flick. leading edge pops up but lands safe near his feet.
patel to hussey, no run, over-pitched again outside off, hussey mistimes the drive to the leg side and munaf does well to collect and fling it at the striker's end. hussey gives him a stare.
harbhajan singh to badrinath, 1 run, bhajji is getting some nice drift going, another one curls in from outside off, badri covers the line and whips to midwicket
ahmed to hussey, 1 run, angled across hussey who calmly glides him down to munaf at third man for one more.,

pollard to hussey, 1 run, munaf is flirting with danger at third man. barely got behind that glide from hussey that was hurtling towards his in a hurry. he just managed to grasp the ball without over-running it.
pollard to badrinath, 1 run, badri calmly drives the last ball past mid-on for one more single. 81 required off 10, and we could have a close finish here.

malinga to badrinath, 1 run, and he gets the first ball to curl away from middle and leg, badri does really well to get bat on it and get it to the leg side for one. not the fastest ball, it was 126 kph, and that helped.
malinga to badrinath, 1 run, uses the pace outside off, and dabs malinga down to third man where harbhajan fields.
malinga to anirudha, 1 run, anirudha barely manages to ride the bounce, and pops the steer to third man in the air. safe in the end.
pollard to badrinath, 1 run, badri again walks out of the crease, and is not given any room so he drops it to the off side for one more
harbhajan singh to anirudha, 1 wide, nice footwork from anirudha, a bit gully-cricketish as he skips inside the line to let that one slide down the leg side
pollard to badrinath, four runs, there's no stopping the submarine. he waddles across the stumps, uses pollard's angles and laps a nerveless boundary to fine leg.
pollard to badrinath, 1 run, badri backs away, pollard sees him and lands this on middle, badri dabbed it backward of point and gets to a lovely 50.
pollard to morkel, 1 wide, another wide. mumbai have sent down too many of these. this time down the leg side.

harbhajan singh to morkel, out, bhajji has nailed morkel, and surely mumbai have sealed it now. harbhajan was looking to get it as flat and fast and straight as he could. it's a smart strategy in these end overs. morkel went down on a knee and looked to dump him over cow corner. he swing hard, but the ball slipped through too quickly for him and clattered into off stump. harbhajan's bowled superbly today.
harbhajan singh to ashwin, no run, almost a run out, ashwin whips straight to midwicket and runs down the track. badri sends him back and he has to dive in  ...
khan to kallis, 5 wides, poorer delivery from zaheer, kallis had no chance to tickle or do anything with it, pitches outside leg and moves further down the leg side, no chance for the keeper as well
syed mohammad to kallis, no run, flatter on the stumps, played out on the leg side
syed mohammad to haddin, no run, waits in the crease and pushes out this one to backward point
dilshan to kallis, 1 run, swatted away past midwicket for another single
syed mohammad to kallis, no run, slanted in from wide of the crease, pushed back to the bowler
syed mohammad to kallis, no run, another one angled in flat, pushed back down the track

syed mohammad to haddin, out, gets reward for some tight bowling, tossed this one up a bit, haddin backed away a touch and went for the big lofted shot over mid off from the crease, this one turned a bit, and he got the edge that settled safely in to the hands of virat at point
syed mohammad to kallis, no run, fires in another one flat, pushed back hurriedly to the bowler, he has conceded 2 runs in 2 overs, amid all the carnage at the other end
dilshan to gambhir, 1 wide, skips outside the line of one darted in from round the wicket, and earns a wide
dilshan to gambhir, no run, pushed away on the off side
vettori to gambhir, no run, flat on the stumps, tries to dab it away but can't beat the keeper
gayle to kallis, 1 run, turns in and he flicks it past square leg
vettori to gambhir, 1 wide, tosses this one down the leg side
vettori to gambhir, 1 run, steered behind point for a single
khan to gambhir, 1 run, this time gautam hangs back beside the line of this one outside off and steers it to third man
syed mohammad to gambhir, 1 run, hangs in the crease and tucks this one behind square
syed mohammad to kallis, no run, stumping chance missed, kallis rushed out, flailed wildly at a flat one, missed but the keeper fluffed the take
syed mohammad to gambhir, 1 run, comes down the track, doesn't get hold of it well, but swings it wide of deep square leg
vettori to gambhir, 1 run, tucked away through square leg this time
khan to gambhir, four runs, gautam is playing a delightful knock here, zaheer pitches this one up, and gautam eases it past extra cover
khan to gambhir, no run, steered away from the crease backward of point
khan to pathan, 2 runs, tucked away wide of midwicket, and they come back for the second, yk limps through with that troublesome knee
aravind to pathan, 1 wide, angles this one very wide outside off stump, not a good start
aravind to morgan, 1 run, comes down the track looking to mow this one over midwicket, it is the slower one and he adjusts, one hand comes off the bat as he lifts it over midwicket
pathan to dilshan, no run, pushes this one through, turned away towards mid on
pathan to dilshan, no run, quicker one played out to midwicket
pathan to dilshan, four runs, gets another boundary, bangalore are away, skips out and lifts it high over mid off, just bounces inside the boundary
unadkat to gayle, no run, starts and finishes the over with a swing-and-miss outside off stump, unadkat gives gayle the stare, oh boy
shakib al hasan to dilshan, 1 run, punches in the air, but there is no one at mid off, long off fields
pathan to gayle, no run, pushed away in to the off side
shakib al hasan to gayle, six runs, another one, this one is over deep square leg, he mows another flatter one on one knee, and gets the connection brutally right
pathan to gayle, no run, defended towards covers this time
pathan to gayle, no run, played out towards mid on this time
pathan to gayle, four runs, neat work from gayle, no hammering this time, walks across the stumps and helps it from middle stumps fine on the leg side
bhatia to dilshan, no run, dilshan is playing it smartly, looks to give gayle the strike with a dab past point, cannot beat the man
tiwary to gayle, no run, now he decides to push this one away on the off side
bhatia to dilshan, 1 run, scythed away through midwicket for a single
bhatia to gayle, six runs, this is too much, kolkata have nowhere to hide, shuffles and mows this one over deep square leg
bhatia to gayle, 2 runs, stands tall and pushes a straight delivery straighter down the track, 'two, two' shots dilshan, and gets it comfortably
unadkat to kohli, 2 runs, this time virat gets a couple with a steer wide of third man
iqbal abdulla to kohli, 1 run, drives this one down to long off
iqbal abdulla to kohli, no run, now he pushes this one in to the off side
iqbal abdulla to kohli, 1 wide, iqbal does a randiv, can't say whether it was intentional, fires this one wide down the leg side
kumar to warner, no run, first ball comes in to warner, who defends it to the leg side
kumar to warner, 1 wide, way down the leg side
kumar to warner, four runs, slower ball from praveen sits up for warner, 108kmh, warner gets back and cracks it past extra cover for four more, not the finest of starts from praveen

kumar to sehwag, no run, praveen has his hands on his head after he beats sehwag with a ball that jags away after pitching on off, sehwag looks to drive and can't get bat on ball, that's more of what gilchrist wants from praveen on this green track
harris to warner, no run, first ball from harris is defended to the leg side
harris to warner, no run, angling across warner, who can't get bat on it
harris to warner, no run, another good shot from warner, again he can't beat the field, this time extra cover is in the way
harris to warner, four runs, and again harris gets the ball to rise rapidly, warner looks to fend that, gets the outside edge which flies well wide of first slip and to the third man boundary
kumar to sehwag, four runs, sehwag's in top gear now, he's been given width, never a good idea, he latches on to that one, and powers it over point for four
kumar to warner, 1 wide, praveen is having trouble with his line today, once more slips it past leg
kumar to warner, no run,
harris to sehwag, 1 run, and again sehwag survives and awkward shot, he was looking to work that to the leg side, gets the edge past slip and down to third man
kumar to sehwag, 1 wide, another wide, down the leg side
srivastava to sehwag, 5 wides, big movement for srivastava, unfortunately for him that starts on leg and swings a long way down, that was 138kmh
srivastava to sehwag, 1 run, sehwag stands tall, punches the ball towards point and scrambles a single

srivastava to warner, 1 run, tucked behind square leg for a single, punjab call for the break, which nitin sundar wants to be known as the statsguru time-out. the stat is: gilchrist has hit most sixes in both test cricket and in ipl
nayar to sehwag, 1 run, sehwag looks to whip the ball to the leg side, doesn't time it
chawla to warner, no run, quicker ball to end the over, on offstump, blocked off the backfoot
valthaty to warner, no run, slapped to backward point
valthaty to warner, four runs, the hundred stand comes up as warner finesses the ball behind backward point for a four, nicely done
chawla to warner, 1 run, on middle stump, guided down to fine leg

hussey to sehwag, six runs, make that three in a row, at this rate, punjab will need more than agarkar's largesse to win this game, this time over deep square leg, sehwag in an everything-must-go mode here

hussey to sehwag, out, relief for punjab, the delhi crowd is silenced, sehwag goes for his fourth six in a row but can't latch on to the ball as well as he would have liked, a bit of an inside-edge and that is taken smartly by karthik at deep midwicket
hussey to nagar, no run, no need to guess what nagar has been sent up the order, he looks to pummel the first ball to square leg but doesn't connect
srivastava to nagar, no run, that ends a superb over from srivastava, nagar looks to power the ball through off but it sneaks under his bat
nayar to nagar, four runs, nagar is underway, width on offer and he slashes that past point for four
nayar to nagar, out, nagar smashes that it, hard and flat, but doesn't have the distance, it flies straight to harris at long-off, who fluffs it on the first attempts but catches it on the rebound
chawla to warner, 1 run, slashed towards deep point for a single
chawla to warner, 1 run, guides the final ball of the over towards point
kumar to finch, 1 run, finch wanted to play his first ball towards midwicket, gets a leading edge back towards the bowler
harris to ojha, four runs, lovely touch from ojha, skips towards leg and opens the face to get a faint tickle past the keeper for four, gilchrist puts in the dive but in vain
harris to ojha, 1 run, jags in sharply, ojha is startled by that, dabbed towards point
srivastava to ojha, 1 run, ojha again aims a swipe to midwicket, takes a blow on his ribs as he can't get hold of the ball
srivastava to venugopal rao, 1 run, bowler pushes the ball wide as he sees the batsman making room, batsman has to lean across to reach, get it towards deep point
harris to venugopal rao, 5 wides, harris looks to chase the batsman who is making room, too far down the leg, and that's some free runs for delhi

morkel to gilchrist, four runs, dropped, naman ojha dives across to take an edge from gilchrist,  that was going straight to sehwag, ojha attempts a spectacular take but he can't latch on, that was 147kmh from morkel
morkel to gilchrist, no run, gilchrist is having a tough time out there, little footwork as he looks to smash a slightly wide ball from morkel, no contact
morkel to gilchrist, no run, and again, morkel has gilchrist chasing a ball that is moving away from him, gilchrist doesn't get bat on ball, winces in disappointment at the stroke he attempted
morkel to gilchrist, six runs, the six-fest continues at the kotla, gilchrist uses the pace of that one and helps it along to the deep backward square leg boundary
pathan to valthaty, no run, seams into the batsman after it pitches around middle, valthaty was looking to send that into orbit beyond midwicket, but is surprised by the movement
pathan to gilchrist, no run, way outside off, just within legal limits
pathan to gilchrist, no run, and that is a maiden from irfan, priceless when the asking rate starts at 11.5, the final ball of the over is pushed towards cover, take your hat off irfan
morkel to marsh, no run, guided towards backward point, where warner is around to field
morkel to marsh, (no ball) four runs, 145kmh, and that squared up marsh, he gets an edge on it, and that's past second slip for four, and it's a no-ball as well
morkel to marsh, no run, that kept a bit low outside off, batsman shouldered arms
pathan to gilchrist, no run, guided towards backward point
pathan to gilchrist, no run, gets this one to shape away a touch from gilchrist who is left groping for that outside off
pathan to gilchrist, four runs, third man is proving very productive for punjab, gilchrist skips down the track and gets something of a to edge past slip for four
nagar to marsh, four runs, slower ball from nagar, given a touch of air, marsh rocks back and carves that flatbatted past extra cover for four
nagar to marsh, four runs, another boundary to round off the over, not power but placement this time, backs away from the stumps, and eases the ball behind backward point for four
agarkar to gilchrist, no run, a dot ball, relief for agarkar, gilchrist wanted to swipe that to point but missed out
hopes to gilchrist, 1 run, eased towards long-off for a single
hopes to marsh, 1 run,
aaron to marsh, 1 run, aaron's back, his first ball is mistimed towards mid-off
aaron to marsh, 1 run, ends with a 144.5kmh delivery, bowled from wide off the crease, angling into the batsman, who tucks it to the leg side for a single
morkel to marsh, no run, marsh looking to hammer every ball, again he can't get hold of this one and it goes only as far as mid-on
agarkar to nayar, 1 run, poked towards point, nayar gets a single
steyn to jacobs, no run, 144.7 kph, a bit further up compared to the previous one and davy goes hard at it, but under edges it in to the ground on the off side
ojha to tendulkar, 1 run, again takes a step out and flicks wide of midwicket, this time for a single
ojha to jacobs, 1 run, keeps the strike with a single down towards mid on
sharma to jacobs, no run, and right away, he is greeted with a charge and a heave by davy, who does not connect cleanly, and gets a bottom edge towards square leg
ojha to rayudu, 1 run, pushed slower through the air, rayudu waits and then plonks it on the leg side for a single
ojha to tendulkar, 1 wide, fired down the leg side with the angle
christian to tendulkar, 1 run, now he shuffles way across the stumps and whips this one to fine leg
christian to rayudu, 1 run, another one gets a bit big on rayudu, he manages to keep it down on the leg side
mishra to rayudu, no run, pushed away in to the leg side
mishra to sharma, no run, pushed down on the leg side but mishra dives on the practice pitch and stops the ball
ojha to symonds, 1 run, drives through the line of one turning away and gets the single to long off
mishra to symonds, no run, hurries on with the angle, super bowling from mishra, symonds keeps bat and [ad close together and manages to stab it away
steyn to sharma, 1 run, chopped down to third man for a single
ojha to sharma, 2 runs, takes another couple with a tuck through midwicket, good over for mumbai, ojha has bowled out
christian to symonds, 1 run, steered away for a single to third man
steyn to symonds, 2 runs, gets this one through point but it picked up close to the boundary by the man running across
steyn to sharma, 1 run, squeezed away from outside off and the ball flies to third man
steyn to symonds, 2 runs, gets two this time, another one squeezed away wide of third man and symonds comes hustling back for two
sharma to symonds, 1 run, mistimes the big hit in to the leg side, they cross over for the single
sharma to symonds, no run, ishant manages to get his huge frame down in time to stop a screaming straight hit from symonds, it was travelling but he got his left hand to it
steyn to symonds, no run, can't get this one away for once, steyn sprays it wide outside off stump, symonds stretches out but can't get to it from outside leg
christian to sharma, 1 run, bunted down to long off for a single
patel to dhawan, no run, 128.1 kph from munaf, dhawan cannot beat pollard at point with the punch

harbhajan singh to dhawan, four runs, dhawan is ready for the reverse dab, this one turns slightly outside off, and bounces a bit, but shikhar adjusted to wrist it away, beating munaf who tottered after it to the third man boundary
patel to dhawan, four runs, again, touch wider from munaf, so shikhar goes wider of harbhajan at mid off, who dives over the ball and shikhar gets another boundary
patel to dhawan, no run, still wider outside off goes munaf, this time shikhar tries to muscles it away through extra cover, but mistimes it in to the ground
ahmed to dhawan, 1 run, whips it back to the bowler, who gets a boot to it, and slows it down, gets to it but is not quick enough to prevent the tun
pollard to chipli, 1 wide, strays wide down leg with the angle
sathish to chipli, no run, pushed back to the bowler
sathish to sangakkara, 1 run, gentle but effective stuff at the moment from sathish, this one is pushed through midwicket
sathish to sangakkara, no run, tries to punch a slower one away, ends up pushing it in the air back to the bowler
malinga to ravi teja, no run, almost another one, there is no getting away, once more malinga homes in on middle, he shuffles and manages to stab it on the leg side
malinga to christian, 1 run, this one chooses leg stump as its destination, but teja somehow gets a bit if bat on it to get it towards midwicket
patel to christian, no run, makes room to hit it through extra cover, but gets it off the toe end to point
malinga to mishra, 1 leg bye, malinga continues to sling them in, this one goes off the leading edge towards point
ahmed to steyn, 1 wide, sprays this one wide down leg with the angle
ahmed to steyn, 1 run, steyn leans in to the drive wide of mid off, another direct hit from mumbai, steyn has just made it as the bails come off
harbhajan singh to mishra, no run, mishra sees harbhajan give it air from round the stumps, charges out and has a mighty heave, misses, davy misses it too, that was quick from harbhajan
khan to sehwag, 1 run, 'catch it zak,' says ab as sehwag hits the ball in the air but just wide of the bowler, sehwag mis-timed that and ran a quick single
khan to warner, 1 wide, zaheer strays down leg side, de villiers moves to his right to collect
khan to warner, 1 run, warner doesn't know where the ball is after getting an inside edge, sehwag sees that it's gone close to the stumps on the leg side and sprints the single
khan to sehwag, no run, too wide outside off again but this time sehwag misses the slash
aravind to warner, 1 run, warner checks his drive and plays the ball towards mid-on to turn the strike over
khan to hopes, 1 run, pitches on leg and gives the right-hander no room, played from the crease towards midwicket
aravind to hopes, no run, played from the crease towards the off side
aravind to hopes, 1 run, hopes drives the ball fluently towards wide mid-off where tiwary dives to his left and stops it
vettori to hopes, 1 run, played towards midwicket
vettori to wade, no run, defended back towards the bowler
vettori to wade, 1 run, played towards midwicket for a quick single
gayle to wade, 1 run, played behind square for a single
gayle to hopes, no run,
gayle to hopes, 2 runs, played towards midwicket where a fumble from the fielder allows the second
gayle to hopes, no run, played back to the bowler
vettori to hopes, no run, driven hard towards the bowler, vettori stretches out his right hand and fields
vettori to hopes, 1 run, played with power towards the fielder at deep midwicket, along the ground
vettori to hopes, four runs, bowled flat and straight, hopes flicks the ball firmly through midwicket and has placed it in the gap on the boundary
mithun to venugopal rao, no run, left alone outside off stump
syed mohammad to venugopal rao, 1 run, played towards midwicket for a risky single, the throw towards ab wasn't good and he missed the back flick on to the stumps
syed mohammad to hopes, 1 run, played towards deep midwicket
syed mohammad to venugopal rao, 1 run, swept towards long leg for a single
mithun to venugopal rao, no run, played back to the bowler from the crease
mithun to venugopal rao, 1 run, defended from the crease behind point for a single
mithun to hopes, 1 run, driven towards long-off
mithun to venugopal rao, no run, defended on the leg side
syed mohammad to hopes, 1 run, played towards deep square leg
syed mohammad to hopes, four runs, hopes has blitzed this. down on one knee and a powerful swing, the ball screams across the turf to the deep midwicket boundary
vettori to hopes, 1 wide, vettori strays down leg side and will have to bowl that again
mithun to hopes, no run, hopes tries to hit the ball a bit too hard and mis-times it towards the bowler
vettori to ojha, no run, ojha plays the ball from his crease towards cover
vettori to ojha, 1 run, driven through cover for one
khan to ojha, 1 run, guided towards third man for a single
khan to ojha, no run, ojha hits the ball hard from his crease but can't beat midwicket
gayle to ojha, 1 run, flat and fast from round the wicket, ojha plays towards point
gayle to hopes, 1 run, hopes swings the ball towards deep backward square leg
gayle to ojha, 1 run, driven hard along the ground towards long off
mithun to pathan, 1 wide, that's a wayward delivery down leg side, pathan swung but had no hope of making contact
mithun to pathan, no run, the slower ball outside off stump, pathan heaves and fails
aravind to pathan, 1 run, slower ball outside off, pathan hits it through cover
aravind to nagar, 1 wide, that's too wide outside off stump
aravind to nagar, no run, the slower ball outside off, nagar swings across the line but misses
pathan to kohli, four runs, terrible line, on leg stump, kohli plays the glance to the fine leg boundary, rubbish start from pathan
pathan to kohli, no run, this time he keeps it outside off, far better line, kohli moves back and across and lets it go
dinda to kohli, 1 wide, dinda will have to bowl that again after straying down leg
dinda to kohli, no run, left along outside off stump
dinda to kohli, 5 wides, another one strays down leg side and this time ojha's dive can't stop the ball, delhi are looking ragged
dinda to kohli, no run, kohli plays the ball towards point by opening the face
dinda to kohli, 1 run, played on the leg side for  a single
morkel to kohli, no run, defended back towards the bowler
morkel to kohli, no run, pushed from the crease towards point
morkel to kohli, no run, kohli makes room and tries to hit it a bit too hard, he was aiming for over the blower but mis-hit it to him
morkel to gayle, 1 run, gayle uses the angle into him to open the face and guide the ball towards third man
morkel to kohli, 1 run, defended with soft hands towards cover and they steal a single
yadav to kohli, 1 run, he plays to third man again, this time along the ground
hopes to kohli, no run, nudged on the leg side for a single
yadav to de villiers, four runs, de villiers uses the pace and line of the ball to guide it towards third man, placing it fine enough to beat the fielder
yadav to kohli, no run, played towards point from the crease
yadav to kohli, 1 run, flicked to warner at deep square once again, they don't even think about the second
morkel to pujara, no run, played back to the bowler from the crease
morkel to pujara, no run, pace and bounce from morkel outside off, pujara lets it go
morkel to pujara, no run, played from the crease towards backward point
hopes to tiwary, 1 run, hopes tumbles to the ground on his follow through and tiwary pushes the ball past him for a single
hopes to pujara, no run, nudged off the hips towards midwicket
hopes to tiwary, 1 run, nudged off the hips towards square
pathan to pujara, 1 run, defended with soft hands on the off side and good running from the batsmen, focussing on the singles
pathan to tiwary, no run, played towards backward point, pathan makes a strong comeback after getting caned in his first over

nagar to pujara, out, that's a really long hop but pujara has picked out the incredible warner at deep midwicket. nagar gave pujara plenty of time to place the ball but all he managed to do was go back and loft it straight to the fielder. could have hit that anywhere really.
nagar to tiwary, 1 run, swatted from outside off towards deep midwicket
pathan to vettori, 1 bye, vettori misses the force through the off side and the keeper fumbles it
pathan to tiwary, 1 run, flicked through midwicket for a single

pathan to vettori, 4 byes, vettori blinds the keeper and even though he misses the heave from outside off he ensures the keeper can't see it as well, he moved outside off to block the keeper's vision and swung across the line
morkel to tiwary, 1 no ball, he over-steps! tiwary plays the ball on the off side and wants the risky single, vettori sends him back, free-hit coming up ...
morkel to mithun, no run, mithun is the new batsman, he swings and misses

morkel to mithun, out, mindless batting from mithun. he just needs to stay there with vettori, but what does he do? attempts a big shot, that's what. he mis-times it in the air and yadav takes the catch at deep extra cover
yadav to syed mohammad, no run, mohammad edges the ball into the ground towards the keeper
yadav to syed mohammad, 1 run, bat on ball towards cover and vettori charges through for the single
yadav to syed mohammad, four runs, mohammad you beauty! he uses the pace of the ball and steers the ball deftly towards third man and beats the diving fielder
hopes to vettori, four runs, vettori swings the game decisively towards bangalore by making room and slicing the ball in the air and into the gap on the backward point boundary
hopes to vettori, 1 run, vettori moves back and gently swats the ball along the ground through midwicket
hopes to syed mohammad, 1 run, mohammad tries to drive but ends up slicing the ball through point to warner in the deep

pathan to goswami, no run, lovely ball. irfan special, circa 2003. comes in with the angle, lands outside off and bends away magically. better batsmen have fallen to it, but goswami doesn't edge as he pokes.
pathan to goswami, 1 run, this time too straight, ends up on the hips and goswami tucks it square for one
pathan to kallis, no run, irfan's got that swing going in the first over, comes in drastically and kallis adjusts to play it back down the track
morkel to goswami, 1 wide, morne begins with a big wide down the leg side
pathan to kallis, no run, kallis tries to counter the swing by walking across the stumps and looking for the on side, but can't get it away.
pathan to kallis, 1 run, this time kallis gets the single, flicking with the movement towards midwicket
pathan to goswami, no run, goswami goes fishing. only salmons of doubt for him. irfan again gets it to curl away.
pathan to goswami, no run, now he backs away and looks to slash, but again the ball is in another zip code as irfan continues to banana it away.
pathan to goswami, 1 run, finally goswami gets behind the line, and defends from middle and off towards mid-on for a pinched single.
morkel to goswami, 1 run, this one is a touch wider of the stumps, goswami rides the bounce and plays it into the off side

pathan to kallis, out, irfan's classical inducker has struck, but not the way you would expect it to. as always it lands on off and middle and curls in, searching for the bat-pad gap, but kallis has bounded outside off stump already. he ends up well outside and looks to flick as the ball moves in sharply, and kallis' glance can't make contact. leg stump. clatter.
pathan to gambhir, no run, gambhir skates out first ball and looks to crack him through the covers! hits it hard, but finds venu in the covers.

pathan to goswami, four runs, vicious from irfan, and goswami can be proud that he even got bat on that. it landed on leg stump, moved away like a yo-yo and took the outside edge as it was headed to slip. the edge was thick enough to take it away from sehwag at the lone slip. what a spell from irfan!
yadav to gambhir, four runs, stand and deliver. gambhir gets a foot of room outside off, sets up a solid base on leg stump and smashed it through the covers with a hint of disdain.
agarkar to tiwary, 1 wide, more vintage agarkar. wide down the leg side
agarkar to gambhir, no run, angled across gauti, who opens the face and drives solidly into the mid-off area.
agarkar to tiwary, no run, another almighty swing. and a miss. from tiwary. he needs to settle down here.
agarkar to gambhir, 1 run, gambhir hangs back and opens the face to steer a single backward of point.
agarkar to tiwary, no run, agarkar is hitting his straps now. it's a day for seamers on a comeback trail. another one darts away off the seam, and tiwary pokes uncertainly
agarkar to gambhir, no run, that's as close to a wide as you will get without actually being called. two feet outside off, gambhir can't reach it from leg stump, though he swings hard. not called.
hopes to tiwary, no run, and he begins with a bumper, tiwary ducks under it.
hopes to tiwary, 1 wide, well outside off at 122 kph, tiwary wafts at it without moving the feet at all, and can't get bat on it.
