agarkar to tiwary, four runs, agarkar's bleeding now. another leg-stump offering, tiwary makes it worse by moving across and the whip-slaps him behind square leg for four more.
agarkar to gambhir, no run, gambhir looks to slam him through the off side, he comes out and looks to go big through the covers, but can't connect.
morkel to tiwary, 1 run, wisely lands this outside off, tiwary dabs a single to point.
morkel to pathan, no run, beats him first ball with a smart ball outside off that holds its line and hurries on. yusuf feels inside the line and misses.
morkel to tiwary, no run, width outside off, tiwary reaches and steers but finds point.
hopes to pathan, 1 wide, this one slips too far down the leg side, and is called.
hopes to pathan, 1 run, keeps it just outside off this time, yusuf pushes at it from the crease, and gets a single.
yadav to tiwary, no run, aha, tight, he plays straight to sehwag at midwicket, and yusuf backs up too far down before returning. a direct hit might have got him out.
yadav to tiwary, 1 run, width outside off, tiwary dabs backward of point for one.
pathan to tiwary, 1 run, tiwary leans out to a ball outside off, and picks a single into the off side
pathan to ten doeschate, no run, rtd defends from the crease, not much movement for irfan now.
pathan to ten doeschate, 1 run, just enough room outside off for rtd to slash away backward of point for a single
yadav to tiwary, no run, umesh hits the deck hard again, a touch wide of off stump and manoj swishes and misses.
yadav to ten doeschate, 1 wide, wide, too far outside off and called.
yadav to tiwary, 2 runs, he's given him some width outside off, and tiwary carves it away towards third man
yadav to tiwary, 1 run, good ball to end a good spell, 145 kph and hurrying into the right hander, who dabs it into the off side.
morkel to tiwary, no run, again tiwary moves too far away, and ends up struggling to reach a ball landed well outside off.
lee to warner, 1 wide, pacy but well outside off, it is called a wide as he leaves.
lee to warner, 1 run, tight run thing, and they are away. warner pushes into the covers and they scoot across.
balaji to sehwag, 1 run, brave from bala, gives him more width and sehwag goes in the air. there is protection at deep cover this time, though.
balaji to warner, 1 run, warner is on the backfoot again, stifled appeal from bala, but this landed outside leg before hitting him in line. leg bye taken.

balaji to sehwag, four runs, that ball made its way to the fence at mach 3. again a touch of width outside off, sehwag stays beside the line and clatters it away backward of point, this time along the turf. where that bat speed came from, only sehwag knows.
balaji to sehwag, no run, better line, comes in and finishes on off stump and sehwag plays it into the off side
unadkat to hopes, no run, straighter this time, hopes tries to nurdle to the leg side, but finds the fielder
unadkat to hopes, 1 run, this one lands outside leg and hence it doesn't matter that he got it to move away, hopes was always inside the line and flicked it away square.

iqbal abdulla to hopes, 1 wide, and you wonder why no other tweaker is playing. abdulla ambles in, lands it outside off and gets it to rip away a mile and a half. hopes looks like he just saw a ghost. shreevats did well to get a glove to it.
iqbal abdulla to hopes, no run, saner ball, he gets behind the line and defends to mid-off

iqbal abdulla to hopes, no run, everyone's caught by surprise. abdulla's dropped a return catch. it stopped on hopes who was looking to force into thew off side and he patted it right back down the track. abdulla was wrong footed and could not arrest the momentum enough to catch it. sehwag was scrambling back in, in a hurry.
unadkat to hopes, 1 run, over-pitched, hopes reaches across and smashes it straight. lee does well to run across from long off and keep it to one.

unadkat to pathan, 1 run, missed run out. irfan pokes into the off side and hurries across, unadkat follows through well, goes down and swivels as he picks it up, and has a go, but misses the stumps. hopes would have been gone if he had hit.
unadkat to hopes, four runs, the pressure releases a touch, as hopes mows another tight ball, just past midwicket in the circle. he did not time the shot well, but got it to the right of the fielder.
unadkat to pathan, no run, it's just 129 kph, but unadkat's lines are impeccable. irfan takes no risk, he just ducks under it.
kallis to pathan, no run, over-pitched outside off, irfan tries to winkle the square drive away but still no luck with the placement.
iqbal abdulla to hopes, no run, sharp turn again from outside off, played with the spin into the covers.

iqbal abdulla to pathan, out, this time, no pathan c pathan. this time, it is pathan c rtd. looks like irfan was the designated attacker in this stand, he skated out to the first ball of spin he was facing and looked to cart him with the spin over midwicket. didn't hit it well enough, and rtd settled under it in the deep.
pathan to birt, 1 run, this one skids on from round the stumps, birt deflects to the leg side for one more
pathan to hopes, 1 run, this one turns too much down the leg side, and hopes whips square for one more.
pathan to birt, no run, fired in at 95 kph, birt defends quietly
iqbal abdulla to birt, 2 runs, hopes forces into the covers, and warner shows his worth by running for him at double quick speed. they get a couple.

iqbal abdulla to hopes, 2 byes, aha, did he get anything on that? no. more sharp turn for abdulla, hopes lookes sheepish after swinging straight and misses as it turns away from him. they run two byes.
iqbal abdulla to birt, 1 run, only nine from the over as birt guides another ball towards backward point for one. where is the in-form venugopal?
pathan to venugopal rao, no run, rao is the new man in, and he defends the first ball to the leg side
iqbal abdulla to ojha, 1 run, plays the first ball with the spin into the covers for one.
lee to venugopal rao, 1 run, deft. slower ball, venu spots it late and belatedly chooses to dab it away to third man for one more.

lee to nagar, 2 runs, bombards nagar with a bumper, and he pushes an iffy single to the leg side. almost a run out, lee runs after it, collects at throws at the stumps but he misses. one over throw taken, yusuf backs up well to limit the damage.
lee to venugopal rao, 1 run, stabs the last ball towards point, and they take another dodgy single. another direct hit could have posed problems.
unadkat to venugopal rao, 1 run, angling across outside off, dabbed cautiously to third man. they can't afford caution anymore.
unadkat to nagar, no run, smart. he knows nagar is backing away, and keeps it well outside off but just inside the tramlines. he can't reach it.
unadkat to nagar, no run, and again, even better. nagar scoots out and looks to guide, but can't squeeze it away.
balaji to morkel, no run, dot ball to start off, morkel misses a slower ball that comes in ipl 2012. swing and a miss.
balaji to morkel, no run, bala wisely keeps it as wide outside off as possible. morne backs away, and despite his height he can't reach this.

balaji to yadav, 1 run, delhi have lost five games. not good for them. yadav drives the last ball to mid-off for a single. not close to enough. the kotla bustles without the kind of energy that was there earlier in the day. finally, gambhir has a half-smile.
menaria to tendulkar, 1 run, nudged through midwicket for a single
singh to jacobs, 1 wide, jacobs charges down and moves a touch towards off and swings hard, he misses but the umpire thinks the ball was too wide outside off
singh to jacobs, no run, the keeper stands up to the stumps and collects the ball outside off after jacobs swings hard and misses again
singh to jacobs, no run, pushed from the crease towards extra cover
watson to jacobs, 1 run, played with soft hands on the off side for a single
singh to rayudu, 1 run, mis-timed on the leg side after attempting a powerful heave and they run a quick single, rayudu had to hurry

menaria to tendulkar, out, there won't be any of tendulkar v warne today! menaria's got him! tendulkar charged the bowler, menaria tossed it up and slowed it down, tendulkar swung hard and connected with nothing, easy stumping
menaria to sharma, no run, rohit plays the ball towards cover
menaria to sharma, no run, rohit moves back and punches the ball towards cover point
menaria to rayudu, no run, played back to the bowler
singh to sharma, 1 run, after four dots, sharma pushes towards long-off and gets going
menaria to sharma, 1 run, played towards deep backward square leg
menaria to rayudu, no run, driven back to the bowler
warne to rayudu, 1 wide, warne drifts the ball outside leg but doesn't get it to turn this time
warne to sharma, no run, defended on the of side
warne to symonds, 1 run, driven towards long off for a single

warne to sharma, out, caught at long-off! sharma plays the lofted drive but doesn't place it high enough or wide enough to beat johan botha on the boundary, the mumbai juggernaut is losing steam in jaipur
watson to pollard, no run, pollard tries to nudge on the leg side and fails to make proper contact, top over from watson
warne to symonds, no run, defended back towards the bowler
watson to pollard, 1 run,
warne to symonds, no run, defended on the leg side
warne to pollard, 1 run, pollard goes deep into his crease and plays towards point
trivedi to symonds, 1 run, symonds plays from his crease towards cover point
botha to symonds, 1 run, played behind point for a single
botha to pollard, no run, played behind square
botha to symonds, no run, loud appeal for lbw, botha thinks it hit pad first perhaps. the batsman had played it to midwicket
trivedi to sathish, 1 run, sathish backs away towards leg and plays the ball towards long leg
trivedi to symonds, 1 run, symonds backs away and hits the ball with a flat bat towards long off
trivedi to sathish, 2 runs, sathish baks away this time and slugs the ball through midwicket
singh to murtaza, no run, murtaza tries to play the big drive through the off side but misses
singh to murtaza, no run, played from the crease towards point
singh to murtaza, no run, driven from the crease towards cover
watson to murtaza, 1 run, murtaza backs away to create room and drives the ball towards point
malinga to dravid, no run, played towards mid-off
patel to watson, no run, played on the leg side from the crease
patel to watson, no run, defended on the off side
patel to watson, no run, defended solidly from the crease towards the bowler
murtaza to dravid, 1 run, dravid backs away and forces the ball towards mid off to keep strike
murtaza to botha, 1 run, driven from the crease to long off
murtaza to watson, no run, this one keeps a bit low and watson hits it back to the bowler
murtaza to watson, no run, played back to the bowler again
harbhajan singh to botha, 1 run, botha moves back and pushes the ball towards mid-on
harbhajan singh to botha, no run, botha goes right back and just about manages to hit the ball with the bottom of his bat, he'd have been plumb otherwise
harbhajan singh to botha, no run, this time he inside-edges it on the leg side
sathish to botha, no run, played from the crease towards point
sathish to botha, 1 run, played behind point for a single
harbhajan singh to botha, no run, botha goes back and plays the ball towards the bowler
harbhajan singh to botha, 2 runs, driven towards wide long-off and the batsman want two, the throw from the deep is wide at the bowler's end
pollard to botha, no run, that's a massive offbreak from pollard and a massive-er appeal for lbw, that jagged back sharply from outside off and hit botha on the thigh, too high
pollard to botha, 2 runs, played towards deep square leg
pollard to watson, no run, watson drops the ball by his feet
pollard to watson, no run, played towards cover from the crease
murtaza to watson, no run, watson backs away to make room and mis-hits it towards the bowler
murtaza to botha, no run, defended towards cover from the crease
patel to taylor, no run, played from the crease towards point
patel to taylor, 1 run, taylor waits in his crease and dabs the ball towards third man
patel to botha, 2 runs, so deft, so late, botha opens the face to steer towards third man
patel to botha, 1 run, this one keeps low and beats the batsman and the keeper
pollard to taylor, 1 wide, wide down leg side, bowl that again says the umpire, well he didn't actually say it
pollard to taylor, 1 run, the keeper hits direct at the batsman's end after the batsman bottom edges the ball over his stumps, but the single has already been stolen
malinga to botha, no run, played towards mid-off
patel to menaria, no run, left alone outside off stump
patel to menaria, no run, defended once again towards the bowler

sathish to taylor, 1 run, dropped, taylor swipes across the line, gets a top edge that goes over the keeper, pollard runs towards it from behind point on the off side, gets both hands to it, and drops it, and rajasthan celebrate
lee to gilchrist, no run, a 139.4kmh ball follows, again tight around off, eased towards mid-off this time
lee to gilchrist, 1 run, first run for punjab and gilchrist, tapped off the backfoot towards mid-off and races through for the single

lee to valthaty, 1 run, valthaty starts nervously, an inside-edge as he looks push the ball to the off side, jags back in a touch, the ball dribbles towards backward square leg, keeper runs across to field, gilchrist was three-fourths through the run before valthaty responds, valthaty gets in the way of the throw and the stumps and makes his ground
lee to gilchrist, 1 run, on legstump to end the over, guided towards backward square leg by gilchrist, good start from lee
balaji to gilchrist, no run, closer to off than the first ball of the over, gilchrist looked to scythe that through point again, he misses
balaji to gilchrist, 1 run, well outside off from balaji, gilchrist doesn't try to power this one, just glides it towards fine leg
balaji to valthaty, 2 runs, slides it on to leg, whipped towards midwicket by valthaty
lee to gilchrist, four runs, pitching on middle and slanting towards leg, a hit-me ball, whacked by gilchrist to the midwicket boundary
iqbal abdulla to valthaty, no run, lovely ball from abdulla, tosses up his first ball to valthaty, pitching on off and turns past the outside edge
iqbal abdulla to valthaty, no run, jabs this one towards cover
pathan to valthaty, four runs, 'catch it,' yusuf screams as valthaty plays a lofted inside-out shot which just clears cover, yusuf has his hands on his head
pathan to gilchrist, 2 wides, down the leg side, keeper can't collect
pathan to marsh, no run, spins past the outside edge, starts outside off and turns away
pathan to marsh, no run, chopped towards point to end the over
iqbal abdulla to gilchrist, 1 run, finding it tough to play the spinners, gilchrist hits this uppishly to the left of the bowler
iqbal abdulla to marsh, no run, just outside off, blocked from the crease to the off side
pathan to karthik, no run, flatter delivery outside off, karthik blocks it
pathan to karthik, 1 run, tucked towards square leg for an ambled single
pathan to nayar, no run, ooh, pathan bowls that from round the wicket, gets the leading edge and the ball nearly pops back to the bowler

bhatia to karthik, out, another run-out, terrible cricket this from punjab, a defensive push from karthik towards point, morgan swoops on to that and the throw is a tough high for the keeper, who takes off the bails even as nayar puts in a dive, thats not enough for nayar, and things getting bad to worse for punjab, the edeh gardens crowd are enjoyed the saturday night
bhatia to karthik, no run,
tiwary to karthik, no run, even tiwary is getting the ball to turn here, edged towards the leg side
tiwary to karthik, no run, karthik gets a big stride in as he defends to the off side
tiwary to karthik, 1 run, driven along the ground towards long-off by karthik for a single
tiwary to hussey, 1 wide, keeper appeals loudly though that was way down the leg side and nowhere near the bat
bhatia to hussey, no run, sharp fielding from morgan, just outside off, chopped towards backward point

bhatia to hussey, no run, oh my, what is with punjab's running today? hussey pushes the ball towards extra cover, shouts 'wait, wait', karthik was dashing off, had to scramble back and he would have been safe even if there was a direct hit
bhatia to hussey, no run,
bhatia to hussey, 1 bye, this one keeps low, outside off and it  slips under the bat, takes the keeper by surprise as well, dribbles after hitting the keeper's glove
pathan to hussey, 2 runs, another call of 'catch' as the ball is whipped just wide of the midwicket fielder
pathan to hussey, 1 run, on middle and leg stump, tucked towards square leg, kolkata's slow bowlers doing a fantastic job here
pathan to karthik, no run, blocked towards the leg side from the crease
bhatia to hussey, 1 run,
bhatia to karthik, no run, blocked to the off side to end the over

iqbal abdulla to hussey, four runs, a rare misfield from kolkata, gambhir is not happy at that, gives the fielder the teapot, pushed towards backward point, the ball spins behind bhatia as he looks to field and it goes away for four
iqbal abdulla to hussey, 1 run, tucked to midwicket for a single
iqbal abdulla to hussey, no run, an lbw appeal from kolkata is turned down, pitching on middle and turning sharply, hits him on the thigh on the back leg, that was going to miss off

iqbal abdulla to hussey, out, another big lbw appeal, this time the umpire is convinced, the big wicket of hussey for abdulla, he's having a great season, this was fired in quick, hussey looking for the spin but there isn't no extravagant turn, slips past the bat and on to the pad, was that doing enough to take legstump? i'm not sure it was, the umpire does though
bhatia to karthik, no run, defends the first ball
bhatia to karthik, no run, another dot ball, blocked to the leg side this time
balaji to bipul sharma, 2 runs, a very slow delivery from balaji, 102kmh, bipul waits for it and guides it behind backward point, appeal for a run out but bipul is safe
lee to karthik, no run, wants to wallop the first ball of lee's spell, mistimed towards mid-on

lee to karthik, 1 run, out, one more run out? moves towards leg and carves the ball towards cover, throw fired in to the keeper, who is a yard away from the stumps, he throws the ball onto the stumps and karthik is gone, perhaps he might have made his ground if he dived, smartly done by shreevats
lee to kumar, 2 runs, hit to long-off, they take the single after praveen muscled the ball past the bowler, there is an extra run after that with an overthrow
kumar to kallis, 1 run, ooh, that one came on sharply, whipped towards midwicket by kallis, that one came in a long way
kumar to morgan, no run, praveen always gets the ball to nip around early, this game is no different, moves away from morgan and beats the outside edge
kumar to morgan, no run, skates down the track and slaps the ball towards point

bhatt to kallis, out, bharghav bhatt has got  big wicket, he makes the first one turn a long way, kallis is surprised by that, and checks his shot, ball loops to cover for an overhead catch, punjab fight
kumar to morgan, four runs, the bottom hand comes off as morgan slams that one over mid-on, inside half off the bat, lands a few yards inside the rope
hussey to gambhir, 1 run, hussey starts round the wicket, well outside off, dabbed towards backward point
hussey to gambhir, 1 run, providing plenty of width in this over, chopped towards point
bhatt to gambhir, 1 run, outside leg stump, tucked behind square leg

bhatt to morgan, out, superb catch from ryan harris ends morgan's cameo, an effortless chip shot from morgan towards deep midwicket, harris charges in from the deep and takes the ball low as it was dipping on him, punjab need more of these if they are to make a fight of it
bhatt to gambhir, no run, eased back to the bowler
bhatt to gambhir, 1 run, nudged to midwicket for a single
harris to tiwary, no run, extra bounce for harris, tiwary wanted to guide that to third man but can't connect
chawla to gambhir, 3 wides, spins the first one down the leg side
chawla to gambhir, no run, fired in quicker, defended to square leg
hussey to tiwary, no run, this time he tosses it up, driven towards mid-off
chawla to tiwary, 1 run, eased towards extra cover for a single
bhatt to tiwary, 1 run, stabs it towards point
bhatt to gambhir, 1 run, drilled down to long-off for a single
bhatt to tiwary, 1 run, guided towards point for a sharp single
bipul sharma to gambhir, 1 wide, spins it down the leg side
bipul sharma to gambhir, 1 run, pitching outside off and turning in, played form the crease towards cover
bipul sharma to tiwary, no run, dabbed to point, tiwary wanted one, gambhir didn't
valthaty to tiwary, four runs, lovely work from tiwary, he's in superb form, another attempted slower ball, tiwary opens the face and guides it fine past the keeper for four
valthaty to tiwary, no run, bowling at a rajat bhatia pace, guided towards backward point
bipul sharma to gambhir, 1 run, dabbed to point
bipul sharma to tiwary, 1 wide, wide outside off
bipul sharma to gambhir, 1 run, turns in sharply, gambhir adjust well, he was initially looking for an expansive shot, check it to carve the ball to cover
valthaty to gambhir, 1 run, a single to cover brings up the century, 20 to go
valthaty to tiwary, 1 run, turns into tiwary, who tucks the ball to midwicket
valthaty to gambhir, 1 run, guided down towards fine leg for a single
valthaty to tiwary, no run, looks to muscle the ball out of the ground, mistimes it and the ball reaches mid-on on the bounce
chawla to tiwary, no run, charges out once more, but can't get under this one, slammed towards cover
chawla to tiwary, 1 wide, turns past the leg  stump, punjab have given away nearly 10% of the target in wides
bhatt to gambhir, no run, gambhir waltzes out of the crease and whips the ball,can't beat hussey at midwicket again
bhatt to gambhir, 1 run, swiped towards deep midwicket this time for a single
bhatt to tiwary, no run, tiwary wanted to slam that against the spin and into the crowd, can't connect
bhatt to tiwary, no run, jabbed to backward point, another dot ball to end
duminy to vijay, no run, flat on middle and leg now, he turns it towards square leg, can't get the single
christian to hussey, 1 run, gets lot of width outside off stump, and guides it past point towards third man
sharma to hussey, no run, ishant runs in and angles this one across the left-hander who leaves it alone
sharma to hussey, four runs, how much is that drop going to cost deccan? hussey gets some width outside off and lays in to it, hammering it past cover in an instant
duminy to raina, no run, flatter this time, turned away to square leg
christian to hussey, 1 run, well done from hussey, stays back in the crease, lets this one come on, and then quietly dabs it late to third man
mishra to raina, no run, flatter delivery, suresh plays with the turn to midwicket
mishra to raina, no run, turned away towards square leg, tidy over from mishra
harmeet singh to raina, 1 run, plays this one away towards midwicket for a single
mishra to hussey, 1 run, flat delivery picked from leg stump behind square leg
mishra to raina, 1 run, once again on leg stump, well, well, this time suresh cannot beat the man running in from deep square leg
harmeet singh to hussey, no run, pushes this one hard back at the bowler who manages to field it cleanly

harmeet singh to dhoni, 1 run, there is a mid off in place, but he will have to be twice as quick as he was to beat dhoni who pushes the ball in his direction and sets off with those big strides and gets home comfortably in the end
ojha to raina, 1 wide, this one turns down leg even as suresh looks to help it fine
ojha to dhoni, no run, gets turn on this one from off stump, dhoni stretches out to push it to point
ojha to dhoni, no run, more turn for ojha around off stump, dhoni uneasily pushes it back
mishra to dhoni, 1 run, tucks it away to deep midwicket for a run
harmeet singh to dhoni, 1 run, takes it from way outside off stump, and hammers it down to deep midwicket
harmeet singh to raina, 1 run, angles this one wide outside off stump, would have been called one had raina not reached out to squeeze it away to cover, that will be 50 for suresh, well played
ojha to raina, out, this time suresh goes, skips down the track again, and lifts ojha with the turn to deep midwicket who runs some steps to his left and holds on comfortably, it is shikhar
sharma to dhoni, 1 run, dhoni again remains in the crease and whips this one with the angle through square leg
sharma to morkel, 1 no ball, goodness me, what was that, ishant sprays this one high in the air, fortunately for albie it was miles outside off stump, and pitched well after it had passed the stumps
morkel to dhawan, 1 run, pushed in to the leg side for a  single
morkel to sohal, 1 wide, albie sprays this one wide

morkel to sohal, four runs, now sohal the conjurer brings up four, backs away, but finds the ball following him, even as he falls away, he manages to get a bit of angled bat on it and sends it wide of third man

morkel to sohal, four runs, if the future looks back towards history for variety, it will have to look no further than this over, ending up two feet outside leg stump, sohal sees morkel angle it in to him, and gets the dab well past dhoni in to the third man boundary, beat that
ashwin to sohal, 1 bye, tries toe play the dab again, but ashwin is no morkel, and crucially, sohal is not backing away, it bounces extra as he misses, dhoni fails to gather as well
ashwin to dhawan, 1 run, pushed away towards midwicket for a single
randiv to sohal, 1 wide, tries to dab fine one that turns down leg, misses, this time dhoni does not

randiv to sohal, four runs, sohal cannot do anything wrong, if he does, chennai are there to reprieve him, this time he repeats the shot, does not get enough elevation but will still get the boundary towards deep midwicket
randiv to sohal, no run, the straighter one that randiv bowls, leaves sohal clueless for once as he stabs inside the line from the crease
ashwin to sohal, no run, the carrom ball, almost pushes it back in the air to ashwin
ashwin to sohal, no run, played away towards midwicket this time
jakati to dhawan, 1 run, shikhar meanwhile continues to pick up unruffled singles on the off side
randiv to chipli, no run,
randiv to chipli, 3 runs, gets a leading edge as he closes the face too early, the ball runs behind point, and they comes back for the third
randiv to dhawan, no run, good over from suraj, sees him charge out and angles it in, shikhar can only push it on the off side
randiv to dhawan, no run, tries to help this one fine down the leg side, misses, dhoni hangs his leg out trying to stop it, all happening
randiv to chipli, 1 run, flicks this one in the air past midwicket
jakati to dhawan, no run, comes out and pushes this one to extra cover
jakati to dhawan, 1 run, now he gets the single away through covers

jakati to dhawan, out, gets his man this time, reward for some fine bowling in this over, shikhar went for the big mow over midwicket from way outside off stump, and the ball turned in sharply to strike timber
randiv to sangakkara, 2 runs, good running, tucked away towards square leg, even as two men and dhoni rush towards it, sanga comes back for the second
jakati to sangakkara, six runs, super strike from sanga, fetches this from outside off, gets down on a knee and swings it over midwicket for one of the flattest sixes you'll ever see, or read about
jakati to sangakkara, no run, dug back to the bowler
ashwin to white, no run, the carrom ball, on leg stump, and he gets the leading edge back to the bowler
ashwin to white, no run, pushes a flatter one towards extra cover
ashwin to white, no run, skips down the track but cannot get the single as he finds midwicket
ashwin to sangakkara, 1 run, brilliant over from ashwin so far, sanga goes back to turn this one to deep midwicket

bollinger to white, no run, lovely slower one from bollinger at 117.7 kph as he follows white who had backed away outside leg, pats it back to the bowler in the end, getting tougher and tougher for deccan
bollinger to mishra, out, it's all over, christian has to go, mishra charged and missed, christian wanted the bye, was nowhere in the picture when dhoni found the stumps
bollinger to mishra, out, dougie gets another wicket with the last ball, he makes room and has a swing, but the edge loops tamely back to bollinger who takes it low to his left
bhatt to tendulkar, no run, bowled slowly through the air, and pitches around leg, sachin tucks it backward of square even as bhatt's appeal is turned down
kumar to jacobs, 2 byes, width outside off this time, and davy goes hard at it, the edge rolls away past keeper and the lone slip

kumar to jacobs, four runs, dropped, right past the man at slip, pk gets the edge, davy stabs at it as it pitches around middle, nayar cannot get down to it quickly as it flies to his left, sharp chance but could have taken
kumar to jacobs, no run, pushes this one back to the bowler, who bangs the ball on the pitch in disgust, still smarting over the dropped chance
kumar to rayudu, 1 run, nicely done by rayudu, stays in the crease, allows the ball to come beside him around off and guides it towards point for a single
kumar to tendulkar, 1 run, hardly any swing on offer for pk, sachin pushes it towards covers and sets off for the run even as pk charges after the ball
bipul sharma to tendulkar, 1 run, driven along the ground to long off for a single
bipul sharma to rayudu, no run, good comeback from the bowler, gets rayudu to come out and push this one back in the air towards him as it dips on him, on the bounce to the bowler
bhatt to tendulkar, no run, stays back and looks to tuck him towards midwicket, but cannot time it much further from the pitch, gilchrist rushes after the ball as sachin rushes back in his crease
harris to tendulkar, 1 run, now shifts his weight back and tucks this one again through midwicket to keep the strike
bipul sharma to tendulkar, 2 wides, goes very wide the angle down the leg side, gilly cannot collect it cleanly
bipul sharma to tendulkar, 1 run, hangs back this time, and tucks it away through square leg
bipul sharma to tendulkar, 1 run, now he turns it behind square leg for a run
chawla to tendulkar, 1 run, gets a leading edge in to the covers for a single
kumar to rayudu, four runs, even better, marginally outside off stump, enough for rayudu, who sends it scurrying it past point with a quick swing of the arms
kumar to rayudu, no run, pk gets away with this one, again rayudu was eyeing the deep point boundary, but could not beat the man at point
chawla to tendulkar, 2 runs, goes through extra cover, it is david hussey who lets sachin's drive go through his hands
chawla to tendulkar, 1 run, pushed away on to the leg side for a single
chawla to rayudu, 1 run, rayudu is going after everything now, charges down the track, getting too close to the ball and belts it down to long off
chawla to tendulkar, no run, drives this one in the air back to the bowler, sachin getting a bit stuck here
bhatt to rayudu, 1 run, charges out to lift him over midwicket but he bowls it flat and rayudu mistimes it along the ground
bhatt to tendulkar, 1 run, comes down the track and brings up the 100, pinging long off with the drive
bhatt to rayudu, no run, once again, rayudu charges out and has a huge swing, inside edging it on to the pad
bhatt to rayudu, four runs, this time rayudu gets it away, slowed down the charge down the track, went inside the line and smote it over the bowler's head

bhatt to rayudu, 1 run, dropped rayudu bashes this one to bhatt's right with lots of power, he gets both hands to it and the grenade slips from his grasp, he is left rubbing his hands and wondering why they had to get in the way

chawla to rayudu, four runs, chawla gets rayudu to mistime this one, rayudu lofts it high in the air, harris at long off seemed to have it covered, but ended up getting too much inside the ropes, the ball went over his head and in to the boundary, that will be 50 for ambati
chawla to rayudu, no run, pushes the quicker one to point
chawla to tendulkar, 1 run, tucked away backward of square leg for a single

valthaty to pollard, 2 runs, 109.5 kph from valthaty, pollard takes one hand off the bat as he reaches out for it, still gets enough power on the inside edge to make deep square leg run hard to his left
chawla to sharma, 1 run, swung away through square leg for a single
bhatt to symonds, no run, pushed back toe the bowler
bhatt to symonds, 1 run, flicked through square leg to bring rohit on strike
bhatt to symonds, 1 run, symonds goes hard with the turn, beating extra cover but can't beat long off
harris to symonds, 1 run, hit towards deep midwicket, the ball travels fast off symonds' blade and there isn't enough time to come back for the second
harbhajan singh to valthaty, no run, turning in on leg stump, played away towards midwicket
harbhajan singh to valthaty, 1 run, wound himself up for the big shot over the off side, but again reined himself in to push in to covers
ahmed to valthaty, 1 run, goes hard at a wide one outside off, couple of bounces to harbhajan at third man, who does well to grab it as it flies towards him
ahmed to marsh, 1 run, slower one, he picks it, stays back and guides it towards point, takes on pollard with the throw that misses at the non-striker's end
ahmed to valthaty, 1 run, sachin at mid off is deep, valthaty goes hard at it and mistimes it to sachin, but is able to take the single
patel to marsh, 1 run, tries to chop this one from middle stump to third man, mistimes it towards point
pollard to marsh, 1 run, good slower one from pollard, marsh picks it late and pushes it on the off side
patel to marsh, 1 leg bye, misses the whip across the line, munaf thinks that is hitting the stumps, and appeals, looked a bit high

pollard to karthik, out, that is hitting leg stump if there is no inside edge, dinesh walks across his stumps looking for the single to square leg, misses and right away umpire reiffel raises his finger, does not seem to be any inside edge on the replays
ahmed to nayar, 1 run, nayar goes a foot outside leg stump, sees this one angled across and throws his bat at it, sending it through point
ahmed to marsh, 1 run, smashed down to long off for a single this time

harbhajan singh to marsh, four runs, thinking that marsh will charge out, harbhajan fires this one wide across marsh, who hangs back, reaches out and thrashes it to the cover boundary, that will be another serene 50 for marsh
harbhajan singh to marsh, 1 run, turned away towards midwicket

harbhajan singh to nayar, out, gone this time, harbhajan slants this one across nayar as he sees him coming out, nayar has to really stretch out to get to it, and manages to tamely push it for symonds to take a diving catch at extra cover
malinga to bipul sharma, out, the inevitable has happened, slanted in from a low height, homes in flat on the stumps, bipul can't do anything, off stump is in the way, and is uprooted
malinga to chawla, no run, piyush gets another one zooming in on the stumps, but he manages to get bat on it, nearly a run out but point misses with the direct hit
harbhajan singh to chawla, 1 run, plonked on the wicket and they rush through for the single
patel to kumar, no run, slower one from munaf angling in, pk backed away but could not do anything with it as it kept a touch low
sharma to kallis, no run, hits the pitch hard, on middle and leg, turns it towards square leg
sharma to kallis, no run, again uncharacteristic from kallis, offers a bit of width, he charges down the track and tries to murder that through the off side but is nowhere near it
steyn to morgan, no run, slower one this time from steyn, steps out and has to reach for it in the end, pushes it towards extra cover
christian to morgan, 1 wide, resumes with a wide, saw morgan charging out and slipped it well wide outside off
dhawan to kallis, 1 run, landing on middle and off, gets across and dabs it into the leg side for a single
christian to kallis, 1 run, angling it towards middle, gets across and turns it wide of midwicket for a single
ojha to gambhir, 1 run, ojha lands that on middle and leg, turned away past square leg for a single
ojha to kallis, 1 run,
ojha to gambhir, 1 run, made room and slapped it towards deep extra cover for a single
mishra to kallis, 1 run, slapped towards deep cover
mishra to gambhir, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
mishra to gambhir, 1 run, pushed past point
mishra to gambhir, 1 run,
ojha to gambhir, four runs, trotted out and punches it over the bowler's head for a boundary, lovely to watch
mishra to tiwary, 1 run, pushes it towards mid-on for another single, deccan putting the brakes on here

ojha to pathan, 1 run, dropped, that's a big miss, yusuf survives, a swipe towards deep midwicket and mishra should have taken that, it wasn't that difficult, he got under that one near the rope, and let it slip through his fingers
mishra to pathan, 2 runs, hustles straight through, yusuf get back in the crease and tucks the ball towards deep midwicket, great running from tiwary to pinch the second
mishra to pathan, no run, slapped towards point by yusuf

mishra to pathan, six runs, bang! power from yusuf, that was an awesome hit, barely had any elevation, flew flat and long, wide outside off, yusuf brutalised it over wide long-off for a six to give deccan something to ponder during the strategic time-out
steyn to tiwary, 1 run, tiwary does the sensible thing, chopping the ball to cover for a single that brings yusuf on strike
steyn to tiwary, 1 run, outside off, pushed towards extra cover for a single, tiwary's strike-rate has quickly climbed to close to a run-a-ball
sharma to tiwary, (no ball) 1 run, ishant can't finish off what was a decent over, he sprays a high no-ball on legstump, easily above waist high, helped along to fine leg, ishant apologises
christian to tiwary, 1 leg bye, slower one bowled outside leg just as he saw the batsman making room, tries to tickle it fine, steals a leg bye in the end
sharma to pathan, 2 runs, pitched outside off, yusuf makes room and slices it over point, chipli runs to his left from deep point and drags it just inside the ropes, just a couple in the end
steyn to tiwary, 1 run, slower one as he saw him make room, tiwary pushed it towards point for a single
steyn to pathan, 1 leg bye, slower one and yusuf picked it really late, tried to clear square leg but sneaked a leg bye in the end
lee to sohal, no run, nicely driven, pitched p on the off, pushed towards cover point where morgan fumbled while throwing but there was no damage done
iqbal abdulla to sohal, 1 run, angling towards middle and leg, turned through midwicket for an easy single

iqbal abdulla to sohal, 5 runs, five runs, mistimed a swipe to mid-on where rajat bhatia fielded it on the bounce and tried to throw down the stumps at the non-striker's end, sohal was gone had it hit as he didn't even try to ground his bat, so a missed run-out. add to that the fact that there was no one backing up
iqbal abdulla to dhawan, no run,
iqbal abdulla to dhawan, 1 run, comes down the track and drives it towards mid-off for a quick single
balaji to sohal, four runs, poor delivery with the fine leg up, angling in towards middle and leg from wide of the crease, sohal gets back and tickles it to the fine-leg boundary
balaji to dhawan, 1 run, in the channel outside off from round the wicket, tapped into the off side for another comfortable single
bhatia to white, 1 run, tapped it just wide of point to race through for a single

iqbal abdulla to dhawan, 1 bye, attempting the shot again, tried to reverse-slap it to point, seemed as though there was a bit of an under-edge that the wicketkeeper failed to get his hands on, it's given byes though
pathan to dhawan, 1 run, angling it towards middle from round the wicket, turned away into the leg side for a single
pathan to white, 1 run, a single, comes down the track and whips him past square leg for a single
pathan to ravi teja, 1 run,
pathan to dhawan, 1 run, fires it quick on middle, gets a leading edge as he tries to close the face, a single wide of extra cover
pathan to ravi teja, no run, pushes it towards extra cover, ravi wants the single but dhawan rightly sends him back
kallis to dhawan, out, deccan are sliding here, dhawan walked way too across, kallis targeted off stump, tried to clip it fine, missed and the off stump was sent on its way.
morkel to watson, no run, there's a slip in place for some away swing for morkel and he got the smallest hint of that first up, left alone
morkel to watson, 1 run, gentle nudge into the leg-side as watson gets off the mark
morkel to dravid, 1 run, pushed into the off side, soft hand, quick running ensures the one
bollinger to dravid, no run, moves across dravid, no need to play at that one
morkel to dravid, no run, driven back to the bowler, morkel does his own fielding
morkel to dravid, no run, good line, defended back to the bowler
morkel to watson, no run, shapes away from morkel and its too wide for watson to play at, he reaches far out but can't get to it
morkel to watson, no run, driven to the covers, there's a man there and it looks as though he may have put it down
bollinger to dravid, 1 leg bye, hits dravid around the hip, squrits off towards dhoni and the leg-bye is taken
bollinger to watson, no run, driven to point, not much footwork involved there
morkel to watson, four runs, too much width and watson can lift that over point to third man with some style
ashwin to dravid, 1 run, pushed to deep mid-wicket, flat delivery
ashwin to watson, no run, turned to square leg
ashwin to watson, four runs, swept past square leg, the man there has dived to his right but the fielding has been sloppy and he lets it through
ashwin to watson, 1 run, ashwin tosses it up, pushed past him and he can't stop it in time
ashwin to dravid, 1 run, flatter delivery again, pushed to mid-on
jakati to dravid, 1 run, makes some room for himself and pushed into the off side
jakati to watson, 1 run, slapped to the man at long-off
jakati to dravid, 2 runs, neatly played to deep extra cover, brings up the 50
jakati to dravid, no run, gives it a bit of air, dravid comes down the track and pushes back to the bowler
jakati to dravid, 1 run, flicked to deep mid-wicket, good start from jakarti
randiv to dravid, no run, pushed to mid-wicket, randiv coming round the wicket now
randiv to dravid, no run, stifled appeal for lbw, lots of air in that delivery and dravid misses the flick
randiv to dravid, four runs, randiv's over ends the way it started, gives it air and dravid sends that over mid-wicket for four
ashwin to dravid, 1 run, dabbed to backward point, some respite for ashwin maybe
ashwin to watson, four runs, not really, as watson gets an outside edge which flies to third man
jakati to menaria, 1 run, tucked away to mid-wicket, jakati rushes to field off his own bowling
jakati to dravid, 1 run, dravid brings up 50 and the crowd appreciate it handsomely. whipped to deep mid-wicket, jakati persisting with the flatter ones. first ipl 50 for dravid in rr colours
randiv to dravid, 1 run, played to deep backward point
randiv to menaria, no run, tosses it up and menaria defends back to him
randiv to menaria, 1 run, menaria makes a bit of room for himself, pushes that to point and gets a single to keep strike
ashwin to dravid, 1 run, played to deep mid-wicket
ashwin to dravid, 1 run, driven to long-off this time
randiv to dravid, 1 run, pushed to deep backward point
randiv to botha, 1 run, flatter and pushed to point
jakati to dravid, 1 run, shadab jakati back, played to deep extra cover
jakati to taylor, 2 runs, swept fine for a couple, that's the end of jakati and how good he has been today
randiv to dravid, 1 run, tosses it up and smacked to long off
randiv to dravid, 2 runs, strokes it in the same area and there's time for two
ashwin to rahane, no run, lots of air and defended into the leg-side
ashwin to taylor, four runs, top-spinner with some extra bounce, played very fine and gets the angle exactly right, runs to third man
ashwin to rahane, 1 wide, down the leg-side, first wide of the innings
ashwin to rahane, no run, quicker delivery, played back to the bowler
bollinger to taylor, 1 run, bollinger back and driven to long-off, just the one
bollinger to rahane, no run, wide outside off, big swing and a miss,

morkel to rahane, out, rahane walks across his stumps to get hold of that ball outside offstump, he ends up hitting straight up in the air as he tries to go aerial on the leg-side. morkel takes the catch off his own bowling.
morkel to binny, 1 run, driven into the covers, sucessful last over for morkel
bollinger to binny, 2 runs, clobbered down to long-off, no boundary off this over yet
doshi to hussey, no run, doshi to open the bowling, starts with a good delivery
doshi to vijay, no run, pushed onto the leg-side, bat and pad from vijay
doshi to vijay, no run, tosses it up and its defended solidly
doshi to vijay, no run, pushed onto the on-side
botha to vijay, 1 run, played with soft hands to square leg
botha to hussey, 1 run, flicked to mid-wicket and even though its straight to the fielder they are off for one
watson to hussey, no run, shane watson comes into the attack and starts off with one that is wide of offstump, needs some chasing and hussey pushes to mid-off
watson to hussey, 1 run, some chasing again, hussey gets a bottom edge onto the pad that rolls away for one
watson to raina, 1 run, raina drives that to long-off and sets off for the run as he hits it
botha to raina, 2 runs, driven to deep extar cover, watson is down on the rope and makes a good stop
trivedi to hussey, 1 run, driven to mid-off, its binny again and the batsmen run quickly.
trivedi to raina, 1 wide, just down the leg side, and it's called wide
trivedi to raina, 1 wide, trivedi's discipline doesn't look great so far, down leg again
trivedi to raina, 2 runs, turned delicately to deep mid-wicket, comfortable running for two
botha to hussey, 1 run, botha to bowl his third, played to mid-wicket
botha to raina, 1 run, driven down to long-off, it's all too easy here
botha to hussey, 1 run, flicked away into the gap this time, rolls through mid-wicket
botha to raina, 1 run, that gap through mid-wicket is there for the piercing and another single comes. warne wants a breather, it's time out time.
trivedi to raina, 1 run, turned to deep mid-wicket, wonder if the break had any effect on either side, let's see
trivedi to hussey, 1 wide, oh dear, trivedi! that's the third wide down the leg side.
trivedi to hussey, four runs, there comes the boundary, third man is up and hussey steers into the gap, just runs the ball of the face, angles the bat, waits for the ball well and 50 is up
trivedi to hussey, 1 run, on leg stump and pushed to square leg for one
warne to raina, no run, starts by tossing it up, raina is watchful and defends
warne to raina, 2 runs, and this time raina gets it away to deep backward point, the throw comes in flat and fast and raina has to put in the dive to be safe
warne to hussey, 1 run, driven on the leg-side again, fantastic start for warne
warne to raina, no run, and he finished off the over tidily. nudged onto the leg-side, defensive shot again.
watson to hussey, 2 runs, into the gap at deep backward point, it's up[ to the man on the boundary to save again
watson to raina, four runs, that's wayward from watson, he has strayed onto legstump and it was helped on it's way to the fine leg boundary.
watson to raina, 1 run, pushed down to third man
warne to raina, no run, driven into the covers
warne to raina, no run,
warne to raina, 1 run,
warne to hussey, four runs, charges out and picks up four
warne to hussey, 1 run, swept to the deep for one more
doshi to hussey, 1 run,
botha to raina, no run, flatter from botha, from round the wicket, raina defends. anti-climax.
botha to raina, 2 runs, cheeky little chip. botha tosses it up outside off, raina leans out and taps it over the infield.
botha to raina, no run, not rajasthan's night this. an uncertain call, a potential run-out. the result is an overthrow.
botha to raina, 1 run, raina taps with the turn into the covers and goes for another single.
binny to hussey, four runs, what a fine half-century. he's again shredded the wide ball through backward point for another four. seamless acceleration from the huss.
binny to hussey, 1 run, pushes a single to the leg side. over to raina. can he bring up 50 now?
watson to raina, 1 run, turned off the hips down to fine leg. all technical difficulties have been sorted on my side.
watson to hussey, 1 run, steered to third man, badri's father on the mic says his family is very happy because his sone has been in good form
warne to raina, 1 run, turned around to deep mid-wicket
warne to hussey, no run, hit hussey on the body, in the midriff really and warne is the only one appealing, too much bounce to give that
warne to raina, 1 run, pushed through mid-wicket
warne to raina, no run, warne finishes the over well, raina looks to steer it to third man but only pushes it down close to himself
trivedi to hussey, 1 run, pushed down to mid-off, they set off immediately for the run even though that was nothing more than a soft push
trivedi to hussey, no run, plays and misses, hussey comes down the track and can't connect
trivedi to hussey, 2 runs, pushed square of the wicket, nice, committed running and the two is on
trivedi to hussey, 2 runs, driven to mid-off, again hussey sets off as he hits it, small misfield by shane warne and the second run is on
menaria to hussey, 1 wide, poor ball from menaria, first up, down the leg side, wide
menaria to hussey, no run, hussey back on strike, showing how it's done but only gets it as far as the inner ring
menaria to hussey, 2 runs, played very fine, run down to third man, dravid gives chase and hauls it in, could this be the last over coming up?
watson to hussey, 1 run, turned down to fine leg, one shot could finish this now.
morkel to ravi teja, 1 leg bye, another one that moves past the prod and runs away of the pad
pathan to dhawan, 1 run, around the off stump line, steered to point region
salvi to dhawan, 1 run, turns this through backward square-leg for a single
pathan to sangakkara, no run, just outside off stump, steered to backward point

pathan to sangakkara, no run, he took couple of steps down the track, irfan didn't lose his composure for once and continued with his outswinger plan. sanga tried to chip it up and over the bowler but the ball curved away past the bat
salvi to sangakkara, no run, tries to heave this over wide mid-off region but makes no contact.
agarkar to dhawan, 1 run, tries to clip this middle-stump delivery to square-leg and edges it to his body. sanga calls him over for a quick single. he wants that strike. here we go.
morkel to sangakkara, no run, from round the stumps now, moving in with the angle, tapped to on side of the pitch and morne rushes across to kill the thought of the single
agarkar to dhawan, 1 run, pushes this towards covers. sanga wants a run, has to get back and manages to do it in time to beat the direct hit. overthrows, though.
venugopal rao to duminy, 1 run, duminy does the same to retain the strike
hopes to duminy, 1 run, pushes this through covers for a run
hopes to sangakkara, 1 wide, and so james pushes this even further outside off. wide, though.

salvi to christian, 1 run, tries to play the leg glance and it rolls away to fine-leg region. the umpire checks with him whether he got a touch on it ( that's my interpretation of that conversation) and signals.
salvi to duminy, 1 run, runs this down to third man for a single
salvi to christian, 1 wide, glen salvi pushes this down the leg side for a wide
salvi to christian, no run, around the off stump line, jabbed back down the track
salvi to christian, no run, around that off stump line, nudged to backward point
hopes to duminy, no run,
hopes to christian, no run, on the middle stump line, nudged to the on side
nagar to duminy, 2 runs, gets back to clip it through midwicket for couple of runs
nagar to duminy, six runs, crash bang wallop! jp time. he rushes down the track for the free hit and kills this delivery over midwicket boundary.

morkel to duminy, 1 run, out, jp is run out. he turned this to third man and returned for the second. the throws is flat and accurate and the keeper does the rest. entertaining knock ends. he ambled across for the first run and decided late to turn for the second. silly mistake.
morkel to christian, 1 run, driven to covers for a quick single
agarkar to christian, 1 run, just a single as he drives it hard but straight to long-off
salvi to malhotra, 1 run, pushes this to covers for a single
salvi to christian, 1 run, another mishit drive from dan. just a single to covers.
steyn to ojha, no run, this one kicks up outside off and ojha hops to stab it
steyn to ojha, 1 run, stays back to jab to left of backward point region for a single
sharma to sehwag, 1 run, jumps to ride the bounce and punches it to covers
sharma to ojha, no run, around the off stump line, tapped to backward point
steyn to sehwag, no run, gets behind the line to defend it to the off side of the pitch
sharma to venugopal rao, no run, in the zone outside off stump, venu holds his bat inside the line and allows it to pass through to the keeper
sharma to venugopal rao, no run, stays back to defend it to the off
christian to venugopal rao, 2 wides, sprays this down the leg side for a wide. sanga makes a half-stop
christian to venugopal rao, 1 run, just outside off stump, run down to third man
christian to sehwag, no run, gets back to work it to midwicket region
christian to sehwag, 1 wide, another wide down the leg side and sanga lunges out to collect it
sharma to sehwag, no run, in the zone outside off stump, left alone
sharma to sehwag, four runs, on the middle stump line but sehwag has almost taken an off-stump guard. off and middle may be. and he glances this easily to fine-leg boundary
christian to birt, no run, this time he allows the ball to pass through to sanga
christian to birt, no run, and again! birt is edgy out there. another iffy poke and the ball rushes past the edge
christian to sehwag, 1 run, on the off-stump line, steered to third man
christian to birt, 1 run, on the off-stump line, birt crouches to slash it to third man
christian to sehwag, 1 run, on the off stump line, tapped to cover point for a quick single
mishra to sehwag, six runs, huge! very very high! sehwag moved down the track for the violent six over the straight boundary!
mishra to birt, 2 runs, on the middle and leg line, turned through midwicket for couple of runs
christian to pathan, 1 run, tucks this wide of mid-on for a single

mishra to sehwag, four runs, dropped by ravi teja at long-off. mishra can't believe it! sehwag rushed down the track and ended up slicing it to right of long-off where teja did the work to get there in time but ended up clanging it
mishra to sehwag, 1 run, drags this behind square-leg for a single
steyn to sehwag, 1 run, slower one on the middle, dabbed to extra cover for a single
steyn to sehwag, 2 runs, connects this time and will get couple of runs
mishra to sehwag, no run, tries to heave this from outside off to the on side but makes no contact

mishra to sehwag, 1 run, moves down the track, amit pushes it well outside off and sehwag reaches out to stab it away for a single. for a moment, there was a danger of him getting stumped but he reached out to get some bat on the ball
mishra to pathan, 1 run, around the leg stump line, turned to square-leg
mishra to sehwag, 1 run, fetches it from outside off and drags it to deep midwicket for a single
sharma to pathan, 1 run, taps this gently to the off stump line and steals a single. sehwag gets across and is slightly late in grounding the bat but he will beat the direct hit from dan christian
sharma to sehwag, 1 run, moves outside leg, ishant follows him, sehwag jabs it to the off side for a single
steyn to hopes, 1 run, turned away for a single
steyn to pathan, no run, lifting delivery and it flies through to sanga
steyn to hopes, 1 run, backs away and lunges out to drive through extra cover for a single. lots of risk taken for a single and it was the last ball of steyn's over. hmmm
duminy to hopes, no run, stays back to tap this to midwicket
duminy to hopes, 1 run, on the middle and leg, turned through backward square-leg
kumar to gayle, no run, a bit further up this time, same result, this one moves away in the air, and then continues on that path, gayle manages another feeble push
kumar to gayle, four runs, this is more like gayle, after two went away, this one came in, gayle had already made up his mind, came down the track, and clobbered it over midwicket
kumar to dilshan, no run, gives him some width outside off stump, dilshan goes hard at it and punches without timing to mid off
harris to gayle, no run, and again, this time he backed away outside leg and came down the track as well, missed with the big swing, and the ball went over the stumps
harris to gayle, no run, gayle persists with the attempts at tonking the ball  out of sight, only issue is, he can't connect at the moment as he rushes down the track again
kumar to gayle, no run, pk continues to get the ball to move away appreciably, but this one is some way outside off stump, and for once gayle is happy to leave it alone
kumar to dilshan, no run, no matter what  the track is doing, dilshan knows no lower gear, he stands in the crease and tries to play his swat-drive, gets an inside edge as this one bounces high
harris to gayle, 1 run, the two sixes seem to have rattled punjab, gayle picks up  a single off a misfield around square leg
mclaren to gayle, no run, gayle tries to welcome mclaren with a big swing, but misses the ball going across him
mclaren to gayle, 1 run, hits this one in to the covers for a single
kumar to kohli, no run, keeps a touch low as it comes in with the angle on off, virat does a sachin as he crouches down after keeping it out
kumar to kohli, no run, tight stuff from pk now, not much movement but on a straight line around off stump, virat plays it out on the leg side
mclaren to kohli, 1 wide, the angle is over-cooked on this one, makes it go wide down leg
ablish to kohli, four runs, lovely use of the angle, virat gets one coming in from wide of the crease, and wrists it over mdiwicket, just sent the ball in its way with a quick twirl
ablish to kohli, 1 run, slower one, he allows it to come on and pushes for a single towards covers
ablish to gayle, four runs, even an outside edge gets him four, it is pouring boundaries, gayle pushes at one going across and it is too far from gilly's dive
chawla to kohli, no run,
nayar to gayle, no run, charges out and has a huge heave but misses this one
nayar to gayle, six runs, and another one, i have lost count, half-tracker, gayle rocks back and sends it miles in to the crowd over deep midwicket
mclaren to gayle, 1 run, mistimes a forcing swipe in to the leg side for a single
chawla to kohli, 1 run, flatter one angling in, he goes back and whips it through midwicket
ablish to de villiers, 1 run, comes down the track and pushes away towards extra cover
ablish to tiwary, 1 run, walks down the track, and pushes this one away past cover
chawla to tiwary, 1 run, charges down the track, looking for the big swing, mistimes it past extra cover towards long off, looked like the wrong 'un
chawla to de villiers, 1 run, comes down the track and flicks through midwicket for a single
harris to de villiers, four runs, ab goes for the old-fashioned hoick from the crease, and gets a top edge that flies over gilchrist, when nothing goes your away, abandon all hope
mclaren to de villiers, 1 run, will keep the strike with a single on the off side
khan to valthaty, 1 run, mid off is a bit deep, and that allows them to get the single off a backfoot punch
aravind to nayar, no run, leaves nayar groping outside off stump with one that zips away
khan to marsh, no run, well left, close to off stump from over the stumps and marsh lets it go
khan to marsh, 1 run, played with soft hands from the crease and even as it moves away to take a thick edge, it rolls along the ground past backward point
aravind to valthaty, no run, clobber goes valthaty, hits hard from the crease but straight to mid off
aravind to valthaty, no run, backs away outside leg, he bowls it across the batsman who has a swing, and a miss
aravind to sunny singh, 1 run, flicked away to square leg where tiwary moves to his right to field
aravind to karthik, 1 run, pushes out with high elbow and picks a single to deepish mid off
aravind to sunny singh, 2 runs, forcing push past the bowler, it gathers  momentum as it runs along the ground, vettori lumbers after it but there is another man around to stop it
vettori to karthik, no run, pushed away in to the off side
gayle to mclaren, 2 runs, shuffles and turns this one in to the vacant midwicket area, and they come back for the second
gayle to karthik, 1 run, bends the knee and swings this one backward of square leg
gayle to mclaren, 1 run, pushed away in to the off side
gayle to mclaren, 1 run, driven towards long off for another run
gayle to chawla, out, gayle continues to do different versions of his celebratory jig, saw piyush come down the track, fired it in, and the batsman yorked himself
vettori to mclaren, 1 run, goes deep to work it away to deep square leg
vettori to harris, 1 run, slower through the air, edged just past gayle at slip
vettori to mclaren, 1 run, whipped away to deep square leg for another single
gayle to harris, 1 run, gayle's spell ends with a tuck behind square leg, has to be content with three wickets, should do along with that century for the night
vettori to harris, 1 run, direct hit at the non-striker's but he was just in, umpire did not even refer it upstairs, some call that
vettori to mclaren, no run, played out towards midwicket
khan to mclaren, 1 wide, slanted wide down leg with the angle from over the wicket
khan to mclaren, no run, wants to turn this one towards mid on but pushes it back to zaheer
kohli to harris, no run, virat almost gets a wicket, slips one in between bat and pad, ball misses the stumps, keeper misses the ball, all even
khan to mclaren, 1 run, turned past gayle at midwicket for a single
khan to harris, 1 run, goes for the lofted drive from the crease, thick edge flies to third man
khan to harris, no run, pushed away to point, overbalances and stumbles before sending the non-striker back
mithun to mclaren, 1 run, squeezed out to point, there is an overthrow from dilshan and cross over
aravind to mclaren, out, aravind gets one more, it was the slower one, he went for a mow through midwicket from the crease, and edged it on to the stumps
mithun to kumar, six runs, pk is letting mithun have it, this time clobbers him over deep midwicket for maximum
mithun to kumar, no run, big swing, and miss from pk outside off stump and that is the end of that
pathan to blizzard, 1 run, eased towards cover for a single, not too many singles get as big a cheer as this one, tendulkar is now on strike
pathan to tendulkar, four runs, shot! this is what the wankhede crowd came in, tendulkar gets off the mark with a breathtaking drive between mid-off and extra cover, perfect placement, perfect timing
morkel to blizzard, no run, dabbed towards point this time
morkel to blizzard, four runs, a pick-up shot form blizzard, whipped from leg stump behind backward square leg for four more, the normally economical morkel leaking runs here
morkel to blizzard, four runs, another four, four in the over, blizzard continues to back away and carve the ball through off, this time behind point for four more
morkel to blizzard, four runs, those changes make no impact., morkel gets hit for his fifth four of the over, on legstump, glanced fine by blizzard, the wankhede crowd is lapping it up
pathan to tendulkar, no run, jags back in from just outside off, defended to the off side by tendulkar
pathan to tendulkar, 1 wide, swings down the leg side
pathan to tendulkar, 1 run, tendulkar punches the ball towards mid-on and sets off immediately for a single, there's a direct hit at the keeper's end but blizzard's in

agarkar to blizzard, four runs, blizzard brings up the mumbai fifty with a powerful hit, doesn't get it as long as he would have liked, it going very very high but lands beyond morkle who was running back from mid-off, a few bounces before crossing the rope
pathan to tendulkar, out, irfan's got the breakthrough, tendulkar tries an ugly swipe, he misses as the ball keeps lower than he expects, and off stump is rocked back, relief for delhi
pathan to rayudu, no run, irfan getting the ball to seam in appreciably, rayudu was initially going for the big hit, but the movement forces he defend the ball instead
pathan to rayudu, no run, rayudu charges down the track, and once more he can't play the aggressive shot he wants, blocked to the off side
nadeem to blizzard, 1 run, pushed towards square leg for a single
nadeem to blizzard, no run, blizzard mistimes the drive towards extra cover
hopes to rayudu, no run, rayudu misses an outside off delivery
hopes to rayudu, 1 run, opens the face to steer the ball down to third man for a single
nadeem to sharma, no run, fires it wide outside off, left alone
nadeem to sharma, 1 run, rohit stands tall and drives elegantly through cover for a single
hopes to sharma, 1 run, dabs the ball towards midwicket and sneaks a single
hopes to rayudu, no run, swing and a miss just outside off
nadeem to rayudu, 1 run,
nadeem to sharma, 1 run, makes room and slices the ball towards cover
nadeem to rayudu, 1 run, comes down the track and slashes the ball towards deep point for a single
agarkar to rayudu, 1 run, slashes the first ball behind backward point
agarkar to sharma, 2 runs, driven along the ground, towards deep extra cover
morkel to rayudu, 1 wide, too far outside off stump
morkel to sharma, six runs, superb hit from rohit,  skates out of the crease and wallops that over the bowler's head for a six, morkel's poor day continues
morkel to rayudu, 1 run, plays the shot rohit has played plenty of times today, the tap towards third man
hopes to sharma, no run, missed the ball outside off
hopes to sharma, six runs, rohit's turning it on here, he brings up the 400th six of the season with a club towards cow corner, and that's 18 off the over
pathan to sharma, no run, moves away from the stumps and drives it past extra cover
pathan to sharma, 1 run, driven down to long-off all along the ground
morkel to rayudu, 1 run, squeezed out towards point for a single to bring pollard on strike, the crowd love him and the noise levels go up as pollard takes guard
nadeem to rayudu, 2 runs, tucks this one wide of mid-on
nadeem to rayudu, six runs, hello massive, rayudu makes room and blasts the fired-in delivery over long-off
nadeem to rayudu, 1 run, charges out and drives the ball down the gorund
hopes to rayudu, four runs, four more for rayudu, gets a big stride in and drives over the in-field, warner races across from long-off, but can't get there
hopes to symonds, 1 run, symonds comes down the track and slaps the ball to deep midwicket for a single

agarkar to symonds, 1 run, an outstanding over from ajit (a good day to lay off the jokes, then), the final ball is muscled to the leg side for one more single, just five off the final over with pollard and symonds at the crease, that's superb
harbhajan singh to sehwag, 1 run, once more sehwag plays it uppishly, too far to the right of harbhajan though

harbhajan singh to warner, out, harbhajan gets a wicket in the first wicket once more, that pitched on middle and straightens, warner had a big stride in as he looked to defend, struck just above the knee roll, umpire hariharan wastes little time lifting the finger, warner walks off shaking his head, not sure he had much to complain about
patel to ojha, 1 run, ojha turns the ball to square leg for a single
patel to ojha, 1 wide, sprays it down the leg side

patel to ojha, out, that seemed out, rayudu is the picture of disbelief, he thinks there's big edge after the ball moves away and ojha fishes at it outside off, there was a huge noise, munaf was celebrating his second wicket in the over, only to turn back and see hariharan is unmoved, mumbai can't believe it, then hariharan walks over to the square leg umpire and confers before giving it out, not sure what could have been discussed there
patel to hopes, no run, the last ball of the over is safely negotiated, dabbed towards point
kulkarni to venugopal rao, 3 runs, a lovely drive from rao, steps nicely into the shot, gets himself three
kulkarni to venugopal rao, 1 run, curves this one in towards middle and leg, gets the leading edge as the batsman looks to play to the on side, flies towards third mna
kulkarni to hopes, no run, kulkarni gets the ball to jag away this time, batsman looks to defend but the ball zips past the outside edge
patel to venugopal rao, 1 run, delhi batsmen struggling to middle the ball here, this time it is edged towards the off side
patel to hopes, no run,
patel to hopes, no run, hopes looks to scythe the ball through point but misses
patel to hopes, no run, moves away from the batsman, hopes lets that go
kulkarni to venugopal rao, no run, gets bat on this one, defended towards cover
kulkarni to hopes, 1 run, defended towards extra cover, symonds is lurking but the batsmen decide to risk the quick single, they make it in time
patel to hopes, four runs, this time he connects, hopes isn't going down without a fight, he crashes that past point for four, not much footwork but solid connection
harbhajan singh to hopes, 2 wides, down the leg side, keeper can't collect
harbhajan singh to venugopal rao, four runs, smashed, rao charges down the track and blasts it past the bowler for four
harbhajan singh to venugopal rao, 1 run, backs away to make room, taps the ball towards deep point
pollard to hopes, four runs, swiped towards square leg for another boundary
pollard to hopes, no run, driven firmly by the batsman towards point
symonds to venugopal rao, no run, rao opens the face looking to guide the ball to third man, can't connect
symonds to venugopal rao, four runs, four more for delhi,96.4kmh from symonds, rao gets on one knee and hammers that one to the square leg boundary
symonds to venugopal rao, 1 run, nudged just behind square leg to take a single
pollard to venugopal rao, 1 run, defended towards point for a single
pollard to venugopal rao, four runs, four more, pollard is proving very expensive here, this one slides down the leg side, helped along for a boundary to fine leg
symonds to hopes, 1 run, forces this one towards deep midwicket, not in the gap
symonds to venugopal rao, no run, looks to steer this one down to third man, gets a leading edge and ball dies at the crease
kulkarni to hopes, 2 runs, hopes skips away from leg and dabs the ball towards point, harbhajan fires in the throw at the non-striker's end, and concedes an overthrow
kulkarni to pathan, 1 run, tapped towards point for a single to end the over
harbhajan singh to pathan, 1 wide, darts it down the leg side
harbhajan singh to pathan, no run, ambati appeals in three phases for an lbw, but there was a huge inside-edge there
harbhajan singh to pathan, 1 run, tucks the ball to square leg for a single to end the over
patel to pathan, four runs, swats that one over midwicket, where the fielder leaps but the ball is too high for him
harbhajan singh to pathan, 1 run, slapped down to long-off by irfan for a single

harbhajan singh to hopes, out, the end of hopes, communication breakdown there, hopes skips away from leg and punches the ball to extra cover, he sets off for the quick single, irfan takes a couple of paces and then decides he wants to hang around at the non-striker's end, hopes is stranded halfway down the pitch
malinga to pathan, 1 wide, flings it wide down the leg side, 146kph that one
malinga to agarkar, no run, the slower ball from malinga, 128kph, ajit goes for the big swipe but is fixed by the change of pace
kulkarni to morkel, no run,
kulkarni to morkel, 1 run, driven towards mid-off for a single
kulkarni to agarkar, four runs, a dismissive swing sends the ball flying over wide mid-on for four
menaria to hussey, 1 wide, poor start. menaria lands this well down the leg side and it is a wide.
menaria to hussey, 1 run, gets it on middle and leg this time, and hussey pushes to mid-on for one.

menaria to vijay, no run, aha, misunderstanding, but they get away with it. vijay pushes to wide mid-on, hussey goes a long way down before returning but makes it in time. the fielder did not pick it up cleanly.
menaria to vijay, 1 run, forces a flat ball on middle and leg past the bowler and gets a single. chennai off to a better start than they got to the other day.
singh to vijay, 1 leg bye, angled into vijay's hips and he looks to glance. gets a single away through square leg.
menaria to hussey, four runs, hussey's making those surgical incisions into menaria's dibblies here. flat and no turn, on off stump, hussey reverses the grip and slaps it through third man.
menaria to hussey, 1 run, speared in faster on leg stump and hussey pushes through mid-on for one more.
menaria to vijay, 1 run, flat and on the leg stump, vijay resists from swiping through the leg side and picks up a single with a nudge to square leg.
singh to hussey, no run, another charge from the huss. he jumps out and goes for a bit heave to the leg side, but misses.
botha to vijay, 1 wide, down the leg side, vijay smartly lets it go.

botha to hussey, no run, huge appeal for lbw, hussey survives. boy, they may have changed the pitch, but it still turns a mile! this was landing close to leg stump from round the stumps, hussey thought it was going down and let it go. it turned back big and hit his pad. the umpire got it right, it was pitching outside leg. hussey looked quite worried for a moment.
botha to hussey, no run,
warne to vijay, no run, a hint of drift outside off, vijay opens the face and steers to point
botha to hussey, no run, touch of turn away from hussey who pushes the ball towards point.
warne to vijay, no run, there you go warne. classy ball, slower, tempting outside off, drifting away slightly and then spinning big away from vijay who misses it by a mile.
botha to vijay, no run, keeps it outside off this time, vijay pushes into the off side.
warne to vijay, 1 wide, too wide outside off, vijay lets it go and it is called.
warne to vijay, no run, more air, vijay pushes it with the turn towards point but can't get the single

warne to vijay, 1 run, lovely ball, nearly owned vijay there as he first thought of advancing, and then belatedly realised it was the quicker one homing in on off stump. vijay is good enough to hang back and defend into the off side.
watson to vijay, 1 run, slower ball on off stump, vijay pushes into the covers for another single

watson to raina, four runs, raina is into the act now, drilling watson through the covers with an emphatic twirl of the wrists. lovely shot that, stayed along the ground and threaded the extra-cover gap.

singh to vijay, 1 run, hare-brained running, but they get away with it. vijay laps amit from outside off towards fine leg and screams away for the first run. he always wanted two, and hared right back, but raina was not at all interested. throw came to the keeper who then had a go at the bowler's end, and missed.
singh to raina, 1 run, raina looks to jump out, amit keeps it tight and ensures he can't swing freely. pushed into the covers for a single.
botha to raina, 1 run, raina forces another single to long-off.
botha to dhoni, no run,

watson to dhoni, no run, interesting call from the umpire. dhoni goes a mile down the leg side, watson follows him and sends it down the leg side even as dhoni trots back into line. not called a wide.

watson to morkel, 2 wides, bad time to bowl a wide, angled too far outside off and morkel can't make contact with it. dhoni was always coming for the run, and morkel responded though the keeper tried to under-arm it to the bowler's end.
morkel to dravid, no run, angled in from outside off, dravid pushes it into the covers.
morkel to dravid, 1 run, tight delivery on middle, dravid whips towards midwicket for a single.
bollinger to dravid, 2 wides, wide down the leg side, dhoni palms it away and they get an extra run.
bollinger to dravid, 1 run, misfield, this time from badri at cover point, as dravid steers solidly. single to the cause, rr need boundaries.
bollinger to rahane, no run, another interesting call from umpire hariharan, refusing a potential wide down the leg side as rahane skips back inside line after moving away.
bravo to watson, 1 run, another slower ball, watson mis-times the heave and finds mid-on. only the single.
bravo to rahane, no run, angled into middle and leg line to finish the over, rahane can't get it away.
ashwin to rahane, no run, on off stump, hit hard with the spin but straight to mid-on.
jakati to rahane, 1 run, turns away from off stump, rahane pushes past point for a single.
jakati to taylor, 1 wide, speared round-arm, down the leg side, and called.
ashwin to menaria, no run, plays back again and steers a ball outside off to backward point.
jakati to rahane, no run, half an appeal for lbw, turned down rightly. that was hurrying down the leg side when it hit the pad.
jakati to rahane, 2 runs, yes and no situation, rahane plays it into the covers and they get a couple before thinking of a third late, and deciding against it later. just as well.
ashwin to rahane, no run,
ashwin to rahane, four runs, rahane keeps getting the occasional four, this time he's jumped out to ashwin and dispatched him through the covers.
ashwin to rahane, no run,
bravo to botha, 1 wide, slips his first ball down the leg side and it is called a wide.
bravo to botha, 2 runs, slower ball outside off, forced into the covers for another tight single. this time the fielder, raina,  hits the stumps, but botha was in.
bravo to rahane, 1 run, over-pitched on off stump, rahane steers through point for a single, and it is time for another 'stretch my legs' time-out.
jakati to botha, no run, speared in round-arm from wide of the crease. pushed back down the track.
jakati to botha, 2 runs, armer hurries onto botha who drags it wide of mid-on for a couple of runs.
jakati to raut, 1 run, tosses this one up, raut pushes with the turn into the covers for a single.
ashwin to botha, 1 run, flat from ashwin outside off, botha gets it away to point for a single.
ashwin to yagnik, no run, yagnik can't negotiate the turn as ashwin breaks it away from off stump line.
ashwin to yagnik, 1 run, how does one get ashwin to go for runs? 4-0-24-2 today, as yagnik poushes a single to retain strike.
raina to warne, no run, defended down the track, first up.

raina to warne, out, all over. raina's got the legend, and he has two wickets in three balls. chennai are knocking on the doors of the play-offs. @imraina tosses it up outside off, @warne888 smears it high over mid-off, and @newbigdog at long-off holds it easy.
harbhajan singh to valthaty, no run, lots of over spin on the first delivery just outside off, steered to backward point
