harbhajan singh to valthaty, no run, turning into the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
harbhajan singh to valthaty, 1 run, swat pick-up! floated on the leg and middle line, chipped over to deep midwicket
harbhajan singh to gilchrist, 1 run, this one skids towards middle and off line, pushed out to mid-on for a single. he was a touch late in playing that shot.
harbhajan singh to gilchrist, no run, gets back to push this back to the bowler

harbhajan singh to valthaty, four runs, catch it  was the cry. it was on the leg stump line and rohit sharma, at backward square-leg, flew to his left but couldn't get there in time. he got his finger tips to it, i think.
patel to marsh, no run, in the corridor outside off and marsh shoulders arms
harbhajan singh to gilchrist, no run, gets back to punch this to mid-off
harbhajan singh to gilchrist, no run, lovely skidding toppie, coming in from round the stumps, on the middle stump line, gilly goes back to stab it to point
patel to marsh, no run, on the middle stump line, nudged towards midwicket
kulkarni to gilchrist, 1 wide, sprays on the leg side. wide. punjab would have hoped it was on the leg stump line so that they could have got four leg byes!
kulkarni to gilchrist, 1 run, pushes it to the off side for a single
suman to marsh, no run, slower and that keeps low. cue harsha bhogle's trademark 'hmmmm'! shaun jabbed that to the leg side
sharma to gilchrist, 1 run, gets back to punch this to the off side
malinga to marsh, 1 run, slower one, on the middle stump line, shaun waits and runs it down to third man
suman to marsh, no run, pushed towards mid-off but suman intercepts with a dive
suman to marsh, 1 run, on the middle stump line, shaun stays adjacent to the line and taps it to cover point
pollard to karthik, 1 run, taps this close to the leg side for a single
pollard to karthik, no run,
suman to marsh, 1 run, backs away to push it wide of covers for a single
suman to karthik, 1 run, drags it from outside off to deep midwicket for a single

suman to karthik, four runs, reverse swept! it almost hits nita ambani, sitting just beyond the boundary! ooh! dk swivelled around and reverse slapped this delivery outside off to the third man boundary. one bounce and for a moment nita ji must have thought that the white ball was heading towards her. panic. frantic wave of the hand and the ball just about tails past her.
patel to marsh, four runs, slower one, just outside off stump, shaun waits for it to arrive before creaming it, almost flat-batted that, to the wide long-off boundary
patel to karthik, 1 run, pushed away for a single
malinga to karthik, 1 run, lifter on the middle, dk hops to tuck it close on the leg side for a single
malinga to kumar, out, the off stump has gone for some cardio training. pk moved outside leg and had a swing. and a miss. it was the slower one and the off stump went cartwheeling.
malinga to bipul sharma, 1 run, slower one again, tapped to the left of rayudu who makes a half stop
kumar to blizzard, no run, in the zone outside off stump, left alone.
kumar to blizzard, no run, straighter, driven past the lunging pk to mid-on
bhatt to blizzard, 1 run, on the middle stump line, nudged between midwicket and square-leg for a single
bhatt to tendulkar, no run, takes couple of steps down the track and drives to covers again
bhatt to tendulkar, 1 run, retains the strike with a wristy dab through midwicket
kumar to sharma, no run, around the off stump line, defended towards covers
bipul sharma to blizzard, 1 run, taps this to right of square-leg for a single
bipul sharma to symonds, no run, just outside off stump, tapped to point
kumar to blizzard, out, strangled down the leg side. it seemed a gentle seam-up delivery just outside leg and blizzard feathers it to gilchrist!  three down and wobbling.
harris to rayudu, no run, in the zone outside off, left alone
harris to rayudu, 1 run, skips down the track and slashes it to third man for a single
kumar to rayudu, no run, on the middle stump line, turned to midwicket
kumar to rayudu, no run, in the zone outside off, steered to backward point
bipul sharma to symonds, 1 wide, slips down the leg side for a wide
bipul sharma to symonds, no run, on the middle and off, eased back to the bowler

bipul sharma to rayudu, 1 run, out, symonds is run out rayudu drags it to wide of deep midwicket. symonds turns for the second run but rayudu stays frozen at the other end. symonds keeps coming, rayudu puts his left hand out, suggesting don't. all too late. symonds had almost reached rayudu's end!
bipul sharma to rayudu, 1 run, turned to the leg side
bipul sharma to suman, 1 bye, just outside off stump, gilly fails to collect it

harris to harbhajan singh, 1 run, dropped by paul at first slip. it's a lifter outside off stump and harbhajan hops awkwardly and pokes out at it. the ball flew off the edge to right of paul who palms it off
harris to pollard, 1 run, run down to third man for a single
bhatt to harbhajan singh, no run, moves down the track and ends up lunging to push it to the off
bhatt to harbhajan singh, no run, skips down the track again but ends up mistiming the drive to covers
bhatt to harbhajan singh, six runs, very nice! what a sweet shot. he sashayed down the track and lifted it almost nonchalantly and the ball landed on the sight screen

bhatt to harbhajan singh, out, very nice again! from the bowler this time. harbhajan went down the track but bhargav slowed up the pace further. not quicker but he slowed it up. harbhajan couldn't adjust to it and ended up swiping across the line. clatter.
bhatt to pollard, 1 run,
srivastava to pollard, 1 run, pushed away for a single
bhatt to pollard, 1 wide, slips down the leg side for a wide
khan to watson, no run, watson immediately starts with a smack. it moves away a little and he bludgeons it to the point fielder. that's as far as it will get though.
khan to watson, 1 wide, just down the leg-side from khan. arun kartick is behind the stumps and he collects. ab de villiers is in the outfield.

khan to watson, 1 run, swings back into watson this time, he is still looking for a big shot and manages to turn this one to fine leg, he probably played that a bit late, not reading it too well at the moment
khan to dravid, no run, good first over from zak. keeps bowling a tight line, on offstump and dravid defends.
aravind to watson, no run, srinath aravind shares the new ball and he starts off well. watson looks to go over mid-on but can't get it away, mistimed instead
aravind to watson, no run, pushed to point. ab finishes off by saying that he is pleased that mark boucher is in the ipl. boucher is at kkr, of course.
khan to dravid, no run, ooohhh, dravid almost plays on. looks to run it down to third man, but is very close to chopping it on.
langeveldt to dravid, 1 no ball, starts off with a no-ball, that's quite some overstep, a good few centimetres from the line
langeveldt to dravid, no run, much, much better. gets the smallest hint of swing and beats the outside edge
langeveldt to dravid, 1 run, steered into the gap behind point, third man cleans up
khan to watson, 1 run, goes for a more delicate touch now and plays down to third man, just the one
khan to dravid, 1 run, pushed into the off side, scrambled ran taken
langeveldt to watson, no run, touch slower, watson gets a bottom edge that rolls to the leg side
aravind to dravid, 1 run, guided to third man
aravind to watson, 1 run, throws his bat at that one, gets an outside edge to third man
aravind to dravid, 1 run, dravid makes some room and gets that to point
gayle to dravid, 1 run, carved away past point
gayle to watson, no run, watson tries to clip away on the leg side, misses
gayle to watson, 2 runs, smacked past a diving gayle, this time watson gets its away to long-off and dravid is being made to work hard, he runs back for the second and makes it
kohli to botha, no run, defended back to the bowler
kohli to botha, 1 run, moves onto the backfoot and punches it through the covers
kazi to botha, 1 run, whipped to mid-wicket to end abrar kazi's first over in twenty-over cricket
kazi to rahane, six runs, kazi gets taken on. rahane makes room and launches it over long-off. the ball seems to have hit the rope but the fielder signals six, fair play indeed.
kazi to rahane, 1 run, turned to mid-wicket
kazi to taylor, 1 run, turned to mid-wicket, lots of cries of 'very well bowled kazi' from the 'keeper
kazi to taylor, 2 runs, pushed to long off and they want two. tiwary is doing the tidying up and its a comfortable double in the end
kohli to botha, no run, kohli bowls his third. botha smacks it back to kohli who does well in his follow through to field
kohli to taylor, no run, played back to kohli, not with the force of the first ball, and he does his own fielding again
kohli to botha, 2 runs, good running again, putting pressure on the fielders. botha gets that between midwicket and mid-on and immedaitely calls for the second.
langeveldt to botha, 1 run, pushed to mid-off, ab does the fielding
aravind to taylor, 1 run, pushed out to mid-on again, the two is not on this time
aravind to taylor, 1 run, slower ball and tapped to deep midwicket, kohli doesn't allow a second at all, charging in to pick it up
gayle to raut, 1 run, fired in at the legs and flicked to deep square leg

gayle to menaria, out, it's coming apart for rajasthan. menaria hits that down kaif's throat at ling-on. nothing spectacular about the catch but there didn't need to be. too easy for kaif and not enough meat on it from menaria
gayle to raut, 1 run, played over gayle' who gets fingertipd to it and donw to long off
gayle to yagnik, (no ball) 1 run, quicker from gayle and dabbed to backward point
gayle to raut, 5 wides, quicker again gayle fires it in down the legside and the keeper can't make his way to the left fast enough and it's gone to the rope
khan to raut, 1 run, looking for a big heave-ho and missing completely, bottom edge through to the 'keeper as they scramble for one
watson to dilshan, 1 wide, too far outside off, and called wide
watson to dilshan, no run, better from watson, straighter and beats the bat
watson to dilshan, no run, very close there, shapes away and dilshan follows the line of the ball, could have easily been an edge
botha to gayle, no run, starts with one that angles in, gayle defends
botha to dilshan, no run, keeps it straight and dilshan pushes on the off side
botha to dilshan, four runs, drifting in, dilshan uses the turn, gets an under edge, fine, very fine and the angle is so tight that no one can stop that reaching the fine leg fence
botha to gayle, four runs, no luck for botha either in his first over. gayle picks that up effortlessly and dispatches it through mid-wicket, 20 off the first two
pankaj singh to gayle, 2 runs, gayle makes some room for himself and spanks it to mid-on. warne misfields and allows the double
pankaj singh to gayle, no run, makes room again, almost too much room and hits it cross batted to mid off
botha to dilshan, 1 run, pushed past botha, who dives to his left, can't stop the one
botha to gayle, no run, gayle is happy to defend, pushes it into the off side

botha to gayle, four runs,  dropped  gives it some air again and gayle lifts it to mid-off, where warne is fielding. the ball goes through his hands and it's turning into an unpleasant last game for the australian. if that's not bad enough, it's also four.
trivedi to dilshan, no run, better from trivedi, straighter and dilshan is stll looking to bash, only gets it back to the bowler
trivedi to dilshan, four runs, oh dear, there are problems for rajasthan. trivedi persists in bowling it outside off and dilshan will have it again, through the covers, races away and the 50 is up
trivedi to dilshan, no run, gets it straight now and dilshan defends
botha to gayle, 4 runs, botha continues, whipped to mid-wicket for one, raut hits the stumps at the bowler's end and there are four overthrows to be had, totally unncessary from rajasthan
botha to gayle, six runs, gayle goes big! makes a good deal of room and hits it long and high over long off.
botha to gayle, no run, quiet this time, just a defensive prod from gayle
botha to dilshan, four runs, now dilshan goes for it. gets under it but doesn't get enough on it. one bounce and over the long-off fence
warne to dilshan, no run, on the money, immediately, defended back to warne
warne to dilshan, 2 runs, turned square of the wicket and they get a couple
warne to dilshan, no run, steered to backward point
warne to kohli, 1 run, nice and wristy from kohli, turned to long off
warne to gayle, no run, wide outside off and swatted to taylor at mid off who makes a good stop. gayle studies his bat in disgust
watson to kohli, 1 run, straight and kohli flicks it to mid-wicket to give gayle strike
watson to gayle, 1 run, little bit of width and gayle hits on the toe end of the bat to long off
watson to kohli, 1 wide, too much effort from watto, drifts down the leg side and it's wide
watson to gayle, 1 run, pushed to long off
warne to gayle, four runs, warne tries the flipper, gayle gets the slightest hint of bat on it, and its struck very fine, trickles away for four
warne to gayle, 1 run, pushed to point
warne to gayle, no run, turns in from outside off stumps, gayle watches it through
trivedi to kohli, 1 run, slower ball, turned to mid-wicket
trivedi to gayle, no run, angles into gayle and he pushes to point, he thinks about the run but is sent back
trivedi to gayle, 1 run, angling into gayle again, helps it on its way and pushes to midwicket
trivedi to gayle, 1 run, pushed to deep mid-wicket, gayle keeps strike. halfway in terms of overs and more than half the runs have been scored already
warne to gayle, 1 run, slapped down to long off, shane warne continuing
warne to kohli, 1 run, kohli counters the turn this time and drives in the air to cover, the fielder does well to get to the ball, looks like he may have dropped it, actually.
warne to kohli, no run, quicker ball, chopped to third man
warne to kohli, 1 run, played square of the wicket and warne has completed another fantastic over, almost time to say goodbye to jaipur
botha to kohli, four runs, botha starts his last over and he gets smacked around again, kohli picks up easily and lofts to long off
botha to kohli, 1 run, dabs it down to mid off where botha has to run to clean up after himself
botha to gayle, 1 run, tosses it up and gayle could have done more with that, chops it down beside the pitch and ambles through for one
botha to kohli, no run, turned to mid-wicket, that area is protected
botha to gayle, no run, botha finishes decently, gayle defends back to him, it's been a costly four overs from the south african
taylor to kohli, 1 run, gives it a good bit of air, pushed through the covers
taylor to gayle, 1 run, turned to backward square leg
taylor to kohli, 1 run, kohli wants to smack now, crunches it through the covers, not a great over from taylor, 11 from it
menaria to kohli, no run, pushed into the covers, menaria comes into the attack
menaria to kohli, no run, played back to the bowler
menaria to kohli, 1 run, driven to long off, still only one and that really is enough
menaria to gayle, no run, defensive push to mid-wicket
menaria to gayle, 1 run, gentle nudge to long off, no boundary off this over yet
menaria to kohli, 1 run, turned to mid-wicket and it does look as though bangalore are quite happy to get the runs in ones
warne to gayle, no run, flatter and outside off, gayle slashes and misses
warne to gayle, six runs, the respect has ended as gayle decides he has had enough, it's time to put it away. warne tossed it up and gayle dispatched it over long off
warne to gayle, four runs, swept to the backward square leg boundary and that is shane warne's last ball at jaipur. he walks back with a hint of a tear in his eye. rajasthan has enjoyed you, warney.
menaria to kohli, four runs, off the backfoot from kohli and ross taylor can't save another, it goes through his legs for four on the cover boundary
menaria to gayle, six runs, gayle wants this over and he wants it over quick. swings over deep mid-wicket to score his 30th six of this ipl season. eight left to get now.
pankaj singh to gayle, no run, gayle looking to slap this through the covers and misses, he knows he needs just two more shots
pankaj singh to gayle, 1 run, stroked through the covers, bangalore one shot away now
pankaj singh to kohli, no run, pushed to point, kohli wants one but decides against it
pathan to hussey, 1 run, gets the shape away from the left-hander right away, but it pitches a touch wide and hussey cracks it, diving stop at point saves the boundary
pathan to hussey, no run, angled in on middle and leg, played out quietly on the on side
mcdonald to raina, no run, warner has saved what could have been another four, raina came out of his crease and pushed hard but warner rushed to his left and dived to stop the ball
mcdonald to raina, no run, played out towards point

pathan to vijay, no run, now and then, irfan slips in the one that goes straight on with the angle, quite a change for the batsman expecting it to come back in, and ends up pushing inside the line as it rushes past

nadeem to vijay, no run, another drop simple chance, this one stops on the batsman who pushes hard at it and it travels at a nice height to nadeem who clangs it, delhi have no one to blame but themselves
nadeem to badrinath, no run, good over from nadeem, but that drop, that drop is going to hurt, this one is hit to point
hopes to badrinath, 1 run, badri gets the single behind point this time
hopes to badrinath, 1 run, hello, walks way outside off stump to pick it away over fine leg, cannot connect, but they pinch a tight run as the ball rolls away close to the stumps
nadeem to vijay, 2 runs, goes back to flick it away through midwicket, they come back for the second as well, good running
hopes to badrinath, 1 run, gets an inside edge as he looks to push it away but gets the single
mcdonald to dhoni, 1 run, driven towards mid on now for a single
mcdonald to dhoni, no run, slower one and wide outside off stump, got away with it, dhoni was late in picking it, tried to reach out and guide it late, but missed
nadeem to dhoni, 1 run, slides in with the arm, dhoni goes back to swing it down to deep square leg
nadeem to badrinath, no run, stumping missed, badri almost yorks himself as he comes down the track, ojha cannot gather the ball cleanly, delhi's poor day in the field continues
nadeem to dhoni, 1 run, goes hard at it and gets it down to long off for a run
pathan to badrinath, 1 run, goes for a big swipe, cannot connect cleanly but gets the single to bring dhoni on strike
pathan to dhoni, 1 run, dhoni gets to the 50 with a flick off his toes through midwicket off 28 deliveries, raises the bat to acknowledge the cheers of 'dhoni, dhoni'
morkel to ojha, no run, drives towards mid on, vijay is quick on the ball, lets it rip and warner has to dive in to his crease
morkel to ojha, no run, in the channel outside off stump and he leaves it alone

morkel to ojha, out, that is the end of naman, he wanted to launch morkel again beyond long off, but got too much underneath the ball this time, it was the slower one, and he swung it almost vertically in the air, jakati settled under it at mid off, and took the steepler when it finally came down
ashwin to ingram, no run, turning away from the left-hander, pushed away to covers
bollinger to warner, 1 run, 110.4 kph slower one from dougie, warner goes back to work it away towards midwicket
ashwin to ingram, no run, defended towards point this time
ashwin to warner, 1 run, now this one comes slowly off the pitch, he almost plays too early, then adjusts to push it on the leg side
ashwin to pathan, 1 run, stays in the crease and tentatively pushes it towards extra cover
ashwin to pathan, no run, pushed back on the off side
bravo to pathan, 1 run, pushed away towards extra cover
raina to pathan, 1 wide, looks to swing it fine down the leg side, but misses
bravo to venugopal rao, 1 run, guided behind point for a single

jakati to venugopal rao, six runs, caught by suraj randiv in the dug out, rao skips down the track, lofts jakati high over long off, beats raina there who rushes back and takes down du plessis in the dug out with his momentum, randiv coolly takes the catch
raina to venugopal rao, no run, raina continues to tie the batsmen down, this one is played out to midwicket as it turns in
jakati to venugopal rao, no run, slows it down as he sees him walking out, pushed back to the bowler

jakati to venugopal rao, 1 run, goes for another one big one on the leg side, mishits this one, it is in the air for a long time but deep square leg thinks he cannot get to it in time and takes it on the bounce

ashwin to pathan, six runs, dropped saha gets a chance to do something in the game and clangs a tough chance, irfan finally connected one well enough, it stayed in the air for some time before coming down to saha at long off,  who tried to take it but parried it over the ropes
bollinger to hopes, 2 runs, wide outside off stump, he reaches out to throw his bat at it, but the ball falls between backward point and third man
morkel to mcdonald, 1 run, slower delivery, pushed away towards mid off

morkel to pathan, 2 runs, irfan bends the knee and launches in to another languid swing that is easy on the eye and goes wide of the man at deep square leg, languid he has been today, and expensive with the ball
malinga to lumb, no run,
malinga to sangakkara, no run,
malinga to sangakkara, 1 run,
malinga to sohal, no run,
malinga to sohal, no run,
patel to sangakkara, no run,
patel to sangakkara, no run,
patel to sangakkara, no run,
patel to sangakkara, no run,
patel to sangakkara, 1 run,
patel to sohal, no run,
harbhajan singh to sangakkara, no run,
harbhajan singh to sangakkara, no run,
harbhajan singh to sangakkara, 1 run,
harbhajan singh to sohal, no run,
harbhajan singh to sohal, 1 run,
harbhajan singh to sangakkara, 1 run,
patel to sangakkara, 1 run,
patel to sohal, no run,
patel to sohal, no run,
patel to sohal, 1 leg bye,
patel to sangakkara, 1 run,
harbhajan singh to sangakkara, 1 run,
harbhajan singh to sohal, 1 run,
harbhajan singh to sangakkara, no run,
harbhajan singh to sangakkara, 1 run,
harbhajan singh to sohal, no run,
kulkarni to sangakkara, 1 run,
kulkarni to sohal, 1 run,
kulkarni to sangakkara, 2 runs,
kulkarni to sangakkara, no run,
kulkarni to sangakkara, 1 run,
suman to sangakkara, no run,
suman to sangakkara, 1 run,
suman to sohal, 1 run,
suman to sangakkara, 1 run,
suman to sohal, 1 run,
suman to sangakkara, 1 run,
kulkarni to sangakkara, 2 runs,
kulkarni to duminy, no run,
suman to duminy, 1 run,
harbhajan singh to chipli, no run, offbreak around off, pushed to straight midwicket
pollard to chipli, 1 run, slower one targeting middle and leg, driven wide of midwicket for a single
malinga to christian, no run, steered wide of point to clinch a single
malinga to christian, 1 run, knocked away into the off side for a single to keep strike
kulkarni to dhawan, 2 runs, a bit of width, drives it stylishly wide of deep cover for a couple of runs to get off the mark

malinga to christian, 2 runs, dropped, t suman spills it at third man, slower one and christian, having a mighty swing at that one, gets a top edge that suman gets under but fails to latch on to, a simple one that
malinga to christian, no run, slower one again, a swing and a miss this time
malinga to christian, 2 runs, flicks it through the leg side past square leg, rushes back for the second and makes it this time
duminy to blizzard, no run, bowled flat on middle, pushed it back to the bowler, nice start by jp
sharma to rayudu, no run, rises up to rayudu there, nips back in from outside off, fends it into the leg side after taking his bottom hand off

ojha to sharma, no run, sanga appeals for a catch first, then the stumping, lovely delivery from ojha as it angled in and then zipped away, caught-behind was turned down and replays show rohit was in when sanga took off the bails
ojha to symonds, no run, flat just outside off, defends it towards cover
ojha to symonds, 1 run,
anand rajan to tendulkar, 1 wide, sliding down the leg side and tendulkar lets it be, called a wide
christian to tendulkar, 1 wide, slides it down the leg side, called a wide

mishra to symonds, out, symonds holes out, the pressure was building and mishra got his man, slipped it in quicker, symonds came down the track and tried to loft it over long-off as it turned, didn't get hold of it and ishant took a comfortable catch, mumbai are in trouble now
christian to suman, 1 wide,
christian to suman, 1 wide, christian slips in a wide down the leg side, the slower one but misdirected
anand rajan to tendulkar, 1 run, tendulkar swivels to whip that one fine but is struck on the hips, steals a leg bye

anand rajan to tendulkar, out, tendulkar's been given out lbw, mumbai has gone silent, straight ball and tendulkar shuffled across to whip that fine, missed and was struck in line with midlde and leg, and height was no problem either
ojha to pollard, no run, nice turn again, surprising pollard, zips away and beats pollard
ojha to pollard, 1 run, punches it past the bowler for a single
ojha to harbhajan singh, 2 runs, charges down the track and mistimes it wide of midwicket for a couple of runs, ojha doing a splendid job
mishra to pollard, 1 run, fires it quick outside off, can only drive it past extra cover for a single
anand rajan to pollard, 1 wide, down the leg side, can he retain his calm, concedes a wide
anand rajan to harbhajan singh, 1 wide, slower ball down the leg side, falters to bowl a wide, two sixes needed now
pathan to gilchrist, no run, lands around the middle and moves towards off and middle, gilchrist gets behind the line to push it back down the track
pathan to gilchrist, no run, swing and a miss. it's a wide outswinger outside off and gilly went after it but the ball curved past the edge
pathan to gilchrist, no run, around the off stump area, gilchrist covers the away movement and steers to backward point

pathan to gilchrist, no run, good news. irfan is swinging the white ball. bad news. gilchrist is not connecting with his shots. this was an outswinger and gilchrist ended up driving too far inside the line
morkel to valthaty, 1 wide, wide delivery outside off and the keeper collects that
morkel to valthaty, no run, and again. lovely delivery in the zone outside off and paul pokes at it and the ball rushes past the outside edge
morkel to valthaty, no run, this one tails in towards off and paul ends up jabbing it to the off side

pathan to gilchrist, 1 run, the ball is swinging and i am surprised gilchrist is trying to drive it to  straight rather than repeat what he did the last ball of the previous irfan over when he drove with the swing. this one flies off the outside edge to third man.

pathan to valthaty, 4 runs, run out of gilly missed! and four  (five?)overthrows. what an absolute mess. it was pushed to point region and gilly ran. paul froze. gilly kept running. yogesh caught the ball and gilly slipped. paul started to run.  irfan was near the stumps at the non striker's end. yigesh fired the throw- he could have just lobbed it.- the throw bounces on the pitch and moves towards irfan who fails to collect it! paul decided late to sacrifice his wicket and starts to run across but by then the ball had passed irfan
pathan to valthaty, no run,
pathan to valthaty, 1 run, turned to the leg side for a single
morkel to valthaty, 1 run, dropped by venugopal rao at first slip. paul went for the big on-the-up drive and it flew straight to venu who gets his palms in line but ends up clanging it
morkel to marsh, 1 run, turned to the leg side for a single
aaron to valthaty, no run, stays back to push this to the off side
aaron to valthaty, no run, the ball continues to move past the edge. paul went after this delivery outside off but was very late.
salvi to valthaty, 1 run, on the middle and off line, pushed out to left of backward point
hopes to valthaty, no run, this one didn't climb all that much but paul had decided to duck too early. the ball just went around waist-high and outside off
hopes to valthaty, no run, in the zone outside off, left alone
salvi to valthaty, 1 wide, more wides down the leg side. the keeper fumbles the take
salvi to marsh, no run, around the off stump, steered away to the off side
salvi to marsh, no run, reaches across to tap this to backward point
salvi to marsh, four runs, width outside off and marsh crashes it to the point boundary. whack.
salvi to marsh, no run, just outside off, marsh guides it to backward point
hopes to valthaty, 1 run, runs this down to morkel at third man for a single
hopes to marsh, 1 run, pushes this to the off for a single
hopes to marsh, 1 run, turns this to square-leg region
aaron to marsh, 1 run, stays back to turn it to square-leg region
aaron to valthaty, four runs, edged to third man boundary. paul moves outside leg and looks to punch it up and over the off side. the bounce and pace does him in but he gets a lucky fat edge
hopes to valthaty, no run, slower one, around off stump line, driven to extra cover
hopes to valthaty, no run,
aaron to marsh, 1 run, around that off stump line, steered to third man
sriram to valthaty, 1 run, from over the wicket, on the leg stump line, turned through midwicket
sriram to marsh, 2 runs, tries to tonk this to the straight boundary but ends up slicing it over point
sriram to marsh, six runs, skips down the track and lifts it straight. very nicely done. he focused on getting the timing and the placement right
morkel to marsh, 1 run, on the leg and middle line, tucked quietly to midwicket
pathan to hussey, 1 run, keeps out the hat-trick ball with a dab to point
pathan to karthik, no run, gets back and across to defend this to the off side
salvi to karthik, 2 runs, walks across to work this behind square-leg
morkel to karthik, 1 run, moved outside leg, the ball follows him and he tucks it to midwicket
pathan to harris, 1 run, stays back to tap this to cover for a single
kumar to ojha, no run, on the middle stump line and naman pushes it back to pk
kumar to ojha, 1 run, around the off stump line, dabbed to backward point
harris to ojha, no run,
harris to ojha, no run, in the zone outside off, left alone
harris to ojha, 1 wide, drifts down the leg side for a wide
harris to ojha, no run, on the middle stump line, turned to midwicket
harris to ojha, no run, straightens outside off and naman reaches out to push it to point
kumar to warner, no run, stays back to work it to midwicket
kumar to warner, no run, moves across warner who defends to the off side. mike haysman says that's pk's fourth maiden over in this season.
harris to ojha, no run, crouches to jab this one out to covers
harris to ojha, no run, in the channel outside off and naman has a lazy waft at it and the ball flies through to gilly
kumar to ojha, no run, moves in towards leg and middle, nudged to the on side
kumar to ojha, no run, gets back and across to jab a delivery coming in to the middle and off line back to the bowler
srivastava to ojha, 1 wide, slants this across and outside off stump. wide.
chawla to warner, 1 run, on the middle and leg line, turned through midwicket for a single
chawla to warner, 1 run, gets back to dab this to midwicket for a single
srivastava to warner, 1 run, slightly slower, outside off, warner drags it to deep square-leg
srivastava to ojha, no run, around the off stump line, defended to the off side
valthaty to warner, no run, slower one from wide of the crease, pushed out to the off side
valthaty to venugopal rao, no run, the slower one outside off and it goes past the defensive push and rolls through to the keeper
srivastava to warner, 1 run, stays back to run this down to third man for a single
srivastava to venugopal rao, 1 run, around the off stump line, steered to left of backward point

srivastava to warner, out, shalabh srivastava hugs adam. priety zinta does her hop-skip-and-jump routine. warner walked down the track and went for a big swing to the on side. the ball just about straightened on that leg and middle line and that meant warner got a leading edge. the ball swirled really high in the air and gilly called for the catch and ran past warner to take it.
chawla to sriram, no run, around the off stump, pushed out to covers
chawla to venugopal rao, 1 run, gets this away for a single to the leg side
valthaty to venugopal rao, 2 runs, slower one on the off and middle line, turned to vacant spaces in midwicket for couple of runs.
valthaty to venugopal rao, 1 run, dabs this past square-leg
chawla to pathan, no run,
chawla to venugopal rao, out, delhi are going down. punjab stay alive in the competition. it was a tossed-up delivery outside off and venu lofted it to long-off
valthaty to hopes, 1 run, slower one outside off, hopes forces it to long-off
valthaty to hopes, no run, he keeps bowling those slower ones, this one has been steered to point
chawla to birt, four runs, skips down the track and chips it up and over midwicket in some style.
chawla to birt, no run,
harris to nagar, 1 run, ah the idea shot. he was withdrawing his bat away from the line of the delivery but the ball runs off the face of the bat to third man
harris to birt, 2 runs, on the leg stump line, jabbed to square-leg. the bowler and two other fielders from the deep converge but the batsmen had enough time to turn back for the second
kumar to birt, no run, another swing and a miss. gilly throws the ball back to praveen
harris to morkel, 1 run, pushes it away for a single
harris to nagar, out, walks right across the stumps and tries to swing to the on side. he misses and the ball nails  him on the off stump line. trapped!
harris to aaron, no run, in the corridor outside off and it goes past the attempted heave
srivastava to aaron, no run, punjab have won their third game in a row. this was a slower one and the batsman couldn't get bat on ball. punjab remain in the hunt for the spot in final four.
gayle to valthaty, no run, fires in a quicker one on leg stump, tries to launch it over midwicket once again but makes no contact, good start by gayle
van der wath to marsh, no run, extra bounce as he angles this across him, and marsh tentatively pokes at it
van der wath to marsh, no run, defended towards cover, no room this time
aravind to gilchrist, 1 run, this is 2001st as he dabs this towards third man
aravind to marsh, no run, slower ball this time, marsh checks the drive, gets the inside half of the bat towards mid-on
mithun to gilchrist, no run, struck on the thigh as he looks to work this away, although for a second i thought he shouldered arms towards the end
gayle to gilchrist, no run, pushed straight to extra cover
gayle to gilchrist, 1 run, jabs it into the leg side for a single to keep strike
mithun to gilchrist, (no ball) 1 run, another no-ball, pushed uppishly towards long-off for a single, another freehit, bangalore in some trouble here
kohli to gilchrist, 1 wide, slips a wide down the leg side
kohli to marsh, no run,
kohli to gilchrist, four runs, nicely struck, poor ball but it was crunched through deep extra cover
aravind to marsh, 1 run,
aravind to gilchrist, four runs, gilchrist a touch fortunate there, tried to swing it over midwicket but ended up getting an inside edge past the keeper to the fine-leg boundary
aravind to gilchrist, no run,
aravind to gilchrist, 1 run, turned away to square leg for a single
gayle to gilchrist, 1 leg bye, targeting leg stump again, tries to whip it fine, gets a leg-bye instead
gayle to marsh, four runs, made some room and gayle chased him, hurled it hard down the leg side and marsh just helped it on its way to the fine-leg boundary
gayle to marsh, 1 run, makes room and smacks it to deep midwicket for one more

gayle to gilchrist, 4 byes, the batsman wins in the end as the wicketkeeper misses, just outside leg stump, gilly tried to dismiss it over midwicket, missed and so did arun karthik whose view was blocked
mithun to marsh, 1 run, just a single again, just pushed a wide one down towards long-off
aravind to marsh, no run, swing and a miss again, slower one but he was onto it a little too early
kumar to gayle, no run, comes down the track and has a swing at it, can't connect as it nips away
kumar to gayle, no run, swing again and movement off the pitch too, gayle lets it go once again
kumar to gayle, no run, a maiden over to gayle, a commendable effort, beautiful delivery once again, swinging away and nipping away further, gayle opts out of that one, good start for punjab
harris to tiwary, 1 wide, down the leg side, gayle tries to glance it fine, misses, called a wide
harris to tiwary, 1 wide, wide down the leg side again, much wider than the previous one
harris to kohli, 1 leg bye, angling in towards middle, gets across to tickle it down to fine leg for a single
kumar to kohli, no run, angling in towards middle, gets across to play it towards midwicket
kumar to tiwary, no run, playing inside the line was tiwary, praveen got it to nip away again and beat the outside edge, superb spell thus far
srivastava to de villiers, 1 run, gets back and knocks it down into the leg side for a single
valthaty to de villiers, 1 run, gentle medium, pushed towards deep point for a single
chawla to de villiers, 1 run, pushed past point for a quick single to keep strike, time for the timeout
valthaty to de villiers, 1 run, cracked down towards long-off for a single
valthaty to de villiers, no run, dibbly dobbly mediums, played back to the bowler
valthaty to de villiers, four runs, nicely placed, a bit of width on that one, moved away and sliced it over point for a boundary
valthaty to de villiers, 1 run, slaps it straight back onto the stumps at the non-striker's end
valthaty to van der wath, 1 run, squeezed it wide of extra cover for a single
chawla to langeveldt, no run, gets a stride out and plays it towards cover
chawla to mithun, 1 run, has a swing at that one, drags it to deep midwicket for a single, the end of a successful spell
srivastava to aravind, 1 run, slapped past the bowler for a single
chavan to tendulkar, 1 run, pushed away into the off side to get off the mark
chavan to suman, no run,

watson to suman, out, early breakthrough for rr. that one was straighter from watson and suman looks to flick away through mid-wicket. he did everything right except the 'through' part of the shot and fed it down menaria's throat. easy catch in the end and warney could be heard on the mic saying 'yeah.'
chavan to tendulkar, 1 run, slower through the air, nudged to square leg

chavan to tendulkar, four runs, swept over the inner ring, almost goes all the way but one bounce before it hits the rope. warney tells a story of srt inviting him for dinner during tests and keeping him awake until 2am
watson to tendulkar, 1 leg bye, drifting into the pad and helped on its way to fine leg
watson to rayudu, no run, just outside off this time, rayudu looks to steer to third man, but pushes it to slip
watson to rayudu, 1 run, played off the backfoot to midwicket

watson to rayudu, out, a touch slower and rayudu tries to drive through mid off but gets a leading edge and the ball lobs up in the air, just over the inner ring. super catch from ross taylor running backwards and to his left from his position in the covers.
chavan to sharma, no run, driven into the covers, chavan getting some turn
chavan to sharma, 1 run, still pushing it around, this time through the inner ring, to deep extra cover
watson to sharma, no run, nipping back in, shrama gets behind the line and defends

chavan to tendulkar, no run,  appeal for lbw  big shout from chavan, its the slider and srt looks to drags across. seems as though it may have been missing leg but hawkeye shows that it was hitting leg stump.
chavan to tendulkar, 1 run, srt is down the track and flicks to midwicket for one
trivedi to tendulkar, 1 run, turned through mid-wicket
warne to sharma, 2 runs, quicker one and sharma gets his bat down in time to dig the ball out to mid-wicket, he comes back quickly and gets the two
warne to tendulkar, 1 run, a little leading edge from srt, wide of cover, nothing too dramatic in the battle between the two big guns yet
botha to sharma, 1 run, turned to mid-wicket, its a scramble again, but the two are committed
botha to tendulkar, no run, driven to mid on, taylor dives to his left and saves any runs
botha to sharma, 1 run, nudged through the covers
botha to tendulkar, no run, srt comes down the wicket and plays across the line, gets an inside edge to fine leg, good sstart from botha
warne to sharma, 1 run, sharma has the dancing shoes on, comes down the track and hits the ball with the turn, drives to long off

warne to tendulkar, 2 runs, mishit and lucky for srt. deceived by the turn and looks to play to mid-wicke but ends up hitting it over warney's head and it's in the air for a fair while before it bounced before long off.
warne to tendulkar, no run, slower and looks like warney is tryng the wrong 'un. srt defends solidly
warne to tendulkar, 1 run, driven into the covers and srt keeps strike
singh to sharma, 1 run, but not facing, sharma plays that down to fine leg to put the big west indian on strike
botha to sharma, no run, turned to mid-wicket by sharma, botha tossing it up nicely
botha to sharma, 1 wide, down the leg side and that's called wide
botha to sharma, 1 run, swept to deep backward square leg
botha to sharma, no run, sharma continues to work the ball on the on side, turns it to mid-wicket but that area is protected
singh to sharma, 2 runs, goes down the track and lofts that over long off, hasnt got enough on it and it doesnt reach the boundary, but its a good shot on the charge
botha to sharma, 1 run, goes straight on and pushed to mid on
botha to pollard, 1 run, pushed to mid on, pollard happy to turn the strike and not look for anything too big
botha to sharma, 1 run, gets a big stride in and a leading edge into the covers, warne doesn't pick up cleanly and sharma calls for the run, he wants to keep strike
warne to sharma, 1 run, that's 50 for rohit sharma, and an innings of great maturity. plays that out past point to bring up the half-century
warne to pollard, 1 run, turned to mid-wicket, sensible stuff from pollard
warne to sharma, no run, comes down the wicket and gets an under edge onto the on side
warne to sharma, 1 run, swept to deep mid-wicket, on one knee, it's a good over from warne, who is pushing the brakes on the mi innings himself

menaria to pollard, 2 runs, miscued from pollard. he goes for the big hit over the covers and gets off the toe end of the bat.  that was a tough one for ross taylor who had to change direction while attempting to take the catch and in the end doesn't get a hand to it.
menaria to pollard, no run, quiet now, defended back to the bowler
menaria to pollard, 1 run, looks to drive and gets an outside edge to third man, keeps strike

warne to franklin, four runs, or with the second. there's the wrong 'un and franklin drives over the inner ring, it as in the air for a fair bit but eluded the fielder and ended up at the deep extra cover boundary
warne to franklin, 1 run, turned to deep square leg for one

warne to sharma, out, now he gets one and how wily is that? warne tosses it up and it turns away, sharma has come miles down the track as he looks to hit that over the warne's head. he loses his bat in the process of trying and misses the ball, it's an easy stumping in the end. warne has engineered this one for sure.
patel to watson, 1 run, better now, outside off and steered away down to third man, the cameras show us malinga wearing a purple floppy instead of the cap
patel to dravid, no run, but of frustrating creeping in, perhaps. dravid flashes and misses, munaf ends it well
harbhajan singh to watson, no run, angles into watson again and he pushes to mid on
patel to dravid, 1 run, dravid looking to drive and gets an outside edge to third man
patel to watson, no run, driven out to mid-off where srt does the fielding and there's an enormous roar for th most popular man in mumbai
patel to watson, no run, driven again this time with a litle less force and there's no run
kulkarni to dravid, no run, outside off and pushed into the covers

kulkarni to dravid, 1 run, dabbed to the right of the bowler and dravid is off immediately, he is halfway down the track before watto has even seen him. harbhajan comes in from mid-on and wants to smash in into the stumps but throws too hard and misses. run-out opportunity missed and less than 100 needed
kulkarni to watson, 2 runs, run down to third man and it's a scramble for the second  but watson wants it
kulkarni to watson, no run, dabbed into the on side, no run there
kulkarni to watson, 1 run, pushed to mid on and watto keeps strike, dravid has only faced 10 balls so far
harbhajan singh to watson, 1 wide, down the leg side as harbhajan starts with a wide
harbhajan singh to watson, 1 run, whipped to mid-wicket, mumbai bleeding runs here
pollard to dravid, four runs, and the target is now less than 50. dravid goes down the track and smokes it through the covers, it's so easy
pollard to dravid, 2 runs, shimmies down the track and turns turned through backward square leg
pollard to dravid, 1 run, slower ball and driven to deep point, nice bit of finesse to end the over
malinga to dravid, 1 run, now he is able to guide it third man, as he wanted to do the last ball
pollard to dravid, 1 run, dravid carries on hsi main role, rotates the strike, guides this down to third man
pollard to dravid, four runs, too classy from dravid, takes a step out of the crease and flicks it though fine leg to bring up the 100 in elegant fashion
pollard to watson, 1 run, tapped onto the leg side, ambled single taken
patel to watson, 1 run, that is a stunning shot for one. driven down past munaf, straight as a pin, there's a man there though, so it isnt a boundary but it was good looking enough to be one
malinga to watson, 1 run, driven along the ground this time for one
malinga to dravid, 1 run, quicker one, played off the hips into the leg side
kumar to ravi teja, 1 run, taps this to the on side for a single
kumar to dhawan, no run, moves away from dhawan who pushes it back to the bowler
kumar to ravi teja, 1 run, in the zone outside off, run down to third man for a single
kumar to dhawan, 1 run, taps this to cover point for a single
kumar to ravi teja, 1 run, walks down the track and jabs the incoming delivery to the on side for a single

kumar to dhawan, 2 runs, edged  but safe. it moved away in the air, from leg to off, and shikhar, who was trying to work the ball to midwicket, got a leading edge to cover point but it fell clear of paul
bhatt to ravi teja, no run, on the middle and leg, and some turn there, teja gets a leading edge to covers
bhatt to ravi teja, 1 run, on the middle, ravi goes back to punch it wide of mid-on
bhatt to dhawan, no run, slower this time and shikhar defends down the track
bhatt to dhawan, 1 run, moves down the track and hits it to the right of the bowler who lunges out to make a half-stop.
kumar to dhawan, four runs, this time its pk who pings the pad and shikhar glances it to the fine-leg boundary
kumar to dhawan, 1 run, just outside off stump finally and shikhar edges the intended drive to his pad
kumar to ravi teja, 1 wide, gilchrist is standing up to the stumps now and he reaches well outside off to collect this wide
kumar to ravi teja, no run, outside the off stump, mishit to covers
harris to ravi teja, 1 run, stays back to work it to the on side for a single
valthaty to dhawan, 5 wides, punjab continue to bowl around the leg side and sometimes even down the leg. this one is a wide down the leg and it runs past gilly, who is up to the stumps
valthaty to ravi teja, 1 run, takes this from outside off and whips it to deep midwicket
chawla to ravi teja, 1 run, dropped by chawla not easy. ravi teja went down the track and drilled it hard to left of piyush who went with both hands but it burst through his palms
valthaty to dhawan, 1 run, flicks this through to deep midwicket for a single
mclaren to dhawan, 1 run, taps this to extra cover for a single

valthaty to ravi teja, 3 runs, dropped by ryan harris mid-on. ravi teja went for the big hoick to the on side and top edged it to left of mid-on. harris moved to his left, settled under it and went with the australian style of catching and clanged it! what a day punjab have had on field. miserable
chawla to ravi teja, 1 run, laps this to midwicket region for a single

valthaty to ravi teja, out, some one has held a catch. no seriously. really. truly. unbelievable.  it was wristed away towards deep midwicket, the bottom-hand working overtime, and abhishek pouches it and throws the ball in the air
valthaty to duminy, no run, drives this down the track
valthaty to duminy, 1 run, taps this to backward point region for a single
chawla to duminy, 1 run, moves down the track to ping long-off
bhatt to dhawan, four runs, swipe away! he fetched it from around off and swung it to the square-leg boundary. crashed
harris to dhawan, 1 run, around the off stump line, nudged to right of backward point for a single
bhatt to white, 2 runs, taps this through midwicket and will pick up couple of runs. nicely done. lots of vacant real estate in that area
harris to white, 1 run, backs away to drive this to long-off for a single. finally shikhar is on strike
harris to dhawan, 1 run, he will get just a single, down to long-off.
duminy to valthaty, 1 run, on the leg stump line, paul stays adjacent to the line and punches it to long-off. white has a chat with the bowler as gilly takes guard
duminy to gilchrist, no run, and again. there was some width on offer but gilly couldn't find the gap
duminy to gilchrist, no run, this is a lot straighter on the off stump line, pushed down to mid-on
steyn to valthaty, no run, curves away from the off stump line, paul has a go at it but doesn't connect
steyn to valthaty, no run, and again
steyn to marsh, 1 run, fine delivery this: curving in towards the off stump and shaun defends.
duminy to marsh, no run, floated on the off, pushed out to point
duminy to marsh, no run,
steyn to gilchrist, no run, another screamer, lifting delivery in the channel outside off and gilchrist drops his wrists, gets his bat out of the way and sways away. game on!
anand rajan to gilchrist, 1 wide, wide delivery, from round the stumps. way outside the off stump.
ojha to karthik, four runs, reverse slap! dk fetches this from outside off and reverse swept it past the slip and to the left of backward point
ojha to karthik, 1 run, presses back to turn this to midwicket for a single
ojha to gilchrist, no run, gets back to turn this to square-leg fielder
ojha to gilchrist, no run, lands on the middle and leg and skids on to hit the pad. gilly was trying to turn it to square-leg
christian to karthik, 1 run, in the zone outside off, run down to third man
ojha to gilchrist, 1 run, on the middle and leg, turned to deep square-leg for a single
duminy to karthik, 1 run, goes down the track and steers it through point to hand over the strike to gilchrist
duminy to gilchrist, 2 runs, gets back to whip this to deep midwicket region
christian to mclaren, 1 run, slower one, on middle and off, tapped down to third man
mishra to nayar, 1 run, turns this form around off and middle line to midwicket
mishra to mclaren, no run, ah! a lovely delivery. he slowed up the pace on this one and that did the trick. the batsman couldn't adjust to the slower pace and jabbed out at it. the keeper collects
duminy to mclaren, 1 run, gets a leading edge to cover point, trying to dab this to the on side
duminy to mclaren, 1 run, punches this one out to long-off
ojha to nayar, out, ojha pumps his fist. abhishek went down the track and swung it straight to deep midwicket. punjab's dreams are evaporating in the hills
ojha to mandeep singh, 1 run, on the middle and leg, dabbed to the on side
ojha to mclaren, 1 run, fetches it from outside off stump, and drags it to deep midwicket
christian to mandeep singh, no run, on the off stump line, stabbed back to the bowler
mishra to mandeep singh, 1 run, leg break on the middle and leg, swept away to long-leg
mishra to kumar, no run, gets back to defend this back to the bowler

anand rajan to chawla, six runs, folks see the highlights. joy and agony for duminy! piyush lashed this high towards cover boundary. duminy ran to his left, then realised it was going over him, back pedaled and lunged back to catch it but fell on the ropes!
anand rajan to chawla, no run, in the zone outside off stump, swing and a miss

anand rajan to chawla, out, bhatt is run out. the slower one was pushed to the off side of the pitch, anand got to it and found the stumps at the striker's end. punjab's dreams evaporate into the hills of mcleodganj. good brave effort from them at the end of the tournament and they nearly sneaked through. but that's that. some joy for deccan.
khan to hussey, 1 wide, prodigious away movement from zaheer, but after that chat with the umpire, delivered from wide of the crease and it is called a wide
aravind to vijay, 1 run, gets away this time with a single towards midwicket
aravind to vijay, no run, tries to work him away off the hip, but cannot get the timing on it and aravind goes to his right to field, excellent over from the karnataka seamer
khan to raina, no run, bowls this one in the channel outside off stump again and bounces as it zips away, raina watches it closely and shoulders arms
khan to raina, no run, more away movement from zaheer, superb control, pitches outside off and moves away from raina
khan to badrinath, no run, again that man gully comes in to play, badri stays beside the line to steer a widish one to him
vettori to saha, no run, pushes away a flatter ball in to the off side and sets off for the run, sent back by dhoni
aravind to saha, 1 wide, goes wide down the leg side in an attempt to bring the ball back in
vettori to saha, no run, can;t get it away, slower through the air, he tries to work it on the leg side but cannot time it off the wicket
mithun to saha, 1 run, hangs his bat to a ball wide outside off and gets it away to third man
mithun to saha, no run, shuffles across and outside off stump looking to work it from off in to the leg side, he favours the on side a touch too much, leading edge that goes to covers
gayle to saha, 4 leg byes, chennai getting some sort of move-on here, saha shuffles across, and gets a small tickle on one around leg stump to get it fine past the keeper
gayle to saha, no run, almost yorks himself as he hustles around and tries to work it away through midwicket, but gets an inside edge on to pad
gayle to dhoni, no run, haah, gayle gets feet in the way of a drive from dhoni, stops the ball, finds bravo in the way, and pushes him out of the way to pick up the ball, dwayne smiles
vettori to morkel, no run, can;t get him away, he goes back to work it away right to midwicket

mithun to morkel, out, zaheer takes the steepler, keeps his eyes on the ball all long, morkel this time went for his favourite hitting zone over deep midwicket, but gets it off the toe end of the bat high in the sky, zaheer watches it like a hawk at midwicket and takes a tumbling catch in the end
ashwin to kohli, no run, superb over, almost had him, this guy is relentless, this one is hanging in the air for a while, has him pushing at it in the air, almost carried to ashwin
bollinger to kohli, no run, tight line close to off stump, and virat pushes it away towards extra cover from the crease
bravo to kohli, no run, bravo goes theatrical to stop a defensive push from kohli, goes flying to his left horizontally to grab the ball and comes down crashing
raina to gayle, 1 wide, fired wide down leg side from round the stumps
raina to kohli, 1 run, suresh concedes a run, it was pushed back to him, and he tried to back-flick it on to the stumps, missed and they crossed over
bravo to tiwary, no run, goes for the square drive to one a touch wide outside off but straight to point
bravo to tiwary, no run, bowls it from wide of the crease in to tiwary who adjusts to play it back to the bowler, can chennai come back with some quiet overs?
bravo to tiwary, 1 run, gets width outside off stump and guides it past backward point to third man
raina to gayle, 1 run, stays in the crease to work one through midwicket
raina to tiwary, no run, good work from badri at extra cover, runs to his left and dives to prevent the single off the drive
bravo to gayle, no run, the other version of gayle, the watchful one, lets it go outside off stump
bravo to tiwary, no run, tiwary tries to go over the sightscreen, but ends swinging way inside the line of a ball outside off, bat turns in his hands and one hand comes off the bat too
raina to tiwary, 1 wide, he does not have to do anything with this one as it is fried way wide down the leg side
raina to tiwary, 1 run, direct hit and tiwary was struggling, it was tucked towards bravo at midwicket, who fired in the throw even as they went for the single, just missed at the non-striker;s
raina to gayle, 1 wide, raina has lost his line totally here, fires in another one wide down leg from round the wicket
raina to gayle, no run, pushed back to the bowler from leg stump
raina to gayle, 1 run, dropped gayle went back in the crease and in an attempt to whip it away, looped it straight back to raina, it went to suresh at waist height, went in and went out
malinga to goswami, 1 wide, slides down the leg side, called a wide
harbhajan singh to gambhir, 1 run, turned away past midwicket for a single
ahmed to tiwary, no run, fished for it outside off, held it back slightly and pushed it outside off, tiwary poked at it and missed
price to kallis, 1 run, bowled it flat on the off, defended towards extra cover
price to tiwary, 1 run, angled in towards leg stump, tapped it into the on side for a quick single, tiwary's looking good
malinga to tiwary, no run,
malinga to tiwary, no run, deceived by the slower ball, change of pace and tiwary was committed to an attempt to clear midwicket, missed it completely
malinga to tiwary, no run, good stuff, banged it in this time and with pace, tiwary had stepped down the track but ended up having to duck
price to tiwary, 1 run, tiwary gave him the charge again but price fired it flat on middle and leg, turned past midwicket for one more
harbhajan singh to tiwary, four runs, nice placement, waited for it to turn in, made room early and guided it past point and it raced away on this quick outfield
harbhajan singh to tiwary, 1 run, quicker through the air, jumped down the track and knocked it wide of midwicket for a single
harbhajan singh to kallis, 1 run, dropped it behind point for a single to keep the strike

franklin to pathan, out, slower one on middle and yusuf had made his mind up, bent low and tried to whip it over square leg, was a bit of a miscue, abu nechim was placed at deep square leg and judged it well
harbhajan singh to ten doeschate, 1 run, the doosra first up to ten doeschate, he doesn't pick it, gets a leading edge wide of point, gives kallis the strike

harbhajan singh to ten doeschate, 2 runs, ten doeschate survives, came down the track to another doosra, tried to smash that over midwicket, didn't pick it again, got a leading edge that landed in no man's land
harbhajan singh to ten doeschate, 1 run, drops it into the leg side, wisely, to pick a single
harbhajan singh to ten doeschate, no run, comes down the track and drops it on the pitch, harbhajan gives him the stare

franklin to ten doeschate, four runs, nicely done, moved across too early and franklin slid that down the leg side, ten doeschate did well to get some bat on that one to clip it to the fine-leg boundary
malinga to bhatia, 1 run, didn't pick the slower one, was into the shot too early, miscued it completely and malinga got under it, only to drop it, straight through his fingers, what a mess
malinga to ten doeschate, six runs, gets it right this time, slower one on middle and he flicked it over midwicket, nicely done, off the meat and cleared the ropes

iqbal abdulla to suman, out, strikes immediately! suman charged out to dispatch him over midwicket first ball, it turned away and he ended up getting a leading edge, yusuf took it easily at extra cover
iqbal abdulla to harbhajan singh, no run, held it back slightly, turned away and he played inside the line to that one
balaji to tendulkar, 1 run, strays on leg stump, tendulkar tried to glance him fine but wasn't able to, a leg bye in the end
shakib al hasan to tendulkar, 1 run, eased past extra cover into the deep for a single
shakib al hasan to tendulkar, 1 run, waits for it to turn away and punches it towards deep cover for a single
shakib al hasan to harbhajan singh, 2 wides, fired that one down the leg side, called a wide, the keeper fumbled to concede one more
pathan to harbhajan singh, no run, tossed it up on the off, swept it straight to square leg
pathan to harbhajan singh, 1 run, bowled it flat on the off, came down the track and smacked it to deep midwicket
bhatia to tendulkar, 1 run, slower one on leg stump, turned past square leg for a single
shakib al hasan to sharma, no run, tossed it up outside off, rohit let it go as it turned away and was hoping for a wide but it wasn't called
bhatia to pollard, 1 run, sliding on leg stump, turns it away to fine ;eg for a single
bhatia to tendulkar, 1 leg bye,
iqbal abdulla to tendulkar, 1 run, swept it down to deep square leg for a single
bhatia to pollard, 1 run, just chips that over the bowler's head for one more
bhatia to pollard, 1 run, targeting middle and leg, pushed away into the leg side for a single
shakib al hasan to franklin, 1 run, gets across to turn it behind square for a single
shakib al hasan to pollard, no run, quicker through the air, slapped straight to extra cover
shakib al hasan to pollard, 1 run, drilled hard to long-off for a single, tidy stuff from shakib
iqbal abdulla to franklin, 1 run, chops this wide of cover for a single
lee to rayudu, 2 runs, rayudu gave him the charge and ended up slicing it over point for a couple of runs, gambhir throws in a hard one and is holding his shoulder in pain
bollinger to gayle, no run, more fun as gayle backs away to send this to the arabian sea, but doesn't quite connect and hits it towards mid-on
morkel to agarwal, no run, nice check-drive from off-side line, but finds cover
ashwin to gayle, no run, dangerously non-turning and accurate delivery. gayle gets the bat down in time
ashwin to kohli, no run, angled across him, played to cover
ashwin to kohli, no run, defended into the leg side
bollinger to agarwal, 1 wide, fast delivery, surprises him a touch, but it is down the leg side too
bollinger to agarwal, no run, angled a cross agarwal, slight seam movement away too, and beats agarwal's drive
bollinger to agarwal, four runs, slower ball but agarwal goes ahead with his drive, and puts enough behind this to clear mid-off. he has kept the momentum up for bangalore despite gayle's loss
ashwin to kohli, 1 wide, flat delivery outside leg
ashwin to agarwal, 1 run, pushed towards cover. straight delivery
ashwin to kohli, no run, straight delivery again, can't get it past square leg
ashwin to agarwal, 1 run, and agarwal picks the carrom ball early, plays for the legspin and opens the face to guide it into the covers
jakati to agarwal, no run, another skiddy delivery, off and middle line, played back to the bowler
jakati to agarwal, 1 leg bye, comes down the track, gets another skiddy delivery that doesn't turn. they'll get a leg-bye
bravo to kohli, 1 run, holds its line outside off, kohli gets a single wide of cover
bravo to agarwal, 1 wide, wide down the leg side, third one for bravo
jakati to de villiers, no run, looks to drop and run, kohli refuses the single as it hasn't gone far off dhoni
morkel to kohli, 1 run, pushed past the diving morkel for one
morkel to kohli, 1 run, hit just wide of midwicket for one
morkel to de villiers, no run, slower ball, de villiers goes back and punches this, but can't beat mid-off
jakati to de villiers, no run, makes a diving save himself as this is pushed to his left
raina to pomersbach, 1 run, forced past the straight midwicket for a single
raina to kohli, no run, dives to his right, past luke to save this single
jakati to pomersbach, no run, floated outside off, and left alone
jakati to pomersbach, six runs, top shot, coming down the track, lofting this over long-off. almost inside-out
jakati to pomersbach, no run, straighter one outside off, beats the outside edge
jakati to pomersbach, 1 run, looked to come down the track, stays back to a flat delivery, pushes it down to long-off
bravo to pomersbach, four runs, dropped? not really, dhoni is standing up, and this is a healthy enough edge for pomersbach. streaky but four
bravo to pomersbach, 1 leg bye, appeal for leg-before but pomersbach has shuffled across enough to get outside the line of off. gets a leg-bye to keep the strike
ashwin to pomersbach, no run, flat, around off, defended back
bollinger to kohli, 1 run, driven past extra cover for one

ashwin to tiwary, 2 runs, oh he has nearly killed ashwin. he doesn't seem to know where he is. nasty nasty hit. all tiwary's muscle into this shot back at ashwin, who doesn't have time to get out of the way and is hit straight on the head. it was hit so hard the ricochet flew to long-off, and they came back for two. he just didn't know for a moment where he was. walks off the field. gavaskar reckons they should have called for the stretcher
morkel to kohli, four runs, kolhi completes a very important half-century with a lovely boundary. makes room, lofts this late, over point. kohli keeps improving every day
morkel to kohli, 1 run, gets across this time and flicks this towards deep midwicket
bollinger to kohli, 2 byes, slower ball, beats him, kohli goes for the bye, and dhoni goes for the unnecessary hit and concedes the overthrow. very un-dhoni like
khan to hussey, 1 wide, swing away from hussey, starts just outside off, moves away, called wide. a touch harsh as this swung after passing the batsman
khan to hussey, 1 bye, this one jags back in and hussey has shouldered arms! de villiers has to dive to save four byes
khan to vijay, no run, angled across vijay, left alone
khan to hussey, no run, opens the face on this, still can't beat point
aravind to vijay, no run, angled a cross, driven to extra cover, doesn't find the gap
khan to badrinath, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
khan to badrinath, no run, no room as badri looks to run this down to third man
khan to badrinath, no run, pushed to mid-off, and raina turns down the single. so just the one wide from this over
aravind to raina, 1 leg bye, shuffles dangerously across, but gets the bat down in time for a single
aravind to badrinath, no run, pushed to cover
aravind to badrinath, no run, angled a cross him, pushed to cover
aravind to badrinath, no run, looks for the drive outside off, gets an inside edge onto the pad
khan to raina, no run, raina can't get rid of agarwal! hit straight to him this time. last three shots have been hit towards extra, but not past him
mithun to badrinath, 1 run, steered to third man for one
kohli to badrinath, no run, driven, but straight to extra cover
kohli to badrinath, 1 run, makes room and drives square, for a single to deep point
kohli to badrinath, no run, not a good day for the bowlers, this is hit back at kohli, and he is late into attempting the catch. hits his hands and pops out. no injury or damage done
kohli to badrinath, 1 run, driven down to long-off for a single. good over
vettori to raina, no run, flat, angled across the left-hander, hit straight to extra cover
vettori to raina, no run, flat again, no room, hit straight to extra cover again
vettori to badrinath, 2 runs, makes room, drives this square, past pint, comes back for two
kohli to raina, four runs, loose ball, angled down the leg side with the fine leg up, helped past the lone fielder by raina
vettori to badrinath, 1 run, makes room and drives this to long-off, along the ground
mithun to badrinath, four runs, badri manufactures the desperately needed boundary. comes down the track, and swats this between mid-on and midwicket
gayle to dhoni, no run, floater outside off, no turn, and dhoni pushes inside the line
gayle to dhoni, no run, another floater outside off, and dhoni is reaching again as there is no turn on this
mithun to dhoni, 1 run, angled across dhoni, hit down to long-off for one

vettori to raina, four runs, jeez this is not a good day for player safety. pomersbach's face - as he slides at the square-leg boundary - collides smack into kohli's knee as the two are converging to field this. another nasty blow. and kolhi goes high in the air too, but lands safely. gillespie-waugh anybody?
gayle to raina, 1 wide, misses his line, big wide down the leg side, de villiers does well with the collection
kulkarni to gambhir, no run, around the off stump line, stabbed away to point
kulkarni to gambhir, 1 wide, the scorecard ticks over with a wide down the leg side.. gambhir tried to play the leg glance but didn't connect
kulkarni to kallis, no run, in the zone outside off stump, left alone
harbhajan singh to gambhir, no run, lands just outside leg and turns towards off and middle, from over the wicket, gambhir stabs it to the off .. ball rolls to the keeper
harbhajan singh to gambhir, no run, taps this off break to extra cover
harbhajan singh to tiwary, 1 run, turns towards middle stump, tapped to wide midwicket region
patel to tiwary, 1 run, angling in towards the middle stump line , jabbed away from the crease
malinga to pathan, no run, just outside the off stump line, guided to backward point
malinga to tiwary, no run, just outside off stump, defended to the off
kulkarni to pathan, 1 run, taps this gently to the on side for a single
kulkarni to ten doeschate, 1 run, skids outside off stump, chopped down to third man
malinga to ten doeschate, no run, outside off stump, steered to backward point
malinga to ten doeschate, 1 run, closer to the off stump, straighter, run down to third man
franklin to pathan, 1 run, around the off stump line, guided to cover point

franklin to ten doeschate, no run, shout for lbw franklin came in around the stumps and got the ball to nip back in from outside off. it was almost on the off stump line when ryan decided to run it down to third man for a single. no room. no breathing space. the ball kept coming in and he tried to stab it away. and the ball hit the pad flap around the off stump line and would have hit the top of the off stump.
franklin to ten doeschate, 1 run, turns this one for a single
pollard to ten doeschate, 1 run, slower one outside off, tapped to left of backward point for a single
pollard to pathan, 1 run, slower one just outside off, nudged to cover point
harbhajan singh to pathan, 1 run, quickish skidder on the off stump line, nudged away to backward point
harbhajan singh to ten doeschate, 2 runs, top spinner outside off, ryan squeezes it wide of the lone slip
harbhajan singh to ten doeschate, 1 run, from round the stumps, floated around off, turned to square-leg
harbhajan singh to pathan, no run, moves around the stumps now, slows up the pace on it and yusuf flat-bats it back to harbhajan who makes a good stop
harbhajan singh to shakib al hasan, no run, gets back to punch this to covers
kulkarni to shakib al hasan, no run, in the zone outside off and the keeper collects
malinga to shakib al hasan, 1 run, moves down the track and has to check the shot as it was a slower one: he adjusted well to push it down to long-off
malinga to ten doeschate, 1 run, slower one outside off stump, pushed out to point for a single
patel to ten doeschate, 1 run, slower one around off stump, run down to third man
malinga to bhatia, 1 run, on the middle stump line ,turned behind square-leg
malinga to bhatia, 1 run, yet another slower one, bhatia edges the defensive poke on to his pad and ryan calls him over for a quick single
kulkarni to ten doeschate, 1 wide, pushes it wide outside the off stump.
iqbal abdulla to tendulkar, 2 runs, around the off stump line, tendulkar punches it neatly through extra cover
iqbal abdulla to blizzard, no run, on the off stump line, defended back to the bowler
pathan to tendulkar, no run, quickish delivery, swatted away to backward square-leg fielder
bhatia to blizzard, no run, another slower one, pushed out to kallis at extra cover
kallis to tendulkar, no run, gets back and across to punch this out to mid-off
kallis to tendulkar, no run, gets back to defend it to the bowler
lee to rayudu, 1 run, on the middle , tucked down to fine-leg region
balaji to franklin, 1 run, a little more room this time, franklin forces him away into the covers for a single.
kallis to rayudu, no run, over-pitched but well outside off, rayudu looks to cream through the off side but he is far from the pitch.
balaji to pollard, 1 run, jabbed out to the off for a quick single
kallis to pollard, no run, sharp lifter outside off and pollard sways away from the line of fire. supah spell from jacques.
shakib al hasan to suman, no run, this one grips and turns past the defensive poke. slip and silly point
iqbal abdulla to franklin, 1 leg bye, on the leg and middle, spins on to the pad and rolls away
shakib al hasan to franklin, 1 run, around off stump, franklin taps it quietly to left of backward point
shakib al hasan to franklin, no run, slower, on the middle and off, turned to midwicket

shakib al hasan to harbhajan singh, six runs, game over! crunched for a six! harbhajan roars. tendulkar smiles. gautam's face drains out of expressions. harbhajan rushed down the track and slugged it over wide midwicket boundary. nice and easy. kkr out of the tournament. mumbai indians stay in. tendulkar, for some reason still padded up, walks out to the middle to congratulate his team-mates. huge smiles, as you would expect in the mumbai camp.
ahmed to gayle, no run, nicely bowled, zipping across the left-hander who is a bit tentative and has a poke at it from the crease
ahmed to gayle, four runs, no luck for the bowler, produces the outside edge as gayle is pegged on the crease and pushes at one leaving him outside off, ball flies past slip

ahmed to gayle, 2 runs, it's all happening, gayle was eyeing the deep midwicket boundary, but did not get the connection with enough meat to take it over the boundary, in fact it was almost a catch as pollard came running to his right, the ball bounced close to his toes, he overran it, the ball almost trickled over the ropes before he dived to stop it from rolling over
malinga to gayle, no run, slower one, rolls his fingers over the ball, gayle had set himself up to again go through the off side, saw it coming slowly outside off and decided to rein himself in
harbhajan singh to gayle, no run, gayle plays out this ball, sensibly done, no risks, goes back and calmly pushes to extra cover
patel to agarwal, no run, and right away he is on a tight line close to off stump, agarwal tries to force him away through the off side and almost chops it on to the stumps
malinga to gayle, no run, three dot balls in a row, lunges out to push a slower one to covers, can malinga get the breakthrough this over?
sharma to agarwal, 1 run, almost one more, he creamed this one, it was flatter but he still smoked it off the middle of the bat, long off got around to this one though
pollard to gayle, 1 run, keeps strike with a neat push for a single towards extra cover
ahmed to gayle, 1 run, has gayle reaching out again to a wide ball outside off, he gets it away towards point
pollard to gayle, no run, if he had hit that one, that would have been it for that ball, gayle went back on one leg and tried to wallop it over the bowler;s head, could not connect
pollard to kohli, no run, pushed away towards point this time, virat has enough time to play himself in
ahmed to pomersbach, 1 wide, slants it wide down the leg side this time
ahmed to de villiers, 1 wide, that will be wide, tries to push it across the batsman, gets too much on the angle
ahmed to tiwary, 1 run, another single to tiwary, this has been a good over for bangalore
khan to blizzard, no run, almost run out, virat gets quickly to his right at point and fires in the throw, blizzard was in no position to get back in time, but the throw just missed
aravind to tendulkar, no run, goes hard at this one but cannot get it away, aravind gets to his right quickly to have sachin rushing back in to his crease
aravind to tendulkar, 2 runs, swiped across the line wide of midwicket and the man in the deep gets to his left to field
gayle to blizzard, no run, comes slowly off the track from round the stumps, he goes back to push it on the off side
gayle to blizzard, 1 run, this one is around off stump, he forced it towards virat at mid off who fired in the throw but missed again
aravind to tendulkar, 1 run, follows him with the angle from round the stumps and he gets around to force it towards extra cover,
aravind to tendulkar, 1 wide, tries to help one fine as it is slanted wide down the leg side, misses by some distance
vettori to sharma, no run, has him reaching out to one turning away outside off, pushed in the air to extra cover
vettori to franklin, no run, can't get him away, pushed back to the bowler
vettori to sharma, no run, tight over from dan, rohit can only stab a flatter one away on the off side
gayle to sharma, no run, darts it way outside off, rohit decided not to go for it thinking it would be a wide, but it turned in just inside the line
vettori to franklin, no run, almost pushed back to the bowler, uncertain whether to charge out or not, in the end it almost carried to dan
syed mohammad to franklin, no run, looks to drive from outside off stump but misses the flat one going across
syed mohammad to franklin, 1 run, looks to walk down the track, but this is a very flat trajectory that he is bowling, and franklin has to be content to push it on the off side
syed mohammad to pollard, 1 run, this one hurries straight on to him, he goes deep in the crease to punch past the bowler
vettori to pollard, no run, hurries on to the stumps and only a feeble inside edge from the batsman saves him
gayle to sathish, no run, gayle fires it in and goes up for the lbw appeal, did that strike him outside the line of off stump, not given by umpire rauf
gayle to sathish, 1 run, pushed back to the bowler
syed mohammad to malinga, six runs, sathish gets one away, comes down the track, making room outside leg, it is fired in and he gets under it to loft cleanly over long off
syed mohammad to sathish, 1 run, driven hard with the turn along the ground down to long off
khan to ahmed, no run, zaheer had targetted the stumps as he saw the batsman backing away, but he reached to it and managed to keep it out, stabbing it back to the bowler
syed mohammad to sathish, 1 run, slaps a dipping flat delivery down to long off
syed mohammad to ahmed, 1 run, tries to rush out and loft it over the bowler;s head but the ball turns across to take the edge of the bat and roll away towards long off
mithun to ahmed, four runs, that will be four, backed away again and had a big go, got bat to ball this time, just enough to take the outside edge screaming to the third man boundary
mithun to ahmed, 2 runs, shades of sunny sohal, backs away a mile outside leg, and brings down an angled bat down on it to get an outside edge towards third man
