khan to vijay, 2 runs, vijay edges straight away, and runs like a hare. zaheer angles it across gently, vijay's feet move lazily into the shot and briskly thereafter. the ball screams away to third man and he rushes back for the second. wide throw helps his cause.
khan to vijay, no run, better from vijay, moves nicely into a check drive as zaheer again angles it across him
khan to vijay, 1 run, vijay again leans across with authority and punches wide of mid-off for a single.

khan to hussey, 1 run, aha, interesting shot. hussey jumps out, ends up getting too close to the ball, and yet times it well to the left of tiwary at mid-off who moves with unbecoming agility to tumble away and stop. single taken
aravind to hussey, no run, perilously close to thew off stump as aravind gets one to hold the line outside off stump and hussey feels for it just inside the line.
khan to hussey, no run, decent finish to the over. zaheer finishes with one on the channel outside off and hussey steers towards point.

gayle to hussey, 5 leg byes, wake up bangalore! can't keep giving overthrows away in a final. gayle tosses it up on leg stump and hussey misses as he looks to flick. the ball runs away to the off side as gayle appeals. hussey charges down the track, and tiwary hurls it at the non-striker's end and misses. four freebies.
gayle to vijay, 1 run, vijay chops it away through point for one more single

syed mohammad to hussey, 2 runs, good start from syed, he's keeping it tight and chennai are dealing in unbelievably well-run twos here. hussey chisels a nudge through the square leg area and vijay responds for two more.
gayle to vijay, no run, holds it back a touch, vijay quietly defends.
gayle to hussey, no run, beats him outside off with some extra spin, hussey was looking to steer and the ball broke away sharply

mithun to hussey, 2 runs, good start to mithun's over, not the best finish though. hussey opens the face daintily and guides him to third man. once it goes outside the circle, these batsmen are looking at a minimum of two. every time.
aravind to vijay, 2 runs, this time he goes off side, lofting him cheekily over the infield for two more.
khan to hussey, 1 run, hussey moves to 49, he's feeling knackered too.. the weather's getting to them. hussey charges out, and drags zaheer around towards midwicket for one more.

vettori to vijay, no run, vijay plays the first dot ball since syed failed to hold on to a tough return chance. he looks to swing vettori through the leg side, but is early into the shot as vettori slows it up.

syed mohammad to hussey, six runs, hussey has hit syed into the marina beach. wallop. smear. visceral. he charges out, syed dares him by throwing it well up and hussey puts him on the chidambaram stadium roof.
vettori to vijay, 1 run, vijay pushes into the leg side for one more. he is completely knackered. eight more for a ton. that should keep him going.
khan to dhoni, no run, three in a row. knuckle ball at 122 kph, dhoni swings hard well before the ball comes along, and misses.
ashwin to gayle, no run, sharp spin again, this time closer to gayle, forcing him to play and he feels for it inside the line. gayle looks a little unruffled.
ashwin to kohli, 1 leg bye, kohli looks to push one backward of square and they get a leg bye as he misses.
ashwin to agarwal, four runs, was that a legbreak? george binoy thinks so. goes awry in any case, well wide of off stump and mayank cracks it through point for four.
bollinger to kohli, 1 run, this time he stands back in the crease and taps towards the off side for a single
bollinger to de villiers, four runs, some ab class coming through in that shot. bollinger over-pitches at 129 kph and ab caresses it through the line to send it speeding into the covers. top shot.
raina to kohli, no run, cover's turn now, intercepts swiftly as kohli looks for a single through cover.
raina to kohli, 2 runs, two to end the over, kohli whips raina with the turn softly enough to give him time to come back
jakati to kohli, 1 run, tossed well up on middle and leg, kohli leans out and opens the face to steer through point
raina to tiwary, no run, this one skids along, tiwary is late to go back and then doesn't get it too far away to the off side. no single taken.
ashwin to tiwary, 1 run, tiwary chips him with the spin over wide mid-off for a single.

ashwin to vettori, out, this final has lost more fizz than yesterday's beer can that was accidentally left open. vettori goes for a blob, a tame leading edge back to ashwin as he looks to work an offbreak to the leg side. vettori looks sheepish and gutted at the same time.
ashwin to tiwary, no run, half an appeal as tiwary stays on the crease and plays all over a sharp offbreak.
ashwin to tiwary, 1 run, this time he gets the single away, steering past point for a single.
raina to mithun, 2 byes, raina does his impersonation of muralitharan. big turning offbreak, comes in huge and mithun is utterly clueless. landed on off and middle, but missed leg.
raina to mithun, 1 run, keeps it tight outside off, and mithun steers through point for a single.
raina to tiwary, no run, tiwary is completely stuck. looks to dab through the off side but can't get it away.
bravo to tiwary, no run, another slowish ball, the variation is wasted on someone as cluelessly out of form as tiwary. swish and a miss.
bravo to tiwary, 2 runs, tiwary gets a thick outside edge this time, and the ball runs away to deep backward point.
bravo to tiwary, no run, at some point, the law of averages is going to catch up with tiwary and he is going to connect with the ball. until then he will keep swinging and missing like this.
bravo to tiwary, 1 run, now he gets bat on it, and lofts a single wide of mid-off.
jakati to tiwary, 1 run, jakati skids one across mis-timer tiwary who squeezes it away past point.
jakati to khan, no run, another dot ball, zaheer stays in the crease and can't get it away.
bravo to khan, 1 run, slower ball, zaheer somehow manages to get bat on it after being foxed, and he gets a single to fine leg.

bravo to tiwary, 2 runs, another bravo special slower ball, tiwary is not even bothering to spot them anymore, he is just swinging at them regardless. outside edge this time, whimpers away to third man.
bravo to tiwary, 1 run, another slower ball, tiwary throws everything at it and it dribbles into the deep cover area.
bollinger to khan, four runs, zaheer backs away, opens up the off side and carves bollinger through the covers. the rcb anthem plays on the pa system. pretty pointless.
ashwin to khan, 1 run, tight lines and breaking in nicely, zaheer manages to squeeze it down to third man.
ashwin to tiwary, no run, sharp offspinner again, tiwary stays back and looks to work it around but can't get it away.
ashwin to tiwary, 1 run, now he gets the single, working with the spin through the covers.
ashwin to khan, no run, zaheer can't deal with one that fizzes past him outside off stump.
jakati to khan, no run, zaheer can't connect with the big hit this time.

jakati to tiwary, 1 run, as comical as they come. tiwary looks to slug over the leg side, mis-hits the ball, loses his grip on the bat and the willow nearly travels further than the leather. always a poor sign that, for a batsman.

bollinger to khan, 2 runs, another drop in the deep. csk are finally dropping their guard. zaheer looks to hoist bollinger over long off, and mukund, subbing for vijay, was running in. he should have held on low, but he spilt it.
bollinger to syed mohammad, 1 wide, bounces hustles syed as it goes down the leg side.
raina to tiwary, 1 run, played with the spin into the off side, and a single for tiwary.
malinga to raina, 1 run, widish one dabbed towards third man
ahmed to vijay, no run, driven towards extra cover

ahmed to raina, 1 run, excellent timing, not much wrong with the ball, slight width as it rises outside off, raina guides it past point and it needs a dive from malinga at third man to save the boundary
malinga to vijay, no run, pushes towards cover and charges out for the single, is sent back, the fielder had got to the ball already
malinga to vijay, 1 run, he gets a single this time, with a push just wide of mid off
ahmed to raina, 2 runs, he plays the shot again, manages to connect, off the inside part of the bat, through square leg
ahmed to raina, 1 run, backs away and squeezes out a run to third man
ahmed to vijay, four runs, succeeds this time, did not try to murder the ball, just went through with the horizontal shot from the crease and got it just over mid on
harbhajan singh to raina, 1 run,
franklin to vijay, 1 run, makes a mile worth of room outside leg, but cannot guide this one past point, whose dive prevents the boundary
franklin to raina, 1 run, pushed towards point
harbhajan singh to raina, 1 wide, slides just down the leg side from around the stumps
harbhajan singh to bravo, 1 run, plays late to a similar one and manages to push it to long off
franklin to bravo, no run, pushes from the crease but is late on the shot and mistimes it to extra cover
harbhajan singh to bravo, no run, pushed straight to extra cover
pollard to bravo, 1 run, rohit has a go at the stumps from behind point and instead hits albie on the leg
ojha to bravo, no run, misses the dab towards third man
pollard to badrinath, no run, driven straight to mid off, non-striker has to get back quickly
pollard to badrinath, 1 run, they take half the run before the ball passes a diving backward point, and the other half after it has passed him
pollard to morkel, no run, pushed away to point
ojha to dhoni, 1 run, squeezes out another single with a push to extra cover
pollard to dhoni, no run, stays back in the crease and forces it to extra cover
pollard to badrinath, 1 run,
ojha to jadeja, 1 run, tucked behind square leg
pollard to ashwin, 1 run, whipped through square leg
pollard to jadeja, 1 run, pushed past a diving extra cover
pollard to ashwin, no run, tries to hang in the crease and dab it to third man, misses
harbhajan singh to bollinger, 1 run, almost chopped on to the stumps, it goes just past them on the leg side
harbhajan singh to jakati, 1 run, behind point for a single
malinga to bollinger, out, he backs away a mile outside leg, and slices it tamely to backward point
morkel to levi, no run, sharp away shape and bounce for morkel first up, levi tried to push at it initially but then withdrew his bat
morkel to levi, no run, pushed away towards cover
morkel to levi, 1 run, pushes hard from the crease, extra cover dives, but cannot prevent a single
morkel to tendulkar, no run, he is getting it to shape away neatly but it starts too far outside off this time, and is left alone
bollinger to levi, 1 wide, misses the hit square on the leg side as this one moves in down leg
morkel to tendulkar, 1 wide,
morkel to tendulkar, four runs, crack! sachin goes through the packed off side infield, stays in the crease and punches it through extra cover

morkel to tendulkar, six runs, that has gone all the way, some stroke that, down the track, the ball was going away from him, he reached out and lofted it without fuss, it went comfortably over the deep extra cover boundary, sachin holds the followthrough for effect
morkel to tendulkar, no run, what a corker of a reply from morkel, angled in and zipping away from sachin, no way of playing that, lucky not to edge it, or get bowled, that wasn't far from the stumps
bollinger to levi, 1 run, pushed wide of covers for a tight single, throw misses at the non-striker;s
bollinger to tendulkar, 1 run, vintage tendulkar, a shuffle, an eager flourish of a flick and he watches the ball race through square leg
ashwin to levi, 1 run, leading edge rolls towards mid off, levi was looking to turn it on the leg side
jadeja to levi, no run, shout for lbw, but that was going down leg stump
ashwin to levi, no run, hits hard down the track but ashwin stops it low to his right
bravo to levi, no run, tries to launch this one with the angle over square leg, but cannot connect, it rolls towards the keeper
bravo to levi, no run, played out to point
bravo to sharma, no run, leading edge towards the bowler as he looks to work on the leg side
bollinger to rayudu, 1 run, dabbed away to third man
bollinger to tendulkar, no run, serious bounce on that one, takes sachin by surprise, he somehow manages to fend it down
bravo to rayudu, no run, played out towards covers
jakati to rayudu, 1 run,
jakati to franklin, no run, beats him with one that holds its line outside off
morkel to franklin, no run, thick outside edge towards backward point
morkel to franklin, no run, that has gone through him, angled across just outside off, hint of inward shape as he ends up wafting outside the line
morkel to franklin, 1 run, pushed wide of cover for an easy single
morkel to rayudu, 1 run, driven behind point who takes pace off it with a dive
morkel to franklin, 1 run, pushed in the air down to long off
morkel to rayudu, no run, good delivery, quick and on off with the angle, defended on to the leg side
ashwin to franklin, no run, drives to extra cover
ashwin to franklin, 1 run, drives it down to long off
bravo to franklin, 1 wide, carries straightish down leg
bollinger to franklin, no run, played out to midwicket from the crease

bollinger to rayudu, six runs, rayudu ends it with a six over the third man boundary, leans back and opens the face to guide it superbly over the rope, it wasn't far from the fielder there, but too quick for him
pathan to mccullum, four runs, charges down the pitch and smacks pathan over square-leg for a four! it was a matter of time and it came as early as the second ball.
pathan to mccullum, 1 run, nudged that delivery shaping into the bat towards the right of mid-on for a single.
pathan to kallis, no run, another one that shapes into the batsman and kallis stands tall and drives it back to the bowler.
van der merwe to mccullum, no run,
van der merwe to mccullum, 1 wide, down the leg-side and he leaves it alone. wide called...
van der merwe to gambhir, 1 run, goes down the track and chips it away to the leg-side for a run. end of a wicket-taking over from van der merwe.
morkel to gambhir, no run, pacy ball, outside the off-stump and gambhir goes for a swing. misses completely. there is a slip in place for him.

morkel to tiwary, out, bowled again! similar ball, pitched right up and tiwary went back on his crease, trying to defend, could not get his bat down in time and the stumps get pegged back. three down and morkel's on a hat-trick.
yadav to gambhir, 1 run, pitches it right up to the bat and gambhir defends it to mid-off. darts off to a quick one.
yadav to pathan, no run, driven back but straight to the fielder.
morkel to gambhir, no run, drives straight to the fielder in the covers.
morkel to gambhir, 1 run, nurdled it away to the leg-side by gambhir for a single.
morkel to das, 2 runs, edged away by das and it goes racing away to the fence...well almost. venugopal rao dives at third-man and restricts it to only two. well fielded by rao.
maxwell to das, 1 wide, lot of turn there for maxwell and it goes down the leg-side for a wide.

morkel to das, 1 run, played it on the off-side and runs away for a single. that was smart batting but maxwell swooped down, got the ball and threw it down, all very quickly. umpire calls for a review but he is just in.

morkel to gambhir, out, bowled him! morkel has another wicket, and it is a big one. gambhir tried to run it down to the third-man but only got an inside-edge that found its way to the stumps. a bail went down and gambhir goes to the pavilion.
morkel to bhatia, 1 run, played away to the third-man for a single.
nadeem to bhatia, no run, defended on the off-side.
van der merwe to shukla, no run, tries to drive through the leg-side but misses the timing.
nadeem to shukla, six runs, huge! one of the bigger sixes tonight as shukla winds up and puts him into the stand behind mid-wicket.
nadeem to shukla, no run, attempts a hoick but gets nothing substantial on it.
yadav to shukla, no run, outside the off-stump and he tried to free the arms. misses again!
van der merwe to bhatia, out, he is gone, stumped! pitched right up to the bat and bhatia missed after coming down the track. namane ojha gathered it well and chopped the bails off their roots.
van der merwe to lee, no run, had the chance to go again, it was not pitched right up but he missed it.
de lange to finch, 1 run, this time it is pitched slightly up and finch taps it to the mid-wicket region.
lee to finch, 1 run, played it away to the third-man and a single for finch. which means that sehwag will not get the strike again!
iqbal abdulla to finch, 1 run, played away on the leg-side for a run.
iqbal abdulla to sehwag, 1 run, pushes the ball away for a single to mid-wicket.
iqbal abdulla to finch, no run, went down the leg-stump to give himself a lot of room but the bowler followed him and he defends again.
kallis to finch, no run, the ball jags back in with the angle and finch tries to run it down to third-man. does not get too much of a bat.
kallis to sehwag, four runs, flashed hard by sehwag and it goes racing to the point fence. spoils a good over from kallis.
bhatia to maxwell, no run, driven towards the extra-cover and its gone straight to the fielder.
bhatia to maxwell, 1 run, slower one and this time it is driven to the leg-side for a run.
bhatia to pathan, 1 run, nudged away to the leg-side for a single.
bhatia to maxwell, no run, another slower one and the batsman had no idea about it. a stifled appeal but an excellent over there, only three from it.
kallis to pathan, no run, driven to the covers and the non-striker is sent back by pathan.
kallis to pathan, 1 run, played away to the off-side for a single
de lange to pathan, six runs, biggie! pathan's got his third six and that did not hit the middle either! he has changed it around with those two sixes.
de lange to pathan, 1 run, played away for a single and retains strike.
pathan to pathan, 1 run, nudged away to the on-side for a run. only 10 more needed.
pathan to pathan, four runs, goes down a couple of steps and lifts it over the extra-cover region for a four that had grace written all over it!
pathan to pathan, 1 run, nudged away to the leg-side and gets a single.
kumar to dravid, 2 runs, outside off, dravid slashes at it outside the off stump, well stopped by harmeet at third man but slight misfield after he stops
kumar to rahane, 1 wide, sliding down the leg stump, well wide
faulkner to rahane, four runs, outside off, stands tall and thrashes it straight through the covers for a boundary, exquisite timing!
faulkner to dravid, no run,
faulkner to dravid, 2 runs, outside leg, goes for the flick and gets a comfortable two
faulkner to dravid, four runs, this time dravid goes through the offside, crunches it past the mid-off fielder, no chance watsoever for the fielder, ball goes running to the boundary
faulkner to dravid, 2 runs, drives it through the onside, fielder at midwicket misfields it and the batsman go through for an easy two
faulkner to rahane, 1 wide, wide down the leg stump
faulkner to rahane, no run,
chawla to dravid, no run, spins into the batsman, dravid makes room and chips it to midwicket
chawla to dravid, 1 run,
chawla to rahane, no run,
chawla to rahane, no run,
chawla to rahane, 1 run, punches it to midwicket for a single
kumar to rahane, 1 run, driven to mid-on and he is off for a single.
kumar to dravid, 1 run, drives with a flourish but it goes to the mid-on region for a single.
kumar to rahane, 1 run, nudged away to the fine-leg region for a single.

kumar to rahane, 1 run, slower one and rahane dabs it away to the deep square-leg for a single, dravid wanted to go for the second run but was sent back and what do we have here? a dravid dive back to the strike's end! setting a fine example is the new captain!
bipul sharma to rahane, no run, pitched right up and he drives it to the cover region for no run.
bipul sharma to rahane, 1 run, .jumps down the track and drives it to the long-off region for a single.
harmeet singh to dravid, no run, tries to flick it away but does not get it off the middle.
harmeet singh to dravid, no run, and again! dravid tries to take it from way outside the off-stump and flick it away to the leg-side but misses it by a mile.
harmeet singh to rahane, 1 wide, wide outside the off-stump after rahane tries to make some room there and the umpire calls it a wide too.
harmeet singh to rahane, no run, and rahane's showing some frustration here, goes for a drive through the covers but misses completely.
harmeet singh to rahane, 1 run, this time he flicks it away to the leg-side by walking across his stumps and takes a single.
harmeet singh to rahane, 2 runs, driven in the air over extra-cover and they easily run away for a couple.
harmeet singh to rahane, 1 run, edged but it did not actually race away and the third-man was able to run to his left and field it well.
harmeet singh to rahane, four runs, shot! driven crisply through the extra-cover region and it beats the long-off fielder rather easily.
chawla to menaria, no run, tries to play it on the off-side but chawla's bowled that one quicker and he misses it.
chawla to menaria, out, bowled! menaria, i think has yorked himself and the stumps are lying all scattered on the ground. chawla is pumped and rajasthan have lost two wickets in as many overs.
bipul sharma to rahane, 1 wide, goes wide in the crease and sends it down the leg-side, called wide too.
bipul sharma to hodge, 2 runs,
bipul sharma to hodge, no run,
chawla to rahane, no run, pitched right up to the bat and the batsman tries to steer it away to third-man.
chawla to rahane, 1 run,
valthaty to hodge, 1 run, driven inside-out to extra-cover for a run.
valthaty to rahane, four runs, pitched right up and my, my, that is squeezed through the two point fielders. that, at the expense of being repetitive, was again, a gentle push!
bipul sharma to hodge, 1 run, pitched right up to the batsman and hodge manages to get it away to the leg-side to give it back to rahane.
bipul sharma to rahane, 1 run, he tries to go over the bowler again but this time he does not get too much timing.
bipul sharma to hodge, 1 run,
bipul sharma to rahane, 5 wides, down the leg-side and that is missed by both, the bowler and the keeper. it was a wide, wide.
bipul sharma to rahane, no run, played it to the leg-side but cannot get it away for a run.
harmeet singh to rahane, 1 run, slower one from the bowler, leg-spinner and rahane deftly touches it away to the third-man for a single
harmeet singh to hodge, 1 run, another leg-spinner that hodge fails to connect, and gets only a single to long-off.
harmeet singh to rahane, four runs, and another one, a slower ball, and it is thrashed through the covers! good pitch or not, this has been a superb knock from the opener.
chawla to hodge, 1 run, drives it away to the off-side for a single. not getting too much timing in this innings is hodge.
chawla to rahane, four runs, down the track and he has smashed the ball away over the bowler's head. chawla is lucky he did not get a hand to that.
faulkner to hodge, out, bowled him! slower one, back of the hand stuff, and the batsman tried to play it across the line, but missed it completed and he is bowled.
faulkner to rahane, 1 run, another slower one and rahane is happy to tap it away to the leg-side for a run.
faulkner to shah, 1 run, goes deep into his crease and towards the off-side, but the flick finds a fielder at deep square-leg. only a single for shah.
kumar to shah, 1 wide, horribly gone wrong there, wide down the leg-side, probably in a bid to stall owais shah.
kumar to shah, four runs, another poor delivery down the leg-side and the ball has been flicked away to the fence for a four.
kumar to shah, no run, swing and he has missed it completely. shah loves smacking them to the leg-side and praveen has started bowling them to the off-side.
kumar to shah, four runs, that is a typical t20 stroke, one that thrills when it comes out. shah has actually swept praveen kumar away to the fine-leg fence for a four.
faulkner to rahane, 1 run, slower one and rahane is able to get a single that takes him to 98.
faulkner to shah, 1 run, hits it hard but does not time it well. it is to the leg-side again but only for a single.

faulkner to rahane, out, bowled him! misses his 100 by a couple of runs there! slower ball and rahane tried to go over the top of the extra-cover region, but the change of pace beat him completely and he fails to get any bat to that one. stumps are castled.
faulkner to cooper, six runs, slashes and what a way to make your ipl debut! that has gone all the way over the third-man region for a six!
faulkner to cooper, four runs, and he tries to smash them away yet again, but this time it is off the edge and it has evaded gilly's gloves through to the third-man fence.
trivedi to gilchrist, no run,
trivedi to gilchrist, 1 run, plays it away to the leg-side for a single to deep square-leg.
botha to gilchrist, no run, down the leg-side but does not get any bat on it.
botha to gilchrist, no run, pitched right up to the bat and it is driven back to the bowler.
botha to gilchrist, 1 run, and now gilchrist uses his feet and drives him to long-off. given the circumstances, this is an excellent over from botha, only three off it.
singh to gilchrist, no run, slows his pace down and gilchrist is stopped in his tracks playing his shot. defends and gets no run.

singh to gilchrist, 1 run, dropped! that was a difficult chance but should have been taken, unfortunately it popped out of the hands of the fielder. gilchrist went after the bowler, over the mid-on region but did not get too much of a bat there.
singh to valthaty, 1 run, flicked away to the deep square-leg fence for a single.
singh to gilchrist, 1 run, was shaping to swipe it away but checked himself and defended it and the ball rolls towards mid-on for a single.
botha to gilchrist, four runs, outside edge from gilchrist and that beats the third-man fielder easily for a four. botha will be aggrieved by that.
botha to gilchrist, 1 run, taps it away to the leg-side for a single.
botha to valthaty, four runs, swept away by valthaty and that has gone through the square-leg region for a four.
singh to gilchrist, 1 wide, down the leg-side and any bat on it would have got him a boundary. as it turns out, it is a wide.

singh to gilchrist, out, gone this time, caught in the region between mid-on and mid-off! slower one from amit singh and gilchrist tried to smack it over the bowler but the timing was too awry for it to carry all the way and cooper ran from mid-on to hold on to it.
singh to marsh, 1 run, pitches on the leg-stump and it skids on to marsh. a bit of an appeal but it was pitching way outside the leg-stump.
singh to valthaty, 1 run, valthaty tries to muscle it away over the leg-side but it goes only till the deep square-leg region.
cooper to valthaty, no run, again wanted to loft him over the in-field but does not get his timing right. valthaty's playing million shots a minute at the current moment.
cooper to nayar, 1 leg bye, cooper's got a bit of pace about him, and he hurries nayar into his stroke. that shouldn't have been a run but they get an overthrow in the end.
hodge to nayar, 2 runs, taps it delicately to the leg-side for a couple of runs.
hodge to nayar, 1 run, this time it is driven to the leg-side for a single.
hodge to marsh, 1 run, nudged around the corner for a run.
hodge to nayar, no run, tries to glance it away but gets nothing out of it.
cooper to nayar, 1 run, swings hard at that one, across the line but gets nowhere on the bat where he would have liked. gets a single.
chavan to hussey, 1 run, dabbed away to the long-off for a single.
chavan to mandeep singh, 1 run, played it away to the leg-side for a single.
trivedi to mandeep singh, 1 run, nurdled away to the leg-side and the fielder from the deep square-leg region comes in to restrict the second.
chavan to mandeep singh, 1 run, that is quick running, came down the track and drove it into the covers and they were off.
chavan to mandeep singh, four runs, swept away rather easily and that will go to the deep square-leg fence for a four.
trivedi to mandeep singh, 1 run, pushed away to the leg-side for a single.
trivedi to bipul sharma, no run, drives it back to the bowler and there is no possibility of a run.
botha to mandeep singh, 2 runs, pushed it away to the leg-side and the batsmen get a second thanks to some good running between the wickets.
botha to bipul sharma, 1 run, tries to drive it through the covers and gets the outer portion of the bat for a single.
trivedi to bipul sharma, 1 run, nudged away to the leg-side for a single.
trivedi to mandeep singh, 1 run, nudged away to the deep square-leg region for a run.
trivedi to bipul sharma, 1 run, outside the leg-stump and it is played away to the leg-side for a run.
cooper to mandeep singh, 1 run, slower ball from cooper and he tries to hoick it over the square-leg region, only to scoop it in the air. fortunately, it lands safely.
cooper to bipul sharma, no run, quicker one, on the middle and it is defended back.
chavan to bipul sharma, 1 run, swings it away to the leg-side yet again but only a single this time.
chavan to bipul sharma, out, swept hard but it only looked like he had done that, the timing went totally awry there and the ball went high, not long. the fielder ran in and took a smart catch there.
botha to chawla, 1 run, drives it to long-off for a run. they need two and a half runs per ball.
botha to faulkner, 1 run, drives towards the mid-wicket fielder and rushes off for a single
botha to chawla, 1 leg bye, slows it up really well and beats chawla and it hits his pad.
singh to faulkner, 1 run, smashes it but straight to the cover fielder.
cooper to chawla, out, slower one and cooper has bowled chawla to get his fourth wicket. what an ipl debut for the all-rounder from trinidad and tobago!
cooper to kumar, 1 run, drives to the covers for a single.
cooper to faulkner, 2 runs, goes for a heave to the leg-side but the slowness of the delivery messes up the timing. still the lack of timing allows the batsmen t come back for the second.
singh to harmeet singh, 1 run, the ball hits the batsman and they get a single
singh to faulkner, 2 runs, drives to long-off and they come back for the second, but rajasthan have won the game!
pathan to mcdonald, no run, outside off, inswinging delivery, mcdonald lets it go to the wicketkeeper
pathan to mcdonald, 1 run, a bit of swing, flicks it to deep backward square for an easy single
pathan to pujara, no run, well outside off, pujara shoulders arms and watches it as it carries to the wicketkeeper
pathan to pujara, 1 run, on the middle and off, straight to mid-off for an easy single
bracewell to mcdonald, no run, oh, nooo! catch dropped by maxwell!! a few metres away from point but gets his left hand to it and drops it
bracewell to mcdonald, no run, swinging, between pad and bat
bracewell to mcdonald, no run, away on the off, no run
pathan to pujara, 1 run, outside off, plays with soft hands to deep third man, easy single
pathan to mcdonald, four runs, 2 in 2, dumped it this time through mid-on, exquisite timing!! sensational
morkel to pujara, no run, outside off, chips it straight to cover for no run
morkel to pujara, four runs, skips down the track, keeps it simple, slams it straight over the bowler's head, umpire had to take cover
morkel to pujara, 1 wide, on the off side, pinches it to point, tees off for a single, but a 'no' says pujara
morkel to pujara, no run, gone! big wicket, pujara was looking dangerous
yadav to mcdonald, no run, on the off, lets it go through to the keeper
yadav to kohli, 1 run, kohli at the crease, an inswinger, flicks it to deep backward square
yadav to kohli, 1 leg bye, awa
yadav to mcdonald, no run, on the leg stump, flicks it to square leg
morkel to kohli, 1 run, kohli looks to dump it over mid-on but one bounce to the fielder at mid-on
morkel to mcdonald, four runs, times it in the air and the ball goes flying wide of the man at mid-off, runs away to the boundary
morkel to mcdonald, no run, tries to go over the mid-on region but misses it completely, straight to the wicketkeeper
nadeem to de villiers, 2 runs, on the legs, glances it to fine leg for an easy two
nadeem to de villiers, no run, on the middle, looks turn it on the on side, no run
nadeem to de villiers, no run, outside off, steers it to point
nadeem to de villiers, 1 run, outside off, de villiers punches it through the covers for an easy single
nadeem to kohli, four runs, kohli had all the time in the world, width offered, moves away and smacks it to deep cover boundary
nadeem to kohli, 2 runs, moves away from the stumps, steers it to long-off for an easy single
bracewell to de villiers, 1 run, on the off, he chops it straight to mid-off

bracewell to kohli, out, wats going on here!! kohli is gone!! pitched outside off, stays in the crease, takes it on the bounce and looks to slap it past the point fielder but it goes straight into the palms of nagar, that's a big blow!!
bracewell to tiwary, no run, outside off, gets behind and defends it solidly
bracewell to tiwary, 1 run, similar shot played, gets behind and punches it to deep midwicket for a single
maxwell to agarwal, no run, on the leg side, jams it back to the bowler
maxwell to agarwal, 1 run, on the off stump, rocks back and crunches it to deep point for an easy single
maxwell to agarwal, 1 run, on the off stump, plays with the spin, steers it to point region
maxwell to de villiers, 1 run, on the leg stump, pushes it to midwicket and go through for a tight single, scamper home in time
nadeem to de villiers, 1 run, on the legs, wristy flick to deep backward square
nadeem to agarwal, 1 run, stays in the crease and lofts it over to the long-off region
nadeem to de villiers, 2 runs, moves on to the off side, glances it to fine leg
yadav to agarwal, no run, outside off, punches it but straight to the fielder at point, no run
morkel to agarwal, 1 run, on the off, punches it to point
nadeem to agarwal, no run, on the middle, crunches it to cover for no run
nadeem to de villiers, no run, on the middle, pushes it to the bowler
nadeem to de villiers, four runs, on the leg stump, shuffles across a tad and glances it deftly to the fine leg boundary
bracewell to de villiers, no run, on the off, just pushes it to mid-on, no timing at all
bracewell to de villiers, six runs, whattaaa shot!! stands tall in his crease and smacks it high over the long off fielder straight into the crowd
maxwell to de villiers, no run, outside off, pushes it to cover
maxwell to de villiers, 1 run, down the leg side again, flicks it to backward square for an easy single
maxwell to vinay kumar, no run, pushes it through the air, solid defence on display from vinay kumar
nadeem to de villiers, 1 run, on the off, stays in the crease and steers it to covers for a single
nadeem to vinay kumar, no run, on the stumps, tries to drive him through but back to the bowler
nadeem to vinay kumar, 1 run, on the middle and leg, turns it to deep midwicket
nadeem to vinay kumar, 1 run, on the middle and leg, turns it on to the on side and pinches an easy single
pathan to vinay kumar, no run, leg stump line, pushes it straight to cover, tries to sneak a single but wisely sent back
morkel to vinay kumar, 1 run, on the leg, just dabs it to the on side and go through for a single
morkel to vinay kumar, 2 runs, outside off, loops it into the air over mid wicket region, go through for an easy two
pathan to de villiers, four runs, similar delivery, similar shot played, this time he does not time it well, off it runs away to the third man boundary
pathan to de villiers, four runs, outside off, smacks it on to the on side wide of backward square leg, abd is turning it on here,
pathan to de villiers, 1 run, outside off, drives it with bottom of the bat to long-off
pathan to vinay kumar, 1 run, on the off, slaps it to long-off for an easy single
khan to finch, four runs, 2 in 2, similar delivery, this time steers it to deep cover region, what timing behind that shot!!
khan to finch, four runs, make that 3 in 3, outside off, rocks back and dumps it through the covers, he's turning it on here
khan to finch, 1 run,
vinay kumar to ojha, no run, outside off, inswinging, looks to chip it but misses it completely
vinay kumar to ojha, six runs, whattttaaa shot, into the crowd, can i have the ball back please? picks it from middle and leg and slams it right over the backward square leg boundary
vinay kumar to ojha, no run, outside off, caught napping which he tries to poke
khan to ojha, no run, pitched on the off, steers it straight to the point fielder
khan to ojha, 1 wide, sprays it down the off side, quite wide, ojha tries to poke at it
khan to finch, 1 run, slower delivery on the legs, finch plays it cautiously towards the mid wicket region
vinay kumar to ojha, 1 run, slight inswing, tucks it with soft hands to the midwicket region
vinay kumar to finch, no run, straighter, stays in the crease and jams it back to the bowler
vinay kumar to finch, no run, similar delivery, straighter, defends solidly as the ball rolls back to the bowler
khan to ojha, no run, no width offered this time, lets it go through to the keeper
mcdonald to finch, 1 run, middle and leg, bunts it down to the right of mid on for an easy single
vettori to finch, 1 run, outside off, pushes it to covers
vettori to ojha, 1 run, on the leg stump, crunches it to deep midwicket
muralitharan to ojha, 1 run, drops it, that was tough though, slashes at it, takes the outside edge and flies off the gloves of ab de villiers
muralitharan to finch, 1 run, on the middle and leg, pinches it to point for a single
muralitharan to ojha, out, gone!! caught at slip!! flashes hard at that, takes a thick outside edge and flies straight to kohli at first slip
muralitharan to venugopal rao, 1 run, flat, shuffles across and turns it to square leg
vettori to venugopal rao, 1 leg bye, huge appeal turned down and wisely so, it was going down the leg side
vettori to venugopal rao, 1 run, on the off, punches it to mid wicket, plays it off his wrists
muralitharan to finch, 1 run, spinning away from  the right hander, carves it on to the off side,
muralitharan to venugopal rao, no run, on the leg side, tucks it on to the on side
muralitharan to venugopal rao, 1 run, wide outside off, slices it to deep point for an easy single
vettori to venugopal rao, no run, outside off, tucks it to covers, no run
vettori to venugopal rao, 2 runs, outside off, picks the gap and squeezes that to wide off long off for an easy two
patel to venugopal rao, 1 run, width offered, guides it intentionally to the third man for just a single, there were two on offer there

steyn to karthik, out, bowled! wide outside off, karthik drags it onto his left toe and the ball deflects on  to his stumps, karthik does not use his feet at all
christian to franklin, four runs, good start, smashes it straight past the bowler to long-off boundary , that was blasted
christian to franklin, 1 bye, parthiv misses the stumps as franklin misses an outside off delivery and the batsmen sneak a single
christian to sharma, 2 runs, outside off, slapped hard down to wide of long-off and the batsmen steal a two even as parthiv removes the bails in a flash at the striker's end
vinay kumar to gambhir, 1 run, gambhir stays in his crease and dabs his first ball between first slip and gully to third man
khan to kallis, no run, played towards the leg side
patel to gambhir, 1 run, steered from the crease towards third man
khan to gambhir, 1 run, this time he tries to close the face to play on the leg side but gets a leading edge of sorts past the bowler, kallis slips as he goes for the run
khan to kallis, 1 run, kallis tries to drive from the crease but gets an outside edge towards third man, the pace was a bit slower and the line was around off stump
khan to gambhir, 1 run, gambhir stays in his crease and squirts the ball towards third man
khan to kallis, 1 run, zaheer angles the ball into the right-hander from round the wicket, kallis waits and dabs to third man
muralitharan to gambhir, no run, gambhir charges murali and hits towards mid-on
vettori to kallis, no run, drifts into the right-hander from round the wicket and beats the bat by spinning away
vettori to bisla, 1 run, charges again and lofts the ball towards long off
kohli to gambhir, 1 run, played from the crease behind point
kohli to bisla, 1 run, played from the crease towards midwicket
vettori to gambhir, 1 run, dug out on the off side for a single
vettori to bisla, no run, played back to the bowler from the crease
muralitharan to gambhir, four runs, that is remarkably deft, gambhir moves back, waits for the ball to angle into him, and then dabs it so late, beating gayle at slip
vettori to gambhir, 1 run, gambhir steps out and drives the ball through midwicket
vettori to bisla, no run, played on the off side
vettori to bisla, 1 run, another powerful drive but the fielder in the deep at cover prevents the boundary
patel to bisla, 2 runs, bisla was aiming midwicket but got long leg, the ball thudded off the inside edge as he tried to drive

patel to bisla, 2 runs, bisla charges, he heaves, he mis-times it. the ball lobs in the air but falls safely just outside the circle at midwicket. vettori couldn't reach it from the infield. it's all very manic out there at the moment.
vinay kumar to gambhir, 1 run, slower ball. gambhir spots it, waits and dabs to third man. over to bisla.
vinay kumar to tiwary, 1 run, steered from the crease towards third man
patel to gambhir, 1 run, wide ball outside off stump, gambhir hits it from his crease to point
khan to ten doeschate, 1 run, defended from the crease on the off side

khan to tiwary, out, caught at deep square leg! the slower ball does tiwary in, he was through his swat on the leg side too early and ended up hitting it in the air to mayank agarwal on the square leg boundary, kolkata are falling apart at the finish
muralitharan to shakib al hasan, 1 wide, a flat ball fired down leg side
muralitharan to shakib al hasan, 1 wide, another wide ball down leg side
patel to lee, no run, slower ball outside off stump, the batsman backed away towards leg and was too far away to play a shot
lee to pujara, no run, lee appeals for lbw but there was a thick inside edge on to the pad
lee to pujara, no run, played from the crease towards point
lee to gayle, no run, angled across the left-hander, close to off, he has a look and lets it go past
kallis to gayle, no run, this is unusual for gayle, he tries to take the single with a work behind square, but lee denies him with sharp work
kallis to kohli, four runs, too wide, and virat is in the form of his life these days, he waits on it and dismisses it past extra cover, no fuss at all
lee to de villiers, 1 run, softly dropped on to the off side for one
balaji to kohli, no run, this one carries in with the angle, virat tucks it away, but straight to midwicket this time
balaji to kohli, no run, and now this one goes through virat, that one came back in a long way, was angled in as well, virat was pushing way outside the line in the end, neat take by bisla
balaji to tiwary, no run, carries across the left-hander with the angle, left alone
bhatia to de villiers, no run, slow delivery arrives second ball from bhatia, ab pats it back to the bowler
bhatia to de villiers, 1 run, more slow stuff from bhatia, ab has to adjust and manages to tuck it square on the leg side
balaji to tiwary, 1 run, dabbed down to third man with the angle for one
balaji to tiwary, no run, a leave off the last ball of the eighth over outside off has the asking-rate going up to 11.50
bhatia to agarwal, 1 run, inside-edges the big drive on to pad, they get the single as the ball rolls to point
bhatia to agarwal, 1 run, very slow from bhatia, batsman has to make all the effort, he goes back and punches it past extra cover

balaji to vettori, no run, almost another one, vettori walked way outside off stump looking for his preferred region behind square leg, missed, the ball which rolled onto the off side, tiwary had completed half the run before he turned back, the throw missed anyway
balaji to vettori, four runs, he gets outside off stump again and this time connects, helps it to the fine leg boundary, typical vettori
bhatia to vettori, no run, tries to dab it fine but gets it to backward point
balaji to vettori, no run, now he goes a mile outside leg stump, but cannot beat point
balaji to vettori, 1 bye, makes even more room by shuffling outside off stump, this time the ball sails over middle as vettori misses again, bisla cannot stop the ball on the bounce
ten doeschate to vinay kumar, 1 wide, that would have been wide in any format, way, way outside off
ten doeschate to vinay kumar, 1 run, pushed towards extra cover
ten doeschate to tiwary, 1 run, lofted down to long off
ten doeschate to tiwary, 1 wide, slants it across the left-hander, wide outside off
ten doeschate to patel, 1 run, reaches out a and guides a very wide delivery wide of point
shakib al hasan to patel, 1 wide, another wide with the angle down leg
shakib al hasan to patel, 1 run, goes back and punches to deep midwicket
shakib al hasan to vinay kumar, 1 leg bye,
shakib al hasan to patel, 1 run, a push wide of cover for a single
shakib al hasan to vinay kumar, 1 run,
ten doeschate to vinay kumar, 2 wides, way too far wide outside off stump, bisla cannot collect cleanly
ten doeschate to khan, 1 run,
ten doeschate to vinay kumar, 1 run, guided down to third man
ten doeschate to khan, 1 run, mishit to deep midwicket this time
shakib al hasan to khan, 1 run, another heave down to deep midwicket

pathan to du plessis, out, run-out! perfect start to delhi, faf du plessis has messed it up here!, he starts off after he dabs the angling delivery into him onto the leg side, vijay runs three quarters of the pitch and is sent back but there is no going back
pathan to du plessis, four runs, hit through the line and through covers past mid-off, well timed
yadav to raina, 1 run, slightly outside off, guides it through to third man for a single
yadav to du plessis, 1 wide, sprayed down the leg side, quite wide
pathan to du plessis, 1 run, outside off, he drives it through to extra cover but the fielder misfields and the batsmen got through for a run
pathan to raina, six runs, picked from outside off, stands tall and thrashes it over deep midwicket for a six, brute power behind that shot
pathan to du plessis, 1 run, angling away from the batsman, nudged to third man for a single
morkel to badrinath, no run, lot of pace and bounce on that, badri looks to drive it through the cover region but is caught off guard as the ball rises and zips past him
morkel to badrinath, 1 wide, wide down the leg side, angling away from the batsman
yadav to raina, 1 wide, sprayed down the leg side, wide called
yadav to raina, no run, on the legs, goes back in his crease and pushes it to mid-on for no run
yadav to raina, no run, outside off, pokes at it and misses, nice carry to the keeper
morkel to badrinath, no run, drives it to the man at covers, no run possible
pathan to badrinath, 1 run, wide outside off, badri goes down on one knee and runs it away to third man for a single
pathan to jadeja, no run, dabs one to point and looks to steal a single but sent back in the nick of time
pietersen to jadeja, no run, on the toes, pats it to cover for no run
pietersen to badrinath, six runs, top shot! badri shimmies down the track and clobbers it high over midwicket for a six, massive
van der merwe to jadeja, no run, flat and outside off, pushed back to the bowler
van der merwe to jadeja, no run, comes down the track and defends it onto the off side for no run

pathan to jadeja, out, caught behind! stupendous catch, bowled slightly off, jadeja stays in his crease and looks to slap it over point but takes a thick outside edge, naman ojha takes a one handed catch to his left, that was screamer!
van der merwe to dhoni, no run, fired on the off, gets the bat down and pushes it to the left of merwe
van der merwe to dhoni, 2 runs, leans foward and pushes it through the gap between cover and point, sneak a two by the time fielder runs and stops it
nadeem to bravo, no run, dabs it to cover  for no run
nadeem to bravo, no run, quicker one, defends to the off side
van der merwe to dhoni, 1 run, flatter one, turned away to midwicket and go through for a run
van der merwe to bravo, no run, fired it on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
van der merwe to dhoni, 1 run, flatter one outside off, dhoni goes back and pushes it to cover and jogs for a single
nadeem to dhoni, 1 run, on the stumps, rocks back and turns it away to deep midwicket with soft hands
nadeem to bravo, 1 run, flat and dabbed to backward square leg and hop over for a single
nadeem to dhoni, no run, that stops a bit, dhoni goes back and defends it back to the bowler
van der merwe to bravo, 1 run, fired on the legs, makes room and digs it out to wide of square, dhoni comes half way amidst a say of yes and no and finally steal a single
van der merwe to bravo, 1 run, straight off the backfoot to deep extra cover
van der merwe to dhoni, no run, flat outside off, pushed to the off side for no run
nadeem to bravo, 2 runs, flat outside off, makes room and slams it to deep extra cover for a two
nadeem to dhoni, 1 run, makes room and turned away to deep midwicket
nadeem to bravo, 1 run, pierces the gap between extra cover and long-off for an easy single
morkel to bravo, 1 run, almost 2 in 2, tough one though, slapped back hard but morne gets his hands to it and deflects it to long-off
yadav to bravo, out, bowled! that came off the back of his hand, bravo swipes across the line and misses it, gets deceived and the ball knocks his off stump back
morkel to ashwin, no run, batsman walked right across the stumps, ball goes close to the leg stump
morkel to jakati, 1 run, outside off, bunts it down to extra cover and scamper for a single
morkel to ojha, four runs, four more, this time he glances it off his hips and off it goes running away to the fine leg boundary
morkel to ojha, four runs, make that 3 in 3, pitched outside off, ojha watches that cautiously and guides it over the slip fielder to the third man fence
bollinger to sehwag, 1 run, pitched outside off, goes back and runs it away to wide of third man for an easy single
bollinger to ojha, no run, outside off and angling away from the batsman, slashed to point for no run
morkel to sehwag, four runs, sehwag stays in the crease and swings across the line over midwicket and the ball goes racing away to the fence
morkel to sehwag, six runs, stays deep in his crease again and smashes it over the deep extra cover for a six, that came right off the meat of the bat
morkel to sehwag, no run, slower one, tries to dab it to midwicket but misses
morkel to sehwag, 2 runs, on the legs, nicely flicked away to backward square leg for an easy two
ashwin to ojha, no run, nipped back in, ojha dabs it to mid-on
ashwin to ojha, no run, keeps low, ojha pats it back to the bowler
ashwin to sehwag, 1 run, outside off and spinning in, sehway rocks back and slices it to covers
bollinger to sehwag, no run, outside off, pushes it to the off side for no run
ashwin to sehwag, 1 run,
ashwin to pietersen, 1 run, dances down the track as it turning away from kp, manages to strike it to deep midwicket
ashwin to sehwag, 2 runs, rocks back and smacks it to deep extra cover for a couple
ashwin to sehwag, out, caught at backward square!skips down the track and lofts it high over square leg but does not have enough power to clear vijay who gobbles it easily in the end
jakati to pietersen, 1 run, flat outside off, goes back and hammers it through covers  but raina does well and stops a certain four
jakati to jayawardene, no run, straighter one, pushed back gently to the bowler
jakati to jayawardene, no run, outside off, pushes it to cover for no run
jakati to jayawardene, 1 run, turns it off his hips to deep midwicket for a single
jadeja to jayawardene, no run, turning away from the batsman, goes past the outside as mahela looks to defend it
jadeja to jayawardene, 1 run, turned away to deep midwicket
jadeja to pietersen, six runs, straight into the second tier above the cameras, can i have the ball back please? comes down the track and clobbers it over the bowler's head, explosive!
bravo to pietersen, 3 runs, slower one on the legs, turned away gently through square leg where fielder dives to his right and saves a four
bravo to jayawardene, 1 run, outside off, slashed it to wide of third man where ashwin runs to his right and stops it cleanly
bravo to pietersen, no run, change of pace, that's mishit to midwicket for no run
jakati to jayawardene, 3 runs, risky shot despite a slip in place, he opens the face and deliberately glides it to third man
jakati to jayawardene, four runs, he opens the face of the bat and steers it wide of point and bollinger slid all around it and let it pass, he slid too far across
jadeja to pietersen, 1 run, fires it flatter and it skids through, steers it wide of point, slight fumble allows a single
jadeja to pietersen, 1 run, drops it just wide of cover point for a single
ashwin to jayawardene, 1 run, turned away to deep square leg for a run
ashwin to jayawardene, 1 run, pitched on the middle and leg, flicked off the hips to deep square leg region for an easy run
jakati to pietersen, no run, flat and kept low, kp looks to slap it through covers but misses
jakati to pietersen, 1 run, flat and turning into the batsman, kp bunts it to the off side and sneak a single
jakati to jayawardene, no run, on the legs, chopped to the on side for no run
ashwin to jayawardene, 2 runs, pushed through the air, tucks it away to deep square leg and go through for a hard run two
chavan to suman, 1 run, chipped in the air down to the vacant midwicket region

singh to suman, 1 run, collision and a tumble! he drops the ball on the pitch and risks the single, amit and levi sprint to the other and they collide as the bowler picks up the ball, he has a shy at the stumps but misses
singh to suman, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and steers him to third man
chavan to suman, six runs, straight over the sightscreen! suman gives the charge and lofts cleanly over the bowler's head, neat follow through
chavan to levi, no run, slower through the air and defended back to the bowler
singh to suman, 1 run, nicely done, dropped to the off side for a quick single to get the big-hitting levi on strike
singh to levi, 1 run, run-out chance! pushed towards wide mid-on and the fielder has a shy, a direct hit by cooper would have sent levi back
cooper to sharma, 1 run, on the hips and he turns it to the leg side
cooper to levi, four runs, deliberately done! there was no slip and levi waited for it, dabbed it late comfortably past the keeper and down to third man
singh to sharma, no run, tucks him up for room and he knocks it back to the bowler
singh to sharma, no run, punches it towards mid-on and thinks of a single but sends his partner back

hogg to sharma, out, hogg takes off! rohit made himself room to dab that to the off side but the ball spun back in from outside off and flattened his off stump, he was expecting that to turn away from him
hogg to rayudu, 2 runs, spins away and he steers that wide of backward point
trivedi to rayudu, 1 run, rayudu also waits on it and angles it down to third man
hogg to rayudu, 1 run, made room but the ball spun back in and tucked him up, managed to punch it to long-off
hogg to pollard, 1 run, leading edge and the ball drops safe towards mid-off

hogg to pollard, four runs, didn't read the wrong un but he got away with it! spins away and the ball beats the edge and the keeper's gloves and first slip, the umpire thought he edged it though, should have been given byes
chavan to pollard, no run, flatter delivery and pollard is happy to defend, the lull before the storm?
chavan to pollard, 1 run, makes room and punches it down to long-off
hogg to rayudu, no run, goes back and slaps it straight to midwicket
hogg to rayudu, no run, makes room and the ball spins back in sharply, can only chop it to the off side
cooper to rayudu, no run, this one skids through outside off and beats the edge as he tries to slash that
trivedi to pollard, 1 run, whips it across the line down to deep square leg
trivedi to rayudu, 1 run, slower ball and he chops it down to backward point
trivedi to pollard, 1 run, another slower one and quietly tapped down to rahane at point
trivedi to rayudu, 1 run, comes down the track and slams it down to long-off, slight fumble by botha but doesn't cost anything
botha to pollard, six runs, he comes round the wicket but it makes no difference! fetches that from wide outside off and heaves it plenty of rows over deep midwicket
hogg to rayudu, 1 run, gives the charge and slams it down to long-off
hogg to pollard, no run, booming drive but rayudu gets in the way! owes him a couple of runs here
trivedi to rayudu, 1 run, makes room and thumps it across the line to deep midwicket
trivedi to pollard, 1 run, good slower ball again, pollard makes room but settles for a single to long-off

chavan to pollard, four runs, the stumps get a hammering! at the other end that is, down the track and slams it just past the bowler's fingers, deflects off the stumps and nearly cleans up aleem dar! scorches to long-off
chavan to pollard, six runs, over the wicket but it doesn't help! few paces down and scooped easily over the sight-screen
cooper to rayudu, 2 runs, goes back and forehands that to rahane at long-off
cooper to rayudu, 1 run,
cooper to rayudu, 1 bye, makes room to a slower ball and swishes and misses, they sneak in a bye
cooper to franklin, 1 run, dropped with soft hands down  to point for a quick single
singh to rayudu, no run, big swing and a miss, it was outside the off stumo
singh to franklin, out, another slower ball and franklin doesn't pick it, stays at the crease and tries to clear long-off, had quite a bit of power on the shot but not enough to beat rahane
singh to rayudu, 1 run, makes room and slaps that wide of backward point and cooper does a great job to slide and stop it
cooper to harbhajan singh, no run, slower ball wide outside off and the batsman swings and misses
malinga to dravid, 2 runs, leading edge! tries to work it to the on side but it's safe of cover
malinga to dravid, 1 run, just opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man, travelled quickly and well stopped
malinga to rahane, no run, gets across and taps it towards mid-off
malinga to rahane, no run, tucks him up for room with a pacy delivery and he can only push it to the off side
patel to dravid, no run, good use of the wrists and well timed but he can't get it past midwicket

patel to goswami, out, munaf's on a hat-trick! he lands it outside off and goswami shapes to drive through the off side, didn't bounce as much and it took the inside edge to the keeper, karthik knew it instantly
malinga to rahane, no run, on the angle just outside off and gently steered to the off side
malinga to rahane, no run, a bit slower in pace and still straight, checks his shot to the on side
malinga to rahane, no run, malinga's really tucking him up, no width and rahane can only quietly knock it back to the bowler
patel to rahane, no run, munaf beats him! tucks him up and the ball holds its line and beats the edge
patel to rahane, 1 run, turned to the on side for a quick single
franklin to rahane, 1 run, moves across and flicks uppishly towards pollard in the deep
ojha to rahane, 1 run, goes back and thumps it down to deep square leg
ojha to shah, 1 run, makes a lot of room again and he slams it to the covers
franklin to shah, no run, stays back and knocks it to the off side
franklin to shah, 1 wide, drifts down the leg side and it's way too wide, couldn't control the slower ball
franklin to shah, no run, run-out chance! pushed to cover, the throw was too wide for karthik to collect and whip off the bails, shah was sent back and karthik couldn't throw it back to the stumps
franklin to shah, 1 run, tucks it down to deep square leg
franklin to rahane, no run, keeper up to the stumps, nice and tight, he pushes it back to the bowler
ojha to shah, 1 run, down the track and nearly yorks himself, brings up the 50 stand with a single to long-off
harbhajan singh to shah, 2 runs, makes room and slaps it to deep backward point
harbhajan singh to rahane, 1 run, flatter delivery again and flicked firmly to the deep on the on side
pollard to shah, no run, gets across and taps it down the track
pollard to menaria, 1 run, punches it down to harbhajan at point for a quick single
pollard to menaria, 1 run, gives him width and he steers it to munaf at third man
pollard to shah, six runs, whack! slower ball fetched from the off stump and clubbed across the line, flat six over deep midwicket
malinga to menaria, no run, fires that towards the stumps and he can only push it softly to cover
harbhajan singh to menaria, 1 run, maneris makes room and slaps it to cover, rushes the single and beats the throw
harbhajan singh to menaria, 1 run, makes room and jams it down to long-off, only a single
patel to cooper, six runs, improvisation! cooper sensed that munaf would target his stumps, backed and launched that to the sight screen, swift follow through
pollard to singh, no run, bowls the hat-trick ball outside off, slower one, he misses
pollard to singh, 1 no ball, bounces him and it's a no-ball for height
malinga to trivedi, no run, trivedi backs away a long way and has a desperate swing at it, slower ball which just misses the off stump
malinga to trivedi, no run, how did that miss the leg stump? backed away, swing and a miss
malinga to trivedi, no run, the stumps elude malinga again, moves away to smash that but was nowhere near it
patel to hogg, out, munaf will now take the purple cap! he has ten wickets overall and finishes off the game, hogg swings across the line and hits it flat to franklin at deep midwicket
ashwin to agarwal, no run, around the wicket, on the leg-stump, defended back to the bowler.
ashwin to agarwal, four runs, on the off-stump and lofted over the mid-off player for four! bangalore is away.
ashwin to agarwal, 1 run, tapped away to the leg-side towards deep mid-wicket, where one of the two fielders outside the circle fields and that brings gayle to strike.
ashwin to gayle, 2 runs, down the leg-side and gayle flicks it away to fine-leg. no fielder outside the circle and gayle comes back for a couple.
ashwin to gayle, no run, defended back to the bowler
ashwin to gayle, 2 runs, played away to the leg-side for a couple of runs down to deep square-leg.
bollinger to agarwal, 1 wide, badly released and it went high and wide and almost straight to the wicket-keeper! wide even by test match standards!
bollinger to agarwal, no run, bit of bounce for bollinger and agarwal jumps up in an attempt to keep it down. wanted a single but the languid gayle sends him back.
bollinger to agarwal, four runs, whoa! what piece of timing from agrawal and that's gone away! he was defending it on the off-side and it went to the fence through the covers
bollinger to gayle, no run, runs down the pitch and wants to thrash it through the leg-side but the lack of bounce seems to beat him.
ashwin to agarwal, four runs, shot over mid-off and agrawal is doing what most thought gayle would! this has almost gone all the way!
bollinger to agarwal, no run, walks towards the bowler and tried to smash him over mid-off but goes one bounce to the fielder. wanted the single but gayle sends him back.
bollinger to agarwal, 1 run, punches it through the covers and gets a single.
ashwin to agarwal, 1 run, played away to deep square-leg for a single. gayle gets strike now.
ashwin to gayle, 1 run, knocked it to the leg-side and gayle happily gives the strike back to agrawal.
ashwin to agarwal, no run, defended back to the bowler
ashwin to agarwal, no run, played back to the bowler for nothing.
morkel to gayle, 1 run, tapped on the off-side and he runs away for a single. agarwal is back on strike.
morkel to kohli, no run, defends on the off-side towards the covers.
morkel to kohli, 1 run, flicked away to the deep square-leg fielder for a single.

morkel to gayle, 1 run, gayle went down the track and tried to punch it over mid-off, but it went on the bounce to the fielder. bravo was at mid-off and eh threw the stumps down at the non-striker's end but gayle was just in.
morkel to kohli, 1 run, kohli drives it to the left of mid-off and runs away for a single.
bravo to kohli, four runs, slower one and kohli tickles it really fine down the leg-side.goes to the fine-leg fence to get him his first boundary.
morkel to kohli, 1 run, played away to the off-side for a single.
morkel to gayle, 1 wide, down the leg-side and that is his second wide. gayle wanted to get a tickle on to that one.
morkel to gayle, 1 run, defended back to the bowler by kohli.
morkel to kohli, no run, slower one outside the off-stump and kohli has guided it away to the third-man region for a single.
morkel to kohli, 1 run,
morkel to gayle, 1 run, played away to the leg-side for a single. gayle's now played 11 balls for 11 runs. no threes, no fours, no sixes in his innings so far!
raina to kohli, 1 run, played away to the leg-side for a single. bravo's direct hit would have had kohli in trouble
raina to gayle, 1 wide, down the leg-side and its wide.
raina to gayle, no run, defended by gayle and no run for the big man!
bravo to kohli, no run, flashes outside the off-stump and the slower one kept a tad low yet again.
bravo to kohli, 1 run, down the leg-side and kohli flicks it away to the fine-leg for a single.
bravo to kohli, four runs, flicked away and the gap is picked really well by kohli. bisects fine-leg and deep square.
morkel to gayle, 1 run, slower one and nudged away by gayle for a single.
jakati to kohli, 1 run, drives through to the left of long-off
jakati to gayle, 5 wides, aah, poor ball from jakati, down the leg-side and gayle and dhoni both miss it. through for five wides!
jakati to gayle, 1 run, goes for an expansive shot as you would expect from gayle but it goes to the square-leg.
jakati to kohli, 1 run, drives him to long-off and the batsmen stroll through for an easy single. looking ominous for chennai.
bravo to kohli, 1 run, slower one from bravo and kohi flicks it away to the deep square-leg fielder.
bravo to gayle, 1 run, bulleted through the covers by gayle but they have a fielder in the deep there!
bravo to kohli, 1 run, driven through to the long-off region for a single.
bravo to gayle, 1 run, tapped it away to the off-side for a single.
bravo to kohli, no run, slower one yet again, he is changing his pace up as a variation. played away to the off-side but no timing on it.
bravo to kohli, no run, kohli goes down the track yet again and for the umpteenth time, he misses his swing!
jakati to gayle, six runs, and again! gone into the crowds in the deep square-leg region and that brings up his 50.
jakati to kohli, no run, goes down the track but yorks himself and gets nothing out of it. kohli is frustrating himself here.
bravo to gayle, six runs, slower one and gayle has tonked it into the roof. or has it gone out of the stadium? tom moody says it should be worth 12. new box balls being called for i think.

bravo to kohli, no run, outside the off-stump, pitched right up to the bat and kohli misses getting any bat. not only is kohli struggling but he could end up frustrating gayle, who looks murderous right now.
bravo to kohli, 1 run, drilled through the covers for a single.
bravo to gayle, 1 wide, down the leg-side and gayle smartly leaves it alone for the umpire to call it wide.
ashwin to kohli, 1 run, comes down and plays it away to the leg-side for a run.
ashwin to kohli, 1 run, drives hard and back to the bowler, but only for a single.

jadeja to gayle, out, finally gone and it is jadeja who picks up the wicket of gayle! outside the off-stump and pitched right up, and gayle went for the slash, but only managed to slice it away. bravo caught hold of that one easily.
jadeja to kohli, 1 wide, down the leg-side and it is a wide.
jadeja to kohli, 2 byes, goes down the track and misses! byes called and that confirms my belief that it was a missed stumping.
morkel to kohli, 2 runs, goes down the track and then slaps it to deep square-leg for a couple. kohli has brought up his 50 and the celebration is muted and exhausted!
morkel to kohli, 1 wide, slower one, too many of them in this spell for morkel and he has stylishly flicked it away for a six!
morkel to kohli, six runs,
vettori to vijay, no run, drives to the covers and straight to the fielder.
vettori to vijay, 1 run, nudged away to the leg-side and he has his first run in two games.
vettori to vijay, no run, played away to the leg-side and that ends a rather quickly bowled first over. well bowled too!
khan to du plessis, no run, comes into the bat and du plessis gets an inside edged to the leg-side. vijay wants a single but the batsman sends him back.
khan to du plessis, no run, defends on the leg-side and no run again.
khan to du plessis, no run, comes down the track and tries to play it to the leg-side but does not get anything on his bat.
khan to du plessis, 1 run, defended yet again and it rolls away to the leg-side. the running is not the best at the moment.
khan to vijay, no run, vijay defends it to the off-side and there is no run again.
vettori to du plessis, no run, goes down the track and gets it to square-leg.
vettori to du plessis, no run, tapped it away to the leg-side.
vettori to vijay, 1 run, played away to the leg-side for a single to deep square-leg
vettori to du plessis, 1 run, he goes down the wicket yet again and flicks it to the deep square-leg region for a single.
khan to du plessis, 1 run, he goes down the track yet again and only managed a top-slice that almost carried to the third-man. zaheer wasn't happy that the fielder did not go for the catch...
khan to du plessis, four runs, shot! that has been hit over mid-off and it goes for four. du plessis has been walking down the track and this time he gets it off the middle.
khan to du plessis, 1 run, flicked away to the deep square-leg region for a single.
vinay kumar to vijay, 1 run, this is flicked away by vijay to deep square-leg for a single. moves on to three.
vinay kumar to du plessis, no run, slower one and that is played away to the off-side. the wicket-keeper is up to the stumps.
vinay kumar to vijay, no run, shuffled in his crease and played away to the off-side but straight to the point fielder.
bhatkal to du plessis, four runs, played away to the leg-side. almost mistimed as it stayed low but still managed to beat the in-field.
bhatkal to du plessis, 1 run, pitched right up to the batsman and he drives it to mid-on for a single.
bhatkal to vijay, 2 runs, smartly played away to the leg-side and they run back for the second. vijay was run-out in the previous game and started off a tad shakily today, but this is better running.
bhatkal to vijay, 1 run, on the middle-stump and played away to the leg-side for a single.

bhatkal to du plessis, six runs, du plessis is doing what mayank agarwal was doing for bangalore and this time he has smacked the bowler over the mid-wicket region for a six. nothing wrong with the ball except that it did not have too much pace to challenge the batsman!
muralitharan to du plessis, 2 runs, dabs it away to the leg-side and he calls for two. vijay responds well and they get a couple.
muralitharan to vijay, no run, doosra and vijay seemed to have picked it. dabbed away to the off-side
kohli to raina, 1 run, driven to long-off for a single.
muralitharan to raina, no run, defends it away to the leg-side.
muralitharan to raina, no run, defends it on the off-side once again.
muralitharan to raina, 1 run, pushed away to the off-side for a single.
vinay kumar to raina, 1 run, plays away to the off-side for a single.
vinay kumar to du plessis, no run, on the middle stump, slightly slower and du plessis plays it. this was bowled with a round arm action, a la malinga! surprised the batsman a little..
vinay kumar to du plessis, 2 runs, pitched right up to the bat and he drives through the covers. it was another slower ball from vinay kumar there.
vinay kumar to du plessis, 1 run, brings his fifty up with a push to the off-side.
muralitharan to du plessis, 2 runs, on the middle-stump and that is easily played away to deep mid-wicket for a couple.
muralitharan to du plessis, 1 run, on the leg-stump and played away for a single.
muralitharan to du plessis, no run, played away to the off-side but to the fielder.
muralitharan to du plessis, 1 run, played gently away to the off-side for a single.

muralitharan to dhoni, 2 runs, run-out appeal! dhoni was charging back for the second run after dabbing the ball away to the leg-side and the fielder threw the stumps down direct. but for one, ab had pushed the stumps down with his gloves and by the time the direct hit took the stump down, dhoni was back in his crease.
vettori to du plessis, 2 runs, goes down the track and swings hard, gets a thick inside edge and they get a couple.
vettori to du plessis, no run, played away to the off-side but for no run
vettori to du plessis, 1 run, drives to the long-off region for a run.
vettori to dhoni, 1 run, played away to the leg-side for a single.
bhatkal to dhoni, six runs, pitched right up to the batsman and dhoni has had enough of that dabbing and nudging! he smacks it over the bowler and the sightscreen for a six!
bhatkal to dhoni, 1 run, played away to the leg-side for a run.
bhatkal to du plessis, 1 run, played away to the leg-side for a single. 12 already off this over.
bhatkal to dhoni, 2 runs, keeps a little low, on the leg-stump and dhoni has back at nudging it away to the leg-side and he comes back for two.
bhatkal to dhoni, 1 run, dabbed it to the leg-side again and he rounds it off with a single.
vettori to du plessis, 1 run, drives to long-off for a single.
vettori to du plessis, no run, wanted to go down the pitch again but gets no bat there.
muralitharan to dhoni, 1 run, goes down the track but does not get off the middle of the bat.
muralitharan to bravo, no run, pitched on the middle, hits the pad and murali appeals in a style not too many possess! not-out, the umpire says.
khan to bravo, four runs, played away, superbly, through the third-man, who was inside the circle!
khan to dhoni, 2 runs, on the middle-stump and dhoni whips it away for a couple of runs.
khan to bravo, 1 run, played away to the leg-side for a single. nine off the over with a ball remaining
vinay kumar to dhoni, 2 runs, slower one, dabbed away to the deep point and another piece of excellent running from dhoni!
vinay kumar to bravo, 1 run, slower one, played away to the deep mid-wicket region for a single.
vinay kumar to dhoni, 1 wide, wide ball, outside the off-stump and that is left all alone by the chennai captain. wide called.
khan to bravo, no run, swing and missed! slower ball and bravo wanted to send it to the caribbean. instead, it rolls over to the wicket-keeper.
kohli to morkel, four runs, pitched right up and the inside-edge gets the batsman four. they need to score at four a ball from here.

vinay kumar to jadeja, four runs, edged away and that has gone away to the fence for a four! chennai have absolutely stunned the bangalore side and won their second of four games, and i must add, out of nowhere!
balaji to dravid, no run, pitched outside the off-stump, going away from the batsman and dravid leaves it alone like he loves doing in the longer format.
balaji to dravid, no run, pitched outside the off-stump and right up to the bat, dravid wanted to drive it through the covers but the ball did not come on to him.
balaji to dravid, no run, outside the off-stump, swinging away from the bat and he has let it go to the wicket-keeper. a watchful start from the former indian test number three.
kallis to rahane, no run, on the middle with a bit more bounce than what balaji got, rahane defends it to the leg-side.
kallis to rahane, 1 run, taps it to the off-side and a misfield at point allows the batsman to go through for a single.
kallis to dravid, 1 run, on the middle stump and this time dravid whips to square-leg for a single.
balaji to dravid, four runs, shimmies a little down the track and balaji changed his line towards the leg-side. dravid flicked it away and it goes over the in-field.
balaji to dravid, no run, pitched on the middle and up to the bat, he drives to mid-on but too firmly for any runs.
kallis to dravid, no run, goes for an expansive drive but misses! it was a tad wide and give dravid some room but he failed to get any bat on it.
kallis to rahane, 1 run, nibbled away to the third-man fielder for a single.
narine to dravid, 1 run, on the middle-stump and dravid whips it away for a run.
narine to rahane, four runs, pitched right up to the bat and he drives it through the extra-cover for a four! beauty!

kallis to dravid, 2 runs, driven into the covers and ten doeschate dives really well to stop it from going to the fence. what's more he also throws it at the striker's end and misses, but does enough to dirty rahane's jersey as he dives for his crease!
shakib al hasan to rahane, out, pitched right up to the bat and spinning away, rahane went for a drive but seems to have got an edge through to the wicket-keeper! one down!
shakib al hasan to menaria, 1 run, on the middle-stump and spinning towards the leg-stump, played away for a single to leg-side.
shakib al hasan to dravid, 1 run, nudged away to the leg-side for a single to dravid.
pathan to menaria, no run, pitched on middle and that turns away from the left-hander again! if pathan's going to get so much turn...
shakib al hasan to shah, 1 run, nudged away to the leg-side for a single.
shakib al hasan to goswami, no run, similar delivery and played away to the leg-side.
shakib al hasan to goswami, 1 run, pushed to the off-side this time and they are off for a run.
pathan to shah, 5 wides, pitched on the leg-stump and turns further away and it beats the wicket-keeper through to the fence. well left by owais!
shakib al hasan to goswami, 1 run, driven to the leg-side for a single
shakib al hasan to goswami, 1 run, uses his feet, down the track and scoops it over the in-field. but there is a mid-wicket and there is only a single.
pathan to goswami, 1 run, drives back to the bowler who fields that. scratch that, he should have fielded that easily, but allows it go through for an easy single!
narine to shah, no run, tries to cheekily play it to third-man but misses!
narine to shah, no run, defended on the middle and gets no run.
narine to shah, 1 run, played on the leg-side for a single. owais is playing all his deliveries from outside the off-stump.
bhatia to shah, 1 run, pitched right up to the bat and driven to long-off.
bhatia to shah, 1 run, pitched right up to the bat, shah who had moved away from the stumps, drills it to long-off and runs away for a single.
narine to goswami, 1 run, driven to the off-side for a single.
bhatia to shah, 1 run, pitched right up to the bat and drilled through the covers for a single.
bhatia to goswami, 2 runs, repeats the stroke again but this time it is squarer than before and does not get the timing on it. come back for a couple.
bhatia to shah, four runs, on the leg-side and swept away! it was slow as you would expect from bhatia and it has been swept for a four!
