bhatia to shah, 1 run, shuffles in the crease, away from the leg-stump, then comes back to his original position before nudging it away for a single to the leg-side. that is owais for you.
shakib al hasan to shah, 2 runs, angling into the middle-stump and shah plays it out to the mid-wicket for a couple of runs.
shakib al hasan to shah, four runs, goes down the track and that is timed so well that the long-off needed to not move too much but he still managed to get it for four!
shakib al hasan to shah, 1 run, and now he rotates the strike back by driving it to the off-side for a single
shakib al hasan to hodge, no run, outside the off-stump, turning away and bounce, beats hodge
shakib al hasan to hodge, 1 run, pitched on middle and hodge gets off the mark with a nudge to the leg-side.
balaji to hodge, no run, slower one, turning into the batsman, bounce and spin! and it is balaji we are talking of!
balaji to shah, no run, super slow, kept low, shah played a shot at it, could have played three more shots at it and still miss it.
balaji to shah, no run, another slower one from balaji and owais wanted to swing it away, again misses it and by miles!
balaji to shah, 1 wide, down the leg-side, a quicker one this time and it is his second wide of the over. quicker ones have gone down...

narine to shah, out, gone, stumped! shah gave it away very early by going down the pitch and the 'off-spinner' bowled a leggie. shah was far down the track and he misses completely to allow bisla to complete a simple job.
narine to botha, 1 run, ooooo! leading edge and scooped over the bowler! finally a single.
botha to kallis, no run, turn and a lot of it into the batsman! nudged away to the leg-side.
botha to kallis, 1 run, turns into the batsman yet again and that it nudged away to the deep square-leg region for a single. gambhir on strike now.
botha to gambhir, 1 wide, down the leg-side and a huge appeal, but the umpire gives it a wide! seems to have brushed something on the way.
botha to gambhir, four runs, this time he does succeed in going down the track and he hits him inside-out towards the extra-cover region.
botha to gambhir, no run, ball on middle and he leaves it alone! gambhir thought it was going down with the leg-side but it did not...
singh to kallis, 1 run, again down the leg-side and this time it is to the right-hander. kallis nurdles it away to the leg-side for a single
botha to kallis, 1 run, on the middle-stump and driven to the leg-side for a single.
singh to kallis, 1 run,
singh to gambhir, 1 run, down the track, suddenly stops and plays it away to the leg-side. single for gg.
singh to kallis, 1 run, defended softly on the off-side and runs away for a single.
chavan to kallis, 1 run, on the middle stump, turning away, played through the covers for a single.
chavan to kallis, no run, straighter one and kallis defends it back to the bowler.
chavan to bisla, no run, pitches almost outside the leg-stump and turn takes it outside the off. yep, a lot of turn there alright.
singh to kallis, four runs, driven straight and it beats the fielder at mid-off. pitched right up and kallis needed no second invites.
singh to kallis, 1 run, on the middle stump and it is played away to the leg-side for a run.
singh to bisla, four runs, slower one, bisla waited and smacked it through the covers for a four!
singh to bisla, 1 run, outside the off-stump but bisla walks into the shot and plays it away to the leg-side for a run.

singh to kallis, no run, oooh, close! almost another run-out, kallis dabbed it to the off-side and he took a couple of steps before his loud call of 'no'. the fielder threw it at the non-striker's end, and bisla was out of the crease when the ball passed he stumps, would have been out.
chavan to bisla, four runs, goes down the pitch and smashes it over the extra-cover region!
chavan to kallis, no run, on the middle and kallis drives it back to the bowler.
chavan to bisla, 1 run, turning away from the batsman and bisla dabs it to the covers for a run.
chavan to kallis, 1 run, angling into the batsman and the non-striker quickly calls the batsman for a single. nine off the over.
hogg to kallis, no run, pitched outside the off-stump and gets some turn. tapped away to the off-side.
hogg to bisla, no run, turns in to the batsman and there is nothing the batsman can do about it.
hogg to bisla, 1 run, pitched right up to the batsman and that is swept away to the deep square-leg for a single.
hogg to kallis, no run, played back to the bowler for no run.
hogg to bisla, no run, huge shout for an lbw and hogg held that pose with his hands stretched for almost 20 seconds. not out given.
hogg to bisla, 1 wide, bowled straight on the middle but spinning away for a wide.
hogg to tiwary, no run, wrong 'un to the new man, did not pick it and beats the outside edge.
hogg to bisla, 1 run, swept again and a single for bisla, he has swept really well this innings.
botha to tiwary, no run, tries to play it to the leg-side but no run yet again.
botha to tiwary, 3 runs, goes down the track, chips it inside-out to the deep extra-cover region. they come back well for the third run.
botha to bisla, 1 run, goes down the pitch and driven to long-off for a single.
chavan to bisla, 1 run, driven down to the fine-leg for a single.
menaria to tiwary, no run, slower from menaria and slants it into the batsman.
trivedi to tiwary, 1 run, pushed it away to the leg-side for a single and we will have a time-out now.
hogg to pathan, no run, wrong 'un, spins away and defended on the off-side.
trivedi to pathan, 1 run, defends to the right of the bowler and they run across for a single.
singh to pathan, 1 run, outside the off-stump and tapped it to the off-side for a single.
singh to shakib al hasan, out, or has he! slower one and he goes down the track and tries to hit him over the field on the off-side, but gets a leading edge and it is caught at point.
chavan to ten doeschate, no run, pitches on the leg-stump and turns away from the batsman and beats the outside-edge of the bat.

chavan to ten doeschate, six runs, pitched on the leg-stump and tendo has smacked it over the leg-side for a six! that is an excellent shot to end the game, kolkata have made it two wins in two games here!
pietersen to dhawan, no run, goes down the pitch and drives it to the covers for another dot ball!
pietersen to dhawan, 3 runs, goes down the pitch and tries to smack it, but gets an inside-edge to the ball, fast outfield almost takes it to the fine-leg fence. the batsmen get three.
pietersen to sangakkara, no run, sanga also shimmies down the pitch and tries to clear the in-field but fails in that endeavour as the ball goes straight to mid-on.
morkel to patel, 1 run, tapped away to the off-side and they are off for a quick run. three runs off the over and a wicket for morkel.
pathan to patel, no run, outside the off-stump and keeps a little low, beats the bottom-edge of the batsman through to the keeper.
pathan to patel, four runs, third four in a row for patel, outside the off-stump, pitched right up and the batsman throws his bat at it, goes to the point fence for a boundary. 14 from the over
morkel to dhawan, 2 runs, dhawan has been aggressive this season and he goes after morkel, does not get in the middle and the ball lobs up over the bowler for a couple
morkel to patel, 1 run, on the middle-stump and patel drives towards the mid-on fielder and they rush off for a quickly-taken run.
agarkar to dhawan, six runs, oh ho! what a welcome! that is almost a gentle loosener one thought and it has been pummelled into the leg-side fence for a six!
agarkar to dhawan, 1 run, slower ball, inside-edge but they rush off for a run.
agarkar to dhawan, 1 run, slower one and that is played towards the covers for a single. brings up the 50 at the end of the sixth over.
pietersen to dhawan, 1 wide, down the leg-side and the batsman misses, called a wide.
pietersen to dhawan, no run, down the leg-side yet again and there is an appeal, umpire does not call it a wide because it had come off the trousers. good call.
pietersen to dhawan, four runs, down the pitch and he has gently scooped it over the bowler for a four! excellent batting by the man in form!
pietersen to dhawan, 1 run, played away to the leg-side for a single.
agarkar to patel, 1 run, pitched right up and driven to long-off for a single
agarkar to dhawan, no run, driven back to the bowler, who dives across to his left for a single
yadav to patel, 1 run, flicked away to the deep square-leg for a single.
yadav to dhawan, 1 wide, slower one, it was really slow but too wide outside the off-stump and he will need to re-bowl it.
yadav to patel, 1 run, another slower on the middle-stump and tapped away to the off-side for a single.
yadav to christian, 1 wide, down the leg-side, missing his line yet again, a wide called.

yadav to patel, (no ball) 1 run, that is caught at third-man but the umpires are consulting for the waist-height no-ball. and yes, that is easily above the waist-height of the diminutive parthiv patel! sometimes it pays to not be too tall!
nadeem to christian, 1 run, driven to the leg-side for a single
pathan to christian, no run, on the middle-stump and christian defends it back to the bowler.
pathan to christian, no run, down the leg-side and it touches the pad through to the wicket-keeper.
pathan to christian, 1 run, smacked away to long-off but only for a single. a much better over thanks to the loss of that wicket.
nadeem to duminy, 1 run, nudged away to the leg-side for a single
nadeem to christian, 1 run, down the wicket and played away to the leg-side for a single.
pathan to christian, 1 run, outside the off-stump and slower, tries to punch it through the covers, goes to the left of the point fielder.
pathan to chipli, four runs, slower one but pathan misses the line there, down the leg-side and chipli flicks it away to the fine-leg for a four.
pathan to chipli, 1 run, on the off-stump, tapped it to the off-side and they are away for a quick single. pathan tried to throw the stumps down but he failed to get is hand on to the ball.
pathan to christian, 1 run, on the middle-stump and it is defended away to the leg-side for a single. exactly eight an over.
nadeem to chipli, 1 run, a bit of a round-arm action, drifting down the leg-side, dabbed away to deep square-leg
nadeem to christian, 1 run, swept away from middle-stump to deep square-leg for a single.
nadeem to chipli, 2 runs, outside the off-stump and it is driven through the covers for a couple of runs.
nadeem to chipli, no run, well bowled yet again, angling into the bat and the batsman fails to get it anywhere. excellent spell of bowling ends where he did not concede a single boundary!
yadav to jhunjhunwala, no run, quicker one, outside the off-stump and the batsman, who was moving down the leg-side, misses it.
yadav to jhunjhunwala, no run, slower one and that beats the batsman outside the off-stump yet again!

morkel to jhunjhunwala, out, edged and caught! goes down the track and wanted to clear the long-off fielder, gets a thin edge through to the wicket-keeper. they wanted to check the no-ball, but it looks fine.
morkel to steyn, no run, on the middle-stump and defended back to the bowler.
morkel to steyn, 2 runs, 140 km/hr, down the leg-side, and flicked away to the square-leg region for a couple.
agarkar to mishra, 1 wide, outside the off-stump and left alone. far too wide that one.
agarkar to mishra, 1 run, it was drifting on to his middle-stump and it was flicked away to the leg-side for a single.
agarkar to chipli, no run, slower one and this time he beats the bat.
agarkar to chipli, no run, another slower one and that beats the bat yet again! he has strung together a couple of dots here.
morkel to mishra, 1 run, drilled down to the mid-off fielder who had enough time to have two shies at the stumps, but missed the non-striker's stumps, mishra was nowhere close to the crease.
pratap singh to ojha, no run, on the off-stump, moving a tad away from the bat and the batsman defends yet again.
steyn to pietersen, four runs, and what a superb stroke! goes down the pitch, shimmies to off-stump and flicked away through the mid-wicket region for a four.
steyn to pietersen, no run, outside the off-stump, probably going away from the batsman and tapped away to the point region. kp wants to get going quickly, such is his form i think.
pratap singh to pietersen, 1 run, outside the off-stump and kp is confident enough to get outside the off and play it to mid-on for a single
pratap singh to sehwag, 2 runs, and this time it is whipped away to the leg-side for a couple of runs. it was pitched right up to the bat and the fine-leg was up in the circle.

steyn to sehwag, out, 147.4 km/hr, gone this time, caught! sehwag has edged it to the second slip to christian and delhi are two down! that was a quick ball, touching 150 km/hr almost and sehwag only managed to get an edge to the ball, the slip had only just been brought in.
steyn to jayawardene, 1 run, 144.5 km/hr, outside the off-stump and edged away to third-man for a single.
christian to jayawardene, 1 run, tapped away to the off-side for a single.
christian to pietersen, 1 wide, down the leg-side and it is called a wide. slower one, bowled at 118 km/hr.
christian to pietersen, 1 run, walks to the off-side, flicks it to the leg-side and they are off for a single.

christian to jayawardene, out, gone, caught! shimmies down the track and wants to go over the in-field on the off-side but the ball seems to have hit high on the bat and it loops up easily for jayawardene's sri lankan teammate, sanga to take at wide mid-off.
christian to pietersen, no run, slower one and dabbed away to the off-side, wanted to go for a quick single but does not take the risk.
christian to pietersen, no run, on the middle and it is played away to the leg-side.
duminy to pietersen, four runs, outside the off-stump and pietersen goes down the track and smacks it to the left of the bowler for a four
duminy to taylor, no run, slower this time and taylor dabs it to the leg-side
mishra to pietersen, no run, wow! turned a little and pietersen wanted to drive it aggressively, misses the bat but more vitally the stumps as well!
mishra to pietersen, six runs, and he has now gone down the track and smacked mishra into the stands for a six! what a stroke to bring up the side's half-century
mishra to pietersen, 1 wide, down the leg-side and it is called a wide
ankit sharma to pietersen, no run, driven back to the bowler, who fields
ankit sharma to pietersen, no run, drifting down the leg-side and kp tries to go down the leg-side
christian to taylor, no run, on the middle and defended well by taylor, the bowler fields off his own bowling.
duminy to pietersen, no run, goes down the track but can only drill it back to the bowler.
ankit sharma to pietersen, 1 run, pitched right up and kp drives it to long-off for a single
ankit sharma to pathan, no run, played away to the leg-side to the mid-wicket fielder.
ankit sharma to pathan, 1 run, this time he is able to dab ankit sharma away to the fine-leg for a single
ankit sharma to pietersen, 1 run, driven to long-off for a single
duminy to pietersen, 1 run, from around the stumps, kp drives it to the long-off fielder for a single. fifty for kp, a very confident-looking innings from a man in form.
mishra to pathan, no run, on the off-stump and played away to the leg-side.
mishra to pathan, 1 run, played away to the leg-side, down to fine-leg for a single.
mishra to pietersen, six runs, goes down the track and that, i swear, has disappeared. harsha bhogale says it is on a metro going to cp in delhi. i won't be surprised it that actually happened there!
steyn to pietersen, no run, slower one, and defended away on to the off-side.
steyn to pathan, no run, on the middle stump and pathan defends it to the off-side. yet to get a good spanking shot off the middle of the bat so far.

steyn to pietersen, no run, walks down the track and hits it back to the bowler, who fumbles to hold it before throwing it back at the batsman. a few smiles and a few words later, steyn takes his cap from the umpire.
christian to pietersen, no run, not pitching up again to kp, who flicks it away to mid-wicket.
christian to pietersen, 1 run, played away to the long-off fielder for a single
pratap singh to pietersen, 1 run, drilled through to the long-off region for a single.
pratap singh to nagar, 1 run, pitched right up and this time he drills it to the mid-off fielder for a single.
pratap singh to pietersen, 1 run, again, pitched right up and kp only needs to play it away to the off-side for a single.
pratap singh to nagar, 2 runs, yep, he is pitching them right up to the bat but it could well be a matter of too little, too late. driven to wide long-off for a couple of easy runs.
christian to pietersen, 1 run, and he plays it away to the leg-side for a single now. this is easy now.
christian to nagar, 1 run, goes down the track and drives it to long-off.
christian to nagar, 1 run, and driven yet again down to the long-off region for a single. only eight needed from 12 balls.
steyn to nagar, 2 runs, pitched right up to the bat and nagar gives himself some room and drills it through the covers for a couple of runs.
steyn to nagar, 1 run, slower one and nagar waits for it, before playing it to the third-man region for a single. over to kp now.
steyn to nagar, no run, nicked away, but goes on the bounce to the wicket-keeper, which means that kp sill has a chance to get his century.
kallis to mandeep singh, 1 run, run-out chance missed, ten doeschate was quickly onto the ball as he ran in from midwicket, the dive would not have saved mandeep had the lob from a diving tendo hit
kallis to gilchrist, 1 run, turned wide of midwicket for a single
narine to mandeep singh, no run, dabs an offbreak on the off side and takes off, is sent back  by gilchrist

narine to gilchrist, out, narine has struck in his first over, gilchrist grimaces as soon as he realises he has top-edged the attempted swing over midwicket, the off break from narine did not turn much, it bounced just around off, and gilchrist ended up hitting it straight and high, cover settled under it
narine to marsh, 1 wide, straightish one down the leg side
narine to marsh, no run, that one turned alright, difficult one for the left-hander, as it spun sharply away from him as he pushed at it
kallis to mandeep singh, 1 leg bye, follows him as he makes room outside leg, mandeep manages to get it behind square leg
shakib al hasan to hussey, 1 run, another inside edge, to deep midwicket, he was playing for the turn, looking to drive through extra cover
shakib al hasan to mandeep singh, 1 run, tries to scoop him over the off-side infield, but gets it straight down to long off
shakib al hasan to hussey, no run, comes down the track but cannot do more than push it back to shakib
unadkat to mandeep singh, 1 run, down to third man off a thick edge
unadkat to hussey, 1 run, suddenly they are timing them, a pleasing push past the bowler for a single now
bhatia to mandeep singh, no run, sliced straight to point, when they found timing, they lost the placement
bhatia to mandeep singh, 2 runs, slower one arrives from bhatia, but they have got two off this one, it was just a soft push that looped up in the air towards midwicket
bhatia to hussey, 1 run, turned to deep midwicket
shakib al hasan to hussey, 2 runs, backs away to one on middle and punches past extra cover
shakib al hasan to hussey, 1 run, driven wide of long off
bhatia to dogra, 1 run, pushed through point
bhatia to hussey, no run,
shakib al hasan to hussey, 2 leg byes, nudged behind square leg, and they come back for the second
unadkat to bipul sharma, 1 run, runs it  behind point with an open face
narine to bipul sharma, 1 run, pushed wide of extra cover
narine to chawla, no run, massive turn, pitching miles outside leg stump, and turning across the left-hander, no chance of playing that one
narine to chawla, 1 run,
kallis to harmeet singh, 2 runs, turned through square leg for a couple
narine to chawla, 1 run, hat-trick ball, he punches the turning offbreak towards point

narine to harmeet singh, out, that has to be one of the most bizarre dismissals, harmeet has walked outside off, and scooped narine into the keeper's gloves, narine has five, he has been nearly unplayable today
kumar to gambhir, no run, pushed on the off side
kumar to gambhir, no run, makes room and guides to point
bhatt to gambhir, 2 runs, a push through midwicket now earns him two more
kumar to gambhir, no run, runs it away towards the man around gully
kumar to gambhir, four runs, gautam ensuring kkr make the most of these restrictions, pk swings it in from outside leg, he watches it closely and flicks him over square leg
kumar to gambhir, 1 run, guided towards backward point
kumar to bisla, no run, pushed to extra cover
kumar to tiwary, 1 run, opens the face and runs it to third man
mascarenhas to bisla, 1 run, backs away outside leg again, but cannot time the shot through extra cover this time, punches it down to mid off in the end
mascarenhas to tiwary, no run, tightly defends another one on off stump
bhatt to tiwary, 1 run, nudged behind square leg
harmeet singh to tiwary, four runs, well done, again some width offered, he waited and steered it behind point and wide of third man
harmeet singh to tiwary, no run, reaches out and pushes to point
chawla to tiwary, 1 run,
chawla to tiwary, 1 run, pushed towards vacant midwicket, and by the time the men from the deep reach the ball, they have run two
harmeet singh to bisla, 1 leg bye, slower one from the back of the hand, with the angle down leg, rolls away towards square leg
harmeet singh to tiwary, no run, legbreak from harmeet, pushed softly down the pitch
chawla to tiwary, 1 run, opens the face and pushes the legbreak in the gap past cover
bhatt to shakib al hasan, 1 run, swept away to deep square
mascarenhas to das, 1 run, flashed away to deep point
mascarenhas to das, 1 run, flicked away to deep midwicket
chawla to das, no run,
bhatt to ten doeschate, 1 run, driven to deep point
harmeet singh to das, 1 run, down to long off for a single
mascarenhas to das, no run, steered to point, tendo wants the single, has to dive back into his ground as the throw comes in
harmeet singh to das, 1 run, cannot get this one away for more than a single down to long off

harmeet singh to ten doeschate, out, he's bowled tendo., the legbreak appears innocuous, but it has taken out tendo, who looked to swipe it through midwicket from outside off stump, an inside edge results, also finds its way on to the stumps

harmeet singh to bhatia, 1 run, bhatia gets a taste of how it feels to generate some power off slower ones, gets it towards long off, another pick-up fluffed, but they are satisfied with one this time

harmeet singh to das, 1 run, cannot get it away, the legbreaks, those harmless looking legbreaks from a medium-pacer have done it for punjab, tries to swing one of them over midwicket, cannot time it at all, it rolls away to deep midwicket
khan to dravid, no run, low bounce off the pitch, looks to drive through the covers but misses, straight to the keeper
khan to dravid, 2 runs, dravid gets a big inside edge and the ball goes to the fine leg boundary but murali shows his football skills and stops it
aravind to rahane, four runs, wide outside off, rahane smears it through the gap between backward point and point, top shot!
aravind to rahane, four runs, leaning over the ball, rahane pierces the gap between backward point and square cover, superb placement
aravind to rahane, 1 run, width offered, slices it to the left of kohli at point who dives and saves 3 runs for his team
khan to rahane, no run, rahane bunts it to kohli at point and takes off but gets back to the crease on time
aravind to dravid, 1 run, dravid goes back and tries to slap it past midwicket but gets an underedge and the ball goes to deep square leg
khan to dravid, no run, dravid goes back in his crease and crams it to covers, no run again, 10 dots on the bounce for zaheer
khan to dravid, 1 run, dravid comes down the track and drives it to mid-off and gets to the other end, he'd be relieved!
khan to rahane, 1 run, outside off, bunts it to the off side and the batsmen scurry for a single
vinay kumar to dravid, 1 run, angling into the batsman, skips down the track and turns it away to mid-on and sneak a single
vinay kumar to rahane, 1 run, pitched outside off, rahane watches it cautiously and guides it to third man for a run
vinay kumar to rahane, 1 run, width offered, rahane stays in the crease and runs it to third man for an easy single
vettori to dravid, no run, that's a ripper, dravid gives room but the ball turns the other way
vettori to rahane, 1 run, pushed through the air, turned away to midwicket for an easy single
vettori to rahane, 1 run, quicker one, slashes it but doesnt get past gayle at backward point
muralitharan to rahane, no run, quicker one, rahane chops it back to the bowler
muralitharan to rahane, no run, rahane plays it to point off his backfoot

vettori to dravid, out, stumped! flatter delivery, vettori pushes it through as he sees dravid coming down the track, misses it by a big margin and the rest is cleaned up by ab de villers behind the stumps
muralitharan to rahane, no run, quicker one, pushes it back to the bowler
vinay kumar to rahane, 1 run, outside off, rahane waits and uses the pace of the ball as he runs it to third man for a single
vinay kumar to shah, six runs, shah stays in his crease and tries to go over midwicket but takes a top edge and the ball loops into the air and off it goes sailing over fine leg fence
aravind to rahane, four runs, 2 in 2, exact replica of the previous shot but slightly straighter this time, punches it past the bowler
aravind to rahane, four runs, 6 fours off that over, this time he waits till the ball gets to him and guides it to the third man boundary, what an over that turned out to be!
vettori to shah, 1 run, outside off, goes back and pushes it to cover
gayle to shah, 1 run, slower one, shah drills it to deep midwicket for an easy single
vinay kumar to shah, six runs, shah has hammered that! picks the slower one and smokes it high over the deep midwicket for a homer, see-ya!
vinay kumar to shah, six runs, it's raining sixes here! picks it and smacks it over the bowler's head, that has come off the meat of the bat, stupendous shot!
vinay kumar to shah, 1 run, that's shah's 50, slower one outside off, delicately pats it to point for a single
muralitharan to shah, four runs, quicker one outside off, shah makes room and gets a bottom edge and the ball races away to the fence behind the keeper
muralitharan to shah, 1 run, on the off, shah slams it past the the bowler to long-off
muralitharan to rahane, 1 run, quicker one, stays back and drives to cover for a run
khan to shah, no run, slower one that kept low, shah looks to push ti to cover but misses
khan to shah, four runs, on the money, shah digs it out and squeezes it over backward point to the fence
khan to shah, 4 byes, keeps low and the keeper misses that, piling agony for rcb
khan to rahane, 1 run, slow and outside off, leans into it and pushes it cover for a single
vinay kumar to rahane, four runs, comes down the track and smashes the slower one past the bowler for a four, rahane is on 97 now
vinay kumar to rahane, no run, slower one and quite slow i should say, rahane waits and waits as he looks to nudge it but misses
botha to agarwal, six runs, starts off with a six! mayank shuffles and smacks it over fine leg boundary
botha to agarwal, no run, quicker one, goes back and pushes it to cover for no run
botha to gayle, no run, gayle does it again, defends it to the off side where botha picks it up and no run possible
pankaj singh to agarwal, no run, outside off angling away, mayank leans and tries to punch it through covers but misses
pankaj singh to agarwal, no run, replay of the shot he just played, outside off and shaping away, looks to drive and misses
pankaj singh to agarwal, no run, zipper of a delivery, mayank shapes to turn it to the on side but takes a leading edge and goes to the man at point
botha to agarwal, four runs, goes down the track and thrashes it over mid-off for a one bounce four, timed that to perfection
singh to agarwal, 1 run, width offered, mayank opens the face and runs it to third man for a run

pankaj singh to agarwal, out, caught by owais shah! mayank looks to smack it out of the stadium but gets a top edge and high it goes into the dark sky, shah does well to run to his left and cups it easily in the end, royals draw first blood here!
pankaj singh to gayle, no run, sprayed down the off side, angling away after it pitched, straight to the keeper
singh to kohli, no run, slower one outside off, kohli defends it back to the bowler for no run
singh to kohli, four runs, very wristy! that's a typical kohli shot, flicks it through midwicket for an easy four
singh to kohli, 2 runs, on the legs, whipped to backward square leg for a well run two
singh to kohli, four runs, width outside off, kohli waits and slices it past the point fielder, has enough muscle to go to the deep point fence
pankaj singh to de villiers, 1 run, keeps low outside off, de villiers stays in the crease and drills it to mid-on for a single
pankaj singh to de villiers, 1 run, an uppish delivery, stays on his toes and punches it to midwicket for another run
pankaj singh to kohli, no run, slower one, change of pace, kohli turns it away to midwicket but cant steal a single
hogg to de villiers, no run, down the track and hogg does well to stop a booming drive, with one hand
hogg to de villiers, 1 run, flicked with the spin to deep midwicket, good start by hogg
hogg to kohli, 1 run, steers it down to point and a fine start by hogg
trivedi to kohli, 1 run, down the track and he thumps it down to long-off
trivedi to de villiers, 2 runs, that was lucky! he made room to shovel that over midwicket and he got an inside edge to his body that beat the stumps and the keeper and down to third man
trivedi to de villiers, out, inside edge! trivedi gets him with a slower ball, 107 kph, de villiers was stuck at the crease and the ball stayed low too, big edge pegs back the middle stump
trivedi to tiwary, no run, walks down the pitch straightaway and ends up pushing it to mid-on
hogg to tiwary, 1 run, big turn and he pushes it with the turn to cover
trivedi to kaif, no run, slower one wide outside off shaping away, kaif pokes at it and misses, straight to the keeper
botha to kaif, 1 run, on the off, kaif pats it to backward point for an easy single, they are still dealing in singles here
trivedi to kaif, 1 run, slower one which keeps low, kaif gently pushes it to the man at cover for a single
trivedi to tiwary, out, bowled! slower one, tiwary doesnt move his feet and swings across the line, tries to go over midwicket but misses, ball goes crashing into the middle stump

trivedi to vettori, out, bowled! one more bites the dust! trivedi follows vettori as he makes room and looks to drive it through covers and takes a faint inside edge and goes on to peg his leg stump back
botha to vinay kumar, no run, nips into vinay kumar as he looks to steer it past point
singh to vinay kumar, 2 runs, jags back in from off, flicked to deep midwicket, fielder picks it and hits the stumps and the ball deflects, batsmen have enough time to get an extra run
singh to vinay kumar, four runs, wide outside off, smeared to deep midwicket with brute force and gets a boundary, fielder there tries to stop it but in vain
singh to vinay kumar, no run, slower one, vinay steers it to fielder at point for no run
hogg to khan, no run, wrong 'un, zaheer does not pick it at all, goes to the keeper
pankaj singh to muralitharan, no run, that's a typical murali shot! slower one, he looks to swing across and misses it
pankaj singh to muralitharan, 2 runs, similar line, murali connects it this time as he swivels it over midwicket for a two
pankaj singh to muralitharan, no run, change of pace deceives murali as he looks to swipe it across the line and misses by a good margin
singh to aravind, 1 run, on the legs, whipped to deep backward square leg for a single
nadeem to jacobs, no run, backs away to hit through the off side but can't get past cover
pathan to sharma, 1 run, pathan bends the ball back into sharma, who plays on the leg side
pathan to levi, 1 run, played from the crease towards mid-off, kp comes running in but can't prevent the run
pathan to sharma, no run, played to the fielder on the edge of the circle at midwicket
nadeem to rayudu, 1 run, he steps out of his crease and drives fluently to long-off
nadeem to sharma, 1 run, a straight ball on off and middle, played from the crease towards wide mid-off
nadeem to rayudu, no run, quick and straight, defended from the crease on the off side, nadeen is zipping through some stingy overs
nadeem to sharma, no run, tight wicket to wicket line, the batsman goes back and plays to cover
nadeem to rayudu, 1 wide, fired down leg side
morkel to rayudu, 1 run, played from the crease behind point
morkel to rayudu, 1 run, rayudu waits in his crease and dabs the ball behind point once again
agarkar to sharma, no run, defended from the crease
agarkar to sharma, 1 run, another mix up, the batsman played towards point, the non-striker began running but then turned back
agarkar to pollard, 1 wide, strays down leg side, that's a wide
yadav to karthik, 1 run, played to third man for a single
agarkar to sharma, no run, tight, wicket to wicket line, rohit defends from his crease

agarkar to sharma, out, caught at deep backward square. mumbai are a shambles tonight. rohit's top-edged another one and this time it's to a fielder. rohit was trying to tuck the ball off his hips, the extra bounce resulted in a top edge, and taylor came running in from the boundary once again. so many top-edges off rohit's bat went for four, not this one
agarkar to harbhajan singh, 1 run, played towards long off for a single
pathan to mckay, 1 run, played towards third man
pathan to harbhajan singh, four runs, edged, but wide of the diving wicketkeeper. there was width outside off and harbhajan chased it, he even times his edges well
pathan to harbhajan singh, no run, played from the crease towards point
nadeem to harbhajan singh, no run, defended from the crease
nadeem to mckay, no run, defended from the crease
pathan to mckay, no run, mckay guides the ball from his crease towards backward point
pathan to mckay, 2 runs, hard to tell if that was a slower ball, mckay drives to umesh at long off, the throw to the keeper's end is not very good and mumbai get an overthrow
pathan to mckay, out, caught at long off! mckay tries to launch over long-off but doesn't hit it far enough, umesh yadav positions himself for the catch and tumbles to the ground after taking it
pathan to harbhajan singh, 1 run, played towards the leg side for a single, there was two there if harbhajan wanted it, but he wanted the strike more
yadav to harbhajan singh, 1 run, hit towards the fielder on the cover boundary
yadav to harbhajan singh, no run, a slow ball outside off, harbhajan swings across the line too early and makes no contact
morkel to harbhajan singh, 1 wide, morkel sprays it wide outside off stump
yadav to ojha, 1 run, a fumble at backward point allows the single
yadav to patel, 1 run, a slower ball outside off stump, munaf backs away again and dabs towards backward point
patel to sehwag, six runs, there are two fielders at backward point, but sehwag has gone over them, using the width to slash the ball flat over the boundary
singh to sehwag, 1 wide, rp singh's first ball is down leg side
singh to ojha, 1 wide, another one that is down leg side
singh to ojha, no run, tries to steer towards third man but gets a bottom edge instead
singh to ojha, no run, loud shout for lbw after ojha comes out of his crease and tries to flick, there was an inside edge on to the pad
mckay to sehwag, 1 run, sehwag stays back and opens the face to steer the ball behind point towards third man
singh to pietersen, no run, rp shapes the ball back into pietersen and hits the back thigh, that's too high for rp singh's lbw appeal to be upheld
ojha to sehwag, no run, sehwag let that one go! it straightened just a bit and was so close to off stump
ojha to sehwag, no run, sehwag tries to come out again but mis-hits on the leg side
singh to pietersen, 1 leg bye, pietersen gets smacked on the thigh as he tries to work the ball as it bends back into him after angling across
singh to pietersen, 1 run, flicked to deep square leg for a single
singh to sehwag, 1 run, sehwag stays back and opens the face, to steer the ball bending into him towards third man, along the ground this time
ojha to sehwag, no run, sehwag gets behind the line and defends
ojha to jayawardene, no run, stays in his crease and defends on the off side
ojha to jayawardene, no run, ojha loops the ball into the right-hander from over the wicket, he has to pick it up on his follow through after mahela defends
ojha to jayawardene, 2 runs, mahela makes room by moving towards leg and chips the ball just over the fielder runnign back at extra cover, he connected with the bottom of the bat
ojha to jayawardene, 1 run, mahela swats the ball behind square
ojha to taylor, 1 run, dabbed with an open face towards point. mahela sprints, taylor hesitates, and then sprints in the end
ojha to jayawardene, 2 runs, mahela waits, and dabs very late past the keeper
patel to jayawardene, 1 run, mahela dabs the ball close on the leg side and runs quickly
patel to taylor, 1 run, played behind point for a quick single
pollard to taylor, 1 wide, that's wide down leg side, karthik moves quickly to collect
pollard to taylor, 1 run, played on the leg side for a single towards square
pollard to jayawardene, 1 wide, a third wide in the over, outside off this time
pollard to jayawardene, 1 run, a slower ball delivered from wide of the crease, tapped towards mid on
pankaj singh to dhawan, no run, goes back and steers it towards point
pankaj singh to dhawan, no run, dropped with soft hands to the off side and sends his partner back
singh to sangakkara, no run, tucked away towards midwicket but no opportunity for a single this time
singh to sangakkara, 1 wide, drifts too wide down the leg side, fails to make contact with that
singh to sangakkara, no run, slower delivery and he tucks it firmly towards midwicket
botha to dhawan, four runs, half tracker outside off, loose delivery, gave the batsman enough time to rock back and slap it past the covers
botha to dhawan, 1 run, goes down the track and drives towards mid-off
botha to sangakkara, 1 run, uses his feet and pushes it firmly down to mid-on
botha to dhawan, no run, driven firmly back to the bowler
singh to sangakkara, no run, he gives him the charge and swishes at thin air, slightly slower delivery
singh to dhawan, no run, punches it down the track and can't pinch a single
singh to dhawan, 1 run, driven firmly and well stopped by trivedi at mid-off, saved three runs
singh to sangakkara, 1 wide, this over's never ending, another wide down the leg side
pankaj singh to dhawan, 1 run, punches it just wide of mid-on for an easy single
botha to sangakkara, no run, spins away and he punches it wide of mid-off
botha to sangakkara, four runs, sangakkara uses his feet and gets down the pitch, makes room and hammers it wide of mid-on,top shot
trivedi to dhawan, no run, very firmly driven down to mid-off and no chance for a single there
trivedi to dhawan, no run, slower delivery and he punches it back to the bowler
hogg to dhawan, no run, the wrong 'un shoots back in and the batsman nearly drags it onto his stumps!
hogg to dhawan, 2 runs, spins away and he punches it wide of long-off
hogg to dhawan, no run, he goes back and makes room and punches him firmly down to mid-off
trivedi to dhawan, 1 run, stays back and punches it down to mid-off
trivedi to dhawan, no run, goes back at the crease and punches it back to the bowler firmly
hogg to dhawan, no run,
hodge to dhawan, 1 run, skids through and he punches it firmly to long-off
hodge to dhawan, 1 run, driven just wide of rahane and long-off picks it up
hogg to dhawan, no run,
hogg to dhawan, four runs, can't blame the bowler for that, the skiddy chinaman, dhawan was squared up at the crease and got a thick inside edge that trickled past the stumps and down to fine leg
hogg to dhawan, 2 runs, tucks it down to fine leg and that's dhawan's fifty

trivedi to dhawan, out, they've got their danger man! dhawan gets on his knee to swipe him across the line, he doesn't get the distance and hodge sprints to his right from deep square leg and takes it well
trivedi to christian, 1 run,
trivedi to duminy, no run, stays back and punches it back to the bowler

botha to christian, 3 runs, pretty comical in the end, christian used his feet and lofted it towards long-off and shah did well to slide and stop it with his right hand, he relayed the throw to rahane who over-ran the ball and in the end rahane had to turn around and pick it up at long-off - his original position
botha to duminy, 1 run, goes back and punches it to the off side
trivedi to duminy, 1 run, chases the angle away from the left-hander and dabs it down to third man
trivedi to duminy, no run, nearly drags this onto his stumps, tucked him up for room there
hogg to duminy, 1 run,
singh to duminy, 2 runs, comes down the track and heaves it down to deep midwicket to bring up the 150
pankaj singh to duminy, no run, tries to smash that over the leg side but misses
pankaj singh to duminy, 1 run, mows it down to deep midwicket for a single
singh to duminy, no run, goes for another heave but misses, yagnik who up to the stumps whips off the bails
singh to duminy, no run, another swing and a miss, looked close to the edge
ankit sharma to dravid, no run, turn and bounce straightaway! really foxes dravid outside off
ankit sharma to rahane, 1 run, goes back and punches it just wide of the bowler and down to mid-on
ankit sharma to dravid, 1 run, mistimes the drive to midwicket, good first over
steyn to dravid, four runs, he uses the pace of steyn to reach out and gets a thick outside edge that flies to third man, the fielder dives but can't stop it
steyn to dravid, no run, lands it outside off and he safely leaves it alone
steyn to dravid, four runs, steyn concedes 12 in one over - the same over 4 in the previous game - dravid chases one outside off and deliberately edges it past slip
ankit sharma to rahane, 1 run, comes down the track and lofts him down to long-off
ankit sharma to dravid, 1 run, drags it down to mid-on for a single
christian to dravid, 1 run, punches it to the off side for a single
christian to rahane, 1 run, punches it down to cover for a single
anand rajan to rahane, 1 run, tough chance! spooned to rajan's left and he sticks his left hand out and can't hold on to it
anand rajan to dravid, no run, keeps it nice and straight and he punches it back down the track
anand rajan to dravid, 1 wide, down the leg side and sangakkara was confident he nicked that but wide called
anand rajan to dravid, four runs, outside edge and no slip! chases a wide one and the edge flies past sanga who dives in despair
anand rajan to dravid, 1 run, drops it with soft hands to the on side and sets off quickly
christian to dravid, 1 wide,
christian to dravid, no run,
christian to dravid, 1 wide, slides that too wide down the leg side
christian to menaria, no run, slashes at one outside off and he misses
anand rajan to rahane, 1 run, risks a single, he was down the track before pushing it to mid-off and he was home before the direct hit at the bowler's end
christian to menaria, no run, beats him outside the off stump as he tries to angle it to the off side
christian to rahane, 1 run, outside off and he deliberately angles it down to third man
steyn to rahane, 1 run, bowls it outside off, he opens the face of the bat and angles it to third man
steyn to menaria, 1 run, squares him up at the crease and he steers it down to point
a mishra to rahane, 1 run, stays at the crease and punches it with the turn to long-off
a mishra to rahane, six runs, something like that, rahane takes a few paces down the track, makes room and launches him just over wide long-off's reach
a mishra to menaria, no run,
a mishra to menaria, 1 run, stays back, waits for the turn and punches him to deep cover
ankit sharma to shah, 1 wide, down the leg side and shah withdraws the shot at the last ,minute
ankit sharma to shah, no run,
a mishra to rahane, 1 wide, wide outside off and it spins away, wide called
a mishra to shah, 1 run, drives it just wide of mishra
a mishra to hodge, 1 run, tucks it down to square leg
ankit sharma to shah, 1 run, makes a lot of room and slaps it to the bowler who fumbles
ankit sharma to hodge, 1 run,
a mishra to hodge, 1 run, goes back and slaps it with the turn to the off side
christian to botha, 3 runs, dropped, chipli this time! he makes room and splices it over point and chipli pedals back and spills it
anand rajan to yagnik, 1 run, slower ball and he thuds it down to long-off
anand rajan to hodge, six runs, add six more! slower ball outside the off stump and hodge makes room and whams that over wide long-off
steyn to yagnik, four runs, he knocks off four of them! steyn fires that a touch too wide, he has the width to smack that past the off side field and down to deep cover
kallis to gilchrist, 1 run, turned past midwicket for one
kallis to valthaty, 1 run, hops on his toes to push a rising delivery, this pitch has some bounce alright, down to third man
lee to gilchrist, no run, forced away to mid on from the crease
kallis to marsh, 1 run, adjusts for the bounce to guide this widish one to the right of point, who dives to take pace off it
kallis to gilchrist, 1 run, pushed straight to mid off, a clean pick up could have tested gilchrist as he charged for the single
narine to gilchrist, no run,
narine to gilchrist, no run, offbreak turns and bounces outside off after pitching on leg, pushed to mid on
narine to gilchrist, no run, straightish delivery on middle, pushed to the bowler
kallis to mandeep singh, 1 run, steers a climbing delivery wide of third man
narine to marsh, four runs, another one spinning away, but slowly and slightly wider as well, he plays late and guides it past slip
balaji to marsh, no run, wants the single with a push behind point, but just makes it back as the throw comes in
bhatia to marsh, 1 run, tucked away to deep square leg
balaji to marsh, 1 run, bends the knee and steers one going across to third man
balaji to hussey, 1 run, ending just outside off with the incoming angle, he waits on it and pushes it past point
balaji to hussey, no run, underedges it towards the keeper as he looks to guide this one through point
bhatia to marsh, 1 run,
bhatia to hussey, 2 runs, inside edged on to pad behind square leg, he would have been plumb but for that little bit of bat on ball
bhatia to hussey, 1 run, tucked away behind square leg again
lee to marsh, 1 run, opens the face to run it from off behind point
bhatia to hussey, 1 run,

bhatia to dogra, out, punjab going nowhere at the moment, another big wicket, hussey is run out by a long way, and it is the same man who ran hussey out in kolkata, paras dogra, who has managed to do it again in mohali, pushed towards cover, no chance of completing a single there, they still decide to go for it
bhatia to mascarenhas, no run, pushed towards point
lee to mascarenhas, no run, nearly chopped on to the stumps, trying to arch back and force a rising delivery towards point, inside edges it
bhatia to dogra, 1 wide,
balaji to gilchrist, 1 run, swung away to deep square leg, he did not go hard at that, played it a shade tentatively
balaji to chawla, 1 run,
narine to chawla, 1 run, hit to deep midwicket for one, no way gilchrist is going to be able to run tight twos
narine to gilchrist, 1 run, comes down the track, but gets a thick edge past the keeper as he has a go at the offbreak
kumar to gambhir, 1 run, dabbed down to third man
mascarenhas to mccullum, no run, oh, and then, next ball he decides to let one go outside off
kumar to mccullum, no run, holding its line on off, defended
kumar to mccullum, no run, pushed out to backward point
kumar to mccullum, no run, goes for the shot again, it got onto him quickly, and he mistimed it to mid on
kumar to gambhir, 2 runs, wide of third man for a couple
chawla to mccullum, 1 run, sliding on to middle and leg, turned behind square
mascarenhas to gambhir, no run, pushed towards midwicket

mascarenhas to bisla, 1 leg bye, that looked close enough for a shout, punjab's appeal was a muted one, replays show the ball angled in and struck him quite high, explains the lack of interest from punjab
mascarenhas to gambhir, 1 run, down to long off for one
harmeet singh to bisla, no run, driven to mid off
harmeet singh to bisla, 1 wide, that is a very fine take, it was the slower one bowled with a legbreak sort of action, well down leg, gilchrist got across pretty quickly to collect it
harmeet singh to bisla, 1 run, again he backs away, and slaps it through extra cover now
chawla to bisla, no run, pushed towards cover
bhatt to kallis, 1 run, driven neatly down to long off
bhatt to kallis, 1 run,
chawla to kallis, 1 run,
bhatt to kallis, 1 run, driven to long off along the ground

bhatt to gambhir, 2 runs, dropped at midwicket, he charged out, looking for the clip past midwicket, but hit it close to the fielder, pk dived to his left, got a hand to the ball, but that was a tough chance
bhatt to gambhir, no run, turned to midwicket
mascarenhas to kallis, no run, drive to extra cover
mascarenhas to kallis, 1 run, steered to third man

bhatt to kallis, four runs, oh what an effort from david hussey running to his left from long off, he must have run yards and yards, reached out one-handed as the ball came down after having been lofted by kallis, but hussey tumbled over with all his momentum in the end, and the ball rolled into the ropes
pathan to dhawan, no run, on the off stump, it is not coming on to the bat, driven to mid-on for no run.
aaron to harris, 1 run, just outside off stump, deviating slightly away, gets an outside edge through to the third-man region for a single
morkel to harris, no run, pitched right up to the batsman, tries to drive it, bottom of the bat and driven back to the bowler
morkel to harris, no run, slower ball from morkel, 126.3 km/hr, harris needed to adjust to the slowness of that delivery and defends it to the off side
aaron to sangakkara, four runs, driven and four! it was over-pitched from aaron and sangakkara brought his foot out and drove it through extra-cover for a four
aaron to white, no run, on the middle stump, tapped to the leg side by the in form cameron white
pathan to white, no run, swung back and hit white! the batsman was trying to run it down to third-man but it not only jagged back but also got some bounce and cracks into his gloves. ouch!
pathan to white, no run, this time it is going away from the batsman, is sucked into playing at it, misses, bit of an appeal for a caught-behind but aborted
pathan to white, four runs, and this time he is able to flick it away through fine-leg for a four, bad ball, going down the leg side and he only needed to get some bat
nadeem to dhawan, no run, round the wicket, on the middle stump, pushed to the leg side
nadeem to dhawan, 2 runs, down the wicket, wanted to slam it over the boundary, but did not get too much bat on it, landed to the left of the deep square-leg fielder
russell to dhawan, 1 run, slower ball, outside the off stump, opened he face of the bat to third man for a single
nadeem to white, no run, turn and bounce outside the off stump, white was going for a push, beats him
nadeem to dhawan, 1 run, swept and pretty hard at that, to a ball on his leg stump, and for most part it looked like going to the fence, fielded really well by russell at fine-leg
nadeem to white, no run, on the off stump, turning away, defended to the off side
nadeem to white, 1 run, tapped away to the off side yet again and this time they are off for a quick single
russell to dhawan, no run, slower one and it almost turns back into the batsman, gets an inside-edge as well and misses the off stump!
nadeem to white, 1 run, goes down the track, taps it to mid-wicket and wanted to go for the second run, but nagar rushes in quickly and prevents that
nadeem to dhawan, six runs, down the track and slammed! six for dhawan, who continues to exhibit a lot of form, it was outside the off-stump, allowing him to free his arms
nadeem to dhawan, six runs, six more from dhawan! the line was changed to the middle stump and he has swept it away for a six, over backward square-leg
nadeem to white, no run, on the off stump, bit of movement from white in the crease, but decides to tap it back to the bowler
aaron to white, no run, on the middle stump, keeps a little low, defended on the leg side
aaron to white, 1 run, on the middle stump, squared him up a little, gets a bit of the outside edge for a single
aaron to dhawan, 1 run, goes down the pitch again, drilled over the point region but goes to the deep fielder for a single
russell to white, four runs, smack, through point for another four! that was not hit in the air and beat a diving point fielder within the circle
russell to white, 1 run, flicked it away to the deep square-leg fielder for a single
nadeem to white, 2 runs, goes down the track, tapped it to the leg side and they take one, rush back for the second, with the fielder from deep needing to run into the circle to field that one
nadeem to white, 1 run, pitched right up, driven to deep mid-wicket for a single

morkel to dhawan, four runs, what a shot off one of the best bowlers of the tournament, he moved around in his crease, finished up outside the off stump, the ball was searing into the middle, got some bat on it over fine-leg for four!
morkel to white, 1 run, slower one, outside the off stump, opens the face of the bat, to third-man for a single
morkel to dhawan, four runs, through the point field for a four now! pitched right up to the bat, outside the off stump, and he is able to dig it away for a boundary!
pathan to white, 1 run, slower outside the off stump, tries to hit it over the long-off but gets a single to the fielder

pathan to dhawan, 1 run, out, run-out for 84! pitched right up, bit of swing into the batsman, drills it to the right of fine-leg for a single and they come back for a second. the fielder throws down the stumps direct from deep fine-leg though and dhawan is miles away, end of one of the better innings in this format!
morkel to white, 1 wide, down the leg side and white could have easily got some bat on that for a four down to fine-leg, instead he misses and the umpire flexes his arms
aaron to duminy, no run, outside the off stump, pitched right up and beats the outside edge
aaron to duminy, four runs,
dhawan to sehwag, four runs, pitched right up and sehwag is wasting no time, he has drilled it over mid-off for a four. it was right up to the batsman!
dhawan to warner, no run, outside the off stump, a tad quicker, pushed to the off side
sudhindra to warner, no run, outside the off stump, angling away from the batsman and he misses it
gony to warner, no run, on the middle stump, pitched right up, warner was lining up for a big one but in the end, defended back to the bowler
gony to warner, 1 run, outside the off stump, pitched right up, goes for a drive, gets an outside edge to the third-man for a single
gony to ojha, 1 run, on the middle stump, nudged away to mid-wicket for a single
sudhindra to warner, four runs, width, outside the off stump and that has been smashed through the covers for a four! warner's doing what sehwag has done to bowlers all tournament long!
gony to warner, 1 run, on the off stump, pitched right up, angling away, taps it to the off side and goes for a quick run
gony to warner, no run, outside the off stump, pitched right up, tries to drive it but does not time it too well
gony to warner, 1 run, outside the off stump, tapped away to the off side and the single that follows brings up his half-century!
dhawan to warner, 1 wide, down the leg side, tries to nudge it away, misses and that is called a wide
gony to ojha, 2 runs, outside the off stump, opens the face of the bat and guides it through to third-man for a couple of runs.
mishra to ojha, 2 runs, on the off stump, turning away from the bat, gets an outside edge through the slips for a couple of runs
ashish reddy to warner, four runs, another slower one, warner waited for and gave it a spanking, the deep square-leg fielder dived for it, but got nowhere near and that goes for a four!
ashish reddy to ojha, 2 runs, slower one, tapped away to mid-wicket and they are away for a very quick two!
mishra to ojha, 2 runs, outside the off stump, opens the face of the bat and they are able to get two again
mishra to ojha, no run, flatter, quicker and spins away a little, beats the bat
mishra to warner, 1 run, outside the off stump, tapped away for a single to bring up the 150-run stand off only 84 balls!
sudhindra to warner, 1 run, round the wicket, angling in, tapped away to fine-leg for a single
ankit sharma to ojha, 1 run, outside the off stump, tapped away for a single
khan to saini, 2 runs, tried to make room to hit through the covers, gets another inside-edge and it goes to fine, fine-leg for a couple

khan to saini, out, out, bowled 'em! saini is bowled after zaheer khan came in from round the wicket, it was coming into the batsman before it jagged away a little and he tried to go over the off-side, gets his third inside-edge of the innings but this time he is not lucky enough to miss the stumps.
khan to marsh, 1 run, back over the wicket, the ball comes in and marsh tries to play it to the leg-side, gets a leading edge to the off-side and they are off for a run.
vinay kumar to marsh, no run, outside the off-stump, was going for a drive before realising that it was a tad slower and checked his stroke.
khan to valthaty, 2 runs, finally gets off the mark, with a lofted drive over the covers, tiwary gives chase but by then the batsmen had taken two.

khan to valthaty, out, pitched right up to the bat, outside the off-stump and he went for a lofted drive over mid-off, it does not clear the former bangalore wicket-keeper fielding there and punjab have lost two.
patel to hussey, 1 run, down the leg-side, flicked away to fine-leg for a single
patel to marsh, no run, slower one this time, beats marsh for pace, goes on the bounce to the wicket-keeper
mcdonald to marsh, 1 run, slower one, 109.5 km/hr, played away to third-man for a single
mcdonald to marsh, 1 run, quicker this time, outside the off-stump and driven to long-off
mcdonald to marsh, no run, slower one, driven to the leg-side for a single.
mcdonald to marsh, six runs, slapped, over the boundary and six! that was pitched right up to the bat, slower i think and marsh gave it the sink, goes over the bowler's head.
vettori to hussey, 2 runs, flicked away to the leg-side, to mid-wicket and they have come back for two
vettori to marsh, 1 run, outside the off-stump, driven to long-off for a single
mcdonald to miller, 1 run, outside edge to the third-man fielder for a single
mcdonald to hussey, 1 wide, down the leg-side, tries to nurdle it down fine-leg but misses, wide called
mcdonald to hussey, 1 run, on the off-stump, pitched right up to the bat and driven to long-off for a single.
vettori to hussey, no run, defended and wanted to go for a run, but sent back
vettori to hussey, 2 runs, driven through the leg-side, in fact just pushed and they run away for a couple
mcdonald to miller, 1 run, neatly played away to the third-man region, point fielder runs towards the ball and fields it.
vettori to hussey, no run, driven into the covers
vettori to miller, 1 wide, outside the leg-stump, no turn and it is an easy call for the umpire to make
vettori to hussey, 1 run, on the leg-stump and hussey dabs it to the leg-side to rush off for a quick single
vettori to miller, 1 run, and now miller drives it away for a single. phew, another quickly bowled over.
patel to miller, 1 leg bye, pitched outside the leg-stump, tries to flick it away, hits the pad and they are off for a single

patel to miller, no run, in line with the stumps, pushed back and harshal sticks his hand out to field it off his bowling. wanted to throw down the non-striker's stumps where hussey was backing up a little too far.
mcdonald to hussey, 1 run, outside the off-stump and played away to the point region for a single
mcdonald to miller, out, out, caught! slower outside the off-stump, wanted to go over extra-cover, missed getting the timing right, straight into the hands of the fielder, who times it well.
patel to hussey, 1 wide, down the leg-side and that is a wide.

patel to hussey, 2 runs, dropped! gayle has put hussey down, back-pedalling towards third-man. hussey tried to slash it away, gets the bottom of the bat and it soared up in the air. that should have been third-man's catch
vettori to mandeep singh, 1 run, flicked it away to the leg-side for a single
vettori to azhar mahmood, 1 run, played away to the off-side for a single
patel to mandeep singh, 1 run, round the wicket, pitched on the leg-stump, played away to square-leg for a single
patel to azhar mahmood, no run, jags back into the batsman, who defends it back to the bowler
patel to azhar mahmood, six runs, and this has been spanked away for a six! mahmood got it on the middle-stump and he swivelled around, connected and deposited it to the deep square-leg region.

khan to mandeep singh, 3 runs, tries to hit over the leg-side and gets a leading edge, it goes high, spoons up to the deep square-leg region where agarwal tries to dive and catch it. misses and they get three
khan to mandeep singh, 2 runs, goes for another wild heave, mishits and that has gone high in the air and...again in no man's land!

vinay kumar to mandeep singh, out, slower, pitched right up to the batsman and mandeep tries to go straight this time, does not get too much distance and that is easily caught by virat. finally he gets out, after the many attempts in the previous couple of overs.
kumar to gayle, no run, pitched slightly up and swinging away from gayle, missed and the keeper was up to the stumps to take it.
kumar to gayle, 1 wide, down the leg-side, tried to get some swing from there, left alone by gayle and it is a wide.
kumar to gayle, 1 run, defended stylishly, to mid-off for a single.
awana to kohli, four runs, outside the off-stump, moving slightly away and edged away to the third-man fence for a four!
kumar to gayle, no run, 127.3 km/hr, on the middle, defended by gayle.
kumar to gayle, four runs, spanked away by gayle and that goes on the bounce and over the cover fielder. a bit of room is all he needed.
kumar to gayle, four runs, back to bowling on his legs and it is played away to the fine-leg, where there is nobody and the chase from deep square-leg goes futile!
kumar to gayle, no run, in the air and almost taken! leading edge, towards marsh and he dives to his right at point and takes it on the bounce.
kumar to gayle, no run, slower one and gayle had to wait for its arrival, defended back to the bowler.
awana to tiwary, 1 run, 140.1 km/hr, on the middle stump yet again, and defended on the leg-side for a quick single
kumar to tiwary, no run, from around the wicket now, outside the off-stump, coming into the batsman and he shoulders arms.

awana to tiwary, out, caught off a top-edge and awana has his third! tiwary was almost walking down the pitch to go for the shot, the pace was too hot for him to handle, climbed on quickly on to him, gets a top-edge and that goes to the wicket-keeper for a simple catch.
chawla to gayle, no run, quicker on the middle stump and defended back to the bowler
chawla to gayle, 1 run, bowls outside the leg-stump, turns it away to the leg-side for a single. no turn for chawla so far.
chawla to de villiers, 1 run, outside the leg-stump to de villiers too, quick as well, flicked away to the leg-side for a single
chawla to gayle, no run, bowled from wide of the crease, angling away and gayle defends back to the bowler
harmeet singh to de villiers, 1 run, moves in the crease, towards the off-side, probably wanting to play to the leg-side, leading edge and gets a single
harmeet singh to gayle, 2 runs, leg-spinner, read well and played it to the deep square-leg for a couple of runs.
harmeet singh to gayle, 1 run, pitched right up to the bat and drilled to the long-off for a single.
harmeet singh to de villiers, 1 run, pitched right up yet again, and de villiers drives it well to long-off
harmeet singh to gayle, 2 runs, another leg-spinner and gayle has played it so gently to the deep square-leg fielder that one wouldn't have thought it would go for a couple!
chawla to gayle, six runs, finally, teed off! it was on the middle-stump and gayle smacked it over the bowler with a fine flourish towards the end
chawla to gayle, 1 run, back to pitching on the legs and gayle drives it to the leg-side for a single

harmeet singh to de villiers, no run, tapped on the off side and he is off for a quick one, gayle refused it and de villiers slipped! fortunately he had time to get back to the crease by the time the throw came in from point.
azhar mahmood to gayle, no run, slower one on the off-stump and gayle waits on it, then gently drives it to the cover fielder.
azhar mahmood to gayle, no run, slow yet again, drives to the cover fielder yet again
azhar mahmood to gayle, 1 run, a tad bit quicker this time, but pitched right up and he drives it to the long-off region for a single
harmeet singh to gayle, 2 runs, outside the off-stump and driven through the covers for a couple
harmeet singh to gayle, 1 run, pitched right up yet again and gayle cannot do much except to dig it away to the covers for a single
harmeet singh to de villiers, 1 run, leggie, gently guided away to the leg-side for a single
harmeet singh to gayle, 1 wide, quicker, outside the off-stump and that is as wide as it can get!
harmeet singh to gayle, 1 run, nudged away to the leg-side for a single
chawla to de villiers, no run, quicker and driven to the off-side.
chawla to de villiers, 1 run, pushed to the off-side for a single
kumar to de villiers, 1 wide, de villiers moves around in the crease, drifts down the leg-side and the batsman comes back into his stance, wide called.
kumar to gayle, six runs, this is the over many were waiting for, pitched right up, no swing, gayle winds up and sends it into the crowd yet again.
kumar to gayle, 1 wide, outside the off-stump, way outside in fact and that is a wide.
azhar mahmood to de villiers, no run, pitched right up to the bat again and ab gives himself room to go through the off-side but hits it back.
azhar mahmood to de villiers, 1 wide, down the leg-side and left alone, wide called. well-kept by saini but a single added
azhar mahmood to de villiers, 2 runs, goes for an expansive drive, gets an inside edge and that has gone to fine-leg for a couple
azhar mahmood to de villiers, no run, tries to play it to the leg-side but it hits the pad and pops back to the bowler
awana to gayle, 1 no ball, that was well-bowled, pitched right up but no-ball called.
chawla to mcdonald, 1 run, tucked away to the leg-side for a single
chawla to de villiers, no run, dabbed on the off-side and they wanted to for a single, de villiers sent him back, mcdonald had to dive back.
chawla to mcdonald, 1 run, tries to go for the drive, gets an inside edge and that goes to the deep square-leg for a single.
kulasekara to dravid, no run, outside the off-stump, not too much swing, stayed low. dravid tries to slash at it, misses the under-edge and it goes through on the bounce to the keeper.
kulasekara to dravid, no run, ooooh! that was jagging back into the batsman and an inside edge saves him. there was an lbw appeal
kulasekara to dravid, 1 run, the fine-leg was brought in, deep square-leg outside the circle and dravid plays it away to that fielder sent back. single takes dravid to 1.
bollinger to dravid, 1 wide, wide outside the off-stump, dravid struggled to try and get there and was still not able to and the wide was promptly called
bollinger to dravid, 1 run, outside the off-stump, angling across, tapped on the off-side and they are away. rahane, in his form, is eager to get to the striker's end.
bollinger to dravid, 1 run, flicks it to the fielder at deep square-leg for a single
kulasekara to dravid, four runs, slower one, but pitched right up to the bat and dravid spots it early, driven through the covers for four.
kulasekara to dravid, 2 runs, and he walks down to the bowler this time and has flicked it away to the leg-side for a couple of runs
bravo to rahane, 1 run, slower, outside the off-stump and dabbed it away to the third-man region for a single
bravo to dravid, no run, outside the off-stump and dravid was coming down the pitch, punches it to the cover region but goes straight to the fielder.
bravo to dravid, six runs, slower and that has been picked from outside the off-stump and deposited into the boundary region behind the bowler! what a shot!
ashwin to rahane, 1 run, pitched right up to the bat and driven to the leg-side for a run.
ashwin to rahane, out, tame, tame dismissal there, rahane in some good form, tries to go over mid-off but that was rather meekly hit, not powered, and it goes straight to the mid-off fielder.
ashwin to shah, no run, on the middle-stump, moving away to the off-stump, defended on the leg-side.
bollinger to dravid, no run, pitched right up to the bat, he digs it out and it bounces over the stump, dravid wanted a single but he is sent back.
bollinger to shah, no run, outside the off-stump, defended back to the bowler.
ashwin to shah, no run, pitched right up and shah plays it back to the bowler
jakati to shah, no run, down the pitch and he defends it back to the bowler
jakati to shah, 1 run, and now he walks to the off-side yet again, plays away to the leg-side for a single
ashwin to menaria, four runs, a tad quicker, and menaria tries to push it through the covers yet again and the outside edge goes through to the third-man region for a four

ashwin to menaria, 2 runs, dropped is it? slowed the ball, turn, bounce and takes the edge and goes to the wide second slip region. raina's on the first slip and there is no way he could have taken that
jadeja to menaria, 1 run, leg-side yet again and that is turned away for a single to deep square-leg
jadeja to shah, 2 runs, this time he plays it to the deep square-leg region but the player takes time to rush into the circle and they are able to get back for their second run easily.
ashwin to menaria, 1 run, pitching on middle, coming in and driven to the long-off region, it looked like it was pad first, there was an appeal but the umpire ruled it not out.
ashwin to shah, no run, dropped! driven, straight back at the bowler, catchable, and ashwin has put it down!
ashwin to shah, 1 run, dabbed to the leg-side and rushes off for a single.
jakati to shah, no run, well bowled, shah gave himself room by moving to the leg-side and he sends it to outside the off-stump, had no option but to leave it
jadeja to shah, 1 bye, outside the off-stump and shah again gave himself room, couldn't reach the ball, leaves it and dhoni misses it.
bravo to menaria, 1 run, from around the wicket, pitched on middle, hint of deviation away, gets an outside edge and a single to third-man
jadeja to shah, 5 wides, wide outside the off-stump, this time shah tried to move but did not, it was way too wide and dhoni missed it again!
jadeja to shah, no run, driven straight back, jadeja dives to his right and fields well
jadeja to shah, six runs, finally some sharp movement in the scorecard, goes to the leg-side and almost chips it over long-off for a six!
jadeja to shah, 1 run, no room given this time, and shah plays it to the leg-side for a single
jadeja to shah, 5 wides, and this time it is down the leg-side! deliberately missed by the batsman and the wicket-keeper was blinded, misses it yet again...that is his third miss today.
bollinger to menaria, 1 run, outside the off-stump and that is slashed away to the deep cover for a single
bollinger to shah, no run, outside the off-stump and that is dug out by shah and played to the point region for a single
bravo to menaria, no run, slower one, over-pitched, driven but unfortunately for the batsman, straight to the fielder.
bravo to menaria, no run, outside the off-stump, wider this time and he tries to repeat that stroke that he played off the first ball, misses it this time.
bravo to menaria, 1 run, slower outside the off-stump and that is driven away to the deep point region for a single. 13 from that over, following 22 and 9 in the last two overs.
kulasekara to shah, no run, slower one and shah wanted to go over the straight boundary, missed it because of the slower one.
kulasekara to shah, no run, outside the off-stump, missed by shah.
bollinger to shah, 1 run, fifty for shah! swivels towards the leg-side, pushes to the deep square-leg for a single
kulasekara to hodge, 2 runs, hits over extra-cover and they are able to take two on the midfield.
kulasekara to hodge, 1 run, driven to the covers and they are off for a single.
menaria to badrinath, no run, slow, drifts in and driven to the covers
menaria to badrinath, no run, on the stumps, tries to flick it away to mid-on, bowler fields...
binny to du plessis, no run, outside the off-stump and left alone by the batsman this time. keeper fumbles.
binny to du plessis, no run, tries to drive again and this time it beats the outside edge of the bat. three fours and three dots in the over.
singh to badrinath, 2 runs, outside edge and that gets to the fine third-man where the fielder has to run to his left and tidy up.
singh to badrinath, no run, on the off-stump, the batsman was moving towards the off and played back to mid-on
singh to du plessis, 1 run, outside the off-stump, slower one and that is dabbed away to the leg-side for a single
singh to badrinath, 1 run, again movement to the off-side from the batsman, and gently taps it away to the leg-side for a single
cooper to du plessis, 2 runs, slower yet again and played away gently to the leg-side, they come back for the second by the time the fielder gets to deep square-leg
singh to badrinath, 1 run, goes down the track, gets an outside edge, goes through to the third-man region for a single. misfielded by binny but they do not come back.
singh to du plessis, 1 run, goes down the track and punches it to mid-off for a single
hogg to badrinath, no run, oooh! gets the wrong 'un right, moves away, beats badri outside the off-stump.
hogg to badrinath, no run, this is a chinaman, turns a little, bounce and that is played away to the leg-side.
hogg to badrinath, no run, another chinaman and played away to the off-side. no run, five runs off the over after conceding a boundary off the first.
menaria to du plessis, no run, again outside the off-stump, goes straight on, driven to the covers for no run.
menaria to du plessis, six runs, goes down the pitch and lofts it over the extra-cover region for a six! the form continues!
menaria to badrinath, 1 run, saw him coming down the pitch, and delivered it slower, beat them in the air but gets a single.
hogg to du plessis, 1 run, wrong 'un and dabbed away for a single. there is a slip in place too.
trivedi to raina, 1 leg bye, an appeal for an lbw, but pitching outside the leg-stump and the batsmen cross over for a leg-bye.
hogg to du plessis, 1 run, tries to play it to the leg-side, closes the face of the bat, gets a leading edge.
hogg to raina, no run, comes down the track and defends it back to the bowler.
trivedi to du plessis, 1 run, flicked away to the leg-side for a single.
trivedi to raina, 1 run, opens the face of the bat, played away to the off side for a single. doing it easily here.
trivedi to du plessis, 1 run, tapped away to the off-side and he is away for another single
trivedi to raina, 1 run, on the off-stump, keeps a tad low and that is played away to the leg-side for a run. the bowler had a shy at the stumps but missed by a mile
cooper to raina, four runs, down the leg-side and that is flicked away to the fine-leg for a four, there was a fielder in place but he was a touch squarer.
cooper to du plessis, 1 run, nudged away to the leg-side for a single
trivedi to raina, no run, driven to the extra-cover fielder.
trivedi to raina, 1 run, slower ball and pitched right up to the bat and he punches it to the long-off fielder for a run.
trivedi to du plessis, 1 run, played away to the leg-side for a single
trivedi to raina, 1 run, goes for a heave, but does not get off the middle of the bat and gets only a single
trivedi to du plessis, 1 run, on the off-stump, keeps a little low, flicked away to the leg-side.
hogg to raina, 1 run, played away to the leg-side for another single.
hogg to du plessis, 1 run, pitched right up and driven to mid-wicket for a single
hogg to du plessis, no run, outside the off stump, played away to the off side for no run.
hogg to du plessis, 1 run, tried to defend it, gets a bit of a leading edge and that allows him a single.
trivedi to du plessis, 1 run, slower from trivedi, played out to the off-side and they get only a single.
trivedi to du plessis, six runs, goes down the track and that has actually gone away for a six! why i say that is because it barely looked like it had the power, but it did have the timing!
trivedi to du plessis, 1 run, played away to the leg-side for a single
singh to raina, 1 run, slower than a slower ball, 105.5 km/hr, and raina was down the track an hour early for his train. still manages to play it to the leg-side for a single
singh to du plessis, 2 runs, driven to the covers for a couple, mis-fielded by the fielder at extra-cover.
singh to du plessis, 1 wide, down the leg-side, after du plessis came down the track and missed it, wide called.

cooper to du plessis, out, gone, finally, edged and taken! he went down the pitch, tried to slam it away, gets an edge through to the wicket-keeper and there was a period of waiting as he looked at the umpires over whether the ball had carried, out says the ump.

cooper to raina, out, gone, caught by rahane at long-off...that was slapped high up in the air and for most part, it looked like that the ball was going to sail over but rahane takes an excellent catch at the edge of the fence!
cooper to bravo, 1 run, outside the off-stump, driven through the covers for a single.
cooper to dhoni, no run, slower one and dhoni almost chips it back to the bowler!

singh to bravo, 1 run, oooh! run-out chance missed and they get an overthrow! driven to the covers and well fielded by binny, who tries to throw the stumps down at the striker's end, bravo was way out, misses.
singh to dhoni, 1 run, played away to the covers and they are off for a single, this time the ball is collected well and the stumps are hit direct, but dhoni's in.
singh to bravo, 1 run, played away to the deep square-leg region for a single
cooper to bravo, 1 run, played away to leg-side, easy run taken
cooper to dhoni, no run, swing and miss! tried to send it into the next state but misses it as it was much slower.
binny to dhoni, 1 run, slower one and played away to the off side for a single
binny to bravo, 1 run, up and over, through the extra-cover region for only a single!
binny to dhoni, 1 run, slower yet again, driven to mid-off and dravid slides and they get a single.
