kumar to franklin, no run, driven straight to extra cover, no single on offer there
bhatt to tendulkar, 1 run, makes a bit of room and bhatt chases him, turned wide of square leg for a single
azhar mahmood to tendulkar, four runs, delicately done, used the pace of the ball, waited for that one to come on and opened the face at the last moment, beat third man to the boundary
chawla to tendulkar, no run, turning away and he punches that towards extra cover
chawla to franklin, 2 runs, bowled it flat on the off, gets across and scoops it down towards fine leg for a couple of runs
chawla to franklin, 1 run, drilled towards extra cover where david hussey got a hand to it and kept them down to just a single
bhatt to franklin, six runs, franklin sends that into the stands, round the wicket, lands on middle and off, franklin opens up and swings that miles over deep midwicket
hussey to franklin, 1 run, drops that into the off side for a single, franklin reaches his half-century, good steady innings
kumar to franklin, six runs, spotted the slower one, punjab are clueless, on middle and off, stood his ground and swung it away into the second tier behind deep square leg
chawla to franklin, 1 run, quicker through the air on middle, drives that through midwicket for a single
chawla to pollard, no run, quicker through the air, bowled flat on the off, drops that one into the off side
awana to harbhajan singh, no run, missed run-out, pushed towards extra cover, franklin's well out of his ground and david hussey misses
awana to perera, 1 wide, called a wide again, slips it really wide outside off, he leaves that one alone

awana to rayudu, 1 wide, a wide, this one is down the leg side, rayudu shuffled across there and tried to clip it fine, missed, close calls this over for wides, a couple were a touch harsh, like this one
awana to rayudu, 1 run, comes down the track and drives that towards deep extra cover for a single
awana to perera, 1 run, pitched on middle, drives it down towards deep midwicket, a single is all he'll manage
patel to mandeep singh, 1 run, softly steered down to third man

singh to mandeep singh, 1 run, missed chance for a run-out, that should have been gone, mandeep had pushed towards extra cover and set off, he had no chance of beating the throw, the fielder only had to lob the ball towards the non-striker's stumps, but he missed
singh to saini, no run, defended from the crease
singh to saini, 1 run,
patel to saini, no run,
singh to saini, 1 run, angling away, he runs that one down to third man for a single
pollard to saini, 1 run, chipped and it lands right in between midwicket and franklin running in from deep square leg, got across and flicked it but didn't get hold, was lucky in the end
ojha to saini, no run, angling in towards the off stump, pushed into the off side
ojha to marsh, 1 run, comes down the track and tickles it down behind square for a single
harbhajan singh to mandeep singh, 2 runs, leading edge again, on middle and leg, ends up getting more bat on it and it lands safely behind cover, a couple of runs
harbhajan singh to marsh, 1 run, knocks htat one down towards point and steals a quick single, a direct hit at the non-striker's end but marsh is comfortably in
harbhajan singh to marsh, 2 runs, comes down the track and punches that one through midwicket for a couple of runs
harbhajan singh to marsh, 1 run, wristily done, whipped through midwicket into the deep to keep strike
harbhajan singh to hussey, 1 run, quicker through the air, comes down the track and chips it on the bounce to deep midwicket
harbhajan singh to marsh, 1 run, chips that one towards long-off for a single
ojha to marsh, 2 wides, slips that one wide, down the leg side, and they get another run plus one more as karthik fumbles
ojha to azhar mahmood, out, strikes it straight to thisara at long-off this time, similar delivery but didn't time it as well, straight into the hands of thisara who hardly had to move
ojha to miller, no run, flicked that one straight to square leg, can't get it past him, a dot ball
patel to marsh, 1 run, flicked away towards deep square leg to keep the strike
pathan to dhawan, 1 run, goes back and punches a flat delivery, again down to long off
lee to dhawan, no run, whoa, that hardly got up, it looked like the slower one, it came off slowly at least, but it was clocked at 137 kph, pushed on the off side
pathan to dhawan, no run, driven to mid off
pathan to dhawan, 1 run, stays in the crease and softly drops it on the off side
pathan to sangakkara, four runs, now sanga leaves the crease, and lofts this one cleanly between bowler and mid on
pathan to sangakkara, 1 run,
narine to sangakkara, no run, offbreak turning away from the left-hander, pushed to point
narine to dhawan, no run, defended down the track
narine to dhawan, no run,
balaji to sangakkara, 1 run, lee has saved the boundary with a run to his left and a big dive at mid off, it was struck hard by sanga
balaji to sangakkara, no run, allows this one to come on and drops it towards cover
kallis to dhawan, no run, beats the outside edge with a slower one which moves away from the left-hander
balaji to patel, no run, pushed away towards point
balaji to patel, 1 run, opens the face and runs it behind point
balaji to patel, 2 runs, tumbling stop at square third man saves the four
bhatia to dhawan, 1 run, driven down to long off
bhatia to white, 2 runs, hit wide of long off for a couple
bhatia to dhawan, no run, defends a slower one that moves across him from leg

lee to dhawan, no run, he was gone by a mile had the throw hit, dhawan's innings has tapered off completely, pushed towards cover and took off right away, there was no run, dhawan had given up trying to regain his ground, but the throw was poor
bhatia to dhawan, no run, pushed to covers, almost at a run a ball now
bhatia to duminy, 1 run, turned in the region of midwicket, bhatia goes after it and fields
bhatia to jaggi, 1 run, gets bat around pad to work to deep square
lee to jaggi, 1 run, he was backing away again, this time lee bowls it slower at 121 kph, he reaches out to push in the air past cover
narine to jaggi, out, another one goes, he left the crease more in hope than anything else, it was the carrom ball, and he could only mishit it for long off to come in and settle underneath it
narine to duminy, no run, pushed down the track
balaji to ankit sharma, 1 run, drives an angled delivery to mid off and they go through for the run, he was gone easily had the throw hit at the bowler's end
narine to duminy, 2 runs, hit to deep midwicket
steyn to gambhir, no run, beats him first up, gambhir saw the line going across him and went for the drive, but the ball swung in appreciably to beat the inside edge
steyn to gambhir, no run, swings back in once again, this time he forces it back to the bowler
ankit sharma to mccullum, no run, defended on the off side
steyn to gambhir, 1 run, slashes hard and hits it on the bounce to third man
steyn to mccullum, no run, defended towards extra cover
steyn to bisla, no run, too good, bisla nods in acknowledgement towards steyn, good pace, and moves away sharply after drawing the batsman into a prod, for good measure, it bounces a lot too
pratap singh to gambhir, no run, too wide outside off, he reaches out and mishits it to cover off the toe end of the bat
pratap singh to gambhir, 1 wide, straight and down the leg side as he misses the nudge
pratap singh to gambhir, four runs, crashed through cover, he comes down the track, and uses the width to slam the ball past cover
pratap singh to gambhir, 1 run, pushed towards point for one
pratap singh to bisla, 1 run, pushed towards mid off
mishra to bisla, no run, comes out initially, mishra bowls it flatter, and he pushes with the turn to point
white to kallis, 1 run, would have been a big wide down leg had he not nudged it to fine leg
mishra to kallis, no run, defended on the off side
mishra to kallis, no run,
anand rajan to kallis, 1 leg bye, loud appeal for lbw, that was clearly missing leg though
anand rajan to tiwary, 2 runs, well done, just hangs his bat out and times the wide one past point, mishra puts in an awkward dive from third man to save the four
anand rajan to tiwary, 1 run, opens the face and runs another wide one to third man
ankit sharma to kallis, no run, makes some room and drives hard, but cannot beat point
ankit sharma to tiwary, no run, reaches out and pushes to point
mishra to kallis, 1 run, driven down to long off
mishra to tiwary, no run, reaches out and pushes to extra cover
pratap singh to kallis, 1 run,
steyn to kallis, four runs, first ball kallis makes room outside leg, and takes a step out, outside edge flies past the keeper as kallis has a go
steyn to das, 1 run, thick outside edge as the ball bounces, and flies to third man
pratap singh to das, 1 run, similar delivery, similar result, another single, this one was closer, midwicket got to the ball and threw towards the non-striker's stumps, but das was in the way
mishra to tiwary, 1 wide, wide outside off and turning further away
mishra to tiwary, four runs, down the track and chips it over the bowler for a boundary, safe shot
duminy to tiwary, 1 wide, atrocious wide a mile down the leg side from duminy, and that will do for kkr
pankaj singh to kohli, no run, that one nipped away and kept a little low, got to the keeper on the second bounce, kohli played that slightly away from his body and he missed
pankaj singh to kohli, 2 runs, angling in towards middle, drops that wide of midwicket, big yawning gap there and kohli calls for the second, and gets it
chandila to kohli, 1 run, ooh, that appeared to stop on him just a bit, kohli was committed to the punch, ended up just chipping it over the bowler's head for a single, landed safely

cooper to agarwal, 1 leg bye, nice footwork from cooper, dropped it down into the leg side, cooper and dilshan are involved in a race as bangalore attempt a single, cooper kicks the ball onto the stumps but dilshan has made it well in time
pankaj singh to dilshan, no run, on target on middle, dilshan pats it back down the pitch, the bowling's been good so far, they've given little away
pankaj singh to dilshan, no run, would have gone down the leg side, pankaj appeals, shuffled slightly to whip it over square leg but it would have gone down and struck him high as well
trivedi to agarwal, 1 run, opens the face does agarwal, running that one down to third man
trivedi to agarwal, 1 run, whips that one through midwicket for one more
trivedi to dilshan, no run, sees him coming down the track, holds that one back, dilshan tries to chop that one, misses
hogg to dilshan, 1 run, played away into the deep on the off side for a single
chandila to gayle, no run, round the wicket, gets a stride out and pushes that one down the pitch
hogg to dilshan, 5 wides, wide down the leg side, spins down the leg side and beats the keeper as well, five runs given away
chandila to dilshan, 1 run, walked across to that one and turns that behind square for a single
chandila to de villiers, no run, comes down the track as he held that back, tidy spell so far this, was dropped into the leg side
hogg to dilshan, 1 leg bye, appeal for lbw, turned in and struck him on the back pad as he tried to play it into the off side, would have probably gone down leg
cooper to de villiers, 1 run, chops that one into the off side, an easy single taken
trivedi to dilshan, 1 run, chopped that slower one towards cooper at point, quick single taken and it brings up dilshan's half-century, a steady innings
cooper to dilshan, no run, swings hard at that one, slower one and he tried to drag that over square leg, missed
cooper to dilshan, 2 runs, two more, dilshan runs to the danger end this time and makes it, through square leg for a couple of runs
cooper to de villiers, 1 leg bye, another slower one and he swung hard at that one, was too early into the shot, was hit on the shoulder, a single in the end
khan to dravid, 1 wide, well wide down the leg side and ab does a fine job, diving to his left to pluck that one
khan to dravid, four runs, uppish but he gets it past point, came down the track and got a thick outside edge as he tried to whip that, flew past point to the boundary
khan to rahane, no run, in the channel outside off stump and he shoulders arms to that one
khan to rahane, 1 wide, sliding down the leg side again, called a wide
vinay kumar to dravid, no run, came on well and he cracked it hard but struck it straight to extra cover, nicely hit but couldn't beat the in-field
vinay kumar to dravid, no run, angling in towards middle, moved across and pushed it firmly towards mid-on
khan to rahane, 1 run, pushes that one firmly down towards mid-on for a single
khan to dravid, 1 run, angling in towards middle, gets across and flicks that over square leg for a single

vinay kumar to rahane, 1 leg bye, appeal for lbw, played across the line and that struck him in line with middle and leg, the umpire appeared to raise his hand only half-way, perhaps trying to indicate it may have been going down leg, close call
vinay kumar to dravid, 2 runs, presses that one away for a couple of runs
vettori to rahane, no run, comes round the wicket, bowls it flat on the off stump, pushed towards cover
vettori to rahane, no run, angling in towards middle and leg, turned towards square leg

vinay kumar to rahane, four runs, mis-field at mid-on, vettori's the man, attacked the ball but over-ran it and let it through, it had enough on it to roll over the ropes, some of rajasthan's poor fielding form rubbing off on vettori there
appanna to rahane, no run, comes down the track to that flat delivery and knocks it down into the off side
appanna to shah, no run, sees him coming down and keeps that flat as well, owais defends it into the off side
appanna to shah, no run, owais had already made room, appanna kept it tight, got it to turn away sharply and beat owais as he tried to open the face
appanna to shah, 1 run, saw him coming down the track and he bowled it flat and wide, owais slapped it to long-off, just the single
vettori to dravid, no run, swings and misses, gives himself room and he misses, tries to have that over midwicket

appanna to dravid, out, appanna's picked up his best haul in t20 cricket, dravid gave himself too much room there and couldn't do much with it as it turned away from him, played loosely at that one and it took the top edge to land safely in the hands of extra cover
appanna to binny, no run, turns away to go past the outside edge
appanna to binny, no run, pushed away towards point
appanna to binny, 1 run, fires it quick on leg stump, tucked away into the leg side for a single
appanna to hodge, 1 run, angles in towards middle, pushed into the off side, a single to the score, appanna's done

patel to hodge, out, bangalore have one hand on this game, slower one from harshal and hodge goes after it, swings it hard but doesn't connect well, finds deep square lg in the deep where agarwal keeps his cool and clasps it firmly
vettori to cooper, no run, angling in towards middle, defended that into the off side

khan to cooper, out, lots of elevation but hardly any distance, had no option, tried to loft that over mid-off but ended up skying it and gifting vettori a comfortable catch, zaheer was happy to see him go, didn't like being struck for those boundaries
khan to binny, 2 runs, slower one outside off, opens the face at the last moment and picks up a couple wide of third man
khan to hogg, 1 run, makes room and zaheer chases him, dragged through square leg for a single
khan to binny, no run, slower one and he didn't pick that, went after it a touch too early, missed
patel to hogg, no run, slower one again, gets an under-edge as he tries to clear the infield on the off side
patel to hogg, out, the match ends with a wicket, makes room and drives that straight to extra cover, bangalore have won easily
peterson to mandeep singh, no run, pushed back to the bowler, quiet first over for punjab
singh to saini, four runs, that's a gift, the fine leg is up and he what does he do? bowl it down the leg side, easily whipped away over the fielder
singh to saini, no run, this one jagged back in sharply and he had to hop at the crease to fend it off
singh to saini, no run, the away movement teases him as he flashes and misses
singh to saini, 1 run, chases the movement again as he chops it down towards third man
singh to mandeep singh, 1 run, a bit too straight and he whips it away towards deep midwicket
mckay to mandeep singh, no run, punches it towards cover and he mandeep sets off and wisely heads back to his crease, fielder under-arms the throw to the stumps
mckay to mandeep singh, four runs, makes himself room and he gets a thick outside edge that flies past the keeper, a slip would have been handy there
mckay to mandeep singh, 2 runs, on the stumps and he whips it away wide of square leg for a couple
singh to saini, no run, makes a bit of room and chops it down to the off side
singh to mandeep singh, no run, bowls it straight and he can only punch it back to the bowler
singh to saini, no run,
patel to saini, 1 run, outside edge and he runs it down to third man, how about a slip?
patel to mandeep singh, no run,
patel to mandeep singh, four runs, he makes the mistake of giving himself width and he smashes that down to deep point
singh to mandeep singh, no run,

singh to mandeep singh, out, that's an off dismissal, rp saw the batsman give the charge and bowls it wide outside off, mandeep had to really stretch out to whack that and only managed a thick edge to the keeper
singh to saini, no run, keeps a touch low before reaching the keeper
patel to marsh, no run, pushed towards midwicket, shaping to be a good over
mckay to marsh, no run, steered towards pollard at point, they decide against the single
mckay to marsh, no run, punches it solidly back to the bowler
harbhajan singh to hussey, 1 wide, fires it wide down the leg side
harbhajan singh to hussey, 1 run, on middle and leg and flicks it down to deep midwicket
pollard to marsh, no run, false shot by marsh, the ball angles away and beats the bat as he tries to knock it to the off side
pollard to marsh, 1 run, gets beside the line and steers it to third man
pollard to marsh, 1 run, slower one down the leg side and he whips it down to deep square leg
pollard to hussey, no run, tucks him up for room and he chops it to the off side
harbhajan singh to hussey, 1 run, he flicks it down to backward square leg
pollard to hussey, no run, hussey exposed his stumps and the ball nipped back in and hits his back pad, only the bowler appealed but that wasn't hitting
franklin to hussey, 1 run, makes room and chips down the track and ends up steering it to deep point
franklin to marsh, no run,
franklin to marsh, 1 wide, slower ball down the leg side and marsh fails to punish that away

franklin to marsh, out, they've got the danger man, marsh stays at the crease and tries to loft it over the off side, the ball didn't come onto the bat and hence resulted in a top edge that swirled to harbhajan at cover
harbhajan singh to hussey, no run,
harbhajan singh to hussey, 1 run, bat-pad but it lobbed away to safety, no close fielders

harbhajan singh to hussey, 5 wides, harbhajan bowls it down the leg side and it beats the keeper but it appeared as if he was taking out his frustration on karthik, poor ball to be honest, he should be blaming himself
harbhajan singh to hussey, 2 runs, drives this one down to deep backward point
harbhajan singh to hussey, 1 wide, down the leg side and wide called
harbhajan singh to hussey, 1 run, outside off and pushed to backward point
singh to hussey, no run, this time he brings it closer to the off stump, hussey nearly slashes that to the keeper
singh to miller, 2 runs, punches it down to deep extra cover for a couple
pollard to miller, 1 run, quietly knocks it down to square leg for a single, punjab need a few big overs now
mckay to miller, no run, slower ball and the batsman makes room and chips down the track and chops it to the off side
patel to hussey, no run, very lucky to get away with that wide delivery, down the leg side and hussey followed it and failed to put it away, should have been called
patel to hussey, 1 run, slower one and he made room and mistimed it to the on side
kumar to franklin, 1 run, edgy start to the chase, ball keeps low and franklin gets a tame outside edge that races to third man
kumar to tendulkar, no run, wide outside the off stump and he chops it to the off side
kumar to franklin, no run, franklin quietly pushes it back to the bowler and praveen for no reason flings the ball back to the batsman, franklin was unmoved and praveen apologised immediately
bhatt to franklin, no run, flatter delivery and he forces it back to the bowler
kumar to franklin, 1 run, comes round the wicket and franklin flashes at it and gets an outside edge that flies away to third man
kumar to tendulkar, no run, gives him width and he punches it straight to cover
awana to franklin, 1 run, risky single! dropped towards cover and franklin set off, the fielder has a shy at the stumps but misses
awana to tendulkar, no run, makes a bit of room and slaps it to cover point
kumar to franklin, 1 run, knocked towards midwicket for a quick single
kumar to tendulkar, 1 run, a bit too straight and he eases it down to deep midwicket
awana to franklin, no run, awana tempts him with width and franklin swings and misses
chawla to tendulkar, 1 run,
azhar mahmood to tendulkar, 2 runs, gets beside the line and steers it down to third man, the fifty is up
azhar mahmood to tendulkar, 1 run, gets behind the line and drives down to mid-on

azhar mahmood to franklin, out, mahmood will love to see the replay of that! lovely delivery, the ball landed on middle and moved away late, it completely squared up franklin who got an outside edge to the keeper
azhar mahmood to sharma, no run, stays behind the line and pushes it back to the bowler
bhatt to sharma, no run, steers it down to point and tendulkar tells him to stay
bhatt to sharma, no run, the turn squares him up, outside edge rolls to point
azhar mahmood to sharma, no run, gets beside the line and steers it towards point
chawla to karthik, 1 run, drops it to the off side for a quick single
chawla to karthik, no run,
azhar mahmood to pollard, no run, nips this one back in sharply from outside off and catches pollard's pad, he was surprised by that
chawla to sharma, no run,
chawla to pollard, 2 wides, down the leg side and wide called, beats the keeper
chawla to sharma, 2 runs, stays back and whips it away down to deep midwicket and he hurries him for the second run
chawla to pollard, no run, fizzes off the pitch and beats the outside edge as he tries to steer it away
awana to sharma, 1 run,

awana to pollard, out, if pollard was batting at hamilton that would have gone for six, he made room and whip that away over the on side and he connected well but it was too flat, the ball went flying to mandeep at the edge of deep midwicket
awana to rayudu, 1 run, drops it with soft hands to the off side and sets off
bhatt to sharma, 1 leg bye, comes over the wicket to the right-hander, the ball rolls to the off side
bhatt to rayudu, 1 run, uses his feet and drills it down to long-off
bhatt to rayudu, 1 leg bye,
kumar to sharma, 1 wide, strays wide down the leg side, can't control the swing there
kumar to rayudu, 1 run, rayudu walks down the track and lofts him down to deep midwicket
kumar to rayudu, 2 runs, backs away and he flicks it down to fine leg, awana picks up
bhatt to rayudu, four runs, heads up! rayudu makes room and uses his feet and smacks that flat over the bowler's head, rocketed to the sight screen
bhatt to rayudu, 1 run, free hit: pounds a flat delivery down the track and bhatt boots it away
bhatt to rayudu, 2 runs, down the track and a big swing and he gets an inside edge that beats the keeper

awana to sharma, out, is this the turning point? sharma throws his head back in frustration and yells out, he made room to slap that over the off side but ended up slashing it straight to backward point, it dipped to mahmood
awana to rayudu, 2 runs, makes room and slaps it down to third man
malinga to sehwag, no run, this one came back into sehwag, instead of moving away, sehwag got behind the line and blocked
malinga to jayawardene, four runs, too straight from malinga, mahela stays in his crease this time and flicks the ball deftly into the gap on the backward square leg boundary
shukla to jayawardene, no run, now he steps out towards the bowler and tries to hit through cover, doesn't find the gap
singh to sehwag, 2 wides, a slower ball, but it's down leg side
harbhajan singh to sehwag, no run, sehwag wanted to hit that hard but ended up playing back to the bowler

harbhajan singh to sehwag, four runs, sehwag flat-bats the ball past the bowler towards long-off, rp singh runs to his right, gets to the ball, gets hand on it but can't prevent the boundary, shoddy effort
harbhajan singh to sehwag, 1 run, this time rp singh does stop the ball, it was hit straight to him by sehwag
peterson to jayawardene, no run, played towards point once again
harbhajan singh to sehwag, no run, sehwag moves back but can't force the ball past midwicket
harbhajan singh to sehwag, 1 run, driven from the crease through point
pollard to jayawardene, 1 run, the slower ball on middle stump, mahela uses the angle into him from over the wicket to glance towards fine leg
harbhajan singh to sehwag, 2 runs, sehwag makes room by moving towards leg and biffs the ball in the air towards long-off, rohit sharma runs to his right to field and almost makes a mess of it
peterson to pietersen, no run, driven back to the bowler
peterson to pietersen, no run, tries to nudge the ball on the leg side but it hits the pad
peterson to pietersen, no run, played back to the bowler from the crease again
shukla to pietersen, 1 wide, what happened there? that would have been a wide had the batsman been a left-hander. it was that far down leg.
peterson to pietersen, 1 run, kp backs away to dab the ball towards cover
harbhajan singh to pietersen, four runs, that's blitzed hard and straight, a hazard for the bowler and umpire. kp drove that with tremendous power, long-off had no chance
peterson to pietersen, no run,
peterson to pietersen, four runs, kp's edged this one past the keeper and to the third man boundary, he was looking to drive the ball. 20 runs off the run and peterson's figures have been destroyed
pathan to blizzard, no run, driven from the crease towards point, he can't afford too many more scoreless deliveries
pathan to sharma, six runs, that is some way to get going! rohit simply flicks the ball high over deep square leg, perfect balance and timing
pathan to sharma, four runs, in the air but over the leaping fielder at extra cover! rohit uses the width outside off to free his arms and drive with power
nadeem to tendulkar, no run, tendulkar comes out of his crease but ends up playing back to the bowler
nadeem to tendulkar, no run, tendulkar tries to drive on the off side but plays it to the bowler again
nadeem to tendulkar, no run, pushed back to the bowler
morkel to tendulkar, no run, tendulkar makes room and tries to hit on the off side, mis-times the drive to mid-on
pathan to rayudu, 1 run, punches it to mid-off for a single
pathan to karthik, four runs, that's a gift without a fine-leg fielder. karthik helps it on its way and gets his first boundary
pathan to karthik, 1 run, turns it to fine-leg for a single

morkel to rayudu, four runs, well he seems to be learning a few strokes from sachin tendulkar. rayudu makes room to a delivery pitched on the middle stump and smashes it past cover for a superb boundary
yadav to karthik, four runs, the combination of karthik and rayudu is difficult to bowl to. karthik walks into the line of the delivery and flicks it past midwicket for a boundary
agarkar to rayudu, no run, played on the leg side
agarkar to rayudu, no run, rayudu backs away to play on the off but agarkar follows him, he ends up pushing to cover
agarkar to rayudu, 1 wide, that's wide down leg side
nadeem to rayudu, 1 run, hit from the crease towards point
nadeem to karthik, no run, played back to the bowler
agarkar to pollard, no run, agarkar's bowled a crucial over for delhi, pollard defends the last ball to the bowler. mumbai needed 12 runs per over, this one has yielded only three.
nadeem to pollard, 2 runs, pollard backs away and slugs the ball through midwicket, not timed well
nadeem to pollard, 1 run, pollard backs away once again and hits towards long off, again not timed well
nadeem to rayudu, 1 run, rayudu jumps down the pitch and drives between midwicket and mid-on
nadeem to pollard, four runs, pollard backs away and boy has he timed this well. he's hit it flat and hard, the ball pitched just inside the long-off boundary
nadeem to pollard, no run, pollard backs away towards leg, nadeem fires it outside off and beats the bat. mumbai still haven't got as much as they need off this over
yadav to harbhajan singh, 1 wide, harbhajan throws his bat at a wide ball, but it is too far away to make contact
morkel to malinga, 1 run, played towards deep point
kulasekara to mandeep singh, 1 wide, that's wider than the previous one, kulasekara is getting the ball to move away from the right-hander, but he's starting too wide. mandeep chases again
kulasekara to marsh, 1 wide, a third wide, this time down leg side to the left-hander. kulasekara is not helping himself by bowling nine-ball overs in this heat.
morkel to marsh, four runs, this outfield is very quick, marsh simply opened his face and gently steered the ball, which then raced through backward point and gave third man no chance at all
ashwin to marsh, 2 runs, marsh closes his face too early while playing towards leg side, he gets a leading edge that goes past first slip ...turn right away for ashwin
ashwin to marsh, 1 run, played towards midwicket for a single
ashwin to mandeep singh, 1 wide, drifts down leg side this time from round the wicket
kulasekara to marsh, no run, played back to the bowler once again
ashwin to mandeep singh, no run, played back to the bowler
raina to mandeep singh, 1 run, played on the leg side for a single
jakati to mandeep singh, 1 run, lapped around the corner for a single, not very pretty
jakati to marsh, four runs, along the ground this time, marsh steps out and drills the ball past the bowler, jakati did not have time to stick his boot out, or maybe he decided not to
ashwin to azhar mahmood, no run, that's wide outside off and it beats the bat
bravo to mandeep singh, 1 run, mandeep tries to whip through square leg but mis-times towards midwicket instead
bravo to azhar mahmood, 1 wide, that's down leg side, too far away for mahmood to connect with his flick
jadeja to mandeep singh, 1 run, mandeep makes room and chips the ball towards long off
jadeja to azhar mahmood, 1 run, driven through cover for a single
bravo to azhar mahmood, 1 run, the slower ball on middle and leg, mahmood plays it towards square leg
ashwin to miller, 1 run, miller stays in his crease and forces the ball through midwicket
ashwin to miller, 1 run, miller steps out but ashwin angles the ball into him and slows the pace down, miller adjusts and pushes on the off side

morkel to chawla, no run, a comedy of errors! chawla pushed a slower ball limply towards cover and did not run. sharma ran a long way down from the non-striker's end before having to turn around. jakati misfielded at midwicket, he had time to recover and throw the ball to morkel but he made a mess of that as well
bravo to kumar, 1 run, another slower ball on off and middle stump, kumar dabs it on the off side and runs
kumar to du plessis, no run, kumar swings the ball into the right-hander, faf stays in his crease and drives to cover

kumar to du plessis, no run, that's a good call from the umpire, too many of them call it wide when the batsman moves towards the off side and then misses the ball down leg side. that was close to leg stump
kumar to du plessis, no run, faf tries to hit through the off side but mis-times on the leg
bipul sharma to du plessis, no run, bowled into the right-hander from very wide of the crease, faf doesn't make proper contact
bipul sharma to du plessis, no run, mis-timed back towards the bowler, he was looking to hit through cover
bipul sharma to du plessis, no run, nudged from the crease on the leg side

azhar mahmood to du plessis, out, caught and bowled! mahmood rolled his fingers over the ball and it arrived much slower than faf expected, he pushed at the ball too early and played it straight to mahmood, who took the catch at stomach height
azhar mahmood to raina, no run, raina also plays the ball back to mahmood, it nearly carried to the bowler
chawla to badrinath, 1 run, driven through the off side towards the fielder in the deep at cover
chawla to raina, no run, flatter ball on a straight line, raina goes back and plays it back to the bowler
chawla to saha, no run, played with soft hands close on the off side, saha wants one, raina sends him back. the umpires signal the first time-out.
awana to raina, no run, played from the crease towards cover
chawla to raina, 2 runs, raina backs away to try and hit on the off side, he gets an inside edge towards fine leg
awana to saha, 1 run, saha tries to force the ball through the off side but gets a bottom edge past his stumps towards the keeper's left, they run a single before saini can reach the ball
awana to saha, 1 run, driven to cover for a single
hussey to saha, 1 run, played towards midwicket for a single
hussey to dhoni, no run, played back to the bowler from the crease

bhatt to dhoni, out, dhoni doesn't know where the ball is and he's been run out! he bottom edged the ball into the ground near his feet and it bounced up behind him. dhoni thought the ball might have gone away from the pitch and took a few steps out of his crease. by the time he realised the ball was close, it was too late, the keeper saini moved quickly to his left, picked up the ball and broke the stumps
chawla to bravo, 1 wide, that's fired down leg side, a wide
azhar mahmood to bravo, 2 runs, bravo dabs the ball with soft hands towards midwicket, the fielder has to run in from the boundary and so the batsmen had time to complete two
vettori to mccullum, no run, pitched on the middle, turning slightly away and defended into the covers.
vettori to mccullum, no run, ooooh! that turned from vettori, who usually relies on variations than turn, beats outside the off-stump

khan to gambhir, four runs, dropped! if he had caught that, it would have been a ripper! gambhir got width again and went for a slash, the top-edge went to the left of harshal patel at third-man who ran and dived and caught it...before it popped out and went to the fence.
appanna to gambhir, 1 wide, pitched on middle but turns towards the leg-side...
appanna to gambhir, 1 wide, and another one down the leg-side.
appanna to mccullum, no run, quicker, pitched right up to the bat and mccullum just about manages to dig it out.
vinay kumar to gambhir, no run, goes down the track, gets an inside edge and narrowly misses the stumps. de villiers dives to his right and stops it.
vinay kumar to gambhir, no run, slower one, outside the off-stump and he tries to guide it to the third-man region, the ball turns away and beats the outside edge.
vinay kumar to gambhir, 1 run, goes towards his leg-stump, and dabs it away to the covers for a single.
dilshan to gambhir, 1 run, played away gently to the leg-side for a single.
vettori to mccullum, no run, pitched right up, driven back and there is a bit of a misfield but no harm done.
vettori to mccullum, four runs, and this time it is a shimmy down the track and smashed away behind the bowler!
vettori to mccullum, no run, pitched right up and he drives it back to the bowler
patel to mccullum, four runs, slower ball and he goes down the track and tries to hit it over the bowler, gets an inside edge and trickles through the fine, fine-leg for a four.
vettori to mccullum, four runs, pitched right up and that is swept hard, through the deep square-leg region for a four. mccullum's coming into his own...
vettori to kallis, 1 run, on the off-stump and driven through to long-off for a single.
appanna to kallis, 1 run, bowled up to the batsman, driven stylishly to long off for a run

appanna to gambhir, 2 runs, missed! run-out missed and that takes gambhir to his half-century. 13th in the ipl. taps it to the leg-side and took off, kallis responded but he was far away, the throw was wide of the keeper.
appanna to gambhir, six runs, and he has hit his second six of the game, lofted over mid-wicket for a six. used his feet to come down the track, gave himself room and deposits it over the boundary.
appanna to gambhir, no run, pitched right up on the off stump and drilled to the cover fielder.
dilshan to kallis, 1 run, on the middle stump, driven through to leg-side for a single
dilshan to gambhir, 1 run, uses his feet yet again and drills it through the covers for a single
dilshan to kallis, 1 run, nudged away to the leg-side for a single by kallis. he will keep doing this till he needs to hit out.
dilshan to kallis, 1 run, driven through to long-off for another single.
patel to gambhir, no run, outside the off-stump in the hope that it would be called a wide, but it was within the line. slower one as well.
patel to kallis, 1 run, goes down the track and plays it through the leg side. he is rotating the strike rather well.
khan to kallis, 1 run, slower and it almost did not arrive. kallis awaited for some time before late-dabbing it to third-man.
vettori to kallis, 1 run, pitched right up and driven to long-off to give it back to gambhir.
vettori to kallis, no run, driven away to the covers but fielded well.
patel to kallis, six runs, now that is off the middle, pitched right up to the bat and kallis teed off from the spot, it has gone to over where the control room is...it was a big six alright.
vinay kumar to gambhir, no run, pitched right up to the bat and he can only manage to dab it away to point for a single

khan to kallis, six runs, watch out people! too many slower balls here and kallis again needed to only wait for it and he has smashed it over the deep mid-wicket region for a six, into the crowds too.
khan to kallis, no run, pitched right up, and driven back to the bowler, fielded by the bowler on his follow-through.
vinay kumar to pathan, 1 run, pitched right up and pathan gave it his all, goes to long-off for a run.
pathan to dilshan, 1 run, goes down the track and looks to hit it over the bowler, inside edge to deep square leg for a single
pathan to gayle, no run, pitched right up to the batsman and gayle defends it back to the bowler.

pathan to dilshan, out, gone, caught! pathan has eked out the wicket of dilshan, a big, big one at that. dilshan went after pathan in the same manner he had tried to do off the first ball, does not get the middle and lobs it back to mid-off, who takes a good catch.
lee to gayle, no run, outside the off-stump, going away and gayle allows it to go through to the keeper.
lee to kohli, 1 run, outside the off-stump and slower, kohli went for the drive, but checked the stroke quickly and the outside edge gets him a single to third man.
lee to gayle, 1 wide, down the leg-side, quick one and gayle tried to feather it through to fine-leg, misses the edge and the umpire calls a wide.
lee to gayle, no run, outside the off-stump and change of pace yet again, gayle only taps it to the covers. six balls for his two so far.

pathan to gayle, 2 runs, dropped! no, you cannot do that if you want to win matches, you just cannot! gayle wanted to go over long-off, got a lot of height and there were four of them coming from everywhere to catch the ball, but fellow west indian narine drops a sitter.
lee to kohli, no run, slower on and defended back to the bowler.
lee to kohli, 1 run, opens the face of his bat and plays it away to the third-man region for a single
narine to kohli, no run, turns into the batsman, who flicks it away to square leg.
narine to kohli, no run, pitched right up and defended to the leg-side and still no run. a big shot coming...
kallis to gayle, no run, outside the off-stump and dabbed away to the off-side.
kallis to tiwary, 2 leg byes, loud appeal but it seemed to be pitching outside the leg-stump . slower one and there was a cry from kallis, but billy doctrove rules it not-out, and rightly so.
kallis to gayle, 1 run, slower, outside the leg-stump and that is tucked away for a single by gayle. moves on to 16 off 16.
pathan to gayle, no run, slower one, holds up on the surface and gayle goes down and defends.
pathan to gayle, no run, quicker one and it goes straight through, gayle was hurried into the stroke.
pathan to gayle, 1 run, moves down the track and then defends it lazily to the leg side for a single. the first of the over.
bhatia to gayle, no run, swings it away and misses. there was some sort of an appeal from the bowler for a caught-behind but none from the keeper.
bhatia to gayle, 1 run, slow yet again and defended on the off-side for a single.
bhatia to tiwary, no run, gives himself some room, wanted to go over it, but checks his stroke to that slower one.
bhatia to gayle, 1 run, slower yet again and driven to long-off. he is not attempting too many in anger, something that should not be too far away.
bhatia to tiwary, no run, slower one outside the off-stump, kept low and tiwary only plays it to the covers.
narine to gayle, 1 run, outside the off-stump after it turns away from gayle and he plays it away to the off-side.
lee to gayle, 1 run, and gayle continues to dab it away to the off-side for a single. he wasn't selected in the test squad for their tour of england. just saying.
lee to agarwal, 1 run, played away to the off side for a single.
narine to gayle, no run, ripper from narine! pitched outside the leg stump and turns away from the batsman, beats him!
narine to gayle, 1 run, pitched right up and gayle wanted to drive at it, and an inside edge gets a single.
lee to gayle, 1 run, pitched right up and quicker, gayle can only drive it to long-off. difficult ball to hit.
kallis to gayle, four runs, and suddenly a poor ball, and even poorer keeping. down the leg side, gets a feather, on the bounce to the keeper who misses it.
narine to gayle, 1 run, nudged away to the leg side for a single
narine to gayle, no run, well bowled yet again, turning away from the batsman, again fails to read him.
narine to gayle, 1 run, pitched right up and driven to long-off for a single.
shukla to gayle, no run, slower one and he swings it hard, misses and it hits him on the inside of the thigh.
shukla to gayle, no run, drilled to the cover fielder. he has 86 to his name.
shukla to gayle, out, edged and it has been given out, caught behind. outside the off-stump and gayle wanted to go for the drive, takes the edge and mccullum takes a good catch.
chavan to sehwag, 2 runs, pitched right up and sehwag was driving that through the covers, gets an inside-edge that goes through fine-leg for a brace. good over after that first-ball four.
pankaj singh to sehwag, no run, outside the off stump and he tries to carve it through the covers, to the fielder.

pankaj singh to jayawardene, out, shot in anger and caught! it was on the middle but this is a shot you would probably play towards the end of the innings. he tries to aggressively flick it over fine-leg, got too much under the ball and affords brad hogg at the deep square-leg a simple catch.

pankaj singh to sehwag, four runs, flicked through the mid-wicket region and that is gone for four! that is an awesome stroke and for the second time i will have to say that there wasn't too much wrong with the ball!
pankaj singh to taylor, no run, on the stumps, pitched right up and taylor defends it back to the bowler
pankaj singh to taylor, no run, defended a ball outside the off stump, back to the bowler and that ends a decent over from pankaj singh.
singh to sehwag, 1 leg bye, for the third time in a row, down the leg side, goes for an expansive lofted drive over the leg side but it was a tad too quick there.
singh to taylor, 1 run, adjusts his line this time, on the middle and nudged it to the leg side for a single.

singh to sehwag, 2 runs, goes for a big one, over the mid-off fielder but did not get it in the middle of the bat, it went high, not long but the fielder at mid-off owais shah, was way too far from the ball.
cooper to sehwag, no run, takes a little pace off the ball and sehwag looked set to give himself some room yet again, tries to drive it through the covers. a bit of mistiming and there is no run.
chavan to taylor, 1 run, pitched right up to the bat, but down the leg-side and taylor flicks it away to the leg-side for a single
chavan to sehwag, four runs, pitched right up and sehwag gives himself some room and drills it through the covers, goes for a four!
chavan to sehwag, 1 wide, outside the leg stump after sehwag moved around to confuse the bowler!
hogg to taylor, 1 run, outside the leg-stump and turning a little, tapped away to rotate the strike back.
singh to taylor, no run, defended back to the bowler and no run for taylor who has played 14 balls for six.
pankaj singh to sehwag, 1 run, bludgeoned straight back, to the right of the bowler and it needs a sliding save from the fielder at long-off to prevent it from going to the fence.
chavan to taylor, 2 runs, pitched right up and driven through to the wide long-off for a couple
chavan to taylor, 1 run, almost walking into the shot and driving it to the leg side for a single

chavan to sehwag, 1 run, he is toying with the bowling, almost looking bored, looking for a challenge, moves around in the crease and finally decides to play it to the mid-wicket fielder for a single.
chavan to taylor, 1 run, outside the off-stump, taylor moves to the off as well and punches it to the deep mid-wicket fielder as well for a single
hogg to taylor, 1 run, flicked away to the leg side for a single
pankaj singh to taylor, 1 run, outside the off stump, goes down the pitch, driven to the covers for a quick single. cooper fields but does not have a shy at the stumps.

pankaj singh to taylor, out, gone, bowled! he was playing many of these strokes, going outside the off-stump to flick it away to the leg side for a single or two, this time he failed to read the pace of the ball, missed the ball and is castled.
pankaj singh to ojha, 1 run, outside the off stump and plays it late to third-man for a single.
pankaj singh to nagar, no run, comes down the pitch and taps it away to the covers.
cooper to ojha, 1 run, slower, floated it up outside the off stump and the batsman waits for a while before he decides to dab it to the off side for a single

cooper to nagar, 1 leg bye, quicker this time and pitched right up to the bat, missed and there was an appeal for an lbw, not-out given. cooper tried to kick the ball to the stumps because the batsman was out of his crease, it missed the stumps and they go for an overthrow.
cooper to nagar, no run, very slow, rolled his fingers over it and beats the batsman
cooper to nagar, 1 leg bye, quicker down the leg side, does not get any timing on it and misses it. hits the pad and they are away for a single
singh to ojha, no run, slower one yet again and he goes for a big one, misses by a mile, and goes to the keeper on the bounce.
cooper to nagar, 1 wide, a wide this time, down the leg-side, the batsman isn't reading cooper too well and that is making it difficult for him to get any bat on it.
singh to pathan, four runs, on the middle stump and that has been swung away to the leg side for a four to get delhi to their 150. excellent last over for the home team!
pathan to dravid, 1 run, swinging into the batsman from outside the off stump and dravid punches it back to the bowler to get his scoring started.
pathan to rahane, four runs, poor ball, down the leg side and rahane has flicked away the first ball he faces to the fine-leg fence for a four.
pathan to rahane, 1 run, slight swing into the bat, he taps it gently to square leg for a single
pathan to dravid, no run, outside the off stump and defended in the covers to end the over
nadeem to rahane, no run, on the stumps, drifting in and defended back
nadeem to rahane, 1 run, off-stump, spinning away and keeps low, played away to the leg-side for a single
pathan to dravid, four runs, shot! four! this was not slower and dravid's class shows, driven through the covers

pathan to dravid, no run, another one outside the off stump and dravid is disappointed not to get it away through the covers for a four. it was much like the fourth ball of the over but misses his timing.
morkel to rahane, 1 run, pitched right up, outside the off stump and rahane plays it to mid-off, quick single taken
morkel to rahane, no run, outside the off-stump and rahane has a good, hard, long look at it and sees it through to the keeper.
yadav to dravid, 1 wide, outside the off-stump, swinging further away, 141.9 km/hr and wide called.
yadav to dravid, 1 run, outside the off-stump, dabs it away to point and rushes away for a single
morkel to rahane, no run, pitched right up to the batsman who digs it out back to the bowler.
morkel to rahane, 1 run, outside the off stump and played away to the third-man for a single
agarkar to rahane, no run, pitched right up and defended back by rahane
agarkar to dravid, no run, outside the off stump and played it back to the bowler.
agarkar to dravid, 1 run, gives himself some room, mistimes it a little, but goes to long-off for a single
agarkar to rahane, 1 run, allows the ball to come to him, and opens the face of the bat, to third-man, touch of jacques kallis in that stroke.
nadeem to dravid, no run, a bit of round arm action, coming into the batsman and he misses it.
nadeem to rahane, 2 runs, slower, keeps low and that is dabbed away to mid-wicket, but it was so gently hit that they came back for the second.

nadeem to rahane, four runs, lofted, almost like he was giving catching practice and that went through between the deep cover and long-off for a four. it was so well hit in the gap that it bisected both of them!
nadeem to rahane, no run, defended well into the covers and that calls for a time-out
nadeem to rahane, 1 run, on the stumps, does not move his feet too much and that is played away to the leg side for a single
nadeem to dravid, 1 run, well hit by dravid, in the gap through the covers but taylor does well to slide and prevent it from going to the fence. only a single.
agarkar to dravid, 1 run, on the off stump and dravid drives it to long-off for a single

agarkar to rahane, four runs, over extra-cover and four! the pressure was building ever so slightly and they needed a four to relieve it rahane gives himself room and hits it over the fielder within the circle
agarkar to rahane, 1 wide, bit of swing into the batsman, from the middle stump and that is left alone for the ump to call it a wide
pathan to rahane, 1 run, slower, outside the off stump and driven to long-off for a single
pathan to dravid, 1 run, slow ball, pitched right up and tries to hit it hard and to long-off
pathan to rahane, 1 run, pathan's continuing to pitch them up, and he has driven it to long-off for another run
yadav to dravid, 1 run, outside the off stump, slashed away to the third-man for a single
yadav to dravid, 1 run, tries to go over the top but mistimes the stroke and hits it to long-off on the bounce.
pathan to dravid, 1 wide, slower one and way down the leg-side, dravid wanted to have a swipe at it but he misses and it is a huge wide.
pathan to dravid, 1 run, shot over mid-wicket but he does not get too much power there. only a single
pathan to rahane, no run, big shout for a leg-before but seemed like it was going down the leg-side, given not-out.

nadeem to hodge, no run, turning away, played away to the off side and hodge wanted a quick single, sent back, the throw was a tad wide and the keeper uprooted some of the stumps there! third umpire called but just in.
agarkar to hodge, 1 run, on the middle, dabbed it gently to the off stump and they are away for a single
agarkar to rahane, 1 run, slower one on the middle stump, turns it to the leg side for a single

agarkar to rahane, four runs, unbelievable shot, just amazing! he was moving to outside the off-stump to flick it over fine-leg, it was bowled wide outside the off and opens the face of his bat, goes to the left of point, right of third man and slowly and steadily trickles over for a four!
morkel to rahane, four runs, edged and goes for a four! he tries to open the face of the bat to third-man, but the edge goes very fine and to the fence!
morkel to hodge, four runs, over extra-cover and that has been tonked away for a four! the required rate's dropping
morkel to hodge, 1 run, outside the off stump, hodge opens the face and guides it to third-man for a single.
yadav to hodge, four runs, pitched right up to the bat and hodge wanted to go straight, instead he gets an inside edge and it goes through mid-wicket for a four!
yadav to hodge, 1 run, slower one from yadav and that is played to extra cover for a single.
yadav to rahane, 1 run, slower from yadav, 110.7 km/hr, played away to third-man for a single.
morkel to rahane, no run, outside the off stump, pitched right up and he tries to go over the extra-cover, misses!
morkel to hodge, no run, down the leg-side, was it? and not called a wide! everyone is smiling there, including the batsman and the fielders...!
yadav to rahane, 2 runs, goes to the off-side and plays it to the deep square leg region for a couple. the fielder was up there and they had to come over from mid-wicket.
yadav to rahane, out, out, run-out! missed the bat, and they went for a bye, the wicket-keeper managed to throw the stumps down and shah is run-out...heart-break for rahane.
harbhajan singh to dhawan, no run, goes down the pitch and harbhajan fires it down the leg-side, hits his pad and rolls to the off side.
singh to patel, no run, outside the off stump and swings away, lot of bounce too! why did harbhajan bowl the first over again?
patel to patel, 2 runs, tries to work through the leg-side, gets a leading edge and it goes over the cover fielder. the ball is flying all over...
patel to patel, four runs, driven through the leg-side and that will go through square-leg for a four. bit of an inside edge i think
patel to patel, 1 run, and some verve from patel, goes down the track and tries to swing it away, gets an inside-edge to deep square-leg
patel to dhawan, no run, defended on the leg-side, wanted a single but went to the bowler.
patel to dhawan, 1 bye, outside the off-stump, swings after it passes the bat and dinesh karthik misses it, they get a bye.
singh to dhawan, no run, outside the off-stump, gets an outside edge and flies to point on the bounce
singh to dhawan, 1 run, pitched right up and driven to mid-off for a single
malinga to patel, 1 run, slower one, dabbed to the off side and they get a single more comfortably this time
malinga to dhawan, no run, slower one again, again into his stroke quite early and the end result is a drive straight back that hits the stumps at the non-striker's end.
singh to dhawan, 1 run, outside the off stump, opens the face of the bat and driven through to third-man for a single
singh to patel, no run, goes down the pitch and drives it to mid-on, it was well-timed but not too well-placed

singh to patel, out, chipped in the air and it is straight to munaf at mid-on! it did not seem like it was a very quick ball, checked his stroke but went to the fielder, munaf had to bend down low to take that.
singh to jaggi, 1 run, bounce and pace, hits jaggi on his gloves and he looked ruffled before dhawan calls him away for a single

singh to dhawan, no run, pitched right up, rasping drive through the off-side but straight to harbhajan at extra-cover, dhawan had taken too many steps down before realising that there was no single there. harbhajan throws it back to the striker's end and misses!
patel to jaggi, no run, pitched right up and driven back to the bowler.
harbhajan singh to dhawan, 2 runs, goes down the track, gets an inside edge for a couple of runs.
malinga to white, 1 wide, down the leg side, quick but wide and called by the umpire.
malinga to dhawan, 2 runs, slower, outside the off stump and driven to the wide mid-off region, a bit of a misfield by munaf patel and they get a second.
harbhajan singh to duminy, no run, slower from harbhajan, taps it to the off side, the non-striker wanted a single but refused by the batsman.
franklin to dhawan, four runs, swept away and that has gone away to the fence! it was a slower one and the bowler was treated like a spinner.
franklin to dhawan, 1 run, dabbed away to the point fielder, rohit sharma for a single.
harbhajan singh to dhawan, out, gone, stumped! this was going straight on, dhawan went down the pitch, missed it and it sneaked through, karthik collected well and easily removed the bails.
harbhajan singh to christian, four runs, outside the off stump, opens the face of the bat and that has gone through the slips for a four.
franklin to duminy, 1 run, outside the off-stump, driven to the point region for a single
peterson to ashish reddy, 1 run, outside the off stump and driven to long-off for a single
peterson to ashish reddy, six runs, goes down the pitch and has smacked it over the bowler's head for a six! some respite.
franklin to duminy, no run, slower one, right up to the batsman and that is fielded well to his left by the bowler.
franklin to ashish reddy, 1 run, outside the off stump, goes for a big heave and takes an outside edge to third-man for a single
patel to ashish reddy, out, slower one, goes for a big one, can only spoon it up high in the air and rohit sharma takes an excellent catch running back from point.
patel to steyn, no run, appeal for a caught behind and given not-out. there was some noise alright, but cannot be sure it was out, outside the off-stump and did it miss the edge?
patel to steyn, 1 run, run-out appeal! third umpire review and he is just in. tried to dab it to the off side and run away, but sharma was quick to it and hits it direct.
patel to duminy, four runs, outside the off-stump, gets an outside edge and goes fine to third-man for a four.
malinga to steyn, out, slower one and totally deceived by it, scoops it back to malinga. end of a torturous stay at the pitch.

malinga to pratap singh, out, slower yet again and the batsman has done exactly what steyn had done off the previous ball, except that it went higher in the air and was caught by rohit sharma at mid-off.
steyn to sharma, 1 wide, down the leg side and sharma fails to get a tickle there, wide called
steyn to sharma, no run, on the stumps, quick, 143.1 km/hr and driven to mid-off for nothing.
steyn to sharma, no run, pitched outside the off stump, swinging away and beating the batsman. no-one else is yawning. not the batsman for sure.
steyn to sharma, no run, what-an-over-so-far! this is fast, 140 km/hr, pitching on middle, going away like a banana skin!
steyn to sharma, no run, and this time it is outside the off stump, and swinging away yet again, rohit wanted to have a flash at it, but he missed it by a mile.
pratap singh to tendulkar, no run, outside the off-stump, bounces and jumps up, tendulkar lets it go.
pratap singh to tendulkar, 1 wide, way down the leg-side and that is the second run of the innings, incidentally, also the second wide.
pratap singh to tendulkar, no run, outside the off stump, left alone by the batsman. not too much swing for vp singh.
steyn to tendulkar, 1 run, on the middle stump and swinging away, gets an outside edge, and in the air! almost goes to the gully in place, to go with the two slips.
steyn to sharma, no run, outside the off stump and surprise, surprise, sharma has left that one alone.
steyn to sharma, no run, yes we do! outside the off-stump and sharma lets that go, this, to be fair was too far wide.
christian to tendulkar, no run, pitched right up, defended by tendulkar back to the bowler.
christian to tendulkar, 1 wide, down the leg side and swinging further away from the bat, wide called.
christian to tendulkar, no run, this is close to the stumps but left well by tendulkar
christian to sharma, no run, pitched outside, moving a little away and that is left alone by the batsman, finally he has begun to leave those outside the off stump.
pratap singh to sharma, 1 run, goes down the track and gets an outside edge to the third-man region for a single
pratap singh to karthik, no run, outside the off stump, karthik tries to drive through the line as if batting on 256. he isn't obviously, misses and it goes through to the wicket-keeper.
christian to sharma, 1 wide, down the leg side yet again and sharma does not get any bat on it, called a wide.
christian to sharma, 1 run, pitched right up and driven back past the bowler, a single only though
christian to sharma, 1 run, driven through the covers for a single
pratap singh to sharma, 1 run, inside edge, again survives, takes a single off that
pratap singh to karthik, no run, on the off-stump, tapped it away to the off side for no run
steyn to franklin, 1 wide, another wide, this was quick again but directionless. down the leg side.
mishra to franklin, no run, leggie, pitched probably on the leg stump and hits the pad, appeal but given not out.
ashish reddy to sharma, no run, outside the off stump, pitched right up, the batsman tried to glide it down but misses, the bowler appealed for a caught-behind, the batsman for a wide.
ashish reddy to sharma, four runs, opens the face of the bat to a rather wide ball outside the off-stump and it misses the point fielder and goes through to the fence for a four.
mishra to sharma, 1 run, pitched right up by mishra and that is driven to long-off for a single
mishra to sharma, no run, plonked his foot ahead, then waited for the ball before driving it straight
mishra to sharma, no run, pitched right up, driven to the bowler and that is the end of an over that costs six
steyn to sharma, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and sharma plays it down to the third-man region for a single. end of what has easily been one of the best spells in this format of the game.

duminy to sharma, out, gone, caught, thrown it away! goes down the track for some reason, when they needed only at less than five runs an over, and wants to go for the big one, misses hitting the middle of the bat and loops up a simple catch between mid-off and mid-on
christian to rayudu, no run, outside the off stump and rayadu leaves the ball alone. still enough in the pitch to test the batsmen.
christian to rayudu, no run, pitched right up, driven to mid-on but he is really close to the bat and they take no run
christian to rayudu, no run, on the middle stump, defended away to the off side.
mishra to rayudu, 1 run, pitched right up to the bat and that is tapped away to point for a single
mishra to rayudu, no run, pitched right up and driven back to the bowler.
ashish reddy to rayudu, 1 run, pitched right up to the batsman and he has been played through the covers for a single
ashish reddy to peterson, no run, slower ball, well bowled, outside the off stump and beats him for pace. off the back of the hand and the batsman was early in his shot.
mishra to rayudu, 2 runs, down the track and driven through the covers, almost goes to the fence, but jp duminy at long off, runs to wide to his left and saves it
mishra to rayudu, 1 run, played away to the off side and they have run away for a single
mishra to peterson, no run, on the stumps, defended back to the bowler.
mishra to peterson, 2 wides, quick ball, down the leg-side and it is a wide, they run off it as well. mishra's poor match continues.
ashish reddy to rayudu, 3 runs, slower one, pitched right up and that is driven through the covers. the field was up and it is hit through for three and that is the end of the game!
iqbal abdulla to du plessis, 2 runs, pitched right up, outside the off stump, driven through extra cover, to wide long-off and they come back for a couple
iqbal abdulla to hussey, 1 run, on the leg stump, slight turn, nurdled away to backward square-leg for a single
pathan to hussey, 1 wide, compensates by pitching right up, but down the leg side and it is a wide.
pathan to raina, no run, pitched right up to the bat and driven well, but straight to the cover fielder
pathan to hussey, no run, outside the off-stump and pitched right up, left alone by hussey.
lee to hussey, 2 runs, this time he pitches right up to the bat and hussey tries to drive it, gets the toe end of the bat, races away to the third-man fence, narine dives and saves the boundary
iqbal abdulla to raina, no run, on the leg side, quicker, driven towards mid-on and the bowler dives and fields
kallis to raina, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and it goes through to third-man for a single
kallis to raina, four runs, down the leg-side, slower, raina took advantage of the poor direction, neatly tucks it away to fine-leg for a four!
kallis to raina, 1 run, slapped away but on the bounce to the fielder at deep cover! went down the pitch to go over extra-cover.
bhatia to bravo, 1 run, driven over the top to long-off for a single
bhatia to bravo, 1 wide, stumping missed? he was jumping down the pitch, missed this down the leg side, probably blinded by the batsman mccullum fails to collect it. and it is also called a wide
kallis to raina, 1 run, on the stumps, opens the face and guides the ball through the third-man for a single
shukla to raina, 1 run, outside the leg-stump, slower and tapped away to deep square-leg for a single
shukla to dhoni, 2 runs, outside the off stump, bottom edge through to third-man for another couple of runs
kallis to raina, 1 run, gives himself room and drives to long-off for a single
lee to dhoni, four runs, shot, first four in 47 balls for chennai! a lot of width, pitched right up and placed away through the left of point for a four
lee to dhoni, 2 runs, swept away, yes you read it right, swept to mid-wicket for a couple of runs. it is the same bowler who bowled the first ball too, lee!
lee to dhoni, 1 run, slower one, dhoni was winding up, brought his bat down quickly to the leg side for a single
narine to dhoni, 1 run, tries to play it to the leg-side gets a leading edge to the covers for a single
lee to morkel, 2 runs, pitched right up to the batsman and morkel drills it back to the bowler, goes through and it is fielded well by tiwary, who runs from long-off to behind the bowler.
narine to morkel, 2 runs, outside the off stump, quicker and he tries to hit it over long-off, gets a couple of runs
ashwin to mccullum, no run, turn and bounce into the batsman and mccullum looks a bit baffled...
ashwin to mccullum, no run, defended it on the off side for nothing

ashwin to mccullum, out, gone, caught! ashwin had clearly got the better of mccullum in that over and he failed to read him on both the previous two deliveries, this time he comes down the track, it was the carrom-ball and he only manages to scoop it to mid-off.
ashwin to kallis, 1 wide, spinning and viciously at that, off-spinner down the leg-side though and it is called a wide
morkel to gambhir, 1 wide, down the leg side yet again, this time he misses it altogether, but it is a wide
morkel to gambhir, no run, third ball down the leg side and third time he misses a boundary, tries to flick it, gets some bat but dhoni dives on his right.
ashwin to gambhir, 1 run, pitched right up, turning slightly away, driven to wide mid-off for a single
ashwin to kallis, no run, defended on the leg side

morkel to gambhir, 1 wide, another wide, poor bowling from morkel, down the leg side and gambhir just needed to get some bat on it and it would have gone for four. gambhir missed but the umpire did not miss calling it a wide.
jakati to gambhir, 1 run, goes down the pitch, dabs it down to the leg side for a single
mahesh to gambhir, 1 run, tapped away to the off side and they are off for a quick single. doing it well so far.
mahesh to kallis, 1 wide, goes down the wicket, gave him the charge, bowled down the leg side, and that is the sixth wide of the innings
mahesh to gambhir, four runs, slashed away through point, four, not very well-controlled, eluding the point fielder du plessis, but he gets those four.
jadeja to gambhir, no run, outside the off stump, dabbed away to the off side.
jadeja to kallis, 1 run, outside the off stump, driven through the covers for a single.
jadeja to gambhir, 1 wide, outside the off stump, quicker one and it another wide.
jadeja to gambhir, 1 run, from outside the off-stump, drilled through deep mid-wicket for a single. doing this comfortably here kolkata.
bravo to kallis, 1 run, outside the off stump, slapped away to the deep cover fielder for a single. only four from the over.
jadeja to kallis, 1 run, goes down the leg stump to give himself room, drives to long-off for another run.
raina to kallis, no run, down the pitch but driven back to the bowler
raina to kallis, four runs, goes down the pitch yet again but this time he has lofted it through mid-wicket for a four
bravo to kallis, out, edged and caught! goes down the track, wanted to drive it, gets a bottom edge, dhoni takes it easily and kolkata have lost their second.
bravo to tiwary, 1 run, played away to the leg side for a single.
raina to tiwary, 1 run, flicked away to the leg-side, down to deep square-leg for a single. easy going.
morkel to pathan, 2 runs, on the middle, dabbed away gently to mid-on and they call each other for a second. the bowler had to run for this one and the batsmen are able to make it in time.
morkel to pathan, 1 run, flicks it away easily for a single, end of morkel's four overs.
ashwin to pathan, 1 run, quicker, carrom ball from ashwin, pathan sees it to his bat, taps it to the off side for a single
ashwin to gambhir, 1 leg bye, gambhir tries to mow it across the line and there was a huge appeal there for an lbw. it seemed to be going down the leg-side, or so i think anyway.
ashwin to das, four runs, shot, four, end of the match! that is an excellent shot under pressure from das and he has been dispatched to mid-wicket for a four.
pathan to dravid, no run, defends the first ball towards backward point
pathan to rahane, no run, angles it wide of off stump this time, pitching well outside off, rahane chases it and drives towards cover
yadav to rahane, 1 wide, this wasn't very good from umesh, well down the leg side
morkel to dravid, no run, defended to the off side by dravid
nadeem to rahane, 1 run, nadeem, delhi's unlikely bowling hero of the season, to bowl, first ball is pushed towards mid-off for a single
nadeem to dravid, 1 run, another single, towards cover this time
nadeem to rahane, 1 run, went in this one after pitching outside off, driving towards mid-off for a single
nadeem to dravid, 1 run, more orthodox from dravid, pushing it along the ground towards long-off for a single
morkel to rahane, no run, played off the backfoot towards point, that was slower from morkel, 128kph
negi to dravid, 1 run, negi flies to his right this time, getting his fingertips on a powerful drive, can't latch on but can't call that a drop
negi to rahane, no run,
negi to rahane, 1 run, whipped towards square leg for a single
nadeem to dravid, 1 run, driven with power towards long off
negi to dravid, 1 run, goes back, makes room and drives the ball hard to the fielder on the cover boundary

negi to watson, out, huge wicket this, watto is gone as he looks to swipe that towards his favourite midwicket region, that stayed lower than watson expected and sneaked under his bat, off stump is on the ground, negi is jumping for joy
negi to shah, no run, punches his first ball back towards the bowler
yadav to dravid, 1 run, whipped towards midwicket by dravid
negi to dravid, 1 run, backs away again and pushes this towards extra cover
negi to menaria, no run,
negi to menaria, no run, fired in quicker, and wider, menaria looks to chop that towards backward point but misses out
sehwag to goswami, no run, sehwag bowls, his first ball is defended
nadeem to goswami, 1 wide, way down the leg side, keeper has some work to do to collect that
nadeem to goswami, no run, defended from the crease towards mid-on
nadeem to dravid, 1 run, crunched towards mid-on for a quick single, the spinners getting through their overs quickly here
sehwag to goswami, four runs, at last a boundary for rajasthan, like most in this innings it is a conventional hit, skipping down the track and driving it towards extra cover
sehwag to goswami, 1 run,
sehwag to goswami, no run, blocked to the right of the bowler, goswami wants one but dravid doesn't
morkel to dravid, 1 run, not timed that one, lobs to the left of the bowler for a single
yadav to dravid, no run, backs away from leg and looks to thump that through the off side, doesn't connect and the ball goes through to the keeper

yadav to dravid, 2 runs, wide outside off, dravid carves it towards wide long-off, the ball was in the air for a long time, jaywardene has to race across from long-off to stop that from reaching the rope
yadav to dravid, 1 run, slashed towards cover by dravid
yadav to goswami, 1 run, a flat-batted hit towards long-off, pietersen is onto that quickly, keeping the batsmen to a single

chavan to jayawardene, out, big wicket, chavan strikes in the middle over, just the start a demoralised rajasthan wanted, jayawardene was caught on the crease as he looked to tuck that to the leg side, that looked to be heading for middle stump, the umpire didn't have to think twice, mahela gone for a duck
chavan to sehwag, no run, sehwag skips out first ball and thumps the ball towards extra cover, hits it too hard to have time for a single
pankaj singh to pietersen, no run, plenty of movement there for pankaj, seaming away after pitching outside off, pietersen is left searching for that outside off
chavan to pietersen, no run, pushed towards cover by kp
watson to pietersen, no run, the seamers getting a bit of help here, watson beats kp with a delivery that snaked away, kp flirts with it but misses
watson to pietersen, 1 run, gets a quick single towards mid-off
watson to pietersen, no run, pietersen is happy looking for the single here as sehwag is getting the boundaries, this time kp defends towards cover but can't get a run

singh to sehwag, four runs, four more for sehwag, that i should just keep that phrase copied, would save me some work, this time over mid-off, timing is off once more but has enough to clear the man in the ring, rajasthan need wickets fast
watson to pietersen, 1 run, pietersen once again is happy to take the single, pushes the ball to mid-off, and its over to sehwag
hogg to pietersen, 2 runs, kp punches it towards point and races through for two
pankaj singh to pietersen, no run, defended towards point this time by kp
pankaj singh to pietersen, 1 run, this time he gets a quick run, defended towards cover and zips through
hogg to pietersen, 2 runs, outside leg once more, tucked towards square leg for a quick couple
hogg to pietersen, 1 run, flatter and quicker, wide outside off, chopped towards deep point
watson to sehwag, 1 run, crunched towards long-off for one more
watson to taylor, no run, slanting in towards middle stump, defended from the crease by ross taylor
hogg to sehwag, 1 wide, way down the leg side, a free run there
hogg to taylor, 1 run, backs away and carves it towards backward point
hogg to sehwag, four runs, sehwag just makes a hint of room, and slaps that past backward point for four more, a very controlled hit that

chavan to nagar, four runs, nagar gets going with a chop towards deep point, races through for one in the hope of pinching a second, the pressure tells on the fielder who misfield and lets it through for a boundary
chavan to sehwag, 1 run, 'cathc it,' is the call as sehwag mishits it towards mid-off, lands safe
hogg to nagar, 1 run, turns it towards backward square leg for a single

hogg to sehwag, 2 leg byes, sehwag doesn't move his feet at al as he look to play that one that spins towards the stumps from outside leg, pushed to the off side for a single, there's an overthrow and sehwag is back on strike
hogg to nagar, 2 runs, nudged towards midwicket this time, seemed like it would be a leisurely single, instead the batsmen push for two, well run that

menaria to ojha, six runs, rajasthan's fortress? they have been hammered at the sawai man singh stadium today, it ends with a six over long-off completes, delhi show why they are the top of the table with a crushing victory
kumar to agarwal, no run, agarwal tries to close the face to play on the leg side, the ball swings away from him after pitching middle and the leading edge goes towards mid-off
harris to agarwal, no run, played from the crease on the off side
harris to kohli, 1 run, pushed towards wide mid-off for a single, the crowd are roaring because gayle has been given the strike for the first time today
kumar to gayle, 1 run, gayle stays put in his crease and steers the ball with the extravagant swing across him towards third man
kumar to kohli, no run, played from the crease tentatively towards point
harris to gayle, 1 run, straighter line and gayle plays the ball to square leg, he dropped his bat as he began to ground it and a direct hit at the non-striker's end would have dismissed gayle
harris to kohli, 1 run, pushed towards mid-off for a single
kumar to kohli, no run, kohli tries to flick one that angles into him but doesn't make proper contact
awana to kohli, 1 run, kohli drives to mid-off for a single
kumar to gayle, 1 run, gayle stays back and drives towards long-off, not timed well
kumar to kohli, 1 run, pushed towards cover point for a single
kumar to gayle, 1 run, praveen pitches leg and seams it towards off, gayle gets squared up as he pushes towards cover
kumar to kohli, 1 run, kohli moves back and mis-times the push towards mid-on
azhar mahmood to kohli, no run, played from the crease towards point
azhar mahmood to gayle, 2 runs, played firmly towards deep backward square where the fielder from fine leg runs to his right and slides to stop the ball with his legs

awana to gayle, 2 runs, gayle has been dropped by the substitute david miller. gayle was squared up and tried to flat-bat the ball, he ended up slicing it in the air towards wide mid-off, slightly beyond the circle. miller ran in from long off and to his right, he got to the ball well in time but let it go through his hands
awana to kohli, 1 run, kohl stands in his crease and hits the ball hard towards mid-off
nayar to kohli, 1 run, steered towards third man for a single
nayar to kohli, 1 run, kohli tries to play the big drive but edges to third man
hussey to gayle, no run, bowled flat and fast, gayle plays it back to the bowler
chawla to de villiers, four runs, ab unfurls the reverse hit and smacks the ball flat through backward point
hussey to de villiers, 1 run, ab reverse-hits the ball to cover
khan to mandeep singh, 2 wides, starts with a wide down the leg side, de villiers can't collect that as it slants away

khan to mandeep singh, four runs, this time he gets bat on it, and gets a boundary as well, not too convincing though, off the leading edge and loops over backward point, third man can't get across in time
vinay kumar to marsh, no run,
khan to mandeep singh, no run, defended back to the bowler
