vinay kumar to mandeep singh, 2 runs, edged and gayle at first slip gets the fingertips of one hand on it but can't catch the ball. mandeep had backed away to slash towards third man but hit the ball with the high part of the bat. gayle leaped and reached over his head but the ball was just too high
vinay kumar to mandeep singh, 1 run, played from the crease through point
mcdonald to mandeep singh, 1 run, played towards backward point where agarwal fields and throws at the batsman's end, he misses the stumps and concedes an overthrow
vettori to saini, 2 runs, played through backward point for two more
vettori to hussey, 1 run, pushed from the crease through cover
vettori to saini, 1 run, driven to long off for a single
appanna to saini, 1 run, the batsman drives at a ball skidding into him and places it through point
appanna to saini, 2 runs, saini steps out of his crease and hits the ball flat and in the air past the bowler, who dived to his left, the ball went to long off
appanna to saini, 1 run, driven to cover where zaheer fumbles and deflects the ball towards mid-off
vettori to hussey, no run, played towards cover
vettori to hussey, 1 run, played through wide mid-on for a single
vettori to saini, 2 runs, saini charges and and throws his bat at a ball outside off stump, mis-hitting it over point
vettori to hussey, no run, driven back to the bowler
appanna to hussey, six runs, long off has no chance this time, hussey's made room again and swung hard, smashing the ball far over the boundary
appanna to hussey, six runs, he's gone over long-off again, but has he hit it far enough? kohli's on the boundary and he lunges backwards but in vain, the ball clears him
appanna to hussey, no run, played towards point once again
khan to saini, 1 run, saini backs away but zaheer follows him, tapped towards midwicket
khan to hussey, 1 leg bye, awkwardly played towards the off side, kohli swoops on the ball from cover and scores a direct hit but saini is safe
vettori to hussey, no run, driven towards cover
khan to nayar, 1 run, played towards point for a quick single, hussey was desperate to get on strike

khan to dogra, out, a third run out, all hell is breaking loose! dogra dropped the ball close on the off side and ran for a non-existent single, nayar responded. kohli sprinted in from cover and picked up, he continued running towards the striker's end and once he got close enough he under-armed the ball into the stumps
vinay kumar to dogra, no run, dogra tries to hit through the off side but mis-hits it on the off side, will they run? no they don't. the crowd is right behind their team
vinay kumar to dogra, no run, dropped but a dot ball, dogra drives the ball hard and straight right back at the bowler, vinay can't take it, a tough chance, that was hit hard
ankit sharma to vijay, no run, pitched right up again, on the middle, driven to the off side for no run
ankit sharma to vijay, 1 run, this time on the middle stump, tapped to the leg side for a single
steyn to vijay, 2 runs, pitched outside the off stump, swinging away, driven through point and the third-man gives chase, restricts them to two. slow outfield
steyn to vijay, no run, on the middle, swinging away, almost squaring up vijay, leading edge to the off side
pratap singh to du plessis, 1 run, outside the off stump, jumps out, opens the bat face and it is tapped away to the third-man fielder
steyn to du plessis, 1 run, jumps out yet again, ball's outside the off stump, almost in the air back to the bowler, goes to mid-off

pratap singh to raina, four runs, flat-batted it over mid-on for a four. he was attempting this one before as well but the pace this time is much easier to play, almost played it early, but is able to get it over the fielder
christian to du plessis, 1 wide, way down the leg-side and patel has to dive to his left to stop it, does a good job but it is a wide.
jhunjhunwala to du plessis, 1 run, quicker this time, played away to the leg side for a single.
mishra to raina, 1 run, on the middle stump, wanted to heave it away, but gets a bit of an inside edge to deep square for a single
jhunjhunwala to raina, no run, on the middle stump, defended back to the bowler.
jhunjhunwala to raina, 1 run, opens the face of the ball, gives himself room, drives through the covers and they are off for a single.
ankit sharma to du plessis, 2 runs, on the legs, tapped to the mid-on region, the fielder was way back, the bowler ran after it but the two were able to complete a couple
ankit sharma to du plessis, 1 run, comes down the track yet again, flicked it away to the mid-wicket for a single this time
christian to du plessis, 1 run, on the middle stump, driven straight to mid-wicket and guess what? it is misfielded again!
ashish reddy to dhoni, (no ball) 1 run, slower one, outside the off stump, driven to the off side, but it is no-ball, free-hit coming up.
ashish reddy to du plessis, 1 run, flicked away to the leg side for a single
pratap singh to morkel, 1 run, tries to force it through the covers and gets an inside edge for a single.
jhunjhunwala to morkel, no run, outside the off, very wide, but not called a wide
jhunjhunwala to morkel, out, quicker one, straighter and he tries to heave it away, goes through and the stumps are on the ground!
christian to dhoni, 1 run, slower one, outside the off-stump, wanted to play it away aggressively, checks the stroke and drives to the mid-wicket region for a single
christian to jadeja, no run, right within the stumps, flicked away to mid-wicket and it is straight to the fielder.
ashish reddy to jadeja, out, gone, caught! was a slower one, tries to heave it away over mid-wicket, gets a top edge and that is easily caught by the dc captain.
christian to bravo, six runs, this is how you make them pay when they drop simple catches, smacked high up and that has cleared the deep mid-wicket fielder for a six!
hilfenhaus to dhawan, 3 runs, outside the off stump and driven through the covers, beats the in-field and bravo chases it down well, fields through a slide and saves a run
hilfenhaus to patel, no run, in-swinger, swinging a tad too much into the batsman, he tries to play it through the leg side, misses the bat and there is an lbw appeal. drifting down the leg side.
morkel to dhawan, four runs, goes through the covers for four, and it was actually through the fielder, driven, hits the edge of the practice wicket and jumps way over jadeja at point!
morkel to patel, out, inside edge and patel is bowled again, second game in a row! went down the pitch in an attempt to up the scoring, gets the edge and the leg-stump is grounded.
hilfenhaus to dhawan, 1 run, outside the off stump, guided through the point region for a single to third-man
hilfenhaus to white, 1 run, driven to the mid-on fielder and they go for a quick one
hilfenhaus to dhawan, 2 runs, on the legs, forced through the leg-side, the dive from square-leg does not help and they get a couple
hilfenhaus to dhawan, four runs, over-pitched and driven through extra-cover for a four!
morkel to white, 1 run, flicked away and the fielder at fine-leg lost it in the lights, he did not go for the catch and in the end, had to dive to stop what was going straight to him.
bravo to white, four runs, slower one and has been tonked over mid-on for four! it was pitched right up to the bat and white has deposited him to the fence.
bravo to white, 1 run, a bit of an in-dipper, on the off-stump, coming in to the bat, gets an inside edge and they get a single
bravo to dhawan, 1 run, flicked away to the deep square-leg fielder for a single
ashwin to white, no run, on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
ashwin to white, four runs, smoked over the bowler's head and it goes into the boundary on the bounce. an excellent shot!
jakati to dhawan, 1 run, tapped away to the left of the bowler, who runs to mid-on to field that one, restricts them to one.
ashwin to white, no run, huge appeal for a catch, he tried to play it away to the leg side, balloons up and dhoni holds it. not out given
ashwin to white, no run, from outside the off stump, flicked away to the leg side, to mid-wicket
ashwin to white, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and they are quickly off for a single
jakati to white, 2 runs, down the pitch, gets the inside edge to fine-leg, and they run rather well for a second. 50-run stand off only 39 balls, doing this well here.
ashwin to white, no run, driven back and fielded well by the bowler
ashwin to dhawan, no run, turn and a bit of a bounce, beats the outside edge of the bat
ashwin to white, 1 wide, a very poor ball, down the leg-side and white only looked at it go. dhoni did a good job getting in its way.
bravo to dhawan, no run, goes down the pitch, tries to whack it through the covers, but straight to the extra-cover fielder
bravo to white, 1 run, slower one, driven to the long-off for a single
raina to white, 1 run, on the middle, he walks across to the line of the ball and taps it away for a single to deep square-leg
morkel to white, 1 run, opens the face of the bat, taps it away to the third-man for a single
morkel to white, 1 run, widish again, this time pitched right up, driven to long-off for a single
hilfenhaus to christian, 1 run, flicked away to the leg side, deep square-leg fields and only a single results.
hilfenhaus to white, 1 run, opens the face of the bat, to the left of point and they are off for a single, third half-century for cameron white in four innings.
hilfenhaus to christian, no run, slower one, outside the off stump, was a bit of a surprise for the batsman, waited but failed to get any timing on it.
jadeja to white, no run, goes outside the leg stump and tries to force it through the off side, goes to the extra cover fielder
jadeja to white, no run, goes down the pitch but hits it back to the bowler.
jadeja to white, 1 run, steps away to the leg side, makes room, drives to long-off for a single
jadeja to christian, 1 run, drilled back and it results in another of those run-outs at the non-striker's end. misfield allows a single
jadeja to christian, 1 leg bye, swept away for a single, leg bye called
jadeja to white, six runs, over long-off this time, white has taken jadeja on and he has succeeded in getting the runs this over, that were required.
jadeja to white, no run, outside the off-stump, was giving himself room, but leaves it because it was too wide
bravo to white, 1 wide, outside the off-stump, way, way outside and that is called a wide. easy decision.
hilfenhaus to christian, four runs, flicked away for four. goes outside the off-stump and mows it to the fine-leg fence for a four. the fielder was up inside the circle.
hilfenhaus to christian, 1 run, edged and that goes to fine third-man, but the fielder is just where they need him to be, and there is only a single
hilfenhaus to ashish reddy, out, gone, caught! tried to slash it away, goes in the air, and murali vijay ran to his right and catches it well.
kumar to rahane, no run, swings into the right-hander from just outside off, rahane gets behind the line and defends
harris to watson, 1 run, played from the crease on the leg side
kumar to watson, 1 run, in-swinger, watson opens the face of the bat and plays it down to third-man for a single
kumar to dravid, 1 leg bye, slower one from pk, angling into the batsman, tries to flick it away and hits the pad, trudges away for a single.

kumar to dravid, four runs, this is a stunning start from rajasthan, difficult to reconcile with the fact that dravid's hitting so many to the fence, but all have been some superb cricket shots, driven through the covers for a four!
awana to watson, four runs, lofted over mid-on and for a four! that was pitched right up to the bat, watson hits it through the line, over the fielder who was up in the circle.
azhar mahmood to dravid, no run, on the off stump, pushed into the covers and goes to the fielder
azhar mahmood to dravid, no run, on the middle, pushes the batsman back and he defends it back into the off side
azhar mahmood to dravid, no run, on the middle stump and defended back to the bowler
azhar mahmood to dravid, no run, jagging back into the batsman, wanted to flick it away, missed, hits his thigh-pad and that is the end of the over
chawla to menaria, 1 run, quicker from chawla, pushed to the off side and they are off for a quick one
awana to menaria, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and it goes to the third-man region for a single
awana to menaria, no run, tries to flay it away, but the bounce beats him, goes through to the wicket-keeper
awana to menaria, no run, down the wicket and attempts to smack it, but the pace is too hot to handle for the left-hander
harris to menaria, 1 run, outside the off stump, opens the face of the bat to third-man for a single

harris to dravid, out, edged and caught at third-man! it was outside the off stump, dravid went for a drive through the covers, gets the outside edge and it flies to the third-man fence, they have lost their third
awana to hodge, 1 run, opens the face of the bat, guides him down to the third-man for a single
chawla to menaria, out, gone, caught! chawla has eked out his second wicket, pitched right up, tried to heave it away and can only hit it to deep mid-wicket for the fielder to take a simple catch
azhar mahmood to hodge, 1 run, outside the off stump, opens the face of the bat, played to third-man for a single
azhar mahmood to hodge, 1 run, opens the face of the bat, plays it to point and they are off for a single
kumar to hodge, 1 run, another one down the leg side, flicked away to fine-leg for a single, to bring up their 150
azhar mahmood to hodge, six runs, pitched right up to the bat and hodge has cleared the long-off fielder with much ease, smacked away for a six!
azhar mahmood to hodge, no run, slow ball, rather slow, went for a heave and missed judging the pace of the ball, goes through to the keeper
azhar mahmood to hodge, 1 run, driven through the covers for a single, good batting from the two overseas batsmen here
harris to hodge, four runs, pitched right up and that has been smacked back over the bowler for another four! 10 off three balls after 16 from the previous over.
watson to marsh, no run, round the wicket, pitches and looks like it will angle in, instead, it leaves the batsman and beats the outside edge.
watson to marsh, four runs, outside edge and poor effort from tait at third-man allows it to roll over for a four. the outside edge went on the bounce to hodge in the slips, misfielded there as well!
watson to marsh, 1 leg bye, the boundaries make watson change his line to outside the leg-stump, and a tickle there would have got him a four, misses and it goes to the keeper
watson to saini, no run, outside the off stump, dabbed to the point region but no run for the batsman
botha to marsh, 1 run, on the middle stump, pushed to the deep mid-wicket for a single
botha to marsh, 1 run, round the wicket, drifting into the batsman, guided through square-leg for a single
tait to hussey, four runs, squares him up, leading edge and that could have gone to hands in the covers! instead, it goes in the gap and tell you what, the edge has gone for four!
trivedi to hussey, four runs, for the third time, hussey has been squared up, this off the bowling of trivedi, gets the edge, goes through slips for four!
trivedi to marsh, 1 run, flicked away to the square-leg for a single
trivedi to marsh, no run, inswinging delivery, still a bit of deviation on this pitch, defends somewhat awkwardly, back to the bowler
botha to azhar mahmood, 1 wide, spin and bounce for botha, but down the leg side and mahmood lets it go
botha to azhar mahmood, no run, straighter one, quicker one, bounce and beats the outside edge, bit of an appeal
botha to marsh, out, goes down the pitch and has yorked himself here, bowled! botha pushed it quicker, marsh looked to be a tad fidgety because of the increasing required-rate and is bowled
botha to azhar mahmood, no run, goes down the leg side, mahmood tried to flick it, he missed it, and the keeper removed the bails quickly, but the umpire gives it not-out.
trivedi to gurkeerat singh, no run, on the middle, slower, pushed it into the covers but for nothing
trivedi to azhar mahmood, no run, slower outside the off stump, swinging away and misses the outside edge
botha to gurkeerat singh, no run, pitched right up to the batsman yet again, driven to mid-wicket
botha to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, this time drives it to rahane at mid-wicket, at the edge of the circle, went for a single, a direct hit at non-striker's end would have been interesting.
trivedi to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, opens the face of the bat, to the third-man for a single
trivedi to azhar mahmood, 1 run, slower ball, had mahmood checking his shot, defended on the off side and they get a quick single this time
trivedi to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, another one that seems to stop on the batsman, gets a leading edge over the bowler's head
tait to gurkeerat singh, 1 wide, down the leg side and quick, but misses the batsman and it is wide
tait to gurkeerat singh, no run, middle stump, tries to play it through the leg side, bit of swing, leading edge to the point fielder
tait to azhar mahmood, 1 run,
chavan to azhar mahmood, 1 run, driven and hits the non-striker and they still get a single
chavan to gurkeerat singh, 2 runs, swept it away for a couple of runs to fine-leg
chavan to azhar mahmood, no run, goes down the pitch and wanted to drive, but held back, hits the pad
chavan to azhar mahmood, 1 leg bye, goes outside the leg stump, wanted to flick it away, but again hits the pad.
binny to gurkeerat singh, no run, outside the off stump, swinging away and he went for a swing over mid-wicket, gets the toe end of the bat
binny to azhar mahmood, out, slower one and bowled, mahmood was going for another heave over the mid-wicket region but he misses it, too early into the stroke
trivedi to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, pitched right up to the batsman, driven to long-off for a single

trivedi to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, another hoick, another drop! two times in the same over and that is poor fielding. wanted to hoick it away, goes high in the air off the top edge and the keeper drops it!
botha to nayar, 1 run, goes down the pitch, hits it through mid-wicket for a single, the required rate is 20 an over!
tait to harris, 2 runs, slower one from tait, harris flicks it away to the deep square-leg region and they come back for the second
watson to kumar, 1 wide, down the leg side and it is left alone for a wide
patel to vijay, no run, defended on the off side
malinga to du plessis, 1 wide, the first ball is down leg side
malinga to vijay, 1 run, played towards midwicket from the crease
malinga to vijay, 1 run, this time he pushes towards mid-on and sprints, this time he does not stop and makes it
singh to vijay, no run, vijay tries to play the ball on the leg side but makes poor contact
singh to bravo, 1 leg bye, bravo tries to flick towards square leg but gets hit high on the thigh with one that shapes into him
harbhajan singh to bravo, no run, he beats bravo with one that slides across the right-hander and bounces
harbhajan singh to bravo, no run, defended on the leg side
harbhajan singh to bravo, 1 wide, this time the line is down leg side, bravo had moved across to try and glance
harbhajan singh to raina, 1 run, played from the crease towards midwicket
singh to raina, 1 wide, this one bounced alright, it bounced too high, that's a wide for height
singh to bravo, no run, bravo chases one that angles across him outside off stump, he tried to play a powerful square drive but missed
harbhajan singh to raina, 1 run, driven through cover for a single
harbhajan singh to bravo, no run, played from the crease towards midwicket
harbhajan singh to bravo, 1 run, bravo stays in his crease and flicks the ball past midwicket, who is the only fielder in the circle on the leg side
smith to raina, 1 run, pushed towards extra cover for a single

harbhajan singh to bravo, no run, karthik thinks bravo has edged the ball, but umpire asad rauf says not out. bravo chased a very wide ball outside off and tried to drive, he lost grip on the bat, which ended up near square leg. the bowler might have escaped with a wide there
harbhajan singh to bravo, 1 run, pushed towards the leg side
harbhajan singh to bravo, 1 run, played behind square for a single
harbhajan singh to raina, 1 wide, that's fired down leg side
smith to raina, 1 run, driven firmly towards long-off, where rp fields the ball on the bounce, odd choice of fielder for long off
smith to raina, 2 runs, driven through backward point, malinga is on the boundary and he runs to his right and attempts a pick up with one hand, he fumbles and allows the extra run

patel to bravo, four runs, slower ball outside off stump, bravo waits for it and drives just a bit later, placing the ball behind point, rp singh ran to his right from third man and dived but failed to prevent the four
patel to bravo, 1 run, pushed towards extra cover for a single
franklin to dhoni, 1 run, dhoni drives his first ball through cover
franklin to dhoni, 1 leg bye, dhoni tries to play towards square leg but misses, the ball goes on the off side off the thigh and bravo calls for the quick single
peterson to dhoni, 2 runs, dhoni steps out and hits the ball hard through midwicket
peterson to dhoni, 2 runs, quick, flat ball angling into middle stump, dhoni stays back and drives towards cover, harbhajan throws needlessly and concedes an overthrow
malinga to jadeja, 2 runs, another slower ball outside off stump, this time jadeja is able to square drive through point
hilfenhaus to sharma, no run, more movement away from rohit, who lets it go through to dhoni

ashwin to tendulkar, 2 runs, tendulkar backed away and slapped the ball hard and flat over the bowler's head, ashwin jumped up and got finger tips on it, an extremely difficult chance. vijay chases the ball and prevents the four
ashwin to tendulkar, four runs, no finger tips on this one, tendulkar backed away again and hit the ball flatter and harder past the bowler, ashwin didn't have time to try
ashwin to tendulkar, 1 run, goes back and dabs the ball behind point
bravo to sharma, 1 run, sharma hits the ball from the crease towards cover point and runs, the fielder is on the edge of the circle
bravo to tendulkar, four runs, tendulkar charges and lofts the ball high towards long-off, he's not timed it perfectly but still well enough for a one-bounce four
jakati to sharma, no run, rohit tries to play towards midwicket but gets an inside edge on to his shoe
ashwin to sharma, 1 wide, that's bowled very wide down leg side from round the wicket
ashwin to tendulkar, 1 run, goes back and across to nudge the ball through square leg
jadeja to sharma, 1 run, dabbed on the off side for an easy single
ashwin to sharma, no run, driven back to the bowler
jadeja to sharma, 1 run, angled into the right-hander from round the wicket, played from the crease towards mid-on
jadeja to rayudu, no run, rayudu reaches out for the ball outside off and mis-times it back to the bowler
khan to dhawan, 1 wide, carries down the leg side with the angle from over the stumps
mithun to harris, 1 wide, bowls it down the leg side
khan to dhawan, 1 run, manages to push one angled into him towards cover and they take the single
mithun to dhawan, 1 run, forces it towards extra cover for one
mithun to dhawan, four runs, dhawan gets some width, makes some room as well, and carves this one over point
mithun to harris, no run, forced away to extra cover
khan to harris, 1 run, swung to deep square leg for one
khan to dhawan, no run, he has been timing some drives pretty well, this one is hit straight to extra cover
parameswaran to harris, no run, mistimes an attempted push past extra cover to the fielder
muralitharan to harris, 1 run, pushed to mid-on for a single
syed mohammad to dhawan, 1 run, charges down the track, the angle takes it away from him, and he ends up mistiming it to long off
syed mohammad to dhawan, no run, he gets away with another dot ball, dhawan slams it straight to extra cover
muralitharan to dhawan, 1 run, pushed down to long off for a single
muralitharan to harris, no run, now comes the offbreak, big turn into harris, he tries to defend, a mile outside the line
muralitharan to dhawan, no run, cannot get the great man away, comes down the pitch but can only push it back to murali

syed mohammad to dhawan, out, gone! big mix-up, harris was halfway up the pitch before he finally decided to turn back, and in the end, had no chance as virat fired it to the bowler, dhawan had pushed towards cover and taken a few steps out, harris had come rushing, but virat swooped in on the ball, and harris was out comfortably
gayle to dhawan, no run, straight to virat at extra cover
syed mohammad to dhawan, 1 run, swings a flat delivery over square leg, on the bounce to deep square
syed mohammad to white, six runs, white cranks up, and picks this one from way outside off, and violently mows it high over deep midwicket
syed mohammad to white, 2 runs, pushed softly wide of deep midwicket for a comfortable two
syed mohammad to white, no run, pushed through on middle, defended to the bowler
syed mohammad to white, 2 runs, goes deep in the crease and again pushes wide of deep midwicket, mohammad is not happy with the fielders' effort
muralitharan to white, 2 runs, tries to pick it from outside off and lap it fine on the leg side, manages to get it past the keeper
muralitharan to white, 1 run,
mithun to dhawan, 1 run,
khan to dhawan, no run, dropped, zaheer was in the way of a crunching stroke from dhawan, got both hands as the rocket came at him, but it popped out
dhawan to gayle, 1 run, tosses it up, gayle only pushes it down to long off
dhawan to dilshan, four runs, more runs, dilshan fetches it from outside off now, and slams it over square leg
dhawan to dilshan, 1 run, swept from outside off again, but this time anand rajan puts in a sliding stop at deep square leg to save what would have been the third four
steyn to dilshan, no run, a shade late in getting the bat down to push to mid on, gayle trots out for the single, but it sent back late, just manages to make it back
pratap singh to dilshan, no run, smacks the drive straight to extra cover now
steyn to gayle, no run, gayle has had enough, he makes room and charges out to have a go at steyn, cannot connect with a 149 kph delivery
anand rajan to gayle, no run, gayle wants some runs, he opens up, stands with feet wide apart but finds square leg as he has a go
ashish reddy to dilshan, no run, looks to hit it through cover, gets an inside edge
ashish reddy to dilshan, no run, forced back to the bowler
ashish reddy to dilshan, four runs, dilshan ends the succession of dot balls with a loft over mid off, who cannot save the four with a slide
ashish reddy to dilshan, six runs, he is doing all the scoring at the moment, fetched from outside off, and swept for a flat six over deep square leg
ashish reddy to dilshan, 1 wide, he walked towards the line of the wide delivery but let it go in the end
mishra to gayle, six runs, the angle does not work for mishra, gayle brings up his 100th six in the ipl with a calm swing over deep square leg
mishra to dilshan, 1 run,
mishra to kohli, 1 run, drives hard down to long off
ashish reddy to kohli, no run, nearly edged it to the keeper as he looked to steer it to third man
mishra to pathan, 2 runs, hit hard through point for a couple
mishra to pathan, 2 runs,
anand rajan to dilshan, 1 wide, way too wide outside off stump
anand rajan to de villiers, no run, pushed to extra cover, white has found the stumps, this could be tight, dilshan seems to be in after backing up, just by a frame though when the bails come off
pratap singh to agarwal, 1 wide, goes after a wide one outside off, misses
ashish reddy to de villiers, four runs, now ab with the reverse hit to a medium-pacer, connects well and places it just wide of  backward point
ashish reddy to de villiers, 1 run,
ashish reddy to de villiers, 1 run, hit hard down to long off along the ground
lee to warner, no run, lee goes past warner's outside edge right away on this pitch with some green on it, it swung in from over the stumps, and then moved away to leave warner clueless
lee to warner, no run, warner can't connect at the moment, there is some nip off this pitch, this one appeared to move away slightly with the angle, and warner's drive away from the body was futile
narine to warner, 1 run, gets across to an offbreak and turns it to midwicket, top over from narine
sangwan to jayawardene, 1 run, shuffles across and turns it to fine leg
sangwan to jayawardene, no run, wristily turned to midwicket
kallis to taylor, no run, left alone outside off stump
kallis to taylor, no run, the old allrounder is on fire, now he beats taylor with one that straightens outside off stump, taylor pushes some way inside the line
kallis to taylor, no run, forced straight to gautam at extra cover
bhatia to jayawardene, four runs, lots of width first up, and mahela won't miss out, he puts it away through backward point
narine to jayawardene, four runs, mahela has managed to scoop it ultimately, he was outside off and on a knee well before the offbreak arrived, and scrambled to get it over the keeper's head
bhatia to taylor, 1 run, driven down to long off
bhatia to taylor, 1 run,
bhatia to pathan, 1 run, turns this one to deep square

sangwan to pathan, four runs, second fine drive from irfan, this time through extra cover, there is a man in the deep, but his dive cannot stop the ball, should have been stopped really, he had managed to get to the ball comfortably
bhatia to nagar, 1 run, follows him as he backs away down leg, he adjusts to turn it to deep square
lee to nagar, 1 run, swung to bhatia at midwicket for a single
lee to pathan, 2 runs, irfan tries to go over midwicket from outside off stump, mishits it but there is no one at deep midwicket, it is hauled back in by midwicket
narine to ojha, 5 wides, narine slips it down the leg side, too far
pathan to mccullum, 1 run, swing in to the right hander right away, but ending on leg, and turned behind square
pathan to gambhir, no run, swinging across the left-hander, around middle and off, defended safely

nadeem to mccullum, 1 run, dealing in arm balls at the moment, comes in to the right-hander, who punches it to mid off
morkel to gambhir, 3 runs, this time he hops and work it off the hip behind square leg

yadav to mccullum, no run, down the track, but mistimes the forcing stroke to extra cover
yadav to mccullum, no run, tries to repeat the stroke he played a couple of balls ago, but this time he misses and the ball gets lodged between right pad flap and leg

aaron to gambhir, 2 runs, that is dropped, that was a dolly and umesh has spilled it at third man, gautam sliced a bouncing delivery and it flew to umesh, who went at it with upright fingers, and it went through
yadav to kallis, no run, they are bowling quick this duo, kallis defends this one outside off tightly
aaron to mccullum, 1 run, slower one on leg at 124.4 kph, turned to deep midwicket
aaron to kallis, 1 run, run it down to third man to keep strike

nadeem to mccullum, 1 run, arm ball comes in sharply, pushed down to long off

pathan to kallis, no run, stays in the crease and punches another straightening delivery from off to mid off

yadav to kallis, 1 run,

morkel to das, no run, lets this one go outside off stump, it came back in sharply, but was still comfortably away from the stumps
aaron to pathan, no run, he was gone had the throw hit, taylor races in to pick up the ball from midwicket, non-striker had backed up too much, but taylor misses

pratap singh to mandeep singh, no run, makes room and tries to slam that over mid-off but fails to make any contact, parthiv appeals but that was far from the bat
pratap singh to mandeep singh, no run, stays back at the crease and chops it to cover
ashish reddy to mandeep singh, no run, tries to steer it with soft hands to the off side but the ball bounces and lobs behind the keeper

chawla to harris, 1 run, that was very tight run-out chance! harris punches the ball towards mid-off, and sets off for a single, reaches at a nice height for hussey who fires in the throw but misses, a dive from harris helps him make his ground, only by a frame though

hussey to white, out, hussey had turned this game around, he gets the danger man cameron white, this wasn't his usual flat and fast delivery, slight bit of air, white sees it and wants to send that out of the park, he gets too much height on it, it's in the air a long time, shaun marsh settled under it at deep midwicket, he didn't make a mistake, and punjab are on top now
hussey to sangakkara, no run, defended back towards the bowler

kumar to sangakkara, out, what a catch from saini, sangakkara is gone and chargers are imploding, once again their home stadium isn't proving a happy hunting ground, that one seamed after after pitching on off, does enough to get the outside edge, saina has a bit of ground to cover to take that, he throws out his left arm and it sticks
kumar to jhunjhunwala, no run, the inward movement causing more trouble for jhunjhunwala, between bat and pad as he looks to slice it towards cover

kumar to jhunjhunwala, 1 run, pushed towards extra cover for a single this time

khan to tendulkar, no run, vintage zaheer here, another one angles across tendulkar and he still has no answers, very close to the edge again

muralitharan to karthik, no run,

hilfenhaus to dravid, out, ugly shot from a usually beautiful stroke-player, tried to play across the line, gets a bit of a top edge and it goes to hussey at mid-off, dravid's gone!
morkel to watson, no run, good delivery, probably morkel's best of the innings so far, outside the off stump, makes the batsman reach out and then gets it to move away
morkel to watson, no run, and a over pitched one down the leg side yet again, but watson misses this and there is a bit of a stifled appeal, aborted and negated.
morkel to rahane, no run, pitched right up to the bat, driven to the covers but straight to a fielder

hilfenhaus to watson, out, out, caught at third-man? outside edge from watson, it flew to the third-man fielder, ashwin makes a lot of ground, dives and holds on, but they are checking now. yes, it is out, an excellent camera angle and there was no doubt about that one.
mahesh to rahane, no run, pitched right up to the bat, outside the off stump, driven back to the bowler
mahesh to rahane, 1 run, dropped! edged away by rahane, there was a slip waiting, raina, he dived a tad too late to his right and it hits his palms and rolls away
mahesh to binny, 1 wide, way down the leg side, the batsman barely moved his bat, called a wide
mahesh to binny, 1 wide, goes down the track, this is now sent across the off side, too far out there as well, and that is the second successive wide

hilfenhaus to binny, 2 runs, gives himself room yet again, gets an inside edge through to fine-leg, raina gives chase from slips and stops the boundary. the ball was slowing down on this heavy outfield
hilfenhaus to binny, 1 run, on the off stump, moves away and drives it through point for a single
hilfenhaus to rahane, 1 run, outside the off stump, opens the face of the bat, guides it to the third-man region for a single. that is the end of an excellent hilfenhaus spell.

mahesh to rahane, out, goes down the track and he is gone, caught! rahane was getting frustrated at his inability to score runs, he tried to take on mahesh, gets the toe end of the bat and it ballooned up for ashwin to take a simple catch at mid-on
mahesh to hodge, 1 wide, way outside the off stump and that is a very wide wide!
mahesh to binny, 1 run, on the off stump, taps to the off side for a single. and would you believe it, we have a strategic time-out.
bravo to binny, 1 run, this time it is on the middle stump, driven to mid-on and they are off for a single, the mid-on fielder throws the stumps down at the non-striker's end but the batsman is in

bravo to binny, six runs, down the track and bravo has been spanked over the long-off fence for a six! would you believe it, hilfy bowled four overs at this end for eight runs and bravo has done nothing of that kind
bravo to binny, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and through to third-man for a single, 18 off that over!
mahesh to botha, 1 run, on the middle, tapped away to mid-on for a single
mahesh to hodge, no run, on the off stump, does not bounce too much, defended back to the bowler
jadeja to hodge, 1 run, tapped away to the leg side for a quick single, a direct hit would have been the end of the batsman.
jadeja to botha, 1 run, pats it to the off side and they are off for a quick single here
bravo to hodge, 1 run, leading edge off the bat of hodge, flies to third-man for a single
bravo to botha, 1 run, nips back, botha was rooted to his crease and finally manages to get some bat there, goes to square-leg for a single
bravo to hodge, no run, goes down the track to get it away, bravo slows the pace down and hodge can only push it back to the bowler
bravo to hodge, 2 runs, pitched right up to the bat and that has been driven to wide long-off, where they are able to come back for the second
jadeja to botha, 1 run, some room given, pushed to the off side for a single
ashwin to botha, 1 run, pitched right up to bat, slightly slower, driven to deep mid-wicket for only a single
jadeja to menaria, no run, driven to the bowler, no run again
jadeja to hodge, four runs, swept away and finally a four, that gets them to their 100
ashwin to hodge, 2 runs, goes down the pitch, wanted to hit it over long-off, instead gets some sort of a leading edge and it has gone high in the air, dropped by srikanth!
ashwin to hodge, six runs, and this time he connects, it is a huge six, over mid-wicket, cruel, cruel life!
ashwin to yagnik, 1 run, pushed to the off side for a single
bravo to yagnik, 1 run, width again, outside the off stump, gets the outside edge to third-man, on the bounce for a single
bravo to menaria, 1 run, opens the face of the bat, guides it to third-man for a single
bravo to yagnik, four runs, outside edge and four! bravo's gone for 10, with the last ball giving the batsman some width yet again and that has flown away over the wicket-keeper for four!
watson to vijay, no run, on the middle stump, was shaping to flick it away to the leg side, the ball seamed away a tad, squares him up and he checks his shot
watson to vijay, out, gone, bowled! that was an excellent ball, pitched on the stumps and moving away, hits the top of the off stump and the bails are down!
pankaj singh to raina, no run, outside the off stump, had a chance to hit it in the gap but misses his timing, gets something of an inside edge into the ground
tait to hussey, 1 run, quick ball, outside the off stump, 148.2 km/hr, pitched right up, defended back to the off side and they are off for a single
tait to raina, 2 wides, another wide, but it was quick, down the leg-side, 150.4 km/hr, even beats the wicket-keeper with the late swing, they get two wides
watson to raina, four runs, outside the off stump and crashed through the off side for a four! there are two slips in place and that is leaving a lot of gap on the off side, punches it through covers
tait to hussey, no run, pitched right up to hussey, swinging into him and late, gets the bat down in time, played away to square-leg
tait to hussey, no run, outside the off stump and hussey leaves that again, but this is quite close to the stumps, misses it.
tait to raina, 1 run, pitched right up to the bat, raina pushes it into the covers and they are away for a single
pankaj singh to raina, no run, outside the off stump,pushed into the covers
pankaj singh to raina, no run, wanted to open the face of the bat, gets a bit of a leading edge, but goes down.

pankaj singh to raina, out, outside the off stump, gives himself room to play it over extra-cover, driven in the air and caught! that was an excellent catch, it went high in the air, as much as the catch dropped by srikanth had, but rahane did well to get under it and take it easily! what was raina doing playing that stroke, i do not know.
botha to hussey, 1 run, on the middle stump, pushed to the off side for a single
botha to bravo, no run, pushed to the leg side but this time it goes straight to the fielder
botha to hussey, no run, on the middle stump, slower, defended back to the bowler
pankaj singh to bravo, 1 run, outside the off stump and pushed to the deep cover for a single
botha to hussey, four runs, a very good shot, inside-out through the extra-cover region for four, not too much power but amazing placement
botha to hussey, 1 run, pitched right up to the batsman, who drives to long-off for a single
botha to bravo, no run, goes down the track, pitched right up, almost yorks himself, played to the off side
trivedi to bravo, no run, outside the off stump, a bit of movement, pushed to the off side by bravo
trivedi to dhoni, 1 wide, down the leg side, he was probably trying a quicker one but misdirected.
tait to jadeja, no run, pitched right up, really quick, 147.4 km/hr, jadeja dug it out to mid-off and wanted a single, dhoni did not and there was a bit of confusion there
botha to dhoni, no run, does not pitch it up to the bat this time, dhoni defends it back to the bowler
pankaj singh to jadeja, four runs, outside the off stump, pitched right up to the bat, and driven through the covers for four! good start for chennai after the break!

pankaj singh to jadeja, out, down the track and caught at long-off! he had hit a boundary off the first ball of the over but he went down the pitch for this one and tried to clear the long-off fence, mistimed it and its gone straight to the fielder on the boundary.
watson to morkel, 1 run, gives room, drilled away but straight to extra cover, dravid had the chance to run morkel out, but had one stump to aim at, misses.

tait to anirudha, 5 wides, down the leg side and it is four wides! tait has had an excellent first three overs but he has bowled three of the worst balls you would see at this stage. the super kings win easily in the end!
shakib al hasan to sharma, no run, slows it down, outside the off stump, defended to the off side
narine to gibbs, no run, outside the off stump, pitched right up, driven to mid-off
narine to gibbs, no run, outside the off stump, slight turn, pushed to the off side
kallis to gibbs, no run, goes down the track quickly, kallis sees it and pushes it wider of the off stump, gets an inside edge, on the bounce to the wicket-keeper
bhatia to gibbs, 1 run, outside the off stump, bit of deviation away from the bat, pushed to the off side
kallis to sharma, 1 run, on the off stump, moves to the off side and flicked away to the deep square-leg for a single
kallis to sharma, four runs, gives room and drills it  back to the bowler, almost through his hands, it was so quick that the hands came in very late, gone for four!
kallis to sharma, 1 run, slower ball, outside the off stump, driven to long-off, almost a check-drive and moves on to 53
kallis to gibbs, 1 run, slower, pitched on the middle and up to the bat, driven through the covers for a single
bhatia to gibbs, six runs, gives room and bang, over the bowler's head for a six! bhatia slowed the pace down, gibbs waited for it and then slammed it for the maximum
shakib al hasan to sharma, 2 runs, they are giving themselves room, he does that again and it turns away, hit over extra-cover for a couple
narine to gibbs, no run, outside the off, turning away, bounce and left alone!
narine to gibbs, no run, quicker and turns as an offie as well, beats gibbs
bhatia to sharma, four runs, down the track, drilled through the extra-cover region for a four, that sped away, gorgeous stroke
narine to gibbs, 1 run, slapped away by gibbs to the deep cover, only a single
narine to sharma, four runs, swept away this time, through fine-leg for four, the fielder was inside the circle
narine to sharma, 1 run, another one outside the off stump, quickly turning in, pushes to the off side for a single
lee to sharma, four runs, four more, flicked over the mid-wicket fielder for four, 99 to rohit sharma, this has been an excellent knock on a slow track
lee to sharma, 1 wide, down the leg side and that is a wide, thank goodness he did not get any bat on that from kolkata's perspective, that would have been another four!
narine to gibbs, 1 run, swept away to the deep square-leg for a single
narine to sharma, 1 run, tries to hit it over extra-cover, slashes it, over the extra-cover region for a single
narine to gibbs, four runs, uses his feet and hits it over extra-cover for a four!
lee to gibbs, no run, outside the off stump, wanted to hit it over the off side, misses, a good over from lee
patel to bisla, 1 run, on the off stump, deviating away, pushed away to the off side for a quickly taken run
patel to gambhir, out, gone, bowled, middle peg is on the floor! it was slower, he was giving himself room and misses, and the skipper is on his way back!
patel to kallis, no run, outside the off stump, thought it would angle into the bat, moves away from him and misses the outside edge
ojha to kallis, 1 run, quicker ball, on the off side, driven down for a single
patel to kallis, no run, on the middle stump, pushed back to the bowler, not too much pace on that one
malinga to tiwary, no run, slower ball outside the off stump, tiwary was sucked into trying to hit it over the extra-cover, misses, through to the keeper

malinga to tiwary, 1 leg bye, slower one, wanted to go over mid-wicket, it has turned and hit the back pad, huge appeal from malinga and the umpire says not-out. probably going down..but wow that turned!
patel to kallis, 1 run, on the off stump, pitched right up to the bat, driven to mid-off for a single
ojha to kallis, 1 run, turns away, played to push it to point for a single
ojha to kallis, 1 run, on the off stump, turning away from the bat, tapped to the off side
ojha to tiwary, 2 runs, goes down the track and chips it over mid-wicket, square-leg comes over and gets a couple
ojha to tiwary, four runs, and he goes down the pitch yet again and this time he is able to clear the mid-on fielder for a four, that is his first four.
harbhajan singh to kallis, six runs, shot, swept away, six! this time he did not move too much and smashed it over deep square-leg for a six, just over the fielder there and some move on.
pollard to tiwary, 1 run, pitched right up to the bat, pushed firmly to the wide long-off region for a single
pollard to kallis, 1 run, outside the off stump, opens the face of the bat and pushes to the covers for a single
smith to tiwary, 1 run, on the middle stump, angling in, he tried to flick it away, gets a top edge and it loops up to square-leg, but there is no fielder there
pollard to tiwary, four runs, cross-batted mow from tiwary and that beats the mid-wicket fielder, it was a slower ball and read well!
pollard to tiwary, four runs, inside edge and goes for a four to fine-leg, slower ball, probably a knuckle ball, the keeper was up and he could not get down in time
pollard to tiwary, no run, moves away, tries to play it through the covers, but is only able to push it to backward point
smith to pathan, 1 run, outside the off stump, wanted to hit it over long-off for a single
smith to pathan, 1 run, played away to the leg side for a single
ojha to kallis, six runs, down the pitch and smack! six over the bowler's head, that is not such a good welcome!
ojha to kallis, no run, again, almost down the track, before realising he was going to miss it, and he pushes his foot back
ojha to kallis, 1 run, driven to the off side, quick single taken and that is 15 runs in that over, movement in the right direction
pollard to pathan, 1 wide, slower one, down the leg side, does not get any bat on it after walking across, wide called
pollard to kallis, no run, slower one, pitched right up to the batsman, goes for a drive and gets it in the middle too, but it hits the stumps at the non-striker's end!
malinga to pathan, no run, another one pitched right up to the bat, he is just not able to get them away, straight to mid-wicket
patel to kallis, 1 run, on the middle stump, driven to the long-off for a single
smith to das, four runs, outside the off stump, opens the face of the bat and edged away to the third-man for four!
hilfenhaus to warner, no run, outside the off stump, moving into the batsman, defended to the covers, a confident-looking push that was
hilfenhaus to warner, 1 run, another one swinging in, but this time from the middle stump, inside-edge to square-leg for a single
morkel to warner, four runs, outside the off stump and that is driven through the covers for a four, continues from where he left off last game!
morkel to warner, 3 runs, pitched right up to the bat, driven over extra-cover, in the air and they are able to come back for the third.
hilfenhaus to jayawardene, no run, outside the off stump, pitched right up, swinging away, driven to the covers
hilfenhaus to jayawardene, 2 runs, outside the off stump, opens the face of the bat and guides it through the point region for a couple of runs, timed well
morkel to ojha, no run, on the off stump, pushed to the off side but to the fielder
morkel to ojha, 1 run, on the off stump, not too quick, pushed to the off side for a single

morkel to jayawardene, no run, this was pitched outside the off stump, up to the bat as well, tempting him to drive it through the covers, but goes to the fielder, dives and manages to field before they can think of a single
hilfenhaus to ojha, 1 run, outside the off stump, pushed to the off side for a single
morkel to nagar, 1 run, on the middle stump, 134.8 km/hr, played away to the square-leg for a single
bravo to nagar, no run, slower one, pitched right up to the bat, defended back to the bowler
bravo to venugopal rao, 1 run, jagging back into the batsman from outside the off stump, does well to defend it to the off side and take a quick single

bravo to venugopal rao, 1 run, missed! run-out chance missed, it had fallen next to the batsman and he wanted a single, bravo ran to the on-side and picked it up, threw it back to the stumps, the batsman was way out of his crease and given up.
jakati to venugopal rao, 1 run, defended on the off side and they go for a quick single, bravo tries another direct hit at the non-striker's end, misses
jakati to venugopal rao, 1 run, on the off stump, tapped away to the off side for a single, five of them this over
jadeja to venugopal rao, 1 run, outside the off stump, tapped it away to the off side
jadeja to nagar, 1 run, angling into the batsman, driven the over pitched ball to long-off
ashwin to venugopal rao, no run, pitched right up to the bat, driven to the leg side
ashwin to nagar, 1 run, outside the off stump and he late-guides it to the off side, single taken
jakati to nagar, 1 run, pitched right up to the batsman, driven to long-off for a single
ashwin to venugopal rao, 1 run, outside the off stump, guided away to the off side for a single
ashwin to nagar, 1 run, on the off stump, turning into the bat, played away to the square-leg region for a single
ashwin to venugopal rao, 1 run, goes down the track and smacks him, it went high in the air and for a moment it looked it was going away, but that is a long part of the ground
ashwin to nagar, no run, tries to work it to the leg side, leading edge, almost carries to the bowler
jakati to nagar, 1 run, pitched right up to the bat, opens the face of the bat, guided to the off side for a single
jakati to venugopal rao, no run, outside the off stump, defended on the off side and that ends a good over for delhi
ashwin to nagar, 1 run, outside the off stump, slower, gets a leading edge to the off side and they get a single
ashwin to pathan, 1 run, middle stump line again, he is getting some turn, played away to the leg side for a single
ashwin to nagar, no run, quicker this time outside the off stump, tapped to the off side
bravo to pathan, no run, quicker, on the stumps, and defended back to the bowler
bravo to pathan, 2 runs, on the off stump, played away to the leg side, they get a single and by the time srikkanth throws it back to the keeper, pathan comes back for the second
bravo to pathan, no run, outside the off stump, widish, wanted to hit it over extra-cover and missed by the left hander
bravo to pathan, 1 run, on the off stump, played away to mid-on for a single
ashwin to nagar, 2 runs, carrom ball probably, tries to hoick it over, mistimed the shot, looped high up and raina went back to take it, good effort to get to it and then drops it!
ashwin to nagar, 2 runs, goes down the pitch and drills it through the covers for a couple of runs
morkel to pathan, no run, slower ball, on the leg stump, tries to nudge it away to square-leg but can only defend it back
morkel to pathan, no run, slower yet again, pathan was lining up to smack him, but no timing at all, defended back to the bowler
bravo to pathan, no run, appeal for a caught-behind, it had an edge alright but went to ground before going to the keeper.
hilfenhaus to nagar, no run, gives himself room, by moving to the leg side, misses hitting it
hilfenhaus to pathan, 1 wide, outside the off stump, left alone by pathan and that is a wide
hilfenhaus to pathan, 1 run, swings his bat hard yet again and the outside edge takes it to the third-man on a couple of bounces for a single
bravo to nagar, 1 run, slower one, outside the off stump, was lining up to smack it away, gets an outside edge as he mistimed it, and goes through to dhoni on the bounce, needed to dive to stop it.
bravo to pathan, 1 run, swung away but goes to mid-wicket for a single
bravo to nagar, 2 runs, outside the off stump, goes for a heave, it was a slower one and that did not help his timing, spooned up but in the gap behind the fielder at mid-wicket
bravo to nagar, no run, tries to scoop it over fine-leg, another slower one and beats the batsman, they do not run the bye because the batsman was in a rather difficult position, especially to run.
morkel to hussey, no run, outside the off stump, very outside in fact, there was a loud appeal from the wicket-keeper, who is miked up, it sounded even louder!
morkel to hussey, 2 runs, on the leg stump, flicked away to fine-leg and they get a single...and then hussey turns back and quickly comes back for the second
morkel to hussey, no run, on the middle stump, defended back to the bowler
yadav to vijay, no run, outside the off stump, pitched right up to the bat, swinging away from the batsman, gets it on the toe, to the covers
yadav to vijay, 1 wide, outside the off stump, wanted to smack it through point, moved away from the bat, beats the outside edge and it is called a wide
yadav to vijay, 2 runs, outside the off stump, swinging away from the batsman, driven to point, goes through to third-man for a couple
yadav to vijay, 1 run, tapped away to the leg side for a single
morkel to hussey, no run, outside the off stump, pitched right up and driven to mid-off, still no run
morkel to hussey, four runs, outside the off stump, hussey was trying to drive it through, gets a thick edge that goes up over backward point and rolls over for a four
aaron to vijay, 1 run, on the middle stump, inside edge to mid-on and a bit of confusion between the two for the single, finally they go for it
aaron to hussey, four runs, round the wicket, outside the off stump, goes down the track and slashes it over point for a four!

aaron to hussey, 3 runs, hoicks it over mid-on not timed well, goes high in the air, yadav runs back and jumps and prevents it from going into the fence, they still take three and that means that the run-rate has ticked over six.
morkel to hussey, four runs, outside edge and that has gone for a four. there was a slip in place and it beats both, the slip and the third-man, 15 off the last four balls
aaron to hussey, no run, was going down the track, slowed it down to 118.2 km/hr, through the shot, missed and it misses the stumps too
aaron to vijay, no run, outside the off stump, tapped away to the off side
yadav to vijay, four runs, down the leg side, flicked away for a four, the square-leg was up in the circle and he is able to flick it away very easily
van der merwe to hussey, four runs, first ball to hussey and that has been reverse swept through third-man for a four, the fielder was up in the circle and that is rather well played
van der merwe to hussey, no run, another one attempted from hussey, but was a lot quicker and misses the shot
van der merwe to hussey, 1 run, flicked away for a single to the leg side

van der merwe to vijay, 2 runs, round the stumps, angling into the bat, played away to the leg side and they take a single before turning back for the second. it was tapped gently to push the deep fielder, but hard enough for the wicket-keeper to take time to get to it.
pathan to vijay, 1 run, slower this time, outside the off stump, pushed through the covers and that gives them a single
van der merwe to vijay, 2 runs, played away to the fine-leg fielder, they are able to come back for a second
van der merwe to vijay, 2 runs, jumps out of the track again and that has been played up and over the extra cover fielder for a couple of runs
van der merwe to vijay, 1 run, outside the off stump, played away to the off side for a single
van der merwe to raina, 1 run, outside the off stump and tapped gently to the point region, they are away for a single
van der merwe to vijay, no run, turn and bounce and going away, misses the outside edge of the bat, keeper collects
yadav to raina, no run, outside the off stump, pitched right up to the bat, wanted to guide it through third-man, misses, through to the wicket-keeper
yadav to raina, four runs, poor ball, down the leg side, 142.5 km/hr, raina gently guides it away to fine-leg for a four
yadav to raina, 1 run, outside the off stump, 145.8 km/hr, opens the face of the bat, guided to the third-man
aaron to vijay, no run, on the off stump, played away to the off side and to the fielder
aaron to raina, 1 run, round the stumps, opens the face of the bat and dabs it away to third-man for a single
morkel to raina, six runs, gives himself room and that has been smacked over the covers for a six!
morkel to raina, 1 run, change of pace, outside the off stump, tapped to mid-off for a single
morkel to vijay, 1 run, gives himself room, opens the face of the bat, gets an inside edge to square-leg for a single
morkel to raina, 2 runs, outside the off stump yet again, drilled through the backward point region and they are able to come back for the second
aaron to raina, no run, round the wicket, angling in, pitched right up and driven back to the bowler

aaron to raina, 3 runs, outside the off stump, tries to hoick it over the leg side, gets a top edge, goes high in the air and two fielders were converging for it, no-one got to it and they get a couple. oh but wait, there is an overthrow and they come back for the third and that is game, set and match chennai!
kumar to dhawan, no run, swinging across the left-hander right away, pitching around middle and leg, he lets it go
kumar to patel, no run, tighter line now, pushed away quietly towards point
hussey to dhawan, 1 wide, fired it quick and down the leg side from around the stumps
hussey to patel, four runs, this time he tosses it up wide outside off, and it is put away without fuss past extra cover
kumar to dhawan, 1 run, direct hit and he was way out, but mandeep runs in from extra cover and fires in a wayward throw at the striker's end which misses by miles
kumar to patel, 5 runs, again they attempt a risky single, again the throw misses from extra cover, and this time the backing-up isn't good
harris to dhawan, no run,
harris to dhawan, 1 run, tucked through midwicket for one
awana to dhawan, 1 run, mishit towards point for one
awana to dhawan, no run, comes down the track, wants to carve it through the off side, the ring is packed with fielders though, cover fields
azhar mahmood to dhawan, 2 runs, holding its line just outside off stump, he stays in the crease and dabs it past point and wide of third man
azhar mahmood to dhawan, 1 run, allows it to come on and pushes it softly on the off side
azhar mahmood to patel, 1 run, again this one holds its line, this time on middle, he makes some room to squeeze it out towards cover
awana to dhawan, no run, plays out one going across him to point
harris to dhawan, 1 run, steered to third man
azhar mahmood to white, no run, defended back to the bowler
kumar to dhawan, 1 run, goes hard at this one outside off, sliced in the air down to third man
chawla to dhawan, six runs, dhawan continuing his good form, picks this one from middle and leg, and deposits it over square leg, not off the middle of the bat but he still gets maximum
awana to white, 1 run, tight line around off, white runs it down to third man
harris to white, 1 run, steered down to third man for one
harris to dhawan, 1 run, tries to swing him over midwicket with the angle, thick inside edge dribbles away to deep square
chawla to dhawan, 1 run,
chawla to white, 1 run, down to long for a single

azhar mahmood to white, no run, they have dropped white again, the deccan virus has spread, white makes room and drills it straight to chawla at extra cover, it travelled fast and went down quickly out of his hands
harris to christian, 1 run, played towards backward point
harris to white, 1 run,
awana to christian, 1 wide, he was walking across the stumps as he missed that ball angled just past leg stump, given a wide, never was a bowler's game

awana to christian, 2 runs, this one could have gone as well, it was there to be swung over deep midwicket, this time christian cannot quite get under it, man in the deep runs across to it, there is another fumble as he tries to pick it up
steyn to mandeep singh, 1 run, pitched further up around off, pushed in the air wide of extra cover
christian to azhar mahmood, 1 run, allows it to come on and steers to third man
gony to hussey, 1 run, goes deep in the crease to defend towards point, a misfield allows him to get off the mark
mishra to chitnis, no run,
christian to hussey, six runs, that has gone, christian's slower one has been lifted over deep midwicket, just wide of the man and just over the rope

gony to gurkeerat singh, 2 runs, somehow gets it in the air wide of extra cover, they will risk the second, they have to, gurkeerat is not making it, he has too much ground to cover, but a big dive, a massive dive, and he is in
singh to dilshan, 1 run, dilshan tried to let that go outside off but made the decision to lift his bat out of the way a bit too late, the ball hit the face and went towards third man
singh to dilshan, 1 run, pushed towards extra cover and dilshan sets off immediately, the fielder from extra cover comes running  in and scores a direct hit but dilshan is safe

malinga to tiwary, 1 run, the fielder at mid-off dives to his left to try and catch the lofted drive but drops it. a tough chance for rp singh. tiwary had checked his shot and ended up spooning the ball

malinga to dilshan, 1 run, dilshan drives into the ground and over the bowler, rp from mid-on runs to his left and dives to intercept, he ends up pushing the ball towards mid-off, where there was no fielder because the fielder had run to his right to back up rp
malinga to tiwary, 1 wide, the slower ball down leg side, that's a wide
malinga to tiwary, no run, a third slower ball, tiwary steers it towards point

harbhajan singh to tiwary, out, would you believe it, tiwary has stepped on to his stumps. he took a step back into his crease to work the ball through square leg and then before beginning to run he took another small step back. unfortunately for him middle stump was in the way
harbhajan singh to dilshan, 1 run, driven from the crease towards cover
harbhajan singh to dilshan, 1 run, flicked through square leg for a single
pollard to de villiers, 1 run, slower ball outside off, ab taps it wide off the keeper and runs
harbhajan singh to dilshan, 1 run, bowled flatter and quicker from round the wicket, dilshan stays back and plays through square leg

harbhajan singh to de villiers, four runs, shot! ab backed away towards leg to make room and slapped the ball flat over the infield at cover and into the gap on the boundary. he hit that very late and from middle stump
harbhajan singh to dilshan, 2 wides, that's a wide down leg side, karthik can't collect cleanly
harbhajan singh to de villiers, 1 run, hit to deep square leg for a single
smith to agarwal, 1 run, opens the face this time and steers to third man
pollard to agarwal, 1 wide, another wide down leg side, mumbai have been generous today
pollard to agarwal, no run, played from the crease towards midwicket
pollard to agarwal, 1 wide, a third wide in the over down leg side, pollard is going wide of the crease and hence slanting it down
smith to dilshan, 1 run, driven to mid off for a single
singh to dilshan, 1 wide, what's going on today? slippery fingers? rp sprays the ball wide outside off stump
singh to agarwal, 1 run, he makes room again but this time mis-hits the ball in the air towards extra cover
malinga to dilshan, 1 run, dilshan uses the width outside off to steer to third man
khan to gibbs, 1 leg bye, that's outside leg stump so gibbs can work the ball behind square
khan to sharma, no run, played from the crease towards point
vinay kumar to sharma, no run, played towards point
vinay kumar to karthik, 1 wide, that's down leg side and the batsman misses the flick, ab and the bowler appeal, that hit the pad but the umpire calls it wide
vinay kumar to karthik, 1 run, steered towards third man for a single
khan to karthik, no run, zaheer goes round the wicket and angles the ball into the right-hander, karthik stays in his crease and plays towards point
vinay kumar to sharma, no run, driven from the crease towards cover
vinay kumar to rayudu, 1 run, rayudu gets a bottom edge into the ground near his feet and sprints the single, he was trying to play with soft hands on the off side

vinay kumar to karthik, four runs, zaheer lumbers to his right from mid-on and dives, but can't stop karthik's drive from beating him and going to the boundary. karthik came out of his crease and timed the ball well through wide mid-on
patel to rayudu, no run, rayudu tries to play on the leg side but doesn't connect properly
patel to rayudu, 1 wide, that's down leg side, we've seen a few of those today
patel to rayudu, no run, defended back to the bowler
muralitharan to karthik, 1 run, played toward deep midwicket for one more single
patel to smith, out, caught at point! smith square drove, reaching for the ball away from his body and spooning it towards dilshan, who caught it at head height. mumbai in free fall at the moment
appanna to rayudu, 1 run, rayudu steps out and drives past the bowler, appanna dived to his left but couldn't stop it
muralitharan to rayudu, no run, width outside off stump, but rayudu's backfoot drive goes to cover
muralitharan to rayudu, 1 run,
muralitharan to pollard, no run,
muralitharan to pollard, 1 wide, fired down leg side, that was quick, ab hurries to his left to collect
muralitharan to pollard, no run,
gayle to rayudu, 1 wide, gayle's first ball is a wide down leg side
gayle to rayudu, no run, rayudu drives firmly towards cover, 'run him out!' yells ab, but the batsmen decide against the run
gayle to rayudu, four runs, this time he's drilled it past the bowler for four, reaches his half-century with that shot, he needs to bat through for mumbai
patel to pollard, 1 leg bye, pollard is foxed by the slower ball, it hits him on the thigh again, they run a leg bye after the ball drops close on the off side
khan to rayudu, 1 run, played towards deep midwicket for a single
khan to rayudu, 1 wide, that's a harsh call in my opinion, rayudu had moved a long way across his stumps to swing behind square and so zaheer's ball went past leg stump
khan to pollard, 1 run, driven towards mid off for a single
jakati to gambhir, no run,
jakati to gambhir, 1 run, pushed towards cover for a single
jakati to mccullum, no run, defended down the pitch
jakati to gambhir, no run, drives but straight to mid off
hilfenhaus to mccullum, no run, pushed back down the track
hilfenhaus to mccullum, no run, bounce this time for hilfenhaus, pushed away towards cover
hilfenhaus to mccullum, 1 leg bye, loud appeal for lbw, a shade high, the ball rolls away towards third man
ashwin to mccullum, 1 run,
ashwin to gambhir, no run,
ashwin to gambhir, no run,
ashwin to gambhir, 2 runs, chipped over mid on for two more
ashwin to gambhir, 1 run, pushed to cover for a single

hilfenhaus to gambhir, no run,
hilfenhaus to gambhir, no run,
hilfenhaus to gambhir, 1 run, pushed away for a single to covers
hilfenhaus to mccullum, four runs, down the track and lofted over mid on
ashwin to gambhir, four runs, that's gone between keeper and slip, closer to slip than keeper, raina did not react as gautam steered this one
ashwin to gambhir, 1 run,
ashwin to mccullum, no run,
ashwin to mccullum, 1 run,
ashwin to gambhir, 1 run,
jakati to gambhir, six runs, down the track for a straight six
jakati to gambhir, 1 run, makes room as he looks to drive through extra cover, does not time the stroke
jakati to mccullum, no run, played out to midwicket
jakati to mccullum, no run, driven to cover
raina to gambhir, no run, played out to midwicket
raina to gambhir, 1 run, pushed to long off
raina to mccullum, 1 run,
raina to gambhir, no run, some turn and lots of bounce on middle, played out towards backward point
jadeja to gambhir, no run, down the track but pushes towards extra cover
jadeja to gambhir, four runs, well played, down the pitch, opens the face as he drives it in the air wide of deep cover, a dive is not enough
ashwin to gambhir, 1 run, rocks back and punches through cover
bravo to gambhir, 1 run,
bravo to mccullum, 1 run,
bravo to gambhir, 1 run, dabbed down behind point
raina to mccullum, six runs, poor line, down the leg side, and baz goes down to swing it behind square leg, that has crashed into the rope
raina to mccullum, 1 run, misfield at extra cover by faf gives them another single
bravo to mccullum, 1 run, pushed wide of extra cover for a sharp run

bravo to mccullum, 1 run, out, breakthrough for csk, dhoni gets it with a direct hit, hit behind square leg, baz wants the second, he was almost withing touching distance of gautam before the kkr captain's hand comes up, too late for baz, the throw is in to dhoni, who hits the non-striker's stumps direct
bravo to gambhir, no run,
bravo to gambhir, 1 run,
bravo to kallis, no run,
jakati to gambhir, out, big strike, gautam is gone, he gave jakati the charge, but got an inside edge on to pad, the ball then contrived to roll onto the stumps
jakati to tiwary, no run,
jakati to tiwary, 1 run,
jakati to kallis, 1 run,
jakati to tiwary, no run,
jadeja to kallis, 1 run, driven down to long off for one

jadeja to kallis, no run, pushed on the leg side, bowler fields
jadeja to kallis, no run, this time he times the drive but straight to extra cover
jadeja to kallis, 1 run, opens the face and runs it through point

jadeja to shukla, 1 run, pushed through extra cover for a single
bravo to shukla, no run, tries to fetch it from well outside off and swing it behind square on leg, that seemed to come in a bit, he cannot connect as he gets into a tangle
bravo to shukla, 1 run, offspinner arrives from bravo, dabbed towards point
de lange to hussey, no run, beats the left-hander with another one going across him, hussey poking at it from the crease
de lange to hussey, 1 run, that did not go more than a few inches from the stumps as it was dropped softly, and they go through for a sharp single
de lange to vijay, no run, width given, but it has been slapped straight to cover
de lange to vijay, four runs, more width, and this time is it put away with a punch past cover
balaji to hussey, no run,
balaji to hussey, four runs, that has been picked over midwicket, against the angle, got the timing just right on that one
balaji to hussey, no run, tries to repeat the shot, this one was slightly wider outside off, and he misses
de lange to vijay, four runs, drives in the air, kallis at point dives to his left, but that has gone through his hands
de lange to vijay, no run,
narine to hussey, no run, offbreak spinning away, slapped towards extra cover
narine to hussey, no run, sharp turn and bounce across the left-hander, pushed towards extra cover
narine to hussey, 2 runs,
kallis to vijay, 1 run, waits on it and eases the widish delivery down to third man
kallis to hussey, 1 run,
narine to vijay, 1 run,
narine to vijay, no run,
bhatia to vijay, four runs, moves away well outside off, there was width, it was dabbed to gautam's left, but he was late in getting down and it speeds past by then
bhatia to vijay, 1 run,
bhatia to hussey, six runs, nightmare over for bhatia, now hussey picks it from middle and launches it over deep square leg
balaji to hussey, six runs, make away in the stands, that has been carted rows and rows into the crowd over deep midwicket
balaji to hussey, no run,

balaji to hussey, 1 run, he was not even in the frame, but the throw from extra cover misses the stumps, even if he had thrown it to the bowler, who had got back in time, the batsman would have been gone
balaji to vijay, 1 run, could have been another opportunity if the throw had hit at the non-striker's from extra cover
balaji to hussey, 1 run, hussey brings up fifty with a checked loft down to long off
pathan to hussey, 1 run,
narine to vijay, 1 run, pushed away from the crease to cover
narine to raina, no run, corker of a turner from outside leg stump, leaves him clueless as it spits across his bat and ends well outside off, lots of bounce, for good measure
pathan to raina, no run, punches it from the crease to extra cover
kallis to raina, no run, looks to steer it to third man but misses
bhatia to du plessis, 1 run, sees him making room and goes wide of off, batsman reaches out to slap it down to long off
bhatia to dhoni, 1 run, under-edge now past the keeper as dhoni wafts at a widish one outside off
kallis to dhoni, 1 run, the bat speed is going up from dhoni, ball flies to point, could have been close but fielder could not collect the ball
kallis to du plessis, 1 run, drives it hard to long off for one
kallis to du plessis, 1 run, leaves the crease and eases it down to long off
narine to dhoni, no run, dabs one turning away from him but straight to point
narine to du plessis, no run, one that turns away, defended solidly
narine to du plessis, 1 run, now the offbreak, he is outside the line of off as he turns it with the spin square on the leg side
bhatia to bravo, no run, there is no pace off the pitch from bhatia, and bravo's punch goes straight to the bowler
bhatia to jadeja, 1 run, cannot get it away for anything more than a single to deep square leg, bhatia proving difficult to get away yet again
venugopal rao to marsh, no run, wide delivery outside off, pushed to cover
venugopal rao to marsh, 1 run, to deep midwicket for a single
morkel to marsh, no run, angled outside off now, but he pushes it tamely to point from the crease
morkel to mandeep singh, four runs, in the air but just out of the reach of square leg
morkel to mandeep singh, four runs, goes after this one outside off, and the thick edge flies over and well past the wide slip
aaron to hussey, 1 run, could that have been another one? hussey drives first ball, and warner got to it at point before it rolls away, did that carry?
aaron to saini, no run, wide and slow at 122.1 kph, but he does not drive in the air, checks his shot a bit, ball goes to cover
aaron to saini, 3 runs, that has been neatly dabbed past point, and morkel runs across from third man, puts in the dive and saves the boundary
negi to saini, no run, flat and wide outside off, he reaches out to slap it to covers
negi to saini, four runs, thick edge as he goes for a drive, the ball races to the third man rope
negi to saini, no run, mahela dives at extra cover and saves the single
negi to hussey, 1 run, angled into him, and rushes in with the angle, he was making room, but could not work it away
yadav to miller, 2 runs, they go for the second and get it, deep square leg running in cannot stop the ball cleanly, it was swung away off a thick inside edge
pathan to hussey, 1 run, thick edge along the ground now down to third man
pathan to hussey, no run, misses as he tries to steer it past point, some bounce for irfan
negi to hussey, no run,
negi to gurkeerat singh, no run, square drives it but point stops it to his right
aaron to hussey, no run, pushed back to the bowler
pathan to hussey, no run, good end to the over, fools him with a slower one that moves in past his swing
yadav to kumar, no run, pushed away to extra cover
morkel to hussey, no run,
kumar to venugopal rao, 1 run, softly pushed with a straight bat from close to the body for a single on the off side
awana to jayawardene, no run,
azhar mahmood to jayawardene, 1 run, sharp single taken with a soft push on the off side

awana to taylor, out, taylor does not look happy, but there was a sound again, boy, is this lad awana sharp off the pitch, draws taylor into a poke with one that holds its line outside off stump, and the thin edge is taken by the keeper
awana to ojha, no run, bounce, lots of it outside off, ojha brings it down safely
chawla to jayawardene, 1 run, hit through vacant midwicket, chawla goes after the ball, man from the deep gets to it first, only one allowed
harmeet singh to jayawardene, no run, driven very straight down the pitch to the bowler
harmeet singh to jayawardene, 1 run, half-swatted, half-helped away to deep square
harmeet singh to ojha, no run, pushed towards midwicket
chawla to jayawardene, no run, nudged down the pitch, chawla gets around to it
harmeet singh to jayawardene, 1 run, without fuss, mahela opens the face and takes the single to third man
harmeet singh to ojha, four runs, wide outside off, ojha slashes at it, and the thick edge flies well wide of the keeper, hussey grimaces
azhar mahmood to ojha, no run, tries to steer it to third man as it comes in from outside off, cannot get it past point
azhar mahmood to jayawardene, 1 run, opens the face very late and earns a single to third man
chawla to ojha, no run, pushed back to the bowler
chawla to ojha, out, chawla smiles at the irony, a long hop gets him a wicket, ojha smashes it straight to mandeep at deep midwicket, he does not mess up, takes it safely just inside the rope

harmeet singh to jayawardene, 2 runs, mahela wants the second, he has to rush back, and also has to dive in, makes it in the end, a stronger throw from third man and he was gone, mahela had deftly dabbed it late wide of pk at third man
chawla to jayawardene, no run, and an appeal for leg before now, turned down, hit him comfortably outside the line, it was pushed through in with the angle, mahela defended outside the line
chawla to jayawardene, no run, can he bowl a maiden? mahela cannot push this one past the bowler
awana to pathan, no run, irfan tries to launch him through extra cover but there wasn't enough room to play that shot, the ball bounced as well
patel to gambhir, 1 run, steered from the crease to third man
patel to tiwary, 1 run, steered towards third man
patel to gambhir, no run, defended from the crease towards the bowler
