nadeem to pathan, no run, flatter from nadeem, yusuf pathan defends that one
nadeem to pathan, no run, bowled with a round-arm action, more defence from yusuf
yadav to morgan, 1 run,
yadav to pathan, 1 run, whipped towards deep midwicket for a single
yadav to morgan, 1 wide, down the leg side, a free run for kolkata
russell to pathan, 1 run, a ripping delivery from russell, leaps up at yusuf who manages to tap it towards point for a single
botha to morgan, 1 run, looks to chop that one through the off side, bottom edges it and that misses the stumps and goes past the keeper
botha to morgan, 1 run, kkr make a winning start, srk likes that, a single towards midwicket for the single that confirmed the result
johnson to gayle, no run, almost a strike! at first it looked like he edged it, it swung away from middle, squared him up on the off stump, hit the pad and good attempt by keeper karthik
johnson to gayle, no run, gayle doesn't do anything with this one, moves away and doesn't offer a shot
johnson to dilshan, no run, mitchell where were you? that was a beauty of a delivery, sliced dilshan in half and the ball just sailed over the stumps, phew
johnson to dilshan, no run, he pushes it towards cover and sets off and there's hesitation, they decide against it
patel to gayle, no run, lands it outside off and moves away, doesn't offer a shot
patel to dilshan, no run, dilshan goes for the wild slash and misses, munaf tempted him with width
patel to dilshan, no run, bowls a tight line there, not much room and he steers it to the off side
johnson to gayle, 1 run, nice running, gayle half heartedly tapped it to the off side and dilshan was off quickly, they take the run easily
johnson to kohli, no run, stays back at the crease and defends this one
johnson to kohli, 1 run, stays beside the line and steers it to backward point, he slides and they sneak in a run
johnson to gayle, 1 wide, this was sprayed wide outside off and wide called
johnson to gayle, no run, gayle's in no hurry yet, he's happy to leave this one outside off
patel to kohli, no run, stays behind the line and he pushes it back to the bowler
patel to kohli, no run, really restrictive line here, on the off stump and kohli can't do much but play it back to the bowler
patel to kohli, no run, moves towards middle and he quietly tucks it to the on side
patel to kohli, 1 run, stays back and tucks it with the line down to fine leg
bumrah to kohli, no run, some respite for the bowler, closer to the off stump and he pushes it to the off side
bumrah to agarwal, no run, stays back and he defends back to the bowler
oram to gayle, 1 wide, loosener down the leg side, gayle lets it go
oram to gayle, 1 run, gayle decides to slash at that and see where it goes, it was in the air but down to third man
oram to agarwal, no run, tucks it away towards mid-on and tells his partner to wait
oram to agarwal, no run, this one jags back in and nearly takes out the off stump, that was close
oram to agarwal, 1 run, knocks it towards mid-on and risks a single and agarwal was lucky rayudu';s throw was way off target
oram to gayle, no run, gayle's still his 'usual' watchful self, this was on the stumps and quietly pushed towards cover
bumrah to christian, no run, christian gets across and pushes it to the off side
bumrah to gayle, no run, angles it from wide of the crease and gayle softly pushes it to mid-off
oram to christian, no run, stays back and the ball bounces a bit more and beats the bat
oram to christian, no run, example of the seam movement again, nipped back in and beat the bat, karthik had some work to do
oram to christian, 1 wide, this time he slides it down the leg side
oram to christian, 1 run, tries to work it across the line and he places it wide of mid-on
oram to gayle, 2 runs, tucks it to the on side
oram to gayle, four runs, wrong line, down the leg side and he shuffles and easily tucks it wide of the keeper
bumrah to christian, 1 run, tries to punch it to the off side and he gets an inside edge past the stumps
harbhajan singh to gayle, 1 run, flat delivery to begin with and he chops it to the off side, mistimed really
harbhajan singh to christian, 1 run, shuffles early and he tucks it with the angle to fine leg
harbhajan singh to gayle, 1 run, makes room and pushes it wide of point

harbhajan singh to christian, no run, we have a collision and gayle's in pain, christian chips it in the air and harbhajan goes to his right to catch it, collides with gayle, the big man's down, clutching his left leg, harbhajan tries to help him up
pollard to gayle, no run, he risks padding up and pollard went up in appeal, didn't offer a shot, pitched on leg and hitting him above the knee roll, that wasn't hitting
pollard to gayle, four runs, fluke boundary for gayle as he tries to help it to the on side and gets a leading edge past point for four, it was in the air
pollard to christian, no run,
harbhajan singh to nair, no run, straighter one and he punches it to cover
harbhajan singh to gayle, no run, flatter delivery and he defends this one
harbhajan singh to gayle, 1 wide, fires it down the leg side and wide called
harbhajan singh to gayle, no run, bowls it straight, keeps it straight and gayle is happy defending
harbhajan singh to gayle, 1 run, streaky way to get to a fifty, an inside edge past the stumps
johnson to gayle, 1 run, moves away and he opens the face of the bat and steers it to third man
harbhajan singh to gayle, six runs, just flew off the bat, gayle made room early, harbhajan tossed it wide outside off and he carved it flat over deep cover
harbhajan singh to gayle, no run, stays back and pushes it back to the bowler
harbhajan singh to gayle, no run, down the leg side and close to kissing the edge
harbhajan singh to gayle, no run,
oram to arun karthik, no run,

patel to arun karthik, 1 run, dropped  but a good attempt at the rebound by ponting! karthik tries to clear extra cover, ponting leaps, fails to hang on, back flips and tries to take the rebound, nearly...
oram to arun karthik, no run, down the leg side and he tries to work it away
patel to gayle, no run, this was really wide outside off and he can only bash it straight to cover, dot ball that too
christian to ponting, no run, keeps it outside the off stump and he moves across and shoulders arms
christian to ponting, no run, ponting walks down the pitch and he ends up steering it straight to backward point
christian to tendulkar, no run, this was well timed but straight to backward point, just 3 off the first two overs
unadkat to ponting, 1 run, he comes down the track again and he ends up forcing it down to mid-on
unadkat to ponting, 1 run, risky single there, gets an inside edge to the on side and ponting had to hurry
christian to tendulkar, 1 run, steers it towards backward point and there's a direct hit at the bowler's end and they take a singe off the deflection
vinay kumar to tendulkar, 1 run, moves a long way across his stumps and angles it down to third man
vinay kumar to ponting, 1 run, chips down the track and he slices it in the air down to third man
vinay kumar to tendulkar, no run, showing some signs of urgency, tries to slash one outside off and misses
vinay kumar to tendulkar, 2 runs, stands tall and times the punch well past extra cover, finds the gap and two fielders chase, good coordination by the two fielders, ends of a good over
muralitharan to ponting, no run, stays back and pushes it to the off side
vinay kumar to tendulkar, no run, keeps it tight, tucks him up for room and he can only work it to midwicket
vinay kumar to tendulkar, 1 run, shuffles a long way across to the off stump and stylishly whips it away down to deep square leg
kartik to karthik, no run,
kartik to ponting, no run, beats him as he tries to force it away to the off side and karthik whips off the bails
kartik to ponting, no run,
kartik to sharma, no run, quicker delivery and he pushes it to backward point
kartik to sharma, no run,
kartik to karthik, no run, flatter delivery and he pushes it to cover
unadkat to karthik, 1 run, he chips down the track and checks his shot, glides it down to third man
unadkat to sharma, 1 run, angles across him and he gets an outside edge to third man
unadkat to karthik, 1 run, opens the face and steers it with the angle to third man
vinay kumar to karthik, 1 run, stays deep at the crease and punches it towards mid-on
vinay kumar to sharma, no run, tucks him up for room and he steers it down to point
vinay kumar to sharma, 2 runs, this time he goes over the on side, lofts over midwicket and the fielder picks up in the deep
vinay kumar to sharma, out, he swings and misses! vinay kumar keeps it straight, rohit tries to swipe it across the line and he misses it completely, the off stump is pushed back
vinay kumar to karthik, 2 runs, he opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man and kartik does well to stop it
christian to rayudu, no run, tries to hoick this one down to midwicket, the ball hits his body and rolls to the keeper
kartik to rayudu, four runs, streaky! he chips down the track and gets an inside edge the beats the stumps, the keeper and runs away
kartik to rayudu, 1 run,
kartik to karthik, 1 run, flat-bats it to the bowler and  karthik gets a hand to it but drops it, the ball deflected to the on side and the bowler seemed rather annoyed
christian to karthik, no run,
muralitharan to karthik, 1 run,
muralitharan to rayudu, 1 run, stays back and slaps that in the air over point
unadkat to karthik, 1 run,
unadkat to rayudu, 2 runs, yet another collision! makes room and bashes it down to long-off, rayudu and arun k collide as the batsman tries to make his ground

vinay kumar to rayudu, 1 bye, beats him first ball as he tries to force it through the off side, they try to sneak in a bye, arun k's under-arm throw misses the stumps, vinay picks up and dives, he hits the stumps but karthik's home
vinay kumar to harbhajan singh, 1 run, no hat-trick for vinay but it will only be a single to deep midwicket, harbhajan swings and gives pollard the strike
pathan to perera, no run, gentle away swinger, he guides it and times it wide of point, who dives to save some runs
pathan to perera, no run, guided with the away swing to backward point
nehra to perera, no run,
yadav to perera, 1 run, dropped, botha got a hand out to this screamer high to his left at lone slip, but it burst out, perera thick edged it after having a go at an outswinger going across him
yadav to rahane, 1 run,
nehra to dravid, four runs, dravid is a touch slow to get to the line of another wide one, and he's managed a thick edge that has run past the lone slip
russell to dravid, no run, quickly bursts into a drive, but he's mistimed it to extra cover
russell to dravid, 1 run, pushed to mid off, and dravid makes it in time
russell to dravid, 1 run,
pathan to rahane, 1 run, this one goes across, and a thick outside edge runs to third man
nadeem to dravid, 1 run, follows the batsman as he backs away to leg, forced out to deep midwicket
nadeem to rahane, 1 run, comes down the track and pushes to wide long off
nadeem to dravid, four runs, darted in quick, he's whipped that through midwicket, and the man in the deep has failed to rein it in, nehra it is who makes a mess of a regulation stop
nadeem to rahane, out, nadeem with the breakthrough, rahane unsure what to do with it, he's ended up forcing it back to the bowler
nadeem to binny, no run, moves across and inside edges it down the track
russell to dravid, no run, dropped, dravid chipped a slower one in the air, russell got a hand to it but it went down, there was a chance to run the non-striker out, but he was back in time
russell to dravid, 2 runs, opens the face very late to run it fine, third man slides to stop the four
nadeem to binny, no run, down the track to force it to extra cover
nadeem to dravid, 1 run, makes room to hit it down to long off
nadeem to binny, 1 run, misses another swipe and keeps the strike as they jog across even as the ball rolls square
botha to binny, four runs, backs away and swings, gets four with a thick edge to third man, he's lost his bat on that occasion, but he'll pick it up, and pocket four
botha to binny, six runs, well, botha's gone for runs straight away, binny comes down, he's opened the face to loft this one over long off
botha to dravid, 1 run, swats a wide one down to long off and that is fifty for rahul dravid in his first innings in a long time
yadav to dravid, no run, slow and wide, dravid waits and has a go, edge runs to the keeper
pathan to dravid, six runs, slower one, and dravid has sent that flying over deep midwicket
nehra to shukla, no run, nehra not getting the hat-trick, shukla denies him with a solid defensive push down the pitch
sreesanth to chand, four runs, that has raced away four, chand steps out and swings hard, gets it through vacant midwicket, mid on chases, but the outfield it too fast
sreesanth to chand, no run, pushed to point

sreesanth to warner, 1 run, dropped, dravid puts it own at backward point, it was finer than the normal position, warner slashed it high towards dravid, who leaped, got both hands to it, but it flew through
badree to warner, no run, quick and flat on middle, he makes room and pushes to extra cover
badree to warner, no run, slapped straight to cover on the edge of the circle
sreesanth to chand, four runs, lucky for chand, on the move down the track, throws his bat at it, and the ball flies over the lone slip
sreesanth to jayawardene, no run, bat around pad to push down to mid on
trivedi to jayawardene, 1 run, mahela gets width and sends this one to third man
sreesanth to jayawardene, no run, across to push it down the pitch
sreesanth to jayawardene, 1 run, mahela chips down the pitch and swings one down to deep midwicket, didn't time it
cooper to warner, 1 run,
cooper to jayawardene, 5 runs, overthrows, four of them, from rahane, mahela dropped this towards backward point and took off, rahane missed with the throw, and it raced wide of mid on
cooper to warner, 1 run, a push from warner pops up in the air down to long off
cooper to jayawardene, no run,

trivedi to jayawardene, 1 run, they've been kept to one this time, after another nudge by mahela to midwicket, man runs in from the deep and lets rip with the throw, warner abandons the idea of the second
trivedi to warner, 2 runs, two this time, to warner, to midwicket again
trivedi to warner, 1 run, driven to mid off for a single
trivedi to jayawardene, 2 runs, steered wide of third man, binny runs across and slides to keep them to two
shukla to warner, 1 wide, sprays it way outside off stump now
shukla to warner, 1 run, to fine leg for a single
shukla to warner, 1 wide, angled too far across the left-hander once again
shukla to warner, 1 run, pushes to extra cover who can't stop the ball and concedes the single
trivedi to juneja, 1 run, opens the face and picks up one to third man
trivedi to warner, no run, that surprised warner, seemed to stop on him, as he stabbed it to mid off
trivedi to juneja, 1 run, dabs a slower one to third man
shukla to warner, no run, reaches out to a wide one and underedges it to the keeper
cooper to juneja, 1 wide, sends it down the leg side now
binny to warner, 1 run, they have kept denying him width and he's kept picking up runs through midwicket, happens again
binny to juneja, six runs, slow long hop, and it's been carted several rows into the stands at deep midwicket
binny to warner, 2 runs, yet another couple to warner with a nudge to the leg side, who needs boundaries
binny to warner, 1 run, driven crisply down to long off
trivedi to juneja, no run, walks down the pitch and misses a heave to a slower one
trivedi to warner, six runs, it's taken him 51 deliveries, but here's warner's first six, fetches it from leg stump and murders it way over deep midwicket
cooper to juneja, no run, tries to swing it from outside off over midwicket and misses
cooper to warner, 1 leg bye, hits the pad and rolls fine down leg as warner misses

shukla to warner, out, direct hit, will that change this game, stand-in captain hodge gives his side some breathing space with a pick up and throw from extra cover, warner had no chance to complete the single
rajpoot to ponting, 1 run, he stays in the crease and waits for the ball to swing, then guides it down to third man
rajpoot to karthik, 1 run, another tight delivery on off stump, the batsman stays in the crease and dabs it towards point to pick up another single
nannes to karthik, 1 run, he steers this down to third man to pick up another easy single
nannes to karthik, no run, he smacks it back to the bowler, who is not able to get out of the way, saves four runs for the team
bravo to karthik, no run, here comes the slower delivery, the batsman defends it to the leg side
bravo to karthik, four runs, comes down the pitch and times this supremely through midwicket, oh that just skims on the grass.. beautiful shot
jadeja to rayudu, no run, he takes a couple of steps down the pitch, the bowler fires it in quicker, defended towards midwicket
ashwin to smith, no run, bowls a flatter delivery on the off stump, the batsman goes right back in the crease and defends
ashwin to smith, 1 run, another flatter delivery outside off, the batsman goes back and punches it to long off
jadeja to harbhajan singh, 1 run, quicker delivery outside off, the batsman pushes it to deep cover
jadeja to pollard, no run, another quicker one outside off, the batsman tries to push it to off, gets an inside edge
ashwin to harbhajan singh, no run, bowls a flatter delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it towards midwicket
ashwin to harbhajan singh, no run, bowls the carrom ball and it sucks harbhajan into a drive, then goes past the outside edge
nannes to harbhajan singh, 1 run, stays in the crease to the angled delivery and opens the face to run it down to third man
ashwin to pollard, no run, carrom-ball on the middle stump, the batsman defends it easily
ashwin to pollard, no run, another one of those carrom-balls, the batsman looks to work it away to the leg side but ends up defending it
ashwin to pollard, no run, tosses it up wide outside off, but pollard, surprisingly, lets it go through
bravo to pollard, no run, he bends down on his knee to ramp it over the keeper, but bravo bowls it slow and the batsman is left waiting for it, it goes over him, few pleasant words exchanged again
bravo to pollard, 1 run, he punches it to long-off and wants to come back for a couple, but harbhajan wasn't even looking, pollard is upset, he wanted the strike

patel to vijay, out, he hits timber this time! vijay tries moving to the off side this time in an attempt to flick it fine on the leg side, but misses the line of the ball and it hits the top of leg stump. munaf roars..
patel to hussey, 1 wide, pushes this wide outside off and hussey watches it go through to the keeper
patel to raina, no run, tries the same shot again, but this time he hits it straight to the mid-off fielder
harbhajan singh to hussey, no run, sees him coming down and bowls it quick into him, it pops up as hussey defends
ojha to bravo, 1 run, spins away after being angled in on off, pushed behind point and they cross over quickly
harbhajan singh to hussey, 1 run, pushed through on the stumps, hussey dabs it towards square leg for a quick single
harbhajan singh to bravo, no run, pushed through outside off, it goes straight on and beats bravo's waft
harbhajan singh to badrinath, no run, bowls it with a lower trajectory, the batsman tries to work it to the leg side, but ends up defending it
ojha to bravo, 1 run, bowls the slider this time, the batsman goes deep in the crease and pushes it to deep cover
ojha to badrinath, no run, pushed through on the stumps, the batsman defends it towards midwicket
pollard to badrinath, 1 wide, he bowls this one down the leg side and is called a wide
ojha to jadeja, no run, quicker delivery on the stumps, jadeja pushes it to midwicket
harbhajan singh to jadeja, 1 run, another quicker delivery and jadeja tries to guide it to the off side, but gets an inside edge past the stumps
patel to jadeja, out, he goes after this one too, but ends up getting an inside edge on to the middle stump, munaf is pumped, those glaring eyes help jadeja find the way back to his dugout..
patel to ashwin, no run, bowls a slower delivery on the middle which ashwin pushes to midwicket and runs halfway, dhoni sends him back, but a high throw from ojha saves him
harbhajan singh to dhoni, 1 run, bowls a flatter delivery outside off, dhoni mishits it towards midwicket and calls for a couple, but ashwin slips while turning..
pollard to dhoni, 1 wide, bowls a slower wider delivery, this one is wide indeed
pollard to laughlin, out, he bowls a slower delivery outside off, the batsman was too eager to push it to the leg side and falls over a bit, gets an inside edge and the ball hits the stumps..
johnson to dhoni, 1 wide, he gives away an extra run with another wide outside off
steyn to dilshan, 5 wides, poor delivery this one, it is fired down the leg side and it keeps going away from the keeper
vihari to kohli, no run, pushed through on the stumps, kohli defends it to midwicket
ankit sharma to kohli, no run, beautiful delivery, it was quicker and flatter, it turned and took the outside edge to gully
ankit sharma to nair, no run, another flatter delivery, this time outside off, the batsman goes back and punches it to cover
sharma to kohli, no run, another tight delivery outside off, straightens a touch, kohli defends it to the off side
mishra to kohli, no run, quicker delivery, kohli goes back and defends it back to the bowler
perera to henriques, 1 run, slower ball outside off, he waits for it and then opens the face to run it down to third man
mishra to henriques, 2 runs,
ankit sharma to henriques, 1 run, bowls a flatter delivery on off stump, the batsman goes back and punches it to deep point
mishra to henriques, no run, pushed through on the stumps, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
mishra to henriques, 1 run, stays in the crease and dabs it towards cover for a quick single
sharma to henriques, 1 run, beautiful work by the fielder at point, but he is not able to prevent the single.
ashish reddy to henriques, 1 run, slower delivery bowled off the back of the hands, the batsman waits and pushes it to deep cover
ashish reddy to kohli, no run, slower delivery on off, messes with kohli's timing as he ends up tamely pushing it back to the bowler
perera to henriques, four runs, this time it is a slower delivery, the batsman waits and drags it over midwicket in the gap

perera to arun karthik, out, the extra delivery earns him a wicket! another catch at mid-off as the batsman tries to drive it over mid-off, he doesn't get the elevation and hits it flat, the fielder moves a step to his right and takes a good smart catch
steyn to vinay kumar, four runs, another edge, this one goes over the keeper's head, more agony for steyn...
henriques to white, 1 wide, bowls this one down the leg side, would have been a good ball to a left-hander
unadkat to white, no run, and down the leg side again, they ask a question to the umpire in hope
kartik to reddy, 2 wides, he too bowls a wide, this one is down the leg side
kartik to reddy, four runs, he comes out of the crease and drives it through cover with just timing, didn't try to hit it hard at all, just placed it in the gap
kartik to reddy, 1 run, now he goes back to a flatter delivery and punches it down to long-off
kartik to reddy, 1 run,
kartik to vihari, 1 run, pushed to long off for one
vinay kumar to reddy, no run, flicked in the air to midwicket, throw misses at the non-striker's end
muralitharan to vihari, 1 run, he flicks it fine on the leg side, to fine leg for a single
muralitharan to sangakkara, no run, pushed through on off stump, the batsman gets bit of inside edge as he defends that
vinay kumar to vihari, no run, similar delivery, he hits it straight to backward point now
muralitharan to sangakkara, 1 run, bowls a quicker one as sanga comes out of the crease, but the batsman flicks it on the leg side to fine leg

unadkat to perera, 1 run, another rising delivery outside off, the batsman dabs it to the left of point (dilshan) and calls for a quick one, a throw comes to the non-striker's end and had it hit, it would have made life a bit more interesting for sunrisers
muralitharan to perera, 1 wide, he fires it down the leg side, wide called
vinay kumar to ashish reddy, 1 run, slower delivery on off stump, the batsman drags it towards midwicket without any timing, they steal a single
vinay kumar to vihari, four runs, slower delivery on off stump, vihari gets down on his knee as he spots it early and whacks it in the gap at cow corner, well picked there, in the gap..
vinay kumar to steyn, no run, another good slower delivery, it misses steyn's hoick and it misses the off stump by a whisker!! vihari watches it all from the other end..
vinay kumar to vihari, 1 bye, slower delivery, he misses it but runs a bye.. the keeper misses the stumps.. it's a tie.. it's a tie
lee to watson, no run, right on middle and off, 141.4 kph, says the speed gun, warning: believe it at your own peril, watson bends low to block

mohammed shami to watson, 1 run, wow, confusion, collision, rahane just about manages to reach the other end with a slide on one leg, nudged to leg, they take off, first rahane has to get past the bowler, who is rushing towards the ball, then watson crashes into him, well done, little rahane, for recovering from that
lee to rahane, 1 run, wide again from lee, rahane reaches for it and steers it in the air down to third man, that flew to the fielder, pace in the desert, well, on the edge of it
mohammed shami to rahane, no run, wide line from kkr once again, rahane eyes the cover region but misses this time
kallis to dravid, 1 run, squeezed past point for a single
bhatia to rahane, 1 run, pops it in the air as he tries to punch down to long off, no harm done in the end as it's wide of extra cover
kallis to binny, no run, drives but off the inner part of the bat, straight back to the bowler
kallis to rahane, 1 run, dabbed down to third man again
shukla to binny, out, that is gone, aleem dar raises the finger immediately, and shukla has struck first ball, with one angled in, binny caught in the crease as it nipped in further
shukla to hodge, no run, straight and rising outside off, left alone
shukla to hodge, no run,
narine to rahane, no run, another dot ball, straightens outside off, rahane steers it to point
shukla to hodge, 1 run,
mohammed shami to hodge, 1 run, backs away and ends up chopping it towards point
mohammed shami to rahane, 1 run, bends and opens the face to steer it to third man, was aiming to be much squarer in the gap
mohammed shami to hodge, 1 run, down to third man for a single
narine to rahane, out, rahane walks, tries to run it to third man, it is the one that goes away from the right-hander, keeper takes it and goes up immediately, and rahane walks instantly
kallis to yagnik, 1 run, goes deep and runs it from close to off down to third man
kallis to yagnik, 1 run, dropped softly to the off side, morgan runs in from extra cover and throws down the stumps at the non-striker's but yagnik's made it with a dive
narine to hodge, 1 run, carrom ball on off, guided to point for one
kallis to sreesanth, 1 bye, sreesanth dances out and has a huge swing, can't connect, and hodge rushes through for a bye
kallis to sreesanth, 1 run, sreesanth makes room and goes for glory, an inside edge onto pad is his reward, and hodge regains strike again
kallis to hodge, 2 runs, swung through square leg, and they come back for the secon
sreesanth to gambhir, 1 wide, he gets it outside off now, but too far outside, gambhir misses again, but he gets another ball
tait to bisla, 1 wide, outswinger, past the attempted drive, called wide, tight call
tait to gambhir, no run, that is fast, clocked at 150.1 kph, almost reaches the keeper even as gamhir is going through the motions of his attempted flash outside off
cooper to tiwary, 1 run, width, slapped away to point, bursts past him, cover tidies up
cooper to gambhir, 1 run, slower one from cooper, gambhir waits and dabs it to third man
cooper to morgan, 1 run, walks out and turns it from outside off to mid on, who cannot pick it up cleanly and it is an easy single in the end
cooper to shukla, 1 wide, wider, swinging away, he goes after it, and misses, quite daft
cooper to shukla, 1 run, runs it down to third man
trivedi to shukla, 1 run,
trivedi to morgan, 1 run,
trivedi to shukla, no run, right on middle stump, lovely, all-out seam attack dominating a powerful line-up in a t20, defended to the bowler
trivedi to shukla, no run, nips in from wide outside off, chopped straight to point
sreesanth to morgan, no run,
sreesanth to morgan, 1 run, goes across and turns it down to fine leg
trivedi to morgan, no run, hit on the body with some inward shape and lots of bounce, ball runs towards slip
sreesanth to bhatia, four runs, sloppy from trivedi, bhatia guides it past point, trivedi labouring in from third man, gets a hand to it and helps it into the rope
sreesanth to bhatia, 1 run, runs it down to third man past backward point's dive
sreesanth to morgan, 1 run, slashes hard, it flies on the bounce to third man, give me this pitch any day, in the ipl
shukla to morgan, 2 runs, pushed through vacant midwicket, and they come back for the second
tait to morgan, four runs, more runs, leg side from tait, and mogan gets something on it to beat fine leg
cooper to narine, 1 run, no pace to work with, narine backs to leg, and slaps it to extra cover

pathan to ponting, no run, ooh, nicely bowled, got it to swing in towards middle, ponting moved across and was looking to flick it square, got a leading edge in the direction of point and warner did well, diving to his left to save the single
pathan to ponting, out, ponting goes, five dot balls and that's done the job, ponting came down the track and tried to loft him over mid-off, struck it straight to the fielder, goes for a duck

morkel to karthik, no run, appeal for lbw, there may have been an inside edge there, morkel pushed him back, struck him in line, replays suggest no inside edge but height was an issue, would have probably gone over

morkel to karthik, four runs, irfan is a good fielder but he overruns the ball this time, thick outside edge as he tries to drive it through cover, irfan at third man didn't read the turn in the deep as the ball spun past him to roll over the ropes

yadav to sharma, no run, well, rohit is getting bogged down and he wants to open up, charges down the track and tries to launch him over mid-off, similar delivery to the previous one, goes past the outside edge
nehra to sharma, 1 run, gets across to turn it through square leg into the deep for a single
morkel to karthik, (no ball) 1 run, angling in towards middle, flicked away towards deep square leg for a single, well the umpire calls it a no-ball, morkel has overstepped
morkel to sharma, six runs, rohit hits a six, tries to swing that over square leg, gets a top edge and it sails over the third-man boundary, mumbai have recovered well here
yadav to karthik, 1 wide, down the leg side, tries to flick it fine, misses, called a wide

yadav to karthik, four runs, that's four more, didn't strike it too well but managed to get enough on it to earn four more, drags it from the off stump, he kept that down and played it through midwicket again
nadeem to sharma, 1 run, rohit knocks that into the leg side past midwicket for a single
nadeem to karthik, no run, angling in towards off and middle, defended into the off side
nadeem to sharma, 1 run, rolls that into the leg side for one more
mendis to karthik, 1 run, tries to crash that into the off side, gets a thick inside edge for a single
mendis to sharma, no run, flatter from jeevan, rohit comes down the track and defends it back to the bowler
mendis to sharma, 1 run, chipped in the vacant midwicket region for a single
nadeem to karthik, no run, tries to open the face to that flat delivery outside off, doesn't make contact
nadeem to karthik, 1 run, swept again, towards deep backward square leg for just the single this time
nadeem to sharma, 1 run, flattish on the off, makes room and drives that through point into the deep for a single
mendis to sharma, 1 run, comes down the track and pushes it towards long-off for a single
pathan to karthik, 1 run, calmly runs that one down towards third man for a single
morkel to sharma, four runs, ...to be struck for four, not struck, edged rather, rohit made room to drive that through cover, thick outside edge to the third-man boundary

morkel to karthik, out, oh dear, karthik has missed out on a ton and he's visibly upset, morkel angled that in, karthik moved across and then chipped it towards extra cover, sliced it slightly, a comfortable catch but that ends an excellent innings
morkel to pollard, 1 run, steals a quick single, pushes that one towards mid-off and runs through
yadav to pollard, 1 wide, down the leg side and that's been called a wide
morkel to sharma, no run,

morkel to sharma, 1 run, rohit guides that wide of point for a single to bring up his half-century, played a good supporting role to karthik, was under some pressure coming in to this match, this should give him some relief
pathan to rayudu, 1 run, mistimes this but keeps the strike for the final over, chips that towards long-off, gets to warner on the bounce
harbhajan singh to warner, no run, turns it into the leg side towards square leg
malinga to warner, no run, that one swung in towards middle, digs that one out towards point from the crease
malinga to warner, no run, slower one on leg and middle, pushes it towards extra cover
malinga to warner, no run, pushed it into the leg side to play ti towards midwicket
johnson to jayawardene, 1 wide, slides that one down the leg side, that's been called a wide
harbhajan singh to juneja, 1 run, flatter outside off, gets across and turns it into the leg side for a single
harbhajan singh to warner, 1 run, goes inside-out to that one and drives it wide of long-off, just the single
harbhajan singh to juneja, 1 run, flicked away through midwicket into the deep for a single
johnson to juneja, four runs, that's an excellent shot, manpreet got back in the crease and drilled it past the bowler, wide of mid-off, for four more
johnson to warner, 2 runs, makes a bit of room and johnson chases him, turns it away wide of tendulkar at mid-on for a couple of runs
malinga to warner, 1 run, a thick outside edge as he made room to drive that through off, a single down to third man for warner
ojha to warner, six runs, warner smashes that miles behind the deep midwicket boundary, long hop from ojha and it's been punished
ojha to warner, no run, flatter this time, comes down the track and pushes it back towards the bowler
pollard to warner, no run, warner lets that one go thinking that'll be a wide, it's not called, slower one bowled outside off
pollard to warner, 1 wide, reaches for that one, wide called this time, warner tried to crack that through point and missed
johnson to warner, four runs, four more, slower one and warner picked it, waited for it and drilled it past harbhajan at mid-off

johnson to warner, out, didn't pick the slower one this time, warner had made up his mind, made room and appeared to be into the shot too early, ended up chipping it over point into the off side, rayudu ran in from the deep and took it well, big wicket, a decisive one possibly
johnson to juneja, 2 runs, angling in towards middle, that's been flicked through square leg for a couple of runs
pollard to pathan, no run, turns it into the leg side
pollard to pathan, 1 run, pushes it into the off side, gets a single
pollard to juneja, 1 wide, that one is bowled down the leg side, called a wide
ojha to juneja, 1 leg bye, bowls that flat on leg stump, comes down the track to turn it into the leg side, gets a leg-bye
ojha to pathan, 2 runs, irfan takes that from the off stump and drives it through midwicket for a couple of runs
ojha to juneja, 5 wides, down the leg side and manprit knocks that on its head to help it to the fine-leg boundary, or did it make any contact at all? no, it didn't, called wides
ojha to pathan, 1 run, a leading edge as pathan tries to turn it square, lands safely in the off side, they get a single
harbhajan singh to pathan, 2 runs, angling in on middle turned through square leg for a well-run couple
harbhajan singh to pathan, no run, taps it into the off side just wide of the keeper
ojha to juneja, four runs, makes room and finds the boundary after slicing it over point, manprit has played well today but there's only so much he can manage
ojha to juneja, 2 runs, flicked away into the deep past square leg for a couple of runs

malinga to jadhav, out, he's gone now, quite a few caught-and bowleds today, slower one and jadhav struck it straight back to malinga, he fumbled on the first attempt but retained his composure to take it on the second
ojha to nadeem, 1 run, angling in towards middle, makes room and plays it towards point
ojha to nadeem, out, slowed it up considerably did ojha, took a while to get to the batsman, tried to clear extra cover there but played it too early, an easy catch offered to point

malinga to juneja, out, run-out, mumbai have been brilliant in the field today, pushes it to midwicket, wants the single, is sent back and rishi dhawan scores a direct hit at the striker's end, juneja goes for 49, a well-played knock but there was too much to get, mumbai are easing to victory here
pollard to yadav, four runs, swung away over square leg for a boundary, umesh chipping in
pollard to yadav, no run, tries to send that back to delhi, slower one bowled from well behind the stumps, misses
pollard to morkel, six runs, a similar end to each innings today, that's been dispatched for six over deep square leg, but delhi have lost three in three
nannes to mandeep singh, no run, he lets another one go outside off stump, two in a row, it's unlikely there will be a third
nannes to mandeep singh, 1 run, waits for the ball to angle across him and then opens the face to steer towards third man
rajpoot to mandeep singh, 1 leg bye, mandeep tries to whip the ball off his hips but misses and gets hit on the thigh
rajpoot to gilchrist, four runs, gilchrist stays back and pokes tentatively outside off stump, the ball flies off the outside edge to the third man boundary
rajpoot to gilchrist, no run, gilchrist tried to play that on the off side but mis-timed it on the leg side
nannes to mandeep singh, 2 runs, width outside off stump and mandeep slashes, carving the ball in the air towards third man
nannes to mandeep singh, 1 run, played with softer hands towards point for a single
morris to hussey, 1 run, played towards vijay again, for a single
jadeja to hussey, 1 run, bowled slowly on middle stump, driven towards mid off for one more
jadeja to vohra, 1 run, pushed from the crease towards point
jadeja to vohra, no run, defended on the off side
bravo to gurkeerat singh, 1 wide, another one down leg side, the second wide of the over
jadeja to hussey, 1 run, stays back in his crease and plays the ball with the angle into him through midwicket
ashwin to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, played to extra cover for a single
jadeja to gurkeerat singh, 2 runs, swept towards long leg for one more
jadeja to gurkeerat singh, no run, nudged from the crease towards cover. hussey began to run but was sent back
ashwin to hussey, 1 run, driven along the ground towards long off
jadeja to hussey, 1 run, played through midwicket for a single
jadeja to gurkeerat singh, 2 runs, gurkeerat goes back and punches straight past the bowler for two more
jadeja to hussey, no run, he hard and straight back at the bowler
bravo to azhar mahmood, 1 run, a slower ball outside off stump, steered towards third man
bravo to sathish, 1 run, steered from the crease towards third man
bravo to sathish, 2 runs, sathish makes room and drives the ball through cover for a single
morris to awana, 1 run, he wanted to drive straight but got an inside edge towards square leg
nannes to awana, no run, similar ball, similar shot, and similar result. awana backed away and swished outside off stump

nannes to awana, out, that's the end of the innings. awana missed the swing for the fourth time and this time praveen tried to run a bye to dhoni, who was keeping without his right glove so that he could throw quickly and accurately. he hit the stumps direct, running out praveen kumar
kumar to vijay, 1 wide, the start is poor, a leg-side wide. vijay tried to glance but the ball was too far away
kumar to vijay, 1 run, pushed from the crease towards extra cover for a tight single
kumar to hussey, no run, hussey played away from his body at one that swung away from him and the outside edge nearly carried to his brother at a wide second slip
azhar mahmood to vijay, 1 run, awana lets the ball go through his legs at mid-on, vijay stayed in his crease and flicked the ball towards mid-on, really sloppy fielding
azhar mahmood to hussey, 2 runs, hussey stays back and opens the face late to steer the ball towards wide third man, the hussey express steams back for the second
azhar mahmood to vijay, 2 runs, too straight, and vijay stays in his crease and flicks towards deep square
harris to hussey, 1 run, played on the leg side for a single
awana to hussey, no run, pushed towards mid-on, hussey says no to the single
awana to hussey, no run, a stunning stop at cover. hussey's drive was nearly about to pierce the infield at cover but mandeep dived to his right and brought the ball down with one hand
azhar mahmood to vijay, no run, defended from the crease towards midwicket
chawla to vijay, no run, defended back to the bowler
chawla to hussey, no run, put down! hussey chipped the ball back to the bowler, quite tamely. chawla stooped towards his left and shelled it. that was quite easy
chawla to vijay, 1 run, played to point for a single
chawla to hussey, 1 run, payed from the crease on the off side
chawla to vijay, 1 run, waits in his crease and closes the face of the bat to play behind square
harris to vijay, no run, vijay stays back and defends on the leg side
chawla to vijay, no run, played back to the bowler
chawla to vijay, 1 run, played behind point for a single
harris to vijay, no run, defended from the crease on the off side
azhar mahmood to vijay, 1 run, a slower ball on middle stump, vijay stays in his crease and defends on the off side, they run a quick single
azhar mahmood to vijay, 1 run, 110 kph, vijay dabs the slower ball close on the off side and jogs the single to reach his fifty
kumar to hussey, 1 run, the winning run is a single to long off, it's a ten-wicket victory, as emphatic as they come in t20 cricket
singh to gambhir, no run, turned to square leg, again gambhir is rather eager to take the run, not getting it
unadkat to kallis, no run, wider, kallis goes harder at it, mishits the drive to mid off
unadkat to kallis, no run, slower one from unadkat now, kallis surprised, starts to go for the drive, then tries to run it fine in the end, misses
unadkat to kallis, 1 run, walks out now, tries to work it to leg, gets a leading edge to covers for a tight single
henriques to kallis, no run,
henriques to gambhir, 1 run, this came in from outside off, he guides it to third man
muralitharan to gambhir, four runs, gambhir bends the knee and heaves from outside off, and gets enough connection to hit it over mid on
muralitharan to gambhir, no run,
muralitharan to kallis, 1 run, swept from outside off, but straight to deep square
muralitharan to gambhir, no run, comes down the track, tries to push to off, off the inner part of the bat to the bowler
vinay kumar to gambhir, 1 run, dropped softly behind square on off for a quick single
muralitharan to pathan, no run, quicker offbreak nudged to square leg
unadkat to gambhir, 1 run, chopped down to third man for one
henriques to gambhir, 1 run, across and outside off to try it again, sees it wider outside off and runs it to third man
henriques to tiwary, 1 run, runs it wide of backward point for one
unadkat to tiwary, 1 run, away to third man again, safely this time
unadkat to gambhir, 2 runs, dabbed to the keeper's left, whose throw it way off target at the non-striker's, and they take another
muralitharan to tiwary, no run, down the track again, finds midwicket now
unadkat to gambhir, 1 run, this time he cannot beat gayle at backward point, but goes through for one
unadkat to tiwary, 2 runs, neat stop from agarwal at fine leg, tiwary top-edging a swat, bounces and is about to go over the boundary, agarwal jumps and slaps it back in
unadkat to tiwary, no run,
unadkat to tiwary, 1 run, down the track, not much timing as he hits it down to long off
vinay kumar to tiwary, 1 run, steered to third man for a single
vinay kumar to morgan, no run, and another one in the same spot, morgan shuffles across but can only squeeze it back
singh to tiwary, no run, tries to heave it from wide outside off to square leg and misses by a long way

vinay kumar to bhatia, 2 runs, bhatia's creamed this to the right of deep midwicket, who's taken it inside the rope, the momentum has carried him over. but he's got rid of the ball before, lobbing it towards deep square running across
singh to sangwan, no run, he backs away to leg, rp follows him further down leg, he misses with the flick, but that hits the pad on its way to the keeper,
mclaren to gayle, no run, nice, making him play around off, and leaving him with the angle, very close to the outside edge, good bounce too
mclaren to agarwal, 1 wide, now this one is angled in and moves down leg
narine to kohli, 1 run, straightening outside off, pushed wide of cover
narine to kohli, 1 run, keeps strike with a single through the off side
balaji to de villiers, 1 run,
sangwan to gayle, 2 wides, he is ready with a foreboding backlift, but this one is too far outside off, keepre fails to gather
narine to de villiers, four runs, outside edge, past slip, carrom ball moving away, ab had no clue about it
narine to de villiers, no run, misses as he flashes at an offbreak outside off
narine to de villiers, no run, pushed to extra cover
narine to de villiers, no run,
narine to de villiers, no run, beats him outside off with a straighter and quicker one that ab plays well inside the line of, he's had little clue about narine this innings
balaji to gayle, 1 wide, slanted too wide across the left-hander

steyn to warner, out, warner keeps the proud delhi-duck tradition going. has taken from not right where chand left, but he has scored a duck nonetheless. looks to drive hard at this one, the ball swings and hits the inside half of the bat and lobs to mid-on
steyn to jayawardene, no run, superb bowling. wicket-maiden. another outswinger, the edge is soft this time, but white does really well to dive to his right at second slip and field this
sharma to sehwag, 1 run, risky run to get off the mark. pushed hard to mid-off, and charges off. no direct hit, though
steyn to jayawardene, 1 leg bye, another non-swinger, and this time he gets a leg-bye

sharma to sehwag, out, sharma on a hat-trick. delhi people are going after delhi people everywhere. sehwag punches at a wide one, gets a thick edge, white is placed superbly at a wide slip, and he takes a tumbling one
anand rajan to botha, no run, left alone. and this is straight too, but headed down leg. only slightly but still
anand rajan to botha, no run, defended back to him
sharma to juneja, no run, wrsitily flick from just outside off, straight to mid-on
mishra to botha, no run, flatter, just outside off, defended
mishra to juneja, 1 run, flat, middle and leg, defended to leg, takes a single
mishra to pathan, 1 run, driven to long-off for a single this time
mishra to juneja, no run, plays across the line, mishra beats him with the legbreak, but it is clearly pitched on off, and is missing the stumps
anand rajan to juneja, 1 run, steered away to third man for one
anand rajan to pathan, 1 wide, wide down the leg side

mishra to juneja, out, goes for the big drive outside off, not quite to its pitch, and gets a thick edge to point. one for goes. surely he would have scored more with an 'ad' in his name instead of 'un'
perera to pathan, 1 run, tucked away off the hip for a single
anand rajan to jadhav, 1 run, steered away to third man
perera to pathan, 1 run, slower ball, a proper offbreak, turning from outside leg, gets a leading edge towards mid-off
pathan to reddy, no run,
pathan to reddy, no run, swinging in towards off again, defended from the crease
pathan to reddy, no run, goes for the heave-ho, mis-hits it back to pathan
pathan to reddy, 1 wide, this one doesn't swing, angles away, and angles away too wide. called. breaks the maiden

kaul to reddy, out, that's superb fielding. he is gone for all money here. nadeem has stunned reddy. pushed to leg for what looks like a regulation single, but nadeem swoops in from midwicket, and throws it one motion, and direct onto the stumps at the non-striker's end. gone by one frame. closer than what it looked to me, but i would have given this out without the third umpire
kaul to sangakkara, no run, back to normal pace, driven to point
morkel to sangakkara, 1 run, another superb-looking square-drive from sanga. boy is he looking ominous today? however, this one has been stopped by a diving botha at cover-point
morkel to patel, four runs, wristily played. slightly too straight, and he has glanced this fine for four
botha to sangakkara, four runs, lovely chip. sanga is down the wicket, plays a pick-up off the toes. morkel at deep midwicket makes a dive to go for the catch but can't reach it
botha to sangakkara, no run, defended back to him
botha to sangakkara, 1 run, down the wicket to drive this to long-off for one

nadeem to patel, out, leading edge back to nadeem. this is slow in the air again, patel tries to flick it to leg, is early into it, gets a healthy leading edge, and nadeem goes back to the stumps and accepts the dolly
botha to vihari, 1 run, topspinner, vihari goes back to work this to leg
botha to sangakkara, 1 run, driven to long-off for one
nadeem to sangakkara, no run, another leading edge, but this is soft and dies as soon as it leaves the bat
nadeem to white, 1 run, driven nicely to deep cover for one
nadeem to vihari, six runs, clears sid kaul by inches. driven inside-out, towards long-off. kaul is not all the way back, he has had to back-track, and it goes through his fingers for a six
nadeem to vihari, no run, defended back to him
morkel to vihari, no run, driven nicely, but straight to mid-on. another good over for delhi. just two off
nadeem to vihari, 1 run, down the wicket, right to its pitch, drills it back at nadeem, who misfields to allow them the single
nadeem to white, 1 run, placed between cover-point and cover for one
nadeem to vihari, 1 run, down the track again, drives this to long-off for one
morkel to ashish reddy, 1 run, more pace and bounce, guided away past point for one. morkel tumbles in his follow-through, warner dives at point but doesn't get a touch. bodies on the ground
yadav to ashish reddy, four runs, backs away to hit this slower ball between mid-off and cover. not the prettiest of the shots, but i don;t know a team that will turn down these four runs

yadav to ashish reddy, four runs, reddy is backing away to everything, but it is working. this time he gets a thick edge that flies over the keeper and the slip. now the asking rate is close to a run a ball
morkel to mishra, no run, slower ball again, gets extra bounce, hits the higher part of the bat

pathan to mishra, 2 runs, they are appealing for obstructing the field. mishra tries the ramp, is hit on the back of his bat, to cover. perera wants the single, mishra responds, and the throw hits his back. now we don't know if mishra changed his line. mishra is fine. he never looked at the fielder, and never changed direction. and sunrisers are so desperate they take the overthrow off the body. mahela jayawardene is letting his displeasure known. just to rub it in, mishra is hit on the back when taking the second too
yadav to steyn, 1 run, slower ball, gets a leading edge from steyn, concedes a single to third man
nannes to gayle, 1 wide, down the leg side and it's called a wide, gayle tries to clip that fine but can't make contact
morris to agarwal, 1 run, angling in towards middle, that's defended wide of extra cover for a single
morris to gayle, no run, on the stumps this time, pushed back towards the bowler
sharma to kohli, no run, angling in towards middle, gets across and drives it towards mid-on
morris to kohli, four runs, width and kohli cashes in, opens up and flays that over the in-field on the off side for a one bounce four
ashwin to kohli, no run, flatter on the off, takes it from the off and turns it away to midwicket
ashwin to kohli, no run, flatter and straight on middle, flicked away towards square leg from the crease, can't beat the in-field
ashwin to kohli, 1 run, turns it away through midwicket into the deep for a single
ashwin to agarwal, 1 run, goes on straight, punches that through extra cover into the deep for a single, tidy start for ashwin
jadeja to agarwal, 1 run, slipped it flat on middle, gets a thick inside edge as he tries to play that through cover, past midwicket for a single
ashwin to agarwal, 1 run, appeared to come off the back of the hand and turned in, the offspinner, chopped past point for a single

ashwin to agarwal, 1 wide, out, a leg-side stumping, dhoni was smooth on that, flat delivery bowled outside leg, agarwal charged out and then had to change direction but failed to make contact, dhoni collected and took out the bails, wide signalled but chennai won't mind that
jadeja to kohli, 1 run,
jadeja to de villiers, 1 run, makes room does ab and chips it past extra cover for a single
ashwin to kohli, 1 run, lovely wristwork by kohli, charged out to whip that from the off stump but struck it on the bounce to deep midwicket
ashwin to kohli, 1 run, slowed it up and held it back, comes down the track and punches it to long-off for a single
ashwin to de villiers, 1 run, fired down the leg side and ab will feel he missed out there, swept it straight down to deep backward square leg for a single
ashwin to kohli, 2 runs, flicked away through square leg into the deep for a couple more runs
nannes to de villiers, no run, some width there and he mistimes it, gets a thick inside edge back to the bowler
bravo to kohli, 1 run, dropped, bravo tried to snap that one with his left hand, kohli mistimed it back towards him and bravo reacted in time but couldn't hold on in his follow through

bravo to kohli, 2 runs, slower one on leg stump, tickled, uppishly, through square leg for a well-run couple, kohli is made to work hard for the second as hussey sends out a powerful throw, hits kohli's bat

bravo to kohli, 1 run, slower one bowled round the wicket on middle, flicked through midwicket for a single to bring up his half-century, a fluent one but also fortuitous, was caught-behind earlier in his innings
bravo to rampaul, 1 wide, wide, has to reach for that one, tries to square-drive that past point, doesn't get his bat to it
bravo to rampaul, 1 wide, wide again, has to reach out to play that one, too wide outside off stump
bravo to rampaul, no run, angling in towards middle and it's been pushed back to the bowler

bravo to rampaul, out, rampaul goes, dismissed by his team-mate, outside off and he chases that one, gets a thick edge and dhoni dives low to his left to complete a sharp catch, bravo celebrates in typical bravo style, a jig on the middle of the pitch
bravo to arun karthik, 2 runs, slower one on the off, drags that over midwicket into the deep for a couple of runs
morris to de villiers, six runs, that's disappeared, picked the slower one and gave it a good whack, smashed it from the crease over the deep midwicket boundary, brings up his half-century
nannes to arun karthik, no run, swing and a miss again, got across to swing it over midwicket, again made no contact
nannes to arun karthik, 1 run, tries to swing that past midwicket, got an inside edge onto the show for a single
singh to hussey, no run, in the channel outside off stump, leaves that one to the keeper, moved away a bit
singh to hussey, no run, bowled in the channel again, not a lot of width there, shoulders arms to that one as well as it moved away
rampaul to raina, no run, appeal for lbw but that would have missed leg, swinging in, lands on leg and would have gone down, replays show it pitched outside leg in fact, tried to flick it and missed
rampaul to raina, 1 run, raina moves a little across to turn it away towards fine leg for a single

christian to badrinath, 1 no ball, christian bowls a no-ball, freehit coming, guides that one into the off side, dot ball, harsh call from asad rauf who called that a no-ball, christian had not overstepped, a part of his foot was behind the line at the time of landing
christian to badrinath, 1 run, angling towards middle and leg, flicks it behind square for a single
christian to raina, no run, straighter on middle, gets a little across and plays it towards midwicket
kartik to raina, 1 run, flatter on middle, swung away towards deep midwicket for a single
kartik to badrinath, 1 run, flicks that one through midwicket into the deep for a single
syed mohammad to raina, 1 run, crunches it down to long-off for a single
syed mohammad to badrinath, 1 leg bye, gets across to turn it fine, gets a leg-bye
kartik to badrinath, no run, chops that one behind point, no single on offer there
kartik to badrinath, 2 runs, punches that through midwicket for a well-run couple
kartik to raina, 1 run, raina gently tucks it around the corner for a single
syed mohammad to dhoni, 1 run, gets across to that straight delivery and turns it past square leg for a single
kartik to badrinath, 1 run, taps it wide of extra cover for one more
kartik to dhoni, 1 run, turns it into the leg side in the direction of square leg for a single
syed mohammad to dhoni, no run, flatter from syed there and dhoni, who charged out, had to adjust and ended up playing it back to the bowler
syed mohammad to dhoni, 1 wide, lucky to get away with that one, dhoni was looking to help it fine, down the leg side, called a wide
singh to jadeja, 1 run, straight on middle and leg, flicks it through square leg into the deep for a single
vinay kumar to jadeja, 2 runs, slower one outside off, guides it wide of point in the direction of third man, jadeja scampers back for the second
vinay kumar to jadeja, 2 runs, drives it down towards long-off and guess what, kohli misfields in the deep to concede another run, two to chennai
vinay kumar to dhoni, 1 wide, wide ball, just past that marker on the off side, called by the umpire
vinay kumar to jadeja, 2 runs, slower one bowled on middle, turned away past midwicket into the deep for a couple more runs
rampaul to morris, 2 runs, a couple, comes down the track and cracks that through extra cover into the deep for two more runs, kl rahul, the substitute, has done a good job so far
rampaul to morris, 2 runs, morris flicks that past square leg for a couple to keep strike
steyn to bisla, 1 run, makes a bit of room to force that through the off side, gets a thick inside edge towards fine leg for a single
steyn to bisla, 1 run, angling in towards middle, turns it wide of the diving mishra at mid-on for a single

vihari to bisla, 1 leg bye, struck him in line, appeal for lbw, may have pitched outside leg, ooh, appears to have just pitched in line, marginal call there, he tried to turn the face and missed the ball, close call, really close
steyn to bisla, 1 run, nips away after pitching, opened the face at the right time and guided it towards third man for a single
i sharma to gambhir, 2 runs, gambhir makes room to crack that through cover, got an inside edge and scampered back for the second as it rolled towards fine leg
i sharma to bisla, four runs, bisla had made up his mind, charged out and just chipped that over mid-on for a boundary
i sharma to bisla, no run, tried to open the face there but didn't make contact, just went past the outside edge
mishra to gambhir, four runs, picked the gap, raises the fifty with a boundary, comes down the track and smacks it over midwicket
mishra to gambhir, no run, flatter on the off, he's pushed that back towards the bowler
kv sharma to gambhir, 1 run, on the off stump, turned away past square leg for a single
perera to gambhir, 1 wide, slower one but bowled down the leg side, misses, called a wide
perera to kallis, 1 run, that's been turned into the leg side for a single
perera to gambhir, 1 run, angling in towards middle, tickles it past square leg for a single
i sharma to morgan, 2 runs, morgan scampers back for the second, guided that one wide of third man and rushed back for two, took on the fielder in the deep, mishra was the man
perera to morgan, 1 wide, down the leg side and it's called a wide, again more round-arm
perera to morgan, 1 leg bye, down the leg side and he'll feel he missed out there, gets a leg-bye as he tries to swing it over square leg
steyn to morgan, 1 wide, too wide from steyn, a slower ball gone bad, called one by the umpire
steyn to kallis, four runs, four more for kallis, tries to go downtown but gets a thick outside edge past the keeper to the third-man boundary, steyn smiles
balaji to white, no run, angling in towards middle, white gets a little across and pushes it back down the pitch to the bowler
balaji to white, 1 leg bye, angling in towards middle and leg, tries to clip that one fine, gets a leg-bye
balaji to white, 1 run, angling in towards middle and leg, turns it through square leg for a single
balaji to patel, 1 run, parthiv comes down the track and mistimes an attempted drive, gets it past the bowler for a single
balaji to white, 1 run, angling in towards middle, turns it away past midwicket for a single into the deep for one more
senanayake to white, 1 run, chopped into the off side for a single
senanayake to white, 1 run, presses that one away for a single
senanayake to patel, 1 run, pushed away into the off side for a single
senanayake to white, 1 run, on middle and leg and he drives it wide of mid-on for a single
narine to white, 1 run, the offspinner on middle, drives it through midwicket into the deep for a single
narine to white, 1 run, ooh, got a slight leading edge as he tried to turn the face, just wide of extra cover for a quick single
senanayake to patel, 1 wide, senanayake slips that one down the leg side, called a wide
senanayake to patel, 1 run, a bit more air on that one, parthiv plays that from the crease, turns it past square leg for a single
senanayake to patel, 1 run, parthiv turns that towards narine at mid-on for a single
bhatia to patel, 1 run, difficult to get hold of those, the slower one, he's a tricky bowler to face when he takes the pace off, parthiv strikes that on the bounce towards long-off

kallis to patel, no run, run-out attempt, pushed towards extra cover, parthiv wanted the single, morgan dived to his left and returned a throw to the keeper as parthiv was sent back, bisla took off the bails, the throw was a little wide and parthiv was back in
bhatia to white, four runs, this time he makes room and punches that superbly between long-off and deep extra cover for a one bounce four, middled it this time
bhatia to sangakkara, 1 run, chips his first delivery just wide of extra cover for a single
kallis to ravi teja, 1 wide, slower one bowled down the leg side, called a wide
kallis to sangakkara, 1 run, turns it towards square leg from the crease for a single, kallis keeping it tight

narine to perera, four runs, morgan missed it in the floodlights! that was struck flat and he seemed to get under it to complete what would have been a comfortable catch, but, at the last moment, he was distracted by the glare and completely missed the ball
narine to perera, 1 run, this one turns away, slaps it towards deep cover for one more
balaji to ravi teja, 1 run, ravi teja swivels and whips that towards fine leg for just the single
balaji to perera, 1 run, perera cracks that from the off towards deep midwicket for a single
senanayake to ashish reddy, 1 run, strikes the umpire as he hits it back past the bowler, just the single

senanayake to perera, 1 run, dropped, really tough chance though, perera tried to go over midwicket, got a leading edge and it was in the air for some time, senanayake had to run back, kept his eyes on it but it just evaded him as he reached for it as it landed
senanayake to ashish reddy, out, bowled'im! slower through the air, reddy came down to track to swing this over midwicket, it turned in, he missed and was bowled through the gate
narine to perera, 1 run, gets an inside edge as he tries to swing it towards leg, a single
narine to kv sharma, no run, tries to guide it past point, plays it down towards the keeper instead
kallis to kv sharma, 1 run, slower one bowled on leg stump, turns it past square leg for a single
kallis to perera, out, the leg stump has been knocked out, perera swung hard at that one, was eyeing cow corner, missed and heard the death rattle
bhatia to kv sharma, 3 wides, down the leg side and that's a wide, the keeper fumbles as well
bhatia to kv sharma, 1 run, crunched past extra cover for a single
bhatia to kv sharma, no run, swing and a miss and it's all over
sreesanth to mandeep singh, 2 wides, wild delivery down the leg side this time, the keeper dives and gets a hand to it, parries it down to fine leg
sreesanth to vohra, 1 run, another dab and another quick run, this time towards mid-off
chandila to vohra, no run, and again, this time the batsman pushes it towards the non-striker where the bowler fields
cooper to hussey, four runs, and he is greeted with a slap through midwicket by hussey. the fielder at midwicket misfielded actually, the ball went through him

cooper to hussey, 2 runs, slower delivery outside off, the batsman is again making room and ends up slicing this one over the infield, he is lucky as it just drops down before watson from cover can get to it
faulkner to gurkeerat singh, no run, oh another beauty, this one again carries on with the angle and the batsman plays inside the line
trivedi to hussey, 1 run, keeps it tight on off stump line, the batsman dabs it towards cover where cooper misfields, but the fielder from the deep charges in to prevent the extra run
sreesanth to sathish, no run, keeps it there around the off stump, he is really testing the batsman although this was not very quick. the batsman defends it to off
trivedi to sathish, 1 run, good away going delivery outside off, the slower pace on that allows the batsman to adjust late and steer it to third man
trivedi to hussey, 2 runs, takes the pace off this one too, but hussey chops it down to deep backward point for a couple
trivedi to hussey, 2 runs, another slower delivery that the batsman pushes towards mid-on with soft-hands, sathish is quick to turn back for a second
trivedi to hussey, 1 run, he waits in the crease and opens the face of the bat very late to steer it to third man

trivedi to hussey, out, fumble, but dravid takes it on the second attempt! mr. hussey has driven the slower delivery straight to mid-off where dravid goes low to take it, but palms it over his head. much to the relief of the bowler, he holds on to it in the second attempt..
trivedi to chawla, 1 run, bowls a slower delivery which chawla steers to third man for a single
cooper to chawla, 1 run, slower delivery wide outside off stump, the batsman punches it down to long-off
cooper to azhar mahmood, 1 run,
faulkner to azhar mahmood, four runs, he moves outside leg and punches the angled delivery through extra cover. it seemed like a push, but the ball sped across the turf
faulkner to azhar mahmood, 1 run, makes room again, this time he hits it squarer, to the fielder at deep cover
cooper to kumar, 5 wides, bowls a slower delivery, but this one is down the leg side. the keeper dives and gets to it, but doesn't get behind it. it runs down to the boundary at fine leg
cooper to kumar, no run, another slower delivery, this time it is outside off and it beats the bat
kumar to watson, 1 run, now this one goes the other way outside off, the batsman steers it down to third man
kumar to rahane, no run, he comes back and across to whip it to the leg side, but ends up pushing it back to the bowler
harris to watson, 1 wide, now harris starts by slipping it down the leg side
harris to watson, no run, and to complete it all, a play and a miss off an excellent delivery outside off that leaves the batsman and squares him up
harris to watson, four runs, he bowls it a little straight and that is enough for watson to punch it through midwicket, it speeds along the turf
harris to watson, 1 wide, walks across the stumps, but harris bowls it down the leg stump
harris to hodge, no run, and another rising delivery outside off, the batsman goes back and defends it towards cover
azhar mahmood to samson, 1 run, he walks across the stumps again, gets a slower ball outside leg stump that he dabs towards deep midwicket for a single
harris to rahane, no run, he dances down the pitch and tries to slam it over the infield, but makes no connection..
balaji to gilchrist, 1 wide, that one's down the leg side, kkr start with a wide, punjab are off the mark
balaji to gilchrist, no run, almost a wide again, this time on the off, but the umpire gives the bowler the benefit of the dount there, marginal call, gilly lets it go
balaji to gilchrist, no run, slashed away, straight to point though, some width on that one and gilchrist goes hard at it, struck straight to the fielder
kallis to mandeep singh, no run, bowls that one in the channel outside off and he leaves that one be
narine to vohra, no run, may have been the carrom ball, on the off and appeared to go the other way, pushed into the off side
senanayake to mandeep singh, no run, quicker through the air on middle, tapped away into the off side
kallis to vohra, 1 run, slower one on the off, pushes it through cover for a single
kallis to mandeep singh, 1 run, bowling slow seems the way to go here, comes down the track and punches it through cover into the deep
kallis to vohra, 1 run, pushed away into the off side from the crease
bhatia to vohra, 1 run, knocked away for a single
bhatia to mandeep singh, 1 leg bye, slower one bowled on middle and leg, tickled into the leg side for a single
bhatia to mandeep singh, 1 run, comes down the pitch and drives that uppishly past the bowler to long-off for a single
bhatia to vohra, 2 runs, slower one on middle, pushed through past midwicket into the deep for a well-run couple
balaji to mandeep singh, 2 runs, third man is up, narine's not the greatest fielder of all time, he fumbles as he tries to cit that past him, a couple more for punjab
balaji to mandeep singh, 1 run, angling in towards middle, pushed in the direction of mid-on for a single
balaji to hussey, 1 run, hussey presses that one away to get off the mark
bhatia to hussey, 1 run, punches that one towards long-off for a single
bhatia to hussey, 1 run, slower ball, a bit of width, cracked towards deep cover for just the single
bhatia to mandeep singh, 1 run, slower one on middle, pushed through midwicket for a single
kallis to hussey, no run, slower one on the off, pushed it towards extra cover
kallis to miller, 1 run, flicks that one towards fine leg for another single
bhatia to miller, 1 run, struck him outside leg stump as he tried to work that past midwicket, appeared to get an inside edge
bhatia to miller, 1 run, miller knocks that one away for a single to keep strike
senanayake to miller, no run, angling in towards middle, drives it back towards the bowler
narine to azhar mahmood, out, gone first ball, mahmood heads back, appeared to go straight on, tried to turn the face first ball, got a leading edge and offered the simplest of catches back to narine

narine to gurkeerat singh, out, narine has grabbed a hat-trick, gurkeerat is clueless about the carrom ball, fired that in quick, landed on middle and turned away as he again, tried to turn the face to play it into the leg side. he missed and the off stump was pegged back, kkr on top now
senanayake to gony, four runs, another leading edge, gony closes the face on senanayake this time and gets away, went past slip to the third-man boundary, long chase for kallis from slip

senanayake to miller, out, the spinners are turning it on for kkr, miller just missed that, went on straight, on middle and leg and he rocked back to whip it through midwicket, just seemed late on that one, missed and the leg stump was knocked back
narine to gony, 1 run,
narine to chawla, no run, pushes that back towards the bowler
narine to gony, no run, lovely delivery from narine again, that turned away and gony tried to open the face on that one
narine to gony, 1 run, flicked away through midwicket into the deep for a single
narine to chawla, no run, a bit of width on that one, chawla just drives that back towards the bowler
balaji to gony, 2 runs, guides that one to point, gambhir throws at the non-striker's end, misses, and they get an overthrow
balaji to gony, no run, swing and a miss, the shot was on it seemed, tried to clear midwicket again did gony but didn't connect, didn't bounce as much as he would have liked
balaji to gony, no run, slower one this time, a slower bounce and gony had readied himself for a big one over midwicket, missed
narine to chawla, 1 wide, called a wide, landed well outside off and turned away, chawla missed
kallis to chawla, 1 bye, they steal a bye, tries to smack a slower one over midwicket, misses
kumar to gambhir, no run, comes down the track and tries to drive that through the covers, misses

azhar mahmood to kallis, out, early success for mahmood as well, mandeep holds on to a sharp chance at extra cover, kallis made room there, loves to hit through extra cover, strikes it well but can't get it past mandeep singh who holds on to a toughie
azhar mahmood to gambhir, four runs, lovely shot, a bit of width for gambhir and he cracked that superbly between the two points, excellent timing
kumar to morgan, 1 run, chopped behind square on the off side for a single
kumar to morgan, 2 runs, slowish outside off, comes down the track and pushes that one past midwicket, the fielder in the deep takes a while to get to it and they come back for the second
gony to gambhir, 1 run, tried to drive that on up past extra cover, got an inside edge, morgan wanted the single and ran through, gambhir reacted late but no damage done
gony to morgan, no run, opened the face nicely there while trying to play it past backward point, found the fielder however
chawla to gambhir, 1 run, tickles that one through square leg for one more
awana to morgan, no run, goes hard at that one, in the channel outside off and he was looking to square-drive that one, missed
chawla to morgan, 1 run, swept straight to deep square leg this time
chawla to gambhir, 1 run, waits for that one to turn in and chops it past point for a single
gony to gambhir, 2 runs, gambhir brings up his half-century, turns that away through square leg for two more runs, been very consistent this ipl
chawla to gambhir, 1 run, turns that one through square leg for a single
gony to tiwary, no run, angling in towards middle, defends that one towards extra cover from the crease
azhar mahmood to morgan, 1 wide, starts off with a wide down the leg side
azhar mahmood to morgan, 2 runs, morgan comes down the track and just chips that over midwicket for a couple of runs
azhar mahmood to morgan, out, gone this time, tried to turn this one away as well, got a leading edge this time however, hussey at extra cover made no mistake
gony to pathan, 1 wide, down the leg side, tries to turn it down fine, called a wide there
gony to pathan, no run, slower one bowled just over leg stump, yusuf let that go but it wasn't a wide, landed on middle and leg, that
awana to das, 1 run, turns that towards midwicket, bowled at 133.8kmph, for a single, hussey picks up and throws at the non-striker's end, misses, would have been close
awana to pathan, four runs, slower one and yusuf flat-bats that hard over mid-off, that man is inside the circle and he crashed that for a one bounce four
azhar mahmood to bhatia, 1 run, sliding it straight, gets across to flick it square into the deep for a single
rampaul to sehwag, no run, sehwag spots width, flashes, and misses an away going, bouncing ball
singh to warner, 1 wide, away swinger wide outside off, warner goes hard at it, but it is too far away
singh to warner, four runs, now he waits, width again from rp, and warner calmly eases it past covers
rampaul to sehwag, 1 run, slight width and sehwag awkwardly steers it to third man
rampaul to warner, no run,
vinay kumar to juneja, no run,
vinay kumar to jayawardene, no run, sharp, that took off, mahela decided early to sway out of the line
vinay kumar to jayawardene, no run,
mcdonald to juneja, 1 run, stretches out to a widish one and drives it to wide long off
unadkat to jayawardene, no run, pushed away and finds kohli at point once more
unadkat to jayawardene, no run, can't get it past kohli at the moment, mahela wants the single, juneja sends him back, mahela tries one more time, before he turns back, throw misses
syed mohammad to juneja, no run, flat and widish, he flashes it to extra cover
syed mohammad to juneja, 1 run, angled in from wide of the crease, he moves across to work to leg
unadkat to jayawardene, 1 run, about four men, four of them converge to field this inside edge to backward square leg, one fumbles, another picks it up, the rest have a laugh about it
unadkat to rohrer, no run,
unadkat to jayawardene, 1 run, mahela can't time it at the moment, tries to work to leg, takes the run as it rolls to off
syed mohammad to jayawardene, 1 run, mahela is having problems with the running as well, dabs this last to backward point and has to really hurry in the end
unadkat to jayawardene, no run, how many times has mahela run the ball to point today, one more for the collection
vinay kumar to jadhav, 1 run, walks across and outside off and turns it to square leg
nehra to gayle, 1 run, straightening and bouncing outside off, he moves across to push for a single behind point
nehra to rahul, no run, swings in and catches him by surprise, flicks the pad on its way to the keeper
nehra to rahul, no run, straightening around off, and pushed awkwardly towards cover
nehra to rahul, no run, pushed back to the bowler
morkel to gayle, no run, slanted wider across gayle, who makes no attempt to reach it
morkel to gayle, no run, this time he fishes for it close to off, but it zips through and moves slightly away past the outside edge
nehra to rahul, no run, chopped towards slip
morkel to kohli, 2 runs, turned  behind square leg, kohli has to really tear back for the second as he realises the throw is coming in fast

morkel to kohli, 3 runs, all happening, kohli confidently pushes through extra cover, the chase is long but fruitful as  run is saved. kohli rams into the umpire on the third, and is left rubbing his shoulder, umpire erasmus took the brunt of the impact with kohli's helmet, wonder how's doing
nehra to kohli, no run, thick inside edge behind the stumps as he pushes at one angled across
nehra to kohli, 1 run, opens the face and runs it to third man
nehra to de villiers, six runs, over backward point, ab getting down on the knee and slicing it high, and his timing is almost always special
