pathan to de villiers, no run, driven down to mid on
pathan to de villiers, four runs, exquisite, ab has used the angle across, and despite no width, has sent it crisply into the gap at extra cover with a meaty punch
pathan to de villiers, no run, pushed back to the bowler
pathan to de villiers, 1 run, pushed down to long off
pathan to de villiers, four runs, sweet, ab on the knee and pinging the deep extra cover rope
yadav to kohli, 1 run, turned behind square leg
yadav to de villiers, no run, width but he's slapped it straight to backward point
nadeem to de villiers, 1 run, stayed in the crease as this came in with the angle, thick inside edge towards midwicket
nadeem to kohli, no run,
nadeem to de villiers, 1 run, goes deep to whip it from off to deep midwicket
nadeem to kohli, no run, that turned, past the outside edge just outside off
nadeem to kohli, no run, eases a push to backward point
pathan to de villiers, 1 run, direct hit was needed, rohrer dived and stopped a solid punch to his right, but he was off balance as he threw at the non-striker's
nehra to kohli, 1 run, squeezes it from off stump behind point with an open face
yadav to kohli, no run, played by one on top of his game, takes a step out and flays it on the bounce to point
yadav to de villiers, out, that is gone, ab is running straight off, he took on morne from mid off after a forcing hit to the fast bowler, was always going to struggle, and this was a direct hit
nadeem to arun karthik, 1 run, this push was in the air for a long time, but there was no mid off, long off fields
nadeem to kohli, no run, quick and spinning away outside off, defended
morkel to arun karthik, 1 run, direct hit and he was stranded miles outside, pushed one to backward point and set off, warner just missed, they take the overthrow
morkel to kohli, 1 run, pushed  behind point for one
morkel to arun karthik, no run, opened him up with one holding its line, thick edge to backward point
pathan to rampaul, 2 runs, nadeem has raced across from long off and slid to save the boundary off a rampaul straight hit, two taken
pathan to rampaul, 1 bye, we have a super over, rampaul has missed again, but they have kept rcb in it with a scampered bye
johnson to rahane, 1 wide, down the leg side, there was a little swing for johnson but started from around the middle-stump line, wide called
malinga to rahane, no run, and again, like the first delivery, there was a bit of swing away from the bat and rahane taps it to the backward point region

johnson to watson, four runs, edged and through the slips cordon for a four! it was a widish ball from mj and watson goes hard at it, despite the presence of two slips there it flies away to the fence
johnson to watson, 1 run, better this time, opens the face of the bat and guides it through to third-man for a single
dhawan to watson, 1 run, extra bounce for dhawan and watson's had to fend it away to the leg side, gets a single to the leg side
pollard to yagnik, 1 wide, down the leg side and goes further down for a wide

pollard to yagnik, four runs, leading edge and it goes off for the second such boundary! it was from round the stumps and the left-hander was looking to flick it to the leg side, but the edge flies through point and beats the third-man fielder
pollard to yagnik, 2 runs, and now chipped over the in-field for a couple of runs to mid-wicket
harbhajan singh to yagnik, no run, slower from harbhajan from round the stumps, turn away from the batsman and it rolls over to the off side
harbhajan singh to yagnik, 1 run, tries to work it over the mid-wicket, gets it away for a single
harbhajan singh to yagnik, no run, slowing it down well and there are a few which are turning, like this one, and yagnik tries to tap and run, sent back by rahane
pollard to rahane, no run, goes wide on the crease and gets it to come back into the batsman, taps it to the leg side
pollard to rahane, 1 wide, down the leg side and going further down, called wide
dhawan to yagnik, 2 runs, easily pushed away to the fine-leg for a couple of runs, well tucked away, well run too
dhawan to yagnik, 1 wide, down the leg side and that's a wide, getting a tad rattled here
dhawan to rahane, no run, slower ball and he was walking down the track to smack it over, missed by the batsman
malinga to rahane, 1 run, slower from malinga and easily played down to fine-leg for a single to bring up a 33-ball 50 run stand
harbhajan singh to rahane, 1 run, he's quickly down the track yet again and pushes it over to long-off for a single
johnson to rahane, 1 wide, starts off with a wide, from round the stumps and angling down the leg-side, rahane fails to get any bat on it
johnson to rahane, 1 run, better from johnson, outside the off and he taps it away to the point fielder, quickly runs across for a single
johnson to binny, 1 run, outside the off stump, and that's almost caught! there was one fielder running out from the inside the circle and another coming from outside, none of them got close
johnson to rahane, 2 runs,
johnson to rahane, 1 run, and now he opens the face of the bat, tapped away for a single
johnson to binny, no run, wanted to go after it but the drive doesn't materialise, fails to get any bat on it

johnson to binny, 2 runs, opens the face of the bat and guides it to the third-man region where they should have gotten themselves a single, instead they rush back for a second. harbhajan fails to get it back in time...

ojha to rahane, 1 run, out, and rahane was trying to go down again, gets an inside edge and there's an appeal for a run-out! out, the batsman's out by a yard, they were going for the second to johnson's arm, he came in quickly and lets it loose at the non-striker's end where ojha gathers it well and whips the bails away, binny's gone!
ojha to hodge, 1 run, defended to a delivery from ojha to the off side and they are away for a quick single
ojha to rahane, 1 run, another shimmy down the pitch but he's struggling to get them away is rahane, pushed to the extra-cover region for a single
harbhajan singh to rahane, 1 run, quicker from harbhajan and rahane is only able to hit it to long-off for a single
harbhajan singh to hodge, 1 wide, quicker one but down the leg-side and it's a wide this time
harbhajan singh to rahane, 1 run, and at the other end rahane continues to pick the singles, played away to the leg side
ojha to rahane, 1 run, and again, rahane's doing his best to get some away but he's just not getting them off the middle, inside edged to the leg side
ojha to hodge, 1 run, another one tapped to the off side and another stroking shot which is only a single

malinga to rahane, 2 runs, up in the air and that's a drop! it beat rahane there, the ball scooped high up in the air and falls between malinga and tendulkar! both could have caught it and both didn't get a hand!
johnson to hodge, 1 run, and this time was opening his stance up and was looking to play it over the off side, gets a bit of an inside edge, they run throught for a single
chandila to ponting, 1 run, pushed down to deep mid-wicket for a single to get off the mark too now ponting
chandila to tendulkar, 2 leg byes, on the middle stump but spinning down the leg side, hits the pad and rolls down to fine-leg for a couple of leg-byes
chavan to ponting, no run, in the air and it lands between the bowler and mid-on, almost a wicket!
chandila to ponting, 1 run, pushed to the off side and this time they are away for a quickly taken run

chandila to ponting, out, and he's gone now, ponting's gone, caught and bowled! this is excellent stuff from the royals, and from chandila, the batsman was struggling throughout against him and this time he lobs up a simple catch back to the bowler, easily taken and mumbai indians are two down very quickly!
chavan to karthik, no run, turn away from the batsman, he was looking to defend and misses the outside edge
chavan to karthik, no run, quicker this time, looking to turn it away from the leg side, does not get any bat on it
chavan to karthik, four runs, goes down the track and smashes it over the mid-on fielder for a four! finally a shot in anger that has the desired result for the batsman!
chavan to karthik, 1 run, flicked away to the leg side for a single now to end the over
faulkner to karthik, four runs, shot from karthik and goes for a four! it was pitched right up to the bat and the batsman goes over the bowler's head, very, very straight and for a four!
faulkner to sharma, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and guides it to third-man for a single, gets off the mark with that too
chavan to sharma, no run, whoa, gets it to spin and beats the outside edge, the track's helping the slower bowlers here
trivedi to pollard, no run, oooh, and now some swing! pollard's at five and he was looking to defend it, the ball swings away from the batsman, beats his outside edge!
trivedi to pollard, no run, and again, would you believe it, it's a maiden, trivedi's got a wicket first ball and bowled five really good deliveries at pollard, who defends the last one too
binny to karthik, 2 runs, pushed to the off side for a couple of runs to the off side

binny to pollard, out, bowled him now, pollard's bowled and mumbai are in trouble or what! it was a straighter one from binny and there was a bit of swing there from the bowler, the ball through and pollard's middle stump has been pegged back!
binny to rayudu, four runs, edged and gone for four! there should have been a slip but there isn't and that's run away pretty quickly!
trivedi to rayudu, 2 runs, on the middle stump and tapped away to the leg side by rayadu, that's played well and run equally well, couple of runs for the batsman
trivedi to rayudu, no run, almost squares him up, could have got a leading edge but it goes straight back to mid-off
trivedi to rayudu, no run, on the middle stump and tapped to the leg side, not getting too many off the middle of the bat, the pitch seems to have gotten really slow
binny to rayudu, no run, outside the off stump and lets it go through to the keeper
binny to karthik, 1 run, another single to the off side which takes the required rate up to almost 13.5

trivedi to rayudu, no run, almost! a run-out chance there! it was tapped to the off side and karthik was running down the pitch from the non-striker's end, was sent back and luckily for him the throw does not hit!
trivedi to karthik, four runs, some respite, a slower one and this time karthik was waiting for it, flicks it over square-leg for a four!
cooper to karthik, 2 runs, opens the face of the bat, gets it to third-man for a couple of runs, fielded well by hodge there
cooper to karthik, 1 run, slower one from cooper and that's dabbed away gently to the leg side for a single
cooper to karthik, 1 run, and opens the face of the bat yet again to guide it to the third-man fielder for a single
faulkner to karthik, 1 run, slower one from the bowler, tapped away to the off side for a single
faulkner to karthik, 2 runs, tries to go over the top and the outside edge rushes to the deep point fielder, the fielder had a long run inside and they are able to come back for the second
faulkner to rayudu, no run, he continues to go down the track, but misses the outside edge, not getting anything off the middle of the bat here
faulkner to rayudu, 1 run, tapped to the off side and for a single, takes rayadu on to 17 as ends an over that costs 5
binny to rayudu, 1 run, outside the off stump, opens the face of the bat through to third-man for a single
binny to rayudu, no run, and some swing! wow! it's the 14th over of the innings, and while it is one thing to have a slow pitch, it's quite another to see one that swings too! beats the outside edge

binny to rayudu, out, gone now, run-out, don't know though! that's gone, one of them is gone, flicked away to the leg side by rayadu and he was off for a single, harbhajan was never interested and both the batsmen were at the same end! both were at hand-shaking distance from each other although at that stage it seemed like they wanted to do anything but shake hands, in the end the third umpire has to intervene and send harbhajan on his way!
binny to johnson, no run, inside edge now and it has not carried through to the keeper, wow, some more swing!
trivedi to johnson, no run, a very slower one, johnson looked to be winding up for a big blow but had to check his shot in the end
cooper to johnson, 1 run, slower ball from cooper and it was flicked away by johnson, again the ball never came on to the bat and he did not entirely go through the shot
faulkner to malinga, no run, slower one from faulker and pushed to the off side
faulkner to malinga, no run, another back of the hand slower one, gets an inside edge through to the keeper
faulkner to malinga, no run, down the leg side and gets a bit of pad on that one, caught by the keeper but it wasn't off the bat.
faulkner to malinga, no run, defended on the leg side, he wanted a single but was sent back.
cooper to malinga, no run, a very slow one from cooper and malinga could have played his shot twice, misses, through on the second or third bounce to the keeper
cooper to malinga, 1 wide, down the leg side and it was another slow ball, malinga fails to get a bat on that, wide called
cooper to malinga, 1 run,
faulkner to malinga, out, ...but this time he's gone, on the stumps and malinga misses, the leg stump is sent cartwheeling and rajasthan have won the most comfortable of games here
nadeem to hussey, 1 run,
nadeem to vijay, no run, driven hard, but straight to point
nadeem to vijay, no run,
pathan to hussey, no run,
pathan to hussey, four runs,
pathan to hussey, 1 run,
pathan to vijay, 1 run,
morkel to hussey, 1 wide, down the leg side and that's a wide, swing back into the left-hander there
morkel to hussey, no run, outside the off stump and left alone by the batsman, lot of bounce there for morkel
morkel to hussey, no run, and again, left alone, shoulder arms by watching it the last moment and collected by the keeper
morkel to hussey, no run, and another one left alone, seeing out what is a good spell this from morkel
morkel to hussey, 2 runs, and for a change he goes after it, is able to glide it away through backward point for a couple of runs, well fielded by yadav
yadav to vijay, 1 run, wide outside the off and up to the bat, he goes for a drive but manages to slice it to the third-man fielder, ajit agarkar gets his hands to it
yadav to hussey, no run, outside the off stump and tapped to the extra-cover region
morkel to raina, no run, tucked away to the leg side but straight to the fielder
pathan to hussey, four runs, width from pathan and exquisitely played from hussey, bit of bent feet and driven through the covers for a four
pathan to hussey, 1 run, swing away from the bowler and opens the face of the bat, guides it down to the third-man region for a four

sehwag to raina, four runs, and a four this time, it was a mere chip over the bowler's head and it's gone all the way to the fence, good shot to end what was turning out to be a decent over from sehwag
agarkar to raina, no run, and now a swish outside the off stump, nowhere close to the ball, beats the inside edge
nadeem to raina, 2 runs, swept away to fine-leg region for a couple of runs, pathan does well to slide around the restrict it to couple
nadeem to hussey, 1 run, faster, on the middle and pushed away to deep square-leg for a single
agarkar to hussey, 1 run, slower one, outside the off stump and hussey guides it through the backward point region for a single
agarkar to hussey, 1 run, shimmy down the pitch and manages to only defend it away on the off side, desperate single attempted and needed a direct hit from mendis to run raina out
agarkar to hussey, no run, slower one from agarkar and he's only able to tap it to the covers for another dot
yadav to raina, no run, opens his stance up a little and pushed to the off side for no run
yadav to hussey, no run, pushed to the off side and not for runs, better over for csk

pathan to raina, 2 runs, tucked away to the leg side and they complete a single, he comes back for the second and the throw is a little far from the keeper, who whips the bails but by then he's in, third ump into action and he's got an easy decision to make

pathan to raina, out, edged and gone! raina's walking to a caught behind! it was outside the off and raina was looking to clear his foot and smack it over the off side, gets only an outside edge and taken by the keeper
morkel to dhoni, 1 run, tucked away to the leg side for a single
morkel to dhoni, four runs, and it's hit hard and strong and despite no room to play that shot, it's still gone over the in-field for a four!
morkel to dhoni, 1 run, flicked away over the in field to the leg side for a single
nadeem to dhoni, 1 run, goes down the track and wants to smash it over the deep square-leg, but gets an inside edge for a single
yadav to hussey, 1 run, a slower one that does not bounce, he is able to pat it to the leg side where the bowler has to rush across and field
pathan to hussey, no run, outside the off stump and he wants to crash it through the covers, this is not as quick as the previous over and he looks to have played his shot early
agarkar to dhoni, no run, inside edge and it bounces and rolls over to the keeper, he was looking to hit it hard but it did not even arrive
agarkar to dhoni, 1 wide, wide this time, on the off side, and did i spot some swing away from the bat, one way or the other it's very wide
agarkar to dhoni, 1 run, wants to smash it over mid-wicket but plays the shot early, the ball runs over to mid-wicket for a single

yadav to bravo, 1 run, out, slower one and he's run-out this time last ball. it was hit away to the leg side but not off the middle, wanted to get back for the second but he's not quick enough to get back
sharma to sehwag, 1 wide, not a good start there from mohit shrma, it was down the leg side and sehwag wanted to flick it at first, wouldn't have got any close to the ball anyway!
sharma to sehwag, no run, this time he gets it right at 130.4 km/hr, on the off stump, marginal swing away and defended to the off side
morris to sehwag, 2 runs, flicked away to the leg side for a couple of runs, that's much better from sehwag there
morris to sehwag, 2 runs, and another inside edge there, for a couple of runs to the leg side, he was looking to drive it through the covers but gets it away to fine-leg
morris to sehwag, four runs, not too well-timed but enough to get him a four, he was trying to hit it over the mid-on fielder but gets it over mid-wicket, the results counts in the end!
sharma to jayawardene, no run, 131 km/hr on the off stump, tapped to the off side but again does not pierce the field and it's a dot
sharma to jayawardene, no run, not that he's bowling very quick but it's a slower one here, 111/9 km/hr, pushes it to the off side and to the fielder
sharma to jayawardene, 1 run, driven back to the bowler, mohit was looking to field it but isn't able to get down and its fielder by mid-off
morris to jayawardene, no run, good bounce and he was trying to open the face of the bat through to the third-man region, misses the outside edge

morris to jayawardene, no run, whoa, that's a big appeal for a caught behind from both the bowler and the wicket-keeper, there seemed to be a bit of a nick there but cannot be sure. the ump says not-out
morris to jayawardene, no run, and now he defends it on the off side, not for a run
sharma to jadhav, no run, another one on the off stump line and defended well to the off side, in other news the required rate's almost crept up to 10
sharma to jadhav, 1 run, a very slow ball, 105.2 km/hr and he was looking to smack it away but needed to control it in the end, played it away to third-man for a single
sharma to mendis, no run, outside the off stump from round the stumps and he shoulders arms, lets it go through to the keeper
morkel to mendis, no run, very close to the stumps, on the off and he is only able to tap it away to the point region
bravo to mendis, no run, goes down the pitch and wants to smash it back, gets it very low on his bat and it's athletically fielded by bravo
bravo to jadhav, 1 run, slower one from the bowler and turns it down to fine-leg for a single
jadeja to jadhav, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and it's rolled over to fine third-man, ashwin moves around quickly and fields well
jadeja to mendis, 1 run, played away to the leg side and this time he gets a single
jadeja to jadhav, 2 runs, goes down the track and very casually flicks it away to the leg side, they run hard and come back for the second
ashwin to jadhav, 2 runs, swept away to the fine-leg and it's fielded well there, rolls over and throws the ball back to the other fielder running across
ashwin to jadhav, 1 run, skips down the pitch this time and hits it over to mid-wicket for a single
ashwin to agarkar, no run, tries to give it fair thwack there but the ball does not quite arrive, on the bounce to the fielder
jadeja to jadhav, 1 run, played away to the leg side for a single there, goes to mid-wicket
ashwin to morkel, out, bowled him, was looking to hoick it away but misses, that has taken timber along its way, end of the eighth wicket
vihari to mandeep singh, no run, slow from round the wicket, driven back and almost carries
steyn to gilchrist, no run, another in-swinger into the left-hander, nice curve back in and gilly is very, very watchful, pushes it to the covers
steyn to mandeep singh, no run, out-swinger for mandeep and he lets it go through to the keeper, not the aggression this time that was on display in the first over

i sharma to mandeep singh, 2 runs, another flick and and another couple of runs, was a quick enough delivery but mandeep was equal to it, it was in the air for some time. mishra gave chase but wasn't able to restrict it to one

steyn to gilchrist, no run, ooh, he was trying to drill it through the covers there, as he got some width from steyn, so far he was very close to the stumps but not that time, misses, through to the keeper
perera to gilchrist, no run, a tad slower from perera and he opens the face of the bat but is not able to work it away to the off side properly, to the fielder
kv sharma to valthaty, no run, slowish, turning away from the bat, beats the outside edge
kv sharma to valthaty, no run, quicker, flatter and defended to the leg side, three dots now

kv sharma to valthaty, 4 byes, and now four byes because of the extra turn, spun across the bat again and he was looking to drive at it, he missed, the keeper missed but the scorer does not, adds four byes to the total
mishra to valthaty, no run, slows it up well and it's defended to the off side
kv sharma to gilchrist, no run, tries to guide it through third-man but that's slower and it unable to use the pace of the ball

steyn to hussey, four runs, inside edge for a four! that could have gone anywhere, to the keeper, on to the stumps and to the fence, the ball chose the latter option and helps punjab get four more to their score
kv sharma to chawla, six runs, a very clean strike to one that's pitched very up to him, swept over the deep square-leg for a six!
kv sharma to chawla, six runs, whoa, that's second six and he's walked down the track and smashed it over the bowler's head for another maximum, suddenly it looks like it's not been such a bad move!
perera to chawla, 2 runs, three in a row and this time chawla's waiting for it, he's able to crash it through mid-wicket for a quickly taken couple of runs
mishra to hussey, 1 run, on the leg stump and he was able to tap it away for a single
mishra to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, flicked away for a single to the leg side

i sharma to hussey, out, gone, caught on the second attempt! tries to hit ishant out of the ground, sliced it a tad more than he would have liked and it went straight to akshat who fumbles with it before grabbing it on the second attempt
i sharma to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and gets it through backward point for a single to deep third-man
mishra to gurkeerat singh, four runs, swept away behind square and gone for a four, that's good batting, chosen the field well

steyn to gurkeerat singh, out, bowled him! gone, bowled, what a collapse, and again! he was looking to play it over the off side, the ball was too quick there and he misses it, crashes into the middle and about one-tenth of a second later it's lying flat on the ground.
steyn to kumar, 1 run, flicked away to the leg side for a single
steyn to mascarenhas, 1 run, on the middle stump, opens the face of the bat, through to the third-man for a single
perera to kumar, no run, very outside the off stump but not wide enough to be called a wide, praveen kumar has both his feet together and tries to swish away at it, misses
kumar to de kock, no run, outside the off and some movement away from the leg-hander, he was looking to play at it before opting out of the shot
kumar to de kock, no run, this time he gets the swing from close to the stumps, swing away too and defended back to the bowler

kumar to de kock, out, bowled him, pk has the middle stump castled! that was coming back into the batsman and he was looking to flick it away to the leg side, gets bit of a pad and then rocks the middle pole back, gone for a duck
kumar to vihari, no run, on the off stump, not too much swing there and defended back to the bowler
mascarenhas to reddy, 1 run, ooh, keeps very low, on the off stump and he was going back to play at it, gets the bottom half of the bat and is able to play it away to the leg side
mascarenhas to vihari, 1 run, on the middle stump, gets some bounce on it and is able to flick it away to the leg side for a single
kumar to vihari, no run, another keeps very low, but no swing on that one, it's on the off stump and defended it to the leg side
kumar to vihari, 2 runs, on the middle stump and flicked it away behind deep square-leg for a couple of runs, well played, gap found well
kumar to vihari, 1 run, slower one from pk and it's flicked away to david hussey who's at square-leg and miked up with the commentators, misses a direct hit, was out had it hit!
kumar to reddy, no run, quicker from pk, bit of bounce, and swing away from the batsman and beats the outside the edge
mascarenhas to vihari, 1 run, on the off stump and pushed into the covers, they go for a quick one to hussey who shies at the striker's end, but he's in
mascarenhas to vihari, 2 runs, makes room for himself and finds the gap through the covers for a couple of runs
kumar to vihari, 1 run, moves down the track and taps it to the off side, hares across for a single
kumar to reddy, no run, outside the off stump, opens the face of the bat and wants to guide it to third-man but gets only to point, better from hyderabad
azhar mahmood to reddy, 2 runs, this is too straight and he's easily tucked away to the leg side for a couple of runs through mid-wicket
azhar mahmood to reddy, 1 run, looking to play it over the in-field there by coming down the track, smacks it to gony at mid-on who fields it well by diving to his left
chawla to vihari, 1 run, and a lot of slow turn again, but easily negotiated away to the off side for one
mascarenhas to vihari, 1 run, opens the face of the bat now and plays it down to third-man for a single
chawla to vihari, four runs, goes over the top and hits it to the left of long-off for a four, hit with the turn and the room allows him to play it away for a four
chawla to vihari, no run, slower, turned away and opens the face of the bat through to the point fielder
mascarenhas to white, 1 run, on the off stump and he's played it away to the leg side for a single
chawla to samantray, no run, opens the face of the bat, gets it away to the off side but not for runs
azhar mahmood to samantray, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and guides it to the third-man for a single
azhar mahmood to samantray, 1 run, oh ho, the ball keeps low there and almost gets the inside edge, rolls over to the leg side for a single
gony to white, 1 leg bye, and another one attempted, and even ruffles white up a little here but the non-striker is quick to call him across for a single
chawla to white, 1 run, tapped away to the off side for a single again, they are doing it easily here
chawla to white, 1 run, opens the face of the bat through to the off side for a single to signal the time-out
gony to perera, 1 run, off the mark by guiding it down to third-man for a single to get off the mark
gony to samantray, four runs, opens the face of the bat and guides it through the point region for a four! wow, what a shot, pure timing!
gony to perera, 4 byes, and another one that keeps low and beats the batsman, beats the keeper, beats the stumps and then the fielder at fine-leg, four byes to help take some pressure off!

azhar mahmood to samantray, out, appeal for an lbw and given! was looking to play it through the leg side, missed and hits the back pad, still to ascertain whether it was hitting outside the off stump but otherwise looks close enough
azhar mahmood to ashish reddy, no run, he was swinging that like it was a game of golf, misses it by a mile too and through to the keeper, 25 needed from the last three overs
gony to perera, 1 run, looks to hoick it away over mid-wicket, one of his favourite, clear-his-foot-and-hit stroke, gets only an inside edge

gony to ashish reddy, no run, smashed and what a shot, but not for a run! it was hit hard down to mid-on and a yard either side would have gone through to the fence, goes to hand and hussey throws it to the non-striker's end, hits the stumps too but perera is back home
gony to ashish reddy, no run, slower one from gony and he has to check his stroke there, taps it back to the bowler
azhar mahmood to perera, six runs, you got to be kidding me, what a way to end the game, third six in a row to make it five wins in seven games and catapult to the top of the points table!
morkel to gambhir, 1 run, tighter with the line now around off, he guides it behind point for a single
sharma to gambhir, no run, comes in from round the stumps, he mistimes the punch to covers
morris to gambhir, 1 run, makes some room and steers this down to square third man
sharma to morgan, no run, coming in with the angle from round the stumps, defended to leg
sharma to morgan, no run, played out to mid on
sharma to das, 1 run, they take on jadeja at mid on with a sharp single, wonder what's the pressing need, a dive is required, jadeja misses with the lob
sharma to tiwary, no run, tight line on off, opens the face to steer to point
bravo to tiwary, no run, lots of width, but he;s steered it straight to point
ashwin to das, no run, another carrom ball, pushed back to the bowler
jadeja to tiwary, 1 run, yet another tight single, to midwicket again, and jadeja misses with the throw once more, that was another run out had he hit
ashwin to tiwary, 1 run, backs away to leg, he tosses it up outside off, sound as ball passes the attempted big drive, but dhoni cannot gather that
ashwin to das, 2 runs, swung through midwicket, and had dhoni taken this throw from deep midwicket, this would have been the 43rd run out today
jadeja to tiwary, 1 leg bye,
jadeja to bhatia, 1 run, straightening on middle, he thick edges behind point
jadeja to tiwary, 2 runs, pushes in the air to midwicket, bowler runs after it
jadeja to tiwary, 1 run, backs away to leg, jadeja follows him, nudged behind square leg
ashwin to bhatia, no run, other one pushed to extra cover
ashwin to bhatia, no run, slapped to extra cover again from the crease
ashwin to narine, no run, this hurried in from round the stumps, thick inside edge saves him
ashwin to senanayake, 1 run, carrom ball pushed wide of cover
jadeja to narine, six runs, narine's launched another one over deep midwicket, with the turn this time, fetching it from around off
jadeja to narine, out, goes for it once more as jadeja angles it across, and this time he picks out deep midwicket, getting too much height on the shot
jadeja to senanayake, no run, pushes it to extra cover
jadeja to senanayake, no run,
jadeja to senanayake, no run, straightens and bounces around off, he plays it from the crease and is a touch late in patting it away
balaji to hussey, 1 bye, swings in sharply from round the stumps, hussey wafts outside the line, keeper fails to gather cleanly
balaji to hussey, 1 run, softly pats this behind point, hussey goes for the run, ashwin is no hussey, and he has clumsily dive in
balaji to ashwin, four runs, but he can time them alright, walks down the pitch, gets bat around pad to flick stylishly through square leg
senanayake to hussey, no run, goes deep in the crease to push to the bowler
senanayake to hussey, no run,
balaji to hussey, no run, holds its line just outside off and beats him on the drive
balaji to hussey, 1 wide, wide, too wide, and swinging away
senanayake to ashwin, no run, not getting the single to leg, sent back by hussey
senanayake to ashwin, no run, can;t find the gap, backs away again and slaps it to point
narine to ashwin, out, widish offbreak swung straight to midwicket, and the experiment is over
narine to hussey, no run, dabs this flat offbreak behind point, tiwary dives and prevents the single
bhatia to hussey, no run, can;t get pace as well as room, pushes it back to the bowler
kallis to badrinath, 1 run, tiwary goes flying to his right at backward point to parry this square drive towards cover, top effort
narine to badrinath, no run, that skidded on to off, he keeps it out from the crease
narine to hussey, 1 run, flat and widish, he chops it wide of backward point
kallis to jadeja, 1 run, pushed to long off
kallis to bravo, 1 run, driven in the air, couple of a bounces to long off
singh to rahane, no run, no swing for rp, so he bowls it on a tight line around off stump. rahane gets behind it solidly and defends to the leg side

singh to rahane, no run, he comes down the pitch and makes room at the same time, but the ball is delivered wide outside off and he only manages to get a toe-edge to it as he goes for a drive through off
unadkat to binny, 1 run, slower delivery on the stumps, the batsman is a bit early as he tries to whip it away to the leg side, ends up playing it towards square leg
unadkat to binny, 1 run, here comes the slower delivery! the batsman dabs it towards point and calls for a quick single
kartik to binny, 1 run,
kartik to dravid, 1 run, makes room by moving outside leg and mows this flat delivery to deep midwicket without any timing, settles for a single
unadkat to hodge, 1 run, stays in the crease and opens the face to run it down to third man for a single
kartik to dravid, 2 runs, comes down the pitch to hit is over long-off, but it goes diametrically opposite to it off a thick inside edge
chandila to dilshan, no run, tosses it up and the batsman pushes it towards the non-striker where the bowler fields
chandila to gayle, no run, doesn't toss it up, bowls it flat and gayle pushes it back to him
chandila to gayle, no run, flatter delivery, gayle waits in the crease and punches it hard, straight to cover though
chandila to gayle, 1 run, pushed through on the middle stumps line, the batsman dabs it towards backward square leg for a single
trivedi to gayle, 1 wide, oh that's a really poor start, another wide down the leg side
tait to tiwary, 1 wide, bowls a bad follow-up delivery after sharing words of wisdom, it's wide down the leg side
chandila to gayle, no run, he pushes it through on the off stump, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
chandila to gayle, 1 run, another one of those flatter deliveries, the batsman defends it towards the leg side
chandila to gayle, 1 run, bowls a quicker delivery on off stump, the batsman punches it down to long-off
trivedi to gayle, no run, the bowler is continuing with the slow stuff and the batsman are struggling to nudge them around
chandila to tiwary, 1 run, another slow delivery outside off, the batsman pushes it to extra cover for a single

trivedi to gayle, six runs, all this while he was just playing with everyone's mind, because he can do it whenever he wants. doesn't matter where the ball was pitched, the point is that it ended up over the sight screen
pathan to smith, no run, bit of inward movement first up from irfan, defended down the track by smith
pathan to smith, 1 run, pushes this one towards cover and sets off for a quick single
pathan to smith, no run, closer to the off stump, defended from the crease to the off side
nadeem to tendulkar, no run, defended towards extra cover to end another quiet over
pathan to tendulkar, no run, tendulkar skips down the track, drives firmly towards cover, can't find the gap
pathan to tendulkar, no run, again roelof makes a diving stop at point
pathan to tendulkar, no run, looks to whip the legstump ball towards square leg but the ball rolls towards point instead
van der merwe to smith, four runs, launches that over mid-off for the first four of the innings

van der merwe to smith, out, tries to repeat and he's gone, roelof strikes in his first over of the season, mumbai made a change at the top of the order, but there's no difference in the result, another early wicket, and there's been no quick start either, smith can't get this one over the man at mid-off, umesh yadav doesn't grab it on the first attempt, parries it high and settles under to collect on the second attempt
van der merwe to karthik, no run, more defence, down the track
van der merwe to karthik, no run, blocks it once more, van der merwe keeping it on the stumps, not giving much for the batsman to work with
van der merwe to karthik, 1 run, pushed towards mid-off for a single to end a successful over for mumbai
pathan to tendulkar, no run, defended back towards the bowler
nadeem to tendulkar, 1 run,
van der merwe to tendulkar, 1 run, van der merwe returns, driven towards long-off for a single
van der merwe to sharma, no run, defended towards point
nadeem to sharma, no run, can't time the ball at all as he looks to drive the ball through the off
nadeem to sharma, no run, defended towards cover
nadeem to tendulkar, no run, nadeem bowling his final, tendulkar can't get that away to the leg side as he wanted
nadeem to tendulkar, no run, dropped, a regulation caught-and-bowled chance, and that is put down by nadeem, nice height and not to fast, hits him on the tip of the fingers, tendulkar survives
nadeem to sharma, 1 run, another drive towards long-off for one more
nadeem to sharma, 1 run, rohit skips down the track and caresses that towards long-off
yadav to sharma, 1 run, rohit moves across and opens the face to steer the ball to third man
van der merwe to tendulkar, 2 runs, chipped over the bowler's head for a couple, tendulkar sashays down the track to play that one
van der merwe to tendulkar, 1 run, swept towards square leg, tendulkar looking more and more adventurous

agarkar to tendulkar, no run, slower ball from agarkar, 112.5kph, tendulkar moving about a lot around the crease, he wasn't quite in position to take advantage of this one, looked to run it down to third man but misses
agarkar to tendulkar, 1 run, slapped towards cover for a single
agarkar to sharma, 1 run, a heave towards midwicket, badly mistimed, a single results
agarkar to tendulkar, 1 run, whipped towards the leg side for one more
yadav to sharma, no run, third dot ball in a row, second slower ball of the over, outside off and rohit can't connect

agarkar to sharma, six runs, that was in the air for a long, long time as rohit swipes it towards deep midwicket, it was a slower ball from ajit, that sials past the midwicket rope for six, a man beyond the rope shells the catch
agarkar to sharma, no run, slower ball doesn't rise up at all and rohit can't connect
agarkar to sharma, no run, well outside off, looked like a wide, not given, rohit isn't too happy
agarkar to sharma, 1 run, slugged towards midwicket to end another profitable over for mumbai
van der merwe to rayudu, 1 run,
malinga to jayawardene, no run, and again, 138.8 kph, tight around off stump, blocked towards point by jayawardene
malinga to sehwag, 1 run, tucked away to the right of mid-on for a single
bumrah to sehwag, 1 no ball, starts poorly, with a no-ball, angling in towards middle, defended to the off side
bumrah to sehwag, no run, bumrah bowls from wide of the crease, angling in and that is defended towards cover
bumrah to sehwag, 1 run, wide outside off, munaf nearly makes a hash of a simple fielding stop at third man
bumrah to jayawardene, no run, opens the face to steer the ball towards backward point
patel to sehwag, 1 run, again down the leg side, helped along towards deep square leg
patel to sehwag, four runs, whipped away past point for four, munaf continues to target leg stump, past midwicket for four, he now has the most boundaries in ipl
patel to sehwag, 1 run, shifts his line towards off, a wristy stroke towards square leg for a single
patel to jayawardene, no run, defended to the off side, some relief from the mayhem
harbhajan singh to sehwag, 1 run, mumbai turn to harbhajan in an attempt to stop the runs, slapped towards point first up
harbhajan singh to jayawardene, 1 run, nudged towards square leg for one more
smith to sehwag, 1 run, fifty for sehwag, he backs away and slashes it towards third man, his first half-century in 10 ipl innings
smith to jayawardene, 1 run, driven towards long-off for a single, can't see how mumbai can come back in this
harbhajan singh to jayawardene, no run, defended down the track by jayawardene
harbhajan singh to jayawardene, 1 run, from round the wicket, guided towards point
malinga to jayawardene, 1 run, a slower one from malinga, guided down to third man
patel to jayawardene, 1 run, there's the half-century for mahela, a comfortable single towards wide mid-on, 34 balls it took
harbhajan singh to jayawardene, 1 run, moves across and turns it to midwicket for a single
harbhajan singh to sehwag, 1 run, another single, carved towards deep point, all gone calm now

harbhajan singh to sehwag, four runs, toying with harbhajan here, the bowler looped this one and on middle and leg, sehwag skips away from the stumps and places it perfectly behind point to pick up another four
patel to sehwag, 1 run, sehwag is proving unstoppable in the region behind point, another single
patel to jayawardene, no run, slower ball, between bat and pad after jayawardene skips away from leg stump, throug to the keeper
pollard to sehwag, no run, oh, here comes pollard, inside-edged down the pitch
pollard to sehwag, four runs, is that the first false shot of the innings? a thick outside edge past the keeper for four, pollard had his arm up in appeal before seeing the ball fly past the keeper
pollard to sehwag, 1 run, guided down to third man for a single, sehwag 16 away from a 100, delhi 18 away from victory
malinga to jayawardene, 1 run, driven along the ground to extra cover for an easy single
bumrah to sehwag, 1 run, deftly done by sehwag, arches back and deflects the ball down to third man
bumrah to warner, no run, looks to hammer that one out of the park, pitched outside leg and struck the pad
morris to watson, 1 run, now he takes a suicidal single after pushing it to the right of raina! he was gone had raina hit
morris to rahane, 1 wide, another one on the leg side, this one is too far down
ashwin to rahane, 1 run, he pushes it in the gap between midwicket and square leg and calls for a quick single
jadeja to rahane, 1 run, tosses it up a touch, but it is on a leg stump line. rahane taps it towards midwicket for another single
holder to yagnik, no run, another one round about the leg stump line, the batsman tries to push it to the leg side, but ends pushing it back to the bowler
holder to watson, 1 wide, loses his line, bowls it down the leg side
holder to watson, no run, bowls a slower delivery on off stump, the batsman dabs it to point. yagnik took a few steps down, but was sent back in time
ashwin to dravid, 1 run, flatter delivery outside off, the batsman goes back and punches it firmly to deep extra cover
bravo to binny, 1 run, another slower delivery, but this one is slightly wider outside off, the batsman drives it past point for a single
jadeja to watson, 1 run, bowls a flatter delivery wide outside off, the batsman flogs it in the air to deep point
jadeja to binny, 1 run, the batsman whips it to deep midwicket for an easy single
bravo to binny, 1 run, slower delivery wide outside off, binny fails to get it away, finds the fielder at cover
jadeja to watson, 1 wide, jajeja has lost it! he bowls a filthy filthy wide outside off
jadeja to watson, 1 wide, oh no! another super filthy wide outside off... what's going on
jadeja to binny, 1 run, he plays a sensible push to wide long off for a single
jadeja to watson, 2 runs, flatter delivery wide outside off, the batsman flat bats it to deep extra cover
bravo to binny, 1 wide, he bowls a slower delivery down the leg side
chandila to hussey, no run, that hurried on with the angle, from round the stumps, hussey stabbed it to leg with a thick inside edge
chandila to hussey, 1 run, turned square on leg for one
chandila to raina, no run, quickly comes in with the angle, raina backs away and punches from off and middle to extra cover
shukla to hussey, 1 run, took the pace off it this time, but hussey waited and managed to time the square drive, required a dive from backward point
shukla to hussey, four runs, nice, shukla slows it down once more, hussey is on the charge down the wicket and has built up enough momentum to crash it past extra cover, slow ball or not
chandila to hussey, no run, much quicker now, he cannot knock it to the leg side far enough for runs
chandila to raina, 1 run, turned to deep midwicket

trivedi to hussey, 1 run, hussey makes it through for the single, was a close one, he'd mistimed the drive to dravid at extra cover, he was off balance as he threw, and missed, direct hit would have been very tight
watson to raina, 1 run,
watson to hussey, 1 leg bye, appeal for lbw, but that pitched outside leg, and rolled fine past the keeper on off
trivedi to raina, 2 runs, nudged for two, superb running, turned from outside off to vacant midwicket, bowler after it, throw comes in, as does the huss
binny to hussey, 1 wide, angled too wide across the left-hander
binny to hussey, 2 runs, picks up two more, a drive through extra cover, couple of seconds to catch his breath, and he's ready again
trivedi to dhoni, 1 run, turned from off to deep square leg
trivedi to hussey, 1 run, and again, but this time, it is on the bounce to cooper at deep midwicket
cooper to hussey, four runs, another one, off a thick edge to the fine third man boundary
faulkner to jadeja, no run, tries to steer to third man, edges to keeper on the bounce

pathan to marsh, four runs, four for marsh! and it's a good shot too, was a tad wide and he opens the face of the bat and cracks it through the right of point, absolutely ripped off the surface for a four

kaul to marsh, no run, wide outside the off stump and after hitting those two boundaries, he wanted to go for it again, last minute he lets it go hoping it would be called a wide, touch inside the line
kaul to marsh, 1 wide, and it swings the other way now, was on the middle stump before moving down the leg side, easy call of a wide this time
morkel to marsh, no run, whoa, what bounce there, it was outside the off stump, and jumps up, the ball and the batsman both, misses the outside edge through to the wicket-keeper

nehra to gilchrist, six runs, and that's the first one of the night, was in his slot here and gilly was not holding back, he has some form behind his back and wants to cash in, goes over the mid-off fielder and as it turns out, it goes all the way
nehra to gilchrist, 1 run, finally gets the line back close the batsman, on the middle stump and he can only tap it to the leg side for a single
yadav to gilchrist, 1 run, and again, that same swing back into the bowler, gets an inside edge to the leg side for a single
pathan to marsh, 1 run, slower on the middle stump and he taps it to mid-on rushes off for a quick single and the fielder there has a shy at the stumps, misses
pathan to azhar mahmood, 1 wide, down the leg side, swinging back in but starts at a poor line and it's called a wide
yadav to azhar mahmood, 1 leg bye, slightly off line this time and the batsman tries to flick it away, gets some pad on its way to the leg side
pathan to marsh, 1 run, outside the off stump and he tries to push it through the point fielder, rohrer does well to dive to his left and stalls the possibility of anything more than a single
pathan to marsh, 1 run, swing away from the bat and marsh is in that kind of a mood now that he will go after it, had width too and smacks it but straight to warner at deep covers
kaul to azhar mahmood, 1 run, and now mahmood wants to spank him over the in-field, yadav's inside the circle at mid-on and he's got to rush across to his right to field that one
pathan to marsh, 1 wide, wide, wide outside the off stump, that's swinging away further too and that's gone for a wide
yadav to marsh, four runs, wow and this is flown to the off side, through the slips, edged too and for a four!
yadav to sathish, four runs, the carnage continues, satish walks across for the second time this over, it's a slower one but that does not defeat him, waits on the delivery and chips it over fine-leg
nehra to sathish, no run, wants to get it over fine-leg yet again by moving across, slowness of the ball beats him and it lobs up to the keeper

kumar to jayawardene, 1 run, edged and dropped at second slip (yep they have two of them there), outside the off stump and swinging, a deliberate attempt to open the face of the bat through to third-man, gets an edge and mahmood drops it
azhar mahmood to chand, no run, outside the off and he wanted to drive it through the covers, no foot movement as we have seen from him throughout the tournament, beats the outside edge
azhar mahmood to chand, 1 run, manages to squeeze it through the crowded in-field and the third-man rushes to his right to field that, restricted to two
kumar to chand, no run, ooh, what swing, late one too, jagging back into the batsman who was looking to go for an expansive stroke before having to defend quickly
kumar to chand, out, bowled him, too much swing and unlike mj, chand's defences are not too strong, the ball sneaks through the bat and the pad and the bails are scattered
kumar to pathan, no run, outside the off stump and swinging away from the batsman, lets it go through to the keeper

sandeep sharma to pathan, out, edged and gone, this has been a difficult stay for pathan, and on a track where there's so much  swing it reminded me of his innings as a test opener in australia, was outside the off and he went after it, gets an edge and is caught!
kumar to sehwag, no run, on the off stump and tapped to the off side, straight to the off side
kumar to jayawardene, no run, outside the off yet again and he lets it go through to the keeper

sandeep sharma to jayawardene, 2 runs, wow, well attempted that but just eludes the fielder! he was looking to walk down and hit it over the fielders inside the circle on the off side, the ball loops and mandeep runs back and dives, gets bit of a hand on it, but fails to latch on to it
azhar mahmood to sehwag, 1 run, on the middle stump and tapped to the leg side for a single
azhar mahmood to jayawardene, no run, a touch outside the off stump and swinging further away, through to the keeper as mj lets it go through
azhar mahmood to jayawardene, no run, wow and he shoulders arms yet again, outside the off and lets it go
chawla to sehwag, 4 byes, missed by the batsman and missed by the keeper, in the middle of that, it misses the stumps too and goes through for four byes, he was looking to swing at it
awana to sehwag, four runs, up to the bat this time and sehwag opens up his stance and hits it over the in-field for a four
chawla to rohrer, no run, quicker one, bowled at 117 km/hr and rohrer gets his bat down just in time
chawla to jayawardene, 1 run, on the middle stump and inside edged to the leg side for a single
awana to rohrer, 1 run, on the off stump and he wants to crack it through the covers, gets bit of an inside edge and they go through for a quick one, needed a dive from rohrer to get in
awana to jayawardene, no run, outside the off stump and he was looking to give himself room, gets no where close to it, it was nipping away too

sandeep sharma to jayawardene, out, finally they catch him, finally mj's out, it was a slower one, outside the off and he tried to go across and scoop it over the deep square-leg fielder, gets it off the middle but straight to the fielder, who gobbles him up this time

sandeep sharma to rohrer, six runs, whoa, how can that go for a six? he was looking to swing it across the line and almost checks the stroke, gets the outside edge and it goes over third-man for a six!
kumar to rohrer, 1 run, was looking to come down the track, can only push it to extra-cover where mandeep fields and wants to have a shy but someone in the field asks him to hold on it
kumar to gautam, 1 run, edged through to third-man for a single this time
azhar mahmood to gautam, 1 run, was looking to walk towards outside the off stump but he was followed and only opens the bat through to third-man

harbhajan singh to pathan, four runs, edged and through the slips for a four! what a start, he was looking to defend at it and the outside edge flies off the bat and eludes the right of the first slipper, rohit in action
harbhajan singh to pathan, four runs, three in a row! what a start! he has thrown his bat at it again, swept it to backward square-leg for the third in three balls
johnson to pathan, 1 wide, that's a very over-pitched ball and that's a very wide ball too, way outside the off and the batsman has nothing to do with it
johnson to kallis, no run, and this one keeps a tad low, angling outside the off stump and kallis defends it to the off side
malinga to kallis, four runs, bad ball, lot of width from malinga and kallis throws his bat at it, crashes it through the backward point region for a four, 50 comes up for kkr!
malinga to gambhir, no run, almost a wicket! it was a leading edge from gambhir and malinga needed to dive to his right if he had any chance of even coming close to touching the ball, survives!
ojha to gambhir, 1 run, and tries to go down the track and smack it again, mistimed a little and goes to deep square-leg for a single
pollard to gambhir, 1 run, slower on the off stump, gg has to adjust his stroke and manages to play it through the point region for a single

ojha to kallis, 1 run, slows it down even further and the ball turns away from the batsman, who opens the face of the bat and rushes off for a quick single, fielder hits the striker end's stumps but gg's in
ojha to kallis, 1 run, driven through the covers for a single this time
chahal to kallis, 1 run, slower this time from chahal and it's driven down to long-off for a single
ojha to kallis, four runs, dropped! well bowled by the bowler, tosses it up and kallis goes over the top and gets to long-off where johnson floors a reasonably easy one
ojha to kallis, 1 run, drives it through the covers for a single
ojha to tiwary, no run, a tad quicker and he opens the face of the bat and taps it to the pont region
chahal to tiwary, 1 run, goes down the track but gets too close to the ball and is only able to flick it away to the deep square-leg region for a single
chahal to kallis, no run, taps it to the off side and wants to run off for a single, sent back by the non-striker
ojha to kallis, 2 runs, opens his stance up a tad and is able to crack it through the point region for a couple of runs
ojha to morgan, no run, on the middle stump and tapped it away to the leg side

ojha to morgan, 1 bye, outside the off stump and he was looking to go towards the off side and defend, beats the inside edge of the bat and slips through to the keeper, who misses it and they are able to rush across for a bye
johnson to morgan, no run, edged and it slides through to the keeper on a couple of bounces, that's four dot balls in a row
johnson to tiwary, no run, slower one, a very slow ball and tiwary had decided to tonk it into another city, misses by a mile and that ends a very good over, just one from it
malinga to tiwary, 1 leg bye, big appeal after tiwary tries to hoick it across the line, it hits his back pad alright, but it was easily missing the leg stump
malinga to morgan, four runs, walks down the track and thrashes it through mid-wicket for a four, spoils what was a good over to begin things
johnson to tiwary, 2 runs, outside the off stump and thats been carved away to the deep extra-cover region, harbhajan runs across and stops it from going to the fence
malinga to das, no run, slower one outside the off stump, it never rose too much and he was looking to flay it away, misses easily
balaji to smith, no run, outside the off stump and he lets it go through to the keeper, shoulders arms!
balaji to smith, no run, on the off stump and driven down to mid-off, not for runs though

balaji to smith, 1 run, comes back into the batsman, gets bit of an inside edge and they are off for a quickly taken single, balaji was looking to dart towards the ball and throw it at tendulkar's end but does not get close
iqbal abdulla to smith, no run, he throws the bat at it and misses easily, beats the outside the edge, no foot movement
iqbal abdulla to smith, no run, some turn from abdulla, turning away from the bat, hits the outside edge and rolls over to backward point
iqbal abdulla to smith, no run, ooh, almost a wicket! beats the outside of the bat and misses the stumps as well, just by a whisker
balaji to smith, no run, well fielded by mclaren at the point region, the fielder was a couple of yards away but dives to his left and fields well
balaji to tendulkar, 1 run, gets bit of an inside edge and he gets it a single to mid-wicket
iqbal abdulla to tendulkar, 1 run, goes down the pitch and nurdles it away for a single
senanayake to karthik, 1 run, on the middle stump and karthik was shimmying down the track, pushed to the right of the bowler and are away for a quick one
senanayake to smith, no run, tapped to the mid-wicket fielder, morgan fields well and tries to throw down the stumps at karthik's ends
senanayake to smith, four runs, swept away and for a four through the backward square-leg region, the fielders were inside the circle

senanayake to karthik, four runs, width and karthik punches is through the covers and for a four! what a start to karthik's innings, who's been attempting to run at every possible chance and now this shot
iqbal abdulla to karthik, 1 run, round the stumps, on the middle and tucked away to the leg side for a single
iqbal abdulla to karthik, no run, defended to the off side, straight to the fielder
senanayake to smith, 2 runs, taps it to the leg side and they are away for a single but karthik wants to come back for the second which they do...bringing up smith's fifty! good knock this!
iqbal abdulla to smith, 1 run, down the wicket he comes but the ball's a tad slower than he would have liked, gets some bat on it to the leg side for a single
bhatia to sharma, no run, slower from bhatia and the ball just does not come on to the bat, gets an inside edge
narine to smith, 1 run, an off spinner, coming back into the batsman, pushed through the covers for a single
bhatia to pollard, four runs, inside edge and rolls over to the very fine, fine-leg fence for a four, the edge could have gone anywhere including the stumps, but misses the stumps by a whisker!
bhatia to pollard, 1 run, flat-batted and pushed to the leg side, gets an edge for a single
senanayake to sharma, 1 run, reaches out to the delivery that's outside the off stump and pushes it to the leg side for a single
bhatia to pollard, no run, slow, very, very slow and the batsman has to wait for it before trying to whip it away, gets an inside edge
narine to sharma, 1 run, quicker and on the off stump, pushed to the off side and they are off for a quick single
balaji to pollard, no run, and now balaji is trying to bowl at bhatia's speeds, the ball just does not come on to the bat and he's already played the stroke twice, beats the outside edge
senanayake to rayudu, 1 run, does not turn and he gets a leading edge trying to work it to the leg side, quick-fire single
balaji to rayudu, 1 run, angles back into the batsman who opens the face of the bat and guides it to backward point for a single

sharma to vihari, 1 run, this time he affords slightly more width to the batsman who opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third-man for a single, there seemed to be a lot of bounce on that one
holder to vihari, 1 run, another one which isn't pitched in the batsman's half, easily turned away down to fine-leg for a single
holder to dhawan, no run, opens the face of the bat but is only able to dab it away to the point fielder
holder to dhawan, 2 runs, up and over and almost for a four, but that's well fielded by mohit sharma who dives to his left and fields it, restricts it to a couple

holder to dhawan, out, gone, run-out, that's surely gone i think but we have a third-ump decision pending! yep, that's out, dhawan had pushed the ball into the covers and he wanted the single, the non-striker was a tad slow in responding to the call and raina swoops down quickly and throws the stumps down at the striker's end, gone!
sharma to dhawan, no run, pushed into the covers but to the fielder again, four dots to follow two good overs
sharma to dhawan, 1 run, he was looking to run down the pitch yet again but this time the bowler pitches it further up, almost yorks him, dhawan pushes into the covers and runs across for a run
holder to white, 2 runs, on the middle stump and white is able to just nudge it away through mid-wicket for a couple of runs, this looks like a good batting pitch so far, lot of bounce

sharma to dhawan, four runs, crashed through backward point for a four! shot sir, that's again a shimmy down the wicket, the third time he's done that to sharma, but this time there's width created and cracked it away
ashwin to dhawan, 1 run, round the stumps, on the off stump, not too much turn and opens the face of the bat through to backward point for a quick single
ashwin to mishra, no run, steps out, drives to the covers but straight to the fielder
ashwin to mishra, no run, tries to move in his crease and play it through the covers, the turn beats the inside edge of the bat, goes through to the keeper
ashwin to mishra, 1 run, it's slower from ashwin this time and he easily tucks it away to the backward square-leg area for one
ashwin to dhawan, 1 run, stops in his action before delivering and dhawan goes down and drives it to long-off for a single
ashwin to mishra, 1 run, goes down the track, and wants to drill it through the covers, inside edge through that beats dhoni
morris to mishra, no run, outside the off stump, not wide enough to be called one, mishra was moving towards the leg side too and lets it go through to the keeper
ashwin to mishra, no run, leading edge and it almost carries to badri at cover, he was running towards it but catches it on the bounce
ashwin to mishra, 1 run, was trying to hit it over the top again, gets it off the middle but no power and it goes to long-off this time
ashwin to dhawan, 1 run, swept away this time to the leg side for a single
morris to thalaivan sargunam, 1 run, half edge, half deliberate opening of the bat, runs through to third-man for a single
holder to dhawan, 1 run, goes down the pitch and wants to crash it away, gets the bottom of the bat and through to third-man for a single
bravo to thalaivan sargunam, 1 run, slower one from bravo, opens the face of the bat and pushes it to the off side, runs across for a single
bravo to thalaivan sargunam, no run, swing, an across line hoick, but the lack of pace from bravo beats the outside edge. in fact, tell you what, he had played it way earlier
bravo to ashish reddy, 1 run, round the stumps and hits it flat, straight to vijay at long-off, that almost looked like it was running away from the fielder

bravo to sammy, out, gone, caught at backward point! it was outside the off stump but no pace there from bravo, he was looking to drill it through the covers, the lack of pace defeats him and the drilled stroke goes to hand, morris grabs it easily
bravo to dhawan, 1 run, slower one and he opens the face of the bat, looks to guide it over the fielder, gets only a single
sharma to dhawan, no run, was looking to drive it through the covers yet again but the lack of pace helps the bowler, gets a mistimed shot back to him
sharma to dhawan, four runs, and another one, four through the extra-cover region, another excellent over for the sunrisers as he smashes it through the in-field
bravo to ashish reddy, four runs, and now over the off side, this is a good display of batting from reddy, it was outside the off and he slices it over the in-field for a four
sammy to hussey, 1 run, inside edge and it rolls over towards the keeper, who has to run towards it, they are off for a quick single this time
sammy to vijay, no run, outside the off stump, bit of movement away from the bat, he shoulders arms this time
i sharma to vijay, 1 wide, down the leg side, and vijay was looking to flick it away over the leg side, walks too far across and misses, still it's a wide
steyn to hussey, 1 wide, wide outside the off stump, angling away from the left-hander, lets it go through to the keeper for a wide
kv sharma to vijay, no run, spin away from the batsman, he was looking to defend and the spin beats vijay's bat
mishra to hussey, no run, finally a defensive stroke from huss, as he plays it back to the bowler
kv sharma to hussey, 1 run, spinning back into the batsman, flicks it away to the deep square-leg region for a single
mishra to raina, 2 runs, gets his foot out and pushes it to the leg side, is immediately off for a couple of runs because the ball does not go all the way to the fielder there
mishra to dhoni, no run, bowls from wide of the crease, quicker and dhoni plays it back, defends it
kv sharma to dhoni, 1 run, pushed it to the leg side and is off for a quick one
kv sharma to raina, 1 run, is that another drop? he goes down the track and wants to chip it over the bowler, gets his hand to it, to his right, difficult chance
kv sharma to dhoni, no run, on the middle stump yet again and pushed to the leg side
sammy to dhoni, 1 run, tucked away to the leg side for a quick single, there was a bit of a misfield from mishra but prevents the second

kv sharma to bravo, no run, appeal for stumping and the third ump is called for. it was a good, quickish leggie, turns away from the batsman, bravo was looking to defend at it, de kock whips it off quickly but it looks like bravo has his boot down just in time. the problem is that the boot comes up after the bails are out of the slot, which is allowed...not-out is the call
kv sharma to bravo, no run, and again spins across the batsman, beats the outside edge, make that four dots in this over
kv sharma to bravo, no run, would you believe it, we have a maiden in the 16th over of the innings, karan sharma has ended with figures of 0/8 in four overs!
steyn to bravo, no run, and another one, dot that is, on the off stump and that's only pushed to the off side, not for a single now

i sharma to bravo, 2 runs, wants to work it to the leg side, gets bit of an inside edge and they are able to get back for the second run, there was a bit of a misunderstanding between the two but easily come back

steyn to dhoni, four runs, up and over, that wasn't the most clever delivery from steyn, the fielder was inside the circle on the off side and steyn gave him room outside the off and he scoops it over the point region for a four

steyn to jadeja, out, gone, caught at point! that was smashed to the point region but it went straight to the fielder and is caught, jadeja's got to walk. checking for the no-ball but he's not transgressed there.
ashish reddy to dhoni, 1 wide, very wide outside the off stump, leaves it alone, was a slower one, back of the hand stump but called wide
ashish reddy to dhoni, no run, and another one, a very slow ball, dhoni almost read it but it was so slow that he failed to change the stroke at the last second, misses

ashish reddy to dhoni, four runs, no, no, no, what have you done there? that's wide down the leg side and there was no way the keeper could get close to it, gets some bat on it and it's gone through for a four.
senanayake to gilchrist, no run, not too much turn, it was on the middle stump from round the stumps and defended to the off side
senanayake to gilchrist, no run, on the middle stump, no turn for ss and gilly quietly opens the face of the bat and taps it to the off

balaji to mandeep singh, no run, and wow, that's seemed so slow that he could have swung his bat a dozen times before it reached him, 107 km/hr and beats the bat, through to the keeper on a couple of bounces
narine to mandeep singh, 2 runs, and this one turns back into the batsman, he is able to get his bat and pad out and turn that away through square-leg for a couple of runs
narine to mandeep singh, four runs, quicker this time, gets an outside edge as he was looking to turn that one to the leg side, through the backward point region for a four
senanayake to gilchrist, 1 run, slower on the off stump, he has only tapped it to the off side and they are off for a quick one

kallis to mandeep singh, out, and strikes first ball! he was looking to flick it away, came on slightly slower than he expected it to and the whip through the mid-wicket goes straight to the fielder inside the circle, gone!
ladda to gilchrist, 1 run, that's spun back a tad and gilly defends it to the mid-off region for a single
kallis to gilchrist, 1 leg bye, and he swings hard, just does not get it off his bat and they have to remain content with a leg-bye there
bhatia to gilchrist, 2 runs, does not come on to the bat and gilly waits for it before timing it through the covers to get to 27, which is his highest score in this ipl!
kallis to hussey, 1 run, changing his pace down well here, he's bowled that at 122.2 km/hr here and only gets a single to the off side
bhatia to hussey, 1 run, outside the leg-stump and hussey is able to drive it through to deep square-leg for only a single
bhatia to vohra, 1 run, slows the pace down and he has to work it away through the leg side, the flick of the wrist gets him a single
bhatia to hussey, four runs, up and over and gets it through extra-cover for a four, that was a slower one and he waited for its arrival and gets it away to the fence
balaji to hussey, 1 run, quicker for bala, is angling back into the batsman, who is not able to get it away, it gets away to the off side

balaji to vohra, four runs, edged and through the right of the keeper for a four, it was pitched right up to the bat and the batsman was probably walking down to play a stroke before tapping out his bat, gets an edge

balaji to vohra, out, but now he's caught at deep cover! six and out is what brett lee would say in the dugout, it was wide and he went over the in-field on the square boundary off-side, not able to time it well, straight to the fielder at deep cover
narine to miller, no run, almost a wicket, he was going for a drive but the spin away from the batsman beats the outside edge
narine to hussey, no run, that's quicker one that spins away from hussey, who reads it well, pushes it to backward point and wants a single but is sent back
ladda to miller, no run, wants to drive it through the covers but gets no timing on it
ladda to hussey, 1 run, slower this time, taps it away through the covers for a single
senanayake to hussey, 1 run, carrom ball, a tad quicker on the middle stump and tucked it away to the leg side
senanayake to gurkeerat singh, four runs, pathans misfielded it again, it was swept away to backward square-leg and he's allowed it to go through for a four, bad, bad fielding

senanayake to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, direct hit, appeal for a run-out! was pushed into the covers and wanted to go for a single, there's a direct hit there but the batsman is well in, which is what the third ump says too! ladda did well to field there
senanayake to hussey, 1 run, on the middle stump and is able to flick it away to the leg side for a single
narine to hussey, 1 run, big appeal for an lbw, the ball was turning back into the batsman and hits his pad but the umpire thinks it might be hitting outside the off
narine to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, taps it to the off side, read that away going ball well and takes a quick one
narine to hussey, 1 run, swept and it goes on the bounce to rajat bhatia at the deep square-leg region
narine to hussey, 1 run, pushed it away to the leg side this time and they are off for a single

kallis to hussey, out, goes over the top and very well caught by senanayake! it was not a quick one, he got it high and almost handsome, the fielder was right on the edge of the circle and is able to judge that well enough to pouch it, another wicket at a crucial time for kallis
narine to azhar mahmood, no run, and now it goes away from the bat, lot of turn, can only defend it to the bowler
narine to azhar mahmood, 1 run, gives himself some room and drives it through the covers for a single
narine to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, neatly opens the face of the bat and gets it away to point for a single
balaji to gurkeerat singh, six runs, and this time he's got it a six! seemed to have come off the bottom of the blade but the man has enough power to get it over the straight boundary for maximum
kumar to gambhir, no run, ooh, almost an outside edge, it was deviating slightly away from the bat and gg wanted to open the face of the bat as he usually loves doing, misses the outside edge

azhar mahmood to gambhir, out, bowled him, gone, swinging in and the stumps are down! not the best of shots but you got to give it to the bowler, that one was swinging back into the batsman who wanted to slam it over the mid-wicket region, hits something on the way before going on and hitting the stumps

azhar mahmood to pathan, out, edged and gone! first ball! on a hat-trick! that's pushed and the nick goes through to the keeper, gilly dives to his right and is easily caught by him, that's a poor prod from pathan
kumar to kallis, 1 run, walks a tad towards the ball, outside the off and pushes it to mid-off, goes for a run and chawla has a shy at it, misses
kumar to bisla, no run, a tad wider outside the off stump and he is only able to push it to the off side, straight to a fielder
kumar to bisla, no run, keeps a tad low to go with the fact that it was swinging away from the bat too, pushed to the covers
azhar mahmood to kallis, four runs, walks across to the off stump and the straightish delivery is tucked away through fine-leg for a four, the fielder was within the circle and beats him easily
azhar mahmood to kallis, 1 run, as looking to drive it through the covers this time, takes the outside edge of the bat, thats partially stopped at the point region
azhar mahmood to bisla, 1 run, slower one from the bowler, hes able to tuck it away to the deep square-leg for a single
kumar to bisla, no run, outside the off and this is as slow as the previous ones, keeps a little low too and beats the outside edge of the bat
bhatt to kallis, 1 run, slows it down now and kallis is able to play it away to the off side for a single
chawla to bisla, no run, slows it down now and wants him to drive it through the covers again, gets it to the fielder
bhatt to kallis, 1 run, on the leg side, tucked round the corner for a single

chawla to kallis, 4 leg byes, loud, loud shout for another lbw, and not only is it not-out but it rushes away for four leg-byes...it was a good shout, could have been hitting outside the off, but if at all, only marginally so
chawla to kallis, no run,
chawla to kallis, 1 run, pushed into the covers for a single
bhatt to kallis, 1 run, slow turn away from the bat and easily played away to the off side for a single
bhatt to bisla, 1 wide, quicker, flatter, down the leg side and that's a wide
bhatt to kallis, no run, slight appeal against kallis again but it's quickly stifled, rolls over to the leg side
harmeet singh to bisla, 1 run, tries to loft him over the in field by walking down the track and gets no way close to the middle of the bat, just lobs it over the bowler

harmeet singh to kallis, out, edged and gone! kallis has to go! a big wicket this, he was looking to run it through to third-man, gets a thin nick on it and gilchrist takes a simple catch, his second of the innings while kkr lose their tird
chawla to morgan, no run, and that one spins back into the bat now, has to push it to the off side

chawla to morgan, four runs, and now he walks across to the off side and scoops it over the very fine, fine-leg for a four! he's just survived a close call but that's not going to put him off from playing those shots
harmeet singh to bisla, no run, jags back into the batsman, he was looking to drive it through the covers, gets bit of an inside edge
harmeet singh to bisla, 2 runs, easily played away to backward square-leg for a couple of runs, reduces the required rate to seven.
azhar mahmood to morgan, no run, and that's the fourth dot, it is outside the off stump and morgan is kind of jumpy there, pushes it to the off
chawla to morgan, no run, and now defended back to the bowler
kumar to bisla, no run, goes down the track and wants to get it through the covers, but does not get it in the gap
kumar to morgan, 1 wide, down the leg side, was jumping down the track but it's too wide to get a touch on it and it's called a wide
kumar to morgan, 1 run, poor delivery down the leg side again but it's slower and the batsman's not able to get it away too fine
harmeet singh to bisla, no run, down the track and wants to slam it away, inside edge and the bowler is quick to get across and prevent the single
harmeet singh to bisla, 1 run, slower leggie from harmeet, pushed into the covers for a single
harmeet singh to morgan, 1 leg bye, slower one but's gone down the leg-side as the batsman was looking to walk across to the off side, misses but they get a bye
harmeet singh to bisla, no run, outside the off and he wants to crash it away, misses
harmeet singh to bisla, 1 run, pushed across for a single and bring the new man on strike
chandila to reddy, no run, drives at the first ball, back to chandila, who fields well
chandila to perera, no run, slower, dipping a bit, defended to cover
watson to vihari, 1 run, pushed to mid-on, and gets off the strike
watson to sammy, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
cooper to mishra, 1 wide, another wide down the leg side, and this time he lets it be a bye
cooper to mishra, 1 wide, cooper is trying hard to prove he didn't get lucky with vihari's wicket, and that he had planned it. not working, though. well down the leg side
cooper to mishra, no run, nearly an off-side wide, but not quite. left alone
cooper to sammy, no run, winds up for another big hit, but decides late to let it be
watson to mishra, 1 run, mishra charges at him, drives hard, gets a single to third man
trivedi to mishra, 1 wide, down the leg side, another wide. five wides so far
trivedi to mishra, four runs, the wide slip. not sure about that field placement. this one seams away a little, gets the edge, but has gone where the regulation slip would have been
cooper to sammy, 1 run, driven to long-off for one
