trivedi to sammy, 1 run, slower ball, bounces at him, hits the high part of the bat, but they take a single to cover
binny to sammy, no run, drives at this one, but is early into the shot, and has to check it. defended to cover
binny to sammy, 1 run, driven to long-off for one
binny to mishra, 1 wide, another wide. no. 7 in this innings. outside off
trivedi to sammy, no run, slower ball, just outside off, sammy aborts the big back lift and defends it back
trivedi to sammy, no run, slower balls are working against sammy because his back lift is huge. aborted again in favour of a defensive shot
trivedi to sammy, 1 run, slower ball again, bunted into the leg side, he wants two but ipl debutant sachin  baby is quick to charge in from deep midwicket. he keeps them down to one
faulkner to ashish reddy, no run, no room on this, defended to cover
binny to sammy, no run, another leave outside off. this one seams away a touch from the line of off
binny to sammy, 1 run, slower ball, sammy can;t play the big shot, gets a single to cover
binny to ashish reddy, 1 run, walks down the wicket to drive this to long-off for one
binny to sammy, four runs, slower ball, but this time sammy has picked it early, and waits for it to arrive. drives it wide of long-off for four. sammy's highest score in t20s
cooper to ashish reddy, 1 run, dropped by dravid at extra cover. poor fielding. doesn't even make a proper effort. just stiks out one hand hesitantly
cooper to sammy, 1 run, driven down to long-off for one
binny to ashish reddy, 1 run, pushed into the leg side for one
binny to sammy, 2 runs, driven hard to deep cover where sachin fumbles to allows them the second
faulkner to steyn, 1 run, driven to extra cover for one
cooper to steyn, 1 wide, slower ball gone horribly wrong. well wide outside off
steyn to dravid, 1 run, squared up again, but this time he manages to run this to third man for one
steyn to rahane, no run, another good outswinger, just outside off, defended to cover

steyn to rahane, no run, left alone to second slip. he makes a belated decision to leave this alone, ans the ball is way too quick for him. good thing for him, it bounces straight after hitting the bat

steyn to rahane, out, desperate shot. steyn has unsettled them into playing a godawaful shot. that's the problem of t20. you need just a few dot balls. rahane backs away and heaves. the ball shapes away and takes the toe end of the bat through to sanga
steyn to watson, no run, squared him up with a perfect outswinger headed to top of off. defended
perera to dravid, 1 leg bye, seaming in, headed down leg, concedes a leg-bye
steyn to watson, 1 run, squares him up, but the edge is soft and clears second slip for a single
steyn to dravid, 1 wide, goes for the magic ball, and strays too far down the leg side for a wide
steyn to watson, 1 run, steered away to the right of point. a fumble by sammy there allows them the single
perera to watson, four runs, and that wide slip again. why do you have a slip and not in the regulation catching position? this is a regulation edge, and would have been swallowed by the first slip
perera to watson, 1 run, dabbed away late, gets a single to third man
mishra to watson, 1 run, dropped into the leg side for a single
mishra to watson, six runs, long hop. you don't bowl that to watson. he rocks back and sends it flying it over deep midwicket. i have seen this so many times i can call this bit of action eyes closed
sammy to dravid, 2 runs, slower ball, moral victory for sammy, but the mis-hit clears midwicket, and gets dravid a couple

sammy to watson, four runs, vihari takes the risk at deep cover. that's good on him. watson is done in by the slower ball and mis-hits it towards deep cover where vihari wants to the catch, forget saving the four. doesn't quite reach it, and the ball bounces over his arms for four too
sammy to watson, 1 run, pushed to straightish midwicket where ashish reddy fumbles. a clean pick-up and throw would have made this interesting
perera to binny, 1 run, steered away to third man for a single. over to watson
perera to watson, six runs, he has murdered this for a parallel six. perera doesn't have the pace to be bowling in his own half. he takes this from outside off, and clobbers it over midwicket
steyn to binny, four runs, no edge is going to hand. begins with an outswinger, gets an edge, and even though there is a wide slip in place, this one goes wider
rampaul to smith, no run, smith looks to flay the next one through cover and he toe-ends it towards the fielder, think the bat is broken, yup, he gets a new one

rampaul to tendulkar, four runs, tendulkar escapes, a swinging delivery outside off from rampaul, tendulkar chases after it, gets on one knee as he looks to drive it, takes the outside edge and it flies between keeper and first slip, wankhede holds its breath for a second and then roars in glee
rampaul to tendulkar, no run, a leading edge this time, the ball rolls back towards the bowler, terrific opening over from rampaul
singh to smith, 1 wide, swings it down the leg side
singh to smith, no run, extra bounce for rp there, hit high on the bat as smith defends to the off side

rampaul to tendulkar, four runs, four fours in the over for srt, the volume in the wankhede goes way up, this was the best shot of the lot, moving across the stumps and helps along a legstump delivery down to fine leg
singh to smith, 1 run, an ugly swipe from smith towards mid-on for a single, bringing back srt on strike
singh to tendulkar, no run, tendulkar is drawn towards that delivery that is angling away from him, he chases it and misses
singh to smith, 1 run, terrific diving stop from vinay kumar at mid-on, smith played another of his ungainly swats, seemed headed for four till vinay intervened
unadkat to smith, 1 run, a mistimed flat-batted slap towards extra cover from smith
vinay kumar to smith, 2 runs, a mistimed lofted drive over mid-off for a couple, smith clearly not at his best here
vinay kumar to smith, four runs, just after i say that, smith plays a lovely drive through the covers for four, waits for it and just guides it past cover, and mumbai's fifty comes up
syed mohammad to karthik, 1 run, the first ball of spin turns in towards the stumps, slapped towards point for a single
syed mohammad to karthik, 1 run, played with soft hands, tapped towards cover for a single
syed mohammad to smith, 1 run, angling in towards middle and leg, driven to mid-on for one more
unadkat to karthik, 1 run, defended to the off side for a quick single

unadkat to smith, no run, nearly a run-out, major confusion there, smith played the ball towards backward point, karthik wanted a single, smith sends him back, the throw isn't the best from the fielder, unadkat collects and hits the stumps but karthik's dive gets him to safety

unadkat to smith, 1 run, outside off and that is stabbed towards point, again some confused calling, karthik wanted one, smith didn't, the throw from dilshan was wide of the stumps and they pinched an onverthrow

unadkat to smith, 1 run, smith shuffles away from the stumps and opens the face to guide the ball towards third man for a single that brings up his half-century, taken only 35 balls, that too after a pretty slow start
rampaul to sharma, 1 run, slapped towards tiwary at deep midwicket
syed mohammad to karthik, 1 run, guided towards cover for a single
syed mohammad to karthik, 1 run, an inside-edge sends the ball towards fine leg for a single
unadkat to karthik, 1 run, guides that one down towards third man for a single
syed mohammad to pollard, 2 runs, whipped away towards midwicket for two more
vinay kumar to karthik, 2 runs,
vinay kumar to karthik, no run, outside off and he can't get bat on that
singh to harbhajan singh, 1 run, eased towards mid-off for a single
malinga to dilshan, no run, no feet from dilshan as he swings and misses at a ball outside off

johnson to gayle, six runs, the gayle storm begins, he moved away from the stumps, johnson followed him, didn't give him much room, still gayle managed toswat that away to midwicket, he was exactly in position to play that shot, but gayle doesn't care, goes through with the shot and that is over the rope
johnson to dilshan, 1 run, a cracking drive from dilshan, can't beat mid-off though
johnson to dilshan, 1 run, that one swings in towards dilshan, who looks to thrash the ball towards the leg side, gets an inside-edge towards square leg
kulkarni to dilshan, 1 wide, too wide outside off stump
harbhajan singh to gayle, no run, defended again, again some turn for harbhajan, this time gayle plays it to point
harbhajan singh to de villiers, 1 run, almost a return catch to harbhajan, just wide of the bowler
kulkarni to tiwary, 1 run, defended this time for a single

kulkarni to de villiers, out, this is going to end in an embarrassing defeat for rcb, now ab de villiers is gone, another edge through to the keeper, again a hint of away movement does the job, dhawan kulkarni in his first game of the season is asking the mumbai indian selectors,' how on earth did you keep me out this long?'
harbhajan singh to tiwary, six runs, skips down the track and launches that over harbhajan singh's head for six, cleanly struck

kulkarni to tiwary, no run, that was a run-out there, kulkarni had plenty of time , but he was in a hurry to let the ball go, tiwary defended the ball to the left of the bowler, arun karthik raced out of his crease, and was caught out a long way from safety, the throw was wide
kulkarni to tiwary, no run, defended to the off side this time
kulkarni to arun karthik, 1 run,
kulkarni to tiwary, 1 wide, miles down the leg side from kulkarni

harbhajan singh to arun karthik, out, terrific effort from dinesh karthik, who dismissed arun karthik with an athletic bit of keeping, karthik had no clue where the ball was after trying to run the ball down towards fine leg, it pitched and spun towards the keeper, arun karthik started going for the single, dinesh karthik had the ball in his hand, break the stumps and that's another one down for rcb
harbhajan singh to tiwary, 1 run, another hoick from tiwary, towards deep square leg for a single
harbhajan singh to tiwary, no run, defended to the off side by tiwary
harbhajan singh to tiwary, 1 run, tapped towards midwicket for a single
harbhajan singh to syed mohammad, 1 run, defended to the leg side for a single
smith to syed mohammad, no run, huge appeal for lbw, but that looked to be missing off
pollard to vinay kumar, 1 run, outside edge down to third man for a single
pollard to vinay kumar, 2 runs, pollard bowls from well behind the stumps, eased to deep backward square
johnson to vinay kumar, no run, a crisp hit towards mid-on
pathan to saha, no run, pushed through on the stumps, the batsman defends it to midwicket
pathan to hussey, 2 runs, and again, played with soft hands and to deep midwicket
mohammed shami to hussey, 1 run, he flicks it down to fine leg to keep the strike
narine to hussey, four runs, this time, it's a proper edge! the batsman was slightly surprised with the turn and bounce on that, edges it past slip for a boundary
kallis to hussey, four runs, the batsman greets him with a charge down the pitch and whacks it past midwicket, all along the ground
bhatia to saha, 1 run, more slower stuff from bhatia, this time it is on off stump, the batsman punches it to extra cover
narine to raina, 1 run,

narine to raina, four runs, oye! macca makes his presence felt! it was just a nice little punch to long off. macca has to wait for the ball, because it is hit softly towards him, but he lets it go through his legs and it's a four! it's the kind of mistake toddlers make when they are still learning to get their hand and eye coordination working...
pathan to hussey, 2 runs, this time he takes a couple as he hits a powerful drives to the right of deep midwicket
pathan to hussey, six runs, he doesn't want to run, he is struggling with his running! so he chooses to smash this flat delivery and gets a whole lot of bat on it, it sails over the cow corner
balaji to dhoni, 1 wide, he tries to go wide outside off, bowls it along the wide marker and the umpire stretches his arms
nannes to bisla, 4 byes, he hits the top of off stump as the batsman plays an ugly hoick and misses, the ball flies to the boundary and how much more unlucky can you get
nannes to bisla, 1 run, he waits in the crease and opens the face of the bat to run it down to third man for a single

sharma to bisla, 2 runs, he moves outside leg stump, but the bowler bowls a slower delivery wide outside off. the batsman can only push it to mid-off and he calls for a quick single, but there are overthrows as no one was backing
jadeja to bisla, no run, tries to play a cheeky reverse flick past third man to a widish flat delivery, but makes no connection
bravo to morgan, 1 wide, he bowls a slower delivery, but this is wide down the leg side

bravo to bisla, out, he moves outside leg stump and punches it hard to the fielder at mid-off! he calls for a single, but it went quickly to hussey, who gets rid of it quickly too. hussey hits the stumps at non-striker's end and bisla goes for a brilliant 92.. some innings this was by him..

chandila to gayle, four runs, gayle slips and hits it for four, on middle and leg and that's been swept behind square, lost his balance did gayle but all's well in the end, struck it well enough to get it past square leg
faulkner to gayle, 1 wide, slides that one down the leg side and it's called a wide
faulkner to gayle, no run,
faulkner to mukund, no run, the back of the hand slower ball, on leg stump and that's been tickled towards square leg
sreesanth to gayle, (no ball) 1 run, sreesanth oversteps, on the line, bowls a slower one and gayle picks a single on the on side, mukund to face the freehit
watson to mukund, 1 run, guides that one comfortably towards third man for  a single
watson to gayle, no run, gayle's turn to square-drive, opened the face there but could not beat point on that occasion, was nicely struck
faulkner to kohli, no run, strikes virat on the elbow as he tried to leave that one alone, was in the channel outside off
faulkner to mukund, 1 wide, slower one but misdirected, bowled down the leg side and he's given it a wide, rightly so
watson to mukund, 2 runs, mukund pushes that towards extra cover and steals a single, dravid concedes an overthrow and they take one more
watson to kohli, 1 run, gets back and rolls his wrists over that one to play it into the deep for one more
chandila to kohli, 1 run, kohli waits for it to turn in and stabs it towards point
chandila to mukund, 2 runs, angling in towards middle and leg, gets across and scoops that for a couple more wide of fine leg
chandila to de villiers, 1 run, angling in towards middle, pushed towards deep midwicket for a single
trivedi to kohli, no run, on middle and off, bowled at 105kmph, gets across and plays it towards midwicket

chandila to de villiers, four runs, this one has been dispatched, long hop from chandila, ab waits for it to turn and smashes it over midwicket, comfortably, for four, a boundary after more than 40 balls

binny to de villiers, four runs, he's lost it, that should go down as a drop, even though sreesanth didn't touch that one, sliced it towards deep point, sreesanth was several yards inside the boundary and ran in further when he should have pedalled back, goes over his head for four
sreesanth to henriques, no run, ooh, comes down the track and tries to drive it hard through the covers, gets an inside edge towards the keeper, thinks of a single but is sent back
trivedi to kohli, 1 run, slower one bowled on the off, knocked down into the leg side, wide of the bowler, for a single
trivedi to kohli, four runs, easy pickings, on leg stump and kohli just tickles that with ease to the fine-leg boundary, fine leg is inside the circle
sreesanth to kohli, 1 run, slower one that kohli picked, slaps it hard towards mid-on, faulkner at mid-on keeps them to a single
sreesanth to henriques, 1 run, henriques moved across before the ball was bowled, dropped it into the off side and set off for a single
sreesanth to henriques, 1 run, the back of the hand slower ball, tried to clear midwicket, mistimed it just for a single
sreesanth to tiwary, 2 runs, makes a bit of room does tiwary, sreesanth chases him, turned past square leg into the deep for a couple of runs
faulkner to tiwary, 1 wide, called a wide, faulkner bowled it just wide of the marker outside off stump
faulkner to tiwary, 1 run, slower one, got across to drive it through midwicket, got a leading edge wide of extra cover for a single
faulkner to henriques, 1 run, strikes it well but can't get it past extra cover, sweet sound of bat hitting ball, just the single
faulkner to tiwary, no run, and again, tiwary tries to go over cow-corner this time and doesn't make contact, that one turned away
watson to rampaul, no run, swings and misses, tried to smash that over midwicket, didn't connect
watson to rampaul, out, rampaul tries to swing that over midwicket, was the slower one from watson, got a top-edge and the keeper sanju samson kept his eyes on that one and judged it well
faulkner to vinay kumar, 2 runs, streaky, slower one, tried to smack that over midwicket, got an inside edge, chandila runs to his right at fine leg, dives and restricts them to two
singh to dravid, four runs, width and that's easy pickings for dravid, slaps it between point and cover
singh to dravid, 2 runs, on middle, nips back in from middle, flicked through square leg into the deep for a couple of runs
henriques to samson, 1 wide, slower one but misdirected, ends up being a wide down the leg side

henriques to samson, 1 run, dropped, tough one for gayle at slip, thick outside edge again for samson as he tried to drive that through midwicket, gayle dived to his right, reacted late, got his right hand to it but couldn't hold on
henriques to dravid, no run, nicely timed by dravid but straight to rampaul at mid-off
henriques to dravid, no run, dravid comes down the track and pushes that back to the bowler
kartik to samson, 1 run, gets across and chips it in the direction of square leg for a single
singh to samson, 1 run, comes down the track and drives that one down to long-off for a single, 100 up for royals
unadkat to samson, no run, slower one bowled on the off, mistimes it as he plays it back to the bowler
vinay kumar to hodge, 1 run, slower one bowled on leg stump, turned through square leg for a single

vinay kumar to hodge, out, bowled'im! vinay, you beauty! he was the one who turned it around in the final over of the rcb innings and he's trying to do it here as well, slower one on middle, tried to swing it square and missed
kumar to smith, no run, outswinger, starts just outside off, left alone
kumar to smith, no run, and slips in the big inswinger now, and smith has not picked this at all. however, it is headed down the leg side
azhar mahmood to tendulkar, no run, starts with an outswinger, and is left alone outside off
azhar mahmood to tendulkar, four runs, nicely played. pushed for four. covers the swing, then opens the face, places it between point and cover-point
kumar to smith, no run, lovely outswinger, squares him up, and then deviates away after beating the bat. for a moment, i thought he had edged it
kumar to smith, 1 run, piyush chawla is conceding easy singles at mid-on. they are picking on him
kumar to karthik, 1 wide, big inswinger, but slips just down the leg side. this is harsh, because he beat him around off after he had moved across, and missed the leg stump by not much
kumar to karthik, no run, left alone outside off
azhar mahmood to karthik, 1 run, this one swings away a bit, guided to third man for one
kumar to smith, no run, good inswinger, headed towards top of off, defended back to him
kumar to smith, 1 run, another inswinger, pushed to mid-off for a single

azhar mahmood to smith, no run, nearly run out. smith refuses to respect karthik's call who is running to the danger end as the ball has been hit to point. karthik is left stranded, but miller's throw misses

azhar mahmood to karthik, 5 runs, that's a five. miller keeps missing, but this time no one is backing up. this is an easy single, but miller goes at the striker's end, and finds the gap between mid-on and midwicket
azhar mahmood to smith, 1 run, pushed into the off side for a single
azhar mahmood to karthik, 1 run, stays back, plays with soft hands, gets a single to point. miller keeps the ball with him this time
awana to sharma, no run, left alone outside off
awana to smith, 1 wide, wide down the leg side. the run rate reaches six now
awana to smith, 1 run, gets an inside edge on the drive, goes to long leg for one
gony to smith, 1 run, gets an inside edge onto the pad now. takes a single
gony to sharma, 1 run, pushed into the off side for one
chawla to pollard, no run, flatter, on off, defended. chawla had tossed it up after smith hit the six. not now
hussey to sharma, 1 wide, sharma backs away, hussey wants to push this wide outside off, but he has bowled this too wide
johnson to mandeep singh, 1 wide, johnson starts with a wide delivery well outside off
malinga to marsh, no run, marsh gets a swinging ball into the toes first up from malinga. keeps it out
malinga to mandeep singh, four runs, quick outswinger, squares him up, takes the edge, but goes wide of slip. can't drive at it, swinging just outside off
johnson to marsh, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
ojha to miller, no run, looks to work this to leg, gets a leading edge to off
ojha to miller, 1 run, mis-hit towards long-off, but it desn't carry
ojha to miller, six runs, pollard would have taken this? miller goes inside-out with a flat six over long-off, and mind you, johnson has put in a good effort by jumping high. misses by inches
ojha to miller, 1 run, driven to long-off for one
ojha to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, driven to long-off
harbhajan singh to gurkeerat singh, out, ugly swipe across the line, gets a healthy leading edge to sky this to cover for an easy catch
ojha to miller, 1 run, down the wicket to push this to deep midwicket
ojha to azhar mahmood, 4 byes, this one doesn't turn, beats the inside edge as he drives, but bounces over the stumps and beats dk too
ojha to azhar mahmood, 1 run, driven down to long-off for one
ojha to miller, 1 run, pushed into the leg side

ojha to azhar mahmood, four runs, umpire asad rauf shows quick reflexes to save his life here. this has been smashed back at him, and he is on his backside and lets it go for four. he is asking for a helmet now
harbhajan singh to azhar mahmood, no run, missed run-out. bunted to the next pitch, and goes for a run, and is rightly sent back. karthik misses by inches
harbhajan singh to miller, no run, down the wicket to push this to extra cover

harbhajan singh to azhar mahmood, out, another falls. mahmood looks to flick, but is early into it, and gets a healthy leading edge towards the square-leg umpire. enough time for karthik to run there and complete the catch
harbhajan singh to gony, no run, doosra, beats gony who is looking to bunt this to leg for one
harbhajan singh to gony, no run, another doosra, hits gony's pad, but it is pitched outside leg from round the stumps
johnson to chawla, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
malinga to miller, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
malinga to chawla, six runs, chawla has smoked this one. maybe they should stop bowling slower balls to tailenders. he has picked this one early, and smashed it back over malinga's head
kulkarni to chawla, 1 run, ramped away, but for the tailender third man is fine, and keeps them down to one
johnson to kumar, 1 run, slower ball, this time he bunts it sufficiently wide of cover to take the single
malinga to kumar, 2 runs, flicked away off the toes, chipped over midwicket for two. sharma gives it a sensational chase, though, and dives for it. he could have hurt himself there
malinga to awana, no run, defended solidly to cover, pk declines the single. seventeen to get off the last over. only one wicket in hand. he might have to do this in boundaries
kv sharma to smith, no run, spins away from the batsman, some turn away, beats the batsman's outside edge
kv sharma to smith, no run, left alone this, and it was a top=spinner, misses the off-stump by a bit, some bounce too
steyn to tendulkar, 1 run, bit of swing away from the bat and it gets an edge through to the third-man for a single
steyn to tendulkar, 2 runs, through the covers this time, he adjusts to the slow nature of the delivery, opens the face of the bat but vitally finds the gap for a couple of runs
i sharma to smith, 1 no ball, oh no, a no-ball, which is defended away to the off side

steyn to tendulkar, four runs, hit it away and for a four! what a shot! it was almost flicked away but with an intention of lofting it over the in-field, there was a fielder at deep square-leg and it was quite close to him, on his right, he misread it i think
steyn to tendulkar, 1 wide, and now down the leg-side for a wide, he was attempting a quicker one here but loses his line
steyn to tendulkar, 2 runs, tucked it to the leg side for a couple now, this is to the left of the deep fielder there, and he is able to come back for two
perera to sharma, no run, slower from the bowler, or it came on slower off the track, rohit defends it to the off side
perera to sharma, no run, and another straight-batted defensive stroke, played to the off side
i sharma to smith, no run, this one  he gets it slightly further up to the bat, he pushes it to mid-off but without too much power on that shot
i sharma to smith, no run, outside the off stump and smith has done something he would have probably not done often in this format, shouldered arms in the seventh over of the game
i sharma to smith, 1 run, outside edge through to the third-man for a single, the only run that over
kv sharma to sharma, 1 run, up to the bat, and driven down to long-off for a single
kv sharma to sharma, 1 run, taps it through the covers for another single to get rohit across
mishra to smith, six runs, dropped! what a sitter tipped over the long-off fence by ishant! he was very inside the fence and had to move back, got the hand on it, misjudged and tips it over
mishra to smith, 1 run, bit of a leading edge and it runs down to long-off for a single
mishra to sharma, no run, defended back to the bowler this time
mishra to sharma, no run, wants to drive it through the covers, does not get it off the middle, through to the covers
kv sharma to smith, no run, almost a run-out, he was looking to tip and run, but slipped on his way back, luckily he was not too far down the pitch before he decided there was no run on that one!
mishra to pollard, 1 run, a slightly poor delivery to follow it up, down the leg side and he's able to tuck it away to the leg side for a single
perera to pollard, no run, on the middle stump, not allowing him room to free his arms and taking pace off it too, pushes it to mid-wicket
perera to rayudu, 2 wides, very wide outside the off and to add to that woe, sanga misses it too, a couple of extras added to the score

i sharma to rayudu, 2 runs, slightly outside the off stump and he's able to open the face of the bat and guide it through the backward point region for a couple of runs, mishra does a good job in the field, which is not what ishant did when he dropped one off mishra
i sharma to pollard, 1 run, walks down the pitch and tries thwack it away, can get it away to the mid-wicket region for a single
mishra to pollard, no run, and he tries to go over the top, beats him off the wrong 'un and does not connect, was looking to go over the in-field, misses
mishra to pollard, no run, and again! this was the leggie and he was looking to play it over the off but the turn defeats him
mishra to rayudu, no run, and he pauses in his action before delivering that, bit of an ashwin there, defended it to the off side
mishra to rayudu, 2 runs, tries to go over the top but does not get it off the middle of the bat, bit of the bottom and it flies off to the wide long-off region for a couple
perera to rayudu, 1 run, goes down the track and pushes it to the off side for a single
steyn to rayudu, 1 run, was moving around in his crease and tucks it away to the leg side for a single
perera to rayudu, no run, he tries to walk away to the off side and scoop it over the fine-leg fielder but it's too quick and goes through to the keeper, between the batsman and the stumps

perera to rayudu, four runs, what a shot! there was no deep fielder on the off side and the batsman was looking to go across the off side and hit it over the leg-side, the ball was wide outside the off and he slices it over the in-field!
johnson to reddy, 2 runs, flicked away to the leg side and they want to come back for the second, that's what they do, the throw comes in from rayadu but not collected by the bowler and dhawan's in

kulkarni to dhawan, 1 run, slower one from the bowler and he has pushed it to pollard at point, the non-striker gets away running but dhawan isn't sure, bit of misunderstanding there, and could have been out had he hit it direct at the non-striker's end
kulkarni to dhawan, no run, and now he goes down the pitch and wants to crack it through the covers, slower one and pushed into the covers

johnson to sangakkara, 1 run, slower from johnson and he is looking to defend it, pushes it into the covers and off they go for a single to pollard again, trying too many singles to one of the better fielders in the side
harbhajan singh to sangakkara, no run, whoa, turn for harbhajan, when did that happen last, it was turning and bouncing and beats the outside edge of the bat
harbhajan singh to sangakkara, no run, pushes into the covers, five dot balls here
harbhajan singh to sangakkara, 1 run, and he now goes down the track and drives it down to mid-on for a single
malinga to sangakkara, no run, slammed to the covers and what an effort from rayadu, this was sizzling through to the fence but rayadu dives to his right and does well to field
harbhajan singh to dhawan, no run, and now he defends it back to the bowler to end the powerplay overs.
ojha to dhawan, no run, and he's now back to going down the pitch and defends it this time
harbhajan singh to sangakkara, 1 run, on the middle and angling down from round the stumps, nurdled away to the leg side for a single
harbhajan singh to dhawan, 1 run, again down the track but no room this time, tapped away to the leg side for a single

harbhajan singh to sangakkara, out, gone, caught and bowled, soft dismissal! it was an ordinary ball, on the middle stump, sanga was trying half-defend, half push and he ends up spooning it back to the bowler who has to go low down and takes the catch
ojha to dhawan, no run, from round the stumps, on the middle stump and a hint of turn back, defended back
ojha to vihari, no run, and now some turn and bounce, taps it to the off side
ojha to vihari, 1 run, slows it down well and easily tucked away to the leg side for a single
sharma to dhawan, 1 run, swept away by dhawan, gets it to the 45 fielder at fine-leg for a single
ojha to dhawan, no run, defended to the leg side and to the close-in fielder
ojha to dhawan, 1 run, tucked it away to deep square-leg for a single
smith to vihari, 1 run, flicked away to fine-leg for a single this time, 11 already off it
ojha to dhawan, 1 run, this time he's played it away well to the off side, defended and off for a run
ojha to vihari, 1 run, flicked away to the leg side for a single

ojha to dhawan, 2 runs, gets some room outside the room and easily cracks it away through the covers for a couple of runs, well run there and dhawan's able to get back before the stumps are destroyed by karthik
malinga to dhawan, no run, pushed it to the off side, to pollard yet again, not for runs

malinga to dhawan, four runs, the guy's in cracking form and he shows how, he goes down the track and smashes it over the extra-cover region for a four, gets to his 50 off only 40 balls on a difficult pitch, well played!
malinga to dhawan, 1 run, goes down the track and time time he's drilled it down to long-off for a single
harbhajan singh to dhawan, 2 runs, round the stumps and tapped away to the leg side, not too much pace in the shot and they are able to come back for the second, well run that
harbhajan singh to dhawan, 2 runs, driven through to wide long-off for a couple of runs, bit of a misfield from pollard and they come back for the second
malinga to dhawan, 1 run, slows it down considerably and easily pushes it through the covers for a single
malinga to vihari, four runs, hit over the covers for a four, even vihari joins the act now after an innings of great patience and intelligence, slices it over the covers
kulkarni to dhawan, 1 wide, outside the off stump, very wide outside in fact and he fails to get any bat on that, also called wide by the ump
pathan to pathan, 1 run, and wow, first ball he walks down the pitch and slaps it over to fine-leg, goes on a bounce to the fielder, single
pathan to bisla, no run, outside the off with a hint of a swing back into the batsman, pushed into the covers
pathan to bisla, no run,
nehra to pathan, no run, and that's swung away from the bat, beats the outside edge of the bat
nehra to pathan, no run, on the middle stump now and pathan gets some bat on it, defended to the leg side but nehra is quickly off to field that to his right
yadav to bisla, 1 wide, wide ball, swinging wider away from the batsman and he was looking to get some bat on it, fails to get any touch
yadav to bisla, no run, what a delivery, pitching marginally outside the off and swinging away from the batsman, beats the bat

yadav to kallis, no run, what a ripper! that's absolutely unplayable from the bowler, it was pitching on the middle and looked like angling it, but it swings away from the batsman and at some pace there!
yadav to pathan, no run, on the off stump and quick, he defends it well to the off side, into the covers
nehra to kallis, no run, outside the off and kallis looks to be in a hurry, at least in shot-making, again tries to drive it through the covers, gets an inside edge through to mid-on

nehra to kallis, 1 run, and another edge, kallis has definitely come out with a need to score quick and goes for another drive, gets the outside half of the bat that rushes to the fine third-man fielder
yadav to kallis, 1 wide, down the leg side now and it's drifting further down, kallis wanted to hit that away too but far too wide for him to get any bat on it
morkel to pathan, no run, swings at it against morne morkel and misses it by a mile, this was swinging away from the batsman and he does not give himself any time to have a look at him

morkel to pathan, out, and that's gone very high, and tell you what, pathan's caught pathan! again the swing of the bat, but this time it does not come off the middle, and the edge of the bat means that it's gone high, in fact very high, takes a lot of time to come down which means that irfan has to account for a bit of swirl too and he manages to take it, well caught!
pathan to morgan, no run, and another one that swings away from the batsman, he lets it go through to the keeper
pathan to morgan, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and guides it through to the deep cover fielder
nadeem to das, no run, spins away from the batsman this time, beats the outside edge
pathan to das, 1 run, swing back into the batsman, tucked away to the leg side for a single

pathan to kallis, out, gone now, kallis is out this time, fifth wicket down and that's another ripper! it was outside the off stump and he tries to slice it over the point, rohrer has to jump up and take it. he does exactly does and needs only one hand to grab it!
pathan to bhatia, no run, and that's almost played one, it swung back in and the defensive stroke almost sneaks through
nadeem to das, no run, that one turns away from the bat, only defended to the off side again
nadeem to das, no run, and now it's five dots as he defends to the off side
morkel to bhatia, 2 runs, and another one on the off stump, pushed it to the off side for a quick one, warner rushes in and gets the stumps down again, it ricochets off it again and for an overthrow
nadeem to das, no run, slows it down and the ball grips a tad, spins away, defended again
nadeem to das, no run, was looking to go down the track but it comes in quicker and he has to push his bat down in time
nadeem to das, four runs, down the track and smashes it through the bowler's hand for a four, it was absolutely powered and the bowler had no time to react to that

pathan to bhatia, 1 run, whoa another possible run-out, that was hit straight to the fielder at backward point, rohrer rushes in and tries to break the stumps but misses, das also dived in but would have been quite close had it hit
nadeem to bhatia, 1 run, swept away to the deep square-leg region for a single
nadeem to das, 1 run, pushed into the covers and they are off for a single

morkel to bhatia, no run, whoa, what a delivery, it seems like it's hit the stumps and not dislodged the bails, a big thwack onto the stumps and it's not gone down in a hurry! beats the outside edge there...
morkel to bhatia, 2 runs, bit of an outside edge that flies away to the off side for a couple of runs
nehra to das, 1 wide, down the leg-side and he lets it go through to the keeper, wide called
yadav to narwal, 1 run, and this is outside the off stump, opens the face of the bat, pushed to the off side for a single
yadav to lee, 1 run, slower one now and lee pushes it to the off side for a single to open his account
nehra to bhatia, 1 run, slower one outside the off and he is able to tap it towards long-off, the fielder at extra-cover comes across and fields it before which they get a single
lee to jayawardene, 1 wide, and another one that swing away, quick and swinging away, beats the outside edge of the bat, the ump thinks its wide enough to be called on
lee to jayawardene, 1 run, on the middle stump for a change but this one does not swing any place, mj taps it to the leg side and away for the first run off the bat
lee to sehwag, no run, ooh, almost, he was looking to have a waft at it, beats the inside edge of the bat and goes through to the keeper

balaji to sehwag, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and runs it down to the fine third-man region for a single, it was running away to the fence but lee runs across and fields rather well, dives around to prevent it from going away
balaji to jayawardene, 2 runs, he walks out now and wanted to flick it over the leg-side, manages to get it high but not long enough and they are back for the second to fine-leg
balaji to sehwag, 1 run, on the middle stump and tucked away to the leg side for a single
lee to sehwag, no run, slower from lee this time, on the off stump and sehwag pushes it to the point region
lee to sehwag, four runs, flicked over the top for a four, too leg-sidish from lee and that does not allow the ball to swing too much, easily picked up and hit over the in-field for a boundary
lee to jayawardene, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and it runs through to third-man for single
lee to sehwag, 1 run, and again, likes to open the face of the bat and run it through to third-man for a single
kallis to sehwag, no run, and now goes to slash it away, misses the outside edge of the bat and through to the keeper

balaji to jayawardene, out, edged and gone again, it is a very similar looking dismissal, he was looking to drive it this time and the edge carries through to the lone slip in place, kallis catches it well to push them back

balaji to warner, four runs, slightly further wider outside the off and warner is able to drive it through the wide mid-off region for a four, not your typical hard-hit strokes, more of a well-placed one
balaji to warner, 1 run, and now opens the face of the bat and guides it through to wide third-man for a single, wanted the second but fielded well
narine to warner, no run, some slow turn from outside the leg stump, he was almost squared up there
narine to warner, no run, on the off stump now, bit of turn away, tapped to the off side
lee to chand, 1 run, slower from lee and the batsman opens the face of the bat and guides it through to third-man for a single, finally gets off strike
kallis to warner, 1 run, on the off stump and pushed to wide mid-off for a single
kallis to chand, no run, on the off stump and he look to run it down to the off side, gets it away to point
narine to chand, no run, and that one comes in, chand manages to get something on it, rolls over to the leg-side to end an excellent over from narine, just one off
bhatia to warner, no run, outside the off stump and it seemed to have held up, warner was only able to push it to point
bhatia to warner, four runs, slower from bhatia, he opens the face of the bat and guides it through third-man for a four, the fielder was within the circle and easily beat him

bhatia to warner, no run, missed, stumping chance! it was an off-spinner from bhatia and warner had advanced down the track, misses his outside edge and should have been easily stumped, bisla gets it on his gloved but fails to collect it cleanly, second miss from the kkr
balaji to warner, 1 run, he does not want to pitch it up and warner is able to open the face of the bat and guides it through the point region for a single
bhatia to chand, no run, bhatia continues to pitch it up to the bat and defended to the leg side by chand
bhatia to chand, 2 runs, swept away and gets a couple of runs to backward square-leg, again it had no pace on it and it seemed like he was playing him like a leg spinner
narine to chand, no run, quicker, on the off stump and slight turn away from the batsman, pushed back
narine to warner, no run, prodigious turn and a lot of bounce, opens the face of the bat and gets it to the backward point fielder
kallis to warner, 1 run, cracks it like how he likes to, after all those deft placements he manages to crack it away through the deep point region for a single
narine to chand, 1 run, swept away and there is a misfield at backward square-leg from kallis, not having a great day is the great man
balaji to warner, 1 run, tapped to the off side and they are off for a quick one, bisla seems to have collided with chand, and he's down for the count.

balaji to chand, 2 runs, down the track, and that's dropped again! third miss of the night, second drop of the evening and the slash shot from chand goes straight to hands at third-man, missed by narwal
balaji to chand, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and guides it to narwal at third-man for a single
balaji to warner, 2 runs, and now it's over the mid-wicket region, bhatia gets his hand to it but fails to latch on to it, a night of what-ifs for kolkata
lee to chand, 1 run, outside the off stump and wants to open the face of the bat through to third-man, gets bit of an inside edge, still goes through to third-man
pathan to warner, no run, quicker and angling in from round the stumps, tapped to the off side
pathan to rohrer, 1 run, and he laps it to fine-leg for a single, gets it away to notch up their third win!
hussey to saha, 1 run, slows it down from round the stumps and he checks his shot, pushes it to the leg side for a single
kumar to saha, no run, outside the off stump and he wants to drive it through the covers, does not bounce too much and the shot runs away to a nearby fielder
kumar to saha, four runs, but this time he gets the bat out at exactly the time he wants it get it to meet the ball, creams it through point for a four!
kumar to saha, no run, slows it down again and it's pushed to the covers, straight to the fielder
awana to hussey, 1 run, inside edge and the ball goes on the bounce to the keeper, the non-striker rushes to get a single
awana to saha, no run, and this time he wants to spank him over his head but the ball just does not come on, the mis-hit rolls back to the bowler
awana to hussey, no run, wants to drive it away again and misses, the ball's not quite coming on as well as it was in the last game here, not yet anyway
awana to hussey, 1 run, and again, uses his feet, goes down and wants to spank it away, no timing and it runs towards wide mid-on for a single
hussey to raina, no run, slammed to the off side but straight to the extra-cover fielder
hussey to hussey, 1 run, driven through the covers for a single now
hussey to raina, no run, wants to rush down and smash it through the covers, to the extra-cover fielder, again, not for runs
chawla to hussey, 2 runs, swept away again in that gap on the leg side that i was talking about earlier, fielder needs to run across to get to it
gony to raina, 1 run, outside the off stump, tipped over to the leg side for a single

chawla to hussey, out, gone, stumped? he was coming down the track and chawla saw that, bowled it at a medium-pace, hussey was a tad surprised there and does not get any bat on it, sneaks through to the keeper who does well to gather it first and then whip off the bails, what a delivery, what a stumping!
chawla to raina, six runs, gone for a six this time, again that delivery right in his slot, again that swing of the bat and again that six over mid-wicket!
chawla to raina, no run, quicker on the middle, tapped back to the bowler
chawla to raina, 2 runs, slows it down this time and that's delicately pushed to the leg side, they take the first and then run back for a quickly taken second
sathish to morkel, 1 run, slower one and pushed it to the leg side, they take a single and do not come back for the second this time
sathish to morkel, 1 run, smashed away through covers for a single this time

gony to raina, 1 run, this time he gives himself room and tries to drive it through, gets it only to extra cover and they are off for a quick single, hussey tries to run him out at the non-striker's end but misses
sathish to raina, 2 runs, opens the face of the bat and drives it through the covers for a couple of runs

sathish to raina, four runs, slows it down well, but look at that shot from raina, he moves towards the leg stump, gently opens the face of the bat and plays it through backward point, bisects two fielders there
sathish to raina, 1 run, whips it to mid-wicket now for a single to get to the other end

kumar to raina, 2 runs, appeal for a run-out against raina! it was driven through the point and the third-man has to come around to field it, well done in the field, good throw back and bails whipped off but raina was diving in yet again and this time he's quite in, he moves on to 99 here!
morkel to pomersbach, no run, on the off stump and defended to the off side by the batsman
morkel to pomersbach, 1 run, down the track and tapped to the mid-on region for a single
sharma to pomersbach, four runs, crunch, that's hit hard and in the gap for a four! outside the off stump and he was giving himself some room, creates some width and punishes that one
morkel to marsh, no run, round the stumps and outside the off, enough room to drive it through but decides to punch it to the off, to the fielder though
sharma to marsh, no run, wants to drive it through the point region this time but hits it straight to the fielder and not for runs

sharma to mandeep singh, no run, gives himself some room, was looking to flay it away but gets it to the fielder, raina gets a good bounce and throws at the non-striker's end where marsh's far away from the crease, misses

sharma to mandeep singh, out, and now he's gone, caught at extra-cover! was looking to go over the top, inside-out, but hits it straight to the fielder there, raina takes a simple catch and they have lost their second
morkel to hussey, 1 run, slower one there and he opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third-man for a single
sharma to marsh, no run, ooh, close to getting out there, it was outside the off and he tries to drive it through the covers, misses the outside edge, misses the stumps and goes to dhoni
sharma to hussey, 1 run, outside the off stump, pushed through the covers to the deep fielder there
ashwin to marsh, 1 run, slows it down from round the stumps and he is looking to work it away to the leg side, gets a leading edge to the off side for a single
ashwin to hussey, no run, pushed to the off side now, straight to the fielder this time
ashwin to hussey, 1 run, another one which is very up to the bat and he's only able to tap it back to the right of the bowler for a single
ashwin to marsh, 1 run, outside the off from round the stumps and he's able to tap it away to long-off for a single
morris to hussey, 1 run, gives himself room and plays it through the off side for a single to third-man

ashwin to hussey, six runs, goes down the track and slams it over, that's partially caught by jadeja but he knows he going to cross the fence and he throws the ball back into play, the question is whether he hits the fence before he's thrown it back and replays suggest that yep, it's gone all the way!

ashwin to hussey, out, and now hussey's gone, caught at long-off! it was on the off stump and he wanted to play it over the long-off fielder, hits it well enough i thought but goes straight to bravo at long-off who takes the catch to earn himself a dance
raina to marsh, six runs, and again and for a six! that looked like a mis-hit from marsh but it's gone all the way over the long-off fence, what a shot!
ashwin to miller, six runs, down the pitch and now miller's joined in the fun by spanking it over the bowler for a six! that' going to do the run-rate lot of good
ashwin to miller, 1 run, another one that's right up to the bat and it's pushed down to long-off for a single
bravo to miller, 1 run, driven through the covers and gets it into the gap between the two cover fielders for a single
bravo to marsh, 1 run, slower one but tapped to the off side for a single
ashwin to miller, four runs, whoa, what a shot! that's one of the shots of the game, probably similar to raina's lofted, inside-out shot early in his innings, miller does the same and gets a four
bravo to marsh, 1 run, slower ball and he reads it well, wanted to play it to backward square-leg, gets it squarer
morris to miller, four runs, and that's crunched over the bowler's head for a four, it was hit very hard by miller and a diving raina fails to stop it
bravo to miller, 1 run, top-edge this time and it goes on the bounce to long-off, hussey comes around to field it

bravo to marsh, out, bowled him, first ball on target and he was looking to slap it over the mid-wicket region, gets an edge and the leg-stump are not only on the ground but is also in a couple of pieces, well done marsh, well played but chennai might just have edged ahead here
bravo to gony, no run, swing and miss, chennai have won by 15 runs in the end...
narwal to watson, 1 run, swing away from the bat and he opens the face of the bat through to third-man for a single
narwal to rahane, no run, and immediately the ball keeps low, he was looking to come out of the crease and then had to get back down in time, defends back
narwal to watson, 1 run, slightly closer to the middle stumps and that's tapped away to the leg side for a single
narwal to rahane, 1 run, chips down the track and just pushes it to the mid-on fielder for a quick single, watson was slow in getting away but in the end makes it easily
narwal to watson, 1 wide, poor ball down the leg side, it went further down and it's gone for a wide
narwal to watson, 1 wide, and another one, tries the slower one yet again but he's lost his line and it's called a wide, the fielder is up in the circle at fine-leg

senanayake to rahane, out, and gone now, rahane has been dismissed, stumped off a very slower ball from the spinner! he really slowed that up and rahane was looking to hit it over the top, he misses and bisla whips off the bails
iqbal abdulla to samson, no run, and now gets his bat and pad out, defends back to the bowler again
senanayake to watson, 1 run, up to the bat outside the off stump and that's driven to mid-off for a single
kallis to samson, 1 run, slower from jk and pushed to the deep point, they are off for a quick single, bit of a misfield also helps
kallis to watson, no run, again slows it down and that's defended to the off side

iqbal abdulla to watson, four runs, and finally watto gets some bat on one that's gone down the leg-side! he's been letting those go for wides but this one gets a tickle that runs away to the fence for a four
iqbal abdulla to samson, 1 run, pushed to the leg side for a single now, 15 off the over to signal the time-out
kallis to watson, 1 run, shot back to the bowler but he's away in his follow-through and the ball hits the non-strikers stumps hard, are able to come through for a single
kallis to samson, 1 run, good shot for a single, moves around in his crease and cracks it over the covers, goes on the bounce to the fielder
narine to watson, no run, turning back into the batsman now and that's hit his pad yet again, spinning down the leg side i think, the keeper didn't appeal
bhatia to samson, 1 run, moves across the off stump before going back to his original stance and wants to hit it over, gets an inside edge to the leg side for a single
bhatia to shah, 1 run, slows it down to a trickle and he was going for an expansive shot, checks his shot and punches it to long-off for a single
narine to shah, 1 run, pushed to the leg side for a single
narine to samson, 1 run, punches it down to the long-off area for a single
narine to binny, 1 run, slows it down now and defended to the off side for a single
kallis to shah, 1 wide, outside the off stump and it's called a wide, again slightly harsh i feel but that's how it goes in cricket sometimes
chavan to gambhir, 1 wide, round the stumps, on the leg stump line and turned away, given wide
chavan to gambhir, 1 run, goes down the track and driven through the leg side for a single
faulkner to bisla, 1 leg bye, outside the leg stump from over the wicket, hits his pad and rolls over to the leg side for a single leg-bye
chavan to gambhir, 2 runs, round the stumps and on the middle stump, he is able to tuck it to deep square-leg and they are able to come back for the second
watson to bisla, no run, and now defended to the off side and cries of 'no, no, no' from the batsman
faulkner to gambhir, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and guides it to the off side for a single
faulkner to bisla, four runs, goes over the top and for a four! he's gone down the track and hit it over the mid-off fielder with ease, four more
faulkner to bisla, no run, the keeper's up to the stumps and the ball's right up to the bat, pushes it back to the bowler
watson to gambhir, 1 wide, down the leg side for a wide, that definitely swung down, was on the leg stump and it's eluded the bat, collected well
watson to gambhir, no run, changes his line and it's outside the off stump, driven to the covers, straight to the fielder
hogg to kallis, 1 run, another one that's right up to the bat and he gets his pad out and drives it to the long-off fielder
chavan to pathan, 1 run, wants to go after the bowler, first ball too, gets a bit of an inside edge to fine-leg for a single
chavan to pathan, no run, round the stumps and slower, pushed to the off side but not for runs
hogg to kallis, no run, good delivery, wrong 'un, beats the outside edge and the bails are whipped away quickly too, but he's inside his crease
trivedi to pathan, four runs, and that's played away through the third-man region for a four, this was what he was attempting previous delivery and that's gone to the fence
binny to pathan, no run, he tries to repeat that open-batted stroke through third-man, this time there's a fielder positioned there
binny to pathan, no run, looking to open the face of the bat but does not get any bat on it
trivedi to kallis, 1 run, slower one from the bowler and it's pushed down to deep mid-wicket for a single
watson to kallis, 1 run, and that's played very fine, through to the third-man region, opening the face of the bat and through to fielder
steyn to jayawardene, no run, another outswinger. this one starts a little wider. left alone
steyn to jayawardene, no run, pushed with soft hands, with an open face, towards point
steyn to jayawardene, no run, poor shot. mahela charges at him, steyn bowls another outswinger on leg, it swings and beats his bat. passes over the leg stump

steyn to jayawardene, four runs, nearly the finishing move. jayawardene had been set up superbly. now he pushed at an outswinger just outside off, but the edge was soft, and went between the keeper and slip
i sharma to sehwag, no run, again beats him with the seam movement. beats the inside edge again, headed down leg again
i sharma to sehwag, no run, the first ball with some room on it, but sehwag has pushed this straight to cover-point. maiden. two overs, four on the board, not a run earned

i sharma to jayawardene, out, the great ipl umpiring continues. jayawardene is given out when outside the line of off. this is good bowling, but not sure he is out. he has walked down and across the wicket, misses with the across-the-line drive. given by rauf. jayawardene is not happy. i wouldn't blame him
perera to chand, no run, pushed with an open face to point
i sharma to chand, 1 run, defended into the leg side, and sehwag calls him through for a quick single
perera to chand, no run, did chand think this was a free hit? because he charged down the wicket, shut his eyes, and swung. doesn't touch it
mishra to chand, 1 run, swept away from outside off, gets a single to deep square
kv sharma to mendis, 1 run, this one doesn't turn, bunted into the leg side for one
kv sharma to pathan, no run, driven back at him

mishra to pathan, 2 runs, irfan might have run himself out. bunted into the leg side for what looks like a single, but he takes sammy on and goes back for the second. looks out live time, but on replays he seems to have got a smidgeon over the line before the bail is dislodged
sammy to pathan, no run, drives at a wide delivery with no foot movement. the ball stays low, and beats him
sammy to pathan, 1 run, slower ball, aborts the big drive, pushes this to extra cover to take a single
sammy to mendis, 2 runs, pushed to extra cover for a single again. sanga misses the stumps again. this time they will get an overthrow
perera to pathan, 1 run, down the track, nearly done in by the slower one. takes a single with the ball left on the pitch

sammy to nadeem, out, one more gone. pushed straight to midwicket. nadeem wants one, pathan doesn't. then at some time pathan thinks he should go. by that time nadeem has turned his back on pathan. however, sanga's throw misses and gives them a lifeline. the backing up is good, though, and nadeem sacrifices his wicket
sammy to pathan, 1 run, pushed wide of cover for one
steyn to yadav, no run, quick and straight again, on off, defended from the crease
steyn to yadav, no run, quick, 149ks, middle and leg, holds its line, through him, bounces over the leg stump
pathan to patel, 1 run, edged first ball, but flies wide of slip. pathan gets the customary swing first up, hits the shoulder of the bat

yadav to dhawan, 2 runs, nadeem and pathan struggling with communication again. dhawan gets a top edge that falls between pathan, who is running back from square leg, and nadeem, who is running in from the fence. no on has called, and luckily they avoid the collision

nehra to dhawan, four runs, dhawan is brimming with confidence. he jumps at nehra, makes room, then drives this from outside leg, through cover-point for four. that is incredible. you wouldn't even try if you were not overconfident
yadav to patel, no run, slower ball, driven to cover
botha to patel, 1 run, hard hands, gets an edge on the drive, takes a single to cover-point
nehra to patel, 1 run, stays low outside off, the bottom edge goes between the keeper and the slip. gets him a single
nadeem to sammy, 1 run, pushed to cover for a single. sanga has to dive in

botha to sangakkara, out, beautiful shot, but he is gone. he seems to have lofted this wide of long-off, but not wide enough. yadav stays on the rope and takes the catch. i am surprised this is taken, but that fielder was placed wide

botha to vihari, 1 wide, wide down the leg side. kedar jadhav has come charging down at the umpire asnani for a catch at the wicket, but the umpire stretches his arms. this is a topspinner outside leg, and seems to have kissed the glove on the way. i see some deviation
botha to vihari, no run,
botha to vihari, 2 runs, swept away wide of deep square
yadav to vihari, 1 wide, wide down the leg side now
yadav to vihari, no run, van der merwe has saved a certain four with a dive to his right at backward point
sandeep sharma to pujara, no run, pujara plays straighter this time, pushing the swinging ball towards mid off
sandeep sharma to pujara, 1 run, the line is outside off stump this time and pujara mis-times a drive towards wide mid-off, gayle wasn't too quick between the wickets once again
sandeep sharma to gayle, 1 run, gayle drops the ball close on the off side and runs another single, that's only his 5th ball
sandeep sharma to pujara, no run, pujara's missed out there, there was so much width outside off but his square drive went straight to point
sandeep sharma to pujara, 1 run, a slower ball outside off, pujara plays it towards mid off and takes a single to retain the strike
awana to kohli, no run, whoops, that kept low outside off and beat kohli, bounced a second time before reaching gilchrist
chawla to gayle, no run, that's a cross-seam delivery which is much quicker, it slides across gayle and beats the bat
gony to gayle, 1 run, driven from the crease towards long off
chawla to kohli, no run, defended on the from foot on the leg side
chawla to gayle, no run, another cross-seam quick ball, gayle defends on the off side
chawla to gayle, no run, chawla bowls another medium-pace delivery to gayle, who plays it back to the bowler
chawla to gayle, 2 runs, another quick cross-seam delivery, gayle stays in his crease and drives towards wide long off
chawla to gayle, 1 run, the quick ball this time, gayle hits it along the ground to long off
gony to gayle, 1 wide, that's down leg side, first wide of the innings, first extra of the innings in fact
gony to gayle, no run, gayle takes his bottom hand off the bat as he flays at the ball, he hits it to point
chawla to gayle, 1 run, played on the leg side from the crease
gony to gayle, 1 wide, gony's feeling it for sure, the heat of gayle. he's bowled a wide outside off stump
gony to kohli, no run, gony moves to his right during his follow through to intercept a kohli drive
khan to gilchrist, no run, quite wide outside off, gilchrist swings and misses
khan to gilchrist, 1 wide, this time it's a wide down leg side
khan to gilchrist, 1 wide, arun karthik leaps to his right to collect one that slants down leg side
henriques to marsh, no run, driven towards mid off
unadkat to gilchrist, no run, unadkat nips the ball into gilchrist after pitching outside off and the batsman defends from his crease
khan to azhar mahmood, 1 run, mahmmod drives towards mid off and sprints the single
vinay kumar to gilchrist, 1 run, that would have been out had there been a direct hit! gilchrist played towards midwicket and mahmood set off, gilchrist sent him back, mahmood was a long way out
unadkat to azhar mahmood, 1 run, played with an open face to steer the ball to third man
muralitharan to azhar mahmood, 1 run, played through midwicket for a single
muralitharan to miller, out, ah, miller did not know too much about that. he played all around one that went on with the arm and is bowled between bat and pad
vinay kumar to sathish, 1 run, gilchrist would have been gone had gayle hit at the striker's end from point, sathish had mis-timed the shot
vinay kumar to gilchrist, 1 run, gilchrist plays the ball down near his feet and sprints through
jadeja to smith, no run, angling in towards middle, driven past the bowler towards mid-on
jadeja to smith, no run, flat on middle, pushed back towards the bowler
sharma to tendulkar, 1 wide, begins with a wide down the leg side
sharma to tendulkar, no run, in the channel outside off stump this time and tendulkar leaves that alone to the keeper
morris to smith, no run, angling in towards off and middle and that's been played into the leg side
morris to tendulkar, 1 wide, slides that one down the leg side, the second one to tendulkar today
sharma to smith, no run, angling in towards off and middle, pushes it towards the bowler
sharma to smith, no run, angling in towards off and middle, gets back and pushes it down the pitch
morris to tendulkar, no run, tendulkar swivels and tries to dispatch that behind square, went a little down the leg side, may have just gone over the stumps there, tendulkar moved well across there
morris to tendulkar, 1 wide, this one is a wide, down the leg side this time, comfortably, and the umpire calls it
morris to smith, four runs, angling in towards middle and smith gets rid of that one, flicking it hard between mid-on and midwicket
sharma to tendulkar, 1 run, on the off stump, whips it wide of square leg for a single, thinks of a second but it's not there
jadeja to tendulkar, 1 run, on middle and off, turned through square leg into the deep for a single

jadeja to tendulkar, out, tendulkar's been given out lbw, bowled it quicker through the air on middle and leg, appeared to pitch in line, tendulkar tried to work it into the leg side, seemed to be struck in line of leg stump, tendulkar missed it and it seemed quite adjacent, tendulkar is gone
bravo to karthik, no run, drops it into the off side, wants the single but smith wisely sends him back
bravo to karthik, 1 run, angling in towards middle, walks across and flicks it through square leg for a single
morris to karthik, 1 run, wristy from karthik, gets across and flicks it towards fine leg for a single
morris to pollard, 1 run, angling in towards middle, pushed through midwicket into the deep for a single
jadeja to karthik, 1 run, driven to long-off for one
laughlin to karthik, no run,
laughlin to karthik, 1 run, played that one away behind square on the leg side for a single
jadeja to rayudu, no run, angling in towards middle, drives that one back to the bowler
laughlin to rayudu, 1 run, opens the face to guide it towards third man for a single
laughlin to sharma, 1 run, slower one bowled outside off, runs that to third man to keep strike
ashwin to rayudu, no run, this one goes on straight, tries to open the face, misses
sharma to rayudu, 1 run, sneaks in a quick single by playing that towards mid-off
ashwin to harbhajan singh, no run, the carrom ball, it goes past the outside edge after landing outside off
bravo to harbhajan singh, 1 run, dropped wide of the keeper for a quick single
bravo to sharma, 1 run, slower one on the off, swings it towards deep square leg for a single, didn't connect it well enough
bravo to sharma, no run, ooh, rohit will feel he missed out there, tried to launch that through the line over long-off, missed
laughlin to sharma, 2 runs, tries to swing that over midwicket, gets a thick inside edge for a couple of runs
laughlin to sharma, 1 run, plays that one away for a single
johnson to hussey, no run, swinging away there, and moved after pitching too, hussey saw that through to the keeper
suyal to vijay, 1 run, shaped in, nicely bowled, vijay gets across and pushes it towards midwicket
harbhajan singh to hussey, 1 run, round the wicket, angling in towards off and middle, gets an inside edge for a single
harbhajan singh to ashwin, no run, round the wicket to ashwin as well, bowled flat on the off, comes down the track and defends it back to the bowler
harbhajan singh to ashwin, no run, bowled it flat again and that's been pushed back to the bowler
harbhajan singh to ashwin, no run, ashwin comes down the track to harbhajan and drives it towards midwicket
harbhajan singh to hussey, 1 run, width and that's been cracked towards deep point for a single

harbhajan singh to jadeja, 2 runs, missed run-out, the bowler wasn't near the stumps as he should have been, pushed wide of midwicket, dhoni was running the second towards the non-striker's end, a throw from the deep, misses
harbhajan singh to jadeja, no run, angling in towards middle, defends it on the pitch
ojha to dhoni, no run, angling in towards middle, drops that into the off side
ojha to morris, 1 wide, slips that one down the leg side, called a wide
johnson to jadeja, 5 wides, oh dear, five wides now, slower one bowled down the leg side and karthik failed to get his body behind that one
johnson to jadeja, 1 wide, another wide down the leg side from johnson
ojha to jadeja, out, mumbai have thrashed chennai, jadeja was trying to clear deep square leg there, found rayudu there who took an easy catch, massive win for the hosts
vinay kumar to reddy, no run, bowls a gentle outswinger which reddy wanted to blast through off side, the ball swings past the outside edge
unadkat to patel, four runs, angled delivery on off and middle, parthiv does well and flicks it to deep backward square leg boundary, the fine leg was up in the field
unadkat to sangakkara, 1 run, now sanga plays it with soft hands towards mid-off for a single
muralitharan to sangakkara, no run, pushed through on the stumps, sanga comes solidly behind that one and defends
muralitharan to sangakkara, 1 run, comes down the pitch and tries to launch it over midwicket, gets and inside edge to deep square leg
muralitharan to patel, no run, goes back to the flatter delivery and punches it to cover
muralitharan to sangakkara, 1 run, another one of those flatter delivery, now sanga goes back and flicks it to deep backward square
muralitharan to patel, 2 runs, this one is slightly outside off, parthiv is quick to rock back and guide this to deep backward point
kartik to sangakkara, 1 run, he charges down the pitch and drives it back past the bowler,  all along the ground
kartik to perera, no run, flatter delivery on the off stump, the batsman punches it firmly back to the bowler
kartik to perera, 1 run, he stays in the crease and pushes it to long-off for a single
kartik to white, 2 runs, he comes down the pitch and flicks it in the air towards deep square leg where moises makes a good sliding save
kartik to perera, 1 wide, fires this down the leg side preemptively, big wide
muralitharan to white, no run, pushed through on the middle stump line, the batsman defends it to midwicket
muralitharan to perera, 1 run, he gets inside the line of this flatter delivery and tickles it to deep square leg for a single
henriques to white, six runs, slower delivery, white has enough time to line himself up and he slams  this into the empty seats behind deep midwicket
singh to perera, 1 wide, bowls a wide delivery outside off now, it just went over that wide marker but it's good enough to call it a wide for the ump
vihari to agarwal, no run, quicker delivery on the leg stump, he tries to whack it to deep square leg, mistimes it to square leg
vihari to agarwal, six runs, he gets it right this time, gets under it and smacks it to deep square leg boundary, into the crowd
vihari to agarwal, 1 run, this time he pushes it softly towards mid-off for a single
vihari to gayle, 1 run, quicker delivery on the stumps, he dabs it to square leg to steal the strike
steyn to gayle, no run, keeps it tight around that channel outside off, gayle defends it to the off side
perera to kohli, 1 run, he makes room by moving outside leg stump and gets a thick edge down to third man
white to kohli, four runs, oh poor fielding in the deep, really really bad. it was a backfoot punch to deep point which akshath reddy allows it to go through his legs

white to de villiers, out, ab is gone! he has hit this long-hop straight into the hands of deep midwicket! he could have hit it anywhere, but he picks the man in the deep. big wicket for sunrisers just when these two were getting away with it..
mishra to kohli, 1 run, he drives it to midwicket and looks for a couple, henriques wanted a couple too and turned back fast, but kohli didn't move, he sends moises back in time
mishra to kohli, six runs, and again! this is some beautiful use of the feet, gets under the pitch and sends this one further over the sight screen
mishra to kohli, 1 wide, he is messing with mishra's line, who has bowled this flat down the leg side
perera to kohli, 2 runs, falls down at deep backward point after it took a big edge! mishra was too slow from third man, he had a chance as the ball stayed in the air for a long long time.
perera to kohli, 1 wide, attempts a slower delivery, but this one goes down the leg side..
tait to sehwag, 1 wide, good tait, bad tait. both of them are here. he has bowled this at 147ks, but has also strayed down leg side

faulkner to sehwag, out, back-of-the-hand slower ball, and sehwag has not picked it. that's the clear sign that sehwag is not in form. he is the biggest murderer of slower balls because he picks them earlier than others. this one he has swung at in a different time zone. bowled. they check for a no-ball but more than half of his foot is behind the line
watson to gautam, out, cm gautam's ipl debut hasn't gone well. he drives at a sucker ball outside off, and gets an edge as it moves away
tait to jayawardene, four runs, using all the 143ks of tait's pace. dabs on the top of it, past point, and to the right of third man for four
tambe to jayawardene, no run, this one goes straight on, at 103ks, doesn't turn, jayawardene defends
trivedi to jayawardene, no run, finds point again
trivedi to jayawardene, 1 run, moves across to get inside the line of the ball and gets a single to leg. has taken this from outside off
trivedi to jayawardene, six runs, lovely shot. he has picked the slower ball, got under it, and lofted this inside-out over mid-off
watson to jadhav, 2 runs, lofted over midwicket, but faulkner makes a superb one-handed save at the boundary
tait to rohrer, 2 runs, slower sucker ball, runs off the outside half of the bat, tambe dives at point, but can't get to it. watson at third man keeps it in
tait to rohrer, four runs, through tambe at point. driven hard, but tambe has let this through his legs at point
tait to jadhav, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
watson to jadhav, 1 run, charges at him, ends up yorking himself, gets a single to deep cover
faulkner to rohrer, 1 run, backs away, gets too far from the ball, dabs it to point for one
kaul to dravid, no run, sid kaul begins with a maiden. most promising quick bowler in ranji trophy last season. driven straight to point
yadav to rahane, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
kaul to dravid, no run, driven hard, but it goes straight to mid-off. on the bounce

agarkar to dravid, four runs, do we call it a drop or do we call it a life? slower ball, drilled back at him, and agarkar gets a hand to it, but the ricochet goes for four. this is how hard it has been hit
agarkar to dravid, no run,
negi to dravid, 1 run, dravid chips down the track to chip this to wide long-off for one
negi to dravid, 1 run, drilled back towards the umpire, but negi dives and gets a hand to it
negi to rahane, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
agarkar to rahane, 1 run, pushed wide of mid-on for one
negi to rahane, 1 run, swept away to deep square leg for one
negi to rahane, 1 run, driven to long-off for one
rohrer to dravid, 1 wide, begins with a wide outside off
rohrer to rahane, 1 run, pushed to long-off for one
morkel to dravid, 1 run, for the second time in a row dravid is done in for the pace. this hits the shoulder of the bat even as he looks to close his face. the edge gets him the fifty
morkel to rahane, 2 runs, down the wicket, gets another bottom edge to fine leg for two
kaul to rahane, four runs, kaul slants this too far down leg with the fine leg up in the circle. guided away for four
negi to watson, no run, tries to punch this off the off stump, but hits it straight to cover
negi to watson, 1 run, driven to long-off
morkel to rahane, 1 run, runs off the outside half to third man for one
balaji to smith, no run, leaves this one alone, in the channel outside off, shoulders arms
mclaren to smith, no run, angling in towards the off stump, pushes that one well towards mid-off
mclaren to smith, 1 wide, down the leg side, good collect by the keeper as he dives to his left
mclaren to smith, 1 run, on the off stump, flicks it away through midwicket into the deep for a single
balaji to smith, no run, good stuff from bala, smith gets across and drives that cautiously towards mid-on
mclaren to tendulkar, four runs, slower one and he picks it well, mclaren undoing what balaji did in the previous over, tendulkar dispatches that over mid-on
balaji to smith, 1 run, angling in towards middle and leg, pushed through midwicket in the deep for a single
balaji to tendulkar, no run, charged out to balaji, he held it back and tendulkar was left to defend it awkwardly into the leg side
balaji to smith, 1 wide, slower ball gone bad, too wide outside off, called
narine to smith, no run, turns in from the off stump, may have missed leg as he got across to play it into the leg side
narine to smith, 1 run, flatter on middle, pushed away into the leg side for a single
iqbal abdulla to tendulkar, 1 run, flat outside off, pushed towards extra cover
iqbal abdulla to smith, no run, slaps it back towards the bowler
iqbal abdulla to smith, no run, tries to repeat that shot and misses this time, was eyeing cow-corner
kallis to tendulkar, 1 run, nicely hit but straight to deep midwicket, swings it away into the deep from outside off
iqbal abdulla to smith, no run, smith swings and misses, tries to smack that over midwicket, misses as it turns away
iqbal abdulla to tendulkar, 1 run, flatter on middle, tendulkar makes room and eases that through cover for a single
iqbal abdulla to smith, 1 run, width, chopped away towards deep point for a single
iqbal abdulla to tendulkar, four runs, hammered, tendulkar had made up his mind, made some room and flat-batted that over the bowler's head
iqbal abdulla to sharma, 1 run, defends that one into the off side and steals a single
bhatia to sharma, 1 run, pushes that through the line towards long-off for a single
narine to karthik, 1 run, swung away towards deep midwicket for a single
narine to karthik, six runs, karthik sends that into the crowd, swung it hard with the turn from off stump and smashed it over deep midwicket
narine to karthik, 1 wide, flat and hard, wide of off and called by the umpire
narine to johnson, no run, closer to the stumps, turns away sharply and goes past the outside edge as he tries to defend
narine to johnson, 1 run, slaps that hard but straight to long-off, just the single
mclaren to johnson, 5 wides, appalling stuff, five wides, down the leg side, misdirected from the bowler, way down the leg side and it was out of bisla's reach
johnson to bisla, no run, and he gets swing first ball, only an inside edge saves him
johnson to gambhir, no run, jonhson is swinging it. it's the good mitch that has turned up again. defended just outside off
johnson to gambhir, out, johnson breaks through. this is the first ball that hasn't swung. gambhir plays for the swing, and gets an inside edge onto the stumps. superb over so far
ahmed to kallis, no run, bowled in the channel outside off, leaves that one alone, moves away after pitching
ahmed to kallis, no run, reaches to play that one out, moving away and kallis can't get to it, made a bit of room there, was close to the wide marker outside off
ojha to kallis, 1 run, comes down the track and turns it into leg for a single
