ojha to bisla, 1 run, tries to swing it over square leg, gets an inside edge past the keeper for a single
ojha to bisla, four runs, improvisation from bisla, comes down the track, flicks it away from the off stump over square leg, struck it well enough to take it to the boundary
johnson to bisla, no run, bisla had made up his mind to go after that one, charged down the pitch, johnson chased him, tried to swing it over midwicket, was struck on the thighs
malinga to bisla, 1 run, swings that one towards deep square leg for a single
ojha to kallis, 1 run, this one is driven well to the left of extra cover for a single into the deep
ojha to pathan, no run, quicker through the air on the off stump, defended towards extra cover
harbhajan singh to kallis, no run, pushed away into the leg side

harbhajan singh to kallis, out, kallis has holed out now, harbhajan bowled to him from round the wicket, kallis charged out and tried to clear long-off, mistimed it and offered a simple catch to fielder there
ojha to das, no run, stabs that towards cover from the crease, no single there
ojha to das, 1 run, drives that towards long-off for a single
harbhajan singh to das, no run, may have been the doosra, gets back and taps it down into the leg side
harbhajan singh to das, no run, tries to force it into the leg side, struck on the thigh
harbhajan singh to das, no run, slaps it straight back towards the bowler
harbhajan singh to iqbal abdulla, no run, comes down the track and defends it back to the bowler
johnson to narine, 1 run, narine makes room, johnson follows, gets a thick edge to third man for a single
johnson to iqbal abdulla, 1 leg bye, a leg-bye towards square leg
malinga to iqbal abdulla, 1 run, slower one, didn't pick it, checked his shot in the end, lobbed up towards a vacant extra cover region
steyn to hussey, no run, and this is a lot closer to the stumps, on the middle and swinging back too, hussey is careful and pushes it into the covers
steyn to hussey, no run, on the middle stump and slight movement back into hussey, who taps it back to the bowler, again for a dot
steyn to hussey, no run, and that's a maiden to begin with, it's very similar to the previous ball and he's on to the back, defending to the off side
i sharma to hussey, 1 wide, wide outside the off stump, it was bowled from round the stumps, and he went for a flashy drive, it seemed to be within the line
steyn to hussey, 1 run, the swing back into the batsman continues from steyn but hussey is able to open the face of the bat and push it through to third-man for a single
kv sharma to raina, no run, ooh, lot of turn back into raina, who was walking to the off stump, is only able to tuck it to the in-fielder
kv sharma to hussey, 1 wide, down the leg side and a wide, but that turned a lot and will make the batsman think

kv sharma to raina, six runs, goes down the track and it's been spanked for a six! a flat six that goes straight over the bowler's head, it was raining before the game and now it's raining during the game, sixes.
steyn to hussey, 1 run, easily driven through to third-man for a single to get to his 50! well-played innings and that's taken only 32 deliveries to get to as well
mishra to raina, 1 run, was looking to go down the track but stopped in his tracks, and pushes it to the leg side for a single
perera to raina, no run, down the leg side and he wants to flick it again, misses it this time and the umpire does not give it a wide, was too close to the leg stump i feel
mishra to hussey, 1 run, and now he goes down the track and wants to crack it away, gets it off the middle of the bat too but straight to extra-cover

i sharma to raina, 1 wide, whoa, that is stephen hamisonesque in his wide, he was moving towards the off stump alright but ishant has sent it down so wide that the batsman on the adjacent pitch could have got a nick on it
sammy to raina, 2 runs, up and over yet again but this is hit squarer this time and it was going away to the fence yet again, vihari gets his hand out to the right and stops it, gets a couple
sharma to patel, no run, was walking down the track this time, he was probably looking to hit it over the off side, but the bounce beats him again and it carries through to the keeper
ashwin to patel, 1 wide, down the leg side from over the wicket and it's not turned, given a wide
ashwin to patel, no run, ooh, some turn now, beats the outside edge of the bat

holder to patel, six runs, and wow! parthiv's now socked it over the leg side for a four, he goes outside the leg stump, the bowler follows him but the batsman is able to time it over the leg side for a six!
sharma to patel, 1 run, slower one from the bowler from over the stumps, he checks his shot and flicks it to the leg side for a single
raina to vihari, 1 run, and now he hits it over that same in-fielder on the leg side, straight to the fielder outside the circle for a single
morris to perera, 1 run, leading edge and it goes high in the air but over the bowler's head, he was looking to flick it away but the lack of pace defeats him
ashwin to perera, 1 run, slows it down considerably and the batsman waits for the turn, tucks it to the leg side for a single
jadeja to kv sharma, no run, outside the off stump and turn back into the batsman, pushed to the point fielder
bravo to kv sharma, 1 run, slower on the off stump and he opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third-man for a single
jadeja to kv sharma, no run, wide outside the off and he should have put that away, hits it straight to the point fielder
jadeja to kv sharma, four runs, wow, what a shot, it was a very quick delivery, opens the face of the bat and gets it away very, very fine, probably bit of an edge too
bravo to kv sharma, 1 run, outside the off stump and chops the ball, on the bounce to the point fielder
bravo to kv sharma, 1 run, on the leg-stump line and he opens the face of the bat through to point for a single
bravo to steyn, no run, swings and misses, it was a slower one and he does not read that change-down of pace
morris to kv sharma, 1 run, keeping it up to the bat, wants to flick it away, through to the leg side for a single
chandila to mandeep singh, no run, another one that's slowed down considerably, wants to dab at it, no turn, in fact drift away from the batsman
chandila to gilchrist, 1 run, floated it up to the bat from round the stumps and driven down to long-off for a single

chandila to marsh, no run, whoa, what happened there? that's tapped down to mid-on and it's thrown back, gilly's been hit by the throw, and chandila lifts up the ricochet and whips off the bails, gilly is out of the crease, but dravid takes the appeal back! gilchrist was angry on that, very, very angry!
chandila to marsh, 1 run, tapped away to the leg side for a single
sreesanth to marsh, no run, that's thrown up wide outside the off stump and he does get some bat on it, but not off the middle yet again and it goes to the fielder
chandila to gilchrist, 1 run, goes down the track and tries to hit it in anger, does not get it off the middle and it gets to mid-on for a single
faulkner to gilchrist, 1 run, slower one, and gilly goes back and taps it to wide mid-on for a single
chandila to gilchrist, 1 run, round the stumps, outside the off stump and tapped to the off side for a quickly taken single
chandila to marsh, six runs, goes down the track and smacks it over for a six, uses his feet well against chandila and gets it off the middle of the bat, smacked

chandila to marsh, four runs, and again, that's the second lofted shot, straight back over the bowler's head, this time it's bounced and gone away for a four, finally getting them off the middle of the bat now
chandila to gilchrist, no run, tapped away to the off side but again to the fielder
watson to gilchrist, 1 run, closer to the body this time and tucked away to the leg side for a single
cooper to marsh, 1 wide, outside the off stump, very wide outside and he's let it go through, given a wide, not a good start for cooper after conceding that misfield earlier
cooper to marsh, 1 run, bit of movement back into the batsman, he opens the face and tapped away to the off side for a single
cooper to gilchrist, 1 run, driven through the covers for a single
watson to marsh, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third-man for a single
watson to gilchrist, 1 run, swings because that's in his arc, unfortunately it does not go into the park, just bounces off gently to the fielder at deep square-leg for a single
faulkner to marsh, 2 runs, flicked away to the leg side for a couple of runs
cooper to gilchrist, 1 run, lofts him but not off the middle either, no timing there and it lobs up to mid-wicket for a signel
cooper to marsh, 1 run, tries to bludgeon it away and hits it straight too but without too much power and they don't get back for the second

cooper to gilchrist, out, catch it, yes he does! gone, caught and bowled! slower one and he was looking to play it through the off side but has to check his stroke, only managing to lob it back to the bowler, easily caught
cooper to marsh, no run, slower one and it's tapped back to the bowler, taking the pace off it is making it difficult for the batsmen
faulkner to marsh, four runs, outside the off and that's drilled through the covers for a four, that's marsh coming into his own after a relatively slow start
cooper to marsh, 2 runs, goes for a big heave across the line but does not connect properly and it's run away to backward square-leg for a couple

cooper to marsh, 2 runs, and now he's dropped! dravid's dropped a relatively simple catch, he was looking to loft it over the off side but gets the toe of the bat, goes high and through dravid's hands in the covers
watson to miller, 2 runs, wide outside the off stump, in fact wide enough to be called one had he left it, but he does not, goes after it and hits it through to deep extra-cover for a couple

cooper to marsh, out, and now he's bowled off a slower one! does not give too much pace on it, does not pitch it up either which means that he's got to make his own pace, he tries to do that by hitting it across the line, misses and the top of the middle stump is rattled
faulkner to sathish, 2 runs, slower one, rolls his fingers over the ball and he's able to hit it through extra-cover
kumar to dravid, no run, bit closer to the stumps now, corrects the line and he's tucked away to the square-leg, rolls over to the close-in fielder

bipul sharma to dravid, out, bowled him, what a ball! in fact, it was a good ball not the best of shots from the captain, it dipped into him, was on the middle and he was looking to flick it away, he gets no bat on it and it sneaks between his bat and pad, timber
bipul sharma to rahane, no run, slows it down and it's on the off stump, pushes it to the off side
kumar to watson, no run, slows it down and it's on the off stump, punches it back to mid-on, hit hard enough to not allow them a single

kumar to watson, four runs, cracked away through the off side for a four, there was a little width on that one and he makes the bowler pay, there were four fielders in the area between point to mid-off but he pierces them easily

kumar to watson, 1 run, slows it down, pushes it to mid-off and off for a quick single, hussey was quick to it and throws at the non-striker's end but misses, watson was quick too and seemed to be home even if he had hit
kumar to rahane, 1 run, slower ball and on the middle stump, tucked away to fine-leg for a single
bipul sharma to watson, no run, doesn't hesitate to toss it up, driven to mid-wicket but straight to the fielder
gony to rahane, 2 runs, he's definitely getting some movement here, but easily played through point for a couple of runs, the third-man had to come around to stop it

gony to rahane, six runs, goes down the track and times it over long-off for a six! rahane does not hit them too hard but his timing is enough to get them just over the ropes, he seems to be choosing the gaps well too!
awana to rahane, 1 wide, and this is even wider down the leg side from the bowler, easily left alone and equally easy for the ump to call a wide
awana to rahane, no run, gets it on the middle stump now and tapped away to the leg side
chawla to rahane, no run, that quicker one again, outside the off stump and pushed to point
chawla to samson, no run, very quick yet again, he taps it back to the bowler who fields it well
bipul sharma to samson, no run, was looking to go down the track but then defends it to the off side
bipul sharma to samson, four runs, goes down the track and hit over the bowler for a four, finally gets going after that lull in proceedings
kumar to rahane, 3 wides, down the leg side and that's wides, gilly fails to collect it too which adds to the total
kumar to samson, 1 run, goes down the track and drills it straight to mid-off where hussey fields and gets the throw in, does not hit! would have been out had it done!
awana to samson, 1 run, slower one and he was looking to thrash it at first but the pace change allows him to open the face of the bat and guides it to the off side for a single
awana to rahane, no run, outside the off stump and he looks to open the face of the bat, not for runs
awana to rahane, six runs, shot, shot, shot, that's some aggression, it was right up to the bat and he goes back, opens up his stance and cracks it over mid-wicket for a maximum!
kumar to samson, 1 run, moves around in his crease and then opens the face of the bat, bit of an edge that runs down to third-man for a single
kumar to rahane, no run, outside the off and he was looking to move around, bit of a lazy shot, misses, through to the keeper
gony to samson, 1 run, slower one on the middle stump, tapped away to the leg side for a single
gony to rahane, 1 run, slower one outside the off stump, gets some bat on it and pushes it to the off side for a single, marsh has a shy at the stumps and misses by some distance
pathan to pujara, 1 run, wide outside the off stump, opens the face of the bat and guides it through to third-man for a single
morkel to pujara, four runs, edged and...well, should have been gone! but the captain, the new captain has the slip in the third slip area and it sneaks through the first for a four!
morkel to kohli, no run, bit wide outside the off stump, some more bounce for morne and kohli has no business going after it, lets it go through to the keeper
pathan to pujara, 2 runs, that's swung quite a lot back into the batsman but it's started on the middle stump and swinging down the leg side, flicked away to fine-leg for a couple
pathan to pujara, 1 wide, down the leg-side, swinging down yet again and it's way down for a wide
kaul to pujara, four runs, and for the third time, he looks to hit it hard, he goes down and spanks it away, straight-smashed for a four

kaul to pujara, out, and again, but does not successful, bowled! it's been a surprising innings from pujara, almost as if he had taken over the role of hitting from gayle, was giving the bowler the charge again but the ball beats the bat, goes between the willow and pad and timber!
yadav to henriques, 2 runs, inside edged and this almost goes to the fence, the ball come on slower than he expected and gets the toe, goes to the fine, fine-leg area where nadeem slides and stops it
yadav to henriques, 1 run, on the middle stump and tucked away to deep square-leg for a single, wanted a second, does not go for it
kaul to henriques, 1 run, on the off stump and tapped to the off side for a single
kaul to kohli, no run, outside the off stump and defended it to the off side
nadeem to kohli, 1 run, on the middle stump and not too much turn, tapped to the off side for a single
nadeem to henriques, no run, straighter, on the middle stump and tapped to the off side
yadav to kohli, four runs, edged through the vacant slips region and runs away through to the third-man fence for a four, it was half an edge and probably some part of that shot was deliberate
yadav to henriques, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and guides it through to third-man for a single
yadav to kohli, 1 run, continues that off stump line and kohli easily opens the face of the bat and pushes it to the point region, there's bit of a misfiled and they are through for one
yadav to henriques, 1 run, getting them too easily here now, pushed to the covers and away for one
yadav to kohli, 1 wide, tries to change his line to closer to the stumps, it's gone too far down now and called a wide
yadav to kohli, 1 run,
pathan to kohli, 1 run,
pathan to kohli, 1 run, leading edge that flies to long-off for a single, was looking to flick it away to the leg side
nadeem to kohli, no run, goes down the track and drills it back to the bowler

pathan to de villiers, 1 run, and there you go, that's the first unorthodox shot of the night, or in case of abd and t20 cricket, a normal one, goes outside the off and tries to scoop it over the fine-leg region, pathan follows him and the shot goes straight to sehwag at fine-leg
kaul to de villiers, 1 run, slows it considerably and it's on the off stump and can only tap it to the off side for a single

morkel to de villiers, six runs, and that's deposited over the fine-leg for a six! that's what he's been trying since he started out tonight, goes over to the off side and scoops it over the fine-leg fielder, a top-edge and that's gone all the way

yadav to de villiers, six runs, this is what abd does, he was looking to get across the off stump and almost fooled the bowler into bowling outside the off stump, slower too but he punches it over the extra-cover region for a six!
yadav to kohli, four runs, and now a mistimed shot to the extra-cover area for a four, it was outside the off stump and he gets a bottom edge of the bat and still runs away
kaul to de villiers, no run, down the leg side and that seems to have hit his foot, he was looking to leave and it hits his boot, rolls over and the ump calls it a dead ball for not offering a shot
kaul to de villiers, 2 runs, chipped and gets a couple, he was looking to hit it over the off side but this time chops a little and runs to deep extra-cover
kaul to de villiers, 1 run, and he's spanked it down to long-off, it came rather hard at the fielder and needed to quickly get into action to field it, single this time
rampaul to jayawardene, four runs, chipped over the leg side for a four, that was close to the leg stump line, angling in and he picks it up and hits it over mid-wicket for a four
rampaul to jayawardene, no run, straighter this time, on the off stump, defended back to the bowler

unadkat to jayawardene, out, inside edged to the stumps, bowled, one down! it was quite close to the bat, he was looking to run it through to third-man but gets an inside edge and the stumps are rattled, wicket off the first ball for jaidev and delhi have lost their first
unadkat to chand, 1 wide, down the leg-side and does not get any bat on it, wide called
unadkat to chand, no run, slows it down considerably and it's on the middle stump, he was looking to unwind before he defends it to the off side
unadkat to chand, four runs, another one that's rather slow in pace and chand has tapped it through the covers this time, gets it in the gap, timed well and runs away to the fence
vinay kumar to chand, no run, has it got the edge this time? the keeper has not appealed at all and the bowler was baying for blood, it's a huge, i repeat, huge edge!
vinay kumar to chand, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third-man for a single

vinay kumar to sehwag, four runs, edged and for a four, that's called throwing your bat at it, sehwag's done exactly that to one that's outside the off stump and the edge runs through where the slips would have been for a four
unadkat to sehwag, out, gone, easily taken, slower ball and he was trying to whip it over the mid-on fielder, the slower ball did him in and it spoons up to the mid-on fielder, second man down
unadkat to warner, no run, slows it down well and warner allows it to hit his bat and taps it to the off side
henriques to chand, no run, not a very quick ball, 121.2 kmph, close to the off stump and that's dabbed to the off side

henriques to warner, out, bowled him, warner's gone now! that was slightly quicker in pace and looked like a very straight delivery that the batsman missed, goes through and hits the off stump, captain's back in the dugout
kartik to rohrer, 1 run, manages to tuck it away to deep square-leg for a single
syed mohammad to rohrer, 1 wide, down the leg side as he tries to compensate, goes down for a wide

syed mohammad to chand, four runs, and that's scooped over the keeper this time for a four, it was a very well placed shot which should have been saved by unadkat, who can only parry it away and it hits the fence
gayle to rohrer, no run, on the off stump and defended it to the off side
kartik to rohrer, 1 leg bye, looking to go down the track and hits his pad, appeal from kartik but it was pitching outside the leg stump
vinay kumar to rohrer, 1 wide, round the stumps and does not get his line right, goes down the leg side for a wide
vinay kumar to rohrer, 1 run, adjusts his line and gets it close to the middle stump, opens the face of the bat and through to third-man for a single

vinay kumar to rohrer, out, bowled him, from round the stumps and he gets an inside edge on to the stumps, how many times has this happened tonight? he was looking to guide it through to third-man but does not get it off the part of the bat he wanted.
vinay kumar to chand, 1 run, slower delivery on the middle stump, read it well too and drives it to long-off for a single

unadkat to chand, out, gone, caught, that's another one biting the dust! it was a slower one and he had no option but to get it over the field, over for a six, it just goes very high and vk takes a reasonably comfortable catch!
unadkat to morkel, 1 run, outside edge and almost carries to the keeper, well stopped by abd, was looking to guide it down very fine

rampaul to pathan, 1 no ball, up and over and that's hit hard to the off side, they wanted a single but morkel sends him back...why? because it's called a no-ball and it's a free-hit being given, morkel wanted pathan to take strike...
kumar to patel, 1 run, he takes a couple of steps down the pitch and taps that to wide mid-on, takes a single
kumar to dhawan, 1 run, it pitches outside leg stump and swings in towards middle and off, the batsman drops it to the leg side for a single

kumar to dhawan, 1 run, brings this one in to the lef-hander! it hits the pad first, then the bat, the bowler appeals. not a bad appeal at all, but the umpire reckons it hit the bat first.. it was out for me
awana to patel, no run, beats the bat with one that angles across the batsman, patel tentatively pushes at it from the crease and plays inside the line
awana to patel, no run, now this one flies past the outside edge as the batsman has a poke at an angled delivery

harmeet singh to patel, 1 run, he was gone at the non-striker's end! patel pushed it straight to point and ran straightaway, miller had all the time.. but he missed. parthiv apologises to white for that call
chawla to patel, 1 run, tosses it up on off stump, the batsman pushes it towards wide mid on for a single
chawla to patel, 2 runs, pushes it wide this time and the batsman chops it past backward point for a couple of runs
chawla to perera, no run, that was quick! 120 kph! the batsman does well to bring his bat down in time.. shane watson lost his wicket to that two days ago
steyn to gilchrist, no run, beats the bat as gilchrist plays for the swing, but it goes straight on
steyn to gilchrist, 1 run, now gilchrist does exactly the same thing, pushes it to mid off and calls for a quick single
vihari to marsh, no run, he pushes it through on the off stump, the batsman defends it to off
vihari to gilchrist, 1 wide, is that a stumping missed! yes, parthiv was not able to take this one fired down the leg side.. gilchrist had fallen offbalance
vihari to pomersbach, no run, he stays in the crease and pushes that to the fielder at cover
sammy to miller, no run, he bowls a slower delivery this time, the batsman waits for it and is only able to push it to point
sammy to pomersbach, 2 runs, he bowls a slower delivery that is tapped past point, the batsmen get back for a couple
mishra to sathish, no run, he tries to turn a quicker delivery to the leg side, but gets a leading edge back down the pitch
mishra to sathish, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, the batsman opens the face to run it down to third man for a single
mishra to pomersbach, no run, on the stumps this time, the batsman waits and pushes it back to the bowler
mishra to sathish, 1 run, this one is slower, turns away outside off, the batsman punches it hard to deep extra cover
mishra to pomersbach, 1 run, another one, this time the batsman makes room and slaps it hard to deep extra cover for a single

perera to pomersbach, 2 runs, slower delivery, he is dropped again. this time it is vihari. lp charged down the pitch, but got a thick leading edge over point, the fielder ran backward, got his hands to it, but wasn't able to hold on to the ball
steyn to harmeet singh, no run, another swing and a miss as the batsman makes room, but swings down the wrong line
steyn to harmeet singh, 1 run, slower delivery this time, the batsman drags it to deep midwicket for a single
sammy to pomersbach, 1 run, out, another run out! lp slapped it very hard, back to the bowler,  who gets a hand to it, and palms it to long off. the batsmen run for a second run which wasn't there
sammy to pomersbach, six runs, lp gets a six! it was a slower delivery, the batsman whacks it hard and doesn't get hold of it, still manages to beat long off, just though
balaji to gayle, no run, beats the bat which angles across gayle, seams a touch away and gayle was surprised as he hung his bat at that one
senanayake to gayle, four runs, this one was edged! and it quickly flew through the left of kallis one slip, hard to call that a drop.. it flew really quickly
narine to gayle, no run, he bowls on the leg and middle line, gayle gets a leading edge back to the bowler
narine to kohli, no run, quicker one this time, the batsman goes back and defends it to midwicket
kallis to de villiers, no run, he bowls another slower delivery on off stump, the batsman tries to push it to the off side, but it hits the inside half and goes down the pitch
narine to henriques, 2 runs, he pushes it to cover, where another fumble allows the batsman to come back for a couple
narine to henriques, 1 run, he waits in the crease and punches it firmly to deep cover for a single

balaji to de villiers, 2 runs, that's the back of the hand slower delivery, the batsman has to generate the pace on that as he drives it to deep cover. he calls for two, but he was struggling to get back to his end, he dives and it's a super dive as he makes it in time
narine to tiwary, no run, bowls it slow and on the stumps, the batsman waits and then defends it it to the off side
narine to vinay kumar, 1 run, bowls a quicker delivery that goes away from the right-hander, vinay pushes it to cover for a single
narine to vinay kumar, no run, bowls a quicker offspinner, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
balaji to unadkat, 1 run, another slower delivery outside off, the batsman waits and pushes it to the off side for a single
unadkat to kallis, no run, he bowls a slower delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to cover and thinks about a single, but yusuf sends him back as the point fielder charges towards it
kartik to pathan, no run, he bowls it quick and flat on the stumps, the batsman brings his bat down a little late in defence

unadkat to kallis, 1 run, he takes a step down the pitch and pushes it to mid on for a single. gayle runs in from midwicket and does a dummy throw, but he almost walks into the line of mid-on's throw..
kartik to tiwary, no run, he comes down the pitch again, but this time it's a flatter delivery, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
kartik to tiwary, 1 run, he makes some room, but the bowler bowls it wide outside off, the batsman stretches and pushes it towards off side for a single
rampaul to kallis, 1 wide, he bowls a slower one, but this one goes down the leg side
kartik to tiwary, no run, he starts walking out of the pitch and kartik fires it wide outside off, this time tiwary misses and ab takes off the bails. but tiwary just managed to drag his foot back
mithun to kallis, 1 wide, he attempts a slower one, but he bowls it down the leg side
unadkat to ten doeschate, no run, he has a swish towards the leg side at that one, but it was another slower delivery wide outside off, misses it completely
unadkat to bhatia, 1 run, slower delivery on the stumps, it's a touch slower, the batsman swats it to deep midwicket
malik to hussey, no run, bowled that one in the channel outside off and he shoulders arms to the keeper
malik to vijay, no run, in the channel outside off, this one goes away and vijay lets it go
malik to hussey, no run, not giving much away here, hussey stepped out of the track there but eventually just saw it through to the keeper
watson to vijay, no run, width from watson and vijay drives a little loosely at that one
watson to vijay, 1 wide, slides that one down the leg side and it's called a wide
watson to vijay, no run, stands tall and pushes that one towards mid-on from the crease
malik to vijay, 1 run, tapped away and steals a single
malik to hussey, no run,
cooper to vijay, 1 run, knocks it away to get a single
cooper to vijay, 2 runs, turned away through square leg into the deep for a couple of runs
trivedi to hussey, 1 wide, wide, hussey had to reach out to play a drive there, didn't make contact, called a wide
binny to vijay, 1 run, tapped towards point and tries to steal a single, rahane collects and throws at the striker's end, misses, hussey would have been gone had that hit
binny to hussey, no run, tries to flick it away through the leg side, they try to steal a leg-bye, hussey is sent back, binny's attempt to kick it back onto the stumps misses its mark
binny to vijay, no run, tries to drive it through cover, it moves away to just go past the outside edge, a loose drive
binny to vijay, 2 runs, struck it uppishly past extra cover, wide of long-off, for a couple of runs
cooper to raina, out, raina goes, what was he doing? long-off was near the ropes and he just drove it uppishly towards him, didn't time it as well, comfortable catch
binny to jadeja, 1 wide, that one is bowled down the leg side, tries to flick that one fine, misses
binny to jadeja, 2 runs, gets across to that straight delivery and flicks it over midwicket for a couple of runs, nicely timed
watson to jadeja, 2 runs, jadeja times it well but cooper dives to his left at mid-off to keep them to just two, driven well by jadeja
watson to vijay, 1 run, angling in towards off and middle, defended towards point for a quick single
faulkner to jadeja, 1 run, the back-of-the-hand slower ball, runs that one down to third man for a single
cooper to vijay, no run, slower one, vijay tries to whack it over the bowler's head, misses
cooper to vijay, no run, slower one outside off, vijay tries to slap that through cover, mistimes it back to the bowler
watson to jadeja, no run, slips that wide outside off, tries to slash that one hard past point, misses
watson to jadeja, no run, dropped that towards cover, sent back after he called for a single, dravid msses a run-out at the striker's end, didn't miss by much, had just one stump to aim at
cooper to bravo, 2 runs, angling in towards middle, pushed into the off side for a single
faulkner to bravo, 2 runs, on target on middle, makes room and drives that towards deep extra cover for a couple more
sharma to rahane, four runs, rahane swings and is lucky to get a boundary there, tried to swing it away over midwicket, got an inside edge to the fine-leg boundary
holder to rahane, out, ooh, good low catch, vijay ran in from mid-on and took it well bending low, rahane came down the track and tried to clear mid-on but mistimed it straight to vijay
holder to samson, no run, angling in towards middle, gets across and drives it towards mid-on
holder to dravid, no run, angling in towards middle, pushes that one back towards the bowler
holder to dravid, no run,
sharma to watson, four runs, ooh, there is a widish first slip in place, guides that one to the third-man boundary, opens the face there and gets it wide of a diving first slip to beat third man
morris to dravid, 2 runs, makes a bit of room to punch it through the off side, gets an inside edge past the keeper for a couple of runs, dhoni has to give chase
ashwin to watson, 1 run, bowled it flat outside off,  slams it hard but along the ground to deep midwicket
ashwin to binny, 1 run, played towards midwicket, raina collects and throws down stumps at the non-striker's end but he has dived and slid his bat comfortably in
ashwin to watson, six runs, could this be the turning point in this game? gave it some air and watson was going after it, landed on middle and watson absolutely hammered that towards cow corner
holder to watson, no run, angling in towards middle and off, defended towards point from the crease
morris to watson, four runs, that's poorly bowled, slow ball down the leg side and watson helps it on its way to the fine-leg boundary, applause for watson all around, a half-century
jadeja to binny, 1 run, tickles it into the leg side for a single
bravo to binny, 1 run, makes a bit of room and plays that towards third man for a single
bravo to watson, no run,
kumar to jayawardene, four runs, mahela is away, walks out, and flicks it with the inswing over square leg
kumar to sehwag, 1 run, tries to turn this from off through midwicket, but cannot beat the fielder
awana to sehwag, 1 run, direct hit needed, but hussey misses at the non-striker's, sehwag was struggling had it hit after a work to midwicket
harmeet singh to sehwag, 1 leg bye, another shout for lbw from harmeet, but his angle was taking it down leg once more
hussey to juneja, 1 run, turns in from outside off, he awkwardly punches it to long off
hussey to warner, 1 run, driven hard wide of long off, but he keeps them to one
hussey to juneja, no run, that was pushed through quick and straight, jabbed back to the bowler
chawla to juneja, no run, good over, this comes in quickly with the angle, inside edge onto pad as he pushes
hussey to warner, no run, skips out and drives, cannot beat extra cover
hussey to warner, no run, angled into the pad, straightens, pushed to midwicket
hussey to warner, 1 run, off the inner part of the bat wide of midwicket as he tries to force it through
hussey to juneja, no run,
chawla to warner, no run, pushed through across the left-hander, he backs away and punches, finds extra cover on the edge of the circle
hussey to juneja, 1 run, walks out and turns it down to long off
hussey to juneja, 1 run, skips out and forces it with the spin past midwicket
hussey to warner, 1 run, pushed to the man at long off
bhatt to juneja, no run, swat-driven in kohli fashion but straight to extra cover
bhatt to juneja, 1 run, juneja gets the swat-drive past extra cover, long off gets around
bhatt to botha, out, botha's charged out and lofted this with the turn, looked alright as it came off, but he's failed to hit it wide of long off moving to his left
hussey to pathan, no run, pushes one angled in from round the stumps, to extra cover
hussey to warner, 2 leg byes, gets on the knee across the stumps and tries to help this fine down leg, cannot get much on it though
harmeet singh to pathan, 2 runs, turned wide of fine leg
harmeet singh to pathan, no run, goes outside leg again, harmeet angles it outside off, irfan reaches out in vain
pathan to gilchrist, four runs, outside edge first ball, just past sehwag;s dive at wide slip, outswinger angled in, he closed the face as he tried turning it to leg
pathan to gilchrist, out, another failure for gilchrist, irfan angles it in, gilcrist wants to swing to leg, it moves away and the edge swirls high and comes down in botha's hands at extra cover
pathan to mandeep singh, no run, swings in a tad after starting across, left alone
pathan to mandeep singh, 1 run, waits for it to hold the line this time and turns it to midwicket
pathan to mandeep singh, four runs, they keep feeding mandeep with width, and he keeps putting them away through the covers
pathan to mandeep singh, 2 wides, now he swings it down the leg side, width, either side, nightmare start for dd
pathan to pomersbach, no run, outswinger, he watches it sail past harmlessly
botha to mandeep singh, no run, popped down the pitch, as he gets a leading edge looking to turn it to leg
botha to pomersbach, 2 runs, moved outside leg a long way, botha tried to follow him but he was still able to punch it past extra cover, whose dive took pace off it
van der merwe to mandeep singh, no run, fine one-handed stop to his left by mahela at extra cover, this was driven hard
van der merwe to miller, no run, pushed down the track
van der merwe to vohra, no run, turn and bounce, angled in on off, and takes off past the outside edge
botha to vohra, no run, quicker and closer to off, blocked
agarkar to vohra, no run, mishits a punch to point off the bottom edge
agarkar to vohra, 1 run, warner goes for the non-striker's stumps again from point, but misses this time, vohra would have been gone
agarkar to miller, no run, pushed to extra cover, now mahela has a go at the non-striker's end, misses
botha to vohra, four runs, vohra gets going after the time out with a charge and a loft over mid off
van der merwe to hussey, 1 run, turned to deep square leg
van der merwe to hussey, 1 run, goes back to whip it through midwicket
botha to miller, four runs, he's charged out, and had a go, off the inner part of the bat and into the boundary past deep midwicket
yadav to hussey, 2 runs, steers to the right of third man who dives and keeps them to two
van der merwe to hussey, no run, quick one pushed to extra cover
johnson to patel, 1 wide, down the leg side, tried to flick that fine, missed, called a wide
johnson to patel, four runs, picks the gap, too straight from johnson, parthiv gets across and flicks it uppishly through square leg for a boundary
johnson to patel, four runs, now through midwicket, four more, lovely batting from parthiv, johnson bowls it straight on middle, parthiv gets across and just punches it through midwicket
harbhajan singh to dhawan, 1 wide, round the wicket and that slides down the leg side, called a wide
harbhajan singh to dhawan, no run, gets back and chops that one down into the off side
harbhajan singh to dhawan, 2 runs, angling in on middle and leg, chips that one over midwicket for a couple of runs
harbhajan singh to dhawan, 1 run, holds its line on the off stump, taps it towards point for a single
ojha to vihari, 1 run, angling in towards middle, defended it into the leg side towards square leg for a single
kulkarni to dhawan, no run, slower one, comes down the track and slashes that towards point, pollard dives to his right and stops it
ojha to dhawan, 1 run, flat on leg stump, turned towards square leg for a single
ojha to dhawan, no run,
pollard to dhawan, 1 run, driven neatly towards long-off for a single
pollard to vihari, 1 run, slower one bowled on the off, knocks that one down towards point and races off
pollard to dhawan, 1 run, moved well across and tried to scoop that fine, almost falls over, just the single to square leg
harbhajan singh to dhawan, 1 run, struck hard but straight to deep backward square leg, just the single again
harbhajan singh to vihari, 1 wide, slides that one down the leg side after vihari gives himself some room

johnson to dhawan, out, gone, johnson dismisses dhawan with a slower ball, dhawan charged out to johnson there, and pushed loosely at it after realising that was the slower one, gets an nick and karthik takes it easily
ojha to white, 1 run, slaps that one towards deep cover for a single
ojha to vihari, 2 runs, takes that one from outside off and drags it square into the deep for a couple more runs
ojha to white, no run, makes room and the bowler chases him, cracks it back towards the bowler, ojha responds with a stare
ojha to white, 1 run, miscues it this time, comes down the track, the bat turns in his hand as he tries to hit that, ends up going towards deep midwicket
johnson to white, six runs, johnson's spell ends in disappointment for the bowler, ends up bowling a slower ball that serves as a long hop and white has bludgeoned it over the deep midwicket boundary
malinga to perera, 1 run, perera starts well but pollard is standing quite straight at long-off, driven hard but on the bounce to the fielder there
kulkarni to perera, no run, appeal for a catch, karthik goes up again, clean catch but not sure there was contact with the bat, thisara moved across to scoop it, missed
steyn to smith, no run, another away swinger, starts outside off, bounces and is allowed to go past
steyn to smith, 1 run, more controlled this time, guides that one down to third man for a single
i sharma to karthik, 1 run, angling in on middle, pushed wide of mid-on for a single
sammy to karthik, 1 run, pushes that one uppishly just wide of sammy for a single to long-off
sammy to karthik, 2 wides, down the leg side, called a wide as the keeper fumbles and concedes a single
mishra to karthik, 1 run, flatter outside off, cracked towards deep cover for one more
mishra to tendulkar, 1 run, quicker through the air, flat on the off, tendulkar moves back to punch it to long-off
kv sharma to karthik, no run, flat on middle and that's been defended towards extra cover
kv sharma to tendulkar, 1 wide, too wide down the leg side, called by the umpire, that may have slipped out
perera to karthik, 1 run, good stuff, on target on the off stump, defended towards point and he sets off for a single
perera to tendulkar, 1 wide, that's a wide, too wide outside off and tendulkar couldn't reach it

kv sharma to rayudu, out, stumped and mumbai have reason to worry, comes down the track to play it away into the leg side, that was pushed through, missed and parthiv collected it well as rayudu would have blocked his view for a moment, took off the bails quickly
kv sharma to pollard, no run, ooh, down the leg side and it's not called a wide, may not have been too far from leg stump there
i sharma to pollard, 1 run, on middle and leg and that's turned to fine leg for a single
i sharma to pollard, four runs, mid-off is inside the circle and pollard's flat-batted hit finds the boundary, just clears that fielder in the in-field
steyn to pollard, 1 leg bye, pollard steps across to try to whip it square, steyn runs all the way towards square leg to keep them down to a single
perera to sharma, 1 run, meaty drive but struck straight to long-off for a single
perera to pollard, four runs, pollard cashes in this time, perera is bowling gifts here, thrashed over midwicket for a one bounce four

mishra to pollard, no run, he's lost his bat, it has slipped out of his hand, flat outside off and he swings, misses, and loses his bat, landed just wide of the leg umpire, was in the firing line there
mishra to pollard, 1 run, pollard has just changed things completely, slaps that towards long-off for a single
pathan to vijay, no run, swinging in, beats vijay's flick, but the ball is headed down leg
pathan to hussey, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
nehra to vijay, 1 run, runs this past the keeper for a single
botha to hussey, 1 run, driven straight to mid-on but they steal a single
botha to vijay, 1 run, slower through the air. drops at his feet and runs
botha to hussey, four runs, down the wicket, makes room, and drives it past extra cover
botha to hussey, 1 run, driven to long-off
kaul to vijay, 5 wides, kedar jadhav is having a shocker. wide down the leg side, and he doesn't even make an attempt to go after it

kaul to vijay, 2 runs, missed run-out. slower ball, pushed past point, he comes back for a second that he looks like he will make, but his bat gets stuck in the turf. jadhav, though, doesn't even break the wicket and is not even awake to what has happened to vijay's bat
nehra to raina, no run, wide down the leg side. not given. seems to have touched the pad on the way
botha to raina, 1 wide, botha seems to be struggling with the dew here. down leg this goes
yadav to hussey, no run, finally jadhav catches one, and appeals, but hussey hasn't edged this one
van der merwe to raina, no run, fired across him, beats the outside edge on the dab
van der merwe to raina, 2 runs, down the wicket to push at it. gets a single to irfan, but the overthrow gets them a second too

van der merwe to raina, out, soft dismissal. drives straight into extra cover's lap. delhi must be telling irfan pathan, 'what an idea sirji.' but for irfan's overthrow raina wouldn't even be facing this delivery
van der merwe to dhoni, 1 run, pushed to deep midwicket for one
van der merwe to jadeja, 1 run, down the wicket, jadeja mis-hits this towards long-off
kaul to jadeja, 1 run, slower ball, dabbed away to third man for one

kaul to dhoni, 1 run, return catch dropped. another slower ball, wide outside off, it comes back off the toe end, boot high, but it has come considerably slower than he expects it to. it dips on him too
kaul to jadeja, 1 run, slower ball, on a off, opens the face to guide it to third man
van der merwe to jadeja, 1 wide, wide outside leg
kaul to bravo, 2 runs, slower ball, outside off, driven over point, gets a couple

nehra to dhoni, 1 run, slower ball, wide outside off. dhoni swings so hard at it he has turned 180 degrees and is showing his backside to the bowler by the time he finishes the shot. single to long-off
sharma to botha, 1 run, pushed to the rigth of mid-off. delhi and botha off the mark
holder to botha, no run, goes back to play this, but can't beat point
sharma to warner, no run, defended towards mid-off
holder to botha, four runs, botha has swept holder from wide outside off for a four through fine leg. need more be said about this shot
holder to botha, 1 run, flicked away off the toes for one
ashwin to botha, no run, straighter one, beats the drive
ashwin to warner, 1 wide, wide down the leg side. that breaks the maiden
ashwin to rohrer, 1 run, pushed into the leg side for another single. another 11 overs to survive for a draw
morkel to rohrer, 1 wide, slower ball, wide down the leg side
morkel to van der merwe, no run, diving save at point from badri saves four
ashwin to van der merwe, 1 run, the carrom ball. he reads it off the pitch, punches it to deep cover
holder to warner, no run, driven back to holder
bravo to warner, 2 runs, down the wicket to drive this to the left of long-off for two
bravo to pathan, 1 run, slower ball, bravo dives across the width of the pitch, but can't get a touch on the ball
morkel to warner, 2 wides, he tries to follow bravo who is backing away, and concedes a leg-side wide
bravo to yadav, 1 run, driven to deep cover
sharma to yadav, 1 run, slower ball, kaul edges it to third man for one
bravo to kaul, no run, slower ball, beats his drive outside off
bravo to kaul, no run, slower ball, outside off, beats the bat again
bravo to kaul, 2 runs, gets a thick outside edge on the attempted big drive. wide of the keeper
chavan to maxwell, no run, keeps it up to the bat from round the stumps and maxwell defends it back to the bowler
chavan to maxwell, 1 run, slows it down, bit of turn away from the batsman and he guides it to backward point for a single

faulkner to maxwell, 1 run, top-edged and landed between three fielders, third-man was the closest to it but the slip and the point fielder was also going for it, in the end they get a single, what an over that!
chavan to maxwell, 2 runs, and again, this was outside the off stump, was looking to hoick it away but not off the middle of the bat, couple of runs to the left of deep mid-wicket
chavan to maxwell, 1 run, and he is not holding back, was going down the track to smack it over the in-field, gets an inside edge that runs away to fine-leg for a single
chavan to tare, no run, quicker and flatter, patted to the off side and not for a run

watson to maxwell, out, gone, lbw, watson's got his fellow aussie here! it was on the middle stump and swinging back into the batsman, he was looking to jam his bat down quickly but it seems to have escaped it and hit the back thigh, the umpire thought for many a seconds before giving it. watson's given him a nice, little farewell too.
watson to tare, 1 run, was trying to play across yet again and does not connect, rolls over to the off side and a single
chavan to tare, four runs, outside the leg stump and this gives him the license to smack it away, gets enough bat on it and rolls away to fine-leg for a four

watson to karthik, 1 wide, down the leg side that's been kept well there, was a wide alright but could have easily slipped away for five wides like what we saw in the pune game, a diving keeper makes a good stop to his left
watson to karthik, four runs, it's another shimmy down the track and this time karthik gets it off the middle of the bat, a good tap down through mid-off for a four
binny to karthik, 1 run, on the off stump line and he opens the face of the bat through to third-man for a single
tambe to karthik, 1 wide, outside the off stump, flatter and it's far wide outside the off
tambe to karthik, 1 run, tosses it up and he was going down the track, gets bit of an inside edge through to the leg side for a single

tambe to tare, four runs, missed, stumping missed there, difficult alright but it has to count as a chance, he was looking to go down the track and gets bit of an edge, the keeper does not get a glove there and it's gone for a four
cooper to tare, no run, slows down the pace, it's outside the off stump and beats him
tambe to pollard, no run, tosses it up and on the off stump, pollard gets his long legs out and defends it back to the bowler
cooper to rayudu, 1 run, on the off stump, pushed to the off side for a single
cooper to johnson, no run, slower one, a very slow one in fact, he was a day too early into his stroke and that's gone through him
johnson to dravid, 1 wide, down the leg side, way down in fact and given wide, there was a bit of swing on that one but gets the line wrong
kulkarni to faulkner, four runs, outside-edged for a four, it was outside the off stump and he gave it his bat, gets it over the slips and it races away
johnson to faulkner, 1 run, and this time he has some width which he uses to steer it to third-man for a single
kulkarni to faulkner, 1 run, middle stump line and that's tapped to the leg side for a quickly taken single
kulkarni to faulkner, out, gone, caught, was trying to slice it away and can get only a top-edge on that one, goes high in the air, maxwell runs back to take a good catch
kulkarni to watson, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and steers it to third-man for a single
harbhajan singh to watson, no run, outside the off stump, and opens the face of the bat to the off side
harbhajan singh to binny, 1 run, quicker on the off stump and that's tapped to the off side for a quick one
malinga to binny, no run, slower delivery outside the off and beats the batsman for the lack of pace, through to the keeper
malinga to binny, 1 run, leading edge that scoops over the in-field on the off side, lobs over the fielders and gets a single
harbhajan singh to binny, 5 wides, down the leg side and for five wides, we have seen many of them today, haven't we? it was a quicker one and down the leg side for five wides
ojha to binny, no run, ooh, in the air and almost hit to the fielder, it was outside the off stump and was looking to drive it away, the spin beats him, scoops up to the point
ojha to binny, 1 run, driven through the covers for a single
ojha to binny, no run, quicker and some turn away from the bat, beats the outside edge

harbhajan singh to yagnik, out, bowled him now, harbhajan has a wicket! he had to go after the bowling here with the required rate so high, he went down the track but misses, sneaks through and the stumps are rattled
harbhajan singh to hodge, 4 byes, wow, what a delivery and that seems to have missed the bat, pad and the stumps, karthik gets no gloves on it either and it runs away to the fence for four byes
ojha to hodge, 1 run, outside the off stump, tapped to the off side and they are through for a single
ojha to binny, four runs, down the leg side, was a poor ball and that's swept away over fine-leg for a four! good shot that
malinga to hodge, four runs, that's drilled away to the fence! malinga pitched that one up to the bat and gave him width too, cracked it away by hodge
malinga to hodge, no run, and again, this is further up and driven to the off side, but this time he does not get it in the gap, straight to the fielder
ojha to hodge, four runs, it's caress again for want of a better word, this time it's deftly played behind the backward point with lot less power but it's four all the way
ojha to hodge, no run, defended back to the bowler to end what has been an excellent over for the royals

johnson to hodge, four runs, inside edged and for a four, he was looking to give himself room but all he manages to do is get an inside edge, the good news for rr? it beats the keeper and rolls over to the fence!
malinga to hodge, 1 run, slapped well to one that's pushed up to the bat but it goes on the bounce to pollard at long-off
malinga to hodge, no run, wants to swing it away and all he can do is to get some inside edge on it, rolls back to the keeper who has a shy at the stumps again, misses
kulkarni to binny, 1 run, drilled away over point for a single, it's rayadu at deep point and binny wanted a second but hodge sends him back
kulkarni to hodge, 2 runs, up and over but not hit strongly enough to beat the man at deep extra-cover, the fielder runs over to the right and restricts them to a couple
malinga to cooper, no run, slower one and outside the off stump, was looking to tonk it away but beats him
kumar to pujara, 1 run, follows this outswinger too, gets a single to third man
kumar to gayle, no run, inswinger. hit that, gayle. big inswinger, starts outside leg, squares him up, and beats him
kumar to gayle, 2 runs, down the wicket to push this wide of mid-on
kumar to gayle, no run, another inswinger, starts outside leg, headed towards off, and is defended solidly
kumar to gayle, no run, another big inswinger, beats the outside edge, hits him on the back pad, but is swinging away to miss off
kumar to pujara, 2 runs, pushed towards mid-on. mandeep charges in to deny the single, but he runs past it, and allows them the second
gony to pujara, 1 run, dabs this to point for one

gony to gayle, four runs, a mis-hit goes into the boundary on the bounce. this has skidded on gayle, and he is late into his loft. however, the mis-hit clears mid-on with ease, and nearly carries all the way
chawla to gayle, 1 wide, another dart. wide down the leg side this time
chawla to gayle, 1 leg bye, chawla bowls another dart, and gets away with just the leg-bye. a good over
chawla to gayle, 2 runs, seam up. at 118ks. don't rub your eyes. he has put a lot of shoulder into this. gayle drives this towards long-off, wide of it
chawla to gayle, no run, 122.4ks. is this the quickest a spinner has ever bowled without chucking? gayle manages an inside edge into the pad
gony to kohli, 1 run, gets this one to shape away, takes the edge, but it goes to third man for one
chawla to kohli, no run, quicker, toppie, hits the top half of the defensive bat
kumar to kohli, no run,
kumar to kohli, 1 wide, another wide down the leg side
awana to de villiers, 1 wide, wide down the leg side. trying to counter as ab moves away, but the batsman gets inside the line
kumar to henriques, no run, and again henriques backs away and he goes wide away again. can't reach it again
vinay kumar to mandeep singh, four runs, even he starts with a leg-side delivery with fine leg up in the circle. picked away for four again
vinay kumar to hussey, 1 run, steers this to third man for one
vinay kumar to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, runs this off the face of the bat, gets a single to third man
vinay kumar to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, driven to extra cover and sets off. the throw from ab misses
kartik to miller, 1 run, jumps out of the crease to drive this to long-off for one
kartik to hussey, 1 run, down the wicket to drive this to long-off

vinay kumar to sathish, 1 run, dropped by gayle. west indians at point have not been having the best of times of late. hit high to his left, he got the hand to it, but couldn't hold on. not an easy chance, but a chance nonetheless
gayle to sathish, 1 wide, darted wide down the leg side
gayle to sathish, 1 run, slow through the air, he has blocked it for one
watson to vihari, no run, ooh, that's angled back into the batsman and it keeps quite low, defended back to the bowler, off the toe of the bat
watson to vihari, no run, outside the off stump and moving away from the bat, lets it go through to the keeper
watson to vihari, no run, ooh, almost an edge, it was swinging away from the bat and looks to fish away from the body, misses the outside edge through to the keeper
faulkner to samantray, 1 run, outside edge and it rushes away to the third-man fielder for a single
tambe to vihari, 1 wide, down the leg side, again not too much turn, flatter too and called a wide
tambe to vihari, 2 runs, outside the off stump and he opens the face of the bat and guides it through backward point for a couple of runs
binny to vihari, 1 run, opens the face and guides it to third-man for a run
binny to samantray, no run, and he continues to swing away from the batsman, gets it straight to the point fielder where rahane fields well
tambe to vihari, 1 run, up and over, was looking to play it through extra-cover but gets it as far as wide long-off for a single
tambe to samantray, 1 leg bye, down the leg side, he was looking to flick it away, got sucked into going down for a drive, gets a pad on it, else was a chance for a stumping
tambe to vihari, no run, defended to the off side off one that's up to the bat
trivedi to vihari, 2 runs, edged and it runs away to the fine third-man fielder where watson comes around and rips it in, close to the stumps but the batsman's in by then
cooper to samantray, four runs, slower one, in fact it's so slow he actually adjusted his shot, done well too, at the 11th hour, he rolls his wrist over a deft touch through to fine third-man
trivedi to samantray, 2 runs, slower one, on the middle-stump and tucked away to the leg-side for a couple of runs, it's the fine-leg who has to come around to field that one
tambe to sammy, 1 run, slows it down considerably that one, straighter one and he manages to get some bat on it to the leg side for a single
trivedi to sammy, 2 runs, slower one and he waits on it, taps it through square-leg for a single and by the time faulkner runs into the ball, they come back for the second
trivedi to sammy, 1 run,

trivedi to samantray, 2 runs, moves across to the leg side and he flicks it over the leg side for a couple of runs, faulkner throws it at the non-striker's end but misses the stumps, thought it was out had it hit
trivedi to sammy, 1 run, and now wanted to go down the track but he takes the pace off the ball, needs to check his shot and it rolls over to square-leg for a single
watson to samantray, 1 run, slows the pace down and he opens the face of the bat through to the third-man
faulkner to perera, 2 runs, yet again he's bowled right up to the bat, probably a touch slower and he's hit it to wide long-off for a couple

cooper to perera, 1 run, outside edged through to third-man, he was looking to unwind as you would expect, wasn't quite in his slot and the outside edge runs to third-man for a single, hodge was rushing in and manages to get his hand in the way
faulkner to perera, 2 runs, outside the off stump and the batsman throws his bat at it, gets bit of an outside edge and it rolls over to square third-man
faulkner to perera, 1 wide, outside the off stump, quite outside in fact and that's given a wide

cooper to kv sharma, 2 runs, was looking to go across to outside the off stump and then it was bowled further outside the off, gets an outside edge and it lobs up to the deep cover fielder, dropped there i think
cooper to kv sharma, 1 bye, wants to hit away again but misses, they come across for a bye

cooper to kv sharma, 2 runs, out, out, run-out! slower delivery and he's not going to stop going after it, the slowness beats him too and it's gone high but it's in the gap between the long-off and deep cover, both the fielders converge, one of them, binny stops it on the bounce and flicks it to the other, baby, who rips a strong throw at the non-striker's end where the bails are whipped off, the batsmen were going for the third and is run-out!

cooper to perera, out, slower on the middle stump and he cannot hit it too well, off the toe of the bat back to the bowler who lobs it back at the non-striker's end where the batsman has taken a start and is easily run-out
steyn to dravid, 1 run, swing away from the batsman and he guides it to third-man for a single
steyn to rahane, no run, wow, he's cranking them up here and having a go at the batsman too, was on the off stump line and swinging away, looks to leave it and steyn has a word with rahane
kv sharma to dravid, no run, defended back to the bowler this time, bit of a leading edge

i sharma to rahane, no run, was giving himself room to play it over but then checks his shot and hits it to mid-off, he has a shy at the stumps does perera and misses at the non-striker's end, dravid looked just out
i sharma to dravid, no run, 136.6 km/hr but it seems like it never arrived, gets bit of the bat and it rolls over to the off side
mishra to samson, 1 run, tosses it up slightly more and spin away, pushed to the off side for a single

perera to watson, 2 runs, outside the off and well hit through backward point for a single, steyn runs across to stop the second but watson wants to come back, he does that despite a strong throw from the south african
i sharma to binny, 1 run, outside the off stump, not too quick off the pitch and he gently taps it to third-man for a single
i sharma to watson, 1 run, and easily guides it away to the third-man for a single
perera to watson, 1 run, slower one outside the off stump and he loves playing it down to third-man for a single
kv sharma to hodge, 1 run, tapped away and goes for a quick single
kv sharma to hodge, four runs,
mishra to sachin baby, no run, and again! tosses it up, slows it down and beats the outside edge
kv sharma to faulkner, out, and this time he's caught, was attempting to play that same stroke yet again, what it does is to get a leading edge that carries to long-off for a simple catch
steyn to tambe, no run, outside the off stump and pushed to the point fielder
steyn to cooper, four runs, gives himself and absolutely tonks it through wide long-off, sammy rushes across to stop it and it's gone through him here, poor effort from the fielder
coulter-nile to gilchrist, no run, bounce straightaway and it beats gilchrist, he poked his bat out and the ball just moved away
dhawan to mandeep singh, no run, big swing and a miss! extra bounce for rishi, outside the off stump
dhawan to azhar mahmood, no run, gets some good inswing again, a touch wide outside off and left alone
coulter-nile to marsh, no run,
coulter-nile to marsh, no run, good delivery, this one kicked up a bit and he awkwardly fended it towards slip
dhawan to marsh, no run, he stays behind the line and pats it to the off side for a single
dhawan to marsh, no run, gets some good away movement and he pushes it to the off side
dhawan to marsh, 1 run, drifts on the body and he tucks it away down to square leg
dhawan to azhar mahmood, no run,
coulter-nile to marsh, no run, stays back at the crease and punches it to the off side
coulter-nile to marsh, no run, stays beside the line and he chops it down towards point
coulter-nile to marsh, 1 wide, he strays down the leg side and wide called
coulter-nile to marsh, no run, keeps it straight again and he knocks it back to the bowler
coulter-nile to marsh, 1 run,
kulkarni to marsh, no run, goes back and defends back to the bowler
sharma to azhar mahmood, no run, goes back at the crease and punches it to mid-off

harbhajan singh to marsh, 1 run, goes back and flicks it down to deep midwicket
harbhajan singh to marsh, no run, makes a lot of room and chops it to the off side
malinga to azhar mahmood, 1 run, outside the off stump and he opens the face and dabs it down to third man
harbhajan singh to azhar mahmood, 1 run, flatter delivery and he pushes it wide of point
harbhajan singh to marsh, 1 run,
pollard to azhar mahmood, 2 runs, lands it outside the off stump and he opens the face and runs it down to third man
pollard to azhar mahmood, 1 run, slower ball outside the off stump and he drives wide of cover
pollard to marsh, no run, goes back and punches it to the off side
pollard to marsh, 1 run, pushes it towards mid-off
harbhajan singh to marsh, no run, goes back and knocks it back to the bowler
harbhajan singh to marsh, no run, flatter delivery and he goes back and defends
malinga to azhar mahmood, no run, tucks him up for room and he stays back and defends back to the bowler
malinga to marsh, no run, stays behind the line and pushes it on the walk to mid-off
maxwell to marsh, no run, goes back and punches it back to the bowler
maxwell to marsh, 1 run, chips down the track and drives him down to long-off to bring up his fifty
maxwell to azhar mahmood, 1 run, goes back and punches it wide of backward point to bring up his fifty
dhawan to azhar mahmood, 1 run, goes back and punches it wide of point
dhawan to marsh, 1 wide,
dhawan to azhar mahmood, 1 wide, wide outside off and mahmood made room and left it alone thinking it would be a wide, the bowler and keeper weren't pleased
dhawan to azhar mahmood, 1 run, he runs him down to third man
malinga to azhar mahmood, no run, makes room and he fails to put it away, the ball rolls down the track
malinga to vohra, no run,
malinga to vohra, four runs, edgy! pitches that up outside off and he makes room and he tries to crash that to the off side and gets an outside edge wide of the keeper
pollard to miller, no run, slower ball outside the off stump and he misses
pollard to miller, four runs, good placement! miller was down the track and played an ungainly heave to the deep, bisected two fielders converging at deep midwicket
pollard to vohra, 1 run, tucked it away to the on side
kumar to maxwell, no run, swings it back in and he taps it to the off side
kumar to maxwell, no run, this one swings in as well and he goes for the square drive and misses
kumar to maxwell, out, top edge! praveen moves it back in and maxwell goes for the big swing over the on side, gets a thick top edge that swirls to third man
kumar to tare, no run, keeps it outside off and he swings it away, left alone
kumar to tare, 1 run, reaches out and places it to the off side
azhar mahmood to rayudu, 1 run, stays beside the line and pushes it to the off side
azhar mahmood to tare, no run, drifts it back in and he places it straight to mid-off
azhar mahmood to tare, no run, mahmood's in the middle of a good over, this one drifts in and moves away after pitching, beats the edge
azhar mahmood to tare, no run, stays back at the crease and defends down the track
kumar to rayudu, no run, good bowling pk! moves it away from the right-hander, just beats the edge
kumar to rayudu, 1 run, stays beside the line and he steers it down to third man
kumar to tare, no run, good comeback by pk, this one nipped back in sharply, he can only chop it down to point
sandeep sharma to tare, 1 run, nips it back in and he shuffles and whips it away down to deep square leg

sandeep sharma to tare, out, what a comeback by the bowler! after getting hit for a six, sandeep swings this one towards the off stump, tare goes for the loft but leaves a gap between pad and bat, knocks down the off stump
kumar to rayudu, no run, pk's inswing to the right-handers is causing problems, tucked for room, he can only place it to point
kumar to rayudu, 1 wide, drifts down the leg side this time, didn't control the swing
kumar to rayudu, no run, not much room again and he ends up chopping it to point
kumar to rayudu, four runs, chips down the track and he lofts him over midwicket, praveen gets the ball to move back in
kumar to rayudu, 1 run, stays back and chops it wide of point
sandeep sharma to sharma, 1 run, stays back and punches it to mid-off
awana to rayudu, 1 run, good bowling and good running, tucked up for room, places it with soft hands to the off side and sets off quickly
chawla to sharma, no run,
chawla to sharma, no run, flatter and quicker and he pushes it to the off side
awana to karthik, no run, stays back and he defends with soft hands to the off side
awana to karthik, no run, tucks him up for room and he chops it towards point
chawla to sharma, 1 run, stays back and pushes it to the off side
azhar mahmood to sharma, 1 run, stays back and he punches it towards mid-on
azhar mahmood to sharma, 1 run, opens the face and runs it wide of point
chawla to sharma, no run,
chawla to sharma, 1 run, stays back and punches it to the on side
chawla to sharma, no run,

awana to dhawan, no run, nips back in and he is tucked for room, he chops it to the off side
