chawla to pollard, 1 wide, drifts down the leg side and wide called
chawla to pollard, 2 runs, goes for the heave and it's an ungainly shot, inside edge to the on side
chawla to dhawan, no run, opens the face and tries to run it down to third man but can't beat the fielder in the circle
awana to pollard, 2 runs, pollard lucky to get away this time, fetches one wide outside off and he scoops it one handed down to deep point
awana to pollard, 1 run, this one swings back in sharply and he manages to dig it out
sandeep sharma to dhawan, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and he runs this down to third man
sandeep sharma to dhawan, 1 run, slower delivery and he tries to run this down to third man, the ball bounces towards wide slip
sandeep sharma to pollard, 2 runs, caught at long-off again but it's a free hit! pollard made room and lofted it high and down long-off's throat again
azhar mahmood to dhawan, 1 run,
azhar mahmood to harbhajan singh, 1 run, stays back and he punches it to the off side
sandeep sharma to coulter-nile, no run, slower delivery outside off and he plays and misses
sandeep sharma to harbhajan singh, 1 run, slower delivery outside off and he chops it to the off side
azhar mahmood to malinga, 1 run, that was the slower one and he chips it towards mid-on
azhar mahmood to harbhajan singh, no run, that's a good slower ball, swings and misses it
ashwin to kohli, no run, gets some turn first up, beats his inside edge as kohli looks to work this to leg
ashwin to kohli, four runs, long hop. slightly wide. enough time for kohli to go back and punch this through cover for four
morris to kohli, 1 leg bye, seam movement back in, which beats kohli's big drive. they will get a leg-bye
ashwin to kohli, no run, carrom ball. kohli is looking to play to leg, but this turns from leg to off, and he ends up defending
ashwin to kohli, 1 run, down the wicket to drive this to deep cover
ashwin to kohli, six runs, he has picked the carrom ball and gone with the turn. charges at him again, has made room too, and goes inside-out well over long-off

sharma to de villiers, out, starts off with a slower ball off the back of the hand. de villiers has set himself up for midwicket hit, picks the slower ball, tries to adjust the shot but there is just too long to wait. ends up holing out to long-off
rampaul to vijay, 1 run, slower ball, runs off the inside half of vijay's bat for one
khan to vijay, no run, nearly a run-out. driven straight to mid-off, and vijay sends him back. he was gone had rp singh hit
unadkat to bravo, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
unadkat to bravo, 1 run, slower ball, bravo tries to whip it to leg, gets a thick edge to third man for one
vinay kumar to vijay, 1 run, flicked away to deep square leg
unadkat to vijay, four runs, stylishly picked away off the hip to send it over square leg for four
rampaul to dhoni, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
khan to jadeja, four runs, chipped over mid-off for four
anand rajan to bisla, 1 run, nipped back into the batsman, tapped away to the leg side and they are off for a quick single
steyn to bisla, 5 wides, very, very poor ball from steyn, it seemed to have got stuck in his hand, pushes it down the leg side and it goes further down for five wides
steyn to gambhir, 1 run, outside edge and it rushes through to third-man for a single this time to get off the mark
anand rajan to gambhir, 2 runs, slower one on the off stump and pats it to point for a quick single, sammy has a shy at the stumps and he misses, which allows them to return for the second
anand rajan to kallis, no run, outside the off stump and drives it well but straight to the cover fielder
anand rajan to gambhir, 2 runs, finally something off the middle of the bat for gg, he was looking to go down the track, gets it ful and smacks it over through mid-on for a couple
anand rajan to gambhir, 1 wide, down the leg side that one, swinging further down for a wide
mishra to kallis, no run, straighter one and on the off stump, pushed to the off side, the point fielder runs in, morgan wanted the single but is sent back, the shy at the stumps misses
mishra to kallis, no run, outside edge missed, was looking to drive it straight but misses
sharma to morgan, no run, and now looks to chip it away, gets some pad again and another appeal, but this wasn't out
sharma to kallis, no run, and now a quicker one, straighter one, tapped back to the bowler who runs to his right and fields well
mishra to kallis, no run, stops at the last moment in his action and he defends it this time
mishra to kallis, 1 run, flatter one hit down to long off for a single
sharma to kallis, no run, pitches it right up to the bat with bit of turn away from him who pushes it to the point area
perera to pathan, no run, closer to the stumps this time, was on the off stump and defended to the off side
sharma to pathan, four runs, umpire-killer, had that hit rauf, he would have been in trouble, it was hit with some brute force and straight, rauf ducks for cover and it seeps through to the fence
sharma to pathan, no run, wow, what turn, lot of it and at good pace, grips from the leg-stump line and almost squares him up.
sharma to pathan, no run, pushed to the leg side and not for runs again, end of another good over
perera to kallis, 1 run, slower one from the back of the hands, opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third-man for a single
mishra to dogra, no run, not-out this time but the appeal was as loud as the previous one, was a wrong 'un and he was looking to defend at it, gets an inside edge on to the back pad
perera to dogra, no run, and back of the hand slower one from the bowler this time, around 100 km/hr and it neither gets to the batman nor bounces, beats the edge

perera to pathan, six runs, shot, shot, shot! he's been tonked over the bowler's head for a huge six, when he hit it, it looked to have have come off the edge and seemed to have gone up really high but it soon clears the fence and with much ease
steyn to pathan, 1 run, and now he opens the face of the bat and guides it to third-man for a single
anand rajan to iqbal abdulla, 1 run, too wide outside the off but he does not let it go, has a dab at it and runs across to third-man for a single
pathan to dhawan, 1 run, not up to the bat and he's tucked it away to the leg side for a single
pathan to patel, no run, quicker from round the stumps, hits his pad at some stage and so there's an appeal but umpire gives it not-out
pathan to dhawan, no run, keeping it up to the bat this time, pushes it to mid-off now
pathan to patel, 1 wide, poor delivery down the leg side but very well kept by the keeper, dives to his right to close
pathan to patel, no run, on the middle stump and flicked away to square-leg, not for runs though, another excellent over from pathan
sangwan to dhawan, 2 runs, goes down the track yet again and drills it through the in-field, kallis is at mid-off and he rushes to his right, dives and stops it
sangwan to dhawan, no run, just outside the off stump and tapped to the off side before a loud call of 'no!'
narine to patel, no run, pitches it right up to him this time and defended to the off side
pathan to patel, four runs, no, no, no, that's not how you compensate for the line, it's sent down the leg side and it's been swept away for a four!
pathan to patel, 1 run, outside the off stump and driven down to long-off for a single
pathan to dhawan, no run, slows it down and that's tapped to the off side
kallis to dhawan, no run, up to the bat on the off stump and tapped to the off side, straight to the fielder
mohammed shami to dhawan, no run, charges down the track and pushes it down to mid-on there, wanted a single but sent back
pathan to dhawan, 1 run, walks down the crease and uses a lot of wrists to flick it away
iqbal abdulla to vihari, no run, goes back this time and flicks it away to the leg side, wanted one but sent back
mohammed shami to vihari, 1 wide, and this is down the leg side and he wanted to get a bit of bat there, gets nothing on it but gets a wide for it

mohammed shami to vihari, 5 wides, poor ball, he's getting them to swing but this is too close to the leg stump from where it swings further down the leg side, beats bisla and that's gone for five wides
mohammed shami to vihari, no run, gets the line back to the middle stump and that's swung back in too, tapped to mid-off
iqbal abdulla to perera, no run, drilled back but the bowler gets a hand to it, fielded well and that ends an excellent over from abdulla!
narine to sammy, no run, big big appeal for a caught behind, went away from the bat who was looking to defend at it, hits the thigh through to the keeper
narine to sammy, no run, and now he gets some bat on it, defends it back to the bowler, interesting
narine to sammy, no run, maiden from narine at such a crucial stage, he defends it back to play out a runless over!
iqbal abdulla to sammy, six runs, and again, six more to finish it off, two sixes off successive deliveries and sammy's sealed the deal, hyderabad is through to the playoffs!

johnson to hussey, no run, was looking for a quick one there hussey, had tapped it to the covers and called vijay who remained rooted back, it had gone to rohit who did well there, has a shy back too but hussey's well in
malinga to hussey, four runs, slows the pace down but that's not slowing the pace of scoring down, he's read it well, waits for it and crunches it through the covers for a four
malinga to hussey, 1 leg bye, swinging right into the batsman, wants to flick it away, but gets bit of a pad through to the leg side
harbhajan singh to vijay, 1 run, tosses it up from round the stumps, tapped to mid-wicket for a single, harbhajan runs across to field that one
harbhajan singh to hussey, no run, on the off stump and tapped to the off side this time
pollard to vijay, no run, slower one outside the off stump, pushed it into the point region and straight to the fielder

pollard to vijay, out, swings, hits the bottom, and gone, caught! vijay loves playing this free-swing shot, it was in his arc but not off the middle of the bat at all and it's gone straight to deep square-leg where it's taken, a wicket for mumbai indians
pollard to hussey, 1 run, very close to the off stump and deftly played through to the third-man, steers it through for a single
pollard to hussey, 1 run, and he loves playing that stroke doesn't he, hussey waits till the last moment before opening the face of the bat and guides it down to third-man for a single
ojha to raina, 1 run, tries to swing it away over the leg side, not too much bat on it and runs away on the bounce to the deep square-leg fielder
ojha to raina, six runs, crack, that's the sound that came off it, he was looking to chip down the pitch and he bowled it quicker, tapped it and that's gone over mid-wicket for a solid six!
pollard to raina, 1 run, gives himself some room and gets the ball on the middle stump, hits it through to long-off for a single

patel to raina, four runs, and wow, just wow, that was pitched right up to the bat and he's bisected the two backward point fielders, the players were quite close to each other and he gets the gap so well!
patel to hussey, 1 run, this is outside the off stump and right up to the bat and drilled through to deep covers for a single

pollard to raina, 2 runs, swung away across the line, he was getting into the groove of hitting everything away, this time it's not hit off the middle of the bat, goes to smith at deep square-leg and he tries to go for the catch, does not hold on to it
johnson to hussey, 1 run, that's from over the stumps and outside the stump, drops his pace to 131 km/hr and he was looking to swing it, gets only a bit of an inside edge to the leg side for a single
malinga to hussey, 1 run, comes down the pitch and wants to flay it away, gets it off the toe of the bat through to the covers for a single
sharma to tare, 1 run, the third-man's up inside the circle and he looks to dab it through that area, gets it away to deep backward point region for a single
sharma to karthik, no run, outside the off stump and tapped straight to point, yet to get off the mark here karthik
sharma to karthik, four runs, finally slaps it in the gap, he had been timing them well but it was the placement which was a problem, this was placed through extra-cover for a four
morkel to smith, 2 runs, continues to bowl that line and again, smith gets it off the middle of the bat through to deep square-leg for a couple of runs, jadeja gets the ball in quick
morkel to smith, four runs, no, he's not changing his line and smith's got the hang of it, gets it over mid-wicket, and helps himself to an easy boundary
morris to smith, no run, slows down the pace and taps to the off side, wants a single does karthik but is sent back by smith
ashwin to smith, six runs, outside the off stump, probably slightly quicker but he opens his stance up and pummels it over the bowler for a six, straight enough to hit the sight-screen
jadeja to sharma, no run, straighter from round the stumps and defended back to the bowler
jadeja to sharma, no run, quicker, on the middle stump and tapped to the off side
ashwin to sharma, 1 run, and now wants to go down the track and hit it over the in-field, not off the middle of the bat though
jadeja to pollard, four runs, outside edged for a four! that was on the off stump and quicker, probably a bit of spin too and he throws his bat at it, gets over point for a four
jadeja to pollard, 1 run, closer to the stumps, on the middle, quicker and tapped to the leg side for a single
jadeja to pollard, 1 run, slapped through to wide long-off but it's hit so hard that once it was fielded by vijay - and done well at that - there was no chance for a second
jadeja to rayudu, 1 run, pushes it into the covers this time for a single
bravo to rayudu, no run, outside the off stump and driven to point, straight to the fielder
morris to rayudu, 1 no ball, oh, that's a no-ball over his waist, almost his head high, does well to sway away and the bowler immediately apologises for it
malik to patel, 1 run, leg-stump line and swinging further away, flicked away to the fine-leg fielder for a single to get off the mark
malik to dhawan, 1 run, oww, an outside edge this time that's in the air and then rolls over to the third-man region for a single
faulkner to vihari, 1 run, some bounce but angling away from the batsman, opens the face of the bat and steers it to third-man for his first run tonight
faulkner to dhawan, four runs, another slower one and that's an excellent shot, he merely pushed at it and beats the mid-off fielder to his right with an ease

malik to dhawan, four runs, now that's the shot we have been waiting for, he loves playing it too, takes a couple of steps down the pitch and then opens the face of the bat and taps it through extra-cover for a four
watson to dhawan, no run, keeps it very close to the stumps here, on the off stump too and defended to the off side, was looking to play it down to third-man, gets it squarer
trivedi to dhawan, 1 run, he's definitely getting some sort of movement back into the batsman, just a hint though, on the middle stump line and flicked away to the leg side
trivedi to dhawan, 1 run, and again, the tip and run bit, this is 'tipped' slightly harder and it goes to the off side fielder, but they still manage to get a single
watson to dhawan, no run, seams back into the batsman again, he was looking to defend at it and it gets an inside edge to the leg side
watson to dhawan, 1 run, a quick shimmy down the track and pushed into the covers for a quick single, helped no doubt by the fact that he had already taken those few steps down the pitch
trivedi to white, 1 run, outside the off stump and bit of seam away from the bat, drives it through the covers for a single
binny to sammy, no run, and leaves it alone yet again, was outside the off stump that one and swinging away
trivedi to sammy, 1 run, slows the pace of the delivery down, was on the leg-stump too and he can only push it to the leg side for a single
cooper to dhawan, 1 run, and another one slowed down when he saw him come down the track, gets some bat on it and loops it up to the off side, single alone
cooper to sammy, 1 run, wants to tonk it hard but that one did not come on too much and it goes straight to wide long-off for only a single
faulkner to perera, four runs, wow, what a shot that one, was a slower one and for the second time this over, it looked like he was waiting for it too, cracks it through wide long-off for a four
cooper to perera, 1 wide, poor last ball, read his intentions that he was looking to crack it away, slipped in wider but it's too wide outside the off
watson to samantray, 1 wide, down the leg-side and is called a wide there
cooper to kv sharma, 1 run, slower one on the leg stump and he's too early in his stroke, chipped over the leg side for a single, was in the air for some time there
cooper to samantray, 1 run, slower outside the off stump and tapped to the covers for a single
i sharma to dravid, no run, gets the line outside the off stump and he gets his bat and pad together and defends it to the off side

i sharma to dravid, out, leading edge and gone, caught at point! it was on the middle stump, he was looking to flick it away like he's been doing so far, on replays it looks like there was some movement away to the off side and the leading edge's taken it straight to the fielder
steyn to rahane, no run, slower one outside the off stump and again, he's gotten his foot out and defended to the off side
i sharma to rahane, 1 run, and now he walks across to the off side but flicks it to the leg side, plays it very late too and gets a single
perera to rahane, 1 run, walks across the stumps and flicks it away to deep square-leg for a single
perera to rahane, 1 run, swung across the line now, was on the off stump and he looks to get it over mid-wicket, bit of an inside-edge for a single
i sharma to watson, 1 run, and again, what's with that line of bowling so close to the middle and leg line, easily flicked away to the deep square-leg for a single
sammy to yagnik, no run, round the stumps and outside the off, tapped to the off side and wanted to rush off but sent back by rahane
mishra to samson, no run, straighter this time, wrong 'un and it bounces more than he expects, defended to the leg side
sammy to binny, 1 run, over the in-field for a single, he was looking to throw his bat at that one, gets an outside edge to deep cover
mishra to hodge, 1 run, a change in run-up from mishra, comes more across than straighter, pushed into the covers for a single
mishra to samson, no run, slows it down and on the off stump, turning away and defended to the off side
mishra to samson, no run, ooh, some turn there, was looking to run it down to third-man and that's gripped and turned, beats the outside edge
kv sharma to hodge, 1 run, pitches it right up to the bat and driven through the covers for a single
kv sharma to hodge, six runs, and that's gone for a six! hodge reads that one, was a wrong 'un and slaps it over the bowler, goes all the way for maximum, much, much needed

mishra to hodge, six runs, and now another six! third one this and suddenly the game's back in their favour, was on off the stump and thumped over long-off for another maximum, this is excellent stuff from the aussie!

steyn to faulkner, 1 run, tailing into the batsman and he was looking to swing away, gets an inside edge to the mid-wicket fielder, white should have fielded that, he could have got the batsman out, run-out, fumbles it and they are able to get back for one

perera to hodge, 2 runs, ooh, wants to swing it across the line there, gets only an inside edge and wants to go for a single, perera rushes across quickly and has a shy at the non-striker's end, was a poor throw and that allows them to come back for the second
perera to hodge, no run, and a third swing, this is wider outside the off stump and misses, to the wicket-keeper

perera to hodge, 2 runs, finally he gets it off the middle of the bat, cracked through the off side, he was looking to mow it across the line all this while but this time he's caressed it through the covers, white does well to get close to it, but still gets them two
dhawan to rahane, 2 runs, swings back into the batsman and neatly flicked away to backward square-leg, there was a fielder much squarer and he needed to come around to field that

johnson to dravid, four runs, and another one, flicked away to the square-leg for a four and johnson continues to have a go at the batsman, dravid goes up to the bowler and asks him again, 'you want to say something?'
ojha to dravid, no run, and now he goes down the track to try and flick it away, gets an inside edge to the off side, rahane wanted the single but sent back, he's well out but gets back with a dive
johnson to rahane, no run, round the stumps now and slows the pace down to 126.1 km/hr, gets it off the bottom of the bat to the off side

johnson to rahane, four runs, four more for rahane now, this was pitched right up to the bat and outside the off stump, enough width to free his arms and gets it over the top, extra-cover and for a four!
ojha to watson, four runs, and now he's away, on the off stump and bit of turn away, gets back and cracks it through the backward point area for a four
harbhajan singh to dravid, 1 run, on the middle stump and flicked away to fine-leg for a single

malinga to samson, out, and hit up and it's caught! not the best of strokes to play there, was another slower one and he went through with the shot, was looking to hit it over the mid-wicket region but that lack of pace beats him, it lobs high and harbhajan is at it again, takes a good catch!
malinga to dravid, 1 run, and again, very slow, almost needed to wait for some time before it arrived, flicked away to fine-leg for a single
harbhajan singh to binny, no run, straighter one and beats the outside edge,was looking to play it down the same region
ojha to binny, no run, round the wicket and straighter, not too much turn and defended back to the bowler
ojha to binny, four runs, and again! he goes down the pitch and creams it over extra-cover, this time it bounces a few times before hitting the fence, ends a good over for rr
harbhajan singh to hodge, 1 run, keeps it right up to the bat and it's driven to wide long-off for a single
harbhajan singh to binny, 1 wide, a very quick ball that, 101.8 km/hr and down the leg-side, left alone for a wide
malinga to hodge, 1 run, slower ball and on the middle stump, pushes it into the covers for a singe
dhawan to binny, no run, slows it down considerably, 109.6 km/hr, looks to open the face of the bat but it never comes on and gets it to the backward point fielder
dhawan to binny, 1 run, another slower one but this time binny comes down the track, pushes it into the covers for a single
dhawan to yagnik, four runs, four off an outside edge, wide outside the off and he was looking to throw his bat at, gets the toe of the bat and easily beats malinga there

malinga to yagnik, 2 runs, and now it's quicker one, on the middle stump too, wants to flick it away gets an outside edge through to backward point, ojha rushes across to field that and restricts it to two, the fielder slips while getting up to that one and is down for the count
dhawan to yagnik, four runs, outside the off stump and squeezed through backward point for a four, beats the fielder and gets through to the fence
dhawan to hodge, 1 run, gives himself room and carts it to deep mid-wicket for a single
dhawan to hodge, 4 leg byes, swing and a miss! misses the bat, the stumps and much to the royals' delight, the keeper too, rushes away for four byes!

malinga to yagnik, four runs, look at that, just look at that, he was looking to play from behind the stumps, yep, you heard it right, he's flicked away from behind the striker's stumps over the square-leg for a four!

malinga to yagnik, 2 no balls, now that's a wide of epic proportions, it beats stephen harmison's wide by at least a mile, it's slipped off his hand and goes away some place, outside the camera frame too!

malinga to hodge, 5 wides, what is happening here? seriously, that's slipped from his hand yet again and it's gone down the leg-side for a wide that long that a batsman on the adjacent pitch would have hit it easily, hodge was walking down the track there, took three steps down too and malinga's put off by that
faulkner to smith, 1 wide, wide outside the off stump, looked like it was a slower one too and the batsman cannot get his bat to it, that's called a wide
malik to tare, no run, slower one, it was lobbed up to the bat, outside the off stump and wants to drive it away, gets it only to the covers
trivedi to smith, no run, keeps it up to the bat and on the off stump, pushes it to extra-cover
trivedi to smith, 2 runs, slower from the bowler this time, and tapped to the leg side for a couple of runs before the fielder can come in
trivedi to karthik, 1 leg bye, that leg-stump line yet again and flicked away to the leg side for a single
cooper to karthik, 1 run, takes all the pace off the ball, he waits for it and then gently taps it to the off side for a single
faulkner to smith, 1 wide, down the leg-side and he looks to glance it away, seemed to have got some pad and the ump still calls it a wide
faulkner to karthik, no run, slower on outside the off stump and tapped to the covers, straight to the fielder
watson to karthik, four runs, edged and four! it's been that kind of a night for rajasthan, he opens the face of the bat and eludes the keeper by some distance for a four
watson to karthik, 1 run, and back to bowling the off stump line, slows it down too, opens the face of the bat to third-man for a single
cooper to sharma, 1 run, slows it down considerably but misses his line, defended to the leg side for a single
trivedi to smith, no run, slower one and on the middle stump, almost checks his shot last moment and pushes it to mid-wicket
trivedi to smith, 1 run, not quite off the middle of the bat, bit of an inside half of the bat to one that's kept up to the bat, to the deep square-leg fielder
binny to pollard, six runs, shot for a six! this was in his half this time, and he was almost waiting, gets his swing going and it's gone over long-off
cooper to harbhajan singh, 1 run, wants to swing the bat away there, no room provided and can only get it to the deep square-leg
cooper to rayudu, no run, and he goes down the track this time, he was looking to hit it over the off side but misses the outside edge
cooper to rayudu, 1 wide, wide outside the off stump that, quite wide that and called
sharma to karthik, no run, almost walks out of the crease and defends it back to the bowler

sharma to karthik, four runs, edged for a four! the slip was wide almost at the second slip slot and that's a genuine edge that's gone between him and the keeper, who's up to the stumps, rushes away for a four!
morkel to sharma, 1 run, on the middle-stump and angling into the batsman, tucked away for a single to open his account

sharma to karthik, 1 run, edged and that's a leading one that's gone through the region around the fourth slip, was a cross-seam delivery that, no-one in the slips this time and it's gone to third-man
sharma to rayudu, four runs, edged for a four! it was a quicker one this, 135.6 km/hr, he throws his bat at it and takes the edge of the bat, through the non-existent slips and for a four

sharma to rayudu, 1 run, takes a step down the track and taps it to the off side, the bowler rushes quickly to his left and has a quick pick-up and shy at the non-striker's end, dk's outside his crease but misses the stumps and they go for an overthrow
morris to rayudu, 1 run, and now jumps down the track and caresses it through the covers for a single, went rather quickly to the fielder
morris to karthik, no run, and now karthik wants to jump down the track but unlike rayadu he looks to play across the line, beats the bat through to the keeper
morris to karthik, no run, pitches it right up to the bat and there's a drive back, the bowler gets his hand out in time for it
ashwin to rayudu, 1 run, on the off stump line and tapped into the covers for a single
ashwin to rayudu, no run, leggie, that's on the off stump and its turned away from the batsman, beats the outside edge of the bat
morris to karthik, 1 wide, outside the off stump, way outside in fact and it's called a wide
ashwin to rayudu, no run, quicker and on the middle stump line, gets his bat and pad out, defended back
ashwin to pollard, no run, the other one, carrom ball that spins away and defends to the covers
jadeja to pollard, four runs, edged through the slips for a four, it was a quicker one and looks to drive through the line, some turn and beats ashwin in the slips, through his hands!
ashwin to pollard, 1 run, slows the pace down a lot and is on the middle stump, turn away from the batsman, flicked away to the leg side for a single
ashwin to pollard, no run, defended to the off side and he wants a single, sent back by rayadu
ashwin to pollard, no run, drives it straight to the cover fielder now and remains rooted in the crease
bravo to pollard, 1 run, slows it down to 113.1 km/hr, waits for it and then taps it through the covers for a single
jadeja to pollard, no run, and not some deftness, it was flatter outside the off stump and he tries to play it through to third-man, goes straight to the fielder
jadeja to rayudu, 1 run, quicker, flatter and tapped away to the deep extra-cover for a single
bravo to pollard, no run, and that's hit him on the abdominal guard, it was a slower one, but gets a lot of bounce on that and pollard's stinging, has a smile on his face though
morris to pollard, no run, outside the off stump, quite wide out and he has a bit of a throw of his hands at it, gets an inside edge back to the bowler
bravo to harbhajan singh, 1 wide, slows it down drastically but that's gone down the leg-side this time and it's a wide

bravo to harbhajan singh, four runs, edged again and for a four too! it was an inside edge this time, he was looking to swing it away by stepping back, gets something on his bat and beats dhoni to his left this time

morris to dhawan, 2 runs, out, and now run-out, pollard wanted to get back on strike but dhawan gets run-out in the process, was hit to the leg side and they take a single, the throw is a poor one and beats dhoni, but the fielder backing up is alert enough to throw it down at the non-striker's end
bravo to johnson, out, edged and taken! he was looking to flick it away it but the ball does not angle back into the batsman, straightens slightly and the edge is taken well by dhoni
bravo to ojha, 1 run, edged to the wide slip and almost carries but this time pollard's rushed across for a very quick single to finally get strike

johnson to badrinath, out, edged and gone, three down as badri's gone now! whoa, what a start for mumbai, that was a poor shot from the batsman, wide outside the off stump and he was looking to play wide away from his body, gets only a nick through to the keeper
johnson to bravo, 1 wide, down the leg side for a wide, was trying to bounce him there but it's drifting down
johnson to vijay, four runs, slows the pace and down and that's been caressed through extra-cover for a four!
ojha to bravo, four runs, goes over mid-on and smacks it for a four! it was a decent delivery but the mid-on was up, inside the circle and he jumped on that and smashes it away
ojha to bravo, 1 run, goes back and whips it across to deep square-leg for a single
ojha to vijay, no run, slows the pace down and he gets his bat and pad out to defend to the off side
dhawan to bravo, 1 run, slows the pace down and he tucks it away to deep square-leg for a single

dhawan to bravo, out, gone, caught, chipped straight to mid-on! that was another slower one and bravo looked like he had read that one, was looking to flick it away but the ball never came on to the bat, the shot goes straighter than he would have liked, pops up for a simple catch to mid-on
harbhajan singh to jadeja, no run, nice pace that, not too quick from round the stumps, was outside the off stump and tapped to the off side
harbhajan singh to vijay, 2 runs, outside the off stump and opens the face of the bat and guides it through the off side
harbhajan singh to morkel, no run, round the stumps and defended back to the bowler
ojha to dhoni, no run, round the stumps and on the off stump, no turn for him and only pushed to the off side
harbhajan singh to ashwin, no run, flatter and pushes it quicker too, defended to the off side
harbhajan singh to ashwin, 1 run, and now he slows the pace down, goes back and taps it point for a single
ojha to dhoni, no run, edged to the off side, was looking to tuck it away but the leading edge runs away to the covers, does not take the single
ojha to ashwin, no run, quicker on the middle stump and defended back to the bowler
pollard to dhoni, 1 run, steps down the track and smashed it back to the bowler, goes on the bounce through his hands to long-off for a single
pollard to ashwin, 1 run, and again jumps outside the off stump to play it, it's slowed down by the bowler and he can only push it to the leg side for a single
pollard to sharma, no run, outside the off stump and wide enough for the number 11 to let it go through to the keeper
malinga to dhoni, no run, and now it's drilled through the covers, but straight to the fielder and expectedly the single is refused
malinga to dhoni, 1 wide, and that's a pretty wide ball outside the off stump, noway he was going to get close to touching that one!
pollard to dhoni, 1 wide, swings at it but misses, it's angling down the leg side and it's a wide called
pollard to dhoni, six runs, slapped across the line for a six to get to his half-century, too little too late
pollard to dhoni, no run, and a slower one this, was looking to play it across but the ball does not quite come on and it's rolled over to deep mid-wicket got a single
pollard to dhoni, 1 wide, and that's been bowled quite wide outside the off
shakib al hasan to mccullum, no run, better line, on middle, defended down to the bowler.
narine to mccullum, no run, turns in this time, mccullum tries to force it behind square, hits it straight to point.
shakib al hasan to smith, no run, nudged to square leg
shakib al hasan to smith, six runs, similar ball to that dead ball, but smith stays balanced and hits it cleanly over the long off boundary.
narine to mccullum, 2 runs, big, sharp turn, and the ball jams off the inside edge behind square on the leg side. fielder hits the stumps direct at the bowler's end, but raina is well in.
narine to raina, no run, swept straight to square leg.
shakib al hasan to mccullum, 1 run, goes with the arm this time, played away uncertainly towards square leg, off the inside half of the bat.
shakib al hasan to mccullum, no run, down the track, not anywhere near the pitch, jams down on the ball straight to the bowler.
shakib al hasan to mccullum, 1 run, back and across, tennis-style swat down to long off.
chawla to raina, no run, bit of turn here, legbreak, raina gives himself room but has to adjust quickly to pat it to safety.
vinay kumar to raina, no run, angled across raina, who opens his bat face and tries to steer it behind point. hits it to the fielder.
chawla to raina, six runs, down the pitch, it's just a chip with a straight bat but it flies way over the straight boundary.
shakib al hasan to raina, no run, quick, flat, fired across the left-hander, who tries to heave and misses.
kallis to mccullum, no run, driven firmly to mid-off.
narine to dhoni, 1 run, sharp turn, but dhoni is back to push it gently into the covers.
narine to jadeja, 1 run, driven straight to cover and runs, suryakumar yadav throws to the bowler, who fumbles. direct hit would have had jadeja struggling.
narine to jadeja, 1 leg bye, free hit. jadeja swings at a leg-stump ball and misses, ball goes off his pad behind square leg.
hilfenhaus to uthappa, 1 run, angled into leg stump, prodded down to mid-on.
hilfenhaus to gambhir, no run, angled across, gambhir jumps and squirts it down defensively.

hilfenhaus to uthappa, out, run out! uthappa takes two steps down and inside-edges as he tries to swat across the line. gambhir sets off for a run even though the ball is in dhoni's hands. hilfenhaus collects the keeper's throw halfway down the pitch, runs back and underarms it to the stumps.
hilfenhaus to uthappa, 2 runs,
hilfenhaus to uthappa, no run,
hilfenhaus to uthappa, 1 run, pushed down to deep midwicket.
sharma to uthappa, no run, flicked to square leg from middle stump.
sharma to uthappa, four runs, comes down the track, gives himself room to slash it behind point.
sharma to kallis, no run, kallis makes room, steers it straight to point.
sharma to kallis, four runs, shot! down the track, takes a step away from the line, crunches it between cover and mid off.
ashwin to kallis, no run, pushed back towards the bowler.
jadeja to pandey, out, and he gets a wicket first ball! stops on pandey outside off stump, and he checks his shot halfway into a drive, pops it straight into cover's hands.
jadeja to yadav, no run, quick and straight, defended towards mid off.
raina to uthappa, 1 run, tries a big heave across the line, squirts it behind square for one.
pandey to yadav, 2 runs,
pandey to yadav, no run,
ashwin to uthappa, no run, down the track, ashwin bowls a carrom ball outside leg. uthappa defends down the pitch.
ashwin to uthappa, 1 run, swept to deep square leg.
ashwin to yadav, 1 run, carrom ball again, on off stump, yadav makes room, clubs it down to long-off.
ashwin to pathan, no run, offbreak, bit of turn from outside off, flicked to midwicket.
ashwin to pathan, no run, goes back and across, ashwin fires a quick offbreak on off stump, defended.
jadeja to uthappa, no run, tries to come down the track, jadeja bowls it quicker, forces him to defend.
ashwin to pathan, no run, slow ball dangled outside off, heaves and misses.
jadeja to russell, no run, quicker ball, and russell can only pat it back to the bowler. end of a top spell from jadeja, on a pitch designed for his style of bowling.
sharma to pathan, 1 run, slower ball, clubbed away to deep midwicket.
sharma to russell, no run, another slower ball, outside off, heave and miss from russell and the ball goes rolling down to dhoni.
sharma to pathan, no run, another one out of the back of his hand. it even turns a bit, away from pathan, as he looks to heave it away to the leg side and misses.
hilfenhaus to pathan, six runs, big clean swing of those arms and the ball goes sailing over the midwicket boundary.
sharma to chawla, 1 run, tries to chop it to point, gets an inside-edge that squirts into the leg side.
sharma to narine, 1 run, he can. it's a slower ball, angled into the left-hander from around the wicket, and he waits on it before dabbing it behind point.
khan to pujara, 1 run, opens the face a bit later this time to guide the ball behind point towards third man
bumrah to pujara, 2 wides, bumrah goes wide of the crease and sprays the ball down leg, the keeper dives well to collect but can't prevent a bye
bumrah to pujara, 1 wide, that's a wide outside off stump this time
bumrah to pujara, no run, left alone outside off stump
khan to pujara, 1 run, steered to third man for a single
anderson to pujara, no run, lots of width outside off stump but pujara's square drive does not beat point

anderson to pujara, out, pujara's cameo is over! anderson gave him lots of width again and the ball seamed across him from over the wicket, pujara chased after it and tried to drive through cover but got an edge through to the keeper
anderson to maxwell, 1 wide, that's much too wide outside off stump
bumrah to saha, no run, saha drops the ball close on the on side, maxwell wants one, saha says no
bumrah to saha, no run, goes wide of the crease and fires the ball in at middle stump, saha stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
bumrah to saha, 1 run, defended on the off side
malinga to saha, no run, a slower ball around off stump, played with an open face towards backward point
bumrah to maxwell, 1 run, maxwell moves across his stumps and flicks extravagantly to deep square leg
bumrah to saha, no run, defended on the off side, bumrah ends the over well after beginning with a no-ball and a boundary
harbhajan singh to maxwell, 1 run, chipped over the fielder at cover for a single
pollard to saha, 1 run, a slower ball, saha moves across and dabs the ball towards midwicket for a single
pollard to maxwell, 1 wide, that's wide outside off stump, and the umpire calls it ... mawell played no shot
pollard to maxwell, 2 runs, maxwell doesn't have much pace on the ball to work with - slower one from pollard - but he manages to slap it towards wide long off and they take two to malinga
pollard to maxwell, 1 leg bye, maxwell misses the reverse swat and gets hit on the leg, pollard roars an appeal but the impact was outside off stump
pollard to maxwell, 2 runs, maxwell heaves at the ball but mis-times it through midwicket, maxwell races back for the second to keep strike
harbhajan singh to maxwell, six runs, mazwell charges the offspinner and slams the ball over long off, he's got it all to do for kings xi, getting no support from saha
harbhajan singh to saha, 1 run, saha steps out and flicks the ball to deep square leg

anderson to bailey, four runs, a first-ball four for bailey, anderson offered him so much width outside off, bailey reached for it and opened the face to let the ball run off the face to the backward point boundary
anderson to saha, 1 run, saha waits for the slower ball and dabs it towards third man
pollard to saha, four runs, that's a poor ball, outside leg stump with fine leg in the circle, saha swings across the line and helps it along to the fine leg boundary
pollard to saha, 1 run, saha swats the ball through square leg for a single
pollard to bailey, no run, a slower ball on off stump, bailey defends towards the bowler
khan to bailey, no run, bailey makes room to hit on the off side but mistimes it towards midwicket
harbhajan singh to bailey, 1 run, bailey dabs the ball close on the off side and responds to saha's call ... the keeper does the fielding
bumrah to miller, no run, a slower ball and miller defends with a straight bat
pollard to miller, 1 run, a slower ball outside off, miller reaches for it far outside off and drives it to deep cover
malinga to saha, 1 run, saha swings across the line and gets an inside edge towards deep backward square leg
balaji to gautam, 1 run, mis-timed on the leg side for a single
sandeep sharma to gautam, 1 wide, that's wide down leg side
johnson to sharma, no run, rohit tries to drive on the off side but gets an inside edge towards midwicket
johnson to gautam, 1 run, gautham moves back and across and dabs the ball as it slants across him towards third man
johnson to sharma, 1 wide, johnson goes round the wicket to angle the ball into the right-hander and then strays down leg side. saha thinks the ball brushed something. johnson does too.
johnson to sharma, no run, driven back to the bowler, johnson picks up and hurls the ball at the striker's end, hitting the stumps
patel to gautam, 1 run, pushed into the off side for a single
patel to sharma, 1 run, nudged between point and cover for a single
dhawan to gautam, no run, tried to bash the ball through the off side but mis-timed it to cover, nearly carried to the fielder
dhawan to gautam, no run, nudged towards midwicket, they begin to run and then stop, maxwell picks up and throws at the striker's end, he misses, the batsmen decide against the overthrow
patel to sharma, no run, nudged on the leg side, patel moves to his right to field
patel to gautam, 2 runs, there's a direct hit at the non-striker's end from deep midwicket but rohit has run hard and is safe. maxwell was the fielder
patel to sharma, 1 run, that was slower and outside off, driven through point for a single
patel to sharma, 1 run, rohit makes room by moving outside leg and drives the wicket-to-wicket ball through extra cover
dhawan to anderson, no run, anderson jumps outside leg to hit through the off but can't beat mid-off
dhawan to anderson, 1 run, a slower ball outside off, hit to long off for a single
patel to anderson, four runs, anderson sees the width on offer outside off, the trajectory is flat as well, he biffs it flat over the bowler's head for a one-bounce four
patel to anderson, four runs, awful bowling this, flat with width outside off, anderson smashes it flat over the bowler's head for four more

johnson to anderson, no run, johnson goes very wide of the crease from round the wicket and bowls a slower ball that goes between anderson's legs as he tries to hit on the leg side, anderson then went out of his crease and didn't seem to know where the ball was. the keeper's throw missed the stumps by a long way
johnson to anderson, 1 run, played to deep midwicket for a single, johnson has completed an exceptional over

balaji to sharma, out, saha takes an easy catch! rohit backed away to leg and closed the face to play the ball through square leg. he played too early and the ball lobbed tamely off the leading edge behind the wicket to saha

johnson to pollard, 2 runs, a slower ball, but pollard checks his shot and manages to dab it towards square leg, pollard comes back for the second before the fielder in the deep can rush in to field the ball
kulkarni to vijay, 1 run, picks this off off stump and flicks it to deep square leg. why bother with the covers when you have wrists like that
kulkarni to de kock, no run, this was the slower delivery pushed wide outside off. de kock slashes and misses
watson to vijay, 1 run, slightly slower this time so vijay has to wait on it but still flicks it handsomely to deep midwicket
tambe to pietersen, 1 run, skids on with the arm and kp has to hurry into a flick towards midwicket

tambe to de kock, out, another one, tambe, you legend! looped it on off stump and de kock could not resist. went for a drive against the turn and the ball pitched just before his flaying blade, took the inside half of it and sat safely in the hands of the bowler himself. tambe was pushed to the floor while taking the catch, but he had it under control
tambe to duminy, 1 run, nudged straight of midwicket to pick up a couple. good use of the feet again. oh, but look dk has not put his bat in while he was turning for the second
faulkner to jadhav, 1 run, slower ball off the back of the hand, he chops it to the right of the keeper for a single

kulkarni to duminy, four runs, pushes it wide and jp reaches out and times this brilliantly! but the clinching factor was a little clumsiness from richardson in the deep. overruns the ball and lets it through his legs at deep cover
richardson to duminy, no run, skips down the track while making room for himself, but his slice finds cover
faulkner to jadhav, no run, dot ball straight up. it's the slower one off the back of the hand, jadhav was set up for the heave over cow corner, but he misses completely
faulkner to jadhav, 1 run, down the track again and he flicks it off middle to deep midwicket
mohammed shami to nair, no run, digs it into the middle of the pitch at 142kph, it was outside off so the batsman sways inside the line
parnell to nair, 1 run, guided to deep third man as parnell goes fishing outside off stump. that was at 146kph!
unadkat to samson, four runs, picked off his legs, that should keep unadkat to a better line. especially when he's beating the batsmen outside off. fast hands and brilliant timing from samson
mohammed shami to nair, no run, 144kph, dug in, just outside off. he's rooted to the crease and pushes at it with his hands. somehow manages to keep it down
mohammed shami to nair, 1 run, slower ball outside off, chopped behind point for a quick single
mohammed shami to samson, 1 run, a little slower again around the off stump, dabbed into the third man region
sharma to samson, 1 run, walks across to off stump and defends into the covers. nadeem is the man there and in his haste to throw ball, he hits it into the turf right by his feet
nadeem to nair, no run, teases him on middle and he lets it go
nadeem to nair, 1 run,
nadeem to samson, four runs,
nadeem to samson, no run,
unadkat to bhatia, 1 run, another guide down to third man off a slower ball
starc to dhawan, no run,
hv patel to dhawan, 1 run, it is down the leg side but dhawan does not get enough bat on it and cannot tuck wide enough of fine leg
hv patel to warner, 1 run, turned past gayle at midwicket and wide of mid on for a single
hv patel to warner, no run, a slower one going across the left-hander, warner has a go at it, but only thin-edges it into the ground and to the keeper
chahal to dhawan, 1 run,
hv patel to dhawan, 1 run, pitching outside leg and angling across towards middle, he pushes it towards cover for one
hv patel to warner, 1 run, struck well but backward point dives to get a hand to it, and it rolls towards deep point
chahal to warner, 1 run, there is some room this time and warner chops it to deep cover for a single
chahal to dhawan, no run, oh, warner charges down the pitch after dhawan dabs this floater to point.. he is almost halfway down the pitch, but makes it back in time

aaron to dhawan, four runs, that's typical dhawan this time! there is hardly any room in that one as it comes in with the angle, but he somehow creates room and cracks it past backward point.. that raced to the boundary
chahal to warner, 1 run, this was much slower from chahal, allowed warner all the time in the world to go back and punch it to deep midwicket
hv patel to dhawan, 1 run, this time he decides to wait for the ball rather than throw bat on it, he opens the face of the bat late and runs it down to third man
hv patel to warner, four runs, slower ball, warner spots it early and plays a double-handed forehand winner down the line! no chance for anyone there
hv patel to warner, no run, is that an edge! parthiv was interested, and i heard something as the ball passed the bat.. but harshal turns around and takes his hat. strange
chahal to sammy, 1 wide, slips it flat down the leg side even as sammy fails to connect
starc to ojha, 2 runs, guided  wide of third man, where aaron dives to his right to stop the ball
starc to ojha, four runs, makes ojha hop with another lifter from round the stumps, but the batsman does well to guide it calmly past the keeper and fine to the third man boundary
aaron to ojha, 1 run, makes some room and guides this bouncing delivery to third man
aaron to ojha, 1 wide, goes way outside off stump now
steyn to pa patel, no run, slants it across parthiv at 138 kph, is left alone, it keeps climbing as it approaches the keeper
steyn to pa patel, 1 run, stays in the crease and pushes away from the body again, thick edge goes to third man
kumar to kohli, no run, angled in and straightens outside off, kohli comes across and lets it go
kumar to kohli, no run, driven straight to cover
kumar to rossouw, 1 run, away to third man for a single
kumar to rossouw, no run, bhuvneshwar gets away this time, rossouw tries to force this one outside leg very fine, but misses
kumar to rossouw, no run, moves to off stump and tries to square drive again, underedges it
kumar to rossouw, no run, pushed to mid off
i sharma to rossouw, 1 run, now the running will be much quicker with ab in, rossouw punches wide of cover and sets off, warner fires it in, does not hit, rossouw would have made it anyway
i sharma to de villiers, 1 run, a slower one, ab is early into the drive, he tries to adjust, but hits it in the air just wide of backward points dive
i sharma to rossouw, 2 runs, into the pad, tucked through square leg for a very easy two runs
pathan to de villiers, no run, was moving across trying to go over midwicket probably but this swung in to him and he did not have the room to have a go at it
kv sharma to yuvraj singh, no run, legbreak turned with the spin to square leg
kv sharma to yuvraj singh, no run, backs away, this one hurries towards the stumps, yuvraj dabs it to cover, ab wants the single, he is half way up before being sent back

kv sharma to yuvraj singh, out, yuvraj is gone now, he's swept it to deep backward square leg, henriques the substitute is there in the deep, he steadies himself at the edge of the rope and takes it over his head

sammy to de villiers, six runs, sammy tries a slower one at 107 kph, it sits up outside off, and ab pummels it over deep midwicket, not a clean hit but rcb don't care as long as it goes over, it is also fifty for ab off 23 balls
steyn to de villiers, no run, sees ab walk across outside off stump and hurls it wide, clearly past the marker, but dharmasena says ab had moved too far
steyn to de villiers, six runs, he's taken steyn apart once more, walks across way outside off, gets down and scoops him into the third tier over the fine leg boundary, what a man... dale steyn claps
pathan to de villiers, 1 run, ab moves wide outside off stump to try the scoop again, cannot get hold of it, the ball rolls square on the off side
vinay kumar to rahane, no run, corrects the line, gets this one to shape away a touch outside off, the batsman defends it to off
vinay kumar to rahane, 1 run, this one is too straight again, there is some shape on it but rahane dabs it to midwicket for a single
vinay kumar to nair, no run, appeals for an lbw but this is an ambitious shout as the ball pitched on leg stump and didn't straighten enough
vinay kumar to rahane, 2 runs, more runs at fine leg! this is on the middle stump line, rahane just has to close the face and bang.. couple of easy runs
ut yadav to rahane, six runs, this one has sailed all the way! more runs at fine-leg! he charges down the pitch, got a good slower delivery, but the batsman just carries on with his flick shot
shakib al hasan to nair, 1 wide, fires it down the leg side..
narine to nair, 1 run, cross-batted shot comes out since he has no clue where this is spinning, picks up a single to deep square leg
shakib al hasan to nair, 1 run, goes deep in the crease and punches the flatter delivery to deep midwicket
russell to samson, no run, that's a good response from russell.. a slower delivery just outside off, it bounces a touch extra too and beats the outside edge
shakib al hasan to nair, 1 run, looks to push this to the off side, but gets an inside edge to midwicket to pick up a single
shakib al hasan to samson, 1 run, comes down the pitch and almost yorks himself, still manages to push it to long off for a single
shakib al hasan to samson, no run, he has won that call! that was by the wide marker outside off.. no signal from the umpire
ut yadav to nair, 1 run, moves to the leg side and gets a slower ball, he punches it to deep midwicket for a single
ten doeschate to nair, 1 run, good work by gambhir at backward point! he dives to his left and saves a certain boundary as the batsman had got enough bat on that
shakib al hasan to watson, 1 wide, another one fired flat.. but this way down the leg side
shakib al hasan to watson, no run, quicker on on the middle and leg line, again, watson finds the man at midwicket
shakib al hasan to watson, no run, goes back to punch this, but it keeps coming in with the angle, the batsman pushes it to cover
narine to samson, 1 run, looks to flick it towards midwicket, but ends up chipping it past the non-striker for a single
narine to samson, 2 runs, this one is off the middle! he moves to leg side and punches this flatter delivery over point for a good couple of runs
narine to samson, 2 runs, shuffles across to the off side this time before charging down the pitch, gets a toe end to deep square leg
vinay kumar to samson, 1 run, gets a slower delivery and he throws his bat at that, but finds the man at deep midwicket
vinay kumar to watson, 1 run, pushes this to long off for a single
narine to watson, no run, flatter and quicker on the stumps, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
narine to binny, six runs, he come down the pitch and swings across the line.. gets it on the middle.. it wouldn't have mattered which way it was spinning.. that sails over deep midwicket
vinay kumar to faulkner, 1 run, no hat-trick for the bowler as faulkner pushes this to deep midwicket for a single
vinay kumar to bhatia, six runs, slower ball, bhatia gets under it and launches it over deep midwicket boundary
watson to uthappa, no run, bowls a gentle outswinger, the batsman lets it go through
watson to uthappa, no run, another outswinger.. this is wide outside off and keeps going away to beat the outside edge
southee to uthappa, four runs, superbly hit through wide mid-on! it was angled in on to the stumps and uthappa went on with his drive, threading the gap between midwicket and mid-on
watson to uthappa, four runs, thick outside edge, but there is only one slip in place and this flew through second slip.. it was another outswinger and he drew the batsman into it
tambe to uthappa, four runs, comes down the pitch and just chips it over mid-on for another boundary! that was smart as he didn't try to hit it out of the ground, just a neat punch
faulkner to gambhir, no run, slower delivery, it bounces a touch extra and gambhir defends it to point
southee to uthappa, no run, charges down the pitch but finds the man at midwicket as this hits the inside half of the bat
bhatia to uthappa, six runs, slower delivery! this was spotted very very early by uthappa, who clobbers it over deep midwicket.. this has gone a long long way
tewatia to gambhir, 1 run, flatter and wider outside off, gambhir waits and then punches it to deep cover
tambe to uthappa, 1 run, bowls it slow on off stump, robin picks up a single to midwicket with a soft dab
tambe to uthappa, 1 run, now robin steps out of the crease and flicks it to deep square leg
tambe to gambhir, 2 runs, he is very lucky again! gambhir throws his bat at this wide delivery and gets a toe-end to it, it just loops over the point fielder
tewatia to gambhir, four runs, gambhir wants to impose himself! he steps out again and gets this one off the middle.. there is not much timing, but he manages to hit in the gap at deep midwicket
tambe to uthappa, 1 run,
bhatia to gambhir, 1 leg bye, fails to get bat on a leg-sidish delivery, but picks up a leg bye

bhatia to uthappa, six runs, this is superbly timed! robin waits in the crease for this really slow ball and even though he only gets a toe end to it, manages to clear the rope straight behind the bowler

watson to uthappa, out, second one in three balls now! slower delivery, uthappa flicks it straight to deep square leg.. that didn't even threaten the boundary.. tame dismissal. never too far from some late drama

watson to russell, out, he has knocked the middle stump down! perfect slower delivery! the batsman moved to the leg side and played down the wrong line.. watson gives him a cold stare of death..no words.. the eyes said it all
tambe to pandey, 1 wide, out, he is gone! common sense is up in smoke! manish walks out of the crease far too early and tambe fires this down the leg side.. he had no chance
tambe to sa yadav, no run, pushed through outside off, surya chops it on to point
faulkner to shakib al hasan, 2 runs, he comes out of the crease and chips the slower delivery in the gap at midwicket.. calls for a couple and makes it back in time
faulkner to shakib al hasan, 1 run, fires this on the body, the batsman manages to nudge it down to fine-leg
faulkner to sa yadav, no run, looks to smash it over deep square leg, but this slips under the bat
southee to sa yadav, 1 wide, bowls a slower delivery, but this too far down the leg side
watson to sa yadav, 1 no ball, another no-ball.. ! he oversteps from round the wicket.. this would have been a wide down the leg side too
watson to sa yadav, 1 run, he charges down the pitch and drives it to cover, but can't beat the fielder.. just a single
watson to sa yadav, 1 run, they have done it again! royals, take a bow. surya gets some bat on this, but can only hit it to deep square leg
hilfenhaus to de kock, no run, swings it in to the left-hander again and he knocks it to midwicket
pandey to vijay, no run, pandey probes just outside the off stump, vijay is uncertain with his movement and pokes his bat out again
pandey to vijay, no run, finally vijay gets some bat on ball, behind the line and pushed to mid-off
hilfenhaus to de kock, no run, the maiden over has forced de kock to go for the big hit, he misses it completely because the ball has moved away
hilfenhaus to de kock, no run, de kock makes some room this time but he can only punch it to the off side
hilfenhaus to de kock, 1 wide, hilfy fails to control the movement and he strays down the leg side
hilfenhaus to de kock, no run, slower ball and a touch wide outside off, de kock swings and misses
hilfenhaus to de kock, four runs, finally de kock connects well, he fetches this from outside off and swings and smashes it along the ground wide of midwicket

ashwin to vijay, 1 run,
ashwin to karthik, no run,
jadeja to karthik, no run,

sharma to karthik, 1 run, defends and the ball rolls towards the keeper and vijay responds well to the single
ashwin to vijay, 2 wides, slides this wide down the leg side
hilfenhaus to karthik, no run, he tries the same shot and moves right across the stumps but this was sprayed wide outside off, didn't make contact
ashwin to vijay, 2 runs, skids through and he knocks it to the on side
ashwin to vijay, six runs, the switch hit! vijay shows he can play it too, changed his grip quickly and sent that rows over deep cover

ashwin to jadhav, 1 wide, slides it wide down the leg side

jadeja to duminy, no run, flatter one and he pushes it down to point
sharma to jadhav, no run, dhoni goes back for mohit this time, jadhav uses his feet and comes down the pitch but ends up chopping it down the track

hilfenhaus to jadhav, no run,

mohammed shami to mccullum, no run, nearly lost his stumps there, he went down the track this time, swung and missed it and it just cleared the stumps

shukla to mccullum, no run, dropped by jadhav at backward point! would have been brilliant had he held on, this was slapped hard by mccullum, jadhav threw himself to his right, held out his right hand but it popped out
shukla to mccullum, no run, he makes room and punches it down to mid-off

shukla to raina, 1 wide, saw him advance and fired that wide outside off, the umpire reckoned that had to be penalised
mohammed shami to raina, 1 wide,

hv patel to gautam, no run, this was perilously close to the stumps, looked like the slower ball, gautam was down the track, swung and missed

hv patel to rayudu, no run, strange shot by rayudu as he pokes his bat out and guides it to slip, didn't know whether to play or leave

dinda to gautam, 1 wide, this time he strays down the leg side and wide called

hv patel to sharma, 2 runs,
chahal to pollard, 1 run, makes room and pushes it to the off side for a single

starc to pollard, 2 runs,
aaron to sharma, six runs, the bats these days! rohit swings at one outside off and the ball flies off the outside edge and just clears the rope at third man
aaron to sharma, no run, aaron is spared this time, rohit backs away and swings and misses
starc to sharma, 1 wide, this was a slower ball outside off and it was a touch too wide, kohli thought that was unfair

bumrah to kohli, no run, punches it down the track and bumrah stretches his left hand and the ball hits the stumps, gayle grounds his bat and harbhajan is the only one interested in appealing and the bowler himself can't be bothered! i don't think it brushed the finger in the first place

pollard to kohli, no run, he opens the face of the bat and drops it to third man

pollard to aaron, no run, drifts on the leg side and he gets an inside edge and the ball rolls to the off side
pollard to aaron, no run, slower ball and he swings and misses and that sneaks past the stumps
sa yadav to de kock, 1 run, makes room and punches this to wide mid-off for another easy single
sa yadav to vijay, no run, oye! that almost sneaked under the bat.. the batsman was making room to carve it through cover, but it didn't bounce much and an underedge saves murali
sa yadav to vijay, 2 runs, moves to the leg side again and pushes the flatter delivery through cover for an easy couple
sa yadav to vijay, 1 run, stays in his stance and whips the floated delivery to deep midwicket with ease
kallis to de kock, no run, this one shoots off the pitch and surprises the batsman with the bounce.. flies past the shoulder of the bat
shakib al hasan to pietersen, 1 run, stays in the crease and dabs the flatter delivery to midwicket for a single
narine to vijay, 1 run, he shuffles across the crease and pushes it softly towards mid-on for a single
shakib al hasan to vijay, 1 run, he moves well down the leg side to make room and punches this to cover
ut yadav to karthik, 1 wide, attempts a slower delivery, but this is way down the leg side
ut yadav to karthik, 2 runs, rises with the ball and punches it to deep extra cover for a couple
vinay kumar to karthik, 1 run, slower delivery, the batsman dabs it to point and calls for a quick single
vinay kumar to vijay, 1 run, he pushes the slower delivery softly towards midwicket for an easy single
vinay kumar to karthik, four runs, he goes down on his knee even as the ball is released, picks it from wide outside off and drags it to deep backward square leg boundary

kallis to vijay, four runs, he shuffles across a touch to the offside and picks up the slower ball from the middle stump to flick it behind square .. tendo slides in to stop that, but his boot was kissing the skirting..
shakib al hasan to duminy, no run, he uses his feet and drives it back to the bowler

kallis to karthik, six runs, this is the same shot that ab played off steyn the other night! doesn't go that long, but goes long enough to clear the fine-leg boundary. he is down on his knee, across to the offside and helps it on its way over his shoulder
kallis to karthik, no run, the bowler responds with a quick delivery outside off that beats the outside edge!
kallis to duminy, 1 run, slower delivery on off, the batsman waits an extra second and dabs it to point for a single
kallis to karthik, four runs, slower delivery, he spots it early and whacks it from wide outside off to the deep midwicket boundary.. he is playing some 100 million rupee shots here
shakib al hasan to duminy, no run, he comes down the pitch and punches the flatter delivery to midwicket
shakib al hasan to duminy, no run, he comes down the pitch again, the batsman though only pushes it back to shakib
shakib al hasan to duminy, no run, stays back and pushes the flatter delivery straight to midwicket
ut yadav to duminy, no run, another good ball, it's slightly slower and on the stumps, the batsman pushes it straight to midwicket
vinay kumar to shukla, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, shukla stays in the crease and whips it to deep midwicket
vinay kumar to duminy, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, jp waits before running it down to third man for a single
ut yadav to shukla, no run, he almost chops this on.. it was just about heading for the leg stump before shukla booted it away
narine to shukla, no run, that's a drop by  shakib! the batsman defends it to cover.. and shakib ran in, got there, but is not able to hold on
narine to duminy, 1 run, he waits in the crease and defends the incoming delivery to point

narine to shukla, out, this is too good! it was quicker and honing in on the middle stump. shukla moved to the leg side expecting it to turn into him, but this just goes straight on and flattens the middle stump

vinay kumar to jadhav, six runs, where has this gone! over the ugly stands behind the bowler.. it was a slower ball.. kj generated some momentum coming down the pitch and whacks it long .. all the way to the top
narine to jadhav, four runs, this round goes to the batsman! he waits and waits, before opening the face of the bat very late to steer it very fine on the off side
narine to jadhav, 1 run, tucks this one to square leg for an easy single
kallis to duminy, no run, looks to play the ramp shot by moving way across to the off side.. but misses
narine to duminy, 1 run, this one is a big offspinner and keeps spinning away from duminy, but he still drags it to cow corner
narine to jadhav, 1 run, this is fired in on off stump.. 119 kph.. the batsman digs it out to point for a single
mohammed shami to gambhir, no run, good line to gambhir! it swings a touch towards the off stump, gambhir pushes it to cover
parnell to uthappa, no run, comes down the pitch but yorks himself, digs out the ball to cover
shukla to uthappa, 1 wide, bowls this one smartly! he sees the batsman come out of the crease and fires it wide outside off.. unfortunately the umpire calls it in the batsman's favour
shukla to uthappa, no run, collision between the bowler and the batsman! uthappa was looking to do a kp but common sense prevails.. he turns back but a charging shukla barges into him
duminy to uthappa, 1 run, he comes down the pitch and punches the flatter delivery to deep midwicket for a single
nadeem to gambhir, four runs, now gambhir repeats the shot robin played off the last ball, but he doesn't look to hit this to the purana qila, times it over midwicket for a one-bounce four
nadeem to gambhir, 2 runs, flatter and outside off, gambhir chops it to the right of deep point for a couple
kaul to gambhir, 1 run, he calmly guides this one down to third man for a single
kaul to uthappa, 1 run,

nadeem to gambhir, 1 run, he is very very very lucky here! gambhir charged out of the pitch and looked to hit it over midwicket, but gets a thick edge that stays up for a long time only to descend at the vacant mid-off area
nadeem to gambhir, 1 run, another one chipped, but this time over the midwicket fielder, for a single that brings him his second half-century
nadeem to pandey, 1 run, slower still, pandey waits and pushes it to cover for asingle
mohammed shami to gambhir, no run, almost! this skids past the outside edge as gambhir looks to guide it to third man
mohammed shami to pandey, 1 run, run-out chance! gambhir had given up as nadeem got to the ball quickly at midwicket and aimed at the non-striker.. but he misses, gives away an extra run too
kaul to gambhir, four runs, vijay is losing it in the field! it's a simple pick up at deep cover after gambhir has played a solid punch, but he allows it to run through his legs
duminy to gambhir, 1 run, bowls this one wide outside off, easily pushed to deep cover for a single
duminy to gambhir, no run, slower this time, gambhir looks to push it to cover, but gets an inside edge back down the pitch
duminy to gambhir, six runs, he takes a step down and hammers it over the bowler's head.. clean hit, all the way to the sight screen
parnell to kallis, four runs, outside edge! there was a slip in place, but this would have gone to a second slip. kallis went for the big drive but is lucky to get four for it
nadeem to kallis, 1 run, slower delivery on the stumps, easily tucked to midwicket for an easy single
hilfenhaus to sehwag, 1 run, pushed into the covers and he will retain strike
pandey to sehwag, four runs, laced through midwicket, this time he's hit it hard enough to beat the fielder. a little too straight and that bottom hand is as strong as ever

pandey to sehwag, no run, hint of swing away from the bat, but this was a little too far for him to reach and strike properly. gets a bottom edge which wanders back to the bowler. twelve runs off the over

sharma to mandeep singh, out, walks down, makes room and carves this straight down third man's throat. that was not his job, all he needed to do was put sehwag on strike but he couldn't help himself. tried to manufacture a stroke but gets more of a thick outside edge

sharma to sehwag, four runs, this seemed to bounce a little more off the pitch. mohit has a knack for that and though sehwag was surprised, he drew his bottom hand off the bat and placed the steer past the waiting man at gully.
jadeja to maxwell, no run, that might have stayed a touch low. jaddu gave this a little more air and the ball straightened a touch to beat his outside edge
ashwin to miller, no run, no spin on offer for him as this goes on with the arm, miller pushes to the left of the bower but ashwin gets to it
ashwin to maxwell, 1 wide, he doesn't want to get in maxi's range and ends up bowling it wide down leg
ashwin to maxwell, 1 wide, and now he's shot one way down the off side. ashwin is completely rattled
jadeja to miller, 1 run, fires it thorugh against miller and he can't control the punch back at him. pick up a singe as the ball wanders away towards midwicket
jadeja to maxwell, 1 run,
ashwin to maxwell, four runs, through the fielder at deep midwicket! it was mccullum too. he's a pretty decent man to have on the boundary but maxi had just hit it too hard!
ashwin to maxwell, four runs, reverse swept and it sails over the boundary at deep third man. maxi is making my fingers bleed here. shot after shot after shot
jadeja to miller, six runs, that's a monster! had the width and he got under it to carve it into the crowd behind cover. that ball followed a hyberbolic trajectory. flat and kept gaining height
sharma to johnson, four runs, a taste of his own medicine to start and mitch was a little surprised. manages to dab it fine enough to beat deep third man though
sandeep sharma to smith, 1 wide, lovely outswinger that beats the outside edge! smith was poking his bat at that one but didn't account for that shape
sandeep sharma to mccullum, no run,
johnson to raina, no run, jumps back in his crease as he blocks a 145kph thunderbolt back at the bowler
johnson to raina, no run, bit of width but raina has slapped this straight to point. still nervous about moving his feet and i don't blame him, mitch is bowing some serious pace
kartik to mccullum, four runs, makes a little room and lashes this over the top and finds a boundary to extra cover. calculated shot from mccullum as he beats long-off who was running to his left
sandeep sharma to mccullum, 1 run, slower ball on off stump, baz uses soft hands towards point

sandeep sharma to mccullum, 2 runs, chips down the track but his launch over the top came off the bottom of the bat. gained way more height than he liked and mitch was chasing after it. lunged after it with both hands but he never looked in control. swirler that was, no one would blame johnson for not grabbing that
sandeep sharma to raina, 1 run, grants him width and raina smacks it over the covers. but there is protection in the deep
patel to raina, 1 run, pushes it through at the base of middle, raina looks to flick across the line and is lucky for that ball deflecting away from the stumps
maxwell to mccullum, 1 wide, stays around the wicket to the right-hander too, but this is fired in way too wide outside off
maxwell to mccullum, 1 run, pushed back towards the bowler, maxi tries a flick off the back of his hand to try and run raina out and he would have been had that hit the target
patel to mccullum, four runs, carved through extra, that's a mccullum special! raced down the track and though the ball was flat, he made enough room to give it a good whack
patel to mccullum, no run, this one skidded on with the arm and mccullum was hurried into protecting his stumps. well bowled
maxwell to jadeja, four runs, pushed down leg and jaddu uses the extra pace of the one that was pushed through. glanced fine to the boundary behind him
kartik to du plessis, 1 run, flatter and outside off, faf flicks it deep mdiwicket
kartik to mccullum, 1 run, backs away and shovels it through to deep cover
patel to dhoni, 1 run, chips down the track and picks up a single to maxwell who is prowling at the midwicket boundary
patel to du plessis, no run, moves way outside leg and the bowler follows him. takes it off leg stump but can only tap it to extra cover
patel to dhoni, 1 run, hustles through for a quick single after nudging to extra cover
kartik to dhoni, no run, this time he waits on it but still can't beat backward point
kartik to du plessis, 2 runs, comes down the track and nurdles it straight of deep midwicket and this time it's a well run two to johnson
patel to dhoni, no run, chopped back to the bowler as he doesn't afford him any room
patel to du plessis, no run, good work from bailey at extra cover. faf came down the track and thumps it through the off side, but the fielder ran across to his left and planted enough doubts
kartik to dhoni, 2 runs, tapped calmly into midwicket where deep square leg beats maxwell to the ball
kartik to dhoni, 1 run, stays back and pushes to extra cover for a single
kartik to dhoni, 2 runs, another nudge to midwicket, another couple.
johnson to du plessis, 1 run, walks across and looks to slash the slower delivery outside off, gets an inside edge to the left of the keeper
sandeep sharma to du plessis, four runs, faf jumped outside leg, sandeep went further down and played into his hands. glanced to the fine leg boundary
sandeep sharma to du plessis, four runs, makes room as he chips down the track and lashes it through the covers

sandeep sharma to du plessis, four runs, this is the slower ball, a response to seeing the batsman moving around in his crease. but as the ball was bowled he was waiting on leg stump and tickled it fine again to bring up his fifty, off 22 balls
dhawan to ashwin, four runs, another outside edge and another four to third man. backed away but the bowler tried to put it out of his reach outside off, but ashwin is able to get just enough bat
dhawan to manhas, 1 wide, he has to bowl that again. slower ball slanted well down the off side
richardson to dhawan, no run, another tight delivery on off stump, dhawan punches it straight to the gully fielder
richardson to dhawan, four runs, this time he cracks it with a lot of power! only a tiny bit of room there and he cashes on it, smacking it behind point and beats the deep point fielder

richardson to finch, 1 run, interesting! he walks out of the crease to punch his first delivery, gets an inside edge back towards the non-striker and the bowler is not able to bend down in time.. giving finch his first run
richardson to dhawan, four runs, he offers a lot of width this time and dhawan obliges by cracking it past a diving backward point to the boundary
watson to dhawan, four runs, this is superb from dhawan! controlled shimmy down the pitch and punches it straight between the bowler and mid-off for a boundary
bhatia to ojha, 1 run, slower, much slower, 93.7 kph, that is slower than bhajji.. the batsman waits and punches it to deep cover for a single
tambe to rahul, no run, floated on the stumps, the batsman defends it to cover
bhatia to rahul, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, the batsman moves to the leg side and drives it to deep cover
bhatia to rahul, 1 run, some room outside off, allows the batsman to punch it to deep cover for a single
tambe to ojha, 1 run, floated on the middle stump line, the batsman drives it to long off for a single
tambe to ojha, 1 run, pushed through to the stumps, the batsman defends it to the leg side
bhatia to ojha, 1 run, back to normalcy.. he delivers a slower one on off, the batsman pushes it through cover for a single

bhatia to ojha, 1 run, almost hit back to the bowler! this was almost as slow as a ramesh powar delivery...85 kph!! the batsman looks to drive, but pushes it aerially past the bowler's left hand.. not too far
bhatia to warner, 1 run, he powers this down to long off for a single
