tambe to ojha, four runs, skips out, reaches the pitch and lifts it straight over the bowler, nothing desperate about the charge, and not hitting it too hard
tambe to ojha, no run, pushed to extra cover
bhatia to ojha, no run, slightly wider outside off, the batsman slices it straight to point
tambe to henriques, 1 run, pushed through on the midde stump line, the batsman brings his bat down just in time to punch it to long off
tambe to henriques, no run, goes back to the slider, defends it to midwicket
faulkner to henriques, no run, looks for a single after dabbing this to cover point, but he is rightly sent back by irfan
faulkner to henriques, no run, angled across the right-hander, beats the outside edge as the batsman looks to drive
richardson to pathan, 2 runs, this time he comes behind it and drives it smartly to deep extra cover

watson to sharma, out, another one! this is a hat-trick for watson. angled delivery, it's steered straight to the hands of the keeper. ahmedabad is proving real lucky for royals! second hat-trick in two games
watson to steyn, no run, is there some reverse swing! comes in a touch and steyn drives it to mid-off

watson to steyn, 1 run, another incoming delivery, steyn pushes it straight to midwicket and sets off immediately.. the fielder from midwicket  fires in a throw at the non-striker's.. was out had he hit
watson to pathan, no run, he is keeping it on the stumps, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
watson to pathan, four runs, there is no first slip and that is exactly where pathan gets this boundary from
faulkner to steyn, 1 run, he looks to play to leg side but gets a leading edge to cover
faulkner to pathan, 1 run, this time irfan gets some bat on it, pushes it to backward point
richardson to steyn, no run, good comeback from the bowler! he chases the batsman as he is making room and beats the bat swing
faulkner to pathan, 1 wide, out, and another one! this is too wide though but irfan runs for a bye.. steyn has to pay the price as sanju takes down the stumps..

faulkner to mishra, out, what a comedy! the batsman misses the shot and runs out of the crease to pick up a bye.. sanju fires the throw and misses.. faulkner gathers the ball, he fires in a throw again as mishra is still out of the crease.. he misses again.. now sanju takes it and he finally manages to strike the stumps.. mishra could have saved himself but he had given himself up to the mercy of this funny game between samson and faulkner.. irfan pathan doesn't move, he had the best seat
faulkner to kumar, 1 bye, slower delivery, bhuvi misses.. sanju lobs it up to the bowler, but it's lobbed all the way over the bowler.. the batsmen were not looking for a bye, but they get it finally
kumar to samson, 1 wide, poor delivery to the new man! this is headed for the first slip almost.. the keeper gets there eventually
kumar to samson, 1 run, looks to bring this one in from wide of the crease, the batsman comes on top of that nicely and guides it to third man
steyn to samson, no run, starts off with a outswinger, left alone by the batsman

steyn to samson, no run, superb delivery! this one pitches just outside off and shapes away late, the batsman was looking to play the drive and misses it completely.. that is one of those steyn specials
steyn to samson, four runs, another superb delivery but samson manages to get it away.. he chips it over mid-off and gets a boundary..not in complete control, but his aim for right
steyn to samson, 1 run, he throws his bat at this outswinger again, but this flies off the thick outside edge.. not very far from third man
kumar to nair, four runs, there comes the indipper but nair is on task, brings his bat down stylishly to time this superbly through midwicket
kumar to samson, no run, gets one to come in to the batsman, sanju pushes it calmly to mid-on
kumar to watson, 3 runs, just a punch to the off side, but this is expertly hit in the gap at cover, easy treble
henriques to watson, four runs, oh this is crisply timed through midwicket! watson leans into this legside halfvolley and hits the gap
henriques to smith, no run, some energy in the field! warner charges in from point to stop the defensive shot from smith
sharma to binny, no run, flatter and spins away after pitching, the batsman defends it to point
mishra to smith, 1 wide, this one turns too much and is a wide down the leg side
mishra to smith, no run, another good ball, the batsman looks to work it to the leg side, but gets a leading edge towards the bowler
sharma to smith, 4 byes, stumping chance gone abegging! another superb ball, dips, and spins past the outside edge.. smith was offbalance but the keeper misses it completely
mishra to smith, 1 run, straighter one now, the batsman goes deep into his crease to punch this to deep cover
henriques to binny, 1 run, another slower delivery, the batsman chops it to point softly and calls for a single early
pathan to smith, 1 run, another slower delivery, the batsman punches it to deep cover for a single
mishra to smith, no run, comes out of the pitch early, but can only drive it to dhawan at cover
sharma to faulkner, no run, bowls it flat and gets some turn, the batsman chops it straight to cover point
kumar to bhatia, out, slower delivery, bhatia swings this time.. he goes towards deep midwicket.. again more height than distance.. warner takes a simple catch

kumar to richardson, out, slower ball, batsman swings, this time it doesn't even go beyond the square.. it goes high, touches the moon, but on its wayback, meets the bowler.. who was running backwards.. superb catch again
steyn to kulkarni, 1 wide, looks for a slower ball but this is down the leg side
steyn to kulkarni, 1 wide, quicker one attempted, but again down the leg side
steyn to tambe, 1 run, slower delivery, tambe pushes to mid-off and would have been run-out had the fielder hit.. he survives to live another over
pathan to kulkarni, 1 run, another slower delivery, aerially driven through cover
pathan to tambe, no run, moves to the leg side and crashes it ... the ball dribbles to cover..
morkel to sehwag, no run, tries to go back and punch but it comes in again from just outside off, and the thick inside edge goes to square leg
starc to sehwag, 1 run, opens the face and pushes softly at this one leaving him on the angle, it does not carry to gayle's left at wide slip
starc to sehwag, 1 wide, he bowls a slower one outside off, sehwag cannot reach it, keeper and bowler cannot believe it is called wide, they are right too, that was well inside the marker
morkel to sehwag, 1 run, goes back and whips this incoming delivery through square leg, the man from the deep rushes in to prevent the second
morkel to sehwag, no run, sehwag survives as he plays from the crease, morkel has been moving them in sharply after pitching but the batsman gets an inside edge onto pad
aaron to sehwag, 1 wide, 145 kph from aaron, but of little use as it is sprayed well down the leg side
hv patel to sehwag, 1 wide, yet another ball slanted down leg
hv patel to mandeep singh, 1 wide, the wide problems continue for rcb, harshal sends a slower one down leg now
chahal to maxwell, 1 run, turned through vacant midwicket for a single
yuvraj singh to maxwell, six runs, and again, yuvraj bowls it wider, but maxwell is down in a flash and smacks it straight again
chahal to miller, 2 runs, goes back and across and pushes at one angled across, the ball runs to backward point, who fails to stop it
morkel to bailey, no run, closer to off stump now, bailey tries to run it past point, cannot beat gayle there
chahal to saha, 1 run, skips out and pushes along the ground to long off
morkel to saha, 2 runs, opens the face and guides it wide of third man, and scurries back for the second
hv patel to miller, 1 run, hit to gayle at backward point

hv patel to saha, out, a wide slower one, saha mishits it high and ab comes in from long off to take it, he then throws it right back at harshal and the bowler goes down, he's taken some blows this over
aaron to johnson, no run, johnson swings and misses again, as aaron angles this slower one across him
aaron to patel, 1 run, slashes hard and it flies to harshal at third man, he takes it inches inside the rope, the momentum takes him over, he releases the ball just before, and prevents the six
starc to johnson, 1 leg bye, angles it into the left hander, who misses, and the ball goes square on the off side
sandeep sharma to gayle, no run, dropped, he's smacked it to the bowler, but that has burst out of sandeep's hands and gone towards mid on
johnson to pa patel, no run, now he tries to fetch it from outside off and pick it over square leg, connects very well but finds the man
johnson to pa patel, 1 run, hes been eyeing the area for some time, flicks cleanly and high over square leg now, but there is a man in the deep
sandeep sharma to pa patel, four runs, cracked over the bowler, sandeep pitched it up to the stumps, parthiv cranked up and flayed it back
patel to rana, 1 run, this is pushed in the air and fortunately for him, in the gap at cover, seemed to stop on him
shivam sharma to yuvraj singh, no run, yuvraj clueless again, he comes out and tries to work it to the leg side, it pops up square on off
shivam sharma to yuvraj singh, no run, what an over on debut, yuvraj in a tangle for the umpteenth time against spin, comes outside the crease again, tries to work it to leg, cannot put bat to ball
shivam sharma to morkel, 2 runs, chance goes, past sehwag at slip, albie tries to force this from the crease, thick edge brushes the keeper's leg and flies to sehwag's right, just grazes his fingers
shivam sharma to morkel, no run,
maxwell to de villiers, 1 run, goes hard again but mishits down to long off now
shivam sharma to de villiers, no run,
shivam sharma to starc, 1 run, pushed in the air down to long off
shivam sharma to starc, four runs, starc rocks back, slashes this 91 kph ball and it hurries to the third man boundary
shivam sharma to starc, no run, goes back and punches to extra cover

johnson to aaron, 1 run, arches back and chops it behind point, aaron takes it easy on the single, maxwell throws it at the non-striker's end, had he hit, aaron was gone, but the throw is wild, and nearly hits the umpire
johnson to starc, 1 run, hit along the ground and down to long off
patel to aaron, 2 runs, skips out, patel bowls it wide at 99 kph, he slices it past point in the end
patel to aaron, no run, slows it down, finds some turn, and beats him close to off
patel to aaron, 1 run, aaron heaves at a wide one, toe-ends it to backward point
balaji to starc, four runs, balaji falls as he bowls it way down the leg side, starc helps it fine, mandeep is in the deep, he he's fielded well today, but this time he lets it slip through his hands
badree to simmons, 1 wide, first ball this season, slips down the leg side. dhoni can't quite gather it.
pandey to simmons, no run, wide outside off, bit of outswing, simmons lets it go.
badree to gautam, four runs, down the track, and it's only a little push, but it screams away for four just behind point.
pandey to simmons, 1 run, another ball in that outside-off channel. simmons steers it away to third man.
pandey to rayudu, no run, rayudu shoulders arms again. pandey's not wavered much from that line.
pandey to rayudu, no run, this one doesn't swing, and rayudu waits before bunting it into the off side. decides against taking a single.
badree to simmons, six runs, tossed it up a bit, and simmons swings through the line. bounces right on top of the long-off rope.
badree to simmons, no run, quicker, flatter, pushed towards cover.
badree to rayudu, 1 run, pushed wide of mid-off, quick single.
pandey to rayudu, four runs, sees rayudu walking down the pitch, bowls it wide. rayudu hits smoothly through the line and over mid-off.
pandey to rayudu, no run,
pandey to rayudu, no run, sashays down the pitch, but he's in no position as the ball straightens, bounces and beats him all ends up.
jadeja to simmons, no run, pushed into the off side.
sharma to simmons, no run, slower ball, simmons is down the track but isn't in position for an aggressive shot. defensive push to cover.
jadeja to simmons, 2 runs, down the track, doesn't time it as he tries to heave across the line. deep midwicket picks it up on the boundary.
jadeja to simmons, 1 run, gives himself room, jadeja follows him. forced to nurdle it into the leg side.
jadeja to simmons, no run, gives himself room, tries to smack it through the off side. can only hit it straight to cover.
ashwin to rayudu, no run, offbreak, outside off. rayudu defends towards the leg side.
ashwin to simmons, 1 run,
ashwin to simmons, no run, turn once more. simmons gives himself room but he can only hit it straight back to ashwin.
jadeja to rayudu, 1 run, down the track, chipped to long-off.
jadeja to rayudu, 1 run, extremely round-arm from jadeja, slapped to deep cover.
jadeja to simmons, 1 run, round-arm once more, and the batsman is back in his crease to defend into the off side.
ashwin to simmons, four runs, carrom ball. gives himself width, gets a thick outside edge that runs away fine to the third man boundary, beats a despairing dive from badree.
badree to rayudu, 1 run, flat, outside off, driven to deep extra cover.
badree to sharma, no run, quick, bit of bounce, hits rohit high on the bat as he tries to defend.
badree to sharma, 1 run, skids on, flicked to deep square leg.
badree to rayudu, 1 run, pushed into the leg side for a walked single.
ashwin to rayudu, 1 run, rayudu is back in his crease to work this away towards midwicket.
ashwin to sharma, no run, played late, with a turn of the wrist, behind square leg. they decide against the single.
sharma to rayudu, 1 run, gives himself room to steer it to the right of third man.
sharma to sharma, no run, slower ball, rohit waits and twirls his wrists to find midwicket.
sharma to sharma, 1 run, slower ball, outside off. rohit opens the face of his bat, lets it run down to third man.
sharma to rayudu, no run, rayudu gives himself room, slashes, and misses.
jadeja to rayudu, 2 runs, down the track again, jadeja pushes it through. rayudu drives to deep cover.
jadeja to rayudu, 1 run, down the pitch once more, driven wide of long-off.
sharma to rayudu, 1 run, slower ball, tucked away behind square. two looked on, but the batsmen decided against it as jadeja swooped down over the ball.
ashwin to sharma, 1 run, legbreak, it looked like. swept away behind square.
ashwin to rayudu, 2 wides,
pandey to anderson, 1 wide, oh dear. that's way outside the wide line outside off. almost hits the return crease.
pandey to anderson, 2 runs,

kumar to smith, 2 runs, superb cricket this time, praveen starts it off with an off stump delivery that is a carved away towards deep point, seemed to be headed to the boundary, but a sprinting pollard gets his boot in the way to prevent the ball from reaching the rope
kumar to smith, no run, pushed to the off side this time, no run
kumar to smith, four runs, moving away outside off, guided towards third man for four more, praveen getting good shape here, but he's being taken for runs as well
kumar to smith, no run, bit of away swing outside off, swipes across the line, misses.
kumar to smith, no run, another inswinger, another swipe, another miss.
kumar to smith, 1 run, shuffles across this time, and plays it with the swing, into the leg side.
bumrah to mccullum, 1 run, tries to drive it through the off side, but it goes off the inside half of his bat down towards mid-on.
kumar to raina, four runs, swings, but starts from way outside leg stump, and raina puts it away with a flick of his wrists.
kumar to raina, 1 run, angled across raina again, and he pushes it down to mid-off.
bumrah to smith, no run, hits smith on the thigh as he looks to work it into the leg side.
harbhajan singh to smith, 1 run, goes with the angle, smith goes back and bunts it into the leg side.
harbhajan singh to raina, 1 run, turn again, and raina opens his face and pushes it towards deep point.
pollard to raina, 1 wide, wide, way down the leg side. raina swings and misses.
pollard to raina, 1 run, slower-ish ball outside off, chopped towards point.

pollard to raina, 1 wide, out, he's gone, is he? fires it down the leg side as he sees raina stepping down the pitch. gautam collects brilliantly down the leg side and has the bails off in a flash. raina turned around just as quick, though, and he's got his bat in, is it? or is it in the air when the bails come off? it's hard to tell for sure, but the third umpire seems to think there is. out, flashes the big screen. brave decision, that.
pollard to du plessis, no run, wide outside off stump, but just inside the tramlines, as faf lets it go.
harbhajan singh to du plessis, 1 run, wide outside off, tossed, up, faf goes across, and scoops it over his own head.
pollard to smith, four runs, swats it behind square on the leg side. ball turned in his hands a little bit, but it still went away in a hurry.
harbhajan singh to du plessis, 1 run, back in his crease to tuck it behind square on the leg side.
anderson to smith, no run, was that a slower ball? maybe. just misses off stump as smith swings and misses.
anderson to smith, 1 bye, this was definitely a slower ball, and smith swings and misses once more. rolls down to gautam, whose fumble allows them to sneak a bye.
kumar to smith, out, same shot, different result. doesn't get as much behind it this time, and it drops to simmons, who juggles it and takes it on the third attempt.
morkel to saha, no run, beauty. saha pokes at this, playing the inward angle, and it straightens off the pitch and beats him. extra bounce as well.
ut yadav to sehwag, 2 runs, drifts onto middle and leg, and sehwag flicks it past midwicket, but doesn't hit it all that well.
ut yadav to sehwag, 1 wide, slower ball, down the leg side again. what is this, umesh?
morkel to maxwell, 1 run, flicked to deep square leg, from outside off, with an extravagant follow-through.
morkel to sehwag, no run, angles in towards middle. sehwag stays next to the line and pushes it to mid-off.
narine to maxwell, 1 run, turns in from outside off, flicked to deep square leg.
kallis to sehwag, 1 run, another slower ball, sehwag lofts it high and straight. ten doeschate runs to his right from mid-off, makes a sprawling dive, but it falls just out of reach.
kallis to sehwag, no run, ball moves away after pitching, from well outside off. sehwag slashes without moving his feet, doesn't connect.
kallis to sehwag, six runs, slower ball, just outside off, viru picks it up early and launches it over the long-off boundary.
narine to sehwag, four runs, bit of bounce here, and sehwag gets a thick outside edge as he pushes uncertainly at it. runs away for four to the third man region.
chawla to miller, 2 runs, swept hard, but well stopped by kallis on the slide after running to his right from fine leg.
morkel to miller, 1 run, miller steps down the pitch, and is squared up by the angle, edges this ball behind point.
chawla to sehwag, no run, tries to make room again, but hits it straight to point.
ut yadav to miller, four runs, angled across, bit of width, and miller slaps it hard through cover point.
chawla to bailey, 1 run, skids on again, no room at all, and bailey bunts it towards cover.
narine to bailey, 2 runs, midwicket was on the boundary, and bailey walked across and flicked it towards him, but not too hard.
ut yadav to bailey, 2 runs, bailey had taken guard outside leg. umesh bowled it outside off, and the batsman has to reach for it to slap it down to long-off.
narine to johnson, four runs, flicked off his toes, and he hit it well. morne morkel had come in from deep midwicket, and was in no position as it sails over him and bounces over the rope.
narine to johnson, out, down the pitch, and narine's offbreak spins past his swishing blade. uthappa stumps him easily.
sandeep sharma to uthappa, no run, bit of inswing from outside off. uthappa drives to mid-off.
sandeep sharma to uthappa, 1 run, pushes to mid-off and sets off quickly for one.
sandeep sharma to uthappa, no run, slight inswing. uthappa pushes it towards midwicket.
johnson to gambhir, 1 run, flicked to the left of mid-on from outside off.
johnson to gambhir, no run, straightens from middle and off. hits the outside half of gambhir's bat, but he plays it safely down into the off side.
johnson to gambhir, four runs, similar delivery, different result. he gets hold of it and sends it over the leg side and rolling beyond the vacant midwicket boundary.
johnson to uthappa, no run, angled across the right-hander, checked push to cover.
johnson to uthappa, four runs, drifts down the leg side now, and uthappa glances it neatly to the left of a diving wicketkeeper.
sandeep sharma to gambhir, no run, down the track, doesn't get hold of this slower ball outside off. trickles into the off side.
sandeep sharma to gambhir, no run, angled across, looks to give himself room and guide it behind point. finds the fielder.
patel to uthappa, no run, tries to make room, but it skids on. knocks it down into the off side.
patel to uthappa, 1 run, driven with a straight bat to mid-on.
awana to uthappa, 1 wide, angled way down the leg side
awana to uthappa, four runs, straightens a bit from outside off, and uthappa gets a thick edge down to the third man boundary.
awana to gambhir, 1 run, dabs it down to third man with an open bat face.
dhawan to gambhir, 1 run, waits on it and chops it down to third man.
awana to gambhir, 1 run, it's close to off stump, and gambhir gives himself a bit of room to chop it to third man.
awana to pandey, no run, hugs that off-stump line, and pandey pushes it awkwardly back to the bowler.

awana to pandey, 1 run, tries to steer this past point. bounces up and maxwell fields it well, stretching his arms high above his head. misses the throw at the bowler's end. gambhir would have been miles out.
awana to gambhir, 1 run, banged in, angled across from wide of the crease. gambhir leans back to make room and chops down on it to hit it to third man.
dhawan to gambhir, 1 run, ball stops on gambhir, and the leading edge pops into the off side, nowhere near miller at cover.
dhawan to pandey, four runs, swatted away from well outside off over midwicket.
dhawan to pandey, 1 run, flicked towards midwicket from outside off.
patel to pandey, no run, goes with the angle, and pandey jumps up and jams his bat down on it.
patel to pandey, no run, pushed to mid on.
patel to pandey, 1 run, stops on him a bit, pushed uppishly to long-off.
patel to pandey, no run, ball goes with the angle from outside off, defensive push towards the covers.
maxwell to gambhir, 2 runs, gives himself room, chops it towards deep point.
maxwell to gambhir, 1 wide, slips down the leg side trying to compensate.
johnson to gambhir, 1 run, another slower ball. gambhir bunts it down into the leg side.
patel to pandey, 1 run, pushed towards cover, where bailey makes a diving stop to his left.
dhawan to gambhir, 1 run, gives himself room, slaps it to mid-off.
patel to pandey, no run, gambhir set off as soon as pandey pushed that to cover, even though it went straight to bailey, but akshar didn't collect his throw cleanly.
patel to gambhir, 2 runs, down the track, chips it to deep midwicket.
dhawan to gambhir, 2 runs, gambhir gets on his toes, tucks it off his hips, behind square.
richardson to kohli, four runs, kohli hits out of that three-ball barren patch. this is another inswinger, and he goes hard at it. the bat face closes, takes it square, past square leg, and for four

richardson to kohli, out, superb start for the royals so far, and it has just got better. there have been quite a few dots, and few singles, so kohli throws his bat at this wide delivery. the ball moves away a touch to take a thick edge that flies all the way to third man
faulkner to zol, 1 run, similar delivery, and helped into the leg side for another single
faulkner to zol, no run, slower ball, and this one beats him. zol has not seen this from the hand
tambe to gayle, 1 run, swept away to deep midwicket
tewatia to gayle, no run, strong start for tewatia. he sees gayle move across, and pitches another wrong'un outside leg, and beats the swing of that heavy bat to hit the pad
tambe to zol, 1 run, swept away, but this time for a single to deep square
tambe to de villiers, 1 run, driven to deep cover for one. ab yet to face a dot, i think
tewatia to yuvraj singh, no run, another wrong'un, yuvraj is looking to charge down, but is pushed back as this dips too. defended back to him
tewatia to yuvraj singh, 1 run, wrong'un again, swept away to deep square for one
tewatia to de villiers, 1 run, wrong'un to the right-hand batsman too. ab, too, picks it off the surface, and gets a single to leg as he adjust late
faulkner to de villiers, no run, moving across. some premeditation there. faulkner bowls slow, at 117ks, and beats his attempt to go leg side
bhatia to de villiers, 1 run, now comes the slower legbreak for the right-hand batsman, who drives to long-off for one
tambe to yuvraj singh, 1 wide, another wrong'un, but this too far outside leg. was he trying a stumping down leg anticipating a charge at him?
tambe to yuvraj singh, 1 run, dropped but this is a tough tough chance as tambe pushes one quick ball through. takes the toe end of yuvraj's bat, and it doesn't stick in samson's gloves
watson to yuvraj singh, 1 wide, yuvraj standing off, watson goes wide, but too wide again. watson doesn't like the call because yuvraj is standing almost outside off
watson to yuvraj singh, 1 run, watson stays wide outside off, draws a thick edge from the drive, but it doesn't carry to third man
morkel to rahane, no run, shimmies down the wicket, albie bangs this in shirt, gets good bounce, beats the edge again as rahane pokes without conviction
morkel to rahane, four runs, throws his arms at one, gets a meaty edge, over gayle at wide slip
starc to nair, no run, slower ball, swings in a little, beats the inside edge, and also misses the off stump
starc to nair, 1 run, swinging in towards middle and leg, gets a leading edge that doesn't carry to cover

dinda to rahane, no run, gayle dives at backward point to save runs, and the roof comes off at the ground as gayle smiles. something else in that shoulder might have come off too. he is walking off with an icepack on the shoulder
dinda to nair, four runs, that's unfortunate. outswinger outside off, draws the inside edge, but it goes past the keeper for four
yuvraj singh to binny, out, yuvi has got two wickets in one over. how can this night get any better? stuart binny, sent in to pinch-hit, dances down and gets a thick edge to deep cover
chahal to samson, 1 run, driven to long-off for one
chahal to nair, 1 run, wrong'un, pushed from leg for a single
chahal to samson, no run, nice legbreak, dipping a little, defended back to him
yuvraj singh to samson, six runs, mis-hits it for a six. down the pitch, toe-ends it, skies it, but manages to clear long-off. these boundaries are really small

yuvraj singh to samson, out, long hop to make it three for yuvi. tonight is a good good night for ys. drags this down, but it stops a touch on him, and samson is a little casual, and lobs this back to yuvraj
chahal to nair, 2 runs, hit wide of long-off for two
starc to nair, four runs, desperate heave this time, but gets a healthy enough edge to have it fly over the leaping wicketkeeper, patel
yuvraj singh to smith, six runs, goes for six. that's almost like a right-hand yuvraj hitting this shot. just shimmies down and extends his arms through it. clears long-off
yuvraj singh to smith, 1 run, driven to long-off for one

yuvraj singh to nair, out, yuvraj is on an absolute roll here. one of the best all-round performances of all time in t20 cricket? nair dances down, misses a straight ball, and has his middle stump pegged back
aaron to smith, no run, another slower ball, stays low, beats him outside off as smith tries to go leg
chahal to faulkner, no run, lovely legbreak from chahal. beats the outside edge as faulkner pushes at it outside off
chahal to smith, 1 run, nearly got him stumped, tossing the ball wide as smith gives him the charge. smith reaches out and gets bat on ball for a single to long-off
starc to faulkner, 2 runs, now they come back for the second as faulkner gets a thick edge towards third man. high throw from zol and faulkner makes it
starc to faulkner, 1 wide, slower ball, but too far wide outside off. called too
anderson to finch, no run, superb start! he swings this one into the batsman who misses the ball. somehow it misses the offstump too
bumrah to finch, no run, gets on top of the bounce and chops it firmly to the off side, but that's hit straight to pollard at point
bumrah to finch, no run, some room this time, but the batsman hits it straight to point
anderson to dhawan, 1 wide, he targets the leg stump again, but goes too far down
harbhajan singh to dhawan, 1 run, no room from bhajji, dhawan rocks back and pushes it to long off for an easy single
harbhajan singh to dhawan, no run, moves to the leg side very early and slaps the quicker delivery straight to point. a meter to the right and that was a four
malinga to finch, 1 run, slower delivery on off, finch looks to crash it through off but only manages an underedge to point
ojha to finch, no run, he moves to the leg side again but ojha follows him there, he has to defend
harbhajan singh to finch, no run, on the stumps this time, the batsman defends it to off
ojha to finch, no run, loud appeal as finch plays outside the line of this arm-ball, might have just missed leg, just
ojha to finch, no run, slower this time from ojha, finch defends it to cover point
ojha to finch, 1 run, he pushes it softly to cover to call for a quick single
pollard to finch, no run, slower and straighter, finch waits for it and defends it down the pitch
ojha to finch, 1 run, fires it flat on stumps, the batsman punches it to long off for a single
ojha to warner, no run, looks to come down the crease but is kept back by a quicker than usual delivery, he defends
ojha to finch, no run, flatter and quicker on the stumps, the batsman pushes it to the bowler
harbhajan singh to finch, no run, stays upright and punches it back to the bowler
malinga to finch, no run, indecision! the batsman looks for a single to cover but is sent back in time
harbhajan singh to warner, 2 runs, makes room and punches the flatter delivery to deep extra cover for a couple
harbhajan singh to warner, 1 wide, that last shot has scared him a bit, as he fires this one wide outside off
harbhajan singh to warner, no run, good ball from bhajji, doesn't turn and is headed for off, the batsman chops it to point
bumrah to warner, four runs, poor delivery! this is an attempted slower one but this is down the leg side, warner swings his arms and manages to get it fine on the leg side
bumrah to finch, no run, fires this one in from wide of the crease, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
bumrah to finch, no run, good delivery, fired in on the off stump, finch punches it straight to cover
bumrah to warner, 1 run, good delivery from bumrah again, right in the middle stump line, warner can only block it out to long off
malinga to warner, 1 run, comes down the pitch and almost yorks himself, digs it out to point eventually
pollard to ojha, no run, slower delivery wide outside off, ojha chops it to the keeper
pollard to ojha, 1 run, similar shot, the result is more along expected lines, just clears the infield towards long off
pollard to warner, four runs, the extra ball costs them some more, as warner flays this slower delivery through extra cover
kumar to rayudu, 1 run, good first ball to the new man! seams away after pitching, squaring up the batsman and taking the outside edge to third man
kumar to simmons, no run, bowl the outswinger wide outside off, simmons watches it go to the keeper
steyn to rayudu, 1 run, superb outswinger again, the batsman slices it to backward point
steyn to simmons, 2 runs, charges down the pitch and flat-bats it without timing to mid-on, gets an extra run as the ball ricochets off the stumps
kumar to rayudu, 2 runs, not much swing this time, the batsman cracks it over point for a couple, henriques got a hand to it at point to slow it down
pathan to simmons, six runs, that is the pace to hit! simmons moves to the leg side, pathan's swing follows him, but at 128 kph, it's easy for simmons to whack over deep midwicket
pathan to simmons, no run,
kumar to simmons, 1 run, moves outside leg to blast this through off, but doesn't get the timing, hits it to mid-off for a single
mishra to rayudu, six runs, now rayudu  climbs into mishra! charges down the pitch and lifts it straight to the sight screen, effortless hit
sharma to simmons, no run, comes down the pitch and looks to defend as he is not close to the ball
sharma to rayudu, no run, some extra bounce for karn! rayudu punches it all the way back to the bowler almost
mishra to rayudu, 1 run, flatter and quicker, pushed to midwicket for a single
mishra to simmons, no run,
sharma to rayudu, 1 run, flatter again, rayudu was out of the crease but punches it nicely to long off
sharma to simmons, no run, comes out of the crease but defends this one
henriques to rayudu, no run, takes the pace off the delivery, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
henriques to rayudu, no run, slower again, the batsman pushes it down the pitch and henriques dives to his left to parry it to cover
mishra to simmons, four runs, that was not too far from point! the batsman slices it for a boundary
henriques to rayudu, four runs, no stopping mumbai! henriques gives the batsman some angle and rayudu slices it over point for another boundary
kumar to rayudu, 1 run, slower ball but down the leg side, flicked down to fine leg for a single
henriques to rayudu, 1 wide, another one down the leg side, another wide
henriques to rayudu, no run, slower delivery, very very slow delivery, it's at a snail's pace, slower than a koala, outside off and the batsman misses
henriques to rayudu, 1 wide, quicker delivery, he pounds it on his own half and that sails way over the batsman
henriques to pollard, 1 run, he dabs it to mid-off and shoots off for a quick single
steyn to pollard, no run, can't get it away, pushes it straight to point
steyn to pollard, no run, crazy crazy! pollard dabs it to cover and takes off, just gets back in time
steyn to sharma, four runs, apologies for saying this - lazy elegance - but that's what it is. just a defensive push through extra cover and it speeds up after it crosses infield
sharma to pollard, 3 runs, premediated! he goes down on his knee early and laps it over the keeper's head.. not to the leg side, just over the keeper's head.. straight
sharma to pollard, 1 run, they are in no hurry, a single to deep midwicket
badree to ankit sharma, no run, pitches on leg stump and skids on, sharma goes back and defends
badree to ankit sharma, no run, defended back to the bowler
pandey to watson, no run, defended from the crease with a straight bat
sharma to ankit sharma, no run, defended from the crease towards the bowler
badree to watson, 1 run, that's been chipped in the air but it is wide of the man at midwicket
ashwin to watson, 1 leg bye, pitches outside leg from round the wicket, the ball skids on to hit watson's pad
jadeja to rahane, no run, slowed it up, on off and middle, rahane plays it back to the bowler
ashwin to nair, 1 run, played to deep square leg for a single
sharma to watson, no run, mohit beats watson comprehensively outside off stump with a slower one, watson was through his drive before the ball arrived
sharma to binny, 3 runs, binny tries to play some sort of a dab and gets an edge that misses the stumps and dhoni, the fielder from fine leg prevents the boundary
pandey to binny, 1 run, binny stays in his crease and opens the face to play the ball to point
badree to binny, no run, a loud appeal for lbw after the ball skidded on to binny and hit the pad as he tried to defend, missing leg
badree to binny, 1 run, an overthrow after the batsman plays it close on the off side
ashwin to binny, no run, steps out of his crease and defends on the off side
ashwin to smith, 1 run, swept to long leg for one more, that was ashwin's best over today and he bowled it from over the wicket
jadeja to binny, 1 run, driven through cover for a single
jadeja to binny, six runs, shot! binny steps out of his crease and has room to free his arms, he plays a flowing lofted drive, hitting the ball with the spin over the extra cover boundary

jadeja to binny, no run, there's an appeal for a run out after an eventful delivery! binny survived an lbw appeal and the ball went on the off side, binny tried to steal a leg bye but was sent back, he made it just in time
jadeja to yagnik, 1 run, yagnik jumps back and dabs the ball towards point
sharma to bhatia, out, caught at long off! bhatia is done by the slower one, he throws his bat at a wider ball outside off and slices it high in the air, smith runs in from the deep and catches it
ankit sharma to smith, 1 run, nudged to midwicket for a single
ankit sharma to mccullum, no run, bowled flat on middle stump, mccullum stays back and closes the face to play to square leg, he wants one, smith does not
faulkner to smith, 1 wide, that's a wide outside off, slanting across the right-hander, smith slashes and misses
faulkner to smith, no run, defended into the off side
faulkner to smith, no run, a slower ball wide outside off stump, smith mis-times it on the off side
faulkner to smith, no run, smith mows across the line at a slower ball wide outside off stump, he doesn't make contact
tambe to smith, 1 run, smith hits it to long-off again, but along the ground this time because the fielder is in the deep
tambe to smith, 1 wide, yagnik thinks he has caught smith down the leg side as he tried to swat the ball but the umpire calls it wide
ankit sharma to du plessis, no run, played back to the bowler after coming out of the crease
ankit sharma to du plessis, 1 run, played to deep midwicket for a single
ankit sharma to smith, no run, pitches on middle and turns across smith, who goes back and dabs towards the bowler
ankit sharma to du plessis, 1 run, faf goes right back and taps the ball through midwicket for a single
ankit sharma to du plessis, 1 run, faf stands outside leg to make room and then hits a flat one through cover
bhatia to smith, 1 wide, the slower one drifts down leg side, yagnik lunges to collect and then lunges back to break the stumps, nicely done
bhatia to smith, 1 run, played through midwicket for a single
bhatia to du plessis, no run, defended from the crease towards watson at cover
tambe to du plessis, 2 runs, faf jumps out of his crease, tambe tries to beat him down leg side but faf manages to flick it through midwicket
tambe to du plessis, 2 runs, faf plays a cheeky little scoop over the keeper, didn't time it well at all
bhatia to du plessis, 1 run, a very slow ball on middle and off, faf bunts it through midwicket for a single
bhatia to ashwin, no run, ashwin moves across his crease and tries to play the ball square by closing the face, the leading edge nearly carried to bhatia
tambe to ashwin, 1 run, steps out of his crease and drives calmly to long-off
tambe to ashwin, 1 run, bowled flat and fast and straight, ashwin stays back and dabs the ball towards cover
tambe to du plessis, 1 run, faf comes out and drops the ball close on the leg side for a single
bhatia to ashwin, no run, ashwin tries to drive through cover but mis-times it because it's a slower variation of a slower ball
bhatia to ashwin, 1 run, ashwin moves across his crease and taps the ball softly into the leg side for a single towards midwicket
faulkner to du plessis, no run, a slower ball outside off, from the back of the hand, played from the crease to cover
faulkner to du plessis, 1 run, driven to long off for a single, and the game will break for important strategies to be discussed during the time out
bhatia to ashwin, 1 run, ashwin stays in his crease and mis-times the ball towards cover where watson fails to prevent the single
tambe to du plessis, 1 run, faf steps out and hits the ball to long off for a single
tambe to dhoni, no run, dhoni stays back and mis-times a shot into the covers, tambe bowled it flat and straight
cooper to du plessis, 1 run, faf stays back, taps the ball towards point and takes the single, he's hobbling but he isn't hesitating
faulkner to dhoni, 1 wide, faulkner sprays the ball wide outside off from over the wicket, that's a wide
faulkner to du plessis, 1 wide, faulkner sprays a second wide far outside off, he's trying to get faf to lunge for it on a bad leg
cooper to jadeja, 1 run, jadeja tries to work the ball on the leg side but gets an bottom edge past the stumps to the keeper, dhoni sprints through for the single

faulkner to dhoni, 3 runs, csk have done it! royals fall to pieces off that delivery. dhoni pushed the ball through cover again and cooper was slow in coming off the boundary, they were going to complete the second to level the scores. cooper threw to faulkner who was sloppy in collecting the throw ... they conceded the overthrow ... csk go to the top of the league with two balls to spare.
duminy to gayle, no run, one slip in place, gayle stays back and defends
duminy to gayle, no run, bowls it flatter and he stays back and punches down the track
duminy to patel, no run, gives it more air to parthiv and he gets turn too, outside edge to the off side
mohammed shami to gayle, no run, shami keeps it tight, no room for gayle as he stabs it to the off side
duminy to gayle, no run, flatter one and he pushes it back to the bowler
duminy to gayle, 2 runs, rocks back and punches it wide of cover and vijay gives chase
mohammed shami to patel, no run, parthiv looks to drop it on the pitch and pinch a single but he is hesitant
mohammed shami to patel, 1 run, flicks it softly towards midwicket for a single
mohammed shami to patel, no run, swing and a miss, looked like shami took some pace off the ball
kaul to gayle, no run, straight again and he stays back and punches it to the off side
kaul to patel, no run, pushes it to the off side but mistimes it
shukla to gayle, no run, comes round the wicket and he turns it to square leg
shukla to kohli, no run, this was a touch wide outside off and he's happy to leave it alone
shukla to kohli, no run, he stays back and punches it to the off side
duminy to kohli, no run,
duminy to kohli, 1 run, down the track and he gets a leading edge to the off side
shukla to kohli, 1 run, stays beside the line and dabs it down to third man
shukla to kohli, 1 run, slower ball and pushed softly down to point and sets off
imran tahir to de villiers, 1 run, running a bit haywire here, nudged to the on side and parthiv takes a circuitous route to the other end, tries to get out of the way of the bowler
imran tahir to de villiers, 1 run,
imran tahir to patel, no run, stays back and punches it wide of cover
duminy to de villiers, 1 run, looked to slap that square of the wicket and he gets an outside edge to third man
imran tahir to de villiers, 2 runs, gets turn but it's too wide outside off and he bashes it towards wide long-off
kaul to de villiers, 1 run, he mistimes the punch to the off side
kaul to patel, 1 run, drops it down towards point and sets off
mohammed shami to de villiers, no run, doesn't give him room and he punches it back to the bowler
imran tahir to yuvraj singh, no run, rolls to the on side
imran tahir to yuvraj singh, no run, goes for the big drive but can't beat cover
imran tahir to yuvraj singh, 2 runs, it's a direct hit and it goes upstairs, turned to deep midwicket and he goes for the second run, it's a flat throw at the stumps and yuvraj is home

kaul to de villiers, out, knocks back the off stump, after being spanked for a boundary the previous ball ab tries to hoick him across the line, comes back in off the pitch and shaves the off stump, the stumps are erect
kaul to rana, no run, drops it on the pitch and he decides against the single
shukla to yuvraj singh, 1 no ball, he oversteps and fires it down the leg side
shukla to yuvraj singh, no run, yuvraj misses out on the free hit, good slower ball wide outside off and he swings and misses, bat nowhere near the ball
shukla to yuvraj singh, 1 run, swings across the line and gets an inside edge to the leg side
shukla to rana, no run, stifled appeal as the bowler thought it was pad first and the bat
imran tahir to yuvraj singh, six runs, two in two! tahir tosses it up too wide outside off and yuvraj scoops it high and over deep cover
imran tahir to yuvraj singh, 1 run, drills it hard down to long-off
mohammed shami to yuvraj singh, 1 wide, bowls it too wide outside off and he doesn't play at it
mohammed shami to yuvraj singh, six runs, a few rows over the second tier! nobody can nod off, shami bowls down the leg side and it's a pick up shot played with such ease over fine leg
mohammed shami to rana, no run,
kaul to yuvraj singh, 1 wide,
kaul to rana, 1 run, tries to slap it straight but ends up swatting it to point, yuvraj was through quickly but rana had to hurry
shukla to rana, 1 run, down the leg side and swings and the keeper gets a glove to it, rolls to fine leg
shukla to yuvraj singh, 1 wide, yuvraj takes an off stump guard and moves further to his left as shukla delivers, but he sprays it too wide outside off
shukla to yuvraj singh, no run, some relief for shukla as he bowls a slower ball outside off and yuvraj swings and for a change doesn't connect

muralitharan to vijay, 1 run, he pushes it to yuvraj at mid-off and calls for a quick single.. yuvraj comes in like a fireball, picks it up and has a shy at stumps, misses by a whisker.. vijay was gone had he hit
muralitharan to de kock, four runs, and there is an edge now! past the second slip fielder, runs away to the boundary
muralitharan to pietersen, 1 leg bye, he charges out and almost pays the price as this starts spinning down the leg side, kp is lucky to get some pad on it
muralitharan to agarwal, no run, flatter delivery, dabbed straight to cover
starc to pietersen, no run, kp goes for the big drive through the off side but the ball goes underneath the bat
starc to pietersen, 1 wide, he strays wide down the leg side and wide called
starc to agarwal, four runs, streaky again but safe, this was sliced squarer on the off side and cleared backward point
starc to agarwal, 1 run, tucks it to the on side
ahmed to pietersen, 1 wide, this was too wide outside off and kp chased it
ahmed to pietersen, 1 run, knocks it towards midwicket
ahmed to pietersen, 1 run, gets an inside edge to the pad and the ball rolls to point
ahmed to agarwal, 1 run, he opens the face and guides this to third man
ahmed to pietersen, 1 run, another inside edge, kp looking scratchy
chahal to pietersen, 1 run, goes back and mistimes the drive
yuvraj singh to pietersen, no run, he gets an inside edge to the boot
chahal to pietersen, no run, beats the drive! the turn foxing him, very close to the off stump
chahal to pietersen, 2 runs, streaky there as kp gets a leading edge that just clears cover who leaps
chahal to agarwal, no run, mistimed it to the off side
yuvraj singh to pietersen, 1 run, punches it down to extra cover
yuvraj singh to agarwal, 1 run, comes down the track and mistimes it to the leg side
yuvraj singh to pietersen, four runs, yuvraj tossed it up a bit more and a bit slower, kp clears the left leg and lofts with ease over the covers, easily done
yuvraj singh to pietersen, 1 run, bashed hard to star who times the dive very well at deep midwicket and fires the throw to keep it to just a single
ahmed to duminy, no run, he goes back at the crease and pushes it to the off side
ahmed to duminy, 1 run, gets off the mark with a quick single down to midwicket, beats the throw
muralitharan to pietersen, 1 run, comes round the wicket, sharp spin and he makes room and punches it to long-off
muralitharan to duminy, 1 run, goes back at the crease and punches it down the track
muralitharan to duminy, 1 run, goes back and punches against the turn to the on side
chahal to duminy, 1 run, he rocks back and punches it hard to deep point
chahal to pietersen, 1 run, rocks back and thumps it really hard and the fielder at deep cover had to hurry and he did well
chahal to duminy, 1 run,
muralitharan to duminy, 2 runs, good running, he turned it down to midwicket and takes the first one hard
muralitharan to duminy, 1 run, he rocks back and punches it down to deep point
yuvraj singh to duminy, no run, driven back to the bowler
chahal to jadhav, no run, big turn again, jadhav can only push it back to the bowler
chahal to duminy, six runs, chahal gives dd an opening by bowling a half tracker, duminy was almost expecting it, back at the crease and bludgeoned high over deep midwicket
yuvraj singh to jadhav, no run, takes a few paces down and pushes it back to the bowler
yuvraj singh to duminy, 1 run, he goes back and punches it to the off side

ahmed to duminy, 1 run, dropped by gayle at point! duminy looked to slice this over the off side and the big man leaps and gets a hand to it, tries to take it in the second attempt with the other and it still pops out, tries for the third time, he nearly does the split as he falls to the ground
starc to duminy, four runs, nearly carried all the way! he used the pace on the ball, made room and sliced it over backward point and the ball was going quickly, dipped just before reaching the rope
starc to shukla, no run, a bit too quick for him, he made room to swing but missed

ahmed to jadhav, four runs, that was very cleverly played! he knew third man was up, he moved right across his stumps, cleared the right leg and was looking to hoick it over the leg side, adjusted late and deftly guided it to third man instead, turned the bat perfectly
ahmed to jadhav, no run, follows it up with a swing and  a miss
ahmed to shukla, 1 run, shukla makes room and he swings it down to deep square leg
starc to shukla, no run, shukla makes room and goes for the big swing and misses
starc to mohammed shami, 1 run, punches it down to mid-off and kohli takes aim at the bowler's end and misses
johnson to dhawan, 1 wide, johnson hurls it too far down leg with the angle now
johnson to dhawan, no run, corrects the line and is right on middle this time, dhawan pushes it back
johnson to dhawan, no run, and yet again, dhawan just not able to do anything with these deliveries angled into middle, middle and leg, an inside edge onto pad now as he pushes at it
sandeep sharma to finch, 1 run, pushed to mid off for a single, could have been tight but vohra fails to pick it up
johnson to finch, 1 wide, overdoes the angle into the right hander and sends it down leg
shivam sharma to finch, no run, pushed back to the bowler
shivam sharma to finch, 2 runs, won't be a maiden as finch turns this through square leg for a couple
patel to dhawan, no run, a straighter and wider one as he comes down the track and pushes to extra cover
patel to warner, no run, pushed but straight to extra cover
patel to warner, no run, wide and straight, warner reaches for it, but bottom edges it to the bowler
patel to ojha, 1 run, angled into the pad, turned to fine leg
patel to ojha, no run, skips out and square drives, cannot beat backward point
patel to ojha, 1 run, he looks to whack this over midwicket but mishits it high in the air, it falls in vacant space in that region
johnson to warner, no run, a slower one into the pad, warner cannot connect as he looks to turn it square
dhawan to pathan, 1 run, squeezes it down to third man
henriques to saha, no run, a slower one on off, pushed down the track
sharma to saha, 1 run, forced off a thick inside edge through midwicket
henriques to saha, 1 run, makes room and looks to go over the off side, but drags it in the air through midwicket instead

kumar to maxwell, out, probably this was the only they could have got a wicket, maxwell pushes it down the track, bowler gets his fingers to it, and vohra's bat is in the air as he looks to come back, gone
mishra to miller, 2 runs, miller steps out and sends it soaring miles, it comes down to deep midwicket and is put down, was the free hit anyway
mishra to maxwell, 1 run, a calm push to deep midwicket to end the over
sharma to maxwell, six runs, they can't contain him even if they bowl outside leg, maxwell steps out and drags it just over the deep midwicket boundary
sharma to maxwell, 1 run, pushed to vacant midwicket for a single

steyn to maxwell, 1 run, mid off is up, warner fields this drive, does not have a go at the stumps even though he threatens to, as the batsmen are almost home by that time, maxwell runs all the way up to warner, both have a smile on
steyn to miller, no run, comes outside his crease, but gets an inside edge onto pad
sharma to bailey, no run, wants to work it to square leg, but it hits pad high again and pops up close to the crease
sharma to bailey, no run, bailey struggling in search of the tuck to square leg, cannot get it away again
sharma to bailey, no run, steps out uncertainly and pushes it straight to the bowler
pathan to bailey, no run, shout for leg before as bailey swipes and misses, but that pitched outside leg, bailey wants a single, karn advances from point, had he hit, bailey was out by miles
steyn to bailey, 1 run, bailey continues to survive, direct hit was needed from extra cover as he pushed and ran, not coming, he was gone had it hit
ut yadav to gautam, 3 runs, looks to hoick it over midwicket but doesn't get much timing, tendo chases it down from square leg
morkel to rayudu, 1 wide, wrong line, this is down the leg side and is an easy call for the umpire
morkel to rayudu, no run, stays calm and defends the follow up delivery to point
shakib al hasan to simmons, no run, he moves to the leg side, gets a quick flat delivery on the stumps and punches it back to the bowler
shakib al hasan to simmons, no run, slows it down and follows the batsman who was making room, simmons defends
narine to rayudu, no run, this is the other one now, but rayudu spots it and defends it to point

shakib al hasan to simmons, out, this one goes below the radar! shakib bowls these balls from time to time.. it's the arm-ball, keeps coming in and stays mighty low. simmons was aiming for the sight screen - he was out of the crease and gave it a proper swing, but the bat just met thin air and the ball crashed low into the leg stump. he makes amends for that dropped catch
shakib al hasan to sharma, no run, still slower from shakib, the batsman pushes it to cover
shakib al hasan to rayudu, 1 run, skips down the pitch and eases it to long-off for another single. a sedate start for mumbai here.
ut yadav to rayudu, no run, he fires this on the off stump line, the batsman stays in the crease and defends
ut yadav to rayudu, four runs, smartly played from rayudu! he uses his feet, moves slightly to the leg side to give himself some room and just drives it over mid-off for another boundary
chawla to sharma, no run, lots of loop on this one, the batsman looks to drive it to off but gets it off the toe, straight to cover
chawla to sharma, 1 run, bowls the top spinner, rohit goes deep in the crease and punches it to deep cover
pathan to sharma, no run, another one that stays very low, rayudu lucky again as it's outside off
pathan to rayudu, four runs, finds the gap at backward point this time.. he does it better than what rohit did in the last ball
chawla to rayudu, 2 runs, he stays in the crease and pushes this softly in the gap at deep midwicket for a quick couple
chawla to sharma, no run, gets some turn by bowling it slower, the batsman pushes it back down the pitch
shakib al hasan to sharma, no run, flatter delivery, rohit can't get it away, pushes it back to the bowler
shakib al hasan to rayudu, no run, keeps coming in with the arm, the batsman can only punch it back to the bowler
shakib al hasan to rayudu, 1 run, looks to heave this to the leg side but realises this is not bouncing much, changes his shot to a push to deep midwicket
chawla to rayudu, 1 run, he comes down the pitch and punches this back past the bowler, it was not very far from the right hand.. the ball stuck in the pitch and the batsman played it back in the air
chawla to sharma, 1 run, pushes at it away from the body and picks up a single to point, and again it stops a touch on the surface
chawla to anderson, no run, spins in and stays very low, anderson does well to get some bat on it.. it was shaping for an lbw
morkel to anderson, 1 run, no room from morkel, the batsman dabs it towards cover and calls for a quick single
chawla to anderson, no run, slower this time, the batsman can only push it back to the bowler

narine to anderson, no run, loud appeal for lbw as anderson is hit on the back pad! it seems headed for the middle and leg stump, but looks like he was saved by where it pitched - slightly outside leg in my opinion and also going over
morkel to sharma, 1 wide, now looks to lap it over the keeper's head, but this one is called a wide as it was too far down leg
morkel to anderson, out, this is a soft dismissal now! just when you though mumbai were making a charge, anderson plays a tame chip shot straight to midwicket
narine to sharma, no run, he wanted a quick single to backward point but is rightly sent back in time

narine to sharma, out, narine shows no emotion as he takes out rohit! the batsman was looking to play the lap shot, he walked right across the stumps, but this zipped off the surface to crash to the top of off
narine to pollard, 1 run, quicker delivery, it squares up pollard and he can only manage a single to cover
narine to tare, 1 run, slower this time, the batsman slaps it down to long-off, just for a single
malinga to uthappa, no run, another one wide outside off, it keeps going away from the bat and flies past the outside edge
malinga to gambhir, 1 wide,
bumrah to uthappa, 1 run, big inswing from wide of the crease, hits the batsman high up on the bat as he looks to nudge it to the leg side, they steal a single to midwicket
ojha to uthappa, no run, flatter delivery, the batsman has to change to defence after coming out of the crease..
malinga to uthappa, 1 wide, attempts the slower one, but this one slips down the leg side
malinga to uthappa, no run, and again, this movement is troubling robin. he wanted to dab this to the leg side but gets a leading edge to cover

malinga to uthappa, four runs, now he gets an outside edge, but this is a cruel world if you are bowler.. there is no slip in place and the third-man is square..not that ojha would have stopped it ... robin lets malinga know that he is struggling by tapping his shoulder
malinga to uthappa, no run, another of those outswingers, the batsman defends it to cover point
ojha to gambhir, 1 run, he skips out of the crease and whips the turning delivery to square leg.. malinga makes a half-stop but can't prevent the single
ojha to gambhir, 2 runs, lots of air on this one, gambhir comes out of the crease but as the ball spins in, he gets an inside edge down to fine leg
ojha to uthappa, no run, he goes back and punches this flatter delivery straight to cover
harbhajan singh to gambhir, no run, gets big turn and the batsman lets it go as it's wide
harbhajan singh to pandey, 1 wide, big spin greets pandey, but it spins too far down the leg side. oh, they are checking for the stumping.. pandey never lifted his foot. a bit unnecessary
ojha to uthappa, 1 run, tosses it up outside off, the batsman reaches out and drives it to deep cover
harbhajan singh to pandey, no run, did that hit something? looks like it, probably flicked the pad on its way to the keeper
harbhajan singh to pandey, no run, attempts the doosra, pandey can't get it away, defends it back down the pitch
simmons to pandey, 1 run, comes slow of the surface again, tis time pandey punches it to deep cover

simmons to uthappa, four runs, that stays very very low! he brings his bat down just in time and manages to get an outside edge for a boundary..mumbai lost a wicket to that kind of ball.. simmons it was
simmons to uthappa, 1 run, another single, this time he pushes it to cover point for a single
ojha to uthappa, no run, looks to chop it through point, but can't beat simmons there
ojha to pandey, no run, he comes out of the crease and punches the flatter delivery to cover
ojha to pandey, no run, slower from ojha, the batsman pushes it to cover again
ojha to pandey, no run, looks to find that tiny gap at backward point, but unfortunately he can't
bumrah to pandey, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, pandey stretches out and pushes it to wide mid-off for a single
harbhajan singh to pathan, no run, bowls a slower one outside off, the batsman defends it to the off

harbhajan singh to pathan, 1 run, quicker delivery this time and it was very low too.. had he missed, he was going to be plumb.. but he manages to get some bat and hits it to square leg for his opening run

simmons to uthappa, out, middle stump takes a beating! uthappa was staying still while playing those smooth drives, but this time he moves to the leg side to make room and just plainly misses this one..
malinga to pathan, 1 wide, gautam is enthusiastic behind the wicket and appeals for a caught behind, but this was a wide down the leg side.. yusuf gives him a stare
malinga to pathan, four runs, this is down the leg side and yusuf manages to tickle it past the diving wicketkeeper
simmons to pathan, 1 run, waits an extra bit and punches it in the air past the non-striker for a single
simmons to shakib al hasan, 1 run, he looks for the big one, but can only get it as far as mid-on as this hits the toe of the bat
simmons to pathan, no run, slides down the leg side but not given a wide. yusuf is again not impressed
duminy to rahane, no run, he comes round the wicket and pushes it through on off, the batsman looks to punch it to off but chops it close to the stumps
duminy to rahane, 1 run, lots of air on this one, the batsman whips it to deep midwicket for a single
shukla to rahane, no run, corrects his line and bowls this wide outside off, gets some away movement. rahane lets it go through
shukla to rahane, four runs, big outside edge and the keeper and the gully fielder look at each other, perfectly bisected, like using those compasses in school geometry..
nadeem to cooper, 1 run, moves to the leg side and throws his bat straightaway, doesn't get any timing, but picks a  single to deep midwicket
nadeem to cooper, six runs, flatter and cooper likes to swing! he bared his intentions in the first ball, this time he goes all the way.. straight towards the sight screen
nadeem to rahane, 1 run, a touch on the leg side, easily dabbed to midwicket for a single
nadeem to cooper, six runs, this is not timed at all, but cooper sends it over long-off! the fielder was kept interested, this is just over him.
nadeem to cooper, 1 run, makes room and blasts it through extra cover, but there is a fielder in the deep for that shot..
imran tahir to cooper, four runs, this is a proper legspinner and it turns too, takes the outside edge to run down to third-man boundary
imran tahir to cooper, no run, swing and a miss! this spins past the outside edge and beats him
nadeem to rahane, 1 run, pushed through on the stumps, he dabs it towards deep midwicket for a single
nadeem to rahane, no run, some turn now, it beats the outside edge as rahane looks to turn it to midwicket
duminy to cooper, 1 wide, sprays it way outside off from round the stumps
duminy to rahane, 1 run, turned to deep midwicket for a single
tiwary to samson, six runs, tosses it up again, this is around off, samson comes out immediately, and deposits it over the straight boundary
duminy to rahane, 1 run, quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman punches it down to long off
duminy to samson, 1 wide, fires it across the batsman, this is a bit too wide outside off, umpire not impressed
nadeem to samson, 1 wide, fires this wide down the leg side from over the wicket
nadeem to samson, 1 run, fires it on the base of offstump, the batsman toe-ends it to deep extra cover
nadeem to rahane, out, that's hit the top of middle and stump! rahane has gone too far down the leg to make room and this one spins to beat his bat-swing
imran tahir to samson, 1 run, looks to cart it through cover, but doesn't get any timing, picks up a single to cover
tiwary to faulkner, 1 run, slower on the stumps, the batsman can only pick a single to cover

faulkner to agarwal, out, attempts the uthappa straight loft over mid-off but fails, he doesn't get it off the middle and ends up chipping it towards mid-off where smith back pedals to take a simple catch

faulkner to karthik, 1 run, unmukt runs in from point and hits the stumps direct, but kp makes it in time.. he is gone! hello hello! he has not slid his bat in.. it gets stuck in the mud before the line.. it hasn't been referrred.. this is the repeat  of few matches ago when he was out and no one checked.. this is big big.. rr don't appeal for it... it happened the last time when dd played against royals in delhi.. kp is very lucky.. very very lucky
cooper to duminy, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, the batsman guides it down to third man
cooper to pietersen, 1 wide, atrocious ball! this is very very wide down the leg side
tambe to duminy, 1 run, pushed through outside off, jp drives it to long off for a single
bhatia to pietersen, 1 wide, this is too far down the leg side, easy call
tambe to taylor, 1 wide, slips this down the leg side, another wide
tambe to tiwary, 1 wide, fires this one flat, but this is a big wide down the leg side, samson has to dive to get to it
tambe to tiwary, 1 run, this one is flatter and spins away, tiwary drags it to deep midwicket
tambe to tiwary, 1 run, comes down the pitch and drags the slower one down to deep midwicket without much timing
tambe to jadhav, 1 run, flatter delivery, jadhav comes out of the crease and chips it to long off
bhatia to tiwary, six runs, another slower slower ball, but this time tiwary makes some momentum by coming out of the crease and hammers it long over the cow corner

binny to imran tahir, out, tahir walks all the way to the off side to play a ramp, binny keeps it straight and simple and preys on tahir's error.. the batsman misses and the ball smashes the off stick
kulkarni to tiwary, 1 run, kulkarni brings in some welcome pace, the batsman whips it to deep square leg easily
cooper to shukla, no run, swing and a miss, it bounces over the middle stump
cooper to tiwary, no run, wants to drag this one from outside off to the leg side, misses it completely
cooper to tiwary, four runs, slower ball outside off, tiwary drags this to deep backward square leg boundary
cooper to tiwary, 1 run, meanwhile tiwary gets to his half-century with a push to deep cover
kulkarni to kaul, 1 run, comes back over the wicket, the batsman steers it to third man for a single
kulkarni to tiwary, 2 runs, slower delivery, swung across the line to deep square leg.. there was a mix-up, but binny's wild throws allows them to complete the second easily
kulkarni to tiwary, 1 wide, fires this wide down the leg side
kulkarni to tiwary, no run, bowls it wide outside off and the game is over

ahmed to mccullum, 1 run, that was a chance! and ab doesn't hit the target! it was pushed into the covers and they made a bit of late decision for the single. the fielder rushes in and sort of looped the throw past the stumps. where was the one-bounce hurl?
ahmed to smith, no run, keeps attacking the stumps and smith keeps it out
starc to hussey, no run, bit of room, but huss drives straight to cover. sweet timing.
muralitharan to hussey, no run, rips from outside off and huss tries to nudge it away off his knees. murali's begun spinning that old web
ahmed to hussey, 1 run, dabbed past the keeper to deep third man. nechim is the new bowler and he sticks to a channel just outside off
ahmed to hussey, 1 run, pushed across him and raina hangs his bat out to dry. moved away off the seam there
chahal to hussey, 1 run, this time he drifts a little too close to leg stump and it's picked away through square leg
aaron to raina, four runs, this was the cross-seamed delivery angled into the off stump, raina holds his ground and steers this into the third man boundary
chahal to raina, no run, nips down the track a bit, but has to settle for a defensive push
muralitharan to hussey, 1 run, turned away behind square leg and gayle finds it hard to get down and employs the boot
muralitharan to raina, 1 run, chips down the track and pushes down to long-off
muralitharan to dhoni, no run, backs away a touch and taps it into the covers

ahmed to raina, 2 runs, he's brilliant on the boundary! this was soundly hit as raina moved across to off stump and carved it through the covers. starc had to rush to his left and slide to keep it in the field of play.
ahmed to raina, 1 run, goes for the wild hoick and gets a thick outside edge that skews off to deep third man
sharma to patel, no run, gets a little seam away, but it was pushed a little too far across the left-hander for him to reach
ashwin to gayle, no run, gets turn early as he pitches on off stump. gayle stays back and blocks away from the body
ashwin to gayle, 1 run, scoots in low at him as the surface gives off a puff of dust. picked away into the midwicket region
badree to patel, 1 run, nudged into the midwicket region as badree continues to tuck him up on leg stump
badree to gayle, no run, down the track and he's drilled it back to the bowler, who shells it. the crowd think it's a catch, but it was a bump ball.
badree to kohli, no run, this was the wrong 'un just outside off, kohli goes back and pushes to the bowler
raina to kohli, 1 run, goes down the track, but this is pushed through flatter. kohli whips it away to square leg
raina to gayle, no run, pushes him back with a skidder on middle and leg, gayle keeps it out
raina to kohli, 1 run, turn for raina as well, and this seemed to keep a touch low. kohli doesn't mind as he flicks it away to deep midwicket
jadeja to kohli, 2 runs, waits on it and then guides it past the lone slip fielder. wonderful hands from kohli
jadeja to kohli, no run, tries it again, but this time jaddu gets enough turn and bounce to beat him
raina to kohli, no run, skips down the track but his flick can't beat square leg
raina to kohli, 1 run, this time ashwin fumbles. kohli places it to his right but he is a little slow to set off
raina to gayle, no run,
jadeja to gayle, 1 wide, pushed too far outside off to draw gayle's interest
raina to gayle, 1 run, goes down the track and eases it behind the vacant square leg area
raina to kohli, 1 run, advances down the pitch and picks up a single straight of midwicket
raina to kohli, 1 run, skips down the track and eases it through extra cover. for only a single. kohli punches his thighs in frustration

jadeja to kohli, out, saw him coming down and he fired it flat and outside off. kohli tries to reach out as far as he could, but the pitch enables the ball to turn a lot more than he anticipated. he must have known he was in trouble halfway through his shot and though he tries his best to push that back leg of his back to safety, it gets stuck on the line. dhoni takes care of the rest
jadeja to de villiers, 1 run, sliced to extra cover, who leaps up in hopes of catching it but it bursts through his hands. i had originally thought it was a bump ball but it was a chance!
jadeja to gayle, four runs, this time he drags it from outside off and mauls it over midwicket.
jadeja to gayle, no run, goes for the trifecta, but this time he can't reach the flatter delivery pushed outside off
ashwin to gayle, no run, pushed through on middle and off, gayle goes back and punches it back to the bowler
ashwin to gayle, 1 run, goes back and slaps it through the covers and gets off strike
hussey to de villiers, 2 runs, skips down the track and swiped it to deep midwicket and collects two
hussey to yuvraj singh, 2 runs, bowls a flat one outside off and yuvi belts it for a couple to deep midwicket
ut yadav to ojha, no run, ends with a 143.4 kph outswinger on off stump that is softly pushed to point
morkel to ojha, 1 run, taps it softly on the off side for a single
morkel to dhawan, no run, he makes lots of room outside leg to a 150.6 kph delivery slanted across, but misses
morkel to dhawan, 1 run,
narine to ojha, no run, turning away from the right hander, pushed square on the off side
shakib al hasan to ojha, 1 bye, missed stumping, ojha's charged out to one that does not turn, carries in with the angle past his swipe, but uthappa cannot collect it
shakib al hasan to ojha, no run, turned straight to midwicket
narine to rahul, 1 run, bowls a straighter one outside off, the batsman pushes it through cover for a single
narine to rahul, no run, flatter and quicker, comes in after pitching, the batsman defends
narine to rahul, no run, stays in the crease and defends this to midwicket
narine to rahul, four runs, goes across to the offside and laps this straighter delivery fine on the leg side for a smartly controlled boundary, uses the bowler's pace
chawla to rahul, no run, reaches a wide legbreak and slaps it to extra cover
chawla to warner, 1 run, slaps a wrong 'un square on the off side
morkel to rahul, 1 run, stays on the crease to a 144.4 kph pitched-up ball outside off and runs it to third man
morkel to warner, four runs, thick outside edge flies past the keeper as warner pushes from the crease to one leaving him
chawla to rahul, 1 run, comes down the track to a legbreak and turns it from outside off through midwicket
chawla to pathan, 1 run, pushed down to long off
narine to pathan, 2 runs, drags this wide of deep midwicket for a couple
chawla to pathan, four runs, irfan skips out, and carts it straight over the bowler, times it well enough to beat the deep fielders
kumar to gambhir, no run, this one swings away and flies past the outside edge as gambhir attempts his trademark poke to third man
kumar to gambhir, no run, he steps out of the crease and wants to smack it over the infield, but this one swings away again and beats the outside edge
kumar to gambhir, four runs, this one comes in to him but gambhir gets on top of that and despite there not being much room, he smashes it behind point for a boundary
steyn to uthappa, 1 run, this one could have been risky but gambhir makes it to the other end in time. robin pushed it softly to the left of warner at point
sharma to pandey, no run, some turn and bounce just outside off, pushed back to the bowler
steyn to uthappa, six runs, next ball after the drop goes for six, steyn angles it into the pad, and uthappa connects so well on the flick it goes well over the man at deep midwicket

mishra to uthappa, no run, was that an edge, this slides in with the angle at 88 kph as uthappa backs away and misses, it almost hits the middle stump, bounces just over in the end, keeper cannot collect
sharma to uthappa, 1 run, comes down the track and drives along the ground to long off
sharma to uthappa, 2 runs, turned through midwicket for a couple
pathan to pandey, 1 run, comes down the track but can only force it past cover for one
pathan to pathan, no run, a slower one on the stumps, yusuf plays it back
pathan to pandey, 1 run, reaches for a wide one but drags it down to long off without any timing
pathan to pathan, no run, turned to square leg
mishra to pandey, no run, flat and sliding down the pad, he tries to lift it behind square, misses
mishra to pandey, 1 run, turned to deep midwicket for a single

sharma to pathan, 1 run, stands outside leg before the ball is bowled, karn bowls it just outside leg, yusuf cannot find much power as he hits to steyn's left at long off, fast bowler does not allow a second
mishra to pathan, 1 run, hit hard down to long off
kulkarni to simmons, no run, second appeal of the over for lbw but it is headed down leg once more, simmons caught on the crease and missing the tuck to leg
ankit sharma to simmons, 1 run, moves down the track, bowler angles it in, and simmons turns it to deep midwicket
ankit sharma to simmons, 1 run, backs away outside leg and drives to wide long off
faulkner to hussey, four runs, shot, hussey is stepping out first ball, and places the drive through the small gap at extra cover
faulkner to simmons, four runs, and again, simmons makes plenty of room outside leg stump now and slices the drive in the air, through the gap at point
bhatia to simmons, no run, cannot get this one around off away, bhatia fields on the off side
kulkarni to simmons, 1 run,
kulkarni to simmons, 1 run, down to third man who runs to his right and keeps them to one
bhatia to simmons, 1 run, simmons stands outside leg, bhatia's delivery takes its time in arriving at 88 kph, simmons almost hits it back to the bowler, just past his left to long off

bhatia to simmons, 1 run, and bhatia almost gets simmons again, he had walked out, bhatia bowled his leg roller, and it bounced and moved away, simmons pushed and it popped just wide of the bowler to his left
faulkner to hussey, 1 run, hussey times another drive through the off side, extra cover dives, takes pace off it
ankit sharma to simmons, no run, straightening on middle, simmons cannot force it past the bowler
ankit sharma to simmons, no run, makes some room, but slaps it straight to extra cover

bhatia to pollard, no run, clear run-out chance missed, pollard had no chance of making it  back after coming too far down, midwicket picked up the ball and fired it to the keeper, who broke the stumps, but before that, he let the ball slip out of his gloves
cooper to sharma, no run, charges out and heaves, only manages an inside edge to the left of the keeper, samson gathers, throws and hits the stumps, but rohit has just made it back
faulkner to sharma, no run, now he beats rohit, who makes room outside leg, faulkner follows him there, and generates some more late swing to beat the bat
bumrah to chand, no run, comes in sharply with the angle, chand pushes it towards point
bumrah to chand, no run, he looks to punch through point, but it comes in sharply from outside off, and beats the inside edge
bumrah to nair, 1 wide, bowls it much straighter but it starts way outside off
santokie to chand, 1 wide, swings it in but it starts outside leg and moves further down
ojha to samson, no run, it straightens just outside off, he punches from the crease to point
harbhajan singh to cooper, 1 wide, way down the leg side, cooper has a crack at it, misses
gopal to binny, no run, comes down the track to one that does not turn much, and swats it to extra cover
harbhajan singh to hodge, no run, another one pings the pad, and harbhajan's appeal turned down again, possibly outside the line once more
harbhajan singh to hodge, no run,
gopal to faulkner, no run, goes back to punch a legbreak to the bowler
gopal to faulkner, 2 runs, has him reaching to a spinning delivery, thick outside edge runs past slip
harbhajan singh to faulkner, no run, flat offbreak outside off, turned to midwicket
harbhajan singh to hodge, no run,
ojha to faulkner, 1 run, comes in towards middle and leg, he makes room and punches to long off
santokie to hodge, 1 wide, hurls it way outside off stump with the angle
bumrah to faulkner, 1 wide, bowls it too far outside off this time
sandeep sharma to vijay, 1 run, bit of inswing. lots of inswing, in fact, and vijay gets an inside edge that skitters away towards fine leg.
sandeep sharma to pietersen, no run, straightens this time, from just outside off, and kp defends solidly. he's taking guard outside the crease.
