sandeep sharma to pietersen, 1 run, jams this off the inside part of his bat towards backward square leg
hendricks to vijay, no run, slower ball, angled from middle towards off, goes off the inside edge towards midwicket.
hendricks to vijay, no run, good line, giving the batsman no room. vijay tries to force it past point, finds the fielder.
sandeep sharma to pietersen, 1 run, stays in his crease, opens his bat-face to steer it behind point.
sandeep sharma to vijay, 1 wide, swing, but it's wasted, goes way down the leg side
hendricks to pietersen, four runs, bit of width again, sits up, and kp stays leg side of the ball to flay it between point and cover
hendricks to pietersen, four runs, width again, and kp throws his bat at it. thick edge goes flying away to the left of third man.
sandeep sharma to karthik, 1 wide, uh oh. another one slides down the leg side.
patel to pietersen, no run, skids on, kp misses the flick, and it thuds into his pad, but well wide of leg stump.
patel to pietersen, no run, another one goes with the arm. kp was looking to drive through the covers, gets an inside edge that trickles towards fine leg.
dhawan to karthik, 1 run, slower ball, driven down to a straightish mid-off.
dhawan to pietersen, 2 runs, another typical rishi dhawan delivery, angled in towards off, and kp stays leg-side of it and drives it to deep cover.
patel to karthik, no run, goes with the angle, dowm the leg side, and it hits dk's pad as he misses the flick
patel to pietersen, 2 runs, flicked towards mid-on
patel to pietersen, 1 run, stays next to the line of a straight ball and drives it towards deep cover
patel to karthik, 1 run, gets bat on it this time, good-looking flick to deep midwicket.
dhawan to karthik, no run, walks across the stumps, tries to work this from outside off past midwicket, hits it to the fielder.
dhawan to karthik, 1 run, tries to flick, gets an inside-edge onto the pad, bounces off towards point.
shivam sharma to karthik, 2 runs, turns in from off, tucked away towards midwicket, maxi runs in from the boundary and sends in a flat throw to the keeper, but the batsmen completed two comfortably.
patel to pietersen, no run, keeps a bit low, kp is vigilant, jams down on it.
patel to duminy, no run, driven down to mid-off.
dhawan to duminy, 1 run, pushed towards long-off for a single by duminy
dhawan to karthik, 1 run, eased towards long-off for a single
dhawan to duminy, 1 run,
shivam sharma to karthik, 1 run, wants to bludgeon this one, can one send it dribbling towards midwicket
shivam sharma to duminy, 1 run, tucked to the leg side for a single, and that will be the strategic time-out
hendricks to tiwary, 1 run, send away towards deep midwicket for a single
patel to mohammed shami, no run, skips down the track, defended by shamoi
patel to tiwary, 2 runs, a swipe towards midwicket, tiwary scrambles back for the second
patel to tiwary, 1 run, tapped to the off side for a single, which means there's just four from the final over
parnell to vohra, 1 wide, that was too far outside off for vohra
parnell to vohra, 1 run, on leg stump, vohra goes deep in the crease and tucks the ball towards square leg
parnell to sehwag, 1 run, behind square leg for one more
mohammed shami to vohra, 1 wide, down the leg side, 142kph
mohammed shami to sehwag, no run, struck on the body this time as shami angles the ball in
mohammed shami to sehwag, no run, blocks the ball, drops a couple of yards away from him but the batsmen still pinch a single
parnell to vohra, 1 wide, starts with one well down the leg side, parnell hitting good pace here, 144kph
parnell to vohra, 1 wide, chases a ball that is wide outside off, this time a wide on the other side of the wicket
parnell to vohra, four runs, lovely drive from vohra, beats a diving pietersen at cover for four
mohammed shami to vohra, no run, vohra looks to guide the ball down to third man but it slips past the outside off

unadkat to sehwag, 2 runs, dropped, that was a tough chance for tahir at mid-off, he had run back to get under the ball, and had to take the catch as the ball dropped over his shoulder, he was well placed to take it, but couldn't finish the job, it was a checked drive from sehwag which sends the ball soaring to mid-off
unadkat to sehwag, no run, stays low outside off, sehwag can't get bat on it
unadkat to sehwag, 1 run, pushed behind point for a single this time
unadkat to sehwag, 1 wide, another wide, down the leg side, daredevils giving away freebies here
unadkat to sehwag, no run,

mohammed shami to sehwag, 1 run, shami sees sehwag backing away and follows his, sehwag pushes the ball towards the off side and takes off, a direct hit would have given a few anxious moments for vohra, but there isn't one
imran tahir to maxwell, no run, defended back towards the bowler this time
imran tahir to maxwell, six runs, and it begins, maxwell effortlessly swipes that a long long way, to cow corner for a big six, the crowd is delirious
imran tahir to maxwell, 1 run, driven towards deep extra cover for a single
imran tahir to maxwell, 2 runs, skids straight on after pitching on off stump, chopped towards deep point for two
duminy to miller, no run, defended back towards the bowler, duminy getting through a quiet over here
duminy to patel, 1 run, sliding on towards off, inside-edges it towards backward square leg
unadkat to patel, no run, slants in towards off, batsman opens the face and misses
unadkat to patel, 1 run, hacked towards long-off for a single, bringing up the 100
duminy to patel, 1 run, driven along the ground towards long-off for a single

unadkat to saha, 3 runs, from round the wicket, pushed towards cover, where it should have been a single at most, but shami put in an amateur effort and lets the ball through, conceding two extra runs
duminy to saha, no run, saha again going for the reverse-dab, bottom edges it and the ball bounces through to the keeper
duminy to saha, no run, dances down the track and defends to the off side
duminy to saha, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
mohammed shami to patel, no run, defended back towards the bowler
parnell to patel, no run,
imran tahir to patel, no run, spinning away from the left-hander who defends towards point
imran tahir to patel, no run, bottom edges the ball towards first slip this time, pretty cool that they have a first slip in place at this stage of the innings
imran tahir to bailey, 1 run, guided to backward point to complete a quick single
imran tahir to patel, 1 run, steps down and drives towards long-off for a single
imran tahir to patel, 1 run, pushed towards cover for a tight single, almost an overthrow there, direct hit would have been close there
imran tahir to dhawan, no run, dot ball, dhawan can't get it away, down the track
kumar to gayle, 1 leg bye, leg-stumpish, bit of swing into gayle, tucks it off his hips to deep backward square.
kumar to patel, no run, another one leaves parthiv, extravagant movement, and parthiv lets it go.
kumar to kohli, no run, teasing line, just outside off, bit of outswing. kohli lets it go.
steyn to gayle, 2 runs, tucked off the hips to the right of deep backward square leg
kumar to gayle, no run, flicked from outside off to backward square leg
kumar to gayle, 1 run, tucked off the hips to deep square leg
steyn to kohli, 1 run, opens his bat face, steers it behind point
parvez rasool to kohli, 1 run, takes a couple of steps down the track, tucks it towards midwicket with the turn
sharma to yuvraj singh, 1 leg bye, legbreak, turns from leg and middle down the leg side, seemed to go off his pad
sharma to yuvraj singh, no run,
parvez rasool to yuvraj singh, no run, tucked away from outside off to square leg
parvez rasool to yuvraj singh, no run, bit of width, yuvraj forces it straight to cover
sharma to yuvraj singh, no run, bit of turn, pitches middle, straightens towards middle and leg, defended
sharma to kohli, 2 runs, driven to the right of warner at deep cover
sharma to kohli, no run, down the track, driven to long-off
venugopal rao to yuvraj singh, no run, down the track, defends
parvez rasool to yuvraj singh, four runs, sees yuvraj come down the pitch, rasool fires it down the leg side, too far wide for naman to take. oh. hang on. there was some bat on that, as yuvraj swept.
parvez rasool to yuvraj singh, 1 run, tucked towards square leg
parvez rasool to kohli, 1 run, down the pitch, flicked to deep square leg
parvez rasool to yuvraj singh, no run, quickish, defended into the on side
sharma to kohli, six runs, down the pitch, kohli swings those arms through the line, and it goes high, and way over the straight boundary
parvez rasool to kohli, 1 run, driven down to long-off
parvez rasool to de villiers, 2 wides, drifts down the leg side, naman doesn't gather cleanly
parvez rasool to kohli, 1 wide, change of angle doesn't help. way down the leg side again
parvez rasool to kohli, 1 run, tucked away to deep square leg
pathan to kohli, 1 run, straighter this tinme, pushed down to long-off
pathan to de villiers, 1 run, ab stays next to the line, slaps it to deep point
pathan to de villiers, four runs, width, ab slashes at it on one knee, gets a thick edge that races down to the third man boundary. poor ball.
pathan to de villiers, 1 run, walks across the stumps, scoops it from outside off to deep backward square leg
sammy to de villiers, six runs, slower ball, ab spotted that early, and he waits, keeps a stable base, and swings cleanly through the line to launch that over the long-off boundary
sammy to kohli, six runs, slower ball again, and again, no disguise, and kohli sends that whistling back over his head
kumar to de villiers, 1 run, that's very wide of off, and ab slaps it to cover, where sammy misfields, ball goes rolling down to long-off

pathan to kohli, out, he's gone! kohli swings through the line again, doesn't quite hit it cleanly. it was there to be hit, but this one goes high and drops into steyn's palms, cupped australian-style, after he runs to his right from long-off.
muralitharan to dhawan, no run, once again, dhawan opens his face and pushes it to point.
starc to dhawan, 1 run, tucked into the on side
starc to warner, 1 bye, slower ball outside off stump, warner slashes and misses, and parthiv fumbles behind the stumps as the ball rolls down towards him
muralitharan to warner, no run, pushed down to mid-on
ahmed to warner, 1 run, straighter this time, and warner knocks it down to long-off
chahal to dhawan, no run, dhawan stays back to this one. it keeps a little low, but he still manages to squirt it into the off side with an open face
ahmed to dhawan, no run, dhawan jumps up and squirts this rising ball down into the ground
muralitharan to warner, 1 run, tucked off the legs towards midwicket
chahal to dhawan, 1 run, pushed down to mid-off
muralitharan to dhawan, 1 run, fifty for dhawan. goes back in his crease and tucks it away towards midwicket
muralitharan to warner, 2 runs,
muralitharan to ojha, 1 run, goes back, opens his face, pushes the ball towards point
chahal to ojha, no run, pushed through, defended into the leg side
chahal to ojha, 1 run, quickish, flat ball on off stump, and naman opens his bat face to dab it to point
starc to warner, 1 run, slower ball, and warner pushes his hands at it but checks himself at the last moment to chip it just wide of the bowler, to his right, for the single to long-off

aaron to ojha, 1 bye, slower ball, and it goes between the batsman and leg stump as he heaves and misses. rolls down to parthiv, and the batsmen set off for a bye. parthiv misses with his underarm throw.
aaron to ojha, six runs, he's given ojha room outside off, and he's used it brilliantly, leaning back and slicing under the ball to send it soaring over the deep point boundary
aaron to sammy, 1 run, slower ball, outside off, and sammy clubs that down to long-off
shakib al hasan to smith, no run, pummels it once more, on the bounce to mid-on
shakib al hasan to mccullum, no run, arm ball towards middle stump, watchful defence to end the over, good comeback from shakib after that opening ball four
cummins to smith, no run, starts with a 138kph delivery outside off, swerves away after pitching outside off, swings and misses

cummins to smith, out, instant impact from cummins! a beauty from him to knock over off stump, a rare failure for smith, he as caught on the crease, played down the wrong line as the ball swings, he was looking to play it on middle stump line, ball takes out off stump
cummins to raina, no run, can't time another pitched-up ball, which rolls away towards midwicket
ut yadav to mccullum, 1 wide, umesh starts with a wide down the leg side
ut yadav to raina, no run, pats this past the bowler, wants a single but mccullum doesn't
cummins to mccullum, no run, driven towards mid-off by mccullum
narine to raina, no run, spinning towards off after pitching around leg stump, careful defence
narine to raina, no run, superb over from narine after the first-ball six, rounds it off with five dot balls, the final delivery is dabbed towards point
shakib al hasan to mccullum, 1 run, mccullum gets back in the crease and tucks the ball towards deep square leg
shakib al hasan to raina, no run, comes down the track and defends to the off side
shakib al hasan to mccullum, no run, darts in towards off stump, blocked towards cover
ut yadav to raina, 1 run, guides the ball towards deep midwicket for a single
ut yadav to raina, 2 runs, thick inside edge, the ball fizzes away towards fine leg

shakib al hasan to raina, four runs, dropped, raina goes for the big hit, struck high on the bat and the ball swirls high, and doesn't carry long enough, yusuf pathan at long-off should have taken that, don't think he moved quickly enough, gets his hands on the ball as it is dropping, can't hang on, raina survives
shakib al hasan to raina, 1 run, pushed to long-off for a single
chawla to raina, no run, another edge, leading edge as raina looks to whip the ball to the leg side, the ball goes towards cover
narine to raina, 1 run, down the leg side, swiped towards backward square leg
narine to du plessis, 1 run, spins away just a touch outside off, guides it towards cover for a single
chawla to du plessis, no run, spinning away outside off, driven by faf, straight to gambhir at silly point, gambhir is struck on the chest after a firm drive into the ground
chawla to du plessis, 1 run, skips down the track and sends the ball towards mid-on
chawla to raina, six runs, raina is amazing in the ipl, can accelerate when he wants, this is a clean hit over cow corner for six
chawla to raina, 1 run, stays back in the crease and guides the ball behind point

cummins to du plessis, four runs, another slower one, nicely done by faf, waits for the ball to arrive and softly helps it along to fine leg, it was a flat-batted shot but he wasn't looking to power the ball
narine to du plessis, 1 run, spinning away outside off, another single for faf, who is happy to let raina take the bulk of the strike
narine to du plessis, 1 run, goes deep in the crease and slaps the ball towards deep point for a single
shakib al hasan to raina, 1 wide, rare poor ball from shakib, way outside off

shakib al hasan to raina, six runs, six more for raina, he was a nervous chap for a while after launching that ball towards the long-off boundary, manish pandey was wait9ing for the ball to land, it is behind manish and beyond the rope, manish gets a hand on it as he leaps to his left but can't prevent the six
cummins to raina, 1 run, well outside off, carved towards deep point
chawla to dhoni, 1 run, quicker, and on off stump, shifting from the outside leg line, whipped towards midwicket for a single
narine to dhoni, 1 run, spins away from dhoni this time, dhoni lashes the ball to point and takes a quick single
narine to dhoni, no run, spinning away outside off, dhoni chases but can't connect
narine to dhoni, no run, quicker and zips through outside off, again dhoni can't connect, one over to go
hilfenhaus to uthappa, 1 wide, slants this down leg with the angle
hilfenhaus to uthappa, 1 run, pushed softly into the off side for a single
pandey to uthappa, four runs, the man is in some touch, pandey takes away the width this time, so uthappa opens the face, beats slip easily, that is all he needs to do
pandey to uthappa, 1 run, well bowled, this one comes in from just outside off, uthappa turns it behind square leg

sharma to uthappa, four runs, dropped, just a i type that he's middling it, he edges a pitched-up ball, through to slip once more, raina's chance to give uthappa a chance now, what's more and that is four more, this was a mich tougher chance than ashwin's, lower and to raina's left
sharma to uthappa, 1 run, pushed towards mid-off for a single
sharma to gambhir, four runs, now he's off the mark, through his favourite backward point region for four, how many boundaries have there been already?
pandey to uthappa, no run, swings and misses, the ball was swerving away outside off, uthappa looks to drive through extra cover, no bat
pandey to uthappa, 1 run, is he gone run-out? there is a direct hit, but uthappa is in, uthappa pushed the ball towards mid-off and set off immediately, shouting for the single
hilfenhaus to gambhir, 1 run,
ashwin to gambhir, 1 run, on middle stump, whipped towards square leg
ashwin to uthappa, 1 run, defended towards point for a single, this is a superb start from kkr

ashwin to gambhir, no run, run-out? gambhir is just in though dhoni has again shown off his quick thinking, gambhir guided the ball towards point and set off, uthappa sends him back, hilfenhaus fields and fires in the throw, dhoni doesn't collect the ball but just deflects it onto the stumps, gambhir is back in, just
ashwin to gambhir, 1 run, towards backward point for a single
sharma to pandey, 1 run, mohit gets the ball to curl in, thick inside edge towards square leg
ashwin to uthappa, no run, big appeal for lbw, did that pitch in line? ashwin from round the wicket, uthappa caught on the crease, appeal turned down
ashwin to pandey, 1 run, whipped towards deep square leg
pandey to uthappa, 1 run, guided to backward point for one more
jadeja to pandey, 1 run,
ashwin to shakib al hasan, 1 run, skips down the track, tucks the ball towards square leg
jadeja to pandey, no run, defended to the off side, shakib wanted one, pandey didn't, they decide against it
jadeja to shakib al hasan, 1 run, mows it towards midwicket once more, not quite off the middle, the ball rolls towards the man in the deep
raina to shakib al hasan, four runs, shakib doing the job kkr need, skips out and launches this over the bowler's head for four
raina to shakib al hasan, 1 run, making room and slaps this towards deep point, shakib showing why he should be playing at no. 4 in the order
raina to pandey, 1 run, pandey clobbers that towards midwicket, a dive from mccullum almost stops that powerful hit
hilfenhaus to pandey, 1 run, mistimes it towards midwicket for one more

hilfenhaus to shakib al hasan, four runs, kkr galloping away with this game now, another boundary to shakib, gets on one knee and hammers this towards deep square leg, should have been two, but smith makes a has of the stop, letting the ball through for four

sharma to shakib al hasan, four runs, crunch! what a way to finish the game, shakib pummels that over the bowler's head to confirm an easy win, prompting the release of loads of purple balloons in the stands, csk outclassed today and kkr get their fifth victory in a row
kumar to sehwag, no run, this straightened from off stump, and sehwag checks his shot to push it towards cover
kumar to sehwag, 1 wide, uh oh. praveen doesn't seem to be in rhythm. this slides down the leg side. no real swing either.
santokie to sehwag, six runs, another slower one, outside off, but sehwag has seen it early. waits an age before launching it back over the bowler's head
kumar to vohra, no run, outswinger, outside off. vohra pokes and misses
gopal to marsh, 2 runs, better this time. hangs in the air a bit before turning away from marsh, who gets a leading edge down to long-off
ojha to vohra, 1 run, this one's quite slow, too, and vohra goes back to clip it off his hips towards square leg
ojha to vohra, 1 wide, fired down the leg side, and the umpire's arms shoot out even as aditya tare goes up in a loud appeal for caught behind
gopal to marsh, six runs, down the pitch, and he gets into the perfect position to loft that high and straight
santokie to maxwell, no run, slower ball again, wide outside off, and maxwell pushes it to point
gopal to vohra, no run, fires this down the leg side
santokie to patel, no run, slower ball again, comes back into patel a touch, and he defends it back to the bowler
santokie to patel, 1 run, slower ball, flicked towards square leg from outside off
bumrah to dhawan, 1 run, wide of the crease, angled in towards the top of off stump, rishi opens his face and pushes it behind point
santokie to bailey, 1 run, slower ball again, chipped to long-off.
bumrah to hendricks, out, bowled! that's another slower ball, which crashes into the stumps as hendricks takes a big back-and-across step and swings across the line.
sandeep sharma to simmons, four runs, easy pickings for simmons! he doesn't move his feet but he doesn't need to. it's a gentle-paced loosener wide outside off and he hammers it through covers
sandeep sharma to simmons, 1 wide, this one swings down the leg side and is duly called a wide
sandeep sharma to simmons, no run, here comes the big inswinger, surprises the batsman who was stuck on the crease, tucked to midwicket
hendricks to hussey, 5 wides, slides down the leg side, and it hits saha's right glove as he threw himself sideways
hendricks to simmons, four runs, width this time, and simmons had no need to make room to play his favourite flat-bat slash over the off side. sliced over point this time.
hendricks to simmons, 1 run, angled in, straightened away a touch, and simmons steers it to third man
dhawan to hussey, 1 run, angled across, and that's pretty much been hussey's only run-scoring zone so far, the steer down to third man
patel to hussey, no run, defended into the off side from the crease
patel to hussey, out, bowled him! that turned and skidded through. hussey tried to work it across the line and missed. hit the top of off stump.
patel to rayudu, 1 run, down the pitch, pushed with a straight bat to wide long-off
dhawan to simmons, 1 run, closer to off stump this time, and he opens his face to dab it behind point
dhawan to rayudu, 2 runs, slower ball, on the stumps, chipped straight back over the bowler
dhawan to sharma, 1 run, lets that come onto him and dabs it to third man. he didn't even move his bat there. just angled it and let the ball hit it
patel to sharma, no run, angled in, goes with the arm. rohit dabs it behind point, looks for the single, is sent back
patel to sharma, no run, rohit dabs it behind point again, no single again
patel to sharma, 1 wide, this one is fired down leg. rohit tries to lap it, and misses

sandeep sharma to simmons, six runs, down the pitch, gives himself a lot of room. sandy bowls it on the stumps, and simmons has a lot of room to swing his bat through the line and launch it onto the sightscreen
dhawan to simmons, 1 wide, down the leg side, and saha collects neatly down the leg side and has the bails off in a flash. such a good keeper, he is. but simmons was in no danger.
dhawan to sharma, 1 run, that's a very slow slower ball, and rohit waits before angling his bat face to dab it to third man
shivam sharma to sharma, 1 run, tucked away to deep midwicket for the strolled single
hendricks to simmons, 1 wide, he's struggled with these shifts in angle, and his first ball slides well wide of leg stump

hendricks to sharma, out, that's such a soft dismissal. it's banged in, and rohit had given himself room. he looks to ramp it and gets it off the middle of his bat, but it drops into sandy's hands at third man. was he looking to hit that a bit finer?
hendricks to pollard, 1 run, down the pitch, flicks it between deep square leg and deep midwicket
hendricks to pollard, no run, down the pitch, a bit of bounce, and pollard takes his bottom hand off to defend into the leg side
starc to pandey, no run, a slower one, bowled very wide again, pandey stretches for it, connects again, but picks out cover now
dinda to pandey, no run, and again, he moves outside off stump in the crease now, dinda goes wider, and pandey slaps it straight to cover once more
muralitharan to uthappa, 1 wide, tosses it up well down the leg side, uthappa misses as he tries to nudge it fine
yuvraj singh to pathan, 2 runs, yuvraj goes flat and angles it in next ball, yusuf pushes it softly to vacant midwicket and they have time to take two
yuvraj singh to pathan, no run, tries to whip it to midwicket again, but almost pops it back to the bower

yuvraj singh to pathan, out, yusuf's gifted his wicket away, he pushed to cover and set off for a non-existent single, kohli ran in and lobbed the ball to the keeper, yusuf dived back and should have made it, but his bat was in the air as the keeper took the bails off
chahal to shakib al hasan, 1 run, makes some room to a flat legbreak on middle and guides it square on the off side
yuvraj singh to uthappa, 1 run, drives along the ground to wide long off now
yuvraj singh to shakib al hasan, 2 runs, tries to drag a flat one through midwicket, but the thick inside edge goes fine on the leg side instead
chahal to uthappa, 1 run,
muralitharan to uthappa, 2 runs, turned softly and square on the leg side for a couple
ahmed to shakib al hasan, no run, walks out and has a heave at one angled in, mishits it to midwicket
ahmed to uthappa, 1 run, opens the face again to a wider one, but this travels squarer to third man
chahal to shakib al hasan, four runs, shakib charges out to a wide one, he hasn't middled it, but done enough to pick up a one-bounce four into the straight boundary
chahal to shakib al hasan, four runs, shakib's cranked up and smeared this flat legbreak straight past the bowler

chahal to shakib al hasan, six runs, he sees him coming and bowls it into the pad but shakib is still able to generate plenty of momentum on the swing and lifts it clean over deep midwicket, 89 metres this one, big sixes these
ahmed to shakib al hasan, no run, waits on this one outside off a tad as he tries to find the gap but fails to beat cover again
dinda to shakib al hasan, 1 wide, goes way outside off stump with the angle across the left hander

ahmed to ten doeschate, no run, tendo square-drives crisply but straight to cover, uthappa is a long way up and seems to have no chance of returning, the throw comes to the bowler, he tries to lob it into the stumps, but misses, uthappa smiles
ut yadav to takawale, 1 run, moving away again, steered to third man for a single
morkel to kohli, 1 run, that comes in, is climbing too, kohli handles it well, softly turning it square
morkel to takawale, no run, steepler just outside off at 141.5 kph, takawale tries to guide it over the keeper, but misses again
narine to takawale, four runs, sends it way down the leg side first up and takawale gets some bat on it to send it fine
narine to takawale, no run, straighter one jabbed behind point, he is not getting the single
narine to takawale, 1 run, another carom ball, outside off, turned to midwicket
narine to takawale, no run, quick and straight on middle at 99 kph, defended back
shakib al hasan to takawale, 1 run, tosses up slowly just outside off, he opens the face to turn it to third man
shakib al hasan to kohli, 1 run, fired into the pad, turned square
vinay kumar to takawale, six runs, vinay goes for more runs, this is wide outside off, and takawale hops as he slashes it over point, all the way over the boundary
shakib al hasan to kohli, no run, slides in to kohli who hits it to point
shakib al hasan to kohli, 1 run, leaves the crease once more, turns it to deep midwicket
shakib al hasan to takawale, 1 run,
morkel to yuvraj singh, 1 run, dropped, by the bowler as he stretches out his left hand after yuvraj flays a wide one straight back
narine to rana, 1 run, straighter one bounces on off, is pushed to backward point for a single
kumar to smith, four runs, poor opening over from kumar, this was wide outside off and he square drives this wide if backward point
steyn to du plessis, no run, punches it to cover and tells smith to stay back
steyn to du plessis, no run, stays back and pushes it to the off side
steyn to du plessis, four runs, another expensive over! steyn too straight again and this time du plessis effortlessly whips it over midwicket
kumar to du plessis, no run, close call for smith as he took off and faf quickly sent him back, throw to the bowler's end was wide
kumar to du plessis, 1 run, on the stumps and tucked away down to deep square leg, fielder was pushed back
sharma to du plessis, 1 run, du plessis gives the charge straightaway and checks his drive to mid-off
sharma to smith, no run,
sharma to smith, no run, stays back and punches it to the on side
steyn to smith, no run, mistimed by smith, he had some width and chopped it to the off side
steyn to smith, no run, goes right back at the crease and punches back to steyn, raina ensures he goes back to his crease
steyn to smith, no run, big swing and a miss, smith nowhere near the ball as he looked to pound this to the on side
steyn to smith, four runs, difficult chance at cover, smith reaches out and drives in the air and rao does well at cover to fling himself to his left but smith's placement got the better of him
steyn to smith, no run, skids onto him and he mistimes it to the on side
parvez rasool to raina, 1 run, gets off the mark with a clip down to midwicket
sharma to hussey, no run, hussey plays it safe first ball as he shoulders arms to karn
parvez rasool to raina, no run, tries to slice it but can't beat backward point
parvez rasool to raina, 1 run, drifts back in and he tucks it to the leg side

sharma to raina, out, raina perishes to the big shot early in his innings, it was a top spinner from karn and raina was down the track and looked to loft it over the sight screen, didn't get the distance, finch jogged to his left from long-off and held it
parvez rasool to hussey, 1 run, makes room and drives this one to long-off
parvez rasool to dhoni, no run, checks his drive down to cover
sharma to hussey, no run, flatter one and he softly pushes it back to the bowler
parvez rasool to dhoni, 2 runs, round the wicket and dhoni gives the charge and looks to slam it over the on side, didn't control it and he chipped it towards deep square leg
parvez rasool to dhoni, no run, flatter one and he pushes it to the bowler
parvez rasool to dhoni, 1 run, he stays back and punches it to long-off
pathan to dhoni, 1 run, he stays back and punches him to mid-off
pathan to hussey, no run, makes room and punches it to point, quiet over
steyn to dhoni, no run, he stays back and punches it down to cover
steyn to dhoni, no run, and this time steyn gets away with width, loose ball but dhoni slashes and misses
pathan to hussey, 1 run, chance for a run out! he made room and pushed it to mid-off and challenged sammy who took aim and missed at the bowler's end, hussey was struggling
pathan to dhoni, 1 run, driven firmly but well stopped by sammy at mid-off

pathan to hussey, four runs, excellent placement by hussey, this was the slower ball and he gives him width, hussey knew there was a gap at third man and placed it well wide of the fielder in the circle
sammy to hussey, 1 run, he drills it down to long-off
sammy to dhoni, 2 leg byes,
sammy to dhoni, 1 wide, fires it down the leg side and well taken by ojha, he breaks the stumps too but dhoni's home
kumar to dhoni, no run, keeper up to the stumps and dhoni goes for a big swing and misses it completely
kumar to dhoni, no run, hammers it down the track and well stopped by the bowler
pathan to hussey, six runs, irfan bowls the slower ball but back fires as hussey makes room and slams it over long-off, had to put more power behind that
pathan to dhoni, no run, looked to slam that over the on side and missed and ojha belted out an appeal, he was up to the stumps and irfan joined in too but the umpire wasn't interested
steyn to dhoni, 2 runs, he forces this one down to deep midwicket for a couple
sharma to warner, four runs, this time he offers room and warner places it wide of point. his timing has been pretty good throughout the season and this time it's no different
sharma to warner, 1 run, spears it in on middle and leg, warner whips it through midwicket
sharma to dhawan, 2 runs, nudged behind square leg and that area is quite vacant
sharma to dhawan, 1 run, misfield at extra cover allows dhawan to retain strike off a backfoot punch
hastings to dhawan, no run, keeps it straight and he can only punch it back to the bowler
hastings to warner, no run, stays back and punches it towards cover and tells warner to wait
hastings to warner, no run, driven hard but can't beat manhas at mid-off
ashwin to dhawan, no run, he comes down the track and pushes it straight to cover
ashwin to warner, 1 run, makes room and punches it to mid-off who's a bit deep
ashwin to dhawan, 1 run, he goes back and punches it to mid-on
ashwin to dhawan, 1 run, he comes down the track and checks the loft to long-off
jadeja to warner, 1 wide, he slides this one wide down the leg side
jadeja to warner, 1 run, forced away down to deep midwicket
ashwin to dhawan, 1 run, very good running, dhawan pushes it with soft hands towards cover and calls and warner is quick to respond

hastings to warner, out, warner's dragged it on, but bizarrely it took hastings a few seconds for that to register, warner was at the crease looking to push it through the off side but got an inside edge to the leg stump, dhawan set out from his crease and hastings was actually gesturing to the fielder to throw the ball to him so he could effect a run out, no need for that
hastings to ojha, no run, stays back and punches to the off side
hastings to ojha, no run, well stopped by raina near mid-on
hastings to ojha, 1 run, he opens the face and steers it down to third man
negi to ojha, no run, makes room and drives hard down the pitch but straight to the fielder
jadeja to ojha, no run, he makes room and punches it to the off side
jadeja to ojha, 1 run, stays back and punches it to long-off
negi to ojha, six runs, over the second tier! that was launched downtown over the sight screen, gives negi the charge and lofts cleanly
negi to ojha, 1 run, he stays back and punches it to the off side
negi to dhawan, 1 run, makes room and mistimes the punch to the off side
raina to dhawan, no run,
raina to dhawan, 1 run, makes room to punch but can't beat point
sharma to ojha, 1 run, slower ball outside off and he punches it to faf at point
sharma to dhawan, no run, he comes down the track and looks to swish that away somewhere but ends up swishing at thin air
raina to dhawan, 1 run,
raina to finch, six runs, no sighters for finch, he dances down the track and lofts him clean over deep midwicket
raina to dhawan, no run,
negi to dhawan, 1 run,
negi to sammy, 1 leg bye,
negi to dhawan, four runs, dhawan comes down the track and lofts it nicely over midwicket, picks the gap
negi to dhawan, 2 runs,
jadeja to sammy, no run,
jadeja to dhawan, 1 run, they scamper through for a single as dhawan digs it out to point, hastings' throw was all over the place
parnell to hussey, no run, pushed to mid-on for a single, direct hit at the striker's end but simmons is well home
parnell to hussey, 1 run, stays in his crease and opens the face to steer to third man
kaul to hussey, 1 run, pushed from the crease into the leg side for a single
kaul to hussey, 1 run, picks off a single by pushing the ball towards midwicket
parnell to hussey, four runs, hussey steps down the pitch and lofts a slower ball through the line, chipping it back over the bowler's head for four
unadkat to simmons, 1 run, simmons plays the ball towards point and sets off for a single

unadkat to simmons, 1 run, a close call at the bowler's end! simmons would have been gone with a direct hit. he pushed the ball into the covers and ran though the fielder got to the ball really quickly. the under-arm throw missed at the non-striker's end though
kaul to simmons, no run, hussey dives at the bowler's end to make his crease; he had set off for a single after simmons played the ball to square leg
nadeem to simmons, 1 leg bye, fires it down leg side, the ball brushes simmons' pad and runs down to fine leg
nadeem to hussey, 1 run, nudged towards midwicket for a single
nadeem to simmons, 1 run, a quicker one skids into the right-hander, simmons manages to push it towards square leg

imran tahir to simmons, 1 wide, that's a poor call for wide i'm afraid, simmons had backed away so far outside leg and to counter that tahir fired the ball wide outside off, that was inside the wide line

imran tahir to simmons, out, caught in the deep this time! simmons tries to blast over the cover boundary but mis-times it, he ends up slicing it in the air and parnell comes running in from the deep and take s a well-judged catch on the move. tahir's celebrations are characteristically exuberant
duminy to hussey, no run, hussey tries to drive through the off side but gets an inside edge on to the pad
imran tahir to hussey, no run, driven firmly, but straight to cover
nadeem to hussey, 1 run, hussey comes down the pitch and yorks himself somewhat, digs the ball out to long-off
duminy to sharma, 2 runs, rohit stays back and flicks the ball towards cow corner and his placement was almost perfect, the fielder had to dive to save the boundary
nadeem to sharma, 1 run, driven to long off for another single
nadeem to sharma, 1 run, driven to the fielder on the extra cover boundary
nadeem to pollard, no run, pollard steps out again but has to adjust and defend after nadeem fired the ball flat into the right-hander
nadeem to tare, 1 run, nudged on the leg side, towards midwicket for a single
parnell to gopal, no run, gopal moves back and across towards the off side to drive to point
ojha to vijay, 1 run, vijay leans across and flicks with the angle into him through square leg
ojha to pietersen, 1 run, nudged behind square for a single
ojha to vijay, 2 runs, vijay steps out and chips over the bowler's head
ojha to vijay, 1 run, goes back and across to work the ball through midwicket
harbhajan singh to pietersen, no run, defended from the crease towards midwicket
gopal to karthik, no run, pushed from the crease towards point

harbhajan singh to pietersen, out, kp's been bowled while trying to switch-hit! harbhajan slowed it up and bowled straight. kp switched and swung too early, the ball dipped on him beat the bat and hit the stumps

de lange to karthik, out, when a tall fast bowler is delivering at 140 kph plus, moving across your stumps towards the off and exposing all of them while trying to scoop is probably not the best choice of shot. karthik tried it and his middle and leg stumps took a hit
gopal to tiwary, 1 run, played to backward point for a quick single
de lange to tiwary, no run, a big appeal from the keeper tare as the ball slants down leg side and the batsman tries to glance, might have brushed the body
de lange to tiwary, 1 wide, another extravagant appeal from tare as the slower ball from de lange strays down leg side, that was close to nothing, huge wide
ojha to tiwary, no run, defended on the off side
ojha to duminy, 1 wide, that's pitched outside leg stump and spinning further away down leg side
ojha to tiwary, 1 run, tiwary steps out and dabs the ball into the covers for a single
harbhajan singh to tiwary, 1 run, pushed close on the off side
harbhajan singh to tiwary, 1 run, tiwary moves back and swats the ball from outside off over the in-field at midwicket
watson to vohra, 1 wide, samson leaps to his left to collect a wayward ball down leg side

faulkner to sehwag, out, that's a soft dismissal! sehwag was looking to whip that away down to the leg side, played a bit too early and he ends up getting a tame top edge to mid-on, very easy catch for the fielder
faulkner to marsh, no run,
faulkner to marsh, no run,
faulkner to marsh, 1 run, and he gets off the mark with a dab down to third man
watson to vohra, no run, he makes a bit of room and punches it towards mid-off
watson to vohra, no run, gets across the line and punches it towards point
malik to vohra, 1 run,
malik to marsh, no run, he gets across his stumps and punches it to the off side
cooper to vohra, 1 run,
cooper to marsh, no run, that's a good slower ball, marsh didn't read it very well, stabbed it to the off side
tewatia to marsh, four runs, that was delicately played, he had some width and gently dabbed it well wide of first slip, he picked his spot well
tewatia to marsh, no run, comes down the track and drills it down the track and the bowler slides and stops it
tewatia to marsh, 1 wide, this was too wide outside off
tewatia to marsh, no run, this was a bit wide too and he punches it to cover
cooper to marsh, 1 run, gives him a lot of width this time and he dabs it down to third man
faulkner to saha, no run, close call for saha as he pokes at one moving away and nearly edges it
faulkner to saha, four runs, that was smashed past backward point, faulkner makes the mistake by giving him width outside off, bends slightly, gets beside the line and thrashes it
tambe to bailey, no run, down the track and driven down to cover
tambe to bailey, 1 run, he makes a bit of room and chops it to the off side
cooper to bailey, 1 run, slower ball and forced bailey into checking his shot, stabbed it down to cover
tambe to miller, 2 runs, forced it down to deep midwicket for a couple
tambe to miller, 1 run, he comes down the track and drills it hard down to long-off
tambe to bailey, 1 run, down the track and drives off the toe of the bat to deep cover
faulkner to bailey, (no ball) 2 runs, faulker has overstepped, he makes room again and chips it down to deep point
faulkner to bailey, 1 run, he is caught off the free hit at third man, makes room and gets an outside edge that carries all the way to tambe
cooper to miller, 1 bye, good slower ball to start with, miller made a lot of room and swung and missed, they steal a bye
cooper to miller, 2 runs, swings it to the leg side and it's in the air, the fielder does well at deep square leg to run to his left and take it on the first bounce
cooper to miller, 1 bye, swings and misses a slower ball, they pick up another bye
balaji to rahane, no run, beats him, rahane goes pushing at a wide delivery that straightens and bounces past the outside edge
balaji to rahane, no run, balaji past the outside edge second time in the over, goes wide of the crease, angles it in outside off and moves it away sharply, rahane prods in vain
balaji to rahane, 1 run, outside off and he opens the face and dabs it down to third man
balaji to rahane, no run, lands outside off and he doesn't play at it
dhawan to samson, no run, good inswing by dhawan straightaway, dipping in and samson does well to cover the line
dhawan to samson, 1 run, gives him width and he opens the face of the bat and dabs it to third man
dhawan to rahane, 1 wide, he slides down the leg side and wide called
dhawan to samson, 1 run, samson plays that late, opens the face and dabs it towards third man
patel to rahane, no run, keeps him quiet, he can only push this down to point
patel to rahane, no run, quicker and flatter and doesn't give him room, he punches it to point
hendricks to rahane, 1 run, wide outside off and it's in the air towards third man
hendricks to samson, no run, slower ball outside off and he shoulders arms
karanveer singh to samson, no run,
karanveer singh to samson, no run, turn again and he chops it to point
dhawan to rahane, out, dhawan's got the important wicket, he gets it to swing back in, rahane was playing down the wrong line, left a gap between bat and pad and bowled through the gate
dhawan to binny, no run, the keeper goes back for the hat trick ball, binny pushes it to the off side
dhawan to binny, 1 run, he steers this one down to third man
karanveer singh to samson, 2 runs, down the track and he gets an inside edge to square leg
karanveer singh to binny, no run, no turn this time, makes room and punches it to cover
karanveer singh to binny, 1 wide, this was really wide down the leg side, binny was looking to smash it
karanveer singh to samson, 1 run, he makes room and punches it down to long-off
dhawan to binny, 2 runs, gives himself room and he steers it to balaji at third man
karanveer singh to tewatia, 2 runs, tewatia lofts this one towards deep cover and miller does well this time to run to his left to stop it
karanveer singh to tewatia, 1 run, tewatia goes airborne again this time and it's down to long-off
patel to tewatia, 1 leg bye,
karanveer singh to hodge, no run, spin, bounce and turn again and hodge was completely squared up! fine ball
karanveer singh to hodge, no run, softly pushed it to the off side
karanveer singh to hodge, 1 run, skids through and he tucks it to the on side
balaji to hodge, 1 run, doesn't give him much room, he punches it to the off side
balaji to tewatia, 2 runs, the lap shot that didn't come off as well as expected, he moved right across his stumps and nearly lost his balance, just about cleared the keeper
balaji to tewatia, 1 leg bye, he moved right across his stumps and looked to push it to the on side and it hits the pad and rolls away
balaji to hodge, 1 wide, he strays wide down the leg side
balaji to tewatia, no run, this was a slower ball and he makes room to swing and misses
patel to hodge, 1 run, he makes room and punches it to the off side
patel to hodge, 1 run, he stays back and knocks it towards midwicket
patel to faulkner, 2 runs, he knocks it towards deep midwicket for a couple
patel to hodge, out, another easy stumping for saha, hodge was looking to advance down the track and he made room, akshar fired this towards the leg stump and hodge was a long way down and missed it
patel to faulkner, 1 run, turns it to midwicket for a single
nehra to zol, no run, excellent delivery to end an excellent over, and a rather close leave from zol, this outswinger barely missed the off stump as he raised his bat high
nehra to zol, 1 run, sends it in to middle and leg this time, and it is tucked to long leg for a single
nehra to zol, 2 runs, tucked behind square leg for a couple
badree to takawale, no run, pushed to backward point
raina to kohli, no run, offbreak on middle, he goes back to turn it to midwicket
raina to kohli, 1 wide, some spin for raina, which takes the ball down the leg side
sharma to yuvraj singh, 1 run, plenty of width outside off and yuvraj crashes it square, but raina throws himself to his left at backward point to save a certain boundary
raina to yuvraj singh, 1 run, whipped past square leg, jadeja from deep midwicket sprints across to keep them to one
raina to kohli, 1 run, makes some room and punches a flat offbreak, midwicket dives but cannot stop it
ashwin to yuvraj singh, 1 run, swept hard to fine leg
ashwin to kohli, six runs, kohli out of the crease now, hitting with the spin, and swatting it over deep midwicket
ashwin to kohli, no run, lets this offbreak go as it travels down the leg side, not given a wide, umpire llong signals it brushed kohli's pad
raina to yuvraj singh, 1 run,
raina to yuvraj singh, no run, pushed to midwicket
badree to kohli, six runs, dancing down yet again, and swatting it 87 metres into the crowd over the long off boundary
badree to kohli, 1 run, hits it to the left of long off for a single
jadeja to kohli, 1 wide, hurled fast and flat and down the leg side
jadeja to kohli, no run, bowled a tad slower, and it spins past the outside edge as kohli tries to drive it
jadeja to kohli, 1 wide, now he fires it at 101.3 kph down the leg side
ashwin to kohli, 1 run,
sharma to rana, no run, slower one from back of the hand, it moves away outside off past rana's swipe
jakati to smith, 1 run, survives again, looks to lift it straight, just clears mid on this time
jakati to du plessis, 1 run, whipped to midwicket for a single
jakati to smith, 1 run, cracks it towards deep midwicket again, starc in business once more as he runs to his left
jakati to du plessis, no run, leaves the crease and pushes to extra cover
rampaul to du plessis, no run, still wider this time, du plessis tries to reach it but cannot make contact once again
jakati to smith, six runs, smoked over the deep extra cover boundary now, smith hasn't powered this, he's eased into the stroke and timed it all the way
jakati to smith, 1 run,
jakati to du plessis, four runs, now du plessis, he makes room outside leg and drills it through extra cover, long off dives in vain
jakati to du plessis, 1 run, driven down to long off for a single
starc to raina, no run,
chahal to du plessis, 1 run, legbreak straightening on middle, he goes back to work it to deep midwicket
chahal to raina, no run, turned from back in the crease to midwicket
chahal to du plessis, 1 run, faf leaves the crease as well, and opens the face to push to extra cover
chahal to raina, four runs, comes out first ball of the over and lofts over midwicket
chahal to raina, no run,
chahal to raina, 1 run, opens the face and eases it through extra cover against the turn
yuvraj singh to du plessis, 1 run, walks out and picks up a single through midwicket as yuvraj slants it in
chahal to du plessis, no run, appeal for a catch as faf jumps out, the ball pops up and keeper comes around to take it, replays show it came off the glove on to the pad
chahal to du plessis, no run,
yuvraj singh to du plessis, 1 run, yuvraj posing more problems, faf leaves the crease, yuvraj finds some turn, and a thick outside edge goes to point
yuvraj singh to dhoni, 1 run, takes a couple of steps out and turns it through midwicket
jakati to dhoni, 1 run,
jakati to du plessis, no run,
chahal to dhoni, 1 run, flatter on middle and off, nudged towards point, there's a fumble and dhoni manages to steal a single
yuvraj singh to dhoni, six runs, dhoni does it again, that missed chance is history, he leaves the crease again, reaches the pitch and sends it 95 metres over the straight boundary
starc to dhoni, 1 run, casually swats a drive, extra cover cannot stop it cleanly, and another single is taken
jakati to dhoni, 1 run, leaves the crease and pushes a flat delivery through covers
jakati to du plessis, six runs, faf gets to fifty and ends the game with the last skip down the pitch of the evening, and lofts cleanly over long off
morkel to warner, 1 wide, wide down the leg side
vinay kumar to dhawan, 1 run, dhawan goes for a big shot and gets a thick inside edge towards fine leg
morkel to dhawan, no run, morkel gets that to rise sharply and zip away past the outside edge, dhawan doesn't move his feet much as he wafts at it
morkel to dhawan, four runs, the man at cover point was flying to his right hoping to get a hand on that, but dhawan gets it wide of manish pandey to get a boundary to backward point
morkel to ojha, 5 wides, it all goes wrong for morkel, after an accurate over he sprays this miles (cricketing metric) down the leg side, no chance for uthappa
vinay kumar to dhawan, no run, defended towards cover point
vinay kumar to dhawan, four runs, shot, width on offer for dhawan, he capitalises, thrashes it behind backward point
morkel to dhawan, no run, driven towards mid-off by dhawan as morkel begins his third over
morkel to dhawan, no run, outside off, dhawan chases it and misses, top over that from morkel
narine to ojha, four runs, narine is on, and he's welcomed by an inside-out drive for four through extra cover, best bowler in the ipl? 'i dont' care,' ojha says
narine to ojha, no run, defended towards backward point this time
narine to ojha, four runs, another drive for four, though this time it was streaky, a thick outside edge as the ball flies past backward point for four though ojha was looking to send it past cover
narine to ojha, no run, this one zips away from ojha, outside edge and leaves ojha flustered, this is more like the narine ipl fans have come to expect
narine to ojha, no run, defends the final ball of the over
ut yadav to dhawan, four runs, not entirely in control there, a healthy outside edge sends the ball down to the third-man boundary
ut yadav to dhawan, 1 leg bye, towards backward square leg for a leg bye
ut yadav to ojha, no run, this time ojha chases after the ball outside off, 136.8kph, can't get bat on ball there
ten doeschate to dhawan, 1 run, there's a rare single, chopped towards deep point by dhawan

ten doeschate to ojha, six runs, ojha doesn't believe in singles and twos, after three dot balls he makes up with a huge six over midwicket, that ball went a long way up, but clears the rope by a handful of yards
ut yadav to venugopal rao, no run, a single to get off the mark
ut yadav to venugopal rao, 2 runs, guided towards deep backward point this time
ut yadav to venugopal rao, no run, slower one, well i thought it was a slower one, speed gun says 137kph, on middle stump, defended down the pitch
ut yadav to venugopal rao, 1 wide, sprays that down the leg side
ut yadav to venugopal rao, 1 run, defended towards point for a single, a rare economical over from umesh
shakib al hasan to dhawan, 1 run, pushed towards mid-off for a single
shakib al hasan to dhawan, no run, this one is defended back towards the bowler
narine to venugopal rao, no run, spinning away, defended towards cover
shakib al hasan to sammy, no run, sammy is in much earlier than he would have wanted, defended towards extra cover
shakib al hasan to sammy, no run, hit to extra cover to end a superb over for kkr

morkel to venugopal rao, four runs, dropped, venugopal rao has decided to swing at everything, he wants to smash that over the leg side, a top edge sends it flying towards third man where sunil narine has to leap to get that one, just gets a finger on it when he should have latched on, one-bounce four
morkel to venugopal rao, four runs, this is comical cricket, venugopal swings yet again, one more outside edge, flies away to the third-man boundary
morkel to venugopal rao, 1 run, inside-edge onto the body for a single
shakib al hasan to venugopal rao, 1 run, swept towards deep backward square leg for a single

shakib al hasan to venugopal rao, 1 run, out, another run-out! venugopal rao's kamikaze innings is over, the ball is swept away towards deep midwicket, where vinay kumar seems to have over run the ball, adjusts well to stop the ball from reaching the rope, pandey is there to help out, he fires in a superb throw, venugopal is nowhere near making his ground, he had ambled the first, and then stumbled after stepping on shakib's leg
narine to sammy, 1 run, eased past point for a single
narine to anirudha, no run, defended to the off side this time, again narine keeping it tight
narine to anirudha, 1 run, helped towards backward square leg for a single
shakib al hasan to sammy, 1 run, brutal hit from sammy towards cow corner, just fetches him a single as the placement isn't great
shakib al hasan to holder, no run, pushed  towards the off side
shakib al hasan to holder, no run, pushed towards the off to end another tidy over
narine to sammy, 1 run,

narine to holder, no run, another huge lbw appeal, another one where kkr thought they had a wicket, was that sliding down, i don't think it was, the umpire thought it was, otherwise that was another plumb one
narine to holder, no run, is there another run-out here, pushed towards cover, straight to shakib, who fires the ball to the keeper, holder has to dive back to beat the throw
vinay kumar to sammy, 1 wide, too far outside off, called a wide
kumar to gambhir, no run, there we go! this pitch has been responding to the new ball considerably and bhuvi gets this one to dart past gambhir's angled blade.
kumar to gambhir, 1 run, opens the face as he steers the ball, bounces through to second slip, where it is not cleanly held, allowing a single
kumar to uthappa, no run, this one curls away just a touch, uthappa plays down the wrong line and the ball whizzes past the outside edge
steyn to gambhir, no run, wild from gambhir, a cross-batted heave to a ball that was moving away from him, gets nowhere close the ball

steyn to gambhir, four runs, that rocketed to the boundary, think third man took about three or four steps before that reached the fielder there, bhuvneshwar looks to stop that with his legs after sliding, but that ball was really travelling, gambhir just used the pace of the bowler to slap it from off side
steyn to gambhir, no run, this is driven towards mid-on, not too well timed

holder to gambhir, out, bowled 'im! the sort of dismissal which we have seen so many times from gambhir, once again he looks to steer the ball to third man, inside edges onto the stumps, this match is utterly packed with incident
steyn to uthappa, 1 run, look to swipe it towards midwicket, doesn't quite get it off the middle but gets a single
steyn to pandey, 1 wide, losing the radar there, this one is way down the leg side
holder to uthappa, 2 runs, moves across and takes that from off stump, guiding it behind square leg for a couple
holder to uthappa, no run, looking to club that out of the park after coming down the track, doesn't connect
sharma to uthappa, no run,
sharma to shakib al hasan, no run, slides on outside off, slapped towards point
sharma to shakib al hasan, no run, thick inside edge onto the back pad , the ball rolls away towards point

parvez rasool to pathan, six runs, dropped, this was clubbed towards deep square leg, serious power on it, but you expect dale steyn to hand on to this sort of overhead chance, he doesn't and that's six, rasool is incensed, sammy isn't too pleased either

sharma to shakib al hasan, out, shakib looks to join the fun, he skips down the track and throws his bat it, slices the ball, it goes high and reaches only as far as jason holder at long-off, no mistakes this time in the field
steyn to pathan, six runs, electric from yusuf, just 15 balls for his 50, incredible innings from him, he has just dispatched steyn over midwicket for a mammoth six
steyn to pathan, four runs, fifth ball of the over, fifth ball that goes to the boundary, thick outside edge past the keeper for four more, eden gardens is loving it

sharma to pathan, out, and it's over, a special innings from yusuf that has all but earned kkr a place in the top two, he was going for another sixbut can only get it as far as dhawan at deep midwicket, he knows the job is virtually done, clearly enjoyed this innings, punches gloves with suryakumar before walking off, raises his bat and an adoring crowd replies with raucous cheers
sharma to sa yadav, 1 run, eased to long-off for a single, been a while since i got to type something as simple as that
kumar to sa yadav, 1 wide, kkr get their seventh win in a row, their longest streak, and they go through as no. 2, the result is confirmed by a wide down the leg side, sunrisers are knocked out

awana to pietersen, no run, good stop. akshar dives to his left and saves what might well be four runs, after kp walks across his stumps and flicks it from outside off. a big chip seems to have come off the bottom of his bat.

awana to pietersen, four runs, direct hit! the man at point throws hard and flat to the bowler's end after kp sends agarwal back. the fielder was maxwell, who picked up this open-faced dab from kp after the ball seamed away from him slightly. the diving agarwal is home, and delhi get four overthrows.

awana to karthik, out, got him! did that straighten a bit? maybe. dk was back in his crease, and he tried to flick it from off stump towards midwicket, but he ends up getting a leading edge that loops into point's hands.
awana to jadhav, no run, bit of inward movement again as jadhav pushes out at it. drops it down safely into the off side, off the inside half of his bat

awana to jadhav, out, gone! jadhav danced down the pitch and seemed to time that flat-batted drive really well. but he doesn't keep it down, and he doesn't get any real elevation either, and vohra takes it just above his head at mid-off
karanveer singh to tiwary, no run, tiwary goes back now, and it's flatter. chopped away to point.
dhawan to pietersen, 1 run, loses his line completely. it's way wide of off stump, and kp reaches out to slap it to deep point
karanveer singh to pietersen, 1 run, kp gives himself room and tries to drive wristily through cover, but he's too early into his shot, and the ball trickles into the leg side off his inside edge

dhawan to tiwary, out, what are you doing, delhi? has tiwary sacrificed his wicket, or has kp just run past him? tiwary bunted that straight to point, and kp just took off. bailey is the fielder, and he only has to lob it underarm to the bowler to complete the simplest of run-outs.
dhawan to pietersen, no run, slower ball, angled in towards middle stump, defended down the pitch
dhawan to nadeem, no run, that's banged in, and it rises up towards shahbaz's throat. jumps up to keep it down.
dhawan to nadeem, 5 wides, poor work behind the stumps from saha. it's a slower ball, and it angles down the leg side and goes to the keeper on the bounce, and it went between his legs
dhawan to nadeem, no run, bit of bounce again, around chest-height this time, and nadeem takes his bottom hand off the handle as he defends
patel to nadeem, 1 run, gives himself room to drive it wide of long-off

johnson to unadkat, out, what a shot that is, but he's hit it straight to the fielder. unadkat stays leg side of the ball, and slices it from a middle-stump line. it goes screaming off his bat, and it would have been four had it gone five yards in either direction. he's hit it straight to point, however, and delhi are all out with 11 balls left to play.
mohammed shami to sehwag, 1 run, angles this in, and gets a bit of lift as well as away movement. sehwag gets a thick edge down to third man
mohammed shami to vohra, 1 run, away movement again, and vohra gets a thickish edge down to third man
mohammed shami to sehwag, four runs, drifts towards the leg side this time, and sehwag is on his toes to flick it off his hips past square leg
unadkat to vohra, no run, slower ball, outside off, and a slightly overbalanced vohra is on the walk as he pushes it towards point
unadkat to vohra, no run, better this time. gets a decent stride in to meet it with his head over the ball and defend towards point
mohammed shami to sehwag, 1 wide, poor ball, just doesn't come out right, and it slides well down the leg side
mohammed shami to sehwag, no run, slight bit of width outside off and sehwag gets a lot of power into this backfoot punch. point jumps in the air to field it on the bounce

mohammed shami to sehwag, out, got him! sehwag tries that backfoot punch again, but his feet were cemented to the ground and he gets a thin outside edge as the ball seams away a touch, with a bit of extra bounce
unadkat to miller, no run, this one comes back in off the seam, from outside off, and miller moves his body and bat out of the way to let it pass over the stumps
unadkat to miller, no run, he's back and across this time to defend it solidly
unadkat to miller, 1 run, bit of inward movement from outside off, and miller is out of his crease to play a defensive push to mid-on
mohammed shami to miller, six runs, slower ball, was it? miller comes down the track, giving himself a bit of room, and cracks it over mid-off, almost flat-bats it
imran tahir to vohra, no run, wrong 'un, hurries into vohra, but he seems to have read it, and he defends it calmly with a twirl of the wrists
imran tahir to miller, four runs,
imran tahir to miller, no run, that skids on again. from outside leg towards leg stump, and he defends towards cover
duminy to miller, no run,
imran tahir to vohra, 1 wide, and he's followed that with a rubbish ball. skids on with the angle, and goes down the leg side
nadeem to vohra, 1 wide, poor bowling, this. pitches leg, continues with the angle, goes way down the leg side
imran tahir to miller, 1 run, gives himself room to drive through the off side, gets a thick inside edge that runs towards deep midwicket
imran tahir to bailey, 1 run, bailey is down the pitch to this, and he flicks it to deep midwicket from outside off
anderson to samson, no run, better line and that inswing is more threatening. samson knows it is seeking the base of middle and plays late and pushes to mid-off
bumrah to watson, no run, good lenght ball on and around off stump, opens the face to find point
harbhajan singh to samson, no run, keeps it slow and around off stump, nair goes back and blocks
ojha to samson, 1 run, goes back and flicks it through midwikcet.
ojha to samson, 1 run, steps down and there is a little bit of hesitation after he pushes into the covers. not bad enough to stop the single from being taken
harbhajan singh to nair, no run, slower through the air and it doesn't turn as nair expects. dabbed down the pitch
gopal to samson, 1 run, we have a direct hit from third man and the third umpire gets some work. although the excitement is all for nothing as nair was in safely
gopal to samson, 1 run, stopped on him as he was looking to knock it away into the leg side. the ball goes in the air, but is well beyond the bowler's reach
harbhajan singh to nair, 1 run, nudged through midwicket. such a nonchalant shot to bring up a neat little fifty

watson to hussey, four runs, runs down the pitch and gets a thick outside edge that carries fine enough to the third man boundary. he was looking over point with the room he made, but he'll take it nonetheless
kulkarni to anderson, no run, goes again, but this time he toe-ends it back to the bowler. dhawal gets the ball and feigns a throw. stares him down like a big tall fast bowler
kulkarni to hussey, six runs, switches around the wicket but that doesn't perturb huss who dances down and flicks it over square leg. carried just over the rope.
cooper to anderson, no run, swings and misses, as has been the bane of anderson this ipl. another slower ball and it holds in the pitch just enough to hurt mumbai
tambe to anderson, four runs, this was on leg stump, and anderson has shoveled it wide of midwicket's reach. good effort from the fielder there, but in vain
tambe to anderson, 1 wide, that's a poor ball. hurls a very quick delivery too far outside off
cooper to sharma, 1 run, runs down the pitch and lashes this through to deep cover. got the pitch and drilled it, but doesn't find the gap
cooper to anderson, 2 runs, tucked him up just outside off, anderson bunts it to the right of long-off
faulkner to anderson, 2 runs, room outside off and he carves it through the covers
awana to uthappa, no run, keeps it nice and straight and he stays behind the line and punches it back to the bowler
awana to uthappa, no run, uthappa moves across and punches it down the track
patel to uthappa, 1 run, tucks it towards midwicket for a single
johnson to pandey, 1 wide, he slides down the leg side
awana to uthappa, no run, he looks to launch that over the on side, moves across the stumps and nearly gets an inside edge
awana to uthappa, 1 run, he opens the face and dabs it to third man, the fielder is fine
awana to pandey, 1 run, he had to hurry there, this was pushed with soft hands towards mid-off and set off, bailey underarms the throw but missed the stumps
awana to uthappa, 1 run, he gets an inside edge that sneaks past the stumps
dhawan to pandey, 1 run, pushed it with soft hands towards mid-on and they do well to take a quick single, beat the throw
dhawan to uthappa, 1 run, he gets an inside edge towards midwicket and sets off
patel to pandey, no run, he stays back and punches it to the off side
patel to uthappa, no run, looks to slash that to third man boundary  but sehwag does well to dive in the circle and stop that
karanveer singh to pandey, 1 run,
patel to uthappa, no run, flatter delivery and he goes back, makes room and punches it to  the off side
patel to pandey, no run, flatter one outside off and pushed to the off side
patel to pandey, no run,
karanveer singh to shakib al hasan, no run, looks to drive and gets an inside edge to the leg side
karanveer singh to shakib al hasan, 1 wide, slides that wide outside off
karanveer singh to shakib al hasan, 1 run, drops it wide outside off and he punches it to point
johnson to shakib al hasan, 1 wide, he slides this one wide down the leg side
dhawan to shakib al hasan, 1 run,
dhawan to pathan, 1 run, he tucks it towards deep square leg
dhawan to pathan, four runs, edged and no slip, this was wide outside off and he chased it and he gets an outside edge that beat saha

dhawan to pathan, no run, close call for yusuf as kings xi appeal for a run out, this was tucked towards square leg and yusuf set off and was sent back, did the dive and awana's throw was to the keeper, he made his ground
dhawan to pathan, no run, comes back in and he drives back to the bowler
karanveer singh to sa yadav, no run,
patel to sa yadav, no run, he stays back and punches it to the off side
patel to sa yadav, no run, makes room to punch it through the off side but gets an inside edge to the pad
patel to sa yadav, 1 run, he stays back and punches it towards long-off
dhawan to sa yadav, no run, good comeback as dhawan swings it in and yadav gets an inside edge to the boot
dhawan to ten doeschate, 2 runs, that's good running, tucks it into the vacant gap at midwicket, ten doeschate hurries him for the second
karanveer singh to sa yadav, out, his cameo has ended, yadav shuffles across his stumps and exposes the leg stump, karanveer bowls that straight on the stumps and hits middle and leg
johnson to chawla, no run, he beats him on the drive outside the off stump
morkel to vohra, no run, vohra is squared up by one that moved away late off the pitch, pokes his bat out
morkel to vohra, no run, this is top class bowling by morkel, the previous one moved away and this one came back in and still squared him up, gets good bounce as well
ut yadav to saha, 1 wide, he slides this one wide down the leg side
ut yadav to saha, 1 run,
ut yadav to vohra, 1 run, he pushes it down to cover
ut yadav to saha, no run, down the leg side, swings and misses
morkel to saha, no run, he gets across and punches it to the off side
morkel to saha, no run, he stays beside the line and pushes it towards backward point
narine to vohra, 1 run, keeps it quiet, pushed towards mid-on
shakib al hasan to vohra, 1 run, down the track and he pushes it towards cover, they are on par with the par score of 37
shakib al hasan to vohra, 1 run, he tucks it wide of square leg and we have a match on, it's drizzling, kings xi get one thing out of the way
morkel to saha, 1 wide, wide down the leg side, kkr can't give them an opening like this
narine to maxwell, 1 run, maxwell v narine ball 1 - he quietly pushes it towards mid-on
narine to saha, 1 run, saha too quietly tucks it to the on side and settles for the single
narine to maxwell, no run, good comeback by narine as he sees him come down and bowls the off break, it turns and he is forced to check his shot
ut yadav to maxwell, no run, maxwell gives him the charge and misses it completely, nowhere near the ball
ut yadav to maxwell, no run, that's a good slower ball! maxwell made room and was miles away from the ball
ut yadav to saha, no run, keeps it nice and straight and he pushes it down the track
morkel to saha, no run, looks to beat the off side field  but can't beat backward point
chawla to bailey, no run, bailey stays back and quietly defends this one
shakib al hasan to patel, 1 run, bowls it flat and he goes back and flicks to deep midwicket
shakib al hasan to bailey, no run, good bowling, he comes down the track and has to check his shot
shakib al hasan to dhawan, no run, very slow through the air and he can only defend
shakib al hasan to dhawan, no run, slower through the air again and he can only push it to the off side
chawla to dhawan, 1 run, down the track and he is forced to check his shot, he gets an inside edge
chawla to bailey, 1 run, he comes down the track and drills this down to long-off
chawla to dhawan, 1 run, he comes down the track and drives him to cover
shakib al hasan to dhawan, 1 run, he makes room and punches it down to mid-off
shakib al hasan to dhawan, no run, good bowling, no room to free his arms, pushes it back to the bowler
narine to bailey, 1 run, stays back and mistimes it towards mid-on, it was in the air
narine to dhawan, no run, dhawan was looking to slow that from outside off and he missed it completely
narine to bailey, no run, bailey makes room and looks to smash it through the off side and misses
shakib al hasan to dhawan, out, an easy stumping, dhawan was down the pitch looking to hit out, the ball skidded through, beat him and uthappa did the rest
shakib al hasan to johnson, 1 run,
narine to johnson, no run, sharp turn again and he made room and looked to slash but missed
narine to johnson, 1 run, swings and only gets an outside edge, kings xi really struggling
narine to johnson, no run, how do you out him away? another swing and a miss against an off break
ut yadav to johnson, no run, slower one to johnson and he makes room to swing and misses
ut yadav to johnson, no run, this was fired outside off and he made room to slap this but missed
ut yadav to johnson, no run, and ends the formalities with a slower ball and johnson makes room but can't get bat on ball, no use - kings xi have been caught napping at eden tonight
nehra to simmons, no run, this one is down the leg side, should have been called a wide
pandey to hussey, no run, defends ishwar pandey's first ball down the track
pandey to simmons, four runs, gets on his toes and slashes that through the covers for four, stylishly done by simmons
pandey to hussey, 1 run, tapped towards cover for another single
nehra to simmons, 1 run, another inside-edge, goes for a flashy drive through covers, but the ball rolls behind square leg instead
nehra to hussey, 1 run, given a bit of width, that is helped towards fine leg for a single
sharma to hussey, no run, hussey charges down the track and looks to thrash the ball through the mid-off, doesn't connect
sharma to hussey, no run, thick outside edge this time, the ball rolls towards cover
pandey to hussey, no run, angling across hussey, who wanted to steer that down to third man but doesn't get bat on it
pandey to hussey, 1 run, guided towards backward point for another quick single
sharma to hussey, four runs, a classic twenty20 hit, hussey goes for the mow over midwicket, top edges it instead over the slips for four
ashwin to hussey, no run, defended once more by hussey
ashwin to simmons, no run,
jadeja to hussey, no run, a reverse-lap shot from hussey, can't get it fine towards third man though, it is towards point instead
ashwin to hussey, six runs, hussey shows how it's done, who needs power to hit big? takes a couple of paces down the track and times it perfectly as he swings that towards cow corner
ashwin to hussey, 1 run, tucks it away for a single this time
ashwin to simmons, no run, driven towards cover by simmons to end the over

jadeja to anderson, six runs, six second ball for anderson, his national team captain, brendon mccullum was luring at deep backward square leg boundary but anderson has hit this well enough to clear the rope, mccullum jumps but he had no realistic chance of getting that
ashwin to simmons, no run, spins away as simmons looks to thump that through the off side, misses
raina to anderson, 1 run, reverse-swept towards point for a single
ashwin to simmons, 3 runs, well outside off, chopped towards deep backward point, rohit sprints back for the third
ashwin to sharma, no run, defended by rohit to the leg side
ashwin to sharma, no run, guided towards backward point by rohit
ashwin to sharma, no run, three dot balls in a row to finish the over
jadeja to simmons, 1 run, towards backward square leg for a single
jadeja to sharma, 1 run, faf makes it so easy as he stops that fierce lofted drive from rohit, who skipped down the track before sending the ball towards wide long-off
jadeja to simmons, no run, defended by simmons to end the over
jadeja to sharma, 1 run, another single, down to long-off this time, chennai won't mind this
jadeja to sharma, 1 run, rohit stays in the crease and taps the ball to square leg for a single
sharma to pollard, 1 run, mohit tests pollard with a slower ball, swatted towards deep square leg
sharma to pollard, 1 run, slower ball does the job for mohit, pollard checks his stroke, defends the ball towards cover for a single
nehra to pollard, six runs, pollard may change that though, he's begun with a thunderous hit that is way into the crowd beyond midwicket
nehra to pollard, no run, hurls it wide outside off, pollard had moved across to try get to that, doesn't get bat on it

nehra to pollard, out, got 'im! nehra follows the batsman as pollard backs away from leg stump, pollard decides to go with the shot, ends up hitting it very high, mohit sharma at deep backward square leg continues csk's trend of taking tough outfield catches today, this was in the air for ages, but mohit judges it perfectly

nehra to tare, out, aditya tare hit a first-ball six that is the most famous shot of his career so far in his previous match, this time he gets a first-ball duck, a pitched-up ball is outside edged and it ends as a simple catch to extra cover

kumar to du plessis, 1 leg bye, dances down to negate the swing but the inward movement is just enough to foil his flick through midwicket. the ball wanders towards slip who sends in a throw at the keeper's end. the deflection gifts a run

anderson to du plessis, four runs, dances down and lashes it through extra cover. rohit runs to his left and dives, but lets it through his hands. he lands awkwardly on his left shoulder but all seems fine
anderson to du plessis, 1 run, advances and he swings off his hips, the thick outside edge flies to third man.
anderson to du plessis, no run, this time his swing isn't quite as well timed as anderson dupes him with a slower ball pushed across him
kumar to smith, 1 run, this one goes away from the batsman, smith dabs it towards cover and pinches a tight single
kumar to du plessis, 1 run, outside off and moving away, taken by the keeper
anderson to du plessis, 1 run, chopped towards point, ben dunk moves across from cover and dives to stop that one
anderson to smith, 1 run, guides it down towards third man for a single

anderson to du plessis, 2 runs, another half-chance, this should have been taken, a top edge towards deep square leg, rayudu is coming in from the rope, harbhajan is going back to take that skier, there is confusion between the two, neither makes an effort to take it, it lands between them, rohit is less than impressed
anderson to du plessis, four runs, four more, anderson tries the slower one, it is dismissed towards cow corner for a boundary
kumar to smith, 1 run, pushed towards cover point for a single
kumar to du plessis, no run, too wide from praveen but he gets away with it, slapped straight to cover point
kumar to smith, 1 run, the ball moves in once more from praveen, smith looks to drive, gets a thick inside-edge towards midwicket, praveen grimaces in frustration

bumrah to smith, four runs, smith living on the edge here, outside one this time, if there was slip, this was a sitter, there isn't one and he survives, once more smith was looking to work the ball towards the leg side
