bumrah to smith, four runs, this time the trademark smith mow connects well, that means the ball is flying to the midwicket boundary
bumrah to smith, 1 run, slower, 111kph, wide outside off, smith wants to thump that to the leg side as well, reaches out and slugs it to midwicket
harbhajan singh to du plessis, 1 wide, another one down the leg side

harbhajan singh to du plessis, out, and another one, picks out the man at long-off, both openers are dismissed, mumbai aren't out of this, faf plays a lofted inside-out drive, not looking to really power it to clear the man in the deep

harbhajan singh to raina, no run, on off stump from round the wicket, defended by raina, and that over cost only four runs, there's spin in this track, harbhajan and ojha key here for mumbai's chances, csk still on top though
anderson to raina, 1 wide, wide down the leg side, raina moved across looking to glance that but he misses
harbhajan singh to mccullum, no run, defended to the leg side this time
harbhajan singh to mccullum, six runs, mccullum springs down the track and clobbers that out of the park, a huge hit over long-off for six
harbhajan singh to mccullum, no run, quicker one, defended by mccullum
harbhajan singh to mccullum, 1 run, thick leading edge as he looks to work the ball to the leg side, the ball runs away towards cover
harbhajan singh to raina, 1 run, spinning away outside off, raina waits on the backfoot and slaps that towards deep backward poiint for a single
ojha to hussey, 1 run, d hussey goes well back and guides the ball towards cover
ojha to raina, 1 run, spins in towards raina's body, raina slaps this towards deep midwicket
ojha to hussey, 1 run, turning across, driven towards cover for a single, the 100 comes up

ojha to raina, 3 runs, launches this towards deep extra cover, ben dunk has to motor across fron long-off, dunk dives to get a hand on the ball and as he slides towards the rope, he lets the ball go, good bit of  fielding
ojha to hussey, no run, defended to the leg side
ojha to hussey, no run, more watchfulness from hussey
ojha to hussey, no run, three dot balls to end the over, hussey drives the final ball towards extra cover
harbhajan singh to raina, 1 run, flicked to midwicket
harbhajan singh to hussey, 1 run, pokes the ball to midwicket for a single
harbhajan singh to raina, 1 run, spinning away after pitching on off and middle, uppish off the edge towards cover, safe for raina though
bumrah to hussey, no run, angling in towards off stump, defended towards backward point
ojha to hussey, no run, flat-batted towards mid-off, no run
ojha to hussey, 1 run, towards point for a single
pollard to hussey, 1 run, goes wide of the crease and the angle allows hussey to nudge if off his knees through square leg
pollard to hussey, 1 run, pushed down to long-off to retain strike
bumrah to raina, 1 wide, this has too much height on it. called a wide as it sails over raina's head
nehra to sehwag, 1 run, no boundary first ball from sehwag, drops the ball at his feet and sets off
nehra to vohra, 1 run, angling across outside off, guided towards deep backward point
pandey to vohra, no run, ishwar pandey starts with a ball that nips away after pitching outside off, left alone
pandey to vohra, 1 run, just the single off the over as vohra guides the final ball towards third man
sharma to vohra, 1 run, off the bottom edge as vohra looks to thrash the ball through the off side, the ball dribbles towards mid-off

pandey to sehwag, four runs, vintage sehwag this, not too many people can guide a ball which is just outside off to the third man boundary like sehwag can, waits for it and plays late, the wankhede roars it approval , chants of 'viru, viru'
nehra to sehwag, four runs, sehwag thumps that on-the-up, almost flat-batted by sehwag as he dismisses that between the bowler and mid-off
nehra to sehwag, no run, sehwag skips down the track, making some room as well, nehra follows him and sehwag can swing that one away over midwicket as he intended
sharma to vohra, 2 runs, did i mention everything is going kings xi's way? vohra defends the ball towards cover and sets off for a tight single, throw comes in and there is an overthrow as well
ashwin to vohra, no run, a dot ball! csk fans are cheering, defended by vohra
ashwin to vohra, 1 wide, going down the leg side
ashwin to vohra, 1 run, pushed towards point for a single
ashwin to sehwag, 1 run, a trailing edge towards backward point for a single, brings up sehwag's 50, the wankhede crowd loves it, taken him only 21 balls
ashwin to vohra, 1 run, guided towards backward point for a single, haven't seen sehwag sprint like this in a while
jadeja to sehwag, six runs, 'yessss!' shouts shastri as sehwag hammers a pitched-up ball over the bowler's head for six more, terrific hitting here, what an entertainer
jadeja to sehwag, 1 run, eased towards long-off for a single
jadeja to vohra, no run, solidly defended by vohra as jadeja fires the ball towards middle stump
ashwin to sehwag, 1 wide, way down the leg side
ashwin to vohra, 1 run, guided down towards backward point for a single
ashwin to vohra, no run, carrom ball is defended to the off side
jadeja to sehwag, four runs, outside off, sehwag looks to lash it through the off side, thick top edge sends it to the third man boundary
jadeja to sehwag, 1 bye, nearly had him! sehwag looks to slug that over midwicket, he loses his shape and he doesn't connect with the ball, which slips past the leg stump for a bye
jadeja to vohra, no run,
jadeja to sehwag, 1 run, slammed towards cow corner for a single
pandey to sehwag, 1 run, whips this past mid-on for a single,only two off the over

nehra to maxwell, 2 runs, from round the wicket, a slower one, a bit of an inside-edge towards deep backward square leg, maxwell puts the skates on after realising a second can be taken, back in time for two
ashwin to sehwag, 1 wide, ashwin starts the over with a wide down the leg side
ashwin to sehwag, 1 run, flat-batted away towards deep midwicket for a single
ashwin to maxwell, 1 wide, wild delivery way down the leg side, at least three feet down the leg side

ashwin to maxwell, out, but ashwin gets the wicket he had talked up, this looked like a topspinner going straight on, it was well outside off, maxwell looks to clobber that over cow corner, hasn't hit it far enough though and holes out, ashwin is pumped, he runs towards maxwell and blows a flying kiss, dhoni is not too pleased with ashwin's reaction
jadeja to sehwag, 1 run, heading towards off stump from round the wicket, sliced towards deep extra cover
ashwin to miller, no run, defended by miller
ashwin to sehwag, no run, the crowd is baying for sehwag's century, but they will have to wait, this ball is pushed back towards the bowler
jadeja to sehwag, four runs, looks for another big hit, outside edge past dhoni for four more, csk not having any luck here
jadeja to sehwag, 1 run, superb fielding by faf at point after sehwag plays an inside-out shot, kept to a tight single
sharma to saha, out, miller is run-out as he looked to steal a bye after wridhhiman saha doesn't connect with an outside-off ball, miller dives but not in time to beat dhoni's throw
sandeep sharma to raina, six runs, raina is wasting no time here, the most consistent batsman in the ipl hammers this one over midwicket, into the second tier
sandeep sharma to raina, four runs, sandeep being taken apart here, raina moves away from leg stump to make room, crunches this past a diving point for four
awana to smith, no run, parvinder awana starts with a tidy delivery on off stump, smith defends this one
johnson to smith, 2 runs, well outside off, smith pummels that one through the covers, a diving akshar patel gets a hand on that to prevent a sure boundary
johnson to smith, 1 run, angling in towards middle and leg, tucked towards midwicket for a single
sandeep sharma to smith, 1 wide, sandeep starts the over with a wide down the leg side
sandeep sharma to raina, 1 run, angling in from round the wicket, raina bottom-edges it as he slugs the ball towards midwicket
sandeep sharma to smith, 1 leg bye, nips in after pitching around off, that was sliding down the leg side though
sandeep sharma to smith, out,

awana to raina, six runs, six more, everything raina touches clears the ropes, this one is not even off the middle of the bat, high on the blade but there still enough to send that clear of the midwicket boundary

awana to raina, four runs, 100 in six overs! i am out of words! raina finishes this over off with another boundary, this time towards deep square leg, this over has had 6 6 4 4 4nb 4 4, 33 off the over, at this rate sehwag's son might be teased some more at his school
karanveer singh to mccullum, no run, superb from maxwell at extra cover, a diving stop to prevent a sure boundary
karanveer singh to mccullum, no run, just three off the over, 30 less than the previous one
maxwell to jadeja, no run,
maxwell to mccullum, 1 run, looked to power this through the off side, top edges this towards deep backward point
maxwell to jadeja, 2 runs, squeezed behind square leg, race back for the second
karanveer singh to jadeja, four runs, poor ball that, spinning down the leg side, helped along to the fine-leg boundary

karanveer singh to jadeja, 1 run, skips down and thumps that back towards the bowler, harsh judges might call that a drop, but there was no hit with too much power, bowler sticks out his right hand to stop that

karanveer singh to mccullum, 2 runs, slugged over mid-on for two more, mccullum has to rush back as the throw comes in to the keeper's end, and what a throw that was, right over the bails, jadeja has to gesture toi mccullum asking him to rush back
patel to jadeja, no run, jadeja thumps it towards cover
patel to jadeja, 1 wide, quick and down the leg side, 106.7kph from patel
patel to mccullum, no run, tosses this one up, mccullum blocks it

karanveer singh to jadeja, no run, sees jadeja charging down, and fires it way outside off, jadeja gets bat on it after reaching out, can only push it to cover, he had to play it as he would have been stumped otherwise

awana to jadeja, out, and another one, chennai super kings losing their way here, jadeja wanted to hammer this ball towards long-off, top edges it and it is a low chance for mitchell johnson at third man, johnson does well to scoop that one, priety zinta is over the moon
awana to hussey, 1 run, just a touch wider, again steered to backward point
sandeep sharma to ashwin, no run, looking to hammer it to the leg side, inside-edge it instead
sandeep sharma to dhoni, 1 run, slapped towards point for one more
sandeep sharma to ashwin, 1 run, guides this down to third man for one more
karanveer singh to dhoni, 1 wide, too wide outside off
karanveer singh to ashwin, 2 runs, spinning a long way outside off, slapped past a diving point for two
patel to ashwin, 1 run, a leading edge as ashwin looks to work the ball to the leg side, the ball loops over the bowler
patel to dhoni, 1 run, dhoni wants two after working the ball towards deep midwicket, no time for him to get back on strike though

patel to ashwin, out, ashwin is stumped, he was struggling to get a move on here, charged out to try a big shot, he misses and is so far out of the crease that even though wriddhiman saha juggled the ball once before taking the bails off, ashwin had no chance
johnson to dhoni, 1 wide, way outside off, that's a wide
patel to dhoni, six runs, dhoni skips out and thumps that over long-off for six more
patel to dhoni, no run, charges out again, slammed towards long-off, straight at the fielder
patel to dhoni, 4 byes, swings and misses, the ball misses the stumps, the keeper misses the ball, and it's byes
awana to dhoni, no run, wide outside off, dhoni reaches out for that, slapped towards cover

awana to dhoni, six runs, dhoni finishes it with a six, but there is to be no victory for super kings, it is kings xi who are celebrating, they are into their first final of the ipl, sehwag comes down from the dressing room to celebrate with his team, the most excited of the lot is priety zinta, super kings are deflated
morkel to vohra, 2 runs, he gets on top of the bounce and dabs it past the left of the diving point fielder for a couple, he got behind the line nicely there
morkel to vohra, four runs, no movement of the feet! vohra pushes at it away from the body and gets a thick outside edge. there was just one slip in place, this went through third slip
morkel to vohra, no run, loose shot! he throws his bat at this wide delivery, no movement of the feet, misses it completely
ut yadav to sehwag, no run, nice bit of outswing from the bowler and it beats the inside edge! sehwag was looking to thrash it through cover, but over-accounted for the swing
ut yadav to sehwag, 2 runs, that is a smart whip behind square on the leg side for a couple of runs! sehwag pushes for the second as tendo doesn't pick up cleanly at the boundary
ut yadav to vohra, no run, he defends the first delivery back to the bowler
ut yadav to vohra, 1 run, good tight line from umesh, the batsman pushes the 141 kph delivery towards mid-on with soft hands and calls for a single
morkel to vohra, 1 run, he is playing the waiting game, opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man for a single
morkel to bailey, 1 run, now bailey goes for a quick single, dabs this one to the on side and calls early
morkel to vohra, 2 runs, this one is off the middle! that takes some vertical distance but lands inside the boundary at deep midwicket, yusuf keeps it in

narine to bailey, out, and narine strikes immediately! it's a wicket gifted by bailey though. he walks into the shot and walks too far to the off side, missing the straighter delivery to be bowled behind his legs. kkr are on a roll now
narine to saha, no run, he looks to push this flatter delivery to the leg side but gets a leading edge to cover, it was the other one
shakib al hasan to vohra, 1 run, flatter delivery on off, vohra whips it to deep midwicket for a single
shakib al hasan to vohra, 1 run, he waits in the crease and punches the flatter delivery to deep midwicket
shakib al hasan to vohra, no run, waits in the crease and defends this one to cover
shakib al hasan to vohra, 1 run, waits in the crease and dabs this one to gully for a quick single
shakib al hasan to vohra, 1 run, flatter this time, the batsman waits in the crease and punches it to deep cover
shakib al hasan to vohra, 2 runs, flatter delivery on the stumps, the batsman goes deep in the crease and whips it to deep midwicket for a couple
shakib al hasan to vohra, 1 run, he stays back and punches the flatter delivery to deep midwicket
chawla to vohra, no run, comes down the pitch and yorks himself, digs it out to extra cover
shakib al hasan to saha, 2 runs, another one! not really.. this one just clears yusuf at extra cover. shakib fired it wide outside off and saha only gets a toe to it
narine to saha, six runs, he is not going to stop! saha continues to swing across the line, this time he gets loads of bat and clears the deep midwicket boundary
narine to saha, 1 run, now he watches this one closely and dabs it to cover for a quick single

narine to saha, 1 run, goes down on his knee, looks for the deep midwicket boundary, gets a doosra, gets a thick top-edge! narine calls for it, but he has to run towards mid-on .. he gets there and gets under it but drops it
narine to vohra, 1 run, this one is another harmless delivery, vohra is down on the knee and hammers it over midwicket, but this one doesn't go too far
ut yadav to saha, 3 wides, all falling apart for kkr! umesh bowls a slower one wide down the leg side, robin doesn't collect it cleanly..kings xi are loving this

chawla to vohra, out, he almost fluffed the chance! vohra wanted to send this to mg road, but gets a big edge that looped high up in the night sky. chawla calls early, gets under it.. but the ball bobs out of his hands.. it actually hits him on his face.. and bounces of his mouth. he is relieved to see it's still in his hands later. gambhir is relieved too.. wait a second.. relief? who's next?
chawla to saha, four runs, murdered! call 100.. this is carnage. flatter deliver on off, saha has whacked this so hard past the umpire that no one in the field moves
chawla to saha, 2 runs, comes down the pitch and drives it to deep extra cover, not much timing so this is stopped inside the boundary
narine to saha, no run, bowls the doosra outside off, saha swings across the line, misses
narine to saha, no run, and again! this is wide outside off, the batsman misses the hoick
johnson to uthappa, 1 run, bit of inward movement there from an off-stump line, and uthappa gets an inside-edge towards backward square leg
balaji to gambhir, 1 run, slower ball, and gambhir comes down the pitch before mistiming a swipe towards mid-on. went off the inside half of the bat
johnson to gambhir, 1 wide, uh oh. johnson's radar is going haywire here. slides even further down the leg side this time
awana to pandey, 1 run, angles this one in towards off stump, and pandey drives wristily towards mid-on
awana to pandey, four runs, nice placement. comes down the pitch and flicks it uppishly but safely from off stump. johnson chases from mid on but his slide is futile.
balaji to pandey, no run, slower ball, and pandey plays it wristily back to the bowler
balaji to gambhir, 1 run, another slower ball, and gambhir, who has taken two steps down the pitch, adjusts to work it off his legs to square leg
awana to pandey, 1 run, down the pitch, but he can't really time that flat-batted hit. aims towards the covers, hits it down to long-off
patel to pandey, no run, pushed through again, and pandey pushes it to cover
karanveer singh to pathan, 1 wide,
karanveer singh to pandey, 1 wide, sees pandey come down the pitch and fires it down the leg side again. pandey swivels right around to regain his crease
patel to pandey, 1 run, that's pushed through, just outside off, and pandey muscles it to long-off

patel to ten doeschate, no run, that hurried through again and straightened just a little bit. tendo is late on his flick and hits it back to the bowler off the outside half of his bat, almost a leading edge
karanveer singh to pandey, 1 wide, tries to go wide of off stump again, but overdoes it, and it's way wide of the tramline, and wide of the return crease as well
patel to chawla, 1 wide, chawla walks across his stumps, and it's called wide as akshar fires it marginally down the leg side
patel to chawla, 1 run, slower now, and chawla flicks it towards deep midwicket
patel to sa yadav, 1 run, another of those skidders homing into middle stump. surya flicks it to midwicket
patel to chawla, 1 run, slides across chawla, who opens his face and pokes it towards point
ut yadav to sharma, four runs, again width outside off. rohit plays a more flashing, flat-batted drive this time, away from his body, and slices it wide of the diving fielder at point
shakib al hasan to tare, 1 wide, overcompensates, fires this down the leg side
narine to anderson, no run, similar delivery, quicker, closer to off and middle. anderson has to bring his bat down in a hurry to defend
narine to anderson, 1 run, a bit more air, floated across towards off stump. anderson goes down on one knee to swipe that to deep midwicket
shakib al hasan to sharma, no run,
shakib al hasan to sharma, no run, down the track, drives hard to cover point
narine to anderson, 1 run, down the track now, makes room as he comes at the bowler, slaps this off-stump ball down to long-off
narine to sharma, no run, dropped. down the track comes rohit, swings wildly across the line. this one's the legbreak, and the edge pops straight out of uthappa's gloves
shakib al hasan to sharma, 1 run,
russell to anderson, 1 run,
malinga to uthappa, 1 run, a bit of swing, around off, uthappa defends, and the ball runs off the inside half of the bat for one
malinga to gambhir, 1 wide, more swing but this time he starts too straight and concedes a wide down the leg side
malinga to gambhir, 1 leg bye, swing again, beats the inside edge, goes for a leg-bye
malinga to uthappa, no run, movement away again, beats the defensive bat of uthappa
malinga to uthappa, no run, this one starts around middle and off, and shapes away towards off. uthappa defends towards mid-on. bowled at 147ks

vinay kumar to gambhir, no run, pace like fire. vinay kumar, captain of double treble in indian domestic cricket, has broken gambhir's bat. that will teach him to charge at him. gambhir jumps out of the crease, looks to hit hard, but is left only with his handle in the hand as the ball hits the shoulder of it
vinay kumar to gambhir, 1 run, stays in the crease this time. lets the ball come on this time and opens the face for a single to third man
vinay kumar to uthappa, no run, gets a leading edge first ball but it doesn't carry to mid-off
vinay kumar to uthappa, 1 run, this time he takes on the arm of rohit sharma at mid-off, and completes an easy single

anderson to pandey, no run, ooh. swing again, lots of it, and it started from outside off. pandey's feet were going nowhere as he poked at it, looking to play into the covers, and it curled in sharply and beat his inside edge
vinay kumar to gambhir, no run, down the track, heaves across the line looking to go over midwicket. the ball was slanting away from him all the time and he was nowhere near connecting
ojha to gambhir, six runs, a bit of air, and gambhir is down the track in a flash to swing it away, with the turn, over the midwicket boundary
malinga to pandey, 1 run, another slower ball, turns in from off to middle. pandey waits on it and tucks it away through square leg
morkel to smith, no run, some movement first up, beats the inside edge as it jags back in. headed down leg
morkel to smith, 4 leg byes, and this one swings in too far again, and concedes four leg-byes this time
morkel to smith, no run, this is closer to off, gives him less room, and smith defends it back to him

coulter-nile to mccullum, four runs, that's catch drop no. 8 this ipl. not even 40 overs in. mccullum is batting like he did in the world cup, just swings at one without getting his eye in, and gets a thick edge, which bursts through the hands of yuvraj singh at first slip
coulter-nile to smith, 1 leg bye, angling in too far down the leg side, gets away with just a leg-bye
muthuswami to smith, 4 leg byes, and he strays down the leg side first ball. smith has got four leg-byes, but he must be loving this standard of bowling after being tortured throughout the world cup
muthuswami to smith, no run, and he gets it to hold its line from wide on the crease, beating the edge. that's better bowling, and smith is struggling immediately
morkel to du plessis, 1 wide, slower ball gone wrong, wide outside off
imran tahir to du plessis, no run, stays back to a flat legbreak, punches it, but can't beat point
mishra to jadeja, no run, legbreak, gets extra bounce, hits the splice of the bat as jadeja defends. his head rocks back too
duminy to du plessis, 2 runs, makes room to drive this towards deep cover where joseph is done in by late spin away from him. concedes that extra run
mishra to jadeja, six runs, and now the crowd cheers. jadeja leaves the crease again, and reaches the pitch of a legbreak to hit it for a six right back over mishra's head
duminy to dhoni, 2 runs, stays back for this flat straighter delivery, and uses the pace to send it past backward point for two
imran tahir to dhoni, 2 runs, down the wicket to bunt this into the leg side. 'do, do, do' [two, two, two] is the immediate call. and he has placed it superbly with soft hands. gets two
imran tahir to dhoni, no run, tahir fires this one as dhoni shimmies down. no room. hit back to tahir
imran tahir to dhoni, no run, another shimmy, another quick ball, another dot as dhoni pushes this straight to cover
mishra to dhoni, 1 run, another defensive push to a legbreak, gets just the single to long-off
imran tahir to ashwin, 2 runs, down the wicket, again soft hands bunt it towards deep midwicket. comes back for two
nehra to agarwal, no run, pretty straight, no room, defended back to him
nehra to agarwal, no run, down the wicket again, this time the swing from nehra beats his inside edge and hits his pad. he is down the wicket so there is no shout for lbw
sharma to gautam, 1 run, he moves across first ball and whips this from around off to long leg. not a high-percentage shot
sharma to agarwal, no run, another similar preparation, but this time he keeps it along the carpet, and finds mid-off
nehra to gautam, 2 runs, risky shot. shuffles across to cover the movement, and mis-hits it over mid-off for two

nehra to agarwal, out, and nehra has taken out the openers in one over. agarwal tries one shot too many. nehra has run his fingers on this. slightly off-pace with another forceful shot, and he is early into it. the outside edge is taken by dhoni
nehra to iyer, 1 run, closer to his body, iyer, pushes this wide of mid-off for a single this time. iyer yet to face a dot ball

pandey to morkel, four runs, that's lucky. morkel takes the risk first ball, backing away and swinging at a wide delivery. pandey has actually done well because he has seen morkel back away. but morkel goes at it, and gets an edge that goes fine of third man
pandey to morkel, no run, slightly off pace as morkel makes room again, and he beats him for pace
ashwin to morkel, 1 run, pushed to mid-on with soft hands, sneaks in a single
ashwin to jadhav, 2 runs, offbreak, flicked into the leg side, mccullum at midwicket goes the wrong way, and concedes two runs
ashwin to morkel, no run, morkel gives him the charge, ashwin slows it down, morkel recovers well to play the defensive shot
bravo to morkel, 1 wide, morkel backs away first up, bravo looks to go wide outside off, but goes too wide
pandey to duminy, out, duminy has been running balls down to third man well, but pandey has kept getting closer and closer to off. this time duminy gets the inside edge onto the stumps. huge wicket
ashwin to morkel, 1 wide, backs away early, makes him fire one down leg, and then moves inside it to draw a wide. that's street-cricket batting
ashwin to mishra, no run, slow offbreak, wide outside off too, draws him wide,  mishra defends
ashwin to mishra, 1 run, opens the face on this one, gets a single to point. ashwin has tipped this game in super kings' favour in his last over
nehra to imran tahir, 2 runs, tahir swings, manages to beat mid-off with the mis-hit, comes back for the second
anureet singh to smith, no run, smith shuffles across and pushes this down the track
anureet singh to nair, no run, sandeep generates some excess bounce outside off, holds its line. karun has a wishy-washy waft at it and misses
patel to smith, four runs, and again! he chips down the track, unfurls another flick. puts it away to the left of mid-on for successive fours

patel to nair, out, good riposte from axar and he lets out a roar. rajasthan royals have been reduced to 35 for 3. this was the arm-ball from axar, quicker and flatter. karun aims to swipe over midwicket again. he misses it this time. but axar nails the middle stump. it is knocked back
karanveer singh to smith, four runs, very, very wristy! smith uses his feet, flips his wrists and gets it over midwicket
karanveer singh to binny, 1 run,
johnson to smith, 1 wide, johnson loses his radar, hurls it down leg. far too wide for smith to glance it away
karanveer singh to faulkner, 2 runs, quicker and slid through outside off, poked out towards third man
karanveer singh to hooda, no run, karanveer spears it on off, jabbed to the off side
patel to faulkner, 1 wide, slid down leg as axar strays in line
patel to faulkner, 1 run, arm-ball from axar on off and middle, jabbed down to long-off

karanveer singh to hooda, 2 runs, maxi runs back from the covers, gets his fingertips onto it, but can't cling on. hooda aims to whack it over the leg side, shoots it up in the air off a thick edge. maxi motors back, but can't pouch it
karanveer singh to hooda, no run, flatter on off and middle, he gets n inside edge onto the pad
karanveer singh to hooda, 2 runs, straighter in line, tucked away towards deep square leg
patel to morris, 1 run, driven to long-off, more off an inside-edge
patel to faulkner, 1 run, pushed through on middle and leg, slammed to long-off
anureet singh to morris, no run, well-disguised back of the hand slower one from anureet, morris swings and misses. he was completely hoodwinked by that one
southee to vijay, four runs, and  vijay has put this away in some style. pitched further up and outside off, vijay does not need a second invitation to drive, crunched through the covers
morris to vijay, no run,
morris to vijay, 1 run,
kulkarni to vijay, no run, vijay semi-steers, semi-drives and finds point
faulkner to vijay, four runs, faulkner errs down leg, vijay just tickles it fine. very minimal effort required to put those away
kulkarni to vijay, 1 wide, bumper outside off from kulkarni, vijay half-ducks and gets his noggin out of the way. wided called
tambe to vijay, 1 run, slid through on off, he drills a drive to long-off
tambe to vijay, no run, fired at 90.3ks, vijay's head falls over, but he jabs his bat down in the nick of time and digs it out
binny to miller, 1 wide, binny veers down leg, miller can't flick it away
tambe to miller, 1 run, pushed through on middle and leg, wristed through midwicket
tambe to miller, no run, pushed through, he comes down the track and drills it back at tambe
tambe to patel, 1 run, flat on off and middle, drilled to long-off
faulkner to patel, 1 run, aha, there comes the slower ball outside off. he waits on it and dabs it down towards third man
faulkner to bailey, 2 runs, picked away off the hips to fine leg, tim southee mops it up in the deep

faulkner to patel, 1 run, looks like another of those slippery back-of-the-hand slower ones outside off. chopped behind point, karun collects the ball, hits the stumps at the non-striker's end and concedes an overthrow
southee to bailey, 1 wide, bailey winds up for a big blow, southee sprays this wide outside off

faulkner to johnson, out, johnson perishes for nought after being hoodwinked by faulkner's change of pace. oh wait, the umpires are checking for a possible no-ball. he may have had some part of his heel behind the bowling crease. johnson aims to go big and holes out to long-off
faulkner to anureet singh, 1 leg bye, faulker changes his pace and slips in a slower ball, he misses the flick and takes it on his pad
boult to mccullum, 1 wide, boult gets some gentle swing but drifts it down leg. baz seeks to glance it away but only meets with thin air
kumar to smith, 1 wide, bhuvi invests in an outswinger outside off, smith flashes and misses. past the tram-line
kumar to mccullum, 1 wide, bhuvi tries to mix things up, slower ball down leg

kumar to mccullum, no run, pitched further up and on off - right in the driving zone - baz flays it away to mid-off. bhuvi aimed to intercept the ball with his left boot, but the man at mid-off has it covered
kv sharma to mccullum, no run, pushed through, blocked back to the bowler off an inside edge i guess
kv sharma to mccullum, 1 run, pitched further up, baz hoists it over the covers. long-off hunts it down
kumar to raina, 1 run, raina steps way outside leg, bhuvi is aware of it as he follows the batsman. raina adjusts and steers it away towards deep cover
i sharma to raina, 2 runs, too leg-stumpish from ishant, raina helps it over backward square. bhuvi runs across from deep fine leg and keeps it to a couple
bopara to mccullum, 1 run, might have been the change of pace, baz adjusts and steers it away to deep cover
bopara to dhoni, 1 run, straighter in line, jerked away to the leg side off the inside section of the bat
kumar to dhoni, 1 run, turned to mid-on for a quick single as this was straighter in line
kumar to mccullum, 1 wide, baz aims to back away, bhuvi loses his cool as he slips it wide outside off. past the tram-line and wide called
kv sharma to dhoni, six runs, dhoni goes berserk again and so do the crowd. uses his feet and pummels it over the midwicket boundary
nehra to warner, 1 run, picked away off the hips, behind square on the leg side
sharma to warner, 2 runs, wide line outside off, pushed towards deep cover
ashwin to ojha, 1 run, ash lands this on off and gets it to spin away, dabbed behind point
bravo to warner, 1 run, wide line outside off, he reaches out and squeezes it to deep cover
ashwin to ojha, no run, looped up on middle now, ojha aims to go big and gets an inside edge onto the pad
ashwin to warner, 2 runs, pushed through on middle and leg, turned through midwicket. they earn a couple by the time ashwin gets to the ball

ashwin to ojha, out, the pressure gets the better of ojha. this was a top spinner from ashwin - not the offbreak. ojha runs down the track but mis-hits the lofted stroke, holes out to long-off. mohit follows the ball, watches it all along and pouches it safely
jadeja to bopara, six runs, good strike from bopara. he goes inside-out over the covers. stand and deliver
jadeja to bopara, 1 run, pushed through, sliced away over the covers
bravo to kv sharma, 1 run, pitched and outside off, he throws his bat at it and slices it to deep third man
nehra to kv sharma, no run, nehra slides this outside off, karn wants to smash it from chepauk to tambaram. but only meets it with thin air. change of pace, i reckon
abbott to uthappa, 2 runs, and more gifts for kkr. pushed towards mid-on, they call early, and make an easy single, but there is an overthrow allowing them a second
patel to gambhir, 1 wide, starts this over with a wide down leg
patel to gambhir, 1 run, angled away just outside off, gg looks to drive it late and gets a bottom edge for one
patel to uthappa, four runs, didn't start with a boundary, but ends with one. robbie is given room again outside off and he frees his arms with a well-placed drive past point for four more
aaron to uthappa, 1 run, run out chance - robbie slashes this one towards point, ab gets a fumble and mandeep collects to throw at non-strikers' but uthappa is safe
aaron to gambhir, no run, poor lbw appeal for a ball that pitched outside leg and was going down further as gg looked to flick it in the air
ahmed to gambhir, 1 run, angling away from off stump, guides it late to third man for one
aaron to gambhir, no run, outside off this time, gg guides it late towards backward point
aaron to gambhir, no run, better delivery on middle and leg, no room and gg defends it to midwicket
ahmed to uthappa, 1 run, bit outside off and robbie guides it nicely to third man for one
ahmed to gambhir, 1 run, angled across the batsman outside off, he runs it down to third man too
ahmed to uthappa, 1 run, some room outside off, robbie drives it just wide of mid off and gets one
sammy to gambhir, 1 run, just outside off, pushed down to mid off for one

sammy to uthappa, 1 leg bye, loud, confident appeal from sammy but it looked turned down and they take a leg bye. it came in sharply from well outside off as robbie looked to work it on leg, struck just outside off maybe

ahmed to gambhir, 1 run, run-out chance first ball! gg defends the ball towards the keeper and calls for it, pandey responds with a dive at the keeper's end and luckily for him there was no direct hit
chahal to gambhir, 2 runs, charges down and drives uppishly on leg, inner edge goes to deep midwicket and they get two
aaron to pandey, four runs, mid on is in, pandey knows that and he makes room to smash the delivery over that fielder by making some room for four
aaron to gambhir, 2 runs, shuffles across a bit and defends the ball towards backward point for a quick single. ab tries a direct hit but misses. second run for the overthrow as well
aaron to gambhir, 1 leg bye, pitched outside leg, looks to work it fine to fine leg but gets a leg bye
chahal to pandey, no run, good turn and slightly slower outside off, pandeyji drives and misses
chahal to yadav, no run, waits for the ball to turn from around off, it nearly sneaks through as surya defends it late to slip
abbott to yadav, no run, that goes just over the stumps! surya shuffled too much towards off, looked to whip it like viv and missed
abbott to pandey, four runs, that's a clever shot for four! he made room, saw width as well, and instead of hitting it hard, he merely used the pace of the ball to run it past backward point for four

patel to pandey, out, so much is happening here, pandeyji is run out at the end of it! he pushed the slower ball back to the bowler, who got a hand to it and the ball deflected towards cover. pandey is more than halfway down the pitch but yusuf has done a gayle - he doesn't move - and kohli gets an underarm direct hit at keeper's end by the time pandey dives back
morkel to kohli, no run, slightly closer to off stump and another solid defence from kohli
narine to gayle, 1 run, goes back this time with minimal footwork and pushes it down to mid off for one
narine to kohli, 1 run, shuffles across a bit and helps the ball with the turn to leg for one
narine to kohli, no run, wider outside off and it doesn't turn much, kohli goes after it and gets a bottom edge
narine to kohli, 1 run, turning in from outside off, he goes back and jabs it to leg for one
morkel to kohli, no run, pressure is mounting - kohli dances down the track with some room for the swing outside off and misses
narine to gayle, no run, doesn't move much and defends the ball from leg stump to leg side

russell to de villiers, four runs, drives it uppishly but he finds the gap right between cover and mid off to send it crashing for four. a lot of them thought there was a chance, but it pierced the gap
russell to de villiers, no run, gives him the charge, chases the ball outside off but misses it
pathan to gayle, 1 run, well outside leg and easily helped to midwicket for one
pathan to de villiers, 1 leg bye, tries to whip the ball with the turn to leg, only gets a leg bye
pathan to de villiers, six runs, dances down and connects this time - gone over the midwicket boundary! he had been trying that for a while and finally connected by hitting it with the turn
cariappa to gayle, 1 run, outside leg and turning in, pushed to deep midwicket for one
pathan to sammy, 1 run, stays back to push the ball from outside off to long off
pathan to sammy, 1 run, waits for the ball to turn and just beats midwicket with a punch
pathan to gayle, no run, slower through the air on leg, gayle defends it back
chawla to sammy, 1 run, whips the ball after the turn and against it to deep midwicket
chawla to gayle, 1 run, stays back and lofts the ball after it turns to deep midwicket
narine to gayle, no run, beats him outside off with the offspinner that goes past the outside edge
narine to sammy, 1 run, carrom ball outside off and sammy plays it away from the body to deep point for one
narine to gayle, 1 run, on middle and leg now, gayle looks to defend and gets a thick outside edge on off for one
pathan to abbott, no run, turning in from outside off, pushed back to the bowler
shakib al hasan to gayle, 1 wide, massive wide down the leg side
narine to patel, no run, comes down to smash the ball back to the bowler, narine gets a hand to it
morkel to ahmed, 1 run, makes room to slash at the ball and finds gg at point, but they take a quick single
southee to iyer, 1 wide, strays down the leg side now for a wide
southee to agarwal, no run, drives again but misses this time! width outside off and he swung his arms again but didn't connect this time
southee to agarwal, 1 run, drives this one away from the body outside off to third man with a thick outside edge for one
morris to agarwal, 1 run, pushes at it away from the body with some outswing to third man for one
southee to agarwal, no run, angled in towards the stumps now, he defends it back
kulkarni to agarwal, 2 runs, outswing again outside off, opens the face of the bat bit late to beat point again. this one isn't fast enough to beat third man

kulkarni to agarwal, four runs, excellent batting from agarwal! touch closer to off stump, no slips and he opens the face of the bat late enough to help it fine on the off side and no way third man can get to it
tambe to agarwal, no run, flat on off, driven firmly to extra cover right at the edge of the circle

tambe to agarwal, out, chipped back and tambe has struck! agarwal made room as tmabe targeted the stumps, he got the timing wrong as he looked to loft it over the bowler and tambe got a simple catch around head height
hooda to duminy, 1 run, flatter now and angling into the batsman, helps it to midwicket for one
hooda to iyer, 1 wide, errs down the leg side now for a wide
faulkner to iyer, 1 wide, slower ball and it turns away down leg for a wide
tambe to iyer, 1 run, goes back in the crease and tucks it against the turn to leg for one
tambe to duminy, 1 run, whipped with the turn from middle stump to leg for one
morris to duminy, 1 run, bit too wide outside off with the angle, swishes at it to send it to deep point
hooda to duminy, 1 wide, way too wide outside the off stump. called wide, of course
hooda to yuvraj singh, 1 run, angled in slightly towards middle, tucked on the leg side for one
hooda to duminy, 1 wide, another wide, just like the last over - way outside off
morris to mathews, no run, angled in towards middle and leg, flicked straight to midwicket
faulkner to mathews, no run, tries another heave for this one outside off again, misses this time
morris to duminy, six runs, finally he connects, will it go all the way, yes it does! it was slightly slower, well outside leg and he's powered it over the deep midwicket fielder for six
morris to duminy, 1 leg bye, towards the stumps now, he struggles to put it away but finds a leg bye
unadkat to rahane, 2 runs, errs down towards leg stump, rahane turns it away down leg to fine leg for two
coulter-nile to samson, four runs, angled down leg, samson whips it away to the leg side and tahir at fine leg over-runs the ball and it goes past his left hand for four
coulter-nile to samson, no run, straighter delivery this time, he defends it back
unadkat to rahane, no run, yes, no, yes, almost run out! rahane pushed the ball to cover point, came down, samson also took a couple of steps, but there was no single and he went back just in time
unadkat to samson, 1 run, shuffles down and across, and flicks the ball to leg for one more
coulter-nile to rahane, 1 run, closer to the stumps now, slightly slower, he waits and guides it to third man for one
coulter-nile to smith, no run, goes towards off as usual and whips the ball to midwicket
coulter-nile to smith, no run, pretty wide outside off, he reaches out and gets a bottom edge to to cover point
mathews to rahane, 1 run, targets the off stump again, not giving any room, and it's tucked to fine leg for one more
mathews to smith, four runs, makes room for a change, smithy, and slashes the widish delivery over point region for four in the gap
mathews to smith, 1 run, comes down a step and pushes the ball from outside off to mid off for one
mishra to nair, 1 run, goes back and punches the ball from outside off to cover point
imran tahir to rahane, 1 leg bye, animated appeal from tahir for lbw even though it pitched outside leg, doesn't matter if it was hitting the stumps or not. they sneak a leg bye too
imran tahir to rahane, 1 wide, way outside off and turning away, for a wide
mishra to hooda, 1 wide, errs down the leg side for s wide
mishra to hooda, 2 runs, comes down a step and flicks the ball from around off to deep midwicket in the gap for two
mathews to rahane, 1 wide, jinxy charges down, mathews throws in a slower one to beat rahane but it's given a wide outside off
mathews to hooda, four runs, on the other side now - four more! he exposed is stumps again and chased the ball outside off to swish at it, beat point with that and found the boundary
yuvraj singh to rahane, 1 run, takes a step down and swats it through covers for one more
yuvraj singh to rahane, 1 run, rushes through a little bit, he swats it to leg for one
imran tahir to hooda, 1 run, comes down again and manages some bat to get a single to square leg
imran tahir to faulkner, 2 runs, drifts it in towards the batsman, this one's steered towards deep midwicket with soft hands and they come back for the second
mishra to hooda, 1 wide, way outside off and turning away, called a wide
coulter-nile to faulkner, 1 run, makes room again, ncn aims for the batsman, who tucks the ball with the angle to deep midwicket
coulter-nile to hooda, 2 runs, on the stumps now and hooda flicks it away on the leg side in the gap for two more
coulter-nile to faulkner, four runs, faulkner makes a lot of room, ncn sends it down leg from outside leg and faulkner gets a thin inside edge to get a four fine down leg. lucky one that
imran tahir to southee, no run, quicker and flatter on the stumps, southee defends it back in the nick of time
suyal to vijay, 1 leg bye, on the leg stump again, this one is on the hips. vijay does not connect with the flick. takes it on the thigh and they stroll over for a leg bye
malinga to sehwag, 1 wide, inauspicious start from malinga. slings it down leg, sehwag can't connect with it. as df wrote in the preview, his bulging waistline has hampered his bowling
malinga to sehwag, four runs, he takes it from outside off and whips it away to the right of a diving mid-on. very, very wristy. viru fetches it from there and sends it to the cow corner boundary
harbhajan singh to sehwag, 1 run, nudged behind point for a single
harbhajan singh to miller, no run, darted quick on off, driven to the covers
suchith to miller, 1 wide, darted outside leg, miller misses the glance. and that's a wide
malinga to bailey, four runs, malinga strays down the leg side, bailey glances it away fine on the leg side. easy pickings
malinga to miller, no run, bumper on the leg stump, soars through to the keeper as miller sinks under it. one for the over gestures the square-leg umpire
harbhajan singh to bailey, no run, darted flat on off as bailey comes down the track, jammed back at the bowler
suchith to bailey, 2 runs, much slower through the air outside off, he shuffles across and scoops it fine
suchith to bailey, 1 run, flat and on the leg stump, squeezed away to deep midwicket
pollard to bailey, 1 run, another of those slower offerings outside off, bailey steps away and drills a drive to long-off

malinga to miller, out, miller undone by malinga.. the umpires check for a possible no-ball, just a customary check, all fine though. slippery delivery sprayed wide outside off, miller wants to attack it, but can only edge it thickly to the left of tare. change of pace, there. key wicket for the hosts
suchith to bailey, 1 run, pushed through on off, tucked away through the unmanned mid-on region
suchith to dhawan, no run, slid through outside off, cracked to the covers, straight to the fielder
malinga to johnson, 1 run, slippery and outside off, squeezed down to third man. might have been the change of pace again
sandeep sharma to sharma, no run, pushes it outside off and gets that inward movement, enough to mess with rohit's attempted drive. he gets an inside edge towards mid-on
sandeep sharma to tare, 1 run, keeps it wide outside off, tare has to stretch to reach it but doesn't hit it off the middle, takes a single as the ball rolls to the left of point
sandeep sharma to finch, 1 leg bye, drifting onto the pad again, finch still can't put it away
sandeep sharma to rayudu, no run, awayswinger now, rayudu pokes, zips past the outer edge
johnson to anderson, no run, leg stumpish, corey can't quite work it to the leg side. mitch's half-appeal is shot down, heading down leg
patel to anderson, 1 leg bye, flat on the leg stump, corey misses the flick, outside leg i guess. they sneak a leg bye
patel to pollard, no run, defended on the off stump

patel to rayudu, no run, has another batsman been stumped? tv umpire comes into play. axar loops this up outside off, rayudu comes down the track and misses the big blow. he loses his balance and does a near 360 degress, but just about manages to drag his bat in
patel to rayudu, 1 run, half-track on the leg stump, swatted away to deep midwicket
dhawan to rayudu, four runs, rayudu backs away, dhawan pushes this outside off, he reaches out and flashes it up and over a leaping mitch at mid-off
dhawan to suchith, 1 run,
dhawan to pollard, no run, slower ball and deceives pollard. pollard is way too early into a lash and the ball passes the stumps
patel to suchith, no run, pushed through, nearly chipped back at the bowler

patel to pollard, out, if maxi doesn't get you, miller will. axar gives this some air, pollard aims to loft it away and holes out to miller at long-off. definition of a dolly. in case you are interested, the asking rate is 18.78. pollard skied it off the base of the bat
patel to harbhajan singh, 1 run, arm-ball, slashed away to the off side
dhawan to harbhajan singh, 1 wide, dhawan attempts a slower ball and drifts it down the leg side, bhajji can't glance it away
anureet singh to harbhajan singh, 1 wide, errs in line, leg-side wide
dhawan to harbhajan singh, 1 wide, off-side wide, just past the tram-line
anureet singh to harbhajan singh, four runs, angled outside off from round the stumps, bhajji squeezes it away past the covers
b kumar to kohli, 1 run, wide line outside off, kohli uses the pace of the bowler and guides it away to deep third man
boult to kohli, 1 wide, boult does not control the swing now, drifts it down leg
boult to kohli, no run,
boult to kohli, 1 wide, boult swings it down leg, wided
p kumar to karthik, no run, praveen kumar targets off, dk defends it
bopara to kohli, 1 run, straighter in line, kohli hangs back and tucks it away towards the man at 45 again
sharma to kohli, 2 runs, karn slides this through on middle and leg, tucked away through midwicket. kohli wants a couple and scampers across
sharma to de villiers, 1 run, flat and darted in on off, squeezed past the diving cover fielder. kohli waits for the ball to pass the fielder and then responds to the single
sharma to de villiers, 1 run, looped up on middle, driven down to long-off
sharma to sammy, 1 run, pushed down to long-off
b kumar to de villiers, 1 wide, ab looks to back away, bhuvi sprays it wide outside off. the former can't reach out and slices it away. past the tram-line
p kumar to abbott, no run, swing and misses to an off-speed ball outside off
abbott to warner, 2 runs, nice swing into the left-hander here but warner manages to tuck it past midwicket for a couple

patel to warner, four runs, corrects his line but serves up a medium-paced dolly outside off. warner stands tall and slaps it back at the bowler at extreme speeds. he didn't have a chance to stop that one
sammy to warner, 1 run, sprayed wide outside off, warner reaches out and crashes it to deep point
patel to williamson, 4 leg byes, harshal patel's radar goes haywire as he errs down leg, williamson helps it away fine on the leg side
patel to williamson, 1 run, whipped away off the hips, directed to deep backward square
chahal to dhawan, 1 run, dhawan chips down the track and nearly yorks himself. pushed down to long-off
chahal to rahul, no run, yuzi gives this more air, dabbed into the covers
abbott to rahul, 1 wide, another leg-side wide. abbott has lost the plot
abbott to dhawan, no run, this one skids on outside off, messes with dhawan's attempted drive. off the inside half of the bat, back to the bowler
chahal to rahul, 1 run, yuzi gives this more air, chipped over mid-off

chahal to rahul, 1 run, slid through quick and on off, he can only jerk it away to the covers. they take on ab again and pinch a single. ab has a shy at the striker's end but can't throw the stumps down
ahmed to rahul, 5 wides, drifting down leg, dk dives across to his left, but can't stop the ball. sneaks away to the fine-leg boundary. kohli is frustrated. that's five wides
southee to finch, 1 run, much wider outswinger, finch goes after it, a thick edge zooms down flat to third man, on the bounce
southee to patel, 1 run, straightens it on the left-hander's off stump, and parthiv is away with a soft push to covers

southee to finch, four runs, southee angles it in from wide of the crease, gets it to curl away late, but finch has hit the gap between cover and point with the drive, was in the air for a while, but out of reach
southee to finch, no run, this comes in a tad from outside off stump, left alone
morris to finch, no run, holds the line some way outside off, finch does not go for it
morris to finch, no run, he's been taking it away, but this one has swung back in a long way, finch was leaning across, and manages to inside edge it on to his pad
morris to finch, four runs, overdoes the angle now and finch tucks him behind square, well away from the man at deep square leg
kulkarni to sharma, no run, angled in from wide of the crease, rohit defends from around the line of off
southee to chand, no run, angled in this time after all those away swingers, pushed straight to mid on
southee to chand, no run,
binny to anderson, no run, angles it across left-hander anderson, who leaves it alone
hooda to anderson, no run, comes in with the angle from round the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
tambe to chand, 1 run, down the track to hammer it down to long off
morris to anderson, no run, and another one gets big and jags back in to anderson, who takes it on the bat handle this time as he gets the glove out of the way
morris to anderson, no run, fine reply from anderson as he smashes an over pitched ball, cannot place it wide of mid off though
tambe to pollard, 1 run, charges out now and heaves, gets a thick inside edge to deep midwicket
morris to pollard, 1 run, samson saves some runs with a dive to his left to half stop an underedge of a heave from pollard to a wide ball
faulkner to anderson, no run, slower one angled in to anderson, who can only pat it back
tambe to pollard, 1 run, quicker one on the stumps, he backs away and heaves it through midwicket
tambe to pollard, 2 runs, down the track and cracks it hard, rahane saves the boundary with sharp work to his left at deep midwicket, a better throw would have had anderson though
suyal to rahane, no run, shout from the bowler, got batsman in a tangle as he walked out and failed to work this away square
malinga to smith, 1 run, whipped from way outside off to wide mid on
suchith to smith, 1 run, tosses it up, smith leaves the crease and pushes to long off
suchith to smith, 1 run, comes down the track and whips it hard, but straight to deep midwicket
anderson to smith, no run, stands outside off stump now and punches it straight to point
anderson to smith, no run, this is way outside off stump, almost a foot outside the marker, but not called a wide, weird
anderson to smith, no run, another wide one, smith cannot connect again
suchith to smith, 2 runs, almost yorked himself as he jumped out, but was able to squeeze it square in the end, there is a misfield at deep point
gopal to rahane, 1 run, almost picks it straight to deep backward square leg, this was pushed through much quicker, to the fielder on the bounce
gopal to hooda, 1 run, almost popped it back to the bowler, was just out of his reach in the end to his right
gopal to hooda, six runs, hooda launches it big over deep midwicket, leaves the crease immediately, takes it off middle and carts it high
gopal to hooda, six runs, six more, this stayed in the air longer, hooda advancing out again, getting under the ball and going over long off now
malinga to smith, no run, that has gone through smith, and somehow missed the stumps, he went for a big drive and the ball zipped past the outside edge, wasn't far from off
suyal to smith, four runs, that'll help royals, he gets a thick edge as he drives from the crease, the ball flies to the fine third man rope
malinga to smith, no run, foxed by the slower one this time, was winding up but was left prodding outside off at the change of pace

suyal to smith, six runs, smith all but seals it with another of his ridiculously well-timed checked pick-up shots over midwicket, that is some way into the crowd, moves across early, stands on off, and takes it from around middle and leg
malinga to smith, four runs, another one, makes slight room, bends the legs a bit, arches back a bit, and crashes another drive between extra cover and mid off

cummins to smith, out, that's a blinder first ball, smith gone for a golden duck! it was pretty wide outside the off stump, smith chased the delivery with a swipe uppishly and ten doeschate flew to his left from cover point to gab it with both hands. the crowd erupts even more
cummins to mccullum, 1 wide, another wide, this time a slower one down the leg side
ut yadav to raina, no run, straighter delivery on middle and off, raina goes across and tucks the ball to midwicket

ut yadav to raina, out, he's handed it straight to mid-on, raina gone! umesh pitched it up, looks like raina wanted to clear the infield but he merely chipped it to chawla's right at mid on. he didn't have to move much
ut yadav to du plessis, 1 leg bye, slides it towards the batsman again, near the hips and it deflects down to fine leg for a leg bye
chawla to du plessis, no run, can't middle it this time, came down to steer the ball to leg but took it on the body
chawla to du plessis, no run,
hogg to du plessis, no run, turns it in towards off stump from outside off, faf goes back and pushes to cover

hogg to du plessis, out, second wicket of the over, the wrong one has done it! faf walked down, tried to steer it with the spin to the leg side, but the ball went the other way from around off and beat him completely. uthappa does the rest
chawla to bravo, 1 run, slides in a slightly quicker one, bravo goes back as it doesn't bounce much and he dabs it to midwicket
chawla to jadeja, 1 run, outside the off stump, not much turn and jadeja pushes it down to long off for one
chawla to jadeja, no run, doesn't move much, waits for the ball to turn into him a little bit and defends on the off side
pathan to bravo, no run, he goes back to let it turn and slices it to point
chawla to bravo, no run, turning in this time slightly from outside off, bravo defends to cover point and is sent back for the single
pathan to bravo, 1 run, touch wider outside off, sends it to deep cover this time for one
cummins to negi, 4 leg byes, on the leg side now, he tries to run it down to fine leg and manages it off his hips for four leg byes
hogg to negi, 1 run, comes down the track and turns the ball before it turns to the leg side for one
hogg to negi, six runs, this man is unfazed, he dances down the track with some room and lofts it with an inside-out drive over the covers with turn for six!
russell to nehra, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, nehra pokes and manages an outside edge to third man for one more
sharma to uthappa, 1 run, taps and runs to midwicket, good early call always helps
nehra to uthappa, 1 wide, that wasn't too far from the leg stump as robbie looked to whip it on leg but it went down leg for a wide
sharma to uthappa, no run, angled in towards the stumps, steered to midwicket by uthappa

nehra to uthappa, 1 run, a direct hit brings the third umpire into play. nudged into the leg side, which leaves nehra the closest to go after it. meanwhile the batsmen have scampered across. good stretch and slide of the bat from gambhir makes sure he's in
nehra to gambhir, no run, not quite enough room for the slice behind point and gambhir has to settle for an inside edge to slip
sharma to uthappa, 2 runs, another outside edge as uthappa pushes hart at the ball. manages to evade the lone slip fielder, to deep third man
negi to uthappa, 1 run, slightly slower outside off, uthappa waits and pushes it down to long off
negi to uthappa, 1 leg bye, lbw appeal from dhoni as uthappa swept this ball that pitched outside leg and then went for a leg bye down leg
more to pandey, 1 run, makes some room and swishes at this one to find deep point for one

more to uthappa, 2 runs, angled in towards off stump, uthappa steers it with the angle to the deep midwicket region. there was some hesitation for the second, especially from russell, but they got there
more to russell, 1 wide, errs down the leg side this time and it's a wide
negi to uthappa, 1 run, draws the outside edge as uthappa looked to turn the ball to leg from middle stump, but the ball took the edge and went towards cover point
negi to russell, no run, slides the flatter one towards the stumps, he blocks it back
negi to russell, 1 run, flat again, this time towards leg stump and russell helps it behind square on leg for one
jadeja to uthappa, 1 run, wants to work the ball to leg but mistimes it and the edge goes to cover for one
nehra to uthappa, four runs, just outside off with the angle and uthappa smartly guides the ball, using the pace, and beats third man by helping it fine
bravo to russell, 1 run, angles the ball sharply towards russell's abdomen, he defends on leg for one
bravo to russell, no run, slightly slower at 127.6kph, it's pretty wide and russell chases but missed. just inside the wide line
sharma to russell, no run, slower delivery at 104kph, it was wide too and russell swung his bat wildly but could not middle it
coulter-nile to vijay, no run, outswinger from coulter-nile, teases vijay outside off. vijay was late to drag his bat away, deflects it first slip on the bounce, off the face of the bat
coulter-nile to sehwag, 1 wide, bumper, flies over a ducking sehwag. wide called, for there was too much height on that
mathews to sehwag, four runs, width on offer outside off. viru frees his arms and rifles it over backward point. don't bother about the feet movement
mathews to sehwag, 1 run,
mishra to sehwag, 1 wide, lobbed up outside off and spins away, past the tram-line. saha does not want any of it
duminy to sehwag, 1 wide, angled wide outside off from round the stumps. saw viru wind up and pushed it outside off

imran tahir to maxwell, out, legbreak outside off and tahir strikes! maxi runs down the track, seeks to smash another mighty blow. but has to settle with a slice, which is swallowed up by tiwary at the covers
duminy to bailey, 2 runs, flatter and on off, tucked through midwicket for a couple
duminy to miller, 1 wide, darted flat and miles wide outside off

mishra to bailey, four runs, floated on the fourth-stump line, bailey slithers across off, fetches it from there and lap-scoops it to the left of the keeper, fine on the leg side with a healthy helping of cheek
imran tahir to patel, no run, looped up and slow outside off, axar swings wildly and misses
imran tahir to bailey, no run, pushed through outside off and spins away. bailey backs away, slugs but does not connect

imran tahir to patel, out, another wrong'un, another wicket and mathews takes a sharp catch. axar wants to whack it over the off side, skews it off the bottom of the bat and holes out to long-off, mathews takes it at the edge of the boundary
sandeep sharma to agarwal, no run, outswinger this time, starts fairly wide outside off, left alone
sandeep sharma to iyer, 1 wide, and again! sandeep hunts for a big outswinger and pushes another off-side wide
sandeep sharma to agarwal, 1 wide, another off-side wide
dhawan to agarwal, 2 runs, darted just outside off, dabbed down to third man, skiddy pace from anureet
patel to yuvraj singh, no run, slid through on middle and leg, blocked back to the bowler
patel to agarwal, 1 run, darter outside off, driven away to deep extra cover
patel to yuvraj singh, six runs, quick and on middle and leg, yuvraj picks it up and deposits it over deep square. flat and powerful
anureet singh to agarwal, 1 wide, round the wicket, stray ball down leg. agarwal does not meet with the glance
dhawan to yuvraj singh, 1 wide, yuvraj steps away and makes room, dhawan loses his radar as he slides it wide outside off
dhawan to yuvraj singh, 1 wide, yuvi stands a foot wide outside off, dhawan sprays it past the tram-line, another massive off-side wide

patel to jadhav, out, dd have to wait for victory. this was pushed through, jadhav aims to swipe it away. does not get it off the meat of the bat. skies it off a top-edge, which is held by anureet at the covers

patel to mathews, four runs, dd break their 11-match winless streak, mathews finishes it for dd. he nips down the track and drills it, beating mid-on to his left. tiwary wraps mathews in a hug. albie shakes hands with jpd in the dug-out
morris to warner, no run, change of pace from morris, stops on the batsman. warner is aware of it as he check-taps it gently to mid-off
hooda to dhawan, 1 wide, darted down leg, dhawan lets it be, wided
kulkarni to ojha, 1 wide, bumper from kulkarni, the batsman ducks under it. wided, for there was too much height on it
faulkner to ojha, 1 wide, bumper from faulkner, ojha sinks under it. wide called
faulkner to ojha, four runs, too leg-stumpish from faulkner, stray ball and duly eased away fine on the leg side
tambe to ojha, no run, what.a.a.ball from tambe, simply unplayable. pitched on the leg stump and rips across ojha, misses the off stump by a whisker
tambe to bopara, no run, pushed through on off, defended
tambe to morgan, no run, flatter and quicker, blocked out to the leg side, tambe runs to his left and hunts it down
hooda to bopara, 1 run, pushed through on the stumps, driven down the track, past hooda, who was diving to his right
hooda to morgan, no run, flat and outside off, squeezed to the covers
tambe to ashish reddy, no run, slid through, forced to covers
tambe to ashish reddy, 1 run, he finds the gap now and crashes it past the covers to open his account
tambe to ashish reddy, 1 run, knocked to the leg side for a single
tambe to bopara, no run, slid through outside off, left alone
tambe to bopara, 1 run, quicker outside off, drilled past covers
southee to ashish reddy, 1 run, reddy backs away miles outside leg, southee follows him. jammed out to mid-off
b kumar to rahane, no run, inswinger from bhuvi, rahane's feet does not move as he pokes at it. squirts it to the leg side
boult to samson, 1 leg bye, swinging in on the hips, he misses the flick, they sneak a leg bye
sharma to rahane, no run, looped up nicely on off, blocked from the crease
sharma to samson, no run, aha, sharp spin. karn lands this outside off and gets it to rip across further, samson is not lured into sparring at it
p kumar to samson, 2 runs, sanju shuffles across and flicks it uppishly over backward square
sharma to rahane, no run, floated on off, pushed to the covers
boult to smith, 1 run, squeezed down to third man
bopara to smith, no run, smith advances and yorks himself, dug out to the covers
bopara to nair, no run, gentle dibbly-dobbler outside off, driven back at the bowler
nehra to simmons, no run, on off stump now with some inswing, simmons defends it back
nehra to anderson, 1 wide, way down the leg side this time for a wide
nehra to anderson, no run, nice outswing from nehra outside off. it was well outside off actually and moving away and anderson let it go
nehra to anderson, no run, bit of swing again outside off, anderson watches and lets it go again
pandey to simmons, no run, late outswing now and further outside off stump, simmons shoulders arms this time
pandey to simmons, no run, straight to mccullum this time as simmons punches the ball from outside off again, not in the gap though
nehra to sharma, 2 runs, angling across rohit outside off, he simply guides it to third man by opening the face of the bat

pandey to simmons, four runs, off the middle of the bat, just wide of cover point! he made room early, the ball was just outside off and simmons slashed it right in between cover point and point for a cracking four
pandey to simmons, no run, throws his bat at this one too outside off, can't clear mid off
pandey to simmons, no run, shuffles across completely to expose his stumps, guides the ball to wide second slip
pandey to harbhajan singh, 1 wide, outswinger well outside off doesn't bounce much and is called a wide
pandey to harbhajan singh, no run, pokes outside off as the ball swings away, misses it completely as the ball had some bounce too
nehra to sharma, no run, angling away from around off stump, rohit stays back and defends it into the covers
jadeja to sharma, no run, pretty flat on off, pushed to cover without much movement
jadeja to sharma, 1 run, angled in towards middle stump now, steered down to mid on for an easy single
jadeja to harbhajan singh, no run, room outside off with some turn, he drives it straight to cover

sharma to harbhajan singh, 1 run, could have been tight at the non-striker's end! the bowler almost bowls a legspinner and harbhajan taps it to point. slight hesitation there for a single, but jadeja doesn't take it cleanly, allowing them to get through
sharma to harbhajan singh, 1 run, superb slower delivery on the stumps. the batsman was looking to swing it across the line but adjusts well to push it to off for a single.
sharma to harbhajan singh, four runs, cracking four! he made room early, saw the ball outside off and pierced the gap between point and deep cover for four
jadeja to pollard, 1 run, bit of room outside off, pushed into the covers for one
ashwin to pollard, no run, flat and straight outside off, pushed to cover

jadeja to pollard, 1 wide, that's a stumping chance, dhoni has flicked the bails in no time, as usual. pollard came down, jadeja pitched it wide outside off, pollard missed the ball while swinging his arms, dhoni didn't miss but it looks like pollard dragged his right foot back just in time to get in
jadeja to pollard, six runs, flat and wide outside off, pollard throws his arms at it and tonks it straight down over long off for a clean six
pandey to rayudu, four runs, throws his bat at the delivery outside off, gets a thick outside edge an it goes fine on the off side for a lucky four
pandey to rayudu, no run, shuffles across towards off, pandey sends it just down leg past the leg stump
bravo to pollard, no run, just misses the off stump as pollard heaves at the slower ball and misses
suyal to smith, no run, width on offer and smith cracks it to cover point. didn't concentrate on his timing as much as caning the ball
malinga to mccullum, no run, looks to hit his comfort zone straight away as he bowls at mccullum's toes. seemed a touch slower though, as the batsman adjusts and blocks
malinga to mccullum, 1 wide, banged in and this certainly had pace. a bit too much judging from how the ball leaps high over mccullum's head as he leaves outside off
suchith to smith, no run, seemed to hold it back a touch and made smith reach out a little more. wants to clatter it away again, but has to check his shot
malinga to mccullum, 1 run, pace off the ball brings a miscue as mccullum looks for a smash through the covers, and ends up with an inside edge towards square leg

harbhajan singh to mccullum, four runs, pierces the gap between cover and mid-off and it seems rohit has damaged his shoulder badly! it was a bullet drive from baz and it seemed destined for four. rohit threw himself after the ball on the cusp of the boundary, much like baz does, but he has landed awkwardly on his right shoulder. seems to have shaken it off. windmilling that hand now.

harbhajan singh to smith, 1 run, nudged towards the gap at midwicket and smith has his fifty. csk at 90 for 0, second-highest score in the powerplay in ipl. csk have the record as well, 100 v kings xi last year
harbhajan singh to smith, no run, slightly slower outside off, pushed into the covers
vinay kumar to du plessis, 1 run, shuffles across and tucks the ball from around off behind square on leg for one
vinay kumar to du plessis, no run, parthiv appeals, vinay doesn't move after bowling a snorting outswinger outside off. faf poked without much footwork and nearly edged it behind
harbhajan singh to raina, no run, pretty flat and wide outside off, left alone
malinga to raina, 1 run, widish outside off and he guides it late to third man for one
pollard to bravo, 2 runs, angled into the batsman, bravo tucks the ball wide of fine leg in the gap for two
pollard to raina, 1 run, straight to cover and dropped by harbhajan! raina came down and drove the ball to cover at shoulder height, bhajji got both hands to it but put it down
p kumar to iyer, 1 wide, more and pronounced inswing this time, enough to beat shreyas playing that leg glance again, and it goes for a wide
b kumar to agarwal, out, there we go! lovely line just outside off and agarwal was tempted by third man a bit too much. flashed the angled blade and presents slip-catching practice to dhawan

b kumar to duminy, no run, huge appeal! jp had jumped right across to try and sneak a single behind square leg. kept seriously low and hit him adjacent with middle, that's why bhuvi was instant with his appeal. but it pitched outside leg
b kumar to duminy, no run, no bounce again! this was pitching closer on the stumps and jp shuffles in line and brings down his bat just in time

p kumar to iyer, four runs, that's a skier! steyn chases after it towards the straight boundary. but it appears to have been in vain. he caught up with it, was flicking the ball back into play when it touched the advertising triangles. shreyas was fooled by the ball holding in the deck and hitting him high on the bat as he wanted to loft through the line

bopara to iyer, 1 run, looks to slice the ball behind point, can't succeed it. morgan tries to catch the striker out of his ground, but the man backing up inside the 30-yard circle fails to back up and dhawan behind him misfields as well! comedy of the year

bopara to duminy, 2 runs, slower ball, lovely change of pace from bopara, as duminy looks to bring his bat down to block. gets an inside edge into vacant infield on leg. races for a couple and the deep fielders are too late to respond. warner is not pleased
bopara to iyer, 1 run, third slowy on the trot and shreyas sends it to deep midwicket

sharma to iyer, six runs, runs at the bowler, reaches the pitch and wallops him into the sightscreen to bring up the daredevils fifty! brilliant footwork form shreyas, didn't give the bowler any indication of his intentions until it was too late
bopara to duminy, 1 run, slower delivery on middle and leg, duminy waits for it and knocks it to midiwcket for a quick single
p kumar to duminy, 1 run, slower ball on leg stump, duminy gets down the track to whip to deep square leg
bopara to duminy, no run, well directed slower ball a shade outside off, duminy looks to slide it towards point for a single but there isn't one there

ashish reddy to yuvraj singh, out, what. a. catch! warner has done it again! this was a long hop that was sailing beyond the midwicket boundary, but warner waits for it. he times his jump with insane precision and thrusts his hands over head and grabs a stunner with the boundary inches from his feet as he comes down! boy, is he pumped!
b kumar to jadhav, 2 runs,
p kumar to jadhav, 1 run, runs down the track, but yorks himself. manages to direct the ball to deep midwicket for a single
duminy to warner, 1 wide, veers too far down leg, worried that warner would make room again
duminy to dhawan, 1 run, another fumble, this time at cover from shreyas who raises a hand in apology. single easily taken in the end

mathews to dhawan, four runs, exposed all his stumps, risky but reaps the rewards with a slice through point! took it off the stumps and has timed it extremely well. he's very good at the square region
muthuswami to warner, four runs, picks the gap at extra again, this one with a simpler extension of defence! sunriers have woken up now. six fours in the last two overs

duminy to dhawan, out, off stump takes a hit! was expecting turn, possibly trying to slide it down to third man for a single, but duminy never turns the ball. he simply slides it on with the arm and exploits the gap between bat and pad when the batsmen expect the ball to deviate away. hands raised in a simple smile after the fact
mishra to bopara, no run, some turn for mishra, who has to dive across to his right to keep a clip from bopara from passing through

mathews to rahul, 2 runs, dropped by muthuswami. it was a swirler at mid-off. he was the only one closest and never looked like taking it. the way he had to dive at the very last minute to his right showed how nervously he had tracked the ball. the required rate has told on rahul he as ran at the medium-pacer who is canny enough to bowl another slower ball and make the pitch work for him

coulter-nile to bopara, no run, tries it again, but this one doesn't rise as much as he hopes. that's what the batsman has to contend with on a slow, two-paced pitch. not easy to trust your big shots, and that's what's needed for a run-rate over 11

duminy to morgan, out, away goes the off stump. morgan was making room, and went overboard with it. duminy fires in the quicker one and roars in delight as he beats the batsman all ends up. a little check on the no-ball and all's fine for daredevils
ut yadav to vijay, no run, pitched further up and just a shade outside off, driven to mid-off
ut yadav to saha, 2 runs, tucked behind square on the leg side for a couple. saha and kings xi off the mark
ut yadav to saha, no run, pushed into the covers
morkel to maxwell, no run, greets maxi with a bumper, flies through to the keeper. maxwell jerks his head out of the way
morkel to bailey, no run, ctrl+c, ctrl+v of the previous ball as morne explores the channel outside off
narine to maxwell, no run, slid through outside off, left alone
narine to maxwell, 1 run, this narine offering skids off the deck and hurries on middle. maxi brings his bat down and whips it away through midwicket
narine to maxwell, no run,
narine to maxwell, 4 byes, pushed through outside leg as maxi pre-meditates a reverse-slap and misses. the ball beats the keeper and runs away fine
chawla to bailey, no run, bailey uses his feet and drills it back at the bowler
chawla to bailey, 1 run, bailey uses his feet and drills it to long-off
narine to bailey, no run, slid through far too wide outside off, bailey can't reach out and connect, the keeper can't collect it cleanly as well
anureet singh to uthappa, four runs, swerving down leg, helped away very fine on the leg side with a flick of those dexterous wrists. fine leg is a bit too square and robbie is aware of that

sandeep sharma to pandey, 3 runs, inswinger from sandy, manish pushes and gets an inside edge that sneaks away fine after passing the stumps. axar slides in the deep, but was he in contact with the ad boards while doing that. no, that's a clean stop, says the tv umpire
johnson to sa yadav, six runs, another, surya special. he shuffles across and launches another leg-stump ball over backward square. phew, how do you play that man and that too against mitch?
perera to gambhir, 1 run, leg stumpish, tucked behind square on the leg side
perera to pathan, no run, yusuf greeted by a bumper, he sinks under it
patel to pathan, no run, round-armed on off, toe-ends the drive back to the bowler
patel to pathan, 1 run, squirted to the leg side for one
patel to russell, no run, darted on the stumps, blocked back to the bowler
perera to pathan, 1 run, squeezed down to third man with an angled blade
perera to pathan, 1 wide, perera errs in line, drifts this slower one down leg
perera to russell, four runs, another of those slower ones outside off, russell spots it and smears it over the covers for a one-bounce four. flat hit and it clatters away
