patel to russell, 2 runs, axar gives it more air, driven down towards long-off
perera to russell, 1 run, very and outside off, he ventures deep in the crease and drills a drive to deep cover
johnson to pathan, 1 run, angled outside off from round the stumps, yusuf employs finesse and dabs it to deep third man
ankit sharma to mccullum, no run, flatter and on the leg stump line, mccullum goes back and across and defends it down the pitch
morris to smith, no run, he looks to whip it over the midwicket fielder, but the ball moves in just enough to beat the bat, hits smith on the groin
morris to smith, no run, takes a step down the pitch and looks to hammer this over mid-on, but morris slows it down a touch. it beats the inside edge and fortunately for smith, misses the stumps
tambe to raina, no run, he goes back and across and punches the top-spinner back to the bowler
faulkner to smith, no run, here comes the slower delivery, the batsman mistimes his flat-batted shot to mid-off

morris to raina, out, that's the end of raina, the extra bounce does it. morris slants it across raina at good pace and the batsman looks to steer it to third man. but this is too close and he feathers an edge to the keeper
morris to du plessis, 1 run, he gets off the mark with a punch through midwicket. faf shuffles across to the off side and just pushes it in the gap
ankit sharma to bravo, 1 run, he throws his bat at this wider delivery and it's not too far from the cover fielder, just out of the reach
tambe to smith, 1 run, swipes against the turn and picks up a single to deep midwicket
faulkner to dhoni, 1 run, gets off the mark with a nudge to the right of cover
binny to dhoni, no run, uses his feet but almost yorks himself with that, plays it towards midwicket
binny to dhoni, no run, he is looking to get aggressive here.. uses his feet again and flat-bats it firmly, but just straight to mid-off
binny to dhoni, no run, comes down the pitch again and it's another dot ball as he pushes it straight to midwicket
watson to bravo, 1 wide, pounds this on the pitch and it sails over the batsman easily
watson to bravo, four runs, now to the other side! he gets high on his toes to get on top of the bounce, and squeezes it past the point fielder. beautiful timing again
hooda to dhoni, no run, bowls this one with a slight pause, dhoni punches it straight to cover
hooda to bravo, 2 runs, excellent work at the wide long-off boundary by rahane. this was driven firmly by bravo and the fielder saved a couple of runs there
hooda to bravo, 2 wides, fires this one down the leg side, easy call for the umpire
hooda to dhoni, 1 run, he comes down the pitch and was looking to send it out of the stadium, but yet another inside edge to the leg side
faulkner to dhoni, four runs, lots of width provided this time. dhoni just reaches out and steers it past the diving point fielder, excellent placement there
faulkner to dhoni, no run, comes down the pitch but can only dig the slower delivery out to point
morris to dhoni, no run, charges down the pitch and looks for the big hit, but it's another dot ball as dhoni misses it altogether
watson to dhoni, no run, slower delivery outside off, another dot ball as dhoni pushes it straight to point
watson to dhoni, no run, comes down the pitch and yorks himself, digs it out to the bowler
tambe to bravo, six runs, poor delivery now! bravo gets a long hop and he hammers it over midwicket for a huge huge hit
tambe to bravo, 1 run, he gets to his half-century with a neat clip to deep midwicket. a superb innings in the context of the game
faulkner to bravo, 2 runs, he looks to pick that area at extra cover again, but doesn't get the timing this time. the ball lands safely and the batsman picks two
faulkner to bravo, 2 runs, swings across the line this time and finds another couple at deep square leg

faulkner to bravo, 1 leg bye, he could have been out twice there! bravo moves across to the off side and is lucky to get some pad on it as he misses a straight delivery. he is slow to respond to dhoni's call for a single then, and could have been run out had faulkner hit, he was nowhere in the frame
faulkner to dhoni, 1 run, slower delivery on the stumps, dhoni looks for the big hit but doesn't get his timing right, just a single to deep midwicket
nehra to rahane, no run, nearly gets the outside edge by bowling this one across from outside off, rahane chased it with a drive away from the body and missed
pandey to watson, no run, tight line around off, the batsman pushes it straight to cover point

nehra to rahane, four runs, he has mistimed this towards mid-on but it just evades bravo and runs quickly to the boundary. bravo chases it but cannot keep it in.he was looking to play that to the leg side but closed the bat face too early
nehra to rahane, 1 run, pushes this to mid-off with soft hands and calls for a quick single
nehra to watson, 1 run, another one that was too close! watson gets a leading edge and it just lobs over nehra.. he jumps but cannot grab at that.. it was within his reach
ashwin to watson, 1 run, turn or no turn, watson was going for the big heave.. he hits is straight to bravo at deep midwicket for a single
ashwin to watson, 1 run, punches it back down the pitch and ashwin is not able to stop it cleanly, parries it to mid-off
jadeja to watson, 2 runs, more aggression against jadeja as watson again looks to hit him over the top on off side, gets another thick outside edge through point
ashwin to rahane, 1 run, straighter this time, rahane tucks it behind square on the leg side for a single
ashwin to watson, 1 run, moves to the leg side to create room and punches it to deep cover
ashwin to rahane, 1 run, gets the same delivery, but this time he punches it through cover point for a single to the deep
jadeja to rahane, 1 run, he keeps the strike rotating with a push to midwicket
jadeja to watson, 1 run, gives watson the space to free his arms and the batsman slaps it firmly to deep cover
jadeja to rahane, 1 run, waits in the crease and eases this to deep cover for a single
nehra to watson, no run, a dot ball for csk as watson pushes this straight back at the bowler
bravo to rahane, 1 run, he picks up the slower one early and pushes it towards midwicket for an easy single
sharma to watson, 1 run, another slower ball, watson waits for it before steering it through backward point for a single
jadeja to rahane, no run, pushed through on the stumps, the batsman defends it down the pitch
bravo to smith, out, no he will not! this is a slower ball and what does smith do? he chips it straight back at the bowler. will it be faulkner then?
bravo to nair, 1 run, another slower delivery and karun whips it to square leg to complete a comprehensive win
aaron to patel, 1 wide, starts with a swinging delivery down the leg side
aaron to patel, 1 run, quick at 148kph, swings it in towards parthiv' waist, he takes it on the body and takes a quick single
aaron to simmons, no run,
aaron to simmons, no run, quick and straight at 147kph just outside off, simmons lets it go
ahmed to patel, four runs, starts on the off stump and parthiv goes back a bit to turn it on the leg side by closing the face of the bat, it races away wide of mid on. nicely timed
ahmed to simmons, four runs, heaves on the leg side, doesn't get the middle of it but gets enough to find the gap between mid on and midwicket for four
wiese to simmons, 1 run, touch wider outside off, simmons drives it a bit late to third man for one

wiese to patel, out, the slower ball does it, pp is gone, chinnaswamy erupts! wiese bowled a slower one at 115kph, on middle and off, parthiv defended on the off side but played the wrong line and got an inside edge onto the stumps
aaron to simmons, no run, charges down this time with some room, can't clear cover as he doesn't middle it
chahal to chand, 1 run, slower through the air just outside off, guides it late to third man

iqbal abdulla to chand, 1 wide, appeal for lbw, abdulla looks more confident than dk, though! chand tried the flick the ball down leg but missed, and the momentum took him out of the crease. his left foot is grounded when the bails are taken off, not out
iqbal abdulla to chand, 2 wides, flattish wide way outside off, deflects off the gloves of the keeper for another run
iqbal abdulla to chand, no run, slightly flat on middle stump, he goes back and turns it towards midwicket for one
chahal to simmons, 1 wide, turns it away from well outside off, another wide as it's left alone
chahal to simmons, no run, heaves the away-turning ball to leg from outside off but misses
chahal to chand, no run, tries to hammer it to leg, but gets an edge back to the bowler
aaron to sharma, no run, swing and a miss as the ball moves away from outside off, he chases and misses
wiese to chand, four runs, three in a row! slower ball towards leg, chand waits for it and guides it late fine down the leg side for four more
chahal to pollard, 1 run, flat delivery towards middle stump, turned to the leg side for one
wiese to sharma, four runs, comes down the track and drives that one through the cover boundary right in the gap for four
wiese to pandya, 1 run, angled in towards middle and leg, flicked to the midwicket region for one
ahmed to pandya, six runs, second ball of his ipl and he tonks the ball over midwicket for a massive six. right in the zone and smashed
ahmed to pandya, 1 wide, too wide this time outside off, he swings and misses and it's a wide. 200 comes up
ahmed to harbhajan singh, out, run out on the last ball as harbhajan drives the last ball straight to cover, ab throws the ball to the bowler and there's no way bhajji can get there
mcclenaghan to gayle, no run, good bounce first up as the batsman lets it go through, patel takes it high up. two slips in place
mcclenaghan to gayle, no run, he is lucky this time that the umpire didn't call this a wide, it swung away and flew just over the wide marker
malinga to gayle, no run, starts off with a slower delivery that is dabbed towards midwicket
malinga to gayle, 1 run, yet another slower ball, well outside off, gayle looked to drive, maybe looked to leave it later, and got the toe of the bat towards third man for one
malinga to bisla, 1 run, 120kph, on off and middle, turned towards the midwicket region for one
bumrah to gayle, 1 wide, starts with a slow wide down the leg side
bumrah to gayle, 1 wide, similar delivery as it's another slower delivery down leg for a wide
bumrah to gayle, 1 wide, hat-trick of wides - all down the leg side
bumrah to gayle, 1 wide, four in a row - that was not the slower one but was wide. makes rohit smile about it in the circle
bumrah to gayle, 2 runs, somehow gets it on the leg stump, gayle tucks it towards midwicket where malinga doesn't bend enough and concedes a second
bumrah to gayle, no run, finally angled across the off stump, gayle sticks his bat out and misses
bumrah to kohli, no run, jabs the wider delivery outside off straight to point
harbhajan singh to kohli, no run, slightly flat and outside off, kohli goes back and defends to midwicket
harbhajan singh to kohli, 1 run, goes back in the crease again and steers this one to square leg
harbhajan singh to gayle, no run, straighter one on the off stump, no room at all and gayle manages to defend it
harbhajan singh to kohli, 1 run, shuffles back and across towards off, defends the ball towards midwicket for one
bumrah to kohli, 1 run, angled in from outside off, kohli guides it late to third man by opening the face of the bat
harbhajan singh to kohli, no run, darts it straight outside off, kohli pushes it back
harbhajan singh to kohli, no run, comes down the track and drives it back to the bowler from outside off
harbhajan singh to kohli, 1 run, takes a step down and drives it through the covers
pandya to kohli, no run, charges down first ball, pandya pitches it outside off, kohli swings ans misses
pandya to kohli, 1 run, towards the stumps now, pushed down to the left of midwicket for a quick single
mcclenaghan to de villiers, four runs, sloppy work at third man! slightly wide outside off, ab guided it to third man and bumrah let that one go through him while running to his right
malinga to de villiers, 2 wides, sow and down leg as the batsman tries to heave it. it's a wide and the keeper can't hold on to it so they run one too

harbhajan singh to rossouw, out, first-ball duck for rilee rossouw! harbhajan came round the wicket and angled this one in, looked like rossouw played for the straighter one but it came in and disturbed the stumps
harbhajan singh to wiese, no run, goes back in the crease and tucks it to midwicket
bumrah to iqbal abdulla, no run, slower one at 103kph outside off, flicked on the leg side behind square
bumrah to wiese, six runs, angled into the batsman, wiese makes use of it by flicking it high in the air over fine leg for six
bumrah to wiese, 1 run,
malinga to iqbal abdulla, 1 wide, starts with a wide down the leg side
narine to duminy, no run,

morkel to tiwary, no run, ooh. that was banged in, angling into the body, and it bounced more than tiwary expected. he had walked across, looking to tuck it towards the leg side, possibly from chest height, but it was nearer his head and he popped it off his glove, just wide of backward point
narine to yuvraj singh, no run, sharp turn there. slanted across yuvraj, and turns away further. yuvraj looks to defend initially, leaves it in the end, tucking his bat away inside the line
chawla to mathews, 1 run, down the track, drags this slowish delivery from outside off to deep midwicket
ut yadav to mathews, 1 run, slower ball outside off, waits for it and steers it towards deep point
narine to mathews, 1 run, down the track now and narine bowls it wide outside off. swings through the line and drives to long-off
ut yadav to mathews, no run, slower ball outside off, beats mathews again as he looks to club it into the leg side

duminy to sa yadav, six runs, just a bit of air outside off, bowled with a round-arm action, and suryakumar uses the width to swing his arms through the line and launch the ball over the boundary to the right of long-off
coulter-nile to sa yadav, no run, slower ball outside off, keeps low, goes under suryakumar's bat as he looks to play a crouched slash
mishra to pathan, no run, a bit of turn for mishra, very slow turn. pitches outside off, turns further away, and yusuf has time to adjust and poke it towards point

sandeep sharma to rahane, 2 runs, this one holds its line. rahane is playing for inswing, looking to flick from outside off, and gets a leading edge that loops over the cover fielder and falls in no man's land
sandeep sharma to watson, 1 wide, this time he can't control the line of the inswinger, sends it swerving down the leg side

johnson to rahane, four runs, wow. that wasn't the greatest ball, lots of width, but such a crisp sound when rahane cracked that to the square cover boundary. bent at the knees to get down low and simply flat-batted it away
patel to watson, six runs, a bit slower now and watson loves that. makes room for himself, gets down low, and lofts it high over long-off
patel to watson, 1 run, good ball. saw watson making room and followed him with the arm ball. jammed his bat down to stab it towards backward point
johnson to watson, 1 run, slower ball outside off, cracked away to deep point

patel to watson, out, gone! saw watson stepping down the pitch and fired in an arm ball that slid between bat and pad, and saha did brilliantly there, in such an understated way, to collect calmly outside leg stump and whip off the bails

shivam sharma to rahane, six runs, down the track now. shivam sees him coming and bowls it flat and wide outside off, and rahane simply swishes his bat through the line to launch it over the cover boundary
patel to rahane, no run, down the track, checked drive towards cover
shivam sharma to rahane, 2 runs, down the track now, whips away the leg-stump ball towards deep backward square leg

sandeep sharma to nair, no run, good slower ball, angled across karun. he looked to make room to crash it through the covers, and came nowhere near connecting as it kept low and dribbled through to the keeper
anureet singh to binny, six runs, slower ball down the leg side and binny opens up and swings it away over the backward square leg boundary
binny to vijay, no run,
tewatia to marsh, no run, slowish ball, angled across towards off stump. marsh defends it back to the bowler
tewatia to marsh, 1 run, down the track now, whips this leg-stump ball to deep midwicket
tewatia to marsh, 2 runs, down the track, whipped to deep midwicket
tewatia to marsh, 2 runs,
faulkner to miller, no run, slower ball outside off, slips under miller's bat as he shuffles down the track and goes for the big hit through the covers
tambe to miller, 1 run, down the track, whips the leg-stump ball towards deep square leg
tambe to miller, 1 run, sees him come down the track and fires it down the leg side. miller adjusts his feet and flicks to deep midwicket
hooda to miller, six runs, down the track, hooda follows miller, fires it into his feet, but he puts it away easily, pick-up shot over deep midwicket
starc to smith, no run, outside off with the angle and it's left alone
starc to smith, no run, slightly closer to the off stump, angling away again, and smith leaves at the last minute now

starc to raina, no run, beautiful delivery, extra bounce! pitched it up outside off, there was pace, raina's bat for the drive came down a bit late, the ball then swung away and bounced almost till dk's chest with the bounce
patel to raina, no run, tries to drive the first ball from outside off and misses
wiese to raina, no run, slower one at 113kph on the leg stump, pushed down to mid on
wiese to raina, no run, slow again, at 114kph, raina waits for this one outside off and finds point
wiese to raina, 1 leg bye, lbw appeal for the ball that pitched outside leg, raina takes a leg bye
wiese to smith, no run, coming in towards the middle stump, smith defends on the leg side
patel to raina, no run, down the leg side, but it comes in and goes over leg stump as raina shuffles across to glance but misses
patel to smith, 1 run, slower ball at 116kph on middle and leg, smith waits and chips it in the air to fine leg for one
iqbal abdulla to dhoni, no run, stays back and pushes the ball from outside off to cover
iqbal abdulla to dhoni, no run, turning away from outside off, dhoni waits and guides it to point
wiese to dhoni, 1 run, incoming delivery towards middle stump, steered towards midwicket for one
iqbal abdulla to raina, no run, charges down and iqbal yorks him, raina blocks it back
chahal to jadeja, 1 run, goes back again for the similar delivery and whips it this time to deep midwicket
chahal to du plessis, no run, inside edge for the ball that turned towards off from middle, faf tried to whip against the turn but could not middle

chahal to du plessis, 1 run, makes some room for the ball that comes in, pushes to cover and that's very quick running from jadeja even as kohli gets an accurate throw. direct hit would have made it close, though
iqbal abdulla to du plessis, 1 run, some turn outside off, pushed into the covers for one
iqbal abdulla to du plessis, 1 run, charges down now and swings his arms for a single to long off
iqbal abdulla to bravo, no run, slower through the air around off, bravo waits and defends it back
iqbal abdulla to du plessis, 1 wide, flatter and wider outside off, goes for a wide
iqbal abdulla to du plessis, 1 run, angled in towards middle and leg now, whipped to deep midwicket and they want two but faf slips while turning back for the second
wiese to ashwin, 1 wide, he comes down, wiese sends it down the leg side for a wide
starc to sharma, out, rams into the off stump at 145kmh! angled it in from outside off, mohit made room and swing his arms but the ball rammed into the off stump
pandey to bisla, no run, nice little outswinger, bisla plays it calmly towards point
pandey to bisla, no run, slower delivery! bisla is completely foxed by it, but he was never looking to hit that out of the ground. he pushes it in the air towards mid-on. all safe and sound

pandey to bisla, four runs, looked like he was giving some catching practice to the man at cover, but fortunately for him, this one is in the gap. and they say in bangalore that once it's past the inner circle, it's also past the outer circle
sharma to rossouw, no run, bowls a slower delivery wide outside off, rossouw lets it go through
nehra to bisla, no run, he continues to impress with his lines. this is tight on off stump and bisla can only defend it to point
nehra to bisla, no run, this time he doesn't swing it! this one keeps going away with the angle and beats the outside edge
nehra to kohli, 1 run, comes down the pitch and carves this through backward point
sharma to karthik, no run, solid defence from dk this time, but they need less of that and more of his big hitting
nehra to kohli, 2 runs, swinging in a bit from middle stump, flicked away to deep square leg for one
nehra to karthik, 1 run, thick edge off the delivery angling away from outside off, dk pushed at it and found a single to third man

sharma to karthik, 1 run, right on target on the off stump, dk defends it close to the off stump and kohli responds for the quick single eve  as dhoni comes down and kicks the ball but misses the stumps. what's the use of all those football practice before a cricket match?
sharma to kohli, 1 run, outside off now, defended with soft hands behind square for one
ashwin to kohli, no run, turning in now and kohli helps it with the turn to midwicket
pandey to karthik, no run, outside the off stump, dk guides the ball to point
jadeja to kohli, 1 run, touch wider outside off, pushed down to long off
pandey to kohli, no run, he drives with some power but the ball gets the inside edge and nearly hits the stumps
pandey to kohli, 1 run, steers the ball from around off to midwicket for a quick single
pandey to khan, 1 run, shuffles across towards off and glances the ball to fine leg for one
pandey to kohli, no run, straight on middle stump, driven towards midwicket as raina dives to his left and saves one

jadeja to khan, out, right from the middle of the bat, but he finds deep midwicket. went down on a knee for the ball outside off, swept it against the turn and holed out to mohit, who was a good few yards inside the rope
bravo to wiese, no run, at 132kph now, wiese heaves the straighter delivery on the leg side but misses
bravo to starc, 1 run, the nth inside edhe of the innings as starc looks to slam this on leg but gets a single on off behind square
sharma to wiese, 1 run, rolls his fingers over it again towards middle and leg, wiese gets some bat for one on the leg side
bravo to wiese, no run, swing and a miss for the widish delivery outside off, goes to the keeper
bravo to wiese, out, a wicket on the last ball as wiese threw his bat at this one outside off, get a leading edge and smith ran in from deep cover to take the catch
mcclenaghan to duminy, 1 wide, this one is sprayed outside off, another wide
malinga to iyer, 1 wide, stray slower ball, malinga slings it down leg
malinga to iyer, 1 wide, aha, this is a bumper outside off at 133ks. flies through to the keeper, iyer does not want any of it. wided for height
harbhajan singh to duminy, 1 run, flatter on middle and leg, down the track and whippily driven to the left of mid-on
harbhajan singh to iyer, 1 run, slid through much quicker on middle and leg, jabbed defensively to mid-on
harbhajan singh to duminy, no run, looped up offbreak, duminy can't chop it away, manages an inside edge onto the pad
harbhajan singh to iyer, no run, quicker on off, down the track and pushed back to the bowler
pollard to iyer, 1 run, change of pace on middle and leg, tucked away to deep midwicket
harbhajan singh to duminy, 1 run, slid through on middle, duminy wants to chop it through the off side, gets an inside edge to malinga at 45
mcclenaghan to mathews, 1 wide, he loses his radar and darts it down leg, wide called
coulter-nile to patel, 1 wide, veering down leg, jadhav dives across and collects the ball
coulter-nile to simmons, 1 wide, coulter-nile strays down leg, back-to-back wides
coulter-nile to simmons, no run, he goes wide of the crease and angles it outside off, flash and a miss from simmons
duminy to patel, four runs, pushed through outside off, parthiv steps away and scythes it over the covers. once he cleared the infield that was a four
duminy to patel, 1 run, flatter and outside off, whipped away to deep midwicket
mathews to patel, no run, slowy ball outside off, parthiv skips out, swings and does not connect
nadeem to chand, no run, arm-ball arrows in with the angle on middle, defended back to the bowler
nadeem to chand, 1 wide, drifting down leg, chand can't tickle it away. wide called
nadeem to chand, 1 wide, flat darter down leg, chand still can't help it away. another wide

mishra to chand, out, mishra strikes, he roars! much slower through the air, looped up outside off, lures the batsman out of the crease. chand misses his attempted big hit over the leg side. the ball kept low as well but jadhav breaks the bails in a flash
mishra to pollard, no run, tucked away behind square on the leg side for a couple of runs
mishra to pollard, 2 runs,
imran tahir to pollard, six runs, whack! looked like the wrong'un. pollard flexes his muscles and wallops it  over deep midwicket
imran tahir to pollard, no run, fired on off and middle, pushed back to tahir

mishra to pollard, out, pollard perishes and this is a crucial strike for dd.. this was flatter and spinning away outside off, pollard rocks back and slices it high in the air. nadeem juggles and pouches it at deep cover
mishra to rayudu, 1 run, nudged through vacant mid-on
nadeem to sharma, 1 run, arm-ball on middle, rohit stays back and punches it to long-off
nadeem to rayudu, no run, quicker on off as rayudu looks to advance down the track. chopped to the off side
mishra to rayudu, 2 runs, down the track and whipped away over a leaping midwicket
mishra to sharma, six runs, loobed up outside off, rohit sees ample air, gets under it and smears it over to the long-off boundary
mishra to sharma, no run, quicker and outside off, cracked to extra cover
imran tahir to rayudu, no run, quick on off, chopped to point. rayudu wants a single but is sent back
imran tahir to malinga, no run, slid through on the fourth-stump line, malinga is crease-bound as he pushes it back to the bowler to avert the hat-trick
imran tahir to harbhajan singh, no run, slid through on off, pushed back to the bowler from the crease
imran tahir to harbhajan singh, 1 wide, sprayed wide outside off, spins away further. bhajji can't reach out and connect. wide
imran tahir to malinga, no run, flatter lebgreak from tahir, malinga swings and misses
imran tahir to malinga, no run, darted quicker and outside leg as malinga skips out and misses. bounces off the footmarks and hits jadhav on the bicep
imran tahir to malinga, 1 run, dragged to the leg side off the inside half of the bat
mathews to malinga, no run, slower one outside off, malinga throws his bat at it and misses

mathews to malinga, no run, daredevils break their nine-match winless streak at home. they end the kotla drought. tahir is relieved. duminy looks pleased. looks like this was slowy in pace outside off, malinga hacks and does not connect
starc to watson, no run, angles it across now from around off stump, without any swing, and watto lets it go
starc to rahane, no run, swing and a miss as rahane drives away from his body for the ball that was moving away and beat him
iqbal abdulla to watson, no run, pretty straight on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
patel to rahane, no run, slightly slow around off, pushed down towards mid on
patel to watson, no run, punches the ball back to the bowler with a firm drive
patel to watson, 1 run, bit slow around off stump, flicked to deep midwicket for one
patel to rahane, four runs, oh, that's a misfield at mid-off, goes for four! rahane rolled his wrists a bit to drive the ball down, sarfaraz slid to his right but couldn't stop the ball
chahal to watson, no run, gets a bottom edge for the away-going delivery, as he tries to punch it back. chahal gets a hand to it
chahal to nair, 1 run, comes down the track and drives the ball to long off for one
chahal to smith, 1 run, straighter one just outside off and smith goes back to whip it to leg for one
patel to nair, no run, pushes the ball from outside off to point
patel to nair, 1 run, slightly slower ball around off, flicked to the leg side easily for one
wiese to nair, 1 run, even slower now - 117.5kph - and it's pushed down to long off for one
kohli to nair, 1 run, targets the off stump now, driven down to long off for one
wiese to hooda, 1 run, gets the inside edge of the bat as he swishes at the ball outside off into the covers

wiese to smith, four runs, he takes these risks and they all pay off! shuffled across to expose all his stumps for the ball just outside off, and he whipped just past the leg stump to the boundary for four
iqbal abdulla to smith, 1 run, trots down and whips the ball from outside off to deep midwicket for one
iqbal abdulla to hooda, 1 wide, pretty flat and wide outside off, called wide too
iqbal abdulla to samson, no run, straightish just outside off with some turn, pushed back to the bowler who dives and stops
iqbal abdulla to samson, 1 run, touch wider outside off, driven down this time to long off for one
chahal to binny, no run, waits for the the ball to come to him from leg stump, and he defends it back
wiese to binny, 1 run, angles it in again, but it's going towards leg and it's tucked behind square on leg for one
wiese to binny, no run, charges down to swish at it on off, but gets another bottom edge to the keeper
wiese to binny, 1 run, slightly slower and angling in, binny steers it on the off side for one
patel to binny, no run, slower ball outside the off stump, pushed into the covers
patel to binny, 1 leg bye, angled in this time, binny misses while trying to turn it to leg but gets a leg bye
chahal to binny, 1 run, makes room and comes down, it's pitched wide outside off and he hammers it to deep cover for one
chahal to smith, 1 run, that was headed straight for the stumps with some turn, but binny went back and opened the face of the bat very late to defend on off
starc to binny, 1 run, was there some reverse there? possibly. that swungs away from leg stump towards middle. binny closes the bat face and gets a thick outside edge to third man
patel to kulkarni, 1 run, slower ball outside off, mistimed completely as it's chipped just over point for one
starc to tambe, 1 run, on the stumps now, tambe gets bat and pushes it down to mid on for one
morris to gayle, no run, absolutely accurate inswinger towards off stump from morris, gayle gets his bat down on time to defend it back
morris to kohli, 1 run, in the air but safe! it was outside off, kohli pushed at it almost with a closed face of the bat and it flew just wide of cover
kulkarni to gayle, no run, straighter on middle stump, pushed down to mid on this time
morris to gayle, no run, squares him up a little bit as the slower ball goes towards off, gayle defends it towards point
kulkarni to kohli, no run, charges down and defends the ball to cover, can't clear the fielder
faulkner to de villiers, four runs, doesn't take too long when he's on strike! got width outside off and crashed it with a square drive just wide of backward point for four
faulkner to de villiers, no run, comes down a couple of steps and pushes the ball down to mid off
faulkner to kohli, 1 run, another quick single - this time kohli steers the ball towards point and by the time rahane gets there, they have crossed each other and completed the run
watson to kohli, 1 run, strolls down and swishes at the ball by rolling the wrists to send the ball to deep point
watson to kohli, 1 run, bangs this one outside off, kohli guides it to third man for one
tambe to de villiers, no run, waits for the turn and punches the ball to cover
tambe to de villiers, 1 run, comes down the track and pushes the ball wide of cover point for one
kulkarni to de villiers, 2 runs, gets some room outside off, ab swishes at it to find the gap in the covers with some power for two
morris to de villiers, 1 run, outside off again, ab guides it fine this time past the keeper
morris to kohli, 1 run, closer to the off stump, kohli opens the face of the bat to steer the ball to third man
faulkner to de villiers, 1 run, chipped in the air back towards kohli, wide of faulkner, as the ball bounced extra a little bit
faulkner to kohli, no run, slower ball on middle stump, flicked straight to midwicket where there's a fumble
watson to kohli, 1 run, just outside off, kohli turns this one too to the leg side towards midwicket and brings up his fifty
watson to de villiers, 1 run, pretty wide outside off, driven through the covers for one
tambe to kohli, no run, tries to steer the ball to off but gets an inside edge back to the bowler
tambe to kohli, 1 run, comes down again, and yorks himself. gets an inside edge to the leg side for one
b kumar to patel, 1 wide, loses direction as this one swings down the leg side
b kumar to patel, 1 wide, gives away another extra as it swings down the leg side
b kumar to patel, 1 wide, and yet another one down the leg side. this is the third of the over
boult to simmons, 1 run, he bowls a slower ball, maybe it's a sign of lack of swing, simmons dabs it towards square leg and takes off for a quick single
steyn to simmons, four runs, another thick outside edge! the batsman was looking to steer this to third man but this one slides off the face and beats the lone slip. runs away to the boundary quickly
steyn to patel, no run, comes out of the crease and looks to thrash this through cover but makes no connection. that slides past the outside edge
b kumar to patel, no run, comes down the pitch again and looks to hit it through off but gets a thick inside edge to midwicket

steyn to patel, out, he repeats the shot but has overcooked this shot! this came a bit quicker and that probably messed up with parthiv's placement. even though he made a good connection, he hit it straight to the man stationed at the boundary. a good catch there. a meter here of there and this could have been a six
sharma to simmons, no run, flatter and quicker, simmons defends it towards point this time
p kumar to simmons, no run, slower delivery again! simmons can only defend it back down the pitch
sharma to simmons, 1 run, pushes it wide outside off as soon as he sees simmons step out, but the batsman reaches out and drives it to long off
sharma to pollard, no run, flatter and this one breaks away after pitching! pollard has to uses his reach to counter the spin as he defends
boult to pollard, 1 run, another slower delivery, keeps pollard waiting. the batsman can only dab it behind point for a single
steyn to rayudu, 1 run, he moves a touch to the leg side to give himself room, dabs it straight to point and takes off. a direct hit by dhawan and it could have been tight for pollard
b kumar to rayudu, no run, slower delivery outside off, rayudu looks to guide this to third man but misses it completely
p kumar to pollard, 1 wide, attempts a slower ball but this slides down the leg side too

b kumar to vinay kumar, out, two in two! naman ojha has taken his second wonderful catch of the series. vinay gets a slower delivery, he throws his hands at that, gets a thick outside edge and naman flies to his right to pluck it inches off the ground, one-handed. excellent stuff
b kumar to suchith, 1 wide, bowls a slower delivery wide outside off, but this is past the marker. easy call for the umpire
b kumar to suchith, 2 runs, bowls a slower delivery outside off but suchith throws his bat and manages to slice it over point for a couple of runs
harbhajan singh to dhawan, 1 run, uses his feet to reach the pitch of the delivery and drives it to long off
harbhajan singh to warner, four runs, hammered away through covers with ease! he waits in the crease, allows the ball to come in, then crunches it through cover point
harbhajan singh to warner, no run, quicker one again, the batsman reaches out and pushes it to extra cover
mcclenaghan to dhawan, no run, another tight delivery on the middle stump line, dhawan can only defend it back down the pitch
malinga to warner, no run, now a superb slower delivery! warner was sucked into playing a forceful drive but meets only thin air.
malinga to dhawan, no run, slower delivery this time, dhawan guides it straight to the man at point again
malinga to dhawan, 1 run, slower delivery on off, the batsman chops it towards point
suchith to rahul, no run, flatter delivery, pushed to cover

vinay kumar to rahul, 2 runs, chance, rohit had to jump high at extra cover and stretch his right hand over his head, he made a good effort, but the ball just brushed his fingers, rahul survives, was looking to glide this possibly squarer
vinay kumar to rahul, 1 run,
suchith to rahul, no run, can't get it past extra cover now
suchith to bopara, 1 run, goes deep in the crease and punches it to long off for a single
harbhajan singh to bopara, no run, now this one turns in, hits the inside edge and rolls towards midwicket
harbhajan singh to bopara, 1 run, an outside edge now as this one doesn't turn, bopara gets a leading edge through cover
malinga to vihari, (no ball) 1 run, he has hit the stumps on his way. it's a finn no-ball! this was a slower ball and the batsman dabbed it to point for a single
malinga to vihari, no run, slower delivery wide outside off, vihari swings across the line and makes no connection

malinga to vihari, out, and another one departs! vihari has a swing at a malinga slower delivery and all he can do is edge it to the keeper. there was a faint edge on that one. malinga turned back to appeal but the umpire had already raised the finger
malinga to p kumar, no run, he is through with his swing before the ball arrives, makes no connection
malinga to p kumar, out, and he gets another one! praveen charges down the pitch, gets a slower delivery that beats the bat and grazes the top of middle stump. malinga is running through the side now

malinga to steyn, out, it's the third wicket in this over! another slower one does the job. steyn swings too early, hits it too high but not long. pollard runs in from long off and comfortably settles under the skier. malinga is on a hat-trick
malinga to sharma, no run, bowls a slower delivery outside off that karn misses completely. wonder why he didn't go for his trusted delivery
vinay kumar to sharma, 2 runs, slower delivery on the stumps, karn chips it over the bowler's head and comes back for the second
vinay kumar to b kumar, no run, he walks all the way to the off side to lap this slower delivery but misses it completely
vinay kumar to b kumar, no run, walks too far to the off side and misses the slower ball again
karanveer singh to smith, no run, lobbed up and turns away, poked towards point
anureet singh to raina, 1 run, veering onto the hips, raina flicks it behind square on the leg side. the fielder runs across to his right to mop it up

sandeep sharma to raina, no run, appeal for caught behind from sandeep and saha. raina makes room and chips down the track, he slashes and gets a thick edge to saha. the umpire did not spot the nick and raina gets a lifeline
patel to mccullum, no run, arm-ball, snakes in with the angle on middle, baz is watchful in defence
patel to mccullum, no run, axar pushes this through, baz aims to turn it away, gets a leading-edge to the right of axar
patel to mccullum, 1 wide, axar slides it down leg
patel to mccullum, four runs, baz steps out and makes room. axar is aware of it as he tosses it up wide outside off. baz still reaches out and slaps it over the covers

patel to raina, 1 run, another drop, johnson the culprit again. raina skips out, axar fires it flat on the leg stump. raina whips it in the air. johnson didn't even get his hands on it after moving to his left from deep midwicket, the ball went through his hands
johnson to raina, 1 run, tucked to midwicket
patel to raina, 1 run, tucked towards cow corner for one
patel to raina, four runs, pushed through outside off, raina wants to slap it through the covers. all he manages is a thick outside edge that runs away to the right of sehwag
karanveer singh to raina, no run, raina steps out, karanveer pushes it wide outside off, he manages to reach out and poke it out to the covers
karanveer singh to dhoni, six runs, dhoni steps out, karnveer tosses it up on the leg stump, whipped over midwicket. dhoni clears the fielder in the deep

karanveer singh to dhoni, out, a run-out chance and they go upstairs. karanveer dives across to his right and deflects the ball onto the non-strikers'. raina's bat is in the air. he has to depart after drifting out of his crease and backing up. this was darted flatter and on middle, dhoni drills it ram-rod straight. karanveer manages to tip it onto the stumps. raina's bat was in the air when the bails came off the groove
karanveer singh to dhoni, 2 runs, milked through midwicket. these two are lightning fast between the wickets. add another two
patel to jadeja, no run, jadeja looks to make room, axar fires it outside off. the former opts to leave it
patel to dhoni, no run, darted quicker outside off, pushed to the covers
johnson to dhoni, no run, slowy ball outside off, he steps out and jams it back at the bowler
pandey to sehwag, 1 wide, ishwar looks for inswing and drifts it down leg. viru can't glance it away

jadeja to bailey, out, jadeja strikes in his first over, kings xi reduced to 40 for 3. jadeja sets off on a celebratory run with his hands aloft in joy. he loops this up outside off and gets it to turn away, bailey is glued to the crease as he aims to drive it over the covers. only manages an outside edge that is held by dhoni
ashwin to vijay, 4 wides, vijay skips out, ashwin is wary of it as he fires it down leg. dhoni can't collect the ball. mohit slides and mops it up at deep fine leg

jadeja to miller, out, what's with dhoni and leg-slips? faf hugs raina. this is a sharp, low catch. this was pushed through on a leg-stump line, miller glances it. raina anticipates well, moves to his left, stoops low and takes it inches from the turf before tumbling onto the ground
ashwin to saha, 1 run, offbreak with some testing extra bounce, dabbed towards third man
jadeja to patel, no run, slid through on middle, axar hangs back and blocks it to mid-off
jadeja to saha, 1 run, angled in on off, patted to the left of the covers for one
jadeja to patel, six runs, axar clears ashwin at long-off. floated outside off, axar hits through the line and lofts it over long-off
ashwin to patel, no run, quicker offbreak with extra lift, blocked to slip

ashwin to patel, out, ashwin has his man! he gives this ample air outside off and gets it to turn away. axar is lured out of the crease, swipes across the line and misses. dhoni whips the bails off in a flash
ashwin to johnson, 1 run, quicker on middle and leg, swept away behind square leg
jadeja to anureet singh, 1 run, pushed to the covers, fumble gives them a single
ashwin to saha, no run, quicker with some extra bounce, defended to off
ashwin to anureet singh, 1 run, tapped to backward point, the fielder misfields and allows a single
bravo to anureet singh, 1 run, similar ball, crude swipe to the right of midwicket. anureet could not manufacture his own pace

sharma to anureet singh, out, another soft dismissal. anureet backs away outside leg, mohit follows him with a back-of-the-hand slower ball with some extra bounce. sliced straight down the throat of jadeja at backward point. that was the definition of a dolly
starc to iyer, 1 wide, veering down leg, iyer can't glance it away. dk dives across to his left and collects the ball
iqbal abdulla to jadhav, no run, lobbed up, spins away on a fourth-stump line, blocked to point
iqbal abdulla to jadhav, 1 run, slid through on off, he looks to turn it to the leg side and gets a leading edge wide of the covers
iqbal abdulla to jadhav, 2 runs, pushed through on middle and leg, tucked away through square leg
iqbal abdulla to jadhav, 1 run, straighter one on middle, he hangs back and ticks it to the leg side again, this time behind square
iqbal abdulla to agarwal, no run, angled in on off, driven straight to kohli at extra-cover
wiese to jadhav, no run, slowy ball, jadhav seeks to dab it away. gets an inside-edge that dribbles to the left of the keeper. karthik dives to his left and stops the ball
iqbal abdulla to coulter-nile, no run, pushed through on off and spins away with some extra bounce, defended to point
iqbal abdulla to coulter-nile, no run, quicker one, he pushes at it and gets an inside edge to the left of karthik
iqbal abdulla to jadhav, 1 wide, fired outside off, jadhav leaves it. past the tram-line and wide called
iqbal abdulla to nadeem, 1 run, lobbed up outside off, driven to long-off
iqbal abdulla to nadeem, no run, nadeem makes room outside leg abdulla follows him blocked back to the bowler
patel to imran tahir, 1 run, slowy ball outside off, chipped over the bowler's head
imran tahir to gayle, 1 run, quicker on middle and leg, whipped to deep midwicket
duminy to gayle, no run, much slower through the air, blocked to the off side
imran tahir to gayle, no run, gayle looks to flick it away, nearly lobbed it back to the bowler off a leading edge
imran tahir to gayle, 1 run, straighter and quicker, driven down to long-off
mishra to gayle, 1 wide, sliding down leg, wide
mathews to gayle, no run, bumper from mathews. gayle wound up for a big hit before letting it fly to the keeper
sandeep sharma to warner, no run, draws a thick outside edge as warner presents a straight bat and the ball swings out to go to the off side
sandeep sharma to warner, no run, accurate delivery on leg stump with some swing, driven to mid on again
sandeep sharma to warner, 1 run, draws an outside edge as warner looks to push the ball back from middle stump but thick edge goes to third man for one

johnson to warner, four runs, for a second it looked like warner somehow defended it to save his off stump, then it raced away for four! the ball nipped in slightly and warner played outside the line but he pushed it down and it beat mid on for four
anureet singh to vihari, no run, straighter delivery on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
vijay to henriques, 1 run, turning into the batsman, he goes back and tucks it to leg for one
patel to henriques, no run, angled in towards middle and leg, tucked to midwicket
vijay to ojha, 1 run, turning a bit towards middle and leg, helped to deep midwicket
vijay to henriques, 1 run, towards leg stump now, tucked towards deep square leg and there's time only for one
anureet singh to ojha, no run, wider outside the off stump, helped to point where there's a fumble
dhawan to ojha, four runs, ingswing from just outside off, ojha chips it into the covers by checking his shot but it falls wide of mid off and right in the gap for four
dhawan to ojha, 1 run, slightly wider outside off and it's pushed wide of cover for one
dhawan to ojha, 1 run, slower ball well outside off, chipped in the air through the covers to long off for one
johnson to ojha, 1 run, that got big on him and came back in too, but he handled it reasonably well, gliding it down to third man
johnson to ojha, 2 runs, turned wide of sandeep at fine leg
patel to henriques, no run, charges out and heaves, only manages to hit it back to the bowler
patel to henriques, 2 runs,
patel to henriques, 1 run, flat and slanted in, he comes down the track but cannot do much with it, forces it to extra cover
patel to henriques, no run, walks down the track but is only able to knock it back to the bowler
johnson to bopara, no run, slower ball angled across outside off, he edges it late and it goes to the keeper after a bounce
johnson to ashish reddy, 1 run, slower ball on the stumps, reddy chips it high this time by driving the ball early, dhawan dives for the ball from mid off but it's out of his reach

boult to vohra, no run, loud appeal for lbw mainly from the keeper as the ball swung in sharply towards middle stump, turned down. the ball had good bounce as it hit him above the knee roll in the crease
boult to vohra, 1 run, inside edge this time goes to fine leg as he tries to push the ball on off
boult to vijay, no run, angled across the off stump with the angle, no inswing, left alone
boult to vijay, no run, swings it in again towards off and middle, vijay defends the ball back to the bowler
b kumar to vohra, 1 wide, chases a wide outswinger outside off and misses it completely
b kumar to vohra, no run, beats him completely with a beautiful ball that seamed away after pitching on off and it moved away as the batsman made room to drive but missed
b kumar to vohra, no run, accurate delivery on the off stump, vohra defends it back to the bowler
boult to marsh, no run, nips it in towards the batsman now, no room and marsh defends it back
boult to marsh, 1 run, draws the outside edge as it swings away, marsh looked to play straight and the ball went to point uppishly. fumble at point gets marsh off the mark

b kumar to marsh, out, another inside edge, another wicket! bhuvi angled the ball across marsh outside off, he played the wrong line, trying to nudge the ball towards third man but got an inside edge and that uprooted the leg stump!
b kumar to vijay, 1 run, tries to push the ball towards off but manages an inside edge to mid on for one
b kumar to vijay, 1 run, more swing into the batsman, yet another edge and this one goes to deep midwicket
p kumar to bailey, 1 wide, goes down the leg side now for a aide
sharma to bailey, no run, straighter and slower on off stump, bailey blocks it back
sharma to bailey, 2 runs, takes two small steps again, turns it towards deep square leg and they come back for the second
henriques to miller, 1 run, closes the face as he pushes this straight to midwicket
sharma to saha, no run, pretty flat outside off, he slices it straight to point
sharma to saha, 1 run, gogly turning towards off, pushes it towards point for one
henriques to miller, 1 run, quite slow outside off as miller comes down and then pushes it to mid off
henriques to saha, 1 run, angling in again towards the stumps, steered towards square leg for one
sharma to saha, 1 run, comes down and flicks the ball to the leg side for one
sharma to saha, no run, slower through the air, chipped back to the bowler who tries to run the non-striker out, but he's in
p kumar to patel, no run, stays a bit low as it angles in towards off stump and axar defends it back
p kumar to patel, 1 run, towards middle stump now, steered to midwicket for a quick single
henriques to patel, 2 runs, comes down and drives the ball firmly into the covers, bopara slides to his left and saves two
b kumar to patel, 1 run, charges down, swings his arms freely on the off side and finds deep cover only for one
b kumar to anureet singh, no run, ojha appeals alone this time, not given for the caught behind as anureet swishes at the ball outside off and misses
p kumar to johnson, 1 run, makes room again and connects this time to find a single to mid on
khan to uthappa, 1 wide, a hint of shape in at the batsman, but it had begun on leg and slipped further down
khan to gambhir, 1 wide, oh, that's stuck in his hands a bit too long. searching for the awayswinger again, but it wanders away miles outside the off stump
morkel to uthappa, no run,

morkel to uthappa, four runs, healthy outside edge, but it flies away well wide of the lone slip fielder. they've been bowling for that mode of dismissal, keeping the ball drivable and outside off. uthappa was sucked into the trap, but escapes on a technicality. no second slip

khan to gambhir, out, that's an important strike and it's a carbon copy of many gambhir dismissals. lured into the drive, some away swing foils the stroke, and the outside edge is pouched by the keeper
imran tahir to pandey, 1 run,

imran tahir to chawla, 2 runs, pinch hitter doing what he is supposed to. hit out or get out. nearly carried as far as the deep cover fielder as he stayed leg side of the ball and scythed it over the top
mathews to chawla, no run, and there it is, flrst ball. chawla keeps to his crease and slices it to point

mathews to pathan, 1 leg bye, huuuuge appeal, every daredevils fielder is is in the face of the umpire chaudhary, who confidently signals leg-bye. and he seems to be right. yusuf goes for a pick up off his hips, but the ball just leaps off his legs to square leg

yuvraj singh to chawla, 1 run, saw the batsman rushing at him and only then does yuvi fires it in. nearly goes through him, but chawla is able to bring down that big batswing and get an inside edge past the keeper
yuvraj singh to chawla, 1 run, tapped to long-off as he stays beside the flatter delivery outside off
imran tahir to sa yadav, 1 run, slower through the air and outside off, defended through the covers

imran tahir to pathan, out, winds up again, and is caught at long-off. tahir waves his forefinger around to celebrate, but yusuf's done his bit. loves the spinners so he backed himself to clear the field with another slash over the off side. holes out
russell to mk tiwary, 1 wide, banged into the middle of the pitch, and it rears well over the batsman's head
russell to mk tiwary, 1 run, slower ball on off stump, tapped into the covers for a quick single
narine to mk tiwary, 1 run, lots of turn away, and the batsman reads it off the pitch, waits on it and dabs to point. carrom, again
narine to iyer, no run, pushed through on middle and leg, defended down the pitch. was that the offie? not quite. slid straight on
narine to mk tiwary, no run, appeal from behind the wicket, but narine doesn't bother. he knew the offspinner was going down. seems to be a bit slower than before, narine
narine to iyer, no run, carrom ball, not at all picked, and shreyas is lucking he has not moved his back leg. rips past his outside edge as he was going for a flick
chawla to iyer, four runs, encore! except he's hit this a little closer to ground. gets beside the ball to use the legspin to his advantage. again, spectacular balance and bat speed
chawla to iyer, no run, pushed through, think he expected the wrong 'un, goes back and blocks
chawla to iyer, 1 run, stays put on the crease, waits for the ball to spin and drives through the covers. if a little uppishly
hogg to iyer, 1 run, whipped away through midwicket
hogg to mk tiwary, 1 run, charges at the bowler, first time he faces him, only gets an inside edge as hoggy manages to make the ball dip on him. single to deep square leg
chawla to mk tiwary, 1 run, fired in quick and flat outside off, chopped to point
narine to duminy, 1 run, whipped from off stump through to deep square leg as he adjusts to the ball turning into him. that's the time out as well

chawla to jadhav, out, down to long-off. picked him out. filghted outside off and jadhav goes for a big hit, all he cared about was the six. lost his shape, shaves the outside half of the bat, and he's easily held by botha

chawla to yuvraj singh, out, down the track and lifts the ball down russell's throat at deep midwicket. didn't quite reach the pitch, but hoped his power would help make up the difference. doesn't as the fielder races in a long way from the boundary and takes it so cleanly. top catch
narine to duminy, 1 run, goes back and flicks a flatter delivery through midwicket again
narine to duminy, 1 wide, pushed through quite a way outside off. jp is happy to collect the extra
chawla to mathews, four runs, that's a terrific strike! picked up the legbreak on off stump and reverse swatted it over point. loads of power in the stroke
chawla to mathews, 1 run, 113kph, that's the quicker one, possibly seam up, mathews whips it behind square leg
chawla to ss tiwary, 1 run, tucked away through midwicket
hogg to ss tiwary, 1 run, pushed through on off stump, flicked through to deep midwicket
ut yadav to mccullum, no run, races down the pitch to a 146 kph delivery, but he yorks himself and doesn't really have the room to free his arms as umesh spears the ball in at his toes
ut yadav to smith, four runs, this was a poor ball. went for the extra pace, loses his radar down leg and it's helped ot the long leg boundary
hogg to smith, 1 run, pushes it through on off stump, smith goes back and just about connects the flick on time. work for deep midwicket
russell to raina, no run, goes for the slice behind point again, but this time russell's put a little more effort in the ball. 136 kph lifter beats him outside off
hogg to smith, 1 run, goes flatter to smith and gives him the single he seems to prefer lately. nudged to square leg. raina v hoggy again, this is good
hogg to du plessis, no run, tosses it up on off stump, faf shuffles across and blocks it under his eyes

russell to dhoni, 3 wides, poor all around from knight riders. horrible lapse in line from russell sends the ball way down leg. the keeper can't collect it either and the fielders take too long to gather around it. so dhoni turns nothing into two runs
chawla to du plessis, 1 run, nudged through midwicket again as chawla bowls slow and gives the ball a lot of air
chawla to dhoni, 1 run, flatter delivery, which turns outside off. but dhoni prefers to whip it through to deep square leg
chawla to dhoni, 1 run, orthodox leggie this time that dhoni guides to point and sets off
chawla to bravo, 1 run, wide of the crease and bravo stretches out to dab into the covers. little look up to see if faf was up for a quick single. he is. great work from the two batsmen
chawla to du plessis, 1 run, goes back to a flatter ball and slices it to point. easy single
chawla to jadeja, 1 run, seems to get a touch more bounce, jaddu adjusts though and tucks it behind square leg

chawla to jadeja, 2 runs, they've stolen two! jaddu's barely dabbed it into the leg side, midwicket has spotted the urgency and pandey raced in. goes for an underarm throw. but can't beat the two batsmen
chawla to jadeja, no run, bounces up a little more than jaddu expects - he'll like that when he and ashwin bowl - dabs towards point
russell to du plessis, 1 wide, slower ball way outside off and dribbles away to the keeper. your usual chepauk slow roller

hogg to du plessis, 1 run, faf showed his ace too early. leapt outside leg and allowed hoggy to adjust his plan. flat and outside off stump to make sure he can only reach with the bottom of the bat. gee, he's read the batsmen so well

hogg to jadeja, out, he deserves that! slid in the quicker, flatter delivery as he saw jaddu running at him. no room to work the ball. all he can do is try and stop it from passing him. but since he wanted to belt the ball, he's in two minds. uncertain prod does him in

pandey to uthappa, 1 run, there's a direct hit first ball from mccullum. whoah, mccullum just slapped that back from cover, didn't catch the ball since he didn't have the time, just an open-palm forehand back on to the stumps, gambhir's in though after responding early to uthappa's call
pandey to pandey, no run, some calm after the drama off the first two deliveries, left alone outside off
pandey to pandey, no run, gets back in the crease and defends towards the leg side
nehra to pandey, 1 run, towards third man for one more this time
pandey to uthappa, no run, driven towards mid-on this time, too firmly to have time to take a single

ashwin to pandey, no run, turn, appreciable amounts of it, as ashwin tosses the ball up. that's when the batsman get uncertain and before pandey could decide on anything the ball rips in and hits the top half of his bat
ashwin to pandey, no run,
jadeja to sa yadav, 1 run, flatter delivery on off stump, pushed through the covers

jadeja to sa yadav, four runs, some turn, of the quick kind. yadav follows it with an open face, beats the slip fielder as raina dives to his right. and the outfield's too quick. well, for ashwin at least
jadeja to sa yadav, 1 run, flatter delivery on middle, whipped to long leg
jadeja to pathan, no run, fired in on the stumps, yusuf doesn't bother with his feet but blocks
jadeja to sa yadav, no run, nudged towards square leg, qiuck and flat
jadeja to sa yadav, 1 run, swept off the stumps and finds a single to deep square leg
raina to sa yadav, 1 run, gives it a lot of air, yadav drives to long-off
raina to ten doeschate, no run,
raina to ten doeschate, 1 run, eased into the off side for a quick single
bravo to ten doeschate, 1 run, slower ball, right up there on middle and leg, nudged away but only as far as dhoni who moves to his left and dives
bravo to russell, 1 run, slower ball, outside off, russell slides it to point and races away to the other end
bravo to ten doeschate, 1 run, slower ball with width, slid to point. he's not quite got the measure of a slow pitch. 7 off 12
bravo to chawla, out, standing outside the crease, races down the pitch and miscues the ball straight up. dhoni rushes up, calls for it and takes a skier. and is promptly bear-hugged by bravo
bravo to ten doeschate, no run, down the track and swings, an awful swing. misses
bravo to ten doeschate, four runs, threads the gap at cover! normal pace delivery and tendo runs at it. nearly yorks himself, but manages to squeeze it away
khan to marsh, no run, defended awkwardly on the leg side
khan to marsh, 1 run, dabbed to third man from the crease, the ball races across this quick outfield
khan to vohra, no run, left alone by vohra, who's been watching the action from the other end
duminy to vohra, 1 run, played through midwicket for a single
khan to saha, no run, some zip off the surface from zaheer and the ball bounces on saha who stayed in his crease and took one hand off the bat as he tried to defend
khan to saha, 1 run, steered from the crease towards third man for a single
coulter-nile to saha, no run, defended on the off side
coulter-nile to bailey, 1 run, pushed on the off side for a single
khan to bailey, no run, pushed from the crease towards point
khan to bailey, 1 run, steered to third man for one more
coulter-nile to bailey, 1 run, stays in his crease this time and opens the face to run the ball off it towards third man
coulter-nile to miller, 1 wide, a wide called, a bit harsh in my opinion because miller had moved a long way across his stumps to glance the ball as it sped past his hip
duminy to miller, 1 run, played on the leg side for one, miller is away, slowly
duminy to perera, 1 run, perera winds up and slaps the ball firmly through cover point to get off the mark
duminy to miller, 1 run, swept behind square for another single
duminy to miller, no run, fired it quick outside off, the ball keeps low and beats the bat
duminy to miller, 1 run, stays in his crease and hits the ball through point
mishra to patel, 1 run, closes the face too early and he gets a leading edge that lobs up safely on the off side
mathews to patel, no run, once again he manages only to push the ball tamely into the covers
mathews to miller, 1 run, the slower ball, dabbed on the off side for a single
imran tahir to miller, no run, bowled extremely wide outside off, to deny miller the space to hit towards leg, miller reaches for it and drives hard, but can't beat zaheer at cover
imran tahir to patel, 1 run, played on the leg side for a single
imran tahir to thakur, 1 run, played through cover for a single

imran tahir to anureet singh, 1 run, yuvraj has dropped an absolute sitter at point. thakur reached out for a wide ball and sliced it tamely towards point. all yuvraj had to do was take a few steps back and catch it but it popped out. some fielders may have caught that with actually buttered fingers
thakur to iyer, 1 wide, fires it down leg side now, so that first ball is looking like a false dawn
sandeep sharma to iyer, no run, width outside off but the pace off the pitch is slower and iyer mis-times the ball to mid off
anureet singh to iyer, no run, played on the off side, another dot ball
anureet singh to agarwal, 1 wide, slides down leg this time, another one to extras
anureet singh to agarwal, no run, defended on the leg side
anureet singh to agarwal, 1 run, nudged close on the off side for a quick single
anureet singh to agarwal, 1 run, played from the crease to midwicket
patel to iyer, 1 run, that's a long hop and iyer moves back and across towards the off to heave towards long leg
thakur to agarwal, 1 run, stays in his crease and steers the ball to third man
thakur to agarwal, 1 wide, agarwal chases a wide one, there's an appeal for caught behind but it's a ploy to distract the umpire, it fails
patel to iyer, 1 run, swings hard across the line but mis-times the ball along the ground through square leg, he was aiming towards midwicket
patel to agarwal, 1 run, agarwal dabs the ball with deft hands towards point and runs
anureet singh to agarwal, 1 run, played with an open face towards third man
anureet singh to agarwal, 1 wide, the slower ball but that's so far down leg side
perera to iyer, 2 runs, opens the face late to steer the ball and give third man a chase to his right
perera to agarwal, 1 run, played to third man for a single
patel to tiwary, no run, goes back and across to defend towards the bowler
patel to tiwary, 1 wide, sprays it wide outside off and that's the end of the game
southee to simmons, no run, dropped on the second ball! simmons edged it behind as the ball shaped away again, the ball was dipping on samson, but he got to it and the ball came out of the gloves
southee to simmons, 1 run, angled in a little bit towards the stumps, he defends it on the leg side
kulkarni to patel, four runs, edged over point and another four! the ball had good bounce and took the outside edge as parthiv closed the face of the bat to the leg side, and the edge flew over point
kulkarni to patel, no run, width outside off again, he slaps it to cover point
southee to patel, no run, 142kph, on middle and leg and parthiv tucks it straight to midwicket
theron to patel, four runs, room offered again and parthiv frees his arms with a slash outside off, between cover point and point again. four more
theron to simmons, 1 run, straighter on the stumps, pushes it down solidly for a quick single
kulkarni to simmons, four runs, dances down and slams the ball just past mid on in the gap for four. he didn't middle that, but got enough to collect a boundary
kulkarni to simmons, no run, outside the off stump, driven straight to cover now

kulkarni to patel, out, that's a great reflex catch from kulkarni, he's ecstatic after grabbing it with both hands! parthiv slapped the ball from outside off straight back to the bowler who had to go low and catch it between his legs
ankit sharma to simmons, no run, takes a step down but ends up defending the ball to leg
ankit sharma to simmons, no run, straighter on middle stump, simmons goes back and pushes it back to the bowler
ankit sharma to simmons, 2 runs, that's clever batting - he tucked the ball towards midwicket with soft hands because the fielder is in the deep and they came back for two
ankit sharma to simmons, 1 run, flatter and straighter on middle, steered towards midwicket again but only one this time
ankit sharma to sharma, 1 run, rohit drives extravagantly outside the off stump but missed the line and got a thick inside edge on the leg side, as the ball didn't turn
southee to chand, no run, zips through unmukt's open face as he looks for third man
theron to sharma, 1 run, angled in towards middle and leg, steered to the midwicket region for one
theron to sharma, 1 run, tries to slam the ball through the covers, doesn't middle it and gets a quick single to cover point
theron to rayudu, no run, beats him! 131kph outside the off stump, rohit pokes at it and misses
kulkarni to sharma, no run, not much room as the ball nips in, he gets an edge towards the slip region and says no for the single
kulkarni to sharma, 1 run, angled in towards leg, tucked towards midwicket for one
kulkarni to rayudu, 1 run, 114kph, the ball stops a bit and rayudu defends it into the covers by checking his shot for one
ankit sharma to pollard, 1 run, pollard also comes down and turns the ball to the leg side by closing the face of the bat
ankit sharma to rayudu, 1 run, some width outside off and he drives it to deep cover for one
theron to pollard, 1 run, 135.5kph, pollard heaves on the leg side and gets an inside edge to fine leg for one

theron to pollard, out, rajasthan have a consolatory wicket, that of pollard! it was theron's slower ball outside off, pollard was eying the leg side again but only managed a top edge that went high towards samson who caught it easily
mcclenaghan to rahane, 1 wide, second wide of the over. mcclenaghan does have that tendancy to be wayward, when he isn't confident enough in himself. mumbai are playing after five days

mcclenaghan to rahane, 1 run, drops a sitter! rahane doesn't learn from his last swipe. goes for another one - went after the ball way too early - gets a top edge that should have gone right down square leg's throat. it does, but then goes through his hands as well. j suchith is the culprit
malinga to rahane, 1 run, another outside edge for rahane, who was looking for a clip through the midwicket region and has to settle for a skew to third man
mcclenaghan to rahane, 1 run, another outside edge as rahane drives away from the body and it flies away towards third man

vinay kumar to samson, four runs, run out chance at non-striker's end, watson dives, it's a direct hit and the decision goes upstairs! samson tucked the ball towards midwicket and sent watson back, he had to dive in and made it in even as suchith hit the stumps. not out and the ball goes for four overthrows
suchith to watson, no run, on middle and leg, pushed back to the bowler
suchith to watson, no run, slams it back to the bowler from off stump, suchith stops it with both hands
vinay kumar to samson, four runs, going down the leg side, samson shuffles across and manages to get some bat on it as he helps it fine down leg for four. fine leg is in the circle
vinay kumar to samson, no run, goes across a bit again and pushes the ball to cover point this time
vinay kumar to samson, 1 run, tad closer to off stump, he guides it late to third man for one
suchith to watson, 3 wides, that's flat and way down the leg side for a wide, even parthiv coudln't get to it
suchith to samson, 1 run, slower around off stump, samson goes back and tucks the ball to deep midwicket now
suchith to watson, no run, just outside off, watson opens up and punches it back to the bowler again
harbhajan singh to samson, 1 wide, starts by turning the ball down leg for a wide
harbhajan singh to samson, no run, leans towards the ball and tucks the ball to square leg. rohit runs in vigorously from midwicket
harbhajan singh to samson, 1 run, helps the ball with the turn to deep midwicket for one
suchith to smith, 1 run, uses his feet immediately and drives it down to long off
suchith to smith, 1 run, room outside off again, smith punches it down to long off for one
harbhajan singh to samson, no run, goes back and exposes his stumps a bit, tucks the ball to midwicket
suchith to samson, 1 run, charges down and heaves to leg with an edge
suchith to smith, 1 run, comes down and towards off, and whips the ball with a big follow through to deep midwicket
harbhajan singh to samson, no run, comes down, harbhajan pitches it well outside off and samson pushes it to cover
malinga to smith, 2 runs, 117.4kph, slower ball just outside off, smith goes across and whips the ball square on the leg side for two
harbhajan singh to samson, no run, very loud appeal for caught behind from parthiv as samson looked to tap the ball late outside off. stifled appeal from harbhajan, turned down
harbhajan singh to samson, 1 run, turns the ball from outside off to the leg side for one
mcclenaghan to smith, no run, 143kph, another swing and a miss as smith swings his arms outside off and doesn't connect
vinay kumar to samson, 1 run, outside the off stump now, runs it to third man for one

malinga to samson, six runs, smackalicious! malinga rolled his fingers over that one, it was outside off and samson, as if ready for it, hammered that over the midwicket boundary! the sound of bat hitting the ball from the middle, yes, that!
malinga to binny, 1 run, right on target on middle stump, pushed down to the right of cover for one
malinga to southee, 1 run, comes down the track and drives it to long-off for one
starc to uthappa, 1 wide, strays down leg side this time, first run to kkr
starc to gambhir, 1 wide, that's a huge wide down leg side, starc hasn't adjusted his line for the left-hander

wiese to gambhir, 1 run, weise sprays his first ball wide outside off, gambhir lunges towards it and slices, lofting the ball through point. the fielding restrictions are over so there are fielders in the deep
wiese to russell, 1 run, driven into the covers for a single
chahal to uthappa, 2 runs, uthappa makes room and slaps the ball with a flat bat to long off for a single, chahal is sloppy in collecting ab's clean throw and concedes an overthrow
chahal to uthappa, 1 run, played towards point for a single
chahal to uthappa, 1 run, leaps out of his crease and then uthappa has to reach out for a wide leg break and hit it over the bowler's head. he mis-timed that
aaron to russell, no run, the slower ball wide outside off stump, russell doesn't get near it this time, swung rather wildly he did
chahal to russell, 2 runs, goes deep into his crease and dabs the ball through wicket, they race through for two because the fielders have some ground to cover to get to the ball

patel to ten doeschate, six runs, it's ten doeschate this time! he takes a step towards the off side, gets outside the line of off stump, picks up a slower ball and heaves it over the square leg boundary
starc to pathan, 1 run, slants down leg and gets glanced towards fine leg for a single
starc to pathan, 1 run, carved towards third man for a single
cummins to gayle, 1 wide, starts with a wide down leg side, gayle tried to glance off his hips but the ball was too far away
cummins to gayle, 1 wide, another wide down leg side, gayle tries to glance again, cummins is bowling a right-hander's line
cummins to kohli, no run, driven hard but the timing is not good, goes straight to mid off
ut yadav to kohli, no run, kohli plays his wristy, whippy flick but can't beat the fielder at midwicket
ut yadav to gayle, 1 wide, yadav might have lost grip on that delivery, he sprayed it so far wide outside off stump
cummins to kohli, 1 run, played through midwicket this time
chawla to mandeep singh, no run, madeep stays in his crease and plays the legbreak towards cover
hogg to mandeep singh, 1 run, that was the one that spins into the right-hander, mandeep mis-times the hit past the bowler, just the single
chawla to kohli, 1 run, kohli makes room, steps out and then hits the ball along the ground to long off

ut yadav to mandeep singh, four runs, fine leg is in the circle and mandeep sends the ball high over that fielder with a scoop, the ball bounces off the practices pitches and goes over the boundary as cummins comes racing in from long leg and dives desperately
ut yadav to mandeep singh, four runs, edged and another boundary, to third man! mandeep simply made room to hit on the off side and swung hard, the ball flew off the outside edge and raced away
sharma to warner, no run, good swing into the batsman, warner doesn't get any room and punches it back
sharma to warner, 1 run, pushes at the wrong line outside off, gets a thick outside edge towards backward point where jadeja dives to his right
nehra to dhawan, no run, wider outside the off stump, bit of room and dhawan guides it to point
more to warner, 1 run, just around off now, pushes wide of cover point for a quick single
raina to warner, 1 run, tucks the ball with the angle to deep square leg for one
bravo to dhawan, four runs, typical dhawan flick with a whip on the leg side, fine leg runs to his left and dives, but negi can't stop that one despite getting a hand to it
bravo to warner, 1 run, slower delivery on the leg stump, warner makes room and clears cover point for one
raina to henriques, no run, comes down again and pushes it to midwicket now
raina to henriques, no run, well and wide outside off, guides it to point
negi to henriques, out, henriques' cameo is over, stumped! he came down the track, negi made it flatter outside off, the batsman pushes and missed it. ms dhoni does the rest
raina to dhawan, 1 wide, exposes all his stumps by going down leg, raina follows him with a very wide ball and it's actually a wide down leg
raina to dhawan, 1 run, drives this one with a straight bat down to long off for one
raina to dhawan, 1 run, straighter delivery on middle stump, tucked to leg for one

raina to dhawan, 1 run, out, that's a bizarre run out, dhawan is gone! he flicked the ball from middle to deep midwicket and for some reason they thought of taking the second run. accurate throw and he's run out by a mile. the throw was jadeja's after all
sharma to ojha, four runs, big outside edge and this runs away to the third-man boundary! no slips here.
sharma to ojha, four runs, another superb outside edge! ojha tests nehra at third man again but he is not going to get there

sharma to ojha, 1 run, this one is off the middle! just a push towards extra cover and this was threatening to run away very very quickly. this is why he is the best timer of the ball in india, bar rohit sharma. bravo dives to save a certain boundary at mid-off
sharma to morgan, no run, he needs a couple of lessons on outside edges. looks to drive, misses it completely
nehra to ashish reddy, no run, angled across the batsman outside off, he swings and misses
bravo to morgan, 1 run, slower ball again outside off, morgan drives it into the covers for one

sharma to morgan, 1 run, mccullum drops a catch, yes it's true! morgan mistimed that one as he swivelled on the leg side, the top edge went very high on the off side. baz at point called for it and the ball was nowhere close to his hands as he closed them
boult to smith, no run, right up there, coming in late, this time he gets some bat down to work it to square leg
boult to smith, 1 run, outside edge now as boult straightens it on off stump, a thick edge runs behind point, with smith pushing at it from the crease
b kumar to smith, no run, tight line outside off stump, he wafts at it from the crease, and underedges it close to the stumps
b kumar to raina, no run, on the off stump with some shape, raina blocks it back
b kumar to smith, 1 wide, way outside the off stump with outswing, smith chases and misses it. called a wide
b kumar to smith, six runs, much straighter, smith responds with a straight bat too and lofts that effortlessly to the mid on boundary for six!
b kumar to smith, 1 run, doesn't come in as much as smith expects from outside off, he pokes and gets a thick edge to third man
p kumar to smith, no run, outswinger well outside off, smith looks to slap it on leg, but misses. just inside the wide line
p kumar to smith, no run, slower one outside the off stump, smith realises the ball has stopped on him and defends it to cover
