henriques to smith, out, another top-edge ends in a dismissal! slower ball on the stumps from henriques, smith swipes it on the leg side with a cross-bat, gets a very high top edge and vihari has to run in a lot from deep square leg to catch it. excellent running catch
henriques to du plessis, four runs, that's too much on the leg side, faf flicks it late and fine down the leg side with his right leg in the air for four
henriques to raina, 1 run, angled across from outside off, raina taps it late to third man now
sharma to raina, 1 run, turning in towards middle stump, helped with the turn to deep midwicket
sharma to raina, 1 run, comes down the track for the flat delivery, raina tucks it to the leg side for one. faf slips while turning around so it's only one
henriques to du plessis, 1 wide, starts this over with a wide down leg
sharma to dhoni, 1 leg bye, loud appeal for msd, this one hit him just a touch outside off, dhoni came way down the track and missed it for a leg bye on the off side
sharma to du plessis, 1 run, takes his eyes off while attempting the same shot and laps it to fine leg for one
boult to dhoni, 1 run, 126kph, slightly slower ball angled cross, dhoni pushes it with the angle to long off
p kumar to du plessis, 1 wide, faf moves across to leg a long way, pk follows him and it goes down leg for a wide
ashish reddy to du plessis, 1 run, back of the hand slower ball on middle and leg, flicked to deep square leg for one

ashish reddy to dhoni, out, now dhoni's bowled with a straighter and slower delivery, the crowd is wide awake! the dibbly-dobbly from reddy kept a bit low as dhoni looked to turn it to leg, missed it completely and lost his off and middle
henriques to negi, no run, this time it's a slower one outside off, negi waits and pokes but misses again
p kumar to negi, 1 run, pk chases negi again as he makes room, inside edge goes to fine leg for one
boult to bravo, four runs, some room offered by boult outside off and bravo swings his arms to loft it over the covers for four. that makes it 11 from the over
p kumar to bravo, 1 wide, goes well down the leg side now for a wide

sandeep sharma to simmons, four runs, more curl in at the batsman, but simmons has sized it up early and flicks it to long leg. just a little wayward with the line considering the movement he gets. neatly done
sandeep sharma to simmons, four runs, sublime timing! he's offered ample width, sandeep overcorrecting, and simmons leans on the stroke and picks the gap at cover
sandeep sharma to patel, no run, lovely line just outside off stump and gets it to veer away as well. parthiv is happy to leave the ball
anureet singh to simmons, no run, teasing line a shade outside off, simmons wants to get his bearings right and decides to leave the ball again

anureet singh to simmons, four runs, they've been very leg-sidish in the powerplay and simmons profits with his third boundary to fine leg. anureet set him up by bowling on his knees, he just had to put bat to it
patel to patel, 1 run, pushed wide of midwicket this time
patel to simmons, 1 run, we resume our usual dart service, square leg on your guard
karanveer singh to simmons, 3 runs, turned away into the leg side. kings xi have to adjust their lines better
johnson to patel, no run, almost a toe-crushes, but parthiv is able to work it to midwicket
karanveer singh to patel, 1 run, gets down the track and taps a flatter delivery to long-off
vijay to simmons, 1 run,
patel to patel, 1 run, chipped to long-off, flatter delivery on off stump, easily dealt with
karanveer singh to simmons, 1 run, slows it up and tosses it up outside off, deft little tuck through midwicket brings simmons a fifty as well

karanveer singh to patel, out, picks out deep square leg! after all the effort he'd put into the stroke - ran down the pitch, swung his bat in the big ol arc - but still can't get enough power behind it. deep square leg actually had to run in several yards to get under it
johnson to simmons, no run, right up there - a slower ball outside off - simmons is fooled early but adjusts to slice it to point

karanveer singh to simmons, 1 leg bye, hustles down the pitch again, but karanveer's fired it in down leg. simmons looses his bottom hand in an attempt to let the bat flow and somehow make a connection. but he does get some pad on it to save himself from a stumping
karanveer singh to sharma, 1 run, slid towards the point region to retain strike
anureet singh to sharma, no run, nails it the first time he tries it. right at rohit's toes and he can only bunt it back at the bowler
johnson to sharma, no run, another slower ball, another wild swing. and the speed gun pops up with the numbers - 143 kph. can't be, surely
mcclenaghan to vijay, 1 wide, slides down the leg side, although he did get a little inward movement. should direct it better
mcclenaghan to vijay, four runs, sits up for vijay to smack it through the covers. gets up on his toes, sizes up the width on offer and creams it. sublime timing
suchith to maxwell, four runs, there's the reverse swat. but it's more off a top edge that lobs over slip. seemed flatter and quicker, didn't get hold of the stroke but went through with it
suchith to miller, no run, drilled back at the bowler and suchith does well
suchith to vijay, 1 run, moves down leg to try and lift him through the covers. but suchith has followed him and refuses him the room he wants. inside edge sneaks away to square leg
suchith to miller, 1 wide, fired in way down the leg side
harbhajan singh to vijay, 1 run, stays around the wicket and tosses the ball up on middle, vijay steps away and slices it to deep point

harbhajan singh to vijay, 1 run, lots of air, which vijay likes as he backs away and flays at it. but he can only get the outside half of the bat to connect. only a single to deep point. his timing's been playing hide and seek with him all innings
suchith to vijay, 1 run, tucked away through square leg
suchith to miller, no run, down the track and whips a flatter delivery to midwicket
suchith to miller, no run, tries to make his own pace by running down the track, but ends up yorking himself. suchith has come away with a another handy performance: 4-0-33-1
pollard to bailey, no run,
malinga to miller, 1 run, slower ball outside off, driven down to long-off

malinga to miller, out, scoops a catch to cover! moved away to leg to try and give himself some room, managed to shovel the ball up and has hit it quite hard as well. but he's picked out rohit. the umpires are checking on if the catch was taken cleanly though. everything is fine and off he goes
mcclenaghan to saha, 1 run, slower ball outside off, slashed to deep point

malinga to saha, 1 wide, out, they've gone for a greedy bye off a wide and it seems to be quite close. and bailey's gone. it was a slower ball that skirted well past saha's reach outside off. swings, misses, sees his captain running and has to respond. but parthiv has hit the stumps to put another nail in the kings xi coffin
vinay kumar to johnson, 1 run, slower ball that follows johnson moving down leg, flicked to deep square leg
vinay kumar to johnson, no run, follows mitch running away down leg and lands the ball right at his toes. no room to swing those arms. inside edge onto pad. no runs possible
khan to watson, no run, width offered this time outside off, doesn't swing and watson finds point
khan to rahane, 2 runs, angles it across rahane from off, he guides it to third man with the outside edge
sandhu to rahane, no run, outside the of stump again, with some swing and rahane pokes and misses
sandhu to rahane, no run, not much room this time, rahane stays back to defend on the off side
sandhu to rahane, four runs, gets some width to free his arms and he drives that uppishly with an upper edge because of the extra bounce, and it flies over point
khan to watson, no run, bit of outswing now towards off stump, watson watches and pushes it into the covers
khan to watson, 1 wide, wide down the leg side with some swing as it goes past the batsman
khan to watson, 1 wide, this time way outside off with swing that takes it away further even as watson chases, called wide
khan to watson, no run, just inside the wide line as watson goes after the widish delivery and misses again

khan to watson, no run, there's some noise as watson swings outside off, stifled appeal from the keeper and zaheer because there was no deflection. umpire says no even though replays confirm there was some noise for sure
coulter-nile to watson, no run, pokes and misses outside off as the ball shapes away a little bit. watson's bat was a fair bit away from the body
khan to rahane, 1 run, slightly slower one at 123kph outside off, rahane taps it towards point
khan to watson, no run, no room now because of the angle, watson defends it to point
khan to watson, four runs, coming into the batsman too much now, watson makes use of that and drives it on the leg side with a big follow through, bit of inner edge for four
khan to watson, no run, straighter on the off stump, watson defends it back safely
coulter-nile to watson, 1 run, bit of width outside off, driven firmly on the off side and jpd at mid-off dives to his left to save three
coulter-nile to rahane, 1 run, some width outside off, runs it down to third man for one
mathews to rahane, four runs, outside off, it's coming in with the angle but rahane runs it fine on the off side for a delicate four
mathews to rahane, 1 run, similar delivery and he pushes it to deep cover now

mathews to watson, out, the opening stand is broken, watto is caught behind! angling in from outside off, watson only pushed at it and outside-edged it to the keeper. bit of a juggle and he eventually caught it
mishra to nair, no run, straighter one on the off stump, nair defends it back
mathews to rahane, 1 run, big appeal for lbw as this nipped in sharply, rahane looked to play it on leg and luckily for him got an inside edge onto the pad and the umpire saw that
mathews to nair, 1 bye, that's at least the third time jadhav has let the ball go through his hands, luckily no edge. nair chased the ball outside off and misses, and the keeper conceded byes
mishra to nair, 2 runs, outside off with some turn and nair also finds deep cover with a drive
mathews to rahane, no run, much straighter outside off, pushed back to the bowler
mathews to rahane, 2 runs, closer to the stumps further and rahane flicks it to leg with the angle
mathews to rahane, 1 run, drives outside off with another edge, misfield at cover gives them one
sandhu to nair, no run, on the off stump now and nair pushes it back to the bowler
sandhu to nair, 2 runs, comes down the track and slashes that to the right of deep cover in the gap for two
mathews to nair, four runs, gets some room outside off, nair leans into it and drives it just past cover for four
mishra to nair, no run, bit slower outside off, pushes it uppishly to cover
mishra to rahane, 1 wide, too wide outside off and turning away further, called a wide
mishra to rahane, four runs, misfield in the deep for four! he used his feet again and drove that inside-out towards deep cover, iyer ran in to take it on the bounce and it went through him
mishra to rahane, 2 runs, slightly straighter on the stumps, flicked against the turn towards deep midwicket and nair manages to make it for the second
mishra to rahane, 1 run, drives that handsomely with the turn to deep cover. iyer stops it this time

sandhu to rahane, 2 runs, in the air again, two fielders coming under it and neither zak nor mishra can take it! rahane came down for the slower ball, top-edged it high on the off side. mishra ran back from cover, zak from mid off and both dived but nobody got close to the ball and mishra landed on top of zak
sandhu to rahane, 1 run, another slower one from sandhu, steered to deep square leg for one
khan to rahane, no run, misses the leg stump by an inch or two down the leg side as rahane went across to off to clear the leg side but missed it
coulter-nile to nair, out, gets the height, but not the distance this time as he lofts the ball on the off side and mishra runs in from deep cover to catch that easily
southee to agarwal, no run, angles it in, straightens it sharply outside off, it is dabbed square but rahane stops it with a dive to his left at backward point
kulkarni to iyer, no run, has a swish at this widish ball but it came in just a bit and beat him again
kulkarni to iyer, no run, allows this one to come in around off and opens the face to guide it to cover
binny to agarwal, out, binny strikes immediately, agarwal has played on, stayed back in the crease to a climbing delivery, tried to dab it with an angled bat, managed a thick inside edge
binny to duminy, 1 wide, hint of movement into the left hander but it starts outside the leg stump
watson to iyer, out, inside edge onto the stumps, first ball! the ball was well outside off, iyer pushed at it away from the body without any footwork and edged it on to off and middle stumps
watson to yuvraj singh, no run, swings it into yuvraj, who is crammed for room and defends it to midwicket
watson to yuvraj singh, 1 wide, even wider down the leg side with more swing. wide again
watson to yuvraj singh, four runs, that's a sharp inswinger towards middle stump, yuvraj only defends it back with a punch, right from the middle of the bat and it beats a wide mid off for four!
watson to yuvraj singh, 1 wide, third wide of the over down the leg side
watson to yuvraj singh, no run, gets it right outside off with the angle, yuvraj lets it go
kulkarni to yuvraj singh, no run, swings it in with extra bounce into the batsman towards the ribs, yuvraj defends it to leg
faulkner to yuvraj singh, no run, away-swinging delivery from outside off, yuvraj lets it go
faulkner to yuvraj singh, 1 run, this one comes in sharply towards the batsman, he crouches a bit and defends it with an edge not too far from the stumps
faulkner to duminy, no run, looked like a slower delivery but it was normal pace at 134kph and jpd defended it back
watson to yuvraj singh, no run, swings it into yuvraj, his bat comes down late and he defends it back
watson to yuvraj singh, no run, some room outside off now, yuvi taps it to point
watson to yuvraj singh, 1 run, edged as he goes hard at it, to third man for one! there was a bit of width outside off, yuvraj slashed and the outside edge flew to third man
watson to duminy, no run, swings it down the leg side. looked like a wide, maybe it got something on the way
watson to duminy, no run, bangs it in a bit outside off now, jpd lets it go
watson to duminy, no run, swing and a miss! this was pretty wide outside off, duminy threw his bat at it away from his body and missed it
faulkner to duminy, no run, beats him this time as the ball nips away a bit, jpd poked and missed it
watson to duminy, no run, tries to drill that through the covers but the inswing gets a bottom edge
binny to jadhav, 1 wide, that's another wide down the leg side
binny to jadhav, 2 runs, angled into the batsman, steered to deep backward square for one
bhatia to duminy, no run, widish delivery outside off, duminy chases and gets a bottom edge on the off side
bhatia to jadhav, no run, a fair bit outside off now, jadhav swings his arms but finds cover
bhatia to duminy, 1 run, too slow and down the leg side, duminy drives and gets an edge towards mid on for one
kulkarni to duminy, 2 runs, first he made room and then went back in the crease to tuck that fine on the leg side

kulkarni to jadhav, out, top edge goes high on the off side, and watson runs back from cover to pouch it safely! he swiped the ball to the leg side from outside off, didn't time it at all and the ball gave watson enough time to run back and catch
kulkarni to coulter-nile, 1 wide, watson doesn't look happy as kulkarni now bowls a wide way outside off for another wide
kulkarni to mishra, no run, swings and misses as mishra makes room to target the off side but misses as he swings his bat
southee to tiwary, 1 wide, he's bowling like dhawal and delivers a wide way outside off for a wide
starc to smith, no run, swing and a miss first ball as it's pitched outside off with the angle and he chases but doesn't connect
starc to smith, no run, wider outside the off stump and angling away, left by smith this time

starc to smith, out, starc struck! what a ball, what an over from starc - he beats smith completely by targeting the stumps this time, it didn't really swing as it pitched on middle and off to go straight, smith was never in control of this one as he looked to steer this to leg, off stump uprooted!
chahal to mccullum, no run, bit slower on middle and leg now, baz waits and drives it down to mid on
starc to raina, 1 run, angled towards middle stump, raina goes across and helps it to fine leg
wiese to raina, 1 run, this time he goes back and taps the wider ball late to third man for one
patel to raina, four runs, raina gets room outside off, he leans into the ball and drives that handsomely through the covers by getting on top of that. that was four the moment he hit it
patel to raina, no run, stays back now and taps the ball towards point
wiese to raina, no run, takes the pace off the ball, it's on the stumps and raina defends it back
wiese to raina, 1 run, bit of room outside off now, raina guides it late to third man
iqbal abdulla to du plessis, no run, makes room and the bowler follows him on leg, tucked to leg against the turn
patel to raina, no run, no room at all as he angles it in towards off stump, raina goes back and helps it to midwicket
chahal to du plessis, 1 run, just outside off with no room, faf goes back and defends it to leg for one
wiese to du plessis, 1 run, slower one outside off, faf runs it down to third man for one
wiese to raina, 1 run, wider outside off now, driven through the covers and that's his fifty

patel to du plessis, out, inside edge onto the stumps, faf's gone! it was a slower one outside off, faf went back and across in the crease to swipe it on the leg side but only edged it onto his off stump
patel to dhoni, no run, slightly slower on the off side, pushed into the covers gently
iqbal abdulla to jadeja, 1 run, turning into the batsman, tucked to deep midwicket for one
iqbal abdulla to dhoni, no run, slower on middle and leg, he defends towards midwicket. can't sneak in a single

chahal to jadeja, out, and he's back with a wicket! jadeja opens up to heave the ball on the leg side. he doesn't get the distance and kohli takes a couple of steps back at deep midwicket to catch it. almost lost his balance
chahal to dhoni, 1 run, turning away from outside off, pushed into the covers for one
chahal to negi, 1 run,
wiese to dhoni, 2 runs, heaves that from the off stump to the leg side, it's wide of deep square leg and they get two
wiese to negi, no run, 113.4kph, makes room by moving towards leg, the ball doesn't have much pace and angles across as negi swings and misses
starc to negi, 1 wide, swings it way down the leg side for a wide and dk quickly throws it back to starc
pandey to maddinson, four runs, leg sidish from pandey and all maddinson has to do is get something on it, he does that, and runs it fine past the keeper
nehra to kohli, 1 run, slightly leg sidish but kohli does not find timing on the clip, and mid on reaches it to his right
sharma to karthik, four runs, this time he gets an inside edge and it just misses the stumps to go fine and fast down the leg side for four as dk looked to push it on off
pandey to karthik, 1 run, leans towards the ball on off and tucks the ball to leg for one
pandey to kohli, 1 run, slower outside off and he slashes that through the covers to deep point
sharma to karthik, 1 run, nipping in slightly from outside off, dk runs it down to third man for one
jadeja to karthik, 1 run, slightly slower towards off, driven past cover for one in the deep
jadeja to kohli, 1 run, touch wider outside off and he drives that wider of long off but only for one now
negi to kohli, no run, pushed through on middle, sent back at the bowler
jadeja to kohli, no run, dropped it. came right back at jadeja, he moved well enough to his right but shells a relatively straightfoward chance
negi to kohli, 2 runs, whipped through the leg side, kohli calls for two and has it despite kartik losing his bat midway and running to the danger end
sharma to kohli, no run, he wants to run that fine on the off side but misses the ball
sharma to kohli, 2 runs, pretty wide outside off, kohli slams that to deep point
bravo to kohli, no run, comes down and swipes the incoming delivery on the leg side to find midwicket
bravo to kohli, 2 runs, charges down again, bravo delivers a slower ball and kohli chips that uppishly to deep square leg to come back for the second
nehra to khan, 1 run, tries to ramp it first ball to leg, but the ball goes across and takes the outside edge wide of dhoni to third man as he took his eyes off the ball
bravo to khan, no run, he makes room, bravo takes the pace off the ball and sarfaraz chips the ball uppishly to cover
bravo to khan, 1 run, some room outside off and it's driven a bit wide of point for a quick single
nehra to wiese, 1 wide, wiese goes a long way to off to ramp it to leg, nehra delivers it close to him, just beating him outside off but the umpire calls it a wide

nehra to khan, out, easily taken at fine leg, that went straight to him! nehra angled the ball in, it wasn't that quick, and sarfaraz swiped it high to the leg side, but it didn't go a long way and smith hardly moved to catch that one
bravo to starc, no run, that slower ball outside off hardly bounces as starc heaves on the leg side but misses it by a long way
bravo to starc, no run, another slower one outside off, no pace at all and starc misses again
bravo to iqbal abdulla, no run, some pace on that one, 129kph, and harshal swings and misses on the off side
b kumar to uthappa, no run, not quite so solid this time as he is lured into poking at a wider one. curl away beats him again
b kumar to gambhir, 1 run, strays a bit too straight and gambhir is relieved to pick it away to long leg.
b kumar to gambhir, four runs, whipped away off middle stump and he's got enough to hit the square leg ropes. fast outfield, new ball, field up

p kumar to uthappa, four runs, taken it off middle, the result's the same! praveen instantly calls third man up and fine leg back. a little too straight, and with his lack of pace, uthappa just picks his spot
p kumar to uthappa, 1 run, more inswing for praveen, but its not threatening enough. indeed, with uthappa targeting him in the midwicket to fine leg arc, it helps the batsman. single off the flick
henriques to uthappa, 1 run, slower ball on middle and leg, uthappa shows off his leg stump as he moves across. turned to long leg
henriques to uthappa, no run, back of a lenght and outside off, uthappa reaches outside his off stump to punch into the covers. also, a time out
sharma to pandey, no run, fired in on off stump, pandey stays back and slaps it to point
sharma to pandey, 1 run, goes back and tickles it to midwicket. big gap there
bipul sharma to pandey, 1 run, rushes at the bowler, but bipul's slow pace is working here. he doesn't let the batsman get under him, inside edge skews away through midwicket

bipul sharma to pandey, 1 run, leeeeading edge! but it falls safely! pandey is looking to charge to bowler too often and bipul's got his number. slows it all the way down, gets it to grip and turn right across his flick. that shot would have been a good option had he been able to smother the spin, but he isn't.

sharma to uthappa, 1 run, down the track to a flatter ball on off stump, drilled back at the bowler who was looking to parry it onto the stumps as well. gets some contact too, but it isn't enough. karn flings his hands in disappointment. knew pandey was well outside his crease backing up
sharma to pandey, no run, slower through the air, not giving the batsman anything to work with, defended down the pitch

sharma to uthappa, out, captain's come up with another stunner! it was drummed into the covers after uthappa had made room to free his arms. it was a flatter delivery as well. the problem though was he didn't place it far enough from  warner, who dives low to his right and assures himself of a spot in the highlights of the match later
bipul sharma to russell, 1 run, a bit of spin again, russell stays back and drills it to long-off
sharma to pandey, 1 run, whipped away to deep square leg
sharma to ten doeschate, 1 run, reasonably straighter delivery outside off, slid behind point
bipul sharma to pandey, 1 run, looped up outside off, almost a wide even, but pandey has been able to slash it to deep cover
bipul sharma to ten doeschate, 1 run,
henriques to pathan, no run, slower ball on off stump, pathan defends
steyn to chawla, 1 run, follows him as he makes room, but chawla is still able to dab the slower ball to third man
ut yadav to warner, 1 wide, inauspicious start for umesh as he sprays it wide outside off. warner reaches out but can't connect with the slash
ut yadav to ojha, 1 wide, yadav drags this down leg, wide called
ut yadav to dhawan, no run, gets that seam going this time! pitches on leg and jerks away past dhawan's outside edge and through to the keeper. stunning delivery again
ut yadav to dhawan, no run, right up there on middle, dhawan crunches it to cover
botha to dhawan, no run, steps out, but can't pierce the cover field
hogg to henriques, 1 run, gets some turn, but henriques is able to work with it and flick to square leg

pathan to henriques, six runs, mauled over square leg, miles over it in fact! that's how a long hop should he dealt with, steps down the track and simply heaves it away. nothing pretty about the shot, but it hits the spot fine
chawla to henriques, 1 run, stays back to a flatter trajectory and slaps the ball outside off to deep point
ten doeschate to vihari, 1 run, tucked away towards square leg for a single
hogg to vihari, no run, sneaks in the wrong 'un, and vihari taps it back to the bowler. very harmless indeed
chawla to henriques, no run, looped up, drifts in on leg, henriques has to be careful. blocks it
chawla to henriques, 1 run, looped up outside off, drummed through the covers
chawla to sharma, 1 run, nudged away behind square on the leg side for a single
botha to sharma, no run, bit of turn, even off his quicker delivery. uthappa huts his hand while collecting. karn is the lucky one, swinging and missing
botha to sharma, six runs, long hop sent into orbit over midwicket. kind of the ball that got dhawan, only karn had leapt back and unleashed all he had
botha to sharma, 1 wide, that time he's strayed a little too far outside off. karn can't reach it
botha to p kumar, no run,
ut yadav to p kumar, 2 runs, backs away and slaps it through the covers
russell to p kumar, no run, starts with a slower ball outside off, praveen swings and misses
mcclenaghan to iyer, 1 wide, bumper angled across off, whizzes off the surface. iyer yanks his head out of the way. parthiv leaps to collect the ball, but wide called by the umpire
vinay kumar to duminy, 1 run, vinay sustains the inward shape, flicked through midwicket off the inner part of the bat
harbhajan singh to duminy, no run, slid through outside off, chopped to the covers
harbhajan singh to duminy, no run, slides on with the arm, duminy gets an inside edge onto the pad
suchith to duminy, 1 run, quicker and outside off, flat-batted to long-off. vinay fumbles a bit, but only a single results
harbhajan singh to yuvraj singh, no run, looped up and spinning away, ignored
harbhajan singh to yuvraj singh, no run, straight roller on off, yuvraj defends gingerly
malinga to yuvraj singh, no run, pitched further up and outside off, yuvraj drives on the rise and finds covers
harbhajan singh to yuvraj singh, no run, looped up outside off, turning away. yuvi looks to drive and squirts it to point
suchith to jadhav, no run, arm-ball, arrows in, kept out via an inside edge
suchith to jadhav, no run, width on offer outside off, chopped to point
harbhajan singh to yuvraj singh, 1 run, looped up on off, laced to long-off
harbhajan singh to yuvraj singh, no run, flat and fired on middle and leg, dug out to the right of the bowler. diving save
suchith to mathews, 1 run, looped up on off, chipped over a ducking yuvraj for one
malinga to tiwary, 1 run, tiwary steps down the track, nearly yorks himself and squeezes it past midwicket
mcclenaghan to yuvraj singh, 1 run, yuvraj makes room, the bowler follows him. squirted to leg for only a single
khan to simmons, 1 wide, swinging down leg, simmons does not meet with the glance. wide
khan to pandya, 1 wide, away-swinger wide outside off, left alone. past the tram-line
khan to pandya, 1 wide, drags another one down leg. zaheer then investigates the landing area
khan to patel, 3 runs, parthiv shimmies down the track and whips it over midwicket. iyer covers plenty of ground in the deep, sprints across to his right, puts in a slide and saves a run for dd
mishra to rayudu, 1 run, flatter on middle and leg, nudged through midwicket
mishra to sharma, no run, mishra held this one back on middle, check-pushed back to the bowler
imran tahir to sharma, no run, flat and fired on off, dug out back to tahir.
mishra to sharma, no run, looped up nicely, he nearly lobs it back to the bowler
mishra to sharma, 1 run, skiddy ball on middle, he makes a bit of room and slaps it to deep cover
imran tahir to rayudu, 1 run, pushed to long-off
mishra to sharma, 1 run, looped up on middle, driven inside-out through the covers
mishra to pollard, 1 wide, darted down leg, wide called
sandeep sharma to gayle, no run, comprehensively squared up this time as sandeep rips one right past the outside edge of gayle. terrific delivery
sandeep sharma to gayle, no run, keeps to his crease and pushes his bat at the ball, but it has other plans. leaps away off the deck towards the keeper and the single slip

sandeep sharma to gayle, four runs, put down. bailey was running back after gayle launches another one into orbit. it came off the bottom of the bat and the captain raced back from mid-off, looking over his shoulder to track the ball. but then he's misjudged it. dives after the ball but i don't think he got his hands to it
sandeep sharma to gayle, (no ball) 1 run, sliced through the covers, and it's a no ball as well. gayle was almost reluctant to run that single
anureet singh to gayle, 1 leg bye, back of a lenght slower ball on leg stump, tucked to long leg
anureet singh to kohli, 1 run, slower ball outside off, slid down to deep third man with the open face
maxwell to gayle, 1 run, driven to long-off. that's 3000 ipl runs for gayle. a little raise of the bat in acknowledgment. first overseas player to the mark
maxwell to gayle, 1 run, turned away through midwicket to retain strike. so this is what it looks like when he drops anchor
patel to gayle, 1 leg bye, pushed through quick on leg stump, goes for a whip and doesn't connect. has to settle for a leg bye to fine leg
maxwell to gayle, no run, kept out as this is speared at his legs

karanveer singh to de villiers, 1 run, flatter and quicker on off stump, ab slaps it through extra cover and yells 'yeah, yeah, yeah,' well before miller was unable to dive to his right and stop the ball. boy, this guy knows cricket!
johnson to gayle, no run, slower ball on off stump, gayle goes back and slices it to point
johnson to gayle, 1 run, slower ball on middle, gayle covers the line and blocks into the covers. and he actually takes a quick single
patel to gayle, 1 wide, pushed through down leg
starc to vohra, 3 wides, gets some swing but this moves down the leg side, gets big on karthik who is not able to collect it cleanly, this runs down to fine leg
aravind to saha, no run, bowls this one wide of off, the batsman has to reach out and dabs it towards point
aravind to saha, 1 run, the bowler slows it down a touch, saha pushes it through midwicket for a single
aravind to vijay, 1 run, makes room but gets a slower delivery, ends up chopping it towards gayle at slip for a single
patel to vijay, no run, superb start! he angles it from wide of the crease and keeps the pace quite slow, the batsman has to defend it down the pitch
patel to maxwell, no run, now he chooses to show some respect. stays in the crease and defends it down the pitch
patel to maxwell, no run, another one past the outside edge! fantastic over. maxwell wanted to run this down to third man but makes no contact

aravind to saha, out, simply done at mid-on. kohli moves to his right, eyes on the ball all the way, pouches it and dives with his momentum. no timing on the shot from saha even as he runs down the track. goes for a heave, mistimes it because he is rushed into his stroke

aravind to patel, four runs, lovely pick up shot! he even managed to get on top of a delivery that was lifting above his stomach, and yet he had firm control over it. no intention to keep it down and a roll of the wrists places it perfectly to the straight midwicket boundary
chahal to patel, 2 runs, flat on middle, swept to square leg on the boundary
wiese to patel, 1 run, leaps up to handle a rising delivery on middle and chops it to deep point
chahal to sandeep sharma, out, there we have it! two runs shy of the worst ipl defeat in history. sandeep gets down the track and yorks himself. jams his bat down and gives a dolly back to the bowler
hooda to dhawan, 1 run, steps out of his crease this time to tap the ball towards midwicket and turn the strike over
kulkarni to warner, no run, warner drives into the covers but does not time it well
morris to warner, no run, played into the off side
morris to warner, 1 run, warner pushes the ball with soft hands - relatively speaking - towards mid-off and charges through for a single
tambe to henriques, no run, flat and fast on middle and off, henriques stays in his crease and defends on the off side
tambe to henriques, 1 run, played on the leg side for a single, tambe delivered that ball from way behind the crease
kulkarni to dhawan, 1 wide, dhawan charges again but kulkarni has sprayed it too wide outside off for a shot to be attempted
kulkarni to dhawan, no run, defended on the off side from the crease
tambe to henriques, no run, henriques tries to step out but mis-times it towards cover
tambe to dhawan, 1 run, dug out towards point from his crease
tambe to henriques, no run, henriques steps out too, and towards leg, but ends up playing the ball back to tambe
hooda to dhawan, 1 run, steps out of his crease but maybe a bit too early because the bowler sees him and bowls down leg side, the batsman reaches for it and glances square
hooda to dhawan, 1 run,
hooda to morgan, 1 wide, that's really wide down leg side, the keeper tries well to connect
faulkner to bopara, no run, he's let one go outside off! took me by surprise there.

tambe to morgan, six runs, tambe's punishment is over. after three great overs, he's been hammered in his last. morgan ends the spell by biffing the ball flat over the bowler's head and all the way into the sightscreen
watson to morgan, 2 runs, morgan jumps out of his crease but has to lunge for the ball because it is wide outside off stump, he manges to hit it towards deep cover, where binny fields
watson to morgan, out, he's gone now, caught at long-off! morgan smashed it again, flat and hard. that ball was travelling quickly but the man on the boundary is steven smith and he takes it easily.
watson to ojha, 1 run, the slower ball stops on bopara who pushes it into the covers to keep strike

faulkner to bopara, 1 run, smashed hard back at the bowler and faulkner can't get out of the way in time, he ducks and holds his right arm up for protection, he gets hit on the forearm but doesn't show any discomfort

p kumar to watson, no run, praveen starts around off, swings it into the right-hander, and then gets it to straighten too, wibbly wobbly. watson gets a bit squared up in his crease as he plays to mid on
b kumar to watson, no run, played into the off side
i sharma to smith, no run, played back to the bowler
p kumar to smith, no run, smith mis-hits the ball towards midwicket
p kumar to nair, no run, defended on the off side
i sharma to smith, no run, jumps out of his crease and outside leg to hit through the off side, ishant follows him so smith can only play it to point
i sharma to smith, 1 run, this time smith moves towards the off side, moving right across his stumps to flick the ball from off stump through square leg
bopara to hooda, 2 runs, reaches for the ball outside off to drive to cover but gets an inside edge towards the leg side, royals have huffed and puffed to 50
bopara to smith, 1 run, smith steps out and chips towards square leg

henriques to smith, four runs, slower ball from henriques but smith is good enough to move across his stumps early, he then waits for the ball and hits it to the square leg boundary with perfect timing
henriques to smith, 1 run, smith walks far outside the off stump and flicks the ball through square
kv sharma to smith, 2 runs, skips out of his crease and towards the off side to whip the ball through midwicket
kv sharma to hooda, 2 runs, nudged into the covers, hooda tries to get off strike but can't
kv sharma to smith, 1 run, steps out of his crease again and flicks the ball through square
kv sharma to faulkner, 1 run, dabbed close on the leg side for a single
p kumar to faulkner, 2 runs, they have got two here, dabbing a really slow delivery gently into the space at midwicket and running the second before the fielders from the deep can come rushing in
henriques to faulkner, no run, slow ball wide outside off stump, faulkner swings and misses
bopara to samson, no run, that was so slow that samson got into position way too early and then didn't play a shot properly
bopara to faulkner, no run, super slow from bopara outside off, faulkner gets an inside edge as he tries to hit on the off side
b kumar to morris, 1 run, that's really wide outside off and morris reaches for it and hits it to deep cover, bhuvneshwar is denying morris the space to hit on the leg side
b kumar to morris, 1 run, the slower one outside off stump, morris hits it towards point, sunrisers win by seven runs.
de lange to smith, 5 wides, fast, bouncy, it would have been hard to stop if mohammad irfan was keeping. parthiv patel is half the size.
de lange to smith, no run, slightly slower and on target around off, smith stays solid, defends it down the pitch
suchith to mccullum, 1 run, dropped by harbhajan! this was a long-hop alright but it was hit straight to bhajji at backward square leg. lets off mccullum. this was an easy chance
suchith to smith, four runs, now smith plays the same shot to the same ball but places it to the right of harbhajan, gets four for it
suchith to mccullum, no run, flatter and on the leg stump line, nudged to harbhajan again
vinay kumar to mccullum, four runs, now this one is more timing than power! waits , opens the face and steers it to the left of point. it was in the air, but far away from the diving fielder

vinay kumar to mccullum, four runs, not entirely in control of this one, but this has been whipped to the boundary as well! he was always looking to hit this on the leg side, but gets it off the inside half. it runs away to the square leg boundary
de lange to smith, no run, that is pacy! smith is now getting a bit fidgety.. throws his bat at that one and misses it completely
de lange to smith, no run, dot ball no. 11 now.. smith defends this one towards cover
de lange to smith, no run, superb over! this is a maiden. smith has played out 12 dot balls from de lange
harbhajan singh to raina, 1 run, steps out of the crease and pushes this one through cover for a single to the deep
harbhajan singh to smith, 1 run, stays back and defends the flatter delivery to midwicket
suchith to raina, four runs, super straight hit! he comes down the pitch and drives it over the umpire's head. flat and very straight.

suchith to raina, out, he has picked out pandya! raina came down the pitch, this time going squarer towards his favourite cow corner area, but he didn't get the distance. pandya had to sprint to his right to get under it, he takes it easily, then keeps running all the way.
harbhajan singh to dhoni, 1 run, stays deep in the crease and punches this flatter one to deep cover with ease
harbhajan singh to dhoni, no run, pushes this through on the stumps line, dhoni tucks it straight to square leg
suchith to dhoni, 1 run, goes deep in the crease and turns this one away behind square on the leg side for a single
suchith to dhoni, no run, comes down the pitch and defends the flatter delivery to midwicket
harbhajan singh to du plessis, 1 run, much slower this time, faf tucks it to square leg for an easy single
harbhajan singh to dhoni, 1 run, he pushes this one to cover and calls for a quick single, makes it in just in time

harbhajan singh to dhoni, four runs, now dhoni steps out and even though he doesn't get the whole lot behind it, it's enough to send it to the boundary. he dragged it from outside off to deep midiwicket
suchith to du plessis, no run, he makes room and looks to punch it through cover, but mistimes it back down the pitch
de lange to negi, no run, another pacy delivery! the batsman doesn't make contact. it just misses the stumps
de lange to negi, four runs, another powerful hit! this one is flatter, beats the diving cover fielder and races away through extra cover again
de lange to dhoni, four runs, this was a good delivery on dhoni's body. the batsman gets into a tangle but gets some bat on it. cruelly for the bowler, it runs away to the fine-leg boundary

de lange to negi, 2 runs, some swing this one! the batsman smashes it across the line and gets it very very high towards deep square leg. suchith lines himself up, but drops it.. still manages to keep it in though
ashwin to simmons, no run, flatter delivery on off, the batsman defends it down the pitch
ashwin to patel, no run, he goes back and punches firmly a flatter delivery, can't beat the man at cover
ashwin to simmons, 1 wide, fires this one in, but loses direction. down the leg side, this one
sharma to simmons, 1 run, chops this one to the right of backward point for a quick single. there is no third man.. and simmons was looking for that gap but brendon dove to his right to stop that one
sharma to simmons, no run, looks for that gap behind point again but finds jadeja this time.
sharma to patel, 2 runs, now whips this off the middle stump and picks up a couple to deep midwicket
nehra to simmons, no run, keeps it tight on the stumps, the batsman defends it towards point

ashwin to simmons, six runs, this was a mishit! no way it should have gone for a six. simmons played too early, his bottom hand came off, and it looked as it wouldn't go beyond mid-off.. but it lands over the boundary. crazy
ashwin to simmons, 1 run, he pushes this one towards cover point for a single
ashwin to simmons, no run, he lets this one go through as he sees it's wide, but that turns in to be just inside the safe zone

jadeja to patel, 2 runs, he goes back and punches it to wide long-off. looked like a single from the offing but the batsmen decide for a second. a better throw from bravo in the deep and simmons would have gone
jadeja to patel, 1 run, goes back and whips the flatter delivery over midwicket for a single to the deep
negi to pollard, no run, comes out of the crease but gets a quicker one, ends up defending it down the pitch
jadeja to sharma, no run, three men converging on a defended shot now! dhoni, raina and the man at cover
negi to sharma, 1 run, slower and on the stumps, rohit dabs it towards midwicket for a single
negi to rayudu, no run, slower again, the batsman pushes it back down the pitch
negi to rayudu, no run, steps out, but this one is slower again. superb stuff from negi. the batsman has to adjust and defend
jadeja to sharma, 1 run, there is a hesitation as the batsman dabs this quicker delivery towards point, but they make it through comfortably in the end
jadeja to sharma, 1 run, quicker delivery now, gets the outside edge and runs through point
jadeja to sharma, 1 run, slides the quicker one, this is pushed to extra cover for a single
bravo to rayudu, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, rayudu drags it to deep midwicket without any timing, just a single
bravo to sharma, 1 run, another slower delivery, this time he calmly dabs it towards backward point for a single
nehra to rayudu, 1 run, comes down the pitch and yorks himself, picks up a single towards cover though
bravo to rayudu, 1 run, he comes down the pitch but gets a slower delivery, has to adjust and chop it to backward point for a single
ut yadav to vohra, 1 run, angled into the right-hander from outside off and the ball seams away a touch, vohra hangs his bat out and opens the face a touch to steer towards third man
ut yadav to vijay, no run, pushed from the crease towards cover, umesh starts well, accurate at brisk pace in his first over
russell to vohra, no run, played to point from the crease
russell to vohra, 2 runs, driven towards wide mid-off for a single
ut yadav to vijay, four runs, vijay stays still in his crease now and pounces on the straighter line from umesh, glancing it off his hips towards the fine leg boundary
ut yadav to vijay, no run, driven into the covers but can't pierce the infield
botha to vijay, no run, bowled flat on off stump, the batsman stays in his crease and plays to cover
russell to vohra, no run, played from the crease to point
hogg to vohra, no run, that's the orthodox delivery from hogg that spins into the right hander, he plays it behind point
chawla to vohra, six runs, clean and effective.. chawla gives this ample air outside off. vohra, having backed away, has enough leverage to hoist it over the covers. beats long-off as well
narine to vohra, 1 run, tucked away through backward square leg
chawla to saha, 2 runs, goes right back into his crease and hits the flat ball from off stump through cover

russell to maxwell, 1 run, jumps back and opens the face to try and run the ball past the keeper, uthappa moves to his right to field and misses the stumps at the bowler's end, a better throw would have made maxwell hurry
ut yadav to maxwell, no run, defended on the leg side

narine to saha, no run, a huge appeal for lbw, the batsman moves right across his stumps to glance but misses, that looks really good because you can see leg stump, not given, uthappa could have run out saha as well
hogg to gurkeerat singh, no run, pushed through cover for a single
ut yadav to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, he hits it on the leg side for a single towards mid-on

sandeep sharma to gambhir, no run, a huge appeal for lbw, that looks so good, pitched in line and beats the inside edge of gambhir's bat as he closes the face to play on the leg side, i can't believe that hasn't been given. did the umpire think it pitched outside leg? it pitched in line and was going to smash middle stump
hendricks to gambhir, no run, defended from the crease into the leg side
anureet singh to pandey, 1 run, dabbed past the bowler towards mid on for a single
sandeep sharma to pandey, no run, pandey jumps out of his crease and punches to cover
sandeep sharma to pandey, 1 run, hangs back this time and taps the ball towards mid off for a single
patel to pandey, 1 run, played through midwicket for a single

patel to gambhir, no run, played close on the off side, the bowler runs across to field, he then flings the ball at gambhir who fends it off with his bat, no words are exchanged and they move on quickly
gurkeerat singh to pandey, 1 run,
gurkeerat singh to gambhir, no run, driven into the covers
gurkeerat singh to pandey, 1 wide, strays down leg side this time, that's a wide
gurkeerat singh to pandey, no run, chipped uppishly towards the bowler, gurkeerat moves to his right to try and catch it, doesn't carry
gurkeerat singh to pandey, 1 run, spins into the right-hander, he goes back into his crease and opens the face to play towards point
maxwell to pandey, 1 run, wide outside off stump, pandey hits it hard along the ground to long off
maxwell to gambhir, 1 run, goes back into his crease and flicks behind square
gurkeerat singh to gambhir, 1 run, goes deep into his crease to drive the ball through cover
gurkeerat singh to sa yadav, 1 run, steps out and tries to tee off, but ends up mis-timing the ball through midwicket
hendricks to pathan, 1 run, gets off the mark on his fourth ball by steering towards third man
gurkeerat singh to pathan, 1 run, tries to repeat the shot but mis-times it along the ground through midwicket
gurkeerat singh to pathan, 1 run, bowled flatter and quicker, yusuf hits it through the off side for a single
gurkeerat singh to russell, 1 wide, big spin but the turn takes it far outside leg stump
gurkeerat singh to russell, no run, defended with no footwork on the off side, the bowler runs to his left to field
patel to russell, no run, really slow this time, russell stays back and defends towards point
patel to russell, 1 run, flatter and faster with a round-arm action, russell drives to deep cover, only two runs off the over
patel to pathan, six runs, slow again outside off with room too free his arms, yusuf launches the ball over the long-off boundary with a fearsome blow
patel to pathan, 1 run, flatter and close to off stump, dabbed towards point for a single
patel to russell, 1 wide, fired down leg side, that's a wide. saha whipped off the bails and they have appealed for a stumping. russell's back leg was fine
patel to russell, four runs, big swipe outside off stump and the ball races off the outside edge to the third man boundary. the first two overs from axar went for four runs, and now this.
hendricks to russell, 1 run, mis-times the heave towards deep midwicket, miller comes running in from the deep to field
hendricks to pathan, no run, bounces yusuf from round the wicket, the batsman ducks under it
patel to botha, 1 run, driven to long off for a single
anureet singh to hogg, 1 run, hogg makes room by moving outside leg and hits straight, the bowler gets a hand on the ball but can't save the single
khan to warner, no run, pretty straight on middle and leg stump, warner waits and pushes it down to mid-on
coulter-nile to warner, no run, angles the ball across the batsman outside off, warner swings his bat but the ball doesn't bounce as much and misses the bottom edge

khan to dhawan, out, chipped to midwicket for such an easy catch! it was angling in from over the wicket, dhawan looked to flick it in the air on the leg side but mistimed it and lobbed an easy catch for morkel. no celebration for zak
khan to warner, 1 wide, errs down the leg side for a wide past warner
coulter-nile to morgan, no run, superb inswinging delivery outside off, it comes in sharply, not too far from off stump, as morgan shoulders arms
khan to morgan, 1 run, nipping in towards the batsman, thick inside edge goes down to fine leg for one
khan to henriques, 1 wide, swings it well down the leg side for an easy wide
yadav to henriques, no run, turning in from outside off, pushed towards midwicket
yadav to henriques, 1 run, sharp turn and some bounce as it comes in, moises helps it to square leg now with the turn
yadav to morgan, 1 run, pushes it in the air again, this one turned away from him and he steered it towards deep point
duminy to henriques, 1 run, too many of these falling safe after going in the air. moises comes down, dabs the ball and chips it just wide of cover
duminy to morgan, 1 run, charges down and drives that firmly to long off for one
yadav to henriques, no run, slightly flat and turning in towards middle, helped to midwicket
yadav to henriques, no run, even straighter outside off, pushed back to jayant
yadav to henriques, no run, around off stump, he goes back and pushes it back again
yadav to henriques, no run, turning in from outside off, driven towards midwicket now
mishra to henriques, 1 run, arm ball on the stumps, moises goes back and punches that with one bounce over mishra for one
mishra to kv sharma, 1 leg bye, turning towards leg from middle, helped towards backward square leg for one
morkel to henriques, no run, charges down the track and slaps that from outside off to mid off
mishra to henriques, 2 runs, run-out chance, but it's not a direct hit. he pushed the away-going delivery towards deep cover and they want two again. a not-so accurate throw means moises makes it
duminy to henriques, 1 wide, flat and wide again outside off, called a wide
morkel to bopara, 2 runs, slower one on the off stump, bopara goes across to turn it behind square on the leg side gently. he makes it back for the second with a dive despite an accurate throw
b kumar to de kock, 1 run, that stayed a touch low! the batsman gets the toe end of his bat on this, dabs it close to the stumps and takes off for a single
i sharma to de kock, no run, another one beats the outside edge! this one is closer to the stumps and moves away just a touch to fly past the batsman's defence
b kumar to iyer, no run, he keeps taking it away from the right-hander! this one beats the outside edge again. iyer plays a loose shot there
b kumar to duminy, 1 run, swinging in from outside leg, jpd tucks it off the hips to leg for one
parvez rasool to de kock, no run, doesn't move much and defends it from off back to the bowler
parvez rasool to duminy, 2 runs, swept against the turn from off stump towards deep midwicket in the gap for two
parvez rasool to duminy, 1 run, comes down and whips it using his wrists past midwicket for one more
henriques to duminy, 1 run, this time he gets some room and guides it to third man for one
parvez rasool to duminy, 1 run, goes back in the crease and tucks the ball from leg stump towards backward square leg
kv sharma to de kock, no run, turning in from outside off, he chops that towards backward point, goes down a fourth of the pitch and keeps pressing for the single but jpd says no
kv sharma to de kock, out, gone now, misses the ball and he's stumped! he came down the track to loft the ball with the turn, the ball came in to beat his bat and ojha whipped the bails off quickly
parvez rasool to jadhav, 1 run, taps the ball late and fine on off, deflects off the keeper for one
kv sharma to jadhav, 1 run, swept against the turn from outside off to deep backward square leg
kv sharma to tiwary, 1 run, flattish and turning to leg from middle, helped with the angle behind square on leg for one

kv sharma to tiwary, no run, run out chance as tiwary defends the ball towards silly point region, jadhav comes halfway down the pitch. ojha quickly collects the ball and throws to karn but he doesn't collect it and jadhav makes it
bopara to jadhav, 1 run, taps the ball late towards backward point for one
henriques to jadhav, 1 run, comes down the track to slap that from just outside off to deep midwicket for one
p kumar to jadhav, 1 run,
p kumar to tiwary, 1 wide, slower ball down the leg side for a wide
i sharma to jadhav, 1 run, doesn't move much and merely tucks the incoming delivery towards midwicket by closing the face of the bat for one
i sharma to jadhav, 1 run, 120kph, slower delivery towards the leg side to chase kj as he makes room, inside edge hits the body and then goes fine on off for one
mcclenaghan to kohli, no run, angling across outside the off stump, kohli leans into it and drives it to point where pollard dives and saves a few runs
malinga to gayle, no run, starts with a slower delivery outside the off stump, gayle pokes and misses it

mcclenaghan to gayle, 1 run, dropped by rohit! that went so high in the air, that probably would have affected rohit's concentration. gayle stayed back in the crease to smack it to leg, got a thick top edge and it almost got lost in the sky. rohit gets under it and then spills it

mcclenaghan to kohli, no run, dropped by bhajji at first slip now, what's happening! kohli came down the track, drove the ball onto the off side and it went straight to harbhajan, he only had to take it around his shoulders but it popped out straight
malinga to de villiers, no run, moving it away again from outside off, defends it into the covers again
malinga to de villiers, no run, further outside the off stumps and swinging away too, steers it to cover point
bumrah to kohli, 1 wide, bowls this from wide of the crease and delivers a wide down the leg side
bumrah to kohli, no run, angling in towards the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
bumrah to kohli, four runs, charges down the track and hammers that through the covers with a drive from the middle of the bat for four
bumrah to kohli, 1 run, angling in again, tucked to deep square leg for one
suchith to kohli, 1 run, goes back in the crease and whips the ball by opening up to deep midwicket
suchith to de villiers, four runs, slightly slower towards the stumps, ab goes back to make room and lofts it with an inside-out drive to clear the infield for four
bumrah to kohli, 2 runs, takes some pace off the ball and delivers it wide outside off, kohli swishes at it to the deep backward point region and he comes back like a rabbit for the second
bumrah to kohli, 1 run, drives it outside off and gets a thick outside edge to third man
harbhajan singh to kohli, 1 run, turning in towards the stumps from outside off, helped to square leg for one

harbhajan singh to de villiers, four runs, that's timing, that's four! nothing extravagant, nothing powerful..he drove that gently into the covers and once the ball cleared the fielder in the circle, it raced to the boundary
harbhajan singh to kohli, 2 runs, makes some room and tucks the ball with slightly soft hands towards deep midwicket for two
harbhajan singh to kohli, 1 run, turning in from off stump, helped towards deep midwicket for one
harbhajan singh to de villiers, 3 wides, errs down the leg side for a wide and the keeper misses it too for more byes, counted as wides
harbhajan singh to de villiers, 1 run, goes back and across in the crease and mistimes the punch down to long off
suchith to kohli, 1 run, comes down with some room again and drives that elegantly to long off for one
suchith to kohli, 1 run, touch flatter towards off stump, tucked to deep midwicket for one
mcclenaghan to kohli, 1 run, takes a step down and pushes the ball to long off for one
bumrah to de villiers, 1 run, tried to slam it on the leg side but got an inside edge towards deep midwicket for one
pandya to de villiers, four runs, shuffles across to the off side by exposing all the stumps and drills that through the covers for a powerful four

pandya to de villiers, four runs, gets a slower one well outside off again, he moves towards it even more and lofts it in the gap over the covers for another four even though long off gives it a chase
mcclenaghan to kohli, 1 run, leans towards the ball on off and drives it into the covers
mcclenaghan to kohli, 1 run, angling in towards the stumps, tucked to the leg side for one for his fifty
bumrah to de villiers, six runs, he's done it - his second ipl hundred with another six. ab shuffles to the off side again down on a knee, and slams it over the midwicket boundary now, same result
malinga to de villiers, 1 wide, first makes a lot of room, malinga chases him down leg, but ab comes back in and it's a big wide. malinga smiles
malinga to de villiers, four runs, makes room, swings his arms and muscles some power into that inside-out drive over the covers for a one-bounce four
starc to patel, 1 wide, starc drifts his first ball down leg, parthiv can't connect with the glance. wide called
aravind to simmons, no run, slides this one down leg, much like how starc started off. the ball brushes the thigh en route to dk
wiese to sharma, no run, pushed to the leg side off an inner edge
patel to sharma, 1 run, slow and low on middle and leg, flicked towards deep midwicket for one
wiese to sharma, 1 run, drives that elegantly to cover, the fielder has a shy at non-striker's end. not a direct hit, overthrow conceded
chahal to sharma, 1 run, slightly slow towards middle and leg, tucked to the leg side for one
chahal to simmons, 1 run, turning to middle from leg, turned to midwicket for one more
chahal to sharma, no run, on the off stump now, rohit taps it towards backward point
patel to pollard, 1 run, angled in towards the batsman, helped towards square leg for one
aravind to pollard, 2 runs, angled into the batsman from wide of the crease, pollard tucks it behind square on the leg side for two
aravind to pollard, four runs, widish outside off now, he gets enough room and lofts the ball straight over mid off for four more. just had to clear that one fielder
chahal to simmons, 1 run, flat delivery on middle stump, simmons pushes it down to long off with the turn
starc to simmons, 1 run, shuffles across towards off stump, starc still aims for middle stump and simmons flicks it in the air towards deep midwicket
wiese to simmons, 1 run, slower ball outside the off stump, simmons swishes at it to find deep point
wiese to simmons, no run, slower ball outside the off stump, simmons makes room and get too far away from the ball to connect
wiese to simmons, 1 run, slightly closer to the stumps, swatted on the leg side for one
wiese to pollard, no run, he comes down the track, wiese pitches it wide and pollard swings outside off and misses
aravind to simmons, no run, comes down the track to tonk the ball on the leg side but it angles across outside the off stump
chahal to simmons, 1 run, he comes down too, chahal pitches it slower and it's tucked to the leg side for one
wiese to simmons, no run, tries to heave on the leg side, but there's hardly any pace on it and the ball gets the toe end of the bat
patel to rayudu, 1 wide, rayudu opens up to heave, harshal pitches it well outside off for a wide
chahal to mcclenaghan, no run, slides the quicker one across the batsman on the off side, he swings and misses
morris to mccullum, four runs, i expected that! we all would have expected that. baz comes down the track, nay he races down the track and hoists it over mid-on
ankit sharma to mccullum, no run, ankit held this one back, baz pushes and lobs it in the air to the left of the bowler
morris to du plessis, 1 wide, veering down leg, morris' radar goes haywire. faf can't connect with the glance. good take from sanju
ankit sharma to mccullum, no run, pushed to the right of the bowler
ankit sharma to mccullum, 1 run, pushed through on middle and leg, tapped to the right of mid-on
tambe to mccullum, six runs, tambe loops it up outside off, baz makes a bit of room and sends it screaming over the covers for a flattish six
tambe to mccullum, no run, pushed through just outside off, stops on baz, who nearly lobbed it back for a return catch
tambe to mccullum, no run, slider from tambe, baz gets an inside edge onto the pad
tambe to du plessis, 1 run, pushed through on middle, now its faf's turn to secure a single to long-off
ankit sharma to mccullum, 1 run, down the track and dragged over mid-on. smith leaps in the air, he finger-tipped it away as well
ankit sharma to mccullum, 1 run, whipped away from outside off through midwicket. ankit chases and limits it to one
ankit sharma to du plessis, no run, room outside off, spins away further, faf camps back and cracks it to the covers
tambe to du plessis, no run, ripping legbreak. looped up and spins away past the outside edge. this left faf prodding and missing. ashwin would like this turn
tambe to mccullum, 1 run, takes it from a middle-stump line and whippily drives it through midwicket for a fifty. baz elicits a heathy round of applause from the big crowd
bhatia to mccullum, no run, he comes down the track, yorks himself and squeezes it out
ankit sharma to du plessis, no run, flat on middle, faf makes room and chops to the covers
ankit sharma to du plessis, no run, down the track comes faf, hurled in outside off, jabbed back towards the bowler off the toe-end
watson to mccullum, four runs, width on offer outside off, he runs down the track, slashes with all his might and the thick outside edge races through vacant slip cordon
faulkner to bravo, four runs, loads of width on offer outside off. bravo reaches out, throws his bat at it. yanks one hand off the bat but manages to carve it over backward point
faulkner to bravo, 2 runs, back of the hand slower one, the faulkner special. bravo squirts it through midwicket off the inner part of the bat. they press on for a couple
negi to watson, 1 run, flat and outside off, slapped through the covers
negi to watson, no run, watson backs away and forces this flat ball to the covers
jadeja to watson, no run, darted in on off, pushed to the left of the bowler
negi to hooda, 2 runs, whipped to leg
negi to hooda, 1 run, down the track and driven past the covers
negi to nair, 1 run, played past the covers
negi to hooda, four runs, negi gives this more air outside off, hooda charges down the track and lifts it over the covers
jadeja to samson, no run, straight roller on off, blocked back to jaddu
negi to samson, no run, pushed through, played back to the bowler
negi to samson, 1 wide, flat and down leg, wide called
bravo to hooda, 1 run, another of those slower balls, the line is on leg, hooda nurdles a single fine on the leg side
jadeja to faulkner, no run, jaddu fires a flat dart and strikes faulkner on the back pad i guess. this was snaking down leg
jadeja to samson, 1 run, down the track and hacked to deep midwicket
bravo to samson, 1 run, slower ball again, samson walks down the track and tucks it to midwicket
sharma to morris, 1 wide, slower ball outside off at 103ks, past the tram-line. morris can't reach out and slap it away
sharma to morris, 1 run, can you believe it, baz has dropped it. change-up outside off, morris slices it. baz runs to his left from long-off and spills it. it pops in and pops out.

sharma to bhatia, out, faf completes a sharp catch now. back of the hand slower ball outside off at 102ks, bhatia comes down the track and slices it. faf moves to his right from backward point, takes it and tumbles onto the ground. he is down, clutching his hamstring. he has a smile on his face as well. thanks for coming, bhatia.
sharma to morris, no run, i suspect  that's a slower ball. swing and a miss. hat-trick averted
anureet singh to warner, four runs, 14 off the over. anureet has not recovered from the pasting last game. width on offer outside off, warner lashes it in the gap at the covers
sandeep sharma to dhawan, no run, straighter in line, with a hint of away shape, pushed to the off side
hendricks to dhawan, 1 wide, stray ball down leg, wide called
gurkeerat singh to dhawan, 1 run, looped up slow on middle, flicked towards midwicket for one
gurkeerat singh to warner, no run, slider on leg as warner exposes all his stumps and chops it to the covers
gurkeerat singh to henriques, no run, down the track and pushed back to the bowler, who nearly collides with the non-striker. gurkeerat stretches his right hand and makes a half-stop
patel to warner, no run, straight roller on off, pushed back. axar dives to his right and makes a good stop
maxwell to warner, 1 run, slid through on middle, backs away and punches it wide of point
maxwell to henriques, 1 run, darted outside off from round the stumps, drilled to long-off
maxwell to henriques, four runs, fired outside off, keeps low. henriques hacks and gets a thick edge that nutmegs saha, sneaks through the legs
patel to warner, no run, down the track, yorks himself and jabs it to the covers
gurkeerat singh to warner, 1 run, fired on the leg stump, whisked to leg
gurkeerat singh to warner, no run, straighter one, pushed back at the bowler
maxwell to morgan, no run, pushed through on middle and leg, played back to the bowler
maxwell to warner, no run, slid through flat on leg as warner makes room and chops it to off
hendricks to warner, 2 runs, wide slower one outside off, warner uses every inch of his reach and slaps it behind point. axar dives, gets a hand to it and takes some pace off it
hendricks to kv sharma, no run, bounces rises over to saha, karn ducks out of trouble
hendricks to kv sharma, 1 run, veering down leg, helped fine on the leg side. sandeep has it covered in the deep
sandeep sharma to rahul, four runs, rahul makes room outside leg, sandeep follows him. rahul opens his bat face and shovels it past the keeper, fine on the off side
i sharma to vohra, 1 run, carved towards deep third man from outside off via a thick edge
i sharma to vijay, no run, 131.9ks, down the track, wild swing and a miss
bipul sharma to vohra, no run, vohra wants to hammer this away, gets an inside edge onto the pad
bipul sharma to vohra, 1 run, leading edge - pops in between covers and the bowler. this one held up in the pitch
bipul sharma to saha, no run, slower through the air and outside off, dabbed to point with an open face
i sharma to vohra, 1 run, vohra makes room outside leg, ishant follows him with a 125ks ball, patted towards mid-off
boult to saha, 1 run, slower ball on off at 126ks, pushed to long-off
henriques to saha, 1 run, slower ball on off at 110ks, down the track, saha adjusts and drags it to deep midwicket
boult to miller, 2 runs, miller wants to flick, gets a leading edge that loops over the covers
boult to miller, 1 run, picked away to deep midwicket
kv sharma to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, leg-break outside off with some extra bounce. dabbed awkwardly to the right of the keeper
henriques to patel, 1 wide, bumper from henriques, flies to the keeper as axar half-sways and gets his noggin out of the way
henriques to patel, 1 run, slower ball at 110ks, check-pushed to long-off
i sharma to patel, 1 wide, leg-side wide
nadeem to smith, no run, straighter one on off, poked to the covers
nadeem to smith, no run, seam-up ball outside off, chopped to point
nadeem to smith, no run, spins in quickly, poked to leg off an inner edge
khan to smith, no run, inducker from zaheer khan, smith was perhaps anticipating an away-going ball. he hangs back and gets an inside edge onto the thigh
nadeem to mccullum, no run, looped up on off, baz seeks to flick to leg and manages an inside edge onto the pad. the ball rolls to off
nadeem to mccullum, no run, straight roller on off, pushed to mid-off
nadeem to mccullum, no run, baz looks to make room outside leg, nadeem follows him with an arm-ball. kept out
khan to smith, no run, inswinger from zaheer, smith does not move his feet and gets away with an inside edge onto the pad
nadeem to smith, no run, quicker and flatter on off, he stays back and punches it back to the bowler
yadav to dhoni, no run, big offie spins in from outside off, dhoni manages an inside edge onto the thigh
yadav to dhoni, no run, darted flat on off, blocked back
yadav to du plessis, 1 run, quick offie, keeps alarmingly low. faf stoops low with it and flicks it tentatively through midwicket
yuvraj singh to du plessis, no run, quicker on off, chopped to point
yuvraj singh to dhoni, 1 run, pushed through on off, dhoni advances and flat-bats it to long-off
sandhu to du plessis, 1 run, leg-stump ball, helped to long leg
yuvraj singh to du plessis, 1 run, flatter and quicker on leg, whipped through midwicket
yuvraj singh to du plessis, four runs, fired down leg, poor ball. eased away past the man at 45. he used the pace of the bowler to good effect
yuvraj singh to du plessis, 1 run, looped up outside off, yuvraj held this one back. checks the lofted-drive and chips it over the covers
yuvraj singh to bravo, no run, pushed through outside off, goes straight on and beats bravo's attempted dink towards third man
yuvraj singh to dhoni, no run, slider outside off, dhoni was looking to advance. he eventually lets it pass
sandhu to negi, 1 run, negi backs away, sandhu follows him. tapped to backward point
pandey to iyer, no run, lifter outside off, iyer yanks his head out of the way
sharma to duminy, 1 run, wide line outside off, duminy waits on it before guiding it to third man again
ashwin to iyer, no run, slid through on off, whisked to midwicket
ashwin to iyer, no run, looped up and turns in on off with extra bounce. he may have got an inside edge onto the pad
jadeja to yuvraj singh, 1 run,
jadeja to iyer, 1 run, flat on middle and leg, squirted to long leg off an inner edge
jadeja to yuvraj singh, no run, skiddy ball on off, flicked to midwicket
ashwin to yuvraj singh, no run, looped up on middle and rips away past the outer edge. sharp turn
ashwin to iyer, four runs, flatter and quicker outside off, turns away. cracked away past backward point
jadeja to yuvraj singh, no run, skiddy ball on off, pushed back to jaddu
negi to iyer, 1 run, drifts in on middle and leg, eased to long leg
negi to yuvraj singh, 1 run, extra bounce outside off, pushed to the covers
negi to iyer, no run, angled in on middle, blocked to the leg side

ashwin to iyer, no run, big offbreak spins in from outside off, he backs away and chops it to the covers. yuvraj is halfway down the track. jaddu throws at the strikers'. he should have thrown it to the non-strikers'. yuvraj would have been in trouble
negi to iyer, no run, quicker and spins away, chopped to point
ashwin to morkel, no run, pushed through on middle and leg, blocked to mid-on
ashwin to morkel, 1 run, flatter and on middle, pushed to the covers for one
ashwin to morkel, no run, darted outside off, chopped hard into the ground behind point
ashwin to morkel, no run, straight roller on middle, morkel gets an inner edge onto the pad and negates the lbw appeal. oh wait, that was pad first, but would have missed leg maybe
ashwin to morkel, no run, flatter and quicker, stays low, at the base of off, kept out
negi to iyer, 2 runs, squirted to the leg side off an inner edge
negi to iyer, 1 run, leg-stump line, turned through midwicket
starc to saha, 1 wide, a bit of inswing, but it starts on leg stump and curls down the leg side as saha fails to connect with a flick

aravind to saha, four runs, dropped. that was smacked back hard again, but this time flat, at chest height, and aravind managed to get his hands up in time but barely had any time to close his fingers over the ball. it was hit so hard it ricocheted off them and raced to the straight boundary. aravind is wincing now, and the physio is on the field.
aravind to maxwell, no run, slower ball, angled across maxwell, keeps low, and sneaks under his bat as he tries to whip it square on the leg side
patel to vohra, out, slower ball outside off, and vohra doesn't get hold of the attempted loft over long-off, ends up chipping it straight into the fielder's hands

chahal to miller, 1 wide, out, gone. saw miller coming down the track and slid it flat and wide outside off. quick work from dk as well, collects and has the bails off before miller can turn and try to regain his crease
chahal to patel, no run, good ball. again he slid it wider outside off, and patel swung, looking to go leg side, and missed. dk appealed for a caught behind, but no one else did
wiese to patel, 1 run, slower ball outside off, slapped towards deep point
patel to patel, no run, slower ball just outside off. axar spots it late, looks to chop it towards third man, can't connect

patel to bailey, 1 run, slower ball, may have been a wide because it seemed to be just outside the tramline outside off, but bailey had moved across and he managed to flat-bat it and drag it down to long-off
sandeep sharma to gayle, no run, begins with a beauty that swerves away from gayle outside off. he doesn't move his feet an inch and pokes at it with hands alone, makes no contact
dhawan to gayle, 1 run, slower ball on off stump. gayle makes a bit of room and flat-bats it to long-off
dhawan to mandeep singh, 1 run, slower ball again, on middle stump. mandeep makes a bit of room and chips it over mid-off
dhawan to mandeep singh, 2 runs, sees him make room and bowls a slower ball outside off. mandeep gets down on one knee and slaps it towards long-off
dhawan to mandeep singh, 2 runs, sees ab make room and follows him. he manages to hoick it away to the right of the deep square leg fielder and pick up a couple
hendricks to karthik, 1 run, slower ball on middle stump, angling in and denying the batsman room. pushed into the covers
hendricks to mandeep singh, no run, slower ball outside off, and mandeep swings and misses, looking to carve over the off side
anureet singh to khan, no run, slower ball outside off, makes no contact as he tries to play the lap-scoop
morkel to simmons, 1 run, straighter now, on off and middle, and simmons, who was initially backing away towards the leg side, swipes it to mid-on, not quite middling it
morkel to patel, 2 runs, slower ball on middle stump, nudged with soft hands into the on side, and they pick up two by the time mid-on and square leg converge on the ball
morkel to simmons, no run, slower ball outside off. simmons makes room to try and carve through the off side, misses

shakib al hasan to rayudu, out, sees rayudu skip down the track and bowls it slower and wider. he goes through with the shot but ends up slicing it high and not quite getting the distance, finds russell at wide long-off
shakib al hasan to pandya, 1 wide, goes extremely round-arm now, and the angle takes the ball down the leg side
narine to pollard, 1 wide, flatter and straighter now, but the offbreak turns down the leg side
narine to pandya, 1 wide, another wide down the leg side. i think he's expecting the batsman to come down the track, in the back of his mind
narine to pandya, no run,
vinay kumar to gambhir, 1 run, angled into off and middle, tucked away towards deep backward square leg
harbhajan singh to pathan, 1 wide, slowish ball angled in from wide of the crease, ends up slipping a fair way down the leg side
suchith to gambhir, 2 runs, angles it across towards off and middle. gambhir goes back and across to work it with the turn into the leg side
suchith to gambhir, 1 run, down the track, whips it from off stump towards deep midwicket
suchith to gambhir, 1 run, down the track and hits with the turn, in the air but on the bounce to deep midwicket
pollard to chawla, 1 wide, goes for the slower ball angled across chawla, overdoes the angle, and it ends up waay outside off stump
pollard to chawla, no run, this time he gets the slower ball right, it's just outside off, and chawla swings and misses
pollard to chawla, no run, and again, this one's a bit wider and he swings across the line and only makes contact with air

pollard to chawla, no run, and another slower ball, and another swing and miss. he came down the track this time, but again the angle across him, and the lack of pace, defeated his across-the-line swish. what a final over from pollard
negi to saha, no run, a bit slower and a bit of air, saha steps out and drives inside-out to cover
pandey to saha, 1 run, and again, some bounce. saha stays next to the line and steers it to third man
ashwin to maxwell, no run, down the track now and ashwin bowls it quicker, hurrying him into a defensive push towards midwicket
nehra to maxwell, no run, slower ball angling away from maxwell, who looks to steer it to third man and doesn't get any bat on it
ashwin to gurkeerat singh, 1 wide, fired in quicker, turns down the leg side
ashwin to miller, no run, flat, angled in towards off and middle. defended into the on side
ashwin to patel, no run, this one's a bit quicker, and axar is hurried into a defensive poke, and the ball turns and hits the shoulder of his bat and rolls into the off side
negi to patel, 1 run, now axar is down the track and negi bowls it quick and flat. taps it into the on side to take the single
