negi to dhawan, no run, flat on leg stump, straightens after angling in sharply, and rishi stays back, defends with the turn into the off side
raina to patel, 1 run, flatter now, goes with the angle towards off stump. axar stays leg side and punches it through cover
negi to patel, 1 wide, sharp turn, starts from middle and leg and turns down the leg side. axar shapes to flick and decides to ignore the ball instead
bravo to dhawan, 1 run, down the track and bravo bowls it right up to him, outside off. jabs it away through midwicket

bravo to patel, out, slower ball angled away from axar, and it gets his wicket. slashes away from his body and only manages a top edge that loops to the right of dhoni, who settles himself under it and completes a simple catch
sandeep sharma to hussey, no run,
maxwell to raina, no run,
patel to du plessis, no run, flat, round-arm ball on middle stump. faf hangs back, making a bit of room, punches to extra cover
patel to du plessis, no run, sees him coming again and bowls it quick and flat at his feet. pokes it away towards extra cover
gurkeerat singh to du plessis, 1 run, down the track now, driven to long-off
azhar mahmood to watson, no run, keeps it tight on middle, watson is happy to block it down the pitch
azhar mahmood to watson, no run, tests him on the off-stump corridor, watson doesn't bother with it. just checking if the ball is swinging. not quite
morkel to rahane, 2 runs, 141kph, ample bounce, makes rahane leap off his feet to get on top of the ball. then taps it through third man with an open face. neatly done for a couple

morkel to rahane, six runs, that's a sizzler! he saw the width, he loves it and lashes the ball over point. and it carries all the way. well, he did say a six is a six no matter if it just clears the ropes or soars through it

morkel to rahane, four runs, he's just giving too much room and rahane has slashed it past point. the pace at which the ball is screaming off the bat is stunning. pandey had to dive to his left, did so reasonably well, and even got a hand to it... very tough to call that a drop
morkel to rahane, four runs, that one seamed! and oddly, it was a cross-seamer. a little movement away but rahane rides it with the angled face and caresses it past the keeper
ut yadav to rahane, 1 run, slower ball outside off, rahane gets down and runs it through to third man. russell keeps it to only a single
shakib al hasan to watson, six runs, down the track, not quite at the pitch, but it's not turning either. hit through the line and lifted over the bowler's head. massive hit
chawla to smith, 1 run, holds it back and manages to snag the outside edge as smith steps down again. closed the face too early, and gets off strike with a single to third man
chawla to watson, 1 run, flicked away through square leg. that's his fifty, and he's looking good for much more
shakib al hasan to samson, no run, darted in on middle and leg, he backs away and punches with the horizontal bat

azhar mahmood to watson, six runs, take that, slower ball! it's been a go-to to every bowler in the ipl, but this time a batsman has picked it early, waiting on the trigger position with his high backlift, and slammed it over the top. only 81 kph
ut yadav to nair, four runs, moves outside leg, umesh follows him, karun looks for a slice through point. gets a very thick outside edge and it scurries away to the third man boundary
ut yadav to nair, 1 run, moves away to leg and umesh follows him again, pushed through the covers
morris to uthappa, 2 wides, this one is wild, way down the leg side, well done by the keeper samson to collect that, diving acrobatically before quickly getting up and hurling the ball at the stumps

kulkarni to uthappa, out, a second major blow for kolkata, uthappa is gone, holes out to mid-off, looking to clear the man in the ring but he doesn't get enough power on that as it hits high on the bat, the ball gently flies towards smith, he doesn't drop that, can kolkata recover from these two big early losses?
sran to pathan, 5 no balls, what the heck! that hit the middle of the pitch and leaped about 20 feet in the air. samson needed to be on stilts to get that. soars away to the boundary behind him
kulkarni to pathan, 5 wides, soars over the keeper again! hits the middle of the deck, yusuf ducks immediately, and samson has no chance
kulkarni to pathan, no run,
faulkner to pathan, 1 run,
faulkner to russell, no run, goes for a slash and miss
faulkner to russell, 1 wide, slips away down the leg side, russell was looking flick it to long leg but misses.
sran to pathan, 1 run, another slower ball, with a little width, slapped through the covers
watson to pathan, 1 wide, another one, royals have been quite ordinary with the ball so far. quite rattled by the power of the kkr power-hitters
faulkner to shakib al hasan, 1 wide, appears the back of the hand slower ball, which meanders away to the off side. the batsman leaves and collects a wide

faulkner to shakib al hasan, 1 wide, slips it down the other side this time. the famous faulkner slower balls and coming off completely wrong. as he walks back, he grabs the umpire's kerchief. struggle gripping the ball?
faulkner to shakib al hasan, no run, slower ball outside off, shakib was looking at third man but his slice doesn't connect
mcclenaghan to morgan, no run, teases morgan outside off, he does not bite
malinga to henriques, 1 wide, veering down leg, malinga strays in line. henriques tries to help it away but can't connect. wide
mcclenaghan to morgan, 2 runs, tucked away off the hips to long leg
suchith to rahul, four runs, slid through outside off, rahul advances and looks to go over the covers. he ends up slicing it up and over backward point
suchith to henriques, 1 run, flicked from an off-stump line through vacant midwicket
pandya to rahul, no run, tucked up for room is rahul, pushed back to pandya
suchith to rahul, 1 run, pushed through on leg stump, he steps away and pushes it down to long-off

suchith to henriques, out, got'em! srh further. henriques makes a trip down the track, suchith tossed it up wide outside off. henriques can't slap it away, runs past it and parthiv whips the bails off in a flash
suchith to rahul, 2 runs, darted flat on middle, whipped through midwicket
suchith to rahul, no run, looped up and outside off, down the track and pushed back to the bowler
harbhajan singh to sharma, 1 run, pushed through outside off and spins away, cracked behind point
harbhajan singh to sharma, no run, extra bounce and loop. grips in the surface and turns away past the outer edge
harbhajan singh to ashish reddy, no run, flat on off, pressed into the covers
harbhajan singh to ashish reddy, 1 run, slid through on off, turned behind square leg
malinga to p kumar, 1 run, slower one on off, he is early into the shot and chips it in the air to the right of malinga

pollard to steyn, four runs, another of the slower balls around off from pollard, he backs away. throws his bat at it and gets a thick outside edge to the right of parthiv, who was diving to his right
b kumar to simmons, no run, shapes it away nicely just a bit from outside off, pushed down to mid-off
b kumar to simmons, 1 wide, swings it the other way this time, but down the leg side for a wide
b kumar to simmons, no run, banana inswing from outside off, simmons covers his stumps and defends it back
b kumar to simmons, no run, not much swing this time, not much room either and it's pushed towards point
b kumar to simmons, 1 run, well outside off with hardly any swing, guides it to third man for one

steyn to simmons, four runs, simmons connects against steyn and drills one for four! he charged down the track with some room and swung his arms to crunch that outswinger all along the ground through the covers
steyn to simmons, 1 run, closer to off stump now, simmons defends it gently towards mid-off and takes off for one
steyn to patel, 1 run, bit of width outside off, parthiv runs it down to third man for one
b kumar to patel, 1 run, bit of inside edge as parthiv looks to push the outswinger towards the off side, but gets a single on leg after the edge
b kumar to simmons, 1 run, well outside off with some shape, helped to third man for one easily
p kumar to patel, 1 wide, pk's line is haywire. sliding down leg, wide called
p kumar to simmons, no run, slower ball on off, simmons waits on it and pats it to leg. parthiv wants a single but is sent back
sharma to simmons, no run, straight roller, defended
henriques to simmons, 1 run, slower ball on off, simmons manipulates it behind square on leg side
b kumar to simmons, no run, lifter from bhuvneshwar, simmons half-ducks out of the way
b kumar to simmons, no run, simmons makes room outside leg, the bowler follows him. he manages a toe-ends it, the ball rolls back to ojha
sharma to patel, 1 run, fifty for parthiv. flatter and outside off, chopped through cover-point

ashwin to patel, four runs, edged and that goes fine for four! teasing line just outside off, looked like somewhat intentional as parthiv waited for it to turn and opened the face of the bat late to run it fine
nehra to simmons, 1 wide,

ashwin to patel, 1 run, makes room, ashwin slides it towards leg, there's a bit of mix up for the run as ashwin dives to his right to get a hand to it but the ball deflects and they complete the single
ashwin to simmons, 1 run, goes the other way from off stump, pushed towards point for one
nehra to simmons, no run, drives the ball late from outside off to point
nehra to simmons, no run, he comes down the track, nehra bangs it in just outside leg and over simmons' head as he had to get out of the way just in time
nehra to simmons, no run, straight and on the stumps, he defends it back to nehra
nehra to simmons, no run, inner edge this time as he looks to swish at it outside off and finds point
ashwin to patel, 1 run, squares him up with the turn after pitching it way outside leg as parthiv came down and got an edge to the off side for one
ashwin to simmons, no run, slightly straighter one outside off, swatted to midwicket
nehra to simmons, 2 runs, shuffles towards off now and flicks that with his wrists towards deep fine leg to quickly come back for the second
negi to simmons, no run, sliding in almost towards off stump, slices it to backward point
sharma to simmons, no run, makes some room to target the off side but gets an inside edge on the leg side
bravo to simmons, no run, wide well outside off, he slashes it straight to point
sharma to simmons, no run, makes room and only manages to push the ball to cover
jadeja to sharma, 1 run, comes down the track to push the flatter delivery from off to long off

jadeja to simmons, out, superb catch running in from deep cover from negi, simmons' gone! he got some room to free his arms outside off, swung his bat and negi ran in hard to bend low to his toes to catch that nicely
nehra to pollard, 1 run, slightly slower on the off stump, pushed into the coves for a quick one
nehra to rayudu, 1 run, on the middle stump now, no room at all and he opens up a bit to nudge to point for one
bravo to rayudu, 1 run, comes down the track and drives that widish delivery to deep cover for one
sharma to rayudu, 1 wide, away-swinging delivery from well outside off for a wide
sharma to pollard, no run, quicker at 137kph outside off with some outswing, he swings hard and misses!
sharma to pollard, 1 wide, that was too close to the white line outside off as it moved away, but rightly called wide as pollard swung and missed
sharma to pollard, 1 wide, 139.3kph, pollard misses again as the ball swings away from outside off, called a wide this time. maybe a bit harsh
bravo to harbhajan singh, 1 wide, slower one now, this one well outside off and called wide as harbhajan misses

vinay kumar to du plessis, 2 runs, that goes very very high, malinga gets under it easily at third man and drops it! swivel of the bat for the leg side, malinga had lots of time to place himself nicely but the ball goes straight through his hands
vinay kumar to du plessis, no run, this one swings away from well outside off, faf pokes and misses again
mcclenaghan to hussey, 1 run, nipping in towards off stump, hussey gets an inner edge to the leg side for one
harbhajan singh to raina, 1 run, waits for it to turn from outside off and pushes to point
pollard to du plessis, 1 run, slower one at 106kph outside off, flicked to the leg side with the wrists towards deep midwicket for one
harbhajan singh to raina, no run, turns it away a bit from well outside off, left alone
suchith to bravo, 1 run, some turn outside off as the ball is guided to backward point. some hesitation from bravo for the single. a direct hit at non-striker's would have put him in trouble
harbhajan singh to du plessis, 1 run, turning in from outside off, defends it softly towards point for one

malinga to nehra, out, it's high, it's taken, it's all over! nehra on his first ball swivels his bat for the slower delivery which goes in the air towards deep square leg. simmons can take the toughest catches, he takes these simple ones too
morris to gayle, four runs, crunchh! width on offer outside off, gayle hits through the line. flaying a drive past the covers, beats mid-off to his right
morris to gayle, 1 run, gayle waits on this slower ball outside off and dinks it to deep third man with an open face
watson to gayle, 1 wide, veering down leg, gayle can't meet with the flick. wide called
morris to gayle, 1 wide, morris strays down leg, wide called
ankit sharma to kohli, no run, looped up on off, patted into the covers
ankit sharma to kohli, no run, fired wide outside off, kohli reaches out and flashes it to point
watson to de villiers, 2 runs,
ankit sharma to de villiers, no run, slid through on off, pushed back to the bowler, who dives to his left and stops the ball
ankit sharma to de villiers, no run, darted flat and wide outside off, ab lets it pass. just inside the tram-line
morris to mandeep singh, 1 run, jabbed to point for one
aravind to rahane, no run, drifting onto the hips, rahane does not get hold of the flick
aravind to rahane, 1 run, width on offer outside off, flat-batted without much power towards mid-off
aravind to samson, 2 runs, picked away off the hips through vacant midwicket. by the time starc runs in from the deep and collects the ball, they take two
wiese to rahane, 1 wide, drifts this slower ball down leg, wide called
chahal to nair, four runs, fired outside off, karn nair chases and gets a thick outer edge just past the gloves of dk. too harsh to call that a drop. harshal slides in the deep in vain
chahal to rahane, 1 run, flatter and quicker outside off, cracked to point, who dives across to his right and stops the ball
ashwin to gayle, no run, looped up on off and turns away, gayle stays back and ignores it
ashwin to gayle, no run, flat and turning away outside off, slapped to the covers, where jaddu takes it on his knee
ashwin to gayle, no run, lobbed up on off and turns away, gayle plays for the straighter one and pokes it out behind point
ashwin to gayle, 1 run, straight roller on middle, laced to long-off
ashwin to gayle, no run, gayle lines up for a swat, ashwin is wary of it as he fires it outside off. gayle eventually opts to shoulder arms

nehra to de villiers, out, double-strike from nehra! another appeal for lbw, ab has been given out now. this was another inwinger from nehra, ab misses it and is rapped on the back pad. ab did not account for the movement here. this may have pitched outside leg.... might have been snaking down. tight call. yes, it pitched just outside leg
ashwin to gayle, 1 run, pushed through on middle and leg, swept away to the leg side
ashwin to mandeep singh, no run, flatter and on off, defended back to the bowler
ashwin to karthik, no run,
raina to gayle, 1 wide, fired down leg, gayle can't help it away. wide called
raina to karthik, 1 run, pushed through quicker, whipped away to the left of mid-on for a single, bravo tidies up in the deep near cow corner
raina to karthik, 2 runs, nudged to deep square leg for a couple
raina to karthik, 1 run, dk nips down the track and lofts it over mid-on. there is protection in the deep
bravo to karthik, 1 wide, bravo loses his radar, sprays this wide outside off. dk does not bother with it
raina to gayle, 1 wide, darted wide outside off, past the tram-line. gayle does not bother with it
raina to karthik, four runs, raina drifts down leg, dk employs soft hands and tickles it to the left of dhoni. very fine on the leg side and gets a four
raina to khan, 1 run, darted flat on the leg stump, sarfraz makes room and slaps it towards long-off for one
negi to karthik, no run, negi gives this more air on middle, blocked to the right of the bowler
jadeja to khan, no run, sarfraz steps away outside leg and jadeja is wary of it as he follows him. quietly defended
nehra to wiese, 1 wide, nehra loses his radar, slips it down leg
patel to hussey, 1 run, slower ball outside off, driven to mid-off
wiese to du plessis, 1 wide, sprays this well outside off, left alone. wide called
wiese to du plessis, 1 wide, did faf get a scintilla of a tickle on it? drifting down leg, faf misses the glance, the ball brushes the pad. dk can't collect cleanly
chahal to hussey, 1 run, width on offer outside off, hussey reaches out and slaps it past the covers
chahal to hussey, 1 run, flat and fired on off, forced down to long-off
wiese to hussey, 1 run, width on offer outside off, hussey reaches out and slices it over the covers
chahal to dhoni, no run, flat and on the leg stump, nudged to the leg side
chahal to dhoni, no run, flatter and quicker, spins away outside off. pushed to the covers
chahal to dhoni, 1 run, darted outside off, dhoni winds up and flat-bats it to long-off
chahal to hussey, 1 run, wrong'un on off, hussey aims to work to leg, gets a leading edge to the right of the bowler towards mid-off
chahal to hussey, 1 run, legbreak outside off with some extra bounce, hussey gets on top of it and steers it to point
patel to negi, 2 runs, stump-to-stump line, negi, who had initially backed away, adjusts and drives it past the covers
ashwin to simmons, 1 no ball, sharp offbreak but he has overstepped. rohit wants the leg-bye but simmons sends him back. almost as if both are eager to face the free hit
jadeja to simmons, no run, fired in, defended again
jadeja to simmons, no run, totally round arm this time. his arm is as high as malinga's. defended back

jadeja to simmons, six runs, simmons takes him on again. as he charges down, jadeja looks to go wide, but simmons throws his arms at it, and sends this over mid-off. gets a six off the bottom of the bat
negi to sharma, 1 run, down the wicket to bunt this to deep midwicket for one
ashwin to sharma, no run, bowl the straighter one, pitches leg and goes with the angle. rohit is looking for the spin, and has to defend it as he reads it off the pitch

ashwin to sharma, 2 runs, bunted into the leg side, rohit takes the deep square leg on, and takes a couple thanks to a wide throw. dhoni doesn't emote too much on the field, but he can't stand ordinary fielding. he lets his fielder know it. mohit sharma is the fielder here

sharma to simmons, 2 runs, dropped. only technically can you call this a drop. simmons gets a thick leading edge and the ball lobs wide of backward point. negi races towards it, flies towards for a desperate dive, but can only get his hands to it. as he makes impact with ground, the ball slips out. that brings up fifty for simmons

smith to rayudu, 1 run, raina saves four and then gives away one. driven towards extra cover but raina makes a spectacular diving save only to concede an overthrow as pollard has hardly left his crease
smith to rayudu, no run, pushed back to smith and he throws the ball back at rayudu who has not even left the crease for a mili second
bravo to rayudu, 1 run, slower ball wide outside off, steered to third man for one
smith to rayudu, 2 runs, nice drive with an open face, wide of long-off, but negi makes a flying save there to save two runs

bravo to rayudu, 1 run, another slower ball, rayudu hasn't picked this, and gets a massive edge as he looks to drive over long-off. smith comes under it for what looks like an easy catch, and then he drops it. hard hands there
malinga to smith, no run, malinga starts with a ball that lasers in towards the batsman's toes, smith gets his feet out of the way and defends that from within the crease, superb start from malinga

mcclenaghan to smith, six runs, smith was feeling the pressure there after some dots, he goes for his favourite swipe towards midwicket, a thick top edge over the keeper's head for six, lucky but that should settle him a bit
vinay kumar to smith, four runs, smith takes a risk, gets a big outside edge that flies over point. two last balls, two edges, 8 runs. is the break super kings are looking for?
harbhajan singh to raina, 1 run, chipped towards deep cover for one
harbhajan singh to smith, 1 run, topspinner, smith stays back to work this to leg for one
harbhajan singh to smith, 1 run, swept away for one
harbhajan singh to bravo, no run, lovely bowling. slow through the air, dipping on him, goes straight on, beats the outside edge
malinga to negi, 1 wide, slower ball but wide outside off and angles further away to go for an extra
malinga to negi, no run, another slower ball, negi has no clue about it, and edges it to patel on the bounce
malinga to ashwin, 1 run, slower ball again, on off, ashwin opens the face for a single
malinga to jadeja, 1 run, another slower ball to end the over, ashwin opens the face for another single
malinga to ashwin, 1 run, slower ball, ashwin makes room to work this for one
vinay kumar to sharma, 2 runs, mohit gives him the charge, yorks himself, gets a single to mid-off, and then an overthrow from rohit. he laughs as he apologises to vinay. he can afford to now
vinay kumar to sharma, four runs, top edge over the keeper's head, but mumbai indians don't care where the ball has gone. this is a legal delivery, and that means they have won the ipl again
russell to agarwal, no run, hops back and taps it with soft hands towards point
russell to agarwal, 1 run, uses the pace and runs it down to third man
russell to de kock, 2 runs, whipped away behind square. sweet timing, good work in the deep by munro

russell to de kock, 5 runs, outstanding stop at backward point by manish pandey, fires a throw at the bowler's end where de kock had almost give up, but there was no one backing up. end result: four overthrows. delhi won't complain, gambhir lets out a cry of anguish
russell to agarwal, 1 run, dabs it down to third man
hastings to agarwal, no run, beauty first up. nips away late to beat the outside edge
hastings to agarwal, no run, pushed to gambhir at point. accurate stuff this from hastings
hastings to agarwal, 1 run, gets on top of the bounce and glides it down towards umesh, who dishes in a slide to stop it
hastings to nair, no run, nicely driven, but can't pierce the off side ring
hastings to nair, no run, nibbles away off the seam again, nair is late on the drive, doesn't miss the edge by much
hastings to negi, no run, eased to the man coming in from point
hastings to negi, no run, turned to midwicket.  wicket-maiden to finish the powerplay
ut yadav to samson, four runs, he's squared up but somehow manages to get an edge that flies past the diving slip fielder. third man was square and the ball raced away
ut yadav to samson, 1 run, pats it towards midwicket and scoots across for a quick single

ut yadav to negi, no run, mix-up, confusion, pandemonium! this one was dabbed to point but negi wanted the run, only to turn his back to samson, who was more than halfway down the pitch when he turned back. pandey's throw hit samson, and so there's no damage done
ut yadav to negi, 1 run, ball gets big on him, lobs off the glove but just wide of the slip fielder
ut yadav to samson, no run, he plays inside the line as the ball nips away late, somehow gets some bat on it, rolls to the off side
ut yadav to samson, 1 run, angled down to hogg at third man
munro to negi, no run, pokes at one that is angled away, misses. through to uthappa on the bounce
munro to negi, no run, dabbed to pandey at backward point
ut yadav to samson, 1 run, sprays it onto middle and leg, whipped to deep midwicket
ut yadav to negi, 2 runs, tucked towards midwicket, no one there, umesh had to hare around to stop it, by which time they were comfortably back for the second
hogg to samson, 1 run, pushed to long-off for an easy single
chawla to samson, 1 run, slow turn from outside off, steered to deep point
chawla to brathwaite, 5 wides, drifts back into middle and leg, uthappa is late to move to his left, gets a bit of glove but there's enough pace in it to roll past the fine leg boundary. useful runs
chawla to brathwaite, no run, hint of width on offer, steered to point
chawla to morris, 1 run, gets back into his crease and punches it to deep midwicket
hogg to samson, no run, stays inside the crease and plays it with the spin to midwicket
hogg to morris, 5 wides, once again, uthappa has trouble with collecting one down leg. the slider gone wrong this time as the ball rolls into the boundary

chawla to morris, out, dream delivery for any legspinner. tossed it up nicely on middle, gets a bit of inward drift as well, morris is invited into playing the big stroke against the spin but is done in by the turn as the ball sneaks through the gap between bat and pad to disturb the stumps.

hogg to samson, out, the young 'old' man is on fire. samson shapes to drive but fails to account for the turn, goes through with the stroke as the ball takes the inside edge, uthappa did well to pick that one and stayed low to complete an excellent catch.
hogg to mishra, no run, width on offer, pushed to point
hogg to mishra, 1 run, steps out and thumps it towards long-off
chawla to mishra, 1 run, played wide of gambhir at midwicket
hogg to mishra, no run, looks to play the switch hit this time, but was way too early into the stroke, gets an under-edge that uthappa stops with his pad
hogg to khan, no run, zak, who probably didn't expect to bat on his return to competitive cricket, is completely deceived by that wrong-un
hogg to khan, no run, stopped by yusuf at second slip
chawla to coulter-nile, no run, driven with the spin to cover
chawla to coulter-nile, 1 run, mistimes a drive, but enough to get it wide of the bowler to long-off
chawla to khan, no run, fires a quicker one outside off, sharp turn away, play and a miss from zaheer
chawla to khan, no run, drifts in to middle, somehow manages to get some bat on it
chawla to khan, no run, hides the bat behind the pad, watches it into uthappa's gloves
coulter-nile to uthappa, no run, edged, but morris does well to stop it at second slip. uthappa didn't go hard at it, took the bottom hand off to ensure the edge didn't carry
khan to gambhir, four runs, pure wrist work that. excellent timing. zaheer angles it into middle and leg, and gambhir times that superbly between square leg and midwicket

coulter-nile to uthappa, four runs, looks to force that behind point, gets a thick edge that races away into the third man boundary. second slip was taken off just before the start of the over and it went through that region. not much is working for delhi at the moment
morris to gambhir, 1 run, sensible stuff, drops it with soft hands into the off side and gets across for a quick single
morris to uthappa, no run, whipped, but a tumbling stop by zaheer at midwicket
morris to uthappa, no run, gets it to straighten a wee bit after landing it on middle, uthappa is nicely behind the line as he punches it back to the bowler
morris to uthappa, 1 run, bunted towards point, mere eye contact and off they went
khan to gambhir, 1 run, turned towards midwicket, brathwaite looks to deflect the ball towards the stumps at the non-striker's end with those big boots of his, goes wide

khan to uthappa, four runs, straight as a dye. this wasn't all that bad a delivery, but uthappa's nice high elbows as ball met bat generated the power and timing as it beat zaheer's outstretched foot. bisected mid-off and mid-on
morris to gambhir, no run, driven, straight to point
morris to gambhir, 1 run, goes for a big booming drive, doesn't time it well but steals a run
morris to uthappa, no run, defended back to the bowler
morris to uthappa, no run, slower one this time, authoritative drive but straight to mid-off
brathwaite to uthappa, 1 run, tucked towards deep square leg
brathwaite to gambhir, no run, glides it to gully, where nair stops it well
mishra to uthappa, 1 run, eased with the spin to long-off
mishra to gambhir, 1 run, spins back into middle and leg, nudged wide of square leg
brathwaite to gambhir, no run, no timing or power whatsoever behind that forceful drive, back to the bowler
brathwaite to uthappa, 1 run, whipped, uppish but safe, down to deep square

mishra to uthappa, out, clean strike, but he's picked out morris at long off. did most things right, but it was almost as if he forgot there was a fielder there. didn't get the elevation. he walks back for yet another attractive knock

morris to pandey, four runs, walks across the stumps and picks it behind square on the leg side. not entirely convincing but the ball flew off the bat. shreyas iyer at fine leg did all the hard work in getting to the ball, but palmed it over as he tried to push it back into the field of play
morris to gambhir, no run, slices it towards point
coulter-nile to gambhir, 1 run, whipped to deep midwicket
morris to pandey, no run, walks across the stumps and punches one to mid-on
morris to gambhir, 1 run, tickled down to third man
morris to pandey, no run, looks to play a cross-court forehand over mid-on, gets a bottom edge to the keeper
coulter-nile to gambhir, four runs, gets a thick edge that flies into the third man boundary. didn't have the width he was looking for but runs nonetheless
coulter-nile to gambhir, 1 run, drops it into the off side for a quick single
khan to gambhir, 1 run, eased behind the wicket for a quick single to complete what has been a cakewalk
kumar to gayle, 1 wide, he sprays this wide outside off, warm-up ball
mustafizur rahman to kohli, 1 run, kohli skips out, yorks himself and toe-ends a drive towards mid-off
sharma to de villiers, 1 run, zips through on middle, the batsman ventures deep in the crease and whips to deep midwicket
sharma to kohli, 1 run, kohli comes down the track and wristily drives it to long-off
sharma to kohli, no run, fizzes through to rap the pad as kohli does not connect with a flick
ashish reddy to de villiers, 1 run, tucked away to deep midwicket
sharma to kohli, 1 run, tucked around the corner towards deep midwicket for one
henriques to de villiers, 1 run, ab charges out and flat-bats it to long-off
sharma to watson, 1 wide, fired down leg, wide
mustafizur rahman to de villiers, no run, ab walks a long way across off for a scoop and falls on the floor. mustafiz should have nailed the stumps down. he pushes this down leg
watson to dhawan, four runs, width outside off, that's the release for dhawan. he does not move his feet, but flays a drive through backward point
milne to dhawan, 1 run, banged in outside off, dhawan stays back and rides it to third man

parvez rasool to dhawan, out, and he takes out the off stump and takes down dhawan. rasool wheels away in celebration. pushed through and straightens on off. dhawan hangs back, plays inside the line. pokes and misses
parvez rasool to warner, 1 run, warner backs away and pushes it to the off side
parvez rasool to henriques, no run, slides on flat, 96ks, jabbed to midwicket
parvez rasool to henriques, no run, flat dart, skids on, turned to midwicket
parvez rasool to warner, no run, warner steps away outside leg, rasool follows him with another fast fizzer - 101ks - warner jams it back to the bowler
patel to henriques, 1 wide, harshal's radar goes wonky, slips it miles down leg. good work from jadhav
chahal to henriques, 1 run, slider outside off, hacked to the covers
chahal to warner, 2 runs, skiddy and flat on the stumps, jabbed wide of midwicket. warner hares back for the second
chahal to henriques, 1 run, henriques steps out, legbreak outside off, reaches out and chops it past the covers
chahal to ojha, 1 wide, fired wide outside off
chahal to hooda, 1 wide, legbreak dangled wide outside off, this time the batsman does not chase
chahal to ashish reddy, 1 run, lobbed up on off, chipped over the non-striker
parvez rasool to ashish reddy, no run, slider outside off, chops and misses
parvez rasool to ashish reddy, four runs, slides on outside off, swings hard and toe-ends it to the third man fence
chahal to ashish reddy, no run, looped up and spins away outside off, 69ks, cross-batted swipe meets with thin air
chahal to ashish reddy, no run, loopier and outside off, slashes and under-edges it. jadhav can't catch it. tough chance
parvez rasool to morgan, 1 run, morgan steps out and drags a flat ball to deep midwicket
milne to sharma, no run,
southee to gambhir, no run, not a bad line but gambhir walks across and makes it a leg side-ish delivery. his nudge finds square leg.
southee to gambhir, 1 wide, strays too much in line this time and he'll have to re-bowl that. wide down the leg side
southee to gambhir, 1 run, dabs the last ball down to third man to get off the mark. a tidy over from southee.
southee to uthappa, 1 run, good run. uthappa taps a good delivery down towards cover. all are on the circle and the pair get through for a comfortable run
mcclenaghan to gambhir, 1 run, too straight and shovelled away to deep square leg
southee to gambhir, 1 run, better from gg. tip and run cricket. plays one down by his feet, towards point and gets a positive response from pandey
mcclenaghan to pandey, no run, slower ball, 132 kph. or a slowish ball, i guess. pandey backs away and slaps to point. did not quite time it well enough.
pandya to gambhir, 1 run, good chnage in pace.  a slower delivery outside off, grips in the wicket a touch. gambhir pushes to point and sets off.
harbhajan singh to gambhir, 1 run, fired in on off, tucked away to square leg. six singles off the over. kkr biding their time
suchith to pandey, 2 runs, two for pandey. slow on middle and leg, suchith goes for a hoick but gets some bat on it to fine leg
suchith to pandey, 1 wide, flat down leg, wide called
suchith to gambhir, 1 run, slowish this time, too slow, lots of time for gg to rock back and work to square leg.

harbhajan singh to pandey, six runs, massive. six all the way, never in doubt. harbhajan offers a bit of loop, the first time he has to pandey and pays for it. hammered over midwicket for a massive hit

harbhajan singh to gambhir, 2 runs, nudged away towards square leg, soft hands and placement imperative to two and gambhir does that excellently. southee picks up and fires a throw on the bounce but gambhir makes it. nice running.
harbhajan singh to gambhir, no run, flat delivery on middle and leg, gambhir misses a routine flick. maybe late on it due to the fatigue of last ball's second run
suchith to pandey, 2 runs, flat on middle, wristily flicked away to deep midwicket. harbhajan labours across and sticks out a boot

suchith to gambhir, six runs, just over deep midwicket for six. but that was all in his favour. a bit of air from suchith on middle, gambhir comes down, hitting with the spin and smashes the ball. not all of it but enough
suchith to gambhir, 1 run, flat on off, driven to long-off
mcclenaghan to gambhir, 1 run, fifty for gambhir, a classy innings after an uncomfortable start. slower delivery outside off and dabbed to third man. raucous applause from the eden crowd and why not
mcclenaghan to pandey, 1 run, 140 kph, tight on off but pandey scurries away from the line to find third man with a steer.

bumrah to pandey, four runs, very intentionally played from pandey. impressive batting this. a slower ball outside off, pandey waits and waits and then just steers the ball off the open face to the third man boundary.
bumrah to pandey, 1 run, another slower ball on middle, pushed back so straight that it hits the stumps at the bowler's end. goes through with the run off the ricochet to get to his fifty
bumrah to gambhir, no run, slower delivery again outside off, played away towards point

harbhajan singh to gambhir, 2 runs, fantastic placement required a fantastic bit of fielding from pandya. flat outside off, drilled to wide long-off, pandya needed to put in the dive and did to fruition
harbhajan singh to gambhir, 1 run, slowed up on middle and leg, gambhir is unable to get under it, to deep square leg
harbhajan singh to russell, 1 run, flat outside off, fired in. patted towards point for one
southee to russell, 1 wide, very slow delivery outside off, too wide, called
bumrah to gambhir, 2 runs, oh no, oh no. dropped. eden goes mad. slower ball on off, gambhir is too early through the shot. goes straight up and bumrah settles under it but spills the sitter.
bumrah to gambhir, 1 run, in the air again, and falls in no-man's land. losing his shape through these hits. did not carry anywhere, over the bowler for a run
pandya to pathan, 1 run, slower ball, deceives pathan, but he gets some part of his bat on it to square leg
bumrah to munro, 1 run, another one. munro comes down but can't do much. toe-ended away to cover.
hastings to patel, 1 wide, a sound as the ball passed the pad but the umpire calls wide. strays down leg and parthiv misses his flick. may have been a bit of pad
hastings to patel, 1 run, tight lines on off, steered down to third man
hogg to patel, 1 run, slow on middle, cleverly pushed to mid-on for one
hogg to sharma, 1 run, flat but leg side-ish, tucked to wide square leg for one
chawla to sharma, 1 run, nicely bowled. slow but straight and it skids on, rohit is forced to bring out his defensive technique, a thick inside edge gets him one
chawla to pandya, 1 run, flat on middle and off, pushed to midwicket
kuldeep yadav to sharma, no run, flat on off, pushed back.
chawla to sharma, no run, flat on off, a thick inside edge from rohit onto his pad
kuldeep yadav to pandya, no run, fired in on off, pummeled back at kuldeep who does well
kuldeep yadav to pandya, 5 wides, uh oh, kuldeep and uthappa done by pandya. pandya backs away and kuldeep follows him, but it is too wide down leg. uthappa can't collect
kuldeep yadav to sharma, no run, slow through the air on middle and leg, pushed back
chawla to mcclenaghan, no run, flat outside off, mm shuffles across and goes for a big swipe. straight to midwicket
chawla to mcclenaghan, six runs, that's why he has been sent out. backs away and lofts it over long-off. not a bad delivery at all, wideish outside off
kuldeep yadav to mcclenaghan, no run, flat and fast outside off, very quick. mcclenaghan misses.
hastings to sharma, 1 run, driven to cover for a quick single.
hastings to buttler, no run, what happened there? banged in mid-pitch and it stops in the surface, buttler pops it back on the bounce to hastings
hogg to sharma, 1 run, flat on middle and leg, rohit goes back to turn the strike over, finds deep midwicket

hastings to buttler, no run, dropped. won't be surprised if hastings has done some damage to his finger. slower delivery on middle, buttler backs away, picks the variation and blugdeons it back to hastings who can't hold on. very hard chance but kkr needed that desperately
negi to vohra, no run, driven to cover

negi to vohra, 2 runs, out, dropped by a rickety-looking zaheer running back from cover, but the recovery is good enough that delhi capitalise on a run-out chance. vijay was looking for that extra cover loft again, but negi foxes him by holding the ball back. the batsman seemed to be reaching for it, the ball skewed up off the outside edge. zaheer couldn't make the most of the opportunity, but a mix-up between the two batsman offers another one and this time delhi do not miss. karun nair the man with a throw, and it zoomed in right at the base of the stumps for the wicketkeeper to do the rest
khan to marsh, no run, slower ball on off stump, marsh blocks it down the pitch
mishra to maxwell, no run, out comes the wrong'un again. maxwell did not pick it. stayed deep in his crease to read it off the pitch, but his hands weren't quick enough with the flick to make contact
yadav to saha, no run, moves back and drills a flatter delivery from outside off to midwicket
yadav to patel, 1 run, flatter delivery on middle and off, tucked towards midwicket
yadav to johnson, 2 runs, now he gets turn. the outside edge skirts away past slip and to third man. dipped on the left-hander
yadav to johnson, no run, stays back and blocks a flatter delivery on middle
yadav to sharma, no run, moves around the stumps, jayant bowls the one that goes on with the arm. mohit gets an outside edge to point

khan to sharma, out, that's gone so high, but morris looked perfectly comfortable getting under it. mohit simply goes for a big hit. just a big swing of the arms. the ball skews off the outside half and is then in the hands of the man at mid-off
patel to samson, 1 run, driven to long-off
patel to de kock, four runs, lashed over point. width and that's what de kock thrives on. the minute he sees something outside off, he knows he will capitalise
johnson to samson, 1 run,
sahu to de kock, no run, goes back again, but this time sahu tightens his line and lands it on off stump

sahu to de kock, 4 byes, should have been stumped! sahu has bowled a beauty, tossed it up to drag the batsman outside his crease. de kock goes for a flick, but the ball dips and turns between his bat and pad. saha didn't keep his eyes on the ball, and he didn't even react as the ball zipped past his right
patel to de kock, no run,
patel to de kock, no run,
sahu to samson, no run,
sahu to samson, 1 run, tossed it up, samson liked that, runs down the pitch and drills it to long-off
sharma to samson, 1 wide, banged into the middle of the deck and it soars over the batsman's head. too far over to interest the batsman, but the umps catch on
maxwell to samson, no run, pushed into the covers
maxwell to samson, 1 run, comes down the track and drives to long-off
morkel to warner, 1 wide, leg-side wide
morkel to warner, 1 wide, morne slides another one down leg

morkel to dhawan, out, morne generates typical extra bounce. uthappa pouches a smart catch. they check for a no-ball again. morne has corrected his error. he is okay here and finds some redemption. dug in and angled away outside off, dug in further as dhawan danced out. he slashes again and the thick edge flies to uthappa, leaping to his left. he comes down with the ball in one hand
ut yadav to morgan, no run, too wide outside off, left alone
shakib al hasan to morgan, no run, straight roller on middle, pushed back to the bowler
shakib al hasan to morgan, no run, morgan steps away outside leg, shakib follows him, played back
narine to ojha, 1 run, lobbed up outside off, no turn, driven to long-off

narine to morgan, 1 run, slides on outside off, morgan targets the leg side with a flick and the leading edge drops at the point region. russell runs across from backward point but can't track the catch
narine to ojha, no run, run towards point off the face of the bat
narine to ojha, no run, this is pushed flatter, skids off the deck, chopped hurriedly to cover
narine to morgan, no run, darted outside off, turns away, chopped to point
chawla to ojha, no run, controlled legbreak outside off, bunted towards point
chawla to ojha, 3 runs, floated and heading down leg, tickling fine on the leg side. narine gives in the chase, boots the ball in, before going over the ad boards
narine to ojha, no run, knuckle ball, skids on outside off, no turn with extra bounce, chopped to point
shakib al hasan to morgan, no run, pushed through outside off, flat-batted back to shakib
morkel to ashish reddy, 1 run, played down to third man for one
kumar to uthappa, no run, big awayswinger, lures uthappa into a drive. the ball passes the outside edge
sharma to gambhir, 1 run, tucked from an off-stump line to midwicket
henriques to gambhir, 1 wide, sprays this wide outside off
henriques to gambhir, 1 run, looks like a slower ball outside off, 113ks, forced down to long-off
henriques to uthappa, 1 run, too straight in line, glanced through backward square leg
sharma to gambhir, 1 run, squirted through backward square leg off the inside half
mustafizur rahman to uthappa, 1 wide, leg-side wide
ashish reddy to uthappa, no run, slower ball, grips in the pitch, turns and bounces past the outside edge. uthappa can't tickle it fine on the off side
mustafizur rahman to gambhir, 2 runs, width outside off, gambhir sizes it up and crashes it past the covers
mustafizur rahman to pandey, 3 runs, offuctter with extra bounce, poked into the off side. there is some miscommunication between the wickets. they end up with three, thanks to the ricochet
ashish reddy to gambhir, four runs, veering down the leg side, glanced away. rubbish ball with fine leg in the ring
ashish reddy to gambhir, 1 run, another of those slower balls outside off, gambhir targets the leg side and slices it to the of side
sran to gambhir, 1 wide, slid down the leg side, wide
sran to gambhir, 1 run, slower ball outside off, does not arrive. slapped to cover. gambhir sets off for a quick single. he is struggling. he gives up. dhawan had only a stump to aim. he misses
kumar to gambhir, 1 run, banged in outside off, swatted to deep midwicket
kumar to gambhir, 1 run, slower lifter outside off, helped to long leg
kumar to pandey, no run, slower ball on middle, nudged to midwicket
sharma to gambhir, four runs, gambhir finishes it off with a clean four. down the track and goes over mid-on
khan to de villiers, four runs, he is definitely looking for the inswinger to the right-hander, but zak's thrown this too far wide of off stump. lashed over point
morris to kohli, no run, some shape into the right-hander, but morris fails to pitch it. kohli seems to be generous. blocks it back to the bowler
morris to de villiers, no run, blocks towards mid-on and sets off, but for once kohli is not interested in taking the fielder's arm on.
morris to kohli, 1 run, makes him leap to get on top of the bounce, then kohli's soft hands take over. run down to third man

negi to kohli, 1 run, yes, there is some grip in this pitch. negi pitches a flatter delivery on off stump and gets it to turn substantially. kohli was backing away, and ends up having to reach for the ball. chopped through the covers
mishra to kohli, 1 run, whipped away through midwicket
negi to de villiers, 1 run, jumps back as soon as he sees the flatter trajectory and drills it through the covers
negi to de villiers, 1 run, a simple single to long-off results in a breaking of the sound barrier as the crowd stands up to applaud another skillful fifty from ab de villiers
negi to de villiers, no run, again, a little slower than normal. tosses it up on middle and off, ab was down the track and can only defend
negi to kohli, 1 run, pushed into the extra cover region
brathwaite to watson, 1 run, tailing in on middle and leg, nudged behind square leg. watson seemingly has a bat without a sponsor...

mohammed shami to kohli, 1 run, turned to deep square leg for the single he needs to complete a second successive fifty.. joins ab in that regard tonight. there's plenty of overs left and kohli seems to defy all notion of the human body's frailties. he is so fit

brathwaite to watson, four runs, drifts down leg again and watson directs it to the long leg boundary. this never-ending batting line-up is going to force a few bowlers to rethink their chosen discipline

brathwaite to watson, 1 run, excellent bowling. that was only 90 kph, and it was directed away from watson's reach. brathwaite made that decision the minute he saw watson moving leg side. toe-end wanders into the covers

mohammed shami to watson, six runs, that was mistimed! shami defeats watson with a slower ball, and yet goes for maximum. the batsman was moving away from the line and ends up hitting it off the very bottom of the bat
aravind to iyer, 1 wide, shifts his line wider, a little too wide. iyer leaves and the umpire signals wide

watson to de kock, 1 run, gets down the track, but the slower ball forces all the timing away from him. possibly why he slugged the ball legside. bat face turned on impact and he went through with the shot. single to mid-on
parvez rasool to samson, 1 run, driven past the diving midwicket fielder. aravind was moving to his left, and it would probably have still not stopped the single
chahal to nair, 1 run, just straightened after pitching, which is why nair's backfoot flick shot through midwicket takes the leading edge instead and goes through cover

wiese to nair, no run, nair came down the track, mistimes a lash through the off side. ends up going back to the bowler and making de kock lunge back within the crease. wiese grins at the awkward effort

chahal to nair, no run, superb bowling. looped it up and slowed it down. knows the right-hander would be set up outside leg to try and gain all the room he can. in the end he has too much. play and miss
chahal to nair, 1 wide, lets it go, and nair, who has cottoned onto the tactic, lets it go and collects the extra

patel to nair, six runs, he is playing a blinder! lifts it over the bowler's head with such panache. the ability to play that shot in a big run-chase which can still swing around. daredevils have risen to the occasion
kumar to patel, no run, poor delivery, started the outswinger too wide and it carried on, right into parthiv's slot. thrashed away to backward point where it is excellently stopped by morgan
kumar to rayudu, no run, tight end from bhuvi. he has conceded just four off his two. around off stump without much swing but defended with the open face to point
sran to patel, 1 wide, slower ball but badly directed, well down leg
henriques to rayudu, no run, swing for moises. outswing. rayudu shimmies down and drives the ball back to the bowler after yorking himself
henriques to rayudu, 1 run, slower delivery, pace off the ball. 115 kph. steered to third man with the open face
mustafizur rahman to rayudu, 1 run, chopped into the off side
henriques to sharma, no run, slower delivery at 110 kph on off, driven to mid-off
bipul sharma to buttler, no run, slowed up really nicely, a touch of spin. defended
bipul sharma to rayudu, no run, quicker and flatter this time, defended
henriques to buttler, no run, nice shape on that drive. a bit of inward movement on middle and off, buttler drives delectably but finds mid-off
bipul sharma to rayudu, 1 run, flatter on middle and leg, goes on with the arm. flicked to deep midwicket
sran to buttler, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, buttler shuffled across but driven to mid-off for one. warner hurries but can't prevent the single

sran to buttler, out, oh no, what a way to go. strangled down leg. a poor delivery down leg, and buttler tries to help it on its way to fine leg, but is too late on it. the ball kisses the glove and naman takes a good catch. mumbai in serious trouble.
sran to kh pandya, 1 run, 132 kph, on middle and leg, and flicked away to deep square leg for one
bipul sharma to kh pandya, 1 run, slowed up on middle and leg, hit to deep midwicket with a wristy flick
bipul sharma to rayudu, 1 run, fired in on off, rayudu stays back and forehands to deep midwicket
sran to hh pandya, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, hardik is way too early into the drive, edges one to third man
southee to dhawan, 2 runs, a bit of width and slapped through point for a couple
mcclenaghan to warner, no run, looks to force it through the off side again. gets on top of his toes and muscles a drive to mid-off

southee to warner, 1 run, dropped. but what an effort from rohit sharma. slow delivery on off, warner is deceived and through the stroke too early, lobs it to wide mid-off where rohit dives but cannot hold on to the one-handed special
harbhajan singh to warner, no run, and again, a repeat. fired in on middle and leg, smashed to extra cover
harbhajan singh to warner, 1 wide, was that a missed opportunity? slower down leg, warner misses and over balances. parthiv cannot collect, very hard chance
bumrah to henriques, 1 run, that slingy action takes the ball on middle and leg, whipped off to square leg
bumrah to warner, no run, slower delivery on off, played out
harbhajan singh to henriques, no run, flatter delivery on middle, pushed back

hh pandya to henriques, no run, the keeper went up straight away, the bowler too was very vociferous. the ump silenced it quickly enough. there seemed to be a noise, but it came almost after the ball passed the bat. henriques was looking to force the ball away with a closed face. too much bounce, and the ball seamed back in to refuse him the leverge he wanted. snicko says there wasn't contact with the bat
hh pandya to warner, 1 run,
harbhajan singh to warner, 1 run, slashed through the covers as bhajji tosses one up outside off
southee to warner, 1 run, slower delivery on middle, 121 kph. chopped behind point for one
hh pandya to morgan, no run, slower variation on off and middle, played away back to the bowler
hh pandya to morgan, 1 run, another slower delivery, but poor line. tucked to square leg
hh pandya to warner, 1 run, another slower one, tight - on middle. nudged to midwicket
southee to warner, 1 leg bye,
hh pandya to hooda, 1 run, slower delivery on off, tapped to point
hh pandya to warner, 1 run, slower delivery on off, pushed to long-off. warner may not need to take a risk at all
mcclenaghan to warner, no run,
morkel to vijay, 1 run, tucks it towards mid-on for a quick single
ut yadav to vijay, 1 run, closes the bat face early, the ball shapes away late, gets a leading edge over the vacant gully region
ut yadav to vohra, 2 runs, not entirely off the middle, but a lucky break for vohra. looked to work it past midwicket, got a leading edge, just eluded the cover fielder
ut yadav to vohra, 1 run, turned to mid-on for a quick single
shakib al hasan to vohra, no run, drifting in from round the stumps, pushed to cover
shakib al hasan to vohra, 1 wide, skids back in, but down leg side, good take by uthappa
shakib al hasan to vijay, four runs, classic vijay punch. just a hint of width, and it was enough for him to find the gap between cover and point
shakib al hasan to vijay, no run, nearly through. played outside the line of the ball, perhaps for the turn when it straightened
morkel to vohra, 2 runs, extra bounce this time on middle, vohra whips it uppishly towards deep square leg
morkel to vijay, 1 run, slower one on middle and leg, 130kph, turns it towards square leg
shakib al hasan to vijay, 1 run, drifting into middle and leg, whipped to deep midwicket, vijay wanted the second, marsh wasn't keen
shakib al hasan to vijay, 1 run, eased wide of square leg, slight misfield there by umesh, but he recovers well
morkel to marsh, no run, looks to force that behind point, into the stroke a little too late, mistimed to the fielder there
narine to vijay, 1 run, whipped to square leg, this one was pushed through quicker again
narine to marsh, no run, accurate stuff. this one was quicker on middle, pushed back to the bowler
narine to marsh, 1 run, steps out and eases it down to long-off
chawla to saha, 1 run, leading edge towards point for a single. bounce on offer on that occasion
narine to saha, 2 runs, punished this time, but there's a boundary rider in the form of yusuf pathan at deep point. saha rocked back, opened the face slightly to put that past a diving gambhir
narine to saha, 1 wide, sliding down leg, good take by uthappa. saha missed a faint tickle
narine to saha, 1 run, eased past the bowler to mid-on.
chawla to saha, no run, steps out and drives, but a good stop by chawla on his followthrough
chawla to miller, no run, looks to work it with the spin, defended
chawla to miller, 1 wide, skids across, but far too wide outside off
chawla to miller, 1 run, tucked wide of square lwg
chawla to marsh, no run, cracked off the backfoot, excellent stop at cover
chawla to marsh, four runs, too much width, this time he finds the gap at deep point. he gave it a proper thwack. poor end to the over from chawla
pathan to maxwell, 1 wide, fires one down leg, maxwell lets it go
shakib al hasan to marsh, no run, pushed through quicker on middle, pushed to midwicket
shakib al hasan to marsh, 1 run, whipped off his hip to deep square leg
narine to maxwell, 1 run, swung across the line, toe-ends it towards deep midwicket
shakib al hasan to marsh, no run, pushed through quicker on middle, defended
ut yadav to patel, 1 run, starts off with a slower one on off stump, pushed to long-off

ut yadav to marsh, 1 run, would have been an outstanding catch on his followthrough. marsh turns the bat face early as he looks to turn it to the on side, the ball was dying on umesh, who almost got his hands on that one as he was diving to his left
ut yadav to marsh, 1 run, whipped to square leg, it was going to be a risky single, yusuf has a shy at the stumps at the striker's end, sahu would have been gone had he hit
ut yadav to abbott, 2 runs, tucked towards the man running in from deep midwicket, easy two
ut yadav to abbott, no run, stands tall and plays it with soft hands back down the pitch
russell to marsh, 1 run, hit towards point, straight to the fielder. a metre on side and it was four

russell to abbott, 3 runs, hit towards suryakumar yadav who comes charging in, the misfield allows the second. in an attempt to recover quickly, he fires a casual throw at the non-striker's end which russell fails to collect cleanly.  lets the ball deflect off the stumps, by which time they sneaked in another. so what should have been one, turned out to be three. preity zinta, the kxip owner, also saw the funny side of that
sandeep sharma to gambhir, 1 run, gets on top of the bounce and glides it down to third man to get of the mark
abbott to gambhir, 1 run, hops across the stumps and whips it down to fine leg
abbott to gambhir, 1 run, straight to square leg, but they still get a single. poor fielding there by axar

abbott to uthappa, four runs, width on offer and crunched between cover and the diving point fielder. he will pick those away all day. on this outfield, once it beat the 30-yard circle, there was no stopping it
sandeep sharma to uthappa, 2 runs, good wrist work again to pick the gap on the leg side, the man at deep square had to run around to stop that
abbott to gambhir, 1 run, played back down the pitch, abbott casually lets the ball go, not realising a run was on offer there, gambhir is aware of the possibility and gets across quickly
abbott to gambhir, 1 run, hops across and turns it towards deep square
sharma to gambhir, 1 run, steered wide of point

sharma to uthappa, no run, deflects off mohit's hand to miller at mid-on, gambhir thought it would go wide of the fielder there and took off for the run, was more than halfway down the pitch when he was sent back. gambhir had given up. a direct hit and he would have been gone. everything going kkr's way

sharma to uthappa, four runs, he's riding on luck here. this one swung away late, uthappa looked to work it towards the on side, but got a thick edge past the diving wriddiman saha. had there been a first slip fielder, it would have lodged right into his hands without him having to move an inch
sharma to uthappa, 1 run, tapped towards point for a quick single
patel to uthappa, 1 run, whipped wide of vohra at mid-on, axar is too predictable here. just firing them in
sahu to gambhir, 1 run, starts off with a wrong-un which gambhir picks off the hands, taps it wide of point
sahu to uthappa, 1 run, eased wide of cover for an easy single, yet another fifty for uthappa applause from the dug out.  third fastest fifty this season, off just 24 balls
sahu to gambhir, 1 run, turned to deep square
maxwell to gambhir, no run,
sahu to gambhir, 1 run, driven uppishly, down to long-off
maxwell to pandey, 1 run, gets onto the backfoot and turns it towards deep square leg

maxwell to gambhir, 2 runs, sliding into middle and leg, nurdled towards deep square leg, the fielder in the deep was late to get off the blocks., fires a good throw, but gambhir was well in. third umpire called for, but no real danger there
maxwell to gambhir, 1 run, turned wide of midwicket
sahu to gambhir, 1 run, spins back into middle and leg, played wide of square leg
sahu to gambhir, 2 runs, steps out and squeezes it into the gap at deep cover, didn't get it off the middle, the bat face turned in his hand as he made contact with the ball
sahu to gambhir, no run, outstanding stop by marsh, throwing himself to his left to save four runs
sharma to pandey, four runs, what punch! stands tall and punches it between cover and mid-off. miller gives it chase, but he had no chance
sahu to shakib al hasan, no run, hit hard, straight back to the bowler, good stop

patel to pandey, out, beats him with a straighter one. this one drifts back in from round the stumps, pandey plays for the turn and looks to drive, but the ball holds its line. once he missed, it was headed to hit middle of middle. muted celebration in the kxip camp.
patel to sa yadav, no run, pushed to cover
patel to shakib al hasan, no run, chops one to point
patel to shakib al hasan, 1 run, steps out and eases it to long-off
patel to sa yadav, no run, pushed back to the bowler
sharma to shakib al hasan, no run, slower one on off stump, driven to cover
patel to pathan, 1 run, driven to long-off

abbott to pathan, 2 runs, slapped past point, back for the second easily, a better throw from vohra and he may have been in trouble. yusuf turned at the non-striker's end with his back to the ball. turned blind

abbott to pathan, four runs, helped into the fine leg boundary. easy picking those. had 'hit me' written all over it. tried to camp him for room by trying to bowl into his rib cage, ended up drifting it down leg, helped on its way
abbott to pathan, four runs, thumped past the diving mid-on fielder. tried to play the double bluff, but yusuf was up to the task.
harbhajan singh to kohli, 1 wide, fired in flat and wide outside off. a touch too wide, and kohli doesn't even attempt a shot
kh pandya to de villiers, 1 run, a bit slower and loopier on middle stump, swept to deep square leg
hh pandya to kohli, no run, slower ball on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
kh pandya to head, 5 wides, oh my. that's fired in round-arm, a looooong way down the leg side, and it beats parthiv diving like a goalkeeper
mcclenaghan to head, no run, slower ball outside off, beats the attempted leg-side swat
watson to rayudu, 1 wide, looks to bowl wide and make the batsman hit to deep point again, but this time the line is too far outside off, and the umpire signals wide as rayudu leaves it alone
southee to iyer, 1 wide, slides down the leg side
southee to samson, 1 wide, bumper down leg, sails over the ducking batsman. parthiv leaps and takes it. wide called
kh pandya to samson, no run, slides in with the arm, beats the flick, and hits the pad
kh pandya to samson, 1 run, the batsman steps out and moves away, krunal is wary of it. he follows him and fires it. he aims to flick and gets an inside edge to leg
kh pandya to iyer, 1 wide, darted down leg, wide
kh pandya to duminy, 1 run, slides on outside off, patted through the covers
kh pandya to samson, 1 run, speared on middle and leg, tucked through square leg
kh pandya to samson, 1 run, krunal tosses one up for a change, flicked through square leg
harbhajan singh to samson, 1 run, slid through on off, dabbed towards point
pollard to duminy, 1 run,
bumrah to samson, no run, samson steps out, bumrah bowls a 113ks slower ball outside off and dupes the batsman. he flicks early and misses
bumrah to negi, 1 wide, slid down leg, wide
bumrah to negi, 1 run, slower ball on middle, with extra bounce, dabbed on the pitch for one
mcclenaghan to negi, 1 wide, negi swings his bat again, but can't connect. mm spears it wide outside off
negi to sharma, 2 runs, slider outside off, inside edged past the off stump, beating the keeper
mishra to sharma, 2 runs, straight in line, turned behind square. they hare across for the second
mishra to sharma, no run, slides on off, patted to cover
imran tahir to rayudu, 1 run, fired outside off, driven to long-off
imran tahir to rayudu, no run, pushed through on off, run away to point
imran tahir to rayudu, no run, legbreak outside off, tapped to point
mishra to rayudu, 1 run, down the track and laced to long-off
mishra to sharma, 1 run, slider on middle, nudged to midwicket
imran tahir to sharma, 1 run, slider on middle, flicked to deep midwicket
imran tahir to kh pandya, 2 runs, fired outside off, flayed to the right of negi at long-off for a couple
imran tahir to sharma, no run, lobbed up on off, squirted to backward point
mishra to pollard, no run, flat on middle, pushed back to the bowler
morris to pollard, 1 wide, morris aims a slower ball and slides it down leg
kumar to marsh, no run, another awayswinger that starts around legstump and ends up around the fifth or sixth stump outside off. banana swing. marsh shoulders arms
hooda to marsh, 1 run, driven with the spin to mid-off
hooda to vohra, no run, superb stop off his own bowling. vohra is yorked, squeezes it back towards the bowler, who dives to his right to prevent the single

sran to vohra, 2 runs, uses the pace of the bowler and angles it down to mustafizur at third man, excellent running between the wickets. marsh had just turned when vohra was halfway down the pitch for the second. vohra was running to the danger end

mustafizur rahman to vohra, no run, superb stop off his own bowling, it was played back down the pitch, mustafizur perhaps surprised vohra with his instincts, fired a throw at the striker's end too, but it was wide
mustafizur rahman to miller, no run, drives and misses. it wasn't there for him to play the shot, got his bat to the ball half-heartedly.  wicket maiden for sunrisers
hooda to marsh, 1 run, mistimes a drive wide of cover
hooda to miller, no run, bunted to cover, there's a bit of grip for the spinners here
hooda to miller, 1 run, drops it with soft hands towards point for a quick single, tare, a regular wicketkeeper, was a touch late to react
henriques to miller, 1 run, flicked wide of midwicket for a quick single
henriques to miller, 1 run, width on offer, crunched to morgan at deep point
henriques to marsh, 1 run, driven to mid-off for a quick single
hooda to marsh, no run, skidder on middle from round the stumps, pushed to point
henriques to marsh, no run, misses the dab towards third man
sran to marsh, 1 run, sliding into middle and leg, tucked to fine leg
sran to naik, 1 run, hops back and turns it to square leg
sran to marsh, no run, squared up by the late nip away from middle, point fielder is in business to stop that defensive shot
sran to naik, 1 run, back-of-the-hand slower one on middle and leg, nurdled to square leg
henriques to marsh, 1 run, he's nailed that, but one bounce to the man at deep midwicket
henriques to naik, no run, hops back to wrist it to midwicket
henriques to naik, no run, steps out to hit through the line, struck well, but henriques is up to the task on his followthrough
hooda to marsh, no run, nearly yorked himself, dug back to the bowler

mustafizur rahman to marsh, no run, driven firmly to mid-off, naik at the non-striker's end was flirting with the possibility of a run until he was sent back and had to face a fiery throw. he was airborne, a direct hit and he was gone
henriques to naik, 1 run, gets a thick inside edge towards square leg
henriques to naik, 1 run, dabbed with soft hands towards point

mustafizur rahman to naik, 1 run, chance for a run-out at cover, but they somehow got through. dhawan decided not to throw, perhaps he thought it was pointless considering mustafizur wasn't at the crease
kumar to patel, 1 run, hit hard towards long-off
kumar to patel, 1 run, toe-ends another swipe to long-off
sran to naik, 1 run, struck hard, but warner's slide and stop at long-off has saved them three runs. the release and the powerful throw completed a magical piece of work on the field
sran to naik, 1 run, struck hard, warner in business again at long-off
sran to patel, 1 run, swung across the line, the ball was tailing into middle, squeezes it to deep midwicket
kumar to patel, 1 run, top work by tare at point, cleverly done by axar who squeezed it with an angled bat there

mustafizur rahman to naik, out, he made it look ridiculously easy. this one was skewed high into the nightsky over mid-on, henriques was running back, but didn't lose sight of the ball as he covered good ground, kept his composure and focus even as it swirled in the air for a long time, before completing the catch. he wasn't on the move when the catch lodged into his bucket-like hands. mighty impressive. another wicket for mustafizur
sandeep sharma to dhawan, no run, shapes away from outside off, was there for the drive, but dhawan let that go instead
sandeep sharma to dhawan, 1 run, hops back and runs it down to third man for an easy single, looking a lot more comfortable at the crease.
sandeep sharma to warner, no run, and that man at cover point is in business immediately
abbott to dhawan, no run, mistimes a drive to cover
abbott to warner, 1 run, late on the shot, the ball nips back in sharply to take the edge and roll towards third man.  bounced over his waist on that occasion

abbott to dhawan, no run, nearly chops it back onto the stumps. drives, but played outside the line of the ball, the inside edge bounced over leg stump. dhawan realised it was a mistake and quickly played a shadow stroke to show himself how it ought to be done
abbott to dhawan, four runs, width, and punished. free swing of the arms to crunch that past cover point. generated tremendous bat speed as he made contact
sandeep sharma to warner, no run, good stop by sandeep on his followthrough, is getting the ball to swing away late
sandeep sharma to warner, four runs, whipped behind square, just using the bowler's pace to ease it into the gap. poor from sandeep sharma
abbott to dhawan, 1 run, goes back into the crease and angles it down to square third man
abbott to warner, 1 run, bunts it down to third man

abbott to dhawan, 5 runs, looks to dab but is too close for comfort, just about manages to play it on the bounce towards the keeper, who fires a wide throw at the bowler's end. no one was backing up at mid-on. so what was to be just a run is now five. it simply sums up the mood in the kxip camp. disbelief, frustration.
abbott to warner, four runs, width, and smashed! he hasn't learnt, gives warner all the time in the world to rock back, free his arms and slap that  behind point. raining boundaries here
maxwell to dhawan, no run, floated outside off, jabbed to point
sharma to warner, 1 run, looks to go over midwicket, gets a thick inside edge towards wide mid-on
sharma to dhawan, no run, closer to the stumps this time, defended with soft hands to the leg side
sharma to warner, no run, ball gets big on him this time, fails to ramp it over the keeper's head
dhawan to warner, 1 run, uses the width to reach out and steer it down to third man
dhawan to dhawan, 1 run, stands tall and punches it to long-off
sharma to dhawan, no run, this one deviates back in from outside off, bunted to the off side
sharma to dhawan, no run, closer to the stumps and on middle, played back to the bowler
sharma to dhawan, no run, tight line, not much room to free his arms, pushed to cover
sharma to dhawan, 1 run, squeezed between cover and mid-off, went after that one but didn't get it off the middle
sharma to dhawan, no run, well disguised slower delivery on middle, played with soft hands
dhawan to warner, no run, width on offer, but can't pick the gap. warner struck that well, but straight to point
dhawan to warner, 1 wide, gets it wrong, around the seventh stump outside off, some exercise for the umpire
dhawan to warner, 2 runs, arches back and bunts it down to mohit at third man, the fielder took a couple of seconds to release the ball, by which time warner was through with the second
sandeep sharma to dhawan, no run, nips back into middle and leg, defended with soft hands
sandeep sharma to warner, 1 run, nurdled behind square on the leg side as they jog across

sandeep sharma to tare, out, chaos, confusion and a wicket. bonus for kxip. tare hit it to mid-off and took off for a single when there wasn't, dhawan didn't move an inch as the throw from miller was properly collected by naik who broke the stumps down at the striker's end. tare's desperate dive came after the stumps had been broken. lack of communication. not sure if dhawan and tare have batted together at all previously
maxwell to dhawan, 1 run, driven with the spin to long-off
maxwell to morgan, no run, firm drive, but a good stop at extra cover
maxwell to dhawan, 1 run, pushed through quicker on middle and leg, whipped off his hip to deep square
sandeep sharma to dhawan, no run, gets a thick inside edge onto the pad as it lobs in the air, sandeep, on his followthrough, was late to go for the catch. opportunity missed
sandeep sharma to dhawan, no run, mistimes a drive to mid-off, dhawan is trying to crunch there here
abbott to morgan, 1 run, slashes that one to third man
dhawan to morgan, no run, tucked to midwicket
dhawan to dhawan, no run,
patel to hooda, 1 run, grip and turn from middle, driven with the spin to long-off
patel to morgan, no run, poor ball, fires it way outside off, morgan lets it go
patel to morgan, 2 runs, flicked into the gap at deep midwicket, the two boundary riders there thought the other one was going for it
sharma to hooda, 1 wide, another attempted slower ball, this one slips down leg, goes on the bounce to the wicketkeeper
sharma to hooda, 2 runs, free flow of the bat to drive that towards deep cover, hooda's bat swing has been impressive. he hasn't looked to play the big shots, sensible

sharma to morgan, four runs, can't get too predictable in this format, it doesn't matter how many runs are left. there was no one at deep midwicket, and morgan picks that gap as he swings the slower ball into that direction. one bounce into the boundary
patel to ojha, 1 run, driven hard to wide long-off
patel to henriques, no run, this one's a slider on middle from round the stumps, tucked to midwicket
patel to henriques, 1 run, driven inside-out with the spin to long-off

patel to henriques, four runs, casually done, but very effective. chips down the track and flicks it with the angle over midwicket. make that three in a row for the orange army. this has been a comprehensive win
sandeep sharma to patel, no run, sweetly timed. closer to middle and tucked with use of the wrists, to midwicket.
patel to patel, no run, nurdled to square leg
patel to rayudu, 1 run, 101 kph, flat on middle and leg. played with the angle to square leg, who fumbles while diving
sandeep sharma to rayudu, 1 run, superb lines from sandeep today. very close to off, rayudu opens the face of the bat to glide to third man
johnson to patel, no run, good change in pace on off, slower delivery. parthiv is through the shot too early and lobs a catch to midwicket

johnson to patel, four runs, another slower delivery and four more. poor line. on leg and parthiv just helps it along, all the way to the backward square leg boundary. the square leg fielder should have been finer for parthiv
sharma to patel, 1 run, tight run. tapped to point and both set off immediately. shaun marsh gets a good bounce but can't hit the stumps at the batsman's end
sharma to rayudu, 1 run, another deft dab to third man for one
sharma to rayudu, 1 run, tight on off, glided to backward point
maxwell to rayudu, 1 run, nice start. slowish outside off, not much turn. dabbed to point with soft hands
sahu to patel, 1 run, played away to midwicket with the spin
patel to rayudu, 1 run, pushed quietly to long-off. another fifty for rayudu
patel to rayudu, 1 run, flat down leg, chipped to midwicket
sharma to patel, 2 runs, an uppish flick over midwicket for two. good batting. backed away, did not get the ball he wanted but still found some runs

sharma to patel, 1 run, no timing at all, but he gets to fifty in the most ungainliest of ways. walks across and bunts a flick on the bounce to deep square leg. did not look too pretty on that delivery
sharma to patel, 1 wide, this is too wide, down leg. parthiv misses a flick
patel to rayudu, six runs, lovely from rayudu, turning it on. no need for jos, no nee for pollard. flat and wide outside off, rayudu gets on one knee and flat-bats it over the bowler. six more
patel to patel, 1 run, flat on leg, nudged to deep midwicket
patel to patel, 1 run, another flat delivery to finish his spell. tickled to midwicket
sandeep sharma to buttler, 1 run, good delivery. intentionally looking for that wide tramline outside off, rather just inside that line. buttler reaches out and mis-times his drive to cover.

sharma to buttler, four runs, and again. not a bad delivery again, the slower delivery out of the back of the hand. but buttler shuffles across, shapes for the ramp, waits for the slower ball to come to him before helping it along over the keeper. easy.

sharma to buttler, out, excellent delivery. in all fairness, this has not been a bad over. another back of the hand slower ball on middle, buttler looks for a heave over midwicket but misses completely. since it is straight, the stumps are clattered. buttler's impressive cameo ends.
sharma to pollard, 2 runs, another slower one to finish. chipped past the bowler, to mid-on. pollard hurtles back for two. two completely different strides but they make it
johnson to pollard, 1 run, slower ball on leg, nudged to fine leg
sharma to pollard, no run, whoa, mighty swing but pollard was done, all ends up. the slower ball just misses off stump. another impressive dot ball

sharma to hh pandya, out, two in two for mohit. another slower delivery gets a wicket. pandya looks for a mow over midwicket. doesn't get much on it, a top edge is taken by miller, running in from cover i presume. another superb last over from mohit, he did the same against supergiants.
bumrah to vohra, 1 run, 132 kph to start from bumrah. that tight action, from wide of the crease, on middle and leg with the angle. whipped to square leg
bumrah to marsh, 1 run, slower delivery from around the wicket, 111 kph. tapped to point for a quick run
kh pandya to maxwell, no run, fired in on off to start. defended
kh pandya to marsh, 1 run, nudged to deep midwicket
harbhajan singh to maxwell, 1 run, flat on off, maxwell makes room and pushes wide of cover, good dive, another single
harbhajan singh to marsh, no run, lovely riposte. slower on middle, a hint of spin. defended
kh pandya to marsh, 1 run, darted in on leg, plucked off to deep square leg
harbhajan singh to maxwell, 1 run, quicker this time on off, maxwell opens the face to scythe to deep point
harbhajan singh to marsh, no run, 92 kph, quite quick on off, driven to cover
pollard to marsh, 1 run, 108 kph, slowish on off, tapped to point for one
pollard to maxwell, four runs, lucky boundary but maxwell will not care one bit. slower delivery outside off, 106 kph. maxwell gets an under-edge past the keeper.
pollard to maxwell, 1 run, very slow, finally pollard gets it straight. nurdled to midwicket. maxwell doing it nicely
