harbhajan singh to maxwell, four runs, superb shot from maxwell. he is rocking today, stemming from wonderful shot selection. like this one. backs away, makes room and drills a drive past cover. long-off has no chance
bumrah to marsh, 1 leg bye, slower ball on leg, marsh is surprised by the 115 kph variation. hit on the body, towards silly point. maxwell calls him through.
bumrah to marsh, 1 run, another slower delivery, follows the backing away marsh. swivel-flicked to square leg
bumrah to maxwell, 1 run, rather ugly, maybe for the first time today. looking for an across-the-line heave from outside off, a thick inside edge  to square leg
southee to maxwell, 1 run, looking for another, but too close to his body. not allowing maxi to get under it, either. inside edged onto the body, towards silly point for one
pollard to maxwell, 2 runs, slower delivery on off, nudged with soft hands to midwicket. miller scurries back for two. maxwell has fifty.
pollard to miller, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, mis-timed to long-off.

pollard to miller, six runs, gone for six. the slower ball on off, miller sets himself well and sends it sailing towards midwicket. krunal at the boundary sets himself but krunal leaps and parries it for six, looked to put it back in the field of play
mcclenaghan to miller, no run, through miller. without miller's stance, that was four stumps down leg, but miller backed away, looking to make room. through the feet
bumrah to miller, 2 runs, slower delivery on leg, miller too, has no idea and the ball pings off his hips to point. i'm not sure how miller has got back for the second
bumrah to miller, no run, another slower ball on middle, and miller misses again, bounces over
mcclenaghan to gambhir, no run, wide line outside off, tempts gambhir into his favourite steer to third man. poked off an outside edge to pollard at wide slip, the position arun was talking about
southee to gambhir, 1 run, slower ball at 122ks, some extra bounce on it, dupes gambhir. beats the attempted flick and hits the thigh
harbhajan singh to uthappa, 1 run,
harbhajan singh to sa yadav, 1 run, pushed across the right-hander, bunted to lon-off
kh pandya to sa yadav, no run, fired at 103ks, played back to the bowler
kh pandya to sa yadav, 1 run, slows this up on off, pushed to cover
harbhajan singh to gambhir, no run, dangled up on off, defended back to the bowler
bumrah to russell, no run, bumrah sucks pace off this, 114ks, blocked
southee to sa yadav, 1 run, surya steps outside leg, the bowler follows him. guided to third man
mcclenaghan to lynn, no run, lynn shuffles outside leg, mm chases the moving batsman and pings the pad
mcclenaghan to pathan, no run, swing and a miss outside off
bumrah to lynn, 2 runs, swung away to deep midwicket
bumrah to lynn, 2 runs, squirted to fine leg off an inside edge
bumrah to lynn, 1 run, slower ball outside off, dragged to deep midwicket
unadkat to sharma, no run, defended down the track this time by rohit
unadkat to sharma, 1 run, angling away outside off, guided down towards third man for a single
ut yadav to rayudu, 1 wide, slides it down leg
ut yadav to rayudu, no run, indipper at 146ks, rayudu is caught in a tangle. he camps back and manages an inside edge onto the pad
shakib al hasan to rayudu, no run, down the track and tucked to square leg. rayudu collides with uthappa
ut yadav to sharma, no run, turned to midwicket
ut yadav to rayudu, 1 wide, rayudu shuffles across off, umesh flings it down leg
ut yadav to rayudu, 1 run, down the track and flat-batted to mid-off, where gambhir fumbles and gifts a single
narine to sharma, 1 run, slid through on middle, drifts in a bit, tapped to midwicket
shakib al hasan to sharma, 1 run, floated on off and turns away, rohit slices a square-drive
shakib al hasan to rayudu, no run, rayudu goes deep in the crease, shakib held this back. rayudu nearly lobs it back to the bowler
narine to sharma, 1 run, nudged to the leg side for one
shakib al hasan to sharma, 1 run, slider on off, chopped to the covers
shakib al hasan to buttler, no run, buttler dances out again, shakib fizzes this through and raps the pad
narine to buttler, no run, slapped from outside off to cover russell makes a diving save
narine to buttler, no run, looped up and outside off, run away towards point
shakib al hasan to pollard, no run, slower through the air on middle, keeps pollard to a block
shakib al hasan to pollard, no run, round-armish ball on middle, pollard gets behind that in defence
sathish to pollard, 1 wide, slides it down leg, wide
sathish to pollard, 1 wide, spins another one down leg
narine to sharma, 1 run, offbreak, whipped to deep midwicket
narine to sharma, 1 run, loopier and outside off, caresses it down to long-off
unadkat to pollard, 1 wide, off-side wide
holder to samson, 1 wide, that is a poor line. much wider outside off and samson fishes again. but misses. too wide though
russell to samson, 1 run, too straight - on middle and leg. flicked away past square leg, mid-on runs around to clean up
narine to samson, no run, slowish on off, not too quick. not too much spin. defended back
hogg to nair, 1 run, much flatter outside off, nair stays back to punch to deep extra cover
hogg to billings, 1 run, flat again, wide outside off. billings plays with the little bit of turn, to deep midwicket.
chawla to billings, 2 runs, superb use of the feet, gets there and tucks to wide midwicket for two. picked the gap nicely too
hogg to nair, 1 run, another flatter trajectory delivery on leg, nudged to deep midwicket
holder to nair, 1 run, slower delivery on off, dabbed to third man. may be the first time i've seen pace off the ball today.
holder to nair, 1 run, another slower delivery on leg, nudged to deep midwicket
hogg to billings, six runs, six more. flat outside off, billings muscles the lofted drive over long-off for his first ipl fifty in his first game. wow, what ball striking.
russell to brathwaite, six runs, slower ball and thwacked over midwicket for a humongous hit. outside off and brathwaite drags the heave. huge huge striking this
russell to pant, no run, lovely change in pace. another slower ball outside off, pant is through the swat too early
khan to gambhir, no run, too straight again, a perfect line to the right-hander. gambhir walks across and flicks but misses. umpire erasmus doesn't call a wide
brathwaite to uthappa, 1 run, very slow on off, tapped to point for a quick single. well played

brathwaite to sa yadav, 5 no balls, another no ball. slips out of his hand and down leg. very dangerous but luckily, it wasn't straight. goes down leg and de kock can't collect either. five. a warning for brathwaite
brathwaite to uthappa, 1 run, flicked to deep midwicket
mishra to uthappa, 1 run, flat on off, uthappa goes back but punches back to the bowler. mishra fields but tries to run sathish out, who had backed out too far. misses the stumps and they'll get one
mishra to sathish, no run, nicely bowled. slow through the air on off, sathish defends solidly
brathwaite to uthappa, 1 run, slowish on off, flicked uppishly to deep square leg.
mishra to uthappa, 1 wide, flat, down leg, wide
mishra to russell, no run, flat again, skids on to russell who gets bat down on it, just in time. kept out
mohammed shami to russell, no run, lovely change in pace, slow delivery outside off. russell looks to heave over long-in with a massive swing. misses the off stump by not too much

mishra to uthappa, four runs, through the legs. how did he get that there? a very wide legbreak outside off, uthappa switch hits, but doesn't get there. he is through the shot but the back of his bat comes down late and he gets some bat on it to get the ball through the keeper's legs. what a shot!
mishra to uthappa, 1 run, flicked to deep midwicket

khan to ut yadav, out, and that is the game! kkr have stumbled to back to back losses. another slower ball on middle, yadav gets across and swats the ball in the air but straight to deep square leg. morris takes a sitter and daredevils have a big win
richardson to warner, four runs, slides down leg, and is punished. this one was a half-tracker, warner hops back into the crease and helps it into the fine leg boundary.
watson to warner, no run, inswinger again, lands this on middle, warner stays inside the crease and punches it to cover
watson to warner, 2 runs, rolls his fingers over the ball, that one was at 118kph, warner wrists it towards deep backward square leg
watson to warner, 1 run, skids off the pitch and hurries onto the bat as warner goes back into the crease and taps it behind point for a quick single

aaron to williamson, 3 runs, whipped away behind square, the square leg fielder and richardson at deep fine leg were running around in circles, enough time for them to get back for the third. warner initiated it, williamson responded. superb
shamsi to warner, 2 runs, deep cover was in business and harshal patel does well to slide across and stop that powerful drive
parvez rasool to warner, 2 runs, whipped into the gap between deep midwicket and deep square, kohli was charging towards the ball, but slipped. the misfield allowed the second
parvez rasool to warner, 1 run, the slider again on middle and leg, warner goes deep into the crease and punches it to deep midwicket
aaron to warner, no run, nearly chopped it back onto the stumps as he looks to dab it behind the wicket
aaron to warner, 1 wide, work for the umpire, this one's on a fifth stump on the leg side
aaron to warner, 1 run, whipped to midwicket where watson dives to his left to save a run for his team
parvez rasool to williamson, 1 run, pushed through quicker, williamson eases it past midwicket. 101kph. each delivery in this over has been faster than the previous one
parvez rasool to warner, 1 run, a misfield at cover gives them a single, kedar jadhav the culprit. he made room and struck that really hard
parvez rasool to williamson, 1 run, makes room and steers it towards deep point
shamsi to warner, no run, drilled back to the bowler, who does well to stop it on his followthrough
shamsi to warner, 1 run, turns away from outside off, driven wide of point
aaron to williamson, 1 run, pushed wide of cover to bring warner back on strike

parvez rasool to warner, 1 run, steps out and picks the bones out of that delivery, hit straight as a dye as well, rasool threw himself towards the ball with his left-hands, could have easily broken a finger. the ball missed them and hit his palm instead
shamsi to warner, no run, oh, wait. have i really seen warner miss a ball? looks to play the switch hit, but misses.

shamsi to warner, out, this time he's holed out to long-off, and shamsi immediately runs around towards his captain to trigger the bus driver's celebration. warner once again looked to clear the ropes, but didn't quite get the elevation as de villiers, standing a good 10 yards in from the ropes, took a comfortable catch. a century was there for the taking. maybe even more.
watson to henriques, 1 run, mistimes a drive down to long-off
watson to ojha, 1 run, uses the pace of the bowler and steers it down to third man
richardson to henriques, no run, slower one outside off, swings early and misses, keeper collects on the bounce
shamsi to henriques, 2 runs, swung across the line towards sachin baby at deep midwicket, good work to collect it on the bounce
watson to ashish reddy, no run, swing and a miss, looks to make room and go over the off side
nehra to kohli, 1 run, shapes back in from middle, kohli tucks it to square leg to get off the mark immediately
nehra to rahul, 1 run, dabs it with the angle to third man
kumar to rahul, 1 run, dabbed with soft hands towards third man again
nehra to rahul, 1 run, another dab, once again towards third man. looks like this is a deliberate ploy. not much room to work with again, rahul uses the pace to hit the gap
kumar to rahul, 1 run, chopped down to third man again
kumar to kohli, 1 run, slower one on middle, kohli can't generate much power off that, pats it with soft hands behind square on the off side
nehra to kohli, 1 run, stabs that ball towards cover point for a quick single
nehra to rahul, 1 run, flicked wide of mid-on, lazy running for which the third umpire is summoned. looks like rahul made his ground at the non-striker's end though
nehra to kohli, 1 run, hint of width outside off, driven firmly to deep cover
nehra to rahul, no run, play and a miss. once again, looking to use nehra's pace to run it down to third man, there wasn't much room this time and it missed the edge by a whisker
mustafizur rahman to de villiers, no run, dipping slower delivery across the batsman who toe-ends an attempted drive back down the pitch
mustafizur rahman to de villiers, no run, driven well, but straight to henriques at cover
sran to de villiers, no run, driven straight to mid-off
sran to de villiers, 1 run, clean strike over the infield, straight to long-off
henriques to de villiers, 1 run, drives, hits it off the sweet spot to deep cover
henriques to de villiers, 1 run, whipped wide of midwicket, excellent running
sran to rahul, 1 run, steered behind point with the pace of the bowler
sran to de villiers, 1 run, superb stop at cover by hooda, thew himself to his left to stop that fierce hit. saved three runs for his side
henriques to rahul, 2 runs, on the hips, wristed towards the man running in from deep fine leg
sran to watson, 1 run, uses the depth of the crease to rise onto his toes and nurdle it to fine leg
henriques to sachin baby, 1 run, dabs it behind point to get off the mark
henriques to de villiers, 1 run, makes room and thumps it down to long-off
henriques to sachin baby, no run, once again can't split the gap, hit straight to mid-off.
mustafizur rahman to de villiers, no run, slower one on middle and leg, de villiers knows what's coming, but can't get out of the tangle, defends awkwardly
henriques to sachin baby, no run, width, but he can only hit it straight to the point fielder
sran to jadhav, 2 runs, width and clobbered towards deep point, it was turning away from bhuvneshwar, but he anticipated that well to keep it down to two
kumar to sachin baby, 1 run, crunched towards deep point
kumar to jadhav, 1 run, stylish flick, but straight to midwicket

kumar to jadhav, 1 run, looks to swing across the line over deep midwicket, gets a thick inside edge onto the pad, they scoot through for the run even as bhuvi sprints across the turf an fires an underarm flick at the stumps
nehra to parvez rasool, 1 run, wristy flick to midwicket, a direct hit by hooda at the bowler's end and rasool would have been walking back to the dugout
mustafizur rahman to parvez rasool, 1 run, swings across the line, the ball rolls off the toe-end in the opposite direction, towards point
mustafizur rahman to jadhav, 1 bye, once again through with his swipe over midwicket even before the ball got to him, ojha fumbles while collecting it on the bounce, they get a bye
russell to rahul, 1 run, a tad too straight from russell and nudged to deep square leg. easy delivery to get off

morkel to gayle, six runs, gayle gets going. races down the pitch, gets a delivery in his half. because of his shimmy, he made some room for himself and then just clobbered the muscular loft straight over the bowler. big six
russell to rahul, 1 run, rahul does the same. slightly wider and dabbed to third man
narine to rahul, no run, slow again, on off. not much turn either. defended back
ut yadav to kohli, four runs, poor delivery and what did you expect to this man? drifting down leg and kohli times his flick. meets it late to get the ball behind behind square
ut yadav to kohli, no run, slightly wide outside off. kohli looks to hit the drive too hard, mis-times to cover
chawla to kohli, no run, much better. slow on off, wonderful line. kohli defends
chawla to kohli, 1 run, slowish on off, tapped to point for a run
narine to rahul, 1 run, slowish on off, nudged to deep midwicket
narine to rahul, 1 run, pushed wider outside off, nicely bowled. rahul comes down but has to reach for it, drives to long-off
chawla to de villiers, 1 run, slower on off, pushed to deep cover
narine to watson, 1 run, carrom ball outside off, pushed to point
narine to kohli, 1 run, 86 kph, again wider outside off, kohli drills a drive to long-off.

ut yadav to sachin baby, (no ball) 1 run, another one, surely. yes. another no-ball. this is the first official warning. outside off and miscued to point. the umpire didn't deem the first no-ball as dangerous and so umesh is allowed to continue
ut yadav to sachin baby, 1 wide, awful delivery. way down leg, another extra.
binny to gambhir, 1 run, nice adjustment. brings the inswinger back from wider outside off, towards off. gambhir gets on his toes to chop towards gully
aravind to lynn, 1 wide, nice, shaped away from the outside off but lynn leaves. too wide and called.
aravind to gambhir, 1 wide, gets some more movement. moves away outside off and starts the outswinger too wide. called
shamsi to gambhir, 1 run, superb batting. flat and straight again, but gambhir plays his nudge very late, against the spin, to square leg
aaron to gambhir, 1 run, outside off and steered past point, to third man. opened the face of the bat
aaron to gambhir, 1 run, 143 kph, another big appeal but looked like it pitched outside leg. yes, it did. gambhir missed a flick but an easy leg bye
aravind to gambhir, 1 wide, that will be wide. lots of extras for kkr. extremely wide outside off and gambhir ignores
chahal to russell, no run, starts with a flat delivery on leg, played back
chahal to pathan, 1 run, pushed wider outside off again, yusuf toe-ends a muscular drive to long-off. just one more
chahal to russell, 1 wide, very wide outside off, too wide. the legbreak spins and a wide is called
chahal to pathan, 1 run, flat on middle and leg, yusuf gets some bat on it, squeezed to square leg
chahal to russell, no run, very nicely bowled, slowed up on off and the ball rips past russell's mow.
chahal to russell, 5 wides, flat down leg this time. rahul fails to collect again and five free runs this time.
chahal to russell, 1 run, very flat on off, fired in. pushed to deep cover.
shamsi to russell, no run, another flat delivery outside off, pushed very wide. the ball skids past russell's flaying bat
aaron to russell, 1 wide, oh no. looks for a slower variation outside off but misses his mark by a few feet.  wide
aaron to pathan, 2 runs, slower delivery outside off, drilled past cover. kohli runs around from long-off to haul it in. good stop by the captain
watson to pathan, 2 runs, looks for another one of those mows, doesn't get it though. squeezed to midwicket, in the gap and that will be two more

chahal to russell, out, would have been called wide had he left it alone, but russell chooses to go after it and holes out. is that the play that rcb needed? very slow outside off, russell stretches out for it and doesn't time the drive. holes out to deep cover. binny takes a pressure catch, reverse cupped.
shamsi to pathan, four runs, great batting. expected the flatter delivery outside off, yusuf waits for it and then opens up the face to guide the ball past third man for four. superb
sandeep sharma to uthappa, 1 run, still outside off but no swing this time, uthappa reaches out and sends a thick edge to third man to get off the mark
sandeep sharma to gambhir, no run, comes down the pitch and steers the ball with the angle to cover point
sandeep sharma to gambhir, no run, nice swing outside off to take the ball away from gambhir, he waits and steers towards third man but first slip dives and stops it
stoinis to uthappa, 1 run, defends the ball to point for a quick one, the fielder has a shy at non-striker's end but misses. almost led to overthrows
stoinis to gambhir, no run, drives the ball late on the off side, straight to maxwell at backward point
sharma to gambhir, 1 run, on the leg stump, gambhir closes the face of the bat to send it to long leg for one
sharma to uthappa, 1 run, another quick single and miller misses the stumps at bowler's end after uthappa pushes the ball to mid-on
patel to uthappa, 1 run, angling in from outside off, uthappa turns it to deep midwicket for one
patel to uthappa, no run, just outside off, uthappa goes back to turn it to leg but it seemed like the ball stopped on him. missed
gurkeerat singh to gambhir, 1 run, brings it into the batsman who helps it to leg for one
patel to uthappa, 2 runs, makes a bit of room and turns the ball to the leg side with soft hands for two this time
patel to uthappa, no run, goes in the crease to wait and then steers the ball to point
stoinis to gambhir, 1 run, driven through cover point for a single
sandeep sharma to gambhir, 1 run, walks towards off and flicks it with the angle this time for one

sandeep sharma to uthappa, out, driven straight to cover and oh, is gambhir run out at the non-striker's end? he is surely miles outside the crease after he turned back but the confusion is whether sandeep's hands broke the stumps or the ball? replays from multiple angle confirm that the ball went through sandeep's hands and then to the stumps to dislodge the bails, gambhir is gone! it was driven to cover and maxwell got a direct hit from a tough angle, what was gambhir doing so far down the pitch!

sandeep sharma to uthappa, no run, that's hit the stumps again at the non-striker's end! uthappa drove it back, sandeep couldn't get a hand to it but the ball found the stumps, yusuf was outside the crease and a bit of excitement because of that. bit of a scare for kkr

sandeep sharma to uthappa, 2 runs, dropped! that would have been a great over for kings xi but the catch has been out down! uthappa swung his bat across the line outside off for a high top-edge that went to long-off and david miller got in the position to catch that, but mohit came from miller's left and took the ball away to drop it. costly one
swapnil singh to pathan, 1 run,
patel to pathan, 1 run, goes back in the crease to work it to leg for one
patel to uthappa, 2 runs, sends this one to deep midwicket in the gap for two more
sharma to uthappa, 1 run, mohit starts on the leg stump and uthappa swats it to leg for one

sharma to pathan, out, slower one beats yusuf and then mohit's throw beats uthappa! mohit's slower ball deceived yusuf completely as he looked to work it to leg but took it on his body. he took another step for a run but uthappa had come a long way down the pitch by then, and so had mohit. the bowler then turned around with the ball and hit the stumps at the non-striker's end
sharma to pathan, 1 run, towards leg and yusuf flicks it to fine leg to keep strike
sandeep sharma to russell, 1 wide, this time russell chases with a big swing outside off and it's another wide
sandeep sharma to russell, 1 wide, make that three in a row! way outside off, going away further and russell left it in the end
sharma to russell, 1 run, similar delivery and russell gives it similar treatment - single to long-off
sandeep sharma to pathan, no run, and again! not even a single this time. yusuf drives it down and sandeep dives to his right to stop the ball, turns around and makes russell dive to make his ground
sandeep sharma to pathan, 1 run, drives the ball on the leg stump to deep midwicket. only a single

sandeep sharma to russell, out, a run-out to end the innings! that went down the leg side, maybe for a wide, after russell made room and tried to flick but missed and then took off for a single. but saha threw the ball to sandeep who saw how far russell was and then ran all the way to run russell out. that looked like a wide, but not sure why the umpire didn't give it
russell to vijay, 1 run, start by targeting the stumps and vijay gets an edge to leg for one
russell to stoinis, no run, pretty straight and outside off, stoinis defends with a straight bat
russell to stoinis, no run, nicely bowled just outside off again, stoinis defends towards cover point now
russell to vohra, no run, angling in towards the off stump, he defends it to midwicket
morkel to vijay, no run, squares up vijay just a little bit as the ball came in, maybe not as much as vijay expected. he defends on the off side

morkel to vijay, no run, moon-like gravity for that delivery and the bounce! well outside off and swinging away, vijay chases and misses because of the bounce. uthappa also smiles after taking it behind the stumps
morkel to vijay, no run, back to normal bounce on the off stump, vijay defends this time
morkel to vijay, no run, angles it in again, tucked straight to midwicket
russell to vohra, no run, pretty straight on the off stump, tucked to midwicket
russell to vijay, 1 run, takes a step across and flicks the ball to midwicket for one
morkel to maxwell, 1 run, outside off again, maxwell doesn't move much this time and edges it to third man for one
morkel to saha, no run, gets in a slightly awkward position to tuck the shot ball to leg but takes it on the body
ut yadav to saha, 2 runs, towards the middle stump now, flicked with the wrists behind square for two
morkel to maxwell, no run, makes room this time and swats the ball down to mid-off
morkel to maxwell, no run, slightly slower at 126kph outside off, he makes room and swings but misses
ut yadav to saha, 2 runs, driven into the covers and another overthrow conceded by kkr
shakib al hasan to maxwell, 1 run, makes room and then tucks the ball to leg for one
chawla to saha, no run, well outside off now and it's driven with the turn to point

hogg to miller, no run, loud, loud appeal first ball! shuffles across to off and it was the wrong'un from hogg that beat miller. the appeal was for caught behind, just over the stumps. oh my, replays show the ball hit the bails but it didn't dislodge. what luck for miller
hogg to miller, 1 run,
chawla to maxwell, 2 runs, flicks the ball with the wrists against the turn to leg and they do well to come back for the second
chawla to maxwell, no run, defends it back this time with a completely straight bat
chawla to maxwell, no run, drives firmly into the covers but straight to the fielder
chawla to maxwell, no run, nicely bowled outside off with some turn, maxwell defends it back
chawla to maxwell, 1 run, comes down the track and flicks the ball to leg for one

ut yadav to maxwell, 2 runs, backs away to the leg side, umesh's slower ball chases him and maxwell manages to flick it to leg and russell runs a long way to his left to keep it inside in the nick of time
ut yadav to maxwell, 1 wide, that's way down the leg side for a wide
ut yadav to maxwell, 1 run, wide outside off now, pokes his bat out to get one to third man
shakib al hasan to maxwell, 1 run, comes down and pushes the ball towards mid-off for one
chawla to miller, 1 run, tucks the ball with the turn to leg for one
chawla to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, turns this one away and gurkeerat pushes it towards point for one
shakib al hasan to miller, 1 run, takes a step down and drives the ball with the turn to leg for one
shakib al hasan to gurkeerat singh, no run, tries a powerful drive but gets an inside edge onto the pad
russell to miller, no run, this one keeps low as it goes across miller again and he misses again
russell to patel, 1 run, some room outside off, drilled down to long off for one

russell to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, out, that's another run out, gurkeerat is gone too. that's suicidal. he drove it down to long-off and it was only a single but the batsmen turned around and sathish's throw to the keeper's end meant there wasn't much to do for uthappa
nadeem to stoinis, no run, was that a seam-up ball outside off? swings away, chopped to point
nadeem to stoinis, no run, pushed through at 97ks, drifts in, and hits the pad
nadeem to vijay, four runs, fired flat on off, 102ks, vijay hits through the line, punching it past mid-off for four
nadeem to stoinis, 1 run, dangled up and turns away outside off, the batsman slices it off an outside edge to the covers
nadeem to amla, 1 run, nudged to square leg for one
nadeem to stoinis, no run, chopped to backward point

nadeem to amla, out, slides on outside off, chopped to backward point. he drifts off in search of a single. stoinis isn't interested. zaheer throws to qdk, who breaks the stumps, and amla is gone. amla slips as he slides his bat in. this miscommunication results in a wicket. amla and stoinis had been twitchy all along, much like how rahane and khawaja had been for supergiants
nadeem to saha, 2 runs, pushed through outside off, saha uses the pace and runs it to the right of qdk to third man
brathwaite to stoinis, 1 run, slower ball outside off, guided to backward point
mishra to stoinis, no run, the batsman uses his feet, mishra fires a quicker one at 100ks, hits the pad
mishra to saha, no run, saha steps out and mishra hurls it flat, squeezed back to the bowler
mishra to saha, 1 run, slides on outside off, down the track and creamed to deep cover
khan to saha, 1 run, bunted to long-off
mishra to maxwell, 1 wide, darted down leg, wide
mishra to maxwell, 1 run, tossed outside off, maxwell drags it to deep midwicket
mishra to maxwell, six runs, flat and spins away outside off, maxwell has a crack at it and sends it over long-off
mishra to maxwell, 2 runs, floated and spins outside off, maxwell skips out and scoops it over the covers. samson and zak converge on the ball. it drops into no-man's land
mishra to maxwell, no run, maxi swings and falls over against this legbreak outside off
morris to saha, 1 leg bye, saha moves outside leg, morris chases him and hits the pad, the ball rolls behind square on off
morris to saha, no run, saha backs away outside leg again, this is pushed outside off. saha reaches out, misses, and topples over
sandeep sharma to de kock, no run, starts with a ball well outside off, de kock slaps it towards cover, not much timing on that and straight towards the fielder
sandeep sharma to samson, no run, samson's first ball is crisply drive towards point, but not past the fielder
cariappa to samson, no run, samson skips out, carippa pushes it flatter and hits the pad
cariappa to de kock, no run, driven from outside off to mid-off
sharma to de kock, four runs, back of the hand slower ball outside off, qdk slaps it in the air. the man (maxwell) at extra-cover leaps but can only tip it away
sharma to de kock, no run, the batsman steps away outside leg, mohit chases him. chopped to backward point
patel to samson, 1 run, arm-ball, snakes in with the angle, samson stays back and flicks to deep midwicket
cariappa to de kock, 1 run, tossed on off, dabbed to cover
cariappa to de kock, 1 wide, off-side wide
cariappa to nair, 1 run, slides on outside off, chopped through the cover-point region
patel to nair, 2 runs, arm-ball, angled in, nudged to midwicket
sandeep sharma to samson, 2 runs, samson backs away outside leg, sandeep chases him, driven to long-off for two
sandeep sharma to samson, 1 run, and again! samson makes room and is followed by sandeep. whipped to deep midwicket
patel to nair, no run, flat on middle, driven back to the bowler
cariappa to billings, 2 runs, steps out and scythes to extra-cover, vijay fumbles
sharma to morris, no run, back of the hand slower ball outside off, morris swings early, loses his shape, and does not connect
mcclenaghan to dhawan, no run, nice lines these from mm. 132 kph, in the channel around off. dhawan stays back and punches to cover
mcclenaghan to warner, 1 run, 127 kph, slower delivery outside off, smashed to that deep cover fielder
hh pandya to dhawan, no run, slower ball on off and middle, bunted to midwicket

hh pandya to dhawan, four runs, poor line and punished again. hardik has not had a great ipl so far. straying on leg, dhawan whips the ball away with discernible use of the wrists to get it fine. bumrah's exuberant dive in vain
harbhajan singh to warner, no run, 92 kph, slower and wide outside off again, a slap-chop to cover
harbhajan singh to warner, no run, very fast and very wide outside off, warner thinks he will get the extra but the call of wide never comes. he isn't too happy either
pollard to dhawan, no run, dhawan not happy with the umpire this time. very wide outside off, may have been just outside the tramline, marginal call.
pollard to dhawan, four runs, bowled from way behind the crease, a pollard special. dhawan comes down and scythes the ball past point. dhawan had to wait before meeting the ball
harbhajan singh to warner, 1 wide, 92 kph, fired in outside off, way too wide again. called

harbhajan singh to warner, four runs, pummeled for four. understandable that harbhajan was bowling wide in fear of his protection but he errs now and almost bears the brunt. drilled back at harbhajan's feet who hurries to get his feet out of the way

harbhajan singh to warner, out, massive, just a massive moment in this game. harbhajan bowls it wider outside off, warner chooses a lofted drive but doesn't get all of it, the ball skews off the outside half into pollard's reverse-cupped hands at long-off. pollard is more than happy.
harbhajan singh to williamson, no run, well finished. harbhajan allows the ball some air outside off, kept a tad low and kw whips to midwicket
kh pandya to dhawan, 1 run, a bit of a sloppy fumble. darted in on off, dhawan stays back to punch back to kw, krun;al gets in the way but allows the ball through
kh pandya to williamson, 1 run, fired in on off, steered to third man
kh pandya to williamson, 1 run, flatter on middle, 96 kph. nurdled to midwicket for one, a dive by rohit
kh pandya to dhawan, 1 run, slowed up outside off, driven to long-off for one. tidy over for mumbai
harbhajan singh to dhawan, 1 run, 91 kph, lots of air on off, not much turn. driven to long-off. dhawan seems intent on taking this deep
harbhajan singh to dhawan, no run, quite flat again, not much air on that. dhawan stays back and drives back to the bowler
harbhajan singh to dhawan, 1 run, a bit of loop and slowness to that, dhawan has enough time to rock back and work to square leg
bumrah to dhawan, 1 run, another slower ball on off, pace off. turned to square leg, just one
pollard to dhawan, 1 run, another slower delivery outside off, pushed to long-off to give yuvraj strike

mcclenaghan to yuvraj singh, four runs, sensational power from yuvraj. another slower ball outside off - predictable - and yuvraj muscles his drive past cover. great batting. mitch m has got to vary his pace
southee to dhawan, 2 runs, pace off the ball, outside off, dhawan inside-edges his heave to fine leg and scampers back for the second

southee to yuvraj singh, six runs, muscled into the stands over midwicket for six. power, all power. not a bad delivery but these slower deliveries are quite predictable, cross-batted swipe over deep midwicket for a humongous hit
southee to yuvraj singh, 1 run, thrashed off his hips to square leg, on the bounce
bumrah to dhawan, four runs, four more. backs away, the bowler follows him and then dhawan helps it along, to the backward square leg boundary. big overs
kumar to sharma, four runs, swings that in and tickled to the square leg fence for four. what timing. poor ball though. too straight from bhuvi but nice swing
nehra to kh pandya, no run, goes straighter and whipped to wide mid-on. nice shape again from nehra
henriques to hh pandya, no run, another slower delivery outside off, hammered along the ground, to mid-off
henriques to hh pandya, 1 run, 121 kph slower delivery on middle, swatted to deep square leg. just one
mustafizur rahman to harbhajan singh, 1 run, another slower delivery on off, driven to long-off with the direction
henriques to southee, 1 run, slowish delivery again outside off, tip and run to cover
mustafizur rahman to mcclenaghan, no run, switch hit attempted first ball. yikes. somehow he gets bat on it to square leg/point. hmm.
henriques to mcclenaghan, 1 run, slower delivery on off, swatted to deep midwicket
mustafizur rahman to harbhajan singh, 1 wide, starts this one too straight and it goes further down leg. wide called
sran to bumrah, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, tapped to third man
sran to harbhajan singh, 1 wide, back of the hand slower ball goes wrong. very wide outside off and left alone
kumar to harbhajan singh, 1 run, 112 kph outside off, driven to deep cover

sran to bumrah, out, 132 kph, edged and gone. mumbai stumble to a massive loss. sunrisers muster a massive win. shaped away outside off, bumrah pokes and gets a thick outside edge which is well taken by naman.

sharma to kohli, 1 run, what have you done, marcus stoinis? kohli came down the track, and once again reached away from his body to drive. ended up slicing it to backward point, at chest height, not too far to his left, and that wasn't a difficult chance at all. simply bounces out of his palms
patel to rahul, 1 run, down the track again and axar fires in the straight one. looks to push into the covers and inside-edges through midwicket instead
stoinis to sachin baby, 1 run, slower ball, angling across baby. shuffles across to nudge it into the leg side

sharma to de villiers, four runs, another slower ball, and it wasn't a bad ball by any means, it was on off stump. ab makes room again, moves away from leg stump and then stands nice and still, makes himself a stable base, and uses the swinging room he's created to flat-bat it back over the bowler's head
binny to vijay, 1 run, down the track comes vijay, and binny achieves a bit of outswing, making vijay slice his attempted loft over mid-off high over point instead. falls safely enough
aaron to vijay, no run, down the track, making himself some room, and aaron sees him coming, bowls a wide-ish slower ball that he can't quite connect with as he reaches out
watson to vijay, no run, ooh, that was close. sees vijay making a bit of room and spears it wide of off - that seemed right over the tramline. dharmasena doesn't signal wide
southee to kohli, six runs, down the track now and the first scoring shot of the match is a six. makes some room to free his arms and slice that high over the square boundary on the off side
harbhajan singh to rahul, no run, skips down and again harbhajan bowls it flat outside off. rahul punches to extra cover
mcclenaghan to rahul, 1 wide, expects rahul to make room again and bowls a slower ball outside leg. rahul steps the other way and picks up a wide
binny to sharma, 1 run, hits of away swing for binny and rohit is careful as he blocks. soft hands mean the outside edge skirts past the left of backward point
binny to sharma, no run, pretty outswinger again and rohit check drives to cover
aravind to rayudu, six runs, down the track, and the line, just outside off, gives rayudu plenty of swinging room to flat-bat this over mid-off
chahal to rayudu, no run, wide outside off again, a floaty tempter. rayudu leaves again
aaron to rayudu, 1 wide, slower ball wide of off stump, a touch too wide, decides the umpire, after rayudu reaches out and misses
aaron to buttler, 1 wide, another wide outside off. looks for the slower ball, bowls it outside the tramline
aaron to buttler, no run, this one's just inside the tramline, and buttler reaches out to slap it and can't make contact
yadav to dhawan, no run, 91 kph, a bit slower and wider outside off. dhawan runs down and punches to cover
yadav to warner, 1 wide, flat down leg, warner backed away and then scurried back to off stump. drifts down leg
yadav to dhawan, 1 run, 90 kph, slow on off, dhawan pats the ball to point with one aim - to get one and he does, easily.
duminy to warner, no run, well bowled, slower and flatter on leg, warner's leading edge bobbles back. he isn't happy he missed runs
yadav to warner, no run, nicely bowled, slowed up on middle, extracts a bit of extra bounce and takes it over warner's flaying bat
yadav to dhawan, 1 run, swept to deep square leg

yadav to warner, out, bowled im. massive wicket. warner has to go. slowish on leg, warner backs away, in an attempt to dab to point but the ball spins just enough to beat the bat of warner. may have played inside the line, too. clatters into leg and middle stump. impressive spell from jayant, hasn't erred too often
duminy to williamson, 1 wide, flat delivery, down leg. kw misses a flick. wide
duminy to dhawan, no run, 84 kph, nicely bowled. quite slow on off and defended
mishra to williamson, no run, well bowled again, nice and slow outside off. williamson reaches out for it to drive to cover
mishra to dhawan, 1 run, flat on leg, no turn. whipped to deep square leg. not a bad over for sunrisers
morris to williamson, 1 wide, 149 kph, strays down leg though for an extra
mishra to williamson, no run, 90 kph, fired in outside off. slapped to cover. dot

mishra to dhawan, out, taken. 114 kph, seam-up quick delivery from mishra. dhawan anticipated that delivery and attempted a wild heave. the ball spliced off the upper half and lobbed to deep midwicket. samson ran in and took a good running catch
mishra to williamson, 1 run, another dart from mishra on leg. whipped to deep midwicket
mishra to yuvraj singh, no run, another one of those fast seam-up quick deliveries. on leg, pushed to point
coulter-nile to nehra, 1 run, slower ball outside off, nehra swipes to deep midwicket. just one.
kumar to de kock, no run, beautiful, lovely movement away from de kock who defends with more intent this time, to point
kumar to agarwal, no run, this one comes back in sharply! good bowling. a defensive glide to backward point
kumar to agarwal, 1 run, slower delivery at 119 kph, pushed to mid-off for one. even warner can't prevent the run
kumar to de kock, 1 run, bhuvi is nice and tight around off and middle, pushed to mid-on for another run
nehra to de kock, 1 run, slower ball on off, pushed to mid-on and de kock sets off for a quick run. well done
mustafizur rahman to de kock, 1 wide, wide, down leg. starts the offbreak too straight and an extra
mustafizur rahman to de kock, 1 run, nice and tight around off. chopped to gully, another clever single
sran to nair, 1 run, good tight line, honing in around off. pushed to cover for a quick run. well played

sran to de kock, six runs, poor poor delivery. strays down leg, all de kock needs to do is get some bat on it but he chooses to go after the offering. helps it along over backward square leg with a superb shot.
yuvraj singh to samson, 1 run, flat to start on middle, pushed to deep midwicket
yuvraj singh to samson, 1 run, slower and wider outside off, carved to deep point for a run to deep point
henriques to samson, no run, another slower ball on off, skewed off the inside half to midwicket
nehra to pant, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, slapped to deep cover.
kumar to samson, no run, skewed off the inside half to midwicket
cariappa to rana, 1 wide, that one turned as well. the regulation offbreak to the left-hander. very wide outside off and called
patel to sharma, no run, oo, nicely bowled. slowed up on off, the ball grips in the wicket. rohit improvises a defensive stroke
cariappa to rana, no run, flatter trajectory, stops in the wicket before reaching rana. outside edged to the bowler
cariappa to rana, 1 run, nudged away into the leg side, against the spin
cariappa to buttler, no run, nice line. the flat legbreak on off, turns away. buttler pushes to cover
cariappa to buttler, no run, very flat again outside off, hurriedly driven to cover. 111 kph that delivery
patel to buttler, 1 run, flat on leg, not much turn. that allows buttler to tuck to deep midwicket, against the turn
patel to pollard, no run, darted in on off and middle, pollard stays back to block
patel to pollard, no run, some air on the ball and the outside edge is extracted. on the bounce to slip. well bowled, nice pace
patel to buttler, four runs, outside edge and it evades slip for four. much flatter outside off, buttler goes back to punch but gets a thick edge to the third man boundary
cariappa to pollard, no run, darted in, seam-up on middle. pushed back to the bowler
cariappa to pollard, 1 run, flat on leg, tucked to deep square leg

patel to pollard, 3 runs, another flatter delivery on middle, pollard calmly tickles it fine where no one is present. square leg has to run around to keep it in, and he does so but not before the batsmen get three. cleverly played

patel to pollard, six runs, mis-timed for six. axar has a wry smile on his face, primarily because he deceived pollard there. slowed up the offspinner, pollard looked to whip the ball into the leg side but the ball spin away. took the outside half of his bat and skewed away for six over long-off

sharma to southee, out, slower ball, out the back of the hand, and southee holes out now. was into his swipe too early, resulting in him miscuing his stroke. skied straight to long-off, who took a good catch with his hands reverse cupped

sharma to harbhajan singh, six runs, gets it this time. another slower delivery on off, harbhajan backs away and swats it over midwicket. miller backtracked and tried to palm it back into the field of play but could only get a hand on it. carries over
southee to vijay, no run, nice bowling from southee. sees vijay advancing and follows him. pushed to that extra cover fielder
southee to vijay, 1 run, very very slow, 113 kph. almost stops in the wicket, gets to vijay very late who gloves one to square leg
mcclenaghan to vijay, 1 wide, not great from mitch. strays down leg for an extra
mcclenaghan to vijay, no run, slower ball outside off, loosely driven to cover.
mcclenaghan to vijay, 1 run, another slower delivery, very slow of the surface. vijay pats it down towards gully for a run
pandya to saha, no run, fired in outside off, driven to cover
pandya to saha, no run, darted in on leg, played away to midwicket. a bit on the faster side is krunal
pandya to saha, no run, better, and immediately extracts purchase. slower on middle, grips and takes the outside half to point
pandya to saha, no run, flat outside off, pushed back to the bowler
bumrah to saha, 1 run, nicely done again. deft touch to get the ball to third man with the angled bat
pandya to saha, 1 run, flat on off, the ball spins away. whipped to midwicket, against the turn
pandya to vijay, 1 run, fired in outside off, steered to backward point for a quick run
harbhajan singh to saha, 2 runs, beautiful pace, looped up on middle, saha gloves one down to fine leg. a brace.

harbhajan singh to saha, 1 leg bye, lovely bowling.  a huge appeal but there is too much turn. slowed up outside off, the ball deviates back in. saha is playing back, misses a flick. the ball strikes him high too
harbhajan singh to vijay, 1 run, massive ripping turn on leg, wristily flicked to deep square leg
pandya to vijay, no run, flat on off, pushed with the spin to cover
pandya to saha, 1 run, flat on off, saha walks across to whip to square leg
harbhajan singh to saha, 1 run, good hands. lets the offbreak turn into him before tucking to midwicket
harbhajan singh to vijay, 1 run,
southee to vijay, 1 wide, strays down leg for an extra
harbhajan singh to saha, 1 run, flat on off, steered to point for a quick run
pandya to saha, no run, darted in on off, chopped towards point
bumrah to vijay, 1 run, another slower ball outside off, dabbed off the open face. another single
mcclenaghan to maxwell, 1 wide, 137 kph, strays down leg. maxwell goes after a pick-up heave but misses. the umpire raises his arms late, very late
kumar to amla, four runs, width and crunched! amla's eyes lights up as he cracks that past karn sharma at point. poor effort, he underestimated the bounce there
kumar to vijay, 1 run, hint of width and he's flayed that down to third man
nehra to amla, four runs, he's hammered that between cover and point. standing tall and hitting through the line without the fear of any demons on the surface. pure hand-eye coordination

nehra to amla, four runs, more width, and the result isn't different. angles it past amla, who frees his arms and crashes that behind point. third man had no chance. nehra's looking for some inward movement, but there hasn't been any so far

kumar to vijay, no run, moves away late from middle, vijay was squared up but adjusted well to defend that to point., yuvraj's rocket throw from point had vijay scampering back, looks like he was just in
kumar to vijay, 1 run, fetches the whip from outside off to midwicket
nehra to vijay, 1 run, squeezed off a thick outside edge to fizz at third man
mustafizur rahman to saha, 1 run, lovely wrist work to get it towards dhawan at deep square leg
sharma to saha, no run, flatter one that breaks away from off stump, pushed to cover
sharma to amla, 1 run, skids back into amla, who makes a bit of room and bunts it past the bowler for a single
sharma to saha, 1 run, skips out and drives it with the spin to long-off
henriques to amla, 2 runs, walks across the stumps and whips it towards deep square, called two the moment he hit it
henriques to amla, 1 run, uses the angle to nurdle that to fine leg
henriques to saha, 1 run, not much room to work with, he defends it with soft hands behind the wicket and scampers through. it was amla's call
sharma to saha, 2 runs, tucked towards deep midwicket, there was a boundary rider at deep square who had to run it to stop that
sharma to saha, no run, once again he gets a little too close to the ball and ends up jamming his bat down in the end to keep that out
sharma to amla, 2 runs, this one pitches on middle and leg and straightens, amla accounts for that and then whips it between deep square and deep midwicket
sharma to amla, 1 run, driven down to bhuvneshwar at long-off
henriques to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, whipped from outside off to deep backward square leg
sharma to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, starts off with a slider on middle and leg, tucked towards square leg
sharma to amla, no run, hit hard, but straight to yuvraj at point
henriques to amla, 1 run, eased to point for a quick single
henriques to amla, 1 run, this time, he's smeared that to deep cover
mustafizur rahman to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, angles it down to third man for an easy single
kumar to amla, four runs, hoisted into the deep midwicket boundary. the man there was a touch inside, and not at the ropes. i wonder why. amla got enough bat on it to clear the man
kumar to miller, 1 run, reaches out to a delivery angling away, gets some bat on it and they're off for a single

kumar to amla, out, and no, he won't get the hundred. amla looks to drill that over long-off, but can't get enough bat on it as he holes out to warner at long-off. it was a tired stroke, he knew he didn't strike that well the moment he hit it. the dug out stands up to applaud, the owner is happy too! super knock
kumar to miller, no run, swings too early, the ball deflects off the back pad to the keeper
sandeep sharma to warner, no run, width on offer first up, warner reaches out to play that one but can only hit it feebly to cover
sandeep sharma to dhawan, 1 run, hint of swing in the air for sandeep, dhawan plays away from the body and gets a thick edge down to third man
sandeep sharma to warner, 1 run, a misfield at mid-on allows him to complete an easy single
sandeep sharma to dhawan, 1 run, slip fielder was moved to gully, now the ball flies past the slip cordon to anureet at third man
vijay to dhawan, 1 run, driven to cover as they pinch a quick single, maxwell's rocket throw hits the umpire who was trying to take evasive action. it deflected off vijay's hands
vijay to warner, four runs, width and hammered. warner gets underneath the delivery and drills it into the cover boundary. once it beat the infield, there was no chance of that being stopped
vijay to warner, 1 run, another chance to maxwell, who picks the ball and fires a throw at the bowler's end, warner was just in
vijay to dhawan, 1 run, drifting into middle, driven to mid-on, a half-stop keeps that down to a single
sharma to dhawan, 1 run, goes through with the drive, but toe-ends it wide of mid-off
anureet singh to warner, 1 run, dabbed wide of point, they make eye contact and off they go for the single
stoinis to warner, 1 run, whipped towards maxwell at deep midwicket, it was hit towards the longer part of the boundary
stoinis to warner, no run, stays inside the crease and bludgeons the drive, straight to the cover fielder though. he packs a punch when he strikes them with that big broad bat of his
maxwell to warner, 2 runs, driven through the line to long-off, miller was caught napping there, warner called two the moment he hit it, and got it
maxwell to dhawan, four runs, solid punch! steps out and hits through the line over mid-off, one bounce into the boundary.
patel to warner, 1 run, this one's fired into middle from around the stumps, tucked with the angle towards the man running in from deep fine leg
patel to dhawan, no run, flatter one delivered on middle, pushed back to the bowler
patel to dhawan, 1 run, bunts it down to long-off
anureet singh to dhawan, no run, firm punch, but straight to vijay at cover
patel to hooda, no run, slows it down nicely this time, hooda checks his shot at the last minute, axar dives to his left to stop that
stoinis to warner, no run, chops it straight to backward point, maxwell slips as he runs in
anureet singh to hooda, 1 run, whipped towards miller, who hares in from deep midwicket to keep that down to a single

patel to warner, out, big wicket, and a big moment in this match. third sunrisers batsman who is out in this fashion. it was fired into middle, warner goes far too deep inside his crease to whip it away but the backfoot slips as he disturbs the stumps and has to walk back. lets out a huge cry of anguish. first yuvraj, then hooda. now warner.
patel to hooda, 2 runs, advances down the track and flicks it uppishly towards deep midwicket
sharma to yuvraj singh, 1 run, hops across and whips it to deep backward square leg
sharma to yuvraj singh, 1 run, slower delivery on leg stump, nurdled to square leg, yuvraj wanted the second, hooda didn't
stoinis to yuvraj singh, no run, can't generate enough power to pick the gap on that slower delivery, hit straight to point
patel to yuvraj singh, no run, pushed through quicker and across yuvraj who can only play it back to the bowler. bowled at 103 kph

sharma to yuvraj singh, six runs, he's muscled that 20 rows back over deep midwicket. picks his spot, waits for the slower one to slide into him and then generates tremendous power in the swing to clear the ropes. the flow on that stroke was simply out of this world. shades of the past, surely
nadeem to sharma, no run, grip and turn! nadeem tosses this on off and lets it rip away past the prodding bat with extra bounce as well. ominous signs?
nadeem to sharma, six runs, loopier and turns away outside off, rohit accounts for it. he plays with the spin, opens the face, and lifts it nice and clean over the covers
nadeem to guptill, no run, slides in on middle, guptill hangs back and pokes it towards point
khan to sharma, 1 run, width outside off now, dabbed quietly to third man for one
khan to guptill, 1 run, guptill pushes to mid-off for one
mishra to guptill, four runs, guptill makes a bit of room outside leg, hits with the spin, drives it inside-out over the covers
imran tahir to guptill, 1 run, darted on top of the off stump, he gets on top of the bounce, and punches through the covers
imran tahir to pandya, 3 runs, flicked from off stump past midwicket, samson takes his eyes off the ball and fumbles. the result is three
mishra to guptill, 1 run, tossed outside off, lofted to long-off

mishra to pandya, four runs, tahir runs to his right from deep midwicket, aims to swat the ball into the field of play. lazy work and the ball goes for four. swiped from outside off to the cow corner fence. tahir could only tip it away. he puts his hand up in apology right away
imran tahir to pandya, 1 run, lobs it up at 78ks, stops on krunal, chips a drive to long-off
imran tahir to guptill, 1 run, slider on off, nudging to 100ks, no room though, laced to long-off
mishra to guptill, no run, flat on middle, jammed back to the bowler. the batsman inspects the toe end
mishra to guptill, 1 run, flat and fired on middle as guptill feigned to make room. driven to long-off
mishra to pandya, four runs, seam-up ball on middle, 110ks, that's mishra's new variation. swung away to the long-off boundary
imran tahir to guptill, six runs, guptill has found his groove. legbreak outside off, steps away outside leg and creams a drive over the covers. krunal punches gloves with the nz opener
nadeem to pandya, 1 run, drifting down leg, swept through backward square leg
mishra to pollard, no run, mishra finds turn, finds the outside edge, poked to slip
mishra to pollard, 1 run, down the track and whipped over square leg
khan to pandya, no run, another slower ball, 112ks, swings early, loses his shape and misses
imran tahir to rayudu, 2 runs, rayudu steps out, he bowls a wide legbreak. reaches out and slices past the covers

imran tahir to buttler, 1 run, down the track and drilled to long-off. tahir finishes with 4-0-59-0, the most runs conceded by a bowler this season. tahir's 59 runs are also the most conceded by a spinner in the ipl
harbhajan singh to agarwal, no run, shuffles across and turns to leg
vinay kumar to nair, 1 run, inswinger, beats the batsman, and hits the back thigh. hit in line with the stumps. looks close. was height the only issue?
mcclenaghan to de kock, no run, kicks up off the surface outside of, surprises qdk. he slashes and the ball zings over the bat

vinay kumar to de kock, four runs, width outside off, nudging to 140ks, qdk backs away, manufactures room and lofts over the packed off-side infield. pollard dives near the edge of the boundary, as does rohit. not even a tag-team effort could prevent that four. qdk continues to fly. this chase is on. strap on
harbhajan singh to nair, 1 run, offbreak on off, patted to midwicket
harbhajan singh to de kock, 1 run, spins away from the left-hander, he reaches out and chops to cover point

harbhajan singh to nair, four runs, nair steps out, the bowler held it back around off. does not matter. nair drills it past the diving bowler. the bowler stuck his left hand out, but the ball raced away
harbhajan singh to samson, 1 run, slider just a shade outside off, shoots low, chopped fine on the off side, past the keeper
harbhajan singh to de kock, no run, cracker from harbhajan! pitches outside leg, grips the surface, opens up qdk, turns and rips past the outside edge
pandya to samson, no run, slider on middle, fizzes off the pitch, 99ks, kept out
pandya to samson, 1 run, tucked quietly to square leg

pandya to de kock, out, mumbai capitalise on a mix-up. harbhajan throws it to the non-striker's end. krunal moves back, collects it from behind the stumps, and dislodges the bails. good awareness from krunal. flat and outside off, slapped straight to harbhajan at backward point. qdk wasn't interested calling 'no'. samson is more than halfway down the pitch. he turns back but can't make his ground in time. there was no run there
harbhajan singh to pant, six runs, clears pollard at long-off. pant dances down the track and lofts it to the left of pollard for six. he leaps and tumbles onto the ground
harbhajan singh to pant, no run, guided to backward point
harbhajan singh to pant, 1 run, harbhajan held this back outside off, chipped to the covers
pandya to de kock, no run, qdk backs outside leg, krunal chases him with turn, nearly shaved the leg stump
pandya to de kock, 1 wide, darted wide outside off
pandya to pant, four runs, slashes hard and sends an outside edge to the third man fence
rana to duminy, no run, slides on off, poked to cover
mcclenaghan to duminy, four runs, down the track and drilled to the right of mid-off for four
mcclenaghan to duminy, 1 leg bye, sliding down leg, deflected behind to the keeper
bumrah to duminy, 2 runs, starts off with a slower ball on the leg stump, duminy waits and turns to midwicket for two
mcclenaghan to mishra, no run, mcclenaghan greets mishra with a lifter, he fends feebly and misses
vinay kumar to mishra, 1 run, prodded from off to midwicket
bumrah to mishra, no run, mishra steps away outside leg, bumrah bangs a bumpy ball outside off. he can only watch it through to the keeper
bumrah to khan, no run, lifter, angled in, zaheer drops his gloves on it

pandya to khan, out, krunal set the game up mumbai. krunal wraps it up. they win by 80 runs. that will boost the net run rate. pushed through, he finds a hint of turn, leaving zaheer prodding and missing. krunal hits the top of off
binny to gambhir, 2 runs, slower delivery on leg stump, gambhir shuffles across to tuck it towards deep backward square leg, where abdulla misfields to allow an extra run
aravind to gambhir, 1 run, hops across and whips it to deep square leg
aravind to uthappa, 1 run, flicked well, but can't beat abd at mid-on, they get through for the single though

aravind to gambhir, four runs, it was nothing more than a gentle flick! this outfield is like a billiards table. jordan at mid-on wasn't more than couple of metres away from the ball when he started sprinting behind it, and still couldn't get it as the ball kept gathering speed. top shot
iqbal abdulla to pandey, no run, driven to kohli at cover
iqbal abdulla to pandey, no run, there's some grip and turn, pandey is slightly squared up as the ball turns from middle, but somehow manages to get some bat on it

aravind to pandey, four runs, looked to go over mid-on, but ended up dragging it past midwicket. still managed to get enough bat on it to clear the infield. the crowd comes alive, the pressure is back on rcb.
iqbal abdulla to gambhir, 1 run, flatter one on off stump from around the stumps, whipped wide of midwicket
iqbal abdulla to pandey, 1 run, gets back and wrists that wide of mid-on
watson to pandey, no run, flicked to abd at midwicket, gayle backs up at cover to stop the rocket throw
chahal to pandey, no run, sharp turn away from outside off, he watches rahul collect the ball
jordan to gambhir, 2 runs, lovely flick of the wrists to place the ball into the gap at deep square leg, binny does the mopping up
jordan to gambhir, 1 run, drops it with soft hands towards gayle at point, pandey was off the blocks immediately to complete the run easily
jordan to gambhir, 1 run, another slower delivery, gets some lift off this one from middle, dabbed behind square on the off side
chahal to pandey, 1 wide, turns away from outside off, just outside pandey's reach, right call from the umpire
chahal to pandey, 1 run, flat-bats that one to long-off
chahal to gambhir, 2 runs, hops across the stumps and nurdles it with the spin towards fine leg
chahal to pandey, 1 wide, directs another one well outside off, it grips and turns, well outside pandey's reach again
chahal to pandey, no run, play and a miss as the ball spins away from outside off

jordan to gambhir, 1 run, angles the slower ball on off stump towards gayle at point, another fifty for the skipper. the dug out applauds, the crowd roars. this has been a superb knock, nothing brutal about it but very crafty.  31st fifty for him , the joint-highest along with warner
iqbal abdulla to pandey, 1 wide, fires this one but gets the direction wrong, it was well outside off
iqbal abdulla to pandey, 1 run, pushed into the vacant cover region for an easy single

iqbal abdulla to gambhir, out, too much width and is lucky to get away with that, but the mix-up results in a bonus wicket for rcb. pandey was more than halfway down the crease, when gambhir looked towards his partner, in the end both of them were stranded at the same end as abdulla collects watson's throw to break the stumps at the non-striker's end. pandey doesn't even bother looking at his captain who walks off shaking his head. they were lucky to get away couple of overs ago, not this time.
iqbal abdulla to pandey, 1 run, driven with the spin to deep cover
watson to pandey, 1 run, walks across the stumps and nonchalantly flicks it to deep midwicket

iqbal abdulla to pathan, 1 leg bye, steps out and offers his pad to that delivery as it deflects to cover, they complete the leg-bye. shouldn't have been a run,  yusuf clearly didn't offer a shot there

iqbal abdulla to pathan, 2 runs, waits inside the crease and then turns it across the line towards midwicket, abdulla sprints across and then slides to stop the ball and fire a throw to rahul. yusuf was comfortably in
chahal to yadav, no run, pushed through quicker, lands this on off, defended back down the pitch
chahal to yadav, 1 run, driven with the spin to long off

aravind to yadav, out, lofted cleanly inside-out but he only ended up hitting it a little too well as abdulla runs 20 yards or so to his left to take an excellent catch at long-off. wonder if surya looked to play a chip shot there. doesn't matter, they're losing wickets in clumps and the squeeze is well and truly on
aravind to shakib al hasan, 1 run, fetches the flick from outside off towards deep midwicket
chahal to russell, no run, drive and a miss. this one fizzes off the deck, almost 45 degrees, rahul collects it well

chahal to russell, four runs, the fielders at deep cover and wide long-off were no more than 10 metres apart, but russell still managed to drill that and generate enough power to find the gap. amazing!
chahal to russell, no run, slapped off the backfoot to cover

watson to russell, 1 run, he's swung across the line and has hurt himself in the process as the thick inside edge hammers into his thigh. he hobbles across for a single. watson has a wry smile, is lucky to get away with that
russell to gayle, 1 run, dabs it with an open face of the bat to point to get off the mark
russell to kohli, 1 run, played with soft hands to the off side
russell to kohli, 1 run, turned to midwicket again, this time with soft hands
russell to gayle, no run, thumped, but straight to double g at extra cover

russell to gayle, six runs, he's clobbered that over the bowler's head, and into the sightscreen. stand and deliver. the ball had landed outside the ropes even before russell could turn on his followthrough. is he back?
morkel to kohli, no run, bat face turned as he made contact, played back down the pitch
morkel to kohli, 1 run, stays inside the crease and then opens the bat face to guide that behind point
morkel to gayle, 1 run, thumped to narine at wide mid-off, struck really hard, he was thrown off balance by the impact
narine to gayle, no run, defended back to the bowler with soft hands
narine to gayle, no run, squeezed back to the bowler
chawla to gayle, 1 run, closes the bat face early, gets a leading edge that rolls wide of cover
chawla to kohli, 2 runs, reaches out and then slaps that one towards cover, where suryakumar yadav took the pace of the ball to prevent the boundary. it was struck really, really hard
chawla to kohli, no run, wrong-un on middle and leg, whipped to square leg. kohli is furious that he didn't find the gap there
chawla to kohli, 1 run, driven with the spin to long-off
chawla to gayle, no run, this one slides past the outside edge, gayle was playing for the turn but it was pushed through quicker
rajpoot to kohli, 1 run, driven to long-off
rajpoot to gayle, no run, slower delivery on leg stump, gayle is once again early into the his flick, squeezed back to the bowler
rajpoot to kohli, no run, looks to dab it behind the keeper, nearly ends up chopping it back onto the stump. top over
narine to gayle, no run, grip and turn from middle, gayle lets it go
narine to de villiers, no run, gets back into the crease and taps it back to the bowler
narine to de villiers, 1 run, gets across and whips it to deep midwicket to get off the mark
rajpoot to kohli, 1 run, makes room to go over the off side but ends up bunting it towards the man running in from deep midwicket
rajpoot to de villiers, four runs, that is a scorcher. just a hint of width, but it was enough for him to convert an inch into an acre as he frees his arms to slap that behind point
rajpoot to de villiers, no run, hit hard into the ground as gambhir leaps to stop that at point
rajpoot to de villiers, no run, chopped to cover, he looked to go behind point again
narine to kohli, no run, ooohs and aaahs. this one breaks back in sharply to take kohli's gloves, nearly rolled back onto the stumps

narine to kohli, 2 runs, wrists it with soft hands towards the fielder running in from deep midwicket, it was hit no more than 30 yards from the pitch. just eye-contact before they decided the second was on, incredible
shakib al hasan to kohli, no run, this one drifts back in from around the stumps and skids back into middle, kohli blocks it with soft hands
shakib al hasan to de villiers, 1 run, played across the line towards deep midwicket
chawla to kohli, no run, slow turn from off stump, kohli drives but gets the inner half of the bat to it, rolls back to the bowler
chawla to de villiers, no run, grip and turn on that from outside off, de villiers checked his drive at the last moment
shakib al hasan to de villiers, no run, hit hard, but straight to cover
shakib al hasan to kohli, 1 run, squeezed to gambhir at point for a quick single
shakib al hasan to de villiers, 1 run, makes a bit of room and crunches it to deep cover
narine to de villiers, 1 run, whipped over the infield to surya at deep midwicket
shakib al hasan to kohli, 1 run, driven with the spin to long-off
shakib al hasan to kohli, 1 run, rocket hit to the man at the edge of the circle at cover, kohli's nerves, i'm afraid, will pop out any time soon
rajpoot to de villiers, 2 runs, lofted over the infield to surya at deep midwicket. rcb dugout must be tired of applauding these strokes now. exhilarating
sandeep sharma to gayle, no run, shapes away from outside off, gayle shoulders arms
sandeep sharma to gayle, 1 run, driven firmly, but only as far as miller at wide long-off. interesting field position that
sandeep sharma to kohli, four runs, he needs no sighters. stands tall and punches that between cover and point. shot of a man in the form of his life. beautiful
sharma to gayle, 1 run, swung across the line to deep midwicket. he wanted to hit it a lot straighter, ended up dragging it
sandeep sharma to gayle, 1 run, swung across the line to amla at deep midwicket. looks like he's trying to hit it too hard. didn't find the timing on that again
sandeep sharma to kohli, no run, tucks it to midwicket, wanted to play it more towards mid-on
abbott to gayle, 1 run, goes leg side this time, gets a thick inside edge on the swing as behardien swoops in at deep midwicket. good work in the deep
abbott to kohli, no run, dabs it to point and sets off for a run that wasn't on,  axar with a shy at the stumps from point.  a direct hit and kohli was gone! opportunity missed
cariappa to gayle, no run, quicker one on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
patel to kohli, four runs, that's sped away into the cover boundary at the rate of knots. much before axar could turn to get back to his run up. inside-out hit, a flat hit. tremendous power
cariappa to gayle, 1 run, pushes it to cover with soft hands for a quick single
cariappa to kohli, no run, carrom ball on middle, kohli goes back and defends
cariappa to kohli, no run, slapped, but straight to vijay at cover, good stop, swift movement to his left to effect that one-hand stop
abbott to kohli, 1 run, flicked to deep midwicket
patel to kohli, 1 wide, sliding down leg, misses a faint tickle, good take by saha down leg
patel to gayle, no run, slapped back to the bowler, good stop

patel to gayle, six runs, fires it outside gayle's swinging arc, at least that's what axar thought, but he didn't account for gayle's reach. off side or leg side, his favourite area at the moment is deep midwicket

patel to gayle, out, the party is over. looks like gayle was bored of going leg side. this time looks to flat bat that over long-off, but didn't quite get the elevation as miller takes a comfortable catch. walks back to a huge round of applause
abbott to kohli, 1 run, helped down to fine leg
abbott to kohli, four runs, wickets or no wickets, there's only one way kohli will play. steps out to get towards the ball and then slaps it one bounce into the cover boundary

sandeep sharma to kohli, six runs, bang, and dismissed. this one is a gift wrapped with plenty of 'makkhan' as they say. he's simply blasted that into the second tier at deep midwicket. kohli was waiting for it deep inside the crease and simply swung through to get the elevation and clear the ropes
sharma to rahul, 1 run, drilled one bounce to long-off
sharma to watson, 1 run, bunted straight to long-off, flat hit
binny to vijay, 1 run, slower one on middle, turns it wide of midwicket for an easy single
binny to amla, 1 run, looks to drive, but there wasn't much room, squeezes it back past the bowler to mid-on
binny to vijay, 1 run, shapes away in the air from middle, vijay pushes it to mid-off and scampers diagonally across the turf for a single

aravind to vijay, out, there's the breakthrough. vijay was trying to give himself room and slap that over the off side, but didn't have any room whatsoever, and ended up getting a thick inside edge onto the pad before the ball rolled onto the stumps.
aravind to saha, 1 run, drops it with soft hands to cover for a quick single
aravind to amla, 1 run, opens the face of the bat and steers it to gayle at point or a quick single
jordan to saha, 1 run, fetches the flick from outside off towards deep square leg
chahal to miller, no run, slides one cross the batsman this time, miller gets an inside edge as he defends
chahal to miller, 1 run, flicked with the spin to deep midwicket
aravind to miller, 1 wide, looks to tickle it fine, the ball may have flicked the pad on the way through to rahul. arvind politely enquires, must say another poor call
aravind to miller, 1 run, driven wide of cover for an easy single
watson to patel, no run, looks to squeeze that behind point, but jams his bat down awkwardly to hit it back down the pitch
watson to gurkeerat singh, no run, slower one on middle, turned to midwicket
watson to patel, 1 wide, slower delivery gone wrong, way outside off on the seventh stump
watson to patel, 1 run, squeezed to jordan at deep cover, once again has to reach out to make some contact
aaron to patel, 1 run, helped down to fine leg
aaron to gurkeerat singh, four runs, poor bowling from aaron. can't give width like that. enough pace on it for gurkeerat to crack that behind point on this outfield that has copped a lot of rain.
watson to gurkeerat singh, no run, a direct hit from the edge of the circle at cover from sachin baby may have had the non-striker in trouble. this wasn't hit off the middle
chahal to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, slides one into middle and leg, tucked past square leg

chahal to gurkeerat singh, no run, big, ripping legbreak from the rough outside off, gurkeerat swings, only to see the ball beat the outside edge. there was a feeble appeal for stumping, but the batsman's backfoot was well inside
gayle to sharma, 1 run, stabs it towards point for a quick single
gayle to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, fired into middle, flicked to deep midwicket
gayle to sharma, 1 run, another quicker one outside off, squeezed to deep cover
gayle to sharma, 1 leg bye, fired down leg, misses the flick, rahul can't collect it cleanly either
chahal to sharma, four runs, throws his bat at that, gets a thick edge that flies wide of gayle at slip, into the third man boundary

chahal to gurkeerat singh, out, swings north, ball goes south. there's turn away from off stump, bounce and gurkeerat can only get a thick edge as he looks to go over long-off as gayle takes a comfortable catch at slip.
gayle to sharma, 1 run, defended wide of cover for an easy single
gayle to cariappa, 1 run, driven past the bowler to long off
sachin baby to cariappa, 1 run, makes room and smears it to deep cover to get off the mark
sachin baby to cariappa, 1 run, hit back over the bowler's head, excellent work by ab running to his left from long-off, lobbed the ball on the relay to jordan who was running across from long-off
sachin baby to sandeep sharma, 1 run, pushed wide of watson at cover
gayle to cariappa, 1 run, flat hit down to long-off
khan to warner, no run, gentle outswinger to start outside off, not very pacey. warner shuffles across to pat to mid-on
yadav to warner, no run, flatter trajectory delivery on off, warner rocks back to punch into the off side
khan to dhawan, 1 run, great batting. nagging line around off, dhawan taps by his feet and warner responds. easily done

yadav to warner, four runs, much too flat. and that is sensational timing. shot of the tournament. on middle and leg, warner backs away and closes the bat face at the last moment to work the ball past mid-on. how did he get so much power behind that?
brathwaite to warner, 2 runs, change in pace, the slower delivery on off. skewed to deep square leg. so big are the dimensions of the ground that two easy runs are available
mishra to warner, no run, mishy starts with a flat delivery on middle, warner backs away to hit to cover
mishra to hooda, 1 run, edged on the bounce to first slip. jp gets a hand on it and ricochets the ball to third man
mishra to yuvraj singh, 1 run, flat outside off, pushed to point to get off the mark
coulter-nile to yuvraj singh, no run, good lines. on and around off. yuvraj hurries into a defensive stroke towards cover
yadav to warner, 1 run, too straight on leg, and nurdled away to wide midwicket
yadav to yuvraj singh, 2 runs, quiet flat again on middle. yuvraj tickles towards square leg. many twos will be seen tonight, this is one of em
brathwaite to warner, 2 runs, slower delivery on off, squeezed to deep cover. warner gets back for another brace

brathwaite to yuvraj singh, out, bowled im. big wicket. did that keep low? brathwaite goes wide of the crease and angles it away from yuvraj who drives away from his body. a thick inside edge clatters into off stump and sunrisers in a bit of trouble
brathwaite to henriques, 1 wide, very wide. banged in mid-pitch. way over henriques' head. de kock does well to leap to the ball
brathwaite to henriques, no run, straightish on middle and leg, hit to midwicket with a rather straight bat
mishra to henriques, no run, lovely bowling.  a nice legbreak on middle from wide of the crease, henriques drives too early, a thick outside edge skews to point
brathwaite to warner, 1 run, a quality fifty from warner. very slow on leg, turned to midwicket and scampers for one, but the second isn't there. well played
brathwaite to henriques, 1 run, another slower variation on middle. henriques shovels a straight-bat flick to the right of midwicket
yadav to warner, 2 runs, flat on off, slapped to deep point. large pockets so an easy couple
yadav to warner, no run, oh lovely. slowed it up just enough to extract just enough turn to sneak it past warner;s outside edge
yadav to henriques, 1 run, flat outside off, chopped to mishra at third man
duminy to warner, 1 run, flatter delivery outside off, chopped to deep cover
mishra to morgan, 1 run, slowed up nicely on middle, turned to square leg

khan to morgan, 1 run, dropped. should have been taken. may have been some pace off the ball on off, morgan was through his drive early. just about carried to pant at cover. the ball smashed into his wrist
kumar to de kock, 1 wide, too wide outside off this time. starts the outswinger too wide. six free runs for daredevils
kumar to de kock, no run, very tight around off. the ball moving away, hit towards mid-on
sran to nair, no run, slower delivery on off to end, squeezed to extra cover
mustafizur rahman to nair, no run, very quick on off, bunted back
hooda to nair, 1 run, flat outside off, nair rocks back to clip to deep midwicket for one
