sharma to pant, no run, good start, right on off. defended.
sharma to pant, 2 runs, slowish on leg, nudged to deep midwicket. pant is forced into the second by his partner and makes it
hooda to nair, 1 run, flat and wide outside off, slapped to deep cover for a run. not a horrible over for either side
sharma to nair, 1 run, quality knock from nair. turns this flat delivery to square leg to bring up another fifty
sran to duminy, 1 run, slower ball outside off, dabbed to point. exceptional over
mustafizur rahman to nair, 1 wide, good batting. moving around in the crease. mustafizur tries to follow the batsman but fires it too wide. called
sran to brathwaite, 1 run, out with a direct hit. slower ball on off, patted to point. yuvi is quick on the ball but misses the stumps at the bowler's end

sran to nair, six runs, six more. another slower back of the hand delivery on off, nair waits for the ball to come to him before smashing it over midwicket. massive shot, superb timing, exceptional placement
kumar to gambhir, 1 run, tap and run single to mid-on
williamson to munro, no run, he steps away outside leg, follows him with a flat ball. jammed to the covers
hooda to munro, 1 run, jabbed to long-off for one
hooda to munro, no run, darts it outside off, munro shapes for a switch hit and misses. hit outside off. the lbw appeal is turned down
sharma to pandey, 1 wide, big turn! karn pushes it outside off and gets it to swerve away, left alone
sharma to pandey, 1 run, flatter legbreak outside off, chopped feebly to point
sharma to gambhir, 1 run, gambhir steps back and pats this 75ks tossed-up ball from outside off to the covers

sharma to gambhir, 1 run, kw runs to his right from midwicket. karn runs back from his followthrough. neither gets to the ball. it drops in between them even as kw tumbles. dangled up, stops on gambhir. he aims a leg-side flick and spoons a leading edge in the air. it drops into no-man's land
sharma to pandey, 1 run, dabbed to cover
hooda to gambhir, 2 runs, dabbed with soft hands to cover, kw runs in but does not gather the ball. by the time the bowler finds the ball, gambhir gets two
sharma to pandey, 1 run, quicker one, glanced behind square
sharma to pathan, no run, pushed through and turns away outside off, past the swing of yusuf
sharma to pathan, six runs, and now over long-off for a six! floated outside off, yusuf ventures outside leg and muscles it over the boundary
sran to pathan, 1 wide, slides this one past the off-side tramline, left alone
pathan to dhawan, 1 run, skids on outside off, calmly tapped to long-off
pathan to warner, no run, skids on again, warner makes room and flat-bats it to cover
rajpoot to warner, 1 run, looks like a slower ball on the leg stump, yes 122ks, nudged to leg. yusuf nails a direct hit at the bowler's end. but warner is in
shakib al hasan to warner, no run, warner now steps out, the bowler held it back, keeping it to a bunt to off
shakib al hasan to warner, 1 run, pushed through, hit to midwicket
narine to ojha, no run, tossed on off, nudged to midwicket
narine to ojha, 1 run, pushed to point for a quick one
narine to dhawan, no run, quicker one outside off, dhawan looks to drive, slices it in the air. it does not carry to cover
narine to dhawan, 1 run, dhawan moves away outside off, narine bowls the offbreak. dhawan checks his shot and pats it to cover
narine to ojha, no run, quicker offbreak, zips in and raps the pad
kuldeep yadav to dhawan, no run, grips in the surface and turns away from dhawan after pitching on middle, defended
kuldeep yadav to ojha, 2 runs, swept down to long leg
narine to yuvraj singh, no run,
narine to yuvraj singh, no run, dabbed to the covers
narine to yuvraj singh, 1 run, tucked off the hips behind square on the leg side for one
narine to williamson, 2 leg byes, offbreak, deflected off the thigh to fine leg
kuldeep yadav to yuvraj singh, six runs, floated outside off, yuvraj dances out, meets the pitch. launched over long-off
shakib al hasan to williamson, 1 run, slider outside off, chopped to point
kuldeep yadav to williamson, 1 run, grips the surface and turns outside off, dabbed to the right of the bowler
kuldeep yadav to sharma, 1 wide, turns away wide outside off, left alone
shakib al hasan to sharma, 1 wide, fired down leg, wided
shakib al hasan to sharma, 1 wide, shakib slides another one down leg
shakib al hasan to henriques, no run, arm-ball, snakes in on off, henriques skips back and keeps it out
shakib al hasan to henriques, 2 runs, henriques stays back again, whipping to deep midwicket
shakib al hasan to henriques, no run, fired through on off, chopped back
shakib al hasan to henriques, 1 run, whipped to deep midwicket
narine to sharma, 1 run, turns away from the left hander, poked to midwicket
narine to sharma, 1 run, chipped towards the midwicket region. narine hunts the ball down. a direct hit could have put the left-hander in trouble
narine to henriques, out, henriques uses his feet. narine dangles an offbreak. the batsman swings wildly and misses. narine hits the leg stump and caps his spell with a wicket
binny to de kock, four runs, poor delivery. strays down leg, would have been wide had qdk not interfered but he did. and rightly so. just a tickle gets the ball racing away to the fine leg boundary.
binny to de kock, 1 wide, uh oh. wide this time. a decent amount of swing. quite a good delivery to the right-hander but qdk is left. wide down leg
binny to de kock, 1 run, again down leg. poor over from binny. nudged away comfortably to deep square leg. not a great start for rcb
aravind to de kock, no run, darts back in from outside off to ping de kock's back elbow. ouch. through to the keeper on the bounce
watson to nair, no run, slower delivery outside off, defended
binny to samson, 1 run, nice lines. nagging away around off, but samson opens the face to dab to third man

chahal to samson, out, flatter and wide outside off. big appeal and given. samson tries to dab a steer to third man. and the ball is taken by rahul who throws the ball up immediately in celebration. inconclusive replays. samson certainly didn't believe there was bat or glove. umpire oxenford had no hesitation
chahal to de kock, 1 run, flat and wide outside off, pushed to long-off
iqbal abdulla to de kock, 1 run, tucked to deep midwicket. kohli is hunting and prevents the second
iqbal abdulla to billings, no run, well bowled. sees the batsman coming and pushes it much wider outside off, billings jams it out
gayle to negi, 1 run, nicely bowled. flat on leg, negi backs away and chops to cover
gayle to negi, 1 run, flat on middle and leg, nudged to deep midwicket. another single

gayle to de kock, 2 runs, edged. beats the keeper and a couple to third man. slowed that up nicely outside off and extracted just enough turn to take the outside edge. flicked rahul's gloves. goes down as a chance, but isn't really
gayle to negi, 1 wide, flat down leg. negi was backing away. so gayle followed him. drifts down leg
aravind to negi, 1 run, negi struggling for any timing. slower ball outside off, negi backs away and then goes back to reach the ball. lobs the ball towards cover
gayle to negi, 1 run, flat down leg, negi backs away but mis-times to midwicket
gayle to de kock, 1 wide, qdk backs away and then comes back inside the line. the ball drifts down leg for a wide

gayle to brathwaite, out, gone. gayle gets another. daredevils struggling here.another fired delivery outside off, brathwaite squeezes it out and the ball carries straight to watson at backward point. the umpires want to check if it has carried and it has. comfortably done.
aravind to de kock, 1 run, slower delivery on off, scythed to point for a run

chahal to de kock, out, another wicket. daredevils falling away quickly. flatter delivery outside off, de kock backs away and flat-bats a stroke to jordan at long-off. the umpires want to check if chahal has overstepped, very marginal call. i'd be giving that a no-ball, seems chahal has nothing behind the line. given out
chahal to morris, no run, flat and wide outside off, slapped straight to kohli at cover
chahal to morris, 1 wide, slower and wider, called this time. the legbreak rips past
chahal to morris, four runs, morris will get four this time. another flat legbreak outside off, morris tries to reverse and gets some bat on it. clears gayle at slip and to the third man boundary
chahal to morris, 1 run, slowish outside off, morris has enough time to rock back and work against the spin to deep midwicket
iqbal abdulla to yadav, 1 run, slow and wide, a thick outside edge carries to third man for a run. another tidy over from rcb
khan to kohli, 1 run, too straight from zak. easily nudged to midwicket to get off strike. impressive stuff from kohli, not taking his form for granted. respecting some good  bowling
khan to de villiers, no run, nagging on off. de villiers defends with an angled bat to point
morris to rahul, 1 run, 144 kph, outside off and glided to third man
negi to rahul, 1 run, slow and flat, nudged to deep midwicket
negi to kohli, 1 run, flat on middle, skids on with the arm. kohli's angled bat takes the ball towards midwicket
negi to kohli, 1 run, flat trajectory again outside off, a drilled drive to long-off
negi to rahul, 1 run, strays in line, leg side and easily tickled to the midwicket area
negi to kohli, no run, a slider on off, carries on with the arm. on off and blocked
negi to kohli, 1 run, nicely bowled but not much turn and so it is easy for kohli to flick from the stumps to deep midwicket
yadav to kohli, no run, tosses it up and extracts turn straightaway. inside-edged into his pad
yadav to kohli, no run, flat outside off, turns in and kohli gets another inside edge onto his pad. went deep in his crease to play it
brathwaite to watson, 1 run, another defensive stroke gets one to point. well played, soft hands
mishra to kohli, 1 run, flat and wide outside off, pushed to deep cover
mishra to kohli, 1 run, another iffy stroke. flat on off, outside-halved to long-off
brathwaite to kohli, 1 run, leg side delivery, easy pickings for kohli as he flicks to fine leg. seems intent on carrying this through
brathwaite to watson, no run, tight lines. on and around off, blocked
brathwaite to kohli, four runs, that will be four. strays down leg now and kohli wristily flicks to deep square leg. a fist pump too from virat
mishra to kohli, 1 run, flat and wide, slapped to long-off
mishra to watson, no run, flat on leg, pushed to midwicket. zaheer prevents the run with a dive
mishra to kohli, 1 run, flat on off, the legbreak. played into the off side with soft hands, done so easily. wow
brathwaite to binny, 2 runs, another drifter down leg, nudged to wide fine leg for a brace
brathwaite to binny, 2 runs, skewed over the infield for a couple. looking to go straighter but that wide of the crease angle takes the ball into the inside half of the bat
khan to kohli, no run, slower delivery outside off, quietly played to cover
khan to binny, four runs, what a shot. shimmies down outside off and wristily times the flick over midwicket. yikes, one of the shots of the day. superb.
khan to binny, no run, 132 kph, slower delivery, steered to cover

brathwaite to kohli, 1 run, there it is. slower delivery is pushed to mid-on for the quick single. kohli is overjoyed, he is ecstatic. pumped as he jumps up in celebration. royal challengers qualify as the second-placed team
pathan to dhawan, no run, swift takedown of an lbw appeal from shamsuddin. the reason - an inside edge. round-armed dart on leg stump, dhawan defends and gets some bat on it
pathan to dhawan, 1 run, attempts to combat yusuf's flatter trajectories by running at him. the offspinner bowls it flatter still and the batsman pushes to mid-on

morkel to dhawan, four runs, ooh, narine made it to the ball but didn't bend down enough. a hint of room, and with morkel's pace, dhawan had no qualms about slashing hard at the ball. it takes a thick outside edge, and third man is unable to stop it
pathan to warner, 1 run, tucked away through midwicket, but his job isn't done yet. walks up to the new batsman henriques for a little chat
pathan to warner, no run, that one did turn, and bounce. warner kept back and softened his hands to knock the ball down on the leg side.
pathan to warner, no run, nudged back to down the pitch, a few yards to the left of the pathan bowling around the stumps
morkel to warner, 1 run, he's running hard, wanting two, but mid-on makes his way to his left to prevent the dink into the vacant midwicket region from bleeding too many
morkel to henriques, no run, a tad too straight, henriques plays a beautiful flick, but he finds midwicket
pathan to warner, 1 run, fired in, aiming at the top of off stump, driven past the diving pathan

narine to warner, four runs, excellent awareness. narine starts off with a rare lose ball. it was too far down leg, so warner moved back, tucked it past the right of square leg inside the circle and to the left of the man on the boundary
narine to warner, 1 run, driven through the covers to retain strike. that's the end of the powerplay. forty-two on the board.
holder to warner, 1 run, picked away off his hips to deep midwicket
holder to henriques, 1 run, turned to long leg. henriques is getting some stability.
kuldeep yadav to henriques, 1 run, comes down the track and driven to long-off
kuldeep yadav to henriques, 2 runs, good batting. henriques races down the track, gets to the ball before it pitches and drills the ball to long-off

kuldeep yadav to henriques, out, beautiful comeback! it was a flatter delivery, the batsman picked that up early and set up for the heave over midwicket. only, he connects with the back of the bat and goes straight up! the bowler takes the catch himself. beautiful wrist-spin bowling from kuldeep
narine to yuvraj singh, no run,
narine to yuvraj singh, 2 runs, scooped! it was on leg stump and he simply played the line. went down on one knee and lifted it over his right shoulder. slip takes off after it

sathish to yuvraj singh, four runs, slashed to the third man boundary. that's the problem with part-timers. their proclivity to bowl that one bad ball is a little higher than the specialists. this is wide outside off, yuvraj throws his bat at it and gets a thick outside edge over the fielders inside the circle
kuldeep yadav to yuvraj singh, 1 run, turned away through midwicket
narine to hooda, 1 run, tucked away through midwicket
narine to yuvraj singh, no run, this one turns the other way. lovely. yuvi reads if off the pitch and keeps it out. he keeps his line so close to the stumps
kuldeep yadav to ojha, 1 run, comes down the track and drives through point
kuldeep yadav to yuvraj singh, four runs, swept away to deep midwicket. yuvi is starting to look imperious. spin is not troubling him one bit. he's just getting under the ball and powering them away
narine to ojha, 1 wide,

narine to ojha, 2 runs, great work from satish at deep midwicket! this ball was travelling, but he raced to his right, eyes on the ball all the way, dived after it as he neared the boundary and slapped it back inside the field
narine to ojha, 2 runs, swept away to deep midwicket
holder to ojha, 1 run, lashed to long-off
hooda to gambhir, no run, moves into the left-hander, who does well after backing away. didn't go with a horizontal bat shot. defends

henriques to gambhir, four runs, that's excellent batting. moved across onto off stump, got on top of the bounce, and uses his wrists to send it backing to deep square leg. magnificent timing and placement

henriques to gambhir, out, direct hit at point! yuvraj singh has produced a bit of magic! one stump to aim at, and he hits the target before munro could make his ground. gambhir had dinked the ball to point, yuvi hurtled up to it, got control of the ball in both hands, and whirled the throw in flat.
bipul sharma to gambhir, 1 run, tucked to deep midwicket, where hooda keeps it to a single
bipul sharma to gambhir, 1 run, comes down the track, but he doesn't have the room to free the arms because it's a flat delivery on leg stump. turned through midwicket

mustafizur rahman to yadav, no run, almost a run-out at the non-strikers'. push towards long-off and both batsmen instinctively thought of a single but henriques moved swiftly to his right, dived after the ball and flicked it at the stumps. could have had pandey had it hit
sran to yadav, 1 run, neatly done. he stayed put noticing the line outside off and slid it to deep third man

sran to yadav, six runs, dropped by mustafiz at the third man boundary! it's off the outside half of the bat that was sailing towards the ropes. the fielder had to move a bit to his right, and it was coming at him at head-height. had moved in, and misjudged the catch in the first place. couldn't adjust thereafter. didn't look comfortable in that position and the ball pops out and over the boundary

mustafizur rahman to holder, 1 leg bye, goes for a reverse dab, and it looked entirely premeditated. he was in no position to make a connection. hits him on the body. sathish is mindful of sneaking a quick single.
kumar to holder, out, another slower ball, holder wasn't quite well balanced when he went for the loft towards long-off. the ball hit high on the bat and carried only as far as long-off
gayle to dhawan, no run, loopier and no turn on off, dhawan drives and squirts it back to the bowler via an inside edge
gayle to warner, 2 wides, fired down the leg side, beats the batsman and the keeper

gayle to dhawan, no run, was that a chance? gayle reaction suggests it was. tossed on middle, stops a touch on dhawan. he seeks to flick and ends up lobbing it, low to the left of gayle. the big man dives to his left and attempts the catch with one hand but did not stick. yes, gayle has shelled a return catch. kohli has his hands on his head
gayle to dhawan, 1 run, darted on the leg stump, dhawan aims to flick it away. he is toppled over. binny fumbles at mid-on, allowing dhawan to recover and pinch a single
gayle to dhawan, no run, gayle is firing it in on middle and leg, dhawan jabs it back to the bowler
watson to warner, 1 run, slower ball on middle, warner picks it. waits and glides it neatly through point
gayle to dhawan, no run, quicker one from gayle, 108ks, deflected to the leg side
chahal to dhawan, 2 runs, chopped to point, a misfield from abdulla gives two
iqbal abdulla to warner, 1 run, warner loads up for a big hit, abdulla is wary of it and darts it quicker on the legs, flicked behind square
chahal to warner, four runs, chahal keeps bowling googlies. warner stays back and slaps it away to the cover boundary. warner acknowledges his half-century
jordan to warner, four runs, width outside off, warner lashes it away to the cover boundary
chahal to warner, 1 run, tapped down to long-off
chahal to hooda, 1 run, hurrying ball on off, guided past cover
chahal to yuvraj singh, 1 run, slider outside off, chopped past cover for one
jordan to yuvraj singh, 1 wide, wild off-side wide. yuvraj does not bother with it
kumar to kohli, no run, brings it into kohli who defends with a straight bat but gets the inside half of the bat
kumar to kohli, four runs, edged and that flies over what would have been first slip! kohli took a step down the pitch, swung hard and got a thick edge that was well out of naman ojha's reach
kumar to kohli, no run, much straighter now, no room at all, and kohli punches it back
sran to gayle, 1 wide, not a great start, slightly slow at 129kph and down the leg side for a wide
sran to gayle, 1 wide, another one down the leg side for a wide
kumar to kohli, 1 wide, kohli shows his ace early and steps down the track. bhuvneshwar sends a bumper down leg. sails over kohli. wide
sran to gayle, no run, gayle winds up again. sran replies with a change-up ball. slower one, keeps gayle to a push to cover. he checked his shot and dabbed it to the off side
henriques to kohli, no run, kohli steps out, bottom-hand dominates the drive to extra cover
bipul sharma to kohli, four runs, bottom-handed whip, kohli's signature strike. arm-ball slides in, skips back and swats it wide of midwicket
bipul sharma to de villiers, 1 run, dangled up on off, ab pre-meditates and lap-scoops it to fine leg
bipul sharma to kohli, 1 run, another arm-ball, shovelled to midwicket
sran to kohli, 2 runs, leg-side ish ball, helped to fine leg
mustafizur rahman to jordan, no run, jordan swipes across the line of a slower ball and misses
mills to warner, 2 wides, yikes, wayward. 146 kph though. drifts down leg. jadhav, rcb's new keeper, fumbles the collection
chahal to henriques, no run, nice. pushed through on middle and leg, blocked

chahal to henriques, 1 run, nicely played. flat delivery outside off, pushed to long-off for a run. whoa, miscommunication. henriques should have been out. the fielder eases in, and throws the ball to the keeper. dhawan called yes, henriques hurries down for the second, and gives up but returns quickly when he sees the throw is to the keeper
chahal to dhawan, 1 run, flicked to deep midwicket
aravind to henriques, 1 run, pushed away towards mid-on for a single
aravind to henriques, no run, big appeal. a thick inside edge. flat delivery on off, henriques hits the ball into his body
chahal to dhawan, 1 run, skids on outside off, chopped to backward point. there was no run there. mills picks the ball up and throws it wildly well wide of jadhav and concedes an extra run
chahal to henriques, 1 run, chopped to the covers
chahal to dhawan, 2 runs, dhawan steps out early, chahal lobbed it really wide outside off. asks dhawan to reach out. he can only toe-end it over a leaping cover fielder
watson to henriques, no run, change-up. slower and wider outside off, henriques reaches out but can't touch the ball
chahal to henriques, no run, a flat delivery on off from chahal, pushed back

chahal to yuvraj singh, 1 run, oh, fantastic stuff from mandeep. a flat delivery outside off, so wide would have been called had yuvraj let that go. but he goes after it. yuvraj lays into a lofted drive towards long-off. mandeep runs to his right, and puts in a leaping, diving, one-handed effort. the ball just bounces out of his hands as mandeep is mid-air. five runs saved. didn't look to save the runs, wanted the catch. fantastic stuff.

choudhary to hooda, six runs, parried for six. rcb's woes continue. a slower ball on middle, hooda swings. high in the air, chahal moves back slowly, conscious of the boundary. in the end, he reverse-cups the parry over the boundary
watson to hooda, 1 run, excellent bowling. 133 kph, extremely wide. hooda reaches out and guides a run to point
hooda to gayle, no run, darted outside off, chopped to cover
hooda to jadhav, no run, good dip for hooda, jadhav eyes up the leg side, and ends up leading-edging the ball towards mid-off
nehra to jadhav, 1 wide, jadhav shuffles across off, nehra bowls it on a fourth-stump on the leg side. wide called
rashid khan to head, 1 run, fired outside off, driven to long-off
rashid khan to watson, no run, ooh. flat delivery outside off, some turn, some bounce. beats the outside edge
kumar to chahal, 1 run, slower ball, nudged down to fine leg for a single

kumar to mills, out, very very high in the air, and warner takes it. a slower delivery on middle and leg, tymal mills gets underneath the mow. soars high, warner settles underneath and claims the catch.
nadeem to watson, 1 wide, skids down the leg side, wide
nadeem to mandeep singh, no run, nadeem gives this some air, but finds no turn. defended
nadeem to mandeep singh, no run, mandeep backs away outside leg, aiming a mow over midwicket, nadeem darts it outside leg and defeats the batsman. mandeep lost his shape there and missed it
nadeem to watson, 1 run, wide of the crease and darted in on off, watson punches the ball hard to extra cover, where the fielder takes some pace off the ball
nadeem to watson, 1 run, dragged down outside off, flat-batted down to long-off
khan to binny, 2 runs, binny opens the face and glides it to the left of backward point. carlos from the deep effects a direct hit and rcb take another one off the ricochet
nadeem to binny, 1 run, nadeem finds grip and turn. the batsman shimmies out and defends uncertainly to cover
khan to jadhav, four runs, hip-high ball on the off stump, got to get it up higher, aimed a swat and skied it over square leg
brathwaite to jadhav, 1 run, jadhav makes room outside leg, brathwaite chases him, opens the face and angles it down to third man
cummins to negi, 1 run, tucked around the corner off the hips
morris to mills, no run, mills backs away outside the leg stump, this is hurled wide outside off. mills can't reach out that far
stanlake to tare, 1 wide, drifting down leg, 143 kph, wide. bad ball. lost his line
chahal to billings, no run, nice pace. slow on off, some drift, no turn. blocked back again
chahal to billings, 1 run, nudged to square leg for a run
chahal to tare, 1 run, pushed to cover for one. good over, tidy
iqbal abdulla to billings, 1 run, flat and slides in with the arm, swatted away wide of midwicket

iqbal abdulla to tare, four runs, edged and flies between gayle at first slip and vinod, the keeper. gayle does not even react. smith and rahane took these blinders in the recent test series. fired outside off, slashed and edged in the gap to the boundary
iqbal abdulla to tare, 2 runs,

stanlake to samson, 3 runs, wide of the crease, angled in on off, whipped away square through the leg side. chahal chases and pushes the ball into the field of play or not. chahal was tantalisingly close to the boundary. looks like he is in contact with it while aiming to push the ball back. the tv umpire is happy with chahal's effort. just three
chahal to billings, 1 run,
chahal to samson, no run, what a ripper from chahal. pitches on middle stump and fizzes away outside off past the outside edge. too good to even nick it
iqbal abdulla to pant, 1 wide, flatter and wider outside off, past the guideline, left alone
iqbal abdulla to pant, 1 wide, another off-side wide
chahal to pant, no run, quick and skids on outside off, left alone
chahal to samson, 1 leg bye, much quicker through the air, fizzes in to hit the pad, beating the inside edge
chahal to pant, no run, fired outside off, pant shows chahal respect and lets it pass
watson to pant, no run, pushed back to the bowler
iqbal abdulla to pant, no run, speared wide outside off, left alone
iqbal abdulla to pant, 1 wide, breaking down the leg side, some bounce as well, wide
chahal to pant, no run, flat and really wide outside off, pant opts to shoulder arms
chahal to pant, 1 run, this is ferociously belted back to chahal. the bowler is hit on the left shin. tossed-up legbreak outside off, chahal is in some pain

mills to mishra, no run, 107ks slower ball from the back of the hand, mishra almost caught the ball with the glove. he looks away, takes his eyes off the ball, looks to evade it, but the ball does not even arrive. when it does, mishra waves his glove at the ball. bizarre
watson to mishra, no run, what is mishra trying to do. he shuffles across off and does not connect with a scoop. watson has conceded just seven from his last two overs
malinga to woakes, 2 runs, slower ball at middle stump, not in control as he looks to work this into the leg side, but only manages to chip it over the umpire

boult to patel, no run, play and miss. again. down the track this time, making himself room, ends up a long way from the ball as boult swings this away from an off stump line. was looking for the big hit over the covers
woakes to buttler, 1 wide, another wide. saw buttler looking to make room and bowled it on a sixth-stump line. buttler just leaves it this time
woakes to patel, no run, replay of the previous ball. this one was a lot closer to off stump. parthiv is lucky he wasn't bowled
kuldeep yadav to buttler, 1 run, down the track now and he doesn't quite reach the pitch. swiped away, along the ground, to deep midwicket
rajpoot to rana, no run, lovely delivery, slanting across the left-hander with a bit of outswing. rana doesn't move his feet, just pushes at it, and the ball beats his outside edge by a fair distance
kuldeep yadav to pollard, no run, stock ball this time, turning in towards middle stump. pollard plays from the crease, defends it. didn't seem to read it out of the hand again
patel to watson, no run, sliding on leg, defended down the pitch
sandeep sharma to vishnu vinod, no run, holding its line in the channel outside off, left alone

sandeep sharma to de villiers, four runs, deft. sees some width on offer outside off and just open the face of his bat. beats a diving point to his right as well as the fielder in the deep who runs across but can't get down in time
aaron to jadhav, 1 run, sees some width on offer and pokes his bat without getting close to it, gets an inside edge and they steal the single by the time the bowler can there on the follow-through
sandeep sharma to de villiers, 1 run,
sandeep sharma to mandeep singh, no run, tucked with the angle to midwicket. there is a fielder there, so no run. good, testing over from sandeep
patel to de villiers, no run, comes in with the arm, no turn, de villiers finds an inside to the pad as he tries to tuck it away
patel to de villiers, 1 run, tucked away to deep square for one
stoinis to mandeep singh, 1 run, backs away and the bowler follows him, opens his bat face, more of the outside part of the bat, actually as he knocks it behind square on the off side
patel to binny, no run,
aaron to de villiers, 1 run, turned away to deep midwicket. two fielders converge and they keep it to one
sandeep sharma to binny, 1 run, drives hard away from the body, gives too much power and gets an outside edge that files towards third man. but there is a fielder there and he gets around it

sharma to de villiers, six runs, one more that sails over the roof. de villiers anticipates that the bowler would take it away from him, so he walks across early. gets right on top of it and smashes it over deep square leg. that was all timing and balance
chahal to maxwell, no run, watches him make room, tosses it wide outside off stump and beats his heave
harbhajan singh to dhawan, no run, gets the inner half of the bat as he shapes to drive
harbhajan singh to dhawan, no run, steps out and then defends with the bat close to the pad
harbhajan singh to warner, 1 run, thumped to the off side, buttler misfields at cover to concede a run. that hit his left thigh.
harbhajan singh to warner, no run, slider that skids back in and straightens, warner defends. this one kept a touch low as well
bumrah to warner, 1 run, too quick is warner. chanced a single by dabbing it to point, the throw from rana at the bowler's end wasn't far from the stumps but he'd comfortably made it by then
bumrah to dhawan, 1 run, looked to heave across the line, changed his shot to turn it to the leg side gently in the end
bumrah to warner, four runs, beautiful timing. hint of width from bumrah, warner waits and then opens the bat face late to glide this between point and third man

hh pandya to dhawan, 1 run,  dropped!  he's lost control of the ball on the dive but the ball bounced up and got stuck into his left elbow as he completed the dive. but there is some doubt here.this was struck really firmly by dhawan, krunal did well to move initially to his left and then dish in the dive. as he completed the catch, you couldn't quite see the ball. he thinks he's taken it but there was one point where he was completely covering the ball, which means the cameras couldn't quick pick if the ball hit the turf at that instant. no conclusive evidence.
mcclenaghan to warner, 1 run, too much width outside off, this one's hit hard to harbhajan at deep point
mcclenaghan to warner, four runs, cracking shot. too much width, much slower in pace. sitting up nicely for warner who gives it a proper whack into the point boundary

hh pandya to dhawan, four runs, how lucky is dhawan? looks to walk across to flick it behind square but the ball deflects off a thick inside edge as he swings. parthiv dives to his left but can't get a glove

hh pandya to warner, six runs, stunning! third man missing, and so warner backs away to make room and then uses the bowler's pace to glide that into the square third man boundary. did well to get under it and let his bat do the rest
mcclenaghan to dhawan, 1 run, slapped into the wide long-off region, on the bounce to the fielder. there was width, dhawan picked the bones out of that but couldn't find the gap
kh pandya to dhawan, 1 run, pushes it across outside off, flat-bats it to point
kh pandya to hooda, 1 run, turned away to midwicket for one
mcclenaghan to dhawan, 2 runs, comes down the track and drags it off the inside part of the bat to midwicket
hh pandya to yuvraj singh, four runs, width and put away. buttler at square third man did all the hard work in getting to the ball but bobbled it with the slide. rohit is fuming
malinga to ojha, 1 run, chipped over malinga's outstretched hands on his followthrough, once again turned the bat face early to get a leading edge
nehra to buttler, four runs, angled across just outside off. buttler feebly pokes outside off and gets an inside edge that misses the stumps and runs away to fine leg

nehra to patel, four runs, outside edge for four. needed a slip there. good, testing line from nehra, tempting the batsman to go after him in the corridor. parthiv slashes at this time and gets a healthy edge that shoots through the cordon
nehra to patel, four runs, strong wrists. flicks it uppishly from outside off, keeps it in the air but not a problem as it goes comfortably to the left of and over mid-on
rashid khan to patel, no run, skidding on, just around off, finds the inside edge of parthiv as he looks to defend
rashid khan to patel, no run, backs away to manufacture room and slaps hard to covers
mustafizur rahman to rana, no run,
hooda to rana, 1 run, flat, sliding in on leg, tucked away to deep square leg
hooda to rana, 1 run, comes down the track and looks to go inside-out, gets an inside edge to backward square leg
boult to amla, four runs, swing, in at the thigh guard, hops and whips it off his hips and gets it fine. this time chawla nowhere near
narine to miller, 1 wide, looks for the quick ball coming in after the last two,  starts on leg stump, goes further down
boult to mm sharma, no run, unhappy with his fellow pace. bounces him, gets it well above the helmet but the umpires don't call it wide
sandeep sharma to narine, no run, sandeep swings it in the channel, narine has a bigger swing at it and does not connect
i sharma to gambhir, 1 wide, starts wide outside off, angling away further, off-side wide
patel to gambhir, no run, nice dip from axar, gambhir pokes back to the bowler
mm sharma to gambhir, 1 run, off-stump ball, gambhir opens the face and dabs it to the right of point
patel to pandey, 1 run, slides on outside off, goes hard at the ball and drags an inside edge to square leg
patel to pandey, 1 run, arm ball, slides in, nurdled to backward square leg
stoinis to pandey, no run, another slower delivery outside off, even slower at 105ks, asks pandey to reach out wide outside off. guided to point
southee to gayle, 1 wide, gets the direction wrong. there's some movement in the air but he lands this outside leg, comes back in further to beat the flick. on the bounce to parthiv
harbhajan singh to gayle, no run, drifts one in and spins away from outside off, left alone
harbhajan singh to gayle, no run, slider that comes back in with the arm from wide of the crease, defended back down the pitch
mcclenaghan to gayle, 1 run, plays down the wrong line as he looks to defend, rolls off a thick inside edge to square leg
mcclenaghan to kohli, no run, looks to duck first, then tries to use the pace and ramp it over the slips but missed. mcclenaghan went up in an appeal but it was a very optimistic one
mcclenaghan to kohli, 1 run, square driven to jasprit bumrah at third man
harbhajan singh to gayle, no run, steps out to loft but harbhajan gets this to dip on him nicely, jabs that away in the end. beautiful from harbhajan
bumrah to kohli, no run, hit back to bumrah, who deflects it on his followthrough to mid-off
bumrah to kohli, no run, walks into the drive and crashes it properly, but straight to rohit at cover
harbhajan singh to gayle, 1 run, dabs it wide of harbhajan on the leg side for a quick single
hh pandya to de villiers, 1 run, whipped towards the man coming in from deep midwicket
kh pandya to de villiers, no run, nearly chopped on. backed away to slap this through cover but the ball kept coming back in to take a thick inside edge onto the pad
kh pandya to kohli, 2 runs, opens the face of the bat to ease this towards deep point

bumrah to kohli, four runs, delicate little dab. plays this really late. uses the pace to run this down fine. parthiv had no chance despite the dive. is this the momentum changer rcb needed desperately?
kh pandya to de villiers, 1 run, hit hard to the man at the edge of the ring at cover
kh pandya to kohli, no run, leading edge but safe, straight to point
mcclenaghan to jadhav, 1 run, drilled to mid-off but he completes the run easily. anil chaudhary wants the benefit of a replay. didn't need to, though.
kh pandya to jadhav, 1 run, drifts one on middle and leg, whipped to deep square
bumrah to jadhav, 2 runs, predetermined hoick but he gets a thick inside edge to deep square
bumrah to jadhav, 1 run, squeezes an inside edge to fine leg. looked to back away and steer this behind point
mcclenaghan to negi, 2 runs, swung over the bowler's head, no timing whatsoever
bumrah to binny, 2 runs, swung away but no power or timing whatsoever as he hits it to wide long-off, they come back for the second
badree to pollard, 1 leg bye, nearly walks past this ball. pollard steps out, this is fired down the leg side and he just about gets pad on this
mills to kh pandya, 1 leg bye, this one is quick, 144 kph, thuds into his thigh guard as he looks to turn it into the leg side
chahal to pollard, six runs, what ability, this man. he backs well away this time as well, and it's thrown outside off stump again. but he has enough of a reach to drag this straight over the bowler
nehra to gambhir, no run, a slower ball outside off, slapped to cover from the crease.
nehra to gambhir, no run, nice comeback. tight line, around off. some movement back in, tapped towards the keeper
rashid khan to uthappa, no run, superb start. a legspinner that pitches on off and rips past the edge. uthappa had no idea
rashid khan to pandey, no run, lovely. flat delivery outside off, the ball rips past the outside edge. lovely bowling
rashid khan to pandey, no run, another legbreak on off, pushed to cover
bipul sharma to pandey, no run, oh lovely pace. slow on middle, pushed back to the bowler
bipul sharma to uthappa, 1 run, slow on off, some turn. off the outside edge towards point. excellent pace in that over
henriques to uthappa, 1 run, 133 kph, slower delivery down leg, nudged down to fine leg. uthappa looking really good today
henriques to uthappa, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, pushed to point. 11 off the over so far
rashid khan to uthappa, no run, flat on off, pushed back
nehra to uthappa, 1 run, a nice slower ball outside off, carved down to third man
rashid khan to uthappa, 1 run, flat and wide outside off, hammered to long-off
bipul sharma to pandey, no run, flat and wide outside off, slapped to cover
bipul sharma to pandey, 1 wide, strays down leg for a wide
bipul sharma to pandey, no run, another flat delivery that drifts down leg. pandey walks across, misses a flick. why isn't that a wide?

kumar to pandey, out, that's a change in pace. the slower delivery outside off, pandey is through his lofted drive too early. warner runs in from long-off. bipul runs back from cover. warner takes the catch but wasn't happy with bipul being so close to him. doesn't say anything though
nehra to pathan, 1 wide, drifts down leg does nehra, wide
ut yadav to warner, 1 wide, errs down the leg side for a wide this time
ut yadav to warner, 1 bye, wider on the off side now, warner lets it go and uthappa fumbles to collect it. concedes a bye

boult to dhawan, four runs, hint of swing but he's given too much room on the off side, dhawan flashes and gets a thick edge flying over the slip region for a four. that hit the laptop in the sunrisers dugout
boult to dhawan, no run, bit closer to the off stump, dhawan watches and pushes to point
boult to dhawan, no run, not too much room this time, dhawan punches it to point again
ut yadav to dhawan, no run, nicely bowled on middle and leg, he waits and pushes into the covers
ut yadav to dhawan, no run, tries to steal a single by nudging the ball to mid-on but there's no time
ut yadav to dhawan, four runs, whips with hard hands for another four. don't think he middled it but the swing was such that he got enough power to get the ball to the boundary in the vacant area
ut yadav to dhawan, 1 run, nicely bowled on the off stump, accurate lines. dhawan used the angle and ran it down to third man for one
narine to dhawan, no run, turns it away from outside off, dhawan waits and pushes to cover
narine to warner, 1 run, it turns from leg stump, warner wants to turn it to leg but gets a leading edge towards point
narine to warner, no run, opens up a little for the offspinner and pushes it into the covers
kuldeep yadav to warner, no run, goes the other way with the angle as warner makes room too but can't clear point
kuldeep yadav to warner, no run,
kuldeep yadav to warner, no run, drives it nicely into the covers, well stopped by surya with a dive
narine to warner, no run, turns it away from warner who is a bit surprised by the bounce too after the ball pitched around leg
narine to henriques, 1 run, turns it into the batsman from outside off, he goes back and tucks it to deep midwicket
kuldeep yadav to henriques, no run, not much room this time as the batsman goes back and is strangled for room to only defend it back
kuldeep yadav to yuvraj singh, 1 run, gets his bat close to the pad to defend the turning ball and gets a single to leg
narine to yuvraj singh, 1 run, too much on the leg side now and he tucks it behind square for one
woakes to yuvraj singh, 1 wide, too wide outside off with the angle, left for a wide
woakes to yuvraj singh, 1 wide, another wide on the off side, erring with the lines woakes

woakes to bipul sharma, 1 bye, they sneak a bye basically after the wicketkeeper hits the stumps. naman is backing up, then he stops since bipul has not moved. sees uthappa's underarm throw hit the target, and then sneaks the run

aaron to billings, four runs, fierce. billings is looking busy today. steps down the track against punjab's fastest bowler, meets it on the pitch at a middle stump line and hammers it past his partner at the other end
sharma to billings, 1 run, slower ball at off stump, walks across the stumps and drops this into the off side to bring up his second fifty in the ipl
khan to amla, 1 run, a bit of room, and amla plays a stand-and-deliver flat-bat slap but hits it straight to mid-off moving to his left
anderson to sharma, no run, slower ball slanted across the right-hander. mohit looks to drive through cover, inside-out and the ball beats his outside edge

coulter-nile to samson, four runs, and another. this time the bowler does make a mistake. he gives samson room outside off and he lashes it behind point. beats the infield, and third man is just a spectator
narine to billings, 1 run, whacks it away to the left of deep midwicket
kuldeep yadav to samson, no run, flatter delivery on off stump, defends and it is done so solidly that it races to mid-off
kuldeep yadav to samson, no run, flatter delivery on off stump, blocks
narine to samson, no run, this is the one that goes away from the right-hander, samson reads it off the pitch and blocks
ut yadav to samson, 1 run, leans into the drive, but there is long-off in place now. five men in the deep after the powerplay
ut yadav to nair, 1 run, width outside off, and nair carves it to the right of deep third man. kuldeep does well again
woakes to iyer, 1 run, opens the face to utilise the width outside off and gets a single to third man
woakes to iyer, 1 run, runs it down to third man. that's the time out

narine to nair, no run, dropped. nair was backing away, looking to slap this away. seems like it was the knuckle ball, comes into him. no room, maybe he was expecting the legbreak from narine. gets a good, healthy edge and the keeper puts it down. hit hard into the gloves
kuldeep yadav to pant, 1 run, opens the face of his bat to guide this one to third man but there is a fielder inside the circle and he cannot beat him
kuldeep yadav to mathews, no run, wrong'un from kuldeep, sussed out by the batsman who stays in the crease and fends it off into the off side

woakes to morris, four runs, outside edge races away to the third man boundary. the fielder is up inside the circle, for woakes to bowl the slower ball. he does, but morris is fortunate to beat him, swinging for midwicket

khan to gambhir, out, that was pre-meditated from gambhir and zaheer strikes again. comes down the track very early and zaheer, seeing the batsman's intention, takes it away from him. fires it outside off with the seam pointing there. gambhir responds with a wild heave and finds the leading edge that is held by mathews running back a few steps at backward point
mishra to pandey, no run, sees some width and flays it hard but straight to the fielder at cover
mishra to pandey, 1 wide, tries to take it away from the batsman but fires it too wide outside off

mohammed shami to pandey, 5 wides, misses the batsman's pad as well as the keeper diving to his left. sliding on leg and pandey tries to glance it away, gets the pad outside the line of the ball and it sneaks away just outside leg. keeper fails to stop it as well
mathews to pathan, no run, sliding down the leg side, tries to glance it but misses and the ball kisses the pad on its way to the left of the wicketkeeper
morris to sa yadav, 1 run, backs away and carves it out through covers with an open bat face
i sharma to warner, no run, bursts through his defence. this one is angled to go past off stump, but it straightens after pitching and climbs over the middle stump as warner is fending at it

kumar to maxwell, no run, another inswinger coming in towards off stump, and this one keeps low. maxwell looks to hit it back over the bowler's head, and only manages to toe-end it, along the ground, towards the keeper
kumar to i sharma, 1 run, slower ball at off stump, gets behind the line and taps it into the off side

kaul to sandeep sharma, 1 wide, slower ball, outside off stump. was that wide? looked like it has just come back in from the marker, but it's given. he was looking to hit this over the midwicket boundary
yadav to dhawan, 1 run, a hint of turn. slow outside off, some turn. pushed to long-off
mathews to williamson, 1 wide, drifts down leg for a wide
mathews to williamson, no run, a slower delivery and straight, williamson's flick finds midwicket.
cummins to williamson, 1 run, dabbed away to backward point for a run. 140 kph
mishra to dhawan, 1 run, swept away to deep square leg
cummins to williamson, 2 runs, great stroke. williamson shuffles across and carves the ball behind point. but mathews scampers across to his left to save two
cummins to dhawan, 1 run, dhawan gets across and flicks to deep square leg
mishra to dhawan, 1 run, nicely bowled. slow and wide outside off, sliced to deep cover
mishra to williamson, no run, flat delivery outside off, pushed back to the bowler who throws the ball back to the keeper in a channel outside off. williamson plays the leave
khan to dhawan, 1 run, fifty for dhawan. 120 kph, slower delivery on middle, takes the top edge and travels down to fine leg for a run
mathews to dhawan, 1 run, another slower ball outside off, dhawan struggles for timing. hit to deep midwicket. losing some momentum
morris to dhawan, four runs, edged past the keeper for four. slower ball, was it? outside off. dhawan is through his drive too early. the ball takes the outside edge and beats the keeper for four.
mathews to dhawan, 1 run, well bowled. pace off the ball. slower ball outside off, inside-edged past square leg
morris to hooda, 1 run, a hat-trick ball is pushed to long-off for a run. not a bad result for sunrisers that
kumar to samson, 1 leg bye, tries to flick it away but the ball angles into him and knocks his pad instead on the way to fine leg
mohammed siraj to billings, four runs, closes the face of his bat and plays it early, gets a leading edge that dies to the left of yuvraj who gets down at backward point
mohammed siraj to samson, 1 run, hangs back and opens the face of his bat to run one down to third man
rashid khan to samson, no run, pitching on middle and leg and straightening, defended down the pitch
rashid khan to samson, 1 run, tries to turn into the leg side and is into the shot early. ends up checking it and chipping it in the air towards mid-off
yuvraj singh to samson, no run, left alone outside off
mohammed siraj to iyer, 1 run,

rashid khan to iyer, six runs, good use of the feet. comes down the track, meets the pitch of this. it is pitching outside off and he makes sure to move towards it, keeps a still head and lofts it over long-off
kumar to mathews, 1 wide, trying to take it away from the batsman again but this time he just sends it outside the line outside off
kumar to iyer, 1 bye, ojha fumbles allowing a bye to be taken. slower ball, outside off, iyer backs away and has to reach out for it, can't make contact. sloppy from ojha
harbhajan singh to marsh, no run, 97ks, quicker flatter one, angled in, skewed to point
harbhajan singh to marsh, 1 run, marsh uses his feet, this non-turning offbreak dips on him, takes the inside edge and squirts away behind square on the leg side
kh pandya to saha, 1 run, krunal holds this back and finds some turn outside off, driven to long-off
kh pandya to amla, 1 leg bye, slower through the air, drifts in and takes the pad. leg bye
kh pandya to amla, 1 run, picked off to deep midwicket
kh pandya to saha, 1 run, saha is trying to force the pace. he uses his feet, but does not meet the pitch, the ball turns away. slices an outside edge to where extra cover may have been
kh pandya to saha, 1 wide, leg-side wide

kh pandya to saha, out, saha never really looked comfortable. he uses his feet and misses a straight ball. kings xi's no. 3 hoodoo continues. the ball dips, saha swings across the line, krunal hits the leg stump
kh pandya to amla, 1 wide, flat and angled down leg, wide
bumrah to amla, 1 run, picked off through square leg
mcclenaghan to amla, no run, amla shuffles a long way across off, the bowler chases him. amla can't connect with the scoop
bumrah to amla, 1 run, slower and wider outside off, amla does not spot it. mis-timed down to long-off
sandeep sharma to buttler, no run, pushes into the covers

sandeep sharma to buttler, six runs, is he off? this is a massive hit over midwicket, and it's been set up by a little skimmy down the wicket and towards off stump. allows him to take a ball on fifth stump and skewer it into the crowd
i sharma to buttler, 1 leg bye, you know he feels in form when he goes for the scoop so early. doesn't make a connection though. gets a single towards midwicket
sandeep sharma to buttler, 1 run, backs away again, but this time he tries to hit the ball too hard and gets an inside edge to deep midwicket
i sharma to patel, six runs, it flies again! perfect ball for the pick up shot, on the hips, and parthiv has made a career off hitting these out of the park over square leg
i sharma to buttler, 1 run, pushes towards mid-off for a single

mm sharma to buttler, four runs, stand and deliver! he is almost deceived by the slower ball, but adjusts, holds the bat in the backlift that little bit longer and by virtue of that he is able to cream it to the left of mid-off

mm sharma to buttler, four runs, superb shot! it's the slower ball off the back of the hand, buttler picks it. makes room so that by the time it pitches as a hafl-volley on middle he is able to smear it through extra cover
stoinis to patel, 1 wide, highest score by mumbai in the powerplay in all ipls and the mark is reached off a slower ball becoming an offside wide, the error brought about by the carnage earlier
stoinis to patel, 1 run, gets under a wide ball outside off and lifts it over the covers. doesn't time it well because of the lack of pace.
patel to buttler, 1 run, jumps back against a flatter delivery on off stump and flicks it to deep square leg
patel to rana, no run, well bowled. zips it past the flashing rana bat outside off stump. lovely low take from saha
patel to rana, 1 leg bye, looks to nudge it through square leg, but has to settle for a leg bye
stoinis to rana, 1 run, great effort from sandeep on the third man boundary. saves three runs by running quickly to his right and putting in the desperate dive. deft little dab from rana only for one
patel to rana, 1 wide, pushes it through, but in trying to do so, in trying to prevent giving room, he slips down leg
patel to rana, 1 run, taps it to the left of the bowler and pinches a single
swapnil singh to buttler, 1 run, good work swapnil. he sees buttler coming down the track, and making room. he still tosses it up, but wide outside off to foil the timing. only a single to deep cover
sandeep sharma to buttler, 1 wide, looks to skirt the off-side wide line, but he does so on the wrong side. that makes the equation 48 off 48 balls in a chase of 199. this has been a mauling

mm sharma to buttler, out, this is high, who's getting under it? it's the captain. mohit starts a new spell with a slower ball, buttler loses his shape in trying to hit it as hard as he could. ends up skewing it high and maxwell, at mid-off, takes a good catch. super innings. broke the chase all on his own.
mm sharma to rana, 1 run, picks the slower ball this time, waits on his punch to long-off, and delivers it perfectly
mm sharma to rana, 2 runs, picks the slower ball and pastes it to the right of long-off. good, hard running gets them two
morris to patel, no run, gets some room, parthiv crunches it to point and shreyas dives to his left for a superb stop with both hands

morris to buttler, no run, dropped it, but how! it went straight to rishabh pant - over his head - after buttler went across for a scoop and managed a thin edge. pant didn't have to move, he put his hands up to catch but his arms were in a tangle. how costly will that be?
khan to buttler, 1 run, towards middle and leg at 126kph, buttler pushes it to mid-on for one
khan to buttler, 1 wide, one more wide - zaheer rolls his fingers over that one but it goes down leg

rabada to buttler, six runs, makes room again and connects well this time - six to the cow corner. rabada pitched it up as the ball angled in and buttler swung hard to flay it to leg. good catch by the ball boy though just outside the rope
rabada to buttler, no run, swings again, rabada changes pace and buttler misses this time
khan to buttler, four runs, errs down the leg side, buttler tickles it pretty fine on the leg side for four more
khan to buttler, 1 run, misfield at mid-off from mishra for a single. zaheer pitched it on middle and buttler pushed it back with a straight bat before mishra fumbled
morris to sharma, no run, nice and accurate from from morris as he pitches it just outside off again, rohit defends it again
cummins to sharma, 1 run, touch closer to off and still back of lengt, rohit slices it to third man

mishra to sharma, out, they are giving them away - rohit has swept it to deep backward square leg for a good catch from cummins. rohit took a big stride towards the ball and swept that one hard against the spin, cummins was at long leg and ran a bit to his left for a catch around shoulder height with both hands. looks like that was a wrong'un and rohit did pick it, and then picked the fielder too
mishra to pollard, no run, some turn away from pollard from lenght, he waits in the crease and defends into the off side
mishra to pollard, no run, stays back again, this one skidded towards the stumps and pollard defended it back

cummins to kh pandya, no run, big appeal for caught behind, there was some noise, but the appeal is turned down. cummins angled it across from off stump, krunal tried to chop and replays show there was no edge and it was not even the bat flicking the pad.
cummins to kh pandya, 1 run, moves across a little and tucks it from close to his waist to deep square leg
cummins to pollard, 1 leg bye, angling in at 146kph, he tries to work it to leg but doesn't connect. still gets a leg bye
rabada to kh pandya, 2 runs, towards krunal's hips again, he goes across a bit and nudged with soft hands towards deep midwicket for two quick runs
khan to kh pandya, four runs, it's only 125kph and there's plenty of room for krunal to open his arms and swing it through the covers for four
khan to pollard, no run, pretty accurate at 130kph on middle stump, rolled his fingers over that one and pollard defends it back
khan to pollard, 1 run, towards the leg side and easily tucked away to fine leg for one
mishra to pollard, 1 wide, skids one with the angle down the leg side for a wide
mishra to pollard, no run, back to the stumps and pollard blocks it back
mishra to hh pandya, no run, nice bit of zip outside off, there's turn too and he defends to cover hesitantly

khan to pollard, 1 run, that was close! pollard swung his bat hard and didn't connect that well, the ball went to midwicket as the batsmen went for the run and pollard dragged his bat in as mishra missed the stumps
mishra to pollard, 1 run, flatter one skidding in towards the stumps, he slices it to point
mishra to pollard, 1 run, another one turning away and pollard drives with the turn too, for one more
cummins to pollard, no run, outside off now with hardly any room, he defends towards the covers
johnson to iyer, no run, pretty close to the batsman as the ball goes away with the angle, iyer tries to work it to third man but misses. it almost took the edge
mcclenaghan to nair, no run, skiddy at 135 on off stump, he tries drives it down but manages only an inside edge onto his pad
mcclenaghan to anderson, no run, angling in towards middle and leg, anderson defends it to leg
mcclenaghan to anderson, no run, more towards the middle stump now, no room at all and he defends it back again
johnson to nair, no run, some room outside off, he drives into the covers gently and extra cover stops it
bumrah to pant, no run, angles it away from pant outside off, he leaves it alone
bumrah to pant, no run, targets the off stump now, pant stays still and defends it back
bumrah to rabada, 1 wide, outside the off stump, it's pretty wide and he lets it go
hh pandya to morris, 1 bye, another ball outside off, morris lets it go but gets a bye because of a fumble
harbhajan singh to morris, no run, just a hint of turn from outside off, he defends it back
harbhajan singh to morris, no run, good turn as he pitches it well outside off, morris hangs back but is unable to connect properly a he looks to work it to leg
hh pandya to morris, 1 run, johnson has a shy at the non-striker's end but misses, could have been close. morris unleashed another firm drive, this one just wide of mid off for a quick single
hh pandya to rabada, 1 run, pitches it wide of off now, he helps it to third man for one
harbhajan singh to morris, no run, flatter and straighter outside off, tries to drive and misses

harbhajan singh to rabada, six runs, goes over pollard at long off and the ball boy drops it too! he came down the track and lofted that high with the spin with a straight bat and got enough to beat pollard's jump
harbhajan singh to rabada, 1 run, drives it firmly in the air into the covers for one
harbhajan singh to morris, 1 run, turning in and morris tucks it patiently to leg for one
bumrah to rabada, no run, slower one at 111kph, rabada spots it and drives it straight to cover
harbhajan singh to rabada, no run, flatter delivery coming in, loud appeal for lbw as rabada is hit on the back pad but it's turned down probably because it was going down leg
harbhajan singh to rabada, no run, straighter towards the stumps and it's another solid defence from rabada
johnson to morris, no run, morris hits his partner rabada with a lofted drive and apologises immediately. mid off was in so he probably wanted to get four straight runs but found rabada instead
johnson to morris, no run, outside off, driven into the covers this time
harbhajan singh to rabada, no run, pretty flat outside off, he chops it to point
kh pandya to morris, no run, outside the off stump again, pushed into the covers
kh pandya to morris, 1 run, goes across the turn this time to bunt the ball to leg for one
mcclenaghan to morris, 1 run, a risky single as morris slams the ball to mid off and sets off for a single, hardik threw the ball but no direct hit and morris was safe
mcclenaghan to morris, 1 run, well outside off, morris goes towards the ball and guides it behind square on leg
mcclenaghan to morris, no run, way too wide outside of, he should have left it but he middles and it finds rohit at cover

bumrah to rabada, out, this one's on leg stump, rabada misses again but bumrah doesn't. bumrah rolled his fingers over it again, it was slow and rabada was through with the shot as the ball hit the base of leg stump. but a very impressive knock from rabada on debut
hh pandya to cummins, 1 run, slices the last ball from outside off behind square, mitch j stops it at the boundary and mumbai have defended 142 on this batsmen-friendly ground
mills to gambhir, no run, gets this to bounce awkwardly, coming into his rib cage as gambhir hops back. rapped on the glove as he tried to fend. wasn't watching the ball
mills to gambhir, no run, hops back and across as she tucks it to square leg. wanted the run but was sent back. good work from chahal, who swooped in quickly from midwicket to prevent the run
aravind to gambhir, four runs, uses the pace to glide this past gayle at wide slip. third man was square and had no chance
mills to gambhir, 1 run, misfield by mandeep at point gives away a single. delicate little dab from gambhir by hopping back. mandeep slipped.
mills to uthappa, no run, goes back into the crease and defends. eventful over
aravind to uthappa, 1 run, hesitation.  uthappa had given up and hoped negi would miss the direct hit from point.  fortunately for him, he missed. total breakdown in commiunication
aravind to narine, 1 run, dabbed wide of cover, once again uncertainty in the running, they eventually get across. hit this well to kohli, who misfielded.
badree to pathan, no run, sharp turn from off stump, yusuf hangs back and blocks. better second over from badree
chahal to pandey, 1 run, driven with the spin to long-off
chahal to sa yadav, 1 run, drives, gets a thick inside edge to midwicket
chahal to pandey, 1 run, slow turn from middle, pandey makes room and punches it to deep point
badree to sa yadav, no run, slider on middle from wide of the crease, defended back down the pitch
negi to woakes, no run, driven with the spin to cover
negi to woakes, no run, steps out to whip it away but gets a thick inside edge onto the pad, rolls back to the bowler
chahal to woakes, no run, looks to drive but gets a thick inside edge, rolls back to the bowler
chahal to woakes, 1 run, lofted but not entirely in control, on the bounce to mandeep at deep point. sliced it
chahal to sa yadav, no run, beauty! sharp turn across the face of the bat to beat him comprehensively
negi to sa yadav, 1 run, drifts in, surya waits for it to spin away as he drives wide of cover
negi to woakes, no run, arm-ball which skids back in from around the stumps, woakes makes room and steers this to point
negi to coulter-nile, 1 wide, walks across the stumps again, gets an arm ball that slides down leg. would have slid into his leg if he hadn't moved, but this is no game for a bowler. wide
coulter-nile to gayle, 1 leg bye, looks to flick but the ball swings back in late to deflect off  the pad to fine leg
coulter-nile to mandeep singh, 1 run, gets on top of the bounce and runs it down to third man to get off the mark
coulter-nile to gayle, 1 run, leading edge that flies past where third slip would've been, down to third man. looked to flick but this one held its line
coulter-nile to binny, no run, looks to drive, minimal feet movement, gets an inside edge back to the bowler. bat came down at an angle
coulter-nile to binny, no run, thumped but straight to the cover fielder
ut yadav to gayle, 1 run, edged but down to third man. squared up again, just wide of yusuf at slip. gayle is living on the edge at the moment

de grandhomme to negi, out, got the previous one to slant away, brought this back in to nail him. super. negi looks to work across the line when he should have been looking to play straighter. once he missed, he was a dead duck. eden gardens roars.  rcb in danger of being bowled out for the lowest-ever ipl score
woakes to nair, 1 run, chops it down off the under edge again, this ball climbed a little more than the previous one, but the timing was off once more. uthappa cleans up to his left
khan to gambhir, no run, gambhir also reaches for his first ball, trying to slash a wide one outside off stump, he doesn't make contact, zaheer nipping the ball both ways
khan to gambhir, 1 run, another slower one, on a straighter line, gambhir once again played too early, he was trying to force the ball on the off side but got an inside edge on to the leg side

rabada to narine, out, there's how you deal with a pinch-hitter, the stumps in disarray. serious speed, pitching around leg stump and seaming across the left-hander. narine stays back - he's not going to rush at rabada's pace - and gets squared up, the ball screams past the outside edge and uproots off stump
morris to gambhir, no run, stays in his crease to one that angles across him and drives into the off side again, timing and placement aren't great
morris to gambhir, 1 run, played wide of mid-off for a quick single, nair ran to his left, picked up cleanly but missed at the non-striker's end
rabada to gambhir, 1 run, pushed into the off side for another quick single
rabada to gambhir, 1 run, flicked off middle stump towards midwicket for a quick single
mishra to gambhir, 1 run, steps out and dabs the ball towards square leg for a single
morris to uthappa, 1 run, played to fine leg for a single
morris to uthappa, 1 run, stays back and opens the face to take the 19th run off the over towards third man
cummins to uthappa, 1 run, stays back and opens the face to run the ball down to third man
cummins to gambhir, 1 run, stays back again and guides the ball towards third man for one more
cummins to gambhir, 1 run, stays back, opens the face and runs the ball to third man
mishra to gambhir, no run, played back to the bowler
morris to jackson, 2 runs, driven through midwicket, a fumble allows two runs
morris to gambhir, 1 run, he was looking to flick that ball but got an outside edge that races towards the third man boundary, mishra does well with the sliding save
i sharma to dhawan, no run, pitches outside leg, comes in, and hits the thigh of dhawan as he misses with the flick now. the ball wanders away through the covers
patel to warner, no run, pushed through on off, hit to mid-on
patel to warner, four runs, this is speared on the stumps, but warner manufactures swinging room by backing away outside leg. crunched through the covers. clean strike
patel to warner, no run, dropped. saha shells it behind the stumps. flatter and skids on outside off, warner pushes at the ball and nicks it, saha can't hang onto the chance. it bursts out
cariappa to warner, no run, stump-to-stump line, flat dart, flat-batted straight to cover
maxwell to dhawan, 1 run, slides on outside off, dabbed to backward point
maxwell to warner, 1 run, slower through the air, drifts in, takes the pad and rolls to cover. one leg bye
maxwell to dhawan, 1 run, long hop on the leg stump, keeps a bit low, swatted away to deep square leg
maxwell to warner, no run, slides in with the arm on middle, no room, pushed to the right of maxwell

maxwell to warner, 1 run, fired outside off, dabbed late to point, where anureet fumbles. misses a run-out opportunity. warner stopped midway because of a miscommunication, but had enough time to recover and complete a half-century with that single
maxwell to dhawan, 1 run, nudged to midwicket for one. dhawan now brings up his own fifty
maxwell to warner, 1 run, hip-high ball on leg stump, swatted away
cariappa to williamson, 1 run, tossed-up legbreak, eased with the turn to point
patel to williamson, no run,
patel to williamson, 1 run, straight ball on middle, williamson ventures leg side of the ball and dabs a single to cover
maxwell to yuvraj singh, 1 run, 101ks offbreak outside off, smeared to the covers
maxwell to yuvraj singh, no run, straight ball on middle, defended back to maxwell with a straight bat
cariappa to yuvraj singh, 1 run, slapped away again, this time to vohra's left
cariappa to williamson, 1 run, pushed through on off, shovelled or rather swept away to leg
cariappa to yuvraj singh, 1 run, yuvraj skips out, but does not meet the pitch of this quickish flat ball outside off. heaves to deep midwicket off the inside half
maxwell to henriques, no run, tossed on middle, but maxwell made room, backing away outside leg, driving inside-out straight to cover
nehra to marsh, no run,
kaul to marsh, 1 run, off-stump ball, marsh opens the face and manipulates a single to deep third man
hooda to marsh, 1 run, another hip-high off-stump ball, swatted to deep midwicket
henriques to marsh, 1 run, leg-side ball, deflected behind square past the keeper
rashid khan to marsh, no run, flatter and quicker, skids in to rap the pad but this was heading down leg. pitched outside leg too

kaul to morgan, 1 run, morgan pre-meditates shuffles a fair way across off. kaul spots it and sends down a 120ks slower ball wide past him. morgan fetches it from there and shovels it to the midwicket region
rashid khan to morgan, no run, legbreak, comes in, inside-edged onto the pad
rashid khan to marsh, 1 run,
rashid khan to morgan, no run, pushed through on a fourth-stump line, morgan skips back and lashes it to cover
rashid khan to morgan, 1 run, slower legbreak, dips, takes the inside edge and runs to square leg
rashid khan to marsh, no run,
rashid khan to marsh, 1 run, marsh comes down the track to this skiddy legbreak on middle, ends up chopping the ball to cover
nehra to anureet singh, 1 run, anureet now moves away outside leg, this is a slower ball chasing him. he dabs it down to third man
kumar to anureet singh, no run, slower ball outside off, the batsman swings early and does not make contact
kumar to mm sharma, 1 run, mohit stays leg side of the ball and guides it to point
natarajan to samson, 1 wide, walks at the bowler, doesn't have to do much in the end, because this is down the leg side at waist height
yadav to dhawan, 1 run, slower ball, pace off the ball on off. dhawan pushes one to mid-on
pathan to warner, 1 run, it's the last ball so he picks a single to midwicket to keep strike.
narine to warner, 1 wide, strays down leg for a wide
narine to warner, no run, flat on middle and leg, looks for one through midwicket but misses. first one he's missed tonight?
kuldeep yadav to dhawan, no run, hit up towards mid-off
kuldeep yadav to dhawan, 1 wide, goes down leg again, another wide. uthappa fails to collect again
kuldeep yadav to dhawan, no run, flat on off, pushed up towards cover
kuldeep yadav to warner, four runs, another switch-hit. nails it again. wow. flat delivery on off, warner gets low and crisply nails it through point. sensational stuff
yadav to dhawan, no run, another slow ball, dhawan picks out midwicket. dhawan is 19 of 22. warner almost had a ton
narine to dhawan, 1 run, nudged away behind square for a run.
narine to warner, 1 run, flat on off, hammered wide of long-off. woakes gets across to his right to save three. kw slipped at the other end, couldn't come back for two
coulter-nile to williamson, 2 runs, gets across and flicks the ball wide of square leg for a couple
mohammed siraj to gambhir, no run, angling it across, good pace and hardly any room again, he tries to nudge and misses again
mohammed siraj to gambhir, 1 run, goes a bit wider and gambhir runs it down to third man this time
kaul to gambhir, no run, pretty straight and tight on off stump, gambhir blocks it back with a straight bat
kaul to uthappa, no run, angles it down the leg side, could have been a wide but flicks the pad
kaul to uthappa, no run, better line - angling into uthappa around middle and leg, pushed down to mid-on now
kaul to uthappa, four runs, angling in again, might have expected it and swats it away between mid-on and midwicket to get off the mark
mohammed siraj to uthappa, no run, leans into the ball a little and defends into the off side

mohammed siraj to uthappa, four runs, delicate stuff, nicely done for four! pitched it well outside off, uthappa didn't move much, waited for the ball and nudged it late enough to beat the wide slip and early enough to avoid the keeper

kaul to pandey, 1 run, call for a quick single, pandey runs hard and rashid has a shy at bowler's end and misses. pandey nudged the slower delivery to the leg side and took off immediately, rashid sprang in too but needed a direct hit
henriques to pandey, no run, he tries to work the ball to leg, but it has some bounce and takes his pad
rashid khan to uthappa, no run, tries to nudge it late this time with the turn, misses again
rashid khan to pandey, no run, plays for the turn, tries to work it to off but it zips past him

henriques to uthappa, 1 run, yuvraj tries the direct hit at keeper's end, misses! he hits the batsman's bat instead. it was just outside off, uthappa defended with soft hands for a quick single and took off, but yuvraj could not get the stumps
rashid khan to pandey, no run, some turn there outside off, maybe the batsman didn't expect it so outside off and he left it
rashid khan to pandey, 1 run, closer to the stumps now, defends it late towards point for another quick single
bipul sharma to pandey, 1 wide, slow and flat down leg for a wide
bipul sharma to pandey, 1 run, comes down again, but there's not pace on the ball and he chips it towards deep midwicket
bipul sharma to pandey, 1 run, towards the leg side again, leading edge goes towards midwicket but there's no fielder there. dhawan runs in from the deep to keep it to one
henriques to uthappa, 1 run, another slower delivery, he swings again but gets an inside edge towards the keeper for one
henriques to pathan, 1 run, ball angles in towards the stumps, he bunts it to leg for one

mohammed siraj to uthappa, out, holes out to long off, warner takes the catch, turns around to the crowd and punches the air with aggression! siraj bowled it slow and well outside off, uthappa went for the big shot and slapped it straight to the captain
kaul to pathan, no run, slower one at 122kph outside off, it was the knuckle ball, and yusuf swing his arms but missed

kaul to pathan, no run, chance of a run out, slightly inaccurate throw from henriques. yusuf slammed the ball to cover and jackson was more than halfway down the pitch but yusuf said no a few times, slightly wayward throw saved jackson as he came back
kaul to pathan, 1 run, slower one again, well outside off, he gets an inside edge to the leg side for one
rashid khan to jackson, 1 run, takes a step down and punches it to long off
rashid khan to pathan, 3 wides, that one's gone down the leg side past the batsman, for three wides
kumar to de grandhomme, four runs, goes back towards the stumps, the ball angles towards the leg side and he manages some inside edge to sneak in four runs
kumar to de grandhomme, 1 run, a little bit outside the off stump and he drives it square of the wicket for one
mohammed siraj to de grandhomme, no run, outside the off stump this time, big swing and a miss
kumar to jackson, 1 run, towards the middle stump now, he swings but manages an inside edge towards square leg

kumar to jackson, out, the teenager takes another catch, this time at deep midwicket. no pace on the ball, only angling in a bit and jackson swings it away, not with the kind of power cdg does, and it sails towards the boundary where rashid is ready to pouch it
kaul to woakes, 1 run, nice pace from kaul, just outside off and he defends it for one
kaul to woakes, 1 run, another slower delivery, closer to the batsman, and a leading edge goes to leg for one
mcclenaghan to negi, 1 run, slower ball outside off stump, drops it into the covers with soft hands
yadav to warner, no run, slow turn from middle, he's right back inside the crease as he defends
rabada to dhawan, 1 run, another one on middle and leg, wrists it to corey anderson at deep square leg

yadav to dhawan, 2 runs, steps out and turns one to mid-on where morris misfields to give away an extra run. dhawan had to scamper for the first, and that had morris scrambling in to fire the throw but didn't pick it up cleanly
morris to warner, 1 run,  another misfield.  this time the cover fielder dives over the ball.
morris to dhawan, four runs,  jayasuriya-esque.  gets on top of the bounce and uses the width to slap this behind point. third man had no chance
morris to dhawan, no run, hustled for pace as morris hits the deck hard at 143kph, dhawan is back inside the crease as he blocks
yadav to dhawan, 1 run, nurdles one on middle and leg to deep square
yadav to williamson, no run, skids back in to hit him on the left pad. bounce from the deck. tossed it up nicely as well
mishra to dhawan, no run, slider across dhawan, who bunts it to samson at point
mishra to williamson, 1 run, flatter one angling in from wide of the crease, turned to deep midwicket
yadav to williamson, 1 run, whips one on middle and leg to deep square leg
yadav to yuvraj singh, 1 run, stops on him, yuvraj through with an attempted punch, skews it off the top part of the bat to long-off
yadav to williamson, 1 run, gets across the stumps and turns an incoming delivery to deep square leg
mishra to williamson, 1 run, wrong'un that spins back in sharply to take an inside edge to square leg
mishra to yuvraj singh, 1 run, slider across yuvraj, who punches it to long-off
mohammed shami to henriques, 1 run, dabs it gently into the gap at cover for a quick single. yuvraj had to hurry, responded immediately to his partner's call
mishra to yuvraj singh, no run, spins back in from off, driven straight to cover.
mishra to henriques, 1 run, eased with the spin to long-off
morris to henriques, 1 run, steep bounce but the change of pace means it stops on henriques who gets a leading edge to the off side

rabada to yuvraj singh, (no ball) four runs, threads the gap on the off side. made room to generate power on the swing, powered to the deep cover boundary. what's better is it will be a  free-hit  as rabada overstepped
mohammed siraj to samson, 1 run, slower ball close to off stump, lets it come on for the dab to third man
rashid khan to pant, no run, quickish on leg stump this time. looks to flick and ends up with his head falling over. misses, a bit of an lbw appeal, but that was turning down leg
rashid khan to iyer, no run, quick, sharp legbreak outside off. no footwork from iyer, and in the end, seeing how much it turned, no stroke either
