kaul to iyer, no run, slower ball outside off, iyer doesn't quite read the pace of it. wanted to dab to third man and in the end he just stood there with his bat at the top of his backlift, not sure when to bring his bat down
mohammed siraj to anderson, 1 run,

mohammed siraj to anderson, six runs, slower ball outside leg. that line was to counter anderson looking to make himself room. on this occasion anderson spotted it early and just whipped it over the square leg boundary
watson to sharma, 1 run, bounces him at off stump, he sways backwards and fends this to third man
sandeep sharma to mandeep singh, no run, swing there as usual for sandeep, brings it into mandeep who defends the ball to leg

sandeep sharma to mandeep singh, 1 run, he wants a quick single, gayle is scrambling to the keeper's end as mohit swoops in from mid-on to fire a throw but misses. it was another inswinger, sltraighter this time, which mandeep pushed to mid-on with a straight bat

sandeep sharma to gayle, out, comes down and hands a catch straight to point! it was another swinging delivery from sandeep, gayle walked down in line with the leg stump and the ball swung enough to take the outside edge and fly straight to the fielder
sandeep sharma to kohli, four runs, the ball is bang on middle stump and what does kohli do first ball? shuffles across to glance it fine down the leg side for four. such confidence and anticipation
sandeep sharma to kohli, 2 runs, doesn't move that much now and waits for the ball to swing in to drive it past midwicket for two in the gap
sandeep sharma to mandeep singh, 1 run, no movement now, slightly outside off and mandeep chops it to third man

sandeep sharma to kohli, out, he's got kohli too, clean bowled! kohli charged down quickly, it was an inswinger from sandeep which pitched around off and middle and came in, kohli swung hard and missed it completely. what a blow for rcb, what accurate bowling from sandeep

sandeep sharma to de villiers, no run, there's an appeal for a run out as ab drove that dead straight and it hit the stumps at non-striker's end. sandeep is claiming it touched his fingers and replays show it did. it looks like mandeep's bat was down just in time but the third umpire wants to be 120% sure. not out gives the local crowd some relief
aaron to mandeep singh, no run, swings it away pretty wide outside off but it's just inside the wide line

aaron to mandeep singh, four runs, makes a bit of room and slices that with a thickish edge just over and wide of point! aaron wasn't giving too much room so he made some on his own and gave it enough aerial route to keep it far from point
aaron to mandeep singh, no run, good delivery to end the over - 142kph, seams in a bit from outside off, mandeep is hurried a little bit to defend it just in time to off
sandeep sharma to de villiers, no run, keeps it straight and simple around off, it's pushed down towards mid-on

sandeep sharma to de villiers, out, ab caught behind, sandeep is on fire! this is beautiful swing bowling from sandeep under pressure. he keeps his head and bowls it in the channel just outside off with lovely shape, ab charges down like kohli and gets a thick outside edge for saha to snap it easily
sandeep sharma to jadhav, no run, he takes a step or two down to negate the swing, sandeep tries to shape it away a little from off and kj defends it back nicely
aaron to mandeep singh, 1 run, makes some room to guide it to point, fumble from guptill concedes a single
aaron to jadhav, no run, 145kmh, nicely bowled outside off, jadhav leans into it to defend from the middle to mid off
sandeep sharma to mandeep singh, no run, shapes it away nicely from around off stump, mandeep watches cautiously and defends with a straight bat
sandeep sharma to jadhav, 1 run, no footwork from jadhav, just hangs back and guides it to third man with the swing
sandeep sharma to mandeep singh, no run, back to the tight line outside off and mandeep defends it to point
sandeep sharma to mandeep singh, no run, little straighter around off, swings it away a little and mandeep bunts it down to mid on
sharma to jadhav, 1 run, seams his first ball in towards off and middle, he defends it to leg
sharma to mandeep singh, no run, aims for the middle stump now, no room whatsover as it seams in, mandeep helps it to cover point
sharma to mandeep singh, no run, 109kph, deceives him by pitching it up and taking the pace off, it was the knuckle ball. mandeep swung big and hard but missed outside off
patel to mandeep singh, no run, bit slower through the air towards middle and leg, he defends it to leg
patel to mandeep singh, no run, hardly any room again and he pushes it to cover with a straight bat
sharma to mandeep singh, four runs, away movement outside off, there's room for mandeep and he slays it to the right of a diving point fielder for a cracking four. there's still hope for rcb
patel to mandeep singh, 1 run, darts it towards off stump, pushed into the covers for one
patel to watson, 1 run, slower through the air outside off, helped wide of point for one more
patel to mandeep singh, 1 run, comes in with the angle a bit, mandeep goes back and tucks it to leg
patel to negi, 1 run, goes back and across a bit and tucks the ball with the turn towards midwicket. off the mark straightaway
maxwell to negi, 1 run, gets an edge first ball, negi wanted to punch that into the off side but got a thick inside edge just past the keeper for a single
maxwell to aravind, 1 run,
maxwell to negi, no run, outside off with some room, defends it to cover
aaron to negi, 1 wide, errs down the leg side for a wide
aaron to negi, 1 run, waits in the crease this time for the ball outside off and chops it to point
maxwell to aravind, 1 run, towards middle and leg this time and it's swept behind square
maxwell to negi, 1 run, waits for the ball in the crease and tucks it to leg for one more
maxwell to aravind, no run, lbw shout from maxwell, but aravind got an inside edge on this flat delivery from outside off
aaron to negi, four runs, swings it well outside off, big edge flies over the slip region for four. he made room but the ball was well outside off as it is
maxwell to badree, 1 wide, strays down leg for a wide
sharma to negi, no run, starts with a slower ball at 107kph outside off, he pitched it up, negi chased and missed
sharma to negi, 1 run, just outside off, negi uses the angle and helps it to point
sharma to badree, 1 run, some away movement, slower knuckle ball again, badree crunches it through the covers for one
khan to simmons, no run, hey, howdy, ho!
khan to simmons, no run,  beauty!  this one nips away off the seam from middle to square him up. no feet movement from simmons as he feels for the delivery
khan to simmons, 1 run, gets a thick inside edge on the drive to mid-on. looked to hit through cover but this curved back in late
rabada to simmons, 1 run, firm drive but good reflexes by rabada, puts his boot out on the followthrough to stop it. they'll take a run as he deflects it to the off side
rabada to simmons, 2 runs, walks down the pitch and lofts this over the infield, looked to hit over mid-on but just managed to clear sanju samson at midwicket. bat face turned in his hand
mishra to simmons, 1 leg bye, slider that drifts into middle, simmons gives him the charge and then plays it away to the off side using the pad. not deliberate though, so a leg-bye it will be
mohammed shami to simmons, four runs, gets on top of the bounce and slashes this away behind point. not the best start from mohammed shami

mohammed shami to simmons, four runs, this was nothing more than a steer again, but so much power on the stroke. width from shami, he gets on top of the bounce and does well to keep it down. just a tiny little gap to hit between cover point and point
mohammed shami to simmons, 1 run, forced off the backfoot to rabada at deep cover

mohammed shami to patel, no run, looks to help this to fine leg, but the ball lobs on the bounce off the back of the bat to midwicket. for a moment, parthiv wasn't sure where it went and took off for a single, only to be sent back.  he would've been gone if there was a direct hit at the striker's end.
mishra to patel, 2 runs, steps out and whips this into the gap between deep square and deep midwicket
mishra to pollard, no run, slider on middle from wide of the crease, defended back down the pitch
mohammed shami to simmons, four runs, clean strike! picks the slower ball this time, makes room and slaps this into the gap between long-off and deep cover. superb
mishra to pollard, no run, waits for the ball to grip and spin away as he stabs that to the off side
cummins to simmons, 2 runs, flayed into the gap between deep cover and deep point.
khan to pollard, 1 run,
khan to rg sharma, 1 run, jags back in to take a thick inside edge to midwicket

anderson to pandya, 2 wides, did it slip out of his hand? looked to fire this wide, ended up bowling it way outside, so much that even the keeper couldn't use his reach to stop it cleanly. one extra run results
rabada to pollard, 2 wides, pant fumbles as he misses a faint tickle down leg, so an extra run as well. hardik was alert to the possibility of the single
rabada to pandya, no run, looks to back away and squeeze it behind point but can't get bat to it
mcclenaghan to iyer, 1 run, a dinky little dab to point helps him retain strike.
malinga to nair, no run, 136kph, gets up a little higher than karun expects, and so he decides not to nudge to midwicket but instead block down the pitch
mcclenaghan to nair, no run, slower ball, at 118 kph, nair drives to mid-on

mcclenaghan to nair, six runs, thwack! he is reading these slower balls like a fortune teller. they must pop up in his crystal ball before he gets into his stance. now armed with that information, this doesn't look that good a shot really. just a swing over the square leg boundary

malinga to anderson, four runs, belts it away. there is room to free the arms, and those arms have a lot of strength in them. anderson was belting these every third ball when he made the then fastest century in odis on new years day a few years ago
malinga to anderson, no run, ripper. he has been accurate and menacing. now he gets the pitch to do his dirty work. kicks up after hitting the deck and beats a flailing anderson
harbhajan singh to samuels, no run, beats him as samuels keeps expecting spin, but the offbreak skids through to the wicketkeeper
harbhajan singh to samuels, 1 run, tosses it up outside off, drives it to long-off
harbhajan singh to cummins, no run, doosra, and cummins reads it as if it is a hieroglyphic. lucky his hard-handed poke doesn't carry to slip
harbhajan singh to cummins, 1 run, mistimes a push towards cover to take on the fast bowlers at the other end.
kv sharma to cummins, no run, hangs back and punches a flatter delivery outside off to point

harbhajan singh to cummins, out, gorgeous bowling. he's bowling the doosra again! for so long, he had hidden this delivery. but now he's wrapped cummins up in a nice little bow. the batsman is caught in his crease, he plays for the ball turning into him, trying to milk a single to midwicket. instead he edges it to the wicketkeeper and parthiv does really well to take the catch too
harbhajan singh to khan, no run, tosses it up on off stump, defends
kv sharma to mishra, 1 wide, pitches the legspinner a bit too wide, and it turns sharply past the batsman's reach

kv sharma to mishra, no run, how has that missed off stump?. this is quicker, flatter and meant for middle stump. but once it pitches on this dry surface, it rags across past the outside edged and the three sticks
kv sharma to khan, no run, these are grand deliveries. snaking in with the arm, pitching beyond the reach of the batsman and turning wildly past the edge
yadav to kohli, no run, 142kph, nice outswing from outside the off stump, he lets it go
yadav to kohli, no run, 137kph, just outside off and no movement, kohli stays back again and punches it down to mid on
yadav to kohli, 1 run, stays a bit low as umesh goes wider outside off, kohli runs it to third man to get off the mark
woakes to mandeep singh, no run, angling in towards middle now, mandeep waits and defends it on off
yadav to kohli, 1 run, some extra bounce outside off surprises kohli a bit as he defends it to off
woakes to mandeep singh, 1 run, comes in a little bit, he tucks it behind square on the leg side for one
woakes to de villiers, 2 runs, comes down the pitch and runs the ball wide of third man with soft hands and he comes back in time for the second
narine to de villiers, four runs, shuffles across the other side this time, narine pitches it wide outside off and ab lofts it over the cover-point region in the vacant area
narine to head, no run, not much turn outside off, head defends tentatively into the off side

narine to head, no run, there's an appeal for a stumping. narine turned it away from the batsman, who looked to drive and missed, jackson whipped the bails off immediately but head's back toe never left the crease
yadav to mandeep singh, 1 wide, tries the slower one again, compromises on the accuracy and it's a wide down leg
narine to mandeep singh, 1 run, loops it nicely around off, mandeep drives it down to mid on

narine to head, 2 runs, direct hit and mandeep was gone! head tucked the ball to the leg side against the turn, wide of deep midwicket, and they come back for the second. a sharp throw fired in but doesn't hits the stumps
narine to mandeep singh, no run, pretty tight line on off stump, he defends it back
rajpoot to head, no run, pretty wide outside off and angling away further, head wants to slam it to leg but misses
rajpoot to mandeep singh, 1 run, pretty tight now on off stump, mandeep defends nicely from the middle and sets off for one
chawla to head, no run, no turn, going away with the angle outside off, and head mistimes it to cover
rajpoot to mandeep singh, no run, nice and tight towards the off stump, mandeep defends it back
rajpoot to mandeep singh, 1 run, touch more towards the leg stump, mandeep tucks it square of the wicket to leg for one
rajpoot to head, no run, 142kph, good pace to angle it away well outside off, keeps a bit low, head swings and misses
rajpoot to mandeep singh, 1 run, brings it into the batsman who helps it behind square for one
rajpoot to mandeep singh, 1 run, takes a step or two down to make some room, the ball angles into him but he drives to mid off for a quick single
de grandhomme to mandeep singh, four runs, fairly innocuous medium pace just outside off, mandeep cleverly makes some room and opens the face late to direct it wide of backward point in the gap
de grandhomme to mandeep singh, no run, pushed towards mid off, gambhir throws it back in a hurry
de grandhomme to mandeep singh, 2 runs, tucks the ball from middle stump towards deep midwicket and they come back for the second for mandeep's fifty. at least some hope for rcb
de grandhomme to mandeep singh, 1 run, doesn't nip in as much as he expects, it's slowish too and a thick outside edge goes towards point

choudhary to de grandhomme, no run, and again. ultimate moral victory for aniket. it's the only one he'll get tonight. beats the bat thrice, again outside off as he looks to punch this away from the body
kumar to patel, 1 wide, goes down leg for a wide. loses his line. good delivery to the right-hander
mohammad nabi to patel, 1 run, quick and straight, pushed to mid-on for a quick single. good tight single from parthiv
mohammed siraj to patel, 1 run, better. slower delivery outside off, pushed to mid-off for a run
mohammed siraj to rana, no run, another slower delivery that is closer to off, played quietly to backward point
mohammad nabi to rana, no run, flat, but slower on off. pushed to point. good bowling. varying his pace effectively
mohammad nabi to rana, no run, a flat, slow delivery outside off. rana looks for a dab to third man but makes no connection. superb start from nabi
mohammad nabi to rana, 1 run, almost goes through. flat and straight, the ball skids on and skews to deep square leg off the inside edge
kaul to patel, 1 run, a slower ball on off, patted towards point.
kaul to rg sharma, 1 run, too straight goes kaul, flicked through square leg for a run
mohammad nabi to pandya, no run, flat and slow outside off, defended
mohammad nabi to pandya, 1 run, much better. flat on off, hardik opens the bat face to find a single to deep point.
rashid khan to pandya, no run, flat delivery outside off, hardik doesn't pick the legbreak. beats the bat.
mohammed siraj to pandya, 3 runs, fantastic effort from hooda. a slower delivery outside off, ramped over the keeper. hooda runs to his left from third man to save a run. awesome stuff, saved one
mohammed siraj to pandya, 1 wide, a slower ball that is ill-directed. drifts far too wide outside off. wide called
rashid khan to pandya, no run, flat and wide, the legbreak. beats the bat
rashid khan to pandya, no run, flat outside off, another legbreak that rips past the outside edge
rashid khan to pandya, 1 run, flat and wide, pushed to cover
mohammed siraj to pollard, 1 wide, strays down leg for a wide
rashid khan to pollard, no run, quick and flat outside off, the ball spins past pollard's edge. sensational bowling

rashid khan to pollard, no run, and another one. wow. sticks with his stock ball, the legbreak. pollard has no idea which way this is going. the ball spins past the outside edge. very tidy from rashid.
kumar to pollard, 2 wides, 140 kph, drifts down leg for a wide. naman can't collect cleanly. there are two extras
yadav to guptill, no run, adjusts straightaway. saw shape in the previous ball so brought this one straighter to ensure there wasn't too much width. guptill forced to defend
de grandhomme to vohra, 1 run, too straight again, whipped away through backward deep square leg
yadav to vohra, 1 wide, drifts down leg, a wide.
narine to vohra, four runs, four more. really good batting. flat, quick with a bit of width. vohra opens the face to get four to third man. very fine
narine to vohra, 1 run, good batting. outside off, vohra flicks through midwicket for a run
narine to guptill, no run, flat, spinning back in towards off. pushed back
yadav to vohra, four runs, gets this over the off-side infield and vohra gets four more. gave himself room, anticipating a straight delivery. vohra guides the ball over point for four
yadav to vohra, 1 wide, that's a bad delivery. strays down leg for a wide
narine to marsh, 1 run, flat and straight, pushed away towards cover for a run to get off the mark
narine to saha, no run, flat and straight, played out
de grandhomme to saha, no run, nagging line towards off, dabbed towards point. a tight single
woakes to maxwell, 1 run, 136 kph, a bit of width outside off, carved down to third man for another single
de grandhomme to maxwell, 1 wide, strays down leg for a wide
de grandhomme to maxwell, 2 runs, flicked away through backward square leg for a couple
de grandhomme to maxwell, 1 run, nudged to midwicket for a run. a fumble but no damage
de grandhomme to saha, no run, 125 kph, slower ball outside off, played down towards backward point
woakes to saha, 1 bye, a slower ball outside off, goes through uthappa as he is unable to make contact. a bye.
de grandhomme to maxwell, 1 wide, drifts down leg for a wide
kuldeep yadav to saha, 1 run, shimmies down and flicks to square leg
narine to saha, 1 run, flat on off, hit away to long-off
narine to maxwell, 1 run, flat on leg, flicked to deep midwicket for a single
narine to saha, four runs, nicely hit by saha. gives himself room, opens up some space and slaps a stroke past cover and long-off
kuldeep yadav to maxwell, six runs, another big hit. it's straight which allows maxwell to get underneath that again. goes a long way over midwicket again. 89 metres.
narine to patel, 2 runs, he finds the gap behind point. flat outside off, carved between point and third man for a couple. just a glide off the face
narine to patel, no run, nicely bowled. flat and slow outside off, some spin beats the bat of axar
woakes to patel, 1 run, a slower ball, straight. pace off. excellently bowled. pushed to long-off
patel to gambhir, 1 run, quicker one, on off stump, goes back to chop it down towards backward point
swapnil singh to lynn, 2 runs, down the track and swapnil bowls it flat and angles this into leg stump to deny swinging room. punches it down to long-off for another single

pandya to guptill, four runs, has he dropped that? just about got a finger, tough to call it a drop. harbhajan at first slip. guptill chases another outswinger, this time he gets a thick outside edge that flies over harbhajan who leaps up with his right hand and can only parry it to the third man boundary
kv sharma to maxwell, 2 runs, steps out, doesn't get to the this middle stump ball, gets an inside edge into the leg side
sandeep sharma to patel, no run, width and slashed straight to maxwell at backward point.
henry to patel, no run, width but couldn't quite pierce the gap, straight to point

i sharma to simmons, four runs, edged, one bounce into the third man boundary. looked to glide this over point. adjusted well. ishant bent his back and got this to bounce high outside off. simmons angled the bat late
i sharma to simmons, 1 run, moves leg side, ishant follows him, simmons mows this with the angle to deep square
mm sharma to patel, 1 run, whipped to vohra at deep midwicket
patel to simmons, no run, drifting into middle from around the stumps, pushed to cover

patel to simmons, 1 run,  mohit puts down a regulation chance at long-off.  is it the dew? he had it, but somehow couldn't hold on as he hared across. this one was hit flat and hard, mohit picked it early, moved swiftly to his left to get to the ball but put it down.
maxwell to rg sharma, no run, slides across the face of the bat to whizz past the off stump. drifted away late, rohit looked to play across the line
tewatia to rg sharma, 1 run, mistimes a lofted hit to long-off,  so near to a fifth dismissal to a legspinner this season
tewatia to pollard, 1 run, drifting into middle and leg, tucked wide of square leg
patel to pollard, 1 run, whips a delivery from outside off towards deep midwicket
patel to rana, no run, slides a quicker delivery across the left-hander from around the stumps, rana swings and misses
patel to pollard, 1 run, tucked with the angle to square leg
tewatia to pandya, no run, sharp turn from fifth stump outside off, pandya leaves in the hope of it being called wide, excellent call from umpire deshpande
tewatia to pandya, 1 run, driven hard to the man at deep extra cover
patel to pandya, 1 run, flays a drive to deep extra cover
patel to pollard, 1 run, drifts in a quicker one on middle and leg, whipped to deep square leg
henry to pandya, 1 run, drilled back over the bowler's head, marsh comes around from long-off to keep it down to a single

sandeep sharma to pandya, out, sensational catch by saha. his reflexes are astounding. thick edge, was flying low to his right but saha moved spontaneously, had to dive low as well to grab it inches off the ground.

mm sharma to kv sharma, out, has his man. this is another slower ball that comes back in from wide of the crease, dipped on karn who looked to swing this behind square, missed it and the ball hit timber. not much celebration from mohit. has this slipped away from kings xi?
mm sharma to harbhajan singh, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, flayed to long-off
sandeep sharma to pollard, 1 run, drills this into the deep cover region, marsh quickly hares around to his right to keep this to a single
mm sharma to pollard, six runs, slower ball outside off, he holds his shape and deposits this swipe into the cow corner boundary.

boult to tiwary, no run, dabbed to the off side, looks for a single but is sent back. hit high on the bat. boult is getting them to skid through.  lazy from tiwary , could have been run out had boult, who hares across to stop the ball on the followthrough, flicked the underarm throw back to the stumps at the striker's end.

boult to simmons, no run,  huge appeal. beautiful delivery.  banana swing. curves back in late to beat the inside edge. s ravi isn't convinced. very, very close. replays show the ball would've hit the outside of leg stump.
de grandhomme to tiwary, 1 wide, steep bounce but way over tiwary's head. right call from the umpire
de grandhomme to tiwary, no run, crunched off the backfoot but straight to backward point
boult to rg sharma, 1 run, sensible, drops it gently wide of cover and gets off the mark
narine to rg sharma, no run, pushed to cover, looks for a run but is sent back
narine to tiwary, 1 run, clever. drops it gently to the man coming in from cover and completes a quick single
de grandhomme to rg sharma, no run, sliding stop at cover prevents what was a definite single
de grandhomme to rg sharma, 1 run, width on offer, slapped away to umesh at deep cover
de grandhomme to tiwary, 1 run, smeared into the gap at cover, down to the boundary rider
kuldeep yadav to rayudu, 1 run, leading edge but wide of the cover fielder. the ball dipped on him and then spun away
rajpoot to tiwary, 1 run, mistimes a lofted hit over rajpoot's head. this one stopped on him and hit the top part of the bat
narine to tiwary, 1 run, backs away and slaps one to cover, a misfield by gambhir allows the single

narine to rayudu, no run, spun back in sharply to nearly sneak through to hit the stumps. rayudu played outside the line, may have got a thin inside edge onto the pad.  uthappa has technically dropped it
narine to rayudu, 1 run, swept with the spin to deep backward square leg

narine to tiwary, four runs, lofted straight over the bowler's head. one bounce into the ropes.  fifty in his first game this season.  painful at times, but credit to tiwary for grabbing this opportunity. not easy coming in from the cold after 13 games on the bench.

yadav to tiwary, 1 run, slapped, umesh gets a hand on the followthrough, deflects to mid-off. he instinctively put his right hand out.  could have so easily split his webbing or dislocated a thumb.  hard hit
yadav to rayudu, four runs, width and he's slashed that into the square third man boundary. not where he wanted but third man was too fine, had no chance
narine to pollard, 2 runs, steps out and nurdles this to midwicket. kuldeep caught napping as he ran in from the boundary
boult to rayudu, 1 run, steps out and forces the slower delivery to long-off
boult to pollard, 1 run, flicked uppishly but into the gap at deep midwicket
boult to hh pandya, 1 wide, flirting with the wide line. started outside off and went further away. hardik couldn't reach it

boult to hh pandya, 1 run,  was it a no-ball?  no. hit pandya on the stomach off a thick outside edge. turned the bat face too early as he looked to hit this over midwicket. another good call from the umpire.
kv sharma to gambhir, four runs, steps out and just manages to clear cover. not entirely convincing. pressure on. karn shouldn't be too disappointed.
kv sharma to uthappa, 1 run, flatter on middle and leg, turned to midwicket

vinay kumar to pathan, six runs, thick edge that flies over the third man boundary. johnson was in business for a while, leapt high but just eluded him. yusuf looked to swing this over midwicket but the ball nipped away late to take a thick outside edge.

vinay kumar to pandey, 3 runs, turned back past vinay on his followthrough, pandya ran in a little quickly from mid-off and dived over the ball in trying to prevent the single. ended up conceding two more. vinay doesn't think that is funny
kv sharma to pandey, no run, steps out to smack this across the line over deep midwicket, ended up getting a fat inside edge onto the body
vinay kumar to pathan, 2 wides, slower ball but got the direction wrong as he slides down leg. rayudu couldn't gather it cleanly
kh pandya to pandey, no run, driven straight to pollard at cover
kh pandya to pandey, 2 runs, steps out to swing this over deep midwicket, ball dips on him as the thick inside edge rolls to tiwary at deep midwicket
kh pandya to de grandhomme, no run,
vinay kumar to de grandhomme, four runs, rides the bounce nicely to use the width and steer this behind point. third man had no chance. sweet
vinay kumar to de grandhomme, four runs, edged, this time to the left of third man. deliberately opened the bat face to steer this wide of the wicketkeeper
kh pandya to de grandhomme, 1 run, forced back past the bowler to long-off
hh pandya to de grandhomme, no run, looks to steer this wide of the keeper but got an edge, on the bounce to rayudu

johnson to pandey, no run, has pandey got an underedge? spontaneou appeal. he looks to steer it behind point.  definite sound as ball passed bat.  s ravi thought long and hard. looked to the square leg umpire. didn't look entirely certain. johnson is shocked that wasn't given
hh pandya to pandey, 1 run, wrists an incoming delivery to the man coming in from deep midwicket
johnson to pandey, 1 run, looked to sway out of the way, ended up flat-batting it to deep square in the end as he realised this one was on middle
hh pandya to kuldeep yadav, no run, play and miss. gets this to angle across kuldeep, who tries to steer it behind point
hh pandya to kuldeep yadav, 1 run, this time, makes room again and puts bat to ball. eased to square third man
southee to boult, no run, sashays down the track, nearly yorks himself as the ball shaves past the inside edge. big appeal, authoritative decision from the umpire
khan to gayle, 1 wide, that one swings away a mile outside off, gayle does not bother going after it and it is called a wide

mohammed shami to gayle, six runs, not off the middle but such is the power. goes hard at this wide delivery outside off, gets it off the outside part of the bat but it does not matter, sails comfortably over the third man boundary
nadeem to kohli, four runs, sliding on leg, kohli glances it fine and mishra gives it a chase but the ground is small and the ball reaches the boundary comfortably
nadeem to kohli, no run, knocked back to the bowler
anderson to kohli, 1 run, rolls his fingers over the seam again, he is giving the batsmen no pace, tucked away to deep midwicket
nadeem to kohli, 1 wide, fired down the leg side and called a wide

khan to jadhav, 1 run, flicked uppishly through square leg and there is a slight misunderstanding on the second eun. jadhav hares back for the second but kohli bellows out a no and jadhav scampers back
cummins to kohli, no run, swings hard at the sight of width, but he is nowhere near it and misses
cummins to sachin baby, 1 wide, tries to take it away from the batsman and fires a wide outside off. baby again reaches out without feet
cummins to watson, 1 leg bye,
anderson to watson, 1 wide, watson backs away and anderson tries to follow him, sprays a wide down the leg side
anderson to negi, 1 wide, tries to take it away from the batsman and the drift away is too sharp, wide outside off

anderson to negi, no run, anderson is claiming a caught and bowled and the umpire isn't too excited. shamshuddin walks up to the square leg umpire and they refer this upstairs. soft signal is not out. tell you what, if he has taken this, this could be one of the catches of the tournament. ah, no, the ball has clearly bounced before going to the bowler. hitting the pad and bouncing before going to the bowler. anderson flings himself to his left of the follow-through to catch it. negi was swiping hard across the line and didn't find the middle of the bat
anderson to negi, four runs, swings hard after reaching out to this wide delivery and skews it off the outside edge through third man, gets it over the man inside the circle
anderson to negi, four runs, outside edge for four. stays stapled to the crease and swings hard at this wide delivery outside off, sends it uppishly through third man
bumrah to gambhir, no run, similar delivery and now gambhir tries to open the face of his bat late. but it jags away further and beats the edge again
johnson to narine, 1 run, bangs another one in on the ribs, narine manages to tuck it away to deep backward square leg fairly comfortably
kh pandya to jaggi, 1 run, whipped against the turn to deep midwicket
kv sharma to jaggi, 1 wide, too wide outside off, called a wide
hh pandya to chawla, no run, tries the same thing again, banged in again but closer to leg stump this time, can't make contact
johnson to sa yadav, 2 wides, tries to bang it in but gets the line horribly wrong, drags it down the leg side by some distance
bumrah to rajpoot, four runs, backs away trying to heave it over the leg side and the ball goes off the inside edge to fine leg for four
bumrah to rajpoot, no run, tries to open the face of his bat, tucked up for room as the ball bounces over the bat and goes to the keeper
chawla to rayudu, 1 wide, 96 kph, drifts down leg for an extra
chawla to patel, 1 run, goes too straight this time. parthiv picks him off to deep square leg. tidy start from piyush
ut yadav to patel, four runs, that's poor bowling. moved the fielder into the off side infield and umesh bowls one on the hip. mumbai and parthiv help themselves to four down to fine leg
coulter-nile to rg sharma, 1 run, another good single. slower ball outside off, tapped towards cover for one.
narine to rg sharma, no run, 91 kph, flat outside off, spinning back in. skewed away towards cover
narine to rayudu, no run, what was that? a dangerous leave. wasn't even wide outside off. flat outside off, spinning back in and rayudu leaves. just beats the stumps. a brainfade of sorts.
narine to rayudu, no run, 98 kph, quick and straight, nudged to square leg. racking 'em dot balls together
narine to kh pandya, no run, flat and slow on off, awkwardly blocked
narine to kh pandya, no run, the offbreak on middle and leg, played away to midwicket
coulter-nile to rg sharma, 1 run, a tad too wide. wide of the crease. tapped to third man for a run
chawla to kh pandya, four runs, flat down leg. quite a bad ball. drifts down leg, swept away down to the fine leg boundary. just a bit of bat.
narine to kh pandya, 1 run, good batting. waits for the offbreak to come to him before deflecting a dab down to third man
narine to rg sharma, no run, flat on off, spins back in. rohit just gets bat down on that in time.
narine to kh pandya, no run, another offbreak outside off. krunal is looking for another dab but this is too close to the stumps. he isn't in a very good position either. chopped into the pad
chawla to rg sharma, no run, 97 kph, flat on off, defended
narine to kh pandya, no run, flat on off, a bit of spin. defended
narine to kh pandya, no run, carved towards point from the crease
narine to kh pandya, no run, well played. he's got enough from the over so can play him out. flat on middle and leg, blocked to cover
rajpoot to pollard, 1 wide, drifts way down leg for an extra
rajpoot to pollard, 1 wide, an extremely wide slower ball doesn't land on the pitch outside pollard's reach. outside off
ut yadav to pollard, 1 wide, 138 kph, may have been close to a wide for the left-hander. well down leg
watson to sharma, no run, rohit saunters down the track, swings wildly at another outswinger, and does not make contact again. strange shots from rohit. he usually takes his time to settle down

chahar to lewis, out, chahar wins an lbw appeal from umpire chris gaffaney. lewis challenges the on-field out decision. drs makes an appearance in the ipl. is this swinging past the leg stump? nippy inswinger from chahar, pitches on middle and leg and swerves in to ping the pad as lewis falls over the leg-side flick. the tracker suggests it would go on to clip the outside of the leg stump. umpire's call it is and lewis bags a duck on ipl debut
chahar to ishan kishan, 2 runs, kishan ventures down the track, nearly yorks himself, and squeezes this inswinger to midwicket
chahar to ishan kishan, 1 run, down the track and hacked behind square off the inside half
watson to ishan kishan, 2 runs, picked off the hips through square leg for a couple
chahar to yadav, no run, jabbed away to square leg
watson to ishan kishan, 1 run, chopped from off stump to backward point
harbhajan singh to ishan kishan, no run, looped up on off, stretches out and pushes back to the bowler
harbhajan singh to ishan kishan, no run, dabbed to slip with soft hands, raina throws himself to his left to stop the ball
jadeja to ishan kishan, four runs, round-arm dart from jadeja, kishan exploits the pace and deftly runs it past dhoni's left knee
jadeja to ishan kishan, no run, speared outside off, swish and a miss
harbhajan singh to yadav, four runs, darted outside off, suryakumar stands tall and cracks it in the gap at the covers. suryakumar keeps mumbai ticking
harbhajan singh to yadav, no run, low-arm slider outside off, runs past the bat. time for the time-out
wood to ishan kishan, 1 leg bye, skidding into the thigh, deflected behind square on the leg side
wood to yadav, no run, suryakumar yadav backs away outside leg, wood runs in hard, hits the pitch harder and finds extra bounce to zip past the bat

imran tahir to ishan kishan, six runs, speared outside off, kishan drags it in the air, jadeja, who is a few yards in as opposed to staying at the edge of the boundary, can't collect it. kishan clears him
imran tahir to ishan kishan, 1 run, speared wide outside off, squeezed through the off side
imran tahir to hh pandya, no run, dangled up outside off and spins away, pandya does not meet the pitch and winds up inside-edging it behind square
imran tahir to hh pandya, 1 run, tossed on off, pushed to mid-on
wood to kh pandya, 1 wide, krunal moves across off again, wood sprays it down leg for a wide

hh pandya to watson, out, hardik provides mumbai with the breakthrough. slower knuckle ball at 120ks from hardik. watson does not pick the variation. he is early into his pick-up shot and skies it to lewis at long leg
hh pandya to rayudu, 1 run, knuckle ball, opens the face and guides it to backward point. they chance a single. raina doesn't even bother to dive. a direct hit could have had raina
markande to jadeja, no run, tossed on leg stump, bunted to midwicket
hh pandya to jadhav, no run, slower knuckle ball on off, guided off the face to backward point
markande to jadhav, 1 run, starts on off and spins away, dabbed to cover
markande to jadeja, 1 run, stabbed wide of backward point
markande to jadhav, 1 run, down the track and pushed down to long-off
markande to bravo, 1 run, sliced with the turn to backward point for one
mcclenaghan to harbhajan singh, 1 run, whipped off the hips to deep square leg
mcclenaghan to harbhajan singh, 1 wide, wild leg-side wide
ashwin to munro, 1 run, quicker delivery drifting into middle and leg, tucked wide of midwicket for a quick single
ashwin to munro, 1 run, pushed through quicker on middle and leg, tucked wide of midwicke
sharma to munro, 1 run, looks to force this but mistimes the drive to mid-off, scampers across for a quick single even as a throw comes in from yuvraj
sharma to gambhir, 1 run, opens the bat face late to steer this away-going delivery to square third man. typical gambhir stroke
patel to iyer, 1 run, driven with the spin to wide long off.
patel to gambhir, 1 run, gentle little dab into the off side for a quick single
patel to iyer, 1 run, leading edge down to mid off. expensive over. 17 off it.
mujeeb ur rahman to iyer, 1 run, risky, risky single. rahul has muffed a take again as the throw comes in from cover point. gambhir was made to stretch. makes it in time.
mujeeb ur rahman to gambhir, 1 run, steps out and mistimes this hoick, gets it wide of mid on as they scamper a single
mujeeb ur rahman to iyer, 1 wide, sharp turn from back in, rahul fumbles down leg. he's struggling already.
tye to gambhir, no run, crunching drive but straight to extra cover
tye to gambhir, no run, looks to hoick this across the line, lost his shape, and so misses out as he mistimes this to the leg side.
tye to gambhir, no run, this is a knuckleball outside off, gambhir absolutely drills this on the bounce to yuvraj at mid off
patel to gambhir, 1 run, leading edge but trickles down to long off. looked to clip this over midwicket
patel to shankar, no run, driven straight to extra cover
ashwin to shankar, 1 run,  first of the legbreaks from ashwin , turned across the line towards midwicket
patel to shankar, 1 run, this time, he hits this lofted drive on the bounce to miller at long off
patel to gambhir, 1 run, sees gambhir advancing and fires this in, whipped to deep midwicket
patel to shankar, 1 run, gets a thick inside edge on a hoick to deep midwicket
ashwin to pant, 1 run, swept fiercely, down to deep square leg

ashwin to pant, 1 run,  run out missed at the bowler's end by kl rahul.  big mix-up. pant looks to hoick but misses, hits the pad and deflects behind the stumps. he wanted a leg bye but was sent back. the throw at the bowler's end is very, very wide.
ashwin to gambhir, 1 run, gentle little dab into the off side for a quick single.  36th ipl fifty.  equals warner's record for most half-centuries in the competition
ashwin to pant, 1 run, swept away towards deep midwicket as they jog the single
tye to gambhir, 1 run, sliced over the infield, down to deep point
mujeeb ur rahman to gambhir, no run, bunts this back towards the bowler.
mujeeb ur rahman to tewatia, four runs, the switch hit over backward point. has done effectively what munro didn't. first ball, sighters anyone? no, boss. not needed. what a hit
mujeeb ur rahman to tewatia, 2 runs, prods outside the line, gets a thick inside edge towards deep midwicket
tye to gambhir, 1 run, slapped over the infield, on the bounce to deep extra cover
tye to tewatia, 1 run, chipped over the infield, no one at cover. single taken

ashwin to tewatia, out, one switch hit too many and is gone. this is not the most intelligent piece of cricket from tewatia. ashwin outfoxes him by getting to drift in, spin away just a wee bit to hit him on the box as he swung through. as plumb as decisions can get.
ashwin to christian, 1 run, squeezes the drive to point for a quick single
ashwin to christian, no run, the flipper from ashwin, hurried on to beat him for pace, somehow managed to get some bat on it as he squeezed it out.
mujeeb ur rahman to morris, no run, squeezes the drive to point
mujeeb ur rahman to morris, 1 run, this one spins away from off stump, eased to long off
sharma to morris, 3 runs, mistimes a hoick, tye runs to his right at deep midwicket and stops it with a sliding tackle, ends up deflecting it off his boot to stoinis. saved a couple of runs
mohammed shami to rahul, six runs, six more. shami bangs it in and angles it in around middle and leg, and rahul gets the angle he's looking for to swivel and smoke it over fine leg
morris to agarwal, out, drills this straight to mid on. agarwal checked his shot, not sure why, and has to go as shami takes a comfortable catch.
morris to nair, 1 run, nearly dragged this back onto the stumps. shaped to drive, got a thick inside edge past leg stump
morris to yuvraj singh, four runs, thick outside edge that beats third man. shaped to play a square drive, genuine edge but no slip in place. frustration for delhi.
boult to yuvraj singh, no run, looks to drive, gets a thick inside edge back to the bowler. yuvraj struggling for timing suddenly.
christian to yuvraj singh, no run, leading edge that rolls to mid-off. yuvraj was looking to work this square on the leg side.
mohammed shami to nair, 1 run, bunts this wide of the keeper as they scamper a quick single. very risky
mohammed shami to nair, four runs, opens the bat face late to steer this wide of the keeper. played it very late, got enough bat on it. clever little dab.
tewatia to miller, 1 run, skids through after pitching on off, squeezed towards point for a quick single
tewatia to nair, no run, slides back in and skids through to hit the pad as nair looks to work this gently into the leg side
tewatia to nair, 1 run, eased with the spin to long off
mishra to nair, 1 run, eased with the spin to long off
mishra to nair, 1 run, turns this gently into the midwicket region
tewatia to miller, four runs, slaps this to the cover boundary. half-tracker outside off, asking to be hit. miller walloped that away
tewatia to miller, no run, slow, sharp turn back in from off stump, defended towards midwicket
tewatia to miller, no run, skiddy delivery outside off, left alone. very close to the wide line
mishra to nair, 1 run, leading edge but safe, over the bowler's head to long off
mishra to nair, no run, nearly sneaked through the gap between bat and pad. looked to work to the leg side but played outside the line.  saved by a thin inside edge
tewatia to stoinis, 1 run, steps out and whips this from outside off towards deep midwicket
boult to stoinis, four runs, smashed back. sitting up for him to belt and he did just that. no chance for long off even though the ball was just a few yards away. packs a punch when he belts them
chawla to mccullum, no run, another dot! flat outside off, pushed to cover
kuldeep yadav to kohli, no run, another wrong 'un around middle and leg, driven to mid-off
kuldeep yadav to kohli, no run, wider outside off, flat too, pushed to mid-off from the crease
kuldeep yadav to kohli, no run, three dots to end the over, well bowled. flat on middle and leg, driven back towards the bowler. kohli happy to play him out too.
chawla to mccullum, no run, excellently bowled, fired that in around off, defended back. five dot balls in a row
chawla to kohli, 1 run, 92 kph, flat outside off, pushed with soft hands towards cover for a run
narine to kohli, no run, starts with a swervy away carrom ball that is fiercely struck to point
narine to kohli, no run, flat and straight, a thick inside edge into the ground
narine to kohli, no run, 94 kph, carved away to point for nothing. lots of dots in the last 10 or so balls.
narine to kohli, no run, the floaty swervy delivery outside off, kohli yorks himself as he defends.
narine to de villiers, 1 run, another swervy delivery outside off, ab opens his season with a neat drive to deep cover
narine to de villiers, 1 run, gives himself lots of room. narine goes the other way, and ab reaches out for it, taps to cover

narine to kohli, 2 runs, flat on middle and off, nudged into the gap at midwicket for a couple. sensational running, these two make running two look so easy, the fitness these two have is extremely rare to emulate in cricket.
johnson to de villiers, no run, on middle and leg, defended to cover. finally, a breath
chawla to kohli, no run, looking for another big hit but can't connect, hit away with bad timing to midwicket
chawla to kohli, six runs, just over midwicket. that's bottom hand, all over. comes running down and chips the ball into that area. the timing is so good that it clears johnson, running around.
narine to mandeep singh, 1 run, the swerve of a carrom ball outside off, chopped to cover
narine to mandeep singh, four runs, fine and four. another poor delivery, strays down leg, just nudged down to the fine leg boundary. vital runs these.
narine to mandeep singh, 1 run, another carrom ball outside off, driven to deep cover for a run

vinay kumar to woakes, out, a nice slower ball and russell will take the catch! two wickets in two balls to finish the over. woakes is through the shot too early, the ball takes the lower half of the bat and lobs to cover. russell runs back and takes a good catch.
chahal to narine, 1 run, flat outside off, pushed to cover for one. sensible from narine, batting like a batsman.
washington sundar to narine, 1 wide, narine does the bowler in the mind this time. backs away, then does not. the ball is down leg. wide.

washington sundar to narine, 1 run, a 17-ball 50 for narine. the last times these two sides met, narine had hit a 15-ball fifty. runs down to the ball and skews a lofted drive to deep midwicket to get there. two fifties by an opener inside the powerplay today, in both games.

yadav to rana, four runs, what a shot that is. he knows mid-on was up so he opened the bat face and checked the lofted drive over mid-on. ab does not give up on the ball, runs back and almost gets there eventually. but the ball plonks one arm beyond him and trickled away
washington sundar to rana, 1 run, slow outside off, carved towards third man for a run.
washington sundar to karthik, 1 run, slow around off, nudged away towards midwicket for one. another tidy over from kkr, they're doing this very very nicely.
chahal to karthik, no run, again, too predicable, the wide legbreak. outside the tramline, should have been wide.
chahal to karthik, no run, should have been wide again! slow and wide outside off, karthik missed his lofted drive but the ball spun past the tramline. that's two runs kkr should have got.
khejroliya to rana, no run, a nice slower ball around off, dips late, driven back to the bowler.
khejroliya to karthik, 1 wide, drifts down leg, wide!
chahal to karthik, no run, slow outside off, driven with the open face to point
washington sundar to singh, 1 run, flat on middle, a thick inside edge to square leg for one. almost went through.
washington sundar to karthik, 1 run, slow outside off, karthik opens the bat face and guides the ball to point for one. an under-rated shot, using the face to hit the ball square on the off side.
woakes to singh, four runs, rinku backs away and toe-ends the ball over mid-on. gave himself some room and went boom. off the toe end so the ball trickles into the boundary.
woakes to russell, no run, a slower ball outside off, russell is through the shot too early, toe-ends the ball back to the bowler.
khejroliya to vinay kumar, four runs, vinay kumar finishes the match with a swat through mid-on to put kolkata knight riders on the board, toppling kkr with a four-wicket win at the eden gardens.
stanlake to samson, no run,
kumar to samson, four runs, caressed through cover point. lovely timing. no meet at all, but his hands are nicely behind this outswinger outside off. punches through the line with no fuss
rashid khan to gopal, four runs, dabs it past first slip nonchalantly. the other legspiner in this game. picks this legbreak off the surface and uses his hands to steer it nicely

rashid khan to gopal, no run, rashid thinks he has the outside edge but llong says no. the perfect legbreak. zipping past the outside edge as he closes the face on this. it's flicked the back pad on the way to saha
kulkarni to dhawan, no run, mistimes an attempted drive to extra cover. didn't get the kind of width he would've liked

kulkarni to dhawan, no run,  dropped!  straight in, straight out. oh, rahane. what have you done? dhawan has a slash to a delivery that isn't wide enough for him to flay through point, flies at a comfortable height to the captain who makes a royal mess of that one. bobbled out, tried to grab on the second attempt but couldn't.

stokes to dhawan, no run, direct hit has prompted the umpire to send this upstairs. he was looking to sneak a single on the leg side but was sent back by williamson. it's a direct hit, but dhawan has made his ground
chahar to lynn, 1 run, on off stump, and lynn sticks his bat out. pokes it past point to the man in the deep. tahir the man tidying up
chahar to narine, 1 wide, pitches on middle, but angles down the leg side. narine misses the leg-side flick and the ball goes to dhoni on the bounce

jadeja to lynn, out, the leg stump's uprooted! flatter ball on middle, and lynn's halfway down the wicket. he misses the leg-side heave, and the ball goes between bat and pad. crashes into leg stump and jadeja's pumped!
watson to karthik, 1 run, just outside off, and karthik punches this firmly past cover to the man in the deep. enough time to walk across for the run
thakur to russell, six runs, width offered outside off, and russell leans into the drive. it's been tonked over the infield, and the ball lands way beyond deep extra cover. that's his tenth maximum!
thakur to curran, no run, knuckle ball outside off, and curran can't connect again! deceived by the pace

thakur to curran, 1 bye, another knuckle ball outside off, and curran can't hit it. but dhoni misfields, which makes the batsmen take the bye. they can take overthrows as well, but russell's not interested
narine to raina, 1 run, turned towards midwicket for a single. flat on middle and leg to start off
chawla to dhoni, no run, flat to start off. on middle stump, and dhoni defends it back to chawla
chawla to dhoni, 1 wide, flat on leg stump, and goes down the leg side. extras
sandeep sharma to lewis, no run, lewis pats the ball to the left of the bowler, sandeep swoops down on the ball but misses the direct hit. lewis wanted a risky single but was sent back by his partner
rashid khan to lewis, no run, another fast wrong'un from rashid. lewis picks it off the pitch and jabs to cover

kaul to lewis, out, kaul strikes twice in his first over. he hits the top of off stump and leaps for job. he brings out the knuckle ball, lewis has no clue about this variation. he is early into his leg-side swing. kaul cleans him up
shakib al hasan to yadav, no run, flat, dart outside off, chopped away to the covers
shakib al hasan to yadav, no run, arm ball, slides in, played back to the bowler
shakib al hasan to yadav, no run, another arm ball, zips in, inside-edged onto the pad
sandeep sharma to pandya, 2 runs, picked off through midwicket for a double
shakib al hasan to pandya, 1 wide, darted down leg for a wide
shakib al hasan to pandya, 2 runs, tossed outside off, nurdled through the vacant spaces at midwicket
shakib al hasan to pandya, four runs, shakib tosses it outside off, krunal stretches out and drives it against the turn in the gap at the covers

shakib al hasan to pandya, out, another soft, soft dismissal. non-turner outside off, shakib lobs it up in the air. krunal expects it to turn but it doesn't. he closes the face early and chips a leading edge to williamson at extra cover
stanlake to pollard, no run, wide of the crease, angling in, straightening and bouncing past the outside edge near the higher part of the bat
rashid khan to yadav, 1 run, chopped to point
rashid khan to pollard, no run, tossed-up wrong'un, swerves in from outside off, pollard did not pick the variation. it was tantalisingly close to the off stump
shakib al hasan to yadav, 1 run, tossed outside off, driven through the covers
shakib al hasan to yadav, no run, arm ball, squeezed back to the bowler
rashid khan to sangwan, no run, pushed through quicker and slides in to hit the thigh
rashid khan to sangwan, no run, finishes with a legbreak on off, defended. rashid walks away with outstanding figures of 4-0-13-1, including 18 dots
sandeep sharma to yadav, no run, another slower ball, knuckle ball, 109ks, another swing and a miss
kaul to markande, 1 run, knuckle ball outside off, tipped into the covers
sangwan to dhawan, 1 run, gets this to straighten from off stump, squirted behind point for a quick single
sangwan to saha, no run,  nearly chopped on!  looks to force this through cover point but didn't have the width. the bat face turned in his hand as well. bounces over.
bumrah to dhawan, 1 run, slower ball on middle and leg, dhawan waits for the ball to arrive, then  tucks it away to square leg
bumrah to dhawan, 1 run, tip and run to cover. smart work from dhawan and saha
pandya to saha, 1 run, tossed outside off, nudged to wide mid-on
pandya to dhawan, no run, straight ball on middle, defended back to krunal
pandya to dhawan, 1 run, dhawan runs down the track and mows one away to deep square leg. not middled
bumrah to dhawan, 1 run, slower ball on off, tip and run to the off side
bumrah to dhawan, no run, dhawan steps out, slashes and misses outside off
markande to dhawan, four runs, half-tracker outside off, dhawan lays into it and cracks it through the covers. sunrisers cruising
markande to dhawan, 1 run, dhawan steps out, has a big heave-ho, drags it behind square on the leg side
markande to williamson, 1 run, nurdled through square leg for one
markande to dhawan, no run, tapped to the covers
pandya to pandey, 2 runs, uses his feet and eases it through the covers
pandya to shakib al hasan, 1 run, chopped to backward point
pandya to pandey, no run, drifts in on middle, blocked back to the bowler
markande to shakib al hasan, no run, chopped from off stump to cover
markande to hooda, four runs, first-ball four for hooda. he races down the track and smears it straight past the right of the bowler. bam
mustafizur rahman to hooda, 1 run, shuffles across and pushes to mid-on for a risky single
markande to shakib al hasan, 1 run, jabbed to the right of the bowler, markande dives to his right and takes some pace off the ball

markande to shakib al hasan, out, markande has his fourth with his last ball of the night. wrong'un, breaks away outside off, shakib reads it off the pitch, and drags a thick inside edge back onto the stumps. what a spell from markande. he ends with a potentially match-winning 4-0-23-4

bumrah to hooda, 1 run, whipped across the line to midwicket. there's a mix-up between the wickets on the second. hooda wants it, pathan sends him back, hooda dishes out a dive and reaches the safety of the crease
yadav to agarwal, four runs, agarwal is matching rahul shot for shot. he backs away outside leg and fiercely drills it past the left of umesh and right of mid-off
khejroliya to agarwal, four runs, 140.3ks but sprayed down the leg side, agarwal simply tickles it away fine on the leg side past the keeper
chahal to rahul, no run, rahul ventures down the track, yorks himself, but digs it out
chahal to rahul, 1 run, tossed on middle stump, dips, rahul does not meet the pitch., therefore, drags it off the inside half past midwicket
chahal to rahul, six runs, rank half-tracker on the leg stump, rahul pounces onto it and smacks it flat and hard over deep square leg
chahal to nair, no run, slower legbreak, spins away outside off, driven with the spin to the covers
washington sundar to rahul, 1 run, straight ball on off, opens the face, and bunts to cover
chahal to rahul, 2 runs, chahal shifts his line wider of off, rahul uses his feet and slices it over backward point
chahal to nair, no run, big-turning legbreak. chahal puts it on off and gets it to rip away outside off. karun can't touch it
washington sundar to stoinis, no run, stoinis steps out, 101ks, jabbed back to the bowler
washington sundar to stoinis, no run, backs away and chops a slider to cover
khejroliya to nair, 1 run, sliding into the hips, picked up and flicked to deep square leg
khejroliya to ashwin, 1 run, ashwin is early into a drive and sends an inside edge to fine leg
washington sundar to ashwin, no run, fired on middle, defended to the leg side
washington sundar to ashwin, 1 run, slides on outside off, opens the face and guides to point
woakes to ashwin, 1 run, ashwin shuffles across for a scoop to fine leg, woakes hurls it wide outside off, ashwin checks his shot and slices it to point
woakes to tye, 1 wide, lifter outside off, flies off the deck, too high, wide
chahal to ashwin, 2 runs, tossed on middle stump, ashwin uses his wrists and drives the ball away to deep midwicket
chahal to ashwin, six runs, ashwin dances out, chahal dangles out a legbreak wide outside off. ashwin goes through with his shot and flat-bats it over chahal's head
chahal to ashwin, out, chahal dangles another wide legbreak. ashwin runs down the track, but the ball dips, and breaks away sharply. ashwin swings and misses. de kock swipes the bails off in a flash
woakes to sharma, 1 wide, sprayed wide outside off, well past the marker
patel to kohli, four runs, dragged down outside off, kohli sizes it up and cracks it it away past the left of mujeeb. he does not get his body behind the ball and concedes four
ashwin to kohli, four runs, 103ks dart outside off, kohli uses the pace of ashwin to his advantage and chops it away past the right of the keeper
mujeeb ur rahman to de kock, no run, slider outside off, stretches out and drives to the covers
mujeeb ur rahman to kohli, 1 run, skidder, stays low on middle, kohli sits back and shovels it away to deep midwicket
tye to de kock, 1 run, 114.8ks knuckle ball on middle stump, de kock delays his push and plays it to mid-off
ashwin to de kock, four runs, tossed on middle, steps out and flicks it in the air over midwcket. stylish from de kock
ashwin to de kock, 1 run, sliding into the legs, turned wide of midwicket
ashwin to de villiers, 1 run, flat on middle, whisked to midwicket
patel to de kock, no run, de kock closes the face early and leading-edges it to the left of axar
patel to de villiers, no run, fired on off, pushed back to the bowler
ashwin to de kock, 1 run, de kock runs down the track and hacks it off the inside half to the leg side
ashwin to de kock, no run, skidding in to beat the inside edge and hit the thigh
patel to de kock, 2 runs, flat on middle, swept away through backward square leg
patel to de villiers, no run, fired outside off, driven to cover
ashwin to de kock, out, de kock runs past a slider and ashwin hits the top of middle. slides on with the arm from around the wicket, de kock steps out, swishes and does not make contact.

ashwin to khan, out, ashwin has two in two. this is the legbreak and ashwin has posted a slip to catch it. wide of the crease, angling in, and breaking away outside off, sarfraz simply runs the ball to slip, where nair takes a sharp catch
patel to de villiers, 1 run, tossed outside off, stretches out and eases it to long-off for a single
tye to mandeep singh, 1 run, knuckle ball outside off, 117.4ks, pushed down to long-off

mujeeb ur rahman to mandeep singh, 1 run, wide of the crease, mujeeb gets it to hold its line outside off, cracked to the covers, where karun runs in, collects the ball, and throws it to the keeper. ab is quick enough to complete the single
mujeeb ur rahman to mandeep singh, 1 run, zippy offbreak on middle, pushed back to mujeeb, and he lets the ball burst through his hands for a single. mujeeb and ab collide. just a single
boult to yadav, 1 run,
nadeem to yadav, 1 run, another slider, on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on
nadeem to lewis, 1 wide, strays waaaaay down leg. a wide to a right-hander.
nadeem to yadav, 1 run, too flat again, on leg. pushed away to mid-on for a run.
nadeem to lewis, no run, darts this one on outside off, pushed away to mid-off
nadeem to lewis, 1 wide, 93 kph, flat down leg, wide. another extra.
nadeem to lewis, no run, flat around middle and leg, pushed back to the bowler this time.
christian to lewis, no run, a slower ball down leg, pushed away towards mid-on.
tewatia to lewis, no run, goes for the almighty hoick over deep midwicket but makes no contact. a topspinner outside off, a wild swing and miss.
tewatia to lewis, no run, decent end. just three off that over. flat on off, pushed back to the bowler
maxwell to lewis, 1 run, very flat outside off, driven to cover for a single. jammed out.
maxwell to lewis, 1 wide, strays down leg for a wide.
tewatia to lewis, 1 run, flat and wide outside off, carved to deep point for a single.
maxwell to yadav, no run, flat outside off, driven to cover.
maxwell to ishan kishan, no run, slow around off, pushed back to the bowler.
tewatia to sharma, 1 run, slow on middle, driven to long-off with the spin.
tewatia to sharma, no run, some control now for delhi. flat on middle and leg, pushed back to the bowler.
tewatia to sharma, 1 wide, drifts down leg for a wide. another slider.

christian to sharma, four runs, and finally rohit gets a move too. got some catching up to do with the rest of his mates, the mumbai captain. on this occasion, he makes use of christian's angle as he bangs one into the batsman and rohit swivels and helps it along to the fine leg boundary

boult to sharma, out, roy takes the catch to dismiss rohit. a slower delivery outside off, rohit gets under the ball and slices the ball towards mid-off. not enough timing, not enough power, the only two not-enoughs-of you need at the wankhede.
boult to hh pandya, 1 run, a slower delivery outside off, carved to backward point for a run.
hh pandya to gambhir, 1 run, strays down leg, helped along to fine leg. mustafizur moves smartly to his left to stop the boundary.
bumrah to gambhir, 2 runs, a slower ball on middle and leg, helped along to the square leg boundary. fine leg gets across.
bumrah to gambhir, no run, a slower ball on middle and leg, swatted away to square leg. just two runs off the over, now delhi under some pressure.
markande to pant, four runs, he finds the gap this time and gets four. flat and wide, hit away through cover for four. rocks back, uses the width and frees his arms.

kh pandya to pant, out, great catch by pollard. a slower delivery outside off from krunal, pant looks to hit the ball over long-off, wanted to get under that, but the ball just skews away after the bat turns in his hand. the fielder dives to his left and takes the catch, diving to his left. making a tough catch look relatively easy.
kh pandya to maxwell, no run, slow on middle, 78 kph. maxwell pushes the ball to krunal's right. he dives and stops the ball.
kh pandya to iyer, 1 run, flat outside off, driven to long-off for on, hit with the spin
dananjaya to roy, 1 wide, flat and wide outside off, outside the tramline
dananjaya to iyer, no run, 92 kph, bottom hand. slow outside off, driven back to the bowler.

kh pandya to roy, six runs, sightscreen! very well bowled, a slower delivery outside off, and wide too. roy comes down and just chips the ball straight, still so much timing that it hits the sighscreen
kh pandya to roy, 1 run, slow on leg, pushed to long-off
bumrah to roy, 1 run, a slower ball outside off, guided to deep point for one. just one. roy wants two.
johnson to saha, four runs, another slower ball wide outside off. saha's in position to lean into that shot, and times it extremely well past cover. silences the kolkata crowd again
woakes to rahane, 1 wide, starts with a wayward delivery down leg, some stretching exercise for the umpire
woakes to d'arcy, 1 run, slower delivery that he bunts into the off side towards point for a quick single
yadav to rahane, four runs, makes room, umesh follows him but it doesn't matter as rahane hoicks this over midwicket. races away to the fence off a mishit
chahal to rahane, four runs, swept uppishly, beats deep square leg coming around. one bounce to the fence.
chahal to d'arcy, no run, drifts away a flatter delivery, pushed to cover. can't pierce the gap

woakes to rahane, four runs, this is just helped on its way over deep backward square. stunning shot. too slow and drifting down, this was almost as if rahane was waiting for it as he swung through with the angle.
washington sundar to stokes, 1 run, eased with the spin to long off
yadav to stokes, 1 run, shapes to drive but gets a thick inside edge towards deep square leg
yadav to stokes, no run, steps out to belt this over mid-off but ends up hitting it flat and off the-end on the bounce to kohli there
yadav to stokes, 2 runs, walks across the stumps and caresses this drive to wide long-off, back comfortably for the second
yadav to stokes, four runs, whips this from outside off towards midwicket, and boy, he's picked the gap. sensational. so much punch in the stroke. deep square leg had no chance
washington sundar to stokes, no run, steps out but washington fires this in, defended back
washington sundar to samson, 1 run, another flatter one on off, pushed past the bowler as they jog the single
washington sundar to stokes, 1 run, drifting into middle and leg, tucked with the angle to deep square. end of a neat, little spell from washington.
chahal to stokes, out, he's dragged this back onto the stumps. went for a big mow over deep square, had to fetch it from way outside off. ended up getting a thick inside edge onto the stumps.
chahal to buttler, 1 run, drifting into middle and leg, tucked to square leg
negi to samson, no run, drifts in to squeeze off an inside edge back to negi
negi to samson, 1 run, eased with the spin to long off
chahal to samson, no run, makes room and punches this to umesh at point
chahal to buttler, 1 wide, fired wide, way outside off. easy call
chahal to buttler, no run, reverse-swept to point, played a touch too early and gave away his intentions
yadav to samson, no run, lovely little flick with the angle towards square leg
yadav to samson, 1 run, width outside off and he stands tall to steer this down to square third man
yadav to buttler, 1 run, stands tall and punches this to cover as they scamper a single
yadav to samson, 1 run, slants this one into middle and leg, tucked to square leg. a direct hit at the bowler's end from chahal and samson would've been gone.
khejroliya to samson, 2 runs, heaves and gets a thick inside edge towards deep midwicket
gowtham to mccullum, four runs, slapped away, a misfield at cover means there's a boundary. should've been a dot. oh, dear. the fielder? sanju samson
gowtham to mccullum, no run, turns this gently with the spin to square leg
gowtham to kohli, no run, spins back in to strike the pad, but this was sliding down leg. kohli was looking to work this to the leg side
gowtham to de kock, no run, drift and turn from middle, defended gently into the leg side
gowtham to de kock, 1 run, grip and turn from middle, de kock gets a leading edge towards point
gowtham to de kock, four runs, clean strike. stepped out, moved to the leg side and lofted this inside-out one bounce to the wide long-off fence

gowtham to de kock, four runs, swept fiercely, beats square leg. fetched this from off stump. this wasn't all that bad a delivery from gowtham, take your hat off to de kock for being brave and risking being lbw to play that
stokes to kohli, 2 runs, chips this flick shot into the gap at midwicket, down towards gowtham. can't prevent the second though
stokes to kohli, 1 wide, slower ball gone wrong, slides this down leg even as kohli walks out to flick. pressure on stokes
gopal to de kock, no run, slides one across de kock, who flat-bats this back to the bowler
gopal to de villiers, no run, spins back in, defended to the leg side. sharp turn

laughlin to kohli, no run, steps out but gets yorked nearly as this tails in a long way. ab was more than halfway down the pitch when he was sent back but buttler doesn't pick up the ball cleanly. run-out chance missed.
laughlin to kohli, 1 run, walks across and whips this on the bounce to deep midwicket
laughlin to de villiers, six runs, he's sliced this over deep extra cover, seemed a mishit but boy, this has carried all the way.
gopal to mandeep singh, 1 run, eased with the spin to long-off
unadkat to de villiers, 1 run, makes room and punches this down to long-off. can't get the kind of room he would've liked. that's three good deliveries so far from unadkat
gopal to de villiers, no run, this one keeps low to beat the underedge as he looked to punch
gopal to negi, 1 run, squeezes this flick to square leg, off the mark
gowtham to negi, 1 run, goes back deep into the crease and whips this down to deep midwicket
laughlin to washington sundar, 1 wide, gets the line wrong, way down leg. good take by buttler
laughlin to washington sundar, 1 run, looks to work this against the line, gets a thick inside edge onto the boot, ball deflects to the off side for a single
stokes to washington sundar, 1 wide, slants this way outside off. saw the batsman making room but bowled it really wide
stokes to washington sundar, 1 run, makes room and punches this to wide mid-off, good stop.
stokes to washington sundar, no run, through with the swing again, failed to account for the slower delivery
unadkat to mandeep singh, no run, walks across to flick, ends up yorking himself.

stokes to washington sundar, four runs, carved away over backward point. lovely from washington, making a case as a batsman too. amidst his new ball ability, it's conveniently forgotten that he plays in the top order for his state side tamil nadu

chahar to rahul, four runs, ah, shot! the aesthetic value of that is just unbelievable. rahul simply leans into a punch through the covers, in the process covering for the late movement and using the pace to his advantage as he throws his weight behind it
harbhajan singh to gayle, no run, comes down the track and pats it away against the turn towards mid-on
chahar to gayle, no run, ah, has he got away with that? seemed to drift a long way from the left-hander, nowhere near gayle's reach, but for some reason, the umpire thought that was fine
harbhajan singh to gayle, 1 run, leg-side line again, he needs to settle into something here, gayle waits and tucks it behind square for one
harbhajan singh to rahul, no run, steps out to one that drifts into him and goes slightly inside-out to extra cover

thakur to gayle, four runs, edged and through the gap between keeper and wide slip. that's an unusually wide slip, probably even wider of where second slip would have been. that means gayle can take liberties at throwing his hands at deliveries that are well outside his reach
harbhajan singh to agarwal, four runs, brilliant from agarwal. uses the width to open the face really late and squeezes it out through backward point
bravo to agarwal, no run,

thakur to yuvraj singh, out, is that an edge? oh, yeah! tucked up for room and some extra bounce too that does him in. yuvraj is trying to slap this over but gets a feather to the keeper. gone for 20 but he kings xi will be pleased he didn't scratch around

bravo to nair, out, goes for a big heave over the leg side and he's picked out jadeja at deep midwicket who takes it reverse-cupped. slower ball from bravo does the trick as he messes up the timing by rolling his fingers over this delivery
sran to vijay, 1 wide, starts the inswinger too straight again. strays down leg, wide!
sharma to vijay, 1 run, flicked to square leg

tye to vijay, out, sran with another catch and he's too chuffed again as he hurls the ball in the air. vijay steps down the track, completely foxed by the slower one from tye, and chips it in the air. sran snaffles it at extra cover
mujeeb ur rahman to rayudu, 1 run, there's that deceptive trajectory right away, rayudu reaches out and gets an outside edge to third man
mujeeb ur rahman to billings, 1 run, shifts back and punches this past mid-on diving to his left
mujeeb ur rahman to rayudu, 1 run, turned away with the spin to backward square leg
ashwin to dhoni, 1 run, another legbreak, make that three in a row, dhoni reaches out and drives to long-off
yuvraj singh to rayudu, 1 run,
yuvraj singh to dhoni, 1 wide, slides down the leg side and sneaks past dhoni's attempt to clip it
ashwin to rayudu, 1 wide, sprayed down the leg side
ashwin to rayudu, no run, finds the outside edge with turn ad bounce from middle and leg as the ball trickles away into the off side
ashwin to rayudu, 1 wide, drifts it in down the leg side again
ashwin to rayudu, 1 run,
mujeeb ur rahman to dhoni, no run, shifts back and hurriedly punches it into the off side as it bounces extra
mujeeb ur rahman to dhoni, 1 run, shuffles across early and then awkwardly flicks it away to square leg for one
ashwin to rayudu, 1 run,
ashwin to rayudu, 1 run, comes down the track and drills to long-off
sran to rayudu, no run, back-of-the-hand slower delivery, rayudu backs away and leaves it hoping for a wide. but well inside

sran to rayudu, out, ashwin with a direct hit. and look at him take off. and look at the kings xi dugout. a lightning quick piece of fielding from ashwin. rayudu drills it to extra cover and ashwin just swoops down in a flash and nails a direct hit at the striker's end after dhoni sends rayudu back
sran to jadeja, no run, another yes and no. dhoni sends jadeja back but he manages to get back in comfortably after tapping a slower one to midwicket
sran to jadeja, 1 wide, slower ball, dips late and sneaks down the leg side

sharma to dhoni, 1 wide, tries an encore and it's drifted away too much. tension building. mohit needs to hold his own here. dhoni has loads of experience in these situations. injured back or not, you don't want to be bowling to him in these situations

boult to lynn, no run, beats the off stump! lynn exposes the stumps and it looks like he's anticipating the ball to swing into him from an off stump line. wants to drill it through cover, but this ball goes straight through with the angle
morris to karthik, four runs, one ball after being dispatched for four, morris offers the same delivery again, and karthik responds with the same shot. through midwicket

morris to karthik, out, and attempts a third hit through the same region, but gambhir had boult from square leg after those two boundaries, and karthik knocks it straight into the hands of the fielder there
morris to rana, no run, tapped to point and he is sent back
mohammed shami to rana, 1 run, slower ball again, finds the inside edge of rana's bat as he tries to drill it through the off side

boult to russell, out, bowled him! very good delivery from boult, almost the perfect delivery to russell. fires it in around leg stump and rolls his fingers over it to slow it up. it then dips really late with russell swinging for the fences, and takes out leg stump
morris to rana, no run, goes deep in his crease and tries to jab it through point but gets the bottom edge and rolls down the pitch
morris to rana, out, slower ball, miscues as he tries to loft it over the off side and sends it soaring into the sky. gambhir settles under it at cover. end of a top innings
tewatia to shubman gill, out, tame! very soft dismissal. a bit of room outside off and he flays this with a flat bat, but picks out point. gill having a tough start to his ipl career
tewatia to chawla, no run, really slows it up and gets it to skid across without turn, chawla swings and misses

tewatia to chawla, out, chawla comes down the track for a big hit. a non-turner again, pretty wide of chawla, and he was probably expecting it to turn into him, but as he doesn't, he skews it in the air off the outside of the bat and the keeper settles under it

chawla to roy, 1 wide, out, leg-side stumping! roy loses his balance completely. it's a slider down leg side that keeps going away from him as he walks down the pitch for some reason. has to reach out a long way for the flick and he won't get there. karthik's toughest task there is gathering the ball. he does that properly and then the stumping is relatively easy
chawla to pant, four runs, well played. it's a quicker one from chawla and he's a little late getting back on this. chops it very very late to get it past backward point
yadav to lewis, 1 run, shapes back in late, driven to mid-on as they scamper a quick single
woakes to lewis, 1 run, pushes outside the line, gets a thick inside edge towards fine leg
yadav to lewis, no run, drills this drive, but can't beat mid-off.
yadav to sharma, 1 run, opens the bat face late to steer this down to third man
washington sundar to sharma, 1 run, gentle little dab towards extra cover for a quick single
washington sundar to lewis, four runs, too much width and he's slashed this to beat point. used the depth of the crease superbly
mohammed siraj to lewis, no run, belted but on the bounce to kohli at extra cover
mohammed siraj to lewis, 1 run, toe-ends a lofted hit to mid-on, they scamper a run even as ab's throw misses the stumps at the bowler's end
woakes to lewis, no run, can't split the gap at cover. timed superbly but straight to cover.
woakes to lewis, no run, sees the batsman trying to move across and bowls this wide, left alone in anticipation of this being called wide, but this isn't.
chahal to lewis, no run,
