anderson to sharma, four runs, slapped past cover! half-tracker on off and angling across rohit. he comes dancing down the wicket and hits this through the ball's line. goes through cover and mid off

anderson to lewis, out, top edged, and taken! de kock gets under it and completes a swirling catch. tried to flat-bat this over mid on, with the ball angling into lewis' body, but he's through his shot too early, and comes off the toe end. it was in the air for a long time, and qdk had to run backwards for a while before the ball came back to earth

mohammed siraj to kh pandya, no run, half-tracker on middle stump, but bowls very straight. krunal rocks back and check-drives back to siraj. aggression from the bowler, who takes a aim at krunal's stumps... but doesn't throw it in the end
anderson to sharma, four runs, width and he's hammered this to the point boundary like a - insert your favourite word -  tracer bullet
anderson to sharma, 1 run, chips this down towards long-off
yadav to pollard, 1 run, thick outside edge to third man as he looks to slice this towards point
woakes to sharma, 1 run, lofted over the infield, down to deep cover.

mustafizur rahman to kohli, no run, slower ball, on off stump. kohli's forced to check his attempted drive, and taps it with soft hands to point instead. wants the single, but eventually chooses not to. smart choice

kh pandya to mandeep singh, 1 run, direct hit! quicker ball, flat on off, and that's been pushed to mid off for a quick run. the throw is flat, and mandeep, totally outstretched, is on the crease. does he have any part of the bat over the line? this is too tough to call. not out.

narine to rahane, four runs, bam, two fours in a row. jumps out of his crease early, slightly premeditated, to reach the pitch of this flat one outside off, and frees his arms to beat mid-off to his right
kuldeep yadav to d'arcy, no run, gets a good stride and smothers this.

shivam mavi to samson, four runs, ah, lovely. square third man was no more than 10 yards away from the ball but couldn't get around. just a hint of width, samson opens the bat face to steer this behind point. lovely timing.
narine to tripathi, 1 run, driven down to wide long off
narine to d'arcy, no run, defended back to the bowler, played this after it spun away.
rana to tripathi, 1 run, whips this down to deep midwicket as they jog the single
narine to stokes, no run, flat offbreak turning towards off stump, jabbed to midwicket
narine to gowtham, 3 runs, big offbreak now, looks to hoick into the leg side and gets an inside edge down into the fine leg region
gowtham to uthappa, no run, punches this straight to mid-off
kulkarni to narine, no run, looks to slap this over point, toe-ends it to cover instead
kulkarni to narine, four runs, thick outside edge as he attempts to slash over point, but this one flies over buttler's outstretched hands behind the stumps. streaky boundary
gowtham to narine, no run, hint of width again, punches this straight to the edge of the ring at cover
kulkarni to narine, no run, cracked away but can't pierce the off side ring, hit straight to cover point
unadkat to uthappa, four runs, deliberately done! very clever from uthappa. opens the bat face at the last moment to use the pace and angle to tickle this past the keeper to the third man boundary.
laughlin to narine, 1 run, gets on top of the bounce and tucks this towards square leg
stokes to uthappa, 1 run, squeezes this flick towards deep midwicket
gopal to narine, 1 leg bye, slow legbreak on leg stump. looks to stretch out and flick, misses it, and it rolls off his pad into the square leg region

gowtham to rana, 1 run, another misfield. down the track and he bowls it quick and angling into the batsman. drives it back towards him, and he lets it slip through his fingers and roll towards long-off
laughlin to uthappa, no run, slower ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
kumar to rahul, no run, curves away from off stump, driven firmly. good stop at extra cover
kumar to rahul, no run, uppish, but on the bounce to mid-off. nice curve again on the knuckleball. stopped on rahul and hit the top part of the bat as he looked to drive.
kumar to gayle, 1 run, gentle little tuck to square leg, gayle hares across to get off the mark.
kumar to rahul, 1 run, mistimes a big booming drive towards mid off as they scamper a single
jordan to rahul, no run, shapes to drive but this ball veers back in to roll back off the inside edge.
jordan to rahul, no run, squirts this drive to rashid at cover point
kaul to gayle, 1 run, mistimes an attempted punch down to mid-off, gayle is on the ball today, gets across for a single
hooda to rahul, 1 run, half-tracker wide outside off. rahul walks down the wicket to generate some extra pace, and slaps it to deep extra cover
kaul to gayle, 1 run, slower ball, wide outside off. gayle is forced to reach at it, and bunts it to deep extra cover
kaul to gayle, 1 run, half-tracker on off and angling further away. gayle stands tall and flat-bats it hard to long off. they walk across for the run
kaul to nair, four runs, clean strike, one bounce to the long off boundary. made room and lofted through the line. mid off was up, decided to clear him and did so superbly
kumar to nair, 1 run, opens the bat face slightly to drive this towards cover point
jordan to gayle, 1 run, driven to long-off
jordan to nair, no run, looks to walk across and whip this over square leg, played too early. flicked the back pad on the way to the keeper
kumar to gayle, 1 run, driven wide of extra cover for a quick single
ashwin to williamson, 1 run, punches this down to long of as he jogs the single
mujeeb ur rahman to pandey, 1 run, driven towards cover, tiwary dives to his left but can't stop it cleanly
tye to pandey, 1 run, bunts this towards cover, they scamper a single
tye to williamson, 1 run, steps out and drills this slower delivery to long off
mujeeb ur rahman to williamson, 2 runs, backs away, mujeeb follows him. bunted towards deep midwicket. a direct hit at the bowler's end from finch would've spelt trouble for pandey

tye to williamson, out, holes out to long off. stepped out and looked to loft over long off but ended up slicing it, which meant there was no timing. skewed it high in the air, finch took a comfortable catch. the knuckleball meant williamson didn't have any pace to work with.
mujeeb ur rahman to pandey, 2 runs, turned gently towards midwicket, no one there. easy two
sran to shakib al hasan, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, he mistimes this back past the bowler, they scamper a run
sharma to pandey, 2 runs, steps out and slaps this slower ball towards wide long off again, finch comes around to put up a sliding stop
ashwin to shakib al hasan, 1 wide, bowls a kedar jadhav style round-armish down leg. loses direction, way down leg.
ashwin to shakib al hasan, 1 run, has he cleared the ropes, no. put down by mujeeb at deep midwicket. this was a dolly.
ashwin to pandey, 1 run, steps out and punches this to deep cover.  third win in four games for kings xi.  this is also the first time they've won in mohali. emphatic win.
binny to watson, no run, half-tracker outside off, but angling away once again. watson's happy to tap it off the backfoot to point

gopal to billings, out, picks out deep midwicket. csk are having something of a slide on the end opposite to watson's. it's a half-tracker from gopal. which is smart of him, because that's how you get wickets in the ipl if you're a spinner now. sits up nicely on middle stump and he slaps it, flat, to stokes in the deep
laughlin to bravo, 1 wide, slower ball pushed too far wide. it bends away and past the wide marker
chahar to buttler, 1 wide, knuckle ball. fired down leg side. buttler was exposing the stumps in readiness for the ramp, but this was far too wide to make a connection
yadav to roy, no run, slower ball, in line with the stumps, roy tries to force it through midwicket. no luck

yadav to roy, 1 run, opens the face to try and find some runs behind point. there are none and so roy is sent back. mandeep hits the stumps direct and they pinch a single off the overthrow. then the man backing up hits the stumps direct at the non-strikers now. two perfect throws, no wickets
washington sundar to pant, no run, goes around the wicket to the left-hander and even sundar - who rarely gets the ball to move sideways - is beating the edge with turn.
washington sundar to pant, 1 run, he's very wary of slow deliveries in line with the stumps. waits until it gets to him, uses soft hands, angles the face and taps the ball gently to point
washington sundar to pant, no run, tosses it up from around the wicket on middle stump. pant tucks it to midwicket
washington sundar to pant, 1 run, lets the ball come to him, meeting it under his eyes for a flick to the left of midwicket
washington sundar to pant, 1 run, blocks to cover point and jogs across to the other end
washington sundar to iyer, 1 run, another block into the off side for a single
woakes to tewatia, four runs, runs back, leaps up, sticks a hand out, but the ball evades mid-off! tough break for siraj, and even worse, it runs away to the boundary. mis-hit loft from tewatia
anderson to pant, no run, spots the left-hander switching his stance for a reverse scoop and so plants the ball over the wide line to keep it out of pant's reach
boult to de kock, no run,

boult to vohra, no run, huuuuuuge appeal for lbw but the umpire isn't swayed by it. beautiful bowling from boult, pitching up to the new batsman, getting the ball to curl into him late. vohra is not at all ready for the fiendish delivery. he tries to play a shot into the leg side and possibly gets an inside edge? cause otherwise that kinda looks plumb

nadeem to kohli, out, horrendous running and de kock has ended up sacrificing his wicket. there is no run there. de kock thinks so, but his no either isn't accepted or isn't heard, as kohli keeps taking strides down the pitch as he watches the ball roll towards backward point. in the end, kohli is halfway down, de kock is stranded and he crosses over to give his wicket away

patel to de villiers, four runs, dismisses it to the boundary - he was eyeing midwicket, but he'll settle for extra cover. mr 360 at his very best, starting things off by moving across outside off to open up the leg side. but harshal one-ups him by bowling wide, as far wide as he dares. but ab raises the game with a blistering lofted drive for his fifty, off only 24 balls
tewatia to anderson, 1 run, tosses it up on leg stump, anderson flicks to deep square leg
tewatia to de villiers, 1 run, sets up for a heave again, but seeing the leg break turn a slight bit more than he budgets for, hits it along the ground to deep cover
morris to de villiers, 1 run, top edge but with the ball going only as far as the 30 yard circle, and everyone on the leg side in the deep, ab's very very safe
boult to anderson, out, 144. 8 kph. and it's good enough to beat anderson, who is swinging for the fences. done by pure pace. this is what the non-millenials say you miss, i hit.
morris to mandeep singh, six runs, top-edge sails away to the boundary behind him. well, that's one way to do it.
boult to mandeep singh, 1 run, drops and runs to cover
shakib al hasan to du plessis, no run, pushed through outside off, holds its line, driven through the line to the covers
stanlake to raina, four runs, raina manufactures a boundary for csk. he backs a long way outside leg, stanlake chases him, sliced in the gap at backward point. third man can't track it down either
kaul to du plessis, no run, 121ks knuckle ball outside off, faf falls over to the off side and does not connect with a scoop
kaul to du plessis, 1 run, faf shimmies out, yorks himself on off, and jabs a single to mid-on
shakib al hasan to raina, 1 wide, speared down leg, wide
shakib al hasan to raina, 1 run, tossed outside off, raina stretches out, meets the pitch, and drives a single down to long-off. singles won't help csk much
shakib al hasan to du plessis, 1 run, faf uses his feet and flicks an arm ball to deep midwicket
rashid khan to rayudu, 1 run, tosses up a legbreak outside off, driven with the spin to deep cover
kaul to raina, no run, raina backs away outside leg, knuckle ball at 120.8ks, raina reaches out but it does not arrive. when it does raina can't quite adjust. jabbed to backward point
kaul to raina, no run, raina moves outside leg again, another slower one - 118ks - outside off, carved to backward point again
kaul to raina, 1 run, raina now jumps across off and flicks aerially over midwicket. just one
hooda to raina, 1 run, tossed outside off, stretches out and drives through the covers
rashid khan to rayudu, 1 run, skidder on off stump, rayudu sits back and secures a single to midwicket
shakib al hasan to rayudu, no run,
kaul to raina, 1 run, backs away and carves to backward point
chahar to bhui, no run, some shape away outside off, left alone
chahar to pandey, no run, sharp inswinger! curves in significantly and raps the pad but would have headed down leg with that angle. wicket maiden from the young fast bowler. what a start!
thakur to williamson, no run,
thakur to williamson, 1 wide, tails away down the leg side
thakur to hooda, 1 run,

chahar to hooda, out, easy catch at extra cover. hooda pre-meditates and shuffles too early. it's the slower ball again and he goes through with the flick early to get a leading edge that jadeja runs back a few inches to take
jadeja to shakib al hasan, no run, a bit of width, opens up and drops it to point
chahar to williamson, 1 run, a beautiful drive for one as extra cover dives and gets a hand to it, and long-off mops up
jadeja to williamson, no run, pushed back to the bowler
watson to williamson, 2 runs,

sharma to pathan, no run, big swing and a miss from yusuf. zero feet, and against the turn and angle. dhoni whips the bails off in a flash, and wait, has the backfoot been planted back? yusuf just dragged it out but he's managed to ground his foot just in time
sharma to pathan, 1 run, non-turning legbreak on middle, trickles it away into the leg side
jadeja to williamson, 1 run, whipped against the turn between midwicket and mid-on
jadeja to pathan, no run, slides into him and finds the inside part of the bat as he pushes back
sharma to williamson, 1 run, covers for the turn and pushes into the off side
jadeja to williamson, 1 run,
bravo to williamson, 1 run, slower ball with ample width, slapped away to point
gowtham to ishan kishan, 1 run, flat on middle and leg, nudged into the gap at midwicket for a run. nicely played, soft hands, off the mark.
gowtham to yadav, no run, flat outside off, a big extravagant swing, but the drift takes the ball past the outside edge.
kulkarni to ishan kishan, no run, a slower ball outside off, good change in pace, and angle (the ball going away instead of coming in). pushed to cover point.

unadkat to yadav, 1 run, a slower ball on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on. suryakumar called for one immediately (it was his call). kishan doesn't completely trust the call, there's some hesitation but even with a direct hit at the batsman's end, all good.
gowtham to yadav, 2 runs, flat on off, but he gets some turn. that's why an attempted drive results in a thick inside edge through square leg. two runs
gowtham to ishan kishan, 1 run, flat on middle and leg, flicked away towards square leg for a run.
gopal to yadav, 1 wide, looking for the seam-up one, 115 kph. waaaay down leg. buttler does well to prevent five wides.
mcclenaghan to tripathi, 1 wide, not been a great start in terms of line. this one drifts down leg for a wide.

kh pandya to tripathi, out, picks out mid-on! i'm not sure what kind of a shot that was. flat and straight, tripathi just chips a drive to mid-on, did he try to go over? or past him? that does not seem like a very clever shot, did it hold up? something definitely did happen that resulted in a tame bunt to the fielder. krunal doesn't care.
kh pandya to samson, four runs, edged through the vacant slip region for four. a bit of width, flat and wider. a thick edge goes flying away for four. krunal got some turn on that.
mustafizur rahman to samson, four runs, slightly wider outside off, allowing samson to throw his hands at the ball. finds the timing and the placement, into the gap at cover.
kh pandya to samson, 1 run, flat and straight, nudged to deep midwicket for one
kh pandya to rahane, 1 run, flicked against the spin again. flat and wide outside off, drag-flicked to mid-on
mustafizur rahman to samson, 1 run, a slower ball outside off, samson opens the bat face and guides the ball to backward point for a run.
markande to stokes, 1 run, half-tracker on off, and it's the wrong'un this time. stokes says on the backfoot and punches to long off
mcclenaghan to samson, 2 runs, drilled towards the leg side, but played softly enough to come back for the second

bumrah to buttler, out, the zing bails light up! super fast (144kph) on off stump and angling right into buttler. he tries to defend it straight, but the ball goes between bat and pad. crashes into middle stump
plunkett to rahul, four runs, mis-timed but still four. a slower delivery around off, rahul mis-times an attempted lofted drive, the ball skews off the inside half, plonks over mid-on and races away.
christian to agarwal, 1 run, a slower ball on middle and leg, nudged away to deep square leg for a run.
maxwell to yuvraj singh, 1 run, drilled through to deep cover
mishra to yuvraj singh, 2 runs, turns this gently with the spin towards deep fine leg, lazy effort in the deep. should've just been one
avesh khan to miller, no run, this is a stunning delivery. bowled at 145 clicks, whizzes across and beats miller's push. pant collected that over his head.
avesh khan to miller, 1 run, pushed through the line to mid-off for a quick single. avesh bowls out and he's had a superb debut with daredevils
tewatia to miller, no run, goes back into the crease and defends this skiddy delivery

tewatia to miller, 1 run,  dropped by maxwell at cover!  what's worse is they concede an overthrow. miller rocks back and slaps this straight. both feet were in the air as he went for the catch sideways and it popped out. reprieves his old mate
tewatia to miller, 2 runs, flat-bats this to long-off where iyer slides around to stop this, can't stop the second though
mishra to miller, 1 run, eases this down to long off with the spin
mishra to nair, 1 run, driven through the line to wide long-off. expensive over.
plunkett to miller, 1 run, a slower delivery outside off, guided to point for a tight single
plunkett to ashwin, 1 wide, strays down leg, extra run, extra ball.
rajpoot to gambhir, 1 wide, slides one down leg, excellent stop by rahul. the ball bounced before him as well.
rajpoot to gambhir, no run, nervous little poke to an away-going delivery, didn't miss the edge by much

rajpoot to gambhir, no run, big appeal for lbw. gambhir was on his toes when he was struck. height was surely in question there, but no. ashwin thinks otherwise and has asked for a review.. pitch map shows this hit the turf outside leg,  so nothing else matters.
sran to shaw, four runs, slashes and gets a thick outside edge that flies over the slip fielder.
rajpoot to gambhir, 1 run, dabs this gently into the off side as they scamper a single.  an under-arm flick from agarwal at point and shaw may have been gone
rajpoot to maxwell, no run, crunching drive, super stop at point by yuvraj. threw himself to his left to effect a one-handed stop
tye to maxwell, 1 run, squeezes the drive to mid off for a quick single
tye to gambhir, 1 wide, slower one down leg. rolled through to the keeper as gambhir looked to tickle it fine
tye to gambhir, 1 leg bye, hint of curve back in to hit the pad as gambhir looks to flick. he was slightly off balance. big appeal, but no review. replays confirm this pitched outside leg.
tye to maxwell, no run, steps out to whack this slower ball into the neighbouring football stadium, but misses. swung through too early. head all over the place
tye to maxwell, no run, is there an edge there? thought i heard something. maxwell looks to run this off the bat face wide of the keeper.
rajpoot to maxwell, no run, whups this from outside off to yuvraj at midwicket
rajpoot to gambhir, 1 run, hops across and whips to deep square
tye to pant, 1 run, looked to sway out of the way but somehow didn't get his bat away in time, deflects to third man.

tye to iyer, 5 runs, turns this slower delivery from outside off towards midwicket. oh, dear. four overthrows, so make that five. miller throws to the bowler's end, but tye misses. finch, backing up, also misses as this squeezes below him
rajpoot to iyer, no run, squirts this to point. closed the bat face early in trying to nudge this into the leg side.
ashwin to pant, 1 run, whips this from outside off to deep square leg
ashwin to pant, 1 run, drifts in, pitches and spins away from middle, defended with soft hands
mujeeb ur rahman to christian, no run, another carrom ball-type delivery, on middle and leg, nudged to midwicket
ashwin to iyer, no run,
mujeeb ur rahman to iyer, no run, another dot, quick and straight, finds midwicket again
ashwin to christian, 1 run, the legbreak, flat and wide, slashed to deep point for a run.
ashwin to christian, 1 run, a carrom ball outside off, pushed into the gap at midwicket for one.
sran to tewatia, 1 wide, a slower ball goes very wrong. back of the hand outside off, outside the tramline and called
sran to iyer, 1 wide, strays down leg for the third wide of the over. sloppy.
ashwin to tewatia, no run, another dot. flat around off, pushed to cover.
ashwin to tewatia, 1 run, flat outside off, tewatia goes back and punches one to long-off for one.
ashwin to iyer, no run, a carrom ball, on middle. tewatia comes down, but is sent back. tiwary misses at the bowler's end.
mujeeb ur rahman to tewatia, no run, the one that moves the other way. flat and wide, the ball moves away and beats the bat. lovely bowling.
mujeeb ur rahman to tewatia, 1 run, a thick inside edge onto the pad. flat on off, the inside edge takes the ball to square leg.
tye to tewatia, 1 run, one bounce to deep midwicket. a slower delivery around off, a muscled swat to deep midwicket.
tye to tewatia, 1 wide, a slower ball, too wide outside off though. and called.

sran to plunkett, out, a golden duck for plunkett. a slower delivery down leg from sran. excellent variation, because plunkett meets the ball much earlier than he intended. as a result, a whip intended for midwicket goes aerially to deep square leg, where nair takes a comfortable catch.

sran to mishra, 1 run, he walks right across and connects neatly with the lap scoop but he finds the keeper. it's a slower delivery well outside off. that missed off stump by not much. iyer forces him to complete the run.
mujeeb ur rahman to iyer, six runs, six! not over yet. it's flat and wide, iyer stands back and slaps a swat straight back over the bowler's head for six. sensational timing. delhi are dancing again.
mujeeb ur rahman to iyer, no run, refuses the single. flat outside off, powered to long-off. says no. i'll take this over.

mujeeb ur rahman to iyer, out, taken at long-off and kings xi win by four runs. gambhir has his head in his hands. iyer looks up. a flatter trajectory delivery outside off is chipped away to long-off. finch takes the reverse-cupped catch and kings xi begin their celebrations.
hh pandya to pathan, 1 wide, strays down leg this time, another extra delivery
markande to pathan, 1 run, flat on middle and leg, 80 kph, nudged to deep midwicket again. the runs have come this over.
kh pandya to mohammad nabi, 1 run, a slower delivery outside off, drilled down to long-off for one.
kh pandya to mohammad nabi, no run, another leading edge. slow on middle and leg, gets some turn too. off the top edge towards midwicket
kh pandya to mohammad nabi, 1 run, flat and straight, a thick inside edge towards midwicket
kh pandya to pathan, no run, quick and straight, defended back. yusuf now 8 off 13.
markande to rashid khan, no run, the legbreak this time. flat outside off, there is some zip and some turn as the ball beats the bat
markande to rashid khan, no run, nicely bowled, slower around off, tapped away towards backward point
kh pandya to pathan, 1 wide, starts with a leg side delivery that drifts down leg, wide called.
kh pandya to rashid khan, 2 runs, strays down leg again, swept away behind square. another misfield from mustafizur.
kh pandya to rashid khan, 1 run, nicely bowled, flat and straight, pushed away to long-off, one more.
markande to kaul, no run, the legbreak outside off, played to backward point with the angle and a slightly-open face.

mustafizur rahman to kaul, out, run-out! terrible from sunrisers. they've had a shocking evening. a slower ball outside off, kaul finally gets bat on it. slices a drive to point. hardik pandya misfields, which makes kaul think there is a single. pathan comes running down, sees pandya's throw is coming and returns back to his crease, allowing kaul to sacrifice himself. the ball pops out of kishan's gloves, just as he made contact with the stumps

bumrah to pathan, 2 runs, smashed down to long-off. a slower ball is hammered back past the bowler. bumrah sticks out his right hand, but the ball flies past. pollard throws to the batsman's end, but he's fine

sandeep sharma to lewis, no run, beats the outside edge and gets him on the back leg. squares him up once again. this is not easy living for lewis. looking to tap that through midwicket and he's struck outside off on the back thigh
shakib al hasan to yadav, no run, another arm ball that is just kept out. sliding in at off stump and he just manages to block it, from very deep in the crease

mohammad nabi to yadav, four runs, shot! he's bringing out the class now. makes room this time. he's greeted with a slider and he has plenty of pace as he shifts the weight back and punches it to the extra cover boundary
shakib al hasan to pollard, 1 run, arm ball. pushed through flat and pollard has no clue about this. looking to punch through cover, gets an inside edge to fine leg

basil thampi to hh pandya, 1 run, run out chance missed. shakib fails to pick up the ball at extra cover after running in. the batsmen are only just crossing over halfway down the pitch. hardik dropped this pitch side with soft hands

kaul to bumrah, 1 run, dhawan flies to his right and can't hold on! oh what a catch that would have been! kaul gets it to rise in the corridor and bumrah fends at it with hard hands. it is sailing high and very wide of dhawan at wide slip. he does superbly to even reach it. but can only parry it to third man
chahar to de kock, 1 run, makes some room this time, it's a slower ball and he patiently pushes it into off for one
harbhajan singh to de kock, no run, some room outside off, he goes after it and drives it along the ground to cover
harbhajan singh to de kock, no run, little flatter, de kock goes hard at it outside off but doesn't quite middle it
thakur to de villiers, no run, straight delivery served first up to abd, he pushes it back
harbhajan singh to de villiers, no run, tickles it with the turn to the midwicket fielder
harbhajan singh to de villiers, no run, makes room, harbhajan sends it slower and ab waits to defend it back. loud cheers for that too
jadeja to de kock, no run, takes a step down and tries to work it with the spin, stifled appeal for lbw
jadeja to de kock, 1 run, swept yet again, tahir has to run to his left from long leg and keeps it inside the boundary
imran tahir to de kock, no run, makes room and charges, tahir yorks him and de kock bunts it to cover point
bravo to de kock, no run, yorks him for the second time in three balls, got it across with the angle too and de kock misses again. bravo thought he got some bat
bravo to de villiers, 1 run, goes across early and scoops it over the in-field behind square. didn't get much distance but got two
watson to de kock, 1 run, makes room and it's slower again, heaves it to the leg side for one
thakur to de kock, 1 run, gets room to free his arms and he does, along the ground to deep point
bravo to anderson, no run, he charges a bit after those five dot balls, bravo is smart enough to land that wide and away from him, another dot

imran tahir to anderson, out, two in two, tahir is running again! anderson got strike because they crossed over on the previous delivery, tahir sent down a wrong'un outside off and anderson poked tentatively to slip where harbhajan pouched it

jadeja to mandeep singh, 4 byes, that turn beats the batsman and dhoni! it pitched on leg stump, maybe even outside, mandeep looked to work it to leg and that turned a mile to miss the off stump while mandeep came out of the crease and dhoni missed the ball too
jadeja to mandeep singh, no run, beats him outside off with the turn again, turns him square
jadeja to mandeep singh, 1 run, lots of turn outside off, mandeep stretches out to tap it through the covers
imran tahir to mandeep singh, 1 run, quick and flat outside off, he taps it late and calls for the single quickly
imran tahir to de grandhomme, 1 run, drives it with the turn into the covers where a fumble allows one
bravo to mandeep singh, 1 run, smacks it back to bravo who sticks his left hand out couldn't hold on to it. it will count as a drop but was struck really hard
thakur to mandeep singh, 1 wide, he shapes to jump into the leg side for a ramp and withdraws late. the bowler is forced to bowl wide outside off and he leaves to get the extra run
yadav to raina, no run, it's angled away outside off and raina dabs it tentatively to point
washington sundar to rayudu, no run, pretty straight outside off, rayudu dabs it to cover point
yadav to rayudu, 1 run, hint of swing away from outside off, he dabs it late to third man for one
mohammed siraj to rayudu, 1 run, quick and nipping into rayudu, just about gets his bat down for one towards point. think he got glove actually
mohammed siraj to raina, 1 wide, goes towards the off stump and siraj strays down leg for a wide

yadav to raina, out, the persistence with pace pays off, raina miscues it to backward point! raina strayed from his stumps again and umesh pitched it up with some swing towards his legs, raina flicked but mistimed it horrible and the edge went the other way, easy peasy for mandeep
yadav to billings, no run, loud appeal  first ball for billings, but it's going down leg, the excitement for rcb makes it a loud appeal. it was angling in and going down for sure
yadav to billings, no run, straighter on the off stump, solid defence from billings this time
yadav to billings, 1 run, just outside the off stump, he steers it down to third man
yadav to rayudu, 1 run, pretty straight and coming into the batsman, he defends to leg for one
yadav to jadeja, no run, swings it into him from middle stump, no room for jadeja to put it away
yadav to jadeja, 1 run, dances down and smacks the ball from outside off to deep point. a fielder is stationed there
yadav to rayudu, 1 run, stifling line around off again, he goes across a bit on his toes and helps it to leg for one
chahal to rayudu, no run, goes for the drive but it's a touch slower and doesn't turn that much, inside edge back to the bowler
chahal to jadeja, 1 wide, turns from middle and leg and goes down leg for a wide
negi to dhoni, no run, targets the stumps with the angle, dhoni pushes it straight back
negi to rayudu, 1 run, takes a step down and pushes the ball with the turn to long off
negi to dhoni, no run, nicely bowled on the stumps, around middle and leg and it turned enough to make dhoni defend it back. no room whatsoever
chahal to rayudu, 1 run, turning towards off from middle, rayudu goes back and turns it to leg
chahal to dhoni, 2 runs, soft hands from dhoni to work that to the leg side from leg stump, they run hard and make it back for two
anderson to dhoni, 1 run, enough room outside off for dhoni to drive it away to deep point
anderson to dhoni, 1 run, not too far from the off stump, dhoni stays back and punches it to long off
chahal to rayudu, no run, slow and well outside off, turns away further and rayudu leaves, thinking it's a wide. but it's not
chahal to dhoni, 1 wide, this one is a wide was it turns and goes wider than the line
chahal to dhoni, 1 run, better line from chahal as dhoni drives that with turn into the covers
mohammed siraj to dhoni, 1 run, shot and wide outside off, he reaches out and tucks it over point
mohammed siraj to rayudu, six runs, over the covers and six, rayudu's sixth six! he charged down the track and didn't look like he middled it, but he got enough to send it flat and over
mohammed siraj to dhoni, 1 run, good delivery on the off stump, dhoni pushes for a single as soon as he helps it to mid off
anderson to rayudu, no run, slightly slower and angled across from well outside off, he swings and misses

anderson to rayudu, 1 run, dropped! leading edge and umesh has put it down. rayudu went for the big shot from outside off, he didn't get close to it and that went so high umesh had all the time in the world to get under it. he got under it in the cricle on the off side but it popped out
anderson to dhoni, 1 wide, tries to bowl it well away and ends up giving a wide on off
anderson to dhoni, 1 run, wider from the batsman and dhoni pushes it into off for one
anderson to bravo, 1 run, goes or a biggish swing first ball outside off, into the covers for one
mohammed siraj to dhoni, 1 wide, one more wide, this one's gone far down the off side. pressure goes back to the bowler after a really good start
sran to dhawan, four runs, ooh, that's crunched. he sees width, he throws his hands at it. and then watches the ball skip away to the cover point boundary.
rajpoot to pandey, no run, he's probing away, just outside off, generating steep bounce. pandey chooses to leave again
rajpoot to pandey, 2 runs, slots it between extra cover and mid-off, ashwin catches up with it, puts in a dive and saves a few runs.
sran to pandey, no run, pokes it into the covers and looks for a single off the misfield. shakib says no.

ashwin to shakib al hasan, 1 run, is that a run-out. ah, no. ashwin loses the ball as he tries to guide it onto the stumps. so shakib survives after a nudge into the covers and running a tad bit lazily
tiwary to shakib al hasan, 3 wides, slow through the air, barely wanting the ball to bounce with that side-arm action. it goes down leg and rahul fumbles.
ashwin to pandey, no run, keeps it wicket to wicket and pandey, without any room, can only block

mujeeb ur rahman to pandey, no run, the batsmen must feel like this pitch can't make up its mind. to the quicks, it's fast and bounce. to the spinners, it keeps stopping. pandey, here, all set to punch through cover, gets an inside edge back to the bowler
mujeeb ur rahman to pandey, 1 run, adjusts better to the pace of mujeeb and plants the ball in the gap at cover
mujeeb ur rahman to pandey, 1 run, follows the batsman as he makes room and as a result, pandey can only push it to long-off for a single
mujeeb ur rahman to pandey, 1 run, drives to long-off
ashwin to pandey, 1 run, another carrom ball, against which pandey comes down the track and pops out to long-off
ashwin to pathan, 1 run, lobs it up tastily above yusuf's eyeline. the batsman isn't sucked into a big shot and instead hits along the ground to long-off
mujeeb ur rahman to pathan, no run,
mujeeb ur rahman to pathan, no run, stays back to a flatter delivery on off stump and taps it down the pitch

ashwin to pathan, six runs, dropped at deep midwicket, this time it's tiwary, waiting on the edge of the boundary, having very little room to manoeuvre. that makes him nervous and that makes him lose it. yusuf lives to swing across the line again

basil thampi to gayle, 1 run, bisects the fielders with a mis-hit! luck be with gayle-y to-niiiiight. also, that slice off the outside edge, landing between point and deep third man brings up the fifty partnership as well.
basil thampi to rahul, 1 run, a gentle little nudge to deep square leg
rashid khan to nair, no run, stays back and blocks the flatter delivery on middle

shakib al hasan to ashwin, no run, comes down the track to try and nudge it to midwicket. but the ball drifts in a little too much for him to make contact. big shout for lbw, but that's shot down. then there's indecision between the batsman over taking a single. nerves jangling everywhere!

rashid khan to ashwin, out, backs away and toe-ends the slash meant to go over the cover and watches his opposite number settle under a simple catch on the edge of the 30-yard circle. rashid spreads his arms and soaks in the moment. either that, or he's saying, 'yeah, this is me. deal with it'
rashid khan to rajpoot, no run, almost finishes it as a quick leg break beats rajpoot's swing and somehow takes pity on off stump. allows it to stay standing
kaul to rajpoot, 1 run, slower ball, hiding it outside off, and rajpoot only just catches up with it as he slashes it to long-off
johnson to iyer, no run, more bounce for johnson. dug in outside off and angling away, iyer arches his back but can't connect with the ramp to third man
chawla to iyer, 2 runs, another slider from chawla, he's firing 'em in, whipped with the angle through midwicket

chawla to shaw, out, flat, quick, sneaks under the bat and hits the middle stump. this does not bounce at all. end of a sparkling fifty from shaw. another slider from chawla, skids low, shaw swings across the line and watches the ball shoot under his bat and rattle the stumps
chawla to maxwell, 1 run, maxwell ventures outside leg, chawla fires it at 103ks outside off, flat-batted to long-off
narine to maxwell, 1 run, dragged away to the leg side
narine to iyer, 1 leg bye, the batsman backs away outside leg, the bowler follows him and hits the pad
narine to maxwell, 2 runs, there comes the big reverse-swat from maxwell, but he finds cover point
shivam mavi to iyer, 1 wide, mavi has lost his head and line. iyer jumps across off, mavi sprays it past the marker. off-side wide
mishra to shubman gill, 1 run, wide legbreak, the batsman reaches out for the ball and carves it to backward point

mishra to karthik, out, mishra lobs it up outside off and gets it to break away further. he forces karthik to reach out for the ball. karthik tries to do so but loses his shape. he aims to go over the covers, but instead carves it squarer to boult at backward point. over to you, russell
mishra to shubman gill, 1 run, wide legbreak, chopped wide of point

mcclenaghan to rayudu, six runs, steps out and flat-bats this into the sightscreen. what confidence, there's something about rayudu's batting that has become eye-catching this season. terrific followthrough as he hit this straight back over.
mcclenaghan to watson, no run, not much room but he drives anyway, hit straight to cover
bumrah to rayudu, 1 run, hint of width outside off, steered to square third man
mcclenaghan to watson, 1 run, gets on top of the bounce and turns this towards square leg
mcclenaghan to rayudu, 1 run, squeezes this drive to mid-off as they scamper a quick single
hh pandya to rayudu, four runs,  just over gully!  hint of width, rayudu slashes over the fielder to beat third man
hh pandya to rayudu, no run, not much feet movement, driven straight to cover
markande to raina, four runs, flat and powerful. pitched right up to raina with the gift of room, and he shovels it straight over the bowler's head after freeing his arms
kh pandya to dhoni, 1 run, steps out and whips this towards square leg.
hh pandya to dhoni, four runs, drills this, one bounce to long-off. saw this in his swinging arc, brought out his powerful bottom-handed whip to belt this. typical dhoni shot
hh pandya to dhoni, 1 run, slapped to point, where there's a misfield by suryakumar. dhoni pinches a single to keep strike
markande to dhoni, no run, drifts in and spins away from middle, turned to the leg side
markande to dhoni, 1 run, makes room and punch this wide of point for a quick single
bumrah to raina, 1 run, shapes to whip over midwicket, gets a thick inside edge to fine leg
thakur to lewis, no run, left alone outside off
thakur to lewis, no run, flashes hard at the sight of width but it's pacy and he isn't entirely behind the line as the ball shoots past the outside edge
watson to yadav, four runs, not much room to work with there but yadav makes up for it by shifting back and subtly opening the face of his bat to knock it through backward of point
harbhajan singh to lewis, no run, slider on middle, drilled off the inside part of the bat to the left of the bowler
watson to lewis, 1 run, throws his hands at a wide one and gets a thick outside edge towards third man
harbhajan singh to lewis, no run, brilliant stop by raina at mid-off as lewis slaps this off the backfoot and raina dives to his left to intercept it
harbhajan singh to lewis, 1 run, slider that drifts back in to keep a touch low, lewis eases this down to deep point
imran tahir to lewis, 1 wide, fires this across the left-hander but just outside the wide line
harbhajan singh to lewis, 1 run, dabs this gently into the off side for a quick single.
bravo to lewis, no run, steers this away-going delivery to raina at backward point
watson to sharma, no run, crunching drive but a super stop by raina at cover. may have saved at least two runs
watson to sharma, 1 run, mistimes a drive to long off. three dots and a single, yet 13 came off that over. mumbai well on track
bravo to sharma, no run, defended back but bravo moves quickly to his left and fires the throw back at the striker's end. rohit reacted quickly to get back
bravo to sharma, 1 run, thick inside edge, the ball deflects to point. bravo angles one in from wide of the crease, rohit looked to whip this over midwicket
bravo to lewis, 1 run, slower delivery on leg stump, turned towards square leg
thakur to sharma, no run, steps out and slaps this to raina at cover. he fires a throw at the bowler's end but lewis reacts quickly to plonk his bat back in
thakur to sharma, 1 run, flicked up and over, down to deep midwicket
thakur to lewis, no run, drills this to mid-off, rohit wanted the single but was sent back
gowtham to hales, no run, turns this straight to square leg. tight bowling so far from kg
kulkarni to hales, four runs, width and hales has flayed that behind point. cracking stroke! opened his wrists up nicely to pick the gap.
kulkarni to williamson, four runs, too much width, williamson stands still and slaps this through point when it finally arrives.
kulkarni to williamson, no run, leans into the drive, eases this straight to extra cover
archer to hales, 1 run, hurries hales for pace as he gets a thick inside edge on the drive to mid on, quick single scampered
archer to williamson, 1 run, gets on top of the bounce and turns this square on the leg side
unadkat to williamson, no run, looks to get on top of the bounce and work to the leg side but this climbs on him, rolls off the top part to the bowler
sodhi to hales, 1 run, eased with the spin to long off
sodhi to williamson, 1 run, plenty of revs on this one, driven with the spin to deep cover as they jog the single
sodhi to williamson, 1 run, driven hard, a half-stop at cover keeps it down to a single.
stokes to williamson, 1 run, excellent wrist work to flick this from outside off but tripathi throws himself to his right to effect a one-handed stop. saved a couple of runs.
stokes to hales, 1 run, slower delivery down leg, eased to fine leg.
sodhi to hales, 1 run, eased to point when tripathi dives to his right to stop that
stokes to hales, 2 runs, whips this down to fine leg where sodhi dishes out a sliding stop to save a couple of runs
stokes to hales, no run, mistimes a drive to mid on
stokes to hales, no run, drilled but can't split the gap. straight to extra cover
lomror to williamson, 1 run, drifts this into middle and leg, turned wide of midwicket
unadkat to williamson, six runs, steps out, opens up the off side and lofts through the line to clear long off. as stylish as it gets. superb balance
unadkat to williamson, four runs, looks to swing over long off, gets a thick outside edge that flies to the third man boundary. streaky but it doesn't matter
archer to hales, 1 run, dabs this gently into the off side for a quick single.
archer to williamson, no run, looks to mow this across the line but swung through early and missed. rolls to the keeper. brushed the flap of the pad, i think.
sodhi to pandey, no run, looks to go over the bowler's head but toe ends this back
gowtham to shakib al hasan, no run, defends this with the spin to cover point
gowtham to shakib al hasan, 1 run, steps out and drives firmly, gowtham half-stops so can't prevent the single
gowtham to pandey, 2 runs, looks to mow this across the line but gets a thick inside edge towards deep midwicket

unadkat to pandey, out, another painstaking pandey innings comes to an end. was in no control of this lofted hit. sliced this slower delivery to point, where rahane moved a couple of steps back to complete the catch. royals continue to surge.
archer to saha, 1 bye, looks to back away and scoop but misses. they scamper a bye even as buttler misses an underarm flick at the striker's end.
sandeep sharma to rahane, no run,
shakib al hasan to rahane, 1 run,
shakib al hasan to tripathi, 1 run,
basil thampi to samson, no run, slower ball, that's just 94.7ks, and samson has to reach out as it nips away off the seam, skews it off the inside of the bat down the pitch
shakib al hasan to buttler, 1 run,
shakib al hasan to buttler, 2 runs, turned away against the spin to midwicket and they take on the fielder in the deep for a quick second
rashid khan to rahane, 1 run, closes the face to a legbreak and gets a leading edge to backward point

rashid khan to buttler, out, off the outside part of the bat. a legbreak that turns minimally and buttler slices it in the air as he fails to get entirely underneath the stroke. simple catch for dhawan at long-off. sunrisers right back into this
sandeep sharma to lomror, no run,
narine to de kock, four runs, same shot but on the other side and same result. shuffled a bit towards off and this time he swept it much finer for four
narine to de kock, no run, some width on the off side, he pushes it to cover point and comes back in time
johnson to mccullum, 1 wide, comes down again and mitch tries a slower one this time but down leg for a wide
chawla to mccullum, 1 run, on middle and leg now, he pushes it towards mid on for one
chawla to mccullum, no run, darts in one at 122.4kmh according to the tv, it was on off stump and mccullum did well to get his bat down in time
chawla to mccullum, no run, usual leg break, which hardly spins, much slower on the off stump and he defends again
narine to de kock, 1 run, offbreak outside off, slices it to backward point and they sprint across for a quick one
kuldeep yadav to mccullum, 1 run, a fumble at deep midwicket, kkr's fielding still a beat wobbly. mccullum had swept this one with the turn to the leg side
chawla to de kock, 1 run, tries to loft it with the turn this time, doesn't quite middle it but gets one to deep midwicket
shivam mavi to kohli, four runs, shot. pace, width. everything you need on this pitch. waits for it to arrive again and guides it over point
russell to kohli, six runs,

chahal to lynn, 1 run, dropped! kohli has his face covered at slip as m ashwin puts down a sitter at extra cover. chahal has done superbly to induce a leading edge from lynn -  a dipping legbreak at off stump that he looks to lift over midwicket. there was no pressure on ashwin, apart from anything he put on himself. he got under it, couldn't complete it
mohammed siraj to lynn, no run, angles it in nicely towards the stumps, lynn blocks it back
mohammed siraj to lynn, four runs, shot ball outside off and lynn scythes it mercilessly behind square on the off side. that raced to the boundary in no time!
ashwin to uthappa, no run, turns it a mile outside off! uthappa went back in the crease to asses the turn and couldn't get close to it eventually
mohammed siraj to uthappa, 1 run, taps this one square on the off side for a quick single
mohammed siraj to lynn, no run, slower one bordering on the wide line, not called a wide and siraj must be relieved
ashwin to uthappa, 1 run, leans into the legbreak and pushes it to cover for one
chahal to uthappa, six runs, what a beauty! you pitch it up to uthappa and he will swing that bat absolutely straight and with such elegance. it goes straight and high for six
chahal to uthappa, 1 run, pushes this one with the turn to off for one
yadav to uthappa, no run, nice and straight towards the off stump, uthappa says 'wait' after steering that to midwicket
ashwin to rana, 1 run, a wrong'un around off and he goes back to push it into the covers for one
southee to lynn, 1 run, tucks the ball with the angle to leg for one
ashwin to rana, 1 run,
mohammed siraj to lynn, 1 run, uses a strong bottom hand to drill that through the covers. have to settle for one

mohammed siraj to russell, out, gone first ball on his 30th birthday! the crowd has come alive, i tell you. siraj banged it in and russell went hard at it with a swing of the arms, got only a top edge and de kock ran a long way back to complete a superb catch
mohammed siraj to lynn, 1 wide, sends a wide on the off side, outside the tramlines

mohammed siraj to karthik, 2 runs, southee has a shy at the stumps from point, he can see only one of them and he misses as lynn is miles away, he finally makes it and then even comes back for the overthrow. dk drove that straight to point and took off, lynn wasn't sure and was nearly stuck on the pitch but dk was a long way down before southee misses. no back up, little more mix up and that's two runs

southee to karthik, 2 runs, we have a direct hit and the third umpire comes into play, but he's safe. dk closed the face of the bat to tuck the ball to leg with soft hands and said 'two' repeatedly as vohra rain in from the leg side, they can back just in time
tewatia to watson, 1 run, tossed on middle and leg, non-turner, nurdled through the gap at midwicket
mishra to watson, no run, another slider just outside off, watson pushes it back to mishra
tewatia to watson, 1 run, backs away and punches down to long-off
mishra to watson, 1 run,
shankar to raina, 1 run,
shankar to rayudu, 1 wide, sees the batsman advancing and takes it away from him but drifts away too much outside off

mishra to watson, out, mishra does well to float this up to watson and entice him. but he's taken this away from him with some drift in the air, and it results in watson skewing a lofted strike off the outside part of the bat. into the hands of long-off
avesh khan to rayudu, 1 wide, sees the batsman walk across and bowls it too wide outside his off-stump
avesh khan to dhoni, no run, left alone outside off but that's perfectly legal. well inside the line
ngidi to iyer, no run, 117ks slower ball kicks up outside off and foxes iyer
watson to pant, 1 run, another slower ball on middle, pant reads it, drops it to the off side and scampers across for a single
harbhajan singh to shankar, no run, pushed through outside off, keeps low, shankar goes low with it to keep it out
harbhajan singh to shankar, 1 run, slides on outside off, whipped away to midwicket
harbhajan singh to pant, 1 wide, leg-side wide
jadeja to pant, 1 run, steps out and whips it away to deep midwicket
jadeja to pant, six runs, 101.5ks, fired outside off, pant charges down the track, gets under it and smokes it over midwicket for a mighty six
harbhajan singh to shankar, four runs, sprays it on a leg-stump line and shankar whips it off the inner part of the bat past dhoni to fine leg
bravo to shankar, 1 wide, sprayed down the leg side
kh pandya to vohra, no run, slower through the air and breaks away outside off, big swing and a miss

hh pandya to mccullum, four runs, mid-off had just dropped back to the boundary before this ball, and baz swats this knuckle ball away to the left of suryakumar. he waits for the slower ball and forces it away
kh pandya to kohli, 1 run, skidding in on middle, inside-edged away behind square
bumrah to mccullum, 1 run, baz backs away outside leg, bumrah follows him, guided down to third man again
hh pandya to kohli, no run, kohli forays down the track, knuckle ball, bounces and beats kohli outside off
bumrah to mandeep singh, six runs, slower ball outside off, mandeep picks it up and smites it into the stands beyond midwicket. nice, clean swing of the arms
southee to yadav, four runs, too wide, and suryakumar's seen enough! big stride towards the off side, and thumps this drive between cover and extra cover. glorious
southee to kh pandya, 1 run, slower ball, on off stump. it's angling across his body, but krunal's leg-side heave is mistimed. goes to long off instead
kulkarni to shaw, 1 run, delhi's first runs. on middle and leg, flicked away easily through deep square leg for a single.
gowtham to iyer, 1 run, flat outside off, nudged away towards midwicket
gowtham to shaw, four runs, lovely shot. flat outside off, shaw backs away and punches a drive quite comfortably through cover
stokes to shaw, 1 wide, strays down leg, wide

gopal to shaw, out, chipped back to the bowler! it's a legbreak, around middle, extracts some turn. shaw stays in the crease, looks to drive the ball to long-off, but he's not in a great position. because of the turn, all he can do is hit a leaden-footed poke back to gopal
stokes to pant, 1 wide, another one that strays down leg, wide. just like stokes' previous over
unadkat to iyer, 1 run, a slower delivery again outside off, slashed to deep point
gowtham to pant, no run, flat and straight, around off. defended
unadkat to iyer, 1 run, a slower ball outside off, chopped to third man. that's iyer's fourth fifty in five matches
avesh khan to buttler, no run, slower ball, wide outside off and buttler goes chasing after it again. misses the shot this time though, and through to pant on the bounce

shivam mavi to du plessis, four runs, faf continues to chance his arm. he is taking the risks for csk tonight. he charges out, flays at the ball away from the body, and drags an inside edge past the leg stump, to the left of dk

russell to raina, four runs, raina jumps across off and throws russell off his line. the west indian darts it outside leg, picked away fine on the leg side for four. raina continues to deal in boundaries
russell to raina, 1 wide, another leg-side wide, re-set the radar, andre
shivam mavi to jadeja, 1 run, jadeja gets on top of the bounce and rides a single to deep point
johnson to dhoni, 1 run, tucked off the hips through square leg, another slower one from johnson
kuldeep yadav to jadeja, 1 wide, tossed wide outside off and breaks away further, off-side wide
harbhajan singh to singh, no run, gives it some air this time. outside off, and straight through to dhoni. the batsman shoulders his arms
jadeja to singh, no run, on off stump, and rinku defends it back to jadeja
ngidi to karthik, 1 run, outside off, and dk comfortably runs it down to third man
bumrah to gayle, no run, another slower one, good comeback from bumrah this over. defended to point
mcclenaghan to rahul, no run, a slower ball around off, 117 kph. rahul punches to cover and calls for a non-existent single. gayle tells him something along the lines of not quite a run there.
mcclenaghan to rahul, 1 run, another slower ball, on middle and leg, 123 kph, nudged away towards square leg for a tight run. gayle says c'mon this time and it's an easy single.
bumrah to rahul, 1 run, a slower ball on middle and leg, nudged down to fine leg, one more
mcclenaghan to gayle, 1 wide, a slower ball goes wrong. wide down the leg side.
mcclenaghan to gayle, four runs, 113 kph, a slower straight ball is chipped over mid-off. almost carries the distance, for six. lands just inside.
mcclenaghan to gayle, 1 run, 115 kph, another slower ball, and straight. inside edged towards leg gully for a run.
mcclenaghan to rahul, no run, another slower ball, pushed to mid-off. good end from mumbai
markande to yuvraj singh, no run, a legbreak on off, defended back
hh pandya to gayle, no run, no quick singles! a slower delivery outside off, pushed to cover, gayle sends a laboured yuvraj back, ironic.
hh pandya to gayle, no run, another slower delivery on middle and off, hits the pad. pitched well outside the line
kh pandya to yuvraj singh, 1 run, that's much quicker and straighter, flicked to deep square leg
kh pandya to nair, 1 run, 96 kph, flat and straight, swept to deep square leg
mcclenaghan to patel, 1 run, smashed away down to long-off for one
hh pandya to stoinis, 1 wide, yikes! a wideeeee delivery outside off, did that even land on the pitch?

hh pandya to agarwal, out, good catch. a slower ball outside off, agarwal backs away. the ball is wide outside off, so he isn't balanced at point of contact. the ball slices away, third man runs back and takes a good, well-judged catch
hh pandya to stoinis, four runs, four to finish. a slower ball on middle and leg, smashed away into the gap at midwicket. 22 off the last over, kings xi will take that.
ashwin to lewis, 1 run, six in six! the carrom dart on middle and leg, pushed away to long-off
ashwin to lewis, 1 run, flat and straight, nudged away to deep midwicket for one
ashwin to lewis, 1 run, a slower delivery outside off, chopped towards point
mujeeb ur rahman to ishan kishan, 1 wide, too wide thinks the umpire, he's gotta bowl that again
rajpoot to ishan kishan, 1 run, a slower ball on leg. chopped away towards point for a run.
rajpoot to yadav, 1 run, a slower ball outside off, carved away towards backward point

ashwin to yadav, no run, rahul misses a stumping! a carrom ball down leg, suryakumar looks to launch that over midwicket but misses the variation. rahul fumbles the collection even as suryakumar is scrambling to get back
ashwin to yadav, 1 run, flat and wide, slapped to deep cover for a run
mujeeb ur rahman to hh pandya, 1 run, flat and wide outside off, flat-batted to deep cover
mujeeb ur rahman to ishan kishan, 1 run, flat and wide outside off, slapped to long-off. one more.
mujeeb ur rahman to hh pandya, four runs, smashed for four into the gap at midwicket. flat around middle, hardik thrashes that with ease
mujeeb ur rahman to hh pandya, 1 run, flat and wide outside off, carved away towards extra cover for a run
tye to sharma, 1 run, a slower delivery to start, nudged to deep square leg. gayle first misfields, then recovers quickly, then engages in some gayle theatrics.

mujeeb ur rahman to sharma, 1 run, flat and wide outside off, chopped towards backward point for one, like karun and yuvraj in the first innings. but hardik is much quicker and makes it with time to spare.
mujeeb ur rahman to hh pandya, 1 run, a slower offbreak there. hardik backed away, aiming to go straight again, but a thick inside edge to deep square leg.
mujeeb ur rahman to sharma, no run, 98 kph, flat and straight, defended back. don't think ro minds those dots.
tye to kh pandya, 1 wide, strays down leg for a wide.
stoinis to sharma, four runs, eased away for four. a slower ball outside off, rohit just times that drive past cover, like he's batting in the nets against net bowlers.
stoinis to sharma, 1 run, a slower ball outside off, tapped towards point for a run
willey to mccullum, 1 run, baz saunters down the track and drags a thick inside edge
ngidi to patel, no run, ngidi beats the outside edge again! parthiv uses his feet and swings hard so much so he loses his shape. throws his bat at the ball and misses

jadeja to kohli, out, jadeja strikes with his first ball and bowls kohli. arm ball arrows in from around the stumps, no turn, kohli looks to chop it away from off stump. no dice. jadeja knocks over the off stump and is almost apologetic in celebration

harbhajan singh to patel, 1 run, harbhajan drops a return catch! tossed outside off, hint of turn, parthiv does not meet the pitch and drives. instead, he chips it in the air to the right of the bowler. harbhajan is late to react in his followthrough. the ball bursts through
jadeja to mandeep singh, no run, arm ball, fizzes in, 102ks, mandeep nearly drags it back onto the stumps. the ball sneaks away past leg stump
jadeja to de grandhomme, 1 run, backfoot punch down to long-off

harbhajan singh to ashwin, out, plays for non-existing turn and the ball shoots past the outside edge. but, hang on, has there been a stumping? dhoni whipped the bails off, sure, and the backfoot has slid out. ashwin tries planting the foot down, but only lands it on the line. done in by pace, no turn and lack of bounce
bravo to mohammed siraj, 1 run, another slower ball outside off, the batsman plays early and chips it over the covers
bravo to southee, no run, southee backs away outside leg and does not make contact with a slower ball
chahal to watson, no run, tossed on off, no turn again, watson stretches out and drives it back
yadav to raina, no run, chest-high ball on middle, tucks up raina for room, he wears it on the body
southee to rayudu, four runs, 114.7ks slower ball on of, rayudu forces the pace. he bends his back knee and swats it across to the midwicket fence
chahal to raina, 1 run, flat, quick on middle, pushed past the left of chahal
ashwin to dhoni, 1 wide, leg-side wide
ashwin to dhoni, no run, tossed outside off, stretches out and jabs it to the covers
ashwin to dhoni, 2 runs, looped up outside off, driven through the line to the left of wide long-off. kohli throws himself to his left, rolls along the ground, then jumps up for the throw
de grandhomme to bravo, no run, stump-to-stump line again, chipped in the air, but does not carry to midwicket
chahal to dhoni, 1 wide, fired wide outside off, off-side wide
kumar to iyer, no run, on middle stump, and iyer uses the angle to nudge it towards square leg
shakib al hasan to shaw, 1 run, this one drifts in, keeps a touch low as well. shaw punches this to deep midwicket to bring up his second half-century
shakib al hasan to iyer, 1 run, taps this gently into the off side as they take a quick single
rashid khan to shaw, 1 run, waits for the turn and then bunts this past midwicket
sandeep sharma to iyer, 1 run, gentle little tap into the off side as they scamper a quick single
rashid khan to iyer, 1 run, spins away to roll to point off a leading edge. iyer was looking to work this to the leg side
rashid khan to pant, 1 run, uppish but safe! this stopped on pant as he looked to punch towards midwicket
rashid khan to pant, no run, drills this back to rashid, who is hit on the right ankle as he tries to put his foot out and stop
rashid khan to iyer, 1 run, dabs this gently into the off side for a quick single
kumar to iyer, 1 run, chops this into the square third man region. iyer backed away to slap this through point

kaul to pant, four runs, knuckle ball just outside off, and not too wide this time. pant manageds to reach at it, and bunts it over kaul's head. not him well enough, but still sent the umpire scampering for cover
shakib al hasan to christian, no run, outside off and angling into the batsman. mistimed towards cover
boult to hales, 1 run, squeezes this drive to mid off for a quick single
boult to hales, 2 wides, flies down leg, pant fumbles and they'll get an extra run apart from the wide. wrong line from boult

avesh khan to dhawan, six runs, this has been clobbered deep into the stands at backward square leg. sat up nicely, dhawan swivelled back and allowed his wrists to create magic! the release shot. will we see a different dhawan from now?
mishra to hales, no run, drifts in from wide of the crease, defended to the leg side

plunkett to pandey, 1 run, almost chopped on! back of a leg outside off, and he tried to push at it away from his body. the ball jags in, and takes the inside of his blade. goes to fine leg eventually
narine to yadav, no run,
kuldeep yadav to lewis, 1 run, lewis stays leg-side of the ball and drives to wide long-off
chawla to yadav, 1 run, slower legbreak, turns away and finishes on off, tip and run to point
hh pandya to uthappa, 1 wide, another lifter on middle, sails past the head, too high, and that's a wide
hh pandya to uthappa, no run, looks like a knuckle ball outside off, the batsman delays his shot and dabs to point
markande to uthappa, six runs, way too wide outside off, and uthappa leans into this one. swats it over markande's head, and the ball lands on the sightscreen!

kh pandya to uthappa, no run, yes, no, yes, no! uthappa's safe though! tapped towards point, and uthappa wants the run. rana says no, and he's forced to turn back. does well to slide in before kishan can dislodge the bails
hh pandya to karthik, no run, slower ball, wide outside off. dk winds up to hit it straight, but the pace (or lack of it) does him in. under edges it to kishan. hardik asks him to hold on to the ball
mujeeb ur rahman to rahane, 1 run, turned away to deep midwicket
mujeeb ur rahman to samson, no run, takes it away from him this time, and samson swings and misses
ashwin to samson, no run,
tye to buttler, no run, that's at top pace, at 132 kph, and it's dug into the middle of the pitch. buttler thinks about flat-batting it, but it gains too much height. zips past his nose

stoinis to samson, 2 runs, misfield from ashwin at cover, which means a run-out opportunity goes a-begging! he rushes in, alert to the chance of a wicket, but it spins past his right and samson, who was ball-watching, while his partner buttler had raced off the blocks, finally ends up able to complete the run and get an extra
stoinis to samson, 1 run,
ashwin to stokes, 1 run, shimmies down the pitch to turn the ball on middle through midwicket
mujeeb ur rahman to stokes, 1 run, backs away to flat bat a quicker delivery on off stump to long-off
mujeeb ur rahman to buttler, 1 run, rocks back and punches the quick and flat delivery on off stump through cover
ashwin to tripathi, no run, another swing and a miss. oh, jeez, he's been done in non-existent turn here. expects it to come into him but it simply comes on with the arm outside off

mujeeb ur rahman to buttler, out, after a hundred swings and misses, finally an outside edge has been found. a carrom ball from mujeeb, buttler shapes to slap it away but ends up getting severely tucked up due to the lack of room and produces an edge
mujeeb ur rahman to tripathi, no run, drifts it away outside off this time, and gowtham blocks off the outside of the bat

rajpoot to gowtham, four runs, ah, bad misfield at third man boundary from young mujeeb. gowtham slashed at the sight of a hint of width. still not enough and he gets an edge that eventually gets to the boundary as mujeeb over-runs to his right
gowtham to rahul, no run, tosses it up wide outside off and rahul drives to cover

archer to rahul, 2 runs, taps it behind square leg and pinches a couple as well. good work from rahul. plays with soft hands and had a partner who was willing to put in a little extra effort. karnataka boys going well.
stokes to rahul, 1 run, looks for the drive through cover, but he is into the shot too early and an inside edge takes it through midwicket
gopal to rahul, 1 run, takes it away from his off-stump, and rahul reaches out to drill it towards point

unadkat to stoinis, 1 run, direct hit would have had stoinis! rahane at extra cover has one stump to aim at. and only misses it by a clump of whiskers! another slower ball from unadkat throws up great action
unadkat to stoinis, no run, slower ball on middle, stoinis blocks
southee to dhawan, no run, driven firmly but straight to extra cover
southee to dhawan, no run, driven uppishly but on the bounce to backward point.
yadav to williamson, 1 run, closer to the stumps again, eased wide of point
southee to williamson, 1 wide, looks to help it fine but misses. wide called, on the bounce to the keeper
southee to williamson, 2 runs, angles into middle and leg, whipped into the gap at deep midwicket. super running
southee to dhawan, 1 run, turns this off his hip to midwicket, another quick single
mohammed siraj to williamson, no run, gets on top of the bounce and punches to point
chahal to williamson, no run, steps out and then lunges a little more to defend that back
chahal to williamson, 1 run, hint of width, driven through the line to deep cover
ali to pandey, no run, steps out and turns this back to the bowler
ali to williamson, no run, spins back in to beat his tickle, rolls wide of parthiv who hares across to stop
ali to pandey, 2 runs, uppish but just wide of square leg. excellent running to come back for the second
chahal to shakib al hasan, no run, closes the face early and gets a bit of a leading edge back down the pitch
de grandhomme to shakib al hasan, no run,
de grandhomme to shakib al hasan, 1 wide, sprays it horribly down the leg side and parthiv, standing up to him, does well to dive to his right and stop it

yadav to williamson, out, walks across and tries to heave it over. had to fetch it from way outside off and playing from that far outside, it's always hard to middle anything. skews it to the man at the deep backward square leg boundary. umesh almost oversteps
mohammed siraj to shakib al hasan, 1 run, slower ball, shakib steps out and slaps this to long off
mohammed siraj to pathan, 1 run, thick inside edge onto the pad as he shapes to drive, rolls to cover for a quick single
mohammed siraj to saha, 2 runs, gets across the stumps and whips this to deep square. he was initially looking to scoop this fine
kumar to kohli, 1 run, hangs back in the crease and opens the face of his bat to third man
rashid khan to vohra, 1 run, turns it away towards square leg
rashid khan to kohli, 2 runs, slides it into middle and leg, and kohli whips it away through midwicket for a brace
rashid khan to kohli, no run, a bit of spin away from him, kohli moves across and blocks
sandeep sharma to de villiers, 1 run, turns it away towards square leg

rashid khan to kohli, four runs,  dropped at slip!  is that the game? williamson lets this go through his hands. this was a thick outside edge as kohli jabbed at this. what's worse? it races away to the third man boundary
rashid khan to kohli, 1 run, dabs this gently into the off side for a quick single
rashid khan to kohli, no run, reached out and then drives this to cover.
shakib al hasan to kohli, 1 run, drifting into middle and leg, turned towards the man coming in from midwicket
shakib al hasan to ali, 1 run, steps out and whips this over the infield to deep midwicket, moeen off the mark.
kaul to ali, four runs, nearly chopped on! this one just shaves past off stump and beats the keeper to the fine leg boundary
kaul to ali, no run, solidly defended off the backfoot

kaul to de grandhomme, no run, this is a sensational delivery! tails in late to hit cdg flush on his toe. such a comprehensive appeal resonated by 40,000 fans in the ground. but srh don't have a review! good call from umpire virender sharma, though. missing leg stump.
sandeep sharma to de grandhomme, 1 run, whips this uppishly towards square leg, dhawan grabs this on the bounce. de grandhomme would've been anxious
sandeep sharma to mandeep singh, 1 run, whips this from outside off towards deep midwicket
shakib al hasan to mandeep singh, 2 runs, driven into the gap at deep point
sandeep sharma to de grandhomme, 1 run, toe-ends a whip to the keeper, did it take the pad? no, umpire seems to signal it was off the bat. a very thin edge if ever there was
kaul to de grandhomme, 1 run, chops this down to point but a single they'll get
rashid khan to de grandhomme, no run, didn't pick this properly but somehow managed to get this back to the bowler. sharp leggie there
kaul to de grandhomme, 1 run, almighty heave, gets a thick inside edge towards deep midwicket. sid kaul got that to reverse back in
kaul to mandeep singh, 1 run, thick inside edge to the keeper, but de grandhomme risks the run and hares across. saha's underarm flick hits the striker's end direct but he's in.
kaul to de grandhomme, 1 run, drills this straight to williamson at the edge of the ring at cover
kaul to mandeep singh, 1 run, looks to hoick this over midwicket but gets an inside edge that rolls to the off side. they sneak in a single
tye to gowtham, 1 run, slower knuckle ball on off, 117.9ks, dabbed back to the right of the bowler
mujeeb ur rahman to buttler, no run, stays low! outside off, but turning into the batsman. hurries onto him, and does well to push it towards cover
mujeeb ur rahman to samson, 1 run, wide of the crease, skidding in at off stump, forced back past the bowler
mujeeb ur rahman to stokes, 1 run, slid in at off, inside-edged behind square on the leg side
ashwin to stokes, 1 run, chopped away to deep point
ashwin to stokes, 1 run, pushed through quicker, hit down to long-off
sharma to lomror, no run, 116.4ks back-of-the-hand slower ball, beats him in the channel
sharma to lomror, no run, rounds out the over with another slower one, 116.4ks outside off, lomror swings early and misses

gowtham to ashwin, out, two-ball duck! perfect offspin from gowtham, and that crashes into leg stump. it was outside off, but wild turn into the batsman. tries a big heave towards the leg side, but the ball sneaks through the big gap between bat and body
sodhi to rahul, no run, beaut! a leg spinner's dream ball. drifts and lands on leg stump, and then turns across the batsman's bat. taken by buttler from outside off
lomror to tiwary, 1 run, dangled up outside off, not much turn, driven through the line to cover
lomror to rahul, 1 run, drifts in and spins away, dabbed into the covers
lomror to tiwary, 1 run, quietly turned with the incoming angle to the leg side for one
sodhi to tiwary, 1 run, loopier legbreak outside off, tiwary collapses his back leg and drives inside-out to wide long-off
gowtham to rahul, 4 byes, sharp offbreak, starts outside off and rips back in, storms through rahul's gate but beats the off stump as well as the keeper. it raises a puff of dust from the surface

archer to rahul, four runs, too much movement from the batsman, but still manages to clear mid off. it was slow outside off, and he walked across to the off side before checking his movement. was in an uncomfortable position, but still manages to lift it over mid off
russell to yadav, no run, wants the single, but is sent back. rinku swoops in from point and stops
prasidh krishna to lewis, 1 run, width outside off, slashes this down to square third man
prasidh krishna to yadav, no run, once again, good bounce off the deck. gets bounce as surya is hit high on the bat as he defends. lovely from prasidh
curran to lewis, 1 run, squeezes this square drive to narine at square third man. just raced to him
curran to yadav, four runs, delicate dab wide of the slip fielder. saw width and used it to ease this to the third man boundary.
curran to lewis, 1 run, right behind the line as he tucks this wide of midwicket for an easy single
narine to lewis, 1 run, on middle and leg, tucked towards square leg
prasidh krishna to yadav, 1 run, stubs this down to square third man where russell puts out a superb dive to stop. saved three runs
prasidh krishna to lewis, no run, lovely shape away to beat the edge. bounce, pace and carry. he's regularly bowling around the 140 mark
chawla to yadav, no run, punches this straight to curran at cover point
kuldeep yadav to sharma, 1 run, wrong'un which rohit lunges and dabs to the off side for a quick single

kuldeep yadav to sharma, 1 run, just over kuldeep's outstretched hands! drifted into middle stump, and rohit drives too early. the ball holds off the pitch, and rohit pushes it straight back. in the air, but just over the bowler's left hand. close!
russell to sharma, 1 wide, ....and starts with a wayward delivery down leg. wide
russell to sharma, 1 run, uses the depth of the crease to ease this down to third man
russell to ishan kishan, 1 run, was shaping up to heave, ends up dabbing it gently into the off side instead
prasidh krishna to sharma, 1 run, dabs this down to third man
prasidh krishna to ishan kishan, 1 run, backs away and slaps this to point. didn't quite get the width he would've liked.

narine to ishan kishan, out, swept again but this time he's picked out uthappa right at the ropes at deep square leg. so, so close to being a seventh six. sensational knock, one that has given them a kick towards the death overs. kishan is bitterly disappointed but he can be mighty proud of his efforts.
narine to hh pandya, no run, turns this gently into the leg side
curran to hh pandya, 2 runs, hops back and bunts this down to square third man, excellent running, wayward narine throw.
narine to sharma, 1 run, swept from outside off to deep square
narine to hh pandya, 1 run, mistimes an attempted hoick to deep square leg
prasidh krishna to sharma, out, toe-ends a lofted hit straight to mid-off.  first ipl wicket for prasidh  and a slower delivery has earned him one. his one-time karnataka team-mate takes the catch.
mcclenaghan to lynn, no run, pushes this one with a straight bat straight to cover. dot ball to end the over
kh pandya to uthappa, no run, stays back in the crease to turn the ball from well outside off to leg, but doesn't connect
mcclenaghan to lynn, 1 run, slightly slower than average again, on the stumps this time. no room at all so lynn makes some and chops it with hard hands to deep point
kh pandya to lynn, no run, makes some room this time and hits it hard to cover

kh pandya to uthappa, out, oh, mix up and lynn is nowhere close! uthappa sliced the ball to cover point and took a step or two out of the crease but lynn reacted late and suddenly ran down the pitch but it was too late. suryakumar swooped in and sent it a flat throw to krunal well before lynn could reach the crease
bumrah to rana, no run, swings it across rana on the off side who drives and misses
bumrah to uthappa, no run, nearly plays on! strong finish from bumrah to end the over with one that angles in, uthappa gets an inside edge that nearly gets the off stump
hh pandya to rana, no run, slightly straighter and he pushes it towards cover point
hh pandya to rana, no run, waits for the ball around off stump and defends to point
markande to uthappa, no run, goes back in the crease and pushes the ball to off after it turns away
markande to rana, 1 run, on the leg side and rana helps it away easily to deep square leg
markande to russell, 1 run, off the mark straightaway by punching that through the covers
hh pandya to rana, 1 run, punches that uppishly towards mid off and that reaches the fielder after a couple of bounces

hh pandya to russell, out, straight to cover! a slower one outside off, russell wants to pounce on it and makes room to slap it on the off side. he does that but hands it straight to markande who grabs it with both hands over his head
hh pandya to singh, 1 run, angled across and he guides it towards third man dangerously past first slip
hh pandya to curran, no run, swing and a miss outside off this time
hh pandya to curran, no run, stays in the crease this time and pushes it down to mid on
hh pandya to curran, four runs, inside edge runs away to the fine leg boundary. curran pushed at it with hard hands outside off but played the wrong line and the thin edge beat kishan to the fence

bumrah to singh, out, edged to the keeper, kkr collapsing on their home ground against seam bowling. bumrah leaps in celebration and why shouldn't he. that one pitched around the leg stump and bumrah angled it nicely to absolutely stifle the batsman with the line and he only tickled it to the keeper
