bumrah to chawla, no run, right on the off stump, chawla blocks it back
bumrah to curran, no run, pace and bounce towards the middle stump, curran respects it by blocking it back
bumrah to chawla, 1 run, 142.8kmh and down the leg side, chawla also backs up and then tucks it to long leg
mcclenaghan to kuldeep yadav, no run, hardly moves his feet and steers the ball straight to point
mcclenaghan to kuldeep yadav, no run, pokes at it outside off with a slightly tight line, misses it
markande to curran, 1 run, takes a step down to negate the turn and turns the ball to leg for one
markande to kuldeep yadav, no run,
markande to prasidh krishna, no run, turns that one a long way outside off and krishna can't reach it
markande to prasidh krishna, no run, leaves that alone as it turns a mile away from him
shakib al hasan to roy, no run, steps out to work this legside but the ball drifts back in to hit the pad
shakib al hasan to shaw, no run, swept fiercely but straight to square leg
sandeep sharma to iyer, no run, solid punch but can't pierce the gap, straight to mid-off.
kaul to pant, 2 runs, toe-ends a lofted it but this just eludes the two fielders running backwards from cover and mid-off. slower delivery but pant had to reach out to this delivery.
kaul to pant, 1 run, dabs this gently into the off side for a quick single
shakib al hasan to iyer, 1 run, drifts in to take the inside edge as iyer looks to defend to the off side, they squeeze in a single
shakib al hasan to iyer, no run, steps out and across to work this to the leg side but the bat gets tangled inside the pad as he tries to work to the leg side.
shakib al hasan to iyer, 1 run, goes back and whips this indrifter to deep square leg
shakib al hasan to pant, 1 run, turns this gently into the leg side for an easy single

sandeep sharma to pant, out,  another ball, another inside edge  and pant is involved in a run out again. this rolled just wide of the keeper, iyer was more than halfway down the pitch when he had to turn back. by that time, goswami had lobbed the ball to sandeep, who broke the bails at the bowler's end.
shakib al hasan to patel, 1 run, squeezes the drive wide of cover for an easy single
shakib al hasan to patel, 1 run, goes for a big heave, gets a thick inside edge to square leg.
rashid khan to pant, 1 run, swept from middle and leg to deep square leg
kaul to pant, 1 run, dabs this gently into the off side for a quick single
rashid khan to patel, 1 run, steps out and squeezes this drive behind point for a quick single
rashid khan to pant, 1 run, leading edge wide of cover, was looking to work this through midwicket
sandeep sharma to patel, no run, mistimes a slap to cover
sandeep sharma to pant, 1 run, punches this to cover, a misfield gives them a run.  brings up the half-century stand off just 31 balls
rashid khan to patel, 1 run, bunts this back past

rashid khan to pant, 1 run, out,  comedy of errors.  another mix-up with rishabh pant. harshal patel is three quarters of the way down the pitch for the second, but the throw from deep midwicket is fumbled by shreevats, but he recovers quickly to get to the ball and then comes up with an underarm flick to beat harshal's dive. surely someone's got to have a word with pant about his running, very very poor.  fourth time now that pant is involved in a run out this season. he's run his partner out on three of those occasions
shakib al hasan to pant, no run, appeal for lbw as pant misses a heave, this was sliding down leg.
kaul to pant, 1 run, flat-bats this over the bowler's head, on the bounce to rashid at long off. this was a slower delivery
kaul to pant, 1 run, looks to wallop this over deep midwicket, gets a thick inside edge and can only get it as far as square leg
rashid khan to maxwell, no run, leading edge to backward point, loud call of noooooooooo from maxwell
kaul to pant, no run, width outside off, drilled to the man at the edge of the ring at cover
boult to hales, no run, bit of inswing from well outside off, hales drives it away to extra cover
boult to hales, 2 runs, drives again for the inswinger on the off stump, but an inside edge gives him to two square leg
patel to hales, no run, slightly slow in the mid-120s, just around off and he blocks it back
patel to williamson, 1 run, runs it down to his favourite area - third man - for one
nadeem to williamson, no run, targets the stumps, williamson goes back to defend dangerously and brings his bat down just in time
nadeem to williamson, 1 run, takes a step down this time and turns the ball to midwicket for one
nadeem to dhawan, 1 run, charges down the track and drills it down to mid off for a quick single
nadeem to williamson, 1 run, hint of room and he sticks his bat out for one on the off side
patel to williamson, 1 run, slower on the stumps at 120kmh, williamson waits and helps it to leg for one
patel to dhawan, 1 run, touch closer to off, there's still room and he drives it late to deep backward point
plunkett to dhawan, 1 leg bye, 135kmh and angling in, dhawan tries to loft it on the leg side but only gets a leg bye
plunkett to williamson, 2 runs, a late dab is running away for four towards third man but harshal sprints and dives to his left and saves two. excellent effort
plunkett to williamson, four runs, 143.6kmh, another late dab from williamson and this time he sends it much finer to easily beat the third man for a four
boult to dhawan, 1 run, another slower one at 120kmh on the off stump, dhawan defends with soft hands and takes off quickly
mishra to dhawan, 1 run, turning into the batsman and he helps it along towards square leg
mishra to williamson, 1 run, whips this one with the wrists towards mid on
mishra to dhawan, no run, charges down and bunts it back to the bowler, mishra scares kw by almost throwing it to non-striker's end
shankar to dhawan, no run, not much room outside off and he defends it back
shankar to dhawan, 1 wide, he loses his line with that slower one, it's gone well outside off
shankar to williamson, 1 run, slower one on the stumps, he defends it towards silly mid on and dhawan calls for one immediately. good and early call
mishra to dhawan, 1 run, slow in the air around leg, swept away nicely for one
plunkett to williamson, 1 run, slow again and angling in, williamson waits and chips it in the air with a whip for one in the vacant area
mishra to dhawan, 1 run, on the stumps this time and it's driven down easily for one more
nadeem to williamson, 2 runs, goes back in the crease and whips it to deep midwicket, they come back quickly for two
maxwell to williamson, 1 run, turning in a bit and it's tucked to leg for one
maxwell to dhawan, 2 runs, outside off and steered to third man. a really wide throw helps them come back
maxwell to dhawan, 1 run, dances down and lofts it to long off for one more
maxwell to williamson, no run, slow and really slow outside off, williamson sees it go outside the wide line but it's not given
boult to williamson, four runs, angled in and williamson helps it with the wrists off his hips to the long leg boundary and that's his fifty
boult to williamson, 2 runs, lofted over the covers as he gets some room, two more in the gap

boult to williamson, 1 run, almost run out! he tapped the ball to point and hesitated for a fraction of a second before responding for the single. iyer went for a direct hit from point but missed it, williamson had given up on the attempt to make it
plunkett to williamson, 2 runs, a good effort from harshal to slide to his right from deep fine leg but he wasn't quick enough to throw it back qucikly and they come back for the second
plunkett to dhawan, 1 run, slow and slightly wide outside off, tapped to point for one
patel to dhawan, no run, sends it down quick outside off, dhawan slams it back but with a thick edge to the bowler
patel to dhawan, no run, another edge as dhawan heaves and this one goes past the stumps to pant
patel to dhawan, four runs, connects this time finally an he finds the gap too. scrambled seam with a lot of room outside off, he gets to free his arms and sends it flying through the covers
patel to dhawan, 1 run, covers the stumps and wants to loft it towards square leg but gets only a single past williamson with another edge
plunkett to dhawan, 1 run, slams it down to long off for one
gowtham to rayudu, 1 run, speared on the hips, whipped away in the gap at midwicket for one moe
gowtham to rayudu, four runs, wide of the crease, holds its line outside off, extra cover is up in the circle. rayudu dashes out of the blocks and hoists it over the infield
archer to raina, 1 wide, raina jumps a long way outside leg, archer spears it outside off, away from the reach of raina. inside the tramline. poor, poor call from umpire barde

unadkat to raina, 3 runs, raina backs away outside leg, unadkat targets his head with a lifter, raina splices it over mid-on. stokes tears back from mid-on, gets into a side-on position, slides to his left, and hauls the ball back into play. great work from stokes
unadkat to watson, no run, slower ball, floated on middle, watson stays leg-side of the ball and flays to mid-off
sodhi to raina, no run, straight ball on middle, raina stretches out and plays it right back to sodhi
stokes to raina, 1 run, raina shuffles outside leg and hacks a single to deep square leg
sodhi to watson, 1 run, skidding into the hips, this quicker one is nudged to square leg
unadkat to raina, no run, raina backs away outside leg, unadkat follows him with a seam-up ball and tucks him up for room. fended off

unadkat to raina, 1 run, raina backs away outside leg, unadkat takes pace off the ball, chopped to cover. raina collides with umpire erasmus. ouch! rahane, meanwhile, misses a direct hit and hands raina a life
unadkat to watson, 1 wide, another off-side wide from unadkat
archer to raina, 1 wide, goes around the wicket and fires one straight down leg side. archer hasn't found any rhythm against raina. switch to over the wicket maybe?
unadkat to billings, no run, slower ball, skids away rapidly off the pitch as billings it rooted to the crease chasing this with his hands. doesn't get close to connection

unadkat to dhoni, no run, run-out appeal at the non-striker's end. dhoni has taken the stumps down at the other end but the bowler hasn't got a hand on it. billings it looking for a run though as the ball deflects towards the bowler who now has to run back at the stumps and uproot them with ball in hand. manages it but billings' dive saves him
willey to buttler, 1 run, tip and run to point. 13 off the first over
jadeja to buttler, no run, arm ball, buttler stays leg-side of the ball and drills to cover

harbhajan singh to stokes, no run, dhoni claims a one-handed catch behind the stumps. umpire barde refers it to nitin menon, the tv umpire. the soft signal is out skids on middle, non turner, buttler backs away outside leg, and looks to smash it through the covers. he inside-edges the ball onto the boot, the ball touches the ground, before dhoni grabs it with one hand

harbhajan singh to stokes, out, four, six, and out! stokes screams in agony. he runs down the track, harbhajan bowls a slider, angling in from around the stumps, stokes does not meet the pitch, the spinner hits the middle stump

jadeja to rahane, out, jadeja draws an outside edge, raina snaffles it at slip. drifts in from around the wicket, turns and bounces. rahane simply wafts and edges it, the ball bounces out of dhoni's gloves but into the hands of raina. csk's spinners hit back with two wickets in two overs
jadeja to buttler, no run, hint of turn outside off, dabbed to point
jadeja to samson, 1 run, tossed outside off, eased down to long-off

jadeja to binny, no run, appeal for caught-behind and stumping both turned down. a regulation spinner from jadeja, pushed through flat outside off. binny looks to poke through the covers and can't get bat on it
watson to buttler, 1 run, slower ball on middle, skewed off the inside half to deep square leg
willey to buttler, no run, buttler ventures outside leg and carves it up to raina at backward point. buttler strays out of the crease, undoes his steps, as raina misses a direct hit

bravo to buttler, 1 run, has dhoni dropped this? buttler shuffled across off even before the bowler delivered. he does not get enough bat on the scoop to fine leg. he tickles it away. dhoni dives to his left and goes for the ball with one hand but it pops out. replays suggest it carried to him. that's dropped
mujeeb ur rahman to lynn, 1 run, pushed through outside off, stays leg-side of the ball and flashes to the right of backward point. axar misses the direct hit at the bowler's end
mujeeb ur rahman to lynn, 1 run, slider from wide of the crease, no room at all, squeezed into the leg side
sharma to lynn, no run, 105ks back-of-the-hand slower ball from mohit, foxes lynn, as he swishes early and misses
ashwin to lynn, 1 run, dangled up outside off, driven through the line to mid-off. lynn chances a single, aj tye nails the stumps, but the batsman has slid his bat in
patel to uthappa, 1 run, arm ball from around the stumps to uthappa too. he hangs back and secures a single through midwicket
ashwin to uthappa, 1 wide, leg-side wide
ashwin to uthappa, no run, looped up on middle, sticks in the surface, uthappa plays early and nearly spoons a leading edge back to the bowler
ashwin to uthappa, no run, dangled up on off, stretches out and smothers it
tye to uthappa, 1 run, 112.5ks knuckle ball, holds up, finishes on off, bunted to the leg side
patel to karthik, no run, tighter on off, dabbed to point
patel to karthik, four runs, arm ball, chopped from off stump to the right of rahul behind the stumps for a fortunate four
sharma to karthik, 1 run, gentle dab into the off side, behind point
patel to russell, no run, fired into middle from around the stumps, defended back
tye to karthik, 1 wide, slower ball but slips this way outside off, left alone
sharma to rana, four runs, smashed back! beats miller, who didn't have more than a few yards to his left at long-off.
tye to shubman gill, four runs, thick outside edge as he looks to flick this, races to the third man boundary
tye to karthik, 1 run, squeezes the drive to point, dk's first fifty this season

sran to shubman gill, four runs, swung away to clear the midwicket fence, one bounce to the ropes. slower ball again, on middle and leg. lovely use of the crease there, stayed deep inside and swung through
sran to shubman gill, four runs, uses his width to reach it and then slash this to beat backward point. picked the bones out of that
narine to rahul, six runs, stunning! steps out and lofts this through the line to clear long off effortlessly.
narine to rahul, 1 run, spins back in sharply, off a thick inside edge towards square leg, rahul was looking to whip this through midwicket
narine to gayle, no run, goes back into the crease and defends with the spin
prasidh krishna to rahul, four runs, thick outside edge past slip, races past slip to the third man boundary. rahul didn't have the kind of width he would've liked, slashed it away
prasidh krishna to gayle, 1 run, hustles gayle for pace, also targets the ribcage, turned towards fine leg.
scantlebury-searles to gayle, four runs, no third man, so he'll get a four. went for a big slash over point, ended up slicing it away

russell to gayle, 1 run,  oh, no. dinesh karthik has dropped that!  tough chance, did most things right, except hold on. gayle gets a leading edge as he looks to whip this to the leg side, dk leapt high like a goalkeeper but just couldn't take it cleanly.

prasidh krishna to gayle, no run, has gayle nicked this down leg? there was a noise, given wide and karthik has reviewed there's some pad on the way. so it shouldn't be a wide for starters. gayle survives.
scantlebury-searles to rahul, six runs, lofted up and over, straight into the sightscreen. this was right in his swinging arc
scantlebury-searles to rahul, 1 run, chops this wide of cover
russell to nair, 1 run, bunts this into the off side from the crease for a quick single
scantlebury-searles to finch, 1 run, wide of the crease, angling into the hips, tucked away to deep square leg
kuldeep yadav to finch, 1 run, tossed on off, driven down to long-off
kuldeep yadav to patel, 1 run, half-tracker on off, dragged only as far as deep midwicket
kuldeep yadav to patel, 1 wide, off-side wide
chawla to ashwin, 1 run, slower legbreak, starts on off and turns a touch, driven with the spin to long-off
kuldeep yadav to ashwin, no run, slider on off, ashwin camps back and defends it back to kuldeep
kuldeep yadav to ashwin, 1 run, darted on leg stump, nurdled through square leg
chawla to finch, 1 run, skidder on leg stump, backs away and jabs to the covers
prasidh krishna to tye, 1 wide, off-side wide
prasidh krishna to sran, 1 run, lifter on middle from round the stumps, spliced over midwicket
prasidh krishna to sharma, no run, lifter, angling in from wide of the crease, mohit ducks under it and lets it sail through to the keeper

chahal to shaw, out, straight through! it's the slider once more. pitches on middle, and zips straight through. shaw tries to work it towards the leg side, but he's played down the wrong line. crashes into leg stump!
southee to iyer, 1 run,
ali to iyer, 1 wide, sharp turn into him again, tries to flick but the ball gets down the leg side
ali to iyer, no run, pitches on off, and turns sharply into his body. iyer misses the leg-side whip, and it hits his pad. appeal for lbw, but would've been too high
de grandhomme to iyer, four runs, starts off with a boundary! pitches outside off, and iyer pokes at it. opens his bat's face while trying to carve it towards the off side. played fine
ali to pant, no run, grip off the surface! takes the outside edge of pant's bat as he looks to defend. the ball flies away towards point
southee to shankar, 1 run, slower ball, but wide outside off. shankar waits for it this time, before driving it square. negi at deep cover though
lamichhane to patel, no run, slid across outside off, waits for it before opening the face to the off side
dala to kohli, 1 wide, drifts down the leg side
dala to de villiers, 1 run, slower ball, outside off, and de villiers muscles this towards the leg side. that area is packed by outfielders though

patel to kohli, 1 run, harshal hits kohli this time! no malice though. a soft shot towards cover had the batsmen running for a single, but harshal ran there to try and break the stumps at the non-striker's, but the throw finds kohli instead
patel to de grandhomme, 1 run, wide outside off, and driven to long off. cdg will keep strike
chahar to hales, no run, width and he's square driven this straight to rayudu at point

thakur to dhawan, no run, appeal for lbw, may have been struck a tad too high as it curved in from middle. possibly saved by an inside edge too. dhoni wasn't too convinced, shardul went up immediately. in the end, they don't bother going for a review.  replays suggest no inside edge, ball would've hit leg
thakur to dhawan, 1 run, tucks this gently into the leg side as they scamper a run
willey to hales, 1 run, goes for a big heave, gets a thick inside edge onto the pad, they scamper a run. looked to smack this to deep midwicket, down to balewadi, on the highway
willey to dhawan, no run, leading edge, but safe. closed the bat face early in trying to work this to the leg side
chahar to hales, 1 run, driven to mid off for a quick single
chahar to williamson, no run, shapes back in from outside off, williamson plays down the wrong line. bends back in to smack the pad. angle would've taken it down leg
thakur to williamson, no run, mistimes an attempted punch back to shardul. looked to flay this through point
thakur to williamson, no run, driven but a superb one-handed stop by rayudu at point
thakur to williamson, 1 run, eased late, down to square third man
chahar to williamson, no run, delightful shape away! williamson is tempted to commit himself to defend but lets it go
chahar to williamson, 1 leg bye, off the flap of the pad as it rolls to dhoni, they take a legbye
chahar to dhawan, 1 wide, gets this to come back in but beats dhawan's attempted tickle, through to dhoni. wide called.
chahar to dhawan, 1 leg bye, misses the flick as this swings back in late to hit the pad, rolls to the leg side as they sneak in a leg bye
chahar to williamson, 1 run, slashes on the bounce to third man. had width, really went after that one
harbhajan singh to dhawan, 1 wide, he bowls this wide outside off, anticipating another chip down the track. dhawan leaves, wide called and rightly so
chahar to dhawan, 1 run, hustled for pace as he's deep inside the crease as he taps this into the off side for a quick single
chahar to dhawan, 1 wide, huge wide, loses direction in trying to swing the ball back in, slips it down leg in the process
watson to williamson, no run, backs away to slap this over point, ends up getting a thick inside edge back to the bowler
bravo to dhawan, 1 wide, slips this down leg, wide and rightly so
harbhajan singh to williamson, 1 run, steered behind point as they scamper a single
harbhajan singh to dhawan, 1 run, drifts into middle and leg, tucked towards midwicket
harbhajan singh to dhawan, six runs, clobbered deep over deep midwicket! stands his ground and simply swings through. harbhajan dragged it down and got punished
willey to dhawan, 1 run, waits, waits and then steers this to backward point for a quick single
willey to dhawan, no run, the bat breaks as he defends. calls for a few spare ones from the dugout
bravo to dhawan, four runs, squeezes this behind point, no third man so that's headed just one way. it's raining boundaries
bravo to hooda, 1 wide, wide down the leg side, bravo trying to go behind him but going too far with the angle
bravo to hooda, 2 runs, bunted into the leg side, jadeja rushes in from deep midwicket, but they steal the second
sandeep sharma to watson, no run, reaches out to drive, mistimes this to extra cover
sandeep sharma to watson, four runs, beats point, races to the point boundary. once again there's width from sandeep, watson used the pace to steer this wide
kumar to watson, no run, nearly chopped on, excellent from goswami, who leapt high to take that
kumar to watson, 1 run, dabs this gently behind point for a quick single
shakib al hasan to watson, no run, watson makes room outside leg, shakib follows him with an arm-ball, jabbed to the covers
shakib al hasan to rayudu, no run, whipped with the angle to midwicket
kaul to rayudu, no run, lifter wide outside off, rayudu lets it fizz through to goswami
shakib al hasan to watson, 1 run, arm ball, ducks in on middle, stabbed to midwicket off the inside half
rashid khan to rayudu, 1 run, straighter one on off, 97.4ks, tip and run to cover
rashid khan to rayudu, no run, skidder just a shade outside off, chopped to backward point
sandeep sharma to rayudu, 1 run, another slower one outside off, 110.7ks, flat-batted away to long-off
sandeep sharma to watson, no run, gee, how did that miss off stump. knuckle ball, bounces  over off. watson swipes early and misses
kaul to rayudu, six runs, rayudu brings up a fifty of his own and the side's 100 with a six over midwicket. banged in outside off, rayudu, having shuffled across, smokes it over midwicket. bam!
rashid khan to rayudu, no run, fizzes through on a fourth-stump line, chopped behind to goswami
rashid khan to rayudu, six runs, rayudu slices a loft and clears hales at long-off. tossed outside off, breaks away, drops to one knee and lifts it over for six
rashid khan to rayudu, no run, fired outside off, 99ks, stretches out and drives to cover
rashid khan to watson, 1 run, looks like another wrong'un, finishes on a fourth-stump line, fended to the leg side for one more
shakib al hasan to rayudu, six runs, looped up on leg stump, rayudu dashes down the track and launches it into the wind. into the midwicket boundary
shakib al hasan to rayudu, no run, rayudu uses his feet, speared wide, swished to extra cover
sandeep sharma to raina, out, poor shot in desperation results in raina's fall. was looking to muscle this over midwicket but got it high on the bat and williamson took a tumbling catch at mid-off.
sandeep sharma to dhoni, 1 run, forces this one through point to get off the mark
sandeep sharma to dhoni, 1 run, looks to nudge this leg side, the ball angles in to deflect off his pad and they take a leg bye
shakib al hasan to rayudu, 1 run, drifting into middle and leg, eased to deep midwicket
rashid khan to dhoni, no run, squeezes a drive to backward point
kumar to dhoni, 1 run, squeezed down to third man to bring rayudu on strike
kumar to dhoni, 1 run, turns this gently into the leg side, that's that. csk cruise home in style with an over to spare.  they're all but into the playoffs.
gowtham to lewis, four runs, shot! timed and placed sweetly through the right of extra cover
archer to yadav, 1 wide, angled too sharply down the leg side and yadav can't put it away with the glance
archer to yadav, no run,
archer to yadav, no run, tries to open the face late for a run down to third man but manages no contact
kulkarni to lewis, four runs, picks the slower ball really early and waits before opening the face and running it through backward point. knew his field to perfection
unadkat to lewis, 1 run, run down to third man
unadkat to lewis, no run, susses out the lack of pace and punches late but finds backward point
gowtham to lewis, no run, drifts away outside off and left alone
gowtham to lewis, no run, shuffles across and pushes down the pitch
stokes to kh pandya, 1 wide, angles it in and ends up spraying it down the leg side
unadkat to kh pandya, no run, big lifter on off from over the stumps, unadkat forces krunal to duck under it
archer to hh pandya, 1 wide, hardik shuffles across off and throws archer off his line. sprayed down leg, leg-side wide
archer to hh pandya, 1 run, dragged off the inside half to deep midwicket
stokes to hh pandya, no run, 107.8ks slower ball outside off, hardik goes for an encore. hardik fails. he can't touch the ball
bumrah to d'arcy, four runs, zoinks, that is a staggeringly good first ball, a massive booming inswinger, d'arcy jabs down late and somehow digs it out through fine leg for four!
bumrah to d'arcy, 5 wides, not such a good ball... a horrid leg-side wide... sublime to ridiculous, much like the earlier catching...
bumrah to d'arcy, out, edged and gone! and that had been coming all over! a bit of swing, bumrah gets his line right, d'arcy's feet going nowhere, and the keeper snaffles a comfortable nick!
mcclenaghan to buttler, 1 run, flipped off the legs to backward square leg
kh pandya to rahane, 1 run, looped up from round the wicket, into the toes, and tucked to the leg side
kh pandya to buttler, 1 run, tucked out to midwicket once more
kh pandya to rahane, 1 run, flicked into the leg side for another single
mcclenaghan to rahane, no run, attempted ramp from rahane, but he wears it on the glove. leaning back, attempting to pinch a four through third man, but the slower ball did for him
mcclenaghan to rahane, 1 wide, sliding down the leg side
mcclenaghan to rahane, four runs, dinky wristwork! played it so late it was almost into next week, and when you've got angles like those in your locker, who needs extreme power?
kh pandya to rahane, no run, swept once more, out to backward square
kh pandya to rahane, 1 run, nurdled out to deep midwicket, no need to rush for the royals
kh pandya to buttler, six runs, down on one knee, and away she goes! high over backward square, just high enough to lob over the flaying fielder
kh pandya to buttler, no run, crunched to extra cover, they decline to take the single for the slight misfield
kh pandya to buttler, no run, pumped into the covers, more intent for no runs this time, but they are starting to flow now
hh pandya to rahane, 2 runs, another intentful glide into the covers
hh pandya to buttler, four runs, blam! so much bottom hand! over-pitched, in the arc, and utterly butchered for a one-bounce four through long-off
hh pandya to buttler, no run, another attempted scoop, another non-connection. nothing ventured, nothing gained...
bumrah to buttler, 1 run, nudged into the leg side
bumrah to rahane, 1 run, opens the face to glide down to third man, a good release shot but nothing wrong with the ball. tight stuff
markande to buttler, four runs, marching down to meet the pitch, and deposited back over the bowler's head! such poise, power and timing
markande to buttler, no run, shuffling feet and pushed into the covers
markande to buttler, 1 run, flicked off the legs to fine leg
markande to buttler, 1 run, makes room, slaps through the line, straight back at the bowler, who half-stops in his followthrough as they jog the single
kh pandya to rahane, 1 run, fenced into the covers for another single
markande to buttler, 1 run, another unflustered nudge into the gap on the leg side
markande to buttler, 2 runs, flicked along the ground out to deep midwicket
kh pandya to buttler, 1 run, pushed to the off side
kh pandya to buttler, no run, no contact this time, as this one zips through buttler's swing and into his thigh-pad
hh pandya to buttler, 1 run, width this time, and cracked hard out to point
hh pandya to buttler, four runs, that's just power and placement! pounded through the covers, to bring up the five in a row! not a lot wrong with the ball, but the shot was poetry
mcclenaghan to rahane, no run, fizzing through to the keeper, the left-arm line taking the ball clear of an ambitious wallop
mcclenaghan to rahane, no run, through to the keeper once more, good pace and line
mcclenaghan to buttler, four runs, mown through the covers like a combine-harvester across the outfield! such fast hands, giving him time to angle the ball through the field
mcclenaghan to buttler, no run, inverts his stance, for the third time this innings. and for the third time, he makes no contact. that one's not working today jos
hh pandya to samson, 1 run, flicked down to fine leg to get off the mark

hh pandya to buttler, six runs, absolutely slaughtered into the stands! he's having a lot of fun out there now, head right over the ball, even at the point of contact, and slammed with popeye forearms over cow corner!
hh pandya to buttler, 1 run, pushed out to deep cover to keep the strike
bumrah to samson, 1 run, guided down to third man
bumrah to buttler, 1 run, pushed into the off side
bumrah to samson, 1 run, tucked into the leg side, to keep the strike. the royals are ticking along nicely
markande to buttler, 1 run,
mcclenaghan to buttler, 1 run, width outside off, attempted slap into the covers but no proper connection
hh pandya to samson, six runs, samson has no interest in landmarks, he just wants a quick finish! powered over cow corner, and this one is utterly cooked!
hh pandya to samson, no run, through to the keeper this time, but it's a dot ball too late
hh pandya to samson, out, an inside-out slap over the off side, but he hasn't got enough on this, and holes out to deep point! comfortably snaffled by the sub chahar

hh pandya to buttler, six runs, finished in style! stunning feat of beast-mode batting, clobbered violently into the midwicket stands, and the royals have stolen a critical march on mumbai in the battle for the play-offs...

yadav to gayle, no run, dropped! parthiv patel can't hold on with a one-handed dive to his left. gayle and he are both expecting this to swing in. it does through the air before straightening. gayle defends inside the line to get the edge, parthiv takes a step to his right before leaping one-handed. can't take it
yadav to gayle, no run, beats the outside edge as gayle is stranded. no feet as he hangs the bat out in the corridor. it fizzes past him
de grandhomme to finch, 1 wide, sprays it down the leg side
ali to finch, no run, slides on outside off, finch backs away and chops it to the right of cover
ali to sharma, 1 run, flicked uppishly through square leg
ali to patel, 1 run, straight on middle, flicked to deep midwicket
mohammed siraj to patel, 1 wide, bowled down the leg side, axar swings and misses

rajpoot to kohli, 1 no ball, dropped but it's also a no-ball. kohli doesn't run. it's high and outside off, he lifts a simple catch for long-off who comes in, makes the ground, gets to the ball and then fails to hold on. would have been game over if he had run there

shivam mavi to buttler, six runs, that's a shot he's really good at. for lancashire, for somerset, for england, for royals. walks right across and just scoops a fast bowler over fine leg for six. how easy does batting look?
shivam mavi to buttler, six runs, nine in nine! 45 runs in 2.5 overs. buttler backs away, then shuffles right back in line and scoops a straight delivery over fine leg for six. too easy for jos.
narine to tripathi, 1 run, flat and wide outside off, tapped to third man for a run.
narine to buttler, 1 wide, drifts well down leg for a wide. good take from karthik, to his left.
narine to buttler, no run, that's the better line. some sarcastic cheers ring around the eden gardens. flat and straight, blocked
narine to rahane, four runs, breaks that pressure with a neat flick through backward square leg. was an exceptional over till that point, but the line was errant and rahane's off
russell to rahane, no run, backs away, exposes his stumps and drills a drive to cover. a very good stop from uthappa.
kuldeep yadav to stokes, 1 run, looks to nudge it through wide mid-on as kuldeep goes around the wicket. gets a leading edge down to long-off
kuldeep yadav to stokes, 1 run, goes back to flick a flatter delivery outside off through midwicket
shivam mavi to stokes, no run, slower ball, and stokes, who is stuck in the crease, mistimes it to mid-off

kuldeep yadav to stokes, out, pops it back to the bowler! fourth wicket for kuldeep! this angle from around the wicket to stokes has really been messing with him. the left-hander keeps playing the original line, with each ball pitching on leg stump, but since he isn't reading the ball out the hand, and with his team in tatters, he cannot attack. he can only nudge. goes for a little flick, but there is just enough gap between the ball and bat for it to turn, claim a bit of the leading edge and return to where it came from.
shivam mavi to unadkat, four runs, spears it through the covers, unadkat showing how its done. stands still on leg stump, opens the face to place it to the right of the fielder
shivam mavi to unadkat, no run, slower ball on off stump, unadkat picks it and blocks down the pitch
narine to unadkat, no run, spins away from the right-hander and he slices it to the left of backward point
narine to sodhi, 1 run, tucks this off middle to deep square leg
prasidh krishna to sodhi, no run, swings looking for the midwicket boundary but is utterly deceived by a slower ball. goes through between the leg stump and the batsman's back thigh
stokes to rana, 1 wide, a slower ball that drifts down leg, wide.
sodhi to lynn, no run, 80.5 kph. very hard hands from lynn, which is why that ball almost popped back. a legbreak on middle, lynn blocks and almost carries back to ish.
sodhi to rana, no run, on middle and leg, defended back.
gowtham to rana, 1 run, fires it in from around the wicket, rana reads the trick early and chops it behind point
sodhi to lynn, 1 run, flicks a quicker delivery on top of off stump through midwicket
sodhi to lynn, no run, beats him with a gorgeous legbreak, pretending to come into the right-hander a little way and then it pitches and changes direction. gloriously fickle.
sodhi to lynn, 1 run, shifts over to off stump to deal with sodhi's big-turning legbreaks and whips this through midwicket
unadkat to karthik, 1 run, makes sure to play close to the body, which is important against someone with good slower balls, and finds a single at midwicket
anureet singh to karthik, 1 run, rolls his wrists to adjust to the slower ball on off stump and sends it skipping away through midwicket

archer to lynn, four runs, carves it to the point boundary! a little room to work with. a lot more pace to take advantage of. and the old chris lynn. the man nearly everyone comes to watch at the gabba in the bbl pops out to prove it really is him
sodhi to karthik, 1 run, tosses it up on middle, karthik blocks into the covers and sprints through
sodhi to lynn, no run, sees the ball lob up over his eyeline, loves the width on this, looks to smash through the covers. but the dip and turn do him in.

unadkat to karthik, four runs, that's ridiculously good! unadkat is bowling around the wicket, often taking all the pace off it. this one comes down at top pace, karthik spots it and gently deflects it away to the third man boundary. imagine your friend putting an arm around you, only to slap a sign that says 'kick me!'
unadkat to karthik, 1 run, finds a single behind point
rajpoot to yadav, four runs, thick outside edge, flies past a vacant second slip to the third man boundary. there for the drive, he went with hard hands, ended up slicing it.
rajpoot to yadav, no run, this time he leans into the drive, caresses it straight to tiwary at cover
rajpoot to yadav, no run, stands tall and punches straight to cover again
rajpoot to yadav, no run, defended back, bowler parries it towards cover
rajpoot to yadav, four runs, cleverly done, opens the bat face late to steer this past the keeper to beat third man
tye to lewis, out, right through lewis! the purplecap holder strikes gold! this is a knuckleball that comes back in to beat the inside edge and flatten off stump.
tye to ishan kishan, no run, beauty! slants away and holds its line to beat kishan's feeble push. zips through to rahul
sharma to yadav, 1 leg bye, angles in to hit surya high on the thigh as he tries to work this square, they scamper a leg bye
sharma to ishan kishan, six runs, walloped deep into the stands at backward square leg! at mohit's pace, that's asking for trouble. swivels back and helps him over.
sharma to ishan kishan, 1 run, thick outside edge as he drives, this time to third man
tye to ishan kishan, out, cross-batted heave but he can only hit it as far as mid-on. no timing, no power, dragged it from outside off. clever from tye, it's that knuckleball again.
patel to sharma, 1 run, eased with the spin to long-off to get off the mark
patel to sharma, 1 run, dabs it gently into the off side with soft hands
patel to sharma, 1 run, flatter one on middle and leg, tucked to midwicket
rajpoot to sharma, no run, gentle dab towards point, wants the single but is sent back
stoinis to pollard, no run, dabs this gently into the off side.
stoinis to pollard, four runs, stands tall and punches this to the extra cover boundary. sweet. shot of the night so far
stoinis to pollard, 1 run, turns this off his hip to midwicket
patel to pollard, 2 runs, driven firmly past the diving cover fielder, back for the second as tiwary comes around from wide long off
patel to pollard, 1 run, eased back to axar, who half-stops it on the dive, can't prevent the run, down to mid-off
stoinis to kh pandya, 1 run, forces this back past, down to long off
patel to pollard, six runs, backs away, axar drifts this into his swinging arc and pollard muscles this over deep midwicket. onto the top tier
rajpoot to pollard, four runs, drills this past the diving extra cover fielder, finch can't stop it despite a dive. boundary when it should've just been a single
rajpoot to kh pandya, 1 wide, slower delivery but down leg, the umpire will have tougher decisions to make tonight

stoinis to pollard, six runs, thumped over long-off, what a way to get to a half-century. this is some way to announce your return in style. pollard is pumped, fist-pumps towards the dressing room clearly being left out hurt him. what a way to channel that hurt. he's delivered when his team needed him to.
ashwin to hh pandya, 1 run, bowls this carrom ball wide, pandya mistimes this slap to cover

ashwin to pollard, out, backs away and clobbers this straight to long-off. ashwin bowled this just slightly wide outside off as he saw pollard backing away, he went through with the stroke but didn't hit this off the middle and finch takes an excellent catch moving to his left at long-off.
tye to hh pandya, no run, leading edge, just wide of cover. hit the deck hard, got some lift
tye to hh pandya, no run, defends solidly to cover
ashwin to hh pandya, 1 run, uppish whip down to deep midwicket
ashwin to hh pandya, 1 run, turns this flatter one on leg to square leg, they scamper a quick single
tye to hh pandya, 1 wide, slower ball gone wrong, way outside the wide line. hardik swung and missed.
sharma to mcclenaghan, 1 wide, looks for a slower ball, end up bowling it way outside off, rolled to the keeper
hh pandya to rahul, 1 wide, another one. this one barely lands on the pitch outside off
shakib al hasan to de villiers, no run, a good defensive ball, flat and wide, hit to cover.
shakib al hasan to de villiers, 1 run, nicely bowled actually. very slow outside off, bowling to his field. ab drives to deep cover and gets off strike.
shakib al hasan to de villiers, 1 run, flatter through the air around off, chipped to deep cover again
rashid khan to kohli, no run, williamson saves four. flat and wide outside off, kohli flat-bats that towards kw at mid-off. he races away and dives to his right
rashid khan to ali, no run, the legbreak, flat and straight. inside-edged into the pad and then back up towards the keeper.
basil thampi to ali, 1 run, good batting, a slower ball outside off, tapped to point for one.
shakib al hasan to de villiers, 1 run, slow on middle, ab backs away and pushes to cover.
shakib al hasan to de villiers, no run, flat and straight, de villiers drives back to shakib. well bowled again
shakib al hasan to de villiers, no run, signs of a slow surface, but it's very slow from shakib too, on middle and leg, wants to hit to cover, hits to the bowler
sandeep sharma to ali, no run, a slower ball outside off, ali's wild heave is missed.
rashid khan to ali, 2 runs, flat and wide, carved past point for a couple.
rashid khan to ali, 1 run, flat and wide outside off, 96 kph, very quick through the air. hit to long-off
basil thampi to de villiers, 1 wide, drifts down leg, wide. free run.
sandeep sharma to de villiers, 1 wide, that's what he does, forces you to bowl wides. just outside the tramline and wide. but that's a good option from sandeep
sandeep sharma to de villiers, four runs, a very similar delivery, a slow wide delivery outside off. ab goes from bottom to top and carves the ball over backward point.
rashid khan to ali, four runs, moeen doesn't care much. a legbreak outside off, flat-batted over the umpire for four. straight and quick.
basil thampi to de grandhomme, 2 runs, a slower delivery outside off, carved away to backward point. carlos brathwaite misfields and allows a second. sloppy.
basil thampi to de grandhomme, no run, keeps low, a back of the hand slower ball outside off. cdg waits and waits and swings, but the ball goes under
kaul to de grandhomme, 1 run, good stop from goswami. another slower ball outside off, tapped away towards the keeper, who dives to his right and stops three.
basil thampi to khan, 1 run, a slower delivery on off, sarfraz tried to play the same shot but all he can do is tap the ball to backward point
kaul to de grandhomme, 2 runs, a wide slower delivery outside off, it goes up towards williamson at cover. the ball swerves and swirls and williamson drops it.

kaul to de grandhomme, out, rashid takes that! he misjudged that as well but he's taken a one-handed stunner! much like trent boult, rashid misjudges this, comes in, and backtracks late. he then goes back, but this is much flatter so all he can do is stick out his right hand take the catch nonchalantly. it was a flat-batted swat from cdg.
southee to dhawan, no run, once again gets besides the line of this delivery to steer to point
yadav to hales, four runs, looks to go over mid-on but gets a thick inside edge that just about clears midwicket. lucky boundary, but he'll take the runs
yadav to dhawan, no run, dabs this gently into the off side
chahal to hales, no run, driven back to chahal, good stop off his own bowling.
chahal to hales, 1 run, goes for a hoick, gets a thick inside edge towards deep midwicket
chahal to hales, no run, too close to the delivery as he hits this flat on the bounce to mid-on
mohammed siraj to hales, 1 run, dabbed wide of point, down to square third man
chahal to williamson, no run, squeezes the drive to cover.
chahal to williamson, 1 run, nudged uppishly towards midwicket
yadav to williamson, no run, driven firmly but straight to mid-off
yadav to williamson, no run, slashed away to point where mandeep moves quickly to his right to stop that. williamson has missed out
yadav to williamson, 1 run, whips this from outside off towards southee at deep midwicket
yadav to hales, 1 run, slower delivery on off, eased to third man
yadav to hales, 1 run, uses the pace to run this down to third man
ali to williamson, 1 run, whipped uppishly to deep backward square leg, good work by umesh
southee to pandey, no run, slapped to mandeep on the bounce to point
southee to williamson, 1 run, eased down to moeen at third man for an easy single
ali to williamson, six runs, goes over the ropes, clears deep midwicket. clean loft, done with such class and composure. got outside the line and then swung this with the spin. delightful
chahal to williamson, no run, fizz, turn and bounce. williamson pokes and misses as this whizzes past the outside edge from middle and off
chahal to pandey, no run, drifts in to sneak through the inside edge and hit the back pad. drifting down.
mohammed siraj to williamson, no run, gets on top of the bounce and slaps this to a diving mandeep at backward point, superb stop.
de grandhomme to williamson, 2 runs, whipped smith style over the infield towards deep midwicket, completes his half-century off 28 balls, top effort. 11th ipl fifty in his 28th game
yadav to pandey, no run, cracked away but moeen dives to his left to stop this wallop at cover
yadav to williamson, 1 run, dabs this down to square third man
yadav to pandey, 1 run, whipped uppishly but down to ab on the bounce at deep midwicket
de grandhomme to pandey, 1 run, slaps this to the edge of the ring at cover for a single

chahal to pandey, 2 runs, turns this against the turn to deep square leg, the throw from de grandhomme is on the bounce but a touch wide, pandey hares back and is safe. only just. saved by a couple of centimetres. great work by parthiv as he gathered the throw and came up with an underarm flick onto the stumps
chahal to williamson, 1 run, nurdled towards deep square as they jog the single
southee to pandey, 2 runs, drills this straight to mid-off, there's a misfield from umesh to concede two when it should've been a dot. the sydney harbour bridge
southee to pandey, 1 run, once again hit hard and flat, this time umesh gets his body behind the line at mid-off.
mohammed siraj to williamson, 1 leg bye, walks across to scoop, gets into a tangle as the ball hits the pad. they scamper a leg bye
southee to pandey, 1 wide, slower ball gone wrong, way outside off.

mohammed siraj to hooda, 1 run, kohli fluffs a simple chance at long-off but chinnaswamy applauds because they know barring a brain freeze, they can't lose this. hooda looked to clear the ropes, toe-ended it
mohammed siraj to pandey, 2 runs, slices this up and over the infield, lands in no man's land behind point, they'll come back for the second. chinnaswamy roars, the red flags are out
jadeja to shaw, no run, quick, flat and straight, defended

jadeja to shaw, 1 run, dropped. should have been taken. quick and straight, it's another ugly across-the-line hoick that travels at head height to thakur's right. he sticks out his right hand but the ball pops out.
jadeja to iyer, no run, flat and wide, iyer tries an open-faced dab but misses.
jadeja to iyer, 1 run, on middle and leg, nudged away to deep midwicket again. one more run.
harbhajan singh to iyer, no run, nicely bowled. sees iyer coming so he fires it wider. defended to cover.
harbhajan singh to pant, 1 run, and now a good single. slow outside off, tapped to point for one
bravo to pant, 1 wide, angles this wide, but too wide. called a wide.
harbhajan singh to pant, no run, grip and spin! on off, but turning away from pant. defended with soft hands
jadeja to abhishek sharma, 1 run, plays it to midwicket to get off the mark. nice use of the wrists to give it a whip
ngidi to patel, no run, slower ball outside off, and harshal waits for a long time before fending it back to the bowler
bravo to patel, six runs, that's a good slower ball, it deceived harshal patel. but he got there early and still flicked the ball over square leg for six. enough power
thakur to patel, no run, excellent slower ball, the knuckle ball. on middle. a bit of extra bounce takes the ball over off and middle stump after beating a heave
boult to watson, 1 leg bye, on leg stump, but shaping down the leg side. hits his pad though, and the ball drops near his toes. they scamper across for a run
maxwell to raina, no run, fended by raina on this occasion
lamichhane to raina, 1 run, flat and wide outside off, chopped to extra cover for a tight run
maxwell to raina, no run, flat outside off, pushed to cover. 95 kph.
maxwell to raina, no run, flat and wide outside off, carved to point.
mishra to dhoni, 1 run, a legbreak outside off, tapped to point for a run. and dhoni has 6000 t20 runs
mishra to dhoni, no run, spin for mishy. flat on off and middle, the ball spins and beats the bat.
mishra to dhoni, no run, quick and straight, pushed back to the bowler
lamichhane to dhoni, no run, the legbreak outside off, pushed to cover. excellent spell from the young leggie: 4-0-21-1.
boult to chahar, 1 run, a slower ball on off, inside-edged to square leg
chahal to tripathi, 2 runs, crunched to wide long-off where superman ab hares around to his left to stop that
chahal to tripathi, no run, reaches out and drives this straight to extra cover
chahal to tripathi, no run, slider on middle, defended back with soft hands
ali to rahane, 2 runs, turns this gently towards the man coming in from mid-on, aggressive running. misfield from chahal

ali to tripathi, no run, goes through him! sharp turn to beat the inside edge and hit the pad. big appeal from parthiv, nearly four appeals. moeen joined in late. may have been missing leg stump. rcb don't review moeen hinted to kohli that it may have gone down leg.
yadav to rahane, four runs, lovely timing! opened the bat face late to ease this behind point. pure timing
southee to tripathi, 1 run, nips back in from outside off, firmly defended between cover and point
southee to rahane, 1 run, angles this slower delivery down to third man
chahal to rahane, no run, pushed through quicker on off, defended with soft hands to the off side
chahal to tripathi, no run, sharp turn from middle, he goes back and defends back
southee to rahane, 1 run, uses the inwards angle to turn around and guide it to backward square leg
de grandhomme to tripathi, 1 wide, sprays it down the leg side and gets past the attempted glance
de grandhomme to tripathi, 1 wide, slid down the leg side again. poor from de grandhomme
de grandhomme to rahane, 1 wide, this one's the worst of the lot. way down the leg side. that's three wides in the over
de grandhomme to tripathi, six runs, comes down the track and there is an absolute lack of pace at 103.7kmph. chips it straight over and the ball crashes on the bounce into the sightscreen
chahal to rahane, 1 run, flat slider on leg, swept to deep square leg
chahal to tripathi, 2 runs, comes down the track and goes inside-out to the left of long-off
chahal to tripathi, no run, takes it away from him and spins away, and that's got to be a wide. tripathi was expecting the call, which is why he let it go. but not called by the umpire
chahal to klaasen, 1 run, hit hard but can't pick the gap, straight to long off
southee to klaasen, 1 wide, backs away to to over the off side, southee sees this and lands the slower ball wide but gets this outside the wide line. rolls to parthiv
mohammed siraj to klaasen, no run, sees him backing away and bowls a slower one outside off, klaasen can't reach this. nice awareness from siraj
gowtham to kohli, no run, tucked to midwicket
laughlin to patel, no run, opens the face to one outside off and misses
unadkat to patel, no run,
sodhi to de villiers, 1 run, shapes to drive, gets a thick inside edge past midwicket
gopal to de villiers, 1 run, eased with the spin to long-off
gopal to ali, 1 run, turns this gently towards square leg with the spin to get off the mark
sodhi to de villiers, no run, steered with the spin to point
sodhi to de villiers, 1 run, eased with the spin to deep cover, sensibly done.
gopal to de grandhomme, 1 run, eased with the spin to long off
sodhi to de villiers, 1 run, eased with the spin to deep cover as he jogs the single
sodhi to de grandhomme, 1 run, squared up, leading edge that rolls wide of point for a quick single
sodhi to de villiers, 1 run, drives but the ball holds its line, thick inside edge to square leg.
gopal to khan, no run, goes back into the crease and dabs this gently.
unadkat to khan, 1 run, ramps this up and over, but down to third man. once again didn't have the pace to ramp this fine.
unadkat to southee, no run, steps out to hoick but is deceived by the slower delivery that spins away past the outside edge to the keeper
laughlin to mohammed siraj, 1 run, driven firmly to cover, rahane misfields but it wouldn't have mattered because they've taken a single anyway
archer to mohammed siraj, 1 run, squeezes the drive to cover, a direct hit at the bowler's end from rahane and he would've been gone
archer to southee, 1 run, thick inside edge onto the pad, rolls to the off side for a single
archer to mohammed siraj, 1 run, flicked neatly down to deep square leg.
unadkat to southee, four runs, walks across the stumps, holds his shape and hoicks this slower ball into the gap at deep midwicket
archer to mohammed siraj, 1 run, hit back hard but archer stops it with his boot, they'll scamper a run nonetheless
archer to chahal, no run, looks to back away and loft, can only get the bottom of the bat, rolls back to the bowler.

unadkat to mohammed siraj, out, swung away, but this is a steepler towards deep midwicket. sanju samson is running in, k gowtham is running back from the ingield, the ball curves in the air and as it comes down, samson oses balance and fumbles, but gowtham has the presence of mind to take this on the rebound. stunning win for the royals. bangalore boys gowtham and gopal have booted rcb out of ipl 2018.
kuldeep yadav to dhawan, no run, pitches outside leg, but spins across the batsman's body. defended
narine to pandey, 1 wide, quicker ball on leg stump, but that's too wide. extras
sandeep sharma to narine, four runs, clears point with a mistimed slice. narine wants to thump this over over but it's a slower ball drifting away from him and it takes the thick outside edge
brathwaite to karthik, no run, slower ball, and outside off stump. attempts the drive but deceived by the pace. goes past his bat's outside edge
kh pandya to maxwell, four runs, swung away, not in control but manages to hoick this behind square on the leg side. first boundary
bumrah to shaw, four runs, slashed, too quick for suryakumar yadav at slip. by the time he cupped his hands, the ball had flown past him at first slip. tough, tough chance.
hh pandya to maxwell, four runs, punchy drive, beats mid-off. no chance for krunal even though he was no more than a couple of yards away from the ball. that just kept gathering speed.

mustafizur rahman to maxwell, out, what laziness, shaw was taking a sunday stroll and has to walk back. defended to point by maxwell, he called no and turned back immediately. shaw was no more than four or five yards outside the crease even as pandya threw the ball direct at the bowler's end. this is very poor, lack of game awareness. he didn't even make an attempt to get back in. completely taken aback by hardik pandya's throw. virender sehwag like.
mustafizur rahman to maxwell, 1 run, stands tall and punches this to cover point.
mustafizur rahman to maxwell, no run, grips the surface, bounces extra. maxwell slices this punch on the bounce to backward point.
bumrah to maxwell, no run, bit of an inside edge onto the pad as he looked to hoick this over midwicket. stifled appeal from bumrah

bumrah to maxwell, out, right through, 144kph. maxwell's forgettable ipl is over. bumrah gives him the silent treatment. maxwell went for a glory hit, trying to belt this up and over his head. but the ball angled back in to sneak in off a big inside edge and flatten leg stump. this is the fourth time bumrah has dismissed maxwell.
bumrah to pant, no run, gets half a stride in and defends this back towards the bowler.
bumrah to pant, 1 run, punches this wide of mid-on to get off the mark.
mustafizur rahman to iyer, no run, driven but can't pick the gap, straight to cover point.
markande to pant, no run, slides one away, pant looks at dharmasena in anticipation of a wide, but not given and rightly so.
markande to pant, 1 run, turns this gently to square leg, sensible
hh pandya to shankar, no run, dabs this gently to point
bumrah to pant, no run, driven but can't pick the gap, straight to mid-off.

mustafizur rahman to pant, 2 runs, belts this to hit fizz flush on the toe as it deflects towards mid-on. they scamper back for the second because of the overthrow. fizz takes his left shoe off, awkward landing as well because he twisted his left leg
mustafizur rahman to shankar, four runs, slashes, but gets a thick edge that runs wide of the keeper to the third man boundary
hh pandya to pant, no run, looks for the reverse lap, gave away his intention too early. missed it
hh pandya to pant, no run, drills this straight to mid-off.
kh pandya to shankar, 1 run, whipped over the infield, down to brother hardik
kh pandya to pant, no run, slapped to the man at the edge of the ring at extra cover.

mustafizur rahman to shankar, no run, punches this straight to extra cover, big mix up with the running. shankar was a long way down when he was sent back, a direct hit at the striker's end by hardik and he would've been gone.
bumrah to abhishek sharma, 1 run, makes room and lofts this inside-out to long-off.
bumrah to shankar, 1 wide, slips this down leg, he looked to tickle this fine but missed.
maxwell to lewis, no run, flat around off, chopped towards extra cover
maxwell to lewis, 1 run, flat and straight, lewis skews a lofted drive away towards midwicket via the inside half.
maxwell to lewis, six runs, six more! lewis on fire. flat outside off, lewis steps out and nails a lofted drive right back. over the bowler's head
maxwell to lewis, no run, again, this is much flatter through, smashed to cover
plunkett to ishan kishan, 1 wide, a slower ball drifts down leg, wide.
plunkett to lewis, 1 wide, down leg again, another wide.
mishra to lewis, no run, flat and straight, pushed back to the bowler.
lamichhane to hh pandya, four runs, four more! flat and wide outside off, hardik drills a drive past cover for four more. lots of power on that.
lamichhane to hh pandya, 1 run, leg side-ish, and flicked away easily to the deep midwicket fielder
lamichhane to hh pandya, 1 run, well bowled. flat around off, pushed to cover for a quick single. rohit puts in a dive and makes the single despite some quick work from pant.
boult to sharma, 1 wide, a slower, very wide delivery outside off is called
boult to hh pandya, four runs, poor delivery. drifts down leg and hardik flicks the ball very fine, past backward square leg for four.
patel to hh pandya, 2 wides, good stop by pant! harshal drifts well down leg for a wide. pant gets across to his left and stops four extras
lamichhane to markande, no run, flat on off, defended into the off side.
chahar to miller, no run, swipes across the line to one that's angled across and misses
chahar to miller, six runs, swings at the sight of width, there's lot of room, so there was the chance that he may find the toe-end but he's done well to deposit it over long-off
jadeja to nair, 1 run, backs away, gets followed. shovels it to deep backward square
bravo to patel, 1 run, loops slower ball on leg stump. flicked to deep square leg

thakur to nair, four runs, lazy attempt from dhoni and that's a missed chance. nair backs away too much and is lunging to try and play a square drive. gets a thick edge that flies to dhoni's right and he only gets an obligatory right hand out at this, feet barely moving
rajpoot to du plessis, no run, and again. swing movement and bounce. faf at it again away from the body, can't get a touch
rajpoot to du plessis, no run, leading edge to mid-off. great bowling, this. outswinger from middle stump. faf's bat face is closed too quickly and this ends up at mid-off
rajpoot to harbhajan singh, no run, almost strangled down the leg side. harbhajan moves across and tries a flick and the ball goes over leg stump. barely! geez, what's happening here!
rajpoot to harbhajan singh, no run, walks across to a wide one and lets it go. but it's deemed fine
patel to harbhajan singh, no run, again shuffles across early and swings big and misses outside off
ashwin to raina, no run, arm ball in at leg stump, tapped to midwicket from the crease
chahar to goswami, 1 run, goswami helps one to third man and gets off strike
chahar to williamson, no run, slower ball outside off, 118.9ks, not sure if that was a knuckle ball. williamson delays his push to cover
ngidi to williamson, 1 run, another slower ball outside off, 116.7ks, williamson spots the change-up and runs it down to third man
jadeja to pandey, no run, straight ball on middle, played back to the bowler
bravo to pathan, no run, lifter on middle, keeps leg slip interested does bravo, pathan, however, ducks under this
chahar to pathan, 1 wide, slower ball, but awry line. going down the leg side, and yusuf actually gloves it. doesn't go to dhoni straight though. on the bounce to the keeper
jadeja to brathwaite, no run, pacey! drills this straight on middle stump, and brathwaite defends it back to the bowler
jadeja to pathan, no run, stopped by raina! the drive to mid off has been stopped by a diving effort
bravo to kumar, 1 wide, down the leg side again! bravo appeals for the caught-behind, but the umpire's not interested. calls it a wide again.

kaul to rayudu, out, cracking delivery from kaul.. my ball of the tournament. this was the big dipper from kaul, a la malinga, swings away so very late. opens up rayudu, beats him on the outside edge, and hits off and middle. he sends rayudu back for a first-ball duck and pumps his fist animatedly. look at williamson, he's pumped too. this defence is on
rashid khan to dhoni, 1 run, tossed outside off, slices a drive to deep point
sandeep sharma to du plessis, 1 run, knuckle ball outside off, and faf chooses to chop it down to backward point. early call for the run, and he'll keep strike
sandeep sharma to du plessis, 1 run, slower ball, dips at off, 116ks, faf leading-edges it to the covers

kaul to harbhajan singh, no run, knuckle ball outside off, and harbhajan can't even connect with the drive. the ball angled away slightly after pitching, and that, perhaps, put the batsman off. through to goswami
kaul to du plessis, 1 run, knuckle ball just outside off, and faf manages to push it towards cover. just a single on offer this time. csk need 12 off eight balls

gowtham to narine, four runs, slapped for four! starts around the wicket, and pitches outside off. narine backs away, makes some extra room, and crunches this past the diving cover fielder. tripathi the man who couldn't stop it
archer to lynn, 1 run, mistimed this time. archer pitched it on middle, but the ball jagged in sharply. hits the shoulder of his bat, and goes towards square leg
archer to uthappa, 1 wide, carbon copy! pitches on middle, but the ball shapes into his body and then down the leg side. the umpire spreads his arms wide again

gowtham to uthappa, out, leading edge, and caught by the bowler! tossed it up, and uthappa tried to work it towards the leg side. through his shot too early, and the ball lobs straight back to kg. big jump from the big man, and he manages to hold on to it. two wickets in seven balls for gowtham
gowtham to lynn, four runs, just a bit more air offered, and lynn smacks this through the cover region. winds up early, waits for the ball to land, and then slaps it through the off side
sodhi to karthik, no run, goes back and across to work this through midwicket, but this hits him high on the bat and rolls back to the bowler
sodhi to karthik, 1 run, opens the bat face slightly to drive to the left of cover
sodhi to karthik, 2 runs, steered this behind point, unadkat runs behind and slides to stop that but can't prevent the second
sodhi to karthik, no run, goes back into the crease and defends back to sodhi
sodhi to karthik, 1 run, turns this gently into the leg side for a quick single. got close to the ball as he smothered that
gopal to shubman gill, 1 run, pitches on middle, and that's been flicked to square leg. the region's vacant so they take a quick single. gill wants the second, but that's a resounding 'no' from dk

unadkat to karthik, six runs, scooped him up and over the keeper's head, straight scoop for six. half-century for dk. he was looking away while trying to use the pace, got a big, fat top-edge that just flew. this is injustice

laughlin to russell, six runs, backs away but he's denied the free swing because laughlin angles into his body. no problem. he still swings through, gets a top-edge that flies over the fine leg boundary.
laughlin to russell, 1 wide, too far wide outside off. russell has the presence of mind, lets it go. he was initially backing away, so laughlin went outside off. just outside the wide line
russell to rahane, 1 run, on off stump, and rahane taps it with soft hands towards wide mid on. will get tripathi on strike
narine to rahane, 1 wide, slips this down leg, will have to rebowl that
kuldeep yadav to rahane, no run, slider across the batsman, left alone. drifted away as well
kuldeep yadav to rahane, no run, hit on the back leg, but this one's turning too much. rahane didn't pick it at all as he tried to work this to the leg side.
kuldeep yadav to samson, no run, leading edge that rolls to point. bat was angled towards mid-on.
narine to samson, 2 runs, whips this from outside off towards deep midwicket, aggressive running
narine to samson, 1 run, gentle little push with the spin towards midwicket
kuldeep yadav to samson, 1 run, turns this gently with the spin towards square leg
kuldeep yadav to rahane, no run, slides just past the outside of his bat! a beautiful ball. lands on off, and spin further away from the right-hander. almost the dream delivery

chawla to samson, 2 runs, flatter ball, and it turns away from the batsman. tries to punch it towards cover, but comes off the bat's inside edge. it trickles down to midwicket, and samson returns for two
narine to samson, 1 run,
chawla to samson, 1 run, flat on middle, but turning in further. samson mistimes his whip to deep backward square. but gets to fifty
chawla to klaasen, 1 run, backs away, and carves it over point. chawla saw him move, and therefore followed him. good cricket all around
prasidh krishna to gowtham, 1 run, slower ball, but wide outside off. forces him to reach at it, and all he can do is slice it to first slip
prasidh krishna to gowtham, four runs, top edged over the keeper! but kkr won't mind. the home boys win, and stay alive in ipl 2018! rajasthan royals are eliminated.
shivam mavi to dhawan, no run, pitched further up and slanting away outside off, now dhawan shoulders arms
russell to saha, no run, lifter on middle, 141.4ks, saha ducks under it. saha: 6 off 12 balls
narine to saha, 1 run, skiddy offbreak, 101ks, finishes on off, nudged with the break to mid-on
narine to dhawan, 1 run, pushed through on off, 103.8ks, tip and run to the covers
chawla to dhawan, no run, tossed on off, drilled straight back, saha is in the firing line and cops a blow on the right leg
chawla to dhawan, four runs, dragged down outside off, dhawan skips back and flat-bats it fiercely to the left of long-off
kuldeep yadav to williamson, 1 run, lovely dip and turn for kuldeep, williamson does not meet the pitch and squirts a leading edge to the leg side
chawla to shakib al hasan, four runs, right int he slot, drilled to deep extra cover. juicy from pc to his old kkr mate
chawla to shakib al hasan, no run, hammered back on the bounce, good stop off his own bowling
chawla to shakib al hasan, no run, looks to turn this behind square, gets it high on the bat, dk runs to his right to stop that.
kuldeep yadav to hooda, 1 run, driven with the spin to long off

narine to hooda, 2 runs, floated outside off as hooda advances, he reaches out and slices this over the infield, uthappa was circling below the ball and allowed it to bounce before he took it at deep cover.
narine to pathan, 1 run, leading edge but safe. rolls between cover and point for a quick single.
narine to hooda, no run, goes for a mow, played too early and missed. hit high on the right thigh.
prasidh krishna to brathwaite, 1 wide, flirts with the wide line. saw the batsman backing away and bowled this wide. easy call for nitin menon
prasidh krishna to rashid khan, four runs, thick outside edge that beats a leaping dk. looked to hoick this across the line
shivam mavi to rashid khan, no run, drills this straight to the man at the edge of the ring at cover.
prasidh krishna to kumar, four runs, backs away and uses the width to slice this over backward point, clever from bhuvi
prasidh krishna to rashid khan, 2 runs, has he clobbered this or what? not much timing but plonks between the man running in from square leg and the boundary rider. they're back for the second.
kumar to narine, 1 run, tucked off the hips through square leg for one

kaul to narine, out, narine holes out to brathwaite at mid-on. 113.4ks, slower knuckle ball on the leg stump, narine attempts a loft but can only toe-end it in the air to brathwaite inside the circle. narine has done his job, though
rashid khan to rana, no run, quick fizzer from rashid, he beats rana for pace and hits the pad but this might have been heading down the leg side
brathwaite to lynn, no run, slower ball wide outside off, away from the reach of lynn, he swings and misses
rashid khan to lynn, 1 run, swept with the spin this time, much finer to kaul at fine leg
shakib al hasan to lynn, 1 run, drifting into middle and leg, squeezes this flick towards deep midwicket
shakib al hasan to shubman gill, no run, turns this indrifter into the leg side, shakib runs across to stop that
ahmed to shubman gill, 1 run, slices this down to square third man, good work by kaul. a sliding stop
ahmed to chawla, 1 run, steers this gently towards third man to get off the mark off his fourth delivery
ahmed to shubman gill, four runs, slapped away to the cover boundary! angles this in from around the stumps, gill makes room and punches this past a diving williamson
kaul to chawla, no run, looks to arch back and help this over the keeper to third man, misses.
kaul to chawla, 1 run, hit back past kaul but there's no timing, they'll scamper a single
kumar to shubman gill, four runs, belted back, bhuvi gets a hand, but it will be cruel to call that a chance! deflects this to the boundary. so hard was that hit by gill. much-needed for kkr.
kaul to shubman gill, 2 runs, lofted over the infield, but williamson, running back from cover, can't get there. they scamper back for the second

brathwaite to kuldeep yadav, no run, drilled down to long-off, but it doesn't matter. srh have arrested a four-match losing streak and will play chennai super kings in sunday's final. kkr's campaign has come to a shuddering halt
chahar to williamson, 1 run, charges down but gets a slower ball outside off, chopped to mid-off
thakur to williamson, 1 wide, starts with a wide down leg.
thakur to dhawan, 2 runs, too straight this time, down leg and flicked away nonchalantly through square leg for two. good stop by karn, running to his right from fine leg.
sharma to dhawan, 1 wide, strays down leg, wide.
bravo to dhawan, no run, a slower ball outside off, drilled to cover
bravo to pathan, 1 wide, slower ball, but going down the leg side. the batsman did move towards the off side, but bravo was just a bit too wide
thakur to brathwaite, no run, slower ball on the fourth-stump line, and brathwaite misses! gold dust. brathwaite swings blindly towards the leg side, but he's through with his shot way too early

sandeep sharma to du plessis, out, beautiful bowling. watson's pressure results in the wicket of du plessis. he charges down, but it's the slower knuckle ball. faf does not pick that. as a result, he goes through with the lofted drive and the ball goes straight up instead of far back. sandeep says i got this to his team-mates. he's got it.
kumar to raina, 1 run, flicked away uppishly to deep square leg for a run.
sandeep sharma to raina, 1 run, a slower ball outside off, 113 kph, sliced to point. a diving save again
rashid khan to watson, 1 run, the wide legbreak outside off, drilled down to long-off for one
kaul to watson, four runs, knew that was his area. 115 kph, a knuckle ball outside off. watson knows the fielder is up so just slaps the ball over the fielder. lands just inside.

shakib al hasan to watson, six runs, flat outside leg stump, and watson goes down on one knee and thumps it over deep backward square leg! what a classy way to get to your fifty. a freebie to start his spell
brathwaite to watson, 1 run, slower ball to end the over. it's wide outside off, so watson is forced to reach at it. flat-bats it past the bowler's left, and takes a single to keep the strike
sandeep sharma to watson, 1 wide, wide outside off, but he's got to bowl this again. over the tramlines...
rashid khan to rayudu, no run, edged to first slip! but goes to the fielder on the bounce. pitches outside off, and spins into rayudu
brathwaite to rayudu, four runs, and chennai super kings' highest run-scorer hits the winning runs! csk are ipl 2018 champions. driven through the covers
chahar to patel, no run, good bowling, keeps it wide of off stump but within the tramlines, parthiv lets it go, but that's not a wide
harbhajan singh to kohli, 1 run, flatter on off and spinning in a bit, kohli moves back and across and wrists it to midwicket
chahar to kohli, no run, terrific bowling, he's found that spot from where the ball is holding up a bit, and kohli is a mite early into his shot. ends up patting it back
chahar to kohli, 1 no ball, slower one goes wrong it's slipped out of his hands and gone over kohli's head, so it's a no-ball. free hit coming up.

harbhajan singh to de villiers, 2 runs, tahir has dropped ab at deep square leg that would have been nail in coffin with undertaker's music playing, but ab gets a life. swept from leg-stump, gets a top edge, and tahir makes a hash of it
harbhajan singh to hetmyer, no run, flatter, into leg stump, he moves back and slaps to mid-on
imran tahir to de grandhomme, no run, flatter one at 92kph, de grandhomme was playing back but gets his bat down in time, an inside edge on to the shoe
imran tahir to yadav, 1 run, flatter around off, pushes and gets an inside edge towards square leg
chahal to watson, no run, ooh and there's turn there. pitched on leg, and spun across, takes the shoulder of the bat and rolls away
chahal to watson, no run, quicker one, at 97 kph, fired into middle and leg, kept out by watson
chahal to raina, no run, given some air, pitches outside off and spinning into raina, who wants to defend with bat beside pad, but is hit on pad. struck outside the line
ali to rayudu, no run, defended into the offside
ali to rayudu, no run, quicker, steered into the offisde
ali to rayudu, no run, beats him. this one went straight on and rayudu was trying to push it, but it whistles past the outside edge
saini to rayudu, four runs, swings for the fences because it's a free hit, doesn't time it to perfection but lofts it over the bowler's head and into the straight boundary
ali to raina, no run, strays down leg but is not called for a wide. raina is surprised
ali to raina, no run, flatter, pushed back to the bowler
yadav to rayudu, 1 run, strays on leg and tucked to a squarish fine leg
yadav to raina, 1 run, tickled to fine leg to become the first man to reach 5000 runs in the ipl
yadav to jadhav, 1 run, a single to fine leg
prasidh krishna to warner, 1 wide, once again movement back in but starts from leg and goes further down
prasidh krishna to warner, 1 wide, struggling for rhythm, swings one down leg again. excellent take by dk. trying too hard maybe?
prasidh krishna to warner, 1 run, tucks this gently towards square leg for a quick single
chawla to warner, no run, bunts this to cover point
prasidh krishna to bairstow, 1 run, flicks well but dre russ stops well with the dive at mid-on. saved three runs
chawla to bairstow, 2 runs, drifting into middle and leg, tucked wide of midwicket and they scamper back. shubman gill had to come in a long way from the ropes.
chawla to bairstow, six runs, steps out and goes straight, clears the ropes. lovely hit, free swing of the arms and the timing magnificent.
ferguson to bairstow, 2 runs, leading edge, bounces away to the third man region where prasidh does well to stop this on the bounce. saved two runs
narine to warner, 1 run, turns this wide of the bowler into the leg side for a quick single
narine to warner, no run, pushes this into the covers
kuldeep yadav to warner, no run, hint of an opportunity missed down leg as warner is overbalanced! looking to tuck it fine as it drifted in, fumbled by dk
kuldeep yadav to bairstow, 1 run, wrong-un, makes room and cracks this to deep cover
narine to bairstow, 1 run, swung away, one bounce to deep midwicket
narine to bairstow, no run, this one goes away, pushed to the man coming in from point
russell to bairstow, 1 run, chops this to point for a quick single. didn't have the room
russell to warner, 1 run, gentle bunt into the off side for a quick single
kuldeep yadav to warner, no run, driven hard and straight to cover
kuldeep yadav to bairstow, 1 run, makes room and punches to deep cover
kuldeep yadav to bairstow, 1 run, swept one bounce to long leg. hit well though
rana to warner, 1 run, driven to long-off

chawla to warner, four runs, clubbed disdainful almost. stepped away to give himself room, chawla bowled another wrong un, which merely meant he had room to free his arms and he clobbered it through extra cover
narine to warner, no run, some turn there, pitches on off and goes further away
russell to warner, 1 run, driven to cover

prasidh krishna to shankar, four runs, cleverly placed fine leg was in the circle and this one was tailing in too. he manages to get enough on it to place it beyond the fielder in the circle and to the fine leg boundary.
kumar to rana, no run, straightens off the deck as it slants across, defended from the crease
shakib al hasan to lynn, no run, steps out and looks to work through midwicket, gets a leading edge that rolls back to shakib
kumar to uthappa, four runs, tickled nice and fine. bhuvi strays in line and he used the pace to ease this to fine leg. uthappa off the mark
kumar to uthappa, no run, driven well but straight to mid-off
sandeep sharma to rana, no run,
sandeep sharma to rana, four runs,
