sandeep sharma to rana, six runs,
sandeep sharma to rana, no run, slower ball on the stumps, checked his drive to mid-off

sandeep sharma to rana, four runs, outside edge, too early into the shot again, and the ball bounces more than he expected and comes on slower. takes an outside edge to run to the third man fence. lucky for the batsman
kaul to rana, 1 run, slower ball on off, steers it to third man
shakib al hasan to rana, 1 run, bunts this down towards deep midwicket
shakib al hasan to uthappa, no run, makes room and punches this slider to cover, miscommunication with the running but they don't take the run

shakib al hasan to uthappa, four runs, steps out and squeezes the drive between cover and point, superb timing and hands from uthappa. got too close to the delivery so had to jam his bat down, did it well
kaul to rana, no run, defended from the crease
rashid khan to uthappa, 1 run, off a thick inside edge on the drive to deep midwicket. this one drifted in a long way

rashid khan to uthappa, 1 run, yusuf has made a right royal mess of a sitter at long-off! uthappa deceived by the dip on the delivery as he looks to loft over long-off, got the toe end and this lobbed straight up. should have been taken, uthappa with a giant slice of luck
rashid khan to rana, four runs, has a wild swipe at one that drifts away to get a thick edge over the slips
rashid khan to rana, 1 run, eased wide of point for a single
sandeep sharma to uthappa, 1 run, walks into the stroke as he turns this slower delivery to deep midwicket
shakib al hasan to uthappa, no run, defended back as he accounts for the turn
shakib al hasan to uthappa, 1 run, squeezes the drive wide of cover
kaul to karthik, no run, play and a miss great ball. angled in and moving away a touch, karthik wanted to drive it, ends up not connecting, and it just missed the outside edge
sandeep sharma to rana, 1 wide, and he goes around the wicket to angle it in, but goes too far down leg. pressure telling on sandeep
sandeep sharma to rana, 1 wide, too wide this time, and nitish lets it through to pick up the extra run
sandeep sharma to russell, 1 run, big swipe across the line but doesn't get the timing right, sends it to deep midwicket along the ground off the inside half of the bat
rashid khan to shubman gill, no run, slider outside off, chopped tentatively into the offside

rashid khan to russell, four runs, one bounce into the extra cover fence! russell sends rashid's last ball to the boundary, clubbing it from outside off over the in-field. there's life in this game yet perhaps
kumar to russell, 1 run, smart bowling, keeps it very wide outside off and just inside the tramline, has russell reaching for it and he can only chop it away into the offside for a single
kumar to russell, no run, rare dot ball, goes wide outside off, and russell was backing away again so doesn't connect with the swing

kumar to russell, six runs, oh my this should be illegal that's a mis-hit. a total mis-hit. and it's gone over the extra cover boundary. how does he do it? bhuvi kept it wide outside off, and russell moved slightly across, was almost falling over but clubbed it off the toe-end of the bat. and still sent it over the fence
shakib al hasan to russell, 1 wide, russell stays put and shakib second guesses him by firing it down leg. that will be a wide
shakib al hasan to russell, 1 run, almighty heave but only gets an under-edge to deep square leg
shakib al hasan to shubman gill, no run, flatter outside off, tapped back to the bowler
bumrah to dhawan, 1 run, mistimes a drive to mid-off for a quick single. he got a thick inside edge onto the pad as it rolled to the fielder
bumrah to ingram, 1 run, tucked away nicely behind square in the leg side for a single
hh pandya to dhawan, four runs, width and he's belted that through extra cover. tracer bullet stuff. this was a poor ball, loose first up.
hh pandya to dhawan, 1 run, flayed through to deep point
kh pandya to dhawan, 1 run, swept, and swept well but there is a deep midwicket so they only get a single
kh pandya to ingram, no run, angles it wide across ingram, but what saved it from being a wide was it pitched inside the tramline
kh pandya to ingram, no run,

bumrah to pant, 1 leg bye, wow. slower ball, angling into leg stump. pant looks for the reverse-swat, with both third man and backward point inside the circle, but he's undone by lack of pace, and only manages a leg bye into the point region
boult to sharma, no run, ooh, play and a miss. angling across him and going away, rohit goes for the drive, but it rushes past his outside edge
sharma to sharma, four runs, outside edge goes for four would you believe it, the ball after slip has gone, rohit drives away from his body and gets a thick outside edge that goes for four
paul to yuvraj singh, no run, backs away to give himself room but smart by keemo, who pushes it wide of off stump. yuvraj can't reach that, and it's another dot ball
patel to yuvraj singh, 1 run, more luck for yuvraj, top-edges this intended swipe across the line but it loops past the bowler and lands safe
patel to kh pandya, 2 runs, down the track, doesn't quite reach the pitch of this off-stump ball, swipes across the line and drags it along the floor through midwicket
paul to yuvraj singh, no run, slower ball on off stump, stays back and defends it back to the bowler
patel to yuvraj singh, six runs, bam. axar sends down a long-hop, and yuvraj swivels and deposits it high over the square leg boundary
gowtham to khan, 1 run, a bit closer to the stumps, swept down to long leg
gowtham to gayle, 1 run, flat again, on leg stump, and he nurdles it to the left of midwicket to pick up one
stokes to gayle, four runs, almost a repeat of the first ball, but gayle doesn't middle it this time, a thick outside edge though flies towards third man fence for another boundary
mujeeb ur rahman to rahane, 1 run, no real turn, looks like the attempted legbreak angling into middle and leg. goes back again to clip into the square leg region
mujeeb ur rahman to buttler, no run, again that skiddy pace, angling into off stump and straightening slightly. stays back to punch to mid-off

ashwin to rahane, out, bowled him! carrom ball, straightens towards off stump and skids off the pitch. rahane was looking to stay leg-side of the ball and steer this down to third man. ended up playing inside the line and the ball crashes into off stump
ashwin to buttler, 1 run, offbreak outside off, goes back and punches to the left of cover
ashwin to buttler, 1 run,

ashwin to samson, out, ashwin has mankaded buttler here. and has appealed. buttler is furious. replays confirm buttler was well outside his crease. he has to go back, not the best of the scenes here. also, did ashwin stop in his action and waited for buttler to leave his crease? i think yes, but third umpire has ruled it out and buttler has to go
rajpoot to smith, 1 no ball, slower one outside off, smith looks to send it out of the stadium, misses completely but wait, that's another no-ball. even bigger than the last one
curran to smith, 1 wide, moves across again but it's way down the leg side, smith throws his bat at it but cannot connect
mujeeb ur rahman to tripathi, 1 wide, flatter but way outside off, looks to smash it away but misses, called a wide, marginal call
chahar to shaw, no run, hangs back and typically legside of the ball to tap it towards cover. hint of away movement off the pitch from chahar.
chahar to dhawan, four runs, outside edge. he doesn't move his feet, tentatively pushes the bat at a pitched-up outswinger. gets lucky with a thick edge to third man
chahar to iyer, 1 run, gets inside the line of a ball sliding into leg stump and flicks it to deep square leg
harbhajan singh to dhawan, no run, skids into him again, without turning, and almost seeming to hasten after pitching. dhawan manages to squirt it to cover
harbhajan singh to dhawan, 1 run,
chahar to dhawan, 1 run, steps out and has to deal with another ball - this one angled across - bouncing a little more than he expects. manages to get under it and lift over point
chahar to iyer, no run, excellent bowling again, targeting the top of off, and also getting it to straighten enough to keep shreyas to a block to point. wraps up his spell 4-0-20-1
harbhajan singh to iyer, no run, loops it up on off stump, defends
jadeja to iyer, 1 run, slices it to point and sprints across for a quick single. jadeja knocks the bails off even as the point fielder throws so there's no real danger
jadeja to iyer, 1 run, eases it through point
jadeja to dhawan, no run, defended back to the bowler
jadeja to iyer, no run, how'd that miss! angled in, flat, from wide of the crease, and it straightens past the outside edge as iyer reaches out for a push into the off side. so close to off stump
sharma to rayudu, no run, hit the deck though and you bring in uncertainty. the ball might stop on the batsman. ishant tries his best with that ploy and keeps rayudu to a block
patel to watson, 1 run, eases the ball to mid-on and then sprints through
rabada to watson, no run,

mishra to watson, 1 wide, out, huge appeal for a stumping. and it all starts with some sexy bowling from mishy. tosses it up. tempting the batsman. luring him into a big shot over the covers. bringing him out of his crease and then making him lose his shape thanks to the amount of turn off the pitch. now all that's left is for pant to collect the ball and break the stumps and he does it in style
mishra to jadhav, no run, flatter delivery outside off, jadhav goes back and blocks it
patel to dhoni, no run, nicely bowled. gets some dip on it as dhoni reaches out to defend. goes on with the angle and it rolls into the leg side off the inside edge
paul to dhoni, 1 wide, slower ball, sixth-stump line, left alone. was it really that wide, marais erasmus? borderline call - seemed to finish inside the tramline for me
varun to narine, 2 runs, through varun's fingers! smashed back down the track and he can't cling on to his left!
varun to narine, four runs, honked through midwicket! that's another calculatedly aggressive mow. no need for finesse, just pummel it to the rope!
varun to narine, six runs, sliding down the leg side, and launched over backward square! yeegads, narine's at it again!
mohammed shami to lynn, four runs, leans back and monstered over the covers! kxi's fine start is a distant memory!

mohammed shami to lynn, out, right underneath it! that's threatening a few satellites as it soars into the kolkata (k)night ... miller calls for it, braces for impact as it drops to earth like a comet, and falls to the turf to cushion the catch! great hands
viljoen to uthappa, no run, outside off, pushed through to the keeper on a wide line. a precious dot
tye to uthappa, 1 run, poked to the off side
tye to rana, no run, firm defence to complete a very tight over. it's been a mixed bag from kxi so far, but they've settled after that raucous second over
ashwin to uthappa, no run, wider line, attempted slap through the covers but can't connect
ashwin to rana, no run, a swish across the line, half an appeal for lbw but clearly outside the line
varun to uthappa, four runs, too wide, chopped backward of the diving point and clean to the rope!
varun to uthappa, 1 run, better this time, bravely offers more air, and eased down the pitch to long-off
varun to rana, no run, swished to backward point, not sure he read the spin there, and another useful dot
ashwin to rana, 2 runs, slapped out through the leg side, reaching for the ball and just about connecting
ashwin to rana, no run, much wider line, just inside the lines, and rana misses out on a flat-footed wallop through the covers
tye to rana, 1 run, outside off, another slower ball, and tapped to the covers
ashwin to uthappa, 1 run, looks like a carrom ball on leg stump, he flicks it through midwicket
ashwin to rana, 1 wide, the carrom ball goes way too wide outside off

ashwin to rana, six runs, w-o-w! this is the offbreak and ashwin tries his hardest to keep it out of reach of rana outside off. but the left-hander reaches out - while somehow still not losing his shape - and flat-bats it over long-off
viljoen to rana, 1 run, slower ball - good thinking against a rampaging batsman on an easy-paced pitch - rana dabs it at around square leg to pinch a single

viljoen to uthappa, 2 runs, splendid timing as he gets down low to the off-pace delivery outside off and steers it past point. could easily have gone to the boundary without agarwal diving to his left on the boundary
viljoen to russell, 1 run, slower ball on middle and off, russell blocks into the covers - uncharacteristically gently - and sets off
viljoen to uthappa, four runs, flicks it fine and all the way to the boundary to bring up his fifty. that's also the timeout

tye to uthappa, four runs, okay, lets unwrap this. first he moves his back leg outside leg. then he leaps across his stumps. then he has to deal with a slower ball and even through all that he somehow keeps his head and dabs it behind point and all the way to the boundary.
prasidh krishna to gayle, no run, a flat-footed mow, wide of off stump and through to the keeper
prasidh krishna to gayle, four runs, spanged through finer third man! a thick edge, too thin for the fielder, and an unsuspecting cameraman by the dugout wears it on the shoulder!
prasidh krishna to gayle, no run, a round-house swing at thin air! good lift off the deck. well then, this is living up to the billing already!
ferguson to rahul, no run, width outside off, hitting the deck harder, and rahul can't connect with a flash of the wrists
ferguson to agarwal, 1 run, wide on the crease, dabbed down to third man to get off the mark first ball
prasidh krishna to agarwal, 1 wide, takes off down the leg side, lots of pace and bounce, but the wrong line ...
prasidh krishna to agarwal, four runs, clouted over the covers! that's supreme batting, a fraction of room to the leg side, opens up the off, and creams his drive over the ring and away to the rope!
prasidh krishna to agarwal, no run, opens the face this time from deep in the crease but can't create the angle to beat point
prasidh krishna to agarwal, no run, gives room to the leg side again, but that's a good response from the bowler, rolling his fingers on a slower ball outside off, and mayank can't reach it
ferguson to gayle, no run, sharp delivery, hits the seam and jags past the squared-up batsman
ferguson to gayle, no run, rolls the fingers again, gayle steps back, deep into his crease to defend. keeping it solid while he finds his range ...

russell to khan, four runs, cor, that's a shot and a half! an inverted jack-in-the-box, squashing himself like a concertina, down into the crease, then ramping the ball off his nose and over the keeper! you need good knees for that stroke!
russell to khan, 1 run, tapped to the off side
prasidh krishna to agarwal, 5 runs, angled dab into the off side
prasidh krishna to khan, no run, outside off, through to the keeper on a wide line
prasidh krishna to khan, 1 run, pushed into the gap for another single
kuldeep yadav to khan, no run, pushed into the off side again
kuldeep yadav to khan, no run, through to the keeper, another wrong'un, taking it away from the right-hander and missing the mow
kuldeep yadav to agarwal, 1 run, cracked firmly along the ground to long-off. a fine introductory over
russell to khan, four runs, opens the face, glided down to the third man fence, using the pace well

russell to khan, out, attempted wipe over the leg side, but karthik simply jogs round behind the stumps and swallows another loose top-edge! easy pickings for kkr, and they've got themselves a stranglehold now ...
kuldeep yadav to agarwal, 1 run, flashed into the off side, and through for the single
kuldeep yadav to miller, 1 run, nudged down to long-off for a single
kuldeep yadav to agarwal, 1 wide, very wide of off stump, but angled across the batsman
kuldeep yadav to miller, four runs, down on one knee, swept hard through square leg. that's good intent
narine to miller, no run, big tweaker, past the left-hander's outside edge
narine to miller, no run, wider line, through to the keeper once more
narine to miller, 1 run, down on one knee, swept backward of square
narine to agarwal, 1 run, just another single ... a boundary is desperately needed
kuldeep yadav to miller, no run, loops it up on off stump, miller goes for a hard-handed push and the ball nearly ends up back in the bowler's hands
narine to miller, 1 run, flicks it through midwicket

kuldeep yadav to agarwal, 2 runs, dropped by cover running to his left. it's rinku singh subbing for uthappa. the batsman is deceived as he comes down the track, kuldeep keeping the ball wide of off stump to deny him the hitting base. the miscue goes out square on the off side and though it's a tough catch, rinku having to run quite a distance and dive, it should have been taken
chawla to mandeep singh, 1 run, another one the turns the wrong way from the legspinner. mandeep flicks it to deep square leg
ferguson to miller, 2 runs, slower ball, from round the stumps, on middle and leg, miller flicks it to deep midwicket. that's fifty to miller
chawla to mandeep singh, 2 runs, more googlies, mandeep flicks through midwicket

yadav to de kock, 1 run, lovely drive to the left of mid-off, where siraj puts in the dive and stops a boundary. umesh will keep pitching the ball up there. that's his strength in the powerplay. (but good batsmen can turn it into a weakness too)

saini to sharma, four runs, inside edge! and it's the result of rohit being unprepared for the pace and movement. saini hits the deck at 144 kph and gets the ball to dart into the right-hander, who tentatively brings his bat down and is lucky not to chop on

yadav to de kock, four runs, heaves it between midwicket and mid-on! that's a de kock special, right from his disdainful walk down the pitch against the fast bowler and the fast hands that help him put so much power on the shot

saini to de kock, four runs, dropped at midwicket. it's hit so very hard. but it's coming straight to de grandhomme. he has to get up off his feet, stick his hands above his head, and then hope it sticks. (hint, it doesn't)

saini to de kock, no run, stumps the advancing batsman again, going for his toes this time, and following him as he moves outside leg. this is good stuff from saini. he's under extreme pressure but he's holding his own
chahal to sharma, no run,
chahal to sharma, 1 run, quick, flat and in line with the stumps, rohit plays with the turn and flicks to midwicket
chahal to yadav, 4 byes, beats him by placing the legbreak outside off in response to surya premeditating a scoop shot. but the ball keeps low and skitters through the keeper for four
yadav to yadav, 1 run, slower ball on middle, out comes the time honoured suryakumar flick through the leg side, the lovely flourish but didn't time it well enough. one down to fine-leg
chahal to pollard, 1 run, quicker one outside off, pushed to long-off
de grandhomme to yadav, 1 wide, slower ball and down the leg side, called wide

de grandhomme to yadav, four runs, doubt if that shot has a name but it's a bit like a ramp and over the keeper for four! it was a slower ball, so he really had to wait after having gone down on one knee, but managed to time it despite the lack of pace
chahal to pollard, 1 wide,

mcclenaghan to ali, 1 run, another leading edge as moeen is done in by a hint of movement off the pitch. mcclenaghan hits the deck hard and that helps him generate a little bit of magic. not enough to get a wicket though as the ball wanders in the air behind point
malinga to patel, 1 run, flicks behind square leg

mcclenaghan to patel, 1 run, lovely bowling. mcclenaghan is alert to parthiv's mischief moving across his crease. and to counter it, he takes all the pace off and drags the line wide outside off. in the end, the left-hander can only flick for a single through square leg
hh pandya to kohli, no run, slices it to point
kh pandya to patel, six runs, launches it over deep midwicket! he's got such fast hands against spin, especially through the leg side, and krunal, by going round the wicket, is feeding that strength.

markande to de villiers, no run, dropped at first slip! yuvraj is the fielder. and it's onto him so very quickly. the only hope he is is for it to stick and it just doesn't. a hard-handed, backfoot push from ab - that should tell how fast the edge went to the fielder, that to to his left side, which is usually harder for most fielders at first slip.
kh pandya to kohli, 1 run, tosses it up on middle, kohli drives fluently to long-off
markande to kohli, 1 run, quicker one on middle, neatly tucked around to deep midwicket
malinga to kohli, 2 runs, slower ball outside off, kohli leans into the drive, caresses it through the covers for two
malinga to de villiers, 1 run, slower one outside off, swatted away to deep squareleg along the ground
malinga to kohli, 1 run, slower ball outside off, gets on his toes and punches it to deep cover
hh pandya to de villiers, no run, slower ball outside off, hammered straight to extra cover
hh pandya to de villiers, six runs, slower ball outside off, de villiers is nearly on the ground as he swats it over deep cover-point, somehow generating insane power to clear the fence
bumrah to de grandhomme, 1 wide, slower ball outside off, swing and a miss and called wide. harsh call, by the look of it
kumar to rahane, no run, wide of the crease, angled in, rahane opens the face and tries to steer it down and nearly chops it on
kumar to rahane, 1 run,
rashid khan to samson, four runs,
sandeep sharma to rahane, 1 run, slower ball on middle, pushed to mid-on
nadeem to rahane, 1 run, slower on middle, rahane shuffles and turns it around towards deep midwicket
nadeem to samson, 1 run, slower on off, samson waits for it and taps it between point and cover-point for one

kaul to samson, six runs, slower ball, he picks it up early and deposits it high and handsome over the deep midwicket fielder, who briefly felt he was in with a chance, timed his jump well but only got fingertips to it as it sailed over
sandeep sharma to samson, 1 run, slower ball at off stump, flicked uppishly to deep square
kulkarni to warner, no run, slower ball on off, bairstow takes off again and has to dive to make his ground at the non-striker's after he was wisely sent back by warner
kulkarni to warner, no run, slower ball and hammered straight to mid-on
gopal to bairstow, 2 runs,
unadkat to shankar, 2 runs, just clears mid-off. cross-seam ball digs into the surface and stops on him as he looks to drive through the line
gopal to pathan, 1 run, what is fear? yusuf with a big stride down the pitch and an almighty drill down to long-off
r ashwin to de kock, no run, pretty straight and slow on off stump, he blocks it back
r ashwin to sharma, no run, flatter and quicker towards off stump, rohit goes back and punches it into the covers

r ashwin to sharma, 1 run, bit of mix-up as rohit pushes the ball to cover point, de kock wants a single and is nearly halfway down the pitch. rohit called early so de kock went back in time but they got an overthrow eventually after a direct hit at the non-striker's end
r ashwin to de kock, four runs, just outside off, de kock drives with hard hands and gets a thick edge just wide of gayle at slip to see it race to the third-man boundary
mohammed shami to de kock, 1 run, nice delivery on the stumps, no room, and he pushes it down to mid-off for a quick single
mohammed shami to sharma, four runs, look at that drive from rohit! gets room to free his arms outside off, and he sends it caressing along the ground with some timing and power for a cracking four
r ashwin to de kock, 1 run, outside off now and steered towards point for one
viljoen to de kock, 1 run, some room outside off with the angle, he runs it down to third man for one
viljoen to sharma, 1 run, nice and accurate towards off stump, rohit waits and opens the face of the bat late to help it to third man
tye to sharma, four runs, a slower ball at 112.7kmh pretty wide outside off, rohit goes after it with a big swing and doesn't quite middle it but gets just enough to beat the fielders chasing it
tye to sharma, 1 run, looked like a slower one again, this one on the stumps and he pushed it down to mid-on
tye to de kock, 1 run, 115kmh, he's not giving much pace, as usual, andrew tye. slightly wide of off stump and driven into the covers
m ashwin to de kock, 1 run,
r ashwin to de kock, no run, more towards middle now, he defends on the leg side
mohammed shami to yuvraj singh, no run, no room, right on target on off stump and yuvaj defends it on off
mohammed shami to yuvraj singh, 1 run, hint of room outside off, he dabs it to third man easily
r ashwin to pollard, no run, flat carrom ball on middle and off, stays in the crease and stabs it back to ashwin, getting opened up slightly in the process

tye to pollard, out, got him! knuckle ball, long boundaries, and pollard's attempted big hit skews high in the air off the outside half of the bat, and mayank agarwal settles nicely under it right on the edge of the long-off boundary. would have been a mishit six in a lot of other grounds in the ipl

tye to hh pandya, 1 wide, slower ball wide of off stump - he bowled wider because of pandya's premeditated shuffle across his stumps. ends up just outside the tramline, and it's called wide, though he's arguing that the batsman had moved across in advance

malinga to gayle, 1 run, bit of mix-up halfway through the pitch as gayle dabs the slower ball towards backward point and yuvraj fumbles there to make the batsmen go back and forth. no damage in the end
malinga to rahul, no run, swinging away from just outside off, rahul goes back and defends towards cover point
malinga to gayle, no run, futile yet loud appeal for lbw from malinga as this quick delivery beats gayle but he was struck outside the leg stump after he missed the flick. it also pitched outside leg
mcclenaghan to rahul, 1 run, 114kmh, slower one keeps low on the leg stump, rahul goes back and helps it to deep square leg
bumrah to rahul, no run, angling in a bit further towards middle and leg, he helps it to square leg
bumrah to rahul, no run, slower one at 118kmh, outside off and nipping in, rahul gets an inside edge behind square on leg
bumrah to rahul, no run, no room whatsoever still, angling in from wide of the crease and rahul defends again
bumrah to rahul, no run, drives again, reaching away from the body, and he finds point this time
malinga to gayle, no run, just outside off and he punches it into the covers
bumrah to gayle, 1 run, targets the top of middle stump now from wide of the crease, gayle pushes it down to mid-off and takes a quick one
hh pandya to gayle, 1 wide, slower one well outside off, it rolls away for a wide
hh pandya to gayle, no run, another slower one well outside off with the angle, gayle lets it go and looks at the umpire but it's not called a wide
markande to rahul, 1 run, legbreak outside off, driven with the spin into the covers
markande to agarwal, no run, quicker one on off, goes straightish and he pushes it towards cover
markande to rahul, 1 run, no turn again, angling in towards leg stump and helped to leg for one more
rabada to lynn, 2 runs,
lamichhane to naik, no run,
morris to lynn, four runs, slower ball outside off, throws his hands at it and manages to clear mid-off
patel to lynn, no run, slower ball on off, holds in the surface, lynn pushes at it with hard hands but the aerial drive just eludes the bowler to his left in his follow through
patel to lynn, 1 run, slower ball on off, walks across and chips it towards mid-on with no timing, which allows a single
patel to karthik, 1 run, slower ball outside off, opens the face and steers it down to third-man
mishra to karthik, no run,
patel to russell, no run, big, wild swing for the wide delivery outside off. he misses it completely
patel to karthik, 1 run, tucks that one behind square easily for one
morris to karthik, 1 run, some width outside off, karthik runs it down to third man
patel to russell, 1 wide, it has thrown the line off a long way. slower delivery goes waayy outside off for a wide. russell been considered chasing and smashing it

patel to russell, six runs, and another one, in the same place! in the same slot where the fifth ball was pitched, there comes the big back-lift, the big swing and there vanishes the ball on the leg side. this six looked even bigger
rabada to russell, 1 run, accurate line on the off stump, not much room and he pushes it to leg for one
rabada to karthik, 1 run, bit of width outside off and he drives it nicely into the covers for one
mishra to karthik, 1 wide, pitches well outside off, tuns away further for a wide
prasidh krishna to dhawan, no run, slower ball outside off, pushed to mid-off
prasidh krishna to shaw, 1 run, slower ball, follows shaw, who was backing away, but helps it along to deep squareleg with the angle
russell to shaw, 1 run, slower ball, shaw pushes at it with hard hands and gets a thick inside edge to the keeper's left
ferguson to shaw, 1 run, slower ball, picks it and swings but only gets an inside edge towards the keeper
rana to pant, no run, stays low as it turns away a bit from outside off. pant defends it back with a hint of surprise
prasidh krishna to shaw, no run, some room on the off side, shaw drives hard and finds cover
prasidh krishna to pant, four runs, slow for pant too, it's outside leg, and pant swats it to his favourite area - behind square on the leg side to beat long leg. impressive wrist work there
prasidh krishna to pant, no run, makes room this time and krishna responds with a wide delivery outside off, pant almost loses his balance while smashing it to mid-off
chawla to pant, no run, flatter delivery going wide of off stump, pant goes for the reverse hit and misses it completely, it's wide of the wide crease but not given because he changed his stance
chawla to pant, no run, lbw appeal this time as he moves across to swat it, but it was probably going over
chawla to shaw, 2 runs, flicked away to the leg side now, it's against the turn and in the gap to let them come back for the second
kuldeep yadav to pant, 1 run, he moves down and towards leg, the ball turns towards middle and off, he adjusts and defends for a single
ferguson to shaw, 1 wide, strays well down the leg side, it's a wide well taken by karthik
ferguson to vihari, 1 run, waits for the ball to come to him from outside off and steers it late to third man
kuldeep yadav to ingram, no run, this one turns away from ingram and beats the outside edge. he brings his back leg back just in time
yadav to warner, 1 run, leading edge safely past extra cover! warner closes the face too early on this flick as the ball rises across him in the corridor
chahal to bairstow, 1 run, flat and fast towards off stump, and he pushes this towards extra cover
ray barman to warner, four runs, down the leg side, and it allows warner to get down on one knee and swing this towards long leg
rashid khan to ray barman, 1 run, goes back and punches a leg-break down to long off
rashid khan to ray barman, 1 run, wrong 'un again, and he goes back and plays this towards fine leg
rashid khan to ray barman, no run, goes back and punches this towards point
rashid khan to de grandhomme, 1 run, turns into him, and he goes back and punches this towards midwicket
rashid khan to de grandhomme, four runs, plays it late with the turn, and plays it past point. good shot!
sandeep sharma to yadav, no run, slower ball, that angles across him to the off side, and he pushes it towards cover
sandeep sharma to yadav, six runs, slower ball, and he has got a good hold of this. was in no great shape, but gave it a right ol' humpty! sails over midwicket
shankar to yadav, 1 wide, will have to rebowl this. down the leg side, and called wide

shankar to mohammed siraj, 1 no ball, out, one of the two players is run out! it was played towards covers, and the fielder fired a quick return back to the bowler. he whips the bails off, and cdg's bat is in the air! he also got rid of siraj at the other end, but sadly only one of those will count. sums up rcb's evening, though. nothing has gone right from the first ball itself this afternoon
sandeep sharma to chahal, out, slower ball, and he has launched this into the air, and deepak hooda gets under this one. that's that!
kulkarni to watson, 2 runs, slower ball on off, the best timed shot so far, just a gentle push and the ball races through the covers, only two though
kulkarni to raina, no run, slower one outside off, held in the pitch, gripped quite a bit, raina slashed at it but missed
kulkarni to raina, 1 run,

kulkarni to jadhav, out, edged and gone! csk continue to play shots and continue to lose wickets. he was hanging back, dhawal pitched this one right up, got it to move away in the air a little, jadhav threw his bat it from the crease and only managed a nick to buttler
unadkat to bravo, 2 runs, slower ball on off, and bravo's too early into his flick. mistimed to the vacant midwicket region, and it's that mistime which allows the batsmen to pinch the second run
archer to bravo, 1 run, muscled to deep point this time
chahar to smith, 1 run,

morris to khan, no run, ouch! sarfaraz tries to duck under a ball, but the ball doesn't rise enough. hits him near the chest as he tries to get out of the ball's way. no love lost though, morris just picks the ball up nonchalantly
curran to vihari, 1 run, slower ball in the corridor, defended to point's right
gopal to de villiers, 2 runs, another wrong'un to greet him, goes deep in his crease to work it away through backward square leg

bravo to kh pandya, no run, dropped by mohit at mid-off that was as easy a catch as you can get, he drove it off the toe end straight to the fielder. he tried to grab at it too early perhaps, in and out of his hands. bravo is not happy
bravo to kh pandya, 1 run, slashed off a thick outside edge, once bounce to third man, who almost fumbles it but recovers in time
thakur to yadav, 1 run, drilled back straight but shardul has time to get down and parry it with his right hand and keep the batsmen down to just a single
thakur to yadav, 1 run, driven between cover and point with an open bat face
imran tahir to kh pandya, 2 runs, strays on leg stump and is swept to fine leg for a couple
imran tahir to kh pandya, 1 run, driven to long-off

imran tahir to kh pandya, 1 run, direct hit run out missed? swiped to raina again, and they take the quick single. he had time to line up the stumps and let loose, but misses and i think krunal would have been out despite a dive. oh and replays show he would have just made it.
bravo to yadav, 1 run, slower ball on fifth stump, he has a swipe at it, sends it along the ground to deep midwicket

sharma to kh pandya, out, he's holed out to long off krunal's luck has finally run out. went for another big heave over the off side but got a leading edge that flew high in the air. jadeja was settling under it and even though the ball was swirling and he had to lunge at the end, he was never letting it go

thakur to pollard, no run, gets the line right that time, just inside the tram line. pollard stays rooted to his crease and tries to slam it through the offside, but is forced to reach for it and doesn't connect.
thakur to pollard, 1 wide, that's a wide again, too far down legside
bravo to hh pandya, 1 wide, strays very far down leg, perhaps he was expecting the batsman to give himself room. ends up as a wide
behrendorff to raina, no run, another rising delivery, angling into middle stump now. jumps to ride the bounce and keeps it down into the leg side
chahar to jadhav, 1 wide, goes for the wide legbreak outside off. jadhav throws his bat at the drive but can't connect. de kock fumbles behind the stumps
kh pandya to jadhav, 1 leg bye,
kh pandya to dhoni, 1 wide, strays down leg and that'll be a wide
kh pandya to dhoni, 2 runs, flatter on leg stump, dhoni pushes it with soft hands into the vacant midwicket region and they pinch two

bumrah to dhoni, no run, a bit wider outside off, dhoni wanted to swat it hard, but gets an under-edge that bounces to the bowler's right. his bat needs some maintenance after that, uses jadhav's bat to hammer out a few stray pieces
bumrah to jadhav, 1 run, slower ball, on the stumps, jadhav was coming down the track, forced to adjust and steer it to third man
kh pandya to jadhav, 1 wide, oh he completely lost control of that, bowled it way outside off. he'll have to bowl that again
malinga to jadhav, 1 run, down legside again, and jadhav tickles it very fine, but bumrah is very fine too, and he fields
malinga to jadhav, 1 run, making room to drive though off, but gets a thick outside edge that goes fine. third man is fine too though, so no boundary

bumrah to jadhav, 1 leg bye, moving across the stumps, bumrah bowls a quick one that nips in a touch flicks his pad and goes past the keeper. but they've been keeping the third man and fine leg very fine for jadhav, so third man is able to run across and field it

malinga to jadhav, out, and that might be that for csk's faint hopes. slower ball on the fourth stump, jadhav wanted to send it to downtown mumbai, stepping away and swinging mightily, but he can only feather a snick through to the keeper
bumrah to chahar, 1 run, stays still that time and waits for the ball, pushing it to cover for a single
sandeep sharma to tewatia, no run, on the body as he takes the pace off this. grips in the surface just outside off as he looks to flick and it's deflected to the keeper. looked to come off the glove
sandeep sharma to morris, no run, oh lovely ball! gets the knuckle ball to grip, rise, and more slightly away from off stump as morris walks down the pitch and looks to flick. past off stump

rabada to mohammad nabi, six runs, over the third man boundary and that's the game! bounce in the corridor, backs away once more and swishes at it. this time he's managed to get bat on it and that seals the game
kuldeep yadav to kohli, 1 run, a wrong'un, stays back again and flicks it behind square leg
rana to patel, no run,
kuldeep yadav to de villiers, no run, turns back into him, and he drives it back towards the bowler
kuldeep yadav to de villiers, 2 runs, wider, flatter, and he drives this towards extra cover. the man at the fence has some ground to cover, and they can come back for the second
narine to kohli, 1 run, turns into him, and he goes back and turns it away towards long leg
rana to kohli, 1 run, outside off, and he whips this with his wrists towards extra cover
rana to de villiers, 1 wide, looks for a flatter ball down the leg side, but misses his mark. will be called a wide
prasidh krishna to kohli, 2 runs, slower ball, and he whips this towards midwicket and sets off immediately. superb running between the wickets
prasidh krishna to kohli, 1 run, slower ball again, and he plays it towards the middle stump, off his leg
kuldeep yadav to stoinis, no run, angles across him, and he reads it late. goes back to defend
kuldeep yadav to stoinis, four runs, wrong 'un, and stoinis plays the wrong line, but it goes off the outside edge and runs down to third man
kuldeep yadav to stoinis, 1 run, advances down the track and plays a wrong 'un towards cover
narine to de villiers, 1 wide, fired wide outside off, and he leaves this. called a wide as well
prasidh krishna to stoinis, four runs, moves away to the off side and scoops this down towards fine leg. terrific finish to the innings!

chahal to lynn, six runs, that's out of the stadium, literally! down the track and it was once again a wrong'un, lynn makes the perfect connection this time and you could tell by the sound it made off the bat that it was going a long way
saini to rana, 1 run, angles across him, and he plays it down towards third man
negi to rana, four runs, wide, outside off, and he forces this square, and keeps it way to the right of extra cover
negi to rana, no run, tossed outside off, and he looks to go big, and it eludes his outside edge. not far from the tramlines, but the umpire gives him some leeway
negi to rana, 2 runs, thrown wide, and he scoops this high and wide towards backward point. siraj tracks back and somehow keeps it back in. they pick up two

chahal to rana, 2 runs, bowled wide of the crease, and he looks to go for a reverse swipe. gets it much more square than he wants, and can only loft it towards backward point. they get two for this attempt

chahal to rana, 2 runs, dropped again! a difficult chance, though, as rana went for a swipe at another one fired wide, and siraj at point got to it on the stretch, but couldn't hold on as he hit the ground
chahal to rana, out, advances and looks to go over the top to another widish ball, and the slice goes towards backward point, and klaasen the substitute takes this one
tye to du plessis, no run, another slower ball variety, du plessis mistimes his drive back to the bowler
r ashwin to raina, 1 wide, speared very wide outside off, he'll need to bowl that again
r ashwin to raina, 1 run, flatter on the stumps, pushes it down the wicket
m ashwin to du plessis, 1 wide, flatter and wider outside off, spins away sharply and perhaps too much, du plessis was looking to come down but then stays back and leaves it alone
chahar to gayle, 1 run, well bowled, tight on middle and off, shapes back at gayle who pushes into midwicket
harbhajan singh to gayle, no run, drives at this one on off stump, squirts off a thickish outside edge to backward point
harbhajan singh to gayle, no run, well bowled! this spins from outside off, bounces too as it climbs past the edge
harbhajan singh to khan, 1 run, nudged into midwicket
harbhajan singh to rahul, 2 runs, flatter, straighter, flicked nicely wide of deep midwicket
jadeja to khan, no run, round the wicket, skims past the top edge as he looks to play square. some extra bounce
jadeja to rahul, 1 run, goes back in the crease and tucks a straight delivery into midwicket
jadeja to rahul, 1 run, uses his feet and then drives along the ground to long-off
imran tahir to khan, no run, another huge appeal! think for caught behind. was a nice leg-break which spun and beat the edge. dhoni also went for the stumping
jadeja to khan, no run, flatter and quicker outside off, left alone
imran tahir to khan, 1 run, slider on middle and leg, tucked away towards midwicket for one

kumar to sharma, 1 run, hes's come down the wicket and scooped this straight up. goes towards third man, and siddarth kaul drops it! just didn't get his body underneath a skier, and eventually had to sprawl away to his left, making a hash of that early chance. don't think he got his fingers to that, actually...
sandeep sharma to sharma, 1 run, slower ball, and he comes down the wicket and chips it towards mid on. nabi has a shy at the stumps at the non-striker's end, and rohit has to put in a dive to get in
sandeep sharma to yadav, no run, slower ball, outside the off stump, and he leaves one hand off the handle as he looks to drive. goes uppishly, but on the bounce towards cover
mohammad nabi to de kock, no run, tosses this up on off stump, and he drives this back to the bowler
mohammad nabi to kh pandya, no run, tosses this up, and he plays this towards cover
behrendorff to warner, 2 runs, comes down the track to the first ball, and slashes it away over point. behrendorff puts it a bit wide, and that allows him to go for it
chahar to warner, 1 wide, fires this flat and down the leg side. called wide as he misses his mark

chahar to pandey, 1 run, dropped! this time it is pollard, of all people. chahar tosses this up, pandey takes the bait and has a swipe at it, it flies towards mid off, where pollard spills a regulation chance
chahar to shankar, no run, beats the outside edge with a leg break, and de kock whips the bails off
kh pandya to pandey, no run, plays a push towards extra cover, and has to retreat as the fielder stops this
chahar to hooda, 1 run, driven to long off
morris to patel, 1 wide, strays down leg and that will be a wide
morris to patel, out, taken at third man this was bowled wide of off stump and parthiv had a slash at it, gets it off the toe end where it loops high in the air and settles into third man's hands.
sharma to de villiers, no run, stands in his crease to square drive it, but again no timing. bounces to cover

sharma to kohli, 1 leg bye, a bit late on that, and the leading edge rolls towards point. kohli was looking to go across and clip it into the legside again, but this was at 138 kph, and he brought his bat down a touch late
rabada to de villiers, 1 wide, slower ball goes off radar, down leg and he'll have to bowl that one again
patel to stoinis, no run, gets this outside off and he stands to drive, but straight to cover
patel to stoinis, no run, arm ball, came in with the angle and he doesn't pick it. inside edge onto pad
patel to kohli, 1 run, given some air outside off, kohli drives with a flourish but doesn't quite get the timing. ball goes to deep extra cover
patel to kohli, 1 run, given some air again and kohli takes a confident stride out to drive to long-off's left
southee to shaw, 1 run, straighter that time and pushed to mid-on for a single

southee to dhawan, out, caught at point dhawan goes first ball, with a smart take by saini. invited the drive, cross-seam ball wide of off stump and dhawan slices it. saini takes a few steps back and holds it over his head
southee to iyer, 1 wide, some shape into the right-hander now but strays down leg and it's a wide
southee to iyer, 1 wide, down leg again and he'll have to bowl that one again too
chahal to iyer, no run, given some air on off, pushed back to the bowler off the end of the bat
chahal to iyer, no run, given some air and he blocks it back
chahal to iyer, no run, a bit quicker, and he's caught on the crease, ends up jabbing it back. great comeback by chahal after a six off the first ball
negi to shaw, 1 leg bye, some bounce, drifting on leg and turns a bit, he goes back in his crease to push this around the corner
negi to shaw, 1 run, nice loop on the ball, he stays in his crease and punches to deep cover
negi to iyer, 1 run, flatter on leg stump and negi had a chance to run out iyer. it was pushed towards mid-on, negi ran across to field and fired in a throw. would have been mighty close
negi to ingram, no run, ooh arm ball past the outside edge. went with the angle from around the wicket, and defeated ingram's push
negi to iyer, no run, pushed back to the bowler
ali to ingram, no run, flat and on the stumps, blocked to cover
chahal to ingram, 2 runs, faster one, skidder on leg stump, and flicked fine to fine leg
saini to iyer, 1 run, on his toes, and flicked behind square to deep backward for a single
chawla to buttler, no run, another wrong'un, this one around off, buttler goes back and punches it on the off side, cannot beat the cover fielder
chawla to buttler, no run, flatter around middle this time, buttler goes back and defends
kuldeep yadav to smith, four runs, swept and swept hard, rolling his wrists over to find the deep square leg boundary
kuldeep yadav to buttler, four runs, reverse slap past backward point. good option on a slow pitch. kuldeep pushes one through quick and he quickly gets in position to get this away
gurney to stokes, no run, slower ball at off stump, leans in and pushes to midwicket
gopal to lynn, no run, flatter again, this time at the batsman who stays back and punches it back
stokes to shubman gill, 1 wide, well he won't hit the winnings runs. much like they have all innings, royals hand it on a platter. a slower ball down leg side

rajpoot to warner, 1 wide, slants one across, warner leaves. it looked like it was well within the tram line - oh yes, it was - but umpire erasmus deems it too wide and extends his arms. poor call to begin
rajpoot to bairstow, no run, movement away off the deck, from that in that in-between corridor. good leave
mujeeb ur rahman to bairstow, 1 wide, slips one down leg, he looks to tickle fine but misses
mujeeb ur rahman to shankar, no run, plays away from the body, nearly rolled back off an inside edge
rajpoot to shankar, 1 run, steered wide of backward point
rajpoot to warner, no run, punches straight to point
rajpoot to warner, no run, square driven but can't pierce the packed off side ring again
rajpoot to warner, 2 runs, gentle bunt into the leg side, rajpoot sprints to try and stop the second but he fumbles while turning around and they steal an extra run
rajpoot to shankar, 1 run, bends his back again to bowl a lifter outside off, vijay gets on top of the bounce and dabs behind point for a quick single
mohammed shami to shankar, no run, hits him high on the bat as vijay punches this into the covers. feet glued to the crease again
mohammed shami to shankar, 1 run, sweetly timed but can't get it past mid-off
mohammed shami to shankar, no run, again no timing, gets it off the toe-end to mid-off
mohammed shami to shankar, no run, angles one in close to the stumps, vijay defends towards miller, who swoops in from point
ashwin to warner, 1 run, drifts one back in from round the stumps, warner tucks it wide of midwicket
ashwin to shankar, 1 run, flatter one on leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket
ashwin to warner, no run, goes right back inside the crease and defends
ashwin to warner, no run, drift, dip and turn, warner eases with the spin to cover
ashwin to warner, no run, bowls the low-arm slingy, jadhav style, warner thumps it but can't beat cover
mujeeb ur rahman to shankar, no run, punches back to the bowler
mujeeb ur rahman to warner, 2 runs, width and he flays this through point, down to the boundary rider
ashwin to shankar, 1 run, driven nicely down to long-off
curran to shankar, 1 run, flicks this down to deep midwicket
rajpoot to warner, 1 run, slower one on the leg stump, warner gives himself some room and looks to drill towards long-off, doesn't get the timing right
kumar to gayle, no run, this is a jaffa! squares gayle up with one that nips away. he had no clue
sandeep sharma to gayle, no run, slants one across, left alone
sandeep sharma to gayle, four runs, clobbers this! looked to hit this straighter, gets it off the inner part, still clears mid-on
sandeep sharma to gayle, 1 run, driven superbly, but this is an excellent stop at the edge of the ring at cover. sid kaul, i think. saved three runs
rashid khan to agarwal, no run, skids one back in from wide of the crease, defended.
rashid khan to rahul, 1 run, pushes outside the line to get a thick inside edge towards square leg
rashid khan to agarwal, no run, goes back and across to defend
kumar to rahul, four runs, sliced over backward point, third man with a patchy effort. sid kaul put in the slide but ended up pushing the ball further away. may have slipped because of dew.
kumar to rahul, 1 run, tucks this into the leg side for a quick single
kumar to agarwal, 1 run, plays outside the line again, gets a thickish inside edge past square leg
kumar to rahul, no run, right behind the line as he tucks this off the backfoot
mohammad nabi to agarwal, no run, makes room and punches to cover, super stop by warner moving swiftly to his left
sandeep sharma to agarwal, no run, defended towards point.
mohammad nabi to agarwal, 1 run, nudged into the leg side, towards square leg, for a quick single
kaul to agarwal, 1 run, dabbed down to square third man
kaul to rahul, no run, dabs to point, calls no immediately
kaul to rahul, 1 run, quick single to mid-off. there's a direct hit but rahul doesn't seem too perturbed. he had to run around sid kaul, but he's well in.
rashid khan to agarwal, 1 run, slider on middle and leg, tucked behind square
rashid khan to rahul, 2 runs, turns this wide of the bowler, there's no mid-on so rashid has to hare across. excellent running from rahul and mayank
rashid khan to agarwal, 1 run, a top-spinner around off, goes back and punches it towards long-off
santner to narine, no run, round the wicket, fired across outside off, he swings and misses, rebounds off dhoni's gloves
santner to narine, 3 wides, poor ball, pushed well down the leg side, ms can't gather it and it scoots away towards fine leg
santner to narine, 1 run, almost gets it through the off side, but mid-off gets across and intercepts this drive
jadeja to lynn, no run, round the wicket, angled in at leg stump, pushed back to the bowler
jadeja to rana, four runs, width outside off, rana takes advantage and drives it through a gap at cover...able to free his arms
jadeja to rana, 1 run, gets well across the crease and tucks this from outside off into midwicket
jadeja to rana, no run, drives into the off side and can't find a gap...three dots in a row
imran tahir to rana, 2 runs, superb running! gentle nudge into the leg side, deep midwicket had to come in a long way by which time rana had made it
imran tahir to lynn, no run, defended back to the bowler
chahar to lynn, 1 run, shaped to flat-bat this over the bowler's head, but ended up bunting it into the off side
chahar to lynn, 1 run, punches this into the covers for an easy single
chahar to karthik, 1 run, chops this down to third man
santner to karthik, 1 run, gentle bunt into the covers
santner to lynn, 1 run, steps out to loft but yorked himself as santner fired it in, squeezed wide of midwicket
imran tahir to lynn, 1 wide, spins away from way outside off, lynn looks to reach out but leaves. wide called

imran tahir to lynn, out, he's hit this to deep square, where shardul thakur takes an excellent catch moving to his right. lynn went across a touch and then swung acoss the line, didn't quite middle it as well as he would've liked.

imran tahir to russell, four runs, belts the first ball to the deep midwicket boundary. no timing even though he went really hard, looked like it came off a thickish inside edge. no holding back. this is dreruss time, buckle up
imran tahir to russell, no run, defended back, tahir sprints to his left to stop
santner to shubman gill, 1 run, driven down to long-off
santner to karthik, 1 run, swept all along the ground to deep backward square leg
santner to karthik, 1 run, nurdled round the corner towards fine leg
imran tahir to shubman gill, no run, dabbed into the off side for a quick single
imran tahir to karthik, 1 run, driven firmly to deep cover
imran tahir to shubman gill, 1 run, leading edge down to long-off
chahar to shubman gill, no run, slower ball, wide ball or is it? no, not given as umpire nandan reckons this was within the wide line. touch-and-go call
chahar to shubman gill, 1 run, flicks uppishly, on the bounce to deep square leg
chahar to chawla, 1 run, uses the pace to help this down to third man
chahar to shubman gill, 1 run, ugly hoick across the line, no timing, off a thick inside edge to deep midwicket
thakur to chawla, 1 run, tucks this gently towards square leg to bring shubam gill back on strike
thakur to shubman gill, no run, slapped back! shardul put his right hand out on the followthrough but can't grab it. ufff, that should hurt. don't even think of calling it a missed chance
thakur to shubman gill, no run, drilled on the bounce to mid-off
chawla to watson, no run, slower on middle, he tries to flick it to the on side, turns the face of the bat too early and the leading edge nearly carries back to the bowler
chawla to watson, no run,
prasidh krishna to du plessis, no run, lift from the wicket there and beats the bat again! banged into the surface, quick delivery, du plessis surprised by thye extra bounce, nearly gloves it behind

prasidh krishna to raina, no run, another one banged into the surface, around the hip this time, doesn't rise much either as raina tries to turn it around towards fine-leg but doesn't make any contact with the bat
narine to raina, no run,
narine to raina, 1 wide,
prasidh krishna to rayudu, no run, lift from the surface again and just eludes rayudu's gloves as he pokes at it tentatively

chawla to du plessis, no run, turns square and beats the edge! that's vicious turn from middle stump as he tries to turn it to the leg side and actually gets a feather on it but the keeper can't collect it cleanly
gurney to du plessis, 1 run, slower ball, angled away, pushed to deep cover
gurney to du plessis, 1 run, slower ball at middle stump, looks to lift it over the off side, gets it off the inside half to deep square
narine to du plessis, 5 wides, and this one is definitely turning past leg, also both of dk's legs. pitches outside leg, turns a long way down and trickles towards the csk dugout
joseph to rahul, 1 wide, oerpitched and down leg side, can't connect on the flick

chahar to gayle, six runs, pumped over long-off! he had only one run off eight balls against chahar, but this is the first one that lands in his driving arc and he capitalises. clean swing and it's gone a long way
kh pandya to rahul, no run, pushed through fast outside off, swipes and misses
chahar to miller, no run, quicker one on middle, miller plays back again and gets his bat down on it just in the nick of time
bumrah to rahul, 2 wides, slower ball outside off and it's too wide for even the keeper to collect it cleanly. died on de kock a little, as well
hh pandya to rahul, four runs, slower ball outside off, rahul has to reach for it as it is wider, toe-ends it a little but manages to clear extra cover for another boundary
viljoen to pollard, no run, has he edged that?
ashwin to ishan kishan, no run, quicker one on middle, pushed back to the bowler
curran to ishan kishan, 1 run,

mohammed shami to kh pandya, out, slower ball on off, krunal doesn't pick it, is through the drive early and chips a catch to extra cover. what a match shami is having. struck with the new ball and is now breaking the back of this chase
curran to pollard, 1 run,
chahar to buttler, no run, lbw appeal but buttler is well down the track to try and flick this from middle stump. hits him on the thigh too
thakur to samson, no run,
santner to samson, no run, nice pace on this. slow, dipping, gripping and then turning from leg. samson pokes with hard hands and gets it to cover off the thick outside edge
jadeja to smith, no run, fired in from slightly wider on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler's left
imran tahir to stokes, 1 run, given some air outside off, bunted to long-off

imran tahir to parag, four runs, what a strange ssequence stopped on him a bit, he was very late on that, ends up flat batting it straight back. popped in the air and over tahir's head, didn't look it was timed well enough to have legs on it, but ends up beating a diving effort by long-off
imran tahir to parag, 1 run, given some air on the stumps, pushed to mid-on's left
thakur to stokes, no run, angling into him from around the stumps, and gets it to straighten just a touch, takes a thick outside edge to point off stokes' attempted push
jadeja to archer, 1 run, goes back and turns this to midwicket for a single
chahar to archer, 1 run, some swing away from the right hander, but well wide of off, and archer frees his arms to drive it hard, but straight to long off

kulkarni to watson, out, got him! dream ball from kulkarni! outswinger - not a big one, just enough to beat the bat as watson looks to flick this from a middle and leg line. climbs up and tonks middle. watson completely out of shape
kulkarni to rayudu, no run,
parag to rayudu, 2 runs, in the air and safely wide of extra cover. that looked like it was bowled with the wrist, although gripped with two fingers. sort of like mujeeb. long-off cleans up
archer to rayudu, no run,
gopal to dhoni, 1 run, goes wide of off stump that time, making dhoni stretch for it. he taps it towards point
stokes to rayudu, 1 wide, slower ball goes too far down leg and he'll have to re-bowl that
stokes to dhoni, 1 wide, trying for pace at 144 kph but no use if you go so far down leg. wide
stokes to jadeja, (no ball) 1 run, no ball and jadeja has leathered this through extra cover. there's a fielder, but it's a free hit coming up!
stokes to dhoni, out, yorked him stokes nails the perfect ball at the right time. tails in between bat and leg to shatter the stumps. dhoni was looking to give himself room

stokes to santner, 2 runs, another no-ball for height this time slower ball goes wrong ends up above waist height and santner is able to shovel-flick it away. okay scratch that, they have revoked that no-ball. and unprecedented - dhoni is walking on the field to argue with the umpires he's arguing with them, stokes is in the thick of it. scenes! scenes! dhoni will earn himself a sanction. and csk are going to be docked 'fairplay' points. the umpire had stuck his hand out, but the square leg umpire said that was not a no-ball
stokes to santner, 1 wide, and now that's been called a wide! stokes went for the one wide outside off, and it is moving away a bit ends up outside the tram line!
sharma to uthappa, no run, slower ball, on off stump, and he drives it back towards the bowler, who fields it. delivered at just 122kph

rabada to uthappa, four runs, slightly wider, and he throws his bat at this, and slices it over point. it gets height, and just about enough distance to carry for four. made some room by backing away towards the legside. smart shot
patel to uthappa, no run, flat, towards the leg stump, and he defends this
patel to shubman gill, 1 run, angles into him from wide of the crease, and he drives this towards long off
paul to shubman gill, 1 run, slower ball, wide of off stump, and he slaps this towards deep cover point
patel to russell, 1 run,
rabada to russell, no run,
rabada to russell, 2 runs,
morris to chawla, 1 run, slower ball outside off, sliced away with his head falling away, but manages to clear point and retain strike with a single
chawla to pant, 1 run, angles it across him, and he goes back and punches this towards extra cover
brathwaite to dhawan, four runs, slower ball, outside off, and he has picked this one. forces it through covers, and brings up fifty

kuldeep yadav to pant, six runs, down the wicket comes pant, kuldeep pushes it wider, deceives him in the air a little but pant reaches it with one hand, which makes no difference as he clears long-off with ease
kuldeep yadav to dhawan, no run, pushed through quicker and flatter on middle, dhawan makes room and drives straight to cover
rana to ingram, 2 runs, quicker one on middle, ingram comes down the track and drills it to long-off and they take the fielder on, completing the two with ease in the end
gowtham to de kock, no run, drifting into off, he tries to drive but mis-times it to cover
kulkarni to de kock, no run, a drive to mid off but can't beat the man
gowtham to de kock, 2 runs, drifting into leg, he whips this nicely wide of mid on and deep midwicket has to come around to field
gowtham to de kock, 1 run, drifting into off, he defends with soft hands towards cover and pinches one
archer to de kock, no run, slower ball outside off, he mistimes a drive back to the bowler
gopal to sharma, no run, leg break on off, he defends back to the bowler

gopal to sharma, 1 run, a tight single! it was defended towards cover, rahane raced in and underarmed it too high, de kock was struggling as he dived but the throw was high and samson had too much to do
gopal to sharma, 1 run, skips down the track and turns the wrists to work a single to midwicket
gowtham to sharma, four runs, flatter outside off, he smacks this flat back over the bowler's head! lovely strike. he got width and freed the arms to slap it at the sightscreen!
gowtham to sharma, four runs, square driven past point! superb shot. it was drifting across with no turn, he waited and sliced a square drive past backward point and it races away
archer to yadav, 1 run, on the hips, picked away to long leg for one
unadkat to de kock, 1 run, back-of-the-hand slower ball outside off, scythed away behind point by de kock

gopal to yadav, six runs, slower through the air on off, not much turn either way. suryakumar sizes it up and launches it straight over gopal's head. boom, such a clean strike and the wankhede roars in approval

kulkarni to yadav, out, that's a bail-trimmer. kulkarni marks his return with a wicket. suryakumar backs away and manufactures swinging room to blitz the ball through the covers. but, dhawal hits the top of off and the off bail gets tipped off
gopal to pollard, no run, tossed on off, defended back
archer to de kock, four runs, de kock jumps outside leg, makes swinging room, archer pushes a slower ball outside off. de kock reaches out and dispatches it through the covers
unadkat to hh pandya, 1 wide, off-side wide. unadkat is rattled and has lost his line
chahar to buttler, 1 run, 92kph, slider outside off, he drives down to long off
kh pandya to buttler, 1 run, drifting into off, he whips this to deep midwicket
kh pandya to samson, 1 wide, drifting down leg and called wide
chahar to samson, 1 run, 87kph, leg break, he's back and getting a leading edge that flies through the vacant cover-point
kh pandya to buttler, 1 run, drifting in, he tries to get again, gets a thick inside edge that runs to deep square leg
behrendorff to samson, 1 wide, slower ball angled down leg and called wide
behrendorff to buttler, four runs, tickled fine for four! too straight, angled down leg, buttler waited and glanced it fine! fine leg was still wide despite the change of angle
bumrah to buttler, no run, bumrah gets one to straighten away against the exaggerated angle and beats the outside edge
chahar to samson, no run, slower legbreak, turns away outside off, samson edges it onto the boot of ishan kishan
chahar to samson, 1 run, looped up and turns away outside off, samson slices it off an outside edge. rohit runs back from cover and drops a skier

chahar to buttler, out, buttler goes for his seventh successive boundary, this time he holes out to long-off. tossed outside off and spins away further, buttler lines up for the loft over long-off. he can only slice it away to suryakumar in the outfield. blistering innings, nonetheless. and he make it look as easy as eating a sandwich
chahar to samson, 1 run, pitches on middle and leg and breaks away, prodded towards the covers for one
hh pandya to samson, 1 run,
kh pandya to smith, no run, darted on off, dug out to cover
kh pandya to smith, 1 run, slower and spinning away outside off, chipped down to long-off
ali to khan, no run, flatter, outside off, and he drives it back to the bowler
mohammed siraj to gayle, no run, slower ball, on off stump, and he runs it towards point
saini to gayle, 1 wide, tries a slower ball, across the batsman, and it's called a wide. seemed to stay within the tramlines, but called against him
r ashwin to kohli, 1 wide, ashwin starts with a flat ball down the leg side, goes for a wide

mohammed shami to de villiers, 1 run, swift ball, jags into him and he tries to get the whip through midwicket going. it hurries on to him, and he inside-edges this one into his body. they switch ends with some good running
r ashwin to de villiers, 1 run, carrom ball, that he pushes through to extra cover
r ashwin to stoinis, no run, carrom ball, from wide of the crease, and stoinis has to defend this
santner to narine, no run, round the wicket, fired across outside off, he swings and misses, rebounds off dhoni's gloves
santner to narine, 3 wides, poor ball, pushed well down the leg side, ms can't gather it and it scoots away towards fine leg
santner to narine, 1 run, almost gets it through the off side, but mid-off gets across and intercepts this drive
jadeja to lynn, no run, round the wicket, angled in at leg stump, pushed back to the bowler
jadeja to rana, four runs, width outside off, rana takes advantage and drives it through a gap at cover...able to free his arms
jadeja to rana, 1 run, gets well across the crease and tucks this from outside off into midwicket
jadeja to rana, no run, drives into the off side and can't find a gap...three dots in a row
imran tahir to rana, 2 runs, superb running! gentle nudge into the leg side, deep midwicket had to come in a long way by which time rana had made it
imran tahir to lynn, no run, defended back to the bowler
chahar to lynn, 1 run, shaped to flat-bat this over the bowler's head, but ended up bunting it into the off side
chahar to lynn, 1 run, punches this into the covers for an easy single
chahar to karthik, 1 run, chops this down to third man
santner to karthik, 1 run, gentle bunt into the covers
santner to lynn, 1 run, steps out to loft but yorked himself as santner fired it in, squeezed wide of midwicket
imran tahir to lynn, 1 wide, spins away from way outside off, lynn looks to reach out but leaves. wide called

imran tahir to lynn, out, he's hit this to deep square, where shardul thakur takes an excellent catch moving to his right. lynn went across a touch and then swung acoss the line, didn't quite middle it as well as he would've liked.

imran tahir to russell, four runs, belts the first ball to the deep midwicket boundary. no timing even though he went really hard, looked like it came off a thickish inside edge. no holding back. this is dreruss time, buckle up
imran tahir to russell, no run, defended back, tahir sprints to his left to stop
santner to shubman gill, 1 run, driven down to long-off
santner to karthik, 1 run, swept all along the ground to deep backward square leg
santner to karthik, 1 run, nurdled round the corner towards fine leg
imran tahir to shubman gill, no run, dabbed into the off side for a quick single
imran tahir to karthik, 1 run, driven firmly to deep cover
imran tahir to shubman gill, 1 run, leading edge down to long-off
chahar to shubman gill, no run, slower ball, wide ball or is it? no, not given as umpire nandan reckons this was within the wide line. touch-and-go call
chahar to shubman gill, 1 run, flicks uppishly, on the bounce to deep square leg
chahar to chawla, 1 run, uses the pace to help this down to third man
chahar to shubman gill, 1 run, ugly hoick across the line, no timing, off a thick inside edge to deep midwicket
thakur to chawla, 1 run, tucks this gently towards square leg to bring shubam gill back on strike
thakur to shubman gill, no run, slapped back! shardul put his right hand out on the followthrough but can't grab it. ufff, that should hurt. don't even think of calling it a missed chance
thakur to shubman gill, no run, drilled on the bounce to mid-off
gurney to watson, no run, well bowled, nips back at waston and there's a strangled appeal for lbw, not especially close to that...outside the line of off stump. but some nibble
narine to rayudu, no run, plays back and pushes from outside off to midwicket
prasidh krishna to raina, no run, over the wicket, beats the outside edge with one pushed across outside off, raina chasing it with a drive
kuldeep yadav to raina, no run, nearly a mix-up! tapped to the on side, rayudu came racing up for the single but had to a swift(ish) turn
kuldeep yadav to raina, no run, pushed to the covers
chawla to jadhav, four runs, and now a lovely bit of a touch play as he opens the face and guides this to third man, such delicate use of the wrists
kuldeep yadav to jadhav, no run, goes right back to defend, this one keeps a touch low and jadhav nearly dragged one back
chawla to raina, 1 run, driven down to long-off
kuldeep yadav to raina, 1 run, driven past point, where there's a misfield
kuldeep yadav to dhoni, 1 run, slapped to deep cover
chawla to raina, 1 run, swept down to deep square
gurney to raina, 1 run, drilled back, bowler tries to parry it onto the stumps but this kisses his fingers and barely changes track
narine to raina, 1 run, swept down to deep midwicket
prasidh krishna to jadeja, 2 runs, sliced over the infield, uthappa running back from cover gets to the ball but can't prevent the second
prasidh krishna to jadeja, 1 wide, bangs one in, jadeja looks to whip it square but misses. wide down leg
prasidh krishna to jadeja, 1 run, glided down to square third man
narine to raina, no run, steps out and hits it back to narine, who hurls the throw back to the keeper
narine to raina, 1 run, squeezes the drive to long-off

chawla to jadeja, 2 runs, backs away and punches this into the gap at deep cover to bring up the winning runs. chennai super kings consolidate their position at the top. seventh win in eight games for them. kkr slump to their third straight loss and have a lot of soul-searching to do. they concerns will multiply further as andre russell didn't take the field after hobbling off early in the chase.
ahmed to shaw, no run,

ahmed to iyer, 1 run, angling into him, defends with soft hands to silly point and they run for a quick single. early call and they would have made it, even if there was a direct hit by the fielder running in to under-arm it
hooda to munro, 1 run, given some air on the stumps, he stays still and slaps it to deep extra cover
abhishek sharma to iyer, 1 run, goes back and across again to flick it to deep square leg
shankar to pant, no run, angled across again, pant has room outside off to free his arms and drive fluently, but can't get past a tumbling extra cover, who dives to his left to stop the ball
ahmed to morris, no run, slower ball outside off, pushes at it but only manages an inside edge back to the bowler
sandeep sharma to paul, 1 leg bye, appeal for lbw turned down as the batsman walked across and tried to tickle it fine. srh review upon the bowler's insistence, and it would have missed leg
rabada to warner, no run, given some room outside off and he chops it hard to point
rabada to warner, 1 run, swiped to mid-off for a quick single
sharma to bairstow, no run, oooh in the corridor and he has bairstow feeling for that one. feet static, has a poke at it, doesn't get an edge, fortunately for him
morris to warner, 1 run, width offered to warner who slashes it to the man on the point boundary
sharma to bairstow, 2 runs, terrific shot slightly slower, bairstow waited a fraction and used his wrists to whip it off his toes to deep midwicket. morris runs around and puts in a diving save
patel to bairstow, no run, flatter on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
patel to bairstow, four runs, outside edge goes for four given some more air, pitches and turns away. bairstow wanted to force it through cover, ends up with an edge that goes fine. no slip of course
paul to bairstow, no run, slower ball, completely beats bairstow. think pant pinged the batsman on the head while trying to throw it back to the bowler
paul to warner, 1 run, flicked to square leg

paul to bairstow, out, straight to rabada at long-off bowled it very wide, just inside the tram-line, bairstow went at it hard, but got only the toe-end. another slower ball. he ends up hitting down the throat of long-off
paul to williamson, 1 run, off the mark with a clip to deep square leg
paul to bhui, 1 run, slower ball outside off, steered to third-man
morris to warner, 1 run, slower one on middle, grips a little, pushed through point for one

mishra to warner, no run, dropped, if it can be called that! quicker one on middle, warner hammers it back flat and hard, but it found amit mishra rather than the other way around. couldn't quite get his hands around it
mishra to warner, no run,
paul to bhui, out, slower ball outside off and that ends an innings that has done srh's chances more harm than good, looked to smash it into oblivion, ended up top edging it to point's left
paul to warner, no run, slower ball outside off, never arrives as warner makes room to blast it through the off side and gets an outside edge on the bounce to the keeper

rabada to warner, out, rabada wins the battle against warner, but he has keemo paul, amit mishra and perhaps even ricky bhui to thank! slower ball on middle, held in the surface, warner tried to go over mid-off, who was in the circle but only had to take a couple of steps back to take and significantly dent srh's chances
morris to abhishek sharma, 1 run,
behrendorff to de villiers, 2 runs,
bumrah to de villiers, no run,
hh pandya to patel, out, and that's the end of parthiv's little cameo! slower ball on off, parthiv pushes at it, there's a bit of extra bounce, takes the splice and balloons straight to point.
hh pandya to de villiers, no run,
chahar to ali, no run,
chahar to de villiers, 1 run,
malinga to de villiers, 1 run, gets some shape on the ball away, and it ends up well wide of offstump. slapped to deep cover
chahar to ali, 1 run,

malinga to ali, out, slower ball, taken at deep square leg. malinga strikes immediately on return and he's got rid of the dangerman. moeen was looking to whip it with his wrists over the boundary again, but the lack of pace means he ends up mis-timing it, and it lobs up to deep square leg for an easy catch

malinga to nath, out, gives him the charge while giving himself room, but only gets a top edge that flies high over his head. de kock calls for it, runs till backward square leg and catches it. nath won't be happy, his tardiness could have cost ab his wicket and he's thrown it away next ball
malinga to negi, no run, slower ball in the corridor, and negi can't get bat on it, while trying to run it down to third man

malinga to negi, out, straight up in the air once again, but it's just an easier catch for de kock. same spot, but it's the left-hander so it's backward point. same shot as nath too, down the track and trying to go over the top straight, but doesn't pick the slower ball, it flies off the outside edge in the air and into de kock's gloves

malinga to yadav, 2 byes, they steal two byes off the last ball umesh has an almighty heave at it, and misses. they run for the bye, the keeper relays to malinga, who has a shy and misses the stumps at his end, so they get another run
saini to sharma, 1 run, another one banged into the surface, jags back into rohit, and he tucks it away towards squareleg
yadav to de kock, no run,
ali to yadav, no run,
ali to ishan kishan, no run,

chahal to ishan kishan, out, comes down once too often another skip down the track, chahal saw him coming, pushed it well wide of the off stump and bowled a top spinner, so not only was it out of kishan's reach, it also hurried through to parthiv, who was waiting to whip the bails off. kishan's adventurousness had paid off earlier, but chahal has the last laugh
ali to kh pandya, no run, stopped on him a bit possibly and bunted back to the bowler
chahal to kh pandya, no run, comes down the track and defends it back to the bowler
ali to kh pandya, no run, given some more air, defended
ali to kh pandya, no run, driven firmly, but straight back to moeen, who stops the ball to complete an outstanding spell. 4-0-18-2
negi to kh pandya, 1 wide, wanted to bowl it wide outside off, but ends up just outside the tram-line. that'll be wide
chahal to yadav, no run, slider, hurries on to him and he has to chop it away while trying to give himself room

chahal to yadav, out, caught at the long-off boundary came down the track to hit over the top, but gets only the toe-end of the bat. the ball travel more high than far and drops into long-off's waiting hands, stretched out over his head and caught cleanly while not over-balancing to go beyond the rope. rcb are not out of it yet, though mumbai should still be favoured to win from here. he was trying to hit with the turn, but the ball perhaps spun a bit more than he budgeted for
chahal to kh pandya, no run, ooh there's that bounce again. quicker one bowled outside off and spins in, bounces much higher than krunal was expecting
mohammed siraj to hh pandya, no run, just inside the tram-line and that will be a dot ball. hardik lets it go, but it's not a wide
