mohammed siraj to hh pandya, 1 wide, that one will be a wide though. well outside the tram line
mohammed siraj to hh pandya, 1 wide, too far outside off stump again. he wants to keep it out of hardik's reach but that will be a wide
negi to hh pandya, four runs, smashed width offered outside off and clattered through extra cover. no chance of any fielder to stop it
negi to hh pandya, 1 wide, the pressure tells on negi and he bowls it too far outside off
unadkat to gayle, no run, gets some inward movement off the pitch, gayle is rooted to the crease as he blocks
kulkarni to rahul, no run, stands tall and punches this to mid-off
kulkarni to gayle, no run, slower ball this time, gayle is squared up and takes his hands off the grip to get a thick edge, samson dives to his left to stop that. excellent glovework
archer to gayle, no run, scorching drive, straight to binny at cover point
archer to gayle, 1 run, uses the pace to steer this down to square third man
kulkarni to gayle, 1 run, squeezes this slower delivery towards point for a quick single
kulkarni to rahul, no run, denied width, bunts this straight to cover
sodhi to agarwal, 1 run, flayed away but a good stop behind point to keep it to a single. this one was spinning away from the fielder there
sodhi to rahul, 1 run, steps out and tucks this gently towards midwicket
sodhi to miller, no run, sharp turn but this pitched on middle and leg, spun back in to hit the pad with miller looking to work into the leg side
gopal to rahul, 1 run, eased with the spin to long-off
gopal to rahul, 1 run, eased with the spin again, down to long-off
gopal to miller, 1 run, swept fiercely, down to deep square
sodhi to rahul, no run, deceived by the dip. rahul thinks he can flick it through midwicket and get more runs, but the ball dips and straightens to secure the leading edge
sodhi to rahul, 1 run, slices it through the covers to get off strike
sodhi to rahul, 1 run, tosses it up on leg stump, rahul turns it behind square leg
gopal to rahul, 1 run, quicker delivery on middle stump, rahul spots it and whips it to deep midwicket
gopal to miller, 1 run,
sodhi to miller, 1 wide, legbreak pitching outside leg and turning further away. guess what that's called... that's right. bowler rattled
gopal to miller, 1 run, flatter delivery, spinning away from the left-hander, miller crunches it to long-off
archer to miller, 2 runs, slices it behind point
arshdeep singh to buttler, 1 run, stands tall and bunts it to mid-off for a quick single

arshdeep singh to buttler, 1 run, excellent stop by mandeep at mid-off! buttler reached out to drive, didn't time it well but it still needed some stopping. the young man bowls an excellent first over
arshdeep singh to buttler, six runs, welcome to the ipl, young man says buttler. sashays down the pitch and whips him over midwicket. that sailed over
arshdeep singh to buttler, 1 run, walks across and bunts this to mid-off
arshdeep singh to buttler, four runs, scorcher! too much width and he reaches out to open the bat face ever-so-slightly to play this delightful square drive.
arshdeep singh to buttler, no run, stops on him just a touch, buttler gets a thick inside edge to midwicket
arshdeep singh to buttler, 1 wide, slower delivery but sprays this too far wide outside off
arshdeep singh to buttler, no run, beauty! beats the edge with one that zips across with buttler looking to steer behind square.
mujeeb ur rahman to tripathi, no run, driven to cover, straight to mandeep
mujeeb ur rahman to buttler, no run, leading edge, rolls to cover.
mujeeb ur rahman to buttler, 2 wides, slides this down leg, keeper fumbles and they run a bye too
mujeeb ur rahman to buttler, 1 run, driven wide of cover
arshdeep singh to samson, 1 wide, walks across but arshdeep sprays this further away to negate this, left alone. wide called
arshdeep singh to samson, 1 run, slower delivery that he bunts to cover for a quick single
arshdeep singh to tripathi, four runs, leans into the drive and slices it up and over to the square third man boundary. too much width
mujeeb ur rahman to samson, no run, straightens after drifting in a touch, samson gets a leading edge that rolls to cover point
mujeeb ur rahman to tripathi, no run, pushed into the covers
m ashwin to samson, 1 run, whips this to deep square
r ashwin to tripathi, 3 runs, flayed away to deep cover where mujeeb has hurt himself trying to dive, ends up parrying the ball further away. mujeeb is down on the floor, clutching his shoulder.
mohammed shami to samson, four runs, slips one down leg and samson flicks this fine to beat m ashwin at fine leg. shami bowled that at 144.6, all samson needed really was a deflection
mohammed shami to samson, four runs, dabbed away late to the third man boundary. played so very late, excellent control. samson's on top of his game here
mohammed shami to samson, 1 run, another bunt down to third man
mohammed shami to tripathi, no run, slants one back in from wide of the crease, defended back
r ashwin to samson, no run, straighter one, pushed straight to cover
m ashwin to tripathi, 1 run, good bowling - tossing it up and getting it to dip sharply on the right-hander. so much that tripathi, and his big backlift, decide to just block it through the covers

m ashwin to tripathi, no run, quicker through the air and angled into leg stump. but he makes every effort to turn the ball and turn it he does. as a result, tripathi is badly squared up while he defends the ball
m ashwin to tripathi, 1 run, plenty of width to free the arms, but tripathi can't beat the field, ashwin's placed a deep extra cover there and the ball finds him perfectly

r ashwin to tripathi, 1 wide, stumps him?. ashwin sees tripathi haring down the pitch and slides the ball so beautiful wide outside the off stump. the batsman swings in complete desperation, misses it altogether, but replays show he does have the agility to shove his bat inside the crease before pooran could break the stumps. the wicketkeeper had a huge distance to cover, collecting the ball and breaking the stumps
r ashwin to tripathi, no run, carrom ball, outside off, tripathi flat-bats it back at the bowler
r ashwin to tripathi, 1 run, more carroms, tripathi swings it out to deep midwicket to get his fifty. mild applause from his team-mates but there's no celebration from him
m ashwin to turner, 1 wide, spears the legbreak well wide of off stump, hoping to keep away from turner's hitting arc
m ashwin to archer, no run, the pitch is too slow. new batsmen can't come in and go bang bang. not even archer, who goes for a big hit and ends up chopping it back to the bowler
m ashwin to archer, 1 run, punches the flatter delivery outside off through the covers

arshdeep singh to rahane, 2 runs, steps out of his crease to smear a wide delivery outside off to deep cover. this is good stuff from arshdeep, not giving up the easy leg-side boundary that batsman crave in this stage of the innings

arshdeep singh to binny, six runs, into the crowd again! binny finds the leg side boundary by being a lot more still in the crease; a lot more calm. some of that is due to his batting so deep in the crease, waiting for the slightest mistake. and here he gets the room to swing his arms as much as he wants and swing he does over midwicket
mohammed shami to binny, 2 runs, slower ball, which binny lashes to the left of long-off, and agarwal saves it with a proper sprint and well timed dive. kings xi bossing this
kumar to watson, no run, inducker, he went pretty wide to deliver that, watson stuck in the crease gets a thick inside edge towards squareleg
kumar to watson, no run,
kumar to watson, no run, slower ball outside off, watson has a slash but misses, bairstow, who collected it quite low was briefly interested but none of his teammates were, probably for good reason
ahmed to du plessis, no run, slower ball, angled across, du plessis wants to go over the off side but can't reach it
ahmed to du plessis, 1 run, slower ball on middle, grips a little, du plessis waits for it and then angles the bat to guide it to the keeper's right for one
sandeep sharma to du plessis, no run, slower ball on middle, pushed to mid-on
sandeep sharma to du plessis, 1 run, slower ball on middle, pushed towards the covers with soft hands and they scamper one
ahmed to watson, 1 run, slower ball outside off, holds in the surface again, watson goes hard at it but only manages to chop it away towards point for one
nadeem to du plessis, 1 run, quicker one, angled in, du plessis pushes it to deep midwicket off the backfoot
sandeep sharma to du plessis, 1 run, slower ball delivered from quite wide, du plessis steers it to third-man
nadeem to du plessis, 1 run,
sandeep sharma to jadeja, 1 wide, jadeja comes down the track, but seeing this sandeep has slipped in a knuckle ball outside off, too wide though
chahar to bairstow, 1 run, slower ball on middle, holds in the surface, bairstow checks his drive and chips it towards mid-on for one
chahar to williamson, no run,
jadeja to bairstow, no run,
imran tahir to shankar, 1 run, quicker one on middle, uses the depth of the crease and turns it around towards squareleg
jadeja to bairstow, no run, fired in on middle, bairstow pushes it back to the bowler
sharma to hooda, out, once again skips down but hasn't got it right, more height on distance this time and du plessis takes an easy catch at long-off
paul to sa yadav, 1 run, slower ball, way outside off, and he swings this around to deep midwicket. probably would have been called wide, had he left it alone
patel to sa yadav, no run, flat, and he drives it back towards axar, who dives away to his right and stops this. excellent stuff from the bowler!

rabada to sa yadav, out, got 'im! slower ball from rabada, that just sticks on the pitch a bit, and yadav shapes to scoop this over the fine leg fielder, but the outside edge carries it away towards rishabh pant's right, and he takes a superlative catch diving away
morris to kh pandya, 1 run, slower ball, down the leg side, and he whips this towards long leg
paul to hh pandya, six runs, slower ball, but he has spotted this one. picks it up, and whacks it over long off, and sends it a few rows back!
malinga to dhawan, no run, another slower one, dhawan skips down the track and hits it towards extra cover
j yadav to dhawan, 2 runs, down the track and looks to work it on the leg side, yadav follows him, a leading edge goes through extra cover
chahar to patel, 1 wide, turns too much down the leg side
kh pandya to pant, 1 run, fired flat across him, and he flicks this towards midwicket
bumrah to morris, no run, fast, outside off, and keeps a bit low as it beats morris' outside edge

malinga to patel, 2 runs, slower ball, and he sets up to go through midwicket. gets a slight edge towards the fielder there. there's a direct hit at the striker's end, but the deflection allows them to take the overthrow
malinga to patel, six runs, slower ball, and he has got a hold of this! swings it away, picking it up from outside off, and through midwicket for a big six!

bumrah to patel, out, fast, straight, and he defends this. paul has come halfway down the track at the other end, and bumrah gets to the ball, and throws the stumps down at the non-striker's end. paul was still halfway down the pitch! hard to say if there was a single there or not, but paul was definitely not communicating well enough

malinga to mishra, 1 run, slower ball, outside off, and he looks to drive this. seems to get a bit of an outside edge, as it runs towards de kock, but lands ahead of the keeper. they are able to pick up one
hh pandya to rabada, six runs, slower ball again, and this time he latches on to it and smashes this over midwicket. big six!
gurney to nath, 1 wide, loses his line a bit and way down leg, he'll have to re-bowl that one
kuldeep yadav to kohli, four runs, beautiful shot kuldeep tosses the first ball up, kohli is down the track and drives him straight back and finds the fence
kuldeep yadav to ali, 1 run, stays in his crease and punches this to deep cover from his crease. on off and spinning away
kuldeep yadav to ali, no run, ooh better ball, dips on him and spins away, beats his attempted steer.
chawla to ali, no run, wrong 'un, goes past the outside edge as it slants across moeen ali, and also misses the off stump by a whisker
chawla to ali, 1 run, wrong 'un again, down the leg side, and he swings this around to the long leg region
kuldeep yadav to kohli, 1 run, tosses this up around off and middle, and kohli punches this down to long off
gurney to stoinis, 1 wide, slower ball, back of the hand, but starts way down the leg side. will have to bowl this again
gurney to kohli, four runs, slower ball, but too close to leg stump, and kohli waits on it, moves a bit inside the line, and whips this away towards long leg
gurney to kohli, four runs, angles across him, and he crunches a square drive past point. terrific shot, as gurney had reverted to over the wicket for that ball

steyn to lynn, 1 run, dropped by stoinis at first slip perfect outswinger - was steyn ever away? (and why was he away) - and stoinis clangs it. flew to his right at catchable height. steyn has a smile. would have been the perfect comeback. lynn had pushed at it with static feet
steyn to narine, no run, angled across, well wide of the stumps but inside the tramlines. 143 kph, left alone by narine

steyn to lynn, out, steyn has got his man this time. that seemed to come slower off the pitch, though not sure if it was a slower ball by steyn. lynn pushed at it too early, and pops a simple catch to mid-off. steyn is pumped, and the comeback does have a wicket in his first over, even if a wicket off the first ball was missed
saini to shubman gill, no run, beauty. pacy and in the channel, beats his outside edge. gill was feeling for it, looking to punch
saini to shubman gill, 1 run, slashed hard, the outside edge flies at one bounce to third man
steyn to shubman gill, no run, doesn't give him room this time, straighter on the stumps, patted back to the bowler
mohammed siraj to rana, no run, angled across him and rana is happy to watch it go through
mohammed siraj to rana, no run, angled across again and rana lets it go through again! they can't afford too many of those
mohammed siraj to rana, no run, and this one is closer to off-stump, rana wants to steer it fine, ends up missing it
mohammed siraj to rana, no run, and another leave! does rana know the asking rate is above 10? he lets it go through outside off again
mohammed siraj to uthappa, no run, swing and a miss. siraj keeps this wider outside off, uthappa is tempted into an expansive drive, but ends up missing it

mohammed siraj to uthappa, no run, oooh, just past the outside edge. for all the flack he's got, siraj is doing well. brings this into uthappa and he plays inside the line, caught on the crease a bit. the ball goes past the outside edge
mohammed siraj to uthappa, 1 run, gives himself room again but siraj keeps it outside off and uthappa can only carve it to third man
chahal to uthappa, 1 wide, fired wide outside off, and turns further away. will have to rebowl this one
chahal to russell, 1 wide, fired outisde off, and russell lets it pass. goes just beyond the tramlines
chahal to russell, no run, wrong 'un, fired outside off, and stays within the tramlines. russell leaves it
chahal to russell, no run, fired wide outside off, and russell chases it, but misses out on contact. would have been close to being called a wide, but he gets away with this
saini to russell, no run, slower ball, outside off, and russell cannot get to it. waited for it, but it never really arrived. sinks to his knees momentarily, as saini completes a good over
mohammed siraj to russell, 1 wide, slower ball, but wide outside off. russell chases it, and misses out on contact, on one knee as well. too wide, i'm afraid!
kulkarni to yadav, no run, touch of width outside off, square drives and finds cover
unadkat to yadav, 1 wide, poor delivery, way down the leg side, yadav walks inside the line and allows it through
unadkat to yadav, 1 run, tapped away to keep the strike
parag to yadav, no run,
gopal to de kock, 1 run, goes back in the crease and takes this from outside off to deep midwicket
unadkat to de kock, 1 run, a slower ball, at the stumps, nudged into midwicket...has a decent chance for a hundred
gopal to yadav, 1 run, it's a wrong 'un again, whipped in the air, one bounce to deep midwicket
unadkat to hh pandya, 1 wide, again he goes for that wide line, and ends up slanting the ball too wide. attempted slower one this time
hh pandya to samson, no run, beats the edge this one, just a little shape away, playing away from his body looking for another glide to third man but wasn't in as much control

kh pandya to samson, four runs, that's just as good! he's looking a million dollars at the moment. stays still this time, drives with a slightly open face and threads the gap through the covers, wide of long-off. such timing.
malinga to samson, 4 byes, oops! a lovely slower ball, defeats samson's attempt to angle it away, reaches de kock on the second bounce and he can't take it. bonus runs
bumrah to smith, 2 runs, goes deep in the crease, tucks a straight delivery into midwicket and placed nicely for the second
malinga to smith, four runs, strong shot! some width outside off, he powers through the line and slices it through backward point to third man
malinga to smith, 1 run, gets across to off stump, the bottom hand takes over as he plays a bottom-handed whip to deep square
markande to smith, no run, the bottom hand comes off the bat as he drives to cover
chahar to parag, no run, lovely delivery! sharp spin from this leg-break, he ends up square-on to the bowler

hh pandya to smith, 1 run, and again, angles it in from wide of the crease. this time he sits leg-side of the ball and looks to slap it through point, but the ball stops on him and he hits it into the covers without much power at all
bumrah to smith, 1 run, and again, a big shuffle across from smith to try and work it from outside off. only manages an inside edge into his pad

sharma to rahul, no run, pushed a little straight, well fielded by shkhar dhawan at square leg, and the two batsmen are standing mid-pitch... time enough, though, for rahul to get back. bit of yes, no, maybe from the pair there
lamichhane to rahul, no run, pushed through quicker, this one is tapped away
sharma to gayle, no run, angled across the left-hander, gayle bides his time and pokes towards mid-off
lamichhane to gayle, no run, lobbed up slower on the stumps, gayle defends this time
rabada to agarwal, no run, good wheels on off, agarwal defends
sharma to gayle, no run, dug in again, climbing through outside off, gayle lets it go
mishra to gayle, six runs, smashed into the night sky! gayle trying to bring down a ufo... mishra goes the distance from the final ball of the over, royally spannered into the croid at deep midwicket

patel to miller, out, strikes first ball! miller slam dunks himself, picking out deep midwicket! he came down the pitch but got under the ball, going towards the longest part of the ground, more height than trousers and it's well taken by shaw
patel to mandeep singh, 1 run, flat on the stumps and mandeep flicks it fine
patel to gayle, 1 run, pushed through outside off, gayle satisfies himself with another punch from the crease
patel to gayle, 1 run, darted on the stumps and gayle pushes into a gap for one more
mishra to gayle, six runs, dragged down, more tap from the boss! smoked into the crowd at deep midwicket! that's meat and drink once again, gone back many a row...
mishra to gayle, 1 run, oh dear, nearly a run-out chance! pushed into the off side and gayle was slow to get going, not sure how close it would have been with a direct hit at the bowler's end
patel to mandeep singh, no run, darted, a touch wider, steered to point
lamichhane to curran, no run, good bowling, gets it drift across and turn into curran who can only push it back

lamichhane to curran, out, another wrong 'un does it curran had no clue, and he was looking to jab it away, but it bounced a bit more and came on slower and he ends up popping it back for the easiest of return catches.
mishra to mandeep singh, no run, ooh, that had him caught in two minds. drifts on leg and spins sharply across, kept out at the last moment

patel to mandeep singh, out, got him mandeep gave him the charge, but axar out-smarted him, and fired it in well wide of off stump - though within the tramlines. pant collects and whips off the bails.
sharma to harpreet brar, 1 wide, angling across too far outside off and he'll have to bowl that again
sharma to harpreet brar, 1 wide, too far outside off once again, he's not getting his radar right, wanting to angle across and make him reach for it. but too wide

curran to dhawan, 2 runs, slower ball and he hacks to leg, big top edge from dhawan, it's swirling towards fine leg... but shami doesn't get anywhere near it! a swirling chance, up into the glare of the lights, and it didn't look like he picked it up running back from the circle
mohammed shami to shaw, six runs, shami is now tonked for the first six! whirled away over deep backward square by shaw! right out of the screws and into the crowd

viljoen to dhawan, out, chipped into the covers, dhawan comes and then changes his mind... and mandeep hits the stumps at the non-striker's end with shaw stranded! give his partner a reproachful look, it was dhawan's call but he decided it wasn't on way too late for shaw to get back. excellent throw to hit one-and-a-bit stumps
harpreet brar to dhawan, six runs, round the wicket, and sliding through outside off, dhawan dances... and clears long-off in a blink! clattered for six. welcome to the ipl, son
harpreet brar to iyer, four runs, darted quickly just outside off, iyer is back and slashes past the infield, opens the faces and sends the ball fizzing behind point for his first boundary
harpreet brar to iyer, 1 run, lobbed up and tapped into a gap
r ashwin to dhawan, 1 run, uses the feet, pushed into the off side
r ashwin to iyer, 2 runs, flat on the stumps from over the wicket, played softly into the leg side and iyer immediately makes the call for two
harpreet brar to iyer, 1 run, pushed through and chopped into the covers going back
m ashwin to iyer, no run, lobbed up and drilled back at the bowler, does well to get a hand on it
m ashwin to iyer, no run, tapped into the covers
r ashwin to dhawan, 1 wide, round arm delivery, sliding leg side as dhawan flicks at it and misses... they check for the stumping, but his foot was always grounded. just a wide
r ashwin to dhawan, 1 run, round the wicket, angled flat on the stumps and turned through midwicket
m ashwin to dhawan, 2 wides, dew taking effect, maybe...? slips out the hand, well wide of the batsman and rahul can't cling on to it either
m ashwin to dhawan, 1 wide, another slippery soap bar, wide on the off side
m ashwin to dhawan, no run, excited appeal from murugan as dhawan chops down on a leg break... was it pad first? no thought of an appeal
curran to iyer, 1 run, hint of shape across the right-hander, but he is able to negotiate it well, steers it to third man comfortably
r ashwin to iyer, no run, carrom ball, pushed to leg side
r ashwin to iyer, 1 wide, too far down leg and that will be wide
viljoen to iyer, 1 run, on the fifth stump line, gets down low to square drive it to deep point
curran to pant, 1 wide, too far down leg and it's a wide
curran to iyer, no run, angling into him from around the wicket, he was giving himself room but curran followed him. squirted to point
viljoen to ingram, 1 run, angled into him from around the stumps, and pushed to cover. they set off for a quick single. there is a shy at the stumps but it misses. might have been close
viljoen to ingram, 1 wide, loses his line, down legside. wide

mohammed shami to iyer, 1 bye, good work by rahul behind the stumps. iyer backs away to have a thrash at it through extra cover, but the bowler follows and goes between bat and pad. because he has moved away so much it's well down leg side but rahul dives and stops the ball
viljoen to ingram, no run, angles it into him this time to deny room and he squirts it back to the bowler
viljoen to ingram, four runs, ingram's taking charge. he's not going to allow another botched chase on his watch. super shot this, gave himself room and drove it from his toes through extra cover.

mohammed shami to ingram, out, knocked him over ingram wanted to finish it off in a hurry perhaps, danced down the track to drive and ends up yorking himself. ball screams through and knocks the middle stump out of the ground. still time for a twist?

curran to rutherford, 1 run, smashed back with incredible power straight over the bowler, but long-off runs in and collects on the bounce. great work from miller. rutherford thought it was a boundary and only set off for a run late
kumar to lynn, 1 wide, very far down leg first ball, but he'll be encouraged by the movement though it's a wide
nadeem to narine, 1 run, mis-field by yusuf at mid-off given air outside off and narine drives it well but straight to yusuf. poor fielding to let it slip through
sandeep sharma to lynn, 1 run, hint of shape, but he bowls a leg stump line first up and is tucked to mid-on
nadeem to lynn, 1 run, similar line, homing into leg and lynn goes deep in his crease this time to whip it to the bowler's right

nadeem to lynn, 1 run, down the track and patted back to the bowler. quick thinking from nadeem there, who gathered the ball and flicked it towards the stumps with dk having taken a start, but it misses and they get a single
rashid khan to lynn, 2 runs, good lenght again, turning away from off, lynn goes deep in his crease to whip to midwicket
nadeem to lynn, 1 run, lynn makes room, nadeem follows him, but the batsman tucks it away with the angle towards squareleg
nadeem to singh, 1 run, flatter on off, pushed to cover's left off the backfoot
sandeep sharma to singh, 1 run,
ahmed to lynn, 1 wide, slower ball, angled across but too wide and called by the umpire
ahmed to lynn, 1 wide, slower ball angled across again, too wide again and called
ahmed to singh, 1 run, slower ball on middle, chipped towards deep midwicket for a single
kumar to singh, four runs, slower one outside off, too much width and he slaps it through the covers for four
ahmed to russell, 1 wide, slower ball, angled across, russell watches it through to the keeper and the umpire calls it wide, almost as an afterthought
ahmed to lynn, no run, slower ball outside off, lynn has an ugly swing, is too early into the stoke and it takes the toe end of the bat towards point
ahmed to lynn, four runs, slower ball outside off, makes lynn reach for it and he obliges, getting enough bat on it to slice it behind point for four
ahmed to lynn, no run, slower ball, angled across, lynn attempts the same stroke but misses

ahmed to lynn, out, slower ball outside off, lynn goes deep in his crease and tries to blast it over the covers, only managing to get it off the splice and offering a running catch to williamson, who came running in
rashid khan to chawla, no run,
rashid khan to chawla, no run,
gurney to warner, 1 wide, that's too far down leg and he'll have to rebowl that
gurney to warner, no run, down leg, but it flicked his pad. karthik collects
prithvi raj to warner, 1 run, looking to attack again, gives himself room but raj follows him and warner is only able to slap it away past the bowler

narine to warner, 1 bye, what's happened there? warner played inside the line to one on leg and spinning away, it flicked something and rolled off karthik's pad even as he was appealing. beautiful ball but no dismissal there. didn't hit warner's pad
narine to bairstow, 1 run,
cariappa to bairstow, 1 wide, starts off with one that is down leg for a wide
cariappa to warner, 2 runs, gives himself room and slaps this through extra cover. there is a fielder there but these two sprint hard and they get two
chawla to bairstow, 1 run, quicker and flatter outside off, dabbed towards point for a quick single
prithvi raj to bairstow, 1 run, slower ball outside off, pushed to deep cover
narine to bairstow, 1 run,

prithvi raj to warner, out, finally, some luck for the debutant! it might be too late, but a massive first wicket nevertheless. warner tried to heave this across the line, it was a slower ball and the slowness beat him as he was early into the stroke
narine to williamson, no run, stifled appeal for lbw as williamson plays back but would have missed leg
chahar to patel, no run, angling across, moving away from him this time, parthiv has a flash at it, misses

chahar to kohli, out, got him! chahar has been testing him outside off and he gets him. in the channel, some shape away and kohli is drawn irresistibly into an expansive drive. gets a healthy edge and dhoni tumbles to his right to hold on.
chahar to de villiers, no run, keeps it well wide of off and ab is happy to watch it go through
chahar to de villiers, no run, down the track, but doesn't get hold of it, the ball goes to square leg off an under-edge. ab was looking to go straight back over the bowler
thakur to patel, six runs, and the half-chance is followed by a lovely pick-up shot by parthiv, who uses his wrists and flicks it over fine leg for maximum
thakur to de villiers, four runs, now he gives himself room and lofts this straight over the bowler and once bounce into the boundary. started tentatively, but ab is finding his groove
jadeja to nath, 1 run, given some air outside off and nath drives fluently again, but more softly this time. so only a single
jadeja to patel, no run, spinning into him from outside off, he goes deep in his crease and turns it to the onside
jadeja to nath, no run, flatter on off, driven to extra cover
jadeja to nath, 1 run, slowed it up a touch and nath waits for it and pushes it between the fielders on the offside to pick up a single
imran tahir to nath, 1 run, flattish on off, driven down to long-off
imran tahir to nath, no run, flatter on off, pushed toards mid-on
imran tahir to nath, 1 run, top-spinner on the stumps, he plays down the wrong line and gets a thick outside edge to point
imran tahir to patel, 1 run, stays back and slaps this past mid-off
jadeja to nath, 1 run, goes a bit wider and fires it into the stumps, he pushes it into the offside
jadeja to nath, 1 run, flatter and quicker, fired in on leg stump, he pushes it into the offside again and gets a quick single
bravo to ali, 2 runs, a slower one around off, moeen swings it over the bowler's head, doesn't get the power behind it
saini to du plessis, no run, pushed into the offside
steyn to du plessis, no run, gets this to swing in to him now, and it's jabbed to mid-on

yadav to du plessis, no run, oh my word how has that missed shaping away from him and in fact it shaved the stump. at 141 kph, but the bails stay nailed on. faf's lucky day. he was square up and missed it, should have been bowled, but he's still there. umesh has a wry smile

steyn to jadhav, no run, down legside and parthiv is going up in appeal. think it flicked pad perhaps. but kohli has gone for a review. and yes, it flicked the pad. no bat involved there. so rcb will lose a review.
yadav to rayudu, 1 run, goes across to play this into the legside
negi to dhoni, 1 run, too much width outside off and turning away, dhoni stays in his crease, transfers weight back and slaps it past cover

stoinis to dhoni, 1 leg bye, kohli misses a run out chance some uncertain running there. dhoni had inside edged onto pad and it dropped near him. they set off for a run after hesitating. kohli is sprinting in and under-arms to the stumps but misses. rayudu stays
stoinis to rayudu, 1 run, steered to third man
sharma to rahane, no run, slower ball on off, waits for it and defends
sharma to rahane, no run, slower ball, angled in, rahane backs away and has an ugly swing, doesn't make any contact
patel to smith, 1 run, quicker one on middle, pushed to mid-on's right and they scamper a single
morris to rahane, 1 run,
morris to smith, 1 run, slower ball on middle, spotted by smith and picked up towards squareleg's left
mishra to smith, no run,
rutherford to rahane, 1 wide, starts off with a wide down the leg side. the batsman has a swipe at it, but it keeps going further down the leg side
morris to rahane, 1 run, slower ball, outside off, and he runs it down to third man
morris to rahane, 1 run, slower ball, and he plays it towards third man

sharma to rahane, 2 runs, slower ball, on the onside, and he has tucked this away towards midwicket. he wants two...he gets two! well played, ajinkya rahane. held this innings together, and played some gorgeous strokes

sharma to turner, out, gone again! slower ball, outside off, and he was looking to get towards covers, but just popped it up towards rutherford at cover. third golden duck in a row! somewhere, you just know ajit agarkar is watching and smiling :)
kulkarni to dhawan, 1 run, slower ball outside off, uses his wrists to push it to deep cover
unadkat to shaw, no run, slower ball on middle, pushed to mid-on
unadkat to shaw, 1 run, slower ball on middle, agricultural swing across the line from shaw earns him a single down to deep squareleg
unadkat to dhawan, 1 run, slower ball on middle, dhawan shuffles across and tucks it away to deep squareleg
gopal to dhawan, no run,
gopal to dhawan, no run, quicker on off, driven to mid-off
archer to dhawan, 1 run, slower ball outside off, extra bounce, dhawan rides it well and steers it to third-man
kulkarni to dhawan, no run, slower ball outside off, drilled towards extra cover and turner dives to his right and keeps dhawan on strike
parag to shaw, 1 run,
parag to pant, 1 run, lenght, and he pushes this towards midwicket and picks up one
unadkat to shaw, four runs, slower ball, and he gets a hold of it and swings it away towards backward square leg. a game effort from the fielder at deep midwicket, but he cannot keep it inside
kulkarni to pant, 2 runs, slower ball, outside off, and he whips this away with his wrists towards backward point. easy couple on offer
unadkat to pant, 2 runs, slower ball, and he reads it well and flicks this away towards backward square leg and picks up a comfortable two
unadkat to pant, 1 run, slower ball, and he flicks this away towards deep midwicket
archer to shaw, no run, moves away and tries to drive a slower ball pitched outside off. goes straight to smith at cover
harbhajan singh to pandey, no run, quicker one on off, pandey goes back and defends to cover with a straight bat
chahar to warner, 1 wide, slower ball, starts around leg and slips down further, dying to dhoni, who had to dive to his right, called wide
harbhajan singh to pandey, no run, straighter one on off, pandey waits for it, opens the face and guides it to point
chahar to warner, 1 run, slower ball on middle, pushed to mid-on's left for one
chahar to warner, no run, slower one, banged half way into the surface, left alone by warner
jadeja to warner, no run,
jadeja to warner, 1 run, quicker one and flatter on middle, warner makes room and pushes it towards covers for one

jadeja to pandey, four runs, and that's some welcome back. down the track first ball as jadeja spears one down on leg stump. skips away from the line to make swinging room, and absolutely monsters it back over the bowler's head
jadeja to shankar, 1 run, again that quick pace, this time just outside off, opens his bat face to dab into the point region

imran tahir to pandey, 2 runs, down the track to a fairly flat one on middle stump, drives inside-out and du plessis has a lot of ground to cover from long-off, to his right and quite a few yards in off the rope
ahmed to du plessis, no run, slower ball outside off, grips a little, du plessis pushes it to point
ahmed to watson, 1 run, slower ball on off, defended to the off side with soft hands and they scamper a single
ahmed to watson, no run, slower ball, angled across, grips a little as watson swings across the line and misses
sandeep sharma to raina, 1 run, slower ball outside off, pushed to long-off for one
rashid khan to raina, 4 byes, how did that miss the stumps? leg break this time, raina swings across the line again and misses, it spun back in and beat the batsman, stumps and the keeper
rajpoot to patel, 1 leg bye, corrects his line now, targeting middle and leg, parthiv goes for the flick, misses the shot and so has to settle for a leg bye

mohammed shami to kohli, four runs, and this will sting after that missed chance! shami adjusts his line, just outside off, but kohli meets the ball with a scything slap that sends the ball skidding through cover point. that scorched across the outfield
mohammed shami to kohli, 1 run, swatted out through cover point again, but a man's been moved out into the deep in that position as damage control
mohammed shami to patel, 1 wide, shami's trying not to give him any width, but he's sent his line too far the other way and this one scoots down the leg side
mohammed shami to patel, 1 leg bye, parthiv misses a swat into the leg side, but the ball loops up off his hip and there's room enough for a quick single
rajpoot to patel, no run, parthiv sets himself for a mow into the leg side, but he's not got the room he's looking for and the ball is mis-timed to mid on

rajpoot to patel, four runs, picked up over deep backward square! the line, headed towards leg stump, is helpful, and parthiv helps it on its way with a little flourish, lifting his right leg in the air
rajpoot to patel, 1 no ball, massive swooshing drive from the batsman outside off, and he hits only fresh air. but it's a no-ball! free hit coming up
rajpoot to patel, 1 no ball, another huge swipe from parthiv, another play-and-miss, but it's also another no ball. try again
rajpoot to patel, no run, and he switches back around the stumps for the left-hander, pitching it right up to him, parthiv digging it out through gully
rajpoot to patel, no run, nice change-up, a slower ball at 112km/h, and it has the beating of a parthiv drive

mohammed shami to de villiers, no run, and he's almost done first ball! shami tests ab on an offstump line with one that nips in to him, the ball coming off the inside half of the bat and bouncing just past the stumps
rajpoot to de villiers, 3 runs, misfield, and it brings runs! two fielders converged on de villiers' drive to cover, but neither could stop it. the ball is eventually hunted down near the rope
mohammed shami to patel, no run, smeared across the line, but he loses his shape over-hitting it and the ball goes nowhere

mohammed shami to patel, six runs, fetched over cow corner! parthiv is going like a freight train. shami aimed this one straighter, but the batsman was expecting it and clubbed confidently up and over the legside field. this is a cracker of a pitch
m ashwin to ali, four runs, streaky start from moeen, flashing outside off and sending an edge bouncing down to the third man boundary
m ashwin to ali, no run, legbreak at 94km/h, and it's pressed defensively to cover
m ashwin to ali, no run, chopped down to point, where the fielder is in place
r ashwin to de villiers, no run, quick, skidding on outside off, and ab tucks it back to the bowler

r ashwin to ali, out, bowled him! moeen stayed deep in the crease, waiting and playing for orthodox turn, but the ball rushes on to him with the arm, skidding through a little low and slamming into the stumps. and that's that for moeen and ipl 2019 - he's back to england now
viljoen to de villiers, 1 run, ab waits and waits and chops down at the last moment to collect a single to third man
r ashwin to de villiers, 1 run, pushed out through the gap at cover point, just the one
r ashwin to stoinis, 1 run, another push into the covers, but this one is placed well enough for a quick single
m ashwin to de villiers, 1 run, looped up on off stump, ab driving down to long off for a single
m ashwin to stoinis, 1 run, stoinis follows ab's lead, helping himself to a single to long off
m ashwin to de villiers, 1 run, tucked straight of midwicket, just the one
m ashwin to de villiers, 1 run, ab finds a gap on the off side, and keeps the strike
r ashwin to de villiers, 1 run, ab plucks the ball off an off stump line, glancing into the leg side for a single
r ashwin to stoinis, no run, a watchful push finds extra cover
r ashwin to de villiers, 1 run, offbreak at 95km/h, ab nudging with the spin and square of midwicket for one more
viljoen to stoinis, 1 leg bye, stoinis misses a glance at a 142km/h delivery, but they find a single into the leg side off his pad
viljoen to stoinis, 2 runs, nicely placed by stoinis, into the acres of space on the leg side with midwicket on the fence. in fact, there's even time enough for them to rush back for a second

m ashwin to de villiers, 1 run, was this an edge? yes! this is a delightful delivery from ashwin, gripping and spinning across de villiers, who pokes at it and sends an edge flying past the keeper. slip would have gobbled it up, and that's the hundred
m ashwin to stoinis, no run, chopped hard into the covers, where a diving stop saves runs
m ashwin to stoinis, 1 run, nudged into a gap on the off side, and there's space for a quick single
rajpoot to stoinis, 1 run,
m ashwin to stoinis, no run, legbreak, and stoinis pokes defensively at it from the crease
m ashwin to de villiers, 1 run, nice come-back from the bowler, getting the ball right up to him. de villiers can't get anything under the ball, instead driving to long off
r ashwin to stoinis, 1 run, flicked with the spin into the leg side to turn the strike over
viljoen to de villiers, 1 wide, flung much too far outside off, and he'll have to bowl it again
viljoen to de villiers, 1 wide, oh dear, that's slipped out way too wide and he'll have to try again
viljoen to stoinis, no run, stoinis looks to go big on the leg side, but he hits only fresh air
mohammed shami to de villiers, six runs, sliced over long off! how has this gone so far? it looked like de villiers had sliced under this one, but it just kept going and going and going
mohammed shami to de villiers, six runs, and again! same ball, same shot, same result. if anything, he hit this one even better. it didn't go as high, but travelled further
mohammed shami to de villiers, 1 leg bye, another massive swipe, but this time the ball beats the bat and pings off his thigh into the off side
viljoen to de villiers, 1 run, flapped into the leg side, just the one
southee to gayle, 1 wide, plays keep-away with the ball but it slides a little too far outside the off stump for him to win
yadav to rahul, no run, looks to chop and run to point byt klaasen's there and though he's a keeper, he's pretty quick off the blocks. wonder who he's subbing for...

southee to agarwal, four runs, this time mayank goes the other way, stepping across to the off side to play a neat little pick-up to a scramble-seam delivery from southee, raising the fifty. that's kings xi's fastest fifty of the season so far
southee to agarwal, four runs,
southee to agarwal, no run, he spots a little width outside off and throws himself into a big shot, but ball beats bat
southee to agarwal, no run, good finish to the over, keeping things tight in the channel as mayank chops to mid off
chahal to rahul, no run, good start, hurrying rahul's defence with one that rushes on to him
saini to agarwal, 1 run, mayank slashes, but he doesn't get all of this and the ball bounces down to third man, just the single

saini to rahul, four runs, edged to third man! saini finds the channel outside off, and rahul just hangs his bat out at it. there's no slip in place, so it's relatively safe to go fishing. and he's got four for it
saini to rahul, no run, saini keeps the speedometer nudging 140 clicks as he ends his over with another delivery that zones in on off stump and is pushed to cover
stoinis to agarwal, no run, mayank unfurls a handsome leg glance, but it's directed straight at chahal, at midwicket inside the circle
stoinis to agarwal, 1 run, wicket-to-wicket stuff, and it's flicked out to the man in the deep on the leg side
chahal to rahul, 1 run, nurdled straight of midwicket, and there's room for a quick single
chahal to agarwal, 2 runs, glanced behind square, and they hurry back for the second
chahal to agarwal, 1 run, and a nudged single means he keeps the strike
stoinis to miller, no run, and he steps into a defensive push to point to start, finding the fielder perfectly
stoinis to rahul, 1 run, direct hit might have had him! rahul nudged almost straight to chahal at midwicket and just set off. he's only got one stump to aim at, and misses
stoinis to rahul, 1 run, tip-and-run single for rahul, chopping it down close in on the off side

ali to rahul, out, and he strikes first ball! this will dent kings xi's chances even further. rahul was looking to get after moeen straight away, but his lofted stroke comes off the end of the bat and finds southee at long off. it's not the biggest boundary, but the shot doesn't have the legs to beat him
ali to pooran, 1 run, pooran's off the mark straight away with a drive to long off
ali to miller, no run, a diving kohli saves runs, miller leaning into a drive that can't beat the rcb skipper in the covers
ali to miller, no run, miller drives, but again he can't find a gap at cover
ali to miller, 1 run, down to long off this time, just the one
ali to pooran, 1 run, fired in flat on off stump, pooran backing away and chopping to long off to keep the strike
washington sundar to pooran, no run, sundar, finally, is into his work for the evening, sliding one in to pooran to start
ali to pooran, 1 run, pooran backs away and hacks a drive out to long off
ali to pooran, 1 run, moeen spots pooran backing away to leg and follows him, the ball coming off the inside half of a wild swat into the leg side and rolling out to deep square leg

washington sundar to pooran, six runs, pooran breaks the shackles! something had to give, with the required rate ballooning. he makes room and sends the ball arcing deep into the crowd beyond long off
washington sundar to pooran, six runs, and again! pooran backs himself to blast another one clear of the long off fielder, and though he doesn't quite get all of this one, it goes the distance
washington sundar to pooran, six runs, third one in the over! and it's in exactly the same spot. pooran shimmies and makes room, slamming a 90-metre six into the stands beyond long off
saini to miller, 2 runs, a diving chahal saves runs! he had some work to do after miller timed a slash very well behind square, making ground from third man and then diving to save two
ali to pooran, six runs, a fourth six over long off! pooran knows where his strength lies. he backs away to put a straight delivery right in his arc, slamming it way over long off
ali to pooran, no run, nice comeback from moeen, holding his one back and pushing his line a little further outside off to keep the batsman quiet
ali to pooran, no run, moeen sends this one down wider of off stump, and the ball grips in the surface to beat the edge of pooran's slashing square drive
southee to miller, 1 run, slower ball from southee, down to 115km/h, and miller hands the strike back over to pooran with a nudge to point
yadav to miller, 1 run, miller does exactly as he needs to, dropping the ball close in on the leg side for a quick single
yadav to pooran, 1 run, pooran has almost swung himself off his feet trying to hit this, but it comes on to him just a bit too quickly and he toe-ends it down to long off
yadav to miller, 1 wide,
yadav to miller, 1 run, quick single! miller taps to cover and they just set off. a direct hit would have been interesting
saini to mandeep singh, 1 run,

yadav to viljoen, out, gloved down the leg side, and this game is safe now. umesh greets his fellow quick hardus with a bumper first up, and he can only get a glove on it. parthiv makes ground and tumbles to his left to hold the low, dipping chance, and yadav is on a hat trick as the chinnaswamy finds its voice once more
yadav to mandeep singh, 2 runs, spanked out to wide long off, and that's that
aaron to rana, 2 runs, slower ball outside off, swerved away from rana as he went for the expansive drive, nicked it behind but beat the diving slip fielder to his left for a single to third-man

aaron to shubman gill, out, he's bowled him with a beauty! started well outside off and swung back in sharply as gill came down on it with an angled bat, getting a slight inside edge back onto his stumps
unadkat to narine, no run,
gopal to karthik, six runs, massive karthik breaks the shackles, and that's a free gift of a ball too. half-tracker that gave him plenty of time to rock back and smash it over square leg
archer to russell, no run, gave himself room and wanted to whack it over midwicket but gets a thick under-edge that samson dives to his left to collect one-bounce
unadkat to karthik, 1 wide, loses control of that slower one and pushes it well wide of off stump. outside the tramlines and wide
brathwaite to parag, 1 wide, strays down leg and that will be a wide
brathwaite to parag, 1 wide, goes down leg once again, another wide
narine to archer, 1 run, leading edge that falls in no-man's land at cover. he was moving across to flick it to leg, but didn't read the spin

prasidh krishna to parag, four runs, inside edge goes for four he was moving across and wanted to smash this to cow corner but gets an inside edge. luck is on his side, it goes very fine for a boundary
imran tahir to lewis, 1 run,
bravo to sharma, no run,

kh pandya to vijay, no run, appeal for stumping. big turn for pandya to square vijay up. his back leg rises but has he brought it back down in time? looks like it...yes, a toe and he's safe. this ball gripped and spun past the bat as he looked to play the flick

hh pandya to vijay, six runs, straight over the bowler! he was looking, perhaps, to go over mid-off. but he hasn't picked the slower ball from pandya. luckily for him, not too much pace off that ball and it pings off the middle with his extension and comfortably clears the straight boundary

kh pandya to rayudu, out, straight through him! that's the perfect arm ball if there is one. 99kph, skidding straight on and hitting the top of middle stump before rayudu can gauge what's happened. he's driving for the turn, on the rise, outside off. it skids straight on
aaron to williamson, no run, sharp inswinger, hurries onto williamson, strikes him on the thigh
aaron to williamson, 1 run, the knuckle ball, comes hooping back in, williamson waits for it and pushes it towards cover-point for a quick single
aaron to williamson, no run, knuckle ball, swerves back in but williamson picks it, waits for it and defends it back to the bowler
binny to warner, 1 wide, misses his line, down legside and that'll be a wide
aaron to shakib al hasan, 1 run, down the track but aaron follows him and he can only mis-time his drive to deep extra cover
unadkat to shakib al hasan, 1 run, shimmies down the track and carves it to the man on the cover boundary, but not timed well at all. just a single
thomas to shakib al hasan, 1 wide, walking across again but that is too far down leg and will be a wide

aaron to rashid khan, 2 runs, another slower ball, he's down the track to swat it over cow corner but it takes the inside edge to fine leg. they hustle for two, the fielder there was a mite slow in getting to the ball
shakib al hasan to livingstone, 1 run, slower and angled in, comes down the wicket and pushes it through midwicket
kumar to rahane, no run, slower ball outside off, backs away slightly and crunches it straight to cover
kumar to rahane, no run, slower ball on middle, rahane pushes it back to the bowler
ahmed to rahane, 1 run, slower ball outside off, holds in the surface, first one to do so this innings, rahane adjusts and steers it down to third-man
ahmed to livingstone, no run, slower ball outside off, pushed to extra cover
ahmed to livingstone, no run, slower ball outside off, tries to steer it to third-man but misses
rashid khan to livingstone, out, rashid strikes! quicker one on off, livingstone plays back and gets a feather to the keeper, who latches on to give sunrisers some breathing space
rashid khan to samson, 1 run,
kaul to samson, 1 wide, gets some shape in the air but too far down leg and that will be a wide
kaul to samson, 1 wide, the pressure is telling on kaul, he slides one down leg again for another wide
kumar to samson, 1 wide, too far down leg and that will be wide. srh can't afford these extras

ahmed to smith, four runs, moves across his crease again and khaleel is too straight. smith is able to flick it nicely to fine leg. kaul puts in the dive to save the ball, but his boot has touched the boundary. so that will be four
washington sundar to shaw, no run, darted into off, 93kph, some turn straight up, he defends from the crease
washington sundar to shaw, 1 run, flatter, no turn, he punches firmly wide of mid off and takes a single
chahal to dhawan, 1 run, looped up on leg, he tucks this with the spin to square leg
saini to dhawan, six runs, flicked over fine leg into the crowd! magnificent! slower ball on leg, he picked it up and flicked it over the rope!
yadav to dhawan, four runs, he charges and smacks this along the ground back past the stumps! he didn't nail it but played the percentages hitting gun barrel straight
chahal to dhawan, no run, turns this back to the bowler, not much turn for chahal that time.
stoinis to iyer, 1 run, gentle bunt behind point as they scamper a run
saini to iyer, 1 run, square driven to deep point
saini to dhawan, 1 run, steps out, makes room and punches wide of cover for a quick single
saini to iyer, 1 run, driven firmly to mid-off for a quick single
washington sundar to iyer, 2 runs, misfield sat square leg and they're back for the second. very poor from gurkeerat, who is playing his first game
stoinis to iyer, 1 run, chipped but safe, down to deep midwicket
stoinis to dhawan, four runs, scooped over the keeper's head. superbly done, walked across and watched this right till the end
dube to dhawan, no run, steps out to slap this over the infield but has no pace on the ball, loses his shape and timing, straight to point
dube to iyer, 1 run, flat-bats this to long-off
chahal to pant, no run, pushed through across the left-hander, he is back and pushing this into the off side
washington sundar to pant, 1 run, drifting into off, he dabs this into the off side for a single
washington sundar to iyer, 1 run, 99kph, into leg stump, he whips this firmly to deep midwicket
washington sundar to pant, 1 run, darted in, some turn away, he gets a thick outside edge that runs safely to a gap behind point
chahal to iyer, six runs, down the track again and he just clears deep midwicket! again wonderful footwork and he brings up fifty! great innings from iyer

chahal to pant, out, given lbw! rishabh pant reviews. this looked plumb. he hung back in the crease, tried to whip a leg break, hit flush on the knee. bruce oxenford put the finger up straight away. no bat involved. ball tracking says out! pitched in line, hit in line, hitting middle and leg
washington sundar to rutherford, no run, darted into off stump, 96kph, he's back and working this to midwicket
saini to rutherford, four runs, edged fine past patel! fast and tailing away from the left-hander, he gets a thick edge at it flies wide of the keeper. third man is up!
sharma to patel, 1 run, slower ball, he mistimes a drive to mid off and runs well to pinch one
rabada to patel, no run, backs away and plays and misses at a 142kph delivery angled across him

sharma to kohli, four runs, misfield from rabada! kohli pushed it to mid on to pinch a single, rabada raced in to try and pick up and underarm in the one motion and missed the ball! it rolled away for four!
sharma to kohli, 1 run, he skips down to a slower ball and whips this to deep midwicket
mishra to de villiers, no run, leg break on middle, he defends to cover
mishra to de villiers, no run, slider down leg, ab tries to whip and it goes between his leg so it's not a wide!
mishra to de villiers, no run, steps outside leg, drives firmly straight to cover
patel to de villiers, 1 run, punches wide of cover for an easy single
patel to dube, 1 run, leading edge past the bowler, off the mark straightaway
patel to de villiers, 1 run, eased wide of cover for a quick single
mishra to dube, 1 run, steered wide of point for a single
patel to dube, 1 run, misfield by the skipper at cover allows a single, this was slapped hard by dube
patel to de villiers, no run, drip and turn, rolls back off a thick inside edge. ab was looking to drive
patel to dube, no run, steered straight to point
rutherford to klaasen, 1 run, bunts it into the off side for a quick single to get off the mark

mishra to klaasen, out, caught by pant! this is brilliant from the keeper! klaasen went to ramp a leg break over the keeper's head, he gets a top edge that goes onto the helmet and pops up onto the leg side, pant races out and dives to complete another great catch! delhi doing everything right in the field in the last few overs.
mishra to gurkeerat singh, 2 runs, he's back and tucking this behind square and runs very well for two
patel to stoinis, no run, darted into off, he's back and punching back to the bowler
mishra to gurkeerat singh, 1 wide, leg break fired down leg and called wide
mishra to stoinis, four runs, he lofts this back over the bowler's head! glorious stroke. reached out and just swung easily through the line with control straight at the sightscreen
lamichhane to stoinis, no run, sharp leg break, he's back and pushing back to the bowler
lamichhane to gurkeerat singh, 1 run, top spinner, he's back and working this to midwicket for a single
sharma to stoinis, 1 run, slower ball wide of off, it deceives stoinis as he swings too early, gets it off the toe to point
rabada to stoinis, 1 wide, slower ball pushed down leg and called wide
malinga to shubman gill, no run, slower ball outside off, swerving away ever so slightly, pushes to mid-off
bumrah to lynn, 1 run, slower ball outside off, doesn't come on, lynn chops it away towards point for one
malinga to shubman gill, 1 run, slower ball on off, pushed towards point for one
chahar to lynn, 1 run, flatter outside off, hammered to long-off
kh pandya to lynn, 1 run, fired in on leg stump, lynn drills it to long-off
kh pandya to shubman gill, 1 run, quicker on middle, pushed to long-off
hh pandya to russell, 1 wide, slower ball, wide outside off, left alone
hh pandya to russell, 1 wide, another slower ball, very very wide

malinga to russell, four runs, how'd he do that? is possibly what malinga is thinking as he looks for his captain on the field. there's a deep extra cover and a wide long-off. russell bisects them with a drive
sandeep warrier to de kock, no run,
gurney to yadav, no run, slower ball, angled in, pushes towards midwicket
gurney to kh pandya, 1 run, slower ball at middle, dragged into the leg side off the inside half
russell to kh pandya, 2 runs,
m ashwin to pandey, 1 run, straighter ball, skids into the right-hander on leg stump, pandey shifts his weight back and flicks through midwicket

m ashwin to warner, 2 runs, long hop, but with ashwin bowling a slow pace, it sticks in the wicket and warner, for once, doesn't do well delaying his shot, those milliseconds result in a loss of power and balance. finds square leg on the boundary

arshdeep singh to warner, 1 run, surprises the batsman with a banged-in slower ball on off stump. warner, almost coming down the track, has to stop and then adjust to the lack of pace and then chop it through point
mujeeb ur rahman to mohammad nabi, 1 wide, another one that he wants to hide outside off, but skirts the wrong side of the wide line
mohammad nabi to miller, no run,
mohammad nabi to simran singh, no run, tosses it up outside off, prabhsimran drills it back to nabi
rashid khan to rahul, no run, goes back and blocks the quicker legbreak outside off

sandeep sharma to rahul, six runs, one-handed! he's deep in his crease. he's reaching down low for the ball. he's lost his shape. but somehow he times it well enough that it sails over the straight boundary
sandeep sharma to rahul, 1 run, walks across, correctly predicting the bowler's plans to hide it outside off, but he mis-hits it down to long-off
kumar to simran singh, no run, beats him. this is class bowling. he knows the youngster is backing away. he knows he can do him if he takes the pace off and keeps it wide outside off
ahmed to simran singh, no run,
sandeep sharma to mujeeb ur rahman, no run, does him with the knuckle ball and mujeeb has already swung himself clean off his feet by the time the ball passed him outside off
sandeep sharma to mujeeb ur rahman, no run, another knuckle ball, another swing and miss outside off
sandeep sharma to mujeeb ur rahman, out, clatters into the stumps and the slower ball takes out mujeeb - a duck and 0 for 66 for him in this game
sandeep sharma to mohammed shami, 1 run, defends the slower ball on middle through midwicket
sandeep sharma to m ashwin, 1 run, it all ends with a knuckle ball that is nudged through midwicket. all very tame
boult to du plessis, no run, beauty first up! hint of movement back in from outside off, faf plays inside the line as it zips through to rishabh pant
boult to watson, no run, absolutely creams the drive but straight to cover
morris to du plessis, no run, hit on the back leg as he looks to flick. this one rolls to the off side
morris to du plessis, 1 wide, poor ball, slips this too far down leg, faf looks to tickle this fine but misses
morris to du plessis, 1 run, flicks this towards deep midwicket
morris to raina, four runs, reaches out to squeeze behind point, but gets a thick edge over the slips. third man can't do much
suchith to raina, 2 runs, ugly hoick, just eludes point! shaw little late to get off the blocks, but he may have not got there even if he started early, i guess. lucky break
suchith to du plessis, 1 run, leading edge that rolls past mid-off
suchith to raina, 1 run, gentle nudge into the leg side for an easy single
mishra to raina, 1 run, eased with the spin to deep midwicket
mishra to du plessis, no run, beauty! drift in and then sharp turn to square faf up
mishra to du plessis, 1 run, gentle dab into the off side for a quick single
mishra to raina, 1 run, another gentle little tuck into the leg side for a single
morris to raina, four runs, flat-batted back over the bowler's head. this is poor bowling from morris
morris to raina, no run, bunted into the off side
morris to raina, 1 run, leans into the drive, caressed to deep point
morris to du plessis, four runs, helped along to the fine leg boundary. this is like asking a chennai born-and-bred, do you want idli and filter coffee for breakfast? of course he'll say yes.
mishra to du plessis, no run, driven straight to cover, had to reach out for this
mishra to du plessis, no run, driven uppishly, straight to iyer at cover
harbhajan singh to dhawan, 1 run, direct hit and dhawan was struggled. whipped to mid-on and took off immediately
harbhajan singh to iyer, 1 run, leading edge wide of cover
chahar to iyer, 2 runs, gentle bunt to point as they scamper a run even as jadeja fires a quick throw, misses the stumps at the striker's end and they sneak in an overthrow
chahar to iyer, no run, gets on top of the bounce and blocks
chahar to dhawan, 2 runs, steps out, makes room and slaps this to cover where bhajji misfields to give away two. to be fair though this was struck really hard
harbhajan singh to iyer, 1 run, nudged into the gap at midwicket
harbhajan singh to dhawan, no run, slider from around the stumps, dhawan defends from the crease
chahar to iyer, 1 run, dab into the off side for a quick single
chahar to iyer, 1 run, dabs between cover and point
harbhajan singh to iyer, four runs, backs away and slaps this wide of the diving point fielder, top shot

imran tahir to pant, out, open the gates at wallajah road, tahir's coming! because pant has picked out bravo at long-off. was tossed p again, pant couldn't hold back. just looked to belt it but ended up hitting it flat and hard. good catch
imran tahir to ingram, no run, driven firmly but straight to cover
imran tahir to ingram, 1 run, firm push to long-off for a single
imran tahir to iyer, 1 run, driven firmly to long-off
jadeja to iyer, 1 run, driven with the spin to wide long-off for a single
jadeja to patel, no run, off a thick inside edge to midwicket. looked to hit it a lot straighter
bravo to patel, four runs, carved behind point, harbhajan gives up the chase very quickly at square third man. lovely from axar
bravo to patel, 1 run, top-edge but lands safe, on the bounce to deep square
bravo to patel, 1 run, driven firmly to mid-off, quick single taken
bravo to patel, no run, flayed away but straight to point
jadeja to iyer, 1 run, eased to the left of cover
jadeja to patel, 1 run, some bite off the deck for jaddu, axar gets a thick inside edge to deep square

jadeja to morris, out, past the edge. past the edge before he knew what had come. ripping break away as he looks to defend with less than half a stride. and his back leg is up! dhoni has stumped and gone back to his pose...but he might have his man...he does! a stumping so quick i don't think even dhoni was aware what just happened! the capitals are crumbling.
imran tahir to mishra, out, is that an edge? yes! mishra leans in and pokes feebly at a ferocious legbreak outside off. thin edge. dhoni hangs on. of course. and a massive win is sealed

kumar to sharma, four runs, misfield! well, speaking of thampi, this is a sloppy start from him in the field. rohit slashes a rising delivery down to third man, and what should be a simple stop instead results in four runs as thampi is slow creaking down to it and lets the ball past him
kumar to sharma, 1 wide, whoops, this one goes awry, spilling too far outside off to open the extras column with a wide
ahmed to de kock, 1 run, his first delivery slips towards quinny's legs, and he's milked down to fine leg to get off the mark
ahmed to sharma, four runs, width offered, and rohit chops it firmly away behind point. there was a touch of toe-end to the shot, but it's placed wide of third man's right and brings four more
mohammad nabi to de kock, no run, his first ball rushes on to de kock, taking a thick inside edge of his poking defence
mohammad nabi to de kock, 1 run, de kock backs away, looking to give himself room, and though nabi follows him he can't stop a thump back down the track in his follow through

mohammad nabi to sharma, 1 run, tucked into the leg side, where vijay shankar swoops from midwicket and has a shy with one stump to aim at. it's an excellent throw, and a direct hit, but rohit's bat is grounded behind the line before contact is made
mohammad nabi to de kock, 1 run, using the angle, de kock flicks a single out to deep square leg
kumar to de kock, no run,

rashid khan to de kock, no run, rashid ends an excellent first over with another dot, de kock setting himself for a thwack into the leg side but picking out the fielder at midwicket, inside the circle
mohammad nabi to de kock, 1 run, de kock waits and dabs the ball down behind point, nipping through for a quick single
mohammad nabi to de kock, 1 run, rushing on with the arm, and de kock swipes out into the deep on the leg side
mohammad nabi to yadav, 1 run, flicked into the leg side with plenty of bottom hand, but it's not as well struck this time so it's just a single
mohammad nabi to de kock, 1 run, flicked off the toes for one more
basil thampi to de kock, 1 run, whipped firmly out into the leg side, but there's protection in the deep
basil thampi to de kock, four runs, placed through backward point, de kock making room and lacing this forcing stroke right at the top of the bounce
basil thampi to de kock, 1 leg bye, de kock looks to make room again, but thampi follows him and they pinch a single as the ball zips past an attempted glance and ricochets off his pad
mohammad nabi to de kock, 1 run, de kock backs away again, almost making too much room as he has to reach for this one and squeezes it away through cover point off the very end of the bat
basil thampi to hh pandya, six runs, thampi once again bowls at the batsman, hardik is standing at the off stump and moves further across and flicks it over deep midwicket, all the way for a six
sran to saha, 1 run, good riposte! sran bends his back to gain some lift at a shade under 140km/h, saha hopping to fend through gully
sran to guptill, no run, and guptill opts to start with that rarest of t20 strokes - the leave outside off
sran to guptill, 1 run, slightly too straight from sran, and guptill's off the mark with a nurdle close in on the leg side
sran to saha, 1 run, sran finds some seam movement across saha, who hops to fetch the ball softly into space on the leg side, keeping the strike
malinga to saha, no run, and there's some early shape for him! malinga bends his first ball away from saha's groping defensive push outside off, beating the outside edge
malinga to saha, no run, another outswinger from malinga, but this one's not quite as extravagant and it's negotiated easily enough by saha

malinga to guptill, four runs, and guptill toe-ends one past slip to get off the mark! there was width, so the shot was on, but guptill wasn't in control as he flailed outside off and sent the ball bouncing down to third man
sran to saha, no run, saha looks to angle a rising ball down to third man, but he picks out the gully fielder
sran to saha, 1 wide, sprayed down the leg side, and it's a wide
sran to guptill, six runs, lofted handsomely over long off! guptill spots one in his own half and sends the ball soaring way, way over the boundary with a clean swing of the blade
bumrah to saha, 1 run, bumrah finds some seam movement in to saha, the ball taking a thick inside edge and rolling into space behind square
bumrah to guptill, 1 run, tapped to cover, and they set off for a tip-and-run single
malinga to guptill, 1 run, dabbed down behind square on the off side for a quick single
malinga to pandey, 2 runs, slugged into the leg side, and hard running brings two
bumrah to williamson, no run,
chahar to pandey, no run, straighter, pushed back to the bowler
chahar to pandey, no run, nicely bowled by chahar, keeping his line straight and giving pandey no more room to work with
chahar to pandey, no run, looped up on middle and leg, pandey pushing to cover
kh pandya to shankar, 1 run, and he's off the mark straight away, placing a drive through cover
kh pandya to pandey, 1 run, placed through cover for one more
chahar to shankar, no run, looped up just outside off, pandey cracking the ball firmly back at the bowler
kh pandya to shankar, 1 wide, speared down the leg side, and he'll have to bowl that one again
kh pandya to pandey, 1 run, tapped into space at cover point, another single the result

malinga to pandey, four runs, malinga looks for a repeat but gets just little bit wrong. that's all pandey needs as he hammers it past the stumps at the other end, gets to his fifty with the four, off 37 balls
gurney to rahul, no run, slower ball, outside off, and he edges this, but along the ground as it creeps down towards karthik
gurney to rahul, 1 run, straighter ball, and he pushes this towards midwicket and picks up a quick single

sandeep warrier to rahul, out, the first wicket comes through! slower ball, straight, and rahul looks to chip this through midwicket. bails out at the last moment, and ends up going straight towards mid on. chris lynn, with a microphone on him as he speaks to the broadcasters, runs across over his right shoulder and takes a good catch
narine to gayle, 1 run, tosses this up around off stump, and gayle eases into a drive towards extra cover
narine to agarwal, no run, tosses this up, it turns into him, and he has to defend this back to narine
narine to agarwal, 1 run, straighter one, takes the outside edge as he shapes to flick, and it pops up towards cover. they hurry through for a quick single
narine to gayle, no run, angles across gayle, pitching on leg stump, and he defends this back down the wicket
gurney to agarwal, 2 runs, slower ball, outside off, and he plays a slightly airy shot through covers. the man at deep backward point will get around to it to limit the scoring to two
gurney to agarwal, 1 run, angles into him, and he plays it with a dead bat towards point and calls his partner through for one
chawla to pooran, 1 run, angles across him, and he plays this away towards backward point
chawla to agarwal, 1 run, wrong 'un, and he goes back and flicks this towards deep midwicket
chawla to agarwal, 1 run, goes back to punch the ball away towards square leg
chawla to pooran, no run, wrong 'un, and he drives it back to the bowler
sandeep warrier to mandeep singh, four runs, deft!
arshdeep singh to shubman gill, 1 run, slower ball, angles across him, and he drives this towards mid on. a bit to the right of the fielder there, and that allows them to get through for a single
tye to shubman gill, four runs, starts with a ball angling across him, and he helps it down to fine leg for four. terrific timing, and placement to get it really fine
r ashwin to uthappa, 1 run, turns into him and he goes back and punches this towards deep midwicket
r ashwin to shubman gill, 1 wide, very wide. once again, tries to switch his run-up. loses control of it entirely
mohammed shami to russell, no run,
boult to livingstone, 1 run, he shuffles down and drives straight of mid off, iyer misfields attempting to gather and throw in one motion but it doesn't cost an extra run
boult to livingstone, no run, slower ball, grips and holds up, he's squared up pushing into the off side

sharma to rahane, out, caught at wide fine leg! it was a slower ball on leg stump, he tried to flick this square but closed the face too early and skied a leading edge to wide fine leg, dhawan ran a long way in but stayed composed to hold the catch comfortably
boult to livingstone, 1 run, slower ball, he drives to mid off and goes with the stroke, iyer fields and fires and hits but livingstone is well home. they check upstairs but he was well in
boult to samson, 1 wide, slower ball dragged down the leg side and called wide
boult to samson, no run, slower ball, on off, he defends to point

sharma to livingstone, four runs, a miscue flies just straight of a diving paul at mid on and away! he charged and swung hard and gets it off the toe, it flew just straight of mid on and bounced away. paul's dive wasn't far away

sharma to livingstone, out, bowled him! brilliant from ishant sharma! rolled his fingers across a slower ball, livingstone swung as hard as he could across the line but was deceived, it went through the gate and crashed into the top of middle

patel to samson, out, huge mix up! what on earth happened here? samson pushed it to cover, he wanted one, lomror sent him back but samson kept running! shaw swooped, had all the time in the world to throw to the striker's end and samson had given up! shaw hit the stumps direct
sharma to lomror, four runs, opens the face and glides it fine of third man! probably got it finer than intended but it was nicely played, opening the face and using the pace and angle
sharma to parag, no run, this is fired down the leg side
mishra to gopal, 1 run, skips down the track, gets a leading edge trying to work against the spin but it goes straight of cover
paul to parag, 1 run, slower ball, on off, he defends to the gap at cover-point and takes one
mishra to parag, 1 run, flatter on leg, he turns this around the corner for a single

mishra to gopal, out, stumped by a mile! terrible shot this. he was under pressure. he ran down the track and stayed leg side, mishra looped it up outside off, it spun sharply away from gopal, he missed it by a long way and had to keep walking. easy stumping for pant.
mishra to parag, no run, slower leg break, he defends from the crease
patel to gowtham, no run, darted into leg, he defends to midwicket and wants one but is sent back
paul to parag, no run, he attempts to step outside off and scoop fine but paul follows with a slower ball and he's taken on the body
sharma to sodhi, 1 run, angled into leg, he tucks this through midwicket and pushes for two but they elect not to go. good call as the fielders swooped
sharma to parag, 2 wides, slower ball pushed down leg, called wide, and pant can't glove it cleanly and they get another run
boult to parag, 1 wide, he delivers a 113kph slower ball down the leg side
boult to aaron, 1 run, slower ball on off, he pushes this towards mid on
rutherford to parag, 1 run, dropped by rutherford! he swung hard getting it off the toe of the bat, it flew low back at rutherford, he got both hands to it but it burst through for a single
rutherford to aaron, no run, slower ball, completely deceives him and he swings and misses
rutherford to aaron, no run, slower ball, he pushes this through cover but they turn down the single so parag can take strike for the last over
boult to parag, no run, fired way wide of off and not called wide !? strange call. parag was a little outside off but this was way wide and unreachable

boult to parag, out, caught at long off! he didn't get the distance this time. he got under it trying to launch over long off but skied it high to rutherford who stood under it and held the catch well.
thomas to shaw, four runs, too straight and he glances this fine for four! too easy for shaw, he just tucked it away neatly
sodhi to pant, no run, a leading edge to cover-point! he just poked at a well pitch leg break that slid on but it went along the ground into the off side
sodhi to pant, no run, looped up on leg, he drives back to the bowler
gowtham to ingram, no run, fired through, he's back and punching back to the bowler
gowtham to ingram, no run, round arm, fired into off, he opens the face and guides it to backward point
gopal to pant, 1 run, wrong un again, he's back and waiting and turning it to the leg side for a single
gopal to ingram, no run, top spinner, he's pushing this to cover-point but can't beat the fielder
gowtham to ingram, 1 run, darted into off, he backs away and hammers this to deep point
gowtham to pant, no run, flatter on off, he defends from the crease
gowtham to pant, 1 run, 92kph, on off, he punches to cover, there's a mix up, but gopal misfields to allow a single
aaron to rutherford, 1 wide, 142kph, fired down the leg side and called wide
chahal to pandey, no run, flatter on the stumps, goes back and looks to flick it away, an inside edge on the back leg
washington sundar to pandey, 1 run, flatter around off, pandey goes back and tucks it towards backward square leg
chahal to williamson, 1 wide, quicker one, down leg. can't connect on the flick
harpreet brar to watson, 1 run, flatter, straighter, and he plays it off the inside of his bat towards square leg
harpreet brar to watson, no run, flatter, straighter one that darts back at him, and he is able to get some bat on to it. close!
r ashwin to du plessis, no run, goes wide of the crease, and delivers a straight ball, defended back to him
r ashwin to raina, no run, fires in a ball towards the middle and leg, and raina misses an attempted flick
harpreet brar to raina, no run, fires one in angling across raina, who tries to run this down towards third man, and misses
r ashwin to raina, four runs, seems like a seam-up ball outside off, and raina runs it down towards third man. smart shot, keeps it wide of gayle at first slip
