bravo to gayle, no run, starts with a ball angling across gayle. close to being called a wide, and gayle has a stare at the umpire
bravo to rahul, 4 leg byes, bravo comes from round the stumps, and bowls down the leg side, and it's an easy leg-glance down to fine leg for four. imperious rahul!
bravo to gayle, 1 wide, wide, and too wide outside off. called this time
bravo to gayle, 1 wide, angles across him, and goes too wide again. cheeky smile from bravo, because that wasn't too far from the tramlines
chahar to gayle, no run, slower ball, angles across him, and he leaves
bravo to rahul, 1 run, backs away to the leg side, and bravo chases him with the ball, and he places it towards deep midwicket
bravo to gayle, 1 wide, wide again, as he goes beyond the tramlines on the off side again
imran tahir to agarwal, 1 run, slider pushed through, he defends to the gap at cover-point
bravo to pooran, no run, dropped at point by murali vijay! just came on, and pooran slices a square drive straight to him and he grasses it. it was a hot chance
jadeja to pooran, six runs, launched over square leg! pooran didn't hold back. it was in his hitting arc and he went with the spin over square leg. that's a huge hit
jadeja to curran, no run, flatter and quicker, he's back and pushing back to the bowler
mcclenaghan to uthappa, no run, cracked hard to mid off, but pollard is in that position and there's no run to be had. another dot
kh pandya to karthik, 1 run, flicked off the toes into the leg side, just the one
kh pandya to uthappa, no run, robbie looks for a big biff over the leg side, but the ball rushes on to him, beating the bat and hitting the pad
kh pandya to uthappa, no run, left alone outside off! krunal pushes this through slightly wider of off stump, and uthappa just lets it past
kh pandya to uthappa, 1 run, pushed down to long off for an ambled single that keeps him the strike
malinga to russell, 1 wide, dug in by lasith, but it's misdirected down the leg side
bumrah to uthappa, no run, bumrah's back, and he starts with a gem of a delivery just outside off that bursts off the track and past uthappa's outside edge - yet another play-and-miss
bumrah to uthappa, no run, he backs away to leg but bumrah follows him, the ball jagging in off the track to beat a whip into the leg side and strike him on the thigh
bumrah to uthappa, no run,
hh pandya to rana, 1 run, hardik switches back to over the stumps, rana shimmying into a leg glance. he doesn't get the best connection, but there's room enough for a quick single
malinga to uthappa, 1 run,
malinga to rana, 1 run, canny bowling, pace off the ball to finish the over, but rana waits on it and dead-bats a quick single towards point
bumrah to rana, no run, and he shoots one across rana's bows, the left hander making some room but missing an attempted thrash into the off side
bumrah to rana, 1 run, direct hit might have had him! rana pushed this just to the left of rohit in the cover, who swoops and shies, but it goes wide
bumrah to uthappa, no run, flung down well wide of off stump, wide of the popping crease, but it's not a wide as uthappa had wandered in that direction too, missing an airy drive

malinga to rana, out, but now he's got to go! rana was looking to smash everything, and he went very deep in the crease looking to smear this over long off. but the connection isn't enough to get the ball past pollard, who trots in and holds a simple catch at long off
malinga to uthappa, 1 wide, malinga loses his radar, and this one is called wide
mcclenaghan to uthappa, 1 wide, and he pushes his first ball too far outside off, and it's called wide. mccleneghan reckons its a harsh call
mcclenaghan to uthappa, no run, well, this is almost an identical delivery, but the umpire lets this one pass. and now uthappa is the unhappy one
mcclenaghan to singh, 1 run, slapped out through the covers, but it's off the toe end and just the one
mcclenaghan to uthappa, 1 wide, mccleneghan gifts another wide, pushing the ball too far outside off as he looks to keep it out of uthappa's striking zone
mcclenaghan to singh, 1 run, another heave to leg, but this time bat meets ball and they take a single off the bottom edge
bumrah to uthappa, 1 run, an attempted heave into the leg side instead brings a single down to long off, uthappa playing a little too early at another slower one

bumrah to uthappa, out, a leading edge, a simple catch! uthappa trudges off, his misery over. the disappointment is writ large on his face as he walks off. it was another slower one, it takes the toe end, and sharma holds a simple catch in the covers

bumrah to singh, out, and rinku holes out off the last ball, aiming to end it with a maximum but getting more height than distance in the shot. hardik and pollard are down on the straight boundary, and it's hardik who calls early and holds the catch
sandeep warrier to sharma, 1 run, thumped into the leg side this time, but rinku charges around the boundary at deep midwicket and parries the ball back into play, saving runs
narine to sharma, 1 run,
narine to yadav, 1 run, flicked with the turn into the leg side, turning the strike over

gurney to yadav, 2 runs, pitched right up by gurney, and yadav flicks into the leg side. this should have been a dot ball, but lynn lets it through his legs at midwicket inside the circle, and it's only another athletic effort from rinku at the boundary that saves the boundary
gurney to yadav, 1 run,
prasidh krishna to sharma, no run,
kh pandya to watson, no run, flatter, straighter, and he defends this back to pandya
bumrah to vijay, 1 run, slower ball, outside off, and he dabs this towards point and gets a quick single. good response from watson, as there was a shy at the stumps on the striker's end
kh pandya to vijay, 1 run, plays a dab towards point with soft hands and runs through for a quick single
hh pandya to rayudu, 1 run, slower ball, outside off, and he runs this down towards third man by opening the face of his blade
j yadav to vijay, no run, sharp turn, back into him, and beats the edge, as well the top of off stump. close!
malinga to vijay, 1 run, slower ball on middle and leg from around the wicket, vijay bunts a single through the midwicket region
malinga to rayudu, 1 run, knocked away through square leg for one

chahar to vijay, out, ...and chahar has vijay stumped. turn, turn turn. big turn! tossed-up legbreak, starts on leg stump and screams away outside off. vijay closes his face and aims it clip it away to the leg side. he can't touch it. ripping turn for chahar, it leaves vijay overbalanced. de kock breaks the bails off. a run-a-ball 26 from vijay - badrinath-esque innings on a very tough track
chahar to dhoni, no run, looks like a topspinner, kicks up outside off past the iffy prod of dhoni
chahar to dhoni, no run, straighter one on off, dhoni deploys a long stride and pushes the ball to cover
j yadav to rayudu, no run, darted flat on off, stabbed away to midwicket. dhoni wants the single, rayudu denies it, dhoni hares back and makes it
j yadav to rayudu, six runs, pushed through on middle, 99ks, rayudu now dares to step down the track. smoked over midwicket. just like that two sixes in five balls. csk are off and running at chepauk
kh pandya to dhoni, no run, drifts in towards off, grips and turns past the outside edge. it wasn't too far away from brushing off stump
harbhajan singh to de kock, four runs, fired in a bit quicker, and de kock hangs back and plays it late towards third man, making sure he beats first slip
harbhajan singh to ishan kishan, no run, flatter ball, and he goes back and plays this defensively. takes a little of the outside edge and runs away towards first slip
chahar to sa yadav, four runs, strays in line, down the leg side, and he shuffles across and glances this away to fine leg

bravo to ishan kishan, 2 runs, slower ball, and it took forever to reach kishan, who was looking to swing this away towards fine leg. half-appeal from bravo, but it did catch the toe-end of the bat, directed at leg stump
imran tahir to ishan kishan, 1 run, turns into him, and he whips this away towards square leg
imran tahir to sa yadav, no run, wrong'un, suryakumar does not pick it and falls over, heading down leg side
harbhajan singh to ishan kishan, no run, kishan falls over the flick takes this one the pad
harbhajan singh to ishan kishan, 1 run, slides on outside off, run away past second slip
jadeja to ishan kishan, 1 run, pushed through outside off and spins back in, whipped away into the leg side. smart batting from kishan and suryakumar

imran tahir to ishan kishan, 4 wides, starts on middle and spins down the leg side, kishan lets it go, away from the reach of dhoni. harbhajan runs back, dives belatedly, and scoops the ball back near the fine leg boundary
imran tahir to sa yadav, 1 run, pushed through on middle and leg, whipped through midwicket

jadeja to sa yadav, four runs, jadeja finds the outside edge but it eludes the reach of watson. okay, dropped it is. drifts in and turns away, poked away, watson dives away to his left and goes with one hand but the ball pops out
imran tahir to hh pandya, no run, slower legbreak outside off, whisked back to tahir
jadeja to sa yadav, no run, jabbed to point, pandya searches for a single but is sent back

boult to guptill, six runs, he's spliced it for six!. boult went wide outside off again and guptill threw his hands at it, one hand ended up coming off the bat and the bat also turned in his hand, but he still got enough on it to loft it over the cover boundary

sharma to guptill, no run, was backing away to give himself room to have a thrash at it, but ishant follows him with one that is nipping back in. guptill ends up pushing it towards silly mid-on and thinks about a single, but is sent back
paul to pandey, 1 wide, and that is one down legside, so it'll be another wide
paul to williamson, 1 wide, keemo needs to get his line sorted. another one well down leg side and another wide
mishra to pandey, no run, top spinner, hurries on to him and he pushes it towards point, wants a single but is sent back
patel to pandey, 1 run, gives himself room and pushes towards mid-off
paul to williamson, 1 run, slower ball, outside off, and he drives this towards backward point
rutherford to williamson, no run, slower ball, comes back into him, and he drops it at his feet. too close to him to consider going for a run

sharma to williamson, four runs, slower ball, and he has got a hold of this, whipping it in the air towards deep backward square leg. boult dives to his right, in going for the catch, but it lands just ahead of him, and goes through for four
paul to hooda, 1 wide, slower ball, wide of off stump, and called wide, as it goes beyond the tramlines

paul to hooda, 1 wide, out, slower ball, outside off, and they have tried to go for a single. there's a throw at the non-striker's end. the batsman collided with the bowler. they are conferring about whether shreyas iyer wants to withdraw the appeal. the umpires. iyer, rishabh pant everybody in there. and eventually delhi want the appeal to stand. paul was looking to go for the ball, and in the process his leg stuck out a bit as hooda was getting to the non-striker's end. it was also called a wide, by the way
paul to rashid khan, out, slower ball, and he looks to go towards midwicket, but gets an edge, through to pant behind the wicket
mohammad nabi to dhawan, 1 run, flatter and darting in closer to off stump, dhawan opens the face and steers to point's right
mohammad nabi to dhawan, no run, flatter and skiddier, dhawan punches to cover

mohammad nabi to shaw, 2 runs, dropped by thampi at mid-off! that should have been taken. shaw chipped this in the air and thampi had to hold it low to his left, but he tumbled and lost balance, as well as the ball
mohammad nabi to shaw, no run,
mohammad nabi to shaw, 1 run, flatter on the stumps, he goes back and whips this to midwicket
kumar to shaw, 1 wide, down the legside and he will have to rebowl that
basil thampi to dhawan, no run, slower ball, angling into him from around the wicket, dhawan was looking to drive, adjusts and pats it back

hooda to dhawan, 1 wide, out, brilliant work by saha. dhawan gave him the charge and hooda spotted that and smartly bowled it down leg. saha had to move well to his right to collect and then come back to whip the bails off, which he does before dhawan can ground his bat. it'll be a wide, but the important thing is, they've broken the opening stand
hooda to shaw, 1 run, walks across and taps this to midwicket to raise a fine fifty. he's come back into the runs in style
rashid khan to iyer, no run, defended back
basil thampi to munro, no run, slower ball, outside off, and he looks to go over midwicket and misses out completely
basil thampi to munro, six runs, down the leg side, and he has flicked this deep into the long leg fence. what a super piece of timing this from munro!

rashid khan to patel, out, turns back into him, takes the inside edge and trickles off his body, and saha claims this! what a catch, and another wicket for sunrisers hyderabad. rashid khan turning it on when his team needs it! bowling quick, and getting some purchase from the surface. this is turning into a great period for the former champions, as they are putting the squeeze on this young batting lineup. replays reveal it has hit the pad, though. they don't have a review though
rashid khan to rutherford, no run, leg break, that beats an attempted heave down the pitch. rutherford didn't read it
mohammad nabi to pant, 2 runs, played with the angle, slanting into him, and they run two as it trickles away towards square leg
ahmed to mishra, 1 wide, slower ball, outside off, and it has been called wide. that was close, and mishra did choose to not play a shot
ahmed to mishra, 1 run, slower ball, and he angles this across him from around the wicket, and mishra gets it down towards third man
ahmed to paul, 1 run, slower ball, outside off, and he has whipped this towards midwicket. they want two, but will have to make do with one!
chahar to dhawan, 1 run, bottom edged again, the ball ricocheting off the bat and just past the stumps, and they pinch a single before the keeper's up
thakur to dhawan, no run, down the track charges dhawan, but he flashes under the ball and hits only fresh air
thakur to dhawan, 1 run, good follow-up, dhawan dead-batting to cover for a tip-and-run single to keep the strike
chahar to munro, no run, slower ball to finish, and munro is slightly wrong-footed on his attempted dab to third man, ball beating bat
harbhajan singh to munro, no run, round the stumps comes harbhajan, munro tapping softly to cover
harbhajan singh to munro, no run, harbhajan finds some grip outside off, munro pinging cover with a drive
chahar to dhawan, no run, bouncing over leg stump! dhawan catches a lucky break after he walks down at chahar and bottom edges a pokey shot back towards his stumps, the ball just evading the timber
chahar to dhawan, 1 run, held back by chahar at just over 122km/h, dhawan turning the strike over with a push to cover
harbhajan singh to munro, 1 run, some grip and spin, but munro's back and across to nurdle into the leg side

harbhajan singh to dhawan, out, dhoni juggles, but holds it at the second attempt! dhawan tried to manufacture a glide to third man, but the ball just bounced a little more than he expected. the bounce also took dhoni by surprise, but he manages to cling on to a juggling effort
harbhajan singh to munro, 1 run, munro stays deep in his crease, tapping a single out to long off
harbhajan singh to munro, 1 run, thumped down to long off, harbhajan copping a stinging blow to the finger as the ball passes him, and a single ends the powerplay
jadeja to munro, 1 run, munro doesn't look in control as he flashes at a straight one, the ball coming off the inside half of the bat and rolling into space on the leg side
jadeja to iyer, no run, some grip in the surface! shreyas is setting himself to play to leg, but he's squared up by one that holds up in the surface
jadeja to iyer, 1 run, nudged softly into the leg side
jadeja to munro, no run, pushed back hard at the bowler, who stops it cleanly
jadeja to munro, 1 run, glanced with the spin into the leg side
jadeja to iyer, no run, darter from jadeja, but even the quicker one grips and shreyas has to hurry his dab to point
harbhajan singh to munro, 1 run, munro slashes under a drive, scooping it in the air through point - but the fielder's in the deep
harbhajan singh to iyer, 1 run, some width outside off, but there's protection in the deep so it's only a single
harbhajan singh to munro, four runs, but this time he does! munro breaks the quiet spell with a flashing drive through extra cover. the placement is perfect
harbhajan singh to munro, no run, darted in a little quicker to finish, and munro is content to just keep this one out
imran tahir to iyer, 1 run, pushed through at his legs, shreyas driving through mid on
jadeja to boult, no run, flat, angling into off stump, and boult jabs it back to the bowler, at catching height. miraculously, jadeja drops it despite getting both hands to it

boult to watson, 1 run, chaos! what has gone out there? the ball was tapped to point and faf set off, and then stopped. watto, too, had started to run, stuttered, and now he turns back. the batsman meet mid-pitch in utter confusion! there are shies at both ends, but they both miss and - eventually - faf gets down the other end for a single. phew!
boult to watson, no run, watto looks for a dab down to third man, but he can't beat gully
boult to watson, no run, inside edge, and it might have saved watson as he's struck on the thigh. at least, it stifled boult's appeal for lbw
sharma to du plessis, no run, rising up outside off, faf standing tall to meet the ball and punching to point, where an athletic stop saves the run. capitals are buzzing in the field

boult to du plessis, 1 run, another brave run! faf pings mid off perfectly with his drive, but he was always going to run and he's quick enough to have his bat grounded inside the line by the time the shy swerves past the stumps. it was shreyas with the throw
boult to watson, 1 run, angled down behind point, just the one
boult to du plessis, 1 run, another tip-and-run single from faf, tapping to mid off and setting off. he's certainly keeping capitals on their toes
boult to watson, 1 run, boult finds some lift outside off, watson milking a single down to third man
sharma to du plessis, no run, faf walks out at the bowler, slamming a drive to mid off. this time he doesn't opt for a risky single
sharma to du plessis, no run, once again faf is down the track, giving ishant the charge, but he's undone by a change of pace, flinging his hands out way to early and missing the ball
sharma to watson, 1 run, nudged softly into the leg side, and there's room for a single
sharma to du plessis, 1 run, faf and watto are doing this in singles, as a shot comes off the toe end, trickling to mid on
patel to du plessis, six runs, moosed over extra! this is masterful from faf, who backs away and powers the ball up and over the cover boundary
patel to du plessis, 1 run, good follow-up, faf turning the strike over with a single
sharma to du plessis, 1 run, faf is a little early into this forcing stroke as the ball seems to hold up a little, but the ball rolls into a gap on the leg side and they take a single
mishra to du plessis, no run, faf puts a little more vim in this drive, but he can't beat the cover ring
paul to watson, 1 run, a late dab brings a single to third man
paul to du plessis, 1 run, slower one, right down to 102km/h, and faf waits to flick into the leg side
mishra to du plessis, 1 run,
patel to du plessis, no run, chopped down towards point this time, but again they can't find a run
patel to watson, no run, nudged to point, but straight at the fielder
mishra to rayudu, 1 run, flat legbreak on leg stump, swept along the ground to deep backward square leg
chahar to de kock, 1 wide, the consequence of that six is chahar goes wider and ends up toeing the wide line. de kock cleverly let that go. extra ball, the bowler is under pressure early in the over

chahar to de kock, six runs, sliced for six! backs away to go extra cover but doesn't quite get the timing or bat. went off the thick outside edge. for a split-second, harbhajan looked set to lap it up at square third man but watched this sail over in the end. woah, how did that carry? i really don't know.
chahar to de kock, 1 run, slashes hard to harbhajan on the bounce at third man
harbhajan singh to de kock, 1 run, driven with the spin to long-off
harbhajan singh to de kock, 1 run, steps out to hoick across the line, gets a thick inside edge to square leg
harbhajan singh to ishan kishan, 1 run, brings out the switch hit but toe-ends this to point, they squeeze in a single
imran tahir to kh pandya, 1 run, gentle dab into the gap at point for an easy single
jadeja to pollard, 1 run, tucks this gently into the leg side for a quick single
imran tahir to pollard, 1 run, skids one through on middle and leg, punches to deep midwicket
mcclenaghan to du plessis, no run, driven back to mid-on. hint of late inward movement for mitch
kh pandya to du plessis, 1 run, just eludes krunal on the followthrough! stopped on faf, who looked to work it to the leg side. got a leading edge, finger-tips stuff. lucky break
kh pandya to watson, no run, crunched from the crease but hit straight to point
kh pandya to watson, no run, goes right back and across as he defends this flatter delivery back

malinga to watson, 1 run, a direct hit at the bowler's end from point and watson would've been walking back! this was a gentle bunt, waste of a run, loaded with so much risk. ishan kishan the fielder. lucky break for chennai super kings again

malinga to du plessis, 5 runs, another risky run, this time they'll get four more because there's no one backing up. faf had to put in a dive to beat de kock's throw from behind the stumps. no one covering that from mid-on. this was another slower ball from malinga, bunted behind the stumps. even before faf looked up, watto was off, so he had no option but to go. it's all happening!
kh pandya to du plessis, four runs, steps out and thumps this over the bowler's head, no chance for mid-on. watson had to duck for cover as this was drilled!

kh pandya to du plessis, four runs, makes room to open up the off side and slices this between cover and point. wow, incredible batting this. the decision to follow him by firing it in isn't working for krunal.
bumrah to watson, 1 run, skids one through on off, steered to third man
bumrah to raina, 1 run, glances this fine to fine leg to get off the mark
bumrah to watson, 1 run, once again opens the bat face to ease this down to third man
malinga to watson, four runs, sliced but just past chahar at point! solid, diving effort, but the drive still had enough behind that shot to run to the boundary
bumrah to watson, 1 run, hops back and angles this down to third man
bumrah to dhoni, no run, starts off with a jaffa! angles in and holds its line as dhoni pokes and misses
chahar to dhoni, no run, goes right back and bunts this to cover
chahar to dhoni, 1 run, steps out and laces this wide of cover to get off the mark, off his seventh delivery
hh pandya to watson, no run, chops this slower delivery to backward point. pressure building.
hh pandya to watson, 1 wide, bowls his too far wide outside off, and it's been called rightly so by the umpire as watson let that go
chahar to bravo, 1 run, wrong'un which he eases wide of point
chahar to watson, 1 run, skids one on middle, watson gets besides the line as he defends for a quick single
chahar to watson, no run, put down! this was drilled straight back to the bowler, bobbled out of chahar's hand on the followthrough.
chahar to watson, no run, punches straight to extra cover. end of an outstanding spell. 4-0-14-1. time for a breather as they take the time-out
mcclenaghan to bravo, no run, punches straight to point, pressure building.
mcclenaghan to bravo, 2 runs, slashes this as he gets onto the toes, down to square third man but it's a weak throw from bumrah as they get back for the second
bumrah to jadeja, 2 runs, swung away to the leg side but only to mcclenaghan at deep midwicket
